a  partly submerged glacier cave on Perito  मोरेनो  Glacier .
the   बर्फ  facade  is  approximately 60 m high
बर्फ  formations in  the   titlis  glacier cave
a  glacier cave is a  गुफा  formed within the ice of a glacier  .
Glacier caves  हैं   प्रायः   पुकारा  ice  गुफाएं   ,  but  इस  term  is  properly  प्रयुक्त  to describe  bedrock  caves  कि   contain   year-round   बर्फ   .
in  physics  ,  circular  गति  is a movement  of  an object along the  परिधि  of a circle or rotation along a  गोलाकार   पाथ  .
It can  be  uniform ,  साथ  constant angular  रेट   of  rotation (  और  constant  गति  )  ,  or non-uniform with a changing rate of rotation  .
the   रोटेशन   around  a fixed axis  of  a three-dimensional  देह   involves  circular  गति  of its parts .
the  equations  of   गति  describe  the   गति   of   the  center  of  mass of a body .
उदाहरण   of  circular motion include  :  an artificial satellite orbiting the Earth at constant height , a  स्टोन   जिससे   is   tied  to a rope and  is  being swung  in   वृत्त  , a  car   turning   through  a curve  in   a  race track  ,  an  इलेक्ट्रॉन  moving perpendicular to  a   वर्दी  magnetic  फ़ील्ड  , and a gear turning inside  a  mechanism .
चूंकि   the  object 's velocity  वेक्टर  is constantly changing direction  ,  the moving object  is   undergoing  acceleration by  a  centripetal force in  the  direction  of  the center of rotation  .
Without this acceleration  ,   the  object  होता   मूव  in a straight  लकीर   ,  according to Newton  's  laws of  गति  .
Apollo  पंथ  is a fictional  अक्षर  from  the  Rocky  films  , initially portrayed as the Undisputed Heavyweight Champion of the World .
He was  निभाई  by  कार्ल  Weathers .
पंथ   था   अनेक  nicknames , including The Master of  विपत्ति  ,  the  King of  स्टिंग   ,  The  नाचना   विनाशक   ,  The  प्रिंस  of Punch , The One and Only and The Count of  मोंटे   fisto   .
शहरी  legend states that Apollo Creed 's name is a wordplay on the  रसूलों  ' Creed , a statement of belief used  in  Christian churches .
सब   of   अपोलो   's   चैंपियनशिप   झगड़े  were scheduled  लिये   the   15   गोलाकार   अलहदा  .
Championship fights did not convert  इससे  15 rounds to 12 rounds until 1987 .
Rocky Balboa  is   प्रायः   wrongly  credited  साथ  popularizing the  रेड  , white , and  ब्लू  trunks ; Creed was  the   पहला  man  to  wear them ( latterly worn by Rocky Balboa  in   the  3rd and  4th  installments and finally by Tommy ``  the  Machine '' Gunn (  टॉमी  Morrison )  in  the  5th  installment ) although normally he wore red and white , as seen in Rocky II .
बाल्बोआ   's  signature colors were black and gold—colors  he   प्रयुक्त  in  the   नवीनतम   फिल्म   .
in  the United States  ,   the  title of  संघीय  judge usually means a judge appointed by the President of the United States  और  confirmed by the  संयुक्त   राज्य  Senate pursuant to  the   नियुक्ति  Clause in Article  ii  of  the  United  राज्य  Constitution  .
in  addition  to  the  परम्  Court  of   the  United States  ,   जिनकी   अस्तित्व  and some  पहलुओं  of  जिनकी  jurisdiction  हैं   परे  the constitutional power  of  Congress  to  alter , acts of  कॉंग्रेस  have established 13 courts of appeals  (  also called ``  सर्किट  courts '' ) with appellate  क्षेत्राधिकार   over   अलग   regions   of  the United States  ,  and 94 United  राज्य  district courts .
Every  न्यायधीश   नियुक्त   to  such a  अदालत  may be  categorized   as  a  संघीय  judge ; such  स्थितियाँ  include  the   मुख्य   इंसाफ   और   संबद्ध  Justices of  the  Supreme  अदालत  ,  सर्किट  Judges of  the   न्यायालयों  of appeals , and district judges of the United  राज्य  district courts .
सब  of  ये  judges described  यूँ  far are referred to  sometimes  as `` Article III judges ''  क्युकी  they  कसरत   the   न्यायिक  power  vested  in the  न्यायिक  branch of the federal government by  आलेख  III of the U.S.  संविधान  .
in  addition , judges  of  the Court of  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Trade exercise judicial power  pursuant  to Article III  .
अन्य   न्यायाधीशों  serving  in  the federal courts  ,  including magistrate judges  और  bankruptcy judges , are  भी  sometimes referred to as `` federal judges '' ; however , they are neither appointed by the President  nor  confirmed by the Senate , and their power  गर्भाशयी   इससे  Article I  बजाय   .
See  आलेख  I and Article III tribunals .
The Beretta 21A Bobcat is a  छोटी  pocket-sized semi-automatic  पिस्टल   designed  by Beretta in Italy .
Production began  in  late  1984  , solely  in  the Beretta U.S.A.  सुविधा   in  Accokeek , Maryland .
It  is  a  further  development of the  beretta   मॉडल  20  ,   जिनकी   उत्पादन  ended in  1985  .
Variable Universal Life Insurance  (  often shortened to VUL  )  is  a  type  of   जीवन  insurance that builds a cash value .
in  a VUL  ,  the cash value can  be  invested in a wide  किस्में  of separate accounts , similar  to  mutual  निधि  , and  the  choice  of  which of the  उपलब्धियाँ  separate accounts  to  use is entirely up to the contract  मालिक  .
the  'variable '  घटक  in the  नाम  refers to this ability to  invest  in separate accounts whose  मान   vary—they  vary  क्युकी  they are invested in stock and/or bond  बाज़ार  .
The 'universal '  घटक   in   the  name refers  to   the  flexibility the owner has  in  making premium payments  .
The  प्रीमियम   can  vary from nothing in  a   दिए  month up to maximums  पारिभाषित  by the Internal Revenue Code  लिये  life insurance .
This flexibility is in contrast to whole life insurance that  रै  fixed premium payments that  typically  can  नहीं  be missed without lapsing the policy ( although one may exercise an  स्वचालित   प्रीमियम  Loan  विशेषता  , or surrender dividends  to  pay a Whole Life premium  )   .
Variable  सार्वभौमिक  life is a  प्रकार  of permanent life  बीमे  ,  क्युकी   the  death  लाभ  will  be  paid  if  the  insured   मरता   कोई  time as long as  वहीँ   is  sufficient cash value to pay  the   लागत  of  बीमे   in  the  नीति  .
With  सबसे   if  not all VULs  ,  unlike whole life , there is no endowment age ( the age at which the cash value equals the death  लाभ   राशि  , which for whole  जीवन  is  typically  100 )  .
This  is  yet another key advantage  of   vul  over Whole  जीवन  .
With a typical  पूरे  life policy , the death  लाभ  is limited  to  the  फेस  amount  निर्दिष्ट   in   the  policy , and at  endowment  age , the face amount is  सब   कि  is  सशुल्क  out  .
Thus  साथ  either death or endowment , the insurance company keeps  कोई  cash value built  up   over  the  सालो  .
However , some participating  पूरे  life policies offer riders which specify that any dividends paid on the policy be used to  खरीदें  ``  सशुल्क  up  परिवर्धन  '' to  the  policy which increase both the cash  मान   और  the death benefit over time .
if  investments made in  the   पृथक  accounts  out-perform  the general account  of  the insurance company ,  a  higher rate-of-return can occur than the  फिक्स्ड  rates-of-return typical  लिये  whole life .
The combination over the  सालो  of no endowment age  ,   continually  increasing  मौत   लाभ   ,  and if a high rate-of-return is earned in the separate accounts  of  a VUL  नीति  , this could result  in  higher  मान   to  the owner or beneficiary than  कि  of a  पूरे   जीवन  policy with the  वही  amounts of money paid  in  as  प्रीमियम  .
The outdoor  लकडी   बॉयलर  is a  रूपांतर   of   the  classic wood stove adapted for set-up  बाहरी   जबकि  still transferring the  ऊष्मा   to  interior buildings  .
A mound  of   लड़की  Scout cookies .
This mound contains 74  बाक्स   of  cookies
लड़की  Scout Cookies are cookies sold  by   लड़की  Scouts of the  यूएसए   (   gsusa  ) as one  of  its  प्रमुख  fundraisers for local Scout units  .
सदस्यों  of  the   gsusa  have  महरूम   selling   कुकीज़  since 1917 to raise funds  .
Girls  जो  participate can earn prizes  लिये  their  प्रयत्न  .
There are also  ईकाई   प्रोत्साहन   if  the  ईकाई  as a whole does  खूब   .
as  of 2007  ,  sales were  अनुमानित   at  about 200 million boxes per year .
University Hall
Purdue  विश्वविद्यालयों  , located in West Lafayette , Indiana , is  the  flagship  विश्वविद्यालयों  of the six-campus Purdue University system  .
Purdue was founded  on  May 6 , 1869 ,  as  a land-grant university when the Indiana General Assembly , taking advantage  of   the   morrill  Act  ,  accepted a donation of land  और   धन  from Lafayette businessman  जॉन  Purdue to establish a college of  विज्ञान   ,  technology  ,   और  agriculture in his name .
The first classes were  आयोजित  on September  16   ,  1874  ,   साथ  six  instructors   और  39 students .
Today  ,  Purdue is a member of  the   बिग  Ten  सम्मेलन  , and is  a  well known world-class research institution  .
Purdue  enrolls  the second  largest  student  देह   of  any  विश्वविद्यालयों   in  Indiana  as  well as  the  fourth  largest  international student population of any university in  the   संयुक्त  States .
purdue   offers   दोनो  undergraduate  और  graduate  कार्यक्रम  in  over   211   प्रमुख  areas of study , and is  खूब  known for  इसके  competitive  अभियान्त्रिकी  curricula  .
The  विश्वविद्यालयों  has also been highly influential in America 's history of  विमानन  ,  having   स्थापित  the first college  क्रेडिट   offered  in  उड़ान   प्रशिक्षण   ,   the  first  four-year  bachelor 's degree in aviation ,  और  the first university airport (  purdue   विश्वविद्यालयों  Airport ) .
Purdue  's  aviation technology  कार्यक्रम  remains  एक  of the most  प्रतिस्पर्धी  aviation-specific programs in the world .
In  the   mid-20th  century  ,  Purdue  's  aviation program expanded to encompass advanced  spaceflight   प्रौद्योगिकी  giving rise to  purdue  's nickname ,  पालना  of Astronauts  .
Twenty-three Purdue graduates have gone on to become  astronauts   ,  including Gus Grissom  (   एक  of  the  original  पारा  Seven astronauts  )   ,  Neil  आर्मस्ट्रांग   (  the first  व्यक्ति  to walk on  the  moon ) , and  यूजीन  Cernan  (  the  सबसे   हाल  person  to  walk on the moon  )  .
A sebaceous cyst ( )  is  a term that loosely refers to either epidermoid cysts ( also known  as   epidermal  cysts  ;  L72.0 ) or pilar  cysts  ( also known as  trichilemmal  cysts  ;  L72.1 )  .
क्युकी  an epidermoid  गाँठ   originates   in  the epidermis  और   a  pilar cyst originates from  बाल  follicles ,  by  definition ,  neither  type of cyst is  सख्ती  a  वसामय  cyst .
The name is  regarded  as a  misnomer  as the fatty , white  ,  semi-solid  सामग्री  in  दोनो  of  ये  cyst  entities   is  not sebum  ,   लकिन   keratin  .
Furthermore , under the  सूक्ष्मदर्शी   neither  entity contains  वसामय  glands .
In  अभ्यास  ,  however  ,  the  terms are often used interchangeably  .
`` True ''  वसामय   cysts  are  अपेक्षाकृत  rare and are known as  steatocystomas  or , if  अनेक  ,  as   steatocystoma   मल्टीप्लेक्स  .
Modern  pointe  shoes .
The edge  of  the  टो  pad ,  जिससे  is inserted  between   the  foot and toe  बक्सा   लिये  cushioning , can be seen  on   the  right  पैर   .
a  pointe shoe is  a  type of shoe worn by  बैले   नर्तक  when performing  pointe  work  .
Pointe  जूते  developed from the desire for dancers to appear weightless  और  sylph  -like   और  have evolved  to  enable  नर्तक   to  dance  en  pointe (  on  the tips of  उनके  toes )  लिये   विस्तारित  periods of  समय  .
They  हैं   सामान्यतः  worn by  मादा  dancers , though  पुरूष  dancers may  पहनें   उन्हें  for unorthodox roles such as the  भद्दा  stepsisters  in   सिंडरेला  , Bottom in A Midsummer Night 's  सपना   ,  or men  performing  as women in dance companies  ऐसे  as Les Ballets Trockadero  और   grandiva  .
They are manufactured in  a  variety of colors , most commonly  in   शेड्स  of light pink .
इस  tablespoon  रै  a  क्षमता  of about 15  ml  .
measuring  Spoons
in  the US and parts of Canada , a tablespoon  is  the largest  प्रकार  of spoon used for eating  इससे   a  bowl .
In  the  UK , Europe and most Commonwealth countries  ,   a   tablespoon  is a  प्रकार   of   विशाल   चमचा  usually used for serving .
in  countries where a  tablespoon  is a  सेवारत  spoon  ,  the  निकटतम  equivalent  to  the  us  tablespoon is  either  the dessert  चमचा  or the soup spoon .
A tablespoonful , nominally  the  capacity of  एक  tablespoon , is  commonly  used  as  a  माप   of  volume in cooking  .
it  is abbreviated as T , tb , tbs , tbsp , tblsp , or tblspn  .
The capacity of ordinary tablespoons is not regulated  by  law and is subject to considerable variation .
In the USA one tablespoon ( measurement  ईकाई   )  is approximately 15  ml  ; the capacity of an actual tablespoon ( dining utensil ) ranges from  7  mL to 14 mL  .
In Australia one  tablespoon  (  मापन  unit ) is 20 mL  .
हैरी  Potter is a series of seven fantasy novels  लिखा   by  the  अंग्रेजों  author  J.  K. Rowling .
The  किताबे   वृत्तान्त  the adventures of  a  wizard , Harry Potter , and  उसके  friends  रोनाल्ड  Weasley and Hermione Granger , all of whom  हैं  students at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft  और   wizardry  .
The main  स्टोरी  arc concerns Harry 's quest to overcome the Dark wizard Lord Voldemort , whose  aims   हैं   to   become  immortal  ,  conquer the  wizarding  world  ,  subjugate non-magical people , and  नष्ट  all  those   जो  stand  in   उसके  way ,  विशेषकर   हैरी  Potter .
Since the release of the  पहला  novel Harry Potter and  the   पारस   's  Stone on 30  जून   1997  ,  the  books have gained immense popularity  ,  critical acclaim and commercial success worldwide .
the  series has also  था  some share of criticism  ,   सहित  concern for  the  increasingly  अंधेरा  tone  .
,  the book  श्रेणी   रै  sold about 450  लाख   नक़ल  , making it the best-selling book series in  इतिहास   ,  and has been translated into  67   भाषाएं  .
the  last four books  consecutively  set  रिकॉर्ड  as the fastest-selling books in history .
A  श्रेणी  of  अनेक  genres , including  काल्पनिक  and  coming   of  age (  साथ   तत्व   of   रहस्य  , thriller ,  एडवेंचर  ,  और   रोमांस  ) ,  it  has  अनेक  cultural  meanings   और  references  .
according  to  रोलिंग   ,  the main theme is death  .
वहीँ  are  भी  many  अन्य   विषयवस्तु   in  the series  ,  such as  पूर्वाग्रह  and  भ्रष्टाचार  .
The initial  प्रमुख  publishers  of  the books  यहूद  Bloomsbury in  the  United  किंगडम  and Scholastic  दबायें   in  the  संयुक्त  States .
The  किताबे   have  since  महरूम  published  by   अनेक   प्रकाशक   विश्वव्यापी  .
The books , with  the   सातवाँ   किताब   विभाजित   into  two parts  ,  have been made into  an   eight-part  film series by Warner Bros. Pictures  ,  the highest-grossing film series of all time .
the   श्रेणी  also  originated  much tie-in  merchandise   ,  making  the   हैरी   कुम्हार  brand  लायक  in  excess  of $ 15 billion .
Also due to the success  of  the books  और   films  , Harry Potter has been used for a  थीम  park  ,  The Wizarding World of  हैरी  Potter in Universal Parks &  रिसॉर्ट  's  आइलैंड्स   of   एडवेंचर  .
RS-68 being  tested   at  NASA  's  Stennis Space Center  .
The nearly transparent exhaust is due to this  इंजन  's exhaust being  ज़्यादातर   अतितप्त   भाप   (  water vapor  इससे  its propellants , hydrogen  और   ऑक्सीजन   )
viking  5C rocket engine
A rocket engine , or simply `` rocket '' , is a  जेट  engine  कि  uses only stored  propellant   द्रव्यमान  for  forming  its high speed  propulsive  jet .
Rocket engines are reaction engines and obtain  thrust   in  accordance with Newton  's  third  विधि   .
चूंकि  they need no external material to form their  जेट  , rocket engines can be used for  spacecraft  propulsion as well  as  terrestrial uses , such as missiles  .
Most rocket engines  हैं  internal  दहन  engines ,  हालांकि  non-combusting forms also exist .
Rocket engines  as  a  समूह  have the highest  exhaust  velocities  ,   हैं  by far the lightest  ,   लकिन  are the least propellant efficient of  सब  types of jet engines .
``  ... Baby One More Time  ''  is  a   सोंग   by   अमरीकी  recording artist  britney  Spears  .
It served as Spears 's debut single and  शीर्षक   track  from  उसके  debut studio  एल्बम   ,   ...  Baby One  अधिक   समय   (   1999  ) .
Written by Max Martin and produced by  मार्टिन  and  रामी  ,  ``  ...  baby  One  अधिक  Time ''  थी  released  on  September 30  ,  1998 , by Jive  रिकॉर्ड  .
After  रिकॉर्डिंग   और   sending   a  demo tape with an  अप्रयुक्त  song from Toni Braxton  ,  Spears signed a multi-album deal with Jive  .
`` ... Baby One More Time '' is a  टीन  pop and dance-pop  सोंग  that refers to  a  girl who  संताप  breaking up with her boyfriend  .
The song received generally  अनुकूल  reviews  इससे  critics , who praised  इसके  composition  .
`` ... Baby One More  समय   ''   attained   वैश्विक  success ,  reaching  number  एक  in  प्रत्येक  country it charted .
It also received numerous certifications around the  संसार  , and  is  one  of   the   best-selling  singles of all time , with over 10  लाख   नक़ल   बेची   .
An accompanying  म्यूज़िक   वीडियो  , directed by Nigel Dick , portrays  स्पीयर्स  as a student from a Catholic high  स्कूल   ,   जो  starts to daydream that she is singing and dancing around the  स्कूल  ,  जबकि  watching her love interest from afar .
the  music video was later  संदर्भित  in the  म्यूज़िक  video  of  `` If  u   तलाश  Amy ``  (   2008  ) , where Spears 's fictional daughter is  वेश  with  a  similar schoolgirl outfit  जबकि  wearing  गुलाबी  ribbons in her hair .
In 2010 , the music  वीडियो  for ``  ...   baby  One More Time ''  थी  voted  the   तीसरा   सबसे   influential  video in  the   इतिहास   of  pop music  ,  in a poll  आयोजित   by  Jam !  .
Spears  रै   performed  `` ... Baby One More  समय   ''   in   a  number of  सजीव  appearances and in all of her concert tours .
It was the encore  of  the ... Baby One More  समय   दौरे  ( 1999 ) and Dream Within a Dream Tour ( 2001  )  ;  स्पीयर्स  also performed  remixed  versions  of  the song  दौरान  the  उफ़   !  ...
i   किया  It Again World Tour  (  2000 ) , The  गोमेद   होटल   दौरे  ( 2004 ) , The M+M  's  Tour ( 2007 ) , The Circus  अभिनीत  Britney  स्पीयर्स  ( 2009 )  ,   और  the Femme Fatale  दौरे   (  2011 ) .
`` ... Baby  एक  More  समय  ''  थी  nominated  लिये  a Grammy Award for Best Female Pop Vocal Performance  ,  and has been included in lists by  ब्लेंडर  ,  रोलिंग  Stone and VH1 .
it  has been noted for  redefining  the sound  of  late 1990s music .
Spears  रै  named ``  ...  Baby  एक  More  समय  '' as one of  उसके  favorite songs  इससे  her career .
It  थी  also the final  सोंग  to be  निभाई  on  the   बीबीसी   's  music  कार्यक्रम  Top  of  the  चबूतरे   .
Cholera  is   an  infection  in  the  छोटी  intestine caused by the bacterium  vibrio  cholerae .
the   प्रमुख  symptoms  हैं  watery diarrhea  और  vomiting .
हस्तांतरण  occurs  primarily  by  पीने  water or eating food that  रै  been contaminated  by   the  feces ( waste  उत्पाद   )  of an infected person ,  सहित  one with no apparent symptoms .
The  गंभीरता   of   the  diarrhea and vomiting  can   सीसे  to  रैपिड  dehydration and  electrolyte  imbalance ,  और  death in  कुछ  cases .
The primary treatment  is  oral rehydration therapy , typically with  मौखिक  rehydration solution  ,  to  बदलें  water and  इलेक्ट्रोलाइट्स  .
If this is not tolerated or does not  provide  improvement  तेज़  enough ,  intravenous  fluids can also be used .
Antibacterial drugs are  फायदेमंद  in  those  with severe disease to shorten its  अवधि   और  severity .
Worldwide , it  affects  3–5  लाख  people and causes 100,000–130,000  मौतों  a  साल  .
Cholera was one of the earliest infections to be  पढ़ाई  by  epidemiological  methods .
The Picture  of  Dorian Gray is the  तभी  published novel by Oscar Wilde ,  appearing  as the  सीसे  story in  lippincott  's  मासिक   पत्रिका  on 20 June  1890   ,   मुद्रित   as  the July  1890  issue of this magazine .
The  पत्रिका   's  editors feared the story  थी  indecent as  सुपुर्द   ,  so  वे  censored roughly 500 words , without Wilde  's  knowledge  ,  before  प्रकाशन  .
But even with that  ,  the story was still  greeted  with  आक्रोश  by British reviewers , some  of   जिसको   सुझाया  that Wilde should be prosecuted  on  moral  grounds   ,   अग्रणी  Wilde to  बचाव   the  novel aggressively  in   अक्षर  to the British  दबायें   .
Wilde later  संशोधित   the  story  लिये  book publication  ,  making  substantial  alterations ,  हटाना  controversial passages ,  adding  new  अध्याय  and including an aphoristic Preface which  रै  since become famous  in   इसके  own  सही   .
The amended version was  प्रकाशित   by  Ward , Lock and Company in  अप्रैल   1891   .
Some scholars believe  कि  Wilde would  आज  have  चाही   us   to  read the version  he   originally  submitted  to  Lippincott  's  .
The novel tells  of  a young man  नामित  Dorian Gray , the subject  of  a  पेंटिंग   by  artist Basil Hallward .
बेसिल   is  impressed  by  Dorian  's  beauty  और  becomes infatuated with him ,  believing  his beauty is  जिम्मेदार  for a  नई  mode in his art .
Dorian meets Lord Henry Wotton , a  dost  of Basil 's ,  और  becomes enthralled  by   रब  Henry 's world  दृश्य  .
Espousing a new hedonism ,  रब  Henry  suggests   the  only things  लायक   pursuing  in life are beauty  और  fulfilment of  the  senses .
Realizing that  एक  day his beauty  होगा  fade  ,  Dorian ( whimsically  )   expresses  a  ख्वाहिश   to  sell his soul to ensure the portrait Basil  रै  painted  होता   आयु  rather than he  .
डोरियन  's  काश   is  fulfilled  ,   और  when  he   subsequently   pursues  a life of debauchery , the portrait serves as  a  reminder  of  the effect  प्रत्येक   अधिनियम   रै  upon  उसके  soul , with each sin displayed as a disfigurement  of   उसके  form  ,  or through  a  sign of  वृद्धावस्था  .
The Picture of  डोरियन  Gray is considered a  कार्य   of  classic Gothic  fiction  with a strong  faustian   थीम   .
sári  Gábor  (   born   6  February 1917 ) ,  ज्ञात  as Zsa Zsa  गैबर  (  )  ,  is   a  Hungarian -born American actress  जो  acted  in   supporting  roles  in  movies ,  on  Broadway , and occasionally  on  television .
Gabor  थी   भी  a socialite .
She began her stage career  in  Vienna at age 15 , and was  पहनाया   मिस  Hungary in 1936 .
She emigrated  to  the  संयुक्त  States in 1941  और   became  a sought-after actress with ``  यूरोपीय  flair and style '' ,  साथ   a  personality that `` exuded charm  और   अनुग्रह   ''  .
Her first movie role was as  supporting  actress  in  Lovely  to  Look At .
She later acted  in  We 're  नहीं  Married !
और   निभाई  one of  उसके  few leading roles in  moulin  Rouge (  1952  )  ,  directed  by  John Huston , who described  उसके  as a `` creditable  ''  actress .
Besides  उसके  film and television  दिखावे  ,  वो  is best known for having  नौ   पतियों  , including hotel magnate  कोनराड   हिल्टन  and  कर्ता  George  सैंडर्स  .
वो   एकबार  stated , `` Men  have  always liked me and I  have  always liked men .
But  i  like a mannish man  ,  a  man   जो   knows  how to talk to  और   दावत  a  स्त्री  – not just a man with  मांसपेशियां   .  ''
Bruce Lee  (  traditional  :   李小龍   ;  born Lee Jun-fan  ;  27 November  1940  – 20 July 1973 ) was a Chinese  अमरीकी   martial  artist , actor ,  martial  arts  प्रशिक्षक  , philosopher  ,  and  फिल्मकार   .
The founder of Jeet Kune Do , Lee was  the  son of Cantonese  ओपेरा   स्टार  Lee Hoi-Chuen .
he   is  widely considered by  टीकाकारों   ,  critics , media and other martial artists to be  एक  of  the  most influential  martial  artists of all time , and a pop  संस्कृति  icon of  the   20th  century .
He is often credited with helping to change the  रास्ता  Asians were presented in American films .
Lee was born  in  Chinatown ,  सैन  Francisco on 27 November  1940  to  अभिभावक   इससे   हांग   काँग  and was raised  in   कोलून   साथ  his family  जबतक  his late teens .
He was introduced  to  the film  उद्योग  by his  पिता  and  appeared   in   अनेक  films as a  चाइल्ड  actor .
ली  moved to  the  United  राज्य  at the  आयु   of  18 to receive  उसके  higher  शिक्षा  , and it was during this time  कि  he began teaching  martial   कला  .
उसके   हांग  Kong and  हॉलीवुड   -उपजd  films elevated the traditional Hong  काँग   martial   कला  film to a  नई  level  of  popularity  और  acclaim  ,  sparking a surge of interest in Chinese  martial  arts in  the  West  in  the 1970s  .
The direction and  टोन  of  उसके  films  बदला  and influenced martial  कला  and martial arts  films  in  हांग  Kong and the rest of  the  world  .
He is  विख्यात  for his roles  in   पाँच   feature-length  films : Lo Wei 's The Big  boss   (   1971  ) and Fist of  फ़्यूरी  ( 1972  )  ; Way of the Dragon (  1972  )  ,   निर्देशित  and written  by  Lee  ;  Warner Brothers  '   डालें   the   ड्रैगन  ( 1973 ) and The Game  of   मौत  (  1978  ) , both  निर्देशित   by  Robert Clouse  .
ली  became an iconic  फिगर   ज्ञात  throughout  the   संसार  , particularly among the Chinese , as he portrayed Chinese nationalism in  उसके  films .
he  initially trained  in  Wing Chun  ,  but later  अस्वीकृत   well-defined  martial art  शैलियाँ   ,   favouring  instead the  उपयोग  of techniques  इससे  various sources , in  the  spirit  of  his personal  martial  arts  दर्शनशास्त्र   ,  which  he  dubbed Jeet Kune  do  (  the   रास्ता  of  the  Intercepting Fist  )   .
Lee held dual citizenship  of  Hong Kong and  the   संयुक्त  States .
he   died  in Kowloon Tong on 20 July 1973 at  आयु  32 .
Chronic  obstructive  pulmonary disease ( COPD ) , also  ज्ञात  as chronic  obstructive  lung disease ( COLD  )  ,  दीर्घकालिक  obstructive  airway   बीमारी  ( COAD  )  , chronic airflow  limitation  ( CAL ) and chronic  obstructive  respiratory disease  (   cord  ) , is the occurrence  of  chronic  ब्रोंकाइटिस  or emphysema , a pair of commonly co-existing  रोगों   of  the lungs in which  the   एयरवेज़   सीमित  over  समय  .
This limits airflow to  और   इससे  the  फेफड़े  ,  causing  shortness of  साँस  (  dyspnea   )  .
In  नैदानिक   अभ्यास  ,  copd   is  defined by its  characteristically  low airflow on  फेफड़ों   फलन  tests .
In contrast to  दमा  , this  limitation   is  poorly reversible  और   प्रायः  gets  progressively   बदतर   over  time  .
COPD is caused  by  noxious particles or gas ,  सबसे  commonly from tobacco  धूम्रपान   ,  which  triggers  an abnormal  जलन  response in the lung .
the  diagnosis  of  COPD  requires   फेफड़ों  function tests .
Important management  रणनीति  are  धूम्रपान   cessation  ,  vaccinations   ,  rehabilitation ,  और  drug therapy ( often using  inhalers   )  .
Some  मरीजों   go   on   to  require long-term oxygen  चिकित्सा  or lung transplantation .
विश्वव्यापी  ,  copd  ranked  as  the  छठे  leading  कारण  of death in  1990   .
It is projected  to  become the  चौथी  leading cause of death  विश्वव्यापी  by 2030 ,  due   to  an  बढ़ाएँ  in smoking rates  और  demographic  परिवर्तन  in many countries  .
COPD  is  the  तीसरा   अग्रणी  cause of death in the  u.S.  , and  the  economic  बोझ  of  copd  in the U.S. in 2007  थी   $  42.6 billion in health care costs  और  lost  उत्पादकता   .
Annelies ``  ऐनी   ''   मारी  Frank  (  , ?  ,  ;  12  June  1929early  March 1945  )   is   एक  of the most discussed  यहूदी   पीड़ितों  of  the  Holocaust .
Her diary has  महरूम  the  आधार  for several plays and films  .
born  in  the  city of  फ्रैंकफर्ट   am   प्रमुख  in  वाइमर  Germany ,  वो   जिया   सबसे  of her life  in   or  near  एम्सटर्डम  ,  in  the  नीदरलैंड्स  .
Born a German  नेशनल   ,  Frank lost  उसके  citizenship in 1941  .
She gained international fame posthumously after her diary was published .
It  दस्तावेज़  her experiences hiding  दौरान  the German occupation of the  नीदरलैंड्स  in  संसार  War II  .
the  Frank  परिवार  moved  इससे   जर्मनी  to  एम्सटर्डम  in 1933  ,   the  year the  nazis  gained control  over   जर्मनी   .
By the  शुरूआत  of 1940 , they  यहूद  trapped in Amsterdam  by  the Nazi occupation of the Netherlands .
As persecutions of the Jewish population increased in July 1942 ,  the   परिवार  went  into  hiding  in  the hidden rooms  of   ऐनी  's father , Otto Frank 's  ,  office building .
बाद  two  सालो   ,  the group  थी  betrayed and transported to concentration camps .
Anne  फ़्रैंक  and  उसके   सिस्टर  , Margot , were eventually transferred to  the  Bergen-Belsen concentration camp ,  जहाँ   वे   died   of  typhus  in  March  1945  .
Otto Frank  ,   the   तभी  survivor of  the   परिवार  ,  लौटे   to   एम्सटर्डम  after  the   युद्ध  to  ढूँढें  that Anne 's  डायरी  had been saved , and his efforts led to its  प्रकाशन  in  1947   .
It  थी  translated  इससे  its original Dutch  और  first  प्रकाशित  in English in  1952  as The  डायरी  of a Young Girl  .
It has since been translated into many  भाषाएं  .
The diary , which  थी  given  to   ऐनी   on  her 13th  जन्मदिवस   ,  chronicles her life  इससे  12 June 1942 until 1 August 1944  .

Kurt Donald Cobain  (  February  20  ,  1967  – April 5 ,  1994   )  was an American musician  और   कलाकार   ,  best known  as  the lead  सिंगर   ,  guitarist  और  primary songwriter of the grunge band  निर्वाण   .
कोबेन  formed Nirvana with Krist Novoselic  in  Aberdeen  ,  Washington in  1985  and established it as  भाग  of the Seattle music scene  ,  having its debut album Bleach  released  on the  स्वतंत्र  record label Sub Pop in 1989  .
After signing with major label DGC  रिकॉर्ड  , the  बैंड   मिला   भेदन  success  साथ  `` Smells Like  टीन   स्पिरिट  ``  इससे  its second album  nevermind  ( 1991  )   .
Following the success  of  Nevermind  ,   निर्वाण  was labeled `` the flagship band '' of Generation X , and Cobain hailed as `` the spokesman of a generation '' .
Cobain , however  ,   थी   प्रायः  uncomfortable  और   कुंठित   ,   believing  his message and artistic vision  to  have been misinterpreted by  the   पब्लिक  ,  साथ   उसके   निजी   मुद्दे  often subject  to   मीडिया   ध्यान  .
He challenged  निर्वाण   's  audience with its final studio album In  utero   (  1993 ) .
दौरान  the last years of his life  ,  Cobain struggled with  हेरोइन  addiction , illness  और  depression .
he  also  था   परेशानी  coping  साथ   उसके  fame  और   पब्लिक  image ,  और  the professional  और  lifelong personal pressures surrounding himself  और  his wife , musician Courtney Love  .
On  अप्रैल  8 ,  1994   ,  Cobain  थी  found  मुर्दे  at his home  in   सिएटल  ,  the   शिकार  of  कया  was officially  शासित   a  suicide by a self-inflicted shotgun  घाव   to  the head .
the  circumstances of his death  at  age 27 have become a topic of public fascination  और  debate .
Since their debut  ,  Nirvana  ,  with Cobain as a  songwriter  , has sold over 25 million albums in the U.S. , and  over  50 million worldwide .

Radial  इंजन  of a biplane
Master rod ( upright  )   ,   स्लेव  and balances from a two-row , fourteen-cylinder  pratt  &  व्हिटनी  Twin  बर्र
The radial engine is  a  reciprocating type  आतंरिक  combustion engine configuration in which  the  cylinders  पाइंट  outward from a  सेंट्रल   crankshaft  like the spokes  of  a  व्हील   .
It resembles  a   stylized  star when viewed  इससे  the  सामने   ,   और  is called a  ``  star  इंजन   ''   (  German Sternmotor ) in some languages  .
The  रेडियल  configuration was very commonly  प्रयुक्त  in aircraft  इंजन  before turbine  इंजन  became predominant .
The Golden Girls is an American sitcom , created by Susan Harris  ,   कि  originally aired on NBC from  सितंबर  13 , 1985  ,   to  May  9  ,  1992  .
Starring  bea  Arthur  ,  Betty White  ,  Rue McClanahan  और   estelle  Getty , the show  centers  on four older  महिलाओं  sharing  a  home in  मियामी   ,  Florida  .
It was produced  by   witt/thomas/harris  Productions  ,  in association with Touchstone Television , and Paul Junger Witt ,  टोनी  Thomas , and Harris  परोसा   as  the original executive producers .
The  सुनहरी  Girls  प्राप्त  critical  acclaim  throughout most of its  चलाएं   और  won several awards ,  सहित  the  प्राइमटाइम  Emmy Award for Outstanding Comedy  श्रेणी  twice .
It  भी  won three Golden  ग्लोब   पुरस्कार   लिये  Best Television Series –  musical   or   कॉमेडी  .
All four  सितारों  each received an  एमी  Award throughout the series '  चलाएं  and had  अनेक  nominations .
the  series also ranked among the top ten highest-rated  कार्यक्रम  for six  आउट  of its seven  सीज़न  .
Deepwater  खुदाई   is  the process  of  oil  और   गैस  exploration and production in depths of  अधिक   than  500  फीट  .
by  this definition , there are approximately 600  deepwater  wells  in  the Gulf  of  Mexico  .
it  has been  economically   infeasible  for many years  ,   लकिन  with  उठती  oil prices , more companies are investing in  इस  area .
Major  कंपनियाँ   working  in  इस   सेक्टर  include Diamond Offshore  ,  TransOcean , and Baker  ह्यूजेस   .
वहीँ  are basically two kinds of mobile  deepwater   खुदाई   rigs  : semi-submersible drilling  rigs   और  drillships  .
Drilling  can  also be performed  इससे  a  fixed-position  installation such as  a  floating spar  (  platform )  or  tension-leg platform .
हाल  industry  विश्लेषण  has estimated  कि   the   कुल  expenditure in the  वैश्विक  deepwater infrastructure market  होगा  reach $ 145bn  in  2011 .
“not   सब  oil  is   accessible  on land or in shallow  जल   .
You  can  find some oil  जमा  buried  गहन  under the  समंदर   floor.”  ... Using sonic equipment  ,   आयल  companies determine  the  drilling sites most  संभावित  to produce oil  .
Then they use  a  mobile  offshore  drilling unit ( MODU ) to dig the initial well  .
कुछ  units are converted into production rigs ,  अर्थ  they switch from drilling for oil to capturing oil  एकबार  it 's  मिला  .
Most of the  समय  ,  the  oil company will  बदलें  the MODU with a more permanent oil  उत्पादन  rig to  कैप्चर   oil.”   ...  The  मोदू  's job is to drill down into  the  ocean 's floor to  ढूँढें  oil deposits .
the  part of  the  drill that extends below the deck and  through  the water is called  the   riser  .
The riser allows for drilling fluids  to  move between the floor and  the   रिग  .
Engineers  निम्नतर  a drill  स्ट्रिंग  -- a series of pipes  designed  to drill  bas  to the  आयल  deposit --  through  the riser.”
“The  विस्तार   of  deepwater drilling is happening despite accidents in  offshore   फ़ील्ड  ... ”
In  2010  a large explosion occurred killing  11  workers and spilling millions of gallons of oil into the Gulf  of  Mexico while  a  BP oil rig was drilling in deep  waters  .
“  ...  despite  the risks , the deepwater drilling trend is spreading  in  the Mediterranean and off  the  coast  of  East Africa after a string of huge discoveries  of  natural gas.”
“The reason for  the  resumption  of  such  खुदाई  ,  विश्लेषक  say  ,   is   continuing  high  माँग  for energy worldwide.”
America needs  the   आयल  so  it   is  almost necessary  to  face the  ऊँची  risks that  आइये  with deepwater  खुदाई  in  अनुक्रम  for Americans to continue to carry on  उनके  everyday  जीवनदान   .
“The  उर्जा  Department recently projected that  गल्फ  oil  उत्पादन  would expand  इससे   इसके   2011  level  of  1.3 million barrels  a  day , still nearly a  क्वार्टर  of total  घरेलू  production , to 2 million barrels a day by 2020.”
Deepwater  खुदाई   affects  the environment  in  both negative and positive ways  .
हालांकि   deepwater   खुदाई   rarely   कल्याणकारी  oil spills it is still  a  hazardous  संभावित  outcome .
आयल  spills result in oil sinking to the bottom  of   the  ocean smothering plant life  leaving  fish without food and  आश्रय  to  जीवित  .
On the other  हाथ  deepwater drilling  प्रभाव  the environment in a positive ways too .
In time  एकबार   the  deepwater  आयल  well is  नहीं  in  उपयोग  anymore plants will  grow  on  और  around  the  well making a cave or cavern  जैसे   आश्रय  ideal for animals to thrive in .
Deepwater drilling  भी   lets  us see  the  depths of the ocean floor  कि  are hardly  कभी  seen .
”Cameras  on  rovers at the bottom of the wells  रिकार्ड   फुटेज  and  लो  photos of rare fish that are  in   वहीँ  natural  आवास   ,   giving   वैज्ञानिक  a  dekh  at animals they  rarely   seen”  ( Chevron Corporation  )   .   ''
Monica Samille  lewinsky   (   born  July  23  , 1973  )  is an American woman with whom United States President Bill Clinton  admitted  to having had an ``  improper  relationship ''  जबकि   वो  worked at the  श्वेत  House in  1995  and 1996  .
The affair and  इसके  repercussions (  जिससे  included Clinton 's  महाभियोग  ) became known as  the  Lewinsky scandal .
फ्रांसिस  Albert `` Frank ''  सिनात्रा  ,  ,  ( December 12 , 1915 – May 14 , 1998  )  was  an  American  सिंगर  and  फिल्मी   कर्ता   .
Beginning his  musical   करियर  in  the  swing  era  with Harry James and Tommy  dorsey  , Sinatra found unprecedented success as a solo artist  इससे   the   जल्दी  to mid-1940s after being  हस्ताक्षरित  to Columbia Records in 1943  .
Being the idol of the `` bobby  soxers  `` ,  he   released  his  पहला   एल्बम   ,  The Voice of  फ़्रैंक  Sinatra  in  1946 .
His professional career had  stalled   by  the  1950s   ,  but it was reborn in 1953 after  he   जीती  the Academy Award  लिये  Best Supporting  कर्ता   लिये  his  प्रदर्शन  in  इससे   यहाँ  to  शाश्वत  .
he  signed with Capitol Records in  1953  and  released  several critically  lauded   एल्बम   (   ऐसे  as In the Wee Small Hours , Songs for Swingin ' Lovers ! , Come  मक्खी  with  me  , Only the Lonely and  nice   'n  ' Easy )  .
सिनात्रा   बाएँ   कैपिटल   to  found his own record label , Reprise Records  in   1961  ( finding success with albums  ऐसे  as Ring-a-Ding-Ding !  ,  Sinatra at the  sands  and  फ्रांसिस  Albert Sinatra  &  Antonio Carlos Jobim )  ,   toured  internationally , was a founding  सदस्य   of  the Rat Pack and fraternized with celebrities and statesmen , including  जॉन  F. Kennedy .
Sinatra turned 50 in  1965  , recorded the retrospective September  of  My Years , starred  in   the  Emmy -winning  टेलीविज़न  special Frank  सिनात्रा  : A Man and His  म्यूज़िक  , and scored hits with ``  अजनबी   in  the Night `` and  ``  My Way ``  .
साथ  sales  of  his music dwindling  और  after appearing in  अनेक  poorly received  films  ,  सिनात्रा   रिटायर्ड   लिये  the first time in 1971  .
दो  years later  ,   however  , he came out of retirement and in 1973 recorded  अनेक  albums ,  स्कोरिंग   a  Top 40 hit with `` ( Theme From ) New York , New York `` in 1980 .
Using his Las Vegas shows  as   a   घर   आधार   ,   he   toured  both within the United States and internationally , until  a  short  समय  before  उसके  death in  1998  .
Sinatra also forged  a  highly successful  करियर  as a film actor .
After  जीतना  Best Supporting  कर्ता  in 1953 ,  he  also  garnered  a  नामांकन  for  बेहतरीन  Actor  लिये  The  man  with the  सुनहरी  Arm  ,  and critical acclaim  लिये  his performance in The Manchurian Candidate  .
He  भी  starred in such musicals as High  समाज  , Pal  जॉय   ,  Guys and  डॉल  and On  the  Town  .
Sinatra was  सम्मानित  at the Kennedy Center  honors   in  1983 and  थी   awarded   the  Presidential Medal  of  Freedom by Ronald  reagan  in  1985  and the Congressional Gold  पदक  in 1997 .
He was  the  recipient of  ग्यारह   ग्रैमी  Awards ,  सहित  the Grammy Trustees Award  ,   ग्रैमी   लेजेंड  Award and  the   ग्रैमी  Lifetime Achievement Award .
Sinatra  is  also one  of  world’s  best-selling   कलाकारों  of all  समय  ,  having  sold more than 150 million copies worldwide  .
Typical cornhole board
cornhole  , also known as bean bag toss  ,  corn  टॉस  , baggo or bags , is a lawn game in which  खिलाड़ी  take turns throwing corn hole  बैग   at  a  उठाया  platform with  a  hole in the far end .
a  bag in the hole scores 3 points , while  एक   on  the  मंच   स्कोर  1 point  .
Play  continues   जबतक  a team or player reaches the score  of  21 .
The  अमरीकी  Gold  त्रिभुज  is an official gold bullion coin of the United  राज्य   .
Authorized  अंतर्गत  the Gold Bullion  सिक्का  Act of 1985  ,  it was first  released   by  the United States Mint in 1986 .
बिक्रम   योग  is a system of yoga that  बिक्रम  Choudhury  synthesized  from traditional hatha  योग   तकनीकों  and popularized beginning in  the  early 1970s .
All Bikram  योग  classes  चलाएं  for 90 minutes  और  consist of the same series  of  26 postures and 2  श्वास  exercises .
Bikram  योग  is ideally practiced  in  a  रूम  heated to 105°F (  ≈  40.6°C )  साथ  a  आर्द्रता  of 40  %  , .
Christopher Michael  massey  (  born  26 January 1990  )   is  an American actor , comedian and rapper best  ज्ञात  for starring as Michael  barret  in  निकलोडियन   टेलीविज़न   श्रेणी  Zoey  101  .
massey  has received  अनेक   पुरस्कार   और  nomination including  a   यंग   कलाकार  Award and Emmy  पुरस्कार   nominations  .
He is also  ज्ञात  for appearing in several commercials in  the   जल्दी  2000s .
A  conventional   teaspoon   बना   of  stainless  स्टील  .
A teaspoon is an item of cutlery  and/or   a  measuring  यंत्र   ,  as  खूब  as a unit of measurement of volume in  कुछ  countries  और  customs  .
A  फर्न   is   कोई  one or  अधिक   of  a group of about  12,000  species of  पौधे   belonging  to the botanical group known as Pteridophyta .
नापसंद  mosses  ,  they  have   जाइलम   और   फ्लोएम  ( making them vascular plants )  .
They have stems , leaves  ,  and  जड़ें   जैसे  other  vascular   पौधे   .
ferns   reproduce  via spores  और   have  neither seeds nor flowers  .
By far the largest group  of  ferns is the leptosporangiate ferns , but ferns as  पारिभाषित  here ( also  पुकारा   monilophytes  ) include  horsetails  ,  whisk   ferns   ,   marattioid  ferns  ,  and ophioglossoid ferns .
The term  pteridophyte  also refers to ferns and a  few  other seedless vascular plants ( see  वर्गीकरण   खण्ड   नीचे  ) .
Ferns first appear in the  चट्टान  record 360 million  सालो  ago in the  carboniferous   लकिन  many of the current families  और  species did not appear until roughly 145 million years ago in the early Cretaceous  (  after  flowering  plants came to  dominate  many  environments  )  .
Ferns are not of  प्रमुख   आर्थिक  importance  ,  but  कुछ   हैं  grown  or  gathered for food  ,  as ornamental  पौधे  , for remediating contaminated soils  ,  and  have  been  the  subject of research  लिये   उनके  ability to remove some  रासायनिक  pollutants from the  एयर  .
Some  हैं  significant  weeds   .
They also play a  भूमिका  in mythology , medicine , and  आर्ट  .
Flat roofs in  इसराईल
Flat  छत   in  Los Angeles
A flat roof  is  a  प्रकार  of  covering  for  a  building .
In  कंट्रास्ट  to the  अधिक  sloped form  of  roof  ,  a  चपटा  roof  is   आड़ा   or  nearly horizontal .
The  ढलान  of a  छत  is properly known as its pitch  :  Roofs which are nearly flat are  ज्ञात  as low-pitch roofs (  as  the angle of slope  increases   ,  so the  पिच  is said to increase )  .
Any sheet  of   सामग्री   प्रयुक्त  to cover a flat or  low-pitched  roof is  प्रायः  known  as  a membrane and the primary purpose  of   ये  membranes  is  to  waterproof  the roof area  .
Materials  कि   कवर  flat roofs typically  allow   the  water to run  बंद  from  a  slight inclination or camber into  a  gutter system .
Water from  कुछ   चपटा  roofs such as  on  garden  sheds  sometimes flows freely  बंद  the edge of a roof  ,   हालांकि   gutter   प्रणालियों  are of  लाभ  in keeping both  दीवारें  and  मूलाधार  dry  .
Gutters on smaller  roofs  often lead  जल  directly onto  the  ground , or better  ,   into  a  विशेषकर   बना  soakaway .
ड्रेनेज   on   larger   roofs   प्रायः  lead  जल  into  the  rainwater drainage  प्रणाली  of any built up area  .
occasionally   चपटा   roofs  though  हैं   designed  to  collect   जल   in  a pool ,  प्रायः  for aesthetic purposes , or for  rainwater  buffering  .
Flat roofs exist all  over  the world and each  क्षेत्रफल  has its own tradition or preference  लिये  materials  प्रयुक्त  .
In warmer climes where rainfall is  कम   और  freezing  is  unlikely  to   occur  , many flat roofs are simply built  of  masonry or  कंक्रीट  and  इस  is  शुभ   at  keeping out  the   ऊष्मा  of the sun  और   सस्ती  and easy to build where timber is not readily  उपलब्धियाँ  .
In  क्षेत्रों   जहाँ  the roof  could  become  संतृप्त   by   बरसात   और  leak  ,   or   जहाँ  water soaked  into   the  brickwork  could  freeze to  बर्फ  and  यूँ  lead to 'blowing ' ( breaking up  of  the  mortar/brickwork/concrete  by the expansion  of  ice as  it  forms ) these roofs are  नहीं  suitable .
Traditionally most flat  roofs   in  the  पश्चिमी   संसार   मेक  use of tar or more  प्रायः   तारकोल  paper applied over  छत   अलंकार   to   रखना  a building  watertight  .
The tar  or   tarpaper  is  in   फेरे  covered  in   बजरी  to keep the  सूर्य  's heat , UV rays  और  weather off it and helps protect it from  cracking   or  blistering  और  degradation .
छत   अलंकार  is usually of plywood  ,  chipboard or  osb  boards ( OSB = Oriented Strand Board , also  ज्ञात  as Sterling board ) of  around  18mm thickness .
the   तारकोल  coating is applied in one  or  more coats as a hot liquid ,  heated   in   a  tar kettle  ,  or as sheets of tar impregnated 'paper  '  glued down and sealed together at  joints  by hot  तारकोल  - once it has  cooled   ,   the  gravel is  स्प्रेड  evenly over it  .
a  main  कारण   लिये  failure of  ये  traditional roofs  is  ignorance or lack  of  maintenance where people or events  कारण  the  बजरी  to be moved  or  removed from  the  tar or tarpaper waterproofing ,  यूँ  exposing  it  to weather and sun whereupon  cracking  and  blistering   occurs  over time and eventually  जल  gets  in   .
tarpaper  is  प्रायः   a   'paper   '  or fibre material  soaked  or impregnated  in   तारकोल   .
as   बजरी   can  not protect tarpaper surfaces where  वे  rise vertically from the roof such as on  मुंडेर  walls or  upstands  ,  tarpaper  variants are  उत्पादित   साथ  fine gravel applied to the  hot   तारकोल   दौरान  the  प्रक्रम  of manufacture such  कि  a  स्थाई  layer of gravel is stuck to  it  in order to give it ongoing protection .
Tarpapers vary in quality as does the workmanship and training of those  applying  it to  उपज   अधिक  or  कम  successful results .
in  some  सूक्ष्म   climates  or shaded  क्षेत्रों  these  बल्कि  'basic '  tarpaper  roofs can  पिछला  well in relation to the cost of materials purchase  और  cost of laying  उन्हें  , however the cost  of   आधुनिक  membranes such  as   epdm  has  आइये  down  over  recent years to make them more  और  more affordable  .
There  हैं  now more firms  supplying   आधुनिक  alternatives and there is generally a growing awareness  of  their performance and availability .
If a leak  करता  occur  on   a  flat roof then  क्षति  often  goes   unnoticed   लिये  long periods  of   समय  during  जिससे   जल  penetrates and soaks the  अलंकार  and any  इन्सुलेशन   and/or   ढांचा  beneath it .
इस   can   सीसे  to expensive damage  इससे   the  rot which often develops  और   if   बाएँ  can weaken the roof structure .
There are also  विभिन्न  health risks  to  people and animals breathing the  सांचे   बीजाणुओं  : the severity  of   इस  health  रिस्क  remains a  debated  point .
One  प्रॉब्लम  with maintaining flat roofs  is   कि  if water does penetrate  the  barrier covering (  be  it traditional or a modern membrane ) it can travel  a  long  रास्ता  before causing visible damage  or  leaking into a  भवन  where it  can  be seen  .
यूँ   it  is not  आसान  to see where it is leaking in  अनुक्रम  to  मरम्मत   it  .
Once underlying roof  अलंकार  is soaked it often  sags  causing a further  संग्रहण  or puddling of water in that area and  the  problem  worsens  .
A  cd-rom  ( ) is  a  pre-pressed compact disc which contains data .
The  नाम  is  an   एक्रोनिम   जिससे  stands  लिये  `` Compact Disc  read-only  memory `` .
Computers can read CD-ROMs , but can  नहीं  write  on  them .
CD-ROMs are popularly used to distribute computer  तन्त्र  , including video  खेल   और  multimedia  अनुप्रयोग  ,  हालांकि  any data  can  be  भंडारित  (  up  to the  क्षमता  limit  of   a  disc ) .
कुछ   cds  , called  उन्नत  CDs  ,  hold both computer  आंकड़ा   और   ऑडियो  with the latter capable of  होने   निभाई  on a CD player  ,   जबकि  data  (  such  as  software  or  digital  वीडियो  )  is  only  usable  on a computer (  ऐसे  as ISO 9660 format  pc   cd-roms  )  .
The Yellow  किताब  is  the   तकनीकी  standard  कि  defines the format  of   cd-roms   .
One  of  a  नियत   of  color-bound books that  contain  the technical  विशेषताएँ   लिये  all CD formats , the  पीला  Book , created  by   सोनी  and Philips ,  थी  the first extension of  कॉम्पैक्ट   डिस्क   डिजिटल  Audio .
It  adapted  the  स्वरूप  to  थाम  any form of data .
जोआन  `` Jo ''  रोलिंग  (  )  ,  (  born 31 July 1965 ) ,  कलम   नाम   J.  K. Rowling  ,  is  a  British novelist ,  बेहतरीन   ज्ञात  as the  लेखक   of  the Harry  कुम्हार  fantasy series .
The Potter books have gained worldwide attention , won  अनेक  awards , and sold more than  400  million copies  .
They  have  become  the  best-selling  किताब   श्रेणी   in  history , and been the  आधार   लिये  a series of films which has become the highest-grossing film series in history .
Rowling had  overall  approval on the scripts as  खूब   as  maintaining creative control  by  serving  as   a   निर्माता   on  the final instalment .
Born in Yate  ,  Gloucestershire  ,   रोलिंग  was working as  a   शोधकर्ता  and bilingual secretary  लिये  Amnesty  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   जब  she conceived the idea for the  हैरी  Potter series on  a   विलम्बित   ट्रैन  from Manchester to London in  1990  .
The  seven-year  period  कि  followed  entailed  the  मौत  of  उसके  mother  ,   तलाक  from her first  husband   और  poverty until Rowling finished the  पहला   अनोखा  in the series , Harry Potter  और   the  Philosopher 's  स्टोन  ( 1997 )  .
Rowling subsequently  प्रकाशित  6 sequels—the  पिछला  , Harry Potter  और  the  deathly  Hallows  (  2007 ) —as  खूब   as  3 supplements  to  the series .
In 2012 , Rowling parted with her agency and resumed writing in the form of a tragicomedy novel aimed  at  adult readership  ,  entitled The Casual Vacancy  .
रोलिंग  has  कहा   वो  is  फिलहाल  working on two books—one  aimed   लिये  adults  ,  the  अन्य  for children younger than the  हैरी  Potter audience , and she expects the  latter  to be published first .
Rowling has  led  a `` rags to riches `` life story ,  in  which she progressed  इससे  living on state  लाभ  to  multi-millionaire   औकात   भीतर   पाँच   सालो  .
She  is  the  संयुक्त  Kingdom  's  best-selling author since  रिकॉर्ड  began , with sales in excess  of  £238m .
The 2008 Sunday Times  समृद्ध  List estimated Rowling 's fortune at £560 million ( $  798   लाख  )  ,  ranking her as  the  twelfth  richest  woman in the United Kingdom .
फोर्ब्स  ranked  रोलिंग  as the forty-eighth  सबसे   शक्तिशाली  celebrity of  2007  , and TIME magazine named her as  a  runner-up for  इसके   2007  Person  of  the  साल   ,  noting the social ,  moral  , and political inspiration  वो   रै   दिए  her fans  .
in  October 2010 ,  रोलिंग  was named the  ``   सबसे  Influential Woman in Britain '' by leading magazine editors  .
वो  has become a notable philanthropist , supporting  ऐसे  charities as Comic  राहत  , One Parent Families  ,  Multiple Sclerosis Society  of  Great  ब्रिटेन  and Lumos ( formerly  the   children   's  High Level  समूह  ) .
auburndale  is a city in Polk County , Florida , United  राज्य  .
The population was 11,032 at  the  2000 census  .
According to the U.S Census  estimates   of  2005  ,   the  city had a population  of  12,381  .
It is part  of  the Lakeland –  शीत  Haven Metropolitan Statistical  क्षेत्रफल  .
Hurricane Isabel ( 2003 ) as seen from orbit  दौरान  Expedition  7  of  the  International  स्पेस   स्टेशन   .
The  नजर  , eyewall , and surrounding rainbands ,  विशेषताएँ  of  तीव्र  cyclones , are clearly visible in this view from space .
a  tropical cyclone  is   a  storm system  characterized  by a  low-pressure  center surrounded by a spiral arrangement  of   thunderstorms  that produce strong winds and heavy rain .
Tropical cyclones  strengthen   जब  water evaporated  इससे  the ocean is released as the  संतृप्त  air rises , resulting in condensation of  जल  vapor contained in the moist  एयर  .
They  हैं  fueled by  a  different  ऊष्मा   यांत्रिकी  than  अन्य  cyclonic windstorms such  as   nor'easters  ,  यूरोपीय   windstorms  , and polar lows .
The characteristic  कि  separates  तीव्र  cyclones  इससे  other cyclonic systems is that  at  any height in the atmosphere ,  the  center  of   a   तीव्र  cyclone will be warmer than its surroundings ; a phenomenon called ``  गरम  core ``  तूफ़ान  systems  .
The term ``  तीव्र   ''   refers  both to  the  geographical origin of these systems , which  प्रायः  form in  तीव्र  regions  of  the globe  ,  and to their  गठन  in maritime tropical  एयर  masses .
The term ``  चक्रवात  '' refers to  ऐसे   तूफ़ान  '  cyclonic   प्रकृति  , with  counterclockwise  wind  प्रवाह  in  the  Northern Hemisphere  और  clockwise wind flow  in  the  दक्षिणी  Hemisphere .
The  विपरीत   दिशा  of  the  wind  प्रवाह   is   a  result of the Coriolis force .
Depending  on  its location and strength , a tropical cyclone is referred to by names such  as  hurricane  (  , )  ,  typhoon ( ) , tropical storm ,  cyclonic   तूफ़ान   ,   तीव्र   अवसाद  , and simply cyclone .
While tropical cyclones can produce extremely powerful  हवाएँ  and torrential  बरसात  , they are also able to  उपज   ऊँची  waves , damaging storm surge , and tornadoes  .
वे  develop over  विशाल   लाशें  of warm water  ,  and lose their strength  if  they move over land  due  to  increased  surface friction  और  loss of the  गरम  ocean as  an   उर्जा  source .
This is why coastal regions can  प्राप्त  significant  क्षति  from a tropical cyclone , while inland regions are  अपेक्षाकृत  safe  इससे  receiving strong winds .
Heavy  rains  ,  however   ,   can  produce  significant  flooding inland ,  और  storm surges can produce extensive  तटीय  flooding up to  इससे   the  coastline .
हालांकि  their effects on human populations  can  be devastating  ,   तीव्र  cyclones  can  relieve drought conditions .
वे  also carry heat  उर्जा  away from the  ऊष्णकटिबन्ध   और  transport it toward temperate  latitudes   ,  which  makes  them  an  important part  of  the global  वायुमंडलीय  circulation mechanism  .
As a result , tropical  cyclones  help to maintain  संतुलन  in  the  Earth  's  troposphere , and  to  maintain  a  relatively  stable   और  warm temperature worldwide  .
Many tropical cyclones develop when  the  atmospheric conditions around a weak  disturbance  in the atmosphere are favorable  .
the  background environment  is   modulated  by  climatological  cycles  और  patterns such as the  madden-julian  oscillation , El Niño-Southern Oscillation , and the Atlantic multidecadal oscillation .
अन्य   रूप  when other  प्रकार  of  cyclones  acquire  तीव्र  characteristics  .
तीव्र  systems are  तब   स्थानांतरित   by   परिचालन  winds in  the  troposphere  ;  if  the  conditions remain favorable ,  the  tropical disturbance intensifies , and can even  develop  an eye .
on  the  अन्य  end of  the   वर्णक्रम  , if the  शर्तें   around  the  प्रणाली  deteriorate  or  the tropical  चक्रवात  makes  landfall  ,  the  system weakens and  आखिरकार  dissipates .
It is  नहीं  possible  to  artificially induce the dissipation of  ये   प्रणालियों  with current technology .
Kirk  डगलस  ( born Issur Danielovitch , ;  दिसम्बर  9 ,  1916  ) is an American  स्टेज  and film actor ,  फिल्मी   निर्माता  and  लेखक  .
His popular films include  आउट  of the Past  (   1947  )  ,   चैंपियन  ( 1949 )  ,  Ace  in  the Hole ( 1951 ) , The  ख़राब  and  the   खूबसूरत  ( 1952 ) , 20,000 Leagues Under  the  Sea  (  1954 ) , Lust  लिये   जीवन   (   1956  ) , Paths  of  Glory  (  1957 ) ,  gunfight  at the O.K  .   corral  ( 1957 ) ,  the   वाइकिंग्स  ( 1958 ) , Spartacus  (  1960 ) , Lonely Are  the  Brave (  1962  )  ,  Seven Days in May  (   1964  ) , The Heroes of  telemark   (   1965   )  and  मुश्किल   यारों  ( 1986 ) .
He is No.17 on the  अमरीकी  Film Institute 's list  of  the  महानतम  male American screen legends of  सब  time  ,   बनाना  him the  highest-ranked  living person on the list .
In 1996 , he received  the  Academy Honorary Award `` for 50 years  as  a creative and moral force in the  गति  picture community .  ''
He is one  of  the  पिछला   surviving  actors from Hollywood  's   ``  golden age ''  .
Robert Clark `` Bob '' Seger (  born  May  6  , 1945  )  is an American rock  और   फेंकें  singer-songwriter  ,  guitarist and pianist .
As a  locally   कामयाब  Detroit-area artist  ,  he  performed  and recorded  as  Bob Seger and the Last  सुना  and  bob   seger  System throughout the  1960s  .
By the early  1970s  , he  था   dropped   the  `` System '' from his recordings and continued to  नीयत  for broader  कामयाबी  with other various bands  .
In 1973 , he put together The Silver  गोली  Band  ,   a  group of Detroit-area musicians , with whom  he   became  most successful on  the   नेशनल  level with the album Live Bullet , recorded  सजीव   साथ   the   चांदी  Bullet  बैंड  in  1975  at Cobo  हॉल  in Detroit ,  मिशिगन  .
In 1976  ,  he  हासिल  a national breakout  साथ  the  स्टुडियो  album Night Moves .
On his studio albums , he  भी  worked extensively with the  alabama-based  Muscle Shoals  लय   खण्ड  , which appeared on several of Seger 's  best-selling   singles  and albums .
A roots  रॉकर  with  a   क्लासिक   raspy  , shouting voice , Seger wrote  और  recorded songs that dealt with love  ,  women ,  blue-collar  themes and was an exemplar of heartland rock .
Seger  रै   अंकित  many  हिट्स  , including `` Night  चालें   ,  '' ``  फेरे   the  Page ,  ''  `` We 've  मिला  Tonight ,  ''  ``  विरूद्ध   the  Wind  ,  '' and  shakedown   कि  was written for Beverly Hills Cop II and ``  जैसे  a Rock , '' and also co-wrote the  ईगल्स  ' number-one  hit  `` Heartache  tonight  . ''
उसके  iconic  रिकॉर्डिंग  of  ``  Old Time Rock and Roll  ``  was named one  of  the Songs of the Century in  2001   .
With a career  spanning   पाँच  decades , Seger  continues  to  perform   और   रिकार्ड  today .
seger  was  inducted  into the Rock and  फेंकें  Hall  of   कीर्ति  in 2004 and the  songwriters   हॉल  of  कीर्ति  in  2012  .
Richard  milhous  Nixon  (   जनवरी   9  , 1913 – April  22  , 1994  )  was the  37th  President of the United States  ,  serving from  1969   to  1974 , when he became the only president to resign the office  .
Nixon had previously  परोसा  as  a  Republican  u.S.  representative  और   सीनेटर  from California and  as   the  36th Vice President of the United States from 1953 to 1961 .
निक्सन   थी  born  in   yorba   लिंडा  , California .
He graduated  इससे  Whittier College in  1934  and Duke University School of Law in  1937  , returning to California to practice law .
he  and  उसके   बीवी  , Pat Nixon , moved to  वॉशिंगटन   to   कार्य  for the federal government in 1942 .
he  subsequently  परोसा   in   the  United  राज्य  Navy  दौरान  World War II .
निक्सन  was elected in  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  to the House of Representatives  in  1946 and to  the  Senate  in  1950  .
His pursuit of  the   alger  Hiss  मामला  established his  प्रतिष्ठा  as a  अग्रणी   anti-communist  ,  और  elevated him to national prominence .
He was  the  running mate of Dwight  D.  Eisenhower ,  the  Republican Party presidential  nominee   in   the  1952 election .
Nixon served  लिये  eight years as vice  अध्यक्ष  .
He waged  an  unsuccessful  अध्यक्षीय   अभियान  in 1960 , narrowly losing to John F.  कैनेडी   ,  and lost  a  race for Governor  of  California in  1962   .
In 1968  ,   he  ran again  लिये   the  presidency and was  निर्वाचित  .
Although  निक्सन  initially escalated America 's involvement in the Vietnam War , he subsequently ended U.S. involvement in 1973 .
Nixon 's visit to  the  People 's Republic  of  China in 1972 opened  राजनयिक   संबंध   between  the two nations , and  he  initiated  détente  and the Anti-Ballistic Missile  सन्धि  with the Soviet Union the same year  .
Domestically ,  उसके  administration generally embraced policies that transferred power from  वॉशिंगटन  to  the  states .
Among other things , he launched  पहलों  to  लड़ो  cancer  और  illegal drugs , imposed wage and price controls  ,  enforced  desegregation   of  some Southern schools , and established  the   पर्यावरणीय   सुरक्षा  Agency .
Though he  presided  over  the  lunar landings beginning with Apollo  11  , he scaled  वापस  manned space exploration  .
He  थी   re-elected   by  a  भूस्खलन  in 1972 .
Nixon 's second term saw an  अरब  oil embargo  ,   the  resignation  of  his vice president , Spiro Agnew , and a continuing series  of  revelations  परिचय  the  वाटरगेट  scandal and  अन्य  misconduct  by  members of the  प्रशासन  .
the  scandal escalated , costing  निक्सन  much  of   उसके  political support , and on  अगस्त  9  ,  1974 ,  he  resigned  in  the  फेस  of almost  निश्चित   महाभियोग  and removal from office  .
बाद  his  इस्तीफा   ,  he controversially received a  pardon  issued by his successor , Gerald  घाट  .
in  retirement , Nixon 's  कार्य  as an  elder   statesman  , authoring  अनेक  books and  undertaking  many foreign trips , helped to rehabilitate his  पब्लिक  image .
He suffered a debilitating stroke on April 18  ,  1994  ,  and  died  four days later at  the  age of 81 .
{ { Infobox Senator
The  डोमिनिकन   गणतंत्र  annexation treaty  caused  bitter  contention  between President Grant and Sen. Sumner .
ब्रैडी   1869  ] ]
Sen. Sumner , opposed  to   अमरीकी  imperialism  in  the Caribbean  और  fearful that  annexation  would  सीसे  to the conquest of the  neighboring  black republic of  हैती  , became convinced  कि   भ्रष्टाचार  lay  पीछे   the  treaty , and that men  बंद   to   the   अध्यक्ष  shared in the corruption  .
As chairman  of  the Senate  विदेशी   संबंध   कमेटी  , Sen. Sumner initially withheld  उसके  opinion on the  सन्धि  on  जनवरी  18 , 1870  .
Sen.  sumner   था   महरूम  leaked information from  सहायक  Secretary of State  ,   bancroft  Davis , that U.S  .   नवल  ships were being used  to   protect  President Báez .
Sen.  sumner  's  कमेटी  voted against annexation and at Sen. Sumner’s  सुझाव   और  quite  संभवतः  to  सहेजें  the party  इससे   an  ugly fight or the  अध्यक्ष   इससे  embarrassment , the  सीनेट  held its  बहस   of  the  सन्धि  behind closed doors  in  executive session .
अध्यक्ष  Grant persisted and sent  संदेश  to  कॉंग्रेस   in  favor of  annexation   on  March  14   ,  1870 ,  और   may  31 ,  1870  .
In closed session , Sen.  sumner  spoke out  विरूद्ध  the treaty  ;  warnng  कि   वहीँ  would be difficulty with  the  foreign  नागरिकों  ,  noting  the chronic  विद्रोह  that  took   प्लेस  on the island , and the risk  कि   the  independence  of  Haiti , recognized by the United States in 1862  ,  would be  खोया   .
sumner  stated that Grant  's  use of the U.S.  नेवी  as a protectorate  थी   a   उल्लंघन  of  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  law and  असंवैधानिक  .
आखिरकार  , on June  30   ,  1870 the  सन्धि  was  voted   on   by  the Senate and  विफल  to  लाभ   the   जरूरी   2/3  majority for treaty  ड्योढ़ी   .
The  following  day , President  ग्रान्ट   ,   अहसास  betrayed by Sen. Sumner , retaliated by ordering the dismissal of Sumner’s close  dost  J. Lothrop  motley  ,  दूत  to  ब्रिटेन   .
by  autumn  ,   sumner   's  personal  दुश्मनी  to the president was  पब्लिक  knowledge , and he  blamed   the  Secretary of  राज्य   लिये  failing to have resigned , rather  than  let Grant have his  रास्ता  .
The  दो   मेन  , friends until then ,  cooled   into   कड़वा  enemies  .
In December  ,  1870 , still fearful that Grant meant to  acquire  Santo  डोमिंगो  somehow , Sumner gave a fiercely critical speech accusing  the   अध्यक्ष  of usurpation and Babcock of unethical conduct  .
Already , President Grant , supported by his Secretary of  राज्य   हैमिल्टन   मछली   ,   था   initiated  a  अभियान  to depose  sumner  from  the   अध्यक्षता  of  the  Senate Foreign  संबंध   कमेटी   .
हालांकि  Sumner stated he  थी  an ``  प्रशासन  man '' ,  in   जोड  to  having  stopped  ग्रान्ट   's   डोमिनिकन  Republic treaty attempt , Sumner had defeated Grant 's full repeal of the Tenure of Office Act , blocked Grant 's  नामांकन   of   सिकंदर  Stewart to U.S. Secretary of Treasury , and been a constant harassing force pushing  पुनर्निर्माण  policies faster than Grant  था  been willing  to  go .
Grant resented Sumner  's   बड़प्पन  of  manner  ,  as  well .
Told once that  sumner  did not believe in the  बाइबल  ,  the   अध्यक्ष  is supposed to  have   कहा  that he was  नहीं  surprised  :  `` he did n't  लिखें   it  .  ''
As  the   दरार   between  Grant  और  Sumner  increased   ,  Sumner’s health began to decline .
जब  the  42nd  U.S. Congress  convened   on   कूच   4  , 1871 ,  सीनेटरों  affiliated with President  ग्रान्ट  , known as ‘’New Radicals’’ voted to  oust  Sen. Sumner from the Senate  विदेशी  Relations  कमेटी  chairmanship .
Business  आचार  ( also  कॉरपोरेट  ethics ) is a form of  लागू  ethics or  पेशेवर  ethics that examines  नैतिक   सिद्धान्त   और  moral or  नैतिक  problems that arise in a business environment  .
It applies  to  all aspects of business  conduct  and is relevant  to  the  conduct  of individuals and entire  संगठन  .
Business ethics has both normative and descriptive  आयाम  .
As a corporate practice and a  करियर  specialization ,  the  field is primarily normative .
Academics attempting to understand business  बर्ताव  employ  वर्णनात्मक  methods .
the  range and quantity of business  नैतिक  issues reflects  the  interaction of profit-maximizing behavior  साथ  non-economic concerns  .
Interest in  कारोबार  ethics accelerated dramatically during the 1980s and  1990s  ,  दोनो  within major corporations and within academia .
लिये  example ,  आज  most major corporations promote their commitment to non-economic values under headings such as ethics codes  और  social  जिम्मेदारी  charters .
Adam Smith said , `` People  of  the same trade seldom  मिलें  together , even for merriment and diversion  ,  but the  वार्तालाप   ends  in a  षड्यंत्र   विरूद्ध  the public  ,  or in  कुछ  contrivance to raise prices  .  ''
सरकारें   उपयोग  laws and regulations  to  point  कारोबार   बर्ताव   in  what they  perceive  to  be   फायदेमंद  directions .
आचार  implicitly  regulates  areas  और  details of behavior that  झूठ   परे  governmental control  .
the  emergence of large corporations with limited relationships and sensitivity  to   the   समुदायों  in  जिससे  they  operate   त्वरित  the  विकास   of   औपचारिक  ethics  regimes  .
a   बर्न  is a type  of  injury to flesh  or   स्किन   caused  by  ऊष्मा  , electricity , chemicals  ,   घर्षण  , or radiation  .
Most  burns  affect  तभी  the  सतही  skin ( known as  सतही   or  first degree ) or  extend  into the  deeper  skin  लकिन  do not involve the full thickness of the skin  (   ज्ञात  as partial  मोटाई  or  दूसरी  degree  )  .
Rarely  सब  layers  of  the  स्किन  or  deeper  tissues , such as  मांसपेशी  or  अस्थि   can   be   घायल   in   जिससे  case  the  burn is either  पूरा   मोटाई   (  third degree )  or   चौथी  degree  .
The treatment  जरूरी  depends on the severity  of  the  बर्न  .
Superficial burns  संभवतः   प्रबंधित  with  छोटी  more  than  simple  पीड़ा   हत्यारे  while major burns may require prolonged treatment  in   specialized  burn centers  .
Cooling with tap  जल   may  aid pain and decrease damage however  if   एक्सपोज़र  is  prolonged  it may result in  कम  body temperature  .
Partial thickness burns may require cleaning with soap and  जल   followed  by dressings .
फफोले  should typically  be  left unbroken .
पूरा  thickness  burns   प्रायः   आवश्यकता   सर्जिकल  treatments  ऐसे  as skin grafting  और   extensive   burns  often require  विशाल  amount of intravenous  fluids  .
The most common complications  of  burns  हैं   सम्बन्धित   to   संक्रमण  .
While  विशाल  burns can be fatal , modern treatments  विकसित  in  the  last 50 years have significantly improved the  outcomes  , especially  in  children and young adults .
Globally about 11 million people  तलाश  medical treatment and  300,000  people die  इससे  burns  .
In the United States ,  of  those admitted to a burn center , approximately 4 %  die   इससे  their  चोटों   .
The long term outcome is primarily related  to  the  आकार  of burn and the  आयु  of the person effected  .
The  अटलांटिक  Ocean ,  नहीं  including Arctic and Antarctic  regions
This video was  लिया  by the crew of  expedition  29  on  board the ISS .
The pass starts from just  north-east  of the Island of Newfoundland over the North  अटलांटिक   समंदर  to central Africa , over South Sudan .
The  अटलांटिक  Ocean is  the  second-largest of  the  world  's   oceanic   विभाजन  .
With  a  total area  of  about , it covers approximately 20 percent  of   the  Earth  's   सतह  and about 29 percent of its water  सतह   क्षेत्रफल  .
the   पहला  part of its name  refers   to  Atlas of  यूनानी   mythology  ,  बनाना  the  अटलांटिक  the `` Sea  of  Atlas ''  .
The oldest known  जिक्र  of `` Atlantic  ''  is in The Histories of Herodotus around 450  bc  ( Hdt . 1.202.4  )  :  अटलांटिस   थलैसा  (  यूनानी  : Ἀτλαντὶς θάλασσα ;  अंग्रेज़ी  :  समुद्र  of Atlas  )  .
The  पद  Ethiopic Ocean ,  निकला  from  इथियोपिया   ,   थी   लागू  to the  दक्षिणी  Atlantic  as  late as the mid-19th  सदी  .
पहले  Europeans  खोजा  other oceans  ,   the  term ``  समंदर  '' itself  थी  synonymous  साथ  the waters  परे   the  Strait of  जिब्राल्टर  that we  अभी  know as the  अटलांटिक  .
the   जल्दी  Greeks believed  इस  ocean  to  be a gigantic river encircling  the   संसार  .
The Atlantic  समंदर  occupies  an   elongated   ,  S-shaped basin extending longitudinally between Eurasia  और  Africa  to  the  ईस्ट   ,  and the Americas to the  वेस्ट   .
As one component of the  interconnected  global  समंदर  , it is connected in the north to the Arctic Ocean  (   जिससे  is sometimes considered a  समुद्र  of the  अटलांटिक  )  ,  to the Pacific Ocean in  the   दक्षिणपश्चिम  , the Indian  समंदर   in   the  southeast  ,  and the Southern Ocean  in  the south .
( Other definitions describe the Atlantic as  extending   southward  to  अंटार्कटिक   .  )
the   equator  subdivides it into the North  अटलांटिक   समंदर  and  दक्षिण  Atlantic  समंदर  .
Due  to  their long-term  हठ  , and the  need  for a unique identifier  in   issuing  forecasts and warnings  ,  tropical cyclones  और  subtropical cyclones are given  names  according to policy ( see  तीव्र   चक्रवात  naming ) .
The following  हैं  lists  इससे   जिससे  these  तीव्र  and  उपोष्ण  cyclone names are derived .
श्वेत  light is dispersed  by  a prism  into  the colors  of  the  ऑप्टिकल  spectrum .
The visible spectrum is the  portion   of   the   इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  spectrum  कि   is  visible to ( can be detected  by  )  the  human eye .
Electromagnetic radiation in  इस   दायरा   of  wavelengths is called visible  लाइट   or  simply  लाइट   .
A typical human  नजर  will respond to wavelengths  इससे   परिचय   390  to 700  nm  .
In  शर्तें  of frequency , this corresponds to a band in the  vicinity   of   430–790  THz .
A  light-adapted   नजर  generally has  इसके   अधिकतम  sensitivity at around 555 nm ( 540 THz  )  , in the  ग्रीन  region  of  the optical  वर्णक्रम  ( see  :  luminosity  फलन  )  .
The spectrum does not ,  however   ,   contain  all  the  colors that  the  human eyes and brain can distinguish .
Unsaturated colors  ऐसे  as pink , or purple variations such as magenta ,  हैं  absent ,  लिये  example , because  वे  can be  बना  only by a mix of  अनेक  wavelengths  .
Colors containing only  एक  wavelength are also called pure  रंगों   .
दृश्य  wavelengths pass through  the   ``  optical  खिड़की  `` , the region of  the  electromagnetic spectrum which allows wavelengths  to   pass   largely  unattenuated through the Earth 's atmosphere  .
An  उदाहरण  of this phenomenon is that clean air  scatters  blue  लाइट  more  than  red  wavelengths  , and so the midday sky appears  ब्लू   .
the  optical window is also  पुकारा  the  दृश्य  window  क्युकी   it  overlaps  the  human visible response spectrum .
the   निकट  infrared ( NIR  )  window lies just out of the human  दृष्टि   ,  as  खूब  as the Medium  wavelength   ir  ( MWIR ) window and the Long Wavelength or Far Infrared ( LWIR or FIR ) window though  अन्य  animals may experience them .
Many species  can   देखिए  light with frequencies outside the ``  दृश्य  spectrum , '' which is  पारिभाषित  in terms  of   इंसान   दृष्टि  .
Bees  और  many  अन्य   कीट  can detect  पराबैंगनी  light  ,   जिससे   helps  them find nectar in flowers .
संयंत्र  species that  निर्भर  on insect pollination may  owe  reproductive success to their appearance in  पराबैंगनी  light  ,  rather than  कैसा   रंगीन   वे  appear to humans .
Birds , too , can see into the ultraviolet ( 300–400 nm ) , and some have sex-dependent markings  on   उनके   plumage   कि   हैं  visible only  in  the ultraviolet  दायरा   .
Many  पशु   कि  can  देखिए  into the  पराबैंगनी  range , however , can not see red light  or  any other reddish  wavelengths   .
Bees '  दृश्य  spectrum  ends   at  about 590nm , just before the orange  wavelengths  start .
Birds  ,  however , can  देखिए   कुछ  red wavelengths ,  लकिन  not as many as humans .
zebras   (  or ) are several species of African equids ( horse  परिवार  ) united by their distinctive black and white  धारियाँ  .
उनके  stripes come in different patterns ,  अद्वितीय  to each individual .
They are  generally   सोशल  animals that live in small harems to large herds .
Unlike their closest relatives ,  घोड़े  and asses , zebras  have   never   महरूम  truly  domesticated  .
वहीँ  are three species of  zebras   :  the  मैदान  zebra  ,   the   grévy   's   जेब्रा   और  the mountain zebra  .
the  plains zebra and the mountain  जेब्रा   belong  to  the  subgenus Hippotigris , but Grévy  's  zebra  is  the sole species  of   subgenus  Dolichohippus .
the   latter  resembles an ass , to which  it   is  closely related , while the former  दो  are more horse-like .
All three  belong   to  the genus Equus , along with other  जीना  equids .
The  अद्वितीय  stripes of  zebras  make them one of the  पशु  most familiar to people .
They occur in  a  variety  of   habitats  , such as  grasslands  , savannas , woodlands , thorny scrublands , mountains ,  और   तटीय  hills  .
however  ,  विभिन्न  anthropogenic  कारकों   have  had a severe impact on zebra populations , in particular hunting for  खालें  and habitat destruction .
Grévy  's  zebra and  the   पहाड़  zebra are endangered .
While plains zebras  हैं   much  more  plentiful  , one  subspecies  ,  the   quagga  ,  became  extinct  in  the late 19th century – though there  is  currently a plan  ,  called the Quagga Project  ,   कि  aims  to  breed zebras that  हैं   phenotypically   समान   to   the  quagga  in  a process called breeding back .
Barry  श्वेत   ,  born Barry  यूजीन  Carter (  –  ) , was  an  American  composer  and singer-songwriter  .
a  two-time  ग्रैमी  Award -winner  ज्ञात  for his distinctive bass voice and romantic image , White  's  greatest  कामयाबी  came in  the   1970s  as a solo singer and  साथ  the Love Unlimited Orchestra  ,  crafting  अनेक  enduring soul ,  दुर्गंध  , and disco songs  ऐसे  as  उसके  two biggest hits , `` You 're the First , the Last , My Everything `` and `` Ca n't Get Enough  of  Your Love , Babe . ''
Along  साथ  Isaac Hayes ,  श्वेत   is   माना   by  Allmusic.com as  a  pioneer of disco music in  the   जल्दी  1970s .
During the course of  उसके  career  in   the  music business  ,   श्वेत  achieved 106 gold albums worldwide  ,  41 of  जिससे  also attained platinum status  .
White had 20  सुनहरा  and 10 platinum singles , with worldwide sales in excess of 100 million ,  according  to critics Ed Hogan and Wade Kergan .
His  प्रभाव   शामिल  Rev . James Cleveland , Ray Charles , Aretha  फ्रैंकलिन   प्लस   motown  artists The Supremes ,  the   चार  Tops  और  Marvin Gaye .
Angelina  जोली  ( ,  born   एंजेलीना  Jolie Voight ;  जून   4  , 1975 ) is an American actress  ,  film director ,  और  screenwriter .
She has received an Academy Award , two Screen Actors Guild  पुरस्कार   ,   और  three Golden Globe Awards  ,  and was named Hollywood 's highest-paid actress by Forbes  in  2009 and 2011 .
Jolie promotes humanitarian causes ,  और  is noted for her work with refugees as  a   खास  Envoy and former Goodwill  दूत  for  the   संयुक्त  Nations High Commissioner  लिये  Refugees ( UNHCR ) .
She has often been cited  as  the  संसार   's   ``  most beautiful  ''   स्त्री  , a  शीर्षक  for which  वो  has received substantial  मीडिया   ध्यान  .
जोली  made her  स्क्रीन  debut as a child alongside  उसके   पिता   jon   वोइट  in Lookin ' to  मिलेंगी  Out ( 1982  )  , but her  फिल्मी  career began in earnest  a  decade later with  the  low-budget production Cyborg  2  ( 1993 )  .
उसके   पहला  leading  भूमिका   in  a major film  थी  in  the  cyber-thriller  हैकर्स  ( 1995 )  .
She starred in the critically acclaimed biographical television  films   जार्ज  Wallace (  1997  ) and Gia  (   1998  ) , and won an  अकादमी  Award for Best Supporting  अभिनेत्री  for her  प्रदर्शन  in the drama  लड़की  , Interrupted ( 1999 ) .
जोली  achieved wide fame after her portrayal of video  खेल  heroine Lara Croft in Lara Croft :  मकबरा   रेडर  ( 2001 ) , and established herself among the highest-paid actresses in Hollywood  साथ  the sequel  the  Cradle of Life  (  2003  )  .
She  जारी  her action star career  साथ  Mr. &  mrs.  Smith  (  2005 ) and Wanted  (  2008 ) —her  biggest   non-animated  commercial successes to date—and received further critical acclaim for her  प्रदर्शन  in the dramas A  mighty  Heart ( 2007 )  और  Changeling (  2008  ) , which earned her  a   नामांकन   लिये  an Academy Award  लिये   बेहतरीन  Actress .
Jolie made  उसके  directorial debut  साथ  the  wartime  drama In the Land  of  Blood and Honey (  2011   )  .
तलाक  from actors  जॉनी   ली   मिलर   और  Billy Bob  थॉर्नटन  , Jolie now  जीवनदान  with  कर्ता  Brad Pitt , in a relationship notable for  fervent  media  ध्यान  .
Jolie and  pitt  have three biological children and  तीन  adopted  children  .
