अपरदन  is  the   प्रक्रम   by  which  मृदा  and  चट्टान   हैं  removed from the Earth  's  surface  by  exogenetic processes such as wind or  जल   प्रवाह  , and then transported and deposited  in  other  स्थितियाँ  .
While erosion  is  a  प्राकृतिक  process  ,   इंसान  activities have increased  by  10-40 times  the   रेट  at which erosion  is  occurring globally .
excessive  erosion causes problems such  as   मरुस्थलीकरण  ,  decreases  in agricultural productivity  due  to land  degradation  ,  sedimentation  of waterways , and  ecological   पतन  due  to  loss of the  nutrient   समृद्ध  upper soil layers .
जल  and  हवा  erosion are  अभी  the  दो  primary  कल्याणकारी  of land  degradation  ; combined , they  हैं  responsible for  84   %  of  degraded   acreage  ,  बनाना   excessive   अपरदन  one of the most significant global environmental problems  .
Industrial agriculture , deforestation , roads  ,   anthropogenic  climate change  और   शहरी  sprawl  हैं  amongst the  सबसे  significant human  क्रियाएँ  in  लिहाज़   to  their  प्रभाव  on stimulating erosion .
however  , there are many available alternative land use practices  कि  can curtail or limit  अपरदन  ,  ऐसे   as   छत  -building ,  no-till  agriculture , and revegetation of denuded soils  .
Jersey Shore is  an  American reality television series which ran on MTV from  दिसम्बर   3   ,   2009  to December 20 , 2012 in  the  United States  .
The series follows  the  lives of eight housemates  बिता  their summer at  the  Jersey Shore  in  the  u.S.  state of  नई  Jersey .
Season 2 followed the cast  escaping  the  ठंडा  northeast  शीत  to  मियामी  Beach , with Season  3  returning  to  the Jersey Shore .
The fourth season , filmed in  इटली   ,   premiered  on August  4  , 2011 .
The show returned for  a   पांचवां  season , at Seaside Heights on  जनवरी   5  ,  2012  .
The  पांचवां   ऋतु   finale  aired on March  15  ,  2012  .
On  कूच   19   ,  2012 ,  एमटीवी   पुष्टि  that the series would  वापसी   लिये   उनके   छठे  season  .
On August 30  ,  2012 , MTV announced  कि  the  श्रेणी   होगा  end after  the   छठे  season  ,  which premiered on  अक्तूबर  4 .
the  series finale aired  on  December 20 , 2012 .
The show debuted amid large amounts of controversy  regarding   the  use of the words `` Guido /  guidette  , '' portrayals  of   italian-american  stereotypes ,  और  scrutiny from locals  क्युकी  the cast members were not residents of the area .
the   श्रेणी  garnered record ratings for  एमटीवी  , making it the  संजाल   's   सबसे  viewed series  telecast  ever .
The  श्रेणी  ' cast have also been  credited  with introducing unique  lexicon  and phrases into  अमरीकी  popular culture  .
The  विश्वविद्यालयों  of Chicago  और   the  University  of   ओक्लाहोमा  are  among  the  शैक्षणिक   संस्थानों  that have had classes  or  conferences about the show .
In 2010 , the  डाल  of  जर्सी  Shore  थी  named on  बारबरा   walters  '  10   सबसे   fascinating   लोगों  list  ,   और  the series has since been exported to  दर्जनों  of countries worldwide .
There are  अनेक  remakes of  the   दिखाएँ  in other  देशों   ,   साथ  two set in  the  United Kingdom ;  the  well  ज्ञात  Geordie  shore  , set in Newcastle upon Tyne , England  .
The other is  the  Valleys  ,  the Welsh equivalent , which is filmed  और  set  in  Cardiff  .
The only other official remake of the  दिखाएँ  is  gandía  Shore , set in Gandía ,  स्पेन   .
right
United States  territory   is  any extent of region under the  क्षेत्राधिकार   of  the  संघीय  government of the  संयुक्त  States ,  सहित   सब   waters   (  around islands  or  continental  tracts  ) and  सब  U.S . Naval vessels .
The United States has  traditionally   proclaimed  the sovereign  अधिकारों  for  exploring  ,  exploiting  ,  conserving  ,  और   मैनेजिंग  its territory .
This extent of  territory  is all  the   क्षेत्रफल  belonging to ,  और  under the  डोमिनियन  of ,  the  United States  संघीय  government (  जिससे   शामिल  tracts lying at a distance from the country ) for administrative  और  other purposes  .
The United  राज्य   कुल   territory   शामिल  a subset of  राजनैतिक   विभाजन  .
The U.S. government is  a  government with  प्रतिनिधित्व   शक्तियां   अंतर्गत  the  संयुक्त  States Constitution .
``  The powers  नहीं  delegated to the United  राज्य  by the Constitution , nor prohibited  by  it to the  राज्य   ,   हैं  reserved to the States respectively , or to the people  ''  by the  दसवाँ  Amendment .
Terminator 3 :  वृद्धि  of the  मशीने   (  commonly abbreviated as T3 ) is a  2003   विज्ञान  fiction action film directed by  जोनाथन  Mostow  और  starring  अर्नाल्ड  Schwarzenegger ,  उपनाम  Stahl  ,  Claire Danes  और  Kristanna  loken   .
it  is  the   दूसरी  sequel to The Terminator  (  1984 ) .
After  स्काईनेट   fails  to kill Sarah Connor before  उसके   बेटे   is   born   और  to kill John himself as a child  ,  it sends  वापस   another  Terminator ,  the   t-x  , in  an   attempt  to  wipe  out as many Resistance officers  as  possible  .
This includes John  's  future  बीवी  , but not John himself  as   उसके   whereabouts   हैं  unknown to Skynet .
John  's  life  is  placed in  खतरे   जब  the  t-x  accidentally finds him  .
A  cord   of  wood
The cord is a  ईकाई  of measure of  शुष्क  volume used in Canada and the United States to measure firewood and pulpwood .
A  cord  is the amount of wood  कि  ,  जब   ``  ranked and well stowed ''  (  arranged so pieces  हैं  aligned , parallel ,  छु  and compact  )   ,  occupies a  आवाज़  of .
This corresponds to a well  stacked   woodpile  high ,  long   ,   और  deep ;  or  any other arrangement of linear measurements that yields the  वही  volume .
the   नाम  cord probably comes  इससे  the use of a cord or string to measure it .
The , is  an   8-bit  handheld video  खेल  device  विकसित  and manufactured by Nintendo .
It was  released  in Japan  on  , in North America in , and in Europe on .
It is the first handheld console in  the  Game Boy line  ,  and was created by Gunpei  yokoi  and  निन्टेंडो   शोध   &  Development 1 —the same staff  जो  had designed  the  Game &  देखें  series as well as several popular games for the Nintendo Entertainment System .
redesigned  versions were  released  in 1996  और  1998 , in the form  of   खेल   लड़के  Pocket , and Game  लड़के  Light ( Japan only  )   ,  respectively .
the  Game  लड़के  is Nintendo 's  दूसरी   हैंडहेल्ड  system  following   the  Game &  देखें  series introduced in , and it  संयुक्त   सुविधाएँ   इससे  both the  निन्टेंडो  Entertainment System and  खेल  &  देखें  .
It  थी  originally bundled with the  पहेली  game Tetris .
as   भाग  of the fourth generation of gaming , the Game  लड़के  competed with  the  Sega Game Gear , Atari  लिंक्स   ,  and the TurboExpress .
Despite  ये  other  technologically  superior handheld  consoles  , the  खेल  Boy was a  जबरदस्त  success .
The Game Boy and its  successor   ,  the Game Boy Color ,  have  both  संयुक्त   बेची   118.69  million units worldwide .
Upon its  रिलीज  in the United States ,  it  sold its entire  शिपमेंट  of one million  इकाई  within  सप्ताह   .
the  World Trade  बीच  is a complex  of  buildings under construction in Lower  मैनहटन  ,  नई   यॉर्क  City  ,  United States , replacing an earlier complex of seven buildings  साथ  the same name on the same  साईट  .
the  original World Trade  बीच  featured landmark twin  मीनारें  ,  जिससे   खोली  on  अप्रैल   4  , 1973 and were  नष्ट   in   the  September  11  attacks of  2001   ,  along with 7  संसार  Trade  बीच  .
The other  इमारतें   in  the  जटिल  were  क्षतिग्रस्त  in  the   हमले  ,  और  their ruins were eventually demolished .
The site is being rebuilt with five new skyscrapers and  a  memorial  to  those killed  in   the   हमले  .
, only one skyscraper has been completed  ;  the other four are expected to be  समाप्त   पहले   2020  .
One  संसार   व्यापार  Center will be  the  lead building for the new complex , reaching more than 100  कहानियां  at  इसके  completion .
It  became  the tallest building in New  यॉर्क  City on April  30  , 2012 , and is expected to  be  finished by 2013  .
A sixth  मीनार   is  awaiting confirmation  .
At the  समय  of  उनके  completion , the  असली  1 World Trade Center  (  the  उत्तर   मीनार  ) and 2 World Trade  बीच  ( the South Tower ) , known collectively as the  ``  Twin Towers  ''  , were the tallest buildings in the world .
The other buildings included 3 WTC  (  the  मैरियट   संसार  Trade Center ) , 4 WTC , 5 WTC , 6 WTC  ,  and  7  WTC  .
सब   of  these  इमारतें   यहूद  built between 1975 and  1985   .
The  लागत   लिये  the construction  थी   $   400   लाख  ( $ in dollars ) .
The complex was located in  the  heart of  नई  York City 's downtown financial district and contained  13.4  million square feet  (   1.24   लाख   m2  ) of  दफ्तर  space .
the  World Trade Center experienced a fire  on  , 1975  ,  a bombing on , 1993  और   a  robbery  on  , 1998 .
In 1998 , the Port Authority  decided  to privatize the World Trade Center  ,  leasing the buildings  to  a private  कम्पनी  to manage  ,  and awarded the lease  to  Silverstein  गुण  in .
On  the   morning  of September  11  , 2001  ,  Al-Qaeda -affiliated hijackers flew two Boeing 767  jets  into  the  complex  ,  one into each tower , in a  समन्वित   आतंकवादी  attack .
After burning  लिये  56 minutes ,  the  South Tower ( 2 )  collapsed  ,  followed   a  half-hour later by the  उत्तर  Tower ( 1 ) , with the  हमले  on the World Trade Center resulting in 2,753  मौतों  .
गिरना  debris from the towers , combined  साथ  fires that  the  debris  initiated  in several surrounding buildings , led  to  the  आंशिक  or complete collapse of all the other buildings in the  जटिल  and caused  अनर्थकारी   क्षति  to  टेन  other large  structures  in the surrounding area  .
The process of cleanup and recovery  at  the World  व्यापार  Center  साईट   took   आठ  months .
Over the following years ,  योजनाएँ  for a rebuilt World Trade Center took form .
The  पहला   नई  building  at   the  site  थी   7  World  व्यापार  Center ,  जिससे  opened in .
The  निम्नतर  Manhattan  विकास  Corporation (  lmdc   )   ,   स्थापित  in to oversee the rebuilding process ,  व्यवस्थित  competitions to select a site  योजना  and  मेमोरियल  design  .
Memory Foundations ,  designed  by  डेनियल   libeskind  , was selected as  the  master plan , but this went through substantial changes  in   डिज़ाइन  .
The new World  व्यापार  Center  जटिल   होगा   शामिल  One World  व्यापार  Center ,  तीन  other high-rise  दफ्तर  towers  ,  and the  नेशनल  September 11 Memorial &  संग्रहालय  .
San Gabriel Mountains
San  bernardino  Mountains ,  साथ  Mt . San  gorgonio  in the foreground and Big Bear Lake in  the   पृष्ठभूमि  .
the  Transverse Ranges  हैं   a  group of mountain ranges of southern California  ,   in  the Pacific  coast   सीमाएँ  physiographic  प्रदेश  in North  अमेरिका  .
the  Transverse Ranges begin at  the  southern end of the California Coast  सीमाएँ  and lie between  सांता  Barbara  और  San  डिएगो  counties .
They  derive  the  नाम  Transverse  सीमाएँ  due  to  their East-West  अभिविन्यास  , making them transverse  to  the general North-South orientation  of  most of California 's coastal mountains .
Periodic  तालिका  with  इलेक्ट्रॉन   शेल
an  electron shell may be thought  of   as  an orbit  followed  by electrons  around  an  अणु   's  nucleus  .
The closest shell to the  केंद्रक  is called the  ``   1  shell '' ( also called  ``  K shell '' ) , followed by the `` 2 shell '' ( or ``  l  shell  ''  ) , then the ``  3  shell '' ( or `` M shell  ''  ) , and  so  on  दूर   और   दूर  from the nucleus .
The shell  अक्षर   k  , L  ,  M , ... , used  in  the X-ray  संकेतन  , are alphabetical .
Each shell can  contain   तभी  a fixed number  of  electrons : The 1st shell  can   थाम  up to two electrons  ,  the 2nd shell can  थाम  up to  आठ  electrons , the 3rd shell  can   थाम  up  to  18 , and 4th shell  can  hold  up  to  32  and so on .
चूंकि  electrons  हैं   electrically  attracted to  the   केंद्रक  , an  अणु  's  electrons  will generally occupy outer  शेल  only if  the   अधिक  inner shells  have  already been completely filled by other electrons .
However , this  is   नहीं  a strict requirement : Atoms  may   have  two or even three incomplete  बाहरी  shells .
(  See Madelung  नियम   लिये  more  विवरण  . )
For an explanation of why electrons exist in these shells see electron configuration .
The  electrons   in  the outermost  occupied  shell (  or  shells  )  determine  the  chemical properties of  the   अणु   ;  it is called the  valence  shell .
प्रत्येक   शेल  consists  of  one or  अधिक   subshells  , and each  subshell   consists  of one or more  परमाणु   orbitals  .
Vickie Lynn Marshall  (  née Hogan ; November 28 , 1967 –  फ़रवरी   8  , 2007 )  ,   ज्ञात   by   उसके  moniker Anna  निकोल  Smith , was  an  American model , actress , and television  व्यक्तित्व   .
Smith first  gained  popularity  in  Playboy , becoming  the  1993 Playmate of the Year  .
She modeled for clothing  कंपनियाँ  ,  सहित  Guess  जीन्स  and Lane Bryant .
स्मिथ  dropped  आउट  of high school  और  was married in 1985 .
Her  अत्यधिक   publicized   दूसरी  marriage  to   आयल  business mogul  ,  J. Howard  मार्शल  ,  62  years her senior  ,  resulted in  अटकलें  that  वो  married the octogenarian for his  धन  , which she  अस्वीकृत   .
following  Marshall 's death , Smith began  a   lengthy   विधिक  battle over a share of his estate .
उसके  case , Marshall  v.  Marshall  ,  reached the U.S.  परम्  Court on a question  of  federal jurisdiction ,  और  again  on  a  सवाल   of   दिवालियापन   अदालत  authority ( now called  stern  v.  मार्शल   )   .
स्मिथ  died  on  February 8  ,  2007 in  a  Hollywood , Florida hotel  रूम  as a result of an overdose of  नुस्खा  drugs .
Within the  फाइनल   छह  months  of   उसके  life ,  स्मिथ  was the  फ़ोकस   of  a renewed press  कवरेज  surrounding the death of her  बेटे   ,  Daniel , and the paternity  और   कस्टडी  battle over her  नवजात  daughter , Dannielynn .
The is one denomination of  जापानी   येन  .
The  वर्तमान   डिज़ाइन  was first  minted  in  1959   using   जापानी  characters known as the `` new script `` , and  यहूद  also  minted  from 1949-1958 using  ``  old-script '' Japanese characters .
five-yen   सिक्के  date  to  1870 ( when , due to  the  much higher value of the  येन  , they were minted in gold )  .
The front of the coin depicts  a  rice  संयंत्र   growing  out of the water , with  ``  five yen '' written in  कांजी  ;  the  back is  stamped  with `` Japan ''  और  the year of issue ,  भी  in kanji , separated by sprouts  of   a  tree .
The three graphic elements of  the  coin  represent  agriculture and fisheries  ,  the key elements of the Japanese first-sector economy .
Around a  छेद  , there is  a  gear that represents industry  .
It is the only  जापानी  coin  in  circulation to lack Arabic numerals on either face  .
tlc  is an  अमरीकी  girl  समूह  whose repertoire spanned R & B ,  हिप  hop  ,   आत्मा  , funk  ,  and new jack  झूले  .
Originally consisting of singer Tionne `` T-Boz ''  वाटकिंस   ,  rapper Lisa `` Left Eye '' Lopes and singer Rozonda ``  chilli  '' Thomas ,  the   समूह  found  unprecedented  success in the  1990s   जबकि   भी  enduring a series of  spats   साथ  the law , each other , and the  समूह   's   रिकार्ड  label  .
initially   ,  TLC achieved  वाणिज्यिक  success following the  रिलीज  of their  डेब्यू   एल्बम   ooooooohhh  ...
on  the TLC  टिप  , which  बेची   6  million copies worldwide .
However , it was their second  एल्बम  ,  crazysexycool  , that  catapulted  the group  to  superstar status  .
CrazySexyCool  गई   on  to  be  certified  डायमंड  by the RIAA —  a  first  लिये  a female group ,  और   आखिरकार  sold 23  लाख  copies worldwide  .
Five  सालो  later  ,  the  समूह   released   उनके   तीसरा  album FanMail  ,   जिससे   became   the  group 's first album to debut  at  number  एक   और   बेची   अधिक   than   11  million copies worldwide  .
The subsequent tour following FanMails release  became  the  उच्चतम  grossing  दौरे  of all time by a female band  .
In 2002 ,  लिसा   ``  Left Eye  ''  Lopes  died  in a car accident in Honduras .
Seven  महीने  later ,  t-boz   और  Chilli  released  the group  's  fourth  एल्बम  3D , which sold 2 million copies worldwide  ,  it featured  unreleased  vocals from  बाएँ  Eye .
Billboard magazine  क्रमित   tlc  as one  of  the greatest  musical  trios .
Between 1992 and  2003  ,  the  band accumulated ten  शीर्ष   टेन  singles ,  चार  number  एक  singles , four multi-platinum albums , and  चार  Grammy Awards .
at  the end  of  1999 , TLC was ranked as the seventh  सबसे  successful  अधिनियम  of the 1990s  by   बिलबोर्ड  .
In 2008 , the  समूह  was  inducted  into the All Time Hot 100 Artist Hall  of   कीर्ति   by  the same  पत्रिका  , at 56th place .
That year it was also  सूचीबद्ध  as the # 25 R & B/hip-hop artist of  the  preceding 25 years .
TLC has  बेची   अधिक  than 65  लाख   रिकॉर्ड   विश्वव्यापी   और  they are ranked as the  दूसरी  best selling female group of all time , and the best selling  मादा  R & B  समूह  of all  समय  .
In 2012 , TLC  क्रमित   12th  on VH1 's  100   महानतम  Women in  म्यूज़िक  , being  क्रमित  the  क्रमांक  one  सब   लड़की  group on that  सूची  .
टार्ज़न   is   a  1999  अमरीकी  animated  एडवेंचर  film  उत्पादित  by Walt Disney Feature Animation and distributed by Walt  डिज़्नी  Pictures  .
the  37th film in the Walt Disney  एनिमेटेड  Classics , it is based  on  the story  टार्ज़न  of  the  Apes  by  Edgar Rice  बरोज  , and is the only  प्रमुख  motion  चित्र  version of  the  story Tarzan property to be animated .
Directed by  क्रिस  Buck and Kevin Lima with  a  screenplay by Tab Murphy  ,  Bob Tzudiker , and Noni  श्वेत  , Tarzan features the  आवाज़ें  of  टोनी  Goldwyn ,  minnie  Driver  ,  Glenn Close  ,  and  रोजी  O'Donnell with Brian  धन्य  , Lance  henriksen  , Wayne Knight  ,  and  निगेल  Hawthorne  .
it   थी  the last bona fide  hit  before the Disney slump of  the   जल्दी   2000s   grossing  $ 171,091,819 domestically and $ 448,191,819 worldwide ,  outgrossing  its  पूर्ववर्तियों   hercules  ( 1997 ) and Mulan ( 1998 ) .
At the  समय   of  its release  ,   इसके  production  बजट   of  $ 130  लाख  made  it  the most expensive animated film  कभी  made , until  अव्वल  by  डिज़्नी  's own $  140  million Treasure Planet in  2002  .
it   थी   भी  the first Disney animated feature to open at  #  1 since Pocahontas  .
This was the  पिछला  major box office  कामयाबी  of the Disney  पुनर्जागरण  .
आयल  Platform P-51 off the  ब्राज़ीलियाई  coast is a semi-submersible platform  .
आयल  platform Mittelplate in the North sea
An  आयल  platform , (  offshore  platform or colloquially oil rig ) is a large structure with  सुविधाएं  to drill wells  ,  to extract  और   प्रक्रम  oil and natural gas ,  और  to temporarily store product until it can be brought to shore for refining and  विपणन   .
In many  मामले   ,  the  मंच  contains facilities  to   हाउस  the workforce as well  .
Depending on  the  circumstances ,  the  platform may be fixed to the  समंदर   मंजिल  ,  may  consist of  an  artificial island ,  or  may  फ्लैश   .
Remote subsea wells may also be connected to a platform by flow lines  और   by  umbilical  कनेक्शन्स  .
These subsea solutions may consist of one or more subsea wells , or  of  one or more manifold centres for  अनेक  wells .
Slaughter is  the  killing of animals , usually that of domestic livestock for food .
the   पशु  most commonly  slaughtered  for  खाना   हैं  cattle , water buffalo ( for  बीफ  and veal  )  , sheep  ,  goats ( for lamb  और   मटन  ) , pigs ( for pork ) , horses (  लिये  horse meat ) , and  fowl  , largely  मुर्गियों   ,  turkeys , and ducks  और  increasingly fish  इससे  the  aquaculture  industry  (  fish farming ) .
The White House , the president 's official residence  और  center  of  the administration
अंतर्गत   the  United States  संविधान  ,  the   अध्यक्ष   of  the United States is the head of  राज्य  and head of government of the  संयुक्त  States  .
As chief of  the  executive branch and head of  the  federal government as a whole , the presidency is the highest  राजनैतिक  office  in  the United States  by  influence  और   मान्यता  .
the   अध्यक्ष  is also  the  commander-in-chief of the United States Armed Forces  .
The  अध्यक्ष  is  indirectly  elected  to  a four-year term by  an  Electoral College ( or by the House of  प्रतिनिधि  should the Electoral College fail to award  an  absolute  बहुमत  of votes to any person  )  .
Since the ratification of the Twenty-second  amendment  to the United  राज्य  Constitution in 1951 , no person may be  निर्वाचित   अध्यक्ष  more than twice , and no one who has served more than two years of a  पद  to which someone else was  निर्वाचित   may   be   निर्वाचित  more than once .
Upon  the  death  ,   इस्तीफा   ,  or removal from office of  an   लाज़िम  President ,  the  Vice President assumes the office .
The  अध्यक्ष   जरूर  be at  तनिक  35 years of age  और  a  ``  natural born '' citizen  of   the   संयुक्त  States  .
इस  list  शामिल  only those  व्यक्तियों  who  यहूद   sworn  into office as president following the ratification of the United States Constitution , which took effect on March  4  , 1789 .
लिये  American leaders before this ratification , see  अध्यक्ष   of  the Continental  कॉंग्रेस  .
The list does not include any  एक्टिंग  Presidents under the Twenty-fifth  amendment  to  the   संयुक्त  States Constitution .
There  have  been 43 people sworn into office , and  44   presidencies  ,  as   ग्रोवर  Cleveland served two non-consecutive terms and is counted chronologically as  दोनो  the 22nd and 24th president .
Of the  individuals  elected  as  president ,  चार  died in office of natural causes ( William Henry  हैरिसन  , Zachary Taylor  ,  Warren G.  हार्डिंग  , and Franklin D.  रूज़वेल्ट  ) , four were  assassinated   (  Abraham  lincoln  ,  जेम्स  A. Garfield , William McKinley  ,  and John  F.  Kennedy  )  and one resigned  (  Richard  निक्सन   )  .
George  वॉशिंगटन   ,   the  first president , was  उदघाटन  in 1789 after a  सर्वसम्मत  vote  of  the Electoral  कॉलेज  .
विलियम  Henry Harrison spent the  shortest  time in  दफ्तर  with  32  days in  1841  ,  और  Franklin  D.  Roosevelt  खर्च  the  longest  with over twelve years , but died shortly into his fourth term in  1945  .
He is the  तभी  president  to  serve  अधिक   than  two terms ,  और   a  constitutional amendment , affecting presidents after  हैरी  Truman ,  थी  passed  to  limit the number  of   टाइम्स  an individual can be  निर्वाचित  president .
Andrew Jackson  ,  the  सातवाँ  president , was  the  first to be elected  by  men of  सब  classes in 1828 after most laws barring non-land-owners from  मतदान  were repealed .
Warren  हार्डिंग  was the first elected after  महिलाओं  gained voting  अधिकारों  in 1920 .
History  रिकॉर्ड  four presidents – John  q   एडम्स   ,   रदरफोर्ड  B.  हेज़   ,  Benjamin Harrison and  जार्ज  W.  बुश  – who lost the popular vote  लकिन  assumed office  .
John  F.  Kennedy has been the  तभी  president  of  Roman  कैथोलिक  faith , and  the   वर्तमान  president , Barack Obama , is the first president of  अफ़्रीकी  descent .
Several firearms with detachable  suppressors  ,  इससे   शीर्ष  to  नीचे   :  An Uzi , An AR-15 ,  a  Heckler &  koch  USP Tactical , A  beretta  92FS , and  a  SIG Mosquito .
Bolt  कार्रवाई   rimfire  rifle  साथ   suppressor
AWM-F sniper  राइफल  with attached suppressor  .
A  suppressor   ,  sound suppressor ,  or  sound moderator  ,  is a device attached  to  or part of the barrel of a firearm which reduces the amount of noise , and usually the  राशि   of  muzzle flash , generated by firing  the  weapon  .
A suppressor can  be  used both with a firearm  और  with compressed  एयर   गन  .
Though  it  is sometimes referred  to  as a silencer ,  इस  term is a  misnomer  popularized  by  cinematic fiction  :  the sound of a projectile , especially one  चलती  faster than the speed of sound ,  through  the air can not  be   eliminated  .
using  a suppressor  in   long  distance shooting ( i.e  .  greater than 300 meters  )   can  lessen , or retard , the report  at  the moment of impact  ,  and create the impression of silence near the target  .
The noise heard near  the  muzzle as a projectile  पत्ते   the   बैरल  , though subdued  ,   is  not silent  at  all  .
A suppressor is  प्रायः  a metal cylinder  साथ  internal mechanisms to reduce  the   ध्वनि  of firing by  slowing   the  escaping propellant gas and  sometimes  by reducing the  गति   of  the bullet .
Early suppressors were  निर्मित  around the beginning  of  the 20th century by several  आविष्कारक  .
अमरीकी  inventor Hiram Percy  कहावत  ( not  to  be confused  साथ  Hiram Stevens  कहावत   ,  Hiram  पर्सी  's  पिता  , and the  आविष्कारक  of the Maxim Machine Gun ) , is  credited  with inventing and selling the first commercially successful models circa  1902   (  patented 30 March 1909 )  .
Maxim gave his device the trademarked name Maxim Silencer  .
The muffler  लिये   आतंरिक  combustion  इंजन  was  विकसित   in  parallel with  the   firearm   suppressor  by Maxim  in  the early 20th  सदी  ,  using   अनेक  of  the  same techniques to  provide  quieter-running engines ( in  अनेक  European  देशों   ऑटोमोबाइल  mufflers are still called  silencers  )  .
The  शब्द   silencer  in reference  to  gun suppressor remains in  फैली   उपयोग  , although it has  चूंकि  fallen out of  एहसान   साथ  some , especially  among  the firearms industry ,  होने  replaced with the more literally  सटीक  term  ध्वनि  suppressor  or   बस  suppressor  ,  because a  ``  sound suppressor '' does  नहीं   ``   खामोशी   ''  any  हथियार  ,  बल्कि  it eliminates muzzle flash and reduces  the   सोनिक  pressure of a firearm discharging .
आम  usage  और  U.S. legislative language favor  the  historically earlier  पद  , silencer  .
In  u.S.   विधि  , the  शर्तें  ``  firearm  muffler  ''  and  ``  firearm silencer '' are synonymous .
Suppressors  यहूद  regularly used by agents  of   the  United States Office of  रणनीतिक  Services , who  favored  the newly designed High Standard  hdm  .22 Long Rifle  पिस्टल  during World War II  .
OSS  निदेशक  William Joseph `` Wild Bill ''  डोनोवन  demonstrated the pistol for President Franklin  D.   रूज़वेल्ट  at the White House  .
According to OSS  शोध  chief Stanley Lovell  ,   डोनोवन  ( an old and  विश्वसनीय   dost  of the  अध्यक्ष   )  was  लहराया  into  the   ओवल   दफ्तर  ,  जहाँ   रूज़वेल्ट   थी   dictating  a letter .
While Roosevelt  समाप्त  his message , Donovan  turned   उसके   वापस  and  fired  ten shots into  a   sandbag  he  था   brought   साथ   उसे   ,   घोषित   कया  he  था  done and  हात  the smoking  गन   to  the  astonished   अध्यक्ष   .
The British  soe   (  Special Operations  कार्यपालिका  ) Welrod assassination pistol with an  अभिन्न   suppressor   थी  also  प्रयुक्त  by  the  American OSS  on  clandestine  परिचालन   in  Nazi occupied Europe during the Second  संसार   युद्ध   .
beatrice  `` Bea  ''  Arthur ( May 13 ,  1922  – April 25 , 2009  )   थी  an  अमरीकी   अभिनेत्री  , comedienne , and singer  जिनकी  career  spanned  seven  दशकों  .
Arthur achieved fame  as  the character Maude Findlay on the  1970s   sitcoms  All in the Family and Maude ,  और  as  डोरोथी  Zbornak on the  1980s  sitcom The Golden  लड़कियों   ,  winning  एमी  Awards for  दोनो   भूमिकाएँ  .
a  stage actress both before and after her  टेलीविज़न  success , she  जीती  the  टोनी  Award for Best Featured Actress in a Musical for her  प्रदर्शन   as  Vera Charles in the original cast  of  Mame  (  1966 )  .
is  a  2011 Japanese 3D computer-animated film based  on   the  Tekken video game  श्रेणी  , produced  by  Digital Frontier  और  distributed by Asmik Ace  entertainment  in association  साथ  Bandai Entertainment .
the  film premiered in North  अमेरिका  by Bandai  entertainment   on   जुलाई  26 , 2011  ,   और  in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  on July  27  , 2011 in a special exclusive  one-off  screening .
It  थी  released  on  September 3  ,  2011  in   जापानी  .

This film  थी  also  released  on  dvd  on November 22 , 2011 ( 2D Version only  )  .

For a  चर्चा   of  nonprofit , voluntary neighborhood advocacy groups , see  पड़ोस   संघ  .
In  the   संयुक्त   राज्य   ,  a  homeowner  association is a corporation formed  by  a real  एस्टेट  developer for the  purpose  of  विपणन  , managing , and selling  of   घरों  and lots in  a  residential  subdivision  .
It grants  the  developer privileged voting rights in governing the association , while allowing the developer to exit financial  और  legal  जिम्मेदारी  of the organization ,  typically  by transferring  स्वामित्व   of   the  association to the homeowners after selling off  a  predetermined  क्रमांक   of   लोट   .
सदस्यता  in the  homeowners   संघ   by  a  आवासीय   खरीदार  is typically a condition of purchase  ;   a  buyer  is   n't   दिए  an option to reject it .
Most homeowner associations are incorporated , and  हैं  subject to state statutes  कि  govern non-profit corporations and homeowner associations .
राज्य   oversight  of  homeowner   एसोसिएशन  is minimal , and mainly takes  the  form of laws which are inconsistent from  राज्य   to  state .
Some states ,  ऐसे  as Florida and  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , have a large  देह  of homeowner  संघ  law  ,  and some states  ,   ऐसे  as Massachusetts , have virtually no homeowner  संघ  law .
The  तीव्रतम   growing  form of housing in the  संयुक्त  States today is common-interest developments  (  CIDs ) , a  श्रेणी  that  शामिल  planned-unit developments of single-family homes ,  condominiums  , and  सहकारी   अपार्टमेंट  .
Since  1964  , homeowner  एसोसिएशन   have   become  increasingly common in the USA .
the  Community Associations Institute trade association  अनुमानित  that HOAs  governed  24.8  लाख   अमरीकी  homes  और  62  लाख   निवासियों  in 2010  .
A prize-winning lilac-and-white  silkie
There are many breeds of  गिनी   सुअर  which have been developed since its domestication ca .  5000  BC .
Breeds vary  widely  in  रूप  and purpose , ranging from  दिखाएँ  breeds with long  ,   बहती  hair to those in use  as   मॉडल  organisms by science  .
From ca  .  1200  ad   to  the Spanish conquest of  the  Inca  साम्राज्य  in 1532 , selective breeding by indigenous South  अमरीकी  peoples resulted in many varieties of  घरेलू  Guinea pigs  ,   जिससे   रूप  the basis for some of the  आधुनिक  domestic breeds  .
Early Andean breeds  यहूद  primarily kept  as  agricultural  भण्डार  for food , and efforts  at   improving  the Guinea pig as  a  food source continue to  the   आधुनिक   era   .
With the export of Guinea pigs  to  Europe in the 15th century , the  लक्ष्य  in breeding shifted to  फ़ोकस  on the  विकास  of  appealing  pets .
to  this  समाप्त   ,  various  प्रतिस्पर्धी  breeding organizations were founded by fanciers  .
the   अमरीकी  Cavy Breeders Association ,  an  adjunct  to  the American  खरगोश  Breeders  संघ   ,  is the governing  देह  in the United  राज्य  and  कनाडा  .
The British Cavy  परिषद  governs cavy clubs  in  the United  किंगडम   .
समान  organizations exist in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया   (  Australian National Cavy Council  )  and New Zealand ( New Zealand Cavy Club  )  .
Each club publishes its own Standard  of  Perfection and  determines  which  breeds  are  योग्य   लिये  showing .
New  breeds  continue to emerge  in  the 21st  सदी  .
Though there  हैं  many  breeds  of Guinea pig , only a few breeds are  commonly   मिला   on  the  दिखाएँ  table  as   पालतु   .
Most Guinea  सूअर  found as  पालतु  were  either   मिला  undesirable  by  breeders or were bred to be pleasant pets regardless  of   कैसा  well they  मिलें   the   नस्ल  standard of perfection  .
The short  बाल  , Abyssinian , Peruvian and  sheltie  ( aka Silkie ) breeds  हैं  those most frequently seen as pets , and the  पूर्व  three are the core breeds  in   the   इतिहास  of  the  competitive showing of Guinea  सूअर  .
in  addition to their standard  रूप   ,  nearly all  breeds  come in a  साटन  variant .
Satins ,  due  to their  खोखला  hair shafts , possess coats of a  खास  gloss and shine .
however  , there is growing evidence  कि  the genes  जिम्मेदार  for the  साटन  coat also can  कारण  severe  अस्थि  problems  ,  including Osteodystrophy and Paget 's disease .
Showing  साटन   विसंगतियाँ  is prohibited by some cavy breeders  '  associations because of animal  welfare  reasons .
सब  cavy breeds have some shared general standards : the head profile should  be   rounded  ,  साथ  large eyes and large ,  चिकना  ears .
the  body  चाहिए  be  दमदार  and of compact build  .
Coat  रंग   चाहिए  in all variations be clearly  पारिभाषित  and thorough from  रूट  to tip .
These standards are best  मिले   by  long established , commonly bred breeds , as their breeders have  था  enough time and animals to effectively breed for these qualities .
The  कोट   रंग  ideal of  शुभ  definition  और  thoroughness is rarely met by other than  the   चिकना   coated  breeds , which have had  खूब  established ,  पृथक  breeding lines  लिये  different colours .
राज्य   स्कूलों  (  भी  known as public  स्कूलों   or  government  स्कूलों   )  generally refer to primary or secondary  स्कूलों  mandated  लिये  or  offered  to all children  बगैर  charge paid  लिये  , in whole  or   in  part  ,  by taxation .
The term may also  refer  to institutions  of  post-secondary  शिक्षा   वित्तपोषित  ,  in  whole or in  भाग  ,  और  overseen by government  .
the  ribosome  assembles  polymeric  प्रोटीन   अणुओं  whose sequence  is  controlled  by  the  अनुक्रम  of  मेसेंजर  RNA  अणुओं  .
This is required by all  जीना  cells and associated viruses  .
the  ribosome ( from ribonucleic  एसिड   और  the Greek soma , meaning  ``   देह  '' )  is  a  विशाल   और  complex molecular machine  ,   मिला   भीतर   सब  living cells ,  कि  serves as the  प्राथमिक  site of  biological   प्रोटीन  synthesis ( translation ) .
Ribosomes link  अमीनो  acids together in  the   अनुक्रम  specified  by  messenger  rna  ( mRNA ) molecules  .
ribosomes  consist of two major subunits—the small ribosomal subunit reads  the   mrna   ,   जबकि  the large subunit  joins  amino  acids  to form a  polypeptide  chain .
Each subunit is  रचित   of  one  or  more ribosomal RNA ( rRNA  )  molecules  और  a variety of proteins .
The  अनुक्रम   of   डीएनए  encoding  लिये  a protein may be  कॉपी   अनेक  times  into   मेसेंजर   rna  ( mRNA  )  chains of a  समान  sequence .
Ribosomes can bind to an mRNA  कड़ी  and use  it   as  a template for determining the  सही  sequence of amino  acids   in   a   particular  protein  .
Amino acids are  चयनित   ,  collected and carried  to  the  राइबोसोम  by transfer  rna  ( tRNA molecules ) , which enter one  भाग  of the ribosome and  bind   to   the   मेसेंजर  RNA chain  .
The attached amino acids are  तब  linked together by another part of  the  ribosome .
एकबार  the  प्रोटीन  is produced , it can then 'fold  '  to produce a  विशिष्ट  functional  three-dimensional   ढांचा   .
a  ribosome  is  made from complexes of RNAs and proteins and is therefore a ribonucleoprotein .
Each  राइबोसोम   is  divided into two  subunits  :  the   छोटी   subunit  binds to the mRNA pattern , while the larger subunit  बांधता  to the  trna  and  the  amino acids .
When a ribosome  finishes  reading an mRNA molecule ,  ये  two subunits split apart .
ribosomes  are  ribozymes  , because the catalytic peptidyl  transferase   कार्यकलाप   कि  links amino  acids  together is performed by the  ribosomal  RNA  .
Ribosomes from bacteria , archaea  और  eukaryotes  (  the three  डोमेन  of life on Earth ) differ  in   उनके  size , sequence  ,  structure , and the ratio of protein to  rna  .
The differences  in  structure allow some antibiotics  to   मार  bacteria by  inhibiting   उनके  ribosomes , while  leaving   इंसान   ribosomes  unaffected .
In bacteria  और  archaea , more than one ribosome may move along a  सिंगल  mRNA chain at one time , each `` reading '' its  अनुक्रम  and producing  a  corresponding protein molecule .
The ribosomes in the mitochondria of eukaryotic cells functionally  resemble  many features of those in  जीवाणु  , reflecting the likely  विकासवादी  origin of mitochondria .
Albert Claude  ,  Christian de Duve  ,  and George Emil Palade were jointly  awarded   the  Nobel Prize in Physiology  or  Medicine , in 1974 , for  the  discovery  of  the ribosomes  .
The  नोबेल  Prize  in  Chemistry 2009  थी  awarded  to  Venkatraman  रामकृष्णन  ,  थामस  A. Steitz and Ada E.  yonath   लिये  determining the detailed structure and mechanism of the ribosome .
The simplified internal structure  of  a chloroplast
अवलोकन  of the Calvin  साईकिल   और   कार्बन  fixation
The  light-independent  reactions  of  photosynthesis are chemical reactions that convert carbon dioxide and  अन्य  compounds into  ग्लूकोज   .
These reactions occur in the  stroma  , the fluid-filled area of  a  chloroplast outside of the thylakoid membranes .
ये   प्रतिक्रियाएँ  take  the   light-dependent  reactions and  perform  further chemical  प्रक्रियाओं  on them  .
There  हैं  three phases to the  light-independent  reactions  ,  collectively  पुकारा   the  Calvin cycle :  कार्बन   fixation  ,  कटौती  reactions , and  ribulose  1,5-bisphosphate  (   rubp  )  regeneration  .
Despite its name  ,  this  प्रक्रम  occurs only  जब  light is available .
Plants do not carry out the Calvin cycle by night .
They  ,   बजाय  ,  रिलीज  sucrose into  the  phloem from their  मंड  reserves  .
This  प्रक्रम  happens when light is available independent  of  the kind of  photosynthesis   (  C3 carbon fixation  ,  C4  कार्बन   fixation   ,   और  Crassulacean Acid Metabolism  )  ;  कैम   पौधे   स्टोर  malic acid in their vacuoles every night and  रिलीज  it  by  day in order  to  make this  प्रक्रम  work .
In mathematics ,  a  square number or perfect square is an  पूर्णांक  that is the  वर्गाकार  of an  पूर्णांक  ;  in  other  शब्द  , it  is   the  product of some integer  साथ   itself   .
For example , 9 is  a  square  क्रमांक  ,  चूंकि  it can be written as .
The usual notation  लिये  the formula for  the   वर्गाकार   of  a number is not  the  product , but the equivalent exponentiation  ,  usually pronounced as  ``  squared  ''  .
The name  वर्गाकार  number  आता   इससे   the  name of the shape ; see below .
Square  संख्याएँ  are non-negative  .
Another way of saying that a ( non-negative )  क्रमांक  is  a  square number , is  कि   इसके  square roots are  again  integers  .
For  उदाहरण  , =  ±3   ,  so 9 is  a  square number .
a  positive integer that has  no  perfect  वर्गाकार  divisors except  1  is  पुकारा  square-free .
For  a   non-negative  integer , the  th   वर्गाकार   क्रमांक  is , with being  the  zeroth square .
The concept of  वर्गाकार  can  be  extended to some other number systems .
If  तर्कसंगत   संख्याएँ   हैं   शामिल   ,  then a square is the  अनुपात  of  दो  square integers , and ,  conversely  , the ratio of two square integers is a square  (  e.g. , 4/9 = ( 2/3 ) 2  )  .
Starting with 1  ,  there  हैं  square numbers up to and including , where the expression represents the  मंजिल  of the number .
The Era of Good Feelings marked a period in the political history of the United  राज्य  that  reflected  a sense of national  purpose  and a  ख्वाहिश  for unity  among  Americans in  the  aftermath of the  napoleonic  Wars  .
the  era saw the collapse of the  federalist  Party and an end to the bitter partisan disputes  between   it  and the dominant Democratic-Republican party  दौरान   the  First Party  प्रणाली  .
President James Monroe  endeavored  to downplay partisan affiliation in making  उसके  nominations , with the ultimate goal of national unity and  eliminating  parties altogether from national politics  .
the  period is  so  closely  संबद्ध  with Monroe 's presidency  (  1817–1825  )  and his administrative  लक्ष्य   कि  his  नाम  and the  era  are virtually  synonymous  .
the   era   of   शुभ  Feelings marked a transition in  अमरीकी   राजनीती  with the end  of  the Federalist Party  as   अमेरिका  began to develop after the War of 1812  .
जबकि  America  थी  experiencing  विकास   और  prosperity after  the  war with Britain , this era  भी  marks the first  उदाहरण  of  आर्थिक  troubles  in  the growing  संयुक्त   राज्य  .
Mirroring the  अमरीकी  System proposed  by   हेनरी   मिट्टी   ,  protective  tariffs  and the  chartering   of   the  Second  बैंको  of the United States complicated  the  tension between  the  North and South  साथ  the coming of the first financial  संकट  .
जबकि   the  term “Era of Good  feelings”   is  usually viewed with irony because of  the  political  turmoil  , economic factors caused animosity between the North and South .
The  नामांकन  of  the  period by historians  as  one  of  “good feelings” is often conveyed with irony  or  skepticism , as the  इतिहास  of  the  era was one in which the political atmosphere was strained and divisive  ,   विशेषकर  among  गिरोहों   भीतर  the Monroe administration  और  the Republican  पार्टी   .
The phrase “Era of Good Feelings” was coined  by  Benjamin  रसेल  ,  in  the Boston Federalist  समाचारपत्र  , Columbian Centinel  ,  on July  12   ,  1817 ,  following  Monroe  's   विज़िट   to   बोस्टन  ,  मैसाचुसेट्स  as part  of   उसके  good will  दौरे  of America  .
Mariel Margaret ``  मिया   ''  Hamm ( born March 17  ,  1972 ) is a retired American professional soccer  खिलाड़ी   .
hamm  played many years  as  a  आगे  for the United  राज्य  women 's national  सॉकर  team and was a founding  सदस्य  of the Washington Freedom .
Hamm scored 158 international  लक्ष्य  ,  अधिक  than any other player  ,  male or female ,  in   the   इतिहास  of soccer and is the third most capped female  खिलाड़ी   in   सॉकर   इतिहास  behind  kristine  Lilly  और   क्रिस्टी  Rampone  ,  appearing in  275  international matches .
Hamm was named  the  women 's  फीफा  World Player  of  the Year the first  दो  times that award was  दिए  ( in  2001   और  2002 ) , and is  सूचीबद्ध  as one of FIFA  's  125 best living players ( as chosen by Pelé )  .
वो  was inducted into the National Soccer Hall of Fame as  खूब   as  the Alabama Sports Hall of Fame and Texas  खेल  Hall of Fame  .
She  is  the  लेखक  of Go For the Goal : A Champion 's Guide to Winning  in  Soccer  और   जीवन   और  appeared in the HBO  वृत्तचित्र  Dare to Dream :  the   स्टोरी  of the U.S. Women  's   सॉकर   टोली  .
वॉशिंगटन  Post columnist Michael Wilbon called Hamm , `` Perhaps  the  most important athlete of the last 15 years .  ''
Hamm takes a corner  लात   .
The New York  रेड  Bulls is  an  American professional soccer  टोली   आधारित  in Harrison ,  नई  Jersey ,  representing  the New York  महानगर  area .
The team  competes  in the  पूर्वी   सम्मेलन  of Major League Soccer  (  MLS ) .
It  is   एक  of  the  ten  चार्टर  clubs  of   mls   ,  having competed  in   the   लीग  since  इसके   inception  .
the  team was a  founding  member  of   mls  ( 1996 ) ,  लकिन   रै  gone through several  नाम   परिवर्तन  .
The team was originally  ज्ञात  as the New York/New Jersey MetroStars through  1997   .
From the 1998  ऋतु  through the  2005  season , the team  थी  known  as   the  MetroStars .
on  March 9  ,   2006  ,  the  team was sold to  रेड   सांड  GmbH ,  अग्रणी  to the  टोली  's current name .
They  हैं  the  तभी  original  mls  franchise not to have won any significant trophy ( including regular season , playoffs , and  नॉकआउट  competition ) since inception  .
The team  's  best  परिणाम  in the MLS was the MLS  कप  final in 2008 .
In the  us  Open Cup  ,  the  metrostars  reached three semifinals  (   1997  , 1998 ,  2000   )   ,   पहले  reaching  उनके  first  फाइनल   in  2003 ,  खोने  1–0 to  the  Chicago  आग  .
on   अगस्त  26 , 2000 ,  the  Metros  '  Clint  mathis   नियत  an MLS  रिकार्ड  by scoring  पाँच  goals in a game  विरूद्ध  the Dallas  बर्न  .
कुछ  well-known players that  have   निभाई  for  the  team  शामिल  Giovanni  savarese   ,  Tim  हावर्ड  , Tony Meola , Tab Ramos  ,   alexi   lalas   ,   क्लिंट  Mathis ,  jozy  Altidore  ,  Michael Bradley  ,  Claudio Reyna ,  एडी  Pope , Roberto Donadoni  ,  Lothar  matthäus  ,  एडोल्फो  Valencia  ,   youri  Djorkaeff ,  amado   ग्वेरा  ,  जुआन  Pablo Ángel , Thierry  हेनरी  ,  juninho  Pernambucano , Jan Gunnar Solli  ,   राफेल   मार्ख़ेस  , and Tim Cahill .
The team has also had well-known coaches  ,  including Carlos Queiroz  ,  Carlos Alberto  parreira   ,  Bora Milutinović  ,   bob  Bradley , Mo  johnston   ,  Bruce  एरिना  and Hans  backe  .
Confucianism  ,  Taoism ,  और   buddhism  are one ,  a  painting in the litang style portraying  तीन   मेन  laughing by a river stream , 12th  सदी   ,  Song Dynasty  .
Estimating the number  of  Buddhists in the world , or in many countries  ,   is  difficult due  to  definitional  मुद्दे  as well as practical problems of enumeration  .
to  begin  साथ  ,  the  religious beliefs , practices ,  और   पहचान  of East  एशियाइ   (   जो  comprise the majority  of  the world 's  बौद्धों   by  any measure )  प्रायः  blend  buddhism  with other traditions including Confucianism  ,  the Chinese folk  धर्म   ,   daoism  , Shinto  ,  and  कोरियाई  shamanism .
Most  अनुसरणकर्ता  of Buddhism do  नहीं  belong to  संरचित  congregations , or  observe   a  definite ritual of adherence such as taking Refuge , making it difficult  to  accurately estimate  the  number of practitioners .
an  additional challenge is the hostility of  अनेक   नेशनल   सरकारें   (  often Communist  ones  such as China  or  North  कोरियाई  ) to religion  generally  or  to  Buddhism specifically .
Government  नीतियों  in  ये   देशों   may  encourage the under-reporting or  non-reporting  of religious  adherence   ,   resulting  in official totals that  may  drastically  underestimate  the number of  धार्मिक  practitioners  in  these countries  .
अनुमान  of the  विश्वव्यापी  Buddhist population range from 350 million to over  एक  billion  ,  but cluster nearer  to  the  पहला  figure .
adherents.com  ( as of 2012  )  suggests  a  figure of 397 million  .
By major branches , the numbers are  as  follows:
( 1 )  महायान  Buddhism  ,   सहित  East Asian Buddhism , with  no   कम  than  185   लाख  adherents , and possibly several  टाइम्स  that  अनेक  ( again  ,  depending on  definitional   मुद्दे  ) .
This  is  the  predominant   रूप  of Buddhism  practiced  in China , South  कोरियाई  , Japan ,  ताईवान  , Singapore , and Vietnam .
( 2 )  थेरवाद  Buddhism , with no fewer  than   125  million adherents  .
This  is  the predominant  रूप   of  Buddhism practiced in Cambodia , Thailand , Laos , Sri Lanka , and  बर्मा  .
(  3   )  Vajrayana  buddhism  , with approximately  20  million adherents  .
This  रूप  predominates in  the   वृहद  Tibetan and  मंगोलियाई   regions  ,  as  well as  in  the Himalayas .
besides   the  independent countries of Mongolia  और  Bhutan , and  विभिन्न  territories within  कया  is now western China  ,   वज्रयान   is   परंपरागत  to  निश्चित  regions of  रूस   (   e.g  . Kalmykia ,  बुर्यातिया   )   ,  India (  e.g   .   लद्दाख  , Sikkim ) , and Nepal ( e.g  .  Khumbu )  .
Vajrayana ,  भी  known as Tibetan  buddhism  ,  is  often conflated  साथ   तांत्रिक  Buddhism , but this is  imprecise   ,  as  shingon  and other  फ़ॉर्म   of  East  एशियाई  Buddhism  भी  practice tantra .
at  least 7 countries ( Sri Lanka ,  थाईलैंड   ,  Cambodia , Laos  ,  Burma  ,  Bhutan  ,  and  मंगोल  )  have   unambiguous   बौद्ध  majorities .
depending  on how one calculates  चाइनीज   और  other  ईस्ट   एशियाई  adherents , this figure might  विस्तार  to include  अनेक  more countries  .
In addition ,  buddhism   is  the  राज्य  religion of Cambodia and Bhutan , and receives prominent  जिक्र  in the  constitutions  of Thailand and Sri Lanka  .
In northern India and Nepal , the land where  buddhism   थी   born  , the religion  severely  declined during the first  मिलेनियम  .
Whether this decline  थी  due to the Islamic conquest of northern  इण्डिया  , or to other factors  ,  remains  विवादास्पद  .
See the article Decline  of  Buddhism in  इण्डिया  .
James Butler Hickok ( May 27 , 1837 –  अगस्त  2 ,  1876  ) ,  बेहतर   ज्ञात  as Wild Bill  hickok   ,  was  a  folk hero of  the  American  बूढ़ा  West .
उसके   कौशल  as a gunfighter  और  scout  ,  along  साथ  his reputation as  a  lawman ,  provided  the basis for his fame  ,  although some of his reported  कारनामे  are  fictionalized   .
Born  और   उठाया  on a  फार्म   in  rural  इलिनोइस  ,  hickok   गई  west  at   आयु  18  as  a  भगोड़े  from justice , first working  as  a stagecoach driver ,  पहले   he  became a lawman in  the   frontier  territories  of  Kansas and Nebraska .
He  लड़ा  for the Union Army during the  अमरीकी   सिविल  War  ,  and gained  publicity  after the  युद्ध  as  a  scout  ,  marksman  ,  actor , and professional gambler .
Between  उसके   law-enforcement  duties and gambling , which  easily  overlapped , Hickok was involved in several notable shootouts .
he   थी   शॉट  and  मारे  while playing poker in the Nuttal & Mann 's Saloon in Deadwood ,  डकोटा  Territory  (  now South  डकोटा   )  .
Artist 's conception  of   the   जिज्ञासा  rover vaporizing  चट्टान  on  मंगल  .
The  रोवर  landed on  मंगल   in  August 2012  .
A  मंगल  rover  is  an automated motor  गाडी  which propels  itself  across  the  surface of the planet Mars after  लैंडिंग  .
रोवर्स  have several advantages over  stationary   landers  :  वे   जाँचें  more  territory   ,  they  can  be directed to  दिलचस्प  features , they can  प्लेस   themselves   in   सनी   स्थितियाँ   to   मौसम  winter  महीने  and they can advance the knowledge of how to  perform  very  रिमोट  robotic  गाडी  control  .
There have been four successful  robotically   संचालित  Mars  रोवर्स  .
the   जेट  Propulsion Laboratory managed  the   मंगल   pathfinder   मिशन  and  इसके  now inactive Sojourner rover .
It currently manages  the  Mars Exploration Rover  मिशन  's  क्रियाशील  Opportunity rover and inactive Spirit , and , as part of the Mars Science Laboratory mission  ,  the Curiosity  रोवर  .
A  वित्तीय  audit ,  or   अधिक   accurately  , an audit of financial statements , is the verification  of   the  financial  कथन  of a legal  एंटिटी   ,  with  a   दृश्य   to  express  an   ऑडिट   राय  .
The audit  राय  is intended to  provide  reasonable assurance ,  लकिन   नहीं  absolute assurance  ,  that the financial statements  हैं   प्रस्तुत   fairly   ,   in  all material  respects   ,  and/or give a true and fair  दृश्य   in  accordance with the financial  रिपोर्टिंग  framework .
The purpose of  an  audit is provide and objective  स्वतंत्र   परिक्षा  of the financial statements , which increases the value and credibility of the financial statements  उत्पादित  by management , thus  बढ़ाएँ  user confidence in  the   वित्तीय   बयान   ,  reduce investor risk and  नतीजतन  reduce the cost  of  capital  of   the  preparer of  the  financial statements  .
Financial  audits  are typically  performed  by firms of practicing accountants  जो  are  विशेषज्ञ  in  वित्तीय   रिपोर्टिंग  .
The financial audit  is  one of many assurance functions provided by  हिसाब   firms  .
Many organizations separately  employ  or hire internal auditors ,  जो  do not attest to financial reports but focus mainly on the internal controls  of  the organization .
External auditors may  चुनें  to place limited  रिलायंस   on   the  work  of  internal  auditors  .
Auditing promotes transparency and accuracy  in  the financial disclosures  बना  by an organization  ,  therefore would likely to reduce of such corporations to conceal unscrupulous  dealings  .
internationally  ,  the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   मानकों   on  Auditing (  isa  ) issued  by   the  International Auditing  और  Assurance Standards Board (  iaasb  ) is considered as  the  benchmark  लिये  audit  प्रक्रम   .
Almost all jurisdictions require  auditors   to  follow the ISA  or  a local  विभिन्नता  of the ISA  .
Dollar  सिक्के  have  महरूम  minted  in   the  United States  in   सुनहरा   ,  silver , and base  मेटल  versions .
The term silver  डालर   is  often used for  कोई  large white metal  सिक्का   जारी  by  the  United  राज्य  with a face value of one dollar , although  purists  insist that  a  dollar is not silver unless  it  contains some  of   कि   मेटल  .
Silver dollars ,  the  first dollar  सिक्का  issue  ,  were minted beginning in 1794 .
Gold dollars and gold-colored dollars  have  also  महरूम  produced by the United States .
The Sacagawea and Presidential dollars are often referred to  as   ``  golden  डॉलर  '' .
In modern times , dollar coins have not  महरूम  very popular  in  the United States .
despite  efforts by the  सरकारी  to promote  उनके  use , most Americans currently use  the  one dollar  विधेयक  rather than  डालर  coins .
In straight and  स्तर  flight lift ( L ) equals weight  (  W ) .
In a banked  फेरे   of  60°  ,   लिफ्ट  equals double the  वज़न   (  L=2W )  .
the  pilot  अनुभवों   2g  and a  doubled  weight .
The steeper  the  bank ,  the  greater the g-forces .
This  top-fuel  dragster  can   accelerate  from zero to in 0.86  सेकेंड  .
This is a horizontal  त्वरण  of 5.3  g.   संयुक्त  with  the  vertical  g-force  in the stationary  मामला  the Pythagorean theorem yields  a   g   फ़ोर्स  of 5.4 g .
g-force ( with g from  गुरुत्वाकर्षक  )  is  a term for  accelerations  felt as weight  और   measurable   by  accelerometers .
it  is not a force , per  se   ,  but  a  force per unit mass  .
Since such  a  force is perceived as a weight  ,  any g-force can  be  described as  a   ``   वज़न  per unit  द्रव्यमान  ''  (  see  the  synonym specific weight ) .
the  g-force acceleration acts  as  a multiplier  of  weight-like forces for  प्रत्येक  unit of  an  object 's mass , and (  सहेजें  for certain electromagnetic  फ़ोर्स  influences  )  is the  कारण   of   an   ऑब्जेक्ट   's   त्वरण  in relation to free-fall  .
इस  acceleration experienced by  an  object is due to  the  vector  योग  of non-gravitational  शक्तियां   एक्टिंग   on   an  object free to  मूव  .
The accelerations that  हैं  not produced by gravity are termed proper  accelerations  , and  it  is  तभी  these that are measured in  g-force   इकाई  .
They cause  तनावों  and strains on objects .
Because of these strains  ,   विशाल  g-forces may be  destructive  .
Gravitation acting alone  करता   नहीं  produce a g-force , even  हालांकि   g-forces  are  expressed  in multiples of  the   त्वरण  of  a  standard gravity .
Thus  ,  the  मानक   गुरुत्वाकर्षक   त्वरण  at the Earth 's  सतह  produces g-force only indirectly , as a result of resistance to it  by  mechanical  शक्तियां  .
The  1  g-force on an object sitting on the Earth 's  सतह  is  caused  by mechanical force exerted  in   the  upward direction by  the   मैदान   ,  keeping the object  इससे  going into free-fall .
The upward  फ़ोर्स   इससे  the ground  ensures  that an object  at  rest on  the   धरती  's surface is accelerating relative to the  free-fall  condition , which  is  the  पाथ  that the object would follow  जब  falling freely toward  the  Earth  's  center .
Objects  अनुमत  to  free-fall   in  an inertial trajectory  अंतर्गत  the influence of  gravitation-only  , feel no g-force  .
इस  is demonstrated  by   the  `` zero-g ''  शर्तें   अंदर  a freely  गिरना  elevator falling toward  the  Earth 's  बीच  (  in  vacuum )  ,  or  (   to   शुभ  approximation ) conditions inside a  spacecraft  in  धरती  orbit .
These are examples  of  coordinate acceleration ( a change in velocity ) without a  सनसनी   of  weight .
the  experience of no g-force ( zero-g ) , however  it  is produced , is  synonymous  with  weightlessness  .
In the absence of gravitational  फ़ील्ड  , or in  दिशानिर्देश   at  right angles to  उन्हें  , proper  और  coordinate accelerations  हैं  the same ,  और  any coordinate acceleration  जरूर  be produced by a corresponding g-force acceleration  .
an   उदाहरण  here is a rocket in  फ़्री  space , in  जिससे   सरल  changes in velocity are  उत्पादित  by the engines ,  और  produce  g-forces  on the rocket and passengers .
An  augur  holding a  lituus   ,  the curved  wand  often  प्रयुक्त   as  a symbol  of  augury on Roman coins
The augur  थी  a priest  और  official in the  शास्त्रीय  world  ,   विशेषकर  ancient Rome and Etruria .
His main  भूमिका   थी  to  interpret  the will of the  देवताओं  by studying the  उड़ान   of  birds  :  whether  वे   हैं   उड़ती  in groups  or  alone  ,   कया   noises   वे   मेक  as  वे   मक्खी  , direction of  उड़ान  and what kind of  पक्षियों   वे  are  .
This was  ज्ञात  as `` taking the auspices  .  ''
The  रस्म   और  function of the augur was central to any  प्रमुख   undertaking  in Roman society—public  or   private—including   matters   of  war ,  कॉमर्स  , and religion .
The  रोमन   इतिहासकार   livy  stresses the importance  of  the augurs : `` Who does not know that this city was  संस्थापित   तभी   बाद  taking the  auspices  , that everything  in  war  और   in   सलाम  , at  घर  and abroad , was  किया  only after  लेने  the  auspices  ? ''
Farmington Hills is  an  affluent  जातियाँ  in southeastern  मिशिगन  .
It is the second largest city in Oakland County  in   the   u.S.  state of  मिशिगन  .
Its population  थी  79,740 at  the  2010  जनसांख्यिकी  .
It is part of  the  upscale  northwestern  suburbs  of   महानगर  Detroit and is also northeast of downtown Ann  arbor  .
Farmington Hills consistently ranks as  एक   of   the  safest cities  in   the  United States  ,  as  खूब  as  in   the   राज्य  of Michigan  .
In  2010   ,  the  क्षेत्रफल  ranked  as  the 30th safest  नगर   in  America .
हालांकि  the two  शहरों  have separate services  और   पता  , Farmington and Farmington Hills are often  विचार   of  as the  वही  community .
Features of the community include a  recently  renovated downtown ,  boutiques  , a vintage  सिनेमा  ,  numerous   रेस्तरां  , exotic car  dealerships  , art galleries  ,  and public parks including Heritage Park .
There are several  ऐतिहासिक  sites including the  longacre  House  और  the Governor Warner Mansion .
Both cities are served by Farmington Public Schools  .
Farmington Hills serves as a major business center  लिये   the  greater Detroit  क्षेत्रफल  .
Present-day impression  of   a  Late Bronze Age seal
Town seal  (  matrix )  of  Náchod from 1570
a  seal is a  यंत्र  for making  an  impression in wax ,  मिट्टी  , paper , or some other medium ,  सहित  an  embossment   on  paper , and is  भी  the  छाप  thus made .
the  original  purpose  was  to  authenticate  a  document , a  wrapper  for one such as a modern  लिफाफा  ,  or  the cover of  a   संग्राहक   or  package  पकड़कर  valuables or  अन्य  objects  .
the  sealing  प्रक्रम  is  essentially  that  of  a mould , with the final image represented on  the  device  लिये  making  the  impression by a  mirror-image  design  ,  incised in  sunken-  (  or  counter- ) relief or  intaglio  .
the   seal-making  device  is   भी  referred to  as  the seal  मेट्रिक्स  or  die  ;  the  imprint it creates as the seal impression  (  or ,  अधिक  rarely , the  sealing  )  .
If the impression  is  made purely as  a   राहत  resulting from the  वृहद  pressure  on  the paper where  the  high  भाग  of  the   मेट्रिक्स   टच   ,  the  मुहर  is known as a dry seal ; in all  अन्य  cases a  द्रव  or liquified medium ( such  as  ink or  मोम  ) is used , usually in  another  color  than  the paper  .
For legal  उद्देश्य  , the definition of a seal may be extended to  शामिल   रबर  stamps , or  लिखने   निर्दिष्ट  words ( `` seal '' or  ``   l.s   .   ``   )   .
In the United States , the word  ``  seal '' is sometimes assigned to a facsimile of the seal design ( in monochrome or color  )  , which  may  be used in a variety of contexts including architectural  जमावट   ,   on   ध्वज   ,  or  on  official  letterheads  .
Thus , for example  ,   the   ग्रेट   मुहर  of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  , among  अन्य  uses , appears  on  the  रिवर्स  of the  one-dollar   विधेयक   ;  and  अनेक   of   the  seals of the U.S. states appear on  उनके  respective  राज्य  flags .
In  यूरोपीय  ,  हालांकि   coats  of  बाहें   और  heraldic  बैज  may well  विशेषता   in   ऐसे  contexts  as   खूब   as  on seals  ,  the seal design  in  its entirety rarely  appears  as an emblem .
the  study of  seals  is  ज्ञात  as sigillography or sphragistics .
Groundhog  दिन   (   पेन्सिलवेनिया  German : Grundsaudaag  ,  Murmeltiertag ) is a day celebrated on February 2 .
According to folklore  ,  if it  is  cloudy when a groundhog emerges  इससे  its burrow on  इस  day  ,  then spring will come early ; if it is sunny , the  groundhog   होगा  supposedly see its shadow and retreat back into  इसके   burrow  , and the winter weather  होगा   continue  for six more weeks .
Modern customs of the  अवकाश  involve  जश्न  where early morning festivals are held to watch the groundhog emerging from its burrow .
in  southeastern Pennsylvania , Groundhog Lodges (  grundsow  Lodges ) celebrate the  अवकाश  with fersommlinge , social  कार्यक्रम  in which food is served  ,  speeches are  बना  ,  और  one or more  g'spiel   (  plays or  skits   )   हैं  performed for  entertainment   .
The Pennsylvania German dialect  is  the only language spoken at the event  ,  and those who speak  अंग्रेज़ी   अदा  a penalty , usually in the form of a nickel , dime , or  क्वार्टर  per word spoken  ,  with the money put  into   a  bowl in the center  of   the  table .
The largest  groundhog  Day  जश्न  is held  in  Punxsutawney , Pennsylvania .
Groundhog Day , already a widely recognized  और  popular  परंपरा  ,  प्राप्त  widespread  ध्यान   as   a  result  of  the  1993  film Groundhog Day ,  जिससे   थी   नियत   in  Punxsutawney , PA  (  though filmed  primarily  in Woodstock , IL ) and portrayed Punxsutawney  फिल  .
High resolution  चित्र   of  Tampa Bay region
The Tampa Bay  क्षेत्रफल   रै   a   आर्द्र  subtropical climate  (  Koppen  cfa   )  , with  गरम  and humid summers  साथ  frequent thunderstorms and drier  सर्दियों   साथ  freezing  temperatures   occurring  every 2–3 years .
The area experiences  a  significant  गर्मियाँ  wet  ऋतु  , as nearly two-thirds of the  सालाना   वर्षण  falls in  the  months of June  through  September  .
The  क्षेत्रफल   is  listed  by   the  United  राज्य  Department  of  Agriculture (  यूएसडीए  ) as being in hardiness zone  10   ,  which is  परिचय  the northern limit of  जहाँ   नारियल   हथेलियां   और  royal palms can  be  grown .
Highs usually range between  65   और  95 °F ( 18 and 35 °C )  साल  round  .
Though known  लिये   hot  summers  ,  Tampa  's  official high has never  पहुँचे  100 °F ( 38 °C ) – the city 's all-time record temperature  is  99 °F (  37  °C )  .
St. Petersburg 's all-time  रिकार्ड  high is  exactly  100 °F  (  38  °c  ) .
Pinellas County  झूठ  on  a   प्रायद्वीप   between   tampa  Bay and  the   गल्फ   of  Mexico , and much of the  नगर  of Tampa lies on a smaller  प्रायद्वीप  jutting out into Tampa  खाड़ी  .
This  निकटता  to  विशाल   लाशें  of water  दोनो  moderates  temperatures  and introduces large amounts  of   आर्द्रता  into  the  atmosphere .
In general , the  लोकल  communities farthest  इससे  the coast have larger  तापमान  ranges  ,  both during a single day  और  throughout the  सीज़न  of the year  .
A  आरेख   of  the electromagnetic spectrum ,  प्रर्दशित  various properties across  the  range of  बारंबारता   और  wavelengths
the  electromagnetic spectrum is the  दायरा   of  all possible frequencies of electromagnetic radiation .
The `` electromagnetic  वर्णक्रम  '' of  an  object has a different  अर्थ  ,  और  is  बजाय  the  characteristic  distribution of electromagnetic  विकिरण  emitted or absorbed by that  particular  object .
The  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक   वर्णक्रम   extends  from below the low  बारंबारता  used for modern radio communication  to   गामा  radiation at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) end , thereby  covering  wavelengths from  हज़ारों  of kilometers  bas   to  a fraction  of  the size of  an  atom  .
The limit for  long   wavelengths   is   the   आकार  of the  ब्रह्मांड   itself  , while  it  is thought that the  छोटी  wavelength  सीमा  is  in   the  vicinity of  the  Planck length  ,  although in principle the spectrum  is   अनन्त  and continuous .
Most parts of the electromagnetic spectrum are used in science for  spectroscopic  and  अन्य   probing  interactions , as ways to study  और  characterize matter .
In addition , radiation  इससे  various parts of the spectrum  रै  found many other uses for communications and  निर्माण  (  देखिए  electromagnetic radiation for  अधिक   अनुप्रयोग   )  .
