फ्रैंकलिन  Delano Roosevelt  (  or ;  जनवरी  30 , 1882 – April 12  ,   1945   )  , also known by his initials , FDR ,  थी   the  32nd  अध्यक्ष  of the United  राज्य   (  1933–1945 ) and a central  फिगर  in  संसार  events during the  mid-20th  century ,  अग्रणी   the  United  राज्य   दौरान  a time  of  worldwide economic  अवसाद   और  total war .
A  प्रबल   नेता  of the Democratic Party and  the  only American  अध्यक्ष  elected to more  than  two terms ,  he  built  a  New  सौदे  Coalition that realigned American politics after 1932 ,  as  his domestic policies defined American liberalism for the middle  तीसरा  of  the  20th  सदी   .
With  the  bouncy  लोकप्रिय  song  ``   प्रसन्न  Days  हैं  Here  again  ``  as  his  अभियान  theme , FDR defeated  लाज़िम   रिपब्लिकन   हर्बर्ट  Hoover  in   नवम्बर  1932  ,   at  the depth  of   the   ग्रेट   अवसाद  .
Energized by his  निजी  victory over  पोलियो  , FDR 's  unfailing  optimism and  सक्रियता  contributed to a renewal  of  the national spirit  .
He worked closely with  अंग्रेजों   प्रधान  Minister  विंस्टन  Churchill and Soviet General Secretary Joseph Stalin  in  leading the Allies  विरूद्ध  Germany  और  Japan in World War  ii   ,  and  restoring  prosperity to the  स्वदेश  's economy .
in  his first hundred days in office , which began March 4 , 1933 , Roosevelt  पथप्रदर्शन   प्रमुख  legislation and  जारी  a  profusion   of  executive orders that instituted  the   नई  Deal  —a  variety of programs designed to  उपज  relief ( government  कार्य  for the unemployed )  ,  recovery ( economic  विकास   )  ,  और  reform (  through  regulation of  वॉल   गली  , banks and transportation )  .
The  अर्थव्यवस्था  improved rapidly from  1933  to 1937 ,  लकिन  then  relapsed  into a deep  मंदी  .
The bipartisan Conservative Coalition that  formed  in 1937 prevented his packing the Supreme Court or passing any  considerable  legislation  ;  it abolished many  of  the  राहत   कार्यक्रम  when unemployment diminished during  संसार  War II .
सबसे  of the regulations on business  यहूद   ended   परिचय  1975–85 , except for  the   विनियमन  of Wall Street  by  the  प्रतिभूति   और   एक्सचेंज   आयोग  , which still exists .
Along  साथ  several smaller  कार्यक्रम  , major  surviving  programs include  the   संघीय  Deposit Insurance Corporation , which was created  in  1933  ,  and  सोशल  Security , which Congress passed in 1935 .
As  संसार  War  ii  loomed after  1938  , with  the  Japanese invasion of China  और   the  aggression of  नाजी  Germany , FDR gave strong diplomatic  और   वित्तीय   support  to China and Great  ब्रिटेन  , while remaining officially  न्यूट्रल  .
उसके  goal was  to  make  अमेरिका  the `` Arsenal of Democracy  ``   जिससे  would  सप्लाई  munitions to the  allies   .
In March 1941 , Roosevelt , with Congressional  स्वीकृति  , provided Lend-Lease  सहायता  to the countries fighting against Nazi Germany with Britain .
साथ   बहुत  strong national  support  , he made war  on  Japan  और  Germany after the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor on December 7 , 1941 ,  कॉलिंग   it  a `` date which will  सजीव  in infamy  ``  .
He supervised the mobilization of the U.S. economy to support the Allied war  प्रयत्न   .
As an active military leader  ,  Roosevelt implemented  an   overall   युद्ध  strategy on  दो   fronts  that ended in the defeat of the Axis Powers and the development  of  the world 's first atom  बमबारी   .
In 1942 Roosevelt ordered the  internment  of  100,000  Japanese American  नागरिकों  .
Unemployment dropped  to  2 %  ,  relief programs  largely  ended , and the  औद्योगिक   अर्थव्यवस्था  grew rapidly to new heights as millions of people moved  to  new  कार्य  in  युद्ध  centers , and 16 million men and 300,000  महिलाओं  were drafted  or  volunteered for military  सेवा  .
Roosevelt  वर्चस्व  the  अमरीकी  political scene not  तभी   दौरान  the  बारह  years of  उसके   प्रेसिडेंसी  , but also for decades  afterward  .
He  orchestrated  the  realignment  of voters  कि  created  the  Fifth Party System .
FDR  's  New Deal Coalition united labor unions , big  नगर   मशीने  ,  श्वेत  ethnics , African  अमेरिकी  and  ग्रामीण   श्वेत  Southerners .
he   भी  influenced the later creation  of   the  United Nations and Bretton Woods .
Roosevelt is  consistently   रेटेड  by  विद्वानों  as  एक  of the top  तीन   u.S.  Presidents ,  साथ  with Abraham Lincoln  और  George  वॉशिंगटन   .
A liberal  डेमोक्रेट   ,  Roosevelt  पारिभाषित  his  वैचारिक   स्थिति   as   ``  a little left  of  center . ''
a   संयुक्त  Committee  is  a  पद  in politics  कि  is  प्रयुक्त  to refer to  a   कमेटी  made  up   of  members  of  both chambers of a bicameral legislature  .
in   अन्य  contexts ,  it  refers to a committee with  सदस्यों  from more than  एक   संगठन  .
The regulation of prostitution  in  the United  राज्य   is  not among the enumerated  शक्तियां  of the federal government ;  अंतर्गत   the  Tenth Amendment  to  the United States Constitution , it is  इसलिए  exclusively the domain of the  राज्य  to permit ,  prohibit  , or  वरना  regulate  वाणिज्यिक  sex , except  insofar  as  कॉंग्रेस  may regulate it as  भाग  of interstate commerce with laws  जैसे   the  Mann  अधिनियम   .
in  most  राज्य  , prostitution is  माना  a misdemeanor in the category  of  public order crime ,  a  crime that  disrupts  the order of  a  community .
it   थी   at   एक   समय  considered to be a vagrancy crime .
Currently  ,  Nevada is the only  राज्य   to  allow brothel prostitution  ,   the  terms of which  हैं  stipulated in the  नेवाडा  Revised Statutes .
Only  8  counties currently  contain  active brothels .
All forms  of  prostitution are illegal in Clark County  (  which contains the Las  vegas–paradise   महानगर  area ) , Washoe County  (   जिससे  contains Reno  )   ,  Carson City , Douglas County  ,  and Lincoln County  .
The other counties theoretically  allow  brothel  वेश्यावृति  ,  लकिन  some of these counties currently  have  no active brothels .
गली  prostitution  ,   ``  pandering , '' and living  बंद  of the proceeds of a prostitute  remain  illegal under  नेवाडा  law , as  elsewhere   in   the   देश  .
as  with other countries  ,  prostitution in the United States can  be  divided into  तीन  broad categories  :   गली  prostitution , brothel prostitution ,  और  escort prostitution  .
the  national  ध्वज   of   the   संयुक्त   राज्य   of  America ,  प्रायः   बस   referred  to as the  अमरीकी  flag , consists of  तेरह  equal horizontal stripes  of   रेड   (   शीर्ष  and bottom ) alternating  साथ   श्वेत  , with a blue  आयताकार   in   the  canton  (  referred to specifically as the `` union  ''   )  bearing fifty small , white , five-pointed stars arranged in nine offset horizontal rows of  छह  stars ( top and bottom  )  alternating  साथ  rows of  पाँच  stars .
The 50  सितारों   on  the flag represent  the  50 states of the  संयुक्त  States of America and the  13   धारियाँ  represent the thirteen British colonies that  घोषित   स्वतंत्रता  from the Kingdom of Great Britain and became  the  first states  in  the  संघ  .
Nicknames  लिये  the  ध्वज  include the  ``  Stars and Stripes ''  ,  `` Old Glory  ``   ,  and `` The Star-Spangled  ध्वज  . ''
इण्डिया  is a federal union of states  comprising  twenty-eight states and seven union  territories  .
The  राज्य  and  territories  are  further  subdivided  into   जिले  and  so   on   .
congressional  districts for the 113th United  राज्य   कॉंग्रेस
2010   जनसांख्यिकी  change:
बदलें  in apportionment of congressional districts , starting  in   2013   ,   as  a result of the  2010  census .
2000 Census change:
Change in  apportionment  of  congressional  districts  ,  from  2003  to 2013 ,  as  a  परिणाम  of the 2000 census .
इस   is  a complete list of congressional districts for representation in the United  राज्य  House of Representatives .
the  quantity  (   apportionment  ) and boundaries (  redistricting  )  of  districts  हैं  determined  बाद  each  जनसांख्यिकी  ,  हालांकि   in  some cases states have changed  the  boundaries more than once  प्रति  census .
इस   सूची  includes the 435  वर्तमान  and over 200 obsolete districts .
For  उदाहरण  , since the  2000   जनसांख्यिकी  , Nebraska has had three districts  ,   लकिन  it used to  have  as many as six .
In the first  दशक   of   the  twenty-first  सदी   ,   टेक्सास  had 32 districts , but has  चूंकि   added  four due to reapportionment as  a  result of the 2010 census .
Other states have lost  जिले  since the number of congressional seats has been set  at   435  by statute  .
Also  शामिल  here are non-voting delegations : six current and  चार   obsolete  .
the  boundaries of  जिले  often shift with each  redistricting  .
Over  समय   ,   the  region and  जनसांख्यिकी  represented  in  a district can change substantially  .
furthermore  ,  जिले   sometimes  retain the same  सीमाएँ  while changing their district numbers .
mariah  Carey ( born March  27  , 1970  )  is an American singer , songwriter  ,  record producer ,  अभिनेत्री  , and  लोकसेवक   .
Under the guidance  of  Columbia Records executive Tommy Mottola , Carey released her self-titled debut  स्टुडियो   एल्बम  Mariah Carey in 1990 ; it  गई   multi-platinum   और  spawned  चार   लगातार  number  एक  singles on  the  U.S . Billboard Hot 100 chart .
Following  उसके  marriage  to  Mottola  in  1993 and success with hit  रिकॉर्ड  Emotions ( 1991 ) , Music Box ( 1993 ) ,  और  Merry  क्रिसमस   (  1994 ) , Carey was established as Columbia  's  highest-selling act .
daydream   (  1995 ) made music history when its second single  ``  One Sweet  दिन  ``  ,  a  duet  with  बॉयज  II Men  ,  spent  a  record sixteen weeks on top  of   the  Billboard  hot  100 , and remains the  longest-running  number-one song in U.S. chart  इतिहास  .
During the recording of the album ,  कैरी  began to deviate from  उसके  R & B and pop beginnings  और  slowly traversed  into  hip  हॉप  .
इस  musical change became  evident  with the  रिलीज  of Butterfly  (  1997 )  ,  at which  समय  Carey had separated  इससे  Mottola  .
Carey  बाएँ  Columbia  in  2000 ,  और  signed a record-breaking  $  100 million recording contract  साथ  Virgin  रिकॉर्ड  .
Before the release  of  her  पहला  feature  फिल्मी  Glitter  (  2001 )  ,   वो  suffered a  शारीरिक   और   emotional   विश्लेषण  and was hospitalized for severe exhaustion .
following  the film 's  ग़रीब   रिसेप्शन  ,  वो  was  खरीदा  out  of   उसके  recording contract for $ 50  लाख  , which led to a decline  in  her career .
She signed a multi-million dollar contract deal with Island Records in 2002 ,  और  after an unsuccessful  काल  , returned  to  the top of  म्यूज़िक  charts  साथ  The  emancipation   of  Mimi (  2005  ) .
इसके   दूसरी  single  ``   we  Belong Together `` became her  सबसे  successful single of the 2000s , and  थी   बाद  named  ``  Song of the Decade  ''   by  Billboard .
कैरी  once again  ventured  into film with  a  well-received starring  भूमिका  in ( 2009  )  ; she was awarded the  ``  Breakthrough Performance Award '' at the Palm  स्रोतों  International  फिल्मी  Festival , and Black  रील  and NAACP Image Award  nominations  .
In a career spanning over  दो   दशकों   ,  Carey has sold  अधिक   than  200 million records worldwide  ,  making her one  of  the best-selling  म्यूज़िक   कलाकारों  of all time  .
in  1998 , she was honored as the world  's   best-selling  recording artist of  the  1990s at  the  World Music Awards .
कैरी  was also named  the  best-selling female artist  of  the  मिलेनियम   in   2000  .
According to the Recording Industry Association of America  ,   वो   is  the third best-selling female artist in the United States  ,  with 63.5 million certified  एल्बम  .
साथ  the  रिलीज  of  ``  Touch My Body  ``  (  2008  ) , Carey gained her  eighteenth  number one  सिंगल   in   the  United States  ,  more  than  any other solo artist .
In 2012 ,  कैरी  was ranked second on VH1  's   सूची   of  the `` 100 Greatest Women in  म्यूज़िक   ''   .
Aside from her  वाणिज्यिक   accomplishments  , Carey has  जीती  five  ग्रैमी  Awards ,  17  World Music  पुरस्कार   ,   11  American  म्यूज़िक  Awards , and  31  Billboard Music Awards .
referred   to  as  the  ``  songbird  supreme '' by the  गिनीज  World Records  ,  she is famed  लिये  her five-octave  गायन  range  ,   शक्ति   ,  melismatic style and  हस्ताक्षर  use of the whistle  पंजीकरण  .
Stratocumulus stratiformis cumulogenitus
in  meteorology ,  a   बादल  is a  दृश्य  mass of liquid  droplets  or  frozen   crystals  made of water  or   विभिन्न  chemicals suspended in the  माहौल  above the surface of a planetary body  .
These suspended particles are  भी  known as  aerosols   .
Clouds in Earth  's  atmosphere are studied  in   the  cloud physics branch of  meteorology  .
Two  प्रक्रियाओं  ,  संभवतः  acting together  ,  can  सीसे   to   एयर  becoming saturated ; cooling the air  or  adding water vapor to  the  air  .
In general ,  वर्षण  will  पतन  to the  सतह   ;  an exception  is  virga  ,   जिससे   evaporates   पहले  reaching the  सतह   .
The  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  cloud classification  प्रणाली   is   आधारित  on the  फैक्ट  clouds in their most basic  फ़ॉर्म   can  show  free-convective  upward  विकास  like cumulus , appear in non-convective layered  चादरें  such  as  stratus  ,  or  लो  the  रूप  of thin  तंतुमय  wisps , as in the  मामला  of cirrus .
Prefixes are used  in  connection with clouds to express variations or complexities in  ये   मौलिक  forms or  to  specify middle  or  high altitude  सीमाएँ  .
ये  include  strato-   लिये   कम   बादल  with limited convection  कि  form  ज़्यादातर   in   uneven   परतों  , cumulo- for  जटिल  highly-convective  तूफ़ान  clouds ,  nimbo-  for  मोटा  layered  बादल   of   कुछ  complexity that  can   उपज  moderate to heavy precipitation , alto- for middle  बादल  ,  और  cirro- for high  बादल  ; the latter  दो  of which may be of simple  or  moderately complex structure  .
Whether  or   नहीं   a  cloud is low , middle  ,  or high level depends on how far above  the  ground its base forms .
Cloud types with  significant  vertical extent can  रूप  in the low or middle  ऊँचाई  ranges  depending   on  the moisture content of the air  .
Clouds in  the  troposphere  have  Latin names  due  to the popular adaptation of Luke Howard  's  cloud categorization system ,  जिससे   began  to spread in popularity during December  1802  .
Synoptic surface weather  observations   उपयोग   कोड  numbers to record and report the types of tropospheric cloud visible  at   प्रत्येक  scheduled observation  समय   आधारित  on  the   ऊँचाई  and physical  रूप   of   the   बादल  .
While a  बहुमत  of  बादल   रूप  in  धरती  's troposphere , there are occasions  जब  clouds  in  the stratosphere and mesosphere can  be  observed  .
These three main layers of the  माहौल   जहाँ  clouds  may  be seen  हैं  collectively  ज्ञात   as   the  homosphere .
Above this  झूठ   the  thermosphere and exosphere , which together make up the  heterosphere  that marks the transition  to  outer space .
बादल  have been  observed  on other  ग्रह   और  moons within the Solar System , but  ,  due to their  अलग  temperature  विशेषताएँ  ,  वे   हैं  composed of other substances such as methane ,  अमोनिया  ,  और   sulfuric  acid .
galveston  County  is  a county  स्तिथ  in the U.S. state of Texas within the Houston–Sugar Land–Baytown  महानगर  area .
As  of  the  2010   जनसांख्यिकी  , the population was  291,309  .
Its county seat is Galveston .
League City  is  the largest city  in  Galveston  काउंटी  in terms of population ; URL_http between 2000  और  2005 it  surpassed   galveston   as  the county 's  largest   नगर  .
Galveston County was founded  in  1838  .

The following table lists the city or town name  ,   the  geographic coordinates  ,   the  population as of the  1990  census ,  an  estimate  of  the  जनसांख्यिकी   as  of 2009 ,  और   the  island name .
The Big  टेन  Conference ,  formerly   पश्चिमी  Conference and  बिग  Nine Conference  ,  is  the  oldest Division I college athletic  सम्मेलन  in the United  राज्य   .
इसके  twelve  सदस्य  institutions ( which are primarily flagship  शोध   विश्वविद्यालयों  in  उनके  respective states , well-regarded  academically  , and  साथ  relatively large  छात्र  enrollment )  हैं   स्तिथ  primarily in the Midwest , stretching  इससे  Nebraska in  the  west to  penn  State in the east  .
The conference  competes  in the NCAA  's  Division I ; its  फ़ुटबॉल  teams compete in the Football Bowl Subdivision (  fbs   )  , formerly known as Division I-A , the highest level of NCAA competition in  कि  sport  .
सदस्य  schools of  the   बिग  Ten ( or  ,   in   दो  cases  ,  their parent  विश्वविद्यालयों  systems ) also  हैं  members  of  the Committee on Institutional  सहयोग  , a leading  शैक्षणिक  and research  consortium  .
Despite  the  conference 's  नाम  , the Big  टेन   दरअसल  consists  of  12  स्कूलों   ,  following the addition of The Pennsylvania State University in  1993   और  the University  of  Nebraska–Lincoln in 2011 .
in   2014   ,  the conference  होगा   विस्तार  to 14  सदस्यों   साथ  the additions of the  विश्वविद्यालयों  of  मेरीलैंड   ,  College  पार्क   और  Rutgers  ,  The State University of New  जर्सी  .
It  is   नहीं  to  be   उलझन   साथ  the Big  12  Conference , which has  तभी  ten  स्कूलों   और   represents  a different  प्रदेश  of  the  country .
Single  malt  Scotch is single malt whisky made in  स्कॉटलैंड  using a pot still  आसवन   प्रक्रम   at  a  सिंगल   डिस्टिलरी  , with  malted  barley  as  the  तभी  grain  संघटक   .
as  with any Scotch whisky  ,   a  single  malt  Scotch must be distilled  in  Scotland and  matured  in  ओक   casks  in  स्कॉटलैंड  for at  तनिक   तीन   सालो  (  सबसे   सिंगल   malts  are matured longer ) .
``  Malt '' indicates that the whisky  is  distilled from  a  `` malted  ''  grain  .
Several  प्रकार  of  दाने  can be malted  (   लिये  example  ,  barley , rye and  गेहूं   हैं  all grains which can be  malted   )  ; however , in the case  of  single  malt  Scotch , barley  is  always the  तभी   अनाज  used .
``  सिंगल   ''  indicates that all  the  malts  in  the  बोतल  come from a single distillery  .
Bottlings containing malt whisky from  अनेक   distilleries  are called  ``   blended  malt  ``  .
Until the Scotch  व्हिस्की  Regulations 2009  (   swr  2009 )  ,  the word ``  blended  ''  तभी  appeared  (  in the context  of  Scotch whisky  )  on bottles of whisky that contained a mixture  of  both barley and non-barley  अनाज   व्हिस्की   ,  but this is  no  longer the case .
अंतर्गत   the  terminology established by  the   swr  2009 , a `` blended malt Scotch  व्हिस्की  ''  is  a mixture of  सिंगल  malt  स्कॉच   whiskies  , not  a  mixture of malted barley  व्हिस्की  and non-barley  व्हिस्की  ; those are called `` blended  स्कॉच   व्हिस्की  ''  ,   बगैर  the word ``  malt  '' .
the   पद   ``  blended malt ''  replaced  `` vatted malt ''  प्रयुक्त  under the  prior  labelling  प्रथाओं  .
The age statement on a bottle of single malt Scotch is  the   क्रमांक  of  सालो   the   व्हिस्की  spent  maturing  in cask  .
As very few whiskies are  बोतलबंद  from a single  cask  the age  बयान  reflects the age of the  youngest  malt in the mix  .
a  texture  may   be  arranged  so   as  to , `` closely approach  the  single-object status of fused-ensemble timbres ,  लिये  example  ,  the beautiful 'northern lights  '  chord  ...  , in a very interesting distribution of pitches , produces  a  fused sound  समर्थित  by a suspended cymbal  फेंकें  `` (  एरिक्सन  (  1975  ) , p.166 & 168 ) .
In contrast  to   अधिक  traditional musical textures  ,   ध्वनि   द्रव्यमान   संयोजन  `` minimizes the importance  of   व्यक्तिगत  pitches in preference  लिये   बनावट  , timbre , and dynamics as primary shapers of gesture and  प्रभाव  . ''
Developed  इससे  the  modernist   टोन   क्लस्टर   और  spread to  orchestral  writing by the late  1950s  and 1960s  ,   sound-mass  `` obscures  the  boundary between sound  और  noise `` ( Edwards  2001  , pp . 326–27 ) .
Techniques  जिससे  may create or be  प्रयुक्त   साथ   ध्वनि  mass  शामिल  extended techniques  ऐसे  as muted brass or strings , flutter tonguing ,  चौड़ी   vibrato  , extreme ranges  ,  and glissandos .
Composers and works include Barbara Kolb  ,   pauline   oliveros  '  ध्वनि   पैटर्न  for  कोरस  (  1961  ) , Norma Beecroft 's From Dreams of Brass for chorus  (  1963–1964 )  ,  and Nancy  वैन   de  Vate  .
beecroft   ``  blurs  व्यक्तिगत  pitches in favor of a  सामूहिक   timbre  through the use  of   गायन  and  इंस्ट्रूमेंटल  clusters  ,  choral  वाक   ,  narrator  ,  and  a  wash of sounds from an  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  tape  .  ''
( ibid )
a  very  जल्दी  example is the opening of Jean-Féry  विद्रोही  's ballet  लेस  Elémens ( 1737–38 ) , where  अराजकता  is represented  by  a gradually cumulating orchestral  क्लस्टर  of all seven notes of  the  D minor  स्केल  (  henck  2004 , pp  .  52–54  )  .
A  बाद   उदाहरण  is  the  third  गति  of  रुथ  Crawford Seeger  's  String Quartet 1931 ( Nonesuch H-71280 ) while  अधिक  recently Phill Niblock  's  multiple  ड्रोन  based music serves as  an  example .
The use of `` chords approaching timbres '' begins with  debussy  and  edgard  Varèse often carefully scored individual instrumental parts  so  that they would fuse into  एक  ensemble timbre  or   ध्वनि  mass ( Erickson  1975  , pp  .  18 and 21  )  .
Other  उदाहरण  include European  ``  textural '' compositions of  the   fifties   और  sixties such as  krzysztof   penderecki  's Threnody  to  the Victims of Hiroshima (  1959  ) and György Ligeti 's  works  featuring  micropolyphony   in   works  like  atmosphères  ( 1961 ) and  उसके  Requiem  (  1963-65 ) .
Other  composers  with works using this technique include  henryk  Górecki , Karel Husa , Witold Lutosławski , Kazimierz Serocki , and Steven Stucky .
Sound mass techniques  भी  appear  in  the music of George Crumb  (   anon  .  n.d.  )  .

A student  is   a   learner   ,  or someone who attends an educational institution .
in  some nations  ,   the  English term (  or  its cognate  in  another  भाषा  )  is  reserved for those who attend  विश्वविद्यालयों  ,  जबकि  a schoolchild under the age of  अठारह   is  called a pupil in  अंग्रेज़ी   (  or  an   समतुल्य   in   अन्य  languages ) , although in  the   संयुक्त  States a  व्यक्ति  enrolled  in   ग्रेड   k–12  is often  पुकारा   a   छात्र   .
In  इसके  widest use , student is used  लिये  anyone who is  सीखना  .
Australia  is   a  continent  comprising   मेनलैंड  Australia  ,  Tasmania , New Guinea , Seram  ,  possibly Timor , and neighbouring islands .
The continent  is   sometimes   ज्ञात   in   तकनीकी  contexts by the  names  Sahul , Australinea or Meganesia  ,  to distinguish it from the Australian mainland .
it   is  the smallest  of  the  सात  traditional continents in the  अंग्रेज़ी  conception  .
New Zealand  is   नहीं   भाग  of the continent  of  Australia , but of the separate  ,  submerged continent of  zealandia   .
zealandia   और  Australia  हैं  both part of  the  wider regions  ज्ञात  as  australasia   और   महासागरीय  .
The continent  of   ऑस्ट्रेलिया   झूठ  on a continental shelf  overlain  by shallow seas which divide  it   into   अनेक  landmasses — the  अराफुरा   समुद्र  and Torres  जलसन्धि   between  mainland Australia and New Guinea , and Bass Strait between mainland Australia and  तस्मानिया  .
When  समुद्र  levels  यहूद  lower during the  pleistocene  ice age ,  सहित   the  last glacial  अधिकतम   परिचय   18,000   bc   ,  they  यहूद  connected by  शुष्क  land .
During  the  past ten thousand  सालो   ,  rising sea levels overflowed  the  lowlands  और   अलग   the   महाद्वीप  into today  's   low-lying  arid  to   semi-arid  mainland and the two mountainous islands of New Guinea and  तस्मानिया  .
Geologically  ,  a  महाद्वीप  extends to the edge of its  महाद्वीपीय   शेल्फ  ,  so  the  now-separate  islands are considered part  of  the continent .
Due  to  the  स्प्रेड  of  पशु   ,  fungi and plants across  the   सिंगल  Pleistocene landmass  the  separate lands have  a   सम्बन्धित   biota  .
Central  पार्क   is  nearly twice as  बिग  as the  संसार   's  second-smallest country  ,  Monaco .
Historically its reservoirs were important components  of  the city  's  water supply .
पर्यावरणीय  issues in  नई  York  नगर  are affected by  the  city 's  आकार  , density ,  abundant  public transportation infrastructure , and location  at   the  mouth of the Hudson  नदी  .
नई   यॉर्क  's population density has  पर्यावरणीय  pros and cons .
It facilitates the highest mass  पारगमन   उपयोग  in the United States , but also concentrates pollution .
Gasoline consumption  in  the city  is  at the rate  the  national average was  in  the 1920s  ,  and greenhouse  गैस   emissions  are a  भिन्न  of the  नेशनल   औसत   ,  at 7.1 metric tons per  व्यक्ति  per  साल  , below  सैन  Francisco , at 11.2 metric tons , and  the   नेशनल  average ,  at  24.5  मीट्रिक  tons  .
New York City accounts  लिये  only 1 %  of   संयुक्त   राज्य  greenhouse  गैस  emissions while housing 2.7  %   of  its population .
in  September 2012 , New York was named the # 1  ``   अमेरिका  's  dirtiest  City ,  ''  by a  travel+leisure   readership  survey that rated the environmental  विशेषता  of  35   prominent   शहरों  in the United States  .
Atlanta ( ,  stressed  ,  locally  )  is  the  पूंजी  of and the most  populous  city in the  u.S.  state of  जॉर्जिया  , with an  अनुमानित  2011 population of 432,427 .
अटलांटा  is the  सांस्कृतिक  and economic  बीच   of  the  अटलांटा  metropolitan area , home  to   5,457,831  people  और  the ninth largest  महानगर  area in  the  United States .
Atlanta is  the  county seat of Fulton  काउंटी   ,   और  a  छोटी  portion of the  नगर  extends eastward into DeKalb County .
अटलांटा  was established in 1837 at  the   चौराहे   of   दो   रेलरोड  lines , and the city rose from  the  ashes of the Civil  युद्ध   to  become a national center of commerce  .
In the  दशकों   following  the Civil Rights Movement , during which the city earned  a   प्रतिष्ठा  as `` too busy  to  hate  ''   लिये  the progressive views of its  नागरिकों  and  नेताओ  ,  अटलांटा  attained international prominence .
Atlanta is the primary transportation hub of the Southeastern  संयुक्त  States ,  via  highway ,  रेलरोड   ,  and air , with Hartsfield–Jackson Atlanta International Airport being the  संसार   's  busiest airport since 1998 .
Atlanta  is  considered an `` alpha ( -  )  world city ,  ''  and , with  a  gross  घरेलू   उत्पाद   of  US $ 270 billion ,  atlanta’s   अर्थव्यवस्था  ranks 15th among world  शहरों   और   छठे  in the nation .
Although Atlanta’s  अर्थव्यवस्था   is   माना  diverse  ,   प्रबल  sectors include  लोजिस्टिक्स  , professional  और  business services  ,  media  परिचालन  ,  सरकारी   प्रशासन   ,  and higher education  .
topographically  ,  अटलांटा  is marked by rolling hills  और   घना  tree  कवरेज   .
Revitalization  of  Atlanta 's neighborhoods , initially spurred  by  the 1996 Olympics ,  रै   intensified  in  the  21st century , altering the city  's  demographics  ,  politics  ,   और  culture .
A  1947  propaganda  कॉमिक  book  प्रकाशित   by  the Catechetical Guild Educational Society raising the specter of a Communist takeover
McCarthyism  is   the   अभ्यास  of  बनाना  accusations of disloyalty , subversion  ,  or  देशद्रोह   बगैर  proper regard  लिये  evidence .
It also means `` the practice  of   बनाना   अन्यायपूर्ण  allegations  or  using  अन्यायपूर्ण   investigative  techniques  ,  especially  in  order to  सीमित   dissent  or political criticism . ''
the   पद   रै  its origins  in  the period in  the  United States  ज्ञात  as  the   दूसरी  Red Scare ,  स्थायी  roughly  इससे  1950 to 1956  और   characterized  by heightened fears of  कम्युनिस्ट  influence on American  संस्थानों  and  espionage  by Soviet agents .
originally  coined  to  criticize the  anti-communist  pursuits of Republican U.S . Senator Joseph McCarthy  of  Wisconsin  ,  `` McCarthyism  ''  soon took on a  broader  meaning , describing the  excesses   of  similar  प्रयत्न  .
The term  is  also now  प्रयुक्त  more generally  to  describe  लापरवाह  , unsubstantiated accusations , as well as demagogic attacks on  the   अक्षर   or   राष्ट्रभक्ति  of political  adversaries   .
During  the   मैकार्थी  era , thousands of  अमेरिकी  were accused of being Communists or communist  sympathizers   और  became  the  subject of aggressive investigations and questioning before government or private-industry  panels  , committees  और   एजेंसियों   .
The  प्राथमिक  targets of such suspicions  यहूद  government employees  ,  those in  the  entertainment  उद्योग   ,  educators and  संघ   कार्यकर्ताओं   .
suspicions   यहूद  often given  credence  despite  inconclusive  or  questionable   प्रमाण  , and the level of threat posed by  a  person 's real or supposed  वामपंथी   एसोसिएशन  or beliefs was often  greatly   अतिरंजित  .
Many people suffered loss of  नियुक्ति   and/or  destruction of their careers ; some even suffered  कारावास  .
Most of these punishments came  परिचय  through trial  verdicts   बाद  overturned ,  कानून   कि   होता  be declared unconstitutional ,  dismissals  for  कारण   बाद  declared  illegal  or actionable  ,  or  extra-legal   प्रक्रियाओं   कि  would  आइये  into general disrepute .
the  most  प्रसिद्ध  examples  of  McCarthyism include the  भाषणों  , investigations  ,  and  hearings   of   सीनेटर  McCarthy himself  ;   the  Hollywood blacklist  ,  associated with  hearings  conducted by the  हाउस   un-american  Activities  कमेटी  ( HUAC  )  ; and the various  anti-communist  activities of  the  Federal  ब्यूरो  of  छानबीन  ( FBI  )  under Director J. Edgar  हूवर  .
McCarthyism was a widespread  सोशल  and cultural phenomenon that affected all  स्तर   of  society  और  was the source of  a  great deal of debate and conflict in  the   संयुक्त  States .
नेपोलियन   is  a  fictional  character and the main antagonist in  जार्ज   ऑरवेल  's Animal Farm  .
जबकि  he is at first a  आम  farm pig , he gets  rid  of Snowball ,  another  pig  जिससे  shares the  शक्ति  .
He then takes advantage of the animals ' uprising against  उनके  masters  to   आखिरकार  become  the  tyrannical `` President of  एनिमल   फार्म   ,   ''  which he turns into a dictatorship .
वरुण   लोगो
The  वरुण   कनाडा  project is  the  world’s first regional-scale  भाटे  ocean  वेधशाला  that  plugs  directly into the  अंतरजाल  .
Since December  2009  , it has allowed  लोगों  to  ``   लहरे  '' the seafloor while ocean scientists run deep-water  प्रयोग  from  लैब्स  and universities around the  संसार  .
Along  साथ  its sister project , VENUS , NEPTUNE  offers  a unique approach to ocean  विज्ञान  .
Traditionally , ocean  वैज्ञानिकों  have relied on infrequent ship  क्रूज़  or space-based  satellites  to  carry   आउट  their research , while  the  NEPTUNE project uses a  remotely  operated  क्रॉलर   .
The  coronet  was a full-size car from Dodge  in   the  1950s  ,  initially the division 's highest trim line but , starting in 1955 , the  न्यूनतम  trim  लकीर  .
In the 1960s , the name was transferred to Dodge 's  mid-size  entry .
