a  steam engine is a  ऊष्मा   इंजन   कि  performs mechanical work using  भाप  as its working fluid .
Using boiling  जल  to  उपज  mechanical  गति  goes back  परिचय  2,000  सालो  ,  लकिन  early  डिवाइस  were  नहीं  practical .
Since the late 1700s steam  इंजन  have  become  a major  सोर्स  of mechanical power .
the   पहला   अनुप्रयोग   यहूद   निकालना   जल  from mines .
In 1781 James  वाट   patented  a steam engine that  उत्पादित  continuous rotative motion .
These 10 hp engines enabled  a  wide range of manufacturing machinery to be  संचालित  .
The engines  could   be   sited   anywhere  that water and coal  or  wood fuel  could  be obtained  .
By 1883 , engines  कि  could provide 10,000 hp had become feasible .
Steam engines could also be applied to vehicles  ऐसे   as  traction engines and the  रेल   इंजनों  which  हैं  commonly just called steam engines outside America .
The  stationary   भाप  engine was a key component of  the  Industrial Revolution , allowing factories  to  locate where water  शक्ति  was unavailable  .
Today steam turbines generate about 90  %  of the electric power  in  the United States  using  a variety  of  heat sources .
भाप   इंजन  are  बाह्य   दहन   इंजन  , where  the  working fluid is separate from the combustion products .
Non-combustion  ऊष्मा   स्त्रोत  such  as  solar  शक्ति   ,   नाभिकीय   शक्ति  or geothermal energy may be used .
the   आदर्श  thermodynamic  साईकिल  used to analyze  इस  process is called  the  Rankine cycle  .
In the cycle , water is heated into steam in  a  boiler until it  पहुँच  a high pressure .
जब  expanded  through  pistons or  turbines  , mechanical work is  किया  .
the  reduced-pressure  भाप  is  तब  condensed and pumped  वापस  into the boiler .
In general  उपयोग  , the term steam engine can refer  to   either  the integrated  भाप  plants  (  including boilers etc . )  ऐसे  as railway steam locomotives  और  portable engines  ,  or may  refer   to  the piston or turbine machinery  अलोन   ,   as   in  the  बीम  engine  और   stationary  steam engine .
specialized  devices such as  भाप  hammers and  भाप   pile   ड्राइवर   हैं   निर्भर  on steam supplied  इससे   a  separate boiler  .
A  मिल  engine from Stott Park Bobbin Mill  ,  Cumbria  ,  England
A steam locomotive  in  Germany .This class  of  engine was  निर्मित  in 1942 – 1950 and  संचालित  commercially  जबतक  1988 .
``  Move Bitch ''  (  edited version titled ``  मूव  B***h  ''  or  बस  `` Move '' ) is  the  third  आधिकारिक  single  इससे  rapper Ludacris  '  album Word of Mouf .
The single features  mystikal   और  I-20 .
The single reached #  10  on the Billboard Hot 100  बनाना  it Ludacris 's first top ten hit on  the  chart , it also reached # 3 on Hot  रैप  Tracks and # 3 on Hot R & B/Hip-Hop  singles   &  Tracks  .
Puerto Rican reggaeton  duo  Maicol & Manuel  sampled  the song on `` Hoy Me Levanté  ''  on  उनके  2002  रिलीज  Yakaleo .
the  song  is   भी  featured in  एपीसोड  2 ,  श्रेणी   एक  of British teen comedy/drama  खालें  .
the  song  थी  also used  by  World Wrestling Entertainment  superstar  Montel Vontavious Porter  दौरान  his  छोटी   कार्यावधि  in Ring of  सम्मान  .
It  थी  also used for  अप्रैल  Hunter in various Independent circuits  .
It was featured  in  the  फिल्म  ATL starring T.I .  ,  and ' Hancock , ' although in the latter  ,  the clean  संस्करण   थी  used .
A snippet  of  the song  is  played during  ट्रैफ़िक   रिपोर्ट्स   on  many radio stations ,  प्रायः  carrying  an   urban/hip-hop   स्वरूप   .
Retired  एनबीए   स्टार  and now  ईएसपीएन  analyst  jalen  Rose is featured in  the  music video .
The song has  महरूम  covered  by   चट्टान   बैंड   प्रारंभ   ट्रबल  ,  on   उनके  album Every Solution Has Its Problem  .
It was featured on British  sitcom   the  Inbetweeners when the characters Jay and  neil  took Will on a 'pussy patrol ' in Jay  's  red  निसान  Micra  .
It was sampled by  लड़की   बात  on the first track  of  his album All Day  ,  `` Oh No '' .
Elizabeth  ii  ( Elizabeth  एलेक्जेंड्रा  Mary  ;  born 21 April  1926  ) is the constitutional monarch of 16 sovereign states , known as  the  Commonwealth  realms  ,  और  their territories and dependencies  ,   और  head  of  the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations .
वो   is  Supreme Governor of the Church  of  England and , in some  of  her realms , carries the title of Defender of the Faith  as  part of  उसके   पूरा   शीर्षक  .
On  उसके  accession on 6  फ़रवरी   1952   ,  Elizabeth  became  Head of the Commonwealth and queen regnant  of  seven independent Commonwealth countries :  the  United Kingdom , Canada , Australia ,  नई  Zealand , South  अफ़्रीकी  ,  पाकिस्तानी  and  ceylon  .
इससे  1956 to 1992 , the  क्रमांक  of her realms  varied   as  territories  gained   स्वतंत्रता  and some  realms  became republics  .
At present , in addition  to  the  पहला  four  aforementioned  countries ,  एलिज़ाबेथ  is  महारानी  of Jamaica , Barbados , the Bahamas ,  हरा  , Papua  नई  Guinea ,  the  Solomon Islands , Tuvalu , Saint  लूसिया  ,  संत   विंसेंट   और  the Grenadines  ,   बेलीज़  , Antigua and Barbuda  और  Saint Kitts and  नेविस  .
उसके  reign of years is currently the second  longest  for a British monarch ;  तभी  Queen Victoria has  reigned  longer  at   over  63 years .
Elizabeth was  born  in  लंदन  and educated  privately  at home .
Her  पिता  acceded to  the  throne as George VI  in  1936 on  the   abdication   of   उसके  brother Edward VIII , from which time she was  the  heir presumptive  .
वो  began  to   undertake  public duties during the Second World War  ,  in  जिससे  she served in the  auxiliary  Territorial  सेवा  .
In 1947 , she married Prince  फिलिप  , Duke of Edinburgh  ,  with whom  वो  has four children :  चार्ल्स  ,  ऐनी   ,   एंड्रयू  , and  एडवर्ड  .
Her coronation service took place  in  1953 and  थी   the  first to be televised .
The Queen 's many  ऐतिहासिक  visits and meetings  शामिल  a state visit to the Republic of Ireland  और   reciprocal   विज़िट   to  and from  the   पोप  .
the  Queen has seen major constitutional changes in her realms , such  as   devolution   in  the United Kingdom and  the  patriation  of  the Canadian  संविधान  .
Times of personal  significance  have included the births and marriages  of  her  children  , the  births   of   उसके  grandchildren  ,   the  investiture  of  the Prince of Wales , and the celebration  of  milestones such as her Silver ,  सुनहरी  , and Diamond Jubilees in 1977  ,  2002 , and 2012  ,   क्रमशः  .
Major events in the  महारानी  's reign have included the Troubles in Northern Ireland , the Falklands  युद्ध  , wars with Iraq  और  the  युद्ध  in Afghanistan .
वहीँ  have  महरूम  times of personal  विषाद  for  उसके  which include the death of her  पिता   at   56   ,  the assassination of Prince  फिलिप  's uncle ,  रब   माउंटबेटन  , the breakdown of her children 's marriages in 1992 (  a  year deemed her annus horribilis )  ,  the  मौत   in  1997 of her  पूर्व  daughter-in-law , Diana , Princess  of  Wales ,  और   the  deaths of her mother and  सिस्टर  in  2002   .
The  महारानी  has occasionally faced severe press criticism of the  royal  family and republican sentiments ,  लकिन   support  for the monarchy and her personal  लोकप्रियता   remain   ऊँची   .
Christianity  is  the largest religion listed by Australians  in  the  नेशनल  census .
in  the 2011  जनसांख्यिकी  , 61.1 %  of  Australians were listed  as  Christian  .
Australia  रै   no  official  राज्य  religion and the Australian  संविधान   protects   स्वतंत्रता  of religion .
The  उपस्थिति  of  christianity   in  Australia began with the arrival of the First Fleet of  अंग्रेजों  convicts in 1788 .
the  religion grew to account for 96.1  %  of the national population  at  the  समय  of the Federation of Australia in  1901   .
The  anglican   गिरिजाघर  of Australia ( formerly  ज्ञात   as  the Church of England in Australia  )   remained  the largest denomination until  1986  , when  it   थी  surpassed by the Roman Catholic  गिरिजाघर  in Australia .
Post-war multiculturalism  और   a  decline in religious observance among some  भाग  of the population  have   diversified  the demographics  of  religion  in  Australia  .
Of the roughly  61   %  identifying  as   ईसाई  in 2011  ,  the largest  denominations  were  either   रोमन  Catholic (  25  % ) or  anglican  ( 17 % ) , with  the   तीसरा  largest  denomination  being the  5  % affiliated  साथ   the  Uniting Church in Australia .
Post-war immigration  रै  grown the  संख्याएँ  belonging to churches like the Greek Orthodox Archdiocese of  ऑस्ट्रेलिया   और   वहीँ   हैं   विशाल   और  growing Pentecostal  समूह  , such as Sydney 's  hillsong  Church  .
The festivals of  ईस्टर  and  क्रिसमस  are public holidays in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  .
around   a  quarter of  विद्यार्थी  attend church schools and Christian  संगठनों   हैं   अग्रणी   non-government  providers of  स्वास्थ्य   और  welfare services through organisations like Catholic Health  ऑस्ट्रेलिया   ,  Anglicare  ,   unitingcare   ऑस्ट्रेलिया  ,  the  Salvation  फौज  and St Vincent de  पॉल  Society  .
Historically significant Australian Christians  have  included Rev  dr  John Dunmore Lang , Saint Mary  mackillop  ,  कैथरीन  Helen  spence  , Pastor David Unaipon , the Reverend John Flynn and  पादरी  Sir Doug Nicholls .
High profile contemporary Australian Christians  शामिल  : Tim Costello  बैपटिस्ट  minister and  वर्तमान   सीईओ  of World Vision  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  , Frank  ब्रेनन  , Jesuit human rights  वकील  ,  कार्डिनल  George Pell , Catholic  archbishop   of  Sydney ,  फिलिप   aspinall  the current Anglican Primate and Archbishop  of   ब्रिसबेन  , Kevin Rudd  ,   पूर्व  Labor Prime Minister  ,   और  Tony Abbott , leader for  the   संघीय  Opposition Liberal Party .

Yale University is a  निजी   आइवी  League research university  स्तिथ   in   नई  Haven ,  कनेक्टिकट  .
संस्थापित  in 1701 in the Colony of Connecticut , the  विश्वविद्यालयों  is the  third-oldest  institution  of   उच्चतर   शिक्षा  in the  संयुक्त   राज्य  .
Originally chartered as the `` Collegiate  स्कूल  '' , the institution traces its roots to 17th-century  clergymen   जो  sought to establish a college to train clergy and political leaders  लिये   the  colony  .
In 1718 , the  कॉलेज  was  renamed  ``  yale  College  ''   to  honor a gift from  elihu  Yale  ,  a  राज्यपाल  of the British  ईस्ट   इण्डिया   कम्पनी  .
in  1861 , the Graduate School  of   कला   और  Sciences became  the  first U.S. institution to  पुरस्कार  the PhD  .  Yale  became  a  founding  member of the Association of American  विश्वविद्यालयों  in 1900 .
Yale College was  रूपांतरित  , beginning in the  1930s  , through the establishment of residential  कॉलेजों  : 12  अभी  exist  और  two more  हैं  planned .
Yale employs over 1,100  संकाय  to teach  और  advise about  5,300  undergraduate and 6,100  ग्रैजुएट  and professional students .
Almost all  tenured  professors teach undergraduate courses  ,  more than 2,000  of   जिससे  are offered annually  .
the  University  's  assets  शामिल  an  endowment  valued at $ 19.4 billion ,  the  second-largest of  कोई  academic institution  in  the  संसार   .
Yale 's system of  अधिक  than two dozen libraries holds 12.5  लाख  volumes .
49 Nobel Laureates have been  संबद्ध   साथ  the  विश्वविद्यालयों  as students  ,   संकाय   ,  and  स्टाफ   .
Yale has produced many notable alumni , including  पाँच  U.S.  राष्ट्रपतियों   ,  19 U.S. Supreme  अदालत  Justices ,  और  several foreign heads  of  state  .
At the graduate  स्तर   ,  Yale Law School , Yale School of Art  ,   और   yale  School of  नाटक  are  consistently  ranked the  शीर्ष  programs  in  their field .
Yale Law  स्कूल   is   the  most  चयनात्मक  law school in the United States  .
yale  students  compete   intercollegiately   as  the  yale  Bulldogs in  the  NCAA Division I  आइवी  League .
the  oldest intercollegiate athletic  इवेंट  in the  संयुक्त  States  is  the  yale-harvard   regatta  .
Artemisia tridentata  (  `` big sagebrush  ''  or ``  sagebrush  '' ) is an  खुशबूदार  shrub from the family  asteraceae   ,   जिससे   grows  in arid and  semi-arid  conditions , throughout  a  range of cold desert ,  स्तान  , and mountain habitats in  the  Intermountain  वेस्ट  of North  अमेरिका  .
The vernacular  नाम  ``  sagebrush  '' is also used for several related  सदस्यों  of the genus Artemisia , such as California Sagebrush  (  Artemisia californica )  .
Big Sagebrush and other Artemisia  प्रजाति  are the  प्रबल  plants across large portions  of  the Great  जलाशय   ,  covering some 422,000 square miles in 11 western U.S.  &  Canadian  राज्य  .
it   is  the state flower of Nevada .
Sagebrush provides food  और  habitat  लिये  a  किस्में  of species  ,   ऐसे  as sage grouse , pronghorn  antelope  , gray vireo , pygmy rabbit , and  खच्चर  deer .
Big  sagebrush  was used as an  हर्बल  medicine by Native Americans throughout the Intermountain West  of  North America—especially for preventing infection in wounds ,  stopping  internal bleeding  ,  and treating  headaches   और  colds .
Chemically , the  क्रियाशील  medicinal constituents  शामिल  camphor  ,   terpenoids   ,  and tannins .
अनेक  major threats exist  to  sage brush ecosystems , including human settlements  ,  conversion to agricultural land  ,  livestock grazing , invasive plant species , wildfires , and  जलवायु  change  .
याहू   !  Mail  is  a  फ़्री  email  सेवा  offered by  the  American search engine company  याहू  !
It was  शुभारम्भ  in 1997 , and ,  according  to comScore ,  याहू  !  मेल  is the third-largest  web-based  email service with 281 million users as of December  2012  .
Currently , Yahoo ! offers three  संस्करण   of   याहू  ! Mail  .
The traditional `` Yahoo ! Mail  क्लासिक  '' continues the  उपलब्धता  of the original interface  introduced  in 1997 .
A version introduced in 2005 included a  नई  Ajax  इंटरफ़ेस  , drag-and-drop  सुविधाएँ  ,  improved   ढूंढें  functionality  ,   कुंजीपटल   शॉर्टकट  , address  auto-complete  , tabs , and  अन्य   अद्यतनीकृत  features .
In October 2010 , Yahoo ! released a beta version of  याहू  ! Mail ,  जिससे  included improvements to  the   डिज़ाइन  , performance , search  कार्यक्षमता  , and Facebook  संयोजन  .
in   may  2011  ,   बीटा  testing for the  नई  version stopped , and it  became  the default  इंटरफ़ेस  for Yahoo  !   मेल  .
In  जल्दी  2008 , Yahoo  !  began offering unlimited mail storage to  इसके  users in response to heated  प्रतियोगिता   in  the free  web-mail   मार्केट  segment .
On June 27  ,   2009  , Yahoo  !  Messenger was  एकीकृत   साथ  Yahoo ! Mail .
Tacoma (  ,  ) is a mid-sized urban port city and the  काउंटी  seat of Pierce  काउंटी   ,   वॉशिंगटन  , United  राज्य  .
the   नगर  is  on  Washington  's  Puget Sound  ,   दक्षिणपश्चिम  of Seattle  ,  northeast of  the  state capital , Olympia , and northwest  of  Mount  rainier  National  पार्क  .
The population was  198,397  , according to  the   2010  census .
Tacoma is  the  second-largest city  in  the Puget Sound area  और  the third largest  in   the   राज्य  .
Tacoma  भी  serves as the center of business  कार्यकलाप   लिये  the  दक्षिण  Sound region , which  रै  a  जनसांख्यिकी   of  around 1 million people  .
टकोमा  adopted its name after the  आसपास  Mount Rainier  ,  originally called Mount Tahoma .
it  is  ज्ञात  as  the  `` City  of  Destiny '' because the area was chosen to be the western terminus of the Northern Pacific Railroad in the  लेट  19th  सदी  .
The decision of the railroad was influenced by  टकोमा   's  neighboring deep-water harbor ,  शुरुआत  Bay .
By connecting the  खाड़ी  with the  रेलरोड  Tacoma 's motto  became  `` When rails meet sails . ''
आज  Commencement  खाड़ी  serves the Port  of  Tacoma , a center of  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   व्यापार  on  the  Pacific Coast  और  Washington state  's  largest port .
जैसे  most central cities , Tacoma suffered a prolonged  मनाही  in the mid-20th century  as  a result  of  suburbanization and divestment .
Since the 1990s , developments  in  the  शहर  core include the  विश्वविद्यालयों   of  Washington Tacoma ;  टकोमा   कड़ी  , the first  आधुनिक  electric light rail service in the  राज्य   ;  the state 's highest density  of   आर्ट   और  history  संग्रहालय  ;  और  a restored urban waterfront ,  the   thea  Foss Waterway .
With  a  long history of  blue-collar  labor politics —  इससे  the  रेलरोड  workers of the  19th   सदी  ,  to  the longshoremen of the 20th century  ,   to   the  Labor Ready workers of today  —  Tacoma has  long   महरूम  known for  इसके   अशिष्ट   ,  gritty  चित्र   .
A song about  टकोमा  ,  ``  Thrice All American ''  ,  by  अमरीकी   singer-songwriter  and  पूर्व   निवासी  Neko  मामला   ,  describes it as `` a dusty old jewel in  the  South  puget  Sound / where the factories  निकले  /  और  the timber 's all  काटें  down ''  .
Tacoma-Pierce  काउंटी   रै  been named one of the  सबसे   livable   क्षेत्रों  in  the  country  .
टकोमा  was also recently  सूचीबद्ध  as the  19th  most walkable  नगर  in the country .
in  contrast , the city is  भी   क्रमित  as the most stressed-out  नगर  in  the  country  in  a 2004 survey  .
in   2006   ,   महिलाओं   's  magazine Self named Tacoma the `` Most Sexually Healthy  नगर   ''  in the United  राज्य   .
in   2012  ,  the  Advocate  दिया   टकोमा  the  शीर्षक  of `` Gayest City in America ''  ,  in  भाग  because of the large diversity  of  public offices held  ,   और  Washington  राज्य   गुजर  a bill in 2012 allowing LGBT couples to  निकाह  .
Tacoma  is  famous for the 1940  पतन  of the Tacoma Narrows  सेतु  .
Chula  विस्टा   (  ;  )   is  the second largest city in  the  San Diego  महानगर   क्षेत्रफल   ,  the seventh largest city in  दक्षिणी  California  ,  the fourteenth  largest  city in the State of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , and the 77th-largest city  in   the  United  राज्य  .
The population was 243,916  as  of the  2010  census .
Located just from  शहर  San Diego and  इससे  the  मैक्सिकन  border in the South  खाड़ी  region of the metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  , the  नगर  is at  the  center  of  one of  the   richest  economic and culturally diverse zones in the United States .
Chula Vista is so  नामित   क्युकी  of its  दर्शनीय  location between  the  San Diego  खाड़ी   और  coastal mountain  foothills  .
Founded  in  the early 19th century , fast population  विकास  has  recently  been  observed  in  the   नगर  .
As the second largest city in San Diego County , Chula Vista has quickly  become  a destination  लोकप्रिय   to  many tourists  .
Located in the city is one of America 's few year-round United States Olympic Training  centers  and popular tourist  गंतव्यों  include  क्रिकेट  Wireless Amphitheater  ,  the Chula Vista marina , and the Chula  विस्टा  Nature Center .
metes   और  bounds is  a  system  or  method of  describing  land ,  रियल  property ( in contrast  to   निजी  property  )  or real estate .
The system  रै  been used  in  England for  अनेक  centuries , and  is  still used there in  the   परिभाषा   of  general boundaries  .
By custom , it was applied in  the  original  तेरह  Colonies that  became  the United States ,  और  in many other land jurisdictions  आधारित   on  English common  विधि  .
typically   the  system  उपयोग   शारीरिक  features of  the  local geography ,  साथ  with  दिशानिर्देश  and distances , to define and describe the boundaries of a parcel  of   जमीन  .
the   सीमाएँ   हैं  described in a  कार्यशील   गद्य   स्टाइल  , working around the  पार्सल  in sequence  ,  from  a  point  of   शुरूआत   ,   returning  back to  the  same  पाइंट   ;  compare  साथ  the oral ritual of  धड़कन   the  bounds  .
it   may   शामिल  references to other  adjoining  parcels ( and their owners  )  , and it , in  फेरे  , could  भी  be  referred  to  in   बाद  surveys .
At the time the  वर्णन  is  compiled  , it  may  have been  चिह्नित  on the ground with permanent monuments placed where there were no  उपयुक्त  natural monuments  .
The  पद   ``  metes '' refers to  a   boundary   पारिभाषित  by the measurement  of  each straight run , specified by  a  distance  between   the  terminal points ,  और  an orientation or direction .
A direction may be a simple compass  bearing  , or a precise orientation determined  by   सटीक  survey  विधि  .
The term  ``  bounds '' refers  to  a more general  boundary  description ,  ऐसे   as   साथ   a  certain  watercourse  , a  स्टोन   वॉल  , an adjoining public  सड़क  way  ,  or an existing building .
The system  is  often  प्रयुक्त  to define larger pieces of property (  e.g   .  farms )  ,   और  political subdivisions ( e.g . town  सीमाएँ   )  where precise definition  is  not required or  होता  be far too expensive , or  previously  designated  सीमाएँ   can   be  incorporated into the description  .
Sir Isaac Newton (  25   दिसम्बर  164220  कूच   1727   )  was an  अंग्रेज़ी  physicist and mathematician who is  widely  regarded as one  of  the  सबसे  influential scientists of all time and as a  कुंजी  figure  in  the scientific revolution .
उसके  book Philosophiæ  naturalis   प्रिन्सिपिया  Mathematica  (  ``  गणितीय  Principles of Natural Philosophy  ''  )  ,   पहला  published in 1687 ,  रखी  the foundations  लिये   सबसे  of classical mechanics .
न्यूटन   भी  made seminal contributions to optics  और  shares  क्रेडिट   साथ  Gottfried  लैबनिट्ज़  for the  आविष्कार  of  the  infinitesimal calculus  .
Newton 's Principia formulated  the  laws of motion and universal gravitation that dominated  वैज्ञानिकों  ' view of the  शारीरिक  universe  लिये   the   अगला  three centuries .
it  also demonstrated that the motion of objects on the Earth  और   कि  of celestial bodies could be described by the same principles .
by  deriving Kepler 's laws of planetary motion  इससे  his mathematical  वर्णन  of gravity  ,   न्यूटन  removed the  पिछला   संदेह  about the validity of the heliocentric model of  the  cosmos  .
Newton built the  पहला  practical reflecting telescope and developed a theory  of   रंग  based  on  the observation  कि   a  prism decomposes white light  into  the many colours  of  the visible spectrum .
He  भी  formulated an empirical law  of  cooling  और   पढ़ाई  the speed  of  sound .
In addition to his work  on  the  कलन  ,  as   a  mathematician Newton contributed to the  पढ़ाई  of power series , generalised the  द्विपद  theorem to non-integer exponents , and developed Newton 's method  लिये  approximating  the   जड़ें  of a function .
Newton was a fellow  of  Trinity College and the second Lucasian  प्राध्यापक   of  Mathematics at  the  University of  कैम्ब्रिज  .
he   थी  a devout but unorthodox  ईसाई  and  ,  unusually for a member of  the   कैम्ब्रिज  faculty  ,  he  refused  to take holy  आदेश  in the Church of  इंग्लैण्ड  , perhaps because  he   privately  rejected the doctrine  of  trinitarianism .
In addition to his work  on   the  mathematical  sciences  , Newton also dedicated  much   of  his time  to  the study  of  alchemy and biblical chronology , but most of his work in  those  areas remained unpublished until  long  after  उसके  death .
in  his later life ,  न्यूटन  became president  of  the Royal Society .
He also served the British government as Warden  और  Master of the Royal Mint  .
Prof. Walter Lewin explains  न्यूटन  's  विधि  of gravitation  in  MIT  कोर्स   8.01
Satellites and projectiles  सब  obey Newton  's  law  of  gravitation
Newton  's  law of  सार्वभौमिक   gravitation  states  कि  every point mass in  the  universe attracts every other  पाइंट  mass with a  फ़ोर्स  that is  सीधे   आंशिक   to  the  उत्पाद  of  उनके  masses  और  inversely proportional to  the  square of the  अलहदा  between them .
(  separately  it  थी  shown that large spherically symmetrical  masses   आकर्षित  and are attracted as if all their mass were concentrated  at  their centers . )
This is  a  general  शारीरिक   विधि   निकला  from empirical observations by  कया  Newton called induction .
It is a part of classical  यांत्रिकी  and was formulated in Newton 's work Philosophiæ Naturalis Principia Mathematica ( `` the Principia  ''  ) , first published  on  5 July 1687 .
(   जब   न्यूटन   's   किताब  was  प्रस्तुत   in  1686 to  the  Royal Society  ,  Robert Hooke made a  अर्जी  that Newton had  प्राप्त  the  विलोम  square law from him – see History section below  .  )
In modern language , the  विधि  states the following:
Assuming  si   इकाई  , F is measured in newtons  (  N ) , m1 and m2 in kilograms ( kg ) , r  in  meters ( m ) , and the constant G is approximately equal to  .
the   मान  of the constant G was  पहला   accurately  determined from the results of the Cavendish  प्रयोग  conducted  by  the British scientist Henry Cavendish  in   1798  ,  हालांकि   कैवेंडिश   किया  not himself calculate  a  numerical  मान  for G  .
इस   प्रयोग   थी   भी   the  first  परीक्षण  of Newton 's theory  of  gravitation  between  masses in  the   प्रयोगशाला   .
It took  प्लेस   111  years after the  प्रकाशन   of  Newton  's  Principia and 71 years after Newton  's  death  ,   so  none  of  Newton 's calculations could use the value  of   g  ; instead he could only  गणना  a  फ़ोर्स  relative to another  फ़ोर्स   .
Newton  's  law of gravitation  resembles  Coulomb  's  law of electrical forces , which is used  to  calculate the  परिमाण  of  विद्युत  force between two charged  लाशें  .
दोनो  are inverse-square laws , in  जिससे  force is  inversely   आंशिक  to the  वर्गाकार   of  the  अलहदा  between  the  bodies .
Coulomb 's Law has the product of two charges in place of the product of the masses , and  the  electrostatic constant in place of the  गुरुत्वाकर्षक  constant  .
Newton 's law  रै  since been superseded by Einstein 's theory  of  general  आपेक्षिकता  ,  लकिन  it continues to be used  as  an  बेहतरीन  approximation of the effects of gravity  .
आपेक्षिकता  is required  तभी  when  वहीँ  is a need for extreme precision , or  जब  dealing with  gravitation   लिये  extremely  विशाल  and dense  वस्तुएँ  .
White and red  ध्वज  , representing Iraqi and  अमरीकी  deaths , sit  in  the grass quadrangle of The Valley Library on  the  Corvallis  ,  Oregon , campus of Oregon State University .
as  part of  the  traveling  इराकी   देह  Count exhibit  इससे  2008 to 2009 ( not related to Iraq  देह  Count project ) , the  ध्वज  aim to  ``  raise  जागरूकता  of the human cost of the Iraq War .  ''
( May 2008 )
Casualties of the conflict  in  Iraq  चूंकि  2003 ( beginning  साथ   the  2003 invasion of Iraq  ,  and  continuing  with the ensuing  occupation  of Iraq , as  खूब  as  the  activities of the various armed groups operating in the country ) have come in many forms  ,  and the  सटीकता  of  the  information  उपलब्धियाँ  on different types of Iraq  युद्ध  casualties varies greatly .
The table below summarizes various estimates of  the   इराकी  casualty figures .
लिये  troops  in  the U.S.-led  बहुराष्ट्रीय  coalition , the death toll is carefully  tracked   और   अद्यतनीकृत  daily  ,  and the  names  and photographs of those  मारे  in  कार्रवाई  as well as in accidents have  महरूम   प्रकाशित  widely  .
A  कुल  of 4,486 U.S. soldiers  यहूद   मारे   in  Iraq between 2003 and 2012 .
Regarding the Iraqis ,  however  ,  सूचना   on  both military and civilian casualties  is  both less  precise  and less  सतत  .
Estimates of casualty levels  हैं  available from  पत्रकारों   on   the   झाँकी  , from officials  of  involved organizations  ,   और  from  समूह   कि  summarize information  on  incidents reported  in  the  न्यूज  media  .
The word ``  हताहत  `` in its most general sense includes the injured  as  well as the dead .
Accounts of the  क्रमांक  of coalition wounded vary widely  ,  partly because it is not obvious what should be counted  :  should  तभी   those  injuries serious enough to put a  सिपाही   आउट   of   आयोग  be included  ?
do  illnesses or  चोटों  caused by accidents  गिनती  , or  चाहिए  the focus be restricted to  wounds  caused by hostile  सगाई  ?
स्त्रोत  using different definitions may arrive at very different numbers , and sometimes  the  precise definition is  नहीं  clearly specified .
Asalto al coche ( Robbery of the  कोच   )  ,  by   फ्रांसिस्को  de  गोया
A highwayman  थी  a thief  और  brigand who preyed on  travellers   .
This type of  गैरकानूनी  usually travelled and robbed by horse , as  compared  to  a   footpad  who travelled  और  robbed on foot  .
Mounted  लुटेरों   यहूद  widely considered  to  be socially superior to footpads  .
ऐसे   लुटेरों  operated in Great Britain and Ireland from the Elizabethan era  जबतक  the  जल्दी  19th century .
The  शब्द  highwayman is  पहला  known to be used  in  the year  1617  ; other euphemisms  शामिल  `` knights of the  सड़क   ''  and ``  सज्जनों   of   the  road .  ''
दो  terms applied to 19th-century North American  highwaymen   यहूद  road  एजेंटों  in some  उदाहरण  for mountain  डाकुओं  while in other cases the term  is   rlallaala   लिये  mountain-based ruffians  .
In the same  समय  period in Australia ,  वे  were known as  bushrangers  .
Earvin  ``  Magic '' Johnson , Jr. ( born  अगस्त  14 ,  1959  ) is a retired American professional basketball player who played point  गार्ड  for the Los  एंजिल्स  Lakers of the National Basketball Association ( NBA ) .
After winning championships in high  स्कूल  and  कॉलेज   ,  Johnson was selected  पहला  overall in the  1979  NBA  ड्राफ्ट   by  the  लेकर्स  .
He won  a  championship and  an  NBA Finals Most Valuable Player Award in  उसके  rookie season , and won four more  championships  with the Lakers during  the   1980s  .
जॉनसन  retired abruptly  in  1991 after  announcing  that he had contracted HIV , but  लौटे   to  play in the 1992 All-Star  खेल  , winning the All-Star MVP Award  .
After protests from his fellow players ,  he  retired again for four years , but returned  in  1996 , at age  36  , to play 32 games for the Lakers before retiring for the third and final  समय  .
Johnson  's  career achievements  शामिल  three NBA MVP Awards ,  नौ  NBA Finals appearances , twelve  all-star  games , and  टेन  All-NBA  पहला   और   दूसरी   टोली  nominations .
He  led  the league in regular-season assists  चार  times , and  is   the  NBA 's  all-time  leader in average  assists   प्रति  game  ,  at 11.2 .
Johnson was  a   सदस्य  of the  ``   सपना  Team `` , the  u.S.  basketball  टोली  that  जीती  the Olympic  सुनहरा  medal  in  1992  .
After leaving  the   एनबीए  in  1992  , Johnson  formed  the  जादू  Johnson All-Stars , a barnstorming  टोली  that travelled around the  संसार  playing exhibition games .
Johnson  थी  honored  as   एक  of the 50 Greatest  खिलाड़ी  in NBA History in 1996 ,  और  enshrined  in  the  बास्केट  Hall of Fame in  2002  .
He  थी   रेटेड  the greatest NBA point guard of all time by ESPN in 2007 .
His friendship and rivalry with  बोस्टन   सेल्टिक्स  star Larry Bird  ,  whom he faced in  the  1979 NCAA finals and  तीन   एनबीए  championship  श्रेणी  , were well documented .
Since  उसके   रिटायरमेंट  , Johnson  रै  been  an  advocate for HIV/ AIDS prevention  और  safe sex , as  खूब  as an entrepreneur , philanthropist  ,   प्रसारणकर्ता  and motivational speaker .
Johnson was  a  part-owner of the  लेकर्स   लिये  several years , and  थी  part  of   a  group  कि   खरीदा  the Los  एंजिल्स  Dodgers in 2012 .
Allium cells in different phases of the  कोशिका  cycle
The  कोशिकाएं  of  eukaryotes  (  बाएँ  )  और  prokaryotes ( right )
The  कोशिका   is  the basic structural , functional and biological unit of all known  जीना  organisms .
it   is  the smallest unit of  जीवन  that is  वर्गीकृत  as a  जीना  thing ( except virus , which consists only from  dna/rna   covered  by  प्रोटीन  and lipids  )  ,  और  is often called  the  building  ब्लाक  of life .
It  consists  of  a  protoplasm  enclosed  within  a   झिल्ली   ,  which contains  अनेक   biomolecules  such as  प्रोटीन  and nucleic acids .
Organisms can be  वर्गीकृत  as unicellular ( consisting of a single cell  ;  including most bacteria ) or multicellular  (  including plants and animals ) .
While the  क्रमांक  of  कोशिकाएं  in  पौधे  and animals varies  इससे   प्रजाति   to  species ,  इंसानो  contain about  100  trillion ( 1014 ) cells .
Most plant and animal cells  हैं   between   1  and 100 micrometres and  इसलिए  are visible only under the  सूक्ष्मदर्शी  .
the  cell was discovered by Robert  hooke   in  1665 .
The cell theory , first developed in 1839 by  matthias  Jakob Schleiden and Theodor  schwann  , states that all  जीवों  are composed of  एक  or more  कोशिकाएं  ,  कि   सब  cells  आइये  from  preexisting  cells  ,  that vital functions of an organism occur  भीतर   कोशिकाएं  , and  कि  all  कोशिकाएं   contain   the  hereditary  सूचना   जरुरी  for regulating cell functions and for  transmitting  information to the next generation of cells .
Cells  उभरा  on planet Earth  at  least 4.0–4.3 billion years  पहले   .
The  शब्द  cell comes from  the  Latin cella , meaning  ``   छोटी  room ''  .
The descriptive term for the  smallest  living biological structure was coined  by  Robert  hooke  in a book he published  in  1665 when he compared the cork cells  he   देखी  through his microscope to  the  small rooms monks lived in .
Grecian Formula is a men 's  बाल  coloring product in  the   संयुक्त  States .
Canada and  यूरोपीय  previously banned  the  product because of its  उपयोग  of lead  एसीटेट  .
a  motor scooter 's front  साथ   an  impractical number  और  variety of  headlamps  , added for decorative purposes
A  headlamp  is a  बल्ब  attached  to  the front of a vehicle to light  the  road  ahead  .
Headlamp performance has steadily improved throughout the automobile age , spurred by the great disparity between  दिन  and nighttime  ट्रैफ़िक  fatalities  :  the  u.S.   नेशनल   राजमार्ग  Traffic  सुरक्षा  Administration states that  nearly  half of all traffic-related fatalities occur in  the  dark , despite  तभी  25 % of  ट्रैफ़िक  travelling during darkness  .
While it is  आम  for the  पद  headlight  to   be  used interchangeably in informal  चर्चा  , headlamp is the term for the  यंत्र  itself  ,  while headlight properly  refers  to the beam  of  light produced and  वितरित  by  the  device  .
Other vehicles  ,  such  as  trains  और  aircraft , are  जरूरी  to have headlamps  .
Bicycle headlamps are often used on  साइकिल  , and are required in some jurisdictions  .
They can be powered by a  बैटरी  or a small  विद्युत  generator on the  व्हील  .
additionally  automotive night vision systems work  to   संपूरक  headlamps .
महिलाओं  's rights are the rights and  entitlements  claimed for women and  लड़कियों  of many societies  विश्वव्यापी  .
in   कुछ  places these rights  हैं  institutionalized or supported by law , local custom , and behaviour  ,  whereas in others  वे  may be ignored or suppressed .
They  differ   इससे  broader notions  of   इंसान  rights through claims of an inherent historical and traditional bias  विरूद्ध   the  exercise  of   अधिकारों  by  महिलाओं  and  लड़कियों   in  favour of men  और   लड़कों  .
मुद्दे  commonly associated  साथ  notions  of  women 's  अधिकारों   शामिल  , though are not limited to  ,  the right : to  bodily   अखंडता   और   स्वायत्तता   ;  to vote (  suffrage   )  ; to hold public office ;  to  work ; to fair wages or equal pay  ;   to  own property  ;   to  education ; to  serve   in  the military or be  conscripted  ;  to  enter into  विधिक   अनुबंध  ;  और  to  have  marital , parental  और  religious  अधिकारों   .
Caryn Elaine Johnson  ,  best known  as  Whoopi  गोल्डबर्ग  ( , ( born November  13  ,  1955   )  is an American comedienne , actress ,  singer-songwriter  ,  राजनैतिक  activist ,  लेखक   और  talk show host .
गोल्डबर्ग   बना   उसके  film debut in The  रंग  Purple (  1985   )  , playing Celie , a mistreated  ब्लैक   स्त्री   in   the   गहन   दक्षिण   .
वो  received a nomination  लिये  the  अकादमी   पुरस्कार  for Best  अभिनेत्री   और   जीती  her first  सुनहरी   ग्लोब  Award for her role in the film  .
In  1990   ,  she played  oda  Mae Brown ,  a  wacky  मानसिक  helping a slain man ( Patrick Swayze )  सहेजें  his  प्रेमी  ( Demi  मूर  ) in  the   ब्लॉकबस्टर  Ghost  .
This performance  जीती  her  a  second  सुनहरी  Globe and an Academy Award for  बेहतरीन   supporting  Actress  ;  this made Goldberg only the second  ब्लैक   स्त्री   in  the history  of  the Academy  पुरस्कार  to win  an   एक्टिंग  Oscar—the first being Hattie McDaniel who  जीती  for Gone  साथ  the  हवा  in 1939  .
Notable  बाद  films  शामिल  Sister Act  और  Sister Act 2 ,  the  Player  ,  Made  in   अमेरिका  , How  स्टेला  Got Her Groove  वापस  ,  लड़की   ,  Interrupted and Rat  रेस  .
She is also acclaimed for her roles as  the  bartender Guinan in  स्टार   ट्रेक  : The  अगला  Generation ,  as  Terry Doolittle in Jumpin  '  Jack  फ्लैश  , and  as  Carmen  tibideaux   in  Glee ,  as   खूब  as  the  voice of Shenzi the hyena in The Lion King .
गोल्डबर्ग  has been nominated for 13 Emmy Awards  लिये  her work  in  television .
She was co-producer  of  the popular game show  हॉलीवुड  Squares from  1998  to  2004   .
She has been the moderator  of   the  daytime  बात  show  the  View since 2007  .
Goldberg has  a  Grammy , two  दिन  Emmys , two Golden Globes , a Tony  (  for production  ,  not acting  )  ,  और   an  Oscar .
in  addition , Goldberg has  a  British Academy Film Award , four People  's   चुनाव   पुरस्कार  , and has  महरूम  honored  साथ  a star  on  the Hollywood Walk  of  Fame .
She is one of the few entertainers who have  जीती  an Emmy , Grammy , Oscar ,  और  Tony Award .
the   नेशनल  Hockey  लीग  ( NHL  ;   )  is an  ``   unincorporated  not-for-profit association ''  जिससे   operates  a major professional ice  हॉकी  league of  30  franchised member  क्लब  , of  जिससे  seven are currently located in  कनाडा   और  23  in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  .
Headquartered in  नई   यॉर्क  City ,  the  NHL is widely considered to be the premier  पेशेवर  ice hockey league  in  the world , and one of  the   प्रमुख  professional sports  लीग  in the United States and Canada .
the  Stanley Cup , the  oldest  professional sports  ट्रॉफी  in North America , is awarded annually  to   the  league playoff champion at the end of each  ऋतु  .
The league was organized  on  November 26  ,  1917 ,  in  Montreal , Quebec  ,   कनाडा   ,   बाद  the  बर्खास्तगी   of  operations  of   इसके  predecessor  संगठन   ,   the  National  हॉकी  Association ( NHA  )  , which had been founded in 1909 .
It started  साथ  four teams and  ,   through  a  श्रेणी  of  expansions  , contractions , and  relocations  ,  the   लीग  is now  रचित  of  30  active franchises  .
The nation to which the name  of  the league originally  referred   थी   कनाडा  , although the league has now been binational since 1924 when it  विस्तारित  into the  संयुक्त  States .
After a labour dispute that led to  the  cancellation of  the  entire  2004–05  season  ,  the  लीग  resumed play  अंतर्गत  a new collective  bargaining  agreement that included  a  salary cap .
In 2009 ,  the  NHL enjoyed record highs in terms of sponsorships , attendance  ,  and  टेलीविज़न  audiences .
The  एनएचएल   draws  many  अत्यधिक   skilled  players from  सब  over the world and  फिलहाल  has players from about 20 different  देशों   .
हालांकि  Canadians have historically constituted  the  majority of  the   खिलाड़ी  in the NHL ,  over  the past  चार  plus decades the  percentages   of  US and  यूरोपीय  players  have  increased both  क्युकी   of  the NHL 's continued expansion  इससे  six to thirty clubs since 1967 , and the increased availability of highly  skilled  European  खिलाड़ी  .
Maggots feeding on carrion .
A maggot is the  लार्वा  of a  मक्खी  ( order  diptera   )  ; it is applied in particular  to  the larvae of Brachyceran  उड़ता   ,  such as houseflies  ,  cheese flies , and  blowflies  , rather than  लार्वे  of  the  Nematocera ,  ऐसे  as  मच्छरों  and Crane flies .
`` Maggot '' is not a  तकनीकी  term and should  नहीं  be taken as such ; in many standard textbooks of  कीटविज्ञान   it  does not  appear   in  the index at all .
in   अनेक   non-technical   ग्रन्थ  the  पद  is used  लिये  insect larvae in  सामान्य   .
Other sources have coined their own definitions  ;  for example : `` ...
The term applies to a grub when all  ट्रेस  of limbs  रै  disappeared ... '' and  ``  ... Applied  to  the footless  लार्वे  of  dipters  . ''
maggot-like  fly  लार्वे  are of  चौड़ी  importance in  पारिस्थितिकी  and medicine ;  among  other roles , various species  हैं  prominent  in  recycling carrion  और  garbage , attacking  फसलों  and foodstuffs , spreading microbial infections  ,   और  causing myiasis .
Herod ( ,  hordos  , Greek : , Hērōdēs ) , also known  as   हेरोदेस  the Great  (   73/74  BCE – 4 BCE  in  Jericho  )   ,  was a Roman client king of Judea  .
His epithet of  ``  the Great  ''   is  widely disputed as he is  वर्णित  as  ``  a madman who murdered his  अपना  family and  a   ग्रेट  many rabbis `` .
He is  भी  known  लिये  his  colossal   भवन   प्रोजेक्ट  in Jerusalem and elsewhere  ,  including his expansion  of   the   दूसरी  Temple in Jerusalem ( sometimes referred to as Herod 's Temple ) and  the   निर्माण  of  the  port at Caesarea Maritima .
Important  विवरण  of his biography are gleaned  इससे  the  works  of the 1st  सदी   ce  Roman–Jewish historian Josephus  flavius  .
The Romans made  हेरोदेस  's son , Herod Archelaus , ethnarch of Judea ,  samaria   ,   और  Idumea ( biblical Edom ) from 4 BCE  to  6 CE , referred to  as  the tetrarchy of Judea .
archelaus  was judged incompetent by the  रोमन  emperor Augustus who then  संयुक्त  Samaria ,  judea  proper and Idumea into Iudaea province under rule of a prefect until age 41 .
हेरोदेस  's  अन्य  son Herod Antipas was tetrarch of Galilee from 4  bce–39  CE .
ABO blood group antigens present on red blood cells and IgM  antibodies   उपस्थित  in the serum
the  ABO blood group system is the most important  रक्त  type system  (  or  रक्त   समूह  system  )  in human  रक्त  transfusion .
The associated anti-A and  anti-b  antibodies are  प्रायः   igm  antibodies  ,  which  हैं   प्रायः  produced  in  the first years  of  life by  sensitization  to  पर्यावरणीय   substances  such as food ,  जीवाणु  , and viruses .
ABO blood  प्रकार   हैं  also  उपस्थित  in  कुछ  other animals , for example apes such as chimpanzees , bonobos  ,  and gorillas .
साल   1907  ( MCMVII  )  was a common year starting  on  Tuesday (  कड़ी  will display the full  पंचांग  ) of the Gregorian calendar and a common  साल  starting on  सोमवार  of the 13-day-slower  जूलियन  calendar .
Northville is  an  affluent  नगर  located in and divided by Oakland and  वेन  counties  in  the U.S. state of  मिशिगन  .
the  area  is  a  उपनगरीय  of Metropolitan Detroit  .
The population was 5,970  at  the 2010 census .
Most  of  the  नगर  is in Oakland  काउंटी  , and  is  surrounded  by  the city of  novi   .

northville   is   परोसा  by  northville   पब्लिक   स्कूलों   .
The city is  स्तिथ  northeast  of  Ann  arbor   और  northwest  of  Detroit .
Elaine Stritch ( born February 2  ,  1925 )  is  an  अमरीकी  actress  और  vocalist .
She  रै   appeared  in  numerous  stage plays and musicals , feature films , and many television programs .

Misfits is a British science  fiction   comedy-drama  television show about a  समूह  of young  अपराधियों  sentenced to work in a community service programme ,  जहाँ   वे   obtain  supernatural  शक्तियां  after a strange electrical storm .
