ब्रेट   lorenzo   favre  (  born   अक्तूबर   10  ,  1969  ) is a  पूर्व   अमरीकी   फ़ुटबॉल  quarterback who spent  the  majority of his career with the Green  खाड़ी  Packers of the  नेशनल  Football  लीग  (  एनएफएल   )   .
He was a 20-year veteran of the  एनएफएल  , having played quarterback for the Atlanta  falcons  ( 1991 ) , Green  खाड़ी  Packers  (  1992  –  2007 ) ,  नई  York Jets ( 2008 )  और  Minnesota Vikings  (   2009  –  2010  ) .
Favre is  the   तभी  quarterback in NFL  इतिहास  to throw for over 70,000 yards ,  over  500 touchdowns  ,   over   300   interceptions  , over 6,000 completions , and over 10,000 pass attempts .
Favre started at  the  quarterback position  लिये  the  विश्वविद्यालयों  of Southern  मिसिसिपी  for four years before  होने  selected  in  the  दूसरी  round of the 1991  एनएफएल  Draft by Atlanta ( 33rd overall ) .
He  थी   traded  to  ग्रीन  Bay on February  10  , 1992 ,  लिये  the 19th  चुनें  in the 1992 NFL  ड्राफ्ट  .
Favre became  the  Packers ' starting quarterback  in   the  fourth game  of   the  1992  ऋतु  , stepping  in  for  घायल  quarterback Don Majkowski ,  और  started every game through the 2007  ऋतु   .
He  थी   traded  to the New York Jets and started at  क्वार्टरबैक   लिये  the 2008  ऋतु   पहले  signing with the Vikings on  अगस्त  18 , 2009  as  their starting quarterback  .
He  बना  an NFL record 297  लगातार  starts ( 321 including  playoffs  ) .
he  is  the  only  खिलाड़ी  to  जीत  the  ap   सबसे  Valuable Player three consecutive times ( 1995–97 ) .
He has led teams  to  eight division championships ( 1995 , 1996 , 1997 , 2002 , 2003  ,  2004 ,  2007   ,   2009   )  ,  पाँच   nfc  Championship Games  (   1995   ,  1996 , 1997 , 2007 , 2009 )  ,  and two Super Bowl  दिखावे   (   सुपर   कटोरी  XXXI , Super  कटोरी  XXXII ) , winning one (  सुपर  Bowl XXXI ) .
He holds many NFL records  ,   सहित  most  करियर  touchdown passes , most  करियर  passing yards  ,  most  करियर  pass completions , most career  pass  attempts , most career interceptions  thrown  ,  सबसे  consecutive starts by a player , most consecutive starts  by  a quarterback  ,   सबसे   करियर  victories as  a   starting  quarterback , most sacked , and most  fumbles  .
he   is   भी  referred to  by  his nickname ``  the   gunslinger  ''  .
The following is a  सूची  of  notable   वायुयान  hijackings around the world .
the  World  चौड़ी   वेब   (   abbreviated  as WWW or  w3  , commonly known as  the  web ) , is a  प्रणाली  of interlinked  हाइपरटेक्स्ट   दस्तावेज़   पहुँचा  via  the  Internet  .
With  a  web browser ,  एक   can   दृश्य  web pages  कि  may  contain   टेक्स्ट  , images ,  वीडियो   ,  and other multimedia  ,  and navigate between  उन्हें  via hyperlinks .
Using concepts from  उसके  earlier  हाइपरटेक्स्ट   प्रणालियों  like ENQUIRE , British engineer , computer scientist and  at   कि   समय  employee  of  the CERN  ,  Sir Tim  berners-lee  ,  अभी  Director of the  संसार  Wide  वेब  Consortium (  w3c  ) ,  लिखा  a proposal in March 1989 for what would eventually become the  संसार  Wide  वेब   .
At  cern  ,  a  European  शोध  organisation near Geneva  straddling   the  border between France and Switzerland , Berners-Lee  और  Belgian computer  वैज्ञानिक  Robert Cailliau  प्रस्तावित  in 1990 to  उपयोग   हाइपरटेक्स्ट  `` to link  और  access information of  विभिन्न  kinds as a web of nodes  in  which the  उपयोक्ता   can  browse  at   होगा   ''   ,   और  they publicly  introduced  the project in December of the  वही  year .
Wayne  lyman  Morse ( October 20  ,   1900july  22 ,  1974  ) was a  राजनेता  and  attorney  from Oregon , United States  ,  known for his proclivity for  opposing   उसके  parties ' leadership , and  specifically  for his opposition to the Vietnam  युद्ध   on  constitutional grounds .
born  in Madison , Wisconsin  ,  and educated at the University of Wisconsin-Madison and  the  University of Minnesota Law  स्कूल  , Morse  स्थानांतरित   to  Oregon in 1930 and began  शिक्षण  at the University  of   ऑरेगॉन   स्कूल  of Law .
दौरान  World War II  he   थी  elected to the United States Senate as a  रिपब्लिकन  ; he became an Independent after Dwight D. Eisenhower  's  election to  the  presidency in  1952  .
जबकि  an independent  ,  he  नियत  a record for performing the  दूसरी   longest  one-person  filibuster  in the history  of  the Senate .
मोर्स  joined the Democratic Party  in  1955  ,  and was  reelected   twice   जबकि  a member of  कि   पार्टी  .
मोर्स  made a brief run for  the  Democratic Party  's  presidential nomination in 1960 .
A few years later , Morse  थी  one of only two Senators  जो   opposed   the   गल्फ   of  Tonkin  रेज़ोल्यूशन   ,  which authorized  the  president  to  take military action in Vietnam without a declaration of war  .
He  जारी  to  बोलो  out  विरूद्ध   the  war in the ensuing years , and  खोया  his  1968  bid  लिये  reelection to Bob Packwood ,  जो  criticized his strong  विपक्ष  to  the  war .
मोर्स  made two more  बोलियों   लिये   reelection  to  the  Senate  पहले   उसके   मौत  in  1974  .
In parliamentary procedure , a motion to table  रै  two different and contradictory  अर्थs:
in  the United  राज्य  , to table usually means the to  lay  [ the topic ]  on  the table or to  मूव  for  postponement  of consideration  ;  a proposal to suspend  विचार   of  a  स्थगित  motion  .
Much less  प्रायः  ,  it  means a motion to ``  put  on the table ''  :  a proposal  to  begin  विचार  (  or   reconsideration   )   ,   a  usage consistent with the  बाकी  of the English-speaking  संसार  .
In the rest  of  the English-speaking  संसार  such  as  the United  किंगडम  , to table  अर्थात्   to   मूव  to place [ the topic ]  upon   the   तालिका  ( or to move to  प्लेस  on the table )  :  a  प्रस्ताव  to begin consideration  (  or reconsideration ) of a proposal .
दोनो  the  अमरीकी  and the  अंग्रेजों  dialects have the sense  of  `` to  तालिका   ''  as to lay  [   the  topic  ]   on  the table or  to   कारण  [ the  टॉपिक   ]  to  झूठ   on   the   तालिका  .
The difference  is  the idea  of  what the table  is  for , that of a shelf  बंद   to  the side , or an active work bench .
The  अंग्रेजों  meaning  रै  the  भाव  of  the   तालिका  as being an active work bench ,  साथ   the  topic  होने  the center  of   ध्यान   ,  considered and  discussed  by all  जबतक  it can be  resolved  , at which point it is taken  बंद  the 'table '  .
The American sense is that  the  table is like that  of   a  shelf ,  अभिलेख  ,  or  long-term storage  यंत्र  , where  the  topic  रै  been disposed of by sending it to  the  'table '  और  leaving it there .
Toy Story 3 is  a  2010  अमरीकी  3D  कंप्यूटर  animated comedy-drama prison film , and the  तीसरा   किश्त  in the Toy Story series  .
It was produced by Pixar Animation Studios and distributed by Walt  डिज़्नी  Pictures .
निर्देशित  by  ली  Unkrich , the film  थी  released worldwide  इससे  June  through   अक्तूबर  in  डिज़्नी   डिजिटल   3-d  , RealD  ,  and IMAX 3D  .
खिलौना   स्टोरी  3  थी  also the first film to be  released  theatrically with Dolby  घेर   7.1   ध्वनि   .
the   पटकथा   थी  written by  माइकल  Arndt ,  जबकि   unkrich  wrote the  स्टोरी   साथ  with John Lasseter and Andrew Stanton  ,  respectively director and co-writer  of  the two first films  .
The plot  focuses   on  the  खिलौने  Woody , Buzz Lightyear , and their friends dealing with an uncertain future as their owner  ,   एंडी  ,  prepares   to  leave for college .
अभिनेताओं   tom   हैंक्स  ,  टिम  Allen , Joan  cusack   ,  Don Rickles  ,  Estelle Harris , John  ratzenberger  , Wallace Shawn , Jeff  pidgeon  , Jodi Benson , R. Lee Ermey  ,   जॉन  Morris ,  और  Laurie Metcalf  reprised   उनके  voice-over roles from the previous  films   .
Jim  varney   ,   जो  played Slinky Dog in the first  दो  films ,  और  Joe Ranft ,  जो  portrayed  lenny  and Wheezy  ,  both died before production began on  खिलौना  Story 3 .
The  भूमिका  of  slinky  Dog  थी   लिया  over by Blake Clark ( a friend of  varney  ) , while Ranft 's characters and  विभिन्न  others were written out  of  the story .
नई   वर्ण  include performances by  ned   beatty  , Timothy Dalton  ,  Kristen Schaal  ,   bonnie   हंट  ,  whoopi  Goldberg , Jeff Garlin ,  रिचर्ड   दयालु  , and Michael  कीटन   .
The  विशेषता  broke  shrek  the Thirds  रिकार्ड   as  the  biggest   खोलने  day North American gross for  an   एनिमेटेड   फिल्मी   unadjusted  for inflation , and a big opening  साथ  an  unadjusted   सकल   of  $ 110,307,189 .
It  is   भी  the highest-grossing opening  वीकेंड   लिये   a  Pixar film ,  as   खूब  as the  highest-grossing  opening  वीकेंड  for  a  film to have opened  in  the  माह   of  June  .
This is the highest-grossing film of 2010 ,  दोनो  in the  संयुक्त  States and Canada ,  और  worldwide  .
in  early August , it  became   पिक्चर्स   's  highest-grossing film at the North American box office (  surpassing  Finding Nemo  )   ,  and the  highest-grossing   एनिमेटेड   फिल्मी   of  all time  विश्वव्यापी   (  surpassing Shrek 2 ) ; later that month , Toy Story  3  became  the  first  कभी  animated  फिल्मी  in history to make over  $   1  billion  विश्वव्यापी  .
It is currently the  10th-highest-grossing  film  of   सब  time  .
Toy  स्टोरी  3  थी  nominated for five  अकादमी   पुरस्कार  , including Best Picture , Best  adapted   पटकथा  ,  और  Best Sound Editing .
it  was the third animated film ( after Beauty and the Beast and  up  ) to be nominated for Academy Award for Best Picture  .
It won the awards for Best Animated  विशेषता  and Best Original Song  .
John Levell  starks  (  born  August  10   ,  1965 )  is  an American  रिटायर्ड  professional basketball  शूटिंग  guard .
starks  was listed at 6'5  ''  and 190 pounds  दौरान  his NBA playing career .
Although he was not drafted in the 1988  एनबीए   ड्राफ्ट   बाद  attending four colleges  in  his native Oklahoma ,  सहित  Oklahoma State  विश्वविद्यालयों  , he gained fame  जबकि   playing  for  the   नई  York Knicks of the National Basketball Association in the 1990s  .
सुरक्षित  Digital  or   (  SD )  is  a non-volatile memory card format for  उपयोग  in  पोर्टेबल  devices , such as mobile phones  ,  digital  कैमरे  , GPS  नेविगेशन  devices  ,   और  tablet computers  .
The Secure  डिजिटल   मानक  is  कायम  by the SD Card Association (  sda  ) .
sd   technologies  have been implemented  in  more than  400  brands  आरपार   दर्जनों  of product categories and more than 8,000 models  .
The  सुरक्षित   डिजिटल   स्वरूप  includes four card  परिवारों  available in three different form factors  .
the   चार  families are  the   असली  Standard-Capacity (  sdsc   )  , the High-Capacity ( SDHC ) ,  the  eXtended-Capacity  (  SDXC  )   ,  and the SDIO , which combines  input/output  functions with data storage .
The  तीन   रूप  factors are the original  आकार   ,  the `` mini ''  आकार  ,  और   the  ``  सूक्ष्म  ''  आकार  ( see illustration ) .
वहीँ   हैं  many combinations of  रूप  factors and device  परिवारों  .
electrically   passive  adapters allow the use of a smaller card in a  मेजबान  device built to  थाम  a larger card .
Host devices that comply  साथ   नए  versions  of  the specification provide backward compatibility and accept  पुरानी  SD cards , but this  आलेख  explains several factors that can  prevent  the  उपयोग  of a  नए   sd   card:
a   नए  card  may  offer greater capacity than the  मेजबान  device can handle .
A  नए  card may use  a   संचिका  system  the  host device can  नहीं   navigate  .
Use of an  sdio  card requires  the  host device  be  designed for  the  input/output  कृत्यों  the card provides  .
The organization of the  कार्ड  was changed  starting  with the SDHC  परिवार   .
कुछ   विक्रेता  produced SDSC cards above  1  GB before the  sda  had standardized  a  method of doing so .
The  sda  uses several trademarked  लोगो  to enforce  अनुपालन  with its specifications and assure  उपयोक्ता  of compatibility .
Hugh John  mungo   ग्रान्ट   (   born  9 September 1960 )  is  a British  कर्ता   और   फिल्मी  producer  .
He has  प्राप्त  a  सुनहरी  Globe ,  a  BAFTA , and  an  Honorary  césar   .
His films have earned  अधिक  than US $  2.4  billion from 25  नाट्य  releases  विश्वव्यापी   .
Grant  हासिल   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  stardom  बाद  appearing in Richard Curtis  's  successful  चार  Weddings and a  अंत्येष्टि  ( 1994  )   .
he   प्रयुक्त  this breakthrough  भूमिका  as a frequent  cinematic  persona during the  1990s  ,  delivering  comic  प्रदर्शन   in   मुख्यधारा  films  जैसे  Mickey Blue Eyes ( 1999 )  और  Notting Hill  (   1999  ) .
By the  फेरे   of  the 21st century  ,  he  था   स्थापित   खुद  as  a  leading man  skilled  with a satirical comic talent .
ग्रान्ट  has expanded his oeuvre  साथ  critically  acclaimed  turns as a cad in  ब्रिजेट  Jones 's Diary  (  2001  )  , About  a  Boy ( 2002 ) , Love  दरअसल  ( 2003  )  , and American Dreamz (  2006  )  .
He later played against type with multiple  कैमियो  roles in the epic drama  फिल्मी  Cloud Atlas (  2012  ) .
Within the  फिल्मी  industry , Grant is  cited  as  an  anti-film star who  approaches  his  भूमिकाएँ  like a character  कर्ता   ,  and attempts to make  उसके  acting  appear  spontaneous .
Hallmarks of his comic  कौशल  include  a  nonchalant touch  of  irony / sarcasm and studied physical mannerisms  as  well as his precisely-timed dialogue delivery  और   फेशियल  expressions  .
The entertainment media 's  कवरेज  of  ग्रान्ट  's life  बंद  the big  स्क्रीन  has  प्रायः   निष्प्रभ  his work  as  a  thespian  .
He  रै  been vocal about  उसके  disrespect for the  व्यवसायिक   of  acting ,  और  in  उसके   तिरस्कार  towards the  संस्कृति  of  हस्ती   और   दुश्मनी  towards  the  media  .
In a career  spanning  30 years  ,  Grant  रै  repeatedly  claimed  that  एक्टिंग  is not  a  true  कॉलिंग   लकिन   बस  a job he  गिरी   into  .
The  हान  Dynasty (  ;  ) ( 206 BC  –  220 AD )  थी   an  imperial  राजवंश  of China  ,  preceded by the Qin Dynasty  (   221–207  BC ) and  succeeded   by  the Three Kingdoms (  220–280  AD )  .
It was founded by the rebel leader  लियू  Bang  ,  known posthumously  as  Emperor  gaozu  of Han .
it  was briefly  बाधित  by  the  Xin  राजवंश  ( 9–23 AD  )  of  the  former regent Wang Mang  .
This interregnum separates the Han into two  अवधि  : the Western Han ( 206  bc  – 9  ad  )  और   पूर्वी  Han  (   25–220   ad  )  .
Spanning  over   चार  centuries ,  the  period of the  हान   राजवंश  is  माना  a golden  आयु  in Chinese  इतिहास  .
to  this day  ,   चीन  's majority ethnic group refers to itself as the ``  हान  people '' and the Chinese script is  referred  to as `` Han characters  ``  .
The Han Empire was  विभाजित  into areas  सीधे  controlled  by  the  सेंट्रल  government  ,  known as commanderies ,  और  a number of semi-autonomous kingdoms .
These kingdoms gradually lost  सब  vestiges  of  their  स्वतंत्रता  , particularly following  the  Rebellion of the Seven  राज्य   .
The Xiongnu , a  nomadic  confederation  जिससे   वर्चस्व  the  पूर्वी  Eurasian Steppe , defeated the Han  फौज  in  बैटल  in 200 BC .
Following the defeat  ,  a  राजनैतिक  marriage alliance  थी   negotiated   in  which the  हान  became  the  de  facto  inferior partner .
When , despite the treaty  ,   the  Xiongnu continued to  रेड  Han borders , Emperor Wu of Han (  r.   141–87  BC ) launched several military  अभियान   विरूद्ध  them .
The ultimate Han victory  in   ये   युद्धों  eventually forced  the  Xiongnu to accept vassal status  as  Han tributaries  .
These campaigns expanded Han  प्रभुता  into the Tarim Basin of  सेंट्रल  Asia  और   helped  establish the vast trade network known as the  रेशा  Road  ,  which reached as far as  the  Mediterranean world  .
Han forces  प्रबंधित   to   divide  the Xiongnu  into  two competing  राष्ट्र  , the Southern  और   उत्तरी  Xiongnu , and  मजबूर  the Northern  xiongnu   आरपार  the Ili River .
Despite these  victories  , the territories north of Han  's   सीमायें   यहूद  quickly overrun by the nomadic  xianbei   कनफेडरेशन  .
After  92  AD ,  the  palace eunuchs increasingly  शामिल  themselves in court politics  ,  engaging in  हिंसक  power struggles between the various  consort  clans of the empresses  और   सम्राज्ञी  dowagers , causing  the  Han 's ultimate downfall  .
Imperial  प्राधिकार   थी  also seriously  challenged   by  large  daoist  religious  समाजों  which instigated the Yellow Turban Rebellion  और  the Five  pecks  of Rice  विद्रोह  .
Following  the  death of Emperor Ling ( r. 168–189 AD ) ,  the  palace  हिजड़े  suffered  होलसेल  massacre by military  अधिकारियों  , allowing members  of  the aristocracy  और  military governors to become warlords and divide the empire .
When Cao Pi , King of Wei , usurped the throne from  सम्राट  Xian , the Han Dynasty ceased  to  exist .
the  Han Dynasty  थी  an age  of  economic prosperity and saw a significant growth  of  the money  अर्थव्यवस्था   पहला  established  दौरान  the Zhou Dynasty  (  c.  1050–256  BC ) .
the   coinage   जारी  by the central government  मिंट  in 119 BC  remained   the  standard coinage of China  जबतक  the Tang Dynasty ( 618–907  ad  ) .
to  pay for its military campaigns and the  उपनिवेश  of  newly  conquered  frontier   territories  , the government nationalized the  निजी  salt and  आयरन  industries  in  117  bc  .
ये  government  monopolies   यहूद  repealed during  the  Eastern Han period , and the lost revenue was recouped  through  heavily taxing private  उद्यमियों   .
The emperor was at the pinnacle of  हान  society  .
he   presided  over  the  Han government but shared power with both the nobility and  नियुक्त  ministers who  आए  largely from the scholarly gentry  क्लास  .
From  the  reign of Emperor Wu onward , the Chinese court  officially  sponsored  confucianism  in  शिक्षा  and court  राजनीती  ,  synthesized   साथ   the  cosmology of  बाद  scholars  ऐसे  as Dong Zhongshu .
This policy endured until the fall of  the  Qing Dynasty in 1911 AD .
Science and technology during the Han period saw significant advances ,  सहित  papermaking , the  nautical   परिचालन   अरित्र  ,  the  use of negative numbers  in   गणित  , the raised-relief map , the  हाइड्रोलिक   -powered  armillary sphere for  खगोलशास्त्र   ,   और  a  भूकम्पमापी  employing an inverted pendulum .
tourette   सिंड्रोम   (  also called Tourette 's syndrome  ,  Tourette 's disorder , Gilles de la Tourette syndrome , GTS or  ,  more commonly , simply  tourette   's   or  TS )  is  an inherited  neuropsychiatric  disorder with onset in childhood , characterized  by   अनेक  physical  (   मोटर   )  tics  और   at  least one vocal ( phonic )  टिक   .
These tics characteristically  मोम   और  wane , can be suppressed  temporarily   ,   और   हैं  preceded by a premonitory urge  .
Tourette 's  is  defined as  भाग  of a  वर्णक्रम  of tic  विकार  , which  शामिल  transient and  दीर्घकालिक  tics .
Tourette 's  थी  once considered  a  rare and  विचित्र  syndrome  ,  most often associated with the exclamation of obscene words or socially  अनुचित  and derogatory remarks (  coprolalia  ) , but this symptom is present in only a small minority of  लोगों  with Tourette 's  .
tourette  's is no longer  माना  a rare condition , but it is  नहीं  always correctly  पहचाना   क्युकी   सबसे  cases are mild  और  the severity of  tics  decreases  लिये  most children  as   वे  pass  through   किशोरावस्था  .
Between 0.4 % and 3.8 %  of  children ages 5 to  18  may have Tourette  's   ;  the prevalence of transient and  दीर्घकालिक   tics  in school-age children is  उच्चतर   ,   साथ  the  अधिक  common tics  of  eye blinking , coughing  ,   गला  clearing , sniffing  ,  and facial movements .
चरम   tourette  's  in  adulthood is a  rarity   ,  and Tourette 's does not  adversely  affect intelligence or  जीवन  expectancy .
Genetic and  पर्यावरणीय  factors play a role in  the  etiology of Tourette 's , but  the  exact causes  हैं   अनजान  .
in  most cases , medication is unnecessary .
There  is  no effective treatment for every case of  tics  , but  निश्चित   medications  and therapies can  सहायता   जब   उनके   उपयोग   is   warranted   .
शिक्षा   is   an   महत्वपूर्ण   भाग   of  any treatment plan  ,  and  स्पष्टीकरण  and  reassurance  alone are often sufficient  उपचार   .
Comorbid conditions ( co-occurring  diagnoses  other than  tourette  's ) such as attention-deficit hyperactivity disorder  (   adhd  ) and obsessive–compulsive disorder ( OCD ) are  उपस्थित  in many patients seen in  tertiary   specialty   क्लिनिक   .
These other  शर्तें   प्रायः  cause more functional impairment  to  the  व्यक्तिगत  than the tics that  हैं   the   hallmark  of Tourette  's  , hence it  is  important to correctly identify comorbid conditions and treat them .
the  eponym was bestowed by  jean-martin  Charcot  (   1825–1893  ) on behalf  of   उसके   निवासी  , Georges Albert Édouard Brutus Gilles  de   la  Tourette (  1859–1904  )  ,  a French  चिकित्सक  and neurologist , who published an  खाता   of  nine patients with Tourette 's in  1885   .
Sunbeam  बैज  .
Sunbeam  थी   a  marque registered  by  John  marston  Co. Ltd  of   wolverhampton  , England , in 1888 .
The  कम्पनी  first made bicycles ,  तब  motorcycles and cars from the late 19th century until  परिचय  1936 , and applied  the  marque to  सब   तीन   फ़ॉर्म  of transportation .
The company also manufactured  एयरो  engines in the First World War and  647  aircraft  दौरान  the  दूसरी  World War  .
A Sunbeam  थी  the  पहला  British car to win  a  Grand Prix race , and  नियत  a  क्रमांक   of  land speed records  .
The  कम्पनी  went into  receivership  in 1935 and  थी  purchased by the Rootes Group ,  जिससे  continued to  उपयोग  the  सनबीम   marque  .
Fox  न्यूज   चैनल  ( FNC  )  , also known as Fox News  ,   is  a cable news channel owned by the  फॉक्स  Entertainment Group , a subsidiary of News Corporation .
As of April 2009 ,  the  channel was  उपलब्धियाँ  to 102  लाख  households in  the  United  राज्य   और  to viewers internationally  ,  broadcasting primarily from its New York studios  .
The channel  थी   निर्मित   by  Australian-American media mogul  रुपर्ट  Murdoch , who hired former  एनबीसी  executive Roger Ailes as its founding CEO  .
it   शुभारम्भ  on  अक्तूबर  7 , 1996 to 17 million  केबल  subscribers  .
It grew  दौरान  the  लेट  1990s  और   2000s   to  become  the  dominant  केबल  news  संजाल  in  the   संयुक्त  States .
Critics have  stated  that Fox News Channel promotes  रूढ़िवादी  political positions  और  biased  रिपोर्टिंग  .
Commentators , news anchors  ,  and reporters at Fox News Channel  have   responded  that news reporting and political commentary operate  independently  of each  अन्य  , and have denied any bias  in  news reporting .
The mandibular first molar  or  six-year molar is the tooth located distally ( away from the midline of  the   फेस  ) from both the mandibular  दूसरी  premolars  of   the  mouth but  mesial  (  toward  the midline  of  the face ) from  दोनो  mandibular  दूसरी  molars .
It is located on the mandibular (  निम्नतर  ) arch  of  the mouth ,  और  generally opposes the maxillary ( upper )  पहला  molars  और  the maxillary 2nd premolar  in  normal class I occlusion  .
the  function of this molar is  समान  to that of  सब  molars in regard to  पीस  being the  प्रिंसिपल  action during mastication , commonly known  as   चबाने   .
वहीँ  are usually five well-developed cusps on  mandibular  first molars  :   दो  on the  buccal  ( side  निकटतम  the cheek ) ,  दो  lingual  (  side nearest the tongue )  ,   और   एक  distal .
वहीँ  are great differences  between  the  पतझड़ी  ( baby ) mandibular molars and  those   of  the  स्थाई   mandibular   molars   ,   भी  though their  फलन  are similar .
The permanent mandibular  molars   हैं  not considered  to   have   कोई  teeth  कि   precede   it   .
Despite being  नामित   molars   ,  the deciduous molars  हैं   followed  by permanent premolars .
In the universal system  of  notation  ,   the   पतझड़ी  mandibular first molars are designated by  a  letter written  in  uppercase .
The right  पतझड़ी   mandibular  first molar  is   ज्ञात  as `` S '' ,  और  the left one  is  known as  ``   l   ''  .
The international notation has a different  प्रणाली  of  संकेतन   .
Thus , the right deciduous mandibular first molar is known as  ``  84  ''   ,  and  the  left one  is  known as  ``  74 ''  .
In the universal system of  संकेतन  ,  the   स्थाई  mandibular  पहला   molars  are designated by  a  number .
The right permanent mandibular  पहला  molar  is   ज्ञात  as ``  30  ''  ,  and the left one is  ज्ञात  as `` 19 '' .
The Palmer notation uses  a   क्रमांक  in conjunction with a symbol designating  in   जिससे   quadrant   the  tooth is found .
For this  दाँत  , the  बाएँ  and right first molars  होता  have the  वही   क्रमांक   ,  `` 6  ''  , but the right  एक   होता   have  the  प्रतीक  , `` ┐  ''  , over it , while  the  left one would  have  , ``  ┌  '' .
The international notation has a  अलग  numbering  प्रणाली   than   the  previous  दो   ,  and the right permanent mandibular first molar is known  as   ``  46 '' , and  the  left one is known as ``  36  '' .
Mandibular primary first  molars   प्रायः  have  चार   गूदा   horns  .
the   पहला  molar is  प्रायः  the  पहला   स्थाई  tooth  to  erupt and  रै   वयस्क   undertones  .
Anatomy : The mandibular first molar has  पाँच  cusps  :  the  mesiobuccal  ( MB ,  toward   midline  and cheek  )  ,  mesiolingual  ( ML , toward midline and tongue ) ,  distolingual   (  DL ,  दूर  from  midline  and towards tongue )  ,  distobuccal  (   db  ,  दूर  from  midline  and  toward  cheek ) , and distal (  d  ,  दूर   इससे  midline ) ,  सूचीबद्ध  in  अनुक्रम   of  decreasing size  .
सूचीबद्ध  in order of decreasing height they  हैं  : ML , DL , DF  ,  MF  ,   और   D.  An  आठवीं   cusp  was found in  a   प्राथमिक  second lower  molar  in an Argentinean child .
Viewed from the  शीर्ष   of  the tooth ( occlusal view  )   ,  the  mandibular   पहला   molar  is pentagonal ( five sided )  in  shape  और   tapers   toward  the  lingual  ,  साथ  the sides  होने   the  buccal surface  ,  the  mesial  surface  ,   the  lingual surface , distal surface  ,  and the distobuccal surface .
The occlusal surface has four grooves .
the  central  नाली   is   नहीं   सीधा   लकिन  runs  bas  the center of the  दाँत  mesially to distally and contains four pits ( mesial ,  सेंट्रल  ,  सेंट्रल  , and distal ) .
the   distobuccal  groove runs from the distal  गड्ढे  in the central groove  distobuccally   separating  the distal and  distobuccal  cusps .
the   lingual   नाली  runs  इससे   the  more distal of the central pits in  the   सेंट्रल  groove toward the  lingual  surface between the mesiolingual and  distolingual  cusps  .
The buccal groove  रनों  from the  अधिक  mesial of the  सेंट्रल   गड्ढों   in   the  central groove toward the buccal surface between the mesiobuccal and  distobuccal  cusps ending in the buccal pit .
The portion of the central groove between the central  गड्ढों  is  termed  the Lewis  ऑफसेट  and is mandatory  to  account for the  स्थितियाँ  of  the  buccal and  lingual   डोले  ( buccal groove being more  mesial  than the lingual groove while they  हैं  parallel )  .
From the buccal (  buccal  view  )  ,  दो   जड़ें  are present  .
The distal root is generally straighter , although  दोनो   प्रायः  have  a  slight distal curvature  .
The  हाइट्स  of contour on  the  mesial  और  distal  सम्पर्क  the adjacent teeth and are located at  the   जंक्शन   of  the occlusal  और   मध्य  thirds of the  क्राउन  .
The  फ्लोरिडा  Legislature  is  the two houses that act as the  राज्य  legislature of the U.S.  राज्य  of  फ्लोरिडा  .
the   फ्लोरिडा   संविधान  states  कि  `` The legislative power  of  the state  shall  be  vested  in a  विधानमंडल  of the  राज्य  of Florida , '' composed of  a  Senate and  हाउस  of Representatives .
The legislature is  seated  at the Florida  राज्य  Capitol in Tallahassee .
Stained glass depiction of Daniel  interceding  with  arioch  ,  the  king  's  guard .
Arioch  था  been charged with killing all the wise men  बाद   वे   यहूद   नहीं  able to interpret Nebuchadnezzar 's dream .
Daniel 2 is  the  second chapter of the  किताब  of  डेनियल  in the  यहूदी  Bible  .
The  अध्याय  's source  टेक्स्ट   is  predominantly written  in  Aramaic .
According to  the  text ,  nebuchadnezzar  is the  किंग  of  बाबुल  who  is  troubled by  उसके  dreams .
He  मांगे   an  interpretation for his  सपनो  or  होगा   have  his  रहस्यवादी   interpreters  executed .
डेनियल  seeks Divine  अक्ल  to interpret the king 's  सपनो  and praises God with a short psalm .
परमेश्वर  gives  डेनियल  a vision in  the   रात्रि  to  खुलासा  the king 's dream  .
समर्थ  to satisfy the king ,  डेनियल  is promoted over the whole province of Babylon .
One  comcast  Center , the  मुख्यालय   of  Comcast  in  Philadelphia , PA .
the  old  comcast  logo from  1969   to   1999  , when it  थी  replaced with the crescent  लोगो  .
The Comcast  निगम   is  an American provider of entertainment , information and communications products  और  services .
It is the  largest  cable operator  ,  one of the  biggest  mass media  ,   घर   अंतरजाल  service  प्रदाता  ,  और  third largest home telephone service  प्रदाता  in  the  United  राज्य  , providing cable  टेलीविज़न   ,  broadband Internet , telephone  सेवा  and  in  some areas home  सुरक्षा  (  सहित  burglar  सचेतक  , surveillance cameras , fire alarm  प्रणालियों  and home automation  )   to  both residential and commercial customers in 40 states and the  ज़िला   of   कोलंबिया  .
the   कम्पनी  is  headquartered  in  फिलाडेल्फिया   ,   पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
in   2011   ,  Comcast acquired a 51 % majority stake  in  media  संगुटिका  NBCUniversal  इससे   ge  in January 2011 , and began the process  of  purchasing  the  remaining  49  % on  फ़रवरी   12  ,  2013   ,  at  a  cost of $ 16.7 billion .
It completed  the  purchase on March  19   ,   2013  .
Comcast also has  significant  holding in several cable networks ( including E  !
entertainment   टेलीविज़न   ,   स्टाइल  Network  ,  G4  ,  the Golf Channel and NBC Sports Network  )   ,  distribution ( ThePlatform  )   ,  and  सम्बन्धित  businesses .
Comcast has been the subject of criticism for activities  सहित  its  stance  on  जाल  neutrality  ,  as well as poor results  on  customer  संतोष  surveys  .
Porcupines are rodents  साथ  a coat of sharp  कांटे  , or quills  ,  that defend and  camouflage   उन्हें   इससे   परभक्षी  .
वे  are  स्वदेशी   to   the  Americas , southern Asia , and Africa  .
Porcupines are the third largest of  the   rodents   ,  behind the capybara and the beaver .
Most porcupines are  परिचय   long  , with an long tail .
Weighing  ,  they are  rounded   ,  large and slow .
porcupines  come in  विभिन्न  shades  of   भूरा  , gray ,  और  the unusual white .
porcupines  ' spiny protection resembles that of the unrelated erinaceomorph hedgehogs  और  monotreme echidnas .
The common porcupine is a herbivore  .
It eats leaves , herbs , twigs and  ग्रीन  plants like skunk  गोभी  and  क्लोवर  and in the winter it  may  eat bark .
the   उत्तर  American porcupine often climbs trees to find food .
the  African  साही  is not a  climber  and forages on the  मैदान  .
It  is  mostly  nocturnal  ,  लकिन  will sometimes forage  लिये  food  in  the  दिन  .
Porcupines have become  a  pest  in  Kenya and  हैं  eaten as  a   कोमलता  .
The  नाम  porcupine comes from Middle  फ्रेंच  porc espin ( spined pig ) .
a   क्षेत्रीय  American name  लिये   the  animal is quill pig  .
First  पेज  of US  पेटेंट  129,843 for Improvement in Lubricators for Steam-Engines
इलियास  J.  मैककॉय   (   may  2  ,   1844  –  अक्तूबर  10 , 1929 ) was a black Canadian-American inventor  और  engineer , who was  notable   लिये  his 57 U.S. patents , most to do  साथ  lubrication of steam engines  .
born   फ़्री  in Canada  ,   he  returned as  a  five-year-old  चाइल्ड  with his family  to  the United  राज्य  in 1847 ,  जहाँ   he  lived  लिये   the   बाकी  of his  जीवन  and became a  us  citizen .
Honda FCX  स्पष्टता  , a hydrogen fuel cell demonstration vehicle introduced in 2008
A hydrogen vehicle is a vehicle  कि  uses hydrogen as its  onboard  fuel for motive  शक्ति  .
हाइड्रोजन  vehicles include hydrogen fueled space rockets ,  as  well as automobiles and other transportation  वाहनों   .
The power plants  of  such  वाहनों  convert the chemical energy  of  hydrogen  to  mechanical energy either by burning  हाइड्रोजन  in an internal combustion engine ,  or  by  reacting  hydrogen with  ऑक्सीजन   in   a  fuel cell to run electric  मोटर्स  .
Widespread  उपयोग  of hydrogen for fueling transportation is a key element of a proposed hydrogen  अर्थव्यवस्था  .
Hydrogen  ईंधन  does not occur naturally on Earth and  यूँ  is not  an  energy source  ;  rather  it  is an energy carrier .
It is most  अक्सर  made  इससे  methane or other fossil fuels  ,  but it can be produced  using   स्त्रोत  ( such as  हवा  , solar , or nuclear ) that are intermittent  ,  too diffuse or  too  cumbersome to  सीधे  propel vehicles .
एकीकृत  wind-to-hydrogen plants  ,   using  electrolysis of water , are exploring  technologies  to  उद्धार  costs low  पर्याप्त  , and quantities great enough ,  to   compete  with traditional energy  स्त्रोत  .
अनेक  companies are working to develop technologies  कि   might  efficiently  exploit  the potential  of  hydrogen  उर्जा   लिये  mobile  उपयोग   .
The attraction of using hydrogen  as  an  उर्जा  currency is that  ,  if hydrogen  is  prepared without using fossil  ईंधन  inputs , vehicle propulsion  होता  not contribute  to  carbon dioxide emissions  .
the  drawbacks  of  hydrogen  उपयोग  are high  पूंजी  cost , low energy content per unit volume ,  ऊँची   tankage  weights , very high  भंडार   पोत  pressures ,  the  storage  ,   परिवहन   और  filling of gaseous  or  liquid  हाइड्रोजन   in  vehicles , the large investment in infrastructure  कि   होता  be required to fuel  वाहनों   ,  and the  inefficiency  of production  प्रक्रियाओं   .
Sacramento  is  the  पूंजी  city of the U.S.  राज्य  of California and the  सीट   of  government of Sacramento  काउंटी   .
It is  स्तिथ  at the confluence  of  the Sacramento  नदी  and the American  नदी  in  the  northern portion  of   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  's expansive  सेंट्रल  Valley .
With  an  estimated 2011 population  of  477,891 , it is the sixth-largest city in California  और  the  35th  largest city in  the  United States .
Sacramento  is  the core cultural and economic center of  the  Sacramento  महानगर  area  जिससे   शामिल  seven counties with  an  estimated 2009  जनसांख्यिकी  of 2,527,123 .
Its  महानगर  area is the  चौथी  largest in California  बाद  the Greater Los  एंजिल्स  Area , San Francisco Bay Area , and the  सैन  Diego metropolitan area , as well  as  the 25th  largest  in the  संयुक्त   राज्य   .
Sacramento  थी  cited  by   समय  magazine  as  America 's most ethnically  और  racially integrated  नगर  in  2002  .
Sacramento became a  नगर  through  the  efforts of the Swiss  अप्रवासी  John Sutter  ,  Sr. , his son John Sutter  ,   jr.  , and James W.  मार्शल  .
Sacramento grew quickly thanks to the  सुरक्षा  of Sutter  's   फोर्ट  ,  जिससे   थी  established by Sutter in  1839   .
During the California Gold  फटाफट  , Sacramento was a major distribution point , a commercial and agricultural center , and a  टर्मिनस  for wagon trains , stagecoaches , riverboats  ,  the telegraph , the Pony Express  ,  and the First Transcontinental Railroad  .
California  राज्य  University ,  sacramento  , more commonly  ज्ञात   as  Sacramento State or Sac  राज्य  ,  is   the   largest  local  विश्वविद्यालयों  .
it  is one of  the   twenty-three   campuses  of  the   कैलिफ़ोर्निया   राज्य  University system .
Drexel University  sacramento  is located in  शहर  , Sacramento .
University of the  प्रशांत  's McGeorge School of  विधि   is  located in the Oak Park neighborhood .
In addition , the University of California  ,   डेविस   is   स्तिथ  in nearby Davis , west of the capital .
The  uc  Davis  चिकित्सा  Center ,  a  world-renowned research  हॉस्पिटल  , is located  in  the city of  sacramento  .
the  Apple Store  is  a chain  of  retail stores  स्वामित्व  and operated by Apple Inc. , dealing in computers and  उपभोक्ता  electronics  .
The stores sell Macintosh personal  कंप्यूटर   ,   तन्त्र  , iPods  ,  iPads , iPhones  ,   third-party  accessories  ,  and  अन्य   उपभोक्ता  electronics such as  ठहराना  TV .
कुछ   ऊँची  profile stores feature  a  Theatre  लिये   प्रस्तुतियों   और  workshops  और  a  स्टुडियो   लिये   प्रशिक्षण  with  ठहराना   उत्पाद  ;  सब  stores offer a  प्रतिभाशाली   बार   लिये  technical support and repairs  ,  as  खूब  as  फ़्री  workshops available  to  the public  .
Under the  नेतृत्व   of  Ron  जॉनसन  , the  पूर्व  Senior Vice President of Retail Operations , the Apple Stores have , according  to  an article  in  the New  यॉर्क  Times , been responsible  लिये   ``  [ turning ]  the  boring computer sales floor into a sleek playroom filled with  गैजेट  ''  .
,  Apple has  405  stores worldwide , with global sales  of   अरब  in merchandise in  2011   ,   और   वे  lead the United  राज्य  retail market in terms of sales  प्रति   ईकाई  area .
Steven Paul  ``  Steve '' Jobs (  ;  February  24   ,  1955  –   अक्तूबर  5  ,  2011 ) was an American entrepreneur and inventor , best known as the co-founder  ,  chairman ,  और  CEO of  ठहराना  Inc .
through  Apple  ,  he was  widely  recognized  as  a  charismatic   पायोनियर   of  the  निजी  computer revolution and for his influential career  in  the  कंप्यूटर  and  उपभोक्ता  electronics  फ़ील्ड   ,   transforming   ``  one industry after another  ,  from  कंप्यूटर  and smartphones  to  music and  फिल्मों  ...  ''
Jobs also co-founded  और  served  as  chief executive  of  Pixar Animation Studios ; he became  a  member of the  फलक   of  directors of The Walt  डिज़्नी  Company in 2006 , when Disney acquired  पिक्चर्स   .
Jobs was among the first  to   देखिए  the commercial potential  of  Xerox PARC 's mouse -driven  आलेखीय  user interface , which led to  the  creation  of  the Apple Lisa  और  , one year later , the  मैकिंटोश  .
He also played  a  role in  introducing  the  laserwriter  , one of the  पहला   widely  available laser  मुद्रक  , to the market  .
After  a  power struggle  साथ  the board of directors in 1985  ,  Jobs left Apple and  संस्थापित  NeXT , a  कंप्यूटर  platform  विकास  company specializing in the higher-education and business markets  .
in  1986 , he  acquired   the  computer  ग्राफिक्स  division of Lucasfilm  ,  which  थी  spun off as  पिक्चर्स   .
He  थी  credited in Toy Story  (   1995  )  as  an executive producer .
He served  as  CEO and  बहुमत   shareholder  until  डिज़्नी  's purchase of Pixar  in   2006  .
In 1996  ,  after  ठहराना  had failed to  उद्धार   इसके  operating  प्रणाली   ,  Copland , Gil Amelio turned to  अगला  Computer  ,   और   the  NeXTSTEP platform became  the  foundation  लिये  the Mac OS X .
Jobs returned to Apple as an advisor , and  took   कंट्रोल  of  the  company as an interim CEO  .
Jobs  brought  Apple from  निकट  bankruptcy to profitability by 1998 .
As the new CEO of the  कम्पनी   ,   कार्य  oversaw the development of the iMac  ,   itunes  , iPod , iPhone , and iPad , and on the services side  ,   the   कम्पनी   's   ठहराना  Retail Stores ,  itunes  Store  और  the App Store  .
The success of these products and services  provided  several  सालो  of stable financial returns , and  propelled  Apple to  become  the world 's most  मूल्यवान  publicly  traded  company in 2011 .
the  reinvigoration of  the  company is regarded by many commentators as one of the greatest turnarounds in business history  .
in  2003  ,  Jobs was diagnosed  साथ  a pancreas  neuroendocrine  tumor .
हालांकि  it was initially  treated  , he  reported  a hormone  असंतुलन   ,   underwent   a   जिगर   प्रत्यारोपण  in 2009  ,  and appeared progressively  thinner  as his  स्वास्थ्य  declined .
On medical leave for most of 2011 , Jobs resigned in August that  साल  , and was elected  अध्यक्ष  of the Board .
He died  of  respiratory arrest  सम्बन्धित  to his metastatic  ट्यूमर  on October 5 , 2011  .
Jobs  प्राप्त  a  क्रमांक  of honors and public  मान्यता   लिये  his  influence   in   the  technology and music  उद्योग  .
He  रै   महरूम  referred to as `` legendary  ''  ,  a  `` futurist '' or simply  ``  visionary '' ,  और   रै  been described as the `` Father of the  डिजिटल  Revolution '' , a  ``   निपुण   of   नवीनता  '' ,  और   a  ``  डिज़ाइन   perfectionist  ''  .

Roman numerals  ,  the  न्यूमेरिक  system in  प्राचीन  Rome  ,   उपयोग  combinations  of  letters from the  लैटिन   वर्णमाला  to  signify  values .
The numbers 1 to 10 can  be  expressed in Roman  numerals  as  follows:
and .
the  Roman numeral system is a cousin of Etruscan  numerals  .
Use  of  Roman numerals  जारी  after the decline of the Roman Empire .
इससे  the  14th   सदी  on ,  रोमन   numerals  began to be replaced in most contexts by more  सुविधाजनक  Hindu-Arabic numerals ;  however  this process was  क्रमिक  , and  the  use of  रोमन  numerals  in  some  नाबालिग  applications continues to this day  .
Effective  नाभिकीय  Charge  आरेख
The effective nuclear  चार्ज  (  प्रायः  symbolize as or Z* ) is the net positive  चार्ज  experienced  by  an electron  in  a multi-electron  अणु  .
the   पद   ``  effective '' is used because  the  shielding  प्रभाव  of negatively charged  electrons  prevents  उच्चतर  orbital electrons from experiencing the full nuclear  चार्ज  by the repelling effect  of  inner-layer  electrons  .
The effective nuclear charge experienced by the outer  शेल  electron  is  also called  the  core  चार्ज   .
It is possible  to   determine   the  strength of the nuclear charge by looking at the oxidation number of  the   अणु  .
इस  is  a  list  of  episodes from the  डिस्कवरी   चैनल  series  ,   तूफ़ान   chasers  .
a   ग्रामीण   खींचें  of I-5  ,  with two lanes in  प्रत्येक   दिशा   अलग   by  a  विशाल  grassy median  ,  and with cross-traffic limited to  overpasses  and underpasses
The  ड्वाइट  D. Eisenhower  नेशनल  System of Interstate and  रक्षा  Highways ( commonly known  as  the Interstate  राजमार्ग   प्रणाली  , Interstate  फ्रीवे   प्रणाली   ,  Interstate System  ,  or  बस  the Interstate )  is  a network of freeways  कि  forms a  भाग   of   the   नेशनल  Highway System of the United States .
The system is named  लिये  President  ड्वाइट  D. Eisenhower  ,  who  championed   इसके  formation .
Construction was authorized by the Federal  सहायता  Highway  अधिनियम  of  1956  ,  और  the original portion was completed 35 years later .
The network has since  महरूम  extended ,  और  , it  था  a total length of ,  बनाना  it  the  world 's  दूसरी   longest  after  चीन  's . ,  परिचय  one-quarter of  सब  vehicle miles driven in the  देश   उपयोग  the  अंतरराज्यीय   प्रणाली   .
The cost of construction  रै  been  अनुमानित  at $  425  billion ( in 2006 dollars  )   ,  making  it   the  `` largest public  works  program since the Pyramids `` .
The system has contributed in shaping  the  United  राज्य  into  a   संसार  economic superpower and a highly  industrialized  nation .
.eu  is the  देश  code top-level domain ( ccTLD  )  for the European  संघ  (  eu  )  .
Launched on 7 December  2005   ,  the domain is  उपलब्धियाँ   लिये   संगठनों  in  और   निवासियों   of   eu  member  राज्य  .
The TLD  is  administered  by  EURid ,  a  consortium originally consisting  of  the national ccTLD  रजिस्ट्री   ऑपरेटर  of Belgium , Sweden , and Italy  ,  joined later  by   the   नेशनल  registry operator of the  चेक  Republic .
Trademark  स्वामी  were able to submit registrations through  a  sunrise period ,  in  an effort  to  prevent cybersquatting .
पूरा  registration started on  7  April 2006  .
meister  means master in German ( as  in   निपुण   craftsman  , or as an honorific  शीर्षक  such  as  Meister Eckhart ) .
The word  is  akin to  maestro  .
In sports , Meister  is  used for the  वर्तमान  national , European or  संसार  champion ( Deutscher Meister  ,  *Europameister , Weltmeister ) .
Many modern day German police forces  उपयोग  the title  meister  .
During the Second  संसार  War ,  meister   थी  the  उच्चतम   आयोजिक  rank of the Ordnungspolizei  .
Meister  रै  been  उधार  into English slang , where it  is   प्रयुक्त  in compound  nouns   .
A person referred  to   as   “meister”  is one who has extensive theoretical knowledge and practical skills in his profession  ,  business , or some other kind of  कार्य  or activity  .
For example  ,  a  “puzzle-meister”  would be someone highly  skilled  at solving puzzles .
ये  neologisms  sometimes  have a  व्यंग्यात्मक  intent  (  for example , “stubble-meister” for someone with a short , neat beard  or  “crier-meister”  लिये   किसी  who  प्रायः   cries  ) .
mighty  Morphin Power Rangers is  an  American live-action  children  's television series about teenagers with  super-powers   ,  based on the 16th installment of  the  Japanese Super Sentai franchise ,  kyōryū  Sentai  zyuranger  .
Both  the  show and  इसके   सम्बन्धित  merchandise saw unbridled  overnight  success ,  बनने   a  staple of 1990s pop culture in mere  महीने  .
अंतर्गत  the  असली  name , `` Mighty Morphin  शक्ति  Rangers  ''   the   श्रेणी  ran from 1993 to  1995   और  spawned the feature film  mighty   morphin  Power Rangers : The  फिल्म   .
the  second and  तीसरा  seasons of the show  खींचा  on footage and  तत्व   इससे   the   सुपर  Sentai series Gosei Sentai Dairanger and  निंजा   sentai   kakuranger  respectively , though  the  Zyuranger costumes  यहूद   स्टिल  used for the  पाँच  main Rangers and several  नियमित   खलनायक   .
Only the mecha  और  the  kiba  Ranger costume ( worn by the  श्वेत  Ranger ) were  retained  from Dairanger  लिये   the  second  ऋतु  , while  तभी   the   mecha  from Kakuranger were  प्रदर्शित  in  the  third  ऋतु  .
However the Kakuranger costumes  यहूद  later used for the  शीर्षक   वर्ण   of  the mini-series , Mighty Morphin  एलियन  Rangers .
The series was produced by MMPR Productions , distributed  by  Saban Entertainment ,  और  aired on Fox Kids .
The  दिखाएँ  's merchandise was  उत्पादित  and distributed by Bandai Entertainment .
In  1996  , the  श्रेणी  was  rebranded   as  the Power Rangers franchise ;  renaming  the series every year  बाद  , and using costumes , props , and footage from  subsequent  Super Sentai  श्रेणी  , as  खूब  as  बदलना  the cast and  कथानक  .
जबकि   an  overarching storyline would continue until Power Rangers  खोया  Galaxy , subsequent series after MMPR  हैं   नहीं   सिक्वेल  or spin-offs in the  परंपरागत   भाव  .
In 2010 ,  a  re-version of  mighty   morphin   शक्ति   रेंजरों   ,  with a new  लोगो   ,  comic book-referenced  ग्राफिक्स   ,   और  extra  वैकल्पिक  special effects , was broadcast on  एबीसी  Kids ,  और   बंदाई  produced brand new toys to  coincide   साथ  the series  .
Edgar Allan  पो  ( born  एडगर  Poe ; January  19  , 1809 – October  7  , 1849 ) was an  अमरीकी  author , poet ,  एडिटर  and  साहित्यिक  critic , considered  भाग   of  the American Romantic Movement .
Best known  लिये  his tales of  रहस्य   और  the  घोर  ,  पो  was one of the  earliest  American practitioners of the  छोटी  story and is generally considered the inventor of the  जासूस  fiction  विधा  .
he   is  further  credited  with contributing to the  उभरते  genre of science fiction  .
He was the first well-known American  लेखक   to  try to earn a  जीना   through  writing alone  ,   resulting  in a financially difficult life and  करियर  .
He  थी  born as Edgar Poe in  बोस्टन  , Massachusetts ;  he  was orphaned young when  उसके  mother died shortly after  उसके   पिता  abandoned the family  .
Poe  थी   लिया  in by John and Frances Allan , of  रिचमंड   ,  Virginia ,  लकिन  they never  formally  adopted him .
He attended  the  University of Virginia  लिये  one semester but  बाएँ   due  to lack of money .
After enlisting in the  फौज   और  later failing as an officer  's  cadet  at   वेस्ट  Point ,  पो  parted ways with  the  Allans .
His publishing  करियर  began humbly  ,  with an anonymous collection of  कविताएं  ,  tamerlane   और   अन्य   कविताएं  (  1827   )   ,  credited  तभी  to ``  a   bostonian  '' .
Poe switched his  फ़ोकस  to prose  और   खर्च  the next several years  working  for literary journals and periodicals ,  बनने   ज्ञात   लिये  his  अपना   स्टाइल  of literary criticism .
His work forced him to  मूव  among several cities , including Baltimore , Philadelphia  ,  and New  यॉर्क   नगर  .
In Baltimore in 1835 ,  he  married Virginia Clemm , his 13-year-old cousin  .
In January 1845 Poe published his  कविता  , `` The Raven `` ,  to  instant  कामयाबी  .
उसके   बीवी   died  of tuberculosis  दो  years  बाद   इसके  publication  .
He began planning to produce  उसके  own journal , The  penn  ( later renamed The  स्टाइलस   )  ,  हालांकि   he  died before  it  could be produced  .
On October  7   ,  1849 , at age 40  ,   पो   died  in Baltimore  ;  the  कारण  of  उसके  death is unknown  और  has  महरूम   variously  attributed  to  alcohol , brain congestion  ,  cholera  ,  drugs  ,  heart disease , rabies , suicide ,  तपेदिक  ,  और  other  एजेंटों  .
Poe and  उसके   works   बहकावे  literature in  the  United  राज्य  and around the world , as well as in  specialized   फ़ील्ड  , such  as   cosmology  and cryptography  .
पो  and his work appear throughout popular culture in  साहित्य   ,  music , films , and television  .
A number of his homes are dedicated museums today .
The Mystery Writers of America present  an  annual award known as the Edgar  पुरस्कार  for distinguished work in  the   रहस्य  genre .
Lions are obligate carnivores ; they require  up   to  seven kilograms ( 15  पाउंड   )  of  मांस  per  दिन  .
a   प्रमुख  component  of   उनके  diet  is   the  flesh  of  large mammals ,  जैसे  this African  भैंस  .
A carnivore ( ) meaning 'meat eater '  (   लैटिन  , caro meaning  'meat  '  or  'flesh ' and  vorare  meaning 'to devour  '  ) is an organism  कि  derives  इसके  energy and nutrient  आवश्यकताएँ   इससे  a  आहार  consisting mainly or exclusively of  एनिमल  tissue  ,   whether  through  predation  or scavenging .
पशु  that depend  solely   on   एनिमल  flesh for  उनके  nutrient requirements  हैं  considered carnivores while  those  that also consume non-animal food  हैं   माना  carnivores .
Omnivores also consume  दोनो  animal and  non-animal  food ,  और  apart  इससे  the more  सामान्य   परिभाषा  ,  वहीँ   is  no  clearly   पारिभाषित  ratio  of  plant to animal material that  होता  distinguish a facultative  carnivore  from an omnivore .
A carnivore that  sits  at  the  top of the  foodchain  is an apex  परभक्षी  .
Plants that capture  और  digest insects are called carnivorous  पौधे  .
Similarly ,  fungi   कि  capture  microscopic  animals  हैं  often called carnivorous fungi .
The FIFA World  कप  ,  प्रायः   बस  the World  कप  , is  an   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  association football competition contested by the  वरिष्ठ   मेन  's national teams  of  the members of Fédération  internationale  de  फ़ुटबॉल  Association  (  FIFA ) , the sport 's global  शासी  body  .
The championship has  महरूम  awarded every  चार  years  चूंकि  the  inaugural   टूर्नामेंट  in 1930  ,   मगर   in   1942  and 1946 when  it  was  नहीं  held because of the  दूसरी  World War .
The current champions are  स्पेन  ,  जो   जीती  the  2010  tournament .
The current format of  the  tournament  involves   32  teams  स्पर्धा  for the title  at  venues within  the  host  स्वदेश   (  s ) over  a  period  of  about a  माह   ;  this phase  is   प्रायः  called the World Cup Finals  .
A qualification phase ,  जिससे  currently takes place over the  preceding   तीन   सालो  ,  is  used to determine which  टीमों   qualify  for the  टूर्नामेंट  together with the host nation  (   s   )   .
the   19   संसार  Cup tournaments have been won by eight different  नेशनल   टीमों  .
Brazil have won five times ,  और   वे   हैं  the only team  to   have   निभाई  in  प्रत्येक   टूर्नामेंट  .
The other World Cup winners are Italy  ,   साथ   चार  titles ;  जर्मनी   ,  with  तीन  titles ; Argentina and inaugural winners Uruguay , with  दो  titles each ;  और  England , France , and Spain  ,  with one  शीर्षक  each  .
the  World Cup is  the  world  's  most widely viewed sporting event  ;  an estimated 715.1 million  लोगों   देखी  the  फाइनल   मैच  of the 2006 FIFA World Cup held in Germany .
The next  तीन   संसार  Cups  होगा  be hosted by Brazil in 2014 , Russia  in  2018 ,  और  Qatar in 2022 .
Heroes is an American science fiction television drama  श्रेणी   निर्मित  by Tim Kring that appeared on NBC  लिये  four seasons from September  25  ,  2006  through  फ़रवरी   8  , 2010 .
The series  tells  the stories of  ordinary  people who discover  superhuman  abilities , and how  ये  abilities take  प्रभाव   in  the characters ' lives .
The series emulates  the   aesthetic  style and storytelling  of  American comic books , using multi-episode story arcs that build  upon   a  larger  ,  more  encompassing  arc .
The series was  उत्पादित  by  tailwind   प्रोडक्शन्स  in association with  सार्वभौमिक  Media Studios .
It  थी   फिल्माया   primarily  in Los Angeles , California .
Four  पूरा  seasons  aired  , ending  on  February 8 , 2010 .
The critically acclaimed first season had a  चलाएं  of  23  episodes  और  garnered  an   औसत   of  14.3  लाख  viewers in the  संयुक्त  States  ,   receiving  the highest rating for an  एनबीसी   नाटक   प्रीमियर  in five years  .
the  second season of Heroes  आकर्षित  an  औसत  of  13.1  million viewers in the U.S. , and marked NBC 's sole series among the top 20  क्रमित  programs  in  total viewership  लिये  the 2007–2008  ऋतु  .
Heroes  रै   अर्जित  a number of awards and  nominations  , including Primetime  एमी   पुरस्कार  , Golden  ग्लोब्स  ,  लोगों   's   चुनाव  Awards  और   अंग्रेजों  Academy Television Awards  .
An  ऑनलाइन  extension  of  the  श्रेणी  , Heroes 360 Experience , later rebranded as  नायक   evolutions  , was created to explore the Heroes universe and provides insight  into  the show 's mythology  .
Other official  नायक   मीडिया  include magazines , action figures  ,  tie-in  और  interactive websites  ,   a  mobile game ,  a  novel , clothing  और  other  merchandise  .
in   the   पतन  of  2008   ,  NBC  डिजिटल   entertainment   released  a series of  ऑनलाइन  content for the summer  ,  including more original web  सामग्री  , wireless iTV interactivity ,  ग्राफिक  novels available  लिये  mobile viewing and webisodes .
NBC  घोषित   नायक   रद्दीकरण   on  May 14 , 2010 .
Afterward  ,  the network considered making a television  खास   इवेंट  to conclude  the  series ; however , on  सितंबर  9  ,   2010   ,  NBC announced the decision  to  stop any further development  of  the  नायक   मताधिकार  .
टिम  Kring then  सुझाया  that the broad premise of Heroes storylines allowed for the franchise to  वापसी  for fans ,  लकिन  he did  नहीं  specify when or  in  what  मीडिया   स्वरूप  .
On April  17   ,  2013 ,  tv  Line reported  कि   एमएसएन  was in  बाते   to   revive   the   श्रेणी  with a  नई   डाल   .
John Pierpont ``  J.  P . ''
Morgan ( April  17  ,  1837  – March  31  , 1913 ) was an American financier , banker  ,  philanthropist and  आर्ट   कलेक्टर  who  वर्चस्व  corporate finance and industrial consolidation  दौरान  his time  .
in  1892 Morgan arranged the  विलय  of Edison General  इलेक्ट्रिक  and  thomson-houston  Electric Company to form General Electric .
After  financing  the  सृष्टि   of  the Federal Steel  कम्पनी   ,   he   मिलाया   in   1901  with the Carnegie Steel Company  और  several other  स्टील  and iron businesses  ,   सहित   संचित  Steel and  तार  Company owned by William Edenborn , to form the United States Steel Corporation .
Morgan died in  रोम   ,   इटली   ,   in   उसके  sleep in  1913  at the age  of  75 , leaving his fortune  और   कारोबार  to his son , John  pierpont   ``  Jack '' Morgan  ,  Jr. , and  bequeathing  his mansion and large book collections to The  मॉर्गन   पुस्तकालयों  &  संग्रहालय   in  New York .
at  the  ऊँचाई   of  Morgan 's  करियर  during the early 1900s  ,  he and  उसके  partners had  वित्तीय  investments  in  many large corporations  और  were accused by critics of controlling the nation 's high  वित्त  .
He directed the banking  गठबन्धन  that stopped the Panic  of  1907 .
He was the leading  फाइनेंसर  of  the  Progressive Era  ,  and his dedication to efficiency and modernization helped  रूपांतरण  American business .
This  is   a  list of episodes of the  टेलीविज़न   श्रेणी   .
The episodes  यहूद  directed by Shigeru Ueda  और  produced by  the  Yggdrasil Executive Committee which  शामिल   xebec  and Genco .
The plot  of   the  episodes is  नियत   in  Tokyo and revolves  around  Rin  asōgi  ,  an  immortal private investigator , as she explores the secrets  of  modern  और  near-future world and the supernatural events that surround the fictional society  of  immortals  जैसे  herself .
There  हैं  large  समय  gaps in the  आतंरिक   कालक्रम   between  the first five episodes ,  ranging   इससे  one to thirty years  .
The six episodes  यहूद  broadcast  मासिक   on  AT-X  चैनल  in Japan ,  between  February 3  और  July  6  , 2008 .
प्रत्येक  episode is  45   मिनट्स  long .
Two pieces  of  theme  म्यूज़िक  are  प्रयुक्त   लिये  the episodes  :  the  खोलने   थीम  ``  alsatia   ''  and the  समाप्ति  theme ``  कारण  Disarray '' .
Both were composed and performed by the Japanese  मेटल   बैंड  Galneryus .
The series  थी  produced to  commemorate  the tenth  वर्षगांठ  of the  at-x  network it originally  aired  on .
aerial  photo of FLETC ,  जहाँ  US digital forensics standards were developed  in  the  1980s  and  '90s
डिजिटल   forensics  ( sometimes  ज्ञात  as  डिजिटल   forensic   विज्ञान  )  is  a branch of forensic  विज्ञान  encompassing  the  recovery  और  investigation of material  मिला   in   डिजिटल  devices , often in  संबंध   to   कंप्यूटर  crime .
The term digital  forensics  was  originally  used as a  पर्याय  for computer forensics but has expanded to cover  छानबीन  of all devices capable of storing digital  आंकड़ा  .
साथ   जड़ें   in  the  निजी   कम्प्यूटिंग  revolution of the late 1970s and early '80s , the discipline evolved  in  a  haphazard   manner  during the 1990s , and it was not  जबतक  the early 21st  सदी  that  नेशनल  policies  उभरा  .
Digital  forensics  investigations  have  a  किस्में  of applications  .
The  सबसे  common is to support or refute  a  hypothesis before criminal  or   सिविल  (  as  part of the electronic discovery process ) courts .
forensics  may also  विशेषता  in the  निजी  sector ; such as  दौरान  internal  कॉरपोरेट  investigations  or  intrusion investigation ( a specialist probe into the nature and extent of an unauthorized network intrusion ) .
the  technical  पहलू  of an investigation  is   विभाजित  into several  sub-branches   ,  relating to the  प्रकार  of digital devices  शामिल  ; computer forensics  ,  network  forensics  , forensic data analysis and  मोबाईल  device forensics  .
The  ठेठ   forensic  process encompasses  the  seizure , forensic imaging ( acquisition )  और  analysis of digital media and the production of a report into collected  प्रमाण  .
as   खूब  as identifying direct evidence of a  अपराधों   ,  digital forensics can be used  to  attribute evidence to specific  संदिग्धों  , confirm  alibis  or statements , determine intent  ,  identify sources ( for example , in  कापीराइट  cases ) , or  authenticate   दस्तावेज़   .
Investigations are  much  broader in  पैमाना  than other areas of forensic analysis  (  where the usual aim is to provide  जवाब  to a  श्रेणी   of  simpler questions ) often  involving  complex time-lines or hypotheses .
a  comparison of the  chromaticities   enclosed   by   कुछ  color spaces .
A color model is an abstract mathematical model describing the way colors can be represented  as  tuples  of  numbers , typically  as   तीन   or  four  मान  or color components (  e.g   .   आरजीबी   और  CMYK are  रंग   मॉडल  ) .
however  ,  a  color model  साथ   no  associated  मानचित्रण  function to  an  absolute color space is  a   अधिक  or  कम   मनमानी   रंग  system  साथ   no  connection to  कोई   globally  understood system of color interpretation .
Adding  a  certain mapping function between the color  मॉडल   और  a  निश्चित  reference color space  परिणाम  in  a   definite   ``  footprint ''  भीतर  the reference color  स्पेस  .
इस  ``  पदचिह्न  '' is  ज्ञात  as a gamut ,  और  , in combination with  the  color model  ,  defines a new color space  .
For  उदाहरण  , Adobe RGB and sRGB are two different  निरपेक्ष  color spaces , both based on the RGB model  .
In the most generic  भाव  of  the  definition above , color  स्पेसेस  can be defined without  the  use of a color model .
These  स्पेसेस  ,  ऐसे  as Pantone ,  हैं  in effect a given set of  names  or numbers which are  पारिभाषित   by  the existence of  a  corresponding set of physical  रंग  swatches .
इस   आलेख  focuses  on  the mathematical  मॉडल  concept .
Labor  दिन  is an American federal holiday observed on the  पहला  Monday in September  ,  that celebrates the  आर्थिक  and social contributions  of  workers .
Life insurance is a  अनुबंध   between  an  insured   (  insurance policy holder )  और  an insurer , where the insurer promises to pay a designated beneficiary a sum  of   धन  ( the `` benefits '' ) upon  the  death  of  the insured person  .
depending  on the  अनुबंध   ,  other events such as terminal  बीमारी  or  नाजुक  illness  may  also trigger payment .
The policy holder  typically  pays a premium , either  regularly   or  as a lump  योग   .
Other expenses ( such as funeral  खर्च   )  are also sometimes included in the  लाभ  .
जीवन   नीतियों  are legal  अनुबंध  and the terms of the contract describe  the  limitations of the  insured  events .
Specific  exclusions  are often  लिखा   into  the  अनुबंध  to  सीमा   the  liability  of   the   insurer  ; common examples are claims relating  to  suicide  ,   धोखाधड़ी   ,  war , riot  और  civil commotion .
Life-based contracts tend  to   पतन  into two major categories:
सुरक्षा   नीतियों   –  designed to provide a benefit in the event  of  specified event ,  typically  a  lump  sum payment .
a  common  रूप   of  this design is  पद   बीमे   .
निवेश  policies –  जहाँ   the   प्रमुख  objective is to facilitate  the   विकास  of capital by  नियमित  or  सिंगल  premiums .
Common  फ़ॉर्म  ( in the US ) are whole life ,  सार्वभौमिक  life and variable life  नीतियों   .
