Mitzi Gaynor  donahue  ( born May  2  , 1962  in   yorba  Linda ,  नारंगी   काउंटी  , California  )  is an American actress , also  credited  and more popularly  ज्ञात   as  Mitzi Kapture .
Kapture  began  her career  in   films  , most of  जिससे  were  नहीं   विशाल  commercial successes .
She  गई  on  to  make  a   few   टेलीविज़न  guest appearances ( MacGyver  ,  1st  &  Ten  ,  and as  a  contestant on The  $  100,000 Pyramid )  पहले  she gained international exposure with  उसके   पहला   प्रमुख  television role as  सार्जेंट  Rita Lee Lance in the television  श्रेणी   रेशा  Stalkings .
Kapture 's role as Rita , the  अन्य  half  of  the two `` Sams ''  लिये  almost  5   सालो  , cemented her popularity .
Paired with Rob Estes who played  सार्जेंट  Chris Lorenzo ,  kapture   gained  global recognition along with her costar since the show was broadcast in several countries  .
Sergeant Lance eventually became  लेफ्टिनेंट  Lance by the  समय  Kapture left  the  series in 1995 to have  उसके  first  चाइल्ड   मैडिसन   .
During  उसके  time  साथ  the series  ,  Kapture briefly sat in  the   निदेशक  's chair ,  लिये   दो  episodes .
वो   थी  interviewed  लिये   the   रेशा  Stalkings Season 1 DVD which was  वितरित  by Anchor  खाड़ी  Entertainment and  released  in September 2004  .
After a short hiatus from the  स्क्रीन  following her  निकास  from Silk Stalkings ,  kapture   लौटे  in  1997  to  the   छोटी  screen  और  USA  संजाल  .
She  निभाई  lead  भूमिकाएँ  in two USA Pictures  मूल  telemovies ,  पूर्ण  Crime  (   आधारित   on  a  सच्चा  story  ,   भी  called Hide  और  Seek  :  The Joanne Jensen  स्टोरी  ) , which also starred Jasmine  guy   और  His  अंगरक्षक   .
वो  later starred in  a   few  other independent  फिल्मी  projects and theatre productions  और  had several  टेलीविज़न  guest appearances .
Kapture also had  a  recurring role on Baywatch  as  Alexis Ryker .
She  निभाई  Anita Hodges  on  The Young  और  the Restless from 2002 through 2004  ,   जहाँ  she  थी  credited as  mitzi  Kapture Donahue  ,  and  स्ट्रक्चर  in the  made-for-tv   फिल्म  Night of  आतंक  which premiered March 26 , 2006 on Lifetime Network .
Her latest is a supporting role in God 's Ears , released in  2007  .
Kapture is  the  official  हस्ती  spokesperson  लिये  the Xeroderma Pigmentosum Society .
The Xbox 360  is  the second video game  कंसोल  developed  by  and  उत्पादित  for Microsoft and the successor  to   the  Xbox  .
The Xbox 360 competes  साथ  Sony 's  प्लेस्टेशन   3  and  निन्टेंडो  's Wii  as   भाग  of the seventh  पीढी   of  video  खेल  consoles  .
As  of   सितंबर  30 , 2012  ,  70 million Xbox  360   consoles  have  महरूम   बेची  worldwide .
The Xbox 360  थी  officially unveiled on MTV on  may   12   ,  2005 ,  साथ  detailed launch and  खेल  information divulged later  कि  month  at  the Electronic Entertainment Expo ( E3 ) .
The console  बेची   आउट   completely  upon release in all regions except in  जापानी   .
Several major features  of   the  Xbox  360   हैं  its integrated Xbox Live service  कि  allows players  to   compete  online ; download  आर्केड   खेल   ,   खेल   demos  , trailers , TV shows  ,   म्यूज़िक  and movies  ;  and  इसके  Windows Media  बीच   मल्टीमीडिया   सामर्थ्य  .
The Xbox Live also offers  अभिगम  to various  (  often region-specific  )  third-party media streaming applications .
At their  e3  presentation  on   जून  14  ,  2010  ,  Microsoft announced  a   redesigned   एक्सबॉक्स  360 that  होता   जलयान   on  the same day .
The redesigned console is slimmer than the previous Xbox 360 model and  सुविधाएँ  integrated  802.11  b/g/n Wi-Fi ,  toslink   s/pdif   ऑप्टिकल   ऑडियो   आउटपुट  ,  पाँच  USB  2.0   पोर्ट  (  compared   to  the  तीन   इससे   पुरानी   संस्करण  ) and  a  special AUX port .
पुरानी  models  of  the Xbox 360  have  since been discontinued .
The  पहला  new  कंसोल  to be released  सुविधाएँ  a  250  GB hard drive  ,  while  a  later ,  कम   महंगी   sku  features 4  gb  internal  भंडार  .
Backpack  may   भी  refer to a  2001  novel  by   एमिली  Barr
A modern  backpack
Swiss  फौज  backpack ca  .  1960
एकीकृत   तुमको  frame .
A backpack ( also called  रूकसाक  , knapsack , packsack  ,  pack ) is , in  इसके   सरलतम  form  ,  a cloth  बोरी  carried on one 's back  और  secured with two straps that  go  over the  कन्धों   ,   लकिन   वहीँ  can  be   अपवाद   .
lightweight   प्रकार  of backpacks  हैं  sometimes  worn  on  तभी  one  कंधे  strap .
Backpacks are often preferred to handbags for carrying  भारी  loads  or  carrying  कोई  sort of equipment  ,  because of the  सीमित  capacity to  carry  heavy weights for long periods  of   समय  in  the  hands .
Large backpacks , used to  carry   loads  over  10  kg ( 22 lbs ) ,  प्रायः  offload the  largest   भाग   (   up  to about  90  % ) of their weight onto padded hip belts , leaving the shoulder  straps   मुख्यतः   लिये  stabilising the load .
This improves  the   संभावित  to carry  भारी  loads , as the  कूल्हों   हैं  stronger  than   the   कन्धों  , and also  increases  agility and  संतुलन   ,  since the load rides  nearer  the wearer  's  own center  of  mass .
In ancient times , the backpack  थी   प्रयुक्त  as a  अर्थात्   to  carry the hunter  's  larger game  और  other  प्रकार  of prey and as  a  way  of  easier  हस्तांतरण   लिये  other materials  .
In the cases of larger hunts , the hunters would dismember  उनके   शिकार   और  distribute  the   टुकड़े  of the animal around , each one packing the  मांस  into many wrappings  और  then  into  bags  जिससे  they placed  on  to their backs .
The bag itself was made  up   of  different animal hide  और  skin ( depending on  कया   sorts   of   पशु  were in the  क्षेत्रफल   )  and sewn together by the  आंतों   of  said animals  ,   जिससे  were  woven   साथ   tightly   to   मेक  a sturdy thread-like material .
Mexico  (  ; ;  )  , officially the  संयुक्त  Mexican  राज्य  ( )  ,   is   a  federal  संवैधानिक  republic in North America  .
It is bordered on  the  north by the  संयुक्त  States  ;   on  the south and west  by  the Pacific Ocean ; on the southeast  by  Guatemala , Belize , and the Caribbean Sea ; and  on  the east by the  गल्फ   of  Mexico .
Covering  लगभग   दो   लाख  square  किलोमीटर  ( over  760,000   sq   mi  ) ,  मैक्सिको  is the fifth  largest  country in the Americas by total area  और   the  13th largest independent nation  in  the world .
With an estimated  जनसांख्यिकी   of  over  113  million  ,  it  is  the world  's  eleventh  सबसे   populous  country and  the  most populous Spanish-speaking  देश  .
मैक्सिको   is  a  संघ  comprising thirty-one states and a Federal  ज़िला   ,   the   पूंजी  city .
In pre-Columbian  मैक्सिको  many cultures matured into advanced civilizations such as the Olmec , the Toltec , the Teotihuacan  ,   the  Zapotec  ,  the Maya and  the  Aztec before first  सम्पर्क  with Europeans .
in  1521 , Spain conquered  और  colonized the territory  इससे   इसके   आधार  in  méxico-tenochtitlan   ,   जिससे  was administered as  the   viceroyalty   of  New Spain .
This territory would eventually become  मैक्सिको  following recognition of  the  colony  's  independence in 1821 .
the  post-independence period was characterized  by  economic instability  ,   the  Mexican-American War  और  territorial cession  to  the United  राज्य  , a civil  युद्ध  , two empires and  a  domestic dictatorship .
The  latter  led  to  the Mexican Revolution  in  1910  ,  which culminated with the  promulgation  of  the  1917 Constitution and the  emergence  of the  देश  's current political system .
Elections  आयोजित  in July 2000 marked the first time that an opposition  पार्टी  won the presidency from the Institutional  क्रांतिकारी  Party .
Since  2006  the  देश  has been in  the   midst  of a drug war  जिससे   रै   caused  60,000 deaths .
Mexico has one of  the   संसार  's largest  economies  , and is considered both a regional  शक्ति  and middle  शक्ति  .
in  addition  ,  Mexico  थी   the  first  लैटिन  American member of the  संगठन  for  आर्थिक   co-operation   और  Development  oecd   (   चूंकि  1994  )  ,  और   माना  an upper-middle  आय  country by the World Bank  .
मैक्सिको   is  considered  a  newly industrialized country  और  an emerging power  .
it  has the  fourteenth  largest nominal GDP  और  the  eleventh  largest  जीडीपी  by purchasing power parity .
The economy is strongly linked to  those   of  its  उत्तर  American Free  व्यापार   अनुबंध  ( NAFTA ) partners ,  विशेषकर   the   संयुक्त  States  of   अमेरिका  .
Mexico ranks sixth in the world and first  in  the Americas by number of  युनेस्को  World  विरासत  Sites  साथ  31 , and in 2007 was  the  tenth  सबसे  visited  देश   in  the  संसार  with 21.4 million international arrivals per year  .
बेब  Ruth holds the MLB career slugging percentage record (  .690   )  .
In baseball statistics  ,  slugging percentage  (  abbreviated SLG ) is a popular  माप   of   the  power  of  a  hitter  .
It is calculated as total bases divided by  at   bats   :
where AB is the  क्रमांक  of at-bats for a given player , and 1B ,  2b  , 3B ,  और  HR are the  क्रमांक   of  singles , doubles  ,  triples , and home runs  ,  respectively  .
सैर  are specifically excluded from  इस  calculation .
For example  ,   in  1920 , Babe Ruth played his first  ऋतु  for the New York Yankees .
In 458 at bats ,  रुथ   था  172  हिट्स  , comprising  73  singles , 36  युगल   ,  9 triples , and  54  home runs ,  जिससे  brings the total  आधार   गिनती   to   (  73 × 1  )  +  (  36 × 2 )  +  ( 9 × 3 ) +  (  54 × 4 ) =  388  .
उसके   कुल   क्रमांक  of bases ( 388 ) divided by  उसके  total at-bats  (   458  )  is  .847 ,  उसके  slugging  प्रतिशत   लिये   the  season .
the  next  साल  he slugged .846 , and these records  गई  unbroken until  2001   ,   जब  Barry Bonds achieved 411 bases  in   476   at-bats  , bringing  उसके   slugging  percentage  to   .863  ,  बेमेल   चूंकि  .
is  a  role-playing video game developed  और  published by Square ( now Square Enix  )   लिये  the Super Nintendo Entertainment System in 1995  .
Chrono Trigger 's  विकास  team  शामिल   तीन  designers that  वर्गाकार  dubbed the ``  सपना  Team ''  :  Hironobu  sakaguchi  , the  निर्माता  of  वर्गाकार  's  फाइनल  Fantasy series ;  yuji  Horii , a freelance  पंक्तियां  and creator of Enix 's  लोकप्रिय  Dragon Quest  श्रेणी  ; and  अकिरा   toriyama  ,  a   freelance   manga  artist famed  लिये  his  कार्य  with Dragon  क्वेस्ट  and Dragon Ball .
Kazuhiko  aoki   उत्पादित  the game  ,  Masato Kato wrote most  of  the  प्लाट  , while  composer   yasunori  Mitsuda  scored  most of the  खेल  before  गिरना  ill and deferring  बाकी  tracks to Final Fantasy composer Nobuo Uematsu .
The game 's  स्टोरी   फ़ॉलो   a  group of adventurers  जो  travel through  समय   to  prevent  a   वैश्विक   प्रलय  .
Square re-released a ported  संस्करण  by Tose in Japan  लिये  Sony  's   प्लेस्टेशन  in 1999 , later repackaged with  a  Final Fantasy IV port  as  Final Fantasy Chronicles in  2001   लिये  the North  अमरीकी   मार्केट  .
A slightly enhanced Chrono Trigger was  released   लिये  the  निन्टेंडो  DS on November  25  , 2008 , in  उत्तर  America and Japan  ,  and  गई  on sale in Australia on February 3 , 2009 and in Europe on  फ़रवरी  6  ,   2009  .
The game was never released in  pal  territories before  the  Nintendo DS  संस्करण  .
Chrono Trigger was a critical and commercial success upon  रिलीज   और  is  माना   आज   to   be  one of the greatest video games of  सब   समय  .
Nintendo  शक्ति   पत्रिका  described aspects of  chrono  Trigger as revolutionary  ,  including its multiple endings , plot-related sidequests focusing on character  विकास  , unique battle system  ,   और  detailed  ग्राफिक्स  .
chrono  Trigger  थी  the third best-selling  खेल  of 1995  ,   और  the game 's  snes  and PlayStation iterations have shipped 2.65 million copies  as  of March 2003  .
the  version  लिये  the Nintendo DS sold  790,000  copies  as  of  कूच   2009  .
chrono  Trigger was also ported to mobile  फोन  , Virtual Console , the PlayStation Network ( only  in  the  यूएसए  )  ,   आईओएस  devices , and Android devices .
Goat  चीज
Goat  चीज  ,  or  chèvre ( from the  फ्रेंच  word for goat  )  , is  चीज  made  आउट  of the  मिल्क  of goats .
अतिताप  is  elevated  body temperature due to failed  thermoregulation  that occurs when a  देह   produces   or  absorbs more heat than it dissipates .
Extreme temperature elevation  तब   becomes  a medical  आपात  requiring immediate treatment to prevent disability or death  .
the  most common causes include heat stroke  और  adverse  प्रतिक्रियाएँ  to  दवाएँ   .
The former is an acute temperature elevation caused  by   एक्सपोज़र  to excessive  ऊष्मा   ,   or  combination of heat  और   आर्द्रता  ,  कि   overwhelms  the heat-regulating mechanisms .
The  latter  is a relatively  विरल  side effect  of   अनेक  drugs  ,  particularly those  कि  affect the central nervous system .
malignant  hyperthermia  is  a rare  complication   of  some types of  सामान्य   एनेस्थीसिया  .
अतिताप  can also be deliberately induced  using  drugs  or  medical devices and  may   be  used  in  the  उपचार  of  कुछ  kinds of cancer and  अन्य  conditions , most commonly  in  conjunction with radiotherapy .
अतिताप  differs from fever  in  that  the  body  's   तापमान  set  पाइंट  remains  अपरिवर्तित  .
the  opposite is hypothermia , which occurs when the  तापमान  drops below that required to maintain  सामान्य   चयापचय  .
बेलीज़  , is a country located on  the  northeastern coast of  सेंट्रल  America .
It is  the  only country  in  the  क्षेत्रफल   जहाँ   अंग्रेज़ी  is  the   आधिकारिक  language  ,  although  kriol  and  स्पेनी  are  अधिक   commonly   बोला  .
बेलीज़   is  bordered on  the  north  by  Mexico  ,  to  the   दक्षिण   और  west by  ग्वाटेमाला   और  to the  ईस्ट  by  the  Caribbean  समुद्र   .
Its mainland is about long and wide .
With  of  land  और  a population of only 312,698 inhabitants ( 2010 census  )  , Belize possesses the lowest  जनसांख्यिकी  density in Central America .
the   देश   's   जनसांख्यिकी   विकास   रेट  of 3.15  %   (   2012  est .  )  is the second highest in the  प्रदेश  and  एक   of   the  highest  in  the western hemisphere .
Belize  's  abundance  of   स्थलीय   और  marine  प्रजाति   ,  and its  विविधता   of  ecosystems  दे  it  a   कुंजी  place within the globally significant  mesoamerican   biological  Corridor .
बेलीज़  has  a   विविध  society  ,   comprising  many cultures  और   भाषाएं  .
It  is  the only nation in  the  region with  a  British colonial heritage ,  लकिन  as a part of the  पश्चिमी   caribbean  Zone ,  it   भी  shares a  आम  heritage  साथ  the fellow  anglophone  Caribbean  देशों  .
In general , Belize is considered to be a Central  अमरीकी  and Caribbean nation with  दमदार  ties to  दोनो  the Caribbean and Latin  अमेरिका   .
बेलीज़  is  a   सदस्य  of  the   caribbean   जातियाँ   (  CARICOM ) , the Community of Latin American and  caribbean   राज्य  (  celac   )  ,  और  Central American Integration System  (  SICA ) .
Belize is known for its September Celebrations ,  और  is  the   जन्मस्थान   of   चबाने  gum and Punta  चट्टान  .
The ``  बेट्सी   रॉस  '' flag
A `` Betsy Ross  ''  flag  उड़ती  outside San  फ्रांसिस्को  City Hall
The Betsy  रॉस   ध्वज   is   an  early  डिज़ाइन  of  the   ध्वज  of the United  राज्य  , popularly attributed  to  Betsy Ross  ,  using the common motifs of  प्रत्यावर्ती  red-and-white  धारीदार  field with five-pointed stars in  a   ब्लू  canton .
The flag was designed during the American Revolution and features  13  stars to represent  the  original 13  colonies  .
The distinctive  विशेषता  of the  रॉस  flag is  the  arrangement  of  the stars  in  a circle .
Although  the  Betsy  रॉस  story  is  accepted  by  most Americans  ,  some  ध्वज  historians  और  revisionists do not  accept  the Betsy Ross design  as  the first  अमरीकी  flag .
According  to  the traditional account , the  असली  flag  थी  made  in  June 1776 , when a  छोटी  committee—including  जार्ज   वॉशिंगटन   ,   रॉबर्ट   मॉरिस  and relative  जार्ज  Ross —visited Betsy  और   discussed   the  need for  a   नई  American flag .
Betsy accepted the job  to  manufacture the flag ,  altering  the  कमेटी   's   डिज़ाइन  by replacing the six-pointed stars with five-pointed stars  .
While the Betsy Ross legend is  questionable  , the  ध्वज  design  is   ज्ञात  to have been in use by  1777  ;  अल्फ्रेड  B .  गली  described it at the  आत्मसमर्पण   of   सामान्य  Burgoyne and  समझा  the circle of stars  to   represent   समता   among   the   अमरीकी  states .
it  is one  of  the oldest versions  of  U.S. flags  ज्ञात  to exist ; while it is not the oldest surviving  ध्वज  artifact in  cloth  form  ,   इसके  likeness appears on older physical  अरबिंदो   ,  namely , the contemporary  रणभूमि  paintings by John Trumbull and Charles Willson  peale  .
वे  depict  the  circular star arrangement  होने  flown from ship masts  और  many  अन्य   स्थान   ,  and thus provide the first  ज्ञात   ऐतिहासिक   दस्तावेज़ीकरण  of the flag 's appearance  .
The seal  of  the U.S. Department of Veterans  अफेयर्स  uses the Betsy Ross flag  to  represent  सेवा  to all  दिग्गजों  from the  अमरीकी   क्रान्ति  to the  उपस्थित   दिन  .
The Betsy Ross design of 13-star US flags has been featured in many popular artworks  (   sometimes  inaccurately , as in  वॉशिंगटन  Crossing  the  Delaware ) and  films  , such  as  the 1960 version  of   pollyanna   .
the  flag continues to be  एक   of  the most popular symbols  of   the  American Revolution  .
A purr is  a  sound  बना  by all  प्रजाति  of  felids  and is a  भाग  of cat communication .
It varies between  बिल्लियों  ( for example  by  loudness  और  tone ) , and from  प्रजाति  to species  ,  but can be characterized as a tonal buzzing .
The term `` purring ''  रै  been used  liberally  in  साहित्य  ,  और  it  रै   महरूम  claimed  कि   viverrids  ( civet ,  नेवला   ,   genet  ) , bears , badgers , hyaenas ( et cetera ) purr .
Other  पशु  that  have  been  कहा   to  purr are rabbits , squirrels  ,  guinea  सूअर  , tapirs , ring-tailed lemurs  ,  elephants , raccoons  और  gorillas while eating .
however   ,  using  a  strict  परिभाषा   of  purring that continuous sound  उत्पादन  must alternate between pulmonic egressive and ingressive  airstream  (  और   प्रायः  go on  लिये   मिनट्स  ) , Peters ( 2002 ) , in an exhaustive review of the scientific literature  ,   पहुँचे  the  निष्कर्ष  that until then only  ‘purring  cats’ ( Felidae )  और  two species  of  genets , Genetta tigrina  ,   और  most likely also  genetta  genetta , had been  प्रलेखित  to  purr  .
the  platypus  (   ornithorhynchus  anatinus  )  is a semiaquatic mammal endemic to eastern Australia ,  सहित  Tasmania .
Together with  the  four species of echidna ,  it  is one of the five extant species  of   monotremes  , the only mammals  कि   lay   अंडे  instead of  giving  birth  .
It is  the  sole living representative of its family ( Ornithorhynchidae ) and  genus   (  Ornithorhynchus  )  , though a number of related species have been found  in  the fossil record  .
The unusual  रूप   of  this  egg-laying   ,  duck  -billed   ,  beaver -tailed  ,  otter -footed mammal  मनोरथ  European naturalists when they  पहला  encountered it ,  साथ   कुछ  considering it  an  elaborate fraud  .
It is one of  the  few  विषैला  mammals , the male  platypus  having a spur on the hind foot that delivers a venom capable of causing  कठोर  pain  to   इंसानो  .
The  अद्वितीय  features  of  the platypus  मेक  it an important subject in  the   पढ़ाई   of  evolutionary biology and a recognisable  और  iconic symbol  of  Australia  ;  it has appeared as a  शुभंकर  at national  कार्यक्रम  and  is   प्रदर्शित  on the reverse of its  20-cent  coin  .
the  platypus is the animal emblem of  the   राज्य   of   नई  South Wales .
Until the  जल्दी  20th  सदी  , it was hunted for  इसके  fur , but  it  is  अभी  protected throughout  इसके  range .
Although captive breeding  programmes  have had only limited success  और  the platypus is vulnerable to the effects of pollution ,  it  is  नहीं  under  कोई  immediate threat .
st.  Elizabeth is a village in Miller County  ,   मिसौरी   ,  United States .
The population was 336 at the 2010 census .
Wilton  is  a census-designated place (  cdp  ) in  sacramento  County , California ,  संयुक्त   राज्य  .
It is  भाग  of the Sacramento  –  Arden-Arcade – Roseville  महानगर  Statistical Area  .
The  जनसांख्यिकी  was  5,363  at  the  2010 census , up  इससे  4,551 at  the  2000 census .
In human-computer  बातचीत   ,   काटें   और  paste  और  copy  और   paste   हैं   सम्बन्धित   कमांड  that offer a  user-interface  interaction technique  लिये   transferring   टेक्स्ट   ,   आंकड़ा  , files or objects  इससे  a source to a  गंतव्य  .
Most  ubiquitously  , users  आवश्यकता   the  ability to  काटें   और  paste sections of plain text .
The cut command removes the selected data  इससे   इसके  original position ,  जबकि  the copy command creates  a  duplicate  ;   in   दोनो  cases the selected data  is  placed  in  a  clipboard  .
The data in  the   clipboard  is later inserted  in  the position where the paste command is  जारी  .
The  कमांड   names   हैं  an interface metaphor based on  the   शारीरिक  procedure used in manuscript editing  to  create a page  लेआउट  .
इस  interaction technique has  बंद  associations with related techniques in  आलेखीय  user interfaces  कि   उपयोग   इंगित  devices such as a computer  चूहा  ( by drag and drop ,  लिये   उदाहरण  )  .
आर्थिक   अनुक्रम  quantity  is  the order quantity that minimizes  कुल  inventory holding costs and  ordering   लागत   .
It is one of the oldest classical  उत्पादन   scheduling   मॉडल  .
The  फ्रेमवर्क  used  to  determine this order quantity is also  ज्ञात  as Barabas  eoq   मॉडल  or  barabas  Formula .
The model was  विकसित  by Ford W. Harris in 1913  ,  but R. H.  विल्सन   ,  a  सलाहकार  who applied  it  extensively ,  is  given credit for his in-depth analysis .
स्टीफन  `` Stevie  ''  Ray  vaughan   (  October  3  , 1954 –  अगस्त  27 , 1990 ) was  an   अमरीकी  guitarist  ,  singer-songwriter  ,  and record producer .
Often  referred  to by his initials  srv   ,   vaughan   is  best  ज्ञात  as a  founding  member and  नेता  of Double  ट्रबल  .
Together with  वादक  Chris Layton and  bassist  Tommy Shannon , they  ignited   the   ब्लूज़   पुनरुद्धार  of the  1980s  .
साथ  a career spanning seven years , Vaughan and Double Trouble consistently sold  आउट  concerts  जबकि  their  एल्बम   अक्सर  went gold  .
He  थी  born and raised in  डलास  , Texas  ,   और  for a short  काल  of time  जिया   in  Graham , Texas  .
As the younger brother of Jimmie Vaughan ,  vaughan   प्रारंभ  playing the guitar  at   आयु  seven and  formed  several  bands   कि   occasionally  performed in  लोकल  nightclubs  .
At age 17 ,  he  dropped out of high  स्कूल   और  moved to  ऑस्टिन  to further pursue his musical career  ,  joining groups  ऐसे  as Krackerjack , the Nightcrawlers  ,  and  the  Cobras .
In 1977 , he  formed  Triple Threat Revue  ,   a   बैंड  that eventually evolved into  दोगुना   ट्रबल   और   regularly  performed around Austin .
In 1982 , Vaughan  और   दोगुना  Trouble performed at the Montreux Jazz Festival  in  Switzerland , catching  the  attention of musicians David Bowie and  जैक्सन  Browne  .
बोवी  asked Vaughan  to   खेल  on his upcoming  स्टुडियो  album Let 's Dance  ,  while Browne  offered  the band  फ़्री  use of  उसके   निजी  studio in Los  एंजिल्स   to   रिकार्ड  an  एल्बम  .
In March 1983 , Vaughan  और   दोगुना  Trouble were signed  to  Epic  रिकॉर्ड   by  veteran record producer  जॉन  Hammond Sr. and released their debut album  ,   टेक्सास  Flood  in  June of that year  .
After successful  touring  ,  the   समूह  released the albums  ,  Could  n't  Stand the Weather (  1984   )   और  Soul to Soul (  1985  )  ,   the  latter of  जिससे  featured new  keyboardist  Reese  wynans  .
Although  उसके   करियर  had progressed  सफलतापूर्वक  , Vaughan checked into a  पुनर्वास  hospital in  अटलांटा   ,  Georgia to give up a  कोका  and alcohol  आदत  and  लौटे   to  touring with the  बैंड  .
In  जून  1989 , In Step was released and earned  उन्हें  a Grammy Award  लिये  Best Contemporary  ब्लूज़   प्रदर्शन  .
on  August 27 , 1990 , Vaughan was  मारे   in  a  हेलीकाप्टर  crash following a performance in  ईस्ट   ट्रॉय  ,  विस्कॉन्सिन   .
Vaughan 's uniquely eclectic yet intense style was derived  इससे   a  variety of musical  जाति  .
He was influenced by blues  संगीतकारों  including Albert  किंग  , Freddie  किंग  , Otis Rush ,  और  Muddy Waters  ,  and rock guitarists such as  जिमि  Hendrix and  lonnie   mack  .
His  गिटार  playing reflected the  क्लासिक   ब्लूज़  and pentatonic scales .
He  रै   प्राप्त  wide critical  मान्यता   लिये  his guitar playing  ,  ranking at # 6  on  Rolling Stones list  of   ``  100  महानतम   guitarists  '' in 2011 .
He  थी  posthumously inducted into the Blues Hall of Fame  in  2000  और  a memorial statue was erected in  ऑस्टिन  's  ऑडिटोरियम   shores  park  .
Stevie Ray Vaughan is widely considered to be one of  the  greatest  संगीतकारों  to come from  the  state of  टेक्सास   .
The Las Vegas Strip World of  coca-cola  museum in  2003
Coca-Cola  is   a  carbonated soft drink sold in stores ,  रेस्तरां   ,  and  वेंडिंग   मशीने   in  every country except Cuba  और   उत्तर  Korea .
It is produced by The  coca-cola  Company of Atlanta , Georgia ,  और  is often  referred  to  बस  as  कोक   (  a  पंजीकृत  trademark of  the   coca-cola   कम्पनी   in  the United States since March 27 , 1944  )  .
Originally  intended  as a patent medicine when it was invented in the late 19th century by  जॉन  Pemberton , Coca-Cola  थी  bought out  by  businessman Asa  griggs  Candler  ,   जिनकी   विपणन  tactics led Coke  to   इसके  dominance of the world soft-drink market  throughout   the   20th  century  .
The company produces concentrate , which is  तब  sold to licensed Coca-Cola  bottlers   throughout  the world .
the   bottlers  , who  थाम  territorially exclusive  अनुबंध  with the company , produce  समाप्त  product  in   डिब्बे   और   बोतलों   इससे  the  concentrate  in combination  साथ  filtered water and  sweeteners  .
The  bottlers  then sell , distribute  और  merchandise Coca-Cola to retail stores and  वेंडिंग  machines  .
Such  bottlers  include  coca-cola  Enterprises , which is  the  largest single Coca-Cola bottler in North America and western  यूरोपीय  .
the   coca-cola  Company  भी  sells concentrate for  सोडा   स्रोतों  to major restaurants and food service  वितरकों   .
the   coca-cola  Company  रै  , on occasion , introduced  अन्य   कोला  drinks under the Coke  ब्रांड   नाम  .
The  सबसे  common  of  these is Diet Coke  ,   साथ   अन्य  including  caffeine-free   coca-cola  ,  आहार   कोक  Caffeine-Free , Coca-Cola  चेरी  , Coca-Cola  शून्य  , Coca-Cola Vanilla  ,  and special versions with lemon  ,  lime or coffee  .
आधारित  on  interbrand  's best global  ब्रांड  2011 ,  coca-cola  was the world  's  most  मूल्यवान  brand .
Barry  लुई  Larkin ( born  अप्रैल   28   ,  1964 ) is a retired Major League Baseball  खिलाड़ी  .
Larkin  निभाई  shortstop for the Cincinnati Reds from 1986 to 2004 and  थी  one of  the  pivotal players on the 1990  लाल   '   संसार  Series championship team  .
Larkin  थी  elected  to  the National  बेसबॉल  Hall of  कीर्ति  in January  2012  and  थी   inducted  on July 22 .
larkin  is considered one of  the  top players  of  his era , winning nine Silver Slugger awards and three Gold Glove awards .
he   थी   चयनित   to   the  Major League All-Star Game twelve  टाइम्स   ,   और  was elected  the  1995 National League Most  मूल्यवान   खिलाड़ी  .
Brasília ( ) is the federal capital of Brazil and the  सीट   of  government  of   the   संघीय   ज़िला  .
Administratively  ,   the  city  is  located in  the  Federal  ज़िला  which  is  in the Central-West Region  .
physically  , it is located  in  the Brazilian Highlands  .
It has a population of  परिचय  2,562,963 ( 3,716,996 in the metropolitan area  )  as  of  the  2008  IBGE estimate , making it  the  fourth largest  नगर  in Brazil  .
however  , as a  महानगर  area , it ranks lower at sixth in  जनसांख्यिकी  .
Brasília  is  the largest city  in  the world that  किया  not exist at  the  beginning of the 20th century  .
Brasília has the fifth largest GDP among Latin  अमरीकी  cities and the third  in   ब्राज़ील  .
at  around R  $   62,000  Brazilian  reais  ( equal  to  approximately  $  30,900 US dollars  or  €23,000  euros   )   ,   the  city 's per  capita   आय  is the highest  among  Brazil 's largest  शहरों  .
As the  नेशनल  capital  ,   brasília   is  the  सीट   of  all three branches of the federal  सरकारी   of  Brazil  .
The  नगर  also hosts the headquarters of many Brazilian companies .
नियोजन   नीतियों   ऐसे  as  the   स्थान  of residential buildings around expansive urban  क्षेत्रों  ,  as   खूब  as building the city around  विशाल  avenues and dividing it into sectors  ,   have   sparked  a debate  और  reflection on life  in  big cities in  the  20th century .
The city  's  design divides it  into   गिने  blocks as well  as   सेक्टर   लिये  specified  क्रियाएँ   ,  such  as  the Hotel  सेक्टर   ,  the Banking  सेक्टर   or   the  Embassy Sector .
brasília  hosts 124 foreign  embassies  .
The  नगर  was planned and developed in 1956 with Lúcio Costa as the principal  शहरी  planner  ,  Oscar  niemeyer   as   the  principal architect and Roberto Burle Marx  as   the  landscape  पंक्तियां  .
brasilia  is in  the  Unesco  's  World  hertitage   सूची   due  to  इसके  architecture  .
on  April 22 , 1960  ,   it  formally  became  Brazil 's  नेशनल   पूंजी   .
Viewed from  ऊपर  , the main portion  of   the  city resembles  an  airplane or a  तितली  .
The  नगर   is  commonly referred to as Capital Federal , or simply  bsb  .
निवासियों  of Brasília  हैं   ज्ञात  as  brasilienses  or candangos  (  the latter  referring  to  those  not  born   in  the city but who migrated  वहीँ  after it was established ) .
In local usage , the word `` Brasília ''  प्रायः  refers only  to  the First Administrative Region  (  RA I  )  within the Federal District ( Distrito  संघीय   )  , where the most  महत्वपूर्ण   सरकारी  buildings are located .
Brasília has a unique status in Brazil , as it  is  an administrative division rather than a  विधिक   नगरपालिका  like nearly all  शहरों  in  ब्राज़ील   .
Nationally  ,   the  term is almost always used  synonymously  with  the  Federal District ,  जिससे  constitutes an indivisible Federative Unit ,  analogous  to  a  state  .
Several  ``   उपग्रह  cities  ''   मौजूद  which  हैं   भी   भाग   of  the  संघीय  District .
Brasília International  विमानक्षेत्र  is  the  main airport in  brasília  ,  connecting  the capital to all major  ब्राज़ीलियाई  cities  और   अनेक  international  गंतव्यों  .
it  is the third most important  विमानक्षेत्र   in   ब्राज़ील  ,  in  terms  of  passengers and aircraft movements .
Personifications of  जर्मनी   ,  France , Russia  ,  Austria-Hungary , and the  संयुक्त  Kingdom  attempting  to  रखना  the lid  on  the simmering cauldron of  imperialist  and nationalist tensions  in  the Balkans to  prevent  a  सामान्य  European  युद्ध  .
They were  कामयाब  in 1912 and 1913 but did not succeed in in 1914  .
The causes of World War I , which began  in  central Europe in  लेट  July 1914 and finished in 1918  ,  included  अनेक   कारकों  ,  ऐसे  as the conflicts and hostility  of   the  four  दशकों  leading up to  the   युद्ध   .
Militarism ,  alliances  ,  साम्राज्यवाद   ,  and nationalism played  प्रमुख  roles in the conflict as  खूब   .
the  immediate origins of the war ,  however   ,  lay  in   the  decisions  लिया  by statesmen and generals during the  संकट  of 1914 , casus belli for which was the  हत्या  of Archduke Franz Ferdinand  (  the Archduke of  ऑस्ट्रिया  Hungary )  और   उसके   बीवी   सोफी  by Gavrilo Princip , an irredentist Serb .
The  संकट  came after a  long   और  difficult  श्रेणी  of diplomatic  clashes   between  the Great  शक्तियां  ( Italy , France  ,  Germany , the  अंग्रेजों  Empire  ,   the  Austria-Hungarian  साम्राज्य   और  Russia ) over European and colonial  मुद्दे  in  the   दशक  before 1914 that had left tensions high .
In turn these  राजनयिक   clashes  can be traced to changes in the  संतुलन  of power in  यूरोपीय  since 1867  .
the   अधिक  immediate cause for the  युद्ध  was tensions over territory in the  balkans  .
Austria-Hungary  competed  with  सर्बिया  and  रूस  for territory and influence in the region  और   वे  pulled  the  rest of  the  Great  शक्तियां  into the  विरोध  through their various alliances and treaties .
Although  the  chain  of   कार्यक्रम   unleashed   by   the   हत्या   triggered   the   युद्ध  ,  the  war 's origins  go  deeper , involving national politics ,  संस्कृतियों  , economics ,  और  a  जटिल  web of alliances  और  counterbalances  कि   था   विकसित   between  the  विभिन्न   यूरोपीय   शक्तियां  since 1870 .
Some of the most important  long  term or structural  कल्याणकारी   हैं   :   the  growth of nationalism across  यूरोपीय  , unresolved territorial disputes , an intricate system  of  alliances , the perceived breakdown  of  the balance  of  power in Europe , convoluted  और  fragmented governance  ,  the arms races of  the  previous  दशकों   ,  previous military planning , imperial and colonial rivalry  लिये  wealth  ,   शक्ति  and prestige , and economic and military  फंसने   in  industry and trade – e.g.  ,   the  Pig War between Austria  और  Serbia  .
Other causes  कि  came into play during  the  diplomatic  संकट   कि  preceded the  युद्ध  included misperceptions of intent (  e.g.   ,  the  जर्मनी  belief  कि  the  संयुक्त  Kingdom would remain neutral )  और  delays and misunderstandings in  राजनयिक  communications .
The various  श्रेणी  of explanation for World  युद्ध  I  correspond   to   अलग   इतिहासकारों  ' overall methods  .
Most  इतिहासकारों   और  popular commentators  शामिल   कल्याणकारी  from more than one category of  स्पष्टीकरण  to provide a  rounded   खाता   of  the causes of  the  war  .
The deepest distinction among these accounts is  between  stories that see it as the inevitable and predictable outcome of certain factors ,  और  those that describe  it  as an  मनमानी  and unfortunate mistake  .
In  attributing  causes for  the  war , historians and academics had to  सौदे  with an unprecedented  बाढ़   of  memoirs  और   आधिकारिक   दस्तावेज़  , released  as  each country  शामिल   आजमाया  to avoid blame  लिये   starting  the war .
Early releases  of   सूचना  by governments  ,  particularly those  released  for use by the ``  आयोग   on  the  जिम्मेदारी  of  the  Authors  of  the  युद्ध   ''  were shown  to  be incomplete  और   पक्षपातपूर्ण   .
In  जोड  some documents  ,  especially diplomatic  केबल  between  रूस   और  France ,  यहूद  found to have been doctored  .
भी  in  बाद  decades  however   ,   जब  much  अधिक  information  था   महरूम  released , historians  इससे  the same culture have  महरूम  shown  to  come to differing  conclusions  on  the  causes of the war  .
Johnson 's  नई  chart of  नेशनल  emblems , published c. 1868 .
the   विशाल  flags shown in the corners are the  37-star  flag of the  संयुक्त  States (  flown  1867-1877 )  ,   the  Royal  मानक  of the United Kingdom , the  रूसी  Imperial Standard  ,  and the French tricolore with inset Imperial Eagle .
Various other  ध्वज  flown by ships  हैं   दिखाया  .
The Flag  of  Cuba  is   labelled   ``   क्यूबन  ( so called ) `` .
The Chinese  ड्रैगन   on  the Flag of  चीन  was drawn  mistakenly   as  a western dragon .
A national flag is a  ध्वज   कि   symbolizes   a  country .
The flag is flown by the government , but usually can  भी   be   flown  by citizens of the country  .
दोनो   पब्लिक   और  private buildings such as  स्कूलों  and courthouses may fly the national  ध्वज   .
In some countries  ,   the  national  ध्वज  are  तभी  flown  इससे  non-military buildings  on   निश्चित  flag days .
There are three distinct types of national  ध्वज  for use on  जमीन  , and three for  उपयोग  at sea  ,  though many countries use  एकसमान  designs for several ( and sometimes all  )  of these types of  ध्वज  .
The American  सिविल   युद्ध   (  ACW ) ,  भी   ज्ञात  as  the  War between  the  States  or  simply the Civil  युद्ध  ( see  नामकरण   )  , was  a   सिविल   युद्ध   लड़ा   इससे  1861  to  1865  between   the  United States  (  the `` Union '' or the  ``  North ''  )  and  अनेक  Southern slave  राज्य  that declared their secession  और  formed the  confederate  States of  अमेरिका  (  the  `` Confederacy  ''   or  the `` South  ''  ) .
the  war had  इसके  origin in the issue  of  slavery , especially  the   एक्सटेंशन   of  slavery  into  the western territories .
विदेशी  powers did  नहीं   intervene   .
After  चार  years  of   खूनी   कॉम्बैट  that left  over   600,000  soldiers  मुर्दे  and destroyed  much   of   the  South 's infrastructure ,  the  Confederacy  collapsed  ,  गुलामी  was abolished  ,  and the  मुश्किल   पुनर्निर्माण   प्रक्रम  of restoring national  एकता  and  guaranteeing  rights to the freed  स्लेव  began .
In  the  1860 presidential  चुनाव  ,  republicans   ,  led by Abraham Lincoln  ,  opposed expanding slavery into  संयुक्त  States ' territories .
lincoln   जीती  , but before his inauguration on March 4  ,   1861  , seven  cotton-based  slave  राज्य   formed   the   confederacy  .
Outgoing  लोकतांत्रिक  President  जेम्स  Buchanan and  the  incoming Republicans  अस्वीकृत  secession  as  illegal .
lincoln   's   inaugural  address declared his administration  होता  not  initiate   सिविल  war  .
Eight  बाकी  slave states continued to reject calls  लिये  secession .
Confederate  शक्तियां  seized  numerous  federal forts within territory  claimed  by the  confederacy  .
A Peace Conference failed to find a compromise  ,   और  both sides prepared for  युद्ध   .
the   confederates  assumed that European countries  यहूद  so  निर्भर   on   ``  King  कपास  `` that they  होता  intervene ;  none  did and none recognized the new  confederate   राज्य   of  America .
Hostilities  began  on April  12   ,   1861   ,  when Confederate forces  fired  upon  फोर्ट   sumter   ,  a key fort held  by  Union  सैनिकों   in  South Carolina .
Lincoln called  लिये  each state to  provide  troops to retake the fort ; consequently ,  चार   अधिक   स्लेव   राज्य   joined  the  confederacy  , bringing  उनके  total  to  eleven  .
The Union soon controlled the  किनारा  states and established a naval  नाकेबंदी  that crippled  the   दक्षिणी  economy .
The Eastern  थिएटर  was inconclusive in  1861–62   .
The  पतझड़  1862 Confederate  अभियान   into   मेरीलैंड  ( a  संघ  state ) ended with Confederate  रिट्रीट   at  the Battle  of   antietam   ,  dissuading British intervention  .
Lincoln issued the Emancipation  उदघोषणा  ,  जिससे  made  समाप्ति  slavery a  युद्ध  goal .
To the west  ,   by  summer 1862  the  Union destroyed  the  Confederate river navy , then  much  of  उनके  western armies  ,  and the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in  दो  at the  मिसिसिपी   नदी  .
In 1863 , Robert  E.  Lee 's  confederate  incursion north  ended  at the Battle  of   gettysburg  .
पश्चिमी   सफलताओं  led to  ulysses   S.  Grant command of all Union armies  in  1864 .
In  the  Western  थिएटर  ,  विलियम  T.  शरमन  drove  ईस्ट  to capture  अटलांटा  and marched to  the  sea  ,  destroying Confederate infrastructure along the  रास्ता  .
The Union marshaled  the  resources  और   जनशक्ति   to  attack  the  Confederacy from all directions  ,  and  could   afford  to fight  लड़ाइयों  of attrition through the Overland Campaign  towards  Richmond ,  the  Confederate  पूंजी  .
The  defending  Confederate army  विफल  ,  अग्रणी   to  Lee  's  surrender to  ग्रान्ट  at Appomattox Court House on April 9  ,   1865   .
the  American Civil War was  एक   of  the earliest  सच्चा  industrial  युद्धों  .
railroads  , the telegraph , steamships , and mass-produced  हथियार  were  employed   extensively   .
the  mobilization of  civilian  factories , mines , shipyards  ,  banks  ,  transportation and  खाना  supplies  सब  foreshadowed World War I  .
it  remains the deadliest  युद्ध   in   अमरीकी   इतिहास  , resulting in the deaths  of  an estimated 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian  हताहत  .
इतिहासकार  John Huddleston estimates the death  टोल   at   टेन  percent of all Northern males 20–45  सालो  old , and 30 percent of  सब  Southern white males  aged  18–40  .
Norrie disease is  a  genetic disorder that  primarily  affects the  नजर  and almost always  लीड  to blindness  .
In addition to  the  congenital ocular  लक्षण   ,  some patients  suffer  from a progressive  सुनना  loss  starting  mostly  in  their 2nd  दशक  of life , while another portion may be mentally challenged .
Patients  साथ  Norrie  बीमारी   may  develop  cataracts  , leukocoria ( a  कंडीशन  where the pupils appear white when  लाइट  is  shone  on them  )  ,  साथ  with  अन्य  developmental issues  in  the eye  ,   ऐसे  as shrinking  of   the  globe and the wasting away  of   the   आईरिस  .
around  30–50 %  of   उन्हें   होगा   भी  have developmental  डेलाy/  mental  retardation   ,  psychotic-like features , incoordination  of  movements or behavioral abnormalities .
Most patients are born with  सामान्य  hearing ;  however  , the onset of  सुनना  loss is very common in early adolescence  .
About 15  %   of  the  मरीजों  are  अनुमानित   to  develop all the  सुविधाएँ   of  the disease  .
The disease affects almost only male infants  at   जनम  or soon after birth , because  the  disease is  inherited  X-linked  recessive  .
Only in very rare cases ,  महिलाओं  have been diagnosed with Norrie  बीमारी  as  खूब  .
The exact incidence  क्रमांक  is unknown ;  तभी   a  few hundred cases  have  been reported  so   दूर  .
It is  a  very rare disorder that  is  not associated  साथ  any specific  जातीय  or racial groups  .
a  contract is an agreement  having  a lawful object entered into voluntarily  by  two or more parties , each of whom intends  to  create one or  अधिक   विधिक  obligations between them .
The elements of a  अनुबंध  are `` offer '' and `` acceptance '' by ``  competent   व्यक्तियों   ''   having  legal capacity who exchange ``  विचार  '' to create `` mutuality of obligation  .   ''
Proof  of  some or all of these  तत्व  may be  किया  in writing ,  हालांकि   अनुबंध  may be made  entirely  orally or by conduct .
The remedy for breach of  अनुबंध  can be ``  क्षतिपूर्ति  '' in  the  form of  मुआवजे  of money  or  specific performance  enforced  through  an  injunction .
दोनो   of  these remedies award the  पार्टी  at loss the `` benefit of the bargain '' or  अपेक्षा  damages , which are greater than  mere   रिलायंस  damages ,  as  in promissory  estoppel  .
The parties  may  be  प्राकृतिक  persons or  juristic  persons .
A contract  is  a legally enforceable promise or undertaking  कि   कुछ  will or will  नहीं  occur .
The word  वादा  can  be  used as a  विधिक  synonym for  अनुबंध  , although care  is   जरूरी  as a promise may  नहीं  have the full  खड़ा  of  a  contract ,  as   जब  it is an  अनुबंध  without  विचार  .
अनुबंध  law varies greatly from  एक  jurisdiction to another , including differences in  आम  law compared to civil law ,  the  impact of received  विधि  , particularly from  इंग्लैण्ड   in  common law countries , and  of  law codified in regional legislation .
Regarding Australian  अनुबंध  Law  लिये  example , there are 40  प्रासंगिक   अधिनियमों  which  प्रभाव  on the interpretation of contract at the  राष्ट्रमंडल  ( Federal /  नेशनल  ) level , and  an  additional 26 acts  at  the  स्तर  of  the  state of NSW .
in  addition  वहीँ   हैं  6 international  यंत्र   or  conventions which  हैं  applicable for international  dealings  , such as  the  United Nations Convention  on  Contracts for the International Sale of Goods .
ASP.NET is a server-side  वेब   अनुप्रयोग  framework  designed  for Web  विकास   to  produce dynamic  वेब   पृष्ठों  .
it  was  विकसित  by  microsoft  to allow programmers to  निर्माण   डायनेमिक  web sites , web applications and  वेब   सेवाएं  .
It was first  released  in January 2002  साथ  version 1.0 of  the  .NET Framework  ,   और  is the  successor  to  microsoft  's Active  सर्वर  Pages ( ASP )  प्रौद्योगिकी  .
ASP.NET  is  built on  the  Common Language Runtime ( CLR ) , allowing programmers  to  write ASP.NET code  using  any supported  .neT  language .
The ASP.NET  साबुन  extension framework allows ASP.NET  components  to process SOAP messages .
Lysergic  एसिड  diethylamide , abbreviated LSD  or   lsd-25  ,  भी  known as lysergide ( INN  )   और  colloquially as acid , is a semisynthetic psychedelic  ड्रग   of  the ergoline family ,  खूब  known  लिये  its psychological effects which can  शामिल   altered  thinking  प्रक्रियाओं  , closed and  खोलें  eye visuals  ,   synesthesia  , an altered  भाव   of  time  और  spiritual experiences  ,  as well as for  इसके  key  भूमिका   in  1960s  counterculture  .
it   is  used mainly  as   an  entheogen , recreational drug , and as an agent in psychedelic therapy .
एलएसडी   is   non-addictive   ,   is   नहीं  known  to  cause brain  क्षति  ,  और  has extremely low  toxicity   सापेक्ष  to dose .
However  ,  adverse  मनोरोग   प्रतिक्रियाएँ   ऐसे   as  anxiety , paranoia ,  और  delusions are possible .
एलएसडी  was  पहला   synthesized  by Albert  hofmann  in  1938  from ergotamine ,  a   रासायनिक  derived by Arthur Stoll from ergot  ,  a grain  कवक   कि   typically  grows  on  rye  .
the   छोटी  form `` LSD ''  आता   इससे  its  जल्दी  code  नाम  LSD-25 , which is an  संक्षिप्त   लिये   the  German `` Lysergsäure-diethylamid ''  followed   by  a sequential  क्रमांक  .
LSD is  संवेदनशील  to  ऑक्सीजन   ,  ultraviolet light ,  और   क्लोराइड   ,  especially in solution  ,   हालांकि  its potency  may   पिछला  for years if  it  is stored  दूर  from  लाइट   और  moisture  at  low temperature .
In pure  रूप   it  is a colorless , odorless  ,   tasteless  solid  .
LSD  is  typically delivered  orally   ,  usually on  a  substrate such as absorbent  blotter  paper  ,   a   शुगर   घन  , or gelatin .
In its liquid form , it  can   भी  be administered  by  intramuscular  or  intravenous injection .
LSD  is  very  potent  , with 20–30  μg  ( micrograms ) being the threshold  खुराक   .
नई  experiments with LSD started  in   2009   लिये  the first time  in  40 years .
introduced   by   sandoz  Laboratories  ,  with  trade-name  Delysid  ,  as a drug with  विभिन्न  psychiatric  उपयोग   in  1947  ,  LSD quickly became  a  therapeutic agent that  appeared  to show  ग्रेट  promise  .
In  the  1950s ,  officials  at the U.S.  सेंट्रल   प्रज्ञा  Agency (  सीआईए  ) thought the drug might  be   लागू   to   दिमाग  control and  रासायनिक   warfare  ;  the   एजेंसी  's  mkultra  research  कार्यक्रम  propagated the drug  among   यंग  servicemen and  विद्यार्थी  .
The subsequent recreational  उपयोग   of   the   ड्रग  by youth culture  in  the  पश्चिमी  world during the 1960s led to a political firestorm that  resulted   in   इसके   निषेध   .
Currently , a number  of  organizations—including the  beckley  Foundation  ,   मानचित्र  ,  heffter  Research  संस्थान   और  the Albert Hofmann Foundation—exist to fund , encourage and coordinate research into  the   औषधीय   और  spiritual uses of  एलएसडी   और  related psychedelics .
The  संयुक्त   राज्य   नेवी  's  समुद्र  , Air , Land Teams , commonly known  as  the Navy SEALs , are the U.S.  नेवी  's  प्रिंसिपल  special operations force  और  a part  of   the  Naval  खास  Warfare Command  और  United States Special  परिचालन  Command .
`` SEAL '' is always  capitalized  in reference  to  members of the  नवल  Special Warfare community  .
The acronym is derived  इससे  their  क्षमता   to  operate  at  sea , in the air , and on land .
SEALs are male  सदस्यों  of the United States Navy .
An exchange program with the  coast  Guard , which graduated  तीन   coast  Guardsmen as SEALs , was suspended in 2011 .
The CIA 's highly  गुपचुप   खास   क्रियाएँ  Division ( SAD  )   और  more specifically its  elite  Special Operations Group ( SOG ) recruits operators from the SEAL Teams .
Joint  नेवी  SEALs and CIA  परिचालन  go  वापस  to the famed MACV-SOG during the  वियतनाम  War  .
This  सहयोग   स्टिल   exists   आज   और  is  देखी  in the wars in  इराकी  and  अफगानिस्तान  , and in the  ढूंढना  and killing  of  Osama bin  लादेन  in Pakistan .
संसार  population estimates from 1800 to 2100  ,   आधारित  on  un  2010  projections   (   रेड   ,  orange , green  )   और  US  जनसांख्यिकी  Bureau historical  estimates  ( black  )   .
Actual  अंकित  population figures are  in  blue .
according   to  the highest estimate  ,   the   संसार  population may rise to  16  billion by 2100 ; according  to  the lowest estimate  ,  it  may  decline  to  6 billion .
the   संसार   जनसांख्यिकी  is  the  total number  of  living humans  on   धरती  .
As of today , it  is  estimated  to   क्रमांक  billion by the United States  जनसांख्यिकी  Bureau ( USCB ) .
The USCB  estimates  that the  संसार  population exceeded  7   अरब  on March  12   ,  2012  .
According to a  पृथक  estimate  by   the   संयुक्त  Nations Population Fund , it reached  इस  milestone on  अक्तूबर   31   ,  2011 .
The  संसार  population has experienced  निरन्तर  growth  चूंकि  the end of the Great  अकाल   और  the Black  मौत  in 1350 , when  it   stood   at  around 370 million .
the  highest rates of growth – global population increases above  1.8  % per  साल  –  यहूद   देखी  briefly during the 1950s  ,  and for a longer  काल  during the 1960s and  1970s  .
The  विकास  rate peaked at 2.2  %  in 1963 , and had declined to 1.1 % by  2011  .
कुल   सालाना  births were highest in the  लेट  1980s  at   परिचय  138 million , and are now expected  to  remain  essentially  constant at their  2011   स्तर  of 134 million  ,  while deaths number 56 million per year , and are expected to increase to 80 million per  साल   by  2040 .
Current  projections  show a  जारी  increase in population in the near future  (  but  a  steady decline in the population growth rate  )  ,  साथ  the global population expected to  पहुँचें  between  7.5  and  10.5  billion by 2050 .
विभिन्न  longer-term  estimates  predict further growth , stagnation , or even overall  मनाही  in  the   वैश्विक   जनसांख्यिकी  by 2150 .
Some analysts have questioned  the  sustainability of further world population growth , citing  the  growing pressures on the environment , global food supplies , and energy  संसाधन  .
Memphis is a city  in  the southwestern  कोने  of the U.S.  राज्य   of   टेनेसी  , and  the  county  सीट   of   शेल्बी   काउंटी   .
The city is  स्तिथ   on  the 4th Chickasaw  bluff  ,  दक्षिण  of  the  confluence  of  the  भेड़िया  and Mississippi rivers .
मेम्फिस   था   a   जनसांख्यिकी   of   672,277  in 2011 making it the largest  नगर  in  the  state  of  Tennessee ,  the   largest  city on the  मिसिसिपी   नदी  , the third  largest   in  the Southeastern United States , and the 20th largest in  the  United States .
The greater Memphis metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  , including adjacent counties in Mississippi and Arkansas , had  a   2010   जनसांख्यिकी  of 1,316,100  .
This makes Memphis the  दूसरी  largest  महानगर  area in Tennessee , surpassed  तभी   by  metropolitan Nashville  ,  which has overtaken Memphis in recent years  .
Memphis is the youngest of  टेनेसी   's  major cities .
A  निवासी  of Memphis is referred to as a  memphian   ,   और  the Memphis region is  ज्ञात  , particularly to media  आउटलेट  , as  ``   मेम्फिस  &  the  Mid-South  ``  .
the  Cattenom Nuclear Power Plant in France .
France produces around  तीन  quarters of  इसके  electricity  by  nuclear power .

Chancellor  एंजेला   मार्केल  's  गठबन्धन  announced on  may   30   ,  2011  ,  that  germany’s  17  नाभिकीय   शक्ति  stations will  be  shut  bas  by 2022 , in a  नीति  reversal following  जापानी  's  फुकुशिमा   daiichi  nuclear  विपत्ति   .
फिलहाल  , 68 reactors are  अंतर्गत  construction in 15  देशों   .
Nuclear  शक्ति  stations operate in  तीस   देशों  .
In 2010  ,   पहले   the  Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster  ,  it  थी  reported that an average of about 10 nuclear reactors were expected to become operational  प्रति   साल  , although according  to  the  संसार  Nuclear Association ,  of  the 17 civilian  रिएक्टरों  planned to become operational between 2007 and 2009 , only five actually came on  स्ट्रीम  .
As of June 2011  ,  Germany  और  Switzerland are  phasing-out  nuclear power  .
As of June 2011 ,  देशों   ऐसे  as Australia , Austria , Denmark  ,  Greece , Ireland ,  इटली  ,  लातवियाई  ,  liechtenstein  ,  ध्वज   ,  Malaysia , Malta , New Zealand  ,   नार्वे  and Portugal remain opposed  to  nuclear  शक्ति   .
Skeletal  मांसपेशियां   होमो   sapiens
This  is  a  तालिका   of  muscles of the human  anatomy  .
वहीँ  are approximately  642  skeletal muscles within  the  typical human , and almost every  मांसपेशी  constitutes one  भाग   of   a  pair of identical bilateral muscles  ,  found on both sides  ,  resulting in approximately 320 pairs of  मांसपेशियां  ,  as  presented in this article .
nevertheless  , the exact number is  मुश्किल  to  define  because different sources group  मांसपेशियां  differently , e.g . regarding  कया  is  पारिभाषित   as  different  भाग  of a  सिंगल   मांसपेशी   or  as several  मांसपेशियां  .
उदाहरण  range from 640 to 850 .
The muscles  of  the  इंसान  body can  be  categorized into a number of groups  जिससे  include muscles  relating   to  the  सिर   और   गर्दन   ,   मांसपेशियां  of the torso or trunk , muscles  of  the upper  limbs  , and muscles of  the  lower limbs .
the  action refers  to  the action of  प्रत्येक  muscle from the standard anatomical  स्थिति   .
in  other  स्थितियाँ  ,  अन्य  actions  may  be performed .

The  seminole   युद्धों   ,  also  ज्ञात  as the Florida Wars ,  यहूद  three  विरोध   in  Florida between the Seminole — the  सामूहिक  name given to the amalgamation  of   विभिन्न   समूह  of native  अमेरिकी  and Black people who settled in  फ्लोरिडा  in  the  early  18th  century — and the United States  फौज  .
The First Seminole  युद्ध  was from 1814 to 1819 ( although sources differ ) , the Second Seminole  युद्ध  from 1835 to  1842   ,  and the  तीसरा   seminole   युद्ध   इससे  1855  to  1858  .
The  पहला  conflict with the Seminoles arose out of tensions relating to General Andrew Jackson  's  attack  और  destruction of  नीग्रो   फोर्ट  in Florida in 1816 .
Jackson  भी   attacked  the Spanish at  pensacola  .
ultimately  , the Spanish Crown ceded the colony  to   संयुक्त  States rule .
Orono is a town in Penobscot County , Maine , United States .
it   थी  first settled in  1774   और  named in honor of Chief Joseph Orono of  the  Penobscot  स्वदेश  .
it  is  घर   to  The University of  maine  .
The population was 10,362  at  the  2010  census  .

Luxor  लास   वेगास  is a hotel  और   कसीनो   on  the  लास   वेगास  Strip in Paradise , Nevada .
The 30-story hotel , owned and  संचालित  by MGM  रिसॉर्ट   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   ,  has a casino with  over  2,000 slot machines and 87 table  खेल  .
in   the   2008  to 2009 renovation , it has a  नई  ,  अत्यधिक  modernized , and contemporary design and contains  a  total of 4,400 rooms , including 442 suites ,  अस्तर   the   आंतरिक   दीवारें  of  a  pyramid style tower  और  within twin 22-story ziggurat towers that  यहूद  built as later additions .
The hotel  is  named  बाद   the   नगर  of  लक्सर  (  प्राचीन  Thebes ) in Egypt .
Luxor is the  दूसरी  largest hotel  in  Las Vegas  (  the  largest  being the MGM Grand )  और  the eighth largest  in   the   संसार   .
As of 2010 , the Luxor  रै  a  4   कुंजी   दरजा   इससे  the Green Key Eco-Rating Program , which evaluates `` sustainable '' hotel operations  .
A pilot experiment , also  पुकारा  a  पायलट  study , is  a  small  स्केल  preliminary  पढ़ाई  conducted  in  order to evaluate  feasibility  , time , cost , adverse events ,  और  effect  आकार  (  सांख्यिकीय  variability )  in  an  attempt   to  predict an appropriate sample size and  improve   upon  the study design  prior  to  प्रदर्शन  of a  full-scale  research  प्रोजेक्ट  .
Pilot  अध्ययन  ,  इसलिए  ,  may  not be appropriate for case  अध्ययन  .
The Los  एंजिल्स  Fire Department ( LAFD )  is   the   एजेंसी   कि  provides  आग  protection and emergency medical  सेवाएं  for  the  city of  लॉस  Angeles .
It  may  be unofficially  referred  to as the Los Angeles City Fire Department to distinguish it from the  लॉस  Angeles County  आग  Department .
The acre is a  ईकाई  of area used  in  the imperial and U.S.  प्रथागत  systems .
An acre  is   परिचय   40  %  of  a hectare – slightly  छोटी   than   an  American football field .
The acre is no longer commonly used  ,  although a few notable exceptions include the  संयुक्त  States , Australia , Burma  और  the United Kingdom ( as of 2010 , the acre is no longer officially used in the  संयुक्त  Kingdom , though is still used  in  real estate descriptions ) .
It is still used , to some extent  ,  in  कनाडा   .
The international symbol of the acre is ac , and  is  defined as 1/640 of a  वर्गाकार  mile  .
The  सबसे  commonly used acre today is  the  international acre .
In  the  United  राज्य  both  the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  acre and  the  slightly different  us  survey acre  हैं  in  उपयोग  .
The  सबसे  common use  of  the  एकड़  is to measure tracts of land .
एक  international  एकड़  is defined  as  4046.8564224 square metres  .
दौरान  the Middle Ages  ,  an  एकड़  was the amount of  जमीन   कि   could  be plowed  in  one day with a  yoke  of oxen .

भाषा   प्रसंस्करण  refers to the way human beings  उपयोग  words  to   communicate  ideas and feelings ,  और   कैसा   ऐसे   संचार  are processed  और  understood .
यूँ  it is  कैसा   the   दिमाग  creates and  understands   भाषा  .
Most recent theories consider  कि   इस   प्रक्रम  is carried out entirely by and inside the  दिमाग  .
This  is  considered  एक  of the most  characteristic  abilities of  the   इंसान  species - perhaps the most characteristic  .
However very little is  ज्ञात  about it  और  there is huge scope for research  on   it  .
Most of the knowledge  acquired  to  तिथि  on the subject has  आइये   इससे  patients  जो  have  suffered  some type of significant head injury ,  whether  external ( wounds , bullets ) or  आतंरिक  (  स्ट्रोक्स  ,  tumors  , degenerative  रोगों  ) .
Studies have  दिखाया   कि  most of the language processing functions are  carried  out  in  the cerebral cortex .
The essential function of the cortical  भाषा  areas is symbolic representation .
भी  though language exists in different forms , all  of   उन्हें  are based on symbolic representation  .
The Bugatti Veyron EB 16.4  is  a  mid-engined  grand  touring  car ,  designed  and developed by the  volkswagen  Group  और   manufactured  in  molsheim   ,  France by Bugatti Automobiles S.A.S  .
The Super Sport  संस्करण  of the Veyron is the fastest street-legal  उत्पादन   car  in the world , with a  शीर्ष   गति  of .
The  असली  version has a top  गति  of  .
It was named Car  of  the  दशक  ( 2000–2009 )  by   the   बीबीसी  television programme Top Gear  .
The standard Veyron won Top Gears  बेहतरीन  Car Driven All Year  पुरस्कार   in  2005 .
On 6  अप्रैल  2013 , Bugatti set the record for  the   तीव्रतम  roadster in  the  world with  the  Veyron  ग्रैंड  Sport Vitesse , reaching on average a  शीर्ष   गति  of .
The Veyron 's chief designer was Hartmut Warkuss , and the exterior was designed by Jozef Kabaň of Volkswagen , with much of  the   अभियान्त्रिकी   कार्य  being conducted under the guidance  of  engineering  मुख्य  Wolfgang Schreiber  .
A number of special variants have  महरूम  produced .
In December  2010  ,  bugatti  began offering  prospective  buyers the ability  to  customize  exterior  and interiors colours by using the Veyron 16.4  configurator  application  on   the   marque  's official website .
dvd  is an optical disc  भंडार  format , invented and developed by Philips  ,  Sony  ,   तोशिबा   ,  and Panasonic in 1995 .
dvds   प्रस्ताव  higher storage capacity than  कॉम्पैक्ट  discs while having the same dimensions .
pre-recorded  DVDs are mass-produced  using  molding machines that  physically   स्टैम्प  data onto the DVD .
Such discs  हैं   ज्ञात  as DVD-  rom   ,   क्युकी  data can  तभी  be  पढ़ा  and not  लिखा  nor erased .
Blank  recordable  DVD  discs  ( DVD-R  और  DVD+R ) can  be   अंकित  once using a  dvd  recorder and  तब  function as a DVD-ROM . Rewritable  dvds  (  dvd-rw   ,  DVD+RW ,  और   dvd-ram  ) can be recorded and erased multiple  टाइम्स  .
dvds   हैं  used  in  DVD-Video consumer digital video  स्वरूप   और  in  dvd-audio   उपभोक्ता   डिजिटल  audio format  ,  as  खूब  as  लिये  authoring AVCHD discs .
DVDs  containing   अन्य  types of information may be referred to  as   dvd   आंकड़ा  discs .
कया  Chilli Wants is  an  American reality  श्रेणी  on VH1 starring Chilli , one-third of the  ग्रैमी   पुरस्कार  -winning  r  & B trio TLC .
The  दिखाएँ  chronicles Chilli  's   क्वेस्ट  to find love  साथ  the help of Tionna T.  smalls  , an author and relationship coach  .
The series premiered on April 11 , 2010 ,  और   रै   चूंकि  been renewed  लिये  a second season .
the  second season  premiered  on  संडे  , January 2 , 2011  .
Peter Gene Hernandez (  born  October 8  ,  1985 ) , known by  उसके   स्टेज  name Bruno Mars , is an American singer-songwriter and record  निर्माता   .
Raised in Honolulu ,  हवाई  ,  by  a  परिवार  of  संगीतकारों  ,  मंगल   began   बनाना  music  at  a young  आयु  and  performed  in various musical  venues  in his hometown throughout his childhood  .
he  graduated  इससे  high school and then moved  to  Los Angeles  ,  California , to pursue a musical career .
Mars produced  गीतों   लिये   अन्य   कलाकारों  , joining  उत्पादन  team The  smeezingtons  .
मंगल  had  an  unsuccessful stint with Motown Records  ,   लकिन  then signed  साथ  Atlantic in  2009   .
He became recognized as a  सोलो  artist after lending his  vocals  and co-writing the hooks for  the   गीतों  `` Nothin  '  on You  ``   by  B.o.B ,  और   ``  Billionaire `` by Travie  मैककॉय  .
He also  co-wrote  the  हिट्स   ``   सही  Round ``  by  Flo Rida featuring Ke  $  ha ,  और  ``  wavin  ' Flag ``  by  K'naan .
In October 2010 , he released his  डेब्यू  album  ,  Doo-Wops & Hooligans .
Anchored  by  the  विश्वव्यापी   number-one  singles `` Just the Way  तुम  Are  ``  and `` Grenade ``  ,   the  album peaked at  क्रमांक   तीन  on the Billboard 200  .
मंगल  was nominated  लिये  seven  grammys   at   the  53rd  ग्रैमी   पुरस्कार  , winning  बेहतरीन  Male Pop Vocal Performance for `` Just  the   रास्ता  You Are ''  .
His second studio  एल्बम  ,  अपरंपरागत  Jukebox  ,  was released  on  December 11 ,  2012   .
Mars ' music  is  noted for displaying a  चौड़ी  variety of styles and influences , and contains  तत्व  of many  musical  genres  .
he  has  worked  with an assortment  of  artists from various  जाति   .
As a child , he  थी   अत्यधिक   बहकावे  by artists such as Little  रिचर्ड  , Elvis  प्रेस्ली  and Michael Jackson and would often  impersonate  these artists from a young age .
मंगल  also incorporates  रेगी  -  और  Motown -inspired sounds  into   उसके   कार्य   .
Worldwide , Mars became the best-selling  डिजिटल  artist in 2011 .
he  had three singles in the  शीर्ष  ten , including first place with `` Just the  रास्ता   तुम  Are  ''  , which  बेची   12.5  million  नक़ल  .
Mars  जीती  Best  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   पुरूष  Solo Artist at  the  2012 BRIT Awards  .
Bruno Mars  रै   बेची  6 million albums and 40 million singles worldwide as a singer  .
Althought as a song-writer , producer and singer  उसके   कुल  single download  बिक्री   surpass  100 million  विश्वव्यापी  .

Greek  mythology   is  the body of myths and teachings  कि  belong to the ancient  यूनानियों  , concerning their  देवताओं   और  heroes , the  प्रकृति   of   the  world  ,   और  the origins  और   significance  of their own cult and ritual practices .
it   थी  a part  of  the religion in  प्राचीन  Greece  और  is part of religion in  आधुनिक  Greece  और  around the  संसार  , known as Hellenismos .
Modern scholars refer  to  and  पढ़ाई  the myths in an attempt to throw light on the religious and political institutions of  प्राचीन  Greece  और  its civilization  ,  and to  लाभ  understanding  of  the  प्रकृति  of myth-making itself .
Greek  mythology  is explicitly  समाविष्ट  in  a  large collection  of  narratives , and  implicitly  in Greek representational  कला  , such as  vase-paintings  and votive gifts .
यूनानी   मिथक  attempts to explain the origins  of   the   संसार   ,   और  details the  जीवनदान   और  adventures of a wide variety of gods  ,  goddesses ,  नायक   ,   heroines  , and mythological  जीव   .
These  खाते   initially   यहूद   disseminated   in  an  oral-poetic  tradition ; today the Greek myths  हैं   ज्ञात   primarily  from Greek literature .
The oldest known  यूनानी  literary sources  ,   होमर  's epic  कविताएं  Iliad and  ओडिसी  , focus on events surrounding  the   trojan  War .
दो  poems by Homer 's near contemporary Hesiod , the Theogony and the  works  and Days  ,   contain   खाते   of   the  genesis  of  the world , the succession of divine rulers ,  the   उत्तराधिकार   of  human  आयु  , the origin of human woes , and  the  origin  of  sacrificial  practices  .
Myths  हैं  also preserved in the  homeric   hymns  , in fragments of epic poems of the Epic  साईकिल  , in lyric  कविताएं  ,  in   the  works  of   the   tragedians  of the fifth  सदी  BC , in  कृतियाँ  of scholars and poets  of  the  hellenistic  Age  ,  and in  ग्रन्थ  from  the   समय   of   the  Roman Empire by writers such  as  Plutarch  और   pausanias   .
पुरातत्व   निष्कर्षों  provide  a   प्रिंसिपल   सोर्स  of detail about Greek mythology ,  साथ   देवताओं  and heroes  प्रदर्शित  prominently  in  the decoration of many artifacts  .
Geometric designs on  pottery  of the  आठवीं  century BC depict scenes from  the  Trojan cycle as  खूब   as  the adventures of  heracles  .
in  the succeeding  archaic   ,   शास्त्रीय  , and  hellenistic  periods  ,  Homeric and  विभिन्न   अन्य   पौराणिक   दृश्यों   appear  , supplementing  the  existing literary  प्रमाण  .
यूनानी   mythology   रै   था  an extensive influence on the  संस्कृति  , arts , and literature of Western civilization and remains part  of  Western  विरासत   और  language  .
Poets and  कलाकारों   इससे   प्राचीन  times  to  the present  have   निकला   प्रेरणा  from Greek  mythology  and  have  discovered contemporary significance  और  relevance in the  विषयवस्तु  .
