Mouth & MacNeal was a  पॉप  duo  इससे  the Netherlands .
They are best  ज्ञात  for their million selling recording  of  `` How  do  You  do  `` .
the  Boise State Broncos football  कार्यक्रम  represents Boise State University  in  college football and  compete  in  the  Football  कटोरी   subdivision  (  fbs  )  of   प्रभाग  I as a  सदस्य   of  the  पहाड़  West Conference .
They are currently  led   by  head coach Chris Petersen and play their home games at  bronco   स्टेडियम  .
The franc ( sign  :  Fr . or SFr . ;  जर्मनी  :  franken  , French and Romansh  :  franc , Italian :  फ्रेंको  ; code : CHF ) is the currency and legal tender of  स्विट्ज़रलैंड   और  Liechtenstein  ;   it  is  भी   विधिक  tender in the  इतालवी   exclave   campione  d'Italia  .
हालांकि  not  formally   विधिक  tender in  the  German  exclave  Büsingen ( the sole legal currency  is  the euro ) ,  it  is in wide daily use  वहीँ  .
The Swiss National Bank  मुद्दे   banknotes   और  the  संघीय  mint  swissmint  issues coins .
the  Swiss  फ़्रैंक   is  the only version of  the  franc still issued in Europe  .
the  smaller  denomination   ,  a hundredth  of   a  franc , is a  rappen   (  Rp . ) in German , centime (  c.  ) in French  ,  centesimo ( ct.  )  in  इतालवी   ,  and rap (  rp  . )  in  Romansh  .
the   आईएसओ  code  of  the currency used by banks  और   वित्तीय  institutions is CHF ,  हालांकि   ``   fr  .  ''  is used by most businesses and advertisers ;  कुछ  use SFr . ; the Latinate `` CH  ''   स्टैंड  for Confoederatio Helvetica .
दिए  the different languages used in Switzerland , Latin  is  used for language-neutral inscriptions on the coins .
सर  Charles  स्पेंसर  `` Charlie  ''   चैपलिन   ,  (  16   अप्रैल  188925 December 1977  )   थी  a British comic  कर्ता   और   फिल्मकार  who rose to  कीर्ति  in the silent era .
Chaplin  became   a  worldwide icon through  उसके  screen persona  ``   the  Tramp `` and is considered one of the most important figures  of  the film industry .
उसके   करियर   spanned   अधिक  than 75  सालो  , from a child in the Victorian era to close to his death  at  the age of 88 , and  encompassed  both adulation and controversy .
Raised in London  ,  Chaplin  's  childhood was defined  by  poverty and hardship  .
He was sent to a workhouse twice  पहले  the age of nine ; his father was  अनुपस्थित  , and his  माँ   थी  committed to  a   दिमागी  asylum  .
Chaplin  began  performing from  a  young age , touring music halls and later working as a  स्टेज  actor and comedian .
At 19  he  was signed to the  prestigious   फ्रेड   karno  company , which took  उसे  to America  .
Chaplin  थी  scouted by the film  उद्योग  , and made  उसके  first appearances in 1914 with Keystone  studios  .
He soon developed the Tramp  persona   और   formed   a  large fan  आधार   .
चैपलिन   निर्देशित  his films from an  जल्दी  stage ,  और   जारी  to hone his craft as he moved to  the  Essanay , Mutual , and  पहला   नेशनल  corporations  .
By  1918   ,  he was one of  the  most  प्रसिद्ध  men in  the  world  .
In 1919  ,  Chaplin co-founded  the  distribution  कम्पनी  United Artists  ,  giving  उसे  complete  कंट्रोल   over  his films .
His first feature-length  चित्र  was The  बच्चा  (  1921   )   ,   followed   by  A Woman  of   पेरिस  ( 1923 ) ,  the  Gold Rush  (   1925   )   ,  and The Circus (  1928  ) .
He refused to move  to   ध्वनि  films in the 1930s ,  बजाय  producing City Lights (  1931   )  and  आधुनिक  Times ( 1936 ) without dialogue .
चैपलिन   became  increasingly political  और   उसके  next  फिल्मी   ,  The  ग्रेट  Dictator ( 1940  )   ,  satirised  एडोल्फ  Hitler  .
The  1940s  was a decade marked  साथ  controversy  लिये  Chaplin ,  और  his popularity declined rapidly .
He was  अभियुक्त   of   कम्युनिस्ट   sympathies   ,  while his involvement in a paternity  सूट  and marriages to much younger women were  माना  scandalous .
An FBI investigation was  खोली  on  चैपलिन  ,  और  he was eventually forced to  छोड़   the   संयुक्त   राज्य  and  settle  in Switzerland .
He  abandoned  the  ट्रैम्प  for  उसके  later films , which include  monsieur  Verdoux ( 1947 ) , Limelight  (   1952  ) , A King in New York ( 1957  )  ,  और  A Countess From  हांग  Kong ( 1967 ) .
Chaplin wrote , directed ,  उत्पादित  , edited , scored , and starred in most of his  films  .
He was a perfectionist , and his financial independence  meant  he often  खर्च   सालो  on the development and production of  a   चित्र  .
His films are characterised by  slapstick   संयुक्त  with pathos , and often  विशेषता   the   ट्रैम्प  struggling against adversity .
अनेक   contain  social and  राजनैतिक  themes  ,  as well as autobiographical  तत्व  .
In 1972  ,  as part of a renewed appreciation for his work , Chaplin received an Honorary Academy Award  लिये   ``  the incalculable effect he has  था  in making motion pictures the art  रूप  of this century '' .
He continues  to   be  held in  ऊँची  regard , with The Gold  फटाफट   ,  City Lights , Modern  टाइम्स  , and  the  Great Dictator  प्रायः   क्रमित  among the greatest films of all time .
नियोजित   parenthood  Federation of America ( PPFA ) , commonly  shortened   to  Planned Parenthood , is  the  U.S.  संबद्ध  of the International Planned Parenthood  संघ  ( IPPF ) and  एक  of its larger members .
PPFA is a  non-profit  organization  providing  reproductive health  और  maternal and  चाइल्ड  health  सेवाएं   .
The Planned Parenthood Action Fund , Inc. (  ppaf  ) is a  सम्बन्धित  organization which lobbies for  pro-choice   विधान   ,  comprehensive sex education , and  अभिगम   to  affordable  स्वास्थ्य  care in the United  राज्य  .
Planned Parenthood is  the  largest U.S. provider  of  reproductive health  सेवाएं  , including  कर्कट  screening  ,  HIV screening and  counseling   ,  contraception  ,  and abortion .
निरोधक   खाते  for 35 % of  ppfa  's  कुल  services and abortions account for  3  %  ;  PPFA  conducts  roughly 300,000 abortions each  साल  , among  3  million people served  .
the  organization has  इसके  roots  in  Brooklyn , New York  ,  where Margaret Sanger  खोली   the  country 's first birth-control  क्लिनिक  .
Sanger  संस्थापित  the  अमरीकी   जनम   कंट्रोल  League  in  1921 , which in  1942  became  भाग  of  the  Planned  parenthood  Federation of America  .
Since then , Planned Parenthood  रै   grown  to have  over  820  क्लिनिक  locations in the U.S.  ,  with a total budget of US $ 1 billion .
ppfa   provides  an array of services to over  तीन  million  लोगों  in the United States , and supports services  लिये  over  एक  million clients outside  the  United  राज्य  .
Mens  rea  is Latin for  ``   अपराधी  mind '' .
In criminal law , it is viewed as  एक   of   the   जरुरी  elements of  कुछ   अपराधों   .
The  मानक  common law test  of  criminal  देयता   is   प्रायः  expressed  in  the Latin phrase , actus non facit reum nisi mens sit  rea   ,  which means ``  the  act is  नहीं  culpable unless the mind  is  guilty ''  .
Thus , in jurisdictions with due  प्रक्रम  , there must be  an   actus   reus  , or `` guilty  अधिनियम  ,  ''  accompanied by  कुछ  level of mens  rea  to constitute  the   अपराधों  with which  the  defendant is charged (  देखिए   the  technical requirement  of   concurrence   )  .
As a general rule , criminal  देयता  does not attach to  a   व्यक्ति  who  acted  with  the  absence of  दिमागी  fault .
The exception is strict  देयता  crimes .
In  सिविल   विधि   ,   it  is usually not necessary to  prove  a subjective mental element  to  establish  देयता  for  उल्लंघन  of contract or tort ,  लिये  example .
however  ,  if  a tort is  intentionally  committed or a contract is intentionally breached  ,   ऐसे  intent  may   बढ़ाएँ   the   पैमाना  of  देयता   as   खूब   as   the  measure  of  damages  देय  to the plaintiff  .
Therefore , mens rea  refers  to the  दिमागी  element  of  the  अपराध  that accompanies the  actus   reus  .
In some jurisdictions , the terms mens rea and actus reus  have  been replaced by  वैकल्पिक  terminology .
In Australia ,  लिये  example ,  the   तत्व  of  the   संघीय  offences are now  designated  as ``  दोष  elements  ''  or  ``  mental  तत्व  '' ( mens rea  )  and  ``  physical elements  ''  or `` external  तत्व   ''  (  actus   reus  ) .
This terminology was adopted to  बदलें  the obscurity of the Latin terms with simple  और   सटीक  phrasing .
Ulysses S. Grant ( born Hiram Ulysses Grant ; April 27  ,  1822 – July 23 ,  1885  ) was the  18th  President  of  the  संयुक्त  States ( 1869–1877 )  following  his  अत्यधिक   कामयाब  role as a  युद्ध  general in  the  second  हाफ  of  the   सिविल   युद्ध  .
अंतर्गत  Grant ,  the  Union  फौज   पराजित   the  Confederate military ; having  effectively  ended the war and  secession   साथ  the surrender  of   रॉबर्ट  E.  ली  's army at  appomattox  .
As president he led  the   कट्टरपंथी   republicans   in   उनके  effort  to  eliminate all vestiges  of   confederate  nationalism and slavery .
Upset over  uncontrolled   हिंसा  in the South  और  having desired  to   protect  African  अमरीकी  citizenship , President Grant effectively destroyed  the  Ku Klux Klan in 1871 .
Grant  थी  the first President to establish Civil  सेवा   सुधार   having   निर्मित   a   two-year  federally funded Civil  सेवा   आयोग  in 1871 .
in   शर्तें  of foreign  नीति   ,  Grant revealed an ``  अनपेक्षित  capacity for deliberation  और  consultation '' that promoted the national  ब्याज  .
उसके  reputation  थी  marred by  उसके  repeated defense  of  corrupt appointees , and by America 's first industrial age economic depression ( called the  ``   दहशत   of  1873 ``  )  that  वर्चस्व  his second term  .
Although his  रिपब्लिकन  Party  विभाजित  in  1872  with reformers denouncing him , Grant was easily reelected  .
by  1875 the conservative white Southern opposition regained control  of  every state in the South and as he  बाएँ  the  श्वेत  House  in  March 1877 his  नीतियों   यहूद   होने   undone  .
A career  सिपाही  , he graduated  इससे  the United States Military Academy  at  West  पाइंट  and served in the Mexican–American  युद्ध  .
जब  the Civil  युद्ध  began in  1861  , Grant trained Union volunteer  regiments   in  Illinois .
In 1862 ,  as  a general he  लड़ा  a series  of  battles and  थी  promoted  to  major  सामान्य   बाद  forcing the  आत्मसमर्पण  of a  विशाल  Confederate army  और   gaining  control of Kentucky and most  of  Tennessee .
He  तब   led  Union forces to victory after initial setbacks in the  बैटल   of  Shiloh  ,   कमाई  a reputation  as  an aggressive commander .
in   जुलाई  1863 ,  बाद  a long ,  जटिल   अभियान  ,  ग्रान्ट  defeated five uncoordinated Confederate  सेना   (  capturing one  of  them  )  and  जब्त  Vicksburg .
इस  famous  विजय  gave the Union  पूरा   कंट्रोल  of the  मिसिसिपी   नदी   ,  split off  the  western  confederacy  , and opened  the  way for more Union triumphs .
After another win at the Battle  of  Chattanooga in late 1863 , President Abraham Lincoln made  उसे   लेफ्टिनेंट  general and commander  of  all of the  संघ  Armies .
As  commanding  general  of  the army , Grant confronted Robert  E.   ली   in   a  series  of  very bloody battles in 1864 known as the  overland  Campaign that ended with the bottling up of Lee  at  Petersburg , outside  the   confederate  capital  of  Richmond .
During the siege , Grant coordinated a series  of  devastating campaigns launched by William Tecumseh  शरमन   ,  Philip Sheridan ,  और  George Thomas .
आखिरकार  breaking through  ली  's trenches , the Union  फौज  captured Richmond in April  1865   .
Lee  surrendered  his depleted forces to  ग्रान्ट  at  appomattox  as  the  Confederacy  collapsed   .
हालांकि  pro-Confederate historians attacked  ग्रान्ट  as a  निष्ठुर   कसाई  who  जीती  by brute force ,  सबसे  historians have  hailed   उसके   सैन्य  genius .
Grant 's two consecutive terms as  अध्यक्ष   stabilized  the nation after the  अमरीकी  Civil  युद्ध  and  दौरान   the  turbulent Reconstruction period that followed  .
as  president ,  he  enforced Reconstruction by enforcing civil rights  कानून   और   लड़  Ku Klux Klan  हिंसा   .
ग्रान्ट  won passage  of   the  Fifteenth Amendment ;  giving  constitutional  सुरक्षा  for African-American voting  अधिकारों  .
he   प्रयुक्त   the   फौज  to build  the  Republican  पार्टी   in   the  South , based on black voters , Northern newcomers ( ``  carpetbaggers   ``   )  and native  श्वेत   समर्थक  ( `` Scalawags .  ''   )
As a result  ,   अफ़्रीकी  Americans  यहूद  represented in  the  U.S.  कॉंग्रेस  for the  पहला  time in  अमरीकी  history  in  1870 .
reformers   praised  Grant 's Indian  सलाम   नीति   by  having broken the deadlock on  भारतीय   appropriations   in  Congress , the  सृष्टि   of  the  फलक   of  Indian  commissioners  to  मेक  reform  सुझाव  , and his enlistment of Quaker  protestants  who controlled mid western Indian  एजेंसियों  ,  कि  effectively  curbed   congressional   patronage  .
ग्रान्ट   remained  determined in  keeping  Indians  इससे  being  exterminated   इससे   श्वेत   settler  encroachment  or  by the  u.S.  military .
ग्रान्ट  's reputation as  अध्यक्ष  by  1875   थी   at   an  all-time high for his previous veto of the Inflation  विधेयक   ,  the  ड्योढ़ी  of  the  Resumption  of  Specie Act , and Secretary  bristow  's  कामयाब   छापे   कि  shut down  the  Whiskey  रिंग  .
ग्रान्ट   's   विदेशी  policy  ,  led by  सचिव  of State Hamilton  मछली  , implemented International Arbitration ,  settled  the  अलबामा  Claims with  ब्रिटेन  and avoided war with Spain over  the   virginius   affair   .
A  ज्यूकबॉक्स   is  a partially automated  music-playing  device , usually a coin-operated  यंत्र  ,  कि   होगा   खेल  a patron 's selection from self-contained media .
The classic jukebox  रै   बटन  with  अक्षर   और  numbers on  उन्हें  that ,  जब  entered in combination , are used  to  play a  विशिष्ट   चयन   .
A  ड्रग   परीक्षण  is a  तकनीकी  analysis of  a   biological  specimen –  लिये  example urine , hair , blood  ,   स्वेद  ,  or   मौखिक  fluid  /   लार   –  to determine  the  presence or  अनुपस्थिति  of specified parent drugs or  उनके   metabolites  .
प्रमुख  uses of  ड्रग  testing are to  detect   the  presence  of  performance enhancing steroids  in   खेल   or   लिये  drugs prohibited by laws  ,  such  as  cannabis , cocaine and  हेरोइन  .
A `` 10-panel urine screen  ''  consists of  the  following:
Amphetamines ( including Methamphetamine )
barbiturates
benzodiazepines
Cannabinoids  (  THC )
Cocaine
Methadone
Methaqualone
opiates  (  codeine  , Morphine ,  हेरोइन   ,  Oxycodone  ,  Hydrocodone , etc . )
Phencyclidine ( PCP  )
Propoxyphene
Saturn  v  rocket , used  लिये  the American manned lunar landing  मिशन
स्पेस   खोजी  is the discovery and exploration of outer  स्पेस  by means of space technology  .
शारीरिक  exploration of  स्पेस  is conducted both  by   इंसान   spaceflights  and  by  robotic spacecraft .
While the  अवलोकन   of  objects  in  space  ,  known  as  astronomy , predates reliable recorded history , it was the development of large and  अपेक्षाकृत  efficient rockets during the early 20th century that  अनुमत  physical space exploration to become a  वास्तविकता   .
Common  rationales   लिये  exploring  स्पेस   शामिल  advancing scientific research , uniting  अलग  nations ,  ensuring  the future  अस्तित्व  of humanity  और   विकासशील  military and  रणनीतिक  advantages  विरूद्ध   अन्य   देशों  .
Various  आलोचनाओं  of space exploration  हैं  sometimes  बना  .
Space  खोजी   रै  often been  प्रयुक्त  as a proxy competition  लिये  geopolitical rivalries  ऐसे   as  the  ठंडा   युद्ध   .
The  जल्दी   era   of  space exploration was driven  by   a  `` Space  रेस  `` between the Soviet Union and the  संयुक्त  States , the launch  of  the first man-made object  to   कक्षा  the  धरती  , the  ussr  's Sputnik 1 ,  on   4  October 1957  ,  and the first Moon landing by the American Apollo  11   शिल्प  on 20  जुलाई   1969  are often taken as  the  boundaries for  इस   आरंभिक  period .
The  सोवियत   स्पेस   कार्यक्रम  achieved many  of   the  first milestones  ,   सहित   the   पहला  living  होने   in  orbit in 1957 ,  the  first human spaceflight (  यूरी  Gagarin  सवार  Vostok 1 )  in   1961  ,  the  first spacewalk ( by Aleksei  leonov  ) on 18 March 1965 , the first automatic  लैंडिंग  on another  celestial  body  in  1966 , and  the  launch of the first space  स्टेशन  ( Salyut 1  )   in   1971  .
After the first  20  years of  खोजी  , focus shifted from  one-off   फ़्लाइट  to  बेदर्दी  hardware , such as the Space  शटल   कार्यक्रम   ,  and  इससे   प्रतियोगिता   to  cooperation  as  with the International Space Station ( ISS  )  .
With the substantial completion of  the  ISS following  sts-133  in  कूच  2011  ,   योजनाएँ   लिये   स्पेस  exploration by the USA remain in flux .
Constellation , a  बुश  Administration program for a return  to  the Moon by 2020  थी  judged  inadequately  funded and unrealistic by  an  expert  पुनर्विलोकन  panel reporting  in  2009 .
the  Obama  प्रशासन  proposed a  संशोधन   of  Constellation  in  2010  to  focus on the development of the  काबिलियत  for crewed missions beyond low  धरती   कक्षा  ( LEO ) , envisioning  extending  the operation of  the  ISS beyond 2020 , transferring the development of launch vehicles for human crews from  नासा  to  the  private  सेक्टर   ,   और   विकासशील  technology to enable missions to beyond LEO ,  ऐसे  as  earth/moon   l1  ,  the  Moon ,  earth/sun  L2 , near-earth asteroids , and Phobos or  मंगल  orbit .
as  of March 2011  ,   the  US Senate  और   हाउस  of  प्रतिनिधि  are still  working  towards  a  compromise NASA funding bill , which will probably  terminate  Constellation and fund  विकास  of  a  heavy  लिफ्ट  launch vehicle  (  HLLV ) .
In the 2000s  ,  the  लोगों  's  गणतंत्र  of China initiated a successful manned spaceflight program  ,  while the  यूरोपीय  Union ,  जापानी   ,   और  India  have   भी  planned future manned space missions .
China  ,   रूस  , Japan ,  और   इण्डिया  have advocated manned missions to  the  Moon  दौरान  the 21st century , while the  यूरोपीय  Union has advocated manned missions to  दोनो   the  Moon and Mars  दौरान  the 21st century .
From the  1990s  onwards  ,  private  रूचि   began   promoting  space tourism and  तब  private  स्पेस   खोजी  of the Moon  (  see Google Lunar  x  Prize )  .
जॉन   calvin  Coolidge , Jr.  (  July  4  , 1872January 5 , 1933 ) was  the   30th   अध्यक्ष  of the United States  (  1923–1929 ) .
A Republican lawyer from Vermont ,  कूलिज  worked  उसके  way up  the   सीढ़ियाँ   of   मैसाचुसेट्स  state politics , eventually becoming  राज्यपाल   of  that  राज्य  .
उसके   conduct  during the  बोस्टन  Police Strike of  1919   thrust  him  into  the national spotlight and gave him a  प्रतिष्ठा  as a man of decisive action .
जल्द  after  ,  he was elected  as   the  29th Vice President in 1920  और   succeeded  to the Presidency upon the sudden  मौत  of Warren G. Harding  in   1923  .
निर्वाचित  in his  अपना  right in  1924  , he gained a  प्रतिष्ठा  as a small-government conservative , and also as a man who  कहा  very  छोटी  .
कूलिज  restored public confidence  in  the White House  बाद  the  घोटालों  of his predecessor  's  administration , and  बाएँ   दफ्तर  with considerable  लोकप्रियता  .
as   a  Coolidge biographer put it  ,  ``  he  embodied the spirit  और  hopes of the  मध्य  class , could interpret their longings and express  उनके   राय   .
That he did  represent  the genius of the average is the most convincing  प्रमाण  of his strength . ''
कुछ  later criticized  कूलिज  as part of a  सामान्य  criticism of laissez-faire  सरकारी  .
उसके  reputation underwent a renaissance during  the  Ronald Reagan Administration , but the  परम  assessment of his presidency is still divided between those  जो  approve of his reduction of  the  size of  सरकारी   कार्यक्रम  and those who  मानना  the federal  सरकारी  should be  अधिक  involved in regulating and controlling  the  economy  .
Espresso  is  a concentrated  पेय  brewed by forcing a small amount  of  nearly boiling water  अंतर्गत  pressure  through  finely ground coffee beans .
एस्प्रेसो  often has a thicker consistency than coffee brewed by  अन्य   विधि   ,  a higher concentration of suspended  और  dissolved solids , and  crema  (  अर्थ  cream , but being a reference to the foam with a creamy  बनावट   कि   फ़ॉर्म  as  a   परिणाम  of  the   दबाव   )   .
As a  परिणाम   of  the pressurized  brewing  process the  जायका  and chemicals in a typical cup  of  espresso are very concentrated  .
Espresso is the  आधार  for  अन्य  drinks ,  ऐसे   as  a latte , cappuccino , macchiato ,  मोचा   ,   or  americano .
Espresso has more  कैफीन   प्रति  unit volume than most beverages  ,   लकिन   the  usual serving  आकार  is smaller—a  ठेठ   60  mL (  2  US fluid ounce ) of  एस्प्रेसो   रै  80 to 150 mg  of  caffeine  ,  little  कम   than   the  95 to  200   mg  of a standard 240 mL ( 8 US fluid ounces ) cup  of   drip-brewed   कॉफी  .
Brian Keith Kelly  (  born October 25  ,   1961  ) is an American football coach and former player .
He is currently the head football coach for  the  Notre Dame Fighting  आयरिश  , a  स्थिति  he has held since December 2009 .
Kelly was previously head coach at Grand Valley  राज्य  University ( 1991–2003 ) , Central Michigan University  (  2004–2006 ) ,  और  University of Cincinnati ( 2006–2009  )   .
A contract  is   an  agreement having a lawful  ऑब्जेक्ट  entered into  voluntarily  by two  or  more parties  ,   प्रत्येक  of whom  intends  to create  एक  or more legal  दायित्वों  between them  .
The elements  of  a contract are  ``   प्रस्ताव  '' and  ``   स्वीकृति   ''   by  ``  competent  persons '' having  विधिक   क्षमता  who  एक्सचेंज  `` consideration  ''   to  create `` mutuality of  दायित्व  . ''
Proof of  कुछ  or all of these elements  may  be  किया  in  लिखने  ,  हालांकि  contracts may be  बना  entirely orally  or  by conduct .
the   उपाय   लिये  breach of  अनुबंध  can  be   ``  damages '' in the  रूप   of  compensation  of  money or specific performance enforced  through   an  injunction  .
Both  of  these remedies  पुरस्कार  the party at  घाटा  the  ``  benefit of the  सौदेबाजी   ''  or expectation damages , which are  वृहद  than mere reliance damages ,  as  in  promissory   estoppel   .
The  पार्टियों   may  be  प्राकृतिक  persons or juristic persons .
A  अनुबंध   is  a  legally  enforceable promise  or  undertaking that  कुछ  will  or  will not occur  .
the   शब्द  promise can be used as a legal synonym for contract , although  परवाह   is  required as a  वादा  may not have the full standing  of  a  अनुबंध  ,  as  when it  is  an  अनुबंध  without consideration .
Contract law varies greatly from  एक  jurisdiction to another , including  मतभेद  in  आम  law  compared  to civil  विधि  , the  प्रभाव  of  प्राप्त  law  ,  particularly  इससे   इंग्लैण्ड  in common law  देशों   ,  and of  विधि  codified in  क्षेत्रीय  legislation .
Regarding Australian Contract Law for example  ,  there are 40 relevant  अधिनियमों  which impact  on   the  interpretation  of   अनुबंध  at the  राष्ट्रमंडल  ( Federal  /  national  )  level , and an  अतिरिक्त  26 acts at the level  of  the state of NSW  .
In addition  वहीँ   हैं  6 international instruments or  प्रथाओं  which are applicable  लिये   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   dealings  , such  as  the  संयुक्त  Nations  सम्मेलन  on  अनुबंध  for  the  International Sale of Goods .
sidney   पैट्रिक  Crosby , ONS (  born  August  7  , 1987 )  is   a  Canadian professional ice hockey player who  is   कप्तान  of the Pittsburgh Penguins  of  the  नेशनल  Hockey League  (  NHL  )  .
Crosby was drafted  पहला  overall  by  the  penguins  out of the  क्यूबेक  Major  जूनियर  Hockey League ( QMJHL  )  .
During his  two-year  major junior career with  the   rimouski  Océanic  ,  he  अर्जित  back-to-back CHL Player of the  साल  awards  और  led his club to the 2005  मेमोरियल   कप   फाइनल   .
Nicknamed `` The  अगला  One  ``   ,  he was one  of   the   सबसे  highly regarded draft  चयन  in hockey history  ,  leading many to  refer  to the  2005  Draft Lottery as the ``  sidney  Crosby Sweepstakes '' .
In his first NHL season ,  crosby   समाप्त   छठे  in league scoring with 102 points ( 39 goals , 63 assists ) and  थी   a  runner-up for the  calder  Memorial  ट्रॉफी  (  जीती   by   सिकंदर  Ovechkin ) .
By his  दूसरी   ऋतु  , he led the NHL with 120 points ( 36 goals  ,  84 assists ) to  कैप्चर  the Art Ross Trophy , becoming  the  youngest  खिलाड़ी  and  the  only teenager  to  win a scoring  शीर्षक  in  कोई   प्रमुख  North American  खेल  league  .
That same season  ,   crosby  also won  the   हार्ट  Memorial  ट्रॉफी  as  the  Professional  हॉकी  Writers Association  's   चुनाव   लिये   सबसे  valuable  खिलाड़ी  and the  लेस्टर  B. Pearson Award as the NHL Players Association 's  चुनाव  for  सबसे  outstanding  खिलाड़ी  , becoming the seventh player in NHL  इतिहास   to  earn all three awards  in  one  साल  .
Crosby  प्रारंभ  the 2007–08  ऋतु  with  the  team 's captaincy  और  subsequently led  उन्हें  to the 2008 Stanley  कप  Finals , where they were defeated  by  the Detroit Red  विंग्स  in six games .
The Penguins returned to  the  Finals against Detroit the following  साल  and  जीती  in seven games ; Crosby became the youngest captain in  एनएचएल  history to  जीत   the  Stanley Cup  .
In the  2009–10   ऋतु   ,  Crosby  scored  a career-high  51   लक्ष्य  ,  tying  him with Steven Stamkos  लिये  the Rocket Richard  ट्रॉफी   as   the  league-leader ; with 58 assists , he totaled 109  अंक  , second  in  the  एनएचएल  .
During  the   off-season  , Crosby received the Mark Messier Leadership Award .
in  2010–11 , Crosby sustained a concussion  as  a result  of  hits to  the  head in back-to-back  खेल   .
The injury left him sidelined for  टेन  and a half  महीने  .
However , after playing  आठ   खेल  in the 2011–12  ऋतु  , Crosby  's  concussion-like  लक्षण  returned in December  2011   ,  and he  किया   नहीं  return until mid-March 2012 .
Internationally  ,  Crosby  रै  represented  कनाडा  in numerous  tournaments  for the country  's  junior and men  's  teams  .
After competing  in  the 2003 U-18 Junior World  कप  , he represented Canada in back-to-back IIHF World  u20  Championships  ,  winning silver  in  2004 and gold in 2005  .
At the 2006 IIHF World Championship ,  he   led   the  tournament in scoring  ,   जबकि  also  कमाई  Top Forward  और  All-Star Team honours .
Four years later , Crosby was named to Team Canada for  the  2010 Winter  ओलंपिक   in   वैंकूवर  .
Playing the  संयुक्त   राज्य   in  the gold medal  खेल   ,  he  scored   the  game-winning goal in overtime .
A United  राज्य  cent , also  ज्ञात  as a penny .
``  my   दो  cents '' ( 2¢ ) and  इसके  longer version ``  put   my  two  सेंट  in '' is an  संयुक्त  States (  us  ) idiomatic  अभिव्यक्ति  , taken from the  असली  English  मुहावरा  expression : to put in ``  my  two pennies worth '' or  ``   my  tuppence worth .  ''
It is used to preface  the   अंतरिम   stating  of one’s opinion  .
By deprecating  the  opinion to follow – suggesting its value  is  only two  सेंट   ,  a very small amount  –  the  उपयोक्ता  of  the   phrase  hopes to lessen the  प्रभाव  of  a  possibly statement , showing politeness  और   विनम्रता   .
however   ,  it is also sometimes  प्रयुक्त   साथ   विडंबना  when  expressing   a   strongly   लगा  opinion .
The phrase is also used out of habit to preface uncontentious  राय  .
लिये  example:
The Chinese  सिविल  War  थी   a  civil war in  चीन  fought  between   शक्तियां  loyal to the  सरकारी  of the Republic of China led by the  kuomintang   (  KMT  )  and  शक्तियां   of  the Communist Party  of  China  (  CPC  )   .
the  war began in April 1927  ,  amidst the  उत्तरी   expedition  , and  essentially  ended when  प्रमुख   क्रियाशील   लड़ाइयों  ceased  in  1950 .
The conflict eventually  resulted  in  दो  de  facto   राज्य  , the Republic  of   चीन  ( ROC )  in  Taiwan and the People  's   गणतंत्र  of China (  पीआरसी  ) in  मेनलैंड   चीन  , both  claiming   to  be the  legitimate   सरकारी   of   चीन  .
The  युद्ध  represented an ideological split ( Left vs . Right ) between  the  Communist  cpc   ,  and the  kmt  's brand of Nationalism  .
The civil  युद्ध  continued  intermittently  until  लेट  1937 , when the  दो  parties formed  a   दूसरी   संयुक्त  Front to counter a Japanese invasion .
China 's full-scale civil  युद्ध   resumed  in 1946 , a  साल  after  the  end of  hostilities  with Japan .
बाद   चार  more years ,  1950   देखी  the cessation  of  major military hostilities—with the  newly  founded  लोगों   's  Republic of China  controlling  mainland China  (  including  हाइनान   )   ,   और  the Republic of  चीन   's  jurisdiction  होने  restricted to Taiwan , Penghu , Quemoy  ,  Matsu and  अनेक  outlying  आइलैंड्स  .
the  Kuomintang  शिकस्त  is attributed to several factors :  भ्रष्टाचार  - Chiang  लिखा   in  his diary on June 1948 that  the  KMT  था   विफल   ,   नहीं   क्युकी   of  external enemies but because  of  rot from  भीतर  .
दमदार  initial support from the U.S. diminished , and then ,  रोका   .
(  Partly  क्युकी   of  KMT corruption and anti-democratic regime , and partly  क्युकी   of  the  अनिश्चित  U.S.  विदेशी  policy  towards   साम्यवादी  between  1945  and 1950 ) ; Communist land  सुधार  policy promised poor peasants farmland from their landlords  .
This  ensured  PLA popular support  .
After the  आत्मसमर्पण  of Japan  at  the  समाप्त  of  संसार  War II , Soviet forces turned over  उनके   captured   जापानी   हथियार  to the CPC and allowed the CPC to  लो   कंट्रोल  of territory  in  Manchuria .
To  इस   दिन  ,  no  armistice or  सलाम  treaty has ever been signed , and it is debated as  to  the whether the  सिविल   युद्ध  has legally  ended  .
Cross-Strait  संबंध  have been  hindered  by military threats  और  political and economic pressure  ,  particularly  over   ताईवान  's political status  ,  with both governments  officially   adhering  to  a  ``  one-china  policy  .   ''
the  PRC still  actively  claims Taiwan as  भाग  of its territory and  continues  to threaten the ROC with a military invasion if  the   आरओसी  officially declares independence by changing its name to and gaining  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  recognition as  the  Republic of Taiwan .
The ROC mutually claims  मेनलैंड  China , and they both continue the fight  over   राजनयिक   मान्यता   .
Today , the war  as   ऐसे  occurs on the political and economic fronts in the form of cross-Strait relations ; however , the two  पृथक   de   facto  states have  बंद  economic ties .
The One Hundred  बारहवीं  United  राज्य  Congress was the  बैठक   of  the  विधान  branch of the United States federal government  ,   इससे  January 3 , 2011 until January  3  , 2013 .
It convened in Washington ,  d.C.   on   जनवरी  3  ,  2011 , and ended on January 3 , 2013 , 17 days before the end of the  अध्यक्षीय   पद  to which  बराक  Obama was  निर्वाचित  in 2008 .
सीनेटरों  elected to regular  शर्तें  in 2006 completed  those  terms  in  this Congress .
This  कॉंग्रेस   शामिल  the last House of Representatives elected from congressional districts  कि  were  apportioned  based  on  the  2000  census  .
In the  2010   मध्यावधि  elections ,  the  Republican Party won  the  majority in the House  of  Representatives .
While the  डेमोक्रेट   रखा  their Senate  बहुमत  , it  थी  reduced from the previous Congress  .
This  थी  the first Congress in which the House and Senate were controlled by different parties since  the  107th Congress ( 2001–2003 ) , and the first Congress to begin that way since  the   99th   कॉंग्रेस  (  1985–1987  ) .
In this  कॉंग्रेस   ,  the House of Representatives had the  largest  number of  रिपब्लिकन  members , 242 , since the 80th Congress ( 1947–1949  )  .
it  was also  the   पहला  Congress  चूंकि  1947 in which no member of the Kennedy  परिवार  served , as  खूब  as the most politically polarized  कॉंग्रेस  since Reconstruction  ,  with  रिकार्ड   कम  approval  दरजा  .
माल  in the United States is commonly measured in  शर्तें  of net  लायक  , which is the sum of all  एसेट  , including home equity , minus  सब  liabilities .
the  total  जाल  worth of  us  households and  nonprofit   संगठन  1945–2009 , unadjusted for  महंगाई  or population change .
For example , a household in possession  of   an  $ 800,000 house , $ 5,000 in mutual funds  ,  $ 30,000 in  गाड़ियाँ  , $ 20,000 worth of stock in their  अपना  company , and  a   $  45,000 IRA would  have  assets totaling $  900,000  .
Assuming that  इस  household would have a $ 250,000 mortgage  ,   $  40,000  in   car  loans  ,  and $  10,000  in credit card debt , its debts  होता  total $ 300,000 .
Subtracting the debts from the worth of this  household   's  assets ( 900,000  -  $  300,000  = $ 600,000 ) ,  इस  household  होता   have   a  net worth of $  600,000  .
Net worth  can  vary  साथ  fluctuations in value of the  underlying  assets  .
the  wealth —more specifically , the median  जाल  worth—of households in  the   संयुक्त  States is varied  साथ   संबंध   to  race , education , geographic location and gender .
As  एक   होता   expect  , households with greater  आय  feature the highest net worths , though high income can not be  लिया  as an always accurate  indicator   of  net worth .
overall  the number of wealthier  households  is on the rise ,  साथ  baby boomers  hitting  the  highs  of their careers .
In addition , wealth  is  unevenly  वितरित  , with  the  wealthiest  25  %  of  US households owning  87   %  of  the  wealth  in  the United  राज्य  ,  जिससे  was $ 54.2 trillion  in   2009  .
Including human  पूंजी   ऐसे  as skills ,  the  United  राष्ट्र   अनुमानित  the  कुल  wealth  of  the  संयुक्त  States in 2008 to be $ 118 trillion  .
This  आलेख  deals with  चयनात्मक  Dorsal  rhizotomy  ( SDR ) rather than  the  rhizotomy procedures for  पीड़ा  relief  ;  for those  प्रक्रियाओं  , which have begun to take the name `` rhizotomy ''  in   निश्चित  instances , see facet rhizotomy and  समान  .
A rhizotomy  (  )  is  a term chiefly referring to  a   neurosurgical   कार्यविधि  that selectively  नष्ट  problematic nerve roots in  the  spinal  cord   ,  most often  to  relieve  the  symptoms  of  neuromuscular  शर्तें  such as  spastic  diplegia  और   अन्य  forms  of  spastic cerebral  palsy  .
The selective dorsal  rhizotomy  (  sdr   )  for spastic cerebral  palsy  has been the  प्रमुख  use  of  rhizotomy for  neurosurgeons  specialising  in  spastic CP since the  1980s  ; in this  सर्जरी   ,   the  spasticity-causing nerves are  पृथक   और  then targeted and destroyed  .
The sensory nerve roots , where spasticity is located  ,  are first separated from  the  motor ones , and the nerve fibres to be  काटें  are then identified via electromyographic stimulation  .
The  ones  producing  spasticity  are then selectively lesioned  साथ  tiny electrical pulses .
In spasticity , rhizotomy precisely  लक्ष्य   और  destroys  the   क्षतिग्रस्त  nerves  कि   don’t   प्राप्त  gamma amino butyric acid ,  जिससे  is the  कोर  problem for people with spastic cerebral palsy  .
These over-firing ,  non-gaba-absorbing   nerves   generate  unusual electrical activity during  the  EMG testing  phase  in SDR and are  यूँ  considered to  be   the  source of  the  patient 's hypertonia  ;   वे   हैं  eliminated with the electrical  pulses   एकबार   पहचाना  ,  जबकि  the remaining nerves and  तंत्रिका  routes carrying  the  correct messages remain  fully  intact and  untouched  .
This means that the spasticity is  permanently   dissolved  ,  और  that  इस  is done without  affecting   बेचैन  system  संवेदनशीलता  or function in  अन्य  areas  ,   क्युकी  the  तभी  nerves destroyed  हैं   the  over-firing ones responsible for the muscle tightness .
The terms rhizotomy  और  neurotomy are also  increasingly   बनने  interchangeable in  the   उपचार  of  दीर्घकालिक   वापस  pain from  अपक्षयी  disc disease .
This  is  a procedure called  a   facet   rhizotomy  and is not a  सर्जिकल  procedure but is instead done on  an  outpatient basis  using  a simple probe  to  apply radiofrequency  लहरें  to the  impinged   pain-causing  nerve  रूट  lying between the facet joint  और   the  vertebral  देह   .
Such radio frequency nerve lesioning  परिणाम  in five to  आठ   or   अधिक   महीने  of pain relief  पहले  the nerve  regenerates   और   another  round of the procedure needs to be performed .
A facet rhizotomy is just one of many  अलग  forms of radiofrequency ablation , and its  उपयोग   of   the  ``  rhizotomy  '' name should not  be  confused with the SDR  कार्यविधि  .
Migrant workers in California ,  1935
the   पद  migrant  कार्यकर्ता  has  अलग  official meanings  और   connotations  in different parts of  the  world .
The  संयुक्त  Nations ' definition  is   व्यापक  , including  कोई   लोगों  working  बाहर   of  their home country  .
The term can also  be   प्रयुक्त  to  describe   किसी  who migrates  भीतर  a  देश   ,  possibly  उनके  own , in order to pursue work  ऐसे  as seasonal work  .

The teardrop tattoo  or   आंसू  tattoo is a symbolic  टैटू  that  is  placed  underneath  the eye  .
it  has no fixed  अर्थ  but almost all meanings  (  see below  )  have some connection  to  prison .
U.S. Route 75  is  a north–south U.S.  राजमार्ग  .
The highway  's   उत्तरी  terminus is in  kittson  County  ,   मिनेसोटा  , at  the  Canadian border , where it  एकबार   जारी   as  Manitoba Highway 75 on  the  other side of  the  now-closed  किनारा  crossing  .
Its southern  टर्मिनस  is at  अंतरराज्यीय  30 and Interstate  45  in Dallas ,  टेक्सास   ,  where it  is   ज्ञात   as  North  सेंट्रल   एक्सप्रेसवे  .
u.S.  75 was  a  border-to-border  रूट  , from Canada  to   the  Gulf  of   मैक्सिको  at  galveston   ,  Texas  .
However , the entire segment south  of   डलास  ,  टेक्सास  has  महरूम   decommissioned  in favor of  अंतरराज्यीय   45   ,  a cutoff  खण्ड   of  town-to-town  सतह   सड़क  having become State Highway  75   .
Lower Ninth  वार्ड  is a neighborhood of the city  of   नई  Orleans .
As the name  implies  , it is part  of  the Ninth Ward of New Orleans  .
the  Lower Ninth Ward  is   प्रायः  thought  of  as the entire  क्षेत्रफल  within New  ऑरलियन्स  downriver of the Industrial  कनाल  ;  however  , the City Planning Commission divides this area into the Lower Ninth Ward  (  2 ) and Holy  क्रॉस  ( 3  )  neighborhoods  .
the  term ``  निम्नतर  ''  refers   to  its location farther  towards  the mouth of the  मिसिसिपी  River , `` down '' or `` below  ''  the rest of the  नगर   in  local  भौगोलिक  terminology  .
But  the  9th Ward  ,   जैसे  all Wards in New Orleans  ,  is a voting district .
The 9th Ward  थी  added  as  a voting district in 1852 .
the  `` lower '' 9th Ward  is  composed of Ward 9  जिले  1  ,  2  ,  4  ,  and 7  जिससे  make up  the  Holy Cross  क्षेत्रफल   और   वार्ड  9  जिले  3  ,   5  ,  6  , and 8  .
Higher  मतदान   ज़िला  numbers  in  the 9th Ward  (  8-27  )   हैं  on the  upriver  side  of   the  Industrial Canal .
the   क्षेत्रफल  came  to   नेशनल  attention  लिये   इसके  devastation in the aftermath of  hurricane  Katrina in  2005  .

Red and orange tinted Moon ,  as  seen from  धरती  during a lunar eclipse , where the Earth  आता  between the  चंद्रमा  and Sun
The Moon is the only  प्राकृतिक  satellite of the  धरती  , and the fifth  largest  satellite in the Solar  प्रणाली  .
it   is   the  largest natural satellite of  a   ग्रह  in the Solar System relative to  the   आकार  of  इसके  primary ,  having   27  % the diameter and 60 % the density of Earth  ,   resulting  in  इसके  mass .
The Moon  is  the second densest satellite after Io , a satellite of Jupiter  .
The Moon is  in  synchronous rotation with Earth , always  प्रर्दशित  the same face  साथ  its near  पक्ष  marked  by  dark  volcanic   मरिया  that fill between  the  bright ancient  crustal  highlands and the  prominent  impact  craters  .
It  is  the  brightest  object  in   the   आसमान  after the Sun , although  इसके   सतह  is actually very  अंधेरा  ,  साथ  a reflectance similar  to  that of coal .
इसके  prominence  in  the sky and  इसके  regular cycle  of  phases have , since ancient times ,  बना  the  चंद्रमा  an important  सांस्कृतिक  influence on language , calendars  ,  art and mythology .
The  चंद्रमा  's gravitational  influence  produces the ocean tides  और  the minute lengthening of the day .
The  चंद्रमा   's  current orbital distance , about thirty times the diameter of  the   धरती  , causes it  to  appear almost the same size  in  the  आसमान  as the Sun  ,  allowing  it  to  कवर  the Sun  nearly  precisely in total solar  eclipses   .
इस  matching  of   apparent   विज़ुअल  size is a coincidence .
The  चंद्रमा  's linear  अलहदा  from the  धरती  is currently increasing at a rate of  3.82±0.07cm   प्रति  year , but this rate  is   नहीं   निरंतर  .
the   चंद्रमा  is thought  to  have  formed   nearly   4.5   अरब  years ago  ,   नहीं  long  बाद  the  धरती  .
Although there have been several  hypotheses  for  इसके  origin in  the  past ,  the  current most widely accepted explanation is that the Moon formed from  the  debris left over after a giant  प्रभाव   between   धरती  and  a   मंगल  -sized body .
The  चंद्रमा  is the  तभी  celestial body other  than   धरती  on which humans  have  set foot  .
The Soviet Union  's   luna  programme was the  पहला  to reach the  चंद्रमा   साथ  unmanned  spacecraft  in 1959 ; the  संयुक्त  States ' NASA Apollo program achieved the only manned missions to  तिथि  , beginning with  the  first manned lunar orbiting mission by Apollo  8   in   1968  , and six manned lunar  अवतरण  between 1969  और   1972   ,  with  the  first being Apollo 11 .
These missions returned over 380 kg  of   चंद्र  rocks , which have been used  to  develop a  geological  understanding of the Moon 's origins , the  गठन  of  इसके  internal  ढांचा   ,  and its  subsequent   इतिहास  .
After the Apollo  17   मिशन  in 1972  ,  the Moon has been  visited   तभी   by  unmanned  spacecraft  ,  notably  by  the  final  सोवियत  Lunokhod  रोवर  .
Since 2004  ,   जापानी   ,  China ,  इण्डिया  , the United States ,  और  the European  स्पेस  Agency have each sent lunar orbiters  .
These  spacecraft  have  contributed  to confirming the discovery  of  lunar water  बर्फ  in permanently shadowed craters at the poles  और   बंधी  into the lunar regolith .
भविष्य  manned  मिशन  to  the  Moon have  महरूम  planned , including government as well  as  privately  वित्तपोषित   प्रयत्न  .
the  Moon remains , under the  बाहरी   स्पेस  Treaty , free  to   सब   राष्ट्र   to   explore  for peaceful purposes .
Ronald Wilson Reagan  (  ;  फ़रवरी  6 , 1911  –  June  5   ,   2004   )  was the 40th  अध्यक्ष  of the  संयुक्त  States ( 1981–1989 )  .
prior  to that , he was  the   33rd  Governor of California (  1967–1975  ) ,  और  a radio ,  फिल्मी   और  television actor  .
Born in  tampico  , Illinois , and raised in  डिक्सन   ,  Reagan was educated at Eureka College  ,  earning a Bachelor  of  Arts degree in economics  और  sociology .
बाद  graduating , Reagan  स्थानांतरित  first  to  Iowa to work as a  रेडियो   प्रसारणकर्ता  and  तब   ,   in  1937 , to  लॉस  Angeles where he began a career  as  an  कर्ता  , first in films and later television .
Some  of   उसके  most  notable  films include  knute  Rockne ,  सब  American ( 1940  )   ,   किंग्स  Row (  1942  )  ,  and Bedtime for Bonzo ( 1951 ) .
Reagan served as  अध्यक्ष  of the  स्क्रीन  Actors Guild  और   बाद  as  a   प्रवक्ता   लिये  General Electric  (  GE  )   ;  his start in politics  occurred  during his work  लिये   ge  .
originally  a member of the  लोकतांत्रिक   पार्टी   ,  his positions began shifting rightward in the 1950s  ,  and he switched to  the  Republican Party  in  1962 .
After delivering a  rousing  speech in support of Barry Goldwater  's   अध्यक्षीय  candidacy  in  1964 ,  he   थी  persuaded to seek  the  California governorship , winning  दो  years later and again in 1970 .
He was  पराजित  in his run  लिये   the  Republican  अध्यक्षीय  nomination in 1968  और  in 1976 ,  लकिन  won both the  नामांकन  and general election in 1980 , defeating incumbent  jimmy  Carter  .
As president , Reagan implemented  sweeping   नई   राजनैतिक   और   आर्थिक   पहलों  .
उसके   supply-side  economic policies , dubbed  ``  Reaganomics  ``  ,  advocated   reducing  tax rates  to  spur economic growth  ,  controlling  the  money  सप्लाई  to reduce inflation , deregulation  of  the economy , and reducing government spending .
In his first term  he  survived  an   हत्या  attempt ,  took  a hard  लकीर   विरूद्ध  labor unions  ,  announced  a   नई   युद्ध  on Drugs  ,  and ordered an invasion of Grenada .
he   थी  re-elected  in   a  landslide  in  1984 , proclaiming  कि  it was `` Morning in America `` .
His second term was  primarily  marked by  विदेशी  matters ,  ऐसे  as the  समाप्ति  of the  ठंडा   युद्ध  , the 1986  bombing  of  लीबिया   ,   और   the  revelation  of   the  Iran-Contra  affair  .
सरेआम  describing the  सोवियत  Union as an `` evil  साम्राज्य  `` , he  समर्थित   anti-communist  movements worldwide  और  spent his first term forgoing the strategy of détente  by  ordering a massive military buildup in an arms race with the  ussr   .
Reagan  negotiated   साथ   सोवियत  General Secretary Mikhail  गोर्बाचेव  ,  culminating   in  the INF  सन्धि  and the decrease  of  both countries ' nuclear arsenals .
Reagan left  दफ्तर  in  1989   .
In 1994 , the  पूर्व  president disclosed  कि   he  had  महरूम  diagnosed with Alzheimer  's   बीमारी  earlier in the year  ;  he  died  ten years later at  the  age of  93   .
a  conservative icon  ,  he ranks  अत्यधिक  in public opinion  पोल  of U.S.  राष्ट्रपतियों  and is credited for generating an ideological renaissance  on   the  American political right .
Complete set of scrolls ,  constituting  the entire Tanakh .
The  tanakh   (   ,  or ;  भी   tenakh   ,   tenak  , Tanach )  is   a  name used in  judaism  for the canon  of  the Hebrew Bible  .
the  Tanakh is  भी  known as the Masoretic  टेक्स्ट   or   the  Miqra .
The name  is   an  acronym formed from the initial Hebrew letters of the Masoretic Text  's  three traditional  subdivisions  : The  तोरा  ( `` Teaching  ''  ,  भी   ज्ञात   as  the Five Books  of  Moses  )  , Nevi'im ( ``  नबियों  '' )  और  Ketuvim  (  `` Writings '' ) —hence TaNaKh  .
the  name  ``   miqra   ''  ( מקרא  )  , meaning `` that which is read  ''  , is  an  alternative Hebrew term for  the  Tanakh  .
The  किताबे  of the Tanakh  यहूद  relayed  साथ  an  accompanying  oral tradition  passed  on by each generation ,  पुकारा   the  Oral Torah .
The Kawasaki Ninja ZX-6R  is   a  Kawasaki 600 cc  क्लास  sport motorcycle  .
it  was  introduced  in  1995  , and  रै  been constantly updated throughout the years in response to new  उत्पाद  from Honda  ,  Suzuki , and Yamaha  .
The ZX series is  कया   थी  known  as  the Ninja line of Kawasaki motorcycles in the 1980s and still carries the  नाम  today  .
हत्या  attempts and  भूखंड  on Presidents  of   the  United States have been numerous : more than  20   कोशिशें  to kill sitting and  पूर्व  presidents , as well  as  the Presidents-elect , are known .
Four  बैठे   राष्ट्रपतियों  have been  मारे  : Abraham Lincoln (  the  16th President ) , James  A.  Garfield  (   the  20th President  )  , William  mckinley   (   the  25th President ) and John  F.  Kennedy ( the 35th President  )  .
Two presidents  यहूद  injured in attempted assassinations : former President Theodore  रूज़वेल्ट   (  the 26th  अध्यक्ष  ) , and President Ronald  reagan   (  the 40th  अध्यक्ष  ) .
Although the  इतिहासकार  J.W .  क्लार्क  has suggested  कि  most American assassinations were  नीतियां  motivated  क्रियाएँ   ,  carried out by  तर्कसंगत   मेन  ,  नहीं   सब  such  हमले   have  been  undertaken   लिये  political  कारण  .
Some  हमलावर  had questionable mental stability , and a  few   यहूद   judged  legally insane .
Since  the  Vice President of the United States has for more  than  a century  महरूम  elected  इससे  the same political party as the President , the  हत्या   of  the President is unlikely to result  in   प्रमुख  policy changes .
This may explain why political groups typically  do  not make  ऐसे   हमले  .
जहाँ   the  Red  फर्न  Grows is a novel written by  विल्सन   राल्स  in 1961  परिचय  a boy who buys  और  trains two Redbone Coonhound hunting dogs .
ओक्लाहोमा   (  ) ( Pawnee :  uukuhuúwa   ,  Cayuga :  gahnawiyoˀgeh   )  is a state located in West South  सेंट्रल  United States .
Oklahoma is  the   20th  most extensive and the 28th  सबसे  populous of the 50 United  राज्य  .
The  राज्य  's  नाम   is  derived  इससे  the  choctaw  words okla and humma  ,   अर्थ   ``  red people  ''   ,   और  it  is  known  informally  by  इसके   उपनाम  ,  the  Sooner  राज्य  .
formed   by  the  संयोजन  of  ओक्लाहोमा  Territory and Indian Territory on November 16 , 1907 ,  ओक्लाहोमा   थी  the  46th  state to enter the union .
इसके  residents  हैं  known  as  Oklahomans or  ,  informally  ``  Okies  ''  ,  और  its capital and largest  नगर   is  Oklahoma City .
A major  निर्माता   of   प्राकृतिक   गैस   ,  oil , and  कृषि  ,  ओक्लाहोमा  relies  on  an economic base  of  aviation  ,  energy , telecommunications , and biotechnology .
It  रै  one  of  the  तीव्रतम   growing  economies  in  the nation , ranking among the top states in per capita income  विकास  and gross domestic product  विकास   .
Oklahoma City and Tulsa serve as Oklahoma 's  प्राथमिक  economic anchors ,  साथ  nearly two thirds  of  Oklahomans living within their metropolitan statistical areas .
With small  पहाड़  ranges , prairie , mesas ,  और  eastern  वनों  , most of Oklahoma lies  in  the Great  मैदान  and the  u.s   .  Interior Highlands —a  प्रदेश  especially  prone  to severe weather  .
in  addition  to   having  a prevalence of English ,  जर्मनी  ,  स्कॉटिश   ,   आयरिश  and Native  अमरीकी   ancestry  , more than 25  देशी  American languages are  बोला   in   ओक्लाहोमा  , second only to California  .
Oklahoma is located on  a  confluence of  तीन  major American cultural regions  और  historically served  as   a   रूट  for  चौपायों   ड्राइव  ,  a  destination for  दक्षिणी  settlers , and a  government-sanctioned  territory  लिये  Native Americans  .
Redwall , by  ब्रायन   ज़ाक   ,  is  a   श्रेणी  of children 's fantasy  novels  .
it   is   the  title  of  the first book  of  the series , published in 1986  ,  as  खूब   as  the name of the Abbey  प्रदर्शित  in the book  और  the name  of  an animated TV series based  on   तीन  of the novels ( Redwall , Mattimeo ,  और   मार्टिन  the Warrior ) , which first  aired  in  1999  .
the  books  हैं  primarily  aimed  at  पुरानी  children  ,  but have fans of all ages  .
वहीँ  have  महरूम   twenty-two  novels and  दो   चित्र  books  प्रकाशित  .
The twenty-second  ,   और  final  ,  novel , The  दुष्ट  Crew  ,  was  मरणोपरांत   released  on May 3  ,  2011  .
Natural  गैस  is usually measured  by  volume  in   the   संयुक्त   राज्य  and is stated in cubic feet .
a  cubic  पैर  of  गैस   is   the  amount  of  gas needed to  भरण  a  आवाज़   of   एक   घन  foot under  नियत  conditions of pressure and temperature.To measure  larger  amounts of  प्राकृतिक  gas  ,  a  ``  therm  ''   is  used  to  denote  100  cubic feet , and `` mcf '' is  प्रयुक्त   to  denote 1,000  घन   फीट  .
to  provide  वृहद  accuracy in  comparing  fuels , energy  सामग्री  is measured  in   शर्तें   of   ``  British Thermal Units (  btu   's  ) . ''
A BTU  is  the amount of heat required  to  raise one pound of water  (  approximately  a  pint ) , one degree Fahrenheit at  or  close to  इसके  point of maximum density .
One British therm  (  symbol thm  )  is a  non-  SI  ईकाई   of   ऊष्मा  energy  बराबर  to 100,000  अंग्रेजों   थर्मल   इकाई   (  BTU ) .
It  is  approximately the energy equivalent of burning 100 cubic feet (  प्रायः  referred  to  as 1 CCF  )  of  प्राकृतिक  gas .
Since ( Natural  गैस  ) meters measure volume and not energy content ,  a  therm factor  is  used  by  ( Natural ) gas companies to convert the volume of gas  प्रयुक्त  to its heat  समतुल्य  , and thus calculate  the  actual  उर्जा   उपयोग   .
The  therm  factor is usually  in  the units  therms/ccf   .
It will vary with the  मिक्सर  of  hydrocarbons  in the natural gas .
Natural gas with a higher  than  average concentration  of  ethane ,  प्रोपेन  or  ब्यूटेन  will  have  a  उच्चतर  therm factor .
Impurities  ,   ऐसे  as carbon  डाइऑक्साइड  or nitrogen  ,   निम्नतर   the  therm  फ़ैक्टर  .
the  volume of  the  gas  is  calculated  as  if  measured  at  मानक  temperature and pressure  (   stp  ) .
the  heat content of natural gas is  solely  dependent on  the  composition of  the  gas  ,  and is independent  of  temperature  और   दबाव  .
एक  therm is equal  to  about 105.5 megajoules ,  25,200  kilocalories or 29.3 kilowatt-hours .
एक   therm  can  भी  be  provided   by   परिचय  of natural gas .
The therm sometimes has  महरूम  confused with  the  thermie ( see below ) .
The  names  of both  इकाई   आइये  from the Greek  शब्द  for heat .
A thermie  (   th  )  is   a  metric  ईकाई  of heat  उर्जा  ,  भाग  of the  meter-tonne-second   प्रणाली   sometimes  used by European engineers .
The  thermie  is equal to  the  amount of  उर्जा  required to raise the  तापमान   of   1  tonne of water by 1  °c   .
The  thermie  is equivalent to 1,000 kilocalories , 4.1868 megajoules or 3968.3  btu   .
The  अमरीकी  Civil  युद्ध  ( ACW ) , also known as the War between  the  States or simply the Civil  युद्ध  ( see  नामकरण  )  ,  was a civil war fought from 1861  to   1865  between the United  राज्य   (  the `` Union '' or the ``  उत्तर  '' ) and  अनेक  Southern  स्लेव  states  कि  declared their  secession  and  formed   the  Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the ``  दक्षिण  '' ) .
The war had its origin  in  the issue of  गुलामी   ,  especially the extension  of  slavery into the western territories .
Foreign  शक्तियां  did not  intervene  .
After four years of  खूनी  combat that left  over   600,000  soldiers dead and  नष्ट   much  of the South  's   अवसंरचना   ,  the  confederacy  collapsed  ,  slavery was abolished , and the  मुश्किल  Reconstruction  प्रक्रम  of  restoring  national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began .
In the 1860 presidential  चुनाव   ,  Republicans ,  led  by  अब्राहम  Lincoln , opposed  expanding   गुलामी   into   संयुक्त  States '  territories  .
lincoln  won , but  पहले   उसके  inauguration on March 4 , 1861 , seven cotton-based slave  राज्य   formed  the Confederacy .
outgoing  Democratic  अध्यक्ष  James Buchanan and  the  incoming  republicans  rejected secession as  illegal  .
lincoln  's inaugural address  घोषित   उसके  administration would not initiate civil war  .
आठ  remaining slave states  जारी  to reject calls for  secession  .
Confederate  शक्तियां  seized numerous federal forts within territory claimed by the Confederacy .
A  सलाम  Conference failed  to  find a compromise , and  दोनो   पहलू  prepared for war .
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent  on  `` King Cotton  ``  that they  होता   intervene  ; none  किया  and none recognized the  नई  Confederate States of  अमेरिका  .
hostilities  began  on  April 12 , 1861 , when Confederate  शक्तियां  fired upon Fort Sumter ,  a   कुंजी   फोर्ट  held  by   संघ  troops in South Carolina .
lincoln   पुकारा  for each  राज्य  to  provide  troops to retake the fort ;  नतीजतन   ,   चार  more  स्लेव  states joined the Confederacy , bringing their total to eleven .
The Union  जल्द  controlled the  किनारा  states  और   स्थापित   a  naval blockade that crippled the southern  अर्थव्यवस्था  .
the  Eastern Theater  थी   inconclusive  in 1861–62 .
the   पतझड़  1862  confederate  campaign  into  Maryland (  a  Union state  )  ended with Confederate retreat at  the  Battle  of   antietam  , dissuading British  हस्तक्षेप   .
Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation , which made ending  गुलामी  a war  लक्ष्य   .
To the west , by summer 1862 the  संघ  destroyed  the  Confederate river navy  ,  then  much  of their western armies  ,  and the  संघ   at  Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two  at  the  मिसिसिपी  River .
In  1863  , Robert E.  ली  's Confederate incursion north ended at  the  Battle of Gettysburg .
पश्चिमी  successes led  to   ulysses  S. Grant command of  सब  Union armies in 1864 .
In the Western Theater , William T. Sherman  drove  east  to  capture Atlanta and marched  to  the sea , destroying Confederate  अवसंरचना  along the way .
The Union marshaled the resources  और   जनशक्ति  to attack the Confederacy from all  दिशानिर्देश   ,   और   could  afford  to  fight battles of attrition  through  the  overland  Campaign  towards  Richmond ,  the   confederate   पूंजी  .
the  defending  confederate   फौज  failed  ,   अग्रणी   to  Lee  's  surrender to Grant at Appomattox Court  हाउस  on April  9  ,  1865  .
The American Civil War was  एक  of  the   earliest   सच्चा  industrial  युद्धों  .
Railroads  ,  the telegraph  ,  steamships  ,  and mass-produced weapons were employed extensively .
The mobilization  of   civilian  factories ,  खानों  ,  shipyards  ,  बैंको  ,  परिवहन  and food  आपूर्तियाँ  all foreshadowed  संसार  War I .
It  remains  the  deadliest  war  in  American history ,  resulting  in the deaths of an  अनुमानित  750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties .
Historian John Huddleston  estimates   the   मौत  toll at ten percent of all Northern  males  20–45 years  बूढ़ा  , and 30  प्रतिशत  of all Southern white males aged 18–40  .
William Bruce  जेनर  ( born  अक्तूबर  28 , 1949 )  is  a former  u.S.   track  and  फ़ील्ड   खिलाड़ी   ,  motivational speaker , socialite , television personality and  बिजनेसमैन  .
He won the  सुनहरा  medal for decathlon  in  the Montreal  1976  Summer Olympics .
Following his  ओलम्पिक  win  और  the related recognition , he married Kris  कार्दशियन  , and his  पेशेवर  career  विकसित  into  होने  a television celebrity .
by   1981  , he had  स्ट्रक्चर  in several  made-for-tv  movies and  थी   erik  Estrada 's  बदलना  on  the  top rated TV  श्रेणी  CHiPs .
He has  छह   children   :  Burt ,  केसी  , Brandon , Brody , Kendall and Kylie  .
चूंकि  his 1991 marriage  to  Kris Jenner , he  is  the stepfather to  कोर्टनी  ,  किम  , Khloe and Rob Kardashian  .
Since 2007  ,  he has appeared with  उसके  blended family on Keeping Up with  the   kardashians   .
Escherichia  कोलाई   (   ;   commonly  abbreviated  E.   कोलाई  ) is a Gram-negative ,  rod-shaped  bacterium  कि  is commonly found in the  निम्नतर   आंत  of warm-blooded  जीवों  ( endotherms )  .
सबसे  E.  कोलाई   strains  are harmless , but some serotypes can cause serious food poisoning in  इंसानो  , and  हैं  occasionally responsible for product recalls  due   to  food contamination  .
the   हानिरहित  strains are  भाग  of  the  normal  फ्लोरा   of  the gut  ,  and can benefit their  होस्ट  by  producing   विटामिन   k2  , and  by  preventing the  स्थापना  of pathogenic  जीवाणु  within the intestine .
E.  कोलाई  and  सम्बन्धित  bacteria constitute about 0.1 %  of  gut flora , and fecal–oral transmission  is  the  प्रमुख   रूट  through  जिससे  pathogenic  strains   of   the  bacterium  कारण  disease  .
Cells are able to survive outside the body for  a  limited  राशि  of time ,  जिससे  makes  उन्हें  ideal indicator organisms to test  पर्यावरणीय   नमूने  for fecal contamination .
There  is  , however ,  a   growing  body  of  research that  रै   examined  environmentally persistent  E.  coli which can  जीवित  for extended periods  बाहर   of  the  मेजबान  .
The bacterium  can  also  be  grown  easily  and  inexpensively  in  a   प्रयोगशाला  setting , and has been intensively investigated  लिये  over 60 years .
E. coli is  the  most  widely   पढ़ाई  prokaryotic model  सजीव   ,  and an important species  in  the  फ़ील्ड   of  biotechnology  और  microbiology , where it has served as the host organism for  the  majority  of  work with  recombinant  DNA .
Area  कोड  217 is the North American telephone area code  लिये  much of western and central  इलिनोइस  .
the  217  क्षेत्रफल  includes Illinois '  पूंजी   ,  Springfield  ,  plus Champaign ,  urbana  , Decatur , Danville ,  क्विंसी  ,  और  Rantoul .
217   थी  one  of  the original area codes ,  जिससे  were created  in   1947  .
the  only  significant  change  in   217   's   सीमाएँ  was  in  1957 , when its northern portion  थी   संयुक्त  with part of area code 815  to   रूप  area code 309 .

Ozone  depletion  describes two distinct but  सम्बन्धित  phenomena observed since the late 1970s  :  a  स्थिर  decline  of  about  4  %  प्रति  decade  in  the total volume  of   ओज़ोन   in  Earth  's  stratosphere (  the  ozone layer  )  , and a much larger  springtime  decrease in  stratospheric   ओज़ोन   over  Earth 's polar regions  .
The latter phenomenon is referred to as the ozone hole .
In addition to these  well-known  stratospheric phenomena , there are also springtime polar tropospheric ozone depletion events .
The details of polar ozone hole  गठन   differ  from that of mid-latitude thinning , but the most important process  in  both is catalytic  विनाश  of  ओज़ोन  by  परमाणु   हैलोजन्स  .
The  प्रमुख  source  of   ये   हैलोजन  atoms  in  the stratosphere is photodissociation of man-made  halocarbon  refrigerants (  cfcs  , freons  ,   halons  )  .
ये  compounds are transported  into   the   stratosphere   बाद   होने  emitted at  the  surface  .
Both types of ozone  depletion   यहूद   observed  to increase as emissions of  halo-carbons   increased  .
cfcs  and  अन्य  contributory  substances  are referred  to  as ozone-depleting substances ( ODS ) .
Since the  ओज़ोन  layer  रोकता  most harmful UVB  wavelengths  ( 280–315 nm  )  of  पराबैंगनी   लाइट   (  UV light ) from passing through  the   धरती  's  माहौल  ,  observed  and projected decreases  in  ozone have generated worldwide concern  अग्रणी  to  अपनाना  of  the  Montreal Protocol  कि  bans  the  production of CFCs , halons ,  और  other  ozone-depleting  chemicals such as carbon  tetrachloride  and trichloroethane .
It  is   suspected  that a variety  of  biological  consequences  such as  increases  in skin  कर्कट  , cataracts , damage to plants , and reduction of plankton  populations  in  the   समंदर  's photic zone may result from the increased UV exposure  due  to ozone depletion  .
The Preamble to the United States Constitution is a  ब्रैड   परिचयात्मक  statement of the  संविधान  's fundamental purposes and guiding principles .
It  राज्य   in  general  शर्तें  ,  और   न्यायालयों  have referred to it as reliable  प्रमाण  of  ,  the  founding  Fathers ' intentions regarding  the  Constitution 's meaning and what  वे  hoped the Constitution would  achieve  as  it  pertains to all of the people  of  the United  राज्य  .
as  the phrase , ``  we   the   लोगों   ''  suggests  कि  the  नई   सरकारी   originates  from  the  people of the United  राज्य  and it  सेट  into motion  a  question as it pertains to that vast population concerning the  व्यक्तिगत   अधिकारों  and equality  among   सब  people  ;  this can be seen most  broadly  in  the  divide between  republicanism  and  सोशल  democracy .
