the   शॉट  put ( pronounced )  is   a   track  and field  इवेंट   involving  `` throwing '' /  ''   putting  '' ( throwing in  a  pushing motion ) a heavy spherical object —the shot—as  दूर  as  संभावित  .
The  शॉट  put competition for men has been a  भाग  of  the  modern Olympics since their  पुनरुद्धार   in   1896  , women 's  प्रतियोगिता  began  in  1948 .
मैप  of  the  United  राष्ट्र  ( UN )  सदस्य  states ,  साथ  their  territories  ( including dependent  territories   )   पहचाना  by the UN  in   ब्लू
There are United Nations  (   un  ) member states , and each  of   उन्हें  is a  सदस्य   of  the  संयुक्त  Nations  सामान्य  Assembly  .
The criteria  लिये  admission of new members are  नियत   आउट  in the United Nations  चार्टर  , Chapter II  ,  Article  4:
a   अनुशंसा  for admission from the  सुरक्षा  Council requires affirmative  मत   इससे   at  least nine of  the  council  's  fifteen  सदस्यों  , with none of  the  five permanent members  मतदान   विरूद्ध  .
the  Security Council 's  अनुशंसा  must then be  subsequently   स्वीकृत  in the General Assembly by a two-thirds  बहुमत   vote  .
In principle  ,  only  sovereign  states  can  become  un   सदस्यों  , and currently all UN members  हैं  sovereign states  (   हालांकि   a   few  members were  नहीं   sovereign  when they  joined  the UN  )   .
Because a state can only be admitted to the  un  by the approval of the Security Council and the General  सभा   ,  a number of states that may be  माना  sovereign states according to the Montevideo  सम्मेलन   मापदण्ड  are  नहीं  members because  the  UN does not  consider   उन्हें   to  possess sovereignty  ,   मुख्यतः  due to the lack  of  international  मान्यता   or  opposition  इससे   निश्चित  members .
in  addition to the member states , the UN also invites  non-member  states ( currently two : the  पावन   देखिए   और   फिलिस्तीन  ) ,  intergovernmental  organizations , and other international organizations and entities whose statehood  or  sovereignty are  नहीं  precisely defined , to become observers  at  the General Assembly , allowing  उन्हें  to participate and speak ,  लकिन  not vote , in General Assembly meetings .
The Eiffel Tower (  ,  ) is an iron  जाली  tower located  on  the Champ de Mars in Paris ,  नामित   बाद  the engineer Gustave  एफिल  , whose company designed and built the tower .
Erected  in   1889  as the  प्रवेश   मेहराब  to the 1889 World 's  मेला   ,   it  has  become  both a global  सांस्कृतिक   प्रतीक   of  France and one  of   the  most recognizable  structures  in  the   संसार  .
The tower is the tallest structure in Paris and the most-visited paid monument in  the   संसार  ; 7.1 million people ascended  it   in  2011  .
The third  स्तर  observatory  's  upper platform is at the highest accessible  to   पब्लिक   in  the European  संघ   और  the highest in Europe as long  as  the platform of the  ostankino  Tower  ,  at ,  remains  closed as  a  result of the fire of August 2000 .
the  tower  प्राप्त  its  250   millionth  visitor in  2010  .
the   मीनार  stands tall  ,  about the same  ऊँचाई  as an  81-storey  building  .
During its construction , the Eiffel Tower  surpassed  the Washington Monument to assume the  शीर्षक  of  the  tallest  man-made  structure  in   the  world , a title it  आयोजित  for 41  सालो  , until  the  Chrysler  भवन  in New  यॉर्क   नगर  was  निर्मित  in 1930 .
क्युकी   of  the addition , in 1957 , of the antenna atop  the   एफिल   मीनार  ,  it  is now  taller  than the  क्रिसलर  Building .
Not including broadcast antennas , it is  the   second-tallest  structure in France , after the Millau Viaduct .
The  मीनार   रै   तीन  levels for visitors .
टिकटें   can  be purchased to ascend , by  सीढ़ियाँ   or  lift ( elevator ) ,  to   the   पहला  and  दूसरी   स्तर   .
The walk from ground level to the  पहला  level  is  over 300 steps , as is  the  walk from the first to  the   दूसरी  level .
The third and highest level is  accessible  only by lift—stairs do exist  लकिन  are usually closed to  the  public .
the  first  और  second levels  have  restaurants  .
the  tower  रै  become the most prominent  प्रतीक   of  both Paris and  फ़्रांस   ,  often  in   the  establishing shot  of  films set  in  the city  .
Kenneth Wayne  ``  Ken '' Jennings III  (  born May 23 , 1974 )  is  an American game show contestant and author .
जेनिंग्स  is  विख्यात   लिये  holding  the  record for the  longest   जीतना  streak on  the   u.S.  syndicated game  दिखाएँ   jeopardy  !
and as being  the   all-time  leading money winner on  अमरीकी  game shows .
in  2004  ,   जेनिंग्स   जीती  74 Jeopardy !
games before  he  was  पराजित  by  चैलेंजर   नैंसी   zerg  on his 75th appearance  .
His  कुल  earnings  on   jeopardy   !
are $ 3,172,700 ,  consisting   of  $  2,520,700  over  उसके  74  विन्स  , a $ 2,000 second-place  पुरस्कार   in  his  75th   रूप  , a $  500,000  second-place prize in the  jeopardy  !
Ultimate Tournament  of   champions  , as  खूब  as  हाफ   of   a  $  300,000  prize  in   the  IBM  चुनौती   .
During his first run of Jeopardy !
appearances  ,  Jennings earned the record  लिये   the  highest American game show winnings .
His total was surpassed  by   ब्रैड  Rutter  ,  who defeated  जेनिंग्स  in  the  finals of the Jeopardy  !
Ultimate Tournament of Champions  (  first  aired   on   may  25 , 2005 )  ,  adding $ 2,000,000  to  Rutter 's existing Jeopardy !
winnings .
Jennings regained the record after appearing on  अनेक  other game shows , culminating in an  रूप  on  हैं  You Smarter Than a 5th Grader  ?
( first aired on  अक्तूबर  10  ,  2008 )  ,  though Rutter retains the Jeopardy  !
record .
After his  कामयाबी   on  Jeopardy  !  ,  जेनिंग्स   लिखा   परिचय  his experience and explored American trivia history  और  culture  in  his book Brainiac  :  Adventures in the  जिज्ञासु   ,  Competitive , Compulsive  संसार   of  Trivia Buffs ,  प्रकाशित  in  2006  .
The Canadian  फ़ुटबॉल  League or CFL ( ' [ LCF  ]  in French  )   is  a professional  खेल  league located in Canada .
The CFL  is  the highest level  of  competition in Canadian football , a form  of   gridiron   फ़ुटबॉल  closely related  to   अमरीकी   फ़ुटबॉल  .
इसके   आठ  current  टीमों  ,  जिससे   हैं   स्तिथ   in  eight  पृथक   शहरों  , are divided  into  two divisions of four teams each  —  the East  प्रभाग  and  the   वेस्ट   प्रभाग   .
the  league 's 19-week regular season runs from late June to early  नवम्बर   ;  each  टोली  plays 18  खेल  with one bye week  .
Following the  नियमित   ऋतु  , the  तीन  teams with  the   बेहतरीन   रिकॉर्ड  in their division ( except  if   the  fourth place team  in  one division has  a  better record than the  तीसरा  place team  in  the other division , when  the  team with  the  better record  makes  the playoffs and `` crosses  over  '' to the other division  's  playoff ) compete in the league  's  three-week  डिवीजनल  playoffs , which  culminate   in  the late-November Grey Cup  चैंपियनशिप  ,  the  country 's  largest  annual sports  और   टेलीविज़न  event  .
The  cfl  was officially founded  on  January  19  , 1958 , making it the second oldest gridiron  फ़ुटबॉल  league  in   उत्तर   अमेरिका  still in operation , although all its  टीमों   long  predate the modern formation of  the   लीग  .
It  is   the   उच्चतम   स्तर  of play in Canadian  फ़ुटबॉल  ,  the  most  लोकप्रिय   फ़ुटबॉल  league in Canada , and the second-most popular major sports league in Canada , after  the  National Hockey League .
हालांकि   बर्फ  hockey is  कनाडा  's  सबसे  popular sport , the CFL  रै  increased the popularity  of  Canadian football in Quebec  और  Western Canada .
Canadian  फ़ुटबॉल  is also played at amateur levels ( i.e .  युवावस्था  , high  स्कूल   ,  CJFL  ,  QJFL , CIS and senior  लीग  such  as   the  Alberta Football League  )  .
The 2010s will be a significant decade for  the  CFL in terms of  विकास  , as teams  have  renovated , expanded stadiums , or plan to build entirely new  स्टेडियम   .
the  Montreal Alouettes accomplished  इस  first  ,   adding  5,000 seats to  पर्सिवल   molson  Memorial Stadium in time for the 2010  cfl  season .
The  एडमॉन्टन   एस्किमोस   और  Calgary Stampeders also  संवर  their  संबंधित  stadiums and facilities for  the  2010 season  .
In 2011  ,  the BC Lions played  अंतर्गत  a  नई  , retractable  छत  in  bc   प्लेस  after spending one and  a  half seasons at  साम्राज्य  Field .
Then the  विन्निपेग   ब्लू  Bombers will play  in  an entirely  नई  stadium at  the  University of Manitoba , scheduled  to  open in time  लिये  the 2013 season .
the  Hamilton Tiger-Cats  ,  Saskatchewan Roughriders and the new Ottawa franchise are also  looking  at new or  extensively-renovated  stadiums in the following years  .
वहीँ  are also hopes of expanding the league to  अटलांटिक   कनाडा   (   ideally   basing  a team  in  either  the   अधिक  populated Halifax  ,  or  the  more  centralized  Moncton ) , as  2010   और  2011 had regular season games hosted  in   moncton  .
According  to   खेल  historian Douglas Brei , the Canadian  फ़ुटबॉल  League holds the distinction of being the only  पेशेवर  sports  लीग  in North America , major or  नाबालिग   लीग  ,  in   जिससे  each existing franchise has won at least  एक  league title  जबकि   in   उनके  current location .
Each  एंटीबॉडी  binds to a specific antigen ; an interaction similar  to  a  ताला  and key .
An  एंटीबॉडी   (   ab  )  ,  also known as an immunoglobulin  (  Ig  )   ,  is a large Y-shaped protein produced  by  B-cells that  is   प्रयुक्त  by the immune system to identify  और   neutralize   विदेशी   वस्तुएँ  such as bacteria and  वाइरस   .
the   एंटीबॉडी  recognizes a unique  भाग  of  the  foreign target , called an  प्रतिजन  .
प्रत्येक  tip  of  the  ``  Y '' of an  एंटीबॉडी   contains  a paratope ( a structure analogous  to   a  lock  )  that  is   विशिष्ट   लिये  one  particular   epitope  ( similarly  analogous  to a key  )  on an antigen , allowing these  दो   structures  to  bind  together with  परिशुद्धता  .
Using this binding  यांत्रिकी   ,   an   एंटीबॉडी  can tag  a  microbe or an  संक्रमित  cell  लिये  attack by other  भाग   of   the  immune system , or can  neutralize  its target directly ( for example , by blocking a  भाग  of a  microbe   कि   is  essential for its  आक्रमण  and survival ) .
The production of antibodies is  the  main function  of  the  humoral  immune  प्रणाली  .
Antibodies are secreted by a type of white blood cell called a plasma cell  .
Antibodies  can  occur  in  two physical  फ़ॉर्म  ,  a  soluble  रूप   कि  is secreted from the cell  ,  and  a  membrane  -bound  form  कि  is  संलग्न  to  the  surface of a B  कोशिका  and  is   referred  to as the B cell  receptor  ( BCR  )  .
The  bcr   is  only  मिला  on the surface of  b   कोशिकाएं   और  facilitates the activation of  ये  cells and  उनके  subsequent differentiation  into  either antibody factories called  प्लाज्मा  cells , or  मेमोरी  B  कोशिकाएं  that  होगा  survive  in   the  body  और  remember  कि  same  प्रतिजन  so the B cells can respond  तेज़  upon future exposure  .
In most cases , interaction of the B cell  साथ   a   t   हेल्पर   कोशिका   is  necessary to produce full  सक्रियण   of   the  B cell and ,  इसलिए  , antibody  पीढी  following  प्रतिजन  binding .
Soluble antibodies  हैं  released  into  the blood and tissue  fluids   ,  as well as  अनेक   secretions  to  continue  to survey for invading microorganisms .
antibodies  are glycoproteins belonging to the  immunoglobulin   superfamily  ;  the   शर्तें  antibody and immunoglobulin  हैं  often used interchangeably .
Antibodies  हैं  typically made  of  basic  संरचनात्मक  units—each with two large  भारी   जंजीरों   और  two small light  जंजीरों   .
There  हैं  several different  प्रकार  of  एंटीबॉडी  heavy  जंजीरों  , and several  अलग  kinds of antibodies ,  जिससे  are grouped into different  isotypes  based  on   जिससे  heavy  कड़ी   वे  possess .
Five  अलग   एंटीबॉडी  isotypes are  ज्ञात   in  mammals , which perform different  भूमिकाएँ   ,  and help  सीधा  the appropriate immune  जवाब  for  प्रत्येक  different  प्रकार  of  विदेशी   ऑब्जेक्ट  they encounter  .
Though the  सामान्य  structure of all  antibodies  is very similar , a small region  at  the tip of the protein is  अत्यधिक  variable , allowing millions of  antibodies  with slightly  अलग   टिप  structures , or  प्रतिजन  binding sites ,  to  exist .
This region is  ज्ञात  as  the   hypervariable   प्रदेश  .
Each  of   ये  variants can  bind  to a  अलग  antigen .
This enormous diversity of antibodies allows  the   प्रतिरक्षा  system to  recognize   an   बराबर   चौड़ी  variety of antigens  .
the  large and diverse  जनसांख्यिकी  of antibodies is  उत्पन्न  by random  combinations  of  a  set of gene segments that encode different antigen  बाइंडिंग  sites  (  or paratopes ) , followed by random mutations in this area of the antibody gene , which create  further   विविधता   .
Antibody genes also re-organize in  a  process called class switching that changes the base of  the  heavy chain to another , creating  a  different isotype of the  एंटीबॉडी  that retains the antigen specific  परिवर्तनीय  region .
This allows a single antibody to be  प्रयुक्त   by   अनेक  different parts of the immune system .
The symbol used by the Zodiac Killer to sign his  पत्राचार
The Zodiac Killer was a  सीरियल   कातिल  who  संचालित   in   उत्तरी  California  in   the   लेट  1960s and early 1970s .
The killer  's  identity  remains   अनजान  .
the   zodiac  murdered victims in  benicia  , Vallejo , Lake  berryessa   ,   और  San Francisco  between  December 1968 and  अक्तूबर   1969  .
Four men  और  three women between the ages  of  16  और  29 were targeted .
the  killer  originated  the  नाम  ``  zodiac  '' in a series  of   taunting  letters sent  to   the  local Bay Area  दबायें  .
These letters  शामिल  four cryptograms ( or ciphers ) .
Of  the  four  cryptograms  sent , only one has been definitively solved  .
Suspects have  महरूम  named  by   विधि  enforcement and amateur investigators ,  लकिन   no  conclusive evidence has surfaced .
In April  2004  ,  the  San Francisco Police  विभाग   चिह्नित   the  case `` inactive  ''  , yet re-opened the case  at  some point prior to March 2007 .
The case also remains open  in  the  नगर  of  vallejo  , as well  as  in  नापा   काउंटी  and Solano  काउंटी  .
The California Department of  इंसाफ  has  कायम  an  खोलें   मामला  file  on  the  zodiac   हत्याएं   चूंकि   1969  .
Jennings  is  a small city in and the parish seat  of  Jefferson Davis  मोहल्ला  , Louisiana ,  संयुक्त   राज्य  , near Lake Charles .
The  जनसांख्यिकी  was  10,383  at the  2010   जनसांख्यिकी   ,  a small  मनाही  from the  2000  tabulation .
The city  is  68  प्रतिशत  white .
Jennings  is  the principal city of the Jennings  micropolitan  Statistical Area ,  जिससे  includes  सब  of Jefferson  डेविस  Parish .
It is  भी   भाग   of  the larger  झील  Charles-Jennings Combined  सांख्यिकीय  Area  .
Nanotechnology (  sometimes  shortened to  ``  nanotech  ''   )  is the  हेरफेर  of matter  on  an atomic and molecular  स्केल  .
The earliest , widespread  वर्णन  of nanotechnology  referred  to  the  particular technological goal  of  precisely manipulating  अणु  and molecules for fabrication of macroscale  उत्पाद  , also now referred  to   as  molecular  nanotechnology  .
A more generalized description of nanotechnology  थी  subsequently  स्थापित  by the National Nanotechnology Initiative , which defines nanotechnology  as  the manipulation of matter with at least  एक  dimension sized from 1 to  100   nanometers  .
This  परिभाषा  reflects the  फैक्ट  that  क्वांटम   mechanical  effects are  महत्वपूर्ण  at this quantum-realm scale  ,   और  so the definition shifted from a particular technological goal to a research category inclusive  of  all types of  शोध  and technologies  कि  deal  साथ  the special properties  of  matter that occur  नीचे   the  given  आकार  threshold  .
it   is   इसलिए  common  to   देखिए  the  बहुवचन   रूप   ``  nanotechnologies ''  as  well as `` nanoscale technologies  ''  to refer to the broad  दायरा  of research and  अनुप्रयोग  whose common  trait  is size .
Because of  the  variety of potential  अनुप्रयोग  ( including industrial and military  )   ,  governments  have  invested  अरबों   of   डॉलर   in  nanotechnology research .
Through its National  nanotechnology   पहल  , the  यूएसए  has  invested  3.7 billion dollars  .
the   यूरोपीय  Union has invested 1.2  अरब  and  जापानी   750  million dollars .
nanotechnology  as defined by  आकार   is   naturally  very broad , including fields of  विज्ञान  as  विविध  as surface science , organic  रसायन  , molecular biology , semiconductor physics , microfabrication ,  इत्यादि  .
The  संबद्ध  research  और   अनुप्रयोग  are equally diverse , ranging from extensions of conventional device physics to  completely  new approaches based upon molecular self-assembly  ,  from developing new  सामग्री  with  आयाम  on the nanoscale  to  direct control of matter  on  the  परमाणु   स्केल  .
वैज्ञानिकों   फिलहाल  debate  the  future implications of  nanotechnology   .
nanotechnology   may   be  able to create many new materials and  डिवाइस   साथ  a vast  दायरा  of  अनुप्रयोग  , such as in medicine , electronics  ,  biomaterials and energy production  .
On the  अन्य   हाथ  ,  nanotechnology   उठाता  many of  the   वही  issues as any new technology ,  सहित  concerns about the toxicity and  पर्यावरणीय  impact of nanomaterials , and their potential  प्रभाव  on  वैश्विक  economics ,  as   खूब   as   अटकलें  about  विभिन्न  doomsday scenarios .
ये   चिंताएं   have  led  to  a debate among advocacy  समूह  and  सरकारें   on  whether  खास  regulation of  nanotechnology   is  warranted .
Map of the  पूर्वी  Bloc
The term  पूर्वी   bloc  or Communist Bloc refers to  the   पूर्व  communist states of Central and Eastern Europe ,  generally  the Soviet Union and  the  countries  of  the Warsaw  अनुबंध   .
The terms Communist Bloc and Soviet Bloc  यहूद   भी  used to denote groupings  of  states aligned  साथ  the  सोवियत  Union  ,   हालांकि   ये  terms  might  include  राज्य  outside Central and Eastern  यूरोपीय  .
The New  जर्सी   gubernatorial  election  of   2009  took place on November  3  , 2009  .
लोकतांत्रिक  Governor Jon Corzine was running for  a  second term and was being  challenged  by  रिपब्लिकन  Chris Christie , Independent Christopher Daggett and nine others ,  in   जोड   to  several write-in candidates .
क्रिस्टी  won  the  election ,  साथ   परिचय   48.5   प्रतिशत  of  the  vote ,  to  44.9 percent for  corzine   और  5.8 percent  लिये   daggett  .
क्रिस्टी  won the  largest  margin for a  पहला  term  रिपब्लिकन  since 1969 .
Christie assumed office on January  19  , 2010 .
इस  was the first election to  भरण  the newly  निर्मित  office  of  Lieutenant Governor  .
The candidates for governor and lieutenant governor  यहूद  joined together as  a   सिंगल  choice , so  कि  voters  किया  not  have  the  अवसर  to split  the  ticket  .
Kim  guadagno   ,  Christie  's  running mate  ,  became  नई  Jersey  's   पहला  lieutenant governor following  उसके  inauguration .
स्वास्थ्य   परवाह   in   the  United  राज्य  is provided by many distinct organizations .
Health care facilities are largely owned  और  operated by  निजी  sector businesses  .
Health  बीमे  for public sector  कर्मचारी   is  primarily  provided   by  the government  .
60-65  % of healthcare provision  और  spending comes from  कार्यक्रम  such  as  Medicare  ,  Medicaid  ,   tricare  , the Children 's Health Insurance Program , and  the   दिग्गजों   स्वास्थ्य   प्रशासन  .
सबसे  of  the  population  अंतर्गत   65   is  insured by their  or  a family member 's employer  ,   कुछ  buy  स्वास्थ्य   बीमे  on their  अपना  , and the  शेष   हैं   uninsured   .
of   17   high-income  countries studied by  the  National  संस्थान  of  स्वास्थ्य  in 2013 , the United States was at  or  near the bottom in  शिशु  mortality , heart and lung disease , sexually transmitted infections ,  adolescent  pregnancies ,  चोटों   ,  homicides ,  और  rates of disability .
Together , such issues place  the  U.S. at the  नीचे   of  the list for life expectancy .
on   औसत   ,  a U.S. male can  be  expected  to  live almost four fewer  सालो  than those  in   the  top-ranked country .
According  to  the  संसार  Health Organization  (  WHO ) , the United  राज्य  spent more on  स्वास्थ्य   परवाह   प्रति  capita ( $  7,146   )   ,  and  अधिक  on health care as percentage  of  its GDP ( 15.2  %  ) , than any other nation  in  2008 .
the  Commonwealth Fund ranked the United States  पिछला   in  the  विशेषता  of health  परवाह   among  similar countries , and notes U.S.  परवाह   लागत  the  सबसे  .
The  u.S.   जनसांख्यिकी  Bureau reported that  49.9  million residents  ,  16.3 %  of  the population  ,  were  uninsured  in 2010  (   up  from 49.0 million residents ,  16.1  %  of  the population ,  in   2009  ) .
A 2004  संस्थान  of  आयुर्विज्ञान  ( IOM ) report said :  ``  The United States is  among   the  few industrialized nations  in  the world that  करता  not guarantee  अभिगम   to  health  परवाह  for its population . ''
A 2004  oecd  report said : `` With  the  exception of Mexico  ,  Turkey  ,  and the United  राज्य   ,  all OECD countries had achieved  सार्वभौमिक  or  near-universal  ( at  तनिक   98.4   %   insured  )  कवरेज  of their populations by  1990   .  ''
A 2010 report observed that  कमी  of  स्वास्थ्य  insurance  कल्याणकारी   roughly   48,000   अनावश्यक   मौतों  every year  in  the United States .
In 2007 , 62.1  %   of   filers  for bankruptcies claimed high  चिकित्सा  expenses  .
A 2013 study found  कि   परिचय  25 %  of   सब   वरिष्ठ   नागरिकों  declare bankruptcy due to medical  खर्च   ,  and  43  % are forced to mortgage  or  sell their  प्राथमिक  residence .
On March 23  ,   2010  , the Patient  सुरक्षा  and Affordable Care  अधिनियम  (  ppaca  ) became law , providing for major changes in  स्वास्थ्य   बीमे   .
in  physiology  ,  body  जल  is the  जल   सामग्री   of  the  इंसान   देह  .
A significant fraction  of  the human body is water .
Arthur Guyton 's Textbook  of  Medical Physiology states that `` the  कुल   राशि  of  जल  in  a   man  of average weight ( 70 kilograms  )  is approximately 40  लीटर  , averaging  57   प्रतिशत   of  his total body weight .
In a newborn infant ,  इस  may be  as  high as  75   प्रतिशत   of  the body weight  ,  but it progressively decreases from birth  to  old age , most  of  the  घटी   occurring  during  the  first 10  सालो  of life  .
भी  , obesity  decreases  the percentage  of   जल   in   the   देह  , sometimes to as low as 45 percent  ''   .
ये  figures are statistical  averages  ,  so   हैं   illustrative  , and like all biostatistics ,  होगा   vary  with things like type of  जनसांख्यिकी  , age  और  number  of  people sampled  ,   और  methodology  .
So there  is  not ,  और   can   नहीं  be ,  a   फिगर  that is exactly  the   वही  for all people  ,  for this or  कोई  other physiological  माप   .
For  उदाहरण  , Jackson 's  (   1985   )  Anatomy & Physiology for  नर्स  gives  a  figure  of   60   %  for  the  proportion of  body-weight  attributable  to  water ,  जिससे  approximates Guyton 's 57  %  .
in  diseased states where body  जल  is affected , the compartment  or   compartments   कि  have changed can  दे  clues to the nature of the problem .
देह  water is  regulated  by hormones , including  anti-diuretic  hormone ( ADH  )  , aldosterone and atrial natriuretic peptide  .
Per Netter 's Atlas  of  Human Physiology ,  देह  water  is  broken down into the following compartments:
Intracellular  द्रव  ( 2/3  of  body water  )   .
Per Guyton , in a  देह   containing  40  लीटर  of fluid , about  25  litres is intracellular , which  amounts  to  62.5  % ( 5/8 )  ,   बंद   पर्याप्त  to the  2/3  rule of thumb  .
जैक्सन   's  texts states  70  %  of  body  द्रव   is   intracellular  .
Extracellular fluid ( 1/3  of  body water  )  .
प्रति   guyton  's illustration , for  a   40  litre body , about  15   लीटर  is extracellular , which amounts to 37.5  %  Again ,  इस  is close to the  1/3  rule of thumb cited here .
Plasma  (  1/5 of extracellular fluid  )  .
Per Guyton 's  उदाहरण  , of the 15 litres of  extracellular  fluid  ,   प्लाज्मा  volume averages 3 litres .
This amounts  to   20  % ,  the  same as per Netter 's Atlas .
अंतरालीय  fluid (  4/5  of extracellular  द्रव   )
Transcellular  द्रव  ( a.k.a  .   ``  third  स्पेस  , ''  सामान्यतः  ignored in calculations )
Contained inside organs ,  ऐसे   as  the gastrointestinal  ,   प्रमस्तिष्कमेरु  , peritoneal , and ocular fluids  .
Self-esteem  is  a  पद  used  in  psychology to reflect  a  person  's   overall   emotional  evaluation  of  his or her own  लायक  .
It is a judgement of oneself as well as an attitude toward  the  self .
Self-esteem encompasses beliefs  (   लिये  example  ,   ``   i  am competent ,  ''  `` I  am  worthy '' ) and emotions  ऐसे   as  triumph  ,   despair  ,  अभिमान  and shame .
Smith and  mackie  define it by  saying  ``  the  self-concept  is  what we  सोचो   परिचय   the  self ; self-esteem  ,  is the  धनात्मक   or  negative evaluations  of  the  स्वः  , as  in  how we feel about  it  . ''
Self-esteem is  भी   ज्ञात  as the evaluative  आयाम  of the  स्वः  that includes feelings of  worthiness  , prides and discouragement  .
One 's self-esteem is also  closely  associated with self-consciousness .
Self-esteem  is  a  disposition  that a person  रै   जिससे   represents   उनके  judgements of their  अपना  worthiness .
in  the mid-1960s  ,  Morris Rosenberg  और   social-learning  theorists  पारिभाषित  self-esteem as a personal  लायक   or   worthiness  .
Nathaniel Branden in 1969 defined self-esteem as ``  the   अनुभव  of being  competent  to cope  साथ   the  basic challenges of life and being worthy of  सुख  . ''
According  to  Branden  ,   self-esteem  is the  योग  of self-confidence (  a  feeling of personal capacity  )  and self-respect  (   a  feeling of personal worth ) .
It  exists  as a consequence of the  अव्यक्त   निर्णय   कि   प्रत्येक  person  रै  of their ability to face life 's  चुनौतियां  , to  समझे  and  solve  problems , and  उनके  right to achieve  सुख   ,  and be given respect  .
As  a  social psychological construct , self-esteem  is  attractive because  शोधकर्ताओं  have conceptualized  it  as an influential  predictor  of relevant outcomes , such as academic achievement  (  Marsh 1990 ) or exercise  बर्ताव   (  Hagger et al .  1998  )  .
in  addition , self-esteem has also been  treated  as  an   महत्वपूर्ण   निष्कर्ष  due to its close relation with psychological well-being (  दलदल  1989 ) .
self-esteem   can   लागू   specifically   to  a particular dimension ( for example , ``  i  believe I  am  a  शुभ   लेखक  and I feel happy  परिचय  that  ''  )  or   a  global  extent  ( for example , `` I believe  i  am a  ख़राब   व्यक्ति  , and  महसूस  bad about myself in general ''  )  .
Psychologists usually regard self-esteem as  an  enduring personality characteristic  (   ``   trait  '' self-esteem ) , though  सामान्य  , short-term variations ( `` state ''  self-esteem  ) also  मौजूद  .
समानार्थी  or near-synonyms of self-esteem  शामिल  : self-worth ,  self-regard  ,  self-respect  , and self-integrity .
A  masonic  Lodge ,  प्रायः  termed a Private Lodge  or  Constituent Lodge ,  is   the  basic  organisational  unit of Freemasonry .
Every new Lodge  जरूर  be warranted  or   चार्टर्ड  by  a   ग्रैंड  Lodge  ,  but is subject  to   इसके  direction only in enforcing the  प्रकाशित  Constitution of the  क्षेत्राधिकार   .
by  exception  the  three surviving lodges  कि   formed  the world 's first known  ग्रैंड  Lodge  in  London ( today called the  संयुक्त   ग्रैंड   आवास  of England ) have the  अद्वितीय  privilege to  operate   as  time  immemorial  i.e . without  ऐसे  warrant ; only one other  आवास  operates  बगैर   a  warrant - this is the Grand Stewards ' Lodge in London ,  हालांकि  it is not also  हकदार   to  the `` time immemorial ''  शीर्षक  .
a  Freemason  is   generally  entitled  to  visit any Lodge , in any  क्षेत्राधिकार   (  i.e . under any Grand  आवास  ) in amity with his own .
In  कुछ  jurisdictions this privilege  is  restricted to Master Masons ( that is , Freemasons who have attained the  अनुक्रम   's  third degree  )   .
He  is  first usually required to check , and certify , the regularity  of   the   संबंध  of the  आवास  - and  be  able to satisfy that Lodge of his regularity of membership  .
Freemasons gather together as a Lodge to work the three  मौलिक  Degrees of  डाला  Apprentice ,  fellowcraft  and Master Mason .
Pilkington  समूह  Limited is a multinational  कांच  manufacturing  कम्पनी   headquartered  in St Helens , United Kingdom and  a  wholly owned subsidiary  of  the Japan-based NSG Group .
Prior to  इसके  acquisition by NSG in 2006 it was an independent  कम्पनी   सूचीबद्ध  on the  लंदन  Stock  एक्सचेंज  and for  a  time was a constituent  of   the   ftse  100  अनुक्रमणिका  .
A quotation is the repetition of one expression as part of  another  one  ,   विशेषकर  when the quoted expression is  well-known  or explicitly attributed by citation to its original  सोर्स  , and it  is  indicated  by  (  punctuated  with )  quotation  marks  .
A quotation  can  also refer to the  दोहराया  use of  इकाई  of any  अन्य  form of expression , especially parts of artistic works : elements of a painting , scenes from  a  movie or  भाग   इससे  a  musical  composition .
साल  1877 ( MDCCCLXXVII  )   थी  a common year starting  on   सोमवार  (  कड़ी   होगा   प्रदर्शक  the  पूरा  calendar  )  of the  gregorian  calendar and a common year starting on  शनिवार   of  the 12-day  धीमा  Julian  पंचांग   .
ब्लैक  pepper ( Piper nigrum  )  is a flowering vine  in  the family  piperaceae  , cultivated  लिये  its fruit ,  जिससे  is usually dried and used  as  a spice  और  seasoning  .
The  फल  , known  as  a peppercorn when dried , is  लगभग  in diameter  ,  dark red  जब   fully  mature ,  और   ,  like all drupes , contains  a   सिंगल   बीज   .
peppercorns  , and the ground pepper derived  इससे   उन्हें  , may be  वर्णित  simply  as  pepper  ,  or more  precisely   as   ब्लैक  pepper  (  cooked and dried unripe fruit ) , green pepper (  सूखी  unripe fruit )  और  white pepper  (  dried ripe seeds  )  .
Black pepper is  देशी   to  south India  ,  and is  extensively  cultivated there  और  elsewhere in  तीव्र  regions  .
Currently Vietnam is the world 's largest  निर्माता  and exporter of  pepper  , producing  34  %  of  the  संसार  's Piper nigrum crop  as   of  2008 .
सूखी  ground pepper  रै  been  प्रयुक्त  since  प्राचीनता  for both its  फ्लेवर  and as a medicine .
Black pepper  is  the world  's  most  traded  spice .
It  is  one of the  सबसे  common spices  added  to European cuisine and its  वंशजों   .
the   spiciness  of black  pepper  is  due  to the chemical piperine  ,   नहीं  to be confused  साथ  the  capsaicin  that gives  मांसल  peppers theirs  .
It is  in  the modern world ,  प्रायः   युग्म  with salt  .
Fire hydrant  in  Charlottesville  ,   वर्जिनिया  ,  यूएसए
a  fire hydrant ( also  ज्ञात   colloquially  as a  आग   प्लग  in the United  राज्य  or  as  a johnny pump  in  New York City ) ,  is  an active  आग  protection measure , and a  सोर्स  of water  provided  in most  शहरी   ,  suburban and  ग्रामीण  areas  साथ   नगरपालिका   जल   सेवा   to  enable firefighters to tap into the municipal water supply to  assist  in extinguishing  a   आग  .
Buildings near a hydrant may qualify for an  बीमे   छूट  since firefighters  चाहिए  be able  to   अधिक   rapidly  extinguish a fire on the insured property .
The concept  of  fire  plugs   तिथियाँ   to   at   तनिक  the 17th century .
This  थी  a time when firefighters responding to  a   कॉल   होता  dig down  to   the  wooden water mains  और  hastily bore a  छेद  to secure  जल  to fight fires .
The water  होता  fill the hole creating a temporary well , and  be  transported from the well to the fire by bucket brigades  or   ,   बाद  ,  by  hand-pumped fire engines  .
The  छेद   यहूद   तब  plugged with stoppers ,  सामान्यतः  redwood , which  over   समय  came to be  ज्ञात  as fire plugs .
the  location  of  the  प्लग  would often  be  recorded  or  marked so that  it  could be reused  in  future fires .
This is the  सोर्स  of  the   colloquial  term fire  प्लग  still used  लिये  fire hydrants today .
After  the  Great Fire  of   लंदन   in  1666 , the city installed  जल   मेन्स   साथ  holes drilled at  intervals   ,  equipped  साथ  risers , allowing an access  पाइंट  to  the  wooden fire plugs from  गली  level .
the  invention  of   a   post-  or pillar-type fire hydrant is generally  credited  to Frederick  graff  Sr. ,  मुख्य  Engineer of the  फिलाडेल्फिया  Water Works around  the   साल  1801  .
it  had a combination hose/faucet  आउटलेट  and was  of  ``  गीला  barrel  ''  design with  the   वाल्व   in  the  शीर्ष  .
It  is  said  कि  Graff held the  पहला  patent for a fire hydrant  ,  but  इस   can   नहीं   be   सत्यापित   क्युकी  the patent office in Washington  d.C.  caught on  आग   in  1836  destroying   अनेक   पेटेंट  records  इससे   कि   काल   in  the process .
The  अध्यक्ष  of the Republic of  दक्षिण  Africa is the head  of  state and head of government under South Africa  's  Constitution  .
From 1961 to 1994  ,  the head of state was called the State  अध्यक्ष  .
The President  is  elected  by  members of the National Assembly  ,   the  lower house of Parliament , and  is  usually the leader  of  the largest party  ,   जिससे   रै   महरूम  the African National  कॉंग्रेस  since  the  first non-racial elections  यहूद  held on  27  April 1994 .
The role was originally founded to be distinct from the now defunct role of prime minister  ,  but  the  two roles were merged  in   the  1983 constitution which specified a  four-year  term of office .
The 1993  और  later constitutions limits the president 's  समय  in office to two five-year terms .
the  first President to be elected under the new constitution  थी   नेल्सन  Mandela , and  the  incumbent president  is   याक़ूब  Zuma  .
Under the interim Constitution ( valid from  1994   to  1996 ) ,  वहीँ  was a Government  of   नेशनल  Unity ,  in  which an MP from  the  largest  विपक्ष  party  थी   हकदार  to a position as Deputy  अध्यक्ष  .
साथ  with Thabo  mbeki  , the last  राज्य   अध्यक्ष  , F.W  .  De Klerk  भी   परोसा  as Deputy President  ,  in his capacity  as  the  नेता  of  the   नेशनल  Party  जिससे  was the second-largest party in the  नई  Parliament .
लकिन  De Klerk later resigned and went into  विपक्ष  with his  पार्टी  .
A voluntary coalition  सरकारी  continues to exist under the new  संविधान  (  अपनाया  in  1996  ) ,  हालांकि   वहीँ  have been no appointments  of  opposition politicians  to  the post  of  deputy  अध्यक्ष  .
Special  शिक्षा  or  खास   needs  education is  the   शिक्षा  of students with special  needs  in a way that addresses  the  students ' individual differences and needs .
ideally  ,  इस  process involves  the  individually planned and systematically monitored arrangement of  शिक्षण   प्रक्रियाओं  , adapted equipment and  सामग्री  ,  accessible  settings , and other interventions designed to help learners with  खास  needs achieve a higher level of personal self-sufficiency and success  in  school  और  community than would  be   उपलब्धियाँ   if   the   छात्र  were only given access  to  a typical classroom education .
आम  special needs include challenges  साथ  learning ,  संचार  challenges  ,   emotional  and behavioral  विकार   ,  physical disabilities , and developmental disorders  .
Students  साथ  these  kinds  of special  needs   हैं  likely to benefit from additional  शैक्षणिक  services such  as   अलग  approaches to teaching , use of technology  ,  a  specifically  adapted teaching area , or resource room  .
बौद्धिक  giftedness is a  अंतर  in learning and can  भी   लाभ   इससे  specialized teaching  तकनीकों  or different  शैक्षणिक  programs , but the term `` special  शिक्षा   ''   is   generally   प्रयुक्त  to specifically  indicate   निर्देश  of students whose special  needs  reduce their ability to learn  independently   or  in an  ordinary  classroom ,  और  gifted education is  संभाला   separately  .
in  most developed  देशों  , educators are modifying  शिक्षण  methods and environments  so  that the maximum number of students  हैं  served in general education  environments  .
Special education in developed  देशों  is  प्रायः  regarded less as  a  `` place  ''  and  अधिक  as  ``  a range  of   सेवाएं  , available in every school  .  ''
Integration  can   reduce  social  stigmas  and improve academic achievement for  अनेक   विद्यार्थी  .
the   विपरीत   of   खास   शिक्षा  is general  शिक्षा   .
General  शिक्षा  is  the   मानक   curriculum  presented with standard teaching methods and without additional supports .
जार्ज  Soros ( or ; ; ; born August  12  , 1930 , as  schwartz  György )  is  a Hungarian-American  कारोबार   महारथी  , investor , and philanthropist  .
he  is the chairman of  सोरोस   निधि  Management .
Soros supports progressive-liberal causes .
He is known  as  `` The Man Who Broke the Bank of  इंग्लैण्ड   ``   क्युकी  of his  in  investment profits  दौरान   the  1992 Black Wednesday  uk  currency  संकट  .
between  1979 and 2011  ,  Soros gave away  over  $ 8 billion to human  अधिकारों  , public health , and education causes .
He  निभाई  a  significant   भूमिका  in the  शांतिपूर्ण  transition  इससे   साम्यवादी  to capitalism in  हंगेरियाई  (  1984–89  ) and provided one  of  Europe 's largest higher education  endowments   to   सेंट्रल  European  विश्वविद्यालयों  in Budapest .
सोरोस  is also the chairman of  the  Open  समाज  Institute  .
an  actor portraying  सिकंदर   ग्राहम   घंटी   बोलना  into an early model telephone .
The  आविष्कार  of the telephone  is   the  culmination of  कार्य  done by  अनेक  individuals , the history of which  involves  a collection of claims and counterclaims .
The  विकास   of  the modern electrical telephone involved  an   सरणी  of lawsuits founded upon the patent claims of several individuals  और  numerous companies .
This article covers the early years from  1844  to 1898 , from conception  of  the  विचार  of an electric  voice-transmission  device , to  विफल  attempts to  उपयोग  `` make-and-break '' current  ,   to  successful experiments with electromagnetic telephones  by  Alexander  ग्राहम   घंटी   और   थामस  Watson  ,  and finally to commercially  कामयाब  telephones in  the  late  19th  century .
A Master of Fine Arts ( MFA ,  m.f.a  . ) is a graduate  उपाधि   typically   requiring   2–3  years of postgraduate study  परे  the bachelor 's degree ( BFA ) , although the term  of  study will vary by country or by university  .
the   mfa   is   a  creative  उपाधि  usually awarded  as  a terminal degree  in   विज़ुअल  arts , creative writing  ,   filmmaking  ,  नृत्य  , or theatre  और  other performing arts  .
Coursework is primarily  of  an  लागू  or performing  प्रकृति  with the  कार्यक्रम  often  culminating  in a major  कार्य   or   प्रदर्शन  .
Master of Fine Arts programs have generally  जरूरी   a   स्नातक  's degree prior to admission , but many  do  not require that the undergraduate  प्रमुख  be  the  same as  the   mfa  field of study  .
The most important  admissions  requirement has  प्रायः   महरूम  a sample portfolio or a performance audition .
The  निपुण   of   ठीक   कला   differs   इससे   the  Master of Arts  in  that  the  MFA ,  जबकि   an  academic program ,  centers   around   अभ्यास  in the particular field , whereas  कार्यक्रम  leading  to   the  MA  प्रायः  center on  the  scholarly , academic , or critical  पढ़ाई   of  the  फ़ील्ड  .
Additionally  ,  in  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  ,  an   mfa  is recognized  as  a terminal degree for practitioners  of  Visual Art  ,  Design ,  नृत्य   ,  Theatre ,  film/video  , New Media  ,  and  रचनात्मक   लिखने  - meaning that it is considered  to  be  the  highest  उपाधि  in  इसके  field ,  और   is  used as a minimum qualification  to  be able  to  apply to become a Full-Time Professor teaching  at  the University  स्तर   in  these disciplines .
There  हैं  exceptions to  इस  standard  in  the  कला   ,   notably  in  the   मामला  of music  प्रदर्शन  ,  जहाँ  the  mfa  is  नहीं  seen  as   a  terminal degree in the context of  the   अधिक  standardized DMA degree .
it   is  also  नाजुक  to  नोट  that in  the  interest of extending the  कनेक्शन   between   रचनात्मक  production and continued academic research , some  विश्वविद्यालयों   have  established practice-based  ph.d   कार्यक्रम  in fields  ऐसे  as creative writing , visual  कला  , new media  ,  design and  थिएटर   .
While this has had an effect in Creative  लिखने  , and to a  lesser   extent  in design and  नई  media , the influx  of   graduates  from practice-based  phd   कार्यक्रम   रै   नहीं  appreciably changed the  मानक  for the  mfa  as the terminal  उपाधि  in most Arts  disciplines  yet .
This is  an  ongoing contentious topic  ,  and  is   the  frequent  विषय   of  academic panels  ,   विशेषकर  at the annual  कॉलेज   आर्ट   संघ  conference  .
The CAA 2008  दिशानिर्देश  regarding the  mfa  strongly  re-affirms   कि  the  phd   is  not required as a terminal  उपाधि  in  the  visual arts .
The atomic bombings  of  the  शहरों  of  हिरोशिमा  and Nagasaki  in   जापानी  were conducted by the United States  दौरान  the final  चरण   of   संसार  War II in 1945 .
the  two  कार्यक्रम   हैं   the   तभी   उपयोग  of nuclear  हथियार  in war to date .
Following a firebombing campaign that  नष्ट  many  जापानी   शहरों   ,  the Allies  prepared  for  a  costly invasion of Japan  .
The war in Europe ended when  नाजी  Germany signed  इसके  instrument of surrender on 8  may   ,  but  the  Pacific War continued .
साथ  with the  संयुक्त  Kingdom and  the  Republic  of  China ,  the  United States  पुकारा   लिये   a   आत्मसमर्पण   of  Japan in the Potsdam Declaration on  26  July 1945 ,  threatening  Japan  साथ  `` prompt and utter destruction ''  .
The  जापानी  government ignored this ultimatum , and the United States  तैनात  two nuclear weapons developed by the Manhattan  प्रोजेक्ट  .
अमरीकी  airmen  dropped  Little  लड़के  on the city of Hiroshima on 6 August 1945  ,  followed by  मोटे  Man  over  Nagasaki on  9  August .
Within the first two to  चार   महीने  of  the  bombings  ,  the  अधि   प्रभाव  killed 90,000–166,000  लोगों  in Hiroshima and  60,000–80,000  in Nagasaki ,  साथ  roughly half  of  the deaths in each city occurring  on  the first day .
the  Hiroshima prefecture  स्वास्थ्य   विभाग  estimated that , of the people who died on  the  day of the explosion ,  60  % died  इससे  flash or  ज्वाला   burns  ,  30  %  इससे  falling  मलबा  and 10 % from  अन्य  causes .
दौरान  the following months , large numbers died from the  प्रभाव  of burns  ,  radiation sickness ,  और  other injuries , compounded by illness .
In a  us  estimate of  the  total immediate and short term cause  of  death , 15–20 %  died   इससे  radiation sickness  ,   20–30  % from burns , and 50–60 %  इससे  other  चोटों   ,  compounded  by  illness  .
In both cities  ,   सबसे  of the dead were civilians , although Hiroshima  था  a sizeable garrison .
On 15 August  ,   छह  days after the bombing of Nagasaki , Japan  घोषित   इसके  surrender to the  allies   ,  signing the  यंत्र   of   आत्मसमर्पण  on 2 September  ,   officially  ending World War II .
The bombings led  ,  in  भाग   ,   to  post-war Japan 's adopting Three Non-Nuclear  सिद्धान्त  , forbidding the  स्वदेश  from nuclear armament  .
The role  of  the  bombings  in Japan  's  surrender and their ethical  औचित्य   हैं   स्टिल  debated .
Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi ( ; 2 October 1869 –  30   जनवरी  1948 ) ,  commonly  known as Mahatma Gandhi , was the preeminent leader of Indian  राष्ट्रवाद  in British-ruled  इण्डिया  .
Employing non-violent civil  disobedience  , Gandhi led India to independence and inspired movements for non-violence , civil rights and freedom across the world .
The son of  a  senior government official  ,   गांधी  was born and raised in  a  Hindu Bania community in  तटीय   गुजरात  , and  प्रशिक्षित   in  law in London .
Gandhi became famous  by   लड़  for the civil  अधिकारों  of  मुस्लिम  and Hindu Indians  in  South Africa , using new techniques of non-violent  सिविल  disobedience that  he  developed .
Returning  to  India in 1915  ,  he set about organising  peasants  to protest excessive land-taxes .
A lifelong  प्रतिद्वन्दी  of  ``  communalism `` (  i.e  . basing politics on religion )  he   पहुँचे   आउट  widely to all religious  समूह  .
he   became  a  नेता  of  मुसलमान  protesting the declining  औकात  of  the   खिलाफत  .
Assuming  नेतृत्व   of  the Indian National  कॉंग्रेस  in 1921 ,  गांधी  led nationwide campaigns  लिये   easing  poverty  ,   expanding  women  's  rights ,  भवन  religious and  जातीय  amity ,  समाप्ति  untouchability ,  increasing   आर्थिक   self-reliance  ,  और   ऊपर  all for  achieving  Swaraj —the  स्वतंत्रता   of  India  इससे  British  हुकूमत  .
Gandhi led Indians in protesting the national salt tax with the  dandi   नमक  March in 1930 , and  बाद  in  demanding  the British to immediately Quit India in 1942 , during World War II .
he  was  imprisoned   लिये  that and for  numerous  other political  offenses  over the  सालो  .
गांधी   sought  to practice non-violence and  सच्चाई  in all situations  ,  and advocated that  अन्य  do the same  .
He  देखी  the villages  as  the  कोर  of the  सच्चा  India  और  promoted self-sufficiency  ;  he  किया  not  support   the   industrialization  programs of his disciple Jawaharlal Nehru .
he  lived modestly in a  self-sufficient  residential  जातियाँ  and wore  the  traditional Indian  धोती   और   चादर  , woven with  धागे  he had hand  spun  on a charkha .
His  मुख्य   राजनैतिक  enemy  in  Britain  थी  Winston Churchill , who ridiculed him  as  a `` half-naked fakir  .  ''
He was a  समर्पित   शाकाहारी   ,   और   undertook  long  fasts  as means  of  both self-purification and political mobilization  .
In his last year , unhappy at the partition of India , Gandhi worked to stop  the  carnage between  मुसलमान   ,  Hindus and  सिखों   कि   raged  in the  किनारा  area  between  India and  पाकिस्तानी  .
He was assassinated on  30  January  1948  by  nathuram  Godse who thought Gandhi was  too  sympathetic  to   इण्डिया  's Muslims .
30  जनवरी  is observed  as  Martyrs '  दिन   in  India .
The honorific Mahatma ( `` Great  आत्मा   ''   )  was applied to him by  1914  .
In  इण्डिया   he  was also called Bapu ( `` Father  ''   )  .
he   is   ज्ञात   in  India  as   the  Father of  the  Nation  ;  his birthday , 2  अक्तूबर  ,  is  commemorated  वहीँ   as   गांधी  Jayanti  ,   a   नेशनल  holiday , and world-wide as  the  International  दिन  of Non-Violence  .
Gandhi  's  philosophy  थी  not theoretical  लकिन  one of pragmatism , that is ,  practicing  his  सिद्धान्त  in  the   पल  .
पूछा  to give  a  message to the people , he would respond , `` My life is my message . ''
जोन   क्रॉफर्ड  (  कूच  23 ,  ca   .  1904  –   may  10 , 1977 ) , born  lucille  Fay LeSueur , was an American actress in film ,  टेलीविज़न   और  theatre .
Starting as a dancer  in   traveling   नाट्य  companies before  debuting  on  ब्रॉडवे  ,  क्रॉफर्ड  was signed to a  गति   चित्र  contract by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer  in  1925  .
initially   कुंठित  by  the   आकार   और  quality of  उसके  parts  ,   क्रॉफर्ड  began a campaign of  self-publicity  and  became   nationally  known  as  a flapper  by  the end of the 1920s .
In the 1930s , Crawford  's  fame  rivaled  , and later outlasted , MGM  सहयोगियों  Norma Shearer and Greta  garbo   .
Crawford often  निभाई   मेहनती  young women who find romance and financial success .
These `` rags-to-riches  ''  stories were well received by  अवसाद  -era audiences  और   यहूद   लोकप्रिय   साथ  women .
क्रॉफर्ड  became one of Hollywood 's most prominent movie  सितारों   और   एक  of  the  highest paid women  in   the  United  राज्य   ,  but  उसके  films began  खोने  money and  by  the  समाप्त   of   the  1930s she was labeled `` box office  ज़हर   ''  .
After an  अनुपस्थिति   of  nearly  दो  years  इससे  the screen ,  क्रॉफर्ड  staged  a  comeback  by  starring in Mildred Pierce (  1945  ) , for  जिससे  she  जीती  the Academy Award for  बेहतरीन  Actress .
In 1955 , she  became  involved with  the  Pepsi-Cola Company through her marriage to company Chairman  अल्फ्रेड   स्टील   .
बाद   उसके   मौत   in  1959 , Crawford was  निर्वाचित  to  भरण  his vacancy on the board of directors but was  forcibly  retired  in  1973  .
She continued  एक्टिंग   in   फिल्मी   और  television regularly  through  the 1960s ,  जब  her performances  became   कम   ;  after the release of  the  British  हॉरर  film Trog  in  1970 ,  क्रॉफर्ड   रिटायर्ड  from  the   स्क्रीन   .
Following a  पब्लिक  appearance  in   1974  ,  बाद  which  unflattering  photographs were published ,  क्रॉफर्ड  withdrew from public life and became increasingly  reclusive  until her death in 1977 .
Crawford  शादीशुदा  four times .
उसके  first  तीन   विवाह  ended  in   तलाक  ;  the   पिछला  ended  साथ   the  death  of  husband Alfred Steele  .
She adopted five  children  ,  एक  of  जिसको   थी   reclaimed  by his  जनम  mother  .
क्रॉफर्ड   's  relationships with her two older children , Christina and Christopher  ,  were  acrimonious  .
क्रॉफर्ड  disinherited the two  और  ,  बाद  Crawford 's  मौत  ,  क्रिस्टीना  wrote a `` tell-all  ''  memoir  ,   mommie   dearest  , in which she alleged  a   lifelong   पैटर्न  of  शारीरिक  and emotional abuse  perpetrated  by Crawford .
She was  voted  the tenth greatest female  स्टार   in   the  history  of  American cinema by the American Film Institute  .

Tonneau cover (  or  ) describes a  मुश्किल  or soft cover  प्रयुक्त   to  protect unoccupied  यात्री  seats in a  convertible   or  roadster  ,  or the cargo bed in  a  pickup truck .
Hard tonneau covers open  by  a  hinging  or  फोल्डिंग  mechanism  जबकि  soft covers open by rolling  up   .
The  tonneau  cover  is  used to  छिपाते   कार्गो   .
जब   the  cover is pulled out , it keeps items out of the sun  और  provides  अतिरिक्त  security by keeping personal  वस्तुएं  out of sight , as  खूब  as  shielding   the  driver from view .
ट्विटर  is  an   ऑनलाइन   सोशल  networking service and  microblogging  service that enables its  उपयोक्ता  to send and read  text-based   संदेश  of up to 140 characters , known as `` tweets '' .
Twitter  थी   निर्मित   in  March  2006  by Jack Dorsey and  by  July ,  the   सोशल  networking site  थी  launched .
The service rapidly  gained  worldwide popularity  ,  with over 500 million registered  उपयोक्ता   as  of  2012  , generating over 340 million  tweets   रोज़  and handling over 1.6 billion search queries per day .
चूंकि  its  लॉन्च   ,  Twitter has  become  one of the  टेन   सबसे  visited  वेबसाइटों  on the  अंतरजाल  , and  रै  been described as `` the  sms   of   the  Internet .  ''
Unregistered users can read tweets , while registered users  can   पोस्ट  tweets  through  the website interface  ,   sms  , or a range of apps  लिये   मोबाईल  devices .
Twitter Inc. is based in San Francisco ,  साथ  additional servers and offices  in  New York City , Boston , and  सैन   अंतोनियो  .
the  Hangover is a  2009  American  कॉमेडी  film  ,  co-produced  और  directed by  टॉड   phillips  and  लिखा  by Jon  लुकास  and Scott Moore .
it  is the first  फिल्मी   of  The  hangover   मताधिकार  .The film stars  ब्राडली   कूपर  , Ed Helms , Zach Galifianakis , Heather  ग्राहम   ,  Justin Bartha ,  और  Jeffrey Tambor .
The Hangover  tells  the story  of  Phil Wenneck  ,  Stu  दाम   और   एलन  Garner , who travel to  लास  Vegas for a  स्नातक   पार्टी  to  celebrate  their friend Doug Billings ' impending  विवाह  .
However , Phil , Stu and  एलन  have  no  memory of the previous night  's  events  और  must find Doug before the wedding  can   लो  place .
Lucas  और  Moore wrote  the  script  बाद  executive producer  क्रिस  Bender 's  dost  disappeared and had a large bill  बाद  being sent to a strip  क्लबों  .
After Lucas  और   मूर  sold it to  the  studio for  $   2  million , Philips  और  Jeremy  garelick  rewrote the script to  शामिल   a  tiger as  खूब   as  a  subplot  involving a baby and a  पुलिस   क्रूजर   ,  and also  सहित  boxer  माइक  Tyson .
Filming  took   प्लेस  in  नेवाडा  for 15 days , and during filming , the three main actors  (  Cooper  ,  Helms and Galifianakis ) formed a friendship .
the  Hangover was released on June  5  , 2009 , becoming a critical and commercial success .
It became  the   tenth-highest-grossing  film of 2009  ,  with a  विश्वव्यापी  gross  of  over US $ 467 million  .
Critics praised the film 's comedic approach but criticized it for  इसके   vulgarity  .
The film won  the  Golden  ग्लोब  Award for  बेहतरीन  Motion  चित्र  –  musical  or Comedy  ,  and received  अनेक  other accolades .
It is the  tenth-highest-grossing  film of  2009   in  the world  ,  as well  as  the second highest-grossing  r-rated  comedy  कभी  in  the  United States ,  surpassing   a  record previously held by Beverly  पहाड़ियाँ  Cop for  लगभग  25 years and later  होने  surpassed by Ted in 2012 .
आउट  of  सब  R-rated  films   ,  it is the third  highest-grossing  ever  in   the  U.S. ,  पीछे  only  the  Passion of  the   मसीह  and  the  Matrix Reloaded  .
a  sequel  ,  The Hangover Part  ii  ,  थी   released  in 2011 , and  a   तीसरा  and  फाइनल  film ,  the  Hangover Part III  ,  is  नियत  for  रिलीज  in  2013  .
कार्यक्रम   involving  meiosis , showing chromosomal crossover
meiosis   (  ) is a  खास  type  of  cell division  जरुरी   लिये  sexual reproduction in eukaryotes .
The cells produced  by  meiosis are  गैमीट  or spores .
In many organisms  ,  including  सब   पशु   और  land plants ( but not some other groups  ऐसे  as fungi  )  , gametes  हैं   पुकारा  sperm and egg cells  .
Whilst the process  of   meiosis  bears a number of similarities with the 'life-cycle ' cell division process of mitosis  ,  it differs in  दो   महत्वपूर्ण  respects:
the chromosomes  in  meiosis undergo a  recombination  which shuffles  the   जीनों  producing a different  जेनेटिक  combination in  प्रत्येक  gamete , compared with the co-existence  of  each  of  the  दो  separate  pairs  of each chromosome (  एक   प्राप्त  from  प्रत्येक   जनक   )  in  प्रत्येक  cell which  परिणाम   इससे  mitosis .
the outcome of  meiosis   is  potentially four  (  genetically  अद्वितीय  )  अगुणित   कोशिकाएं   ,   compared   साथ  the two (  genetically   एकसमान  )  द्विगुणित   कोशिकाएं   उत्पादित  from  समसूत्रण  .
Meiosis  begins  with  एक   द्विगुणित  cell containing two  नक़ल  of each chromosome —one from the organism  's  mother and one from its  पिता   .
The cell divides twice  ,   potentially  producing up to  चार  haploid cells containing one  नक़ल  of each chromosome .
( `` Potentially '' because in  कुछ  cases ,  ऐसे  as the formation of oocytes  in  mammals  ,  only  एक  of the possible  चार  haploid cells survives . )
in  animals the haploid cell  resulting   इससे  meiosis is a male  or  female  gamete   .
Each  of  the resulting chromosomes in the  gamete  cells is a unique mixture of maternal and paternal  डीएनए  , resulting in  औलाद  that are genetically distinct from either  जनक  .
This gives rise  to  genetic diversity in sexually reproducing  populations   .
This genetic diversity  can  provide  the   विभिन्नता  of physical and behavioural attributes ( phenotypes ) upon which natural selection can  अधिनियम  , but ,  as  described below in Section 6  ,  Origin  और  function  of  meiosis  ,  the  जेनेटिक  diversity  may  be largely  a  by-product  of  the homologous  recombination  that is primarily  employed  for its DNA  मरम्मत  function  दौरान  meiosis .
It is  भी  noteworthy that  दौरान  meiosis , specific  जीनों  are more highly  transcribed  ,  और  these are called  the   meiome  ,  the  term  प्रयुक्त   in  functional  जीनोमिक्स  for the  meiotic   transcriptome   .
Meiosis is  a  key  विशेषता  for all  sexually   reproducing  eukaryotes in which homologous chromosome pairing , synapse and recombination occur .
In  जोड  to strong meiotic  stage-specific   अभिव्यक्ति   of  mRNA ( the meiome  )  , however , there are also pervasive translational controls ( e.g . selective usage of  preformed  mRNA ) , regulating the ultimate meiotic stage-specific protein  अभिव्यक्ति   of   जीनों  during meiosis  .
Thus , both the meiome and translational  नियंत्रण  determine the broad restructuring  of  meiotic cells  needed   to  carry out meiosis  .
Prior to the meiosis  प्रक्रम  the  कोशिका  's chromosomes  हैं  duplicated by a round  of   डीएनए  replication , creating  इससे   the  maternal and paternal versions of  प्रत्येक   chromosome   (  homologs  )   दो  exact copies  ,  sister  chromatids  , attached at the centromere region .
In the beginning of  meiosis  the maternal and paternal homologs pair to each  अन्य  .
Then  वे   typically   एक्सचेंज  parts by homologous recombination leading to crossovers  of  DNA  between   the   मातृ   और  paternal versions of the chromosome .
Spindle  मछली  bind  to   the  centromeres of each pair of homologs  और  arrange  the   pairs  at the spindle  equator  .
Then  the  fibers pull the  recombined  homologs  to  opposite poles  of  the cell .
As the chromosomes  मूव   दूर  from  the   बीच   the  cell divides into two daughter cells , each  containing  a haploid  क्रमांक   of  chromosomes composed of two  chromatids   .
After the recombined maternal and  पैतृक  homologs  have   अलग  into  the  two  बेटी  cells , a  दूसरी   गोलाकार  of cell  प्रभाग  occurs .
There meiosis  ends   as  the two sister chromatids  बनाना   up   प्रत्येक  homolog are separated and  मूव  into one  of  the four  resulting  gamete  कोशिकाएं   .
Upon  fertilization  , for example when  a  sperm enters  an  egg cell , two  gamete  cells  उत्पादित  by  meiosis  fuse .
The gamete  इससे  the mother and the gamete from  the  father each contribute one  हाफ  of the set of  गुणसूत्रों  that make  up  the new  औलाद   's   genome  .
meiosis  uses many of the same mechanisms as mitosis , a  प्रकार   of  cell  प्रभाग  used by  eukaryotes  like  पौधे  and  पशु  to split  एक   कोशिका  into two  एकसमान  daughter  कोशिकाएं  .
In all plants and  in  many protists meiosis results in  the   गठन  of  बीजाणुओं  : haploid  कोशिकाएं  that can divide vegetatively  बगैर  undergoing fertilization .
Boxing ( pugilism  ,  prize  लड़  , the  मीठी   विज्ञान  or  in  Greek  pygmachia  ) is a martial art and combat sport in which two  लोगों   engage  in a contest of strength  ,  speed ,  reflexes   ,  endurance and will  by  throwing punches with gloved hands .
Amateur  मुक्केबाज़ी   is   an  Olympic and Commonwealth sport and is a common  fixture  in most of the  प्रमुख   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  games - it  भी  has its own World Championships .
Boxing is  पर्यवेक्षित  by  a   रेफरी   over  a series of one-  to  three-minute intervals called rounds  .
The result  is  decided  जब  an opponent is deemed  incapable  to continue by a referee  ,  is disqualified for breaking  a  rule  ,   resigns  by  फेंकना   in  a  तौलिया  , or  is  pronounced  the  winner or loser  आधारित  on the judges ' scorecards at the  समाप्त  of the contest .
The birth hour of  मुक्केबाज़ी  as a sport may be its acceptance  by  the  प्राचीन   यूनानियों   as  an Olympic game  as  early as  688   bc  .
Boxing evolved from 16th- and  18th-century  prizefights , largely  in  Great  ब्रिटेन   ,  to the forerunner  of  modern boxing in the  mid-19th   सदी  , again initially in Great  ब्रिटेन  and  बाद  in  the   संयुक्त   राज्य   .
In  2004  , ESPN  क्रमित   मुक्केबाज़ी  as  the  most  मुश्किल  sport  in   the  world .
Agreement or concord happens when a word changes  रूप  depending  on   the  other words to which it relates .
It  is  an instance of inflection  ,   और  usually involves making the  मान  of  कुछ  grammatical  श्रेणी  ( such as gender or person  )  `` agree  ''   between   अलग  words  or  parts of  the  sentence .
लिये  example , in  मानक   अंग्रेज़ी  , one  may  say  i  am or he is , but not  ``  I is '' or  ``  he am  ''   .
This is  क्युकी  the grammar  of  the language requires that  the   क्रिया  and its subject  सहमत  in  व्यक्ति  .
the  pronouns  i   और   he   हैं   पहला  and third person respectively  ,  as are the  क्रिया   फ़ॉर्म   am   और  is .
the  verb form must be selected so  कि  it has the  वही   व्यक्ति  as the subject .
the  agreement based on overt  व्याकरणिक   श्रेणी  as above is formal agreement , in contrast  to  notional agreement ,  जिससे  is  आधारित  on meaning .
For instance ,  the  phrase  the  United States is  treated  as singular for purposes of agreement ,  भी   हालांकि  it  is  formally  बहुवचन  .
This  is  a  सूची  of  स्थान  below  औसत  sea  स्तर  that are on land  .
Places in  tunnels   ,  mines  ,  basements , dug holes ( also with open sky ) , under  जल   ,   अंतर्गत  ice , or existing temporarily as a result of ebbing of sea tide  इत्यादि  .  हैं  not included  .
सब   आंकड़े  are  in  meters below sea level:
Debbie Macomber (  born  October 22 , 1948 in  yakima  , Washington )  is  a best-selling American author of  over   150   रोमांस   novels  and  समकालीन  women  's   fiction   .
Over 140 million copies  of  her books are in print throughout  the   संसार  , and four  have  become made-for-TV-movies .
Macomber  थी  the inaugural winner of the fan-voted Quill Award  लिये  romance in 2005 and  रै  been awarded both a Romance Writers  of  America RITA  और  a lifetime achievement award  by  the  रोमांस   लेखक   of   अमेरिका  .
Catonsville  is  a  census-designated  place ( CDP ) in Baltimore County , Maryland  ,  United States .
The population was 41,567 at the 2010  जनसांख्यिकी   .
The community  झूठ  to the  वेस्ट  of  बाल्टीमोर   साथ  the city 's border .
Catonsville is  the  home  of  the University of Maryland  ,  Baltimore County (  umbc  ) , a  पब्लिक   शोध   विश्वविद्यालयों  with over  12,000   विद्यार्थी  .
A  वकील   ,  according to Black  's   विधि  Dictionary ,  is  `` a person learned in the law ; as an  attorney  ,  counsel   or  solicitor ;  a  person  जो   is  practicing law . ''
Law is the  प्रणाली  of rules of conduct  स्थापित  by the  sovereign  government of a  समाज  to  सही  wrongs  ,  maintain the stability of political and social authority  ,  and  उद्धार  justice .
working  as a  वकील   involves  the practical  अनुप्रयोग  of abstract legal theories and knowledge to solve specific individualized problems  ,  or to advance the  रूचि  of those who retain ( i.e.  ,  hire ) lawyers to  perform  legal services .
The role  of  the lawyer varies significantly across legal  jurisdictions   ,  and  so   it  can be treated here in only the most general terms  .
वेक्टर   विपणन   is  the domestic sales arm of Cutco  निगम   ,  an Olean ,  नई   यॉर्क  based cutlery manufacturer .
The Family and Medical Leave Act of 1993 ( FMLA )  is   a  United States federal  विधि   requiring  covered employers  to  provide employees job-protected  और   unpaid  leave  लिये   योग्य  medical and  परिवार  reasons .
Qualified medical and family reasons include : personal or  परिवार  illness , family military  छोड़  , pregnancy  ,   अपनाना  ,  or  the foster care placement  of  a child  .
The FMLA is administered by  the   मजदूरी  and Hour Division of the United States Department  of  Labor  .
The bill was a major  भाग  of  अध्यक्ष   विधेयक  Clinton 's agenda in  उसके   पहला  term .
President Clinton signed the bill into  विधि   on   फ़रवरी   5   ,   1993   (  ; 29  u.s.c   .  sec  .   2601   ;  29 CFR 825  )  and  it  took effect on August  5   ,   1993  , six months later .
The FMLA was intended ``  to  balance the demands of the  कार्यस्थल  with the  needs  of families .  ''
the   अधिनियम  allows  योग्य   कर्मचारी   to  take  up   to  12 work weeks of  unpaid  leave during  कोई  12-month  काल  to attend to the  गंभीर  health  कंडीशन  of the employee , parent , spouse  or  child  ,  or  लिये  pregnancy  or   परवाह  of  a   नवजात  child  ,   or  for  अपनाना   or  foster care of  a  child .
in  order to be  योग्य  for FMLA leave , an employee must  have  been  at   the   कारोबार  at least 12 months ,  और   worked  at least 1,250  घंटों  over  the  past 12  महीने  , and  कार्य  at a  स्थान  where  the  company  employs  50  or   अधिक  employees within  75  miles  .
the  FMLA  कवर  both  public-  and private-sector employees  ,  but certain categories  of   कर्मचारी  are excluded , including  निर्वाचित  officials and  उनके  personal  स्टाफ   सदस्यों  .
The  वियतनाम  War ( ) was  a   ठंडा  War -era military conflict that occurred in Vietnam , Laos  ,   और   कंबोडिया  from 1 November 1955  to  the fall of  साइगॉन  on 30 April 1975 .
This war  followed   the  First Indochina  युद्ध  and was fought  between  North Vietnam  ,  supported  by  its  कम्युनिस्ट  allies , and the government  of  South  वियतनाम   ,   समर्थित  by the United States and  अन्य   anti-communist  countries .
The  viet  Cong ( also known  as  the National Liberation Front , or NLF ) ,  a   हलके  armed South Vietnamese  कम्युनिस्ट  common  सामने  directed by the  उत्तर  , largely fought a guerrilla war  विरूद्ध   anti-communist  forces in the region .
The Vietnam  लोगों  's  फौज  ( North Vietnamese Army  )  engaged  in  a  अधिक  conventional war , at times committing large units into battle .
U.S. and South Vietnamese  शक्तियां  relied  on  air  बड़प्पन  and  overwhelming  firepower to  conduct  search  और  destroy  परिचालन  , involving ground  शक्तियां  , artillery  ,   और   airstrikes  .
the  U.S.  सरकारी  viewed involvement in  the  war as a way to  prevent   a  communist takeover of South Vietnam as  भाग  of their wider  रणनीति  of containment .
The North Vietnamese government and Viet  cong  were fighting to reunify Vietnam under communist  नियम   .
They viewed the conflict as  a  colonial  युद्ध  , fought  initially  against France , backed  by   the  U.S. , and  बाद  against South Vietnam ,  जिससे  it regarded as a U.S.  कठपुतली  state .
American military advisors  arrived  in what was then French  इंडोचायना  beginning in 1950 .
U.S. involvement  escalated  in  the  early  1960s   ,  with troop levels tripling in 1961  और  tripling again  in  1962  .
U.S. combat units  यहूद   तैनात  beginning in 1965  .
Operations spanned  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  borders , with  लाओस  and Cambodia heavily bombed .
American involvement  in  the war peaked  in   1968  , at  the  time  of  the Tet Offensive .
After  इस   ,  U.S.  मैदान  forces were gradually  withdrawn  as part of a policy known as  vietnamization   .
Despite the Paris Peace Accords ,  हस्ताक्षरित  by all parties  in  January  1973  , fighting continued .
U.S. military  भागीदारी   ended  on 15 August 1973 as a  परिणाम  of the  case–church   amendment  passed by the U.S.  कॉंग्रेस  .
The capture of Saigon  by  the Vietnam People  's  Army in April 1975 marked  the  end of  the   युद्ध   ,  and North and  दक्षिण  Vietnam  यहूद  reunified the following year .
The war  exacted   a   विशाल   इंसान  cost  in  terms  of  fatalities ( see Vietnam War  हताहत  )  .
estimates  of the number of Vietnamese  सैनिको  and civilians killed vary  इससे   800,000   to  3.1 million .
कुछ  200,000–300,000 Cambodians  ,   20,000–200,000  Laotians ,  और  58,220 U.S. service members also died  in  the conflict .
Cleveland Volcano in the Aleutian  आइलैंड्स  of  अलास्का  photographed from the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Space  स्टेशन  ,  may   2006  .
Ash plumes reached a height of 19  km  during the climactic eruption  at  Mount Pinatubo , Philippines in 1991 .
a  volcano is an opening  ,  or rupture , in  a  planet  's  surface or crust , which allows hot  मैग्मा  , volcanic  राख  and gases to escape from the magma chamber  नीचे   the  surface  .
Volcanoes are generally found where tectonic  प्लेटों  are  diverging   or  converging .
A mid-oceanic ridge ,  लिये   उदाहरण   the  Mid-Atlantic Ridge , has examples of volcanoes caused by divergent tectonic plates pulling  अलावा   ;  the  प्रशांत  Ring of Fire  रै  examples of  ज्वालामुखी  caused by convergent  tectonic  plates  coming   साथ  .
By  कंट्रास्ट  ,  ज्वालामुखी   हैं  usually not created where  दो  tectonic plates  स्लाइड   पास्ट  one  another   .
Volcanoes can also form  जहाँ  there  is  stretching and thinning  of  the  धरती   's  crust in the interiors of plates  ,  e.g. , in the East African Rift ,  the  Wells  gray-clearwater   volcanic   फ़ील्ड  and the Rio  ग्रांडे  Rift in North America  .
This  प्रकार   of   volcanism   जलप्रपात  under the umbrella  of  `` Plate hypothesis  ''   volcanism   .
volcanism   दूर  from  थाली  boundaries  रै  also  महरूम  explained as mantle plumes  .
ये  so-called  ``  hotspots `` , for example Hawaii , are postulated to arise  इससे  upwelling diapirs  साथ  magma from the core–mantle boundary ,  3,000   km  deep in the Earth  .
Erupting volcanoes can pose many  जोखिमों  ,  नहीं  only in  the   तात्कालिक   vicinity  of the  फटना  .
Volcanic ash  can  be a threat to aircraft , in particular those  साथ  jet engines where ash particles  can  be melted by the high  ऑपरेटिंग   तापमान   .
Large eruptions can affect temperature as  राख  and  droplets  of sulfuric acid  अस्पष्ट   the  sun and cool the  धरती  's  निम्नतर  atmosphere or  क्षोभमण्डल  ; however , they  भी  absorb heat  radiated   up  from the Earth , thereby warming the stratosphere .
Historically  ,  so-called volcanic  सर्दियों  have caused  अनर्थकारी  famines .

A pothole (  sometimes  called a  केतली  and known in parts of the Western  संयुक्त   राज्य  as a chuckhole )  is   a  type of disruption  in  the  सतह  of a roadway  जहाँ   a  portion  of  the road  सामग्री   रै  broken away , leaving a hole  .
Renal  कोशिका  carcinoma ( RCC , also  ज्ञात   as   hypernephroma   )  is a kidney cancer  कि   originates  in  the   अस्तर  of the proximal convoluted tubule , the very small  tubes   in  the  गुर्दा  that transport GF ( glomerular filtrate  )   इससे  the glomerulus to the descending limb of  the   nephron  .
RCC is  the   सबसे  common type  of  kidney cancer in adults , responsible for  लगभग  80  %  of cases .
It is also  ज्ञात  to be the  सबसे  lethal of  सब  the genitourinary  tumors  .
Initial  उपचार  is most commonly a  कट्टरपंथी   or  partial  nephrectomy  and remains  the  mainstay  of  curative treatment .
Where the tumor is  confined  to  the   renal  parenchyma , the  5-year  survival  रेट  is 60-70 %  ,   लकिन  this  is   lowered   considerably  where  metastases  have spread .
it  is relatively resistant  to   विकिरण  therapy and chemotherapy , although some cases respond to immunotherapy .
Targeted  कर्कट  therapies such as sunitinib , temsirolimus ,  bevacizumab   ,  interferon-alpha , and sorafenib  have  improved  the  outlook for  rcc  .
Estée Lauder Companies , Inc. is a  निर्माता  and marketer of prestige  skincare   ,  makeup ,  महक  and hair care products .
the  company has its headquarters  in   midtown  Manhattan  ,  New  यॉर्क  City .
The peritoneum  (   )  is  the  serous  झिल्ली  that forms the lining of  the  abdominal cavity or the coelom —it covers most of the intra-abdominal (  or  coelomic ) organs—in  amniotes  and some invertebrates ( annelids  ,  for  उदाहरण  ) .
It is composed of a layer of  mesothelium  supported by a thin  परत   of  connective  ऊतक  .
The  peritoneum   दोनो  supports the abdominal organs and serves as a conduit for  उनके  blood and lymph vessels  और  nerves  .
the  abdominal  गुहा   (  the space bounded by the vertebrae  ,  abdominal  मांसपेशियां   ,   diaphragm  and  श्रोणि  floor ) should not be confused with the intraperitoneal space ( located  भीतर  the  abdominal  cavity , but  लपेटा  in peritoneum ) .
The structures within  the  intraperitoneal  स्पेस  are called ``  intraperitoneal   ''  ( e.g . the  पेट  ) , the  structures   in  the  abdominal  cavity  कि  are  स्तिथ  behind the intraperitoneal space are called `` retroperitoneal ``  (  e.g .  the  kidneys ) ,  और  those structures below the intraperitoneal  स्पेस  are  पुकारा   ``  subperitoneal '' or ``  infraperitoneal  ''  (  e.g . the bladder ) .

PCI-E  ,  DRAM , and  नन्द  based  ssd  .
It uses an external power  सप्लाई  to make  the  DRAM non-volatile .
a  solid-state drive ( SSD )  (  also known  as  a solid-state disk  or  electronic disk , though it contains  no   वास्तविक   ``  disk  ''  of any  दयालु  ) is  a  data storage device  using  integrated circuit  सभाओं  as memory  to  store data persistently .
SSD  प्रौद्योगिकी  uses electronic interfaces compatible with traditional block input/output ( I/O  )  hard disk drives .
SSDs  have  no  चलती  mechanical  components  , which  फर्क  them from  परंपरागत   electromechanical  magnetic disks such  as   मुश्किल   डिस्क  drives ( HDDs ) or floppy disks ,  जिससे  contain  घूम  disks and movable read/write heads  .
Compared with electromechanical disks , SSDs  हैं  typically less  susceptible  to physical shock , much  quieter  , have  निम्नतर  access time , and  कम  latency .
However  ,   जबकि   the  price of SSDs  रै  continued  to   मनाही   in  2012  ,  SSDs are  स्टिल   परिचय  7 to  8   टाइम्स   अधिक   महंगी  per unit of storage  than  HDDs .
अनेक  SSDs use I/O interfaces  विकसित   लिये   मुश्किल   डिस्क  drives , thus  permitting  simple replacement in common  अनुप्रयोग  .
, most  ssds   उपयोग  NAND-based  फ्लैश  memory , which  retains  data  बगैर  power  .
For  अनुप्रयोग   requiring  fast  अभिगम   ,  but  नहीं  necessarily data  हठ  after power loss  ,  SSDs may be constructed from random-access  मेमोरी  (  राम  ) .
Such devices may  employ  separate power sources , such as batteries  ,   to   maintain  data after  शक्ति  loss .
संकर  drives or  ठोस  state hybrid  ड्राइव  (  sshd  ) combine  the  features of SSDs and  hdds   in  the same unit  ,  containing  a  large hard disk drive  और   an   ssd  cache  to   improve   प्रदर्शन  of frequently  पहुँचा   आंकड़ा   .
These devices  may   प्रस्ताव  near-SSD  प्रदर्शन   लिये   अनेक  applications .
