Caviar ,  according  to the Food  और  Agriculture Organization , is a product made  इससे  salt-cured fish-eggs  of   the  Acipenseridae family .
the  roe can be `` fresh ''  (   non-pasteurized   )  or pasteurized , with pasteurization  reducing  its culinary  और  economic value .
traditionally   the  term caviar refers only to roe from  जंगली  sturgeon in the Caspian and Black Seas  (  Beluga , Ossetra and Sevruga caviars ) .
Depending on the country , caviar may also  be  used to describe the roe  of  other fish such  as  salmon , steelhead  ,  trout , lumpfish  ,   whitefish  ,  और   अन्य  species of  sturgeon   .
Caviar is considered  a  luxury delicacy and is eaten as a garnish  or   a  spread .
in  2012 ,  caviar  sold for  $  2,500 per pound ,  or  $ 3,000 to $ 5,500 per kilo .
The SEC  संजाल  is a television  अनुप्रयोग  network  featuring  live broadcasts of college football  और  basketball events from the Southeastern  सम्मेलन   .
It  is  owned and operated by  ईएसपीएन   प्लस  and  is  shown in more than 50 percent of households in the United States , mostly Southeastern  संयुक्त  States markets .
the  SEC Network  typically  airs in the  नून   पूर्वी  slot that was former  घर   to   the   raycom  Sports SEC  खेल  of  the  week .
खेल  are shown locally on broadcast stations , regional sports networks  ,  as well as on ESPN GamePlan , ESPN Full Court , and ESPN3.com .
the  SEC Network is  भी  available in Canada via Atlanta  's   wpch-tv  .
the  SEC Network  उपयोग  the same on-screen graphics  फिलहाल  used by ESPN  on  ABC  ,   a  version  of  ESPN 's graphics package .
SEC Network  's  football programming still  उपयोग   a  title  सुरक्षित   क्षेत्रफल  because most of  इसके  affiliates do not Letterbox their Standard Definition  फ़ीड्स  , while ESPN 's  टेलीविज़न  networks have allowed  उनके   ग्राफिक्स   to   लापरवाही  the title  सुरक्षित  , but letterbox  लिये   sd  viewers .
Starting with  the  SEC 2012 Basketball season ,  सेक  Network 's  ग्राफिक्स  have been converted to a 16:9 Widescreen-only format  .
This  is  also being used  लिये   the   2013  Basketball  ऋतु  ,  लकिन   था   स्टिल   adapted  the former 4:3-safe graphics format for the 2012  सेक  football  ऋतु  .
The 1990s  ,   सुनाया  and also  ज्ञात  as `` the Nineteen-Nineties '' or  abbreviated  as  ``  the Nineties  ''  or `` the  '90s   ''   ,   थी  a decade  कि  began on January 1 , 1990  ,  and ended on December 31 ,  1999  .
it  was the 10th and last decade  of  the 20th century and the 100th and last decade  of  the  2nd  millennium .
the  decade is  बेहतरीन  known  लिये  the end  of  the Cold War at the beginning  of   the   दशक   और  the expansion and  व्यावसायीकरण  of  the  Internet during  the  second half of the  दशक   .
In much of the West the 1990s is  remembered  as  a   काल  of unprecedented peace and prosperity , though  अनेक  parts  of  the  so-called   तीसरा  World faced various problems  सहित  genocide  ,  AIDS and new or continuing ethnic  तनाव   और  civil wars .
Culturally speaking the decade  थी  characterized by  the  rise of multiculturalism and alternative media .
Movements  ऐसे   as  grunge  ,  the rave scene and  हिप  hop spread  around  the  संसार  to  यंग  people  दौरान  the  दशक  , aided  by   then-new  technology  ऐसे  as cable  टेलीविज़न  and the  अंतरजाल   .
a  combination  of   कारकों  , including the mass  mobilization  of  पूंजी  markets through  neoliberalism  , the beginning  of   the  widespread proliferation of  नई   मीडिया  such as the  अंतरजाल  , and  the  dissolution  of  the  सोवियत  Union led to a realignment  और  reconsolidation  of  economic and political power across the  संसार  , and within  देशों  .
आय   असमानता  among countries in the world rose sharply between the 1980s and the mid-1990s  ,  before levelling off and then falling after  2000   .
New ethnic conflicts  उभरा  in  अफ़्रीकी  , the Balkans  और   the  Caucasus , the former two which  led  to the  rwandan   नरसंहार  and Bosnian  नरसंहार  ,  क्रमशः   .
The United States began its current military occupation of  the   मध्य  East  दौरान  the summer of  1990  with Desert Shield after  it  cut  बंद   a  large portion of the world 's petroleum supply .
Signs  of  any  रेज़ोल्यूशन  of tensions between  इसराईल  and the Arab  संसार  remained elusive , though  the  Irish Troubles came to a standstill  in  1998 with the  शुभ   शुक्रवार  Agreement after 30 years of violence .
the  gray wolf or  धूसर  wolf ( Canis  lupus   )  is a species  of  canid  देशी  to  the   wilderness   और   रिमोट  areas of  उत्तर  America , Eurasia  ,   और  North  अफ़्रीकी   .
It is the largest member of its  परिवार  , with males averaging , and females .
it  is  समान  in general appearance and proportions to a  जर्मनी  shepherd ,  or  sled  श्वान  , but has  a  larger head  ,   narrower   छाती  ,  longer  legs , straighter tail and  बडे  paws .
इसके  winter  फर  is long and bushy  ,  and predominantly a  mottled   धूसर  in colour , although nearly  pure  white , red , or brown to black also  occur  .
Within  the   genus   canis   ,  the gray wolf represents a  अधिक  specialised  और   प्रगतिशील   रूप   than   इसके   छोटी   cousins  ( the coyote and  सुनहरी   jackal  )  ,  as demonstrated by its morphological adaptations to hunting large  शिकार  , its more gregarious  प्रकृति  and its highly advanced  अर्थपूर्ण   बर्ताव   .
It is a  सोशल  animal  ,  travelling in nuclear families consisting of  a  mated pair , accompanied by  the  pair  's  adult offspring .
The gray  भेड़िया  is typically an  apex  predator throughout its  दायरा  , with  तभी   इंसानो  and tigers posing a serious threat to it  .
It feeds primarily on large ungulates ,  हालांकि  it  भी   eats  smaller animals , livestock , carrion  ,  and  कचरा  .
the  gray  भेड़िया  is one of  the  world 's most  खूब  researched  पशु  , with probably more  किताबे  written about it than any other  वन्यजीव  species .
It has  a   long   इतिहास  of association  साथ  humans ,  having   महरूम  despised and  hunted  in most agricultural communities due  to  its  हमले  on livestock  ,  while conversely  होने  respected by some Native American tribes .
it   is  the sole ancestor of  the   श्वान  , which was first domesticated in  the   मध्य  East .
Although the fear of  भेड़ियों  is prevalent in many human societies , the  बहुमत  of recorded  हमले  on  लोगों  have  महरूम   attributed  to animals suffering  इससे   rabies   .
Non-rabid  भेड़ियों   have   attacked  and killed  लोगों  , mainly children  ,   लकिन   इस  is  असामान्य   ,  as  भेड़ियों  are relatively few , live away from  लोगों  , and have been taught  to  fear  इंसानो  by hunters and  गड़रिये   .
शिकार   और  trapping has reduced the species '  दायरा  to ,  हालांकि   इसके  still relatively widespread range and  stable  population means that the species is  नहीं  threatened  at  a  वैश्विक  level  ,  and is  इसलिए  classified by the IUCN  as   तनिक  Concern .
the  Roman  साम्राज्य  ( ) was the post- Republican period  of  the ancient  रोमन   सभ्यता  ,  characterised  by an autocratic form of government and large territorial  holdings  around the Mediterranean in Europe ,  अफ़्रीकी   ,  and Asia .
The  500-year-old   रोमन  Republic , which preceded it  ,  had been destabilized  through  a series of civil wars .
Several events marked  the   परिवर्तन   इससे  Republic to Empire , including Julius Caesar 's appointment as  perpetual  dictator (  44  BC  )   ;  the Battle  of   actium   (   31  BC  )  ; and the  granting  of the honorific  augustus   to  Octavian  by   the  Roman Senate (  27   bc  ) .
The  पहला  two  सदियां  of  the  Empire were a period of unprecedented stability and prosperity known as the Pax Romana ( `` Roman Peace ''  )  .
It reached its  महानतम  expanse  दौरान   the  reign of Trajan (  98–117  AD  )  .
In  the  3rd century  ,  the Empire  underwent  a  संकट   कि  threatened  इसके   अस्तित्व  ,  लकिन  was  reunified  and  stabilized  under  the  emperors Aurelian  और   diocletian   .
Christians  रोज़  to power  in  the  4th   सदी  ,  दौरान  which time a system  of  dual rule was developed in  the   लैटिन  West and Greek  ईस्ट   .
After the collapse  of  central government  in  the West in the 5th century ,  the   पूर्वी  half continued  as  what would later be  ज्ञात  as  the  Byzantine  साम्राज्य  .
Because  of  the  साम्राज्य  's vast extent and long endurance  ,   the   संस्थानों  and culture of Rome had  a  profound and lasting influence on the development  of   भाषा  ,  धर्म  , architecture  ,  philosophy ,  विधि   ,  and forms  of  government in the territory it  governed   ,  particularly Europe , and  by  means of  यूरोपीय  expansionism throughout  the  modern world .
Education in the United States  is  mainly provided by the public sector , with control and funding coming from three levels  :  local  ,  state  ,  and federal , in that  अनुक्रम  .
Child education  is   अनिवार्य  , and there  हैं  also a large number and wide  किस्में  of higher  शिक्षा  institutions throughout the country that one can choose  to   attend   ,  both  सरेआम  and privately  administered  .
पब्लिक  education  is   universally   उपलब्धियाँ   .
स्कूल  curricula ,  funding   ,  teaching ,  नियुक्ति  , and other policies are  नियत  through locally elected school boards  साथ  jurisdiction  over   स्कूल  districts with many  directives  from  राज्य   विधानमंडलों   .
School districts are  प्रायः  separate from other  लोकल  jurisdictions  ,   साथ  independent officials  और  budgets .
शैक्षणिक  standards  और  standardized testing  निर्णय  are usually  बना   by  state  सरकारें  .
The  आयु  for compulsory education vary  by  state  .
it  begins from  आयु  five  to   आठ  and  ends  from ages fourteen  to  eighteen .
Compulsory education requirements  can  generally  be   संतुष्ट  by  educating  children in public  स्कूलों  ,  state-certified  private schools , or an approved  घर   स्कूल  program .
In  सबसे   पब्लिक   और   निजी  schools , education is divided into  तीन  levels :  elementary   स्कूल   ,  middle  स्कूल  ( sometimes called junior high school )  ,   और  high  स्कूल   (   sometimes  referred to as secondary  शिक्षा  ) .
In  लगभग   सब   स्कूलों  at these levels  ,  children are divided  by  age  समूह  into grades  ,   ranging  from kindergarten  (  followed by  पहला  grade ) for  the   youngest  children  in   elementary  school , up to twelfth grade , the final year of high school .
The exact age range of students in these grade levels varies slightly  इससे  area to  क्षेत्रफल   .
Post-secondary education , better known as ``  कॉलेज   ``  in  the  United States , is  generally  governed separately from the  elementary   और   ऊँची  school  प्रणाली   ,   और  is  वर्णित  in  a  separate  खण्ड  below .
Government supported , free  पब्लिक  schools for  सब   प्रारंभ  being established after  the  revolution , and expanded in the 19th century  ,  as the results of  प्रयत्न  of men like Horace  मन   और  Booker T. Washington .
by  1870 , all  राज्य  had  फ़्री  elementary  स्कूलों  ,  albeit  only  in   शहरी  centers .
as   the  20th  सदी  drew  nearer  , states  प्रारंभ   गुजर   कानून   to  make schooling  अनिवार्य  ,  और  by 1910 , 72 percent  of  children  attended  school .
Private schools continued to spread  दौरान   इस  time , as  खूब  as colleges and—in the rural centers—  जमीन  grant colleges .
the  year of 1910 also  देखी  the first true  ऊँची   स्कूलों  .
During the rest of the 20th century , educational  प्रयत्न  centered on reducing the inequality of the schooling system  .
the   लैंडमार्क  Supreme  अदालत  case  भूरा  v. Board  of  Education made  the  desegregation of  elementary   और  high  स्कूलों  a  नेशनल   प्रधानता  , while  the  Pell  ग्रान्ट   कार्यक्रम  helped poor minorities gain  अभिगम  to  कॉलेज   .
Special education was made  into  federal law in 1975 .
The  elementary  and Secondary Education  अधिनियम  of  1965  made standardized testing a  आवश्यकता   ,   और   in  1983  ,  a  आयोग   थी   स्थापित  to evaluate  उनके  results  और  propose a course  of   कार्रवाई   .
The resulting No Child Left Behind Act  of  2001 was controversial  और  its  लक्ष्य   proved  to be unrealistic  .
A commission established  in  2006 evaluated  उच्चतर  education ,  लकिन  its recommendations have yet to  be  fully implemented .
Paul Bragg ( February  6  , 1895  –  December 7  ,  1976  )  , nutritionist  ,  was a pioneer  in   america’s   तंदुरुस्ती  movement .
Health spending  प्रति  capita ,  in   $  US PPP-adjusted  ,  with  the   us  and Canada compared amongst  अन्य  first world  राष्ट्र  .
Comparison of the health  परवाह  systems  in  Canada and the United  राज्य  are often made by  सरकारी   ,  public health  और  public policy  विश्लेषकों   .
The two countries had similar  स्वास्थ्य  care systems  पहले  Canada  reformed  its system in the  1960s  and  1970s   .
The United States spends  much  more money on health care  than   कनाडा   ,  on  दोनो   a  per-capita basis and as a percentage of GDP .
In 2006 ,  per-capita  spending for health care in Canada was US $ 3,678  ;  in  the  U.S.  ,  US $ 6,714 .
the   u.S.  spent 15.3  %  of GDP on health  परवाह  in  कि   साल  ; Canada spent  10.0  %  .
In 2006 , 70 % of health  परवाह  spending  in   कनाडा  was  financed  by government ,  बनाम  46  %   in  the United States .
Total government spending per capita in the  u.S.  on health care was 23 % higher than  कनाडाई  government spending ,  और  U.S. government expenditure on health care  थी   बस  under  83   %   of  total  कनाडाई  spending  (   पब्लिक  and private )  हालांकि  these statistics do n't  लो  into account population differences .
Studies have come  to   अलग   conclusions  about the result of  इस  disparity in  बिता  .
A 2007  पुनर्विलोकन  of all studies  comparing   स्वास्थ्य   outcomes  in Canada  और   the  US  in  a  कनाडाई  peer-reviewed medical  जर्नल  found that `` health outcomes may  be  superior in patients cared for in Canada versus the  संयुक्त  States , but differences are not consistent . ''
जीवन  expectancy is longer in Canada  ,  and  इसके   शिशु   मृत्यु  rate  is  lower than that  of  the U.S.  ,  but there  is  debate about the underlying causes of these differences .
One commonly cited comparison  ,  the  2000   संसार  Health Organization 's ratings of `` overall health  सेवा  performance  ''   ,  which  प्रयुक्त   a   ``  composite  माप   of  achievement in the level of  स्वास्थ्य  , the distribution of health  ,  the  स्तर  of  responsiveness  and  निष्पक्षता  of financial contribution '' , ranked  कनाडा  30th and the  us  37th among 191 member nations .
This study rated  the   us   ``  responsiveness '' , or  विशेषता   of   सेवा  for individuals receiving treatment , as 1st ,  compared  with  7th  for Canada .
While  the  average life expectancy for Canadians  थी  80.34 years compared with 78.6  सालो   लिये   निवासियों  of the  us   ,   बस  comparing the life  प्रत्याशा  of  दो  groups  साथ   अलग  racial makeup and different obesity rates is likely not  an   प्रभावी   रास्ता  of  determining  which healthcare system is  श्रेष्ठ   .
The WHO  's  study methods were criticized  by   कुछ   analyses  .
Although  वहीँ  is a  माप  of consensus that life-expectancy and  शिशु  mortality mark the most reliable ways to compare  nation-wide  health care ,  assuming  the  जनसांख्यिकी  makeup  is  similar , a  हाल  report by the Congressional Research  सेवा  carefully summarizes some  हाल  data and notes the ``  मुश्किल   शोध   मुद्दे   ''  facing international  comparisons   .
the  sound source has  अभी   टूटा  through the  ध्वनि  speed  अवरोध  , and is traveling at 1.4  टाइम्स  the  गति   of  sound , ( Mach  1.4  ) .
चूंकि  the source  is  moving faster  (  with a speed ) than the sound waves it creates ,  it  actually leads the  advancing   तरंगाग्र   .
The sound source will pass by a stationary observer ( with a speed ) before the observer actually hears the  ध्वनि  it creates .
As a result , an  निरीक्षक  in front of  the  source will detect
और  an observer  पीछे  the source .
A sonic boom produced by an  वायुयान   चलती  at M=2.92 ,  गणना  from  the  cone angle of 20 degrees .
An  निरीक्षक  hears the boom when the shock wave  ,  on the  किनारे   of  the cone , crosses  उसके  or her location .
mach   कोन  angle
A sonic boom is the  ध्वनि  associated with the shock  लहरें  created by an object traveling  through  the air faster than the speed  of  sound .
Sonic  booms  generate enormous amounts of sound energy , sounding much like an explosion .
the  crack  of  a supersonic  गोली  passing  ओवरहेड   is  an  उदाहरण  of a sonic boom in miniature  .
the   tonight  Show with Jay Leno is an American late-night talk  दिखाएँ   hosted  by  jay  Leno that initially aired  इससे   may  25 ,  1992  to  may  29 ,  2009  , and  resumed  production on March 1 ,  2010   .
the   चौथी  incarnation of the Tonight Show franchise made  इसके   डेब्यू  on May  25   ,  1992 , three days following Johnny Carson 's  रिटायरमेंट  as  मेजबान  of the  कार्यक्रम   .
The  कार्यक्रम   originates   इससे   एनबीसी  Studios in Burbank , California  ,   और   is  broadcast Monday through  शुक्रवार  at  11:35  PM in the Eastern and Pacific time zones  (  10:35  pm  Central / Mountain  समय  ) .
नापसंद  Carson or his predecessor Jack Paar , Leno only  एकबार  utilized a guest host , preferring to  मेजबान  the series by himself .
On  अप्रैल   26  , 1999 ,  the   दिखाएँ  began  प्रसारण  in 1080i HDTV  ,  becoming the  पहला  American nightly talk show  to   be  shot  in   ऊँची  definition  .
The show is shot in 16:9 aspect  अनुपात  .
The series ,  जिससे  followed the same basic format  as  that of his predecessors ( an opening monologue followed by  कॉमेडी   दिनचर्या  , interviews and  प्रदर्शन  ) ,  भागा  until May  29  ,  2009  ,  बाद  which  लीनो   थी  succeeded by Conan  o'brien  .
NBC  हस्ताक्षरित   लीनो  to a new deal for  a   nightly  talk  दिखाएँ  in the 10:00 pm ET  timeslot  .
The primetime series , titled The Jay Leno  दिखाएँ   ,  debuted on September 14 , 2009 ,  following  a similar  स्वरूप   to  the  लीनो   अवतार  of Tonight .
Neither O'Brien  's  version of the  कार्यक्रम  , which premiered June 1 ,  2009  , nor  the  Jay Leno  दिखाएँ  generated  the  ratings that NBC  था  expected .
the  network  decided  to move a condensed 30-minute version of Leno 's show to  o'brien  's  समय  slot , and O'Brien 's Tonight Show  a  half-hour later .
इस  decision met with opposition  इससे  O'Brien , whose stint on The Tonight Show ended January 22 ,  2010  , after which he began his own  बात  show on TBS .
The  tonight  Show with Jay Leno then began its second  और  current  अवतार  , the sixth of the  मताधिकार  , on March 1 , 2010  .
RFID chip  अगला  to a grain of rice .
This  चिप  contains  a  radio-frequency  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  field coil  कि   modulates  an  बाह्य  magnetic  फ़ील्ड  to transfer  a  coded  पहचान   क्रमांक  when queried by a reader device  .
इस  small type is  incorporated  in  उपभोक्ता  products  ,  and  implanted   in  pets ,  लिये  identification purposes .
Radio-frequency identification (  rfid  )  is   the  wireless non-contact use  of   radio-frequency  electromagnetic  फ़ील्ड  to transfer data ,  लिये  the purposes of automatically identifying and tracking tags attached  to   वस्तुएँ  .
The  टैग  contain  electronically  stored information .
कुछ   टैग   हैं  powered and read  at   छोटी   सीमाएँ  (  a   few  meters )  via  magnetic fields (  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक   प्रेरण   )  .
Others use a  लोकल  power  सोर्स  such as a  बैटरी   ,   or   else  have no  बैटरी   लकिन  collect energy  इससे  the interrogating  em  field , and  तब  act as a passive transponder  to  emit  microwaves  or UHF  रेडियो  waves ( i.e. , electromagnetic radiation  at  high  बारंबारता   )  .
Battery powered  टैग  may  operate  at hundreds  of  meters .
Unlike a bar  कोड  , the  टैग  does not necessarily need to  be  within line of sight  of  the reader , and  may   be  embedded in the  tracked   ऑब्जेक्ट   .
rfid   टैग  are  प्रयुक्त  in  अनेक  industries .
An RFID tag attached  to  an automobile  दौरान   उत्पादन  can be  प्रयुक्त  to  track  its progress through the assembly  लकीर  .
Pharmaceuticals  can   be   tracked  through  warehouses  .
Livestock and pets may have tags injected ,  allowing  positive identification of the  एनिमल   .
Since RFID tags  can  be attached to clothing  ,  possessions , or even implanted within people ,  the  possibility  of   पढना   personally-linked  information without consent  रै   उठाया  privacy concerns .
Id ,  अहंकार  and super-ego are  the   तीन   भाग  of the psychic apparatus defined in Sigmund  फ्रायड  's structural model of the psyche ; they are  the  three theoretical constructs in terms of  जिनकी   कार्यकलाप   और   बातचीत   दिमागी  life  is  described .
According  to   इस  model  of  the psyche ,  the   id   is  the set  of  uncoordinated instinctual trends  ;   the  super-ego plays  the   नाजुक   और  moralizing role ; and the  अहंकार  is the  व्यवस्थित  ,  यथार्थवादी  part that  mediates   between  the desires of  the  id  और   the  super-ego  .
The  super-ego  can stop you  इससे  doing certain things  कि   अपना  id may  want   तुम  to do  .
Even though  the   मॉडल  is structural and makes  सन्दर्भ   to  an  apparatus  , the id  ,  ego  और   super-ego  are  कृत्यों  of the mind  बल्कि   than  parts  of   the  brain  और   do  not correspond one-to-one  साथ  actual  दैहिक  structures of  the  kind dealt  साथ   by   neuroscience   .
The concepts themselves arose  at  a  लेट  stage  in   the  development of Freud 's  विचार   :  the `` structural model '' (  जिससे   succeeded   उसके  `` economic model '' and  ``  topographical model '' ) was first  discussed  in his  1920   निबन्ध  `` Beyond the  ख़ुशी  Principle `` and was formalized  और  elaborated  upon   तीन  years later in  उसके  `` The Ego and the Id `` .
फ्रायड  's proposal  थी  influenced by  the   ambiguity   of  the  पद   ``  unconscious ``  और  its many  conflicting  uses .
Air Force ROTC  emblem
The Air Force  आरक्षित  Officer Training  corps   (   afrotc   )  is one of  the   तीन  primary commissioning  स्त्रोत   लिये  officers in the United States Air  फ़ोर्स   ,   the  other  दो  being the United States Air  फ़ोर्स  Academy ( USAFA )  और  Air  फ़ोर्स  Officer Training  स्कूल  ( OTS )  .
A  अधीनस्थ  command of the  एयर  University within  the   एयर  Education and Training  कमांड   (  AETC ) , AFROTC  is   लकीर  under the Jeanne  M.  Holm Center for Officer Accessions  और  Citizen  विकास  at Maxwell AFB , Alabama .
the  Holm Center  ,   formerly   ज्ञात  as the Air Force Officer Accession  और  Training Schools  (  AFOATS ) , retains direct responsibility  लिये  both AFROTC  और  OTS  .
afrotc  is the largest  और  oldest source of commissioned officers  लिये   the  U.S. Air Force  .
AFROTC 's  stated   मिशन   is   to  produce quality leaders  लिये   the   u.S.  Air Force .
AFROTC  इकाई   हैं  located on  144   कॉलेज   और  university  campuses  with 984 additional institutions of higher learning participating  in  cross-town agreements that  allow   उनके   विद्यार्थी  to attend  afrotc  classes  at   a  nearby  ``  host '' college or university .
According to AFOATS HQ , in 2006 ,  afrotc   commissioned   2,083  USAF Second Lieutenants , with AFROTC enrollment  ranging  from  23,605  in 1985 to 10,231  in  1993 , and around 13,000 enrolled  आज  .
AFROTC units  at  colleges and universities are called  ``   detachments  , '' and are typically  headed  by an active duty  यूएसएएफ   अधिकारी  in the rank of  कर्नल  or  लेफ्टिनेंट  colonel who functions as  दोनो  the Detachment Commander for USAF  उद्देश्य  and with the nominal title of Professor of Aerospace  अध्ययन  ( PAS  )   भीतर  the  संस्था  's academic  जातियाँ  .
Most colleges and  विश्वविद्यालयों  will  designate  the AFROTC  detachment   as  the Department of Aerospace  अध्ययन  .
The  pas  is assisted by three  to  four Assistant Professors of Aerospace Studies ( APAS  )  , all active duty  यूएसएएफ  officers in the  बाँधने   of  major or captain .
Three USAF non-commissioned officers and  एक  senior non-commissioned officer will typically  provide  military  प्रशासनिक  support and are often augmented  by  one  to   दो  civilian staff support  कर्मचारी  of  the   अकादमिक   संस्था  .
Within AFROTC  detachments  ,  the  students ( referred to as ``  cadets  '' ) are organized into wings  ,  groups , squadrons ,  और   फ़्लाइट  , mirroring the  यूएसएएफ   कार्यात्मक  wing structure .
The  afrotc  detachment 's cadet  wing   or   cadet  group  is  separated into  दो  divisions  :  the General Military  कोर्स  ( GMC  )   consisting  of the first  दो  years of training , and the Professional Officer  कोर्स   (   poc   )  consisting of the  पिछला  two years of training .
The  afrotc   कार्यक्रम  is  भी  divided into  दो  training functions : the  अकादमिक  Classroom Program (  aerospace  Studies  वर्ग  ) and  cadet  Activities  (   i.e.   ,  Leadership Laboratory , Physical Training  ,   और  other training  )  .
Paper density ( also known as basis weight and  grammage  ) is a term used in the pulp and paper industry and also  लिये  fabric  उद्योग   to  denote a measure of mass  of  the product per  ईकाई  of  क्षेत्रफल  for a type  of  fabric  ,  paper or paperboard  .
The term `` density '' is not used in its traditional  भाव   of   द्रव्यमान   प्रति  unit  आवाज़  .
``  Paper density ''  ,  rather ,  is  a  माप  of  the  area  घनत्व  .
Paper products that  let   छोटी  or no light pass  through  ( e.g  .   पोस्टर  board )  हैं  considered dense  or  heavy  .
पेपर  products that allow  कुछ  light  to  pass  through  ( e.g . tissue paper  )  are  माना   lightweight  .
in  the  गूदा  and paper industry , it is common to  नियत  a commercial paper machine to produce  पेपर  to a target paper density .
Paper density can also  be  used to  फर्क  paper from paperboard as  the  latter  प्रायः  has a grammage greater than  134  g/m2 .
Two ways  of   expressing  paper  घनत्व  are commonly used:
Expressed in grams  प्रति  square  मीटर   (  g/m2  )   ,   पेपर  density  is   भी   ज्ञात   as  grammage .
This  is   the  measure used in  सबसे   भाग  of the world .
Expressed in terms of the mass (  expressed  as weight )  प्रति   क्रमांक  of  चादरें   ,   it  is known  as   आधार  weight .
The  सम्मेलन   प्रयुक्त  in the  संयुक्त   राज्य   और  a  few   अन्य  countries using  us   पेपर   आकार  is pounds of a  ream  of  500   (  or  in  some  मामले  1000 )  चादरें  of a given ( raw , still  uncut   )   आधार   आकार  .
Japanese paper is expressed as the  वज़न  in  kg   of  1000  चादरें  .
Candace Nicole  पार्कर  (  born   अप्रैल  19  ,  1986 ) is an American basketball player for the WNBA 's Los Angeles Sparks  और  UMMC  ekaterinburg  of Russia  .
वो  is the  younger  sister of NBA player Anthony Parker .
She  attended  the University of  टेनेसी   और   थी   drafted  by the Sparks  in  2008 .
She  may  be best known  लिये  being  the  first woman  to   डंक   in   an  NCAA tournament game  और   the  first woman to dunk twice  in  a college  game—she  set both milestones as  a  redshirt freshman on March 19  ,  2006 .
She  भी  became only the  दूसरी  player to dunk  in  a WNBA game on June 22  ,  2008 .
a  versatile  खिलाड़ी  ,  वो  is mainly a forward , but  थी  listed on Tennessee 's  रोस्टर  as  a  forward ,  बीच   ,  and  गार्ड   .
वो  was a  प्रारंभ  on the Lady Vols basketball  टोली  , winners  of  the 2007 and  2008   ncaa  championships .
पार्कर  won  the  2009 Nickelodeon Kids ' Choice award as the  पसंदीदा   मादा  athlete in the sports category .
और   वो  was a  अतिथि   स्टार  on Figure  it   आउट  .
a  food  मार्गदर्शिका  pyramid is  a  pyramid shaped guide of  स्वस्थ   भोजन   विभाजित  into sections to  दिखाएँ  the  अनुशंसित  intake  लिये  each food group .
the   पहला  food  पिरामिड  was published in Sweden in  1974  .
The  सबसे  widely  ज्ञात  food pyramid was introduced by the United States Department of Agriculture  in  the year 1992 , was updated  in  2005 , and then replaced in 2011 .
Over  25  other countries and  संगठनों   have   भी  published food  पिरामिडों  .
Hans Christian Andersen  (  ;  प्रायः  referred to  in  Scandinavia as H. C. Andersen ; April  2   ,   1805august   4  ,  1875  )  थी  a Danish author and poet  .
Although a prolific writer of plays , travelogues , novels , and  कविताएं   ,   andersen  is best remembered for his fairy tales , a literary genre he so mastered  कि   he   खुद  has become as  mythical   as   the  tales  he   लिखा   .
andersen  's  लोकप्रियता  is  नहीं  limited to  children  ; his stories—called , or `` fantastic  किस्से   ''  —express themes that transcend age  और  nationality .
During his lifetime he was acclaimed  लिये   having   प्रसन्न   children  worldwide  और  was feted by  रॉयल्टी   .
Andersen  's  fairy tales , which have been translated  into  more than  125   भाषाएं  , have become  culturally   अंतःस्थापित  in the  वेस्ट   's  collective consciousness  ,  readily  accessible  to children  ,  but presenting lessons of virtue and  resilience  in  the  face of adversity for mature readers  as  well .
They have inspired motion pictures  ,   plays  ,  नाटिकाओं  , and  एनिमेटेड  films  .
Two figures locking eyes  in   caravaggio  's The Fortune Teller
Eye contact occurs when `` two people look  at  each other  's  eyes at the same time .  ''
in  human beings  ,   नजर   सम्पर्क  is a form  of  nonverbal communication and is thought  to  have a large influence on social  बर्ताव  .
coined   in   the  early to mid-1960s , the term has come in  the  West to often define the act  as   a  meaningful and important sign of confidence and social  संचार   .
The  कस्टम  and  significance  of eye contact vary  widely  between cultures ,  साथ  religious  और  social differences often altering  इसके  meaning greatly  .
the  study of eye contact is  sometimes  known  as  oculesics .
Bed bugs are parasitic insects  of  the cimicid family that  फीड   exclusively  on  रक्त  .
The  पद  most commonly refers to members  of  the  genus  Cimex of  जिससे   cimex  lectularius  ,  the  आम   bed  bug ,  is   the  best known as it prefers to feed  on  human blood although other Cimex  प्रजाति   हैं   specialized  to other  पशु   ,  e.g. , bat bugs , C. pipistrelli (  यूरोपीय   )  , C. pilosellus ( western US ) , and C. adjunctus ( entire  पूर्वी   us   )  .
The name of  the  ``  bed   कीड़ा   ''   is   निकला  from  the   पसन्दीदा  habitat of Cimex  lectularius  :  गरम   घरों  and especially nearby  or  inside of  beds   और   bedding  or other  नींद  areas .
bed  bugs are  मुख्यतः  active at  रात्रि  ,  लकिन  are  नहीं  exclusively nocturnal  .
They  प्रायः  feed  on   उनके   होस्ट  without being noticed .
A number  of  adverse  स्वास्थ्य  effects  may  result from bed  कीड़ा  bites ,  सहित  skin rashes , psychological effects  ,  and  allergic  symptoms .
निदान  involves both  ढूंढना  bed bugs and the occurrence of compatible symptoms .
Bed bugs  have  been known as human parasites for  हज़ारों   of   सालो  .
At a point in the early  1940s  , they were  ज़्यादातर  eradicated  in  the developed world  ,   लकिन   have  increased in prevalence since 1995 .
Because infestation of human habitats  रै  been on the increase , bed bug bites and related  शर्तें  have been on the  वृद्धि   as  well .
The Book of Isaiah ( ) is  the   पहला  of the Latter Prophets  in  the Hebrew Bible  ,  preceding Ezekiel ,  यिर्मयाह  and the Book of the Twelve .
(  the  order of the subsequent  किताबे  differs somewhat in the Christian Old Testament )  .
The first 39 chapters prophesy doom for a  गुनाहगार  Judah and for all  the   राष्ट्र   of  the  संसार   कि  oppose God , while  the  last 27  prophesy  the restoration of the nation of Israel and a new  सृष्टि  in God 's glorious future  किंगडम   ;  this section includes  the   गीतों   of  the Suffering Servant , four separate  passages  referring to the  स्वदेश  of  इसराईल  , interpreted  by   ईसाइयों  as prefiguring the coming of Jesus  मसीह   .
Tradition ascribes  authorship  of the book to Isaiah son  of  Amoz ,  लकिन   अभी  scholars widely agree that  the  book is the  कार्य  of  तीन  different authors  -   few  scholars deny this view ,  और   those  that  do  , do so for  theological   कारण  .
The  पहला  ,  termed  Proto-Isaiah ( chapters 1–39  )  , contains the words of  the  8th-century BCE prophet with  7th-century  BCE expansions ; the second ,  deutero-isaiah  ( chapters  40–55   )  ,  is  the work of a 6th-century BCE  लेखक  writing near the  समाप्त  of the  babylonian  captivity  ;  and the  तीसरा  ,  the  poetic  trito-isaiah   (  chapters 56–66 )  ,  was  रचित   in   जेरूसलम   shortly   बाद  the return  इससे  exile  ,  probably by  अनेक   लेखक   .
Oregon State University  (  OSU ) is a  coeducational   ,  public research  विश्वविद्यालयों   स्तिथ  in Corvallis ,  ऑरेगॉन   ,  United  राज्य  .
the   विश्वविद्यालयों  offers undergraduate  ,  graduate and doctoral degrees and a multitude of research opportunities .
वहीँ  are more than 200  अकादमिक  degree  कार्यक्रम  offered through the university .
OSU 's  कार्यक्रम  in microbiology , nuclear engineering , ecology ,  वानिकी   ,  public health , biochemistry , zoology ,  oceanography   ,  food science and pharmacy are recognized nationally as top  टियर   कार्यक्रम   .
The OSU  's  liberal arts programs have also grown significantly  और   the  department is considered  a   ``   cornerstone  '' of  the   संस्था  .
More than 200,000 people have  attended  OSU since  इसके   founding  .
The  कार्नेगी  Foundation  classifies  Oregon State  विश्वविद्यालयों  as  भाग  of its top  टियर  of research institutions .
As  of  2008 ,  osu  is  एक  of  तभी  seventy-three land-grant universities .
The school is also recognized as a  sea-grant   ,   space-grant  and sun-grant  संस्था   ,  making  it  one  of   तभी  two US  संस्थानों  to retain  सब  four designations and  the  only  पब्लिक  university to do so  (  Cornell is the  तभी  other with  समान   designations  )  .
As one of  the  two flagship universities  of   the  Oregon  विश्वविद्यालयों  System ,  osu  receives more funding for research  ,  annually , than  सब  other  पब्लिक  higher  शिक्षा  institutions in Oregon combined  .
Female ejaculation is the expulsion of fluid by human females  इससे  the  paraurethral  ducts  through   और  around the female urethra during  or   पहले   an  orgasm .
it  is  भी   ज्ञात  colloquially as gushing or squirting  ,   हालांकि   ये  are  माना  to  be  different phenomena in some  शोध  publications .
the  exact source  और  nature of the fluid continue to be a  टॉपिक   of  debate  among  medical professionals ,  जिससे  is  भी  related to  संदेह  over  the   अस्तित्व  of  the  G-Spot  .
The  kanab  ambersnail  ,  scientific  नाम  Oxyloma haydeni kanabensis or Oxyloma  kanabense  , is a critically  endangered  subspecies  or  species of small , air-breathing land snail  ,  a  स्थलीय  pulmonate  gastropod  mollusc in the  परिवार  Succineidae , the  एम्बर  snails .
The common name of the amber snails  is  based on  the  shell , which  is  translucent and when empty usually resembles amber in  रंग  .
This species is endemic  to   the  United States  ,   specifically  the state  of  Arizona  और  Utah  ,  where  it   थी  first  एकत्रित  in the  जल्दी   20th  century .
it  has  महरूम   सूचीबद्ध  as  endangered  on the United States Fish  और  Wildlife  सेवा  list  of  endangered species since  8  August 1991  .
इस  snail lives  in  wetlands , springs , and seeps , and only  दो   of  its natural habitats are known to exist : Three Lakes  ,  a meadow near Kanab ,  यूटा  , and  vasey  's  स्वर्ग  , a spring along  the   कोलोराडो   नदी  within Grand  canyon  National Park  .
In its natural habitat it is  बल्कि  polyphagous , feeding mainly on bacteria  ,  plants and fungi  ,  and reproduces  दौरान   the  summer .
अभी  considered a Critically Endangered species on  the  IUCN Red List of Threatened  प्रजाति  due  to   a   श्रेणी  of factors ( including influence ) , the Kanab ambersnail has been  reintroduced  to three springs above the historic high water level  साथ  the Colorado River .
the  Spanish  भाषा  is the second most used  भाषा  in  the  United States .
वहीँ  are more  स्पेनी  speakers  in  the  संयुक्त  States than there  हैं  speakers of Chinese , French ,  जर्मनी   ,  Italian ,  हवाई   ,  and the Native American  भाषाएं   संयुक्त  .
According to  the   2010   अमरीकी  Community Survey conducted by the  u.S.  Census Bureau , Spanish  is   the  primary language spoken at  घर   by  almost 37  लाख   लोगों   aged  five or  पुरानी   ,  a  फिगर  more  than  double that of  1990  .
There are 45  लाख  Hispanophones who speak Spanish as  a  first or second language , as  खूब  as six  लाख   स्पेनी  language  विद्यार्थी  , composing  the  largest  नेशनल   spanish-speaking  community  बाहर  of  मैक्सिको  and making  स्पेनी  the Romance  भाषा  and the  indo-european  language  साथ  largest number of native speakers in  the  world .
roughly   हाफ   of  all U.S.  स्पेनी   अध्यक्षों  also  बोलो  English  ``  very  खूब  ,  ''  based  on  the  self-assessment   जनसांख्यिकी  question respondents .
The language came  to  the country since the  16th  and 17th centuries  साथ  the arrival of Spanish colonists in  क्षेत्रों  that  होता   बाद  become the states of  फ्लोरिडा  , Texas ,  कोलोराडो   ,   नई   मैक्सिको  , Arizona , Nevada  ,   यूटा  ,  और  California and of the  स्पेनी  explorers - who explored  क्षेत्रों   of   42   राज्यs-  .
भी  west of Louisiana Territory was Spanish between  1763   -   1800  (  साल   of   the  French recovery  of  territory  )  ,  बाद  the French  और   भारतीय  War .
After  of   the  incorporation of  ये  states to the U.S. in  पहला  half of 19th century , the Spanish language  थी  later reinforced by the acquisition  of  Puerto Rico in 1898 and by later  लहरें  of the Hispanic emigration ,  मूलरूप  from Hispanic America , to the United States beginning  in  the second half of 19th  सदी   जबतक   आज  .

the  Tokyo Mew Mew  manga  and  दुश्मनी  series features  a  cast of  वर्ण   designed  by Mia Ikumi .

the  manga series  is  followed  by  a  छोटी  sequel  श्रेणी   ,   टोकियो   mew  Mew a la Mode , which introduces a new  mew  Mew and  a  new  threat  .

As  the  series progresses , Ichigo goes from  having  a  crush   on  Masaya  aoyama   to  becoming his girlfriend  जबकि  trying to  छुपा  her secret double  जीवन  from him .
the  series  antagonists   शामिल  three aliens ,  kish  , Pie ,  और  Tart  ,   और  their leader , Deep  ब्लू  .
Originally  इससे  Earth ,  the   एलियंस  were forced to leave  long   पहले  due to  घातक  environmental changes .
वे   have   लौटे   to  kill  the  humans  ,  who they  महसूस  are destroying their planet ,  और  reclaim  the  planet .

A la Mode  भी   introduces  new  नियत  of antagonists  ,  the  संत  Rose  crusaders  ,  a  group  of  human teenagers  साथ   विभिन्न  psychic abilities with a  ख्वाहिश  to  बनाएँ  their own utopia  .
led  by  ड्यूक   ,  they  मेक  several attempts to  मार  Berry , eventually turning the local populace  विरूद्ध  the Mew Mews .
Ikumi 's  आरंभिक  vision for Tokyo  mew  Mew was a story called  टोकियो  Black Cat Girl  कि  featured a  cat-girl   battling   एलियन  invaders .
After the story was transitioned to  a  more upbeat story of  पाँच   मादा   superheroes  , the character  डिजाइन  were redone to have a  हल्का  , more colorful feel  .
the  main series  वर्ण  were  praised  for  होने  a  पूर्ण  fit for the overall  स्टोरी  ,  as  well as for  उनके  cute appearances  .
The characters introduced in a  la   विधि  were also praised for their visual appearances ,  लकिन   criticized  as being repeats of the  असली   श्रेणी  .
the  character Duke was also criticized for  having   a  design reminiscent  of   the   श्वेत  supremacy group ,  the  Ku Klux Klan  .

Sedimentary rocks  हैं  types of rock  कि  are  formed   by  the deposition of material  at   the  Earth 's surface  और   भीतर   लाशें  of  जल  .
sedimentation  is  the   सामूहिक  name for processes that cause mineral and/or organic particles  (  detritus  )  to settle and accumulate or minerals  to   precipitate  from a solution .
अणु  that form a sedimentary rock  by  accumulating  हैं  called sediment .
पहले  being deposited  ,  sediment  थी  formed  by  weathering and erosion in a source area  ,  and  तब  transported  to  the  प्लेस  of  deposition   by  water  ,   हवा   ,  ice  ,  mass movement  or  glaciers which  हैं  called agents of denudation  .
The sedimentary rock cover of the  महाद्वीपों   of  the Earth 's crust is extensive  ,   लकिन   the   कुल   योगदान   of  sedimentary rocks is  अनुमानित  to be  तभी  8 % of the total  आवाज़  of the  क्रस्ट   .
Sedimentary rocks are  तभी  a thin veneer over  a  crust  consisting  mainly of igneous and metamorphic rocks  .
Sedimentary  रॉक्स  are deposited in  परतों   as  strata ,  forming   a  structure called bedding .
The study of sedimentary rocks and  चट्टान  strata provides information  परिचय  the subsurface  कि  is useful for civil engineering , for  उदाहरण   in  the construction of roads , houses , tunnels , canals  or  other constructions .
Sedimentary  रॉक्स  are  भी  important sources of  प्राकृतिक  resources like  कोयले  , fossil fuels , drinking  जल   or  ores .
the  study of the  अनुक्रम  of sedimentary rock  strata   is  the main  सोर्स  for  वैज्ञानिक   ज्ञान  about the Earth 's history ,  सहित  palaeogeography  ,  paleoclimatology and the history of life  .
The scientific discipline that  अध्ययन  the properties and origin  of  sedimentary  रॉक्स  is  पुकारा  sedimentology .
Sedimentology is  दोनो   भाग   of  geology and physical geography and overlaps partly with  अन्य  disciplines  in  the Earth sciences , such as  pedology  , geomorphology  ,  geochemistry or structural geology .
