Humans  हैं  born with over 270 bones  ,  some of  जिससे   फ्यूज   साथ   into  a longitudinal axis ,  the  axial  कंकाल  , to which the  appendicular   कंकाल   is   संलग्न  .
संत   पैट्रिक  ( ; ; Modern ; ; c. 387  –   17  March c. 460 or c. 492 ) was  a  Romano-British Christian  मिशनरी  and bishop  in  Ireland .
Known as  the  `` Apostle  of   आयरलैंड  '' , he is the primary patron  संत  of the  द्वीप   साथ  with Saints Brigid and Columba .
Two authentic letters  इससे  him survive , from  जिससे  come the  तभी  generally accepted details of his  जीवन  .
जब   he  was about  16   ,  he was  captured   इससे   उसके  home and taken  as  a slave to Ireland ,  जहाँ   he  lived  लिये   छह  years  पहले   escaping   और   returning  to  उसके  family .
After becoming a  मौलवी  ,  he   लौटे  to northern and western Ireland as an ordained  बिशप  , but little  is  known  परिचय  the  स्थान   जहाँ  he worked .
By the seventh century  ,  he had  already  come to be revered  as  the  संरक्षक   संत  of  आयरलैंड   .
सबसे   उपलब्धियाँ   विवरण  of  उसके  life are from subsequent hagiographies ,  और   ये  are now  नहीं  accepted without detailed  आलोचना   .
The Annals of Ulster state  कि  he arrived in Ireland  in   432  , ministered  in  Ulster  around  443 , and died  in   457  or  461  .
The text ,  however   ,  distinguishes between  ``   बूढ़ा   पैट्रिक  '' ( thought  to  mean Palladius ) and ``  पैट्रिक  ,  archapostle  of the Scots  ,  ''  जो  died in  492  .
The  वास्तविक  dates  of  Patrick 's life can not be fixed with certainty but , on a  फैली   निर्वचन  , he was active as a  मिशनरी  in Ireland during the second half of  the   5th   सदी   .
He is generally credited with  होने  the first bishop  of  Armagh , Primate of All  आयरलैंड  .
Saint  पैट्रिक  's  दिन  is observed on March 17  ,  the  तिथि   of  his death  .
It  is  celebrated  दोनो  inside and  बाहर  Ireland ,  as  both  a  religious and , especially outside  आयरलैंड  , secular  अवकाश   .
In  the   dioceses  of Ireland ,  it  is both a solemnity and a  पावन   दिन   of   दायित्व  ; outside  आयरलैंड   ,   it  can be a  जश्न  of Ireland  itself   .
लकीर   खण्ड  in the golden ratio
A golden rectangle  साथ   longer  side a and shorter side b , when placed  सटा  to a square  साथ   पहलू  of length a , will produce a  समान  golden rectangle  साथ  longer  पक्ष  a + b and shorter side a .
This illustrates  the  relationship .
In mathematics  और  the arts , two quantities are in the golden ratio if the  अनुपात  of the sum of the  quantities  to the larger quantity is equal  to   the  ratio of the larger quantity to the smaller one  .
The figure on the  सही  illustrates  the   ज्यामितीय  relationship  .
Expressed algebraically:
where the Greek  अक्षर   फाई  ( ) represents the golden ratio .
इसके  value is:
The golden ratio is also called  the  golden  खण्ड  ( Latin : sectio aurea  )   or  golden mean .
Other names include  चरम   और   औसत  ratio  ,  medial section ,  दैवी  proportion , divine section  (  Latin :  sectio   divina   )  , golden proportion  ,   सुनहरी  cut ,  और  golden number .
अनेक  20th  सदी  artists and architects  have  proportioned  उनके   works  to  सन्निकट   the  golden ratio—especially in  the  form of  the  golden rectangle , in which the ratio of the longer  पक्ष  to the shorter is the golden ratio—believing this  proportion   to   be   aesthetically  pleasing  (  see  अनुप्रयोग  and observations  नीचे  ) .
Mathematicians since  यूक्लिड  have  पढ़ाई   the  properties  of  the golden  अनुपात  , including its  रूप  in the dimensions of a regular pentagon and in a golden  आयताकार  , which can be cut into a square and  a  smaller rectangle  साथ   the  same  पहलू   अनुपात  .
The  सुनहरी  ratio has also been  प्रयुक्त  to analyze the proportions of natural objects as well as man-made systems such as financial markets ,  in  some cases based  on   संदिग्ध  fits to data  .
North Myrtle  बीच  is a coastal resort city  in  Horry County ,  दक्षिण   कैरोलिना   ,  United States  .
It was created in 1968  इससे   चार  existing  municipalities  north  of  Myrtle Beach , and  serves  as one of  the   प्राथमिक   पर्यटक  towns  साथ  the Grand Strand .
The population  थी  13,752  at   the   2010  census .
संसार  War  i  ( WWI  )   थी   a  global war  केंद्रित  in  यूरोपीय   कि  began on 28  जुलाई  1914 and lasted until  11  November 1918 .
it  was  predominantly  called the World War or the  ग्रेट   युद्ध  from  इसके  occurrence until  the  start of  संसार   युद्ध  II in 1939  ,  and the First  संसार  War  or  World War  i   thereafter  .
It involved all  the  world 's great powers , which  यहूद  assembled in  दो   opposing  alliances  :   the  Allies (  आधारित  on the Triple Entente  of  the  संयुक्त  Kingdom , France and Russia )  और   the  Central Powers (  originally   the  Triple Alliance of Germany  ,  Austria-Hungary and  इटली  ; but ,  as  Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement , Italy did not enter  into  the  युद्ध   )  .
These alliances were both reorganised  और  expanded  as  more nations entered the war :  इटली  , Japan  और   the  United States joined  the   allies  ,  और   the  Ottoman  साम्राज्य  and  बुल्गारिया  the Central  शक्तियां  .
Ultimately , more than 70  लाख  military  कर्मियों   ,  including  60  million  europeans  , were mobilised in one of the largest wars in history  .
More than  9  million  combatants  were killed , largely because of  technological  advancements  कि  led  to  enormous  increases  in the lethality of weapons without  सम्बन्धित  improvements in protection or mobility  .
it  was the fifth- deadliest conflict  in  world history ,  subsequently  paving the way for various political  परिवर्तन   ,   ऐसे  as  revolutions  in many of the nations involved  .
One of the long-term causes  of  the war was the  पुनरुत्थान   of  imperialism  in  the foreign  नीतियों   of   the   ग्रेट   शक्तियां  of Europe  .
More immediately , the  हत्या  of Archduke Franz  फर्डिनेंड  of Austria  ,  the heir  to   the  throne of Austria-Hungary , on 28 June  1914  by  यूगोस्लाव   राष्ट्रवादी   gavrilo  Princip  in  Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary  subsequently   वितरित  an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia  .
Several alliances  formed  over the previous decades were invoked  .
Within  सप्ताह  , the  प्रमुख  powers were  at  war and ,  via  their  colonies  ,  the   विरोध  soon spread  around  the world .
On 28 July  ,  the  austro-hungarians  fired the  पहला  shots of the war  as   तैयारी  for the  आक्रमण  of Serbia .
जबकि  the Russians mobilised ,  the  Germans invaded neutral Belgium  और   ध्वज  on the way to France , providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of war against Germany  .
After  the  German march on Paris was brought  to  a halt—the so-called  चमत्कार   of  the  marne  —the  पश्चिमी   सामने  settled  into  a  स्थिर   बैटल   of  attrition with a trench  लकीर  that changed little  जबतक  1917 .
On  the  Eastern Front ,  the  Russian army was  कामयाब  against  the  Austro-Hungarians , but  थी  stopped in its  आक्रमण  of  ईस्ट  Prussia by the  germans   .
In November  the  Ottoman Empire joined  the   युद्ध  , opening up fronts  in   the  Caucasus ,  मेसोपोटामिया   और  the  sinai  .
इटली   और  Bulgaria went to war  in   1915  and  रोमानिया  in  1916  .
In Russia  ,   the  tsar 's  सरकारी  collapsed in March 1917 and a subsequent revolution in November brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers .
बाद   a  1918 German  अप्रिय  along the  पश्चिमी   सामने  , the Allies  drove  back the Germans in a series  of  successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches .
जर्मनी   ,  which had its own trouble with revolutionaries  ,  agreed to an  armistice  on 11  नवम्बर  1918 .
The war ended in  विजय   लिये   the   allies  .
कार्यक्रम  on  the  home  fronts  were  as  tumultuous as on  the   बैटल  fronts ,  as  the participants tried  to  mobilize  उनके   जनशक्ति  and economic  संसाधन   to  fight  a  total  युद्ध  .
By the end  of   the   युद्ध   ,  four major imperial powers—the German , Russian , Austro-Hungarian  और  Ottoman  empires—ceased  to  मौजूद  .
The successor states of the former two lost a great amount of territory , while the latter two  यहूद  dismantled entirely .
The map of central  यूरोपीय  was redrawn into  अनेक   छोटी   राज्य   .
the  League  of  Nations was formed in the hope of preventing another  ऐसे  conflict .
the  European  राष्ट्रवाद  spawned by the war and  the   ब्रेकअप  of  empires  ,  the  repercussions of Germany 's defeat  और  problems  साथ   the  Treaty  of   versailles   हैं  agreed to be factors  contributing  to  संसार  War  ii  .
Camden is a  नगर  in Camden  काउंटी  , New  जर्सी  , United  राज्य  .
it  is  the  county  सीट  ,  स्तिथ  across the Delaware River  इससे  Philadelphia .
As of the  2010  United  राज्य   जनसांख्यिकी  the city had a  कुल  population of 77,344 , representing  a   मनाही  of 2,560 ( 3.2 % )  इससे  the  79,904  residents enumerated  दौरान   the  2000 Census , which had  in   फेरे   अस्वीकृत  by  7,588   (  8.7  %  ) from the 87,492 counted  in  the  1990   जनसांख्यिकी  .
camden  ranked as the  12th-most   populous  municipality in the state in  2010   बाद   having  been ranked  10th  in 2000 .
Camden  थी  originally incorporated as a city on February 13 , 1828 , from portions of the now-defunct Newton Township ,  जबकि  the area  थी  still part of Gloucester  काउंटी  .
On March 13 , 1844 , Camden became part of  the  newly formed Camden  काउंटी  .
Although once  a  thriving center  लिये  manufacturing and  उद्योग  , Camden is  शायद   बेहतरीन  known for  इसके  struggles  साथ  urban dysfunction .
तीन  Camden  mayors  have been jailed for corruption  ,  the  सबसे  recent being Milton Milan  in  2000  .
Since 2005  the  school  प्रणाली  and police department  have  been operated by the state  of  New  जर्सी  ;  the   कब्ज़ा  expired  in  2012 .
In  2008  , Camden had  the  highest  अपराधों   रेट  in the U.S. with 2,333 violent crimes per 100,000 people while the  नेशनल  average was 455  प्रति  100,000  .
Camden  पब्लिक  schools spent $  23,770  per student  (  $ 19,118 on a budgetary per-pupil basis  )  in  the   2009–10  school year and two-thirds of the students graduate  .
Two out of every five residents are below the national poverty line .
Amitriptyline  (  Tryptomer , Elavil , Tryptizol , Laroxyl  ,   saroten   ,  Sarotex , Lentizol , Endep ) is a tricyclic antidepressant  (  TCA )  .
It is the most  widely  used TCA and has at least equal  efficacy   विरूद्ध  depression as the  नए   क्लास  of  ssris   according  to a study  इससे  early 2001  .
As well as  reducing   depressive  symptoms ,  ये   प्रकार   of  tricyclics also  आसानी   migraines  , tension headaches , anxiety attacks and  कुछ   schizophrenic  symptoms .
It  is   भी   ज्ञात   to   reduce  aggression and  हिंसक  behavior  .
A computer is a general  purpose  device  कि  can be  प्रोग्रामित  to carry out  a  finite set  of  arithmetic  or  logical operations  .
Since a  अनुक्रम   of   परिचालन  can be readily  बदला   ,  the computer can solve more than  एक  kind  of   प्रॉब्लम  .
Conventionally , a  कंप्यूटर  consists of at least one processing element , typically a central processing unit (  cpu  )  और   कुछ  form of memory .
The processing  तत्व   carries   आउट   गणित   और  logic  परिचालन  , and  a  sequencing and control  ईकाई  that can  बदलें  the order of operations based on stored information  .
Peripheral devices  allow  information to  be  retrieved from an external source  ,  and  the  result of operations  saved   और  retrieved .
The first electronic  डिजिटल  computers were developed  between   1940  and  1945  in  the  United  किंगडम  and United  राज्य   .
Originally they were  the  size  of   a  large room , consuming as much power  as  several  सौ  modern personal  कंप्यूटर  ( PCs ) .
In  इस  era  mechanical   एनालॉग  computers  यहूद   प्रयुक्त  for military  अनुप्रयोग  .
Modern computers based  on  integrated circuits  हैं  millions  to  billions  of  times  अधिक  capable  than   the  early  मशीने  , and occupy a  भिन्न  of the  स्पेस  .
Simple computers  हैं  small  पर्याप्त  to fit into  मोबाईल  devices , and mobile computers  can  be powered by  छोटी   बैटरी  .
Personal computers  in   उनके   विभिन्न  forms are icons  of  the Information Age and are what most people think of  as  “computers.”
However  ,  the  अंतःस्थापित  computers found in many devices from MP3  खिलाड़ी  to  सेनानी   वायुयान  and from  खिलौने   to   औद्योगिक   robots  are the most numerous  .
``  Barefoot and pregnant  ''   is  a  phrase   सबसे  commonly associated with the  विवादास्पद  idea that  महिलाओं  should not work outside the  घर  and  चाहिए   have  many children during  उनके  reproductive years  .
It has several other meanings as well  .
It is a  फिगर  of speech  .
the   phrase   ``  barefoot  और  pregnant '' was probably first used  sometime  before 1950 .
An article from 1949 states , `` By  जल्दी   1949  , TWA  was—in  the words of  इसके  new president , Ralph  S.   damon—both  'barefoot  और   गर्भवती   .  ' ''
Its usage may date as  जल्दी  as the  1910s  .
An article published in 1958 states the phrase  थी  first used by  a  `` Dr. Hertzler '' 40 years earlier  .
`` Some forty years ago ,  dr.  Hertzler  उन्नत  a hypothesis which young women of  आज  seem  झुकी  on proving  correct.   '
The only way  to  keep a  स्त्री   प्रसन्न  ,  '  he said , 'is  to  keep her barefoot and  गर्भवती  . '  ''
Oakhurst is  a  census-designated place and unincorporated community within Ocean Township ,  in  Monmouth County , New Jersey , United  राज्य  .
As of  the   2010   संयुक्त  States Census , the  cdp   's  population was 3,995  .
University  of  Phoenix Stadium ,  खोली   अगस्त  1 , 2006  ,  is a multipurpose football  स्टेडियम   स्तिथ   in  Glendale ,  एरिज़ोना  .
It  is  the home of  the  Arizona Cardinals of the National Football League  (  NFL ) and the annual Fiesta Bowl .
The stadium is  स्तिथ   अगला  door  to  the Jobing.com Arena  और  it features the first fully  retractable  natural grass playing surface  निर्मित   in  the United States on top of an  एयरफील्ड   प्रणालियों  drainage  प्रणाली  .
An opening on one side of  the   स्टेडियम  allows the  playing   फ़ील्ड  to move  to   the   exterior   of  the building  ,  allowing the  संपूर्ण  natural  turf  playing surface to be  उजागर   to  daylight .
The  स्टेडियम   रै  hosted Super Bowl XLII  ,  and the 2011  bcs  National Championship Game  ,  a  खेल   कि  it hosts  प्रत्येक  four years ,  जिससे  set the venue 's entertainment  उपस्थिति   रिकार्ड  of 78,603 on January 11 , 2011  .
it  will again host Super  कटोरी  XLIX in 2015 .
The University of  फीनिक्स  acquired  the   नामकरण  rights  in  September 2006 , shortly  बाद  the  स्टेडियम   था   खोली   अंतर्गत   the   नाम   कार्डिनल्स  Stadium  .
The `` University of Phoenix ``  नाम   is  applied as  a   कॉरपोरेट  sponsor ,  और   नहीं   as   the   घर  stadium of  the  University (  जिससे  has no intercollegiate  एथलेटिक्स  program ) .
The stadium has  भी  hosted the  डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई   इवेंट   रेसलमेनिया  XXVI with  72,219  fans  in  attendance .
The  इवेंट   थी  held in the stadium  on  March 28th 2010 .
Joshua Lawrence Chamberlain (  सितंबर  8 ,  1828  – February 24 , 1914 ) , born as  लॉरेंस   जोशुआ   चेम्बरलेन  , was an American college professor  इससे  the State of  maine   ,  who volunteered  दौरान  the American Civil War  to  join  the  Union Army  .
हालांकि  having  no   पहले  education in  सैन्य  strategies , he became a highly respected  और  decorated Union officer ,  reaching   the  rank of brigadier general ( and brevet major  सामान्य  ) .
For  उसके   gallantry  at Gettysburg  ,  he was awarded the Medal of  सम्मान  .
He  थी  given the honor of commanding the Union troops at the  आत्मसमर्पण   रस्म   लिये   the  infantry  of  Robert E. Lee  's   फौज   at  Appomattox , Virginia .
After  the  war  ,  he  डाला   राजनीती  as  a  Republican  और  served  चार  one-year terms of office as  the   32nd  Governor  of  Maine  .
He  परोसा  on the faculty , and as president  ,  of his  अल्मा  mater , Bowdoin  कॉलेज  .
an  inning  ,  or innings ,  is   a  fixed-length segment  of  a  खेल  in any of  a  variety  of  sports  –  most notably cricket and baseball during which  एक   टोली  attempts  to   स्कोर  while the  अन्य   टोली  attempts to prevent  the  first from scoring .
In cricket ,  the  term  पारी  is both  एकवचन  and plural  और  is always spelled  और  pronounced  साथ  the  टर्मिनल  `` s '' .
In baseball and softball , the singular  रूप   is  inning  और  only  the  plural takes an ``  s  ''  .
in  many other  खेल  ,  the  length of the  खेल  is dictated by a clock  और  teams swap offensive  और  defensive roles dynamically  by   लेने   कब्ज़ा   of  a ball or similar item .
in   बेसबॉल   और  cricket  ,  however , one  टोली  , said to be ``  बल्लेबाजी   ''   ,  attempts to score  ``  runs ''  —see  run ( baseball ) and run  (  cricket ) —while the other  टोली   ,  said  to   be  `` fielding '' , attempts to prevent the scoring of runs and get members of the  बल्लेबाजी   टोली  out .
the   टीमों  switch places after the  क्षेत्ररक्षण  team  रै  succeeded  in  getting  a  fixed number of players out ,  बनाना   a   क्लॉक   अनावश्यक   .
In cricket , the term innings is also used  to  refer  to   the  play  of   एक  particular  खिलाड़ी  (  स्मिथ  had a poor innings , scoring  तभी   12  ) .
By extension , this term  can  be used  in  British English  लिये  almost any  कार्यकलाप   जिससे  takes  a   काल   of  time (  the   उदार   सरकारी  had a  शुभ  innings , but finally lost office  in  1972 ,  or   तुम  've had a  मेला   पारी  , now it 's  my  turn , meaning  ``  you have spoken  लिये  long enough , now let me speak  ''  ) .
It is also  प्रयुक्त  in  सन्दर्भ  to someone  जो   रै  died  at   a  reasonably  बूढ़ा  age or  जिया  a rich  और   rewarding  life ( Ah , well .
John was  89  .
At least he had  a  good  पारी  ) .
the  baseball-derived parallel to this in American English is the term at  चमगादड़   .
According to the Oxford English  शब्दकोष  , the  पद  innings  रै  been used in  सन्दर्भ  to cricket since  at  least 1735 .
as   क्रिकेट  was a mature  ,  highly organized sport in the 1600s in  इंग्लैण्ड  , the  पद  's origin could well  precede   इस  first  अंकित  usage .
the  word inning meaning  'a   महफ़िल   in  ' is first  अंकित  in  1522  , and could be  सम्बन्धित  .
Adenosine deaminase deficiency , also called ADA deficiency  or  ADA-SCID , is an  autosomal  recessive  metabolic  disorder that causes immunodeficiency .
it  occurs in fewer than one in 100,000 live births  विश्वव्यापी  .
it  accounts for about 15  %  of all  मामले  of severe combined immunodeficiency (  scid   )  .
It  is   बहुत  rare  ,  you  have  a 3 % chance of getting this  जीन  .
ADA deficiency may be present  in   शैशव  ,  बाल्यकाल  , adolescense , or adulthood .
Age of  onset  and severity is related to  कुछ  29 known genotypes associated with the  विकार   .
An example of urban poverty  in  this slum in Jakarta  ,  Indonesia
Poverty is the state  of  one who lacks  a  certain amount  of  material possessions  or  money .
Absolute  गरीबी  or  destitution   refers   to  the  पिछडे  of  मौलिक  human needs ,  जिससे  commonly includes food ,  जल  , sanitation ,  कपडे  , shelter , health  परवाह  and education .
सापेक्ष  poverty is defined  contextually  as economic inequality in the location or society in which people live .
For much  of  history ,  गरीबी   थी  considered  largely  unavoidable as traditional  मोड्स  of production were insufficient to give an entire population a comfortable standard of  जीना  .
बाद   the  industrial revolution ,  द्रव्यमान  production  in  factories made wealth  increasingly  more  inexpensive   और  accessible .
of   अधिक  importance is the  modernization   of  agriculture , such as  fertilizers  , in order to provide  पर्याप्त  yield  to   फीड  the  जनसांख्यिकी  .
the   सप्लाई  of basic needs can be  प्रतिबंधित   by  constraints  on  government services such  as  corruption , tax avoidance , debt and loan  conditionalities  and by the brain  नाली   of  health care and  शैक्षणिक  professionals .
Strategies  of  increasing income to  मेक   मौलिक  needs more affordable typically include welfare  ,  economic  freedoms  , and providing financial  सेवाएं  .
Poverty reduction is  a   प्रमुख  goal and issue for many international organizations such  as   the   संयुक्त   राष्ट्र  and  the  World  बैंको  .
The  संसार  Bank estimated 1.29 billion people  यहूद  living  in  absolute  गरीबी  in  2008   .
Of these  ,  about 400  लाख  people in absolute poverty lived in  इण्डिया   और  173 million people in  चीन  .
In  यूएसए  1 in 5 children lives in poverty .
In terms  of   प्रतिशत  of  क्षेत्रीय  populations , sub-Saharan  अफ़्रीकी  at 47  %  had the  उच्चतम   incidence  rate of absolute poverty in 2008 .
Between  1990  and 2010 , about 663  लाख  people  स्थानांतरित  above  the  absolute poverty level .
स्टिल   ,  extreme poverty is a global challenge  ;  it  is  observed  in  all parts  of  the world , including the developed  economies  .
Mushroom  विषाक्तता  ( also  ज्ञात  as  mycetism  ) refers to harmful effects from ingestion of toxic substances present  in   a  mushroom .
These  लक्षण  can vary  इससे  slight gastrointestinal discomfort  to  death .
The toxins present are secondary  metabolites  produced in specific  biochemical  pathways  in  the  fungal  cells .
Mushroom poisoning  is   प्रायः  the  परिणाम   of   ingestion  of wild mushrooms  बाद  misidentification of  a  toxic  मशरूम   as   an   खाद्य  species .
The most common reason  लिये  this  misidentification  is close resemblance in  शर्तें   of  colour and  सामान्य   morphology   of  the toxic mushrooms  प्रजाति   साथ  edible species .
Even very experienced wild mushroom  gatherers  are upon  विरल  occasion poisoned by eating toxic species  ,  despite  होने   खूब  aware of the risks  ,  through carelessness  .
To prevent mushroom  विषाक्तता  , mushroom  gatherers  need  to  be very  परिचित   साथ   the   मशरूम  they  intend  to  collect  as well as  साथ  any similar-looking toxic species  .
In  जोड  , edibility  of  mushrooms may depend on methods  of  preparation  लिये  cooking .
Collectors also need to be well aware  कि  edibility or  toxicity  of some species varies with geographic location .
Human height  is  the  अलहदा  from the  नीचे  of  the  feet to  the  top  of  the  सिर  in a human body  ,  standing  वीर्यपात  .
When populations  share  genetic background and environmental factors ,  औसत  height is  अक्सर  characteristic within  the   समूह  .
Exceptional height variation (  around   20  % deviation  इससे   औसत  ) within  ऐसे  a population is sometimes due  to   gigantism  or  dwarfism  , which are medical  शर्तें   caused  by specific genes or  अंतःस्रावी   abnormalities   .
in  regions of extreme poverty or prolonged warfare  ,  environmental factors like chronic  कुपोषण   दौरान  childhood or adolescence may account for  विलम्बित  growth  and/or  ( in severe cases ) marked  reductions  in adult stature even without the  उपस्थिति   of  any of these medical  शर्तें  .
Apollo 11 was the  spaceflight  that landed the  पहला  humans  ,   अमेरिकी  Neil Armstrong  और  Buzz  एल्ड्रिन  , on the Moon on July 20 ,  1969  , at  20:18  UTC .
Armstrong became the  पहला  to step  onto  the lunar surface 6 hours later on  जुलाई   21  at  02:56   utc  .
Armstrong  खर्च  about  दो  and a  हाफ  hours outside the  spacecraft  , Aldrin slightly less ; and  साथ  they collected  of  lunar material  लिये  return  to  Earth  .
A  तीसरा   सदस्य   of  the mission  ,  Michael Collins , piloted the command  spacecraft   अलोन  in  चंद्र  orbit  जबतक   आर्मस्ट्रांग  and Aldrin  लौटे  to it just  अंतर्गत  a day later for the trip  वापस  to  धरती  .
शुभारम्भ   by   a  Saturn  v  rocket from Kennedy Space  बीच  in Merritt Island  ,   फ्लोरिडा  on July  16   ,  Apollo 11  थी  the  पांचवां  manned  मिशन   of  NASA 's Apollo program .
The Apollo  spacecraft  had  तीन   भाग  :  a   कमांड  Module with a  केबिन   लिये  the three astronauts which was the  तभी   भाग  which  उतरा   वापस  on Earth ; a Service Module which  समर्थित  the  कमांड   मोड्यूल   साथ  propulsion  ,  electrical power , oxygen  और   जल  ; and  a  Lunar  मोड्यूल   लिये   लैंडिंग   on  the Moon .
After being sent  to  the Moon by the Saturn V 's upper stage , the  astronauts  separated the spacecraft from it and travelled for three days  जबतक  they entered  into  lunar orbit  .
Armstrong  और  Aldrin  तब  moved into the Lunar Module  और   उतरा  in the Sea of Tranquility .
वे  stayed a total  of   परिचय  21 and a half hours on the  चंद्र  surface .
बाद  lifting  बंद  in the upper  भाग  of the Lunar Module  और   rejoining  Collins  in  the Command  मोड्यूल  , they returned to Earth and landed in  the  Pacific  समंदर   on  July 24 .
ब्रॉडकास्ट  on  सजीव  TV  to   a  world-wide audience ,  आर्मस्ट्रांग  stepped onto  the  lunar surface and  वर्णित  the event  as  ``  एक  small step for [ a ] man  ,  one giant leap for  mankind  . ''
Apollo  11  effectively ended the Space  रेस   और  fulfilled  a  national goal proposed  in  1961 by the  लेट  U.S.  अध्यक्ष  John  F.  Kennedy in  a  speech  पहले  the United  राज्य  Congress , `` before this decade is out , of landing a  man  on the Moon and  returning  him safely to the Earth  .  ''
the   फीफा  World Cup ,  प्रायः   बस  the  संसार   कप   ,  is an  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  association football  प्रतियोगिता  contested by the senior  मेन   's   नेशनल  teams of  the  members of Fédération Internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ) ,  the  sport 's  वैश्विक  governing  देह   .
The championship  रै  been awarded every four  सालो   चूंकि   the  inaugural tournament in 1930 , except in  1942  and 1946 when it was  नहीं   आयोजित  because of the Second World  युद्ध  .
The current champions  हैं   स्पेन  , who  जीती  the 2010  टूर्नामेंट  .
The  वर्तमान  format of the tournament involves 32  टीमों  competing  लिये  the title  at  venues within the  मेजबान  nation ( s ) over  a  period of about  a   माह  ; this phase  is  often  पुकारा  the World  कप  Finals .
A qualification phase  ,  which currently  takes  place over the preceding three years ,  is   प्रयुक्त  to  determine  which  टीमों  qualify for the tournament together with the host nation  (  s ) .
The 19 World  कप  tournaments have been won by eight different national teams  .
ब्राज़ील  have  जीती   पाँच  times  ,  and they are the  तभी   टोली   to  have played  in  every  टूर्नामेंट  .
the  other World Cup  विजेता  are Italy , with  चार   शीर्षक  ; Germany , with three  शीर्षक   ;  Argentina and  inaugural   विजेता  Uruguay , with  दो  titles each  ;  and  इंग्लैण्ड   ,  France , and Spain ,  साथ  one title each .
The World Cup is the world 's most widely viewed sporting  इवेंट   ;  an estimated 715.1  लाख   लोगों  watched the  फाइनल  match of  the   2006  FIFA  संसार  Cup held in  जर्मनी   .
The  अगला   तीन  World  cups  will be hosted by Brazil  in  2014 , Russia  in  2018 , and Qatar in  2022   .
Genocide  is  a  पद   coined  in 1944 by  राफेल  Lemkin  to  describe the deliberate  और  systematic  विनाश   ,  in whole or  in  part ,  of   an  ethnic , racial  ,  religious , or national  समूह   .
It is  पारिभाषित  in Article 2  of  the Convention on the Prevention  और  Punishment  of  the  अपराधों   of  Genocide (  cppcg   )   of   1948   as  `` any of the  following   अधिनियमों  committed  साथ   intent  to destroy ,  in   पूरे  or  in  part , a national ,  ethnical   ,   जातिगत   or  religious  समूह  , as such : killing members of the group ;  causing  serious  bodily  or mental harm to  सदस्यों  of the  समूह  ; deliberately  inflicting  on the groups conditions of life  ,  calculated to bring about  इसके  physical destruction in whole or in part ;  imposing  measures intended to prevent births  भीतर   the   समूह   ;   [  and ]  forcibly  transferring children of the group to another group . ''
skulls  of  पीड़ितों  of the Rwandan  नरसंहार
the   प्रस्तावना  to the CPPCG not only states  कि  ``  नरसंहार  is  a  crime under  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  law , contrary to  the  spirit and  aims  of  the  United  राष्ट्र   और  condemned by the civilized world  ''  ,  लकिन  also  कि   ``   at  all periods of  इतिहास  genocide has inflicted great losses on humanity  ''  .
determining  what historical  कार्यक्रम  constitute a  नरसंहार   और  which  हैं  merely criminal or inhuman behavior  is  not  a  clear-cut matter  .
In nearly every case where accusations of  नरसंहार   have  circulated  ,  partisans of various sides  have  fiercely disputed the interpretation and details of the  इवेंट  ,  प्रायः   to  the  पाइंट  of promoting wildly different versions  of  the facts .
an  accusation of  नरसंहार   is  certainly not  लिया  lightly and will almost always be controversial .
The following  सूची  of genocides  और   कथित   genocides  should  be  understood  in   इस  context  और  can not be  regarded  as the  फाइनल  word on these subjects .
A timing belt is a non-slipping mechanical drive belt  और  the term may refer to  either:
Toothed  बेल्ट  ,  a  flexible  बेल्ट  with  दांत  moulded  onto  its inner surface
Timing  बेल्ट   (  camshaft )  ,   a  toothed  बेल्ट   प्रयुक्त   to  drive the camshaft (  s  ) within an internal combustion  इंजन
The culture of the United States  is  primarily a Western  संस्कृति   ,  but is also  बहकावे  by Native American  ,  African  ,   एशियाई  , Polynesian ,  और  Latin American  संस्कृतियों  .
अमरीकी   संस्कृति   प्रारंभ   इसके  formation  over   10,000  years  पहले  with the migration of Paleo-Indians  इससे   एशिया  into the region that is  आज   the  continental  संयुक्त   राज्य  .
it  has its own  अद्वितीय  social and  सांस्कृतिक  characteristics such  as  dialect ,  म्यूज़िक  , arts  ,  social habits ,  भोजन   ,   और   लोकगीत  .
the  United States of America is  an   ethnically  and  racially  diverse  देश  as a result of large-scale immigration from many different  देशों  throughout its history .
Its chief  जल्दी  European influences  आए  from English , Scottish , Welsh and  आयरिश  settlers of colonial  अमेरिका   दौरान  British  नियम  .
British culture , due to  औपनिवेशिक  ties  साथ  Britain that spread the  अंग्रेज़ी  language , legal system and other cultural  inheritances  , had  a   formative   influence  .
Other important  प्रभाव  came from other parts of  पश्चिमी  Europe , especially  जर्मनी  , France ,  और  Italy .
Original elements  भी  play a  दमदार   भूमिका  , such as the  आविष्कार  of  jeffersonian  democracy .
Thomas Jefferson 's Notes  on   the  State  of   वर्जिनिया   थी   शायद  the first influential  घरेलू   सांस्कृतिक  critique  by   an  American  और  a  प्रतिक्रियावादी  piece to  the  prevailing European consensus that  अमेरिका   's  domestic originality was degenerate  .
प्रचलित   विचार  and ideals that evolved domestically , such  as  national holidays , uniquely  अमरीकी  sports , military  परंपरा   ,   और  innovations  in  the  कला  and  entertainment  give a strong sense of  नेशनल   अभिमान  among  the   जनसांख्यिकी   as  a whole  .
American culture includes  दोनो  conservative  और  liberal  तत्व  , scientific and religious  प्रतिस्पर्धात्मकता   ,  political  structures  ,  रिस्क  taking and free expression  ,  materialist and moral elements  .
Despite certain  सतत   वैचारिक  principles ( e.g . individualism , egalitarianism  ,  and faith in freedom and democracy  )  ,  अमरीकी   संस्कृति  has  a  variety  of  expressions due to its  भौगोलिक   स्केल   और   जनसांख्यिकी   विविधता  .
The  लचीलापन  of U.S.  संस्कृति  and its highly  सांकेतिक  nature  सीसे   कुछ  researchers to  categorize  American culture as  a  mythic identity  ;  others see  it  as  अमरीकी  exceptionalism  .
it  also  शामिल  elements that  विकसित  from Indigenous Americans  ,  and other  जातीय  cultures—most prominently the culture of  अफ़्रीकी  Americans , cultures from Latin  अमेरिका  ,  और  Asian American  संस्कृतियों  .
Many  अमरीकी   सांस्कृतिक  elements  ,   विशेषकर  from popular culture , have spread across the  ग्लोब   through  modern mass  मीडिया  .
The United  राज्य  has  प्रायः  been  विचार  of  as   a  melting  घट  ,  लकिन  beginning in the late  1990s  and early 2000s ,  it   रुझान  towards  सांस्कृतिक  diversity , pluralism and the image of  a  salad  कटोरी  instead  .
Due to the  extent  of  अमरीकी  culture , there  हैं   अनेक  integrated  लकिन  unique social subcultures  भीतर   the  United States  .
The  सांस्कृतिक  affiliations an individual  in  the United States may  have   commonly  depend on social class  ,   राजनैतिक   अभिविन्यास   और  a multitude of  जनसांख्यिकी  characteristics  ऐसे  as religious background ,  occupation  and ethnic group  सदस्यता  .
Samoan (  gagana   fa'a  Sāmoa or Gagana Sāmoa — IPA : ) is  the  language of the Samoan Islands , comprising the independent country  of  Samoa and the United  राज्य   territory   of  American Samoa .
It  is  an official  language—alongside  English —in  दोनो  jurisdictions .
Samoan , a Polynesian  भाषा   ,   is  the  पहला   भाषा  for most  of   the  Samoa  आइलैंड्स   '  population  of  about 246,000 .
With many Samoan people living in other  देशों  ,  the  total number  of  speakers worldwide  is  estimated  at  370,000 .
The  भाषा  is  notable  for  the  phonological  मतभेद  between  औपचारिक  and  अनौपचारिक  speech  as   खूब   as  a  ceremonial   रूप  used in Samoan  छाये   .
A glucose tolerance  परीक्षण   is  a medical test in which  ग्लूकोज  is given and blood samples taken afterward to  determine  how quickly it is cleared from the blood .
The test is usually used to test for  मधुमेह  , insulin  प्रतिरोध  , and sometimes reactive hypoglycemia and acromegaly  ,  or  rarer   विकार  of carbohydrate metabolism .
In  the  most commonly performed version  of  the test ,  an  oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) , a  मानक  dose  of  glucose is ingested by  मुँह  and blood  स्तर  are checked  दो  hours later  .
Many variations of the GTT  have   महरूम  devised over  the  years for various  उद्देश्य   ,  with different standard  doses  of glucose , different routes of administration , different intervals  और  durations of  sampling  , and  विभिन्न  substances  measured  in  जोड   to  blood  ग्लूकोज  .
`` What  परिचय   me  '' is a  सोंग  written by  गैरी  Frost and  frances  Swan ,  पहला  recorded by Australian rock band Moving  तस्वीरें  from their album Days of  innocence  .
It  थी  the  बैंड  's  पहला  number-one single  in  Australia  बिता  six  लगातार  weeks on the  शीर्ष  ; there , it was  the  second-highest selling single of 1982  .
the  success  of  the  सोंग   led  them  to   अमेरिका   जहाँ  it became a hit , reaching #  29  on the U.S  .  Billboard  hot   100  chart .
the  song stayed  in  the  u.S.  charts for such  a  long time that it managed  to  make Billboards top 100 Pop Singles of 1983  ,  at # 88 , a rare  feat   लिये  a single  साथ  such a low  शिखर  position .
The  सोंग  made an  असामान्य  comeback in  1989  , peaking at # 46  .
On  the   बाएँ  a chicken  अंडा  , the egg most  commonly  eaten  by  humans  ,   और  on the  सही  two quail eggs
अंडे  are laid by females of many different  प्रजाति   ,  including birds , reptiles , amphibians , and fish , and  have  been  खाया  by mankind for thousands of years  .
Bird and reptile  अंडे   consist  of  a  protective eggshell  ,  albumen  (  egg white  )  ,  और  vitellus ( egg yolk )  ,  contained within various  पतला   झिल्लियों  .
Popular choices for egg consumption  हैं  chicken , duck ,  बटेर   ,  roe , and caviar  ,   लकिन  the egg most often consumed  by   इंसानो  is the chicken egg ,  by   a   चौड़ी   हाशिया  .
अंडा  yolks and whole eggs store significant amounts of  प्रोटीन  and choline ,  और  are  widely  used  in   cookery   .
due  to their protein  सामग्री  , the United  राज्य  Department  of   कृषि  (  यूएसडीए  ) categorizes  अंडे  as  meats  within the Food Guide Pyramid .
despite  the  nutritional  value of eggs  ,   वहीँ  are some  संभावित   स्वास्थ्य   मुद्दे  arising from  अंडा  quality , storage ,  और  individual allergies .
Chickens and other egg-laying creatures are widely kept throughout the  संसार   ,   और  mass production of chicken eggs is a global industry .
In 2009 , an estimated  62.1   लाख   मीट्रिक  tons  of  eggs  यहूद  produced  विश्वव्यापी  from  a  total laying flock of approximately  6.4  billion hens  .
There are issues of regional variation in demand and expectation ,  as  well as current  debates  concerning methods  of  mass  उत्पादन  , with the European Union 's  बैन  on battery farming of chickens .
Major League Soccer ( MLS ) is a  पेशेवर   सॉकर   लीग  representing the sport 's  उच्चतम  level in the United States and Canada .
Sanctioned by the  संयुक्त  States Soccer Federation (  u.S.  Soccer ) ,  the  league is composed of 19 teams  —  16 in the U.S.  और   3  in Canada  .
Seasons presently run  इससे   कूच  to December  ,  with each  टोली  playing 34 games in the regular season .
Ten teams compete  in  the postseason MLS Cup Playoffs culminating in  the   चैंपियनशिप   खेल  ,  the  MLS Cup  .
Major League  सॉकर  was  संस्थापित   in  1993  as  part of the United  राज्य   '  bid to  मेजबान  the 1994 FIFA World  कप  .
The first  ऋतु   took  place  in  1996 beginning with  टेन  teams  .
Instead  of  operating  as  an  संघ  of independently owned teams , MLS is  a  single entity where each  टोली  is owned and controlled by  the  league 's investors .
The league  's  closed membership makes it  एक   of  the world  's  few soccer leagues not using  प्रमोशन  and relegation .
The legality  of  cannabis varies from  देश  to  देश  .
Possession of cannabis is illegal in most countries and has been since the beginning  of  widespread cannabis prohibition in the late  1930s  .
however   ,  many countries have decriminalized the possession of small  quantities   of  cannabis , particularly in North America ,  दक्षिण   अमेरिका   और  Europe  .
Furthermore ,  कब्ज़ा  is legal  or   effectively  legal  in   the   नीदरलैंड्स  ,  उत्तर  Korea and would  be   in  the  u.S.  states  of  Colorado and Washington if it were not for  संघीय  law , which  governs   व्यक्तियों  in all states  .
The medicinal  उपयोग  of cannabis  is  legal  in  a  क्रमांक  of  देशों   ,   सहित   कनाडा  , the Czech Republic and Israel .
While federal  विधि   in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  bans all sale  और  possession of  कैनबिस  , enforcement  varies  widely at the  राज्य  level and  कुछ   राज्य   have  established medicinal marijuana programs  in  that contradict federal law ; two states ( Colorado and Washington )  have   repealed  their laws prohibiting  the  recreational  उपयोग  of  कैनबिस   और   replaced  them with  a  regulatory regime  ,   भी   contrary  to  संघीय  statute .
कुछ  countries have laws that  हैं   नहीं  as vigorously prosecuted  as   अन्य   लकिन  , apart from the countries that  प्रस्ताव   अभिगम  to medical marijuana , most countries have  विभिन्न  penalties ranging from  lenient  to very  कठोर  .
Some infractions are  लिया  more seriously  in  some countries than others  in  regard to  the  cultivation , use ,  कब्ज़ा   or  transfer of  कैनबिस  for  recreational  use .
A few  jurisdictions   have   lessened   दंड  for possession of  छोटी  quantities of  कैनबिस  , making  it  punishable by confiscation and a fine  ,   बल्कि   than   कारावास   .
Some jurisdictions/ drug courts use mandatory treatment programs for young or frequent  उपयोक्ता  , with  स्वतंत्रता  from narcotic drugs as the goal  और  a  few   jurisdictions   परमिट   कैनबिस  use for  औषधीय  purposes .
वहीँ  are  भी  changes in a  अधिक  restrictive direction  as  in Canada  .
Drug  परीक्षण  to detect  कैनबिस  are increasingly common in  अनेक  countries and have resulted in  कारावास   वाक्य  and people losing their jobs .
However ,  सरल  possession can carry  long  jail  वाक्य  in some countries  ,   विशेषकर  in parts  of   ईस्ट  Asia and Southeast  एशिया   जहाँ  the  बिक्री  of  कैनबिस  may lead to a sentence  of  life in prison  or  even  निष्पादन  .
in   cardiovascular  physiology , ejection fraction  (  EF  )  represents the volumetric fraction of blood pumped out  of  the ventricle (  दिल  ) with each heart beat  or   हृदय  cycle  .
It  can   be  applied to either the right ventricle which ejects  via   the  pulmonary  वाल्व   into  the pulmonary circulation  or  the left  ventricle   जिससे  ejects via the aortic valve  into  the systemic  परिसंचरण  .
इमेजिंग  of the physiology  of   the   mammalian  heart is the art  कि   allows  meaningful mathematical  अभिव्यक्ति  defining EF  .
Noninvasive cardiac imaging has become a  विश्वव्यापी  utility enabling  पढ़ाई   of  cardiac performance reproducibly  और   inexpensively  .
Simplified , Ejection fraction is a  गणितीय  product allowed  by  cardiac imaging .
As a  गणितीय  term , Ejection Fraction is  an  extension of  the   कार्य  of  एडाल्फ  Fick  in  cardiac output .
Dedicated technology such as  इकोकार्डियोग्राफी  , Computed Tomography , Magnetic  अनुनाद  Imaging and MUGA scanning  have  definitively  अनुमत   clinically  relevant  गणित  regarding Ischemia , Congenital  दिल  Disease and Heart  विफलता  .
राज्य  Route 14 ( SR 14 ) is a north–south state  राजमार्ग   in   the  U.S.  राज्य   of   कैलिफ़ोर्निया   ,  largely in  the   mojave  Desert  .
The southern portion of the highway is signed as  the   antelope  Valley  फ्रीवे  .
the   रूट  connects  अंतरराज्यीय   5  ,  or  Golden State Freeway , near Santa  clarita  and with U.S. Route  395   निकट  Inyokern .
Legislatively , the  रूट   extends  south  of  I-5  to  State Route 1  in  the Pacific  palisades  area  of  Los  एंजिल्स  ,  however  the  portion  south of the junction with  i-5   रै  not been  constructed   .
The southern part of  the   constructed  route  is  a  व्यस्त  commuter freeway  सेवारत  and connecting  the  communities  of  Santa Clarita  ,  Palmdale and Lancaster with the rest  of  the  वृहद  Los Angeles area .
The northern portion  ,  from Vincent  (  south of  palmdale  ) to Route 395 , is  legislatively  named the Aerospace Highway ,  as  the  राजमार्ग  serves  एडवर्ड्स  Air Force Base , once  एक   of  the  प्राथमिक  landing strips  लिये   नासा  's Space Shuttle  .
This section is rural , following the line between  the  hot Mojave desert  और   the  forming Sierra Nevada mountain  दायरा  .
Most of  रूट   14  is loosely paralleled  by  a main line of the  दक्षिणी  Pacific  रेलरोड  , used  लिये  the  antelope   घाटी  Line of the  metrolink  commuter rail system as  खूब  as a connection between Los Angeles and the California Central Valley  via  Tehachapi Pass .
Linked with US  395  , this  सड़क  connects Los  एंजिल्स  with such  स्थान  as Mammoth Mountain ,  मोनो   झील   ,  Yosemite  नेशनल   पार्क  and Reno , Nevada  .
Route 14 was part  of  U.S. Route 6  prior  to truncation in 1964 , when U.S. 6 was  a  coast-to-coast route from Long Beach to Provincetown , Massachusetts  .
The non-freeway segment of SR 14  इससे   चांदी   महारानी  Road  उत्तर   of  Rosamond to Mojave is known  as  Sierra  राजमार्ग  , as  is  the old  रूटिंग   between  Interstate 5  और   चांदी  Queen  सड़क  where SR  14  has been moved to a newer freeway alignment .
Portions of Route  14  remain signed  साथ  names  संबद्ध   साथ  US 6  ,  including Midland Trail ,  थियोडोर  Roosevelt Highway  और   ग्रैंड   फौज   of  the Republic  राजमार्ग  .
This route is  भाग   of  the  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  Freeway and Expressway  प्रणाली  .
Blindness  is  the condition of  lacking  visual perception due to physiological or  neurological  factors .
विभिन्न   तराजू   have  been  विकसित  to  describe   the  extent  of   दृष्टि   घाटा   और  define  दृष्टिहीनता   .
Total blindness is the complete  कमी   of   रूप  and visual light perception and is  clinically  recorded  as  NLP , an abbreviation  लिये  `` no  लाइट   बोध  . ''
Blindness is frequently used to describe severe  विज़ुअल  impairment  साथ  vision .
those   वर्णित  as having only light  बोध  have no more sight than the  क्षमता  to  बताना  light from  अंधेरा  and  the  general direction of  a   लाइट  source  .
To determine which people may need special assistance  क्युकी   of   उनके  visual  disabilities   ,  various governmental  jurisdictions  have formulated more complex definitions referred  to  as legal blindness .
In North  अमेरिका  and most  of   यूरोपीय   ,   विधिक   दृष्टिहीनता  is  पारिभाषित  as visual acuity ( vision  )  of  20/200  (  6/60  ) or less  in  the better eye  साथ  best correction  संभावित  .
This means  कि  a  legally  blind  व्यक्तिगत   होता   have  to stand from an object to see it—with  corrective   lenses   —with   the   वही  degree of clarity as a normally  sighted   व्यक्ति  could from .
In  अनेक   क्षेत्रों  ,  लोगों   साथ  average acuity  जो  nonetheless have a visual field  of   कम  than 20  डिग्री  (  the  norm being 180  डिग्री  ) are  भी  classified as  होने  legally blind .
लगभग  ten  प्रतिशत  of those  deemed  legally  अँधा  , by any measure , have  no  vision .
The rest have some  दृष्टि  , from light perception  अलोन  to relatively good acuity .
कम  vision is sometimes  प्रयुक्त  to describe visual acuities from 20/70 to 20/200  .
By the 10th Revision  of  the WHO International Statistical  वर्गीकरण  of Diseases  ,   चोटों  and Causes of Death , low vision is defined  as  visual  तीक्ष्णता  of  कम   than   20/60  ( 6/18  )  ,  लकिन  equal to  or  better than  20/200   (  6/60 ) , or  सम्बन्धित  visual field loss to less than 20 degrees , in  the  better  नजर  with best possible correction .
Blindness is  पारिभाषित  as  विज़ुअल   तीक्ष्णता  of less  than  20/400  (  6/120  )  , or corresponding visual field  घाटा   to  less than 10 degrees , in the better eye with best possible  सुधार  .
Blind people with undamaged  आँखें  may still register light non-visually for  the   purpose  of circadian  entrainment  to the  24-hour  light/dark cycle .
Light  सिग्नल  for this purpose travel through the retinohypothalamic tract and are  नहीं   प्रभावित   by   ऑप्टिक  nerve  क्षति   परे  where the retinohypothalamic tract exits .
अर्ल  Simmons ( born December 18 ,  1970  )  ,   बेहतर   ज्ञात  by his stage  names   dmx   और  Dark Man X , is an American  rapper  and actor .
In  1999  ,  dmx   released   उसके   best-selling  album ...  और   तब  There  थी   x  , which featured the  hit  single `` Party  up   (  Up  in  Here ) `` .
he  has acted in films such as Belly  ,  Romeo Must Die  ,  Exit  wounds  , Cradle 2 The  संगीन   ,  and  पिछला  Hour  .
In 2006 ,  he  starred in the  वास्तविकता  television  श्रेणी  , which was primarily aired on the BET cable television  संजाल  .
In 2003 , DMX  प्रकाशित   a  book  of   उसके  memoirs entitled , E.A.R.L . : The Autobiography of DMX  .
DMX  released  a mixtape The Weigh In as a prelude/promotion towards his album Undisputed (  2012  )  .
DMX has sold  over   30  million records worldwide , making him one of  the  best-selling hip-hop artists of all time .
Professional certification , trade  प्रमाणन  , or professional designation , often  पुकारा  simply certification or qualification ,  is   a  designation earned by a person to  assure   योग्यता  to perform  a   जॉब  or task .
Not  सब  certifications  कि   उपयोग  post-nominal  अक्षर  are an acknowledgement of educational  उपलब्धि  , or an agency appointed  to   safeguard   the   पब्लिक  interest .
Bugs  बनी   is  a funny  एनिमल  cartoon character , best  remembered   लिये  his  अभिनीत   भूमिकाएँ  in  the  Looney  धुनें  and  merrie  Melodies series of theatrical short films produced  by  Warner Bros.  दौरान   the   सुनहरी  age of American animation  .
His  लोकप्रियता  during this era led to  उसके  becoming a corporate mascot of Warner Bros.  entertainment  .
Bugs is an anthropomorphic  धूसर  hare or rabbit who is  प्रसिद्ध  for his flippant  ,  personality  ,  a  सुनाया   नई   यॉर्क  accent  ,   उसके  portrayal as a  छलिया  , and  उसके  catch phrase `` Eh ...
What 's up , doc ?  ''
( usually  कहा   जबकि   चबाने  a carrot ) .
बग  has appeared  in  more films  than  any  अन्य  cartoon  अक्षर   और  is the ninth most portrayed film personality in  the  world  .
According  to  his 1990 `` biography '' Bugs  बनी   :  50 Years and Only One  धूसर  Hare  ,   बग  was  born  on July  27   ,   1940   in   ब्रुकलीन  ,  नई  York in a warren under Ebbets Field , home  of  the Brooklyn  डॉजर्स  .
In reality ,  he  was brought to life by the animators and staff of Leon  schlesinger   प्रोडक्शन्स   (   बाद  Warner  भाईs.  Cartoons ) :  सहित  Tex Avery , who directed  बग  ' early definitive  छोटी   a  Wild Hare  (   1940  ) ; Robert  mckimson  , who created Bugs  '  definitive character  डिज़ाइन  ;  और   mel   blanc  , who originated  the  voice of Bugs .
The mucous membranes ( or mucosae  or  mucosas  ;   एकवचन  mucosa ) are  linings   of   ज़्यादातर  endodermal  उत्पत्ति  , covered  in  epithelium  ,  which are  शामिल  in absorption  और  secretion .
वे  line cavities that are exposed to  the   बाह्य  environment and internal organs .
वे  are  at  several places contiguous with skin : at  the  nostrils  ,  the lips of  the   मुँह  , the  eyelids  , the ears , the genital area , and the  गुदा  .
the  sticky , thick fluid secreted  by  the mucous  झिल्लियों   और  glands  is  termed  mucus  .
the   पद  mucous membrane refers  to  where they  हैं  found in  the   देह   और  not every mucous membrane secretes mucus .
The glans  clitoridis   ,  glans penis ( head of the penis ) , along with the inside of the foreskin and the  clitoral  hood , are mucous membranes .
The urethra is  भी  a  श्लेष्मक  membrane .
The secreted  mucus  traps the pathogens in  the  body ,  preventing  any further  क्रियाएँ  of diseases .
a  master  सार्जेंट  is the military rank for a senior  non-commissioned  officer in some armed forces .
Cake is a  रूप  of bread or  bread-like   खाना   .
in  its modern forms , it is  typically   a  sweet baked dessert  .
In  इसके  oldest  फ़ॉर्म   ,  cakes were normally fried breads  or  cheesecakes , and normally  था  a disk shape .
Determining whether a given food  चाहिए  be classified as bread ,  केक  , or  पेस्ट्री  can be difficult .
Modern cake  ,   विशेषकर  layer cakes ,  सामान्यतः  contain  a  combination  of   आटा  , sugar  ,  eggs ,  और   मक्खन   or  oil ,  साथ   कुछ  varieties also  requiring   द्रव  (  typically  milk  or  water  )  and  leavening  agents (  ऐसे   as  yeast or baking  चूर्ण  )  .
flavorful  ingredients like  फल   purées  , nuts  ,  dried  or   candied  fruit  ,   or   extracts   हैं  often  added  , and numerous substitutions for  the  primary  संघटक  are possible  .
cakes  are  प्रायः  filled with fruit preserves or  मिठाई   sauces  ( like pastry cream )  ,  iced with buttercream  or   अन्य   icings   ,  and decorated with marzipan  ,   piped  borders or  candied   फल   .
Cake is often the  मिठाई  of choice for  meals  at ceremonial occasions ,  विशेषकर  weddings , anniversaries ,  और   जन्मदिन   .
वहीँ   हैं  countless cake recipes ; some  हैं  bread-like , some rich and elaborate  ,   और  many are centuries old .
Cake  बनाना  is no  longer  a complicated procedure  ;  while  at   एक  time  considerable   मजदूर  went into cake making ( particularly the whisking of egg foams ) , baking equipment and  दिशानिर्देश   have  been  सरलीकृत  so that even  the   सबसे  amateur cook may  बेक   a  cake .
Tamara  faye  LaValley Bakker Messner  (  March 7 ,  1942  – July 20 , 2007 ) was an American Christian singer  ,  evangelist  ,  entrepreneur , author , talk  दिखाएँ  host  ,   और  television personality .
She was married from  1961  to  1992   to  televangelist , and  बाद  convicted  felon  , Jim Bakker .
वो  co-hosted  साथ  him on The PTL  क्लबों   (  1976–1987 ) .
वो  was a participant in the 2004 season  of  the  वास्तविकता  show The  surreal  Life  .
cambria  is a village in Columbia  काउंटी   ,   विस्कॉन्सिन  , United States .
The population  थी  767 at  the  2010  जनसांख्यिकी  .
It  is  part  of  the  मैडिसन   महानगर  Statistical Area  .
Public  नीति  is the  principled  guide to  कार्रवाई   लिया  by the  प्रशासनिक   कार्यपालिका  branches of the state with regard to  a  class  of  issues  in  a manner consistent  साथ  law  और  institutional customs .
In general , the foundation is the pertinent national  और  substantial constitutional  विधि  and implementing legislation such as the US Federal  कोड   .
Further substrates  शामिल  both  न्यायिक  interpretations and  regulations  which are generally authorized by legislation .
Other  विद्वानों   define  it as a system of  ``  courses of action , regulatory measures , laws  ,  and  funding   प्राथमिकताएं  concerning a  दिए  topic  promulgated  by a  सरकारी  entity  or  its  प्रतिनिधि  .  ''
Public  नीति  is commonly embodied ``  in  constitutions , legislative acts  ,   और   न्यायिक   निर्णय   .  ''
In the United States ,  इस  concept refers not only  to  the result of policies , but more broadly  to  the decision-making and analysis  of  governmental decisions .
As an academic  अनुशासन  ,  पब्लिक  policy is studied  by  professors  और  students at public  नीति  schools  of  major universities throughout the country .
The U.S. professional  संघ   of  public policy  practitioners  , researchers , scholars , and  विद्यार्थी  is  the  Association  लिये   पब्लिक   नीति   विश्लेषण  and Management .
पाचन   is  the  mechanical  and chemical  विश्लेषण  of food into  छोटी  components  कि  are more easily absorbed  into   a  blood stream ,  लिये  instance .
Digestion is a form of catabolism  :   a   विश्लेषण  of large food  अणुओं  to  छोटी   ones  .
When food enters the  मुँह  , digestion  of   the  food  starts   by  the action  of  mastication , a  रूप  of mechanical digestion  ,  and the wetting  सम्पर्क   of  saliva .
Saliva , a  द्रव   स्रावित  by  the  salivary glands , contains salivary amylase ,  an  enzyme  जिससे   starts  the  पाचन  of starch in the food  .
After undergoing mastication and starch digestion , the food will be  in  the  रूप  of a small , round slurry mass called a bolus .
It  होगा   तब  travel down the  ग्रासनाल  and  into   the  stomach by the action of peristalsis .
Gastric juice in the stomach starts  प्रोटीन  digestion .
gastric  juice  मुख्यतः  contains hydrochloric acid and pepsin  .
as  these two chemicals  may   क्षति  the  पेट   वॉल  , mucus is secreted by  the  stomach ,  providing  a slimy  परत  that acts as a shield  विरूद्ध   the  damaging  प्रभाव  of the chemicals .
at  the same time protein  पाचन  is  occurring  , mechanical mixing occurs by  peristalsis  , which are waves of muscular contractions that move  साथ  the stomach  वॉल   .
इस   allows  the mass of food to  further  mix with the digestive enzymes .
After some  समय  ( typically an hour or two  in  humans  ,  4–6  घंटों   in  dogs  ,   somewhat  shorter duration in house cats ) , the resulting thick liquid is  पुकारा   chyme   .
When the  pyloric  sphincter valve  opens   ,  chyme enters the duodenum where it  mixes  with digestive  एंजाइमों  from  the  pancreas  ,   और  then passes through the small intestine ,  in  which digestion continues .
When  the   chyme   is  fully  पचता   ,   it  is absorbed  into  the blood  .
95 % of  अवशोषण  of nutrients occurs in  the  small intestine .
जल  and minerals are reabsorbed back into  the   रक्त   in   the  colon (  विशाल  intestine ) where the pH  is  slightly acidic  परिचय  5.6 ~ 6.9 .
Some vitamins ,  ऐसे  as  biotin  and vitamin K (  k2mk7  )  उत्पादित  by bacteria in the  कोलन  are also absorbed into the blood  in   the  colon .
बर्बाद  material is  eliminated  from the  मलाशय  during defecation  .
Henry VIII ( 28 June 1491  –  28 January 1547  )  was  किंग   of  England  इससे   21   अप्रैल  1509 until his death .
he  was lord , and  बाद  king  ,  of  आयरलैंड  , as well as  continuing  the nominal claim by the English monarchs to the Kingdom of  फ़्रांस   .
Henry  थी  the second monarch of the Tudor dynasty ,  succeeding  his  पिता  , Henry VII .
Besides his six marriages  ,  Henry VIII is known for  उसके  role in  the  separation of the  गिरिजाघर   of  England from  the  Roman  कैथोलिक  Church .
हेनरी   's   struggles  with Rome led  to  the separation of  the   गिरिजाघर  of England  इससे   papal   प्राधिकार   ,   the  Dissolution of  the  Monasteries ,  और  his own  स्थापना   as  the  परम्   सिर  of the  गिरिजाघर  of  इंग्लैण्ड  .
yet  he remained  a  believer in core Catholic  theological  teachings  ,   भी  after his  excommunication  from the  रोमन   कैथोलिक   गिरिजाघर  .
Henry oversaw the  विधिक  union of  इंग्लैण्ड   और  Wales with the Laws  in  Wales Acts  1535  and 1542 .
In 1513 ,  the   नई  king allied  साथ  the  पावन   रोमन  Emperor , Maximillian  i   ,  and  invaded   फ़्रांस   in  1513  साथ  a  विशाल  ,  well-equipped  army , but achieved  छोटी  at  a  considerable financial cost .
maximillian  , for  उसके  part ,  प्रयुक्त  the English invasion to his own ends ,  और  this prejudiced England 's  क्षमता  to defeat the  फ्रेंच  .
This foray  होता   prove  the  प्रारंभ  of an obsession for  हेनरी  ,  जो  invaded again in 1544 .
This  समय  ,  हेनरी  's forces captured the important city of Boulogne  ,  but  again  the Holy  रोमन  Emperor , Charles  v  ,  समर्थित   हेनरी  only as long as he  needed   to  and  इंग्लैण्ड  , strained by the enormous cost  of   the  war  ,  ransomed the city  वापस   लिये  peace .
His  contemporaries  considered Henry  in  his prime  to  be an attractive  ,  educated and accomplished king ,  और   he  has been described  as   ``  one of the most charismatic  शासकों  to sit  on  the English  सिंहासन   ''   .
besides  ruling with absolute power ,  he  also  सगाई  himself as an  लेखक  and  composer   .
His desire to  provide   इंग्लैण्ड  with a male heir – which  stemmed   partly   इससे  personal vanity  और  partly because he believed  a  daughter would be  असमर्थ  to  consolidate   the  Tudor dynasty  और   the  fragile peace that  existed   following  the Wars of the  गुलाब  –  led  to  the  two things for  जिससे   हेनरी  is most remembered  :  his  छह  marriages  और  the English  reformation  .
Henry  became   रुग्ण  obese and his health suffered , contributing to  उसके   मौत  in 1547 .
He is frequently  characterised  in  उसके  later life as a lustful , egotistical , harsh ,  और  insecure king .
Bongos ( Spanish  :  bongó ) are  an   afro-cuban  percussion instrument .
the   ड्रम  are of  अलग  size : the  larger  drum  is  called in Spanish the  hembra  (  मादा  ) and  the  smaller the macho (  पुरूष  ) .
They are membranophones , or instruments that  बनाएँ  sound  by  a vibration of a  stretched  membrane  .
Different religious groups  शामिल  different  किताबे  in their  biblical  canons , in varying orders  ,  and sometimes  divide  or combine books  ,   or  incorporate  अतिरिक्त   सामग्री  into canonical books .
ईसाई  Bibles  दायरा   इससे  the  sixty-six   किताबे   of   the  Protestant  canon  to  the  eighty-one books of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo  गिरिजाघर  canon .
The Hebrew Bible  ,  or Tanakh , contains  twenty-four  books  विभाजित  into three parts  ;  the five books of  the  Torah ( ``  शिक्षण   ''   or  `` law ''  )   ,   the  Nevi'im ( `` prophets  ''  ) , and the Ketuvim (  ``  writings  ''  ) .
the  first part of Christian Bibles  is  the Old Testament  ,   जिससे  contains  ,  at minimum , the twenty-four books  of  the Hebrew Bible  विभाजित  into  thirty-nine  books and ordered  differently  from the Hebrew  बाइबल  .
The Catholic Church  और  Eastern Christian churches also hold certain deuterocanonical books and passages to be part of the Old Testament canon .
the  second part is the New  वसीयत  , containing  twenty-seven   किताबे  ; the  चार  Canonical gospels  ,  Acts  of  the Apostles , twenty-one Epistles or letters and  the  Book of Revelation .
the  Eastern Orthodox , Oriental Orthodox and Eastern Catholic churches may have minor differences in their lists of  स्वीकृत   किताबे  .
the  list given  यहाँ  for  ये   चर्च  is the most inclusive  :  if at  तनिक  one Eastern  गिरिजाघर   स्वीकृत  the  किताब   it  is  शामिल  here .
the   नेशनल  flag  of  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  of America  ,  often  बस  referred to as the American flag , consists of thirteen equal  आड़ा  stripes of red ( top  और  bottom  )  alternating  साथ  white , with a blue  आयताकार  in the canton (  referred  to  specifically  as the ``  संघ  '' )  bearing  fifty small , white , five-pointed  सितारों  arranged in  नौ  offset  आड़ा  rows  of   छह   सितारों  ( top and bottom ) alternating with rows of  पाँच  stars  .
The  50  stars  on  the flag represent the 50 states of the  संयुक्त  States of America and the 13 stripes represent the thirteen  अंग्रेजों  colonies  कि   घोषित  independence from the Kingdom  of  Great Britain and became the first states in the  संघ  .
Nicknames for the flag  शामिल  the  ``   सितारों  and Stripes '' ,  ``   बूढ़ा  Glory `` ,  और   ``   the   star-spangled  Banner . ''
dred  Scott v.  sandford  ,  ,   भी   ज्ञात  as the  dred  Scott Decision , was a landmark decision by  the  U.S.  परम्  Court .
It made two  प्रमुख  rulings .
The  पहला  ruling was  कि  African-Americans were not citizens  ,   और   इसलिए   था  no standing to sue in  संघीय  court .
The  दूसरी  ruling was that the federal government  था  no power  to  regulate slavery in any  territory   acquired  subsequent to the creation  of   the  United States .
Given the  पहला  ruling , most  विद्वानों  and many  समकालीन  political figures (  सहित  the leadership of the then-new  रिपब्लिकन  Party ) considered that the second  सत्ताधारी  was not  बाइंडिंग   यही   ,  but mere dictum .
the   युक्तिसंगत  of the  परम्  Court regarding  the  jurisdictional ruling implied that  लोगों  of  अफ़्रीकी  descent (  दोनो   स्लेव  and free ) were  नहीं  protected by the  संविधान  and were  नहीं  U.S. citizens .
Since passage  of   the   14th   amendment  to  the  U.S.  संविधान  ,  दोनो  rulings  हैं   superseded  and no longer valid precedent .
Nonetheless , the case  retains  historical significance as it is widely regarded  as  the  worst  decision ever made  by   the  Supreme  अदालत  .
The  राय  of the court , written  by  Chief  इंसाफ  Roger  B.   taney  ,  stirred   बहस   .
The decision was  7–2  ,  और   प्रत्येक  Justice besides Taney wrote a  पृथक   concurrence  or dissent .
For  the  first time since Marbury v. Madison  ,  the  अदालत  held an Act of  कॉंग्रेस  to  be  unconstitutional  .
Dred Scott ,  an  African-American slave , had asked  a  United States Circuit Court to award him his freedom because  he   और  his master had resided in a state  (  Illinois ) and  a   territory   (  Wisconsin  territory  ) where  गुलामी  had been banned .
Chief Justice  रोजर  Taney ,  लिखने  for the court ,  आयोजित   कि  Scott  ,  as a  व्यक्ति  of African ancestry  ,  was  नहीं   a  citizen of  the  United States and therefore had no  सही  to  मुकदमा   in  federal  अदालत   .
इस  holding was contrary to the practice of numerous  राज्य   at   the   समय  , particularly Free  राज्य  , where free blacks did in  फैक्ट  enjoy the rights of citizens  ,  such as  the  right to  vote   और  hold  पब्लिक  office  .
In  कया  is sometimes  माना  mere obiter dictum , the Court went on to hold that Congress had no  प्राधिकार   to  prohibit slavery in federal territories because  स्लेव  are personal property and the Fifth Amendment  to  the Constitution protects property  स्वामी   विरूद्ध  deprivation  of  their property  बगैर  due  प्रक्रम  of law .
in  reaching this decision ,  taney  had  hoped   to  settle the growing  विवाद  surrounding slavery in  the  United  राज्य   ,  but it had the opposite effect  .
The  निर्णय  was fiercely debated across  the  country , as perhaps best  सरंचनाओं  by  the  Lincoln–Douglas debates of 1858 .
Abraham Lincoln ,  the  second-ever Republican nominee for  अध्यक्ष  , was  समर्थ  to win the  अध्यक्षीय  election in 1860 ; the stopping of the further expansion  of   गुलामी  was a key Republican party plank .
the   निर्णय  played an  महत्वपूर्ण   भूमिका  in the  समय  of  राज्य   secession  and the Civil  युद्ध  , although  it  is extreme to  कह   the   निर्णय  `` caused '' the  युद्ध  .
The decision is  acknowledged  for the  influential   भूमिका  it played in altering the national political  लैंडस्केप  :  it   is  credited with launching Abraham  lincoln’s  national political career  और  ultimately allowing for his election  .
Although the Supreme  अदालत  has never explicitly overruled the Dred Scott case , the Court stated in the Slaughter-House Cases  कि  at  तनिक  one part  of  it had  already  been overruled  by  the Fourteenth  amendment   in   1868   ,  which  begins   by  stating , `` All persons born or  देशीयकृत  in the United States , and subject  to  the jurisdiction thereof ,  हैं  citizens  of   the   संयुक्त   राज्य   और   of  the State wherein they reside . ''
To which the Court noted:
The first observation  we  have to make on  इस  clause  is   ,  that it puts at  बाकी  both  the  questions  जिससे  we stated to  have  been the  विषय  of differences of  राय  .
It declares that persons may  be  citizens of the United States without regard  to   उनके  citizenship of a particular State , and it overturns the Dred Scott decision by making  सब  persons  born  within  the  United States and  विषय   to  its jurisdiction  नागरिकों  of  the  United States .
वहीँ  are dozens of neighborhoods in Columbus  ,  Ohio .
Some are  मुश्किल  to define  ,  as  वे  encompass  विशाल   क्षेत्रों   विकसित   at   अलग   times—often  with  sub-neighborhoods  within  उन्हें  .
सीमायें   can  also change based  on   लोकप्रिय  understanding of  the  area , as  खूब  as  the  whims of the  निवासियों  .

A biologist  is  a scientist who  अध्ययन  living organisms  और   उनके  relationship to  उनके  environment  .
Biologists  शामिल  in basic research  attempt  to  discover  underlying mechanisms that govern how  जीवों   कार्य  .
Biologists  शामिल  in  लागू  research  attempt  to  develop  or improve medical , industrial  or  agricultural  प्रक्रियाओं   .

आधार  jumping  इससे   a  cliff  in   a  wingsuit .
BASE jumping , also sometimes written  as  B.A.S.E . jumping ,  is  an activity where  भागीदार   जम्प  from fixed objects and use  a   पैराशूट  to break  उनके  fall  .
`` BASE ''  is  an  एक्रोनिम   कि  stands for four categories of fixed  वस्तुएँ   इससे  which one  can   जम्प   :  buildings , antennas ,  spans  ( bridges ) ,  और  earth (  cliffs  )  .
the  British Shorthair is a domesticated  बिल्ली  whose  सुविधाएँ   मेक  it a popular  नस्ल  in  बिल्ली  shows .
It has  महरूम   the   सबसे  popular breed  of   बिल्ली   पंजीकृत   by   the  UK  's  Governing Council of  the   बिल्ली   फैंसी  (  gccf  ) since 2001  ,  when  it  overtook the  पारसी  breed .
the  USA Basketball  मेन  's  वरिष्ठ  National Team , commonly known as the  संयुक्त   राज्य  men  's  national  बास्केट  team  ,  represents the  संयुक्त  States of America  in  international  मेन  's basketball .
The  यूएसए   is  the  सबसे   कामयाब   टोली  in international competition , winning medals  in  all  सत्रह  Olympic tournaments it has  डाला   ,  coming  दूर  with fourteen golds .
दो  of  इसके  gold  medal-winning  squads were inducted to  the  Naismith Memorial  बास्केट  Hall  of  Fame  as  teams  in  August 2010—the 1960 team , which  प्रदर्शित  six Hall of  famers   (   4  players , 2 coaches )  ,  and  the  1992 `` Dream  टोली  '' , featuring 14 Hall of  famers  ( 11 players , 3 coaches ) .
The United States  is   फिलहाल  ranked  पहला  in the FIBA World  rankings  .
Traditionally composed of amateur players ,  a   1989  rule  बदलें   by  FIBA  अनुमत  USA Basketball to  फ़ील्ड  teams with professional players  .
The  पहला  such  टोली  ,  ज्ञात  as the `` Dream Team '' , won  the  gold  पदक  at  the  1992  गर्मियाँ   ओलंपिक   in  Barcelona  ,  Spain  ,  playing in the  फाइनल  against  क्रोएशिया  .
With the introduction  of  professionals ,  the  team  थी  able to  चिंगारी  a second run of dominance after capturing only a bronze medal in 1988  .
A team  of  professional players competed  at   the  1994 FIBA World Championship ,  finishing   पहला   .
In 1996 , 2000 , 2008  ,  and  2012  the  यूएसए  again captured  सुनहरा  medals .
Facing  increased  competition ,  the  USA failed to win  a  medal at the 2002 FIBA  संसार  Championship , finishing sixth  .
the  2004 Summer Olympic  टोली   खोया  three games on its way to a  कांस्य   पदक  , a record that represented more  नुकसान   in   a  single year  than  the country  's  Olympic teams  था  suffered  in   सब  previous Olympiads combined  .
संकल्पित  to put an  समाप्त  to  ये  failures ,  यूएसए   बास्केट   initiated  a long-term project  aimed   at  creating better , more cohesive teams .
the  USA won its first  सात  games at the 2006 FIBA World Championship in  जापानी  before losing against Greece in the  semi-finals  ,  समाप्ति  the competition with the bronze medal  .
The  यूएसए  won  सुनहरा   दो  years later  ,  though ,  at   the   2008   गर्मियाँ   ओलंपिक  with  a  dominant performance  .
This  कामयाबी  was followed up at  the  2010 FIBA World Championship ,  जहाँ   despite   क्षेत्ररक्षण  a roster featuring  no  players from  the  2008 Olympic  टोली  , the  यूएसए  did not lose  a  single game en route to  defeating  host Turkey  लिये   the  gold medal .
The USA  जारी   इस  streak of dominance by going undefeated  और  capturing  सुनहरा  once more at the 2012  गर्मियाँ  Olympics  .

The  सुपर   कटोरी  ring is an award in the  नेशनल  Football League given to the winners of the league 's annual World Championship game , the Super Bowl .
Since  तभी  one  विंस  Lombardi  ट्रॉफी  is awarded to  the   टोली  (  स्वामित्व  ) itself , the Super Bowl ring offers a collectible  memento   लिये  the  वास्तविक  players and team members to keep  लिये   themselves  to  symbolize  the  विजय  .
