The Witch  's  Finger in  the   carlsbad   caverns
a  stalagmite ( or ;  इससे  the Greek σταλαγμίτης  -  stalagmitês  ,  from σταλαγμίας  -   stalagmias  , `` dropping  ,  trickling  ''   )   is  a type  of   speleothem  that rises from  the  floor  of  a  चूना   गुफा  due to the  टपकता  of  mineralized   समाधान   और  the deposition  of  calcium  कार्बोनेट   .
This  stalagmite  formation occurs only  अंतर्गत   निश्चित  pH  शर्तें  within  the   भूमिगत   cavern  .
The  सम्बन्धित  formation on the ceiling  of   a  cave is  ज्ञात  as a  stalactite  .
If  ये  formations grow together , the  परिणाम  is known as a  कालम   .
the   हॉल   of  Giants  in   the  Carlsbad Caverns
Stalagmites  चाहिए  normally not be touched ,  चूंकि   the   चट्टान   buildup   is  formed by minerals precipitating out of the  जल  solution onto  the  old  सतह   ;  skin  oils  can alter  the   सतह  where the  खनिज   जल  will cling , thus  affecting   the   विकास  of the  गठन  .
oils  and dirt from human  सम्पर्क   can   भी   दाग   the   गठन  and change its  रंग  permanently .
समान  structures can  भी  form  in   लावा  tubes ,  संबद्ध  with some types  of   lavacicles  ,  हालांकि  the mechanism of formation  is  very  अलग  .
stalactites  and  stalagmites   can  also form on concrete  ceilings   और  floors , although they form much more  rapidly  there than in the natural cave  पर्यावरण   .
the   largest   stalagmite   in   the  world is high  और  is located  in   the  cave of  cueva  Martin Infierno , Cuba .
in  the Zagros Mountains of south  इरान  , approximately from  the   प्राचीन  city of Bishapur  ,   in  the Shapur cave on the  चौथी  of five terraces stands the  3rd  century  ce  statue of Shapur I ,  दूसरी  ruler of  the  Sassanid Empire .
the  statue , carved from one stalagmite ,  is  nearly high .
How I Met Your Mother is  an  American  sitcom  that premiered on CBS  on   सितंबर  19 ,  2005   .
The show was created by Craig Thomas and Carter  bays   .
How I Met Your  माँ  is framed by  the  year 2030  ,  when  टेड   mosby   (   voiced  by Bob Saget ) gathers his daughter  (  Lyndsy  fonseca  ) and son (  दाउद  Henrie  )  to tell them  the  story of how he met their mother .
We flashback  to  where it  begins  in 2005 with Ted Mosby ( Josh Radnor ) as a single , 27-year-old architect living with  उसके  two best friends  इससे  Wesleyan  विश्वविद्यालयों   ,  Marshall Eriksen  (  Jason Segel ) ,  a  law  छात्र  , and  लिली  Aldrin ( Alyson Hannigan ) , a  किंडरगार्टन  teacher ,  जो  have been  डेटिंग  for almost  नौ  years when Marshall proposes .
उनके   सगाई  causes Ted  to  think  परिचय   ढूंढना  his own soul  mate  ,  much  to the disgust of  उसके   dost  Barney Stinson  (  Neil Patrick Harris )  ,  a womanizer with an unnamed corporate job .
And  यूँ  , Ted begins his  ढूंढें   लिये   उसके   पूर्ण  mate , and  meets  Robin Scherbatsky ( Cobie Smulders )  ,  whom he also befriends .
The 100th episode of How I Met  अपना   माँ  aired  on  January  11   ,  2010 .
on  December 21 , 2012 , the series was renewed for a  नवीं  season .
On January 30 , 2013  ,  it was announced that Season 9 will be its final season .
Gringo ( , ,  )  is  a  slang Spanish and  पुर्तगाली  word used  in  Ibero-America , to denote foreigners , often from the United States .
the  term can be applied  to   किसी  who  is   दरअसल  a  foreigner   ,   or  it can denote a strong association or assimilation  into  foreign ( particularly US ) society  और  culture  .
In Spanish it does  नहीं   have   a  negative  connotation  .
Roger Axtell ,  a  travel etiquette  विशेषज्ञ  , notes that `` [ t ]  he  word gringo is not necessarily a bad  शब्द  .
it  is slang but is derogatory only in its use and context .  ''
The word was  प्रयुक्त  in  स्पेन  long before it crossed the  अटलांटिक   to  denote foreign , non-native speakers  of   स्पेनी  .
The great white  शार्क  ,  carcharodon  carcharias , also known  as   the  great white  ,   श्वेत  pointer , white shark  ,  or white death , is  a  species of large lamniform shark which can be  मिला   in  the coastal  सतह  waters  of  all the major oceans .
The great white  शार्क  is mainly known for  इसके   आकार  , with the  largest  individuals known to have  approached  or exceeded in  लंबाई  , and  in  weight .
This  शार्क   पहुँच   इसके  maturity around 15 years  of  age and can have a life span of over 30 years .
the  great white shark is  arguably   the  world 's  largest  known extant  macropredatory  fish , and  is  one of the  प्राथमिक  predators  of   समुद्री  mammals .
it  is also  ज्ञात   to  prey upon a variety of other marine  पशु  , including  मछली  and seabirds  .
it  is the only known surviving  प्रजाति  of its genus  carcharodon   ,  and is ranked first  in   having  the  सबसे   हमले   on  humans .
The  आईयूसीएन  list  the  great white shark  as  a vulnerable species , while it is included in Appendix II of  cites  .
The bestselling novel  जबड़े  by Peter Benchley  और  the subsequent  ब्लॉकबस्टर  film by Steven  स्पिलबर्ग  depicted the great white  शार्क  as a `` ferocious man  भक्षक  ``  .
in  reality ,  इंसानो  are not  the   पसन्दीदा  prey of the great white shark  .
The United  राज्य  Armed Forces are the military forces of  the  United States  of   अमेरिका  .
They  consist  of the Army  ,   नेवी   ,   समुद्री  Corps ,  एयर   फ़ोर्स   ,  and Coast Guard .
The  u.S.  has  a   दमदार   परंपरा  of  civilian  control  of   the  military  .
The  अध्यक्ष   is   the  military 's  overall  head , and helps  रूप  military policy with the  u.S.  Department  of  Defense  (   dod   )  , a  संघीय   कार्यपालिका  department , acting  as  the principal organ by  जिससे  military  नीति  is carried out  .
The  dod  is headed  by  the  सचिव  of Defense  ,   जो  is a civilian and Cabinet member .
The  रक्षा  Secretary is second in  the  military 's  कड़ी  of  कमांड   ,  just below  the  President  ,  and  serves  as the  प्रिंसिपल  assistant to the  अध्यक्ष  in  सब  DoD-related matters .
To coordinate military action  साथ  diplomacy , the  अध्यक्ष   रै  an advisory National Security Council  headed  by a  नेशनल  Security Advisor  .
Both the President and Secretary  of   रक्षा  are advised by  a  seven-member Joint Chiefs  of   स्टाफ  , which includes the head of each of the Defense Department 's service branches  as  well as  the  chief of  the  National Guard Bureau  .
नेतृत्व  is provided by  the  Chairman  of   the  Joint Chiefs of Staff and  the   वाइस  Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff .
The Commandant of the Coast Guard is not  a  member of the  संयुक्त  Chiefs of  स्टाफ  .
All of the branches  कार्य  together during  परिचालन  and joint missions  ,   अंतर्गत   the  Unified  combatant  Commands , under the authority of the  सचिव   of  Defense with the exception of the  coast   गार्ड   .
The Coast Guard  जलप्रपात  under  the  administration of the Department  of  Homeland  सुरक्षा  and  receives  its  operational   आदेश  from  the  Secretary  of  Homeland Security  .
The Coast Guard may  be  transferred to  the  Department  of  the Navy by the President or Congress during a  समय  of war .
All five armed services are among the seven uniformed  सेवाएं  of  the   संयुक्त  States  ;   the   अन्य  are the U.S.  पब्लिक   स्वास्थ्य  Service Commissioned Corps and the National  oceanic  and Atmospheric Administration  commissioned  Corps .
From the  समय   of   इसके  inception , the military  निभाई   a   निर्णायक   भूमिका  in the history  of  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  .
A  भाव   of   नेशनल   एकता   और  identity  थी  forged  as   a  result  of   विजय  in the First Barbary War and the Second Barbary War .
भी   so   ,  the  संस्थापकों  were  संदिग्ध  of a permanent military  फ़ोर्स   और  not until  the  outbreak of World War  ii  did  a   विशाल  standing  फौज  become officially established  .
The  नेशनल  Security Act of 1947  ,  adopted following World  युद्ध  II and during the Cold  युद्ध  's onset , created the modern U.S.  सैन्य  framework ; the Act  मिलाया  previously Cabinet-level  विभाग   of  War  और  the  विभाग  of  the  Navy into the  नेशनल  Military Establishment ( renamed the Department  of   रक्षा  in 1949 ) , headed  by  the Secretary of Defense ; and created the Department of the  एयर  Force  और  National  सुरक्षा   परिषद   .
the   u.S.  military is one of  the  largest  militaries  in  शर्तें  of number of personnel .
it  draws its  जनशक्ति   इससे  a large  पूल  of paid  स्वयंसेवक   ;  although  conscription  has been used in the  पास्ट  in various times  of   दोनो  war and  सलाम   ,  it  रै  not been used  चूंकि   1972  .
As of 2013 , the U.S. spends about $ 554.2 billion annually to  निधि  its military  शक्तियां   ,   और   appropriates  approximately $ 88.5 billion to fund Overseas Contingency Operations .
Put  साथ  , the U.S.  constitutes  roughly 43 percent of  the  world 's military  expenditures  .
The U.S.  हथियारबंद   शक्तियां   as   a   पूरे  possess  विशाल  quantities  of  advanced and powerful equipment  ,  along with widespread placement of forces  around  the world  ,  giving them  significant  capabilities in  दोनो   रक्षा   और   शक्ति   प्रक्षेप   .
Freedom of speech  is   the   राजनैतिक  right to communicate one 's opinions and ideas using one  's   देह  and  प्रॉपर्टी  to anyone who is willing  to  receive them  .
The term  स्वतंत्रता   of  expression is sometimes  प्रयुक्त  synonymously , but includes  कोई  act  of   seeking  ,  receiving  and imparting information or ideas  ,   regardless   of   the  medium  प्रयुक्त  .
In practice ,  the  right to freedom of  वाक  is not  निरपेक्ष   in  any country and the  सही  is commonly subject to limitations  ,   as  with  मानहानि  , slander , obscenity ,  राजद्रोह   (   सहित  , for  उदाहरण  inciting ethnic hatred ) , copyright violation  ,   रहस्योद्घाटन   of  information  कि  is classified  or  otherwise  .
The right  to  freedom of expression is recognized as  a  human  सही  under Article 19  of  the  सार्वभौमिक   घोषणा   of  Human  अधिकारों  and  पहचाना  in international human rights law in  the  International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights  (  ICCPR  )   .
Article 19 of  the   iccpr  states  कि   ``  [ e ] veryone shall have the right to hold opinions without interference '' and  ``  everyone shall  have  the  सही   to   स्वतंत्रता  of expression  ;  this right  shall  include freedom to seek , receive and impart information  और   विचार  of all  kinds  ,  regardless  of  frontiers  , either orally ,  in   लिखने   or  in print , in  the  form of art , or  through   कोई  other  मीडिया  of his choice '' .
Article 19 goes on  to  say  कि  the exercise of  ये  rights carries `` special duties and responsibilities  ``   और   may  `` therefore be subject to certain  प्रतिबंध  '' when  जरुरी  `` [  f   ]  or respect of the  अधिकारों   or  reputation  of  others '' or `` [ f  ]  or the protection of national security or  of  public order ( order  पब्लिक  ) , or  of   पब्लिक  health  or  morals '' .
स्वतंत्रता  of  वाक  may be  legally   curtailed  in some religious legal  प्रणालियों  and  in  secular jurisdictions where it is found to cause religious  ठोकर  , such  as  the  अंग्रेजों   जातिगत  and  धार्मिक   द्वेष  Act  2006   .
the  Big Bang Theory  लोगो  .
the  Big  बंग  Theory is  an   अमरीकी  comedy television series  निर्मित  and executive produced by Chuck  lorre  and Bill Prady .
Like the name  of  the series itself  ,   साथ   the  exception  of  the first episode—  ''   पायलट  ''  —episode  titles of  the   बिग  Bang Theory always  प्रारंभ  with  ``   the   ''   और  resemble the name of a  वैज्ञानिक   principle  , theory or  प्रयोग   ,  whimsically referencing  a  plot  पाइंट   or  quirk .
,  133   एपीसोड  have aired .
The Big Bang  सिद्धान्त  has been  नवीनीकृत  for a seventh season .
Dwight David `` Ike ''  आइज़नहावर   (   सुनाया  , ; October 14 , 1890  –  March 28 ,  1969  ) was  the  34th President of the United States from 1953 until 1961 .
He had previously been a five-star  सामान्य  in  the  United States Army during World  युद्ध   ii  and served as Supreme Commander of the  अलाइड   शक्तियां   in  Europe ; he had responsibility  लिये  planning and supervising the  आक्रमण  of North Africa in Operation Torch in 1942–43 and the  कामयाब  invasion of France and Germany  in  1944–45 from the  पश्चिमी   सामने  .
in  1951 , he became the first  परम्   कमांडर   of   नाटो   .
Eisenhower was of Pennsylvania  डच  ancestry and was reared in a large family in  कान्सास  by  अभिभावक  with a  मजबूत   कार्य  ethic and religious background .
As  एक  of  छह  sons ,  he   थी   conditioned  by a competitive atmosphere  जिससे  instilled self-reliance .
He attended and  ग्रैजुएट   इससे  West  पाइंट   और  later  शादीशुदा   और   था  two sons .
बाद  World War II , Eisenhower served  as  Army Chief of  स्टाफ   अंतर्गत   अध्यक्ष   हैरी  S. Truman  ,   तब  assumed the post of  अध्यक्ष  at Columbia  विश्वविद्यालयों  .
Eisenhower entered  the   1952  presidential race as a Republican to counter  the   non-interventionism  of Senator Robert A.  taft  and to crusade against `` Communism , Korea and corruption ''  .
He  जीती  by a  भूस्खलन  ,  defeating  Democrat Adlai  stevenson  and  समाप्ति  two  दशकों  of  the  New  सौदे  Coalition .
In  the   पहला  year  of  his presidency ,  आइज़नहावर  deposed the leader  of  Iran  in  the 1953 Iranian coup  d'état   और  used nuclear  खतरे  to conclude  the  Korean War with China .
उसके  New Look policy  of   नाभिकीय  deterrence  दिया  priority to inexpensive nuclear weapons while  reducing  the funding for conventional military forces ; the goal was  to  keep pressure on the  सोवियत  Union and reduce  संघीय  deficits .
in  1954  ,   आइज़नहावर  first articulated the  domino   सिद्धान्त   in  his description of the threat  प्रस्तुत  by the spread of communism  .
The Congress agreed to his request in 1955 for the Formosa Resolution , which enabled him to prevent Chinese communist  आक्रामकता  against Chinese nationalists  और  established  the  U.S. policy of defending Taiwan .
When the Soviets launched Sputnik in  1957  , he  था   to  play catch-up in the  स्पेस  race .
Eisenhower forced Israel , the UK , and France to end their invasion  of  Egypt  दौरान   the  Suez Crisis  of  1956 .
In 1958 , he  भेजा  15,000 US troops to Lebanon to prevent  the  pro-Western government from  गिरना  to  a   nasser  -inspired revolution .
निकट   the   समाप्त  of  उसके   पद  ,  उसके  efforts to  नियत   up  a summit  बैठक  with  the   soviets  collapsed because of the U-2 incident .
On the domestic  सामने  ,  he   covertly   opposed  Joseph McCarthy  और   contributed   to  the  समाप्त  of McCarthyism  by  openly  invoking   the  modern expanded  संस्करण  of  कार्यपालिका  privilege  .
He  वरना  left  सबसे  political activity to his Vice President , Richard Nixon .
He  थी  a moderate conservative who continued New Deal  एजेंसियों  and expanded Social Security .
Among his  enduring  innovations  ,  he launched the Interstate Highway  प्रणाली  ; the Defense  उन्नत  Research Projects Agency ( DARPA  )  , which  led  to the internet ,  among  many  invaluable  outputs ;  the   नेशनल  Aeronautics and Space Administration (  नासा  )  ,  driving peaceful discovery in  स्पेस  ;  the  establishment of strong science education via  the  National  रक्षा   शिक्षा  Act ; and encouraging peaceful use of  नाभिकीय  power via amendments to the  परमाणु  Energy Act .
In social policy , he  भेजा   संघीय   सैनिकों  to  छोटी  Rock , Arkansas  ,  for the first  समय   चूंकि  Reconstruction to enforce federal  अदालत   आदेश   to   desegregate  public schools .
He also  हस्ताक्षरित  civil rights legislation in  1957  and 1960  to   protect  the  सही  to vote .
He implemented desegregation of  the  armed  शक्तियां  in two years and made  पाँच  appointments to the Supreme Court .
He  थी  the first term-limited president in accordance with  the  22nd Amendment .
Eisenhower  's   दो  terms were peaceful ones  लिये  the most part and  देखी  considerable  आर्थिक  prosperity except for a sharp  मंदी  in 1958–59 .
आइज़नहावर  is often ranked highly among the U.S. Presidents .
Air Force One is the  आधिकारिक  air traffic  कंट्रोल  call  चिह्न  of a United States Air Force  वायुयान  carrying the President of  the   संयुक्त   राज्य   .
In  आम   parlance  the term refers  to  those  एयर   फ़ोर्स  aircraft specifically  designed   ,  built , and used  लिये   the  purpose  of   transporting  the president  .
the  Presidential  वायुयान   is   a   prominent  symbol  of  the American  प्रेसिडेंसी  and  इसके  power .
the  idea  of  designating specific military aircraft to transport  the  President arose  in  1943 , when officials of  the  United  राज्य   फौज  Air Forces  –  the predecessor to  the  U.S. Air  फ़ोर्स  – became concerned  साथ  relying on commercial  एयरलाइंस   to  transport the President .
A  c-87   मुक्तिवादी  Express was reconfigured for use as a  अध्यक्षीय  transport ; however , it  थी   अस्वीकृत  by the Secret Service amid  चिंताएं   over  the aircraft 's safety record .
a  C-54 Skymaster  थी  then  परिवर्तित  for presidential use  ;  this aircraft ,  उतावले  the Sacred Cow , transported President Franklin D.  रूज़वेल्ट  to the Yalta  सम्मेलन   in  February 1945 ,  और  was  subsequently  used for another two years  by  President  हैरी  S. Truman .
The  ``  Air  फ़ोर्स   एक   ''  call sign  थी  created  बाद  a 1953 incident during which  a  flight carrying President Dwight D. Eisenhower entered the same airspace as  a   वाणिज्यिक   एयरलाइन   उड़ान  using the same call sign .
Several aircraft have been  प्रयुक्त   as  Air  फ़ोर्स  One since the  सृष्टि  of the presidential fleet ,  सहित   दो   बोइंग  707s introduced in the 1960s and 1970s , respectively ; since  1990  ,  the   अध्यक्षीय  fleet has consisted of two  बोइंग  VC-25As – specifically  विन्यस्त  ,  अत्यधिक  customized Boeing  747-200b   श्रेणी  aircraft .
the  Air  फ़ोर्स   is  looking  into  replacing  the  two  vc-25  aircraft with three replacement aircraft beginning in 2017 .
a  wedding anniversary is the  वर्षगांठ  of  the  date a wedding took place .
Traditional names  मौजूद   लिये  most  of  them  :  for instance  ,  50 years of marriage is called  a  `` golden wedding  वर्षगांठ  ''  or   बस  a `` golden anniversary ''  .
A  स्कैनर  with Duplexing  स्वचालित  Document  फीडर   .
In multifunction  or   all-in-one  printers  ,  fax machines ,  photocopiers  and  scanners  , an  स्वचालित  document  फीडर   or   adf  is  a   विशेषता  which takes several pages and feeds the paper  एक  page at a time into a  स्कैनर  or copier ,  allowing  the user to scan ,  और  thereby copy , print , or  फैक्स  ,  multiple-page  documents without having  to  manually replace each page .
Most copiers allow  स्कैनिंग  on  the  flatbed  or  platen ( the  ``  glass  ''  ) or  through   a  document feeder .
The  विशाल  majority of  फैक्स  machines  have   an   adf  , allowing the unattended sending of  multi-page   faxes  .
Due to  the  ubiquity of ADF in fax machines , some fax machine owners  उपयोग  the fax machine as a scanner ,  faxing  multi-page documents to themselves  .
दस्तावेज़   feeders  are  वर्णित   by  speed , in pages per  मिनट  or ppm ,  और  capacity  ,  usually in a  दायरा  from 10  चादरें  to 200 .
वहीँ   हैं  two kinds  of  document feeders capable of  two-sided  ( duplex ) scanning  :  a  reversing  automatic  दस्तावेज़  feeder or RADF scans one side of a  पेज   ,  then  flips  it  और  scans  the  other side .
A duplexing  स्वचालित  document feeder or  dadf   scans  both sides in one pass .
The advantage  of  the DADF  is   तेज़  speed  लिये  two-sided  मूल  .
RADFs  और  DADFs are rated  in  images  प्रति  minute  (  IPM ) ,  the   क्रमांक   of   पहलू  they can scan each minute .
Fair Park is a recreational and educational  जटिल  located in Dallas , Texas (  यूएसए  )  .
the  complex is registered  as   a  Dallas Landmark , National  ऐतिहासिक  Landmark and is  घर  to nine museums , six  प्रदर्शन   सुविधाएं  , a lagoon  ,  and the  largest  Ferris  व्हील   in  North America  .
Many of  the  buildings  on   the  complex were constructed  लिये   the  Texas Centennial Exposition in 1936 which drew over  छह   लाख   विज़िटर  .
Most  of   the  buildings  निर्मित   लिये  the  exposition  still survive and it is  पहचाना  as a significant  उदाहरण  of  आर्ट   डेको   वास्तुकला   .
Fair  पार्क   रै   महरूम  designated a  ग्रेट  Place in America  by  the American Planning  संघ  .
The American Planning Association ( APA )  “is  an independent , not-for-profit educational  संगठन  that provides leadership in  the   विकास  of vital  communities.”
the  Great Places in  अमरीकी  program  helps  to  celebrate  areas with “exemplary character ,  विशेषता  , and planning.”
Being designated as a  ग्रेट   प्लेस   in  America  ,   मेला  Park  थी  one of  तभी  ten cities chosen  in  2011  .
San Jose ( ; Spanish :  st.  Joseph ) is  the  third-largest city in California ,  the  tenth-largest  in  the U.S. , and the  काउंटी  seat of  सांता  Clara County which  is   स्तिथ   at  the  दक्षिणी  end of San Francisco Bay .
San  जोस  is  the  largest city within Silicon  घाटी  , which  is  a  प्रमुख   घटक   of  the greater San Francisco  खाड़ी  Area , a region of 8.4  लाख  people  और  the fifth  largest  metropolitan area ( CSA ) in the United  राज्य  .
It is  the   largest   नगर  in Northern California  .
San Jose was founded on  नवम्बर   29   ,  1777  ,   as   el  Pueblo de San José de Guadalupe  ,  the first  civilian  town  in  the  स्पेनी  colony of Nueva  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  ,  जिससे  later became Alta  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
The  नगर   परोसा   as   a   खेती  community to support Spanish  सैन्य   संस्थापना   at   सैन   फ्रांसिस्को  and  monterey  .
जब  California gained statehood in 1850 , San Jose served as its first capital .
बाद  more  than  150 years as  a  small  खेती  city , San  जोस   और  the  surrounding  Santa Clara Valley became the last  (   और  largest ) contiguous  क्षेत्रफल   of  undeveloped land surrounding  the  San Francisco Bay .
San  जोस  experienced increased demand for  आवास  from soldiers and veterans  returning   इससे  World War  ii  .
San Jose then  जारी   इसके  aggressive expansion during  the   1950s   और   1960s  by  annexing  more land area .
The rapid growth of the  high-technology   और  electronics industries further  त्वरित   the   परिवर्तन   इससे  an agricultural center  ,  to an urbanized metropolitan area .
By the 1990s  ,   सैन   जोस  's location within  the  booming local  प्रौद्योगिकी  industry earned the  नगर   इसके   उपनाम   ,  Capital of Silicon Valley .
San Jose now maintains global city status and is the largest city  in  the San Francisco Bay Area in terms of population ,  जमीन   क्षेत्रफल  ,  और  industrial development  .
The  u.S.  Census  ब्यूरो   reported  the population  of  the  नगर  to  be  945,942 as of  the   2010  Census .
As of April  2013  , the estimated population  of  San Jose was 984,000  .
San Jose , along  साथ  the Santa Clara Valley ,  अनुभवी   परिचय  half  a  century  of  spectacular suburban sprawl , with  विशेषताएँ  of  तीव्र   शहरी  similar to the Los  एंजिल्स  area of Southern  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
The city  रै  taken  definite  steps  to  avoid becoming  ``  L.A.  उत्तर  '' .
However ,  the   sprawl  in San  जोस   is   बदतर  than in Los Angeles  by  measures such as population density  और   पब्लिक  transit safety  ,  investment  ,   और   ridership  .
Europe depicted by  antwerp  cartographer Abraham  ortelius  in  1595
The history  of  Europe covers  the   लोगों  inhabiting the European  महाद्वीप  since it was  पहला  populated in prehistoric times  to   उपस्थित  , with  the  first  होमो   sapiens   arriving  between 45,000  और  25,000 BC .
the   earliest   settlers  to Prehistoric  यूरोपीय  came during  the  paleolithic  era   .
The arrival of agriculture  around  7000 BC ushered in  the   पाषाणकालीन   आयु  .
पाषाणकालीन  Europe  lasted   लिये  4000 years , overlapping with metal-using  संस्कृतियों  that gradually spread throughout the  महाद्वीप  .
Technological  अग्रिम  during the prehistoric age tended to  arrive  from  the  Middle East , spreading  धीरे  to the northwest .
कुछ  of the best-known civilizations of prehistoric Europe  यहूद  Minoan  और  Mycenaean , which flourished during the  कांस्य   आयु  until they collapsed in a short  काल  of time around 1200 BC .
The  काल  known as classical  प्राचीनता   began   साथ  the rise  of  the city-states of  प्राचीन   यूनानियों  .
Greek influence reached its zenith under the expansive empire  of  Alexander  the  Great , spreading throughout  एशिया   .
Northern and  पश्चिमी   यूरोपीय   यहूद  dominated by  the  La Tène  संस्कृति   ,  a  precursor  to  the  Celts .
Rome , a small city-state traditionally  संस्थापित   in  753 BC ,  होता   grow  to become the  रोमन   गणतंत्र  in 509  bc  and would succeed  यूनानी   संस्कृति   as   the  dominant  भूमध्यसागरीय   सभ्यता  .
The events of the rule  of  Julius Caesar  led  to  reorganization  of  the   गणतंत्र   into  the Roman  साम्राज्य  .
The empire  थी  later divided by the emperor  diocletian  into  the  Western and  पूर्वी  empires .
During the later  सालो  of the Roman  साम्राज्य  ,  the  Germanic  peoples   of  northern Europe grew in strength  और   दोहराया   हमले  led to the Fall  of  the Western  रोमन  Empire in  ad  476 ,  a  date which traditionally  marks  the end of the classical period  और  the start  of  the  मध्य  Ages .
दौरान  the Middle Ages ,  the  Eastern Roman  साम्राज्य  survived , though modern historians refer to  इस  state as the Byzantine Empire .
in  Western Europe ,  germanic   peoples   स्थानांतरित  into  स्थितियाँ  of  शक्ति  in  the  remnants of the  पूर्व   पश्चिमी   रोमन   साम्राज्य  and established kingdoms and empires of their own  .
of  all of the Germanic peoples ,  the  Franks  होता  rise to  a  position of  आधिपत्य  over western  यूरोपीय  , the  frankish  Empire reaching its peak under  शारलेमेन  around AD  800  .
Francia  थी  divided into several parts ; West Francia would  evolve  into the  किंगडम  of France , while East Francia would  evolve   into  the Holy Roman Empire , a precursor to  आधुनिक  Germany  .
The  अंग्रेजों   isles   यहूद   the  site of  अनेक  large-scale migrations  .
Native  सेल्टिक  peoples had been marginalized during the  काल  of Roman Britain , and when the Romans  abandoned  the British Isles  दौरान  the 400s , waves of Germanic Anglo-Saxons  migrated  to southern  ब्रिटेन  and established a series of  क्षुद्र  kingdoms in  कया  would eventually develop into the  किंगडम  of England by  ad   927  .
दौरान  this  काल  , the Kingdom of Poland  और  Kingdom of Hungary  (   1000–1945  )  यहूद  organized  as  well  .
the  Viking  आयु  , a  काल  of  migrations   of  Scandinavian  peoples  , dominated the period from  the  late 700s  to  the  मध्य   1000s  .
Chief among the Viking states was the Empire of  cnut  the Great , a Danish  नेता   जो  would become king of England  ,  Denmark  ,   और   नार्वे  .
The Normans ,  a   viking   लोगों  who  settled  in  उत्तरी  France and founded  the   duchy  of  normandy   ,  would have a significant  प्रभाव  on many parts of Europe  ,   इससे  the  नॉर्मन   conquest  of  इंग्लैण्ड  to Southern  इटली  and Sicily  .
Another  scandinavian  people , the Rus  '  people  ,   होता   go  on to  मिला  Kievan Rus '  ,   an  early  राज्य  which was a precursor for the  आधुनिक  country of Russia .
As the Viking  आयु  drew to  a   बंद  , the period  ज्ञात   as  the  क्रूसेड   ,  a  श्रेणी  of religiously-motivated military expeditions originally intended  to  bring the Levant back into Christian rule , began .
Several Crusader  राज्य   यहूद  founded  in  the eastern Mediterranean .
These were  सब  short-lived  .
The Crusaders would have  a  profound impact  on   अनेक   भाग  of Europe  .
Their  बोरी  of  कुस्तुंतुनिया   in   1204  brought an abrupt end to the Byzantine  साम्राज्य  .
Extinct  श्वान  breeds is a compilation  of  dog breeds  कि  have become extinct .
Wii  बोलो  is  a  microphone  accessory   लिये  Nintendo 's Wii video  खेल  console .
Connected to  the  console via USB , the device  can   be  placed near the video  प्रदर्शक  , allowing voice chat to be conducted with  the  entire room .
the  device features an LED to  indicate   जब   the   माइक्रोफोन  is  क्रियाशील   .
Wii Speak  थी  announced at  निन्टेंडो   's  2008 E3 media briefing .
It was  released   separately   और  bundled with  एनिमल   क्रासिंग  :  नगर  Folk  on  November  16  ,  2008   ,  in North America  ,   और  was released on December 5 , 2008  ,  in Europe .
the  Wii Speak accessory is succeeded by the  अंतःस्थापित   माइक्रोफोन  on the  वी   u  's  gamepad  controller .
निसान  Intelligent  key®
A  smart  key is an electronic access  और   प्राधिकरण   प्रणाली   जिससे   is  available as  an   विकल्प  or  मानक  in several  गाड़ियाँ   .
it  was first developed by  siemens   in   the   mid-1990s  and introduced by Mercedes-Benz under the name ``  keyless  Go  ''  in 1998 on  the   w220   s-class  following its  डिज़ाइन  patent filed  by  Daimler-Benz  on  May 17  ,  1997  .
Univisión ( ) is a  spanish-language   टेलीविज़न  network in  the   संयुक्त  States .
The network is primarily dedicated  लिये   लैटिन   अमरीकी  families who reside  in  the United States .
It has  the  largest audience  of  Spanish-language television viewers in the world  according  to Nielsen ratings .
Randy Falco  ,   (   सीईओ   as  of  जून  29 , 2011 ) COO , has  महरूम  in  चार्ज  of the company since the departure of Univision Communications president and CEO Joe Uva in April 2010 .
In recent  सालो   the   संजाल   रै  reached  पैरिटी  with  the  U.S. 's five major English-language  टेलीविज़न  networks  ,  and  is  often  a  strong fifth ,  outranking  The CW  ,  with some fourth-place weekly  placings   ,   और  as of 2012 , even  पहला  place rankings for individual  कार्यक्रम   over  all five English networks due to the network 's consistent schedule of new telenovelas  सब  52 weeks of  the  year .
Univisión is headquartered in New York  ,   और  has its major studios , production facilities , and operations in  doral  , Florida , a suburb of Miami .
In  2009  , another  टेलीविज़न  studio was announced , Univision  studios  ,  to   be  built in Doral .
univision   is  available on cable and satellite  in   सबसे  of the country , with  लोकल   स्टेशन  in over 50  बाज़ार  with large  हिस्पैनिक   और  Latino populations and a national cable network  फीड  distributed in markets without either the availability or  the  demand  लिये  a locally-based station  .
सबसे  of these stations  एयर  full local news and  अन्य  local programming  in  addition to network shows ,  और  in  प्रमुख  markets such as Los Angeles ,  नई  York , and Miami the  लोकल   newscasts  carried by the  संजाल   's   owned-and-operated   स्टेशन   (  O  &  O )  स्टेशन   हैं  equally competitive with  उनके  English-language counterparts ratings-wise .
univisión  was  acquired   on  March 29 , 2007 by a consortium led by Haim  saban  's Saban  पूंजी   समूह  ( who had previously  स्वामित्व  the entity Saban Entertainment ) ,  tpg  Capital , L.P.  ,  Providence  इक्विटी  Partners  ,  Madison Dearborn Partners , and Thomas H. Lee  साझेदार  for  $  13.7  अरब  or  $  36.25 per share plus $ 1.4  अरब  in acquired debt  .
the  buyout left  the   कम्पनी  with a debt level of twelve times its  सालाना  cash flow , which was  twice  the norm in  buyouts  done over the previous two years .
Artist  's   धारणा  of a protoplanetary disk
The formation  और  of  the   सौर  System is  अनुमानित  to  have  begun 4.6 billion years ago with  the  gravitational  पतन   of  a small part of a giant molecular cloud .
Most  of  the  collapsing   द्रव्यमान  collected in  the  centre ,  forming  the Sun  ,   जबकि   the  rest flattened  into   a  protoplanetary disk  आउट  of which the  ग्रह  , moons , asteroids , and  अन्य  small Solar System bodies formed .
This widely  स्वीकृत   मॉडल  , known as the nebular hypothesis ,  थी  first developed  in   the  18th century by Emanuel Swedenborg , Immanuel Kant ,  और  Pierre-Simon  लाप्लास  .
इसके   subsequent  development has  interwoven   a   किस्में  of scientific disciplines  सहित  astronomy  ,  physics ,  भूविज्ञान  , and  ग्रहीय  science .
Since the dawn  of  the  स्पेस   आयु  in  the   1950s  and the  डिस्कवरी   of  extrasolar  ग्रह  in the 1990s  ,  the model has  महरूम  both  challenged  and  परिष्कृत  to account for new  observations  .
The  सौर  System has evolved considerably  चूंकि   इसके  initial formation .
Many moons have formed from circling  discs  of gas and  धूल   around  their parent planets ,  जबकि  other moons are thought  to  have formed  independently  and  बाद   महरूम   captured  by their planets .
Still others  ,  as the  धरती   's  Moon , may be the  परिणाम   of   दानव  collisions  .
टक्करों  between bodies have occurred  continually   up  to the present day and have  महरूम   सेंट्रल  to the evolution of the Solar System .
The positions of the  ग्रह   प्रायः  shifted  ,  and planets have switched  स्थान  .
This planetary migration is now thought to have  महरूम  responsible for  much   of  the  सौर  System 's  जल्दी  evolution .
in  roughly  5   अरब  years , the Sun will cool and expand outward many times its current diameter  (   बनने  a  रेड   दानव   )   ,   पहले  casting off  इसके  outer  परतों  as a planetary nebula and leaving  पीछे   a   तारकीय  remnant  ज्ञात  as a white dwarf .
In the far distant future ,  the  gravity of  गुजर   सितारों  will gradually reduce  the   सूर्य  's retinue of  ग्रह  .
Some planets will be destroyed , others ejected into  अंतरतारकीय  space  .
Ultimately , over the course of tens of  अरबों   of  years ,  it  is likely that the Sun will be left with none of  the  original bodies in  कक्षा  around it .
The Trial ( Kafka  's  original German title : , later as ,  और   )   is  a  अनोखा  written by Franz Kafka in  1914  and 1915 but not  प्रकाशित  until 1925 .
One  of  Kafka 's best-known  works  ,  it  tells  the  story of a man arrested  और  prosecuted  by  a remote ,  अभिगम्य  authority ,  साथ  the nature  of  his crime revealed to  neither  him nor the reader .
Like Kafka 's  अन्य  novels  ,  The Trial was never  समाप्त  , although  it  does include  a  chapter which  brings  the story to an  समाप्त  .
Because of this there are certain  inconsistencies  which exist  भीतर   the  novel , such as disparities  in  timing  in  addition to other  discontinuities  in narration  .
After Kafka 's death  in   1924  his  dost  and literary executor Max Brod edited the  टेक्स्ट   लिये   प्रकाशन  by  verlag  Die  schmiede   .
the   असली  manuscript is  आयोजित   at  the  संग्रहालय  of Modern Literature  ,  Marbach am Neckar , Germany .
in  1999 , the book  थी  listed in  le  Mondes 100 Books  of  the Century  और   as   no  .  2   of  the Best German Novels of  the  Twentieth  सदी   .
Lisa  ऐनी   लोएब  ( born March 11 ,  1968   )  is an American singer-songwriter  और   अभिनेत्री  .
She launched her career in 1994 with the song , `` Stay  (  I  छूटी  You ) ``  ,  which  थी   शामिल  in the film  वास्तविकता  Bites .
She was  the  first artist  to  have a number one  सिंगल  in the United States  जबकि  not signed to  a  recording  अनुबंध  .
Her five  स्टुडियो   cds  include her major  लेबल   डेब्यू  , the gold-selling  tails   और   इसके  follow-up , the Grammy-nominated ,  gold-selling  Firecracker .
लोएब  has also worked in film  ,  television , voice-over work and  children’s   रिकार्डिंग  .
Loeb  रै  appeared in two television series ,  dweezil  & Lisa ,  a   साप्ताहिक   culinary  adventure for  the  Food Network  और  Number 1 Single  ,  a  वास्तविकता   दिखाएँ   on   the  E !
संजाल   in  2006 focused  on  her quest for love , success ,  करियर  , and family  .
उसके   children   's   म्यूज़िक  includes the albums  कैच  the Moon (  2003  )  ,   और  Camp Lisa  (   2008  )  .
Her first joint children 's book  और   एल्बम  Lisa  लोएब   's  Silly Sing-Along : The Disappointing  पैनकेक   और  Other Zany Songs was published in 2011  .
In  2010  she founded the Lisa  लोएब  Eyewear Collection ,  जिससे  is based on her own designs .
The Coat  of  arms of the  राज्य  of New Jersey includes:
A shield  साथ  three plows emblazoned , representative of  नई  Jersey  's  agricultural  परंपरा  .
A forward-facing  नाईट  's  हेल्मेट  .
A  घोड़ा  's head as  the   crest  of the helmet .
The female  आंकड़े  Liberty  और  Ceres  ,   प्रतिनिधि   of  the state 's motto ( see  अगला   मद   )  .
Liberty  is   पकड़कर  a  स्टाफ   supporting  a ``  स्वतंत्रता   कैप   ``  ; Ceres is holding  an  overflowing cornucopia  .
The streamer  at  the foot of  the  emblem  contains  the  राज्य   motto  of New  जर्सी   ,  `` Liberty and  समृद्धि  '' ,  और   the   साल  of statehood , 1776 .
It was  originally  designed by Pierre Eugene  du  Simitiere  in   1777  and was  परिवर्धित   थोड़ा  in  1928  .
The  मुहर  is the central motif  in  the flag of New Jersey  और   the  Great Seal of  the   राज्य   of  New Jersey .
The Coat of arms contains a horse 's head  .
A  हेल्मेट   प्रर्दशित  that New Jersey  governs  itself accordingly and three plows  on  a shield  referring  to the State  's  agriculture tradition , giving it the nickname `` Garden State ''  .
The  दो   देवियाँ  represent  the  State motto , ``  स्वतंत्रता   और   समृद्धि   ''  .
स्वतंत्रता  is  on  the left .
वो  is  पकड़कर   a  staff  साथ  a liberty cap on  it  ,  और  the word  स्वतंत्रता  underneath her .
The  देवी  on  the  right is Ceres , goddess of agriculture .
She is holding  a   cornucopia  with prosperity written below her .
according   to  the minutes  of   the  New  जर्सी  General Assembly for  कूच   11   ,  1896 , the date in which the Assembly officially approved the flag as  the  state emblem  ,  the buff  रंग   is  due indirectly to George  वॉशिंगटन  , who had  ordered   on  October 2 , 1779 , that the uniform coats  of   the  New  जर्सी  Continental Line be dark (  जर्सी  ) blue , with  buff  facings  .
Buff-colored facings had  जबतक   तब  been reserved only for  उसके  own uniform and those  of  other  महाद्वीपीय  generals and  उनके  aides .
Then  ,  on February 28  ,  1780 , the Continental War  अधिकारियों  in Philadelphia  निर्देशित   कि  the uniform coat facings of all regiments were to be the  वही   as  the  पृष्ठभूमि  color of  the  regiments '  राज्य  flag .
The seal  is  described in New Jersey statute Title 52  ,   §2-1:
`` We  can  Work It Out '' is  a   सोंग  by  the   बीटल्स  ,  लिखा   by  Paul McCartney and John Lennon .
It was  released   as  a `` double A-sided `` single with `` Day Tripper `` , the  पहला  time both sides of a  सिंगल  were so designated in  an  initial release .
दोनो  songs were recorded during  the   रबर  Soul sessions .
The song is an example of Lennon–McCartney  सहयोग  at a  गहराई  that happened only rarely after  वे  wrote the hit singles of 1963  .
This song , `` A Day in the Life ``  ,  `` Baby  ,  You 're a  समृद्ध   man  `` and ``  i  've Got a Feeling `` , are among the  notable  exceptions .
As a medical diagnosis , pedophilia or  paedophilia  is a psychiatric disorder in  व्यक्तियों  16 years of  आयु  or  पुरानी   typically  characterized by a primary or  विशेष  sexual interest  toward   prepubescent  children  (  generally  आयु  11  सालो   or  younger , though  विशिष्ट   निदान  criteria for the disorder extends the cut-off point for prepubescence to age 13 ) .
An adolescent who  is  16  सालो  of  आयु  or older  जरूर  be at  तनिक  five years older  than  the prepubescent child  पहले  the attraction  can   be  diagnosed as  pedophilia  .
The term has  a  range of definitions , as found in  psychiatry  , psychology ,  the   देशी  , and  विधि  enforcement .
The International Classification of Diseases (  आईसीडी   )  defines pedophilia  as  a  ``  disorder of adult personality  और  behaviour  ''  in which  वहीँ  is  a  sexual  वरीयता   लिये   children  of  prepubertal  or early  pubertal   आयु  .
According to the Diagnostic and Statistical  हस्तचालित  of Mental  विकार  (  dsm   )  , it  is  a paraphilia in  जिससे  adults or adolescents 16 years of age  or  older  have   तीव्र  and recurrent sexual  प्रेरणाएं  towards  और  fantasies about  prepubescent   children  that they have either  acted  on or which cause them distress or interpersonal difficulty  .
In popular usage  ,   pedophilia   अर्थात्   कोई  sexual interest in  children  or the act  of   चाइल्ड   यौन   गाली  , often termed  ``  pedophilic behavior  ''  .
For example , The  अमरीकी  Heritage Stedman 's Medical Dictionary states  ,  `` Pedophilia is the act or fantasy  on  the  भाग  of an adult  of  engaging in sexual activity with  a  child or  children   .  ''
इस  common  उपयोग   अनुप्रयोग  also extends to  the  sexual  ब्याज  in and sexual contact with pubescent or post-pubescent minors .
शोधकर्ताओं   सुझाएँ  that these imprecise  उपयोग  be avoided  क्युकी  although people who commit  चाइल्ड  sexual  गाली  commonly exhibit the disorder , some offenders do  नहीं  meet the clinical  निदान  standards for  pedophilia  and these standards  pertain  to prepubescents .
Additionally ,  नहीं  all pedophiles actually commit such abuse .
Pedophilia was first  formally   पहचाना   और   नामित  in the late 19th century  .
A significant  राशि  of research in the area has taken place since the 1980s  .
Although mostly documented in men , there are  भी  women who exhibit  the   विकार   ,  and  शोधकर्ताओं  assume available estimates underrepresent the  सच्चा  number of  मादा   pedophiles  .
No cure for pedophilia has been  विकसित  , but there are therapies that can reduce the incidence  of  a person committing child sexual abuse .
In  the   संयुक्त  States , following Kansas v. Hendricks , sex offenders who are diagnosed  साथ  certain  दिमागी  disorders , particularly pedophilia ,  can  be subject to  indefinite   सिविल  commitment ,  अंतर्गत  various state laws ( generically  पुकारा  SVP  कानून   )  and  the  federal Adam  वाल्श  Child Protection and  सुरक्षा   अधिनियम  of  2006  .
At present , the exact causes of pedophilia have not been conclusively  स्थापित  .
Research suggests that pedophilia may be  correlated   साथ   अनेक  different neurological abnormalities , and often  co-exists  with  अन्य   व्यक्तित्व  disorders and  मनोवैज्ञानिक  pathologies .
in  the contexts of forensic psychology and law enforcement , a  किस्में  of  typologies   have  been suggested to categorize pedophiles  according  to behavior  और   motivations   .
जूलियो   césar  Chávez ( born Julio César Chávez González  on  July 12 , 1962  )   is  a retired Mexican professional  boxer  .
Chávez is considered by many people  लिये  their sport statistics the greatest fighter  कभी  to come out of Mexico .
He is a six-time  संसार  champion in three  वज़न   विभाजन  , and for several years he was considered  एक   of   the  best pound-for-pound boxer in the  संसार  .
In a career that spanned over  25  years ,  chávez  won  पाँच   संसार  titles  in  three weight divisions :  wbc  Super Featherweight  in  1984 , WBA Lightweight  in   1987  , WBC Lightweight in 1988  ,  WBC Light  welterweight  in 1989 , IBF Light Welterweight  in   1990   ,   और   wbc  Light Welterweight in 1994  .
He holds records for most successful  लगातार   defenses  of world titles (  27  ) ,  सबसे   शीर्षक  fights (  37  ) , most title-fight  victories  ( 31 ) and he  is  after  जो   लुई   साथ  ( 23  )   लिये  most title defenses won  by  knockout  (   21  )  .
Chávez  भी   रै   the   longest   अपराजित  streak in boxing history ,  13  years .
His record was 89-0-1 going into  उसके  first loss to Frankie  रान्डेल  and had an  87  fight win streak until  उसके  ``  चित्रण   ''  with Whitaker .
Julio César  chávez  was  ज्ञात  for his  बकाया   पंचिंग  power ,  विनाशकारी  body attack ,  remarkably  strong  chin  and the relentless stalking of his opponents .
He ranks  #  24  on  ESPN 's 50  महानतम  Boxers Of All Time  .
On  दिसम्बर  7 , 2010  ,  he was inducted in  the  prestigious International Boxing Hall of  कीर्ति  for the Class  of  2011  .
he  is the  पिता  of prospect Omar Chávez and former  wbc   middleweight  Champion Julio César  chávez  , Jr  .

to   be   भेजा  to the right meant  स्लेव   मजदूर  ; to the  बाएँ  ,  the  gas chamber .

The Holocaust ( from the Greek '  :  hólos , `` whole  ''   और  kaustós , `` burnt  ''  ) also  ज्ञात  as the Shoah (  यहूदी   :  ,  hashoah  , `` catastrophe ''  ;  Yiddish : ,  churben  or Hurban , from the Hebrew  लिये  `` destruction '' ) ,  थी   the   द्रव्यमान   हत्या  or genocide of approximately six million Jews during World War  ii  ,  a  programme  of  systematic state-sponsored murder by Nazi Germany , led  by  Adolf  हिटलर  and the  नाजी  Party , throughout German-occupied territory .
of  the nine  लाख  Jews who had resided  in   यूरोपीय  before the Holocaust , approximately  two-thirds  were  मारे  .
Over one million  यहूदी  children  यहूद  killed in the Holocaust  ,  as  यहूद  approximately two million  यहूदी  women and three million  यहूदी  men  .
A network of over 40,000  सुविधाएं  in  जर्मनी  and German-occupied territory  यहूद   प्रयुक्त   to  concentrate  ,  hold ,  और   मार  Jews  और   अन्य  victims .
कुछ   विद्वानों   argue  that the  द्रव्यमान   हत्या   of  the Romani and people  साथ  disabilities should  be   शामिल   in   the   परिभाषा  , and some use the common noun ``  holocaust   ''  to  describe  other Nazi mass murders , including  those   of  Soviet prisoners of war , Polish and Soviet civilians  ,  and homosexuals .
Recent  estimates   आधारित   on  figures  प्राप्त  since  the   पतन   of   the   सोवियत  Union indicates some  टेन  to  ग्यारह  million  नागरिकों  and prisoners of war were intentionally  murdered  by the Nazi regime .
the  persecution and genocide were carried  आउट  in stages .
Various  कानून  to remove the Jews from  सिविल   समाज  ,  सबसे  prominently  the  Nuremberg Laws , were enacted in Germany years before the outbreak of World War  ii   .
Concentration  शिविरों  were established  in  which  inmates   यहूद  subjected  to  slave labor until they  died   of  exhaustion or disease  .
Where Germany conquered new territory in eastern Europe  ,  specialized units called  einsatzgruppen  murdered  यहूदियों   और  political opponents in mass shootings .
The occupiers  जरूरी  Jews and Romani  to   be  confined  in   overcrowded  ghettos before being transported by  भाड़ा   ट्रैन   to  extermination camps where ,  if   वे   बच  the  यात्रा  , most  यहूद   systematically  killed  in  gas  कक्षों  .
Every  भुजा  of Germany 's bureaucracy was involved in the logistics that led to the  genocides  , turning the Third Reich into what one Holocaust scholar  रै  called `` a  genocidal  state  ''  .
4-h   in  the United States is a youth organization administered  by  the National Institute  of   खाना   और  Agriculture of  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  Department  of  Agriculture ( USDA  )  , with  the  mission  of  `` engaging youth to reach their fullest potential while  advancing  the field of  युवावस्था   विकास   .   ''
the  name represents four personal  विकास  areas of focus for the  संगठन   :   सिर   ,  heart , hands  ,   और  health  .
The  संगठन   रै  over 6.5 million members in the  संयुक्त  States ,  इससे   आयु  five  to  twenty-one , in approximately 90,000 clubs  .
The  लक्ष्य  of 4-H is to develop citizenship , leadership ,  जिम्मेदारी  and life skills of youth through experiential learning programs  और   a  positive  युवावस्था  development approach .
Though typically thought  of  as an  agriculturally  focused organization as  a  result of its history  ,  4-H  आज   focuses  on citizenship ,  स्वस्थ  living , science , engineering , and technology programs .
Today , 4-H  और   सम्बन्धित  programs exist in over eighty  देशों   around  the  संसार   ;  the organization and administration varies from country to country  .
प्रत्येक  of these programs operates independently , but cooperatively through  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  exchanges  ,  global education  कार्यक्रम  , and  संचार  .
The 4-H motto  is  ``  to  make the  बेहतरीन  better  ''   ,  while  इसके  slogan  is  `` Learn  by  doing '' ( sometimes written as  ``  Learn  to  do by doing '' ) .
the  national  ध्वज   of  Chile ,  consists   of  two  गैरबराबरी   आड़ा   bands  of white and red and a blue square the same height as the white band  in  the canton ,  जिससे  bears a white five-pointed star in  the  center .
It  थी   अपनाया   on   18  October 1817 .
The  chilean   ध्वज  is also  ज्ञात  in  स्पेनी   as   la  Estrella Solitaria (  the  Lone Star ) .
the  star represents a guide to progress and honor  ;  blue  symbolizes  the  आसमान  and the  प्रशांत  Ocean ,  श्वेत   is  for the snow-covered Andes , and red stands for the blood  spilled  to  achieve   स्वतंत्रता  .
according  to  the   एपिक   कविता   la   araucana  , the colors were  निकला  from those  इससे  the  ध्वज   flown   by  the Mapuche during  the  Arauco War .
``  ध्वज  Day '' is  आयोजित  each year  on   the  ninth of July  to  commemorate  the   77  soldiers  जो  died in the 1882  बैटल   of   la  Concepción .
पीढी  Y , also known as  the  Millennial Generation ,  is  the  जनसांख्यिकी  cohort following  पीढी   x  .
There  हैं   no  precise  तिथियाँ  for  जब  Generation Y starts and ends  .
Commentators  उपयोग  beginning birth  तिथियाँ  from  the  latter 1970s  ,  or from the early 1980s  to   the  early  2000s   .
the  Torches of  नीरो   ,  by Henryk Siemiradzki .
According  to  Tacitus  ,   नीरो   targeted  Christians as those responsible for  the   आग  .
The  ग्रेट  Fire of Rome  (   )  was an urban fire  कि  occurred  शुरूआत   19  July  ad  64 .
Virginia ( ) , officially  the  Commonwealth of Virginia ,  is   a  U.S.  राज्य  located in  the  South  अटलांटिक   प्रदेश  of  the   संयुक्त  States .
वर्जिनिया  is nicknamed  the   ``  Old  डोमिनियन  '' and  the  `` Mother of  राष्ट्रपतियों   ''  after the eight U.S.  राष्ट्रपतियों  born  वहीँ  .
The geography  और   जलवायु   of  the  राष्ट्रमंडल   हैं   तराशा  by the  ब्लू  Ridge Mountains and the Chesapeake  खाड़ी  ,  जिससे  provide  आवास  for much  of  its flora and  fauna   .
The  पूंजी  of the Commonwealth  is  Richmond  ;  and  वर्जिनिया  Beach is the  सबसे  populous  नगर  .
फेयरफैक्स  County  is  the most populous political  subdivision  .
the  wealthiest  is   loudoun  County .
the  Commonwealth  's  population is over eight  लाख   .
the   क्षेत्रफल  's history begins with  अनेक  indigenous groups ,  सहित   the  Powhatan  .
In 1607 the London Company established the Colony of  वर्जिनिया  as the first  स्थाई  New World English colony .
स्लेव   मजदूर  and  the  land acquired  इससे  displaced Native American tribes  प्रत्येक  played a significant role  in  the colony 's  जल्दी   राजनीती   और  plantation economy .
Virginia was one of the  13  Colonies in  the   अमरीकी  Revolution and joined the Confederacy in  the  American Civil War  ,   दौरान  which Richmond was  बना  the  confederate  capital  और  Virginia 's  northwestern  counties seceded to form  the  state of  वेस्ट  Virginia .
Although the Commonwealth was under  रूढ़िवादी  single-party rule for nearly a century following Reconstruction , both  प्रमुख  national parties  हैं   प्रतिस्पर्धी   in  modern  वर्जिनिया   .
The  वर्जिनिया  General Assembly is the oldest legislature  in  the Western Hemisphere .
the  state government  रै  been repeatedly  क्रमित  most effective  by   the  Pew Center  on   the  States .
it  is unique  in   कैसा  it treats cities  और  counties equally , manages local roads , and prohibits its governors  इससे   सेवारत  consecutive terms .
Virginia 's economy has many sectors :  कृषि   in  the Shenandoah  घाटी  ;  संघीय  agencies in  उत्तरी  Virginia , including  the  headquarters  of   the  Department of Defense  और  CIA ;  और  military  सुविधाएं  in Hampton Roads ,  the  site of the region 's main  seaport   .
Virginia 's  पब्लिक  schools  और  many colleges and universities have  contributed   to  growing media and technology  सेक्टर  .
As  a   परिणाम  , computer chips  have  become the  राज्य  's leading  निर्यात  .
खिड़कियाँ  Movie  मेकर  (  formerly   ज्ञात   as   खिड़कियाँ  Live  फिल्म  Maker ,  codenamed   sundance  ) is a  फ्रीवेयर  video editing software  by  Microsoft .
it  is a part of Windows Essentials software suite and offers the ability to  बनाएँ  and edit videos as well as to  प्रकाशित  them on  skydrive  , Facebook , YouTube ,  और  Flickr .
`` Brenda  's  Got A  baby  '' is  the   सोलो  debut single by Tupac Shakur , and tenth track from his  डेब्यू   एल्बम   ,  2Pacalypse Now .
The song , which  सुविधाएँ   r  &  b  singer Dave  hollister  , is about a twelve year-old girl named Brenda  जो  lives in  a   ghetto   ,  has a baby , and is incapable  of  supporting  it  .
The song  explores  the issue  of  teen  गर्भावस्था  and  इसके   प्रभाव   on  the young  माताओं  and  उनके  families .
जैसे  many of Shakur 's songs , `` Brenda 's  मिला  a baby ''  draws   इससे  the plight of  the  impoverished .
Using  ब्रेंडा  to represent young  माताओं   in  general ,  shakur  criticises  the   कम   स्तर  of support from  the  baby  's  father ,  the   सरकारी  , and society  in  general .
shakur  wrote  the  song  जब  he read  a   समाचारपत्र  article about  a  twelve-year-old girl who  मिला   गर्भवती   इससे  her  cousin  and  ,   क्युकी  she did not  want   उसके   अभिभावक   to   जान  about the  baby  ,  फेंका   it  in  a  trash  can  .
the   आधिकारिक   लोगो  of Pokémon for its international  रिलीज  ; `` Pokémon  ''   is  short for the original  जापानी   शीर्षक   of  `` Pocket  राक्षस  '' .
is  a  media  मताधिकार  published and  स्वामित्व   by  Japanese video game company Nintendo and created by Satoshi Tajiri  in  1996 .
Originally  released   as   a  pair  of  interlinkable  खेल   लड़के  role-playing video games developed by Game Freak , Pokémon has since become the  second-most  successful and  lucrative  video  game-based   मीडिया  franchise in the  संसार   ,  behind  तभी  Nintendo 's  अपना  Mario franchise .
Pokémon  गुण   have  since been  merchandised  into anime  ,  manga  ,  trading cards , toys , books  ,   और   अन्य  media  .
The  मताधिकार  celebrated in 2006 , and , cumulative sales of  the  video games ( including home  कंसोल   संस्करण  ,  ऐसे  as the `` Pikachu  ''  Nintendo 64 ) have  पहुँचे  more than  200  million  नक़ल  .
In November 2005 , 4Kids Entertainment ,  जिससे   था  managed  the  non-game related licensing of Pokémon ,  घोषित   कि   it  had agreed not to  नवीनीकृत  the Pokémon representation agreement .
पोकीमॉन  USA Inc. ( now The Pokémon  कम्पनी   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  ) ,  a  subsidiary of  जापानी  's  पोकीमॉन  Co. , now oversees all Pokémon licensing outside of Asia .
the   नाम  Pokémon  is  the  romanized   संकुचन  of the Japanese  ब्रांड  .
The term  पोकीमॉन   ,  in addition  to  referring to  the  Pokémon franchise itself , also collectively  refers   to  the 649 fictional species that have made appearances in Pokémon media  as  of the release  of   the  fifth generation titles Pokémon Black 2 and White  2  ; with  the  upcoming releases of Pokémon X and  y   ,  6 new Pokémon have been featured  in  promotions for the games .
`` Pokémon '' is  एकसमान  in both the singular  और   बहुवचन  , as is  प्रत्येक  individual species name ; it is grammatically  सही  to say ``  एक  Pokémon '' and ``  अनेक   पोकीमॉन   ''  ,  as  well as ``  एक  Pikachu `` and ``  अनेक   pikachu  ''  .
Cover of the first edition of the publication Dada  by  Tristan Tzara ; Zurich , 1917
Dada  (   )   or  Dadaism was an art  गति  of  the  European  avant-garde  in the  जल्दी  20th century .
Many claim Dada  began  in  ज्यूरिख  , Switzerland in 1916 ,  spreading  to Berlin shortly thereafter but the height of  नई  York  दादा   थी  the year before in 1915  .
To quote Dona Budd 's The Language of Art  ज्ञान  ,  दादा  was  born  out of negative reaction  to  the horrors of World  युद्ध   i  .
This international  गति   थी  begun by a group of artist  और  poets  संबद्ध  with the  कैबरे  Voltaire in Zurich .
दादा  rejected reason and logic , prizing nonsense ,  irrationality  and intuition .
The origin  of  the  नाम  Dada is unclear ; some believe that it  is  a  nonsensical   शब्द  .
Others maintain  कि   it  originates from  the  Romanian artists Tristan Tzara and Marcel Janco 's frequent  उपयोग  of the words  da   ,  da ,  अर्थ  yes ,  यस  in the Romanian language  .
Another  सिद्धान्त   says  that the  नाम  ``  दादा  '' came  दौरान  a  बैठक  of the group when  a   पेपर  knife  stuck  into  a  French-German dictionary happened  to  point to  'डैडa   '   ,  a  फ्रेंच  word for 'hobbyhorse '  .
The movement primarily involved  विज़ुअल  arts ,  साहित्य  , poetry , art  manifestoes  , art theory  ,  theatre , and graphic design ,  और   concentrated  its  anti-war  politics through a rejection of the prevailing  मानकों   in   आर्ट  through  anti-art  cultural works .
In addition to being anti-war ,  दादा  was  भी   anti-   बुर्जुआ  and had  राजनैतिक  affinities with  the  radical  बाएँ  .
दादा  activities included  पब्लिक   महफिलों   ,  demonstrations , and publication of art/literary  जर्नल्स  ;  passionate   कवरेज  of art , politics ,  और   संस्कृति   यहूद  topics often discussed in a variety of media  .
Key  आंकड़े   in  the movement included  ह्यूगो  Ball  ,  Emmy Hennings  ,   hans   arp   ,  Raoul Hausmann , Hannah Höch  ,  Johannes Baader , Tristan Tzara ,  फ्रांसिस  Picabia  ,   रिचर्ड   huelsenbeck  , Georg Grosz , John Heartfield  ,  Marcel  duchamp  , Beatrice  लकडी   ,   कर्ट  Schwitters ,  और  Hans  रिक्टर  , among others  .
The movement influenced later styles like the  avant-garde  and downtown  म्यूज़िक  movements , and groups including surrealism , Nouveau  réalisme   ,  pop  आर्ट  and Fluxus .
Dada is the  groundwork  to abstract art  और   ध्वनि   काव्य   ,  a starting point for performance art , a prelude  to  postmodernism  ,  an influence on pop art  ,   a  celebration of antiart to be later embraced for  anarcho-political  uses in the 1960s and the  गति  that  lay  the  न्यास   लिये  Surrealism .
पहला   trophic  level  .
The  पौधे  in this image  ,  and the algae  और  phytoplankton in the lake  ,   हैं  primary producers  .
They take nutrients from the soil or the water , and manufacture their own food by  photosynthesis  , using  उर्जा  from  the  sun .
The  trophic  level  of  an organism  is  the position  it   occupies   in  a food  कड़ी  .
The  शब्द   trophic   गर्भाशयी  from the Greek τροφή  (  trophē ) referring to food  or  feeding .
a  food chain  represents  a  उत्तराधिकार  of organisms  कि   खा  another  सजीव  and are  ,  in turn ,  खाया  themselves .
The number of steps  an  organism  is  from  the  start of  the  chain is a measure of its trophic level .
Food  जंजीरों   प्रारंभ  at trophic level 1  साथ  primary producers such as plants , move to herbivores  at  level 2 , predators at  स्तर   3  and typically  समाप्त   साथ  carnivores or apex predators at level 4  or  5 .
The path  साथ  the chain  can  form  either   a  one-way  प्रवाह  ,  or  a food  ``  web  .  ''
Ecological communities with higher biodiversity form more  जटिल  trophic paths  .
Four of the most important domesticated silk  शलभ   .
Top to bottom : Bombyx mori , Hyalophora cecropia  ,  Antheraea pernyi , Samia cynthia .
From Meyers Konversations-Lexikon ( 1885-1892 )
A silk-producing raspy  क्रिकेट  .
Silk  is   a  natural protein fibre ,  कुछ  forms of which can  be   woven  into  वस्त्र  .
the  protein fibre  of   रेशा  is  रचित  mainly of fibroin and produced by certain  कीट  larvae to form cocoons  .
The best-known type  of  silk is obtained from the cocoons of the larvae  of   the  mulberry silkworm  bombyx   mori   reared   in  captivity ( sericulture ) .
The  shimmering  appearance  of  silk is due  to  the  triangular   प्रिज़्म   -like  structure of  the  silk fibre ,  जिससे  allows  रेशा   cloth   to   refract  incoming light at  अलग  angles  ,   यूँ  producing different  रंगों  .
Silks  हैं   उत्पादित  by several  अन्य   कीट  , but generally  तभी  the silk of moth  caterpillars  has been used for textile manufacturing .
वहीँ  has been  कुछ  research into other silks , which differ at  the   आणविक  level .
अनेक  silks are mainly produced by the larvae of insects  undergoing  complete metamorphosis , but some adult insects such  as  webspinners produce silk ,  और   कुछ  insects such  as   raspy  crickets produce silk throughout their lives  .
रेशा   उत्पादन  also occurs  in  Hymenoptera  (  bees ,  wasps  , and ants ) , silverfish ,  mayflies  , thrips ,  leafhoppers   ,  beetles , lacewings , fleas  ,  flies and  midges   .
Other types  of   सन्धिपाद  produce  रेशा   ,  most  notably  various arachnids such  as   मकड़ियों  ( see spider silk  )  .
लेट  Show with  दाउद  Letterman  is   an  American late-night talk  दिखाएँ  hosted  by  David Letterman on CBS  .
The  दिखाएँ  debuted on  अगस्त  30  ,   1993  , and is  उत्पादित  by  लेटरमैन   's  production company ,  विश्वव्यापी   पैंट  Incorporated .
the  show 's music  निदेशक  and  band-leader  of the  हाउस  band  ,   the  CBS  ऑर्केस्ट्रा  ,  is   पॉल  Shaffer .
the  head writer is Matt Roberts  और  the  उद्घोषक  is  एलन   kalter  .
Of the  प्रमुख   u.S.  late-night  कार्यक्रम  , Late  दिखाएँ   बाँधने   दूसरी  in cumulative average viewers over  समय  and third in number of episodes  over  time .
The  दिखाएँ   लीड  other late night shows in ad revenue with  $  271 million in 2009  .
In  सबसे  U.S. markets the  दिखाएँ   airs  at  11:35   p.m.  Eastern/Pacific  समय  , but  is   अंकित  Monday  through  Wednesday  at  4:30 p.m. ,  और   गुरुवार   at  3:30 p.m and 6:00  p.m   .
The second Thursday episode usually  airs  on Friday of that week .
In  2002  , Late  दिखाएँ   साथ   दाउद  Letterman was ranked No . 7 on TV Guide  's   50  Greatest  tv  Shows of All Time  .
CBS has a contract with Worldwide Pants to continue  the   दिखाएँ  through 2014 ; by then  ,  Letterman will surpass Johnny  कार्सन  as the longest tenured late-night  बात   दिखाएँ  host  .
The Real Housewives  of   नारंगी   काउंटी   is  an American  वास्तविकता  documentary  टेलीविज़न  program on  ब्रावो  , set  in  Orange County , California  .
it  was the first The  रियल  Housewives program in the series .
the   श्रेणी   is  a voyeuristic  dekh  into the wealthy lives of these housewives ,  as  they  दूकान   ,   मिलेंगी  plastic surgery ,  गपशप  , fight  और  live  lavishly  .
The  वित्तीय  crisis ,  the   शुरूआत  of  जिससे  coincided almost  exactly   साथ  the first  ऋतु   's  broadcast ,  रै  since trimmed  the  housewives  '   lifestyles   साथ  job losses  ,  evictions  ,  mortgage defaults ,  foreclosures  ,  और  marital stress—all recorded  in   प्रगतिशील   सीज़न  of the show .
Cyberstalking is the use  of   the   अंतरजाल  or  अन्य  electronic means  to  stalk or  harass  an individual  ,  a group of  individuals  , or an organization .
It may include the making of false accusations  or   कथन  of  फैक्ट  (  as  in defamation ) , monitoring , making  खतरे   ,  identity theft  ,   क्षति  to data or  उपकरण  , the solicitation  of   नाबालिग  for sex ,  or  gathering  सूचना  that may be used to harass  .
The definition of `` harassment ''  जरूर  meet  the  criterion that a reasonable person , in  कब्ज़ा  of the  वही  information  ,  would regard  it  as sufficient to  कारण   another   उचित  person distress .
Cyberstalking is different from spatial  or  offline stalking in that  it   occurs   through  the use  of  electronic communications technology  ऐसे  as the  अंतरजाल  .
however  , it sometimes leads to  it  , or  is  accompanied by  it  .
Both are criminal  offenses  .
Cyberstalking shares  महत्वपूर्ण  characteristics with offline stalking .
अनेक  stalkers – online or  बंद  – are motivated  by   a  desire  to  control  उनके  victims .
a  cyberstalker may be  an  online stranger or a person  जिसको   the   निशाना   knows  .
A cyberstalker may be anonymous and may solicit involvement of other  लोगों  online  जो  do not  भी  know the target .
Cyberstalking is  a  criminal  ठोकर  that  आता  into  खेल   अंतर्गत  state anti-stalking  कानून   ,   बदनामी  laws , and  उत्पीड़न   कानून  .
a  cyberstalking  conviction  can result in a restraining order ,  परिवीक्षा   ,   or  even criminal  दंड  against  the  assailant ,  सहित  jail  .
A business letter  is  usually  प्रयुक्त   जब  writing from one company to  another  , or for  पत्राचार  between such organizations  और  their customers , clients  और   अन्य  external  पार्टियों   .
The overall style  of   अक्षर   होगा   निर्भर   on  the relationship between  the   पार्टियों   चिंतित  .
वहीँ  are many  कारण  to write a business letter .
It could  be  to request direct  सूचना  or  कार्रवाई  from another  पार्टी  ,  to  order supplies from a supplier , to identify a mistake that was  वचनबद्ध   ,  to reply directly to  a   निवेदन  ,  to  apologize for a wrong  or  simply to  convey  goodwill  .
Even today , the business  अक्षर  is  स्टिल   बहुत   उपयोगी  because  it   produces  a permanent record  ,  is confidential  ,  formal and  delivers  persuasive , well-considered messages  .
Tilapia  (  )  is  the common name for nearly a hundred species  of  cichlid fish from the tilapiine cichlid tribe .
tilapia  are mainly freshwater fish , inhabiting shallow  स्ट्रीम  , ponds  ,  rivers and lakes  ,  and less commonly found living in brackish water .
Historically , they  have   महरूम  of major importance in artisan fishing  in   अफ़्रीकी  and  the  Levant ,  और  are of increasing importance in aquaculture .
Tilapia  can  become problematic invasive species in  नई  warm-water  habitats   ,   whether   deliberately  or accidentally introduced , but  generally  not  in  temperate climates due to their inability to survive in cooler  waters   नीचे   परिचय   .
Turner & Hooch is a  1989   कॉमेडी  drama  अपराधों   फिल्मी  starring Tom  हैंक्स  and Beasley the Dog as the eponymous  वर्ण  , Turner  और  Hooch  क्रमशः  .
The film  भी   सितारों  Mare Winningham  ,  Craig T. Nelson , and Reginald VelJohnson  .
It was directed by Roger  spottiswoode  ; the film was originally  slated  to be directed  by  Henry Winkler , but he was terminated due to  ``  creative differences  ''  .
It was  co-written  by  माइकल   blodgett  from  परे  the Valley of the Dolls  कीर्ति  .
Although K-9 ( with James  belushi   )   थी   released   prior  to  इस  film  (  exactly  तीन  months earlier )  ,  Turner & Hooch became more popular  और  seemingly  निष्प्रभ   इसके  greater success , even  हालांकि  K-9 had a very  समान   प्लाट   .
A pilot for a  टर्नर  &  hooch  TV  श्रेणी  was  बना   और  ran  as  a part of The Magical World of Disney  .

Adolf Hitler ( ; 20 April 1889 – 30 April  1945  ) was an Austrian  -born  German politician and the leader  of  the  नाजी  Party (  (   nsdap   )  ;  नेशनल  Socialist  जर्मनी  Workers Party ) .
He was chancellor  of   जर्मनी  from  1933  to 1945 and dictator of Nazi  जर्मनी  ( as  führer   und  Reichskanzler  )  from 1934 to 1945 .
Hitler was at the centre  of  Nazi Germany  ,  World War  ii  in Europe , and the Holocaust .
हिटलर  was a  सजा  veteran of World War I .
He joined the German Workers ' Party ( precursor of the NSDAP  )  in 1919 ,  और  became  नेता   of  the  nsdap  in  1921  .
in  1923 , he attempted a coup  d'état  in  म्यूनिख  , known as the Beer Hall Putsch .
the  failed coup  resulted  in Hitler 's imprisonment ,  दौरान  which  समय  he wrote his memoir  ,   mein  Kampf  (  My  संघर्ष   )  .
After his release in 1924 ,  हिटलर  gained popular support  by  attacking  the  Treaty of Versailles and  promoting  Pan-Germanism , antisemitism , and  anti-communism  with  charismatic  oratory and Nazi propaganda .
After his appointment as chancellor in 1933  ,  he transformed the Weimar Republic into the Third Reich , a single-party dictatorship based on the  अधिनायकवादी  and autocratic  विचारधारा  of Nazism .
Hitler 's aim was to  स्थापित  a New Order of absolute Nazi German hegemony in continental  यूरोपीय  .
To this end , his  विदेशी  and domestic policies had the  उद्देश्य   of   seizing  Lebensraum ( ``  जीना  space '' ) for the  germanic   लोगों  .
He  निर्देशित   the  rearmament of Germany and the invasion of  कैंडल  by the  wehrmacht  in September  1939   ,  resulting in the outbreak of World  युद्ध   ii  in  यूरोपीय  .
Under  हिटलर  's rule , in  1941  German  शक्तियां  and their  यूरोपीय  allies occupied most of Europe and  उत्तर   अफ़्रीकी  .
In  1943  , Germany had  महरूम  forced onto the defensive and suffered a series of escalating defeats  .
In the  फाइनल   दिनों  of  the  war , during the  बैटल  of Berlin  in  1945 ,  हिटलर  married  उसके  long-time partner ,  एवा   braun   .
on   30  April 1945 , less  than   दो   दिनों  later , the two  वचनबद्ध  suicide  to   avoid  capture by the Red  फौज   ,  and their corpses  यहूद   burned  .
हिटलर  's  आक्रामक  foreign  नीति   is  considered the main cause of the  outbreak   of  World  युद्ध  II in Europe .
His  antisemitic  policies  और  racially  प्रेरित  ideology resulted  in  the deaths of  at   तनिक  5.5 million Jews , and  लाखो  of other  लोगों  deemed  racially  inferior .
thumb
a  domain name is an  पहचान  string that defines a  फ्रेम  of  प्रशासनिक   स्वायत्तता  , authority , or control on  the  Internet .
डोमेन  names  हैं  formed  by  the rules  और  procedures of the  डोमेन  Name System ( DNS ) .
technically  ,  कोई   नाम   पंजीकृत  in the DNS is a domain name  .
Domain names are  प्रयुक्त  in  विभिन्न   नेटवर्किंग  contexts  और   application-specific   नामकरण  and addressing purposes .
In  सामान्य  ,  a  domain name represents an  अंतरजाल   प्रोटोकॉल  ( IP ) resource  ,  such  as   a  personal computer used  to  access the Internet ,  a  server computer hosting  a  web site , or the  वेब  site  itself  or any other service  communicated  via the Internet .
Domain names are organized in subordinate levels (  subdomains  ) of the DNS  रूट  domain , which is nameless .
The  first-level  set of domain names  हैं  the top-level domains  (   tlds  ) , including the  जेनेरिक  top-level domains ( gTLDs )  ,   ऐसे   as  the prominent domains  com   ,  info , net and org , and the country  कोड   top-level  domains  (   cctlds  ) .
Below these  top-level  domains in the DNS hierarchy  हैं  the second-level and  third-level  domain names that  हैं  typically open  लिये  reservation by end-users who wish  to   कनेक्ट  local  क्षेत्रफल  networks to the Internet  ,  create  अन्य   सरेआम  accessible Internet resources  or   चलाएं  web sites .
the  registration  of  these domain names is usually administered  by  domain name registrars who sell their services to the public .
A fully qualified domain name (  fqdn  ) is a  डोमेन  name that is completely  निर्दिष्ट   in  the  पदानुक्रम  of the  डीएनएस  , having no  omitted   भाग  .
Domain  names  are  प्रायः  written  in   लोअरकेस  , although labels  in   the  Domain  नाम  System  हैं   case-insensitive  .
Nitrate is a  polyatomic  ion  साथ  the molecular formula  no3−   और   a  molecular mass of 62.0049 g/mol  .   nitrates   भी  describe the organic functional  समूह   rono2  .
These nitrate esters are  a   specialized   क्लास   of  explosives .

Agriculture  is   a   प्रमुख  industry in  the  United States and the country  is  a net  निर्यातक   of  food .
As of the  पिछला  census of agriculture in  2007   ,  there were 2.2  लाख  farms , covering an area  of   ,  an average of per  फार्म   .
हालांकि   agricultural  activity occurs in most states  ,   it   is   विशेषकर  concentrated  in  the vast expanse of  चपटा   ,  arable land  ज्ञात   as   the  Great Plains  ,  which  encompasses  the  सेंट्रल  region of  the  nation .
The Mpemba effect , named after  tanzanian  student Erasto Mpemba , is  the  assertion  कि  warmer water can freeze faster  than   colder   जल   .
Although there  is  anecdotal  support  for the  प्रभाव  ,  वहीँ  is no agreement on exactly what  the  effect  is  and  अंतर्गत  what circumstances it  occurs  .
वहीँ  have been reports  of   समान  phenomena since ancient times  ,  although with insufficient  विवरण  for the claims to be replicated .
The phenomenon seems contrary  to  thermodynamics , but  a  number of possible explanations  लिये  the effect have been proposed .
Further investigations will  need   to  decide on  a  precise definition of  ``  freezing '' and  कंट्रोल  a vast number of starting parameters in order to confirm or  बताइये  the effect .
The Siamese ( , )  is   एक  of the first distinctly recognized breeds of Oriental cat .
The breed  originated  in Thailand ( formerly known as  सियाम  )  ,   जहाँ  they are  एक   of  several native breeds  और   हैं  called Wichian  mat  (  วิเชียรมาศ  , a name  अर्थ   ``  moon  डायमंड  '' ) .
In  the  20th  सदी   the  Siamese cat became one of the  सबसे  popular  breeds   in   यूरोपीय   और   उत्तर   अमेरिका  .
Quality Food  centers  ( QFC ) is a supermarket chain based in Bellevue , Washington  ,  with  64  stores in the  puget   ध्वनि  region of Washington state and in the Portland , Oregon metropolitan area .
In economics , the money supply  or  money  भण्डार  , is the  कुल  amount  of  monetary assets available in an economy  at   a  specific  समय  .
वहीँ   हैं  several  तरीके  to define `` money  ,  ''  लकिन   मानक  measures  प्रायः  include  करेंसी  in circulation and demand deposits (  जमाकर्ताओं  ' easily  पहुँचा  assets  on  the books of  वित्तीय   संस्थानों   )   .
Money supply data  हैं  recorded and  प्रकाशित   ,  usually  by   the  government or the  सेंट्रल  bank of the country .
Public and private sector  विश्लेषकों  have long  monitored   परिवर्तन  in money supply  क्युकी  of its effects  on  the price  स्तर  , inflation ,  the  exchange rate  और  the business cycle .
That  संबंध   between  money and  कीमतें  is historically associated with  the  quantity theory of money .
There is strong empirical  प्रमाण  of a  सीधा  relation between money-supply growth and  long-term  price inflation , at least  लिये  rapid increases in  the  amount of money in the economy .
कि   is  , a country such  as  Zimbabwe  जिससे  saw  रैपिड  increases in its  धन  supply also  देखी  rapid  increases   in  prices ( hyperinflation  )  .
This is one reason  लिये   the  reliance on monetary policy  as   a  means of controlling inflation .
The nature of this causal  कड़ी  is the subject of  contention  .
Some  शास्त  economists  argue   कि  the  धन  supply is endogenous ( determined by the workings  of  the  अर्थव्यवस्था   ,  not by the  सेंट्रल   बैंको  ) and that the sources of inflation must be found in  the  distributional structure of  the  economy .
In addition , those economists seeing the central bank 's control over  the  money  सप्लाई  as feeble say  कि  there  हैं  two weak links  between  the  विकास  of the money supply and  the  inflation rate .
First  ,   in  the aftermath of a recession , when  अनेक   संसाधन  are underutilized , an increase in  the   धन  supply can cause a sustained  बढ़ाएँ  in real production instead of inflation  .
Second , if  the  velocity  of  money  ,   i.e.  , the  अनुपात   between  nominal GDP  और  money supply , changes ,  an   बढ़ाएँ   in   the  money supply could have  either  no effect , an  अतिरंजित  effect ,  or  an  मनमौजी  effect on  the   विकास  of  नाममात्र  GDP .

IMAX ( an abbreviation for  चित्र  Maximum ) is a motion picture  फिल्मी  format and a set of cinema  प्रक्षेप  standards created by the Canadian  कम्पनी  IMAX Corporation  .
IMAX  रै  the  क्षमता   to  record  और   प्रदर्शक  images of  दूर   वृहद  size and resolution than  conventional  film  प्रणालियों  .
Since 2002 ,  कुछ  feature films  have   महरूम  converted  (  or upgraded )  into  IMAX format for display in  imax  theatres and some have also  महरूम   partially  shot in IMAX .
imax   is  the most widely used system  लिये  special-venue film presentations .
, there  हैं  697 IMAX theatres in 52 countries .
Today  's  Special  is   a  Canadian children 's  टेलीविज़न   दिखाएँ   उत्पादित  by Clive  vanderburgh  at  tvontario   इससे  1981 to 1987  .
it  also ran on Nickelodeon and  the  Faith and Values  channel/odyssey  ( now the Hallmark Channel  )  as well as many PBS stations throughout the  संयुक्त  States  .
