Many sequences  लिये   it  were shot at  the  Queen  गली  West and  yonge  Street store after hours  .
संविधानवाद   ,  in its most general meaning , is `` a  जटिल  of ideas  ,  attitudes  ,  and patterns  of  behavior elaborating the principle  कि  the  प्राधिकार  of government derives  इससे  and is limited by a  देह  of  आधारभूत   विधि  ''  .
A political organization is  संवैधानिक  to the  extent   कि  it  ``   contain  [ s ] institutionalized  mechanisms   of   शक्ति  control for the  सुरक्षा  of the interests and liberties of the citizenry ,  सहित  those that may be in  the  minority `` .
As described  by  political scientist and constitutional scholar David  fellman   :
An ice-cream headache ,  भी  known as brain freeze  ,   cold-stimulus  headache  ,  or  इसके  given  वैज्ञानिक  name sphenopalatine  ganglioneuralgia   (  meaning `` nerve pain  of  the sphenopalatine ganglion `` ) , is  a   रूप   of  brief cranial  पीड़ा   or  headache commonly associated with  खपत  ( particularly  जल्दी  consumption ) of  ठंडा  beverages  or   भोजन  such  as  ice cream and  बर्फ  pops .
It is  caused  by having something cold touch the roof of  the  mouth (  तालु  ) , and is believed  to  result from  a   तंत्रिका  response causing rapid constriction and swelling of blood  बरतन   or   a  ``  referring   ``  of pain from the  छत  of the  मुँह  to  the  head .
The  रेट  of intake for cold foods  रै   महरूम   पढ़ाई  as  a   contributing  factor  .
There are  लोगों  who  can   नहीं  experience `` brain freeze  ''   or  similar symptoms .
The  पद   ice-cream  headache has  महरूम  in  उपयोग  since at least 31 January  1937  , contained  in  a  जर्नल   प्रविष्टि   by  Rebecca Timbres  प्रकाशित  in the 1939 book We did n't  पूछो  Utopia : a Quaker family in Soviet  रूस  .
The first  प्रकाशित  use of the  पद  brain freeze  ,   as  it pertains  to  cold-induced headaches , was on  27  May 1991  .
``  Auld Lang Syne ''  (  : note `` s '' rather than `` z  ''   )  is a Scots poem written by Robert  burns  in 1788 and set to the  धुन  of  a  traditional folk  सोंग  (  roud  #  6294   )  .
It is well known in many countries , especially in  the   english-speaking  world ; its traditional  उपयोग   होने   to  celebrate  the  start of the  नई   साल   at  the stroke  of   मध्यरात्रि   .
by  extension  ,  it is also  सुंग  at funerals , graduations and as a  विदाई  or ending to other occasions .
The  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Boy Scout  युवावस्था  movement  ,  in many countries  ,   उपयोग   it  as a close to  jamborees   और  other  कृत्यों  .
The song 's  स्कॉट्स  title may be  अनूदित   into   अंग्रेज़ी   वस्तुतः   as  ``  बूढ़ा  long  चूंकि  ''  ,  or  अधिक   idiomatically  , `` long long ago  ''  , `` days  गए  by '' or `` old  टाइम्स   ''   .
Consequently ``  लिये  auld  लैंग   syne   ''  ,  as  it  appears  in the  पहला  line of  the  chorus , might be  loosely  translated  as  ``  लिये  ( the sake  of  ) old  टाइम्स  '' .
The  phrase  `` Auld  लैंग   syne  '' is  भी   प्रयुक्त  in  समान  poems by  रॉबर्ट  Ayton  (  1570–1638 ) ,  allan  Ramsay  (   1686–1757  ) ,  और  James Watson ( 1711  )  as  खूब  as  पुरानी  folk  गीतों   predating   burns  .
मैथ्यू  Fitt uses  the  phrase `` In the days of  auld   लैंग  syne  ''  as  the  equivalent  of   ``  Once  upon  a time ...
`` in  उसके  retelling  of  fairy tales in  the  Scots  भाषा  .
Ben Schulz , player  of   leeroy   जेनकींस  at BlizzCon 2007
leeroy  Jenkins  ,  sometimes  misspelled  Leroy Jenkins and often elongated  साथ  numerous additional letters ,  is  an Internet  मीम  named  लिये  a player character  निर्मित  by Ben Schulz in Blizzard Entertainment 's  mmorpg  , World  of  Warcraft .
the  character  became   लोकप्रिय  due  to  a video of the game that  परिचालित  around  the  Internet  .
The  घटना  has  चूंकि  spread  परे   the  boundaries  of  the  गेमिंग  community  into  other online and mainstream  मीडिया   .
ऑस्कर  Grant  थी   fatally  shot by  बार्ट   पुलिस  officer  योहानेस  Mehserle in  ओकलैंड   ,   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , United States , in the early morning hours of New Year 's Day 2009 .
Responding to reports of  a   लड़ो   on   a  crowded Bay  क्षेत्रफल  Rapid  पारगमन  train  returning  from  सैन  Francisco  ,   बार्ट  Police officers detained Oscar Grant and several other passengers on the  मंच  at the  fruitvale  BART Station .
Officer Johannes Mehserle and  another  officer  यहूद  restraining Grant ,  जो   थी  prostrate  और   allegedly  resisting arrest .
Officer Mehserle stood and  ,  according  to  witnesses , said : `` Get back ,  i  'm  gon  na tase him . ''
तब  Mehserle drew his gun and shot Grant once  in  the  वापस  ; Mehserle appeared stunned , put  उसके   हैंड्स  to his head and exclaimed , `` Oh , my God !  ''
दौरान   उसके  court  गवाही   ,  Mehserle said that Grant then exclaimed , `` You shot me !  ''
Grant  turned   आउट   to  be  निहत्थे   ;  he  थी  pronounced  मुर्दे  the next morning at Highland Hospital in Oakland .
The events were  captured   on  multiple digital video  और  cell phone  कैमरे  .
The  फुटेज   थी   disseminated  to media outlets and to various websites , where it was watched millions  of  times  .
The following  दिनों   देखी  both peaceful  और   हिंसक  protests  .
the   शूटिंग   रै  been  variously  labeled an involuntary  manslaughter   और   a  summary execution  .
on  January 13 , Alameda  काउंटी  prosecutors  चार्ज  Mehserle with murder for  the  shooting .
he  resigned his position  और  pleaded not guilty .
the  trial began  on  June 10 ,  2010   .
Michael Rains , Mehserle  's  criminal defense attorney , argued that Mehserle mistakenly shot Grant with his pistol  ,  intending to use his  तासीर  when  he   देखी   ग्रान्ट  reaching for his waistband  .
pretrial   filings  argue that  उसके  client  किया  not commit first-degree murder and asked a Los  एंजिल्स  judge to instruct the  जूरी   to  limit its deliberations to either second-degree murder  or  acquittal .
Oakland civil rights attorney  जॉन   burris   दायर   a   $   25  million  wrongful   मौत  claim  विरूद्ध   बार्ट  on behalf of Grant  's  family  .
On July 8  ,  2010 , the  जूरी  returned its verdict : Mehserle  थी   मिला  guilty  of   involuntary   manslaughter  and not guilty of second-degree murder and  voluntary   manslaughter  .
Initial protests against the ruling were peacefully organized ; looting ,  आगजनी  , destruction of  प्रॉपर्टी   ,  and small riots  broke  out after dark .
nearly   80  people  यहूद  eventually arrested .
on  Friday  ,  July 9 , 2010  ,  the U.S. Justice  विभाग  opened a civil rights case against Mehserle ; the federal government  can  prosecute him independently for the  वही  act  अंतर्गत  the separate  अधिपति   एक्सेप्शन  to  दोगुना  jeopardy .
the  Department of Justice will be working  साथ  the U.S. Attorney  's  office  in  San Francisco  और  the FBI  .
On  नवम्बर  5 , 2010 ,  mehserle   थी  sentenced to two years ,  ऋण  time served .
He served his  समय  in  the   लॉस   एंजिल्स  County Jail , occupying a private cell away from other prisoners  .
He was released on June 13 , 2011  और  is now on parole .
प्रमुख  representatives  of   the  Harlem  पुनर्जागरण  .
The  हार्लेम   पुनर्जागरण   थी  a cultural movement that spanned the 1920s .
At the  समय   ,  it  थी  known  as  the `` New  नीग्रो  Movement '' , named after the  1925  anthology by  alain   locke  .
Though it  थी  centered in  the  Harlem neighborhood  of  New York City , many French-speaking black  लेखक   इससे   अफ़्रीकी  and  caribbean  colonies who  जिया   in   पेरिस  were also influenced by the Harlem Renaissance  .
The Harlem Renaissance is unofficially recognized to have  spanned  from about  1919  until the early or mid-1930s .
Many of  इसके   विचार  lived on much longer .
The  zenith  of this ``  flowering  of  नीग्रो   साहित्य  '' , as James Weldon  जॉनसन  preferred to call the Harlem Renaissance , was placed between 1924 ( the year that  अवसर   :  A Journal  of  Negro Life hosted a  पार्टी   लिये  black writers where  अनेक  white  प्रकाशक  were in attendance ) and  1929   (   the  year of the stock  मार्केट  crash  और  the  शुरूआत   of  the Great Depression )  .

The  इतिहास  of Africa begins  साथ  the prehistory  of  Africa  और   the  emergence  of   होमो  sapiens in East Africa , continuing into the present as a patchwork of diverse  और  politically  विकासशील   स्वदेश   राज्य  .
Some early evidence of agriculture in Africa dates from 16,000 BCE  ,  and metallurgy  इससे  about  4000   bce   .
the   अंकित  history of  जल्दी  civilization arose in Egypt , and later in Nubia  ,   the  Maghreb and the Horn of  अफ़्रीकी  .
During the Middle Ages , Islam spread  through  the regions .
Crossing the Maghreb and the Sahel ,  a  major center  of  Muslim culture was Timbuktu .
Some notable  pre-colonial  states and societies in Africa include the Nok culture , Mali  साम्राज्य  , Ashanti Empire  ,  Kingdom  of  Mapungubwe , Kingdom of Sine  ,  Kingdom  of  Saloum , Kingdom of Baol  ,   किंगडम  of Zimbabwe , Kingdom of Kongo  ,  Ancient Carthage ,  numidia  ,  mauretania  , the  अकसूमी  Empire , the Ajuuraan  राज्य  and the Adal  सल्तनत   .
From  the   लेट  15th  सदी   ,  Europeans and  arabs  took slaves from West  ,  Central and Southeast Africa overseas  in  the  अफ़्रीकी   स्लेव  trade .
European colonization of  अफ़्रीकी  developed rapidly  in  the  हाथापाई  for  अफ़्रीकी  of the  लेट  19th  और  early 20th centuries .
Following  struggles   लिये  independence in many parts  of  the continent  ,  as  खूब   as   a  weakened  यूरोपीय  after the Second World War  ;  decolonization took  प्लेस  .
Africa 's history has been challenging  लिये  researchers in the field of African studies  क्युकी  of the  किल्लत   of   लिखा  sources in large parts of  sub-saharan   अफ़्रीकी  .
Scholarly techniques  ऐसे   as  the recording of oral history ,  ऐतिहासिक  linguistics  ,  archaeology  और  genetics have been crucial .
curry  Foley was the first player  in   प्रमुख  League Baseball history to hit  लिये  the  साईकिल  .
In  बेसबॉल  , hitting  लिये  the  साईकिल  is the accomplishment of one batter hitting a  सिंगल  , a double , a triple  ,  and a  घर   चलाएं   in  the same game .
Collecting the hits  in   कि  order is  ज्ञात  as a `` natural  साईकिल  '' .
Cycles are  uncommon  in Major League  बेसबॉल  ( MLB ) , and have  occurred  294 times since  the   पहला  by Curry Foley in 1882 .
The cycle is roughly as  आम   as  a  no-hitter   (   279  occurrences  in  MLB history  )   ;  it has been called `` one of  the  rarest '' and  ``  most  मुश्किल  feats ''  in  baseball .
Based on 2009 offensive levels , the probability of an average  एमएलबी  player  hitting  for  a  cycle against an  औसत  team in a game  is  approximately 0.00590 % ; this corresponds  to  about 2.5  चक्र  in a 162-game  ऋतु  with  30  teams .
In other baseball leagues , the cycle is  हासिल   कम  frequently  .
Through September 4  ,   2008  ,  62   खिलाड़ी   in  Nippon  पेशेवर  Baseball ( NPB ) , the top-level baseball organization  in  Japan , have hit for the cycle  ,  the most recent being Michihiro  ogasawara  .
दो   खिलाड़ी  have  hit  for  the  cycle on the same  दिन  once in  npb  history ; this has occurred twice in MLB history .
One  npb  player has  भी  hit for the cycle in an  npb   all-star  game .
No  खिलाड़ी  has ever  hit   लिये   the  cycle in the MLB  all-star   खेल  or  the   postseason  .
The main slave routes in  मध्यकालीन  Africa .
This article discusses systems , history , and effects of slavery  भीतर   अफ़्रीकी  .
See Arab  स्लेव  trade , Atlantic slave trade , Maafa , and  गुलामी  in  समकालीन  Africa  लिये  other discussions .
``  Slave  हस्तांतरण  in  अफ़्रीकी   ''  .
Europeans usually did  नहीं  enter the interior  regions  .
Slavery in  अफ़्रीकी  has existed throughout the continent for  अनेक   सदियां  ,  और   continues  in  the  current  दिन  .
Systems  of   servitude  and slavery were  आम  in  अनेक  parts of the  महाद्वीप  , as they  यहूद  in  much   of   the   प्राचीन   संसार  .
In most African  समाजों  where slavery was prevalent  ,  the  enslaved  people were  largely  treated as  indentured   बन्दों   और   नहीं  treated as  chattel  slaves .
जब  the Arab slave trade and Atlantic slave trade  began  ,  अनेक  of  the   लोकल  slave systems changed and began supplying captives for slave  बाज़ार  outside of  अफ़्रीकी   .
Slavery in historical Africa was practiced  in  many different forms and some of  ये  do not clearly fit the definitions of slavery  elsewhere  in the world .
Debt slavery , enslavement  of  war captives , military slavery ,  और   दण्ड   गुलामी   यहूद  all practiced in  विभिन्न  parts of Africa  .
हालांकि  there had been some trans-Saharan  व्यापार   इससे   the  interior  of  Sub-Saharan  अफ़्रीकी  to other  regions  , slavery  थी  a small  भाग  of the economic  जीवन   of  many societies in  अफ़्रीकी  until the introduction of transcontinental  स्लेव  trades ( Arab  और  Atlantic  )  .
Slave practices were again transformed with  यूरोपीय   colonization  of Africa  और  the formal abolition  of  slavery  in  the early 1900s .
Windows  कार्य  Manager is a task manager  or  System  मॉनिटर  application  शामिल   साथ  the Microsoft Windows  nt  family of operating systems that provides limited information  परिचय  computer performance  और  running applications  ,  processes and  cpu  usage , commit charge and  मेमोरी  information ,  संजाल   कार्यकलाप  and  आंकडे   ,   logged-in  users ,  और   प्रणाली  services ( and  as   प्रायः  is the  मामला  with software  टूल्स   provided   by  Microsoft  लिये  Windows  ,  3rd party software is available  जिससे  fills the  आवश्यकताएँ  more  thoroughly  , e.g  ,   ``   प्रक्रम  Explorer '' , `` Extended Task Manager '' , ``  anvir  Task Manager '' , ``  प्रक्रम  Hacker ''  ,   और  ``  प्रणाली   एक्सप्लोरर   ''  ) .
The  कार्य   मैनेजर  can also be used  to  set  प्रक्रम  priorities , processor  अपनापन  , forcibly  terminate  processes , and shut down , restart  ,   hibernate   or  log  बंद  from  खिड़कियाँ   .
Windows Task  मैनेजर   थी  introduced with Windows  nt  4.0 .
Previous versions  of  Windows  nt  included the Task List  अनुप्रयोग  , which had  दूर   कम  features .
The  कार्य  list was  सक्षम   of  listing currently running processes and killing them , or  बनाना  a new process .
In Windows XP only  ,   a  Shutdown  मेनू  is  भी  present that allows access to Standby ,  hibernate   ,   फेरे  off , Restart ,  log   बंद   और   स्विच  User .
Earlier  संस्करण  of Microsoft Windows ( Microsoft  खिड़कियाँ   3.x  , Windows 95 , Windows 98 ) had a  कार्यक्रम  known  as  tasks  to  display the programs currently running .
This file  थी  executed by running the  taskman.exe   संचिका   इससे   the  C : \Windows directory  .
The Troop is an American-Canadian live-action , single camera comedy -adventure television series about a trio of teenagers who fight and capture monsters  और  other supernatural phenomena  कि  invade the fictional  कस्बा  of Lakewood .
Created and executive produced by Max Burnett ,  ग्रेग   कूलिज  and Chris Morgan ,  the  series premiered on Nickelodeon on September 18  ,   2009  .
The  दूसरी  season premiered  on   जून  25  ,  2011 and  निकलोडियन  cancelled  the   श्रेणी  midway through it 's second season .
The remaining  एपीसोड   of  season 2 were aired on Nicktoons except the last 3..
Sparsely populated  in  relation to  इसके   क्षेत्रफल  , the  लोकतांत्रिक  Republic of the Congo (  drc  ) is  घर  to  a   विशाल  potential  of  natural resources and  खनिज  wealth ,  इसके   untapped  deposits of raw  खनिज   हैं  estimated to  be  worth  in   excess   of  US  $  24  खरब  , yet the economy of the DRC  रै   अस्वीकृत  drastically since  the  mid-1980s .
At  the   समय  of its  स्वतंत्रता  in 1960 , DRC  थी  the  दूसरी   सबसे  industrialized  देश  in Africa  बाद   दक्षिण  Africa ; it  boasted   a  thriving mining sector and its agriculture  सेक्टर   थी  relatively  उत्पादक  .
if  the  दर्शक  stares  at  this image for  20–60  seconds  और  stares at  a  white object , a  ऋणात्मक   afterimage  will appear ( in  इस  case , it will  be   क्यान  on magenta ) .
This can also be achieved  by   the   दर्शक  closing his/her eyes  और  tilting their head up .
An  afterimage  or ghost image or  चित्र   burn-in  is an optical illusion that refers to an image  continuing  to  appear  in  एक  's  दृष्टि  after the  एक्सपोज़र  to the original  चित्र  has  ceased  .
One of  the  most  आम  afterimages is the  उज्जवल  glow that seems to  फ्लैश  before one 's  आँखें  after looking into a  लाइट  source  लिये  a few seconds  .
closing  the eye  can  help  achieve  a better sense of the color in its own aspect  .
Afterimages come  in  two  फ़ॉर्म  , negative ( inverted ) and positive (  retaining  original  रंग  ) .
The process  पीछे  positive afterimages  is   अनजान   ,  though  विचार  to  be  related  to  neural adaptation  .
On  the  other hand , negative afterimages  हैं   a  retinal  घटना  and are well understood .
Lost is  an  American serial drama television  श्रेणी  that premiered  on   सितंबर   22   ,  2004 on  the  American Broadcasting Company ( ABC  )   .
the   श्रेणी  was created by J.  J.  Abrams and  डैमन  Lindelof , based  upon   an   असली  pilot  स्क्रिप्ट  titled  nowhere  written by Jeffrey Lieber .
Six seasons of the show  aired  , in addition to numerous clip shows to recap previous episodes  .
ABC  घोषित  that Lost would end after six seasons  ,  having produced  a   कुल   of  121 episodes .
The series follows the past  ,  present , and future experience  (  s  )  of the survivors  of  a  प्लेन  crash on  a  passenger jet , Oceanic  उड़ान  815 , flying from Sydney  to  Los Angeles  बाद  it crashes on  a   तीव्र   द्वीप  in the South  प्रशांत  .
The series also includes  कहानियां  of  the  lives of people already living on the island — they  शामिल  the  ``  Others `` , who initially antagonize the survivors  ,  as well as  a   समूह  of people who  arrive  on  the   freighter   kahana   .
प्रत्येक  episode typically features action on the  द्वीप  as well as a secondary storyline from another point in  a  character 's  जीवन  .
Season 6 features a  detailing  of  the  lives of the  survivors  in a  अलग  reality , as if  the   उड़ान  had never crashed .
in   the  following  सूची   ,  the term ``  प्रदर्शित  character  (  s ) '' refers to the  अक्षर   or  characters  जो  are featured in  the  secondary storyline of each  एपीसोड   .
`` No .
in  series ''  refers   to   the  episode 's  क्रमांक  in the overall  श्रेणी  , whereas `` No .
in season '' refers to the episode 's number  in  each particular season .
``  u.S.  viewers  (  million )  ''  refers to the number  of   अमेरिकी  in  लाखो  who watched  the  episode  सजीव  .
A total  of  121 episodes of Lost  यहूद  produced  ,   the   पिछला  of which aired  on  May 23 ,  2010  .
All seasons are available  on  DVD in Regions 1–4 and on Blu-ray in  regions  A and B .
Flat feet  (  also called pes planus or fallen arches )  is   a  formal reference to a  चिकित्सा  condition in which  the   मेहराब   of  the  पैर  collapses , with the entire sole of the  पैर   coming  into complete or near-complete  सम्पर्क  with the ground .
in  some  individuals  ( an estimated 20–30 % of the general  जनसांख्यिकी  ) the  मेहराब  simply never develops in  एक  foot  (   unilaterally  ) or both  फीट  (  bilaterally  )  .
Three  अध्ययन  ( see citations below in military section  )   of   सैन्य  recruits  have   दिखाया  no evidence  of  later increased  चोट  , or foot problems , due  to  flat feet  ,   in  a population of  लोगों   जो  reach military service age  बगैर  prior foot  समस्याएं   .
However ,  ये  studies can not be used to judge possible future damage from this  कंडीशन   जब  diagnosed at younger ages .
वे  also can  नहीं  be applied to persons whose  चपटा   फीट  are associated with foot symptoms  ,  or certain  लक्षण   in  other parts of  the  body  (  such as the leg  or  back ) possibly referable  to   the  foot .
Generation X ,  commonly  abbreviated  to  Gen  x  , is the generation  born   बाद  the Western post-World  युद्ध  II baby  बूम  .
Demographers  ,   इतिहासकारों   और   टीकाकारों  use  शुरूआत  birth dates from  the  early 1960s to the early 1980s .
The  पद  was popularized  by   डगलस   coupland  's 1991  अनोखा  Generation X : Tales for an  त्वरित  Culture  .
पहले  that , it had  महरूम  used for various subcultures or  countercultures   बाद  the  1950s   .
Pressure ulcers ,  भी  known  as   decubitus  ulcers  or  bedsores , are  स्थानीयकृत  injuries to the skin  and/or   underlying  tissue  प्रायः   over  a bony prominence , as a  परिणाम  of pressure  ,   or  pressure  in  combination  साथ  shear and/or  घर्षण  .
सबसे  commonly this will be the sacrum ,  coccyx   ,   एड़ियों  or the hips  ,  but other sites  ऐसे  as the elbows  ,  knees  ,   ankles  or the  वापस  of the cranium can  be   प्रभावित   .
the   कारण  of pressure  छाले  is pressure  लागू  to  नरम  tissue so that blood flow  to  the  नरम  tissue  is  completely or partially  obstructed   .
shear  is also  a  cause  ;   shear  pulls on  रक्त   बरतन  that  फीड  the skin .
Pressure ulcers most  commonly   develop   in  persons who  हैं   नहीं  moving about or  हैं  confined to  wheelchairs  .
it   is   widely  believed that  अन्य  factors can influence  the  tolerance of skin  लिये  pressure and  shear  thereby increasing  the  risk of pressure ulcer  विकास   .
These factors are protein-calorie malnutrition ,  microclimate  ( skin wetness caused  by  sweating  or  incontinence ) ,  रोगों   कि  reduce blood flow  to  the skin , such as arteriosclerosis or  रोगों  that reduce the  अहसास   in  the skin , such as paralysis or neuropathy .
the  healing  of   दबाव  ulcers may be  slowed  by  the  age of  the  person  ,  medical conditions  (  such as  arteriosclerosis  ,  मधुमेह  or infection )  ,  smoking or  medications  such  as  antiinflammatory drugs  .
Although  प्रायः  prevented and treatable  if  found early , pressure ulcers can be very difficult to prevent in  critically  ill  मरीजों   ,  frail  बड़ो  , wheelchair users ( especially  जहाँ  spinal injury is involved ) and terminally ill patients .
Primary prevention is to redistribute pressure by  turning  the patient  regularly   .
The benefit  of  turning  to  avoid further  sores  is  खूब   प्रलेखित   चूंकि  at least the 19th century .
In addition  to   turning  and  re-positioning  the patient  in  bed  or  wheelchair , eating  a   संतुलित  diet with  पर्याप्त  protein and  keeping   the  skin free from exposure to urine and  स्टूल  is very important .
The  व्यापकता  of pressure ulcers  in  hospital  जमावट  is high  ,  but improvements are being made .
According  to   the  2010 IPUP  (  International  दबाव   अल्सर   व्यापकता   सर्वेक्षण  ) conducted in Canada  ,  there  थी   a  significant  घटी   in  the overall facility-acquired prevalence  of  pressure ulcers from 2009-2010 .
Ulcers were  सबसे  commonly  पहचाना  at the sacral/coccyx ulcer  स्थान  ;  however  , heel ulcers were the  सबसे  common  facility-acquired  location  in  the  सर्वेक्षण  .
Overboard  is  a  1987  American romantic comedy film  अभिनीत  Goldie Hawn  और  Kurt Russell .
It was  निर्देशित   by   गैरी   मार्शल  , produced  by  Roddy  mcdowell  , and loosely inspired  by  the 1974 Italian film  swept  Away .
In  फेरे  , Overboard was  adapted   into  the 2006 South  कोरियाई  television series , Couple  or   ट्रबल   .
Green Bay  is   a  city in  और  the county seat  of  Brown  काउंटी   in  the  u.S.   राज्य   of   विस्कॉन्सिन  ,  स्तिथ  at  the  head of  ग्रीन  Bay ,  a  sub-basin of  झील   मिशिगन  , at the  मुँह  of the Fox  नदी  .
It has an elevation  of  above sea  स्तर  and is located  उत्तर  of Milwaukee .
The population was 104,057 at the  2010  census .
It is the third-largest city  in   the  state  of  Wisconsin  ,  after Milwaukee and Madison  .
It is also the  third-largest  city on the  वेस्ट  shore  of   झील   मिशिगन  , after Chicago and Milwaukee .
Green Bay is  घर  to the Green Bay  पैकर्स  of the National Football League  ,   बनाना  it by far the smallest metropolitan area in  the  USA to host a major  पेशेवर  sports franchise  .
ग्रीन  Bay  is   the  principal city of the Green Bay Metropolitan Statistical Area , which covers Brown , Kewaunee  ,   और  Oconto Counties  और  had a combined population of  282,599  at the 2000 census .
Green Bay  is  an  औद्योगिक  city  साथ  several meatpacking  और   पेपर  plants  ,  and a port on  ग्रीन  Bay ,  an  arm of  झील  Michigan that  स्थानीय  call the Bay of  ग्रीन  Bay , to  avoid   conflating  it  साथ  the eponymous  नगर   .
It is home  to  the  नेशनल   रेलरोड   संग्रहालय  ; the  नेविली  Public Museum ,  साथ  exhibitions of art , history ,  और  science ; and  the  University of  wisconsin–green  Bay  .
luteinizing  hormone (  lh   ,   भी  known as  lutropin  and sometimes lutrophin )  is  a  हार्मोन  produced by  gonadotroph  cells in the anterior pituitary gland .
In females , an acute rise of LH (  ``  LH  surge  '' ) triggers ovulation  और  development of  the   कॉर्पस   luteum  .
In  males  , where LH  था   भी   महरूम  called interstitial  cell-stimulating   हार्मोन  ( ICSH ) , it stimulates  leydig   कोशिका  production of testosterone .
It  अधिनियमों  synergistically with FSH  .
सेलिना  Quintanilla-Pérez  (  April 16 , 1971 –  कूच   31   ,  1995 ) , known simply as Selena  ,  was an American singer-songwriter .
She  थी  named  the  ``  शीर्ष  Latin artist  of  the  '90s  '' and `` Best selling  लैटिन  artist of  the  decade '' by Billboard for  उसके  fourteen  top-ten  singles  in  the Top  लैटिन  Songs  चार्ट   ,  including  सात  number-one hits .
Selena  था  the most  कामयाब  singles of  1994  and 1995 , `` Amor Prohibido `` and ``  no  Me  queda  Más `` .
She was called  ``  The Queen of Tejano music `` and the  मैक्सिकन  equivalent of Madonna .
Selena released her first  एल्बम  , Selena y  लॉस  Dinos , at the age  of  twelve .
She  जीती  Female Vocalist of the Year at  the  1987  tejano  Music Awards and landed a recording  अनुबंध   साथ   emi  a few years later .
उसके  fame  grew  throughout the early 1990s  ,  especially  in  Spanish-speaking countries ,  और  she had begun recording in  अंग्रेज़ी   as  well .
सेलिना   थी   murdered   at   the   आयु  of  23  on  कूच  31 , 1995 by Yolanda  saldívar  , the former president of her fan club .
on  April 12 , 1995 , two weeks after her  मौत  ,  जार्ज  W. Bush , governor of Texas at  the  time ,  घोषित  her birthday  ``   सेलिना   दिन   ''  in Texas  .
Warner  भाईs.  produced Selena  ,   a   फिल्मी   आधारित   on   उसके   जीवन  starring Jennifer Lopez  ,  in 1997 .
Selena  's  life was also  the  basis of the  musical  Selena Forever  अभिनीत  Veronica Vazquez  as   सेलिना  .
In June 2006 Selena was commemorated with a life-sized bronze statue (  mirador  de  la  Flor  in  Corpus Christi , Texas )  और  a Selena  संग्रहालय   खोली  there .
She has sold over  60  million albums  विश्वव्यापी  , making her  एक  of  the   best-selling   कलाकारों  of all time .
She  is  also the only  मादा  artist  to  have  पाँच   एल्बम   in  U.S .  बिलबोर्ड  200 at the  वही  time .
German Stahlhelm from  संसार  War II
Insignia of the Bolivian  फौज   colorados  regiment , showing a Stahlhelm and two crossed bayonets
stahlhelm  ( plural ,  stahlhelme   )  is German  लिये   ``  steel helmet ''  .
The Imperial  जर्मनी  Army began  to   बदलें  the traditional  boiled-leather  Pickelhaube ( spiked combat helmet ) with  the  Stahlhelm during World War I  in  1916 .
the   पद   stahlhelm  refers  दोनो  to a generic steel helmet  ,   और  more  specifically  to the distinctive ( and iconic )  जर्मनी   डिज़ाइन   .
the   stahlhelm  , with its distinctive `` coal scuttle `` shape ,  थी   an  instantly recognizable icon for  सैन्य  imagery and became a  आम  element  of  military propaganda on both sides ,  बस  like the  pickelhaube   पहले   it   .
Its  नाम  was also  प्रयुक्त  by the  stahlhelm   ,   a   अर्धसैनिक  nationalist  संगठन   स्थापित   at  the end  of  1918 .
Glow-in-the-dark may refer to:
Bioluminescence ,  the  production and emission  of  light by a  जीना   सजीव
Chemiluminescence ,  is   the  emission  of  light  (  luminescence ) without emission of  ऊष्मा
स्फुरदीप्ति   ,   a  specific type  of   photoluminescence  related to fluorescence
Radioluminescence , production  of   संदीप्ति   in  a  सामग्री   by  the bombardment of  आयनकारी  radiation
glow   in  the  अंधेरा  Tour , a  2008  concert tour by Kanye West
Frankfurt Airport  serves   as   a  hub city  लिये  Lufthansa and  receives  flights from Star  गठबंधन  carriers  .
Airline hubs are airports ranked as large , medium  ,   छोटी   ,  and non-hubs as  एक  of the FAA airport categories which  हैं  re-evaluated every year based on number of commercial  यात्री  .
the  more  आम  but informal use for the phrase  एयरलाइन  hub is  an  airport that  an  airline uses  as  a transfer point to get  यात्री  to their intended  गंतव्य  .
It is  भाग   of  a hub and spoke model , where  travelers   चलती  between airports not served by  सीधा  flights change planes en  रूट  to their  गंतव्यों   .
This is as  opposed   to   the   पाइंट  to Point model .
अनेक  hubs of the airlines  हैं   भी  situated  at  airports in the  शहरों  of the  संबंधित   सिर   कार्यालयों  .
Some airlines  may  use  तभी  a  सिंगल  hub , while other airlines use multiple hubs .
hubs  are  प्रयुक्त  for both  यात्री  flights as  खूब  as cargo  फ़्लाइट  .
Many  एयरलाइंस  also  उपयोग   फ़ोकस   शहरों  ,  जिससे  function much the same as hubs .
Airlines may also  उपयोग  secondary hubs  ,   a   non-technical  term for  विशाल  focus cities  .
A hub  in  the middle of a  रूट  is more effective than at either  समाप्त  as  connecting  traffic  अधिक  easily fills the plane - passengers prefer a one-stop (  two-leg  )  रूट  over a  two-stop   (   three-leg  ) route  .
Hollow Lacedaemon .
Site of  the  Menelaion  ,  the shrine to Helen  और  Menelaus constructed anciently in the Bronze Age city that stood on  the  hill of  therapne  on the left  बैंको   of   the   eurotas  River overlooking the future site of Dorian  स्पार्टा  .
Across the valley the successive ridges  of   माउंट   taygetus  are in  प्रमाण   .
Sparta  (  Doric  यूनानी  : ;  अटारी   यूनानी  : ) , or  lacedaemon  ,  थी  a prominent city-state in  प्राचीन  Greece  ,  situated on  the   बैंको  of  the   eurotas   नदी  in Laconia ,  in  south-eastern  पेलोपोनीज़  .
It emerged  as  a political entity around  the  10th  सदी  BC  ,  when the invading Dorians subjugated  the  local  ,  non-Dorian population .
around  650 BC , it rose to  become  the dominant military land-power in ancient Greece .
दिए   इसके  military  pre-eminence  , Sparta was recognized  as   the   overall   नेता  of the  संयुक्त  Greek  शक्तियां  during the  greco-persian  Wars .
Between 431 and 404 BC ,  स्पार्टा   थी  the principal enemy of Athens  दौरान   the  Peloponnesian War , from which  it  emerged victorious , though at great cost .
Sparta 's defeat by Thebes in  the  Battle of Leuctra  in   371   bc   ended  Sparta 's prominent role  in   यूनानियों   .
However ,  it  maintained its political  स्वतंत्रता  until the Roman conquest of  यूनानियों   in   146  BC .
it   तब  underwent  a  long  काल  of decline , especially in the  मध्य  Ages , when many Spartans moved to live  in  Mystras .
Modern Sparta is the capital  of  the  यूनानी  regional unit of  laconia  and a center for  the   प्रसंस्करण   of  goods  ऐसे   as  citrus and olives .
स्पार्टा  was unique in ancient Greece  लिये   इसके  social  प्रणाली   और  constitution ,  जिससे  completely  केन्द्रित  on military  प्रशिक्षण  and excellence .
Its  निवासियों  were classified as Spartiates  (   spartan  citizens  ,   जो  enjoyed full  अधिकारों  ) , Mothakes (  non-spartan  free  मेन   उठाया  as  spartans  )  ,  Perioikoi ( freedmen ) , and Helots ( state-owned serfs  ,   enslaved  non-Spartan local population ) .
spartiates  underwent the rigorous agoge training and education  regimen   ,   और   spartan   phalanges  were widely considered  to  be among  the  best  in  battle .
Spartan  महिलाओं  enjoyed considerably more rights  और  equality to  मेन   than  elsewhere in  the  classical world .
Sparta was the  विषय  of fascination in its own  दिन  ,  as  well as in the West  following  the revival  of  classical learning .
This love  or  admiration  of  Sparta is known as  laconism  or Laconophilia .
Fantasy  फ़ुटबॉल   is  an interactive competition  in   जिससे   उपयोक्ता  compete against  प्रत्येक  other as general managers  of  virtual teams  .
The players that an individual is able to  मैनेज  are professional American  फ़ुटबॉल  players in  the  National Football  लीग  .
the  different actions people are able to make  हैं   drafting   ,   व्यापार  , adding or dropping  खिलाड़ी   ,  and  बदलना  rosters .
Due  to  the growth  of  the Internet , Fantasy football has  vastly  increased  in  popularity , particularly because Fantasy football providers such as ESPN , Yahoo ,  सीबीएस   ,  and the  एनएफएल  itself are  समर्थ   to   रखना   track   of  statistics entirely  ऑनलाइन  , eliminating the need  to   जाँच   बक्सा  scores and  अखबारों  regularly to keep track of players .
Most  लीग  have  a   सिंगल  week championship in Week  16  of the NFL season  .
World population estimates  इससे   1800  to 2100 , based on  un  2010 projections ( red , orange , green )  और  US  जनसांख्यिकी  Bureau historical estimates (  ब्लैक  )  .
Actual recorded population  आंकड़े  are in blue .
according  to the highest  अनुमान  ,  the  world population may rise  to   16  billion by  2100  ; according to the lowest estimate , it  may  decline to  6  billion .
The  संसार   जनसांख्यिकी   is  the total number  of   जीना  humans on Earth  .
as   of  today ,  it  is  अनुमानित  to number billion by the United States  जनसांख्यिकी  Bureau  (  USCB  )   .
The  uscb  estimates that  the  world population exceeded 7 billion on March 12 , 2012  .
According to a separate estimate by the United Nations  जनसांख्यिकी  Fund ,  it   पहुँचे   इस  milestone on  अक्तूबर  31 ,  2011  .
the  world population  रै  experienced  निरन्तर  growth since  the  end of the Great Famine and  the   ब्लैक   मौत  in  1350  , when it stood at around 370 million .
the   उच्चतम   दरों   of  growth –  वैश्विक   जनसांख्यिकी  increases  ऊपर  1.8 %  प्रति  year – were seen briefly during the 1950s , and for a  longer   काल   दौरान   the  1960s and 1970s .
the  growth  रेट  peaked  at  2.2 %  in  1963  ,  and  था   अस्वीकृत   to  1.1 % by 2011  .
Total  सालाना  births  यहूद   उच्चतम  in the late  1980s  at about 138 million , and  हैं  now expected to remain  essentially  constant  at  their 2011 level  of   134  million  ,   जबकि   मौतों  number  56  million per year  ,   और  are  अपेक्षित  to increase to 80 million per year by 2040 .
Current  projections   दिखाएँ  a  जारी  increase  in  population in the near  भविष्य   (   लकिन  a steady decline in the population growth  रेट   )  , with the global population  अपेक्षित  to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion  by   2050  .
विभिन्न  longer-term estimates predict further growth , stagnation , or even overall decline in the  वैश्विक   जनसांख्यिकी   by  2150 .
कुछ  analysts have questioned the  स्थिरता  of further world population  विकास  ,  citing   the  growing pressures on the  पर्यावरण  , global  खाना  supplies ,  और   उर्जा   संसाधन   .
skeletal   मांसपेशियां  homo  sapiens
इस   is  a  तालिका  of  मांसपेशियां  of  the  human anatomy  .
वहीँ  are approximately 642  skeletal   मांसपेशियां  within the typical human ,  और   लगभग  every  मांसपेशी   constitutes  one part of a pair  of  identical bilateral muscles ,  मिला  on  दोनो   पहलू   ,   resulting  in  लगभग   320  pairs of muscles , as presented  in  this article .
Nevertheless ,  the   सटीक  number is  मुश्किल   to  define because different  स्त्रोत  group muscles  differently  , e.g .  regarding  what  is  defined as  अलग  parts of a single  मांसपेशी   or   as  several  मांसपेशियां  .
Examples range from 640  to  850  .
The  मांसपेशियां  of the human  देह   can  be categorized  into  a number of groups which include  मांसपेशियां  relating to the head and  गर्दन   ,  muscles  of  the torso or trunk  ,  muscles of the  अपर   limbs   ,  and  मांसपेशियां  of the lower limbs  .
The action  refers  to the action  of  each muscle from the standard  anatomical   स्थिति  .
In other positions ,  अन्य  actions may be  performed  .
A gold bar  is  a quantity  of   परिष्कृत  metallic gold of any  आकार   कि  is made by a  बार  producer  बैठक  standard conditions  of  manufacture ,  labeling  , and record keeping .
Larger gold bars that  हैं   उत्पादित  by  pouring  the molten metal into  molds  are  पुकारा  ingots  .
Smaller bars may be  manufactured  by minting or  stamping   इससे   appropriately  rolled  सुनहरा   चादरें   .
the   मानक  gold bar held as gold  reserves  by central banks and  traded  among  bullion  dealers is the 400-troy-ounce (  12.4  kg  or  438.9  औंस  )  शुभ  Delivery  सुनहरा  bar .
the  kilobar ,  जिससे  is to say 1000  गामा   in  mass ,  is  the  बार  that is more manageable  और   is  used extensively for trading and  निवेश  .
the  premium  on   ये   बार  when traded is  बहुत  low  over   the   स्पॉट  value of  the  gold making it  आदर्श  for small  हस्तांतरण   between  banks and traders .
सबसे  kilobars are  चपटा  , although some investors ,  विशेषकर   in  Europe ,  prefer  the brick shape .
Elisha Archibald `` Archie '' Manning III ( born May 19 ,  1949  ) is a former American football  क्वार्टरबैक  in  the  National Football  लीग  ,  playing  for the New Orleans Saints from 1971  to  1982 , then for  the  Houston Oilers and  मिनेसोटा   वाइकिंग्स  .
He is the father of current Denver  broncos  quarterback Peyton Manning , current New  यॉर्क   दिग्गज  starting quarterback  एली  Manning , and  पूर्व  Ole Miss  receiver  Cooper Manning  .
Advocacy is  a   राजनैतिक  process by an  व्यक्तिगत  or group which  aims  to influence public-policy and  संसाधन  allocation decisions within political  ,  economic ,  और  social  प्रणालियों  and institutions  .
Advocacy  can  include  अनेक   क्रियाएँ   कि   a  person or  संगठन   undertakes  including media  अभियान  , public  बोलना  , commissioning  और   प्रकाशन  research or polls  or  the  दाखिल  of an amicus  ब्रैड   .
Lobbying (  प्रायः  by lobby  समूह  ) is a form of  वकालत  where a direct  दृष्टिकोण  is  बना   to   विधायक  on an  समस्या   जिससे  plays  a  significant  भूमिका  in modern politics  .
Research is beginning to  explore  how advocacy  समूह  in the U.S.  और  Canada are using  सोशल  media to  सुकर   नागरिक   सगाई  and collective  कार्रवाई   .
The  ध्वज  of  मैक्सिको   (  Spanish : Bandera de México ) is  a   लंबवत  tricolor of green , white , and red with the national coat of arms charged in the center of the white  stripe  .
While the meaning of the  रंगों  has  बदला   over  time , these  तीन  colors  यहूद  adopted  by  Mexico following independence from  स्पेन  during the  देश   's  War of Independence  ,  and  subsequent   पहला  Mexican Empire .
The current  ध्वज   थी   अपनाया   in  1968 , but the overall design has been  प्रयुक्त   चूंकि  1821 , when  the   पहला  National Flag was created  .
The current law of  नेशनल  symbols , Law on the National Arms  ,  Flag  ,   और  Anthem , that governs the use of  the   नेशनल  flag has been  in  place since  1984   .
रेड  , white  ,  and  ग्रीन  are the  रंगों   of   the  national  मुक्ति   फौज   in  Mexico .
The  सेंट्रल  emblem is the  एज़टेक  pictogram  लिये  Tenochtitlan  (  now Mexico City )  ,   the  center  of  their empire .
it  recalls the legend that inspired the Aztecs to settle on what was  originally  a  lake-island  .
the   रूप  of the coat of  बाहें  was most recently revised  in  1968 .
A  रिबन  in the national  रंगों  is at  the  bottom  of  the  कोट   of   बाहें  .
throughout  history , the flag  रै  changed four times , as the design  of  the coat  of   बाहें  and the length-width  ratios  of  the   ध्वज  have been modified .
However , the  कोट  of arms  रै  had  the   वही  features  throughout   :  an eagle , holding  a  serpent  in   इसके  talon , is perched on  शीर्ष  of a prickly pear cactus ; the cactus is  situated  on a  चट्टान  that rises  ऊपर  a  झील  .
The coat of arms is derived  इससे  an  एज़टेक  legend that their  देवताओं  told  उन्हें  to build a city  जहाँ  they spot an eagle  on  a nopal eating  a   serpent   ,  which  is  now Mexico City  .
The current national  ध्वज  , the Fourth National  ध्वज   ,  is  भी  used as the Mexican naval  ensign  by ships registered  in  Mexico  .
A  गंतव्य  marketing organization or convention and visitor bureau promotes a town , city , region  ,  or country in order to increase the number  of   विज़िटर  .
it  promotes the  विकास  and marketing of  a  destination , focusing on convention  बिक्री  ,  पर्यटन   विपणन   ,  and services .
Such  संगठन  promote economic development of  a  destination by increasing visits  इससे  tourists and business travelers , which generates  overnight  lodging for  a   गंतव्य  , visits  to  restaurants ,  और  shopping revenues .
सम्मेलन  and visitor bureaus are  the   सबसे   महत्वपूर्ण   पर्यटन  marketing organizations in their respective tourist destinations ,  as  they  हैं  directly responsible for marketing the destination brand through  सफर  and tourism  ``  product  जागरूकता  '' to visitors .
dmos  produce  अरबों  of  डॉलर  in direct  और  indirect revenue and taxes for their  गंतव्यों  ' economies with their marketing and sales  विशेषज्ञता   .
Destination  विपणन   संगठन  are often  पुकारा  travel  ,  convention , visitors  ,   or  tourism bureaux  ,  welcome centers  ,  information centers  और  more .
regardless   of   the  name , these organizations offer many services to the traveling public  .
the  elk or wapiti ( Cervus canadensis  )   is  one of  the   largest   प्रजाति  of deer in the world , and one  of  the largest  जमीन  mammals in North America and  पूर्वी  Asia  .
it  was long believed to be a  subspecies   of  the  यूरोपीय  red deer ( Cervus elaphus )  ,  but  प्रमाण   इससे  a  2004  study of the mitochondrial DNA indicates that the two are distinct species .
इस  animal  चाहिए  not be confused with the larger  मूस   (  Alces alces  )   ,   to  which  the  name ``  नीलगाय  '' applies  in  Eurasia .
अलावा   इससे  the moose ,  the   तभी   अन्य  member of  the  deer family to rival  the   नीलगाय  in size is the south  एशियाई  sambar (  rusa  unicolor ) .
नीलगाय  range in  वन   और   forest-edge   आवास  ,  feeding   on  grasses ,  पौधे  ,  पत्ते  , and bark .
Although native to North America  और   पूर्वी  Asia ,  वे  have adapted  खूब  to countries  जहाँ  they  have  been introduced , including Argentina , Australia ,  और  New Zealand  .
Their  ग्रेट   adaptability  may  threaten  endemic species  और   ecosystems  into which  वे  have  महरूम  introduced  .
पुरूष  elk have large  antlers  which are shed each year  .
males  also engage  in  ritualized  समागम  behaviors during  the  rut , including posturing , antler wrestling ( sparring )  ,  and bugling ,  a   लाउड   श्रेणी  of vocalizations  जिससे  establishes dominance over  अन्य  males and attracts females .
Elk are susceptible  to  a number  of  infectious diseases , some of which can be transmitted to livestock  .
Efforts to  eliminate  infectious  रोगों  from elk populations , largely through vaccination , have  था  mixed  कामयाबी  .
Some cultures revere  the  elk as a spiritual  फ़ोर्स   .
In parts of  एशिया  ,  antlers   और   उनके   मखमल  are  प्रयुक्त  in traditional medicines  .
Elk are  hunted  as a game species ; the meat  is  leaner  और   उच्चतर  in protein  than  beef or chicken .
The George  वॉशिंगटन   विश्वविद्यालयों  ( GW ,  gwu   ,  or George Washington ) is a comprehensive private , coeducational research university located in  वॉशिंगटन  , D.C. .
it  awards certificates , Bachelor degrees , Masters  डिग्री  , and PhDs across several dozen disciplines .
The university was  चार्टर्ड  by  an  Act  of   कॉंग्रेस  on  फ़रवरी  9 , 1821  as   the  Columbian College  in   the  District of Columbia .
The lion  (   पेंथेरा   leo  ) is one of the  चार  big cats in the genus  पेंथेरा  and  a  member of the  परिवार   फ़ेलिडाए  .
With some males exceeding in weight  ,   it  is  the  second-largest  जीना   बिल्ली  after the tiger  .
Wild lions  फिलहाल  exist  in  sub-Saharan Africa  और   in  Asia (  जहाँ  an  endangered  remnant population resides  in  Gir Forest National  पार्क  in India ) while other types of lions  have   disappeared  from North Africa and Southwest Asia in  ऐतिहासिक   टाइम्स  .
जबतक  the  लेट  Pleistocene ,  परिचय  10,000 years ago , the lion was the most widespread large  जमीन  mammal  बाद   इंसानो  .
वे  were found in  सबसे  of Africa  ,  across  यूरेशिया   इससे   पश्चिमी  Europe to India , and  in  the Americas  इससे  the  yukon  to Peru .
The lion is  a  vulnerable  प्रजाति   ,   having   देखी  a major population decline of 30–50  %  over  the   पास्ट   दो  decades  in  its  अफ़्रीकी   दायरा   .
Lion  populations   हैं  untenable outside designated reserves and national parks .
Although the cause of  the  decline is not fully  समझा  ,  आवास  loss  और  conflicts with humans are  फिलहाल   the  greatest causes  of  concern .
भीतर  Africa , the West African lion  जनसांख्यिकी   is   विशेषकर  endangered .
शेर   सजीव  for 10–14 years in  the   जंगली  , while in captivity they  can  live longer  than  20 years .
In  the  wild ,  males   seldom   सजीव   longer  than 10 years , as injuries  sustained  from continual fighting  साथ   प्रतिद्वंद्वी  males  greatly   reduce  their longevity  .
वे  typically  inhabit   सवाना   और  grassland ,  हालांकि  they may take to bush  और  forest  .
Lions are unusually  सोशल   compared  to other  बिल्लियों   .
a  pride of lions  consists  of related  महिलाओं  and offspring and a small number  of   वयस्क   males  .
Groups of  मादा  lions typically  हंट   साथ  , preying mostly on large ungulates .
शेर  are apex  और   keystone   परभक्षी   ,   हालांकि   वे  scavenge as opportunity allows .
While lions  do  not typically hunt humans , some have been known to do so .
Sleeping mainly during the  दिन  , lions are primarily nocturnal  ,   हालांकि   bordering  on  crepuscular  in nature .
Highly distinctive , the male  शेर   is  easily recognised by its mane  ,  and its  फेस  is one  of  the most  widely   recognised  animal symbols  in  human culture  .
Depictions have existed from the Upper  paleolithic  period , with carvings and paintings from the Lascaux  और  Chauvet Caves  ,  through virtually  सब  ancient and medieval cultures where  वे   एकबार  occurred .
it  has been  extensively  depicted in sculptures , in paintings , on national  ध्वज  , and in contemporary films and literature  .
Lions have  महरूम  kept in  menageries  since  the   समय   of   the  Roman Empire ,  और   have   महरूम   a   कुंजी  species sought for exhibition in zoos over  the  world since  the  late 18th  सदी   .
Zoos are cooperating worldwide in breeding  कार्यक्रम  for the  endangered  Asiatic  subspecies  .
In the history of video games ,  the   सातवाँ   पीढी  of  consoles  is the previous generation , and includes  consoles   released  since late by Nintendo  ,   microsoft  , and Sony .
लिये   घर   consoles   ,  the seventh  पीढी   began   on  22 November  2005  with  the  release of Xbox 360 and  जारी  with  the  release of PlayStation  3   on   11  November 2006  ,  and  वी   on  19 November 2006 .
प्रत्येक   नई   कंसोल  introduced a new type of breakthrough in technology .
the   एक्सबॉक्स  360 offered games  rendered   natively  at HD resolutions  ,  the PlayStation  3   offered  , in addition  to  FHD gaming  ,  HD movie playback  via   a   built-in   3d  Blu-ray  डिस्क   खिलाड़ी  ,  और  the Wii focused on  integrating   परिरक्षक   साथ  movement  सेंसर   as  well as  joysticks  .
Joining Nintendo in the motion market  ,  Sony released  the  PlayStation Move in September 2010 .
The PlayStation Move features  गति  sensing gaming ,  समान   to  that of the Wii  .
Microsoft  भी  joined Sony and Nintendo  ,   साथ   इसके  Kinect  .
नापसंद  the other  दो  systems  (   प्लेस्टेशन  3  और  Wii )  ,   kinect  does not use  कोई  controllers of  कोई   sort   और  makes the  उपयोक्ता  the ``  नियंत्रक   .   ''
having  sold 8 million  इकाई  in its first 60 days on  the  market  ,  Kinect has  claimed  the  गिनीज  World Record of being  the   ``   तीव्रतम   selling   उपभोक्ता   इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स  device  ''  .
जबकि   the  Xbox 360 offers wired controllers  as   a  standalone product  ,   सब  PlayStation 3  परिरक्षक   can  be used in  तार  and wireless  configurations  .
Starting with  हैंडहेल्ड  consoles , the  सातवाँ   पीढी  began on 21 November 2004 with the North American  परिचय  of the Nintendo DS as a `` third pillar ''  ,   alongside   निन्टेंडो  's existing Game Boy Advance and GameCube consoles  .
The Nintendo DS  (  NDS  )  features  a   टच  screen and  built-in   माइक्रोफोन   ,  and supports wireless IEEE  802.11  ( Wi-Fi ) standards  .
additionally   ,   the  revised version of the NDS , the DSi  ,   सुविधाएँ   दो  built in cameras , the ability to download games from  the  DSi  स्टोर  , and  a  web browser .
The PlayStation  पोर्टेबल  ,  or  PSP , released  बाद  the same year on 12 December 2004 , followed a different pattern .
it   became   the  first handheld  वीडियो   खेल  console to use an optical disc  स्वरूप   ,  Universal Media  डिस्क  ( UMD ) , as  इसके  primary storage media  .
Sony also gave  the   psp   मजबूत  multi-media capability , connectivity  साथ  the PlayStation  3   और  other PSPs  ,  and Internet connectivity  .
The Nintendo DS likewise has  कनेक्टिविटी  to the internet through the Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection and Nintendo DS Browser  ,  as well as  बेतार  connectivity to other DS systems and Wii consoles  .
Despite high sales numbers for both consoles ,  प्लेस्टेशन  Portable sales have  consistently  lagged behind those  of   the  Nintendo DS ;  nevertheless  , the PlayStation Portable has  the  distinction of  होने  the best-selling non-Nintendo handheld gaming  प्रणाली   .
sgt  . Pepper 's Lonely Hearts  क्लबों  Band  (  often  shortened  to  sgt  . Pepper )  is  the eighth studio album by English rock band  the   बीटल्स   .
Released in June 1967 ,  the  album  शामिल  songs such as `` With  a  Little Help from My Friends ``  ,  `` Lucy in the Sky with  ईंट  `` ,  और  `` A Day  in   the  Life ``  .
continuing   the   कलाकारी  maturation  देखी  on the band  's  album  रिवाल्वर  ( 1966 ) , Sgt . Pepper further departed  इससे  the conventional pop rock  मुहावरा  of the  समय  and incorporated  balladry  ,  साइकेडेलिक  ,  म्यूज़िक  hall , and symphonic influences .
During the  sgt  . Pepper sessions , the group improved upon the quality of  उनके  music 's production while exploring  प्रायोगिक   रिकॉर्डिंग   तकनीकों  .
Producer George Martin 's innovative approach  शामिल  the use  of  an orchestra .
widely  acclaimed and  imitated  , the album  कवर   ,  designed by English pop artists Peter Blake and  jann  Haworth  ,  was inspired by a sketch  by   पॉल   mccartney  that depicted the band posing in  सामने  of a collage  of  some  of  their favourite  हस्तियाँ  .
Sgt . Pepper  थी  a  विश्वव्यापी  critical and commercial success , spending  27  weeks at the top of the  uk  Album Chart and 15 weeks at number one on the  us  Billboard 200 .
A seminal  कार्य  in the emerging psychedelic  चट्टान   स्टाइल  ,  the  album  थी   critically   acclaimed  upon  रिलीज   और  won four Grammy Awards in 1968 .
साथ  an  अनुमानित   32  million copies  बेची  ,  it   is  one of the world 's best selling albums .
Sgt  .  Pepper is considered by many to be  the   सबसे  influential and famous rock album ever , and has been  नामित  the  महानतम   एल्बम  of  सब  time by both  सब   समय  Top 1000 Albums  और   रोलिंग  Stone .
the   temporal  lobe is a region of the cerebral  cortex  that is  स्तिथ  beneath the lateral  फिशर   on  both cerebral hemispheres  of   the   mammalian  brain .
the  temporal lobes  हैं  involved in the  स्तंभन  of visual memories , processing  संवेदी  input  ,  comprehending language , storing new memories , emotion , and deriving meaning  .
the  human lungs are the organs of respiration  in   इंसानो  .
इंसानो  have two lungs  ,  a  सही  lung and a left lung .
the   सही  lung  consists  of  तीन   निर्मोक  while the left  फेफड़ों  is slightly smaller  consisting  of  तभी  two  निर्मोक   (  the left lung  रै  a  ``   हृदय  notch '' allowing space for the heart within the  छाती   )  .
साथ  , the  फेफड़े  contain approximately of  एयरवेज़  and 300 to 500 million alveoli , having  a   कुल  surface area  of   परिचय  ( ) in adults  —  roughly the  वही   क्षेत्रफल  as  एक  side of a tennis court .
Furthermore  ,  if  सब  of the capillaries that surround  the   alveoli   यहूद   unwound  and laid end  to  end , they would extend for  परिचय  .
Each lung weighs  ,   इसलिए  making the  संपूर्ण   अंग  about .
इंसान  lungs
The trachea divides  into  two bronchi  (  one for each  पक्ष  ) at  the   स्तर  of T4 .
इस  junction  is   भी  known as  the   carina  .
The  conducting  zone  contains  the trachea , the  bronchi   ,  the bronchioles , and the terminal bronchioles The  respiratory   मण्डल   contains  the respiratory  bronchioles  , the  alveolar  ducts  ,  and the alveoli .
The conducting zone and the  respiratory  stuffers ( but not the alveoli ) are made up of  एयरवेज़  .
The  conducting   मण्डल   रै  no  गैस  exchange with the blood  ,  and is  reinforced   साथ   उपास्थि  in  अनुक्रम  to hold  खोलें  the airways .
the  conducting zone warms the  एयर  to and humidifies  the  air  .
it  also cleanses the air  by  removing particles via cilia located  on   the  walls of all the  passageways   .
The lungs  हैं   घिरी  by the  पसली  cage .
The respiratory zone is the  साईट  of gas exchange with blood .
the   सहानुभूतिपूर्ण  nervous  प्रणाली  via noradrenaline  एक्टिंग   on   the  beta receptors causes bronchodilation .
the  parasympathetic  बेचैन   प्रणाली   via  acetylcholine  ,  which acts on the M-3 muscarinic receptors , maintains the resting tone  of  the bronchiolar smooth muscle .
This  कार्रवाई   is   सम्बन्धित  , although  माना   पृथक  from bronchoconstriction .
अनेक  other  non-autonomic  nervous and biochemical stimuli  ,   सहित   कार्बन  dioxide and oxygen , are also  शामिल  in the regulation process  .
The  pleural  cavity is  the   संभावित   स्पेस  between the parietal  pleura   ,   अस्तर  the  भीतरी  wall of the thoracic cage , and the visceral  pleura  lining the lungs .
the   फेफड़ों   parenchyma  is strictly  प्रयुक्त  to refer solely to alveolar tissue with  respiratory  bronchioles  ,  alveolar  नलिकाएं   और  terminal bronchioles .
However , it often includes any form of  फेफड़ों   ऊतक  , also  सहित  bronchioles ,  bronchi   ,  blood vessels and lung interstitium .
the  margarita is  a  Mexican  कॉकटेल   consisting   of  tequila mixed with Cointreau or  समान   नारंगी  -flavoured liqueur  और   लाइम  or lemon  रस  , often  परोसा   साथ  salt  on  the glass rim .
it  is the most  आम  tequila-based cocktail in the United States .
The  पेय  is  परोसा  shaken with ice ( on the rocks  )   ,  blended  साथ  ice (  frozen  margarita ) , or without ice ( straight  up  )  .

Burgundy  is   a   अंधेरा  red color associated with the Burgundy wine of the same  नाम  ,  जिससे  in turn is named  बाद  the Burgundy region  of  France  .
The color burgundy is similar to other  शेड्स  of dark  रेड  such as maroon  .
When referring to the color  ,  `` burgundy '' is usually  नहीं  capitalized .
The first  अंकित  use  of  ``  बरगंडी   ''   as  a color name in  अंग्रेज़ी  was in 1881  .

Because  उसके  identity  is   अनजान   ,  he  is  missing in  कार्रवाई  .

Missing  in  action  (   मिया  )  is   a   casualty   श्रेणी  assigned under the Status of  लापता   to  armed services  कर्मियों  who are reported missing during active service .
They may  have  been killed , wounded  ,  become a prisoner of war , or deserted .
if  deceased ,  neither  their  remains   nor   संगीन  can be positively  पहचाना  .
Becoming MIA has been an occupational risk  लिये  service personnel for  as  long  as  there has been warfare .

First  बैपटिस्ट  Church at  117   कोरा   गली  in  बीच   is   स्तिथ  next  to  the downtown  खण्ड   .
