Center is a city in Shelby County ,  टेक्सास  , United States  .
the  population was 5,193 at the 2010 census .
it   is   the  county  सीट   of  Shelby  काउंटी  .
It  is  named for its location near the center  of  Shelby County  ,  not for its location in Texas  as   it   is   स्तिथ   निकट  the Louisiana  किनारा   .
तीव्र  red-eye  प्रभाव   in  blue  आँखें   साथ  dilated pupil
the  red-eye  प्रभाव  in photography  is   the  common appearance  of  red pupils in  रंग  photographs  of  eyes .
It occurs when  using  a  फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक  flash very  बंद   to   the  camera lens ( as  साथ  most compact cameras ) , in ambient low light .
The effect  appears   in  the eyes of humans  और   पशु   कि  have tapetum lucidum .
नाट्य   followspot   ऑपरेटर  ,  positioned   nearly  coincidentally with a  बहुत  bright  लाइट  and somewhat distant  इससे  the actors , occasionally witness red-eye  in  actors on  स्टेज   .
The effect is not visible  to  the  बाकी  of  the   दर्शक  because  it  is reliant on  the  very small angle between the  followspot  operator and the light .
The University of California ,  सांता  Barbara ( commonly referred to as UC Santa  बारबरा   or  UCSB ) is a public research university and  एक  of the ten general campuses  of   the  University of California  प्रणाली  .
The main campus  is  located on a site in Goleta , California , United States  ,   इससे  Santa Barbara and northwest of  लॉस  Angeles .
Tracing its roots back to  1891  as an  स्वतंत्र   शिक्षक   '  college  ,   ucsb   joined   the  University of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  system  in  1944  और  is the third-oldest general-education campus  in  the system  .
UCSB is one  of   अमेरिका  's Public Ivy universities  ,   जिससे  recognizes top public research  विश्वविद्यालयों   in  the  संयुक्त  States .
The university is a  व्यापक  doctoral university and  is   व्यवस्थित   into  five colleges  और  schools  offering  87  undergraduate  degrees and 55  ग्रैजुएट  degrees  .
The campus  is  the  6th-largest  in the  uc   प्रणाली   by  enrollment  साथ  18,977 undergraduate and  2,950  graduate students .
In 2012  ,  UCSB was ranked  41st  among  ``  National Universities '' and 10th  among  public universities by  u.S.  News & World  रपट  .
the  university was also ranked 35th  विश्वव्यापी  by the Times  उच्चतर   शिक्षा  World University Rankings and 34th worldwide  (   6th   विश्वव्यापी  for  अभियान्त्रिकी  )  by  the Academic Ranking of World  विश्वविद्यालयों  in 2012. < ref name= ''  shanghairanking.com/fieldeng2012   ''   >
UC Santa  बारबरा  is a  ``  very  ऊँची  activity  ''   शोध  university  और  spent $ 191.2 million on research expenditures in the 2007 fiscal year  ,   97th-largest  in the  संयुक्त  States .
UCSB houses twelve national research centers  ,   सहित  the renowned Kavli Institute  लिये  Theoretical Physics  .
ucsb  faculty  शामिल   पाँच   नोबेल  Prize laureates , one Fields Medalist , 29 members of the  नेशनल  Academy of Sciences ,  27  members of the  नेशनल  Academy of  अभियान्त्रिकी   ,  and 31 members  of  the American  अकादमी  of Arts  और  Sciences .
ucsb  was the  no  . 3 host on  the  ARPAnet and was elected to the Association  of  American Universities in 1995  .
The UC Santa Barbara Gauchos  compete  in  the  NCAA Division I  बिग   वेस्ट  Conference .
The Gauchos  have  won  ncaa   नेशनल   championships  in men  's  soccer  और  men 's water polo  .
Saint  जोसेफ  with the  शिशु   यीशु  by Guido  reni
Saint Joseph  's   दिन   ,  March 19  ,  the Feast of  st.  Joseph is in  पश्चिमी   christianity  the principal feast  दिन  of Saint Joseph  ,   जीवनसाथी   of  the Blessed Virgin  मरियम   .
He is also  the   step-father  of  यीशु  of Nazareth /Jesus  मसीह  .
it  has  the  rank of  a  solemnity in the Roman  कैथोलिक  Church  ;  Catholics who follow  the  Missal of 1962 celebrate it as a first class  feast  .
Previous to  1962   it  was  मनाये  as  a   feast  of the rank  of   दोगुना  of the first  क्लास  .
It is  a  feast or  commemoration  in the provinces of the Anglican Communion , and a feast  or  festival  in  the Lutheran  गिरिजाघर  .
Saint  जोसेफ  's Day is  the  Patronal Feast day  लिये  Poland as well as  लिये   कनाडा  , persons named Joseph , Josephine  ,   etc.  ,  लिये   धार्मिक   संस्थान  , schools  और  parishes  bearing   उसके  name ,  और  for carpenters  .
it  is also Father 's Day in  कुछ  Catholic  देशों  , mainly Spain , Portugal , and  इटली  .
March 19 was dedicated  to  Saint  जोसेफ  in  अनेक   पश्चिमी  calendars by the  दसवाँ  century  ,  and this custom was established in Rome  by  1479 .
पोप  St. Pius V extended  इसके  use  to  the entire  रोमन  Rite by  उसके  Apostolic Constitution Quo  primum  ( July 14  ,   1570  ) .
Since 1969 , Episcopal  सम्मेलनों  may , if they  काश   ,   ट्रांसफ़र   it  to a date outside Lent .
Between 1870 and 1955 , a feast  थी  celebrated in honor  of  St.  जोसेफ  as Spouse of the Blessed Virgin Mary and Patron of the Universal Church , the latter title having been given  to  him  by  Pope Pius IX .
Originally celebrated  on   the   तीसरा  Sunday after Easter with  an  octave ,  बाद  Divino Afflatu  of   st.  Pius X  (  see  सुधार  of the  रोमन  Breviary by  पोप  Pius X ) ,  it   थी   स्थानांतरित  to the  preceding  Wednesday .
The feast  थी  also  retitled   the  Solemnity  of   संत  Joseph .
This celebration and its accompanying octave was abolished during the modernisation  और   सरलीकरण  of rubrics under Pope Pius XII  in  1955 .
it   is   स्टिल  maintained  by  Catholics  जो  follow the  missal  of 1962 or earlier missals .
as  the  परंपरागत  holiday  of  the Apostles Ss . Philip  और  James ,  may  1 , had faded from  the   मेमोरी  of most  catholics  by  the  mid-twentieth century ,  कि   of  Joseph the Worker  थी  created in order to  coincide   साथ  the  जश्न   of  international  श्रमिक  Day  (  May Day ) in many countries .
The  feast  of  ss  . Philip and James  ,  which had been  मनाये  on  कि  date since  the  sixth  सदी  , was moved  इससे  its  परंपरागत  place  .
In the new calendar published in 1969 , the  feast   ,  which  at  one time occupied the highest  संभावित  rank in the Church calendar  ,   थी  reduced to  an  optional Memorial , the lowest rank for a saint 's day  .
The  पूर्वी  Orthodox  गिरिजाघर  celebrates Saint Joseph on  the  Sunday  बाद  Christmas .
Mariah  कैरी   (  born March 27 ,  1970  ) is an  अमरीकी  singer  ,  songwriter , record producer , actress  ,   और   लोकसेवक   .
Under the  मार्गदर्शन   of  Columbia Records  कार्यपालिका   टॉमी   mottola   ,  Carey  released  her  self-titled  debut  स्टुडियो   एल्बम   mariah  Carey in 1990  ;  it went multi-platinum and spawned four consecutive number one singles on  the  U.S . Billboard Hot 100  चार्ट  .
following   उसके  marriage  to  Mottola in 1993 and  कामयाबी   साथ  hit records Emotions  (  1991 )  ,  Music Box ( 1993 ) , and Merry Christmas  (   1994  ) , Carey was established as Columbia 's  highest-selling  act  .
Daydream (  1995  ) made music history  जब   इसके   दूसरी  single  ``  One Sweet Day ``  ,  a duet with Boyz II  मेन  , spent a record sixteen weeks on  शीर्ष  of the Billboard  hot   100  , and remains the longest-running  number-one  song  in  U.S.  चार्ट  history  .
During the recording  of  the album ,  कैरी  began to  deviate  from her R &  b  and  पॉप  beginnings and  धीरे   traversed  into  हिप  hop  .
इस  musical  बदलें   became   evident   साथ  the release of Butterfly ( 1997  )  , at which time Carey had  अलग  from  mottola  .
Carey left Columbia in 2000 ,  और  signed a record-breaking $ 100 million  रिकॉर्डिंग  contract with Virgin  रिकॉर्ड  .
Before the  रिलीज   of  her  पहला  feature film  glitter  (  2001  )  ,  she suffered a  शारीरिक  and  emotional   विश्लेषण  and was hospitalized for  कठोर  exhaustion .
following   the  film  's   ग़रीब  reception , she was bought out  of  her  रिकॉर्डिंग  contract for $ 50 million ,  जिससे  led  to  a decline  in  her  करियर  .
She  हस्ताक्षरित  a  multi-million   डालर  contract deal with Island  रिकॉर्ड  in 2002 ,  और  after an unsuccessful period  ,  returned to the top  of  music charts with The  emancipation  of Mimi ( 2005 )  .
इसके  second single `` We Belong  साथ  `` became her most  कामयाब   सिंगल  of  the  2000s  ,  and was  बाद  named  ``  Song  of  the Decade ''  by   बिलबोर्ड  .
Carey once  again  ventured into film  साथ  a well-received  अभिनीत   भूमिका   in  ( 2009 ) ;  वो   थी  awarded the `` Breakthrough Performance  पुरस्कार  '' at  the  Palm  स्रोतों   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Film  पर्व  , and Black Reel and NAACP Image Award  nominations  .
in  a  करियर  spanning  over  two decades , Carey  रै  sold  अधिक  than  200  million records worldwide , making her  एक  of  the  best-selling music  कलाकारों  of  सब  time .
in  1998 , she was honored as the world  's  best-selling recording artist of the 1990s at  the   संसार  Music Awards .
Carey was  भी   नामित  the best-selling female artist of  the  millennium  in  2000 .
According  to  the Recording Industry Association  of  America , she  is  the third best-selling female artist in the United States ,  साथ  63.5  लाख  certified  एल्बम   .
With the release of  ``  Touch My Body `` ( 2008 )  ,   कैरी  gained her  eighteenth  number one single in the  संयुक्त  States  ,  more than any  अन्य  solo artist .
In 2012  ,  Carey  थी  ranked second on VH1 's  सूची   of  the  ``  100 Greatest Women in Music ''  .
Aside from her commercial accomplishments  ,  Carey has won  पाँच   ग्रैमी   पुरस्कार  , 17  संसार  Music  पुरस्कार  , 11  अमरीकी  Music Awards ,  और   31  Billboard Music  पुरस्कार   .
Referred to as  the  ``  songbird  supreme ''  by  the  गिनीज  World  रिकॉर्ड  , she is  famed  for her five-octave vocal range , power  ,   melismatic  style  और  signature  उपयोग  of  the  whistle register .
A bumblebee is any member of the  मधुमक्खी  genus Bombus ,  in  the  परिवार   apidae  .
There are over 250 known species  ,  existing primarily in  the  Northern Hemisphere  हालांकि  they also  occur   in  South America .
They have  महरूम   introduced  to New Zealand  और  the  ऑस्ट्रेलियाई  state of Tasmania .
bumblebees   हैं  social insects  कि   हैं  characterised by black  और  yellow  देह  hairs ,  प्रायः  in bands .
However , some  प्रजाति  have orange  or   रेड  on  उनके   लाशें   ,   or  may  be  entirely  ब्लैक  .
Another obvious ( but not unique ) characteristic is the  नरम  nature of the hair ( long ,  branched  setae ) ,  पुकारा  pile ,  कि  covers their entire  देह   ,   बनाना  them appear and feel  फजी   .
वे  are best distinguished from  similarly  large , fuzzy bees by  the   रूप  of the  मादा   हिन्द  leg , which is modified to form a corbicula : a shiny concave surface that  is   bare  , but surrounded by a fringe of hairs used  to  transport pollen  (   in   समान   मधुमक्खियों   ,  the  हिन्द   लेग  is  completely  hairy , and pollen grains are wedged  into   the   बालों  for transport  )   .
Like their  रिश्तेदारों  the honey bees  ,  bumblebees feed on nectar and gather pollen  to   फीड   उनके  young .
A man  खुलकर   carrying   a  handgun in  a   बर्गर  King in  त्रिभुज  ,  कोलोराडो   .
in   the  United States  ,  open carry is shorthand  शब्दावली  for  ``  openly carrying a firearm in  पब्लिक  '' ,  as  distinguished from concealed carry , where firearms  can  not be seen  by   the   कैज़ुअल  observer .
The practice of  खोलें   carry  , where  गन  owners openly carry  firearms  while they go  परिचय  their  रोज़  business ,  रै   देखी  an increase  in  the U.S. in recent years .
इस  has been marked  by   a   क्रमांक  of organized events intended to increase  the  visibility of open carry and public awareness about the practice .
Proponents of open  carry  point to history and statistics  ,  noting that criminals usually  छिपाते   उनके   हथियार   .
Encouraged by  समूह  like OpenCarry.org , GeorgiaCarry.org and  कुछ  participants of the Free  राज्य  Project , open carry  रै   देखी   a  revival in  हाल   सालो  , but  it   is  not  yet   साफ  if this represents just  a   short-term   ट्रेंड   .
the   गन  rights community has  महरूम   मिश्रित  in  इसके  response  .
एलन   gottlieb  of the Second Amendment Foundation and the NRA  have   महरूम   cautious  in expressing support ,  जबकि  special-interest  समूह   ऐसे  as the  aforementioned  OpenCarry.org and GeorgiaCarry.org , and  निश्चित  national groups such  as  the  गन   स्वामी   of  America  (   गोवा   )  have been  अधिक  outspoken in favor of the  अभ्यास   .
खोलें   carry  is  strongly  opposed by  गन   कंट्रोल   समूह   ऐसे  as the Brady Campaign and the Coalition to Stop  गन  Violence .
The Cattenom Nuclear  शक्ति  Plant in France  .
फ़्रांस   produces  around  तीन  quarters  of  its electricity by  नाभिकीय  power .
The Grafenrheinfeld Nuclear Power Plant in  जर्मनी  .
Chancellor  एंजेला   मार्केल   's  coalition announced on May 30 , 2011  ,  that  germany’s  17 nuclear  शक्ति  stations  होगा   be  shut  bas   by   2022  ,  in  a policy reversal following Japan  's   फुकुशिमा   daiichi  nuclear disaster .
Currently ,  68  reactors are under construction in 15  देशों  .
नाभिकीय  power stations operate in  तीस  countries .
In  2010   ,   पहले  the Fukushima  daiichi  nuclear disaster , it was reported that  an  average of about 10 nuclear  रिएक्टरों  were expected  to  become operational per year , although  according   to  the World Nuclear Association , of the  17  civilian reactors planned to become operational between 2007  और   2009   ,  only five  दरअसल  came on  स्ट्रीम   .
As of June 2011 , Germany  और  Switzerland are phasing-out nuclear power .
as  of June 2011 , countries  ऐसे  as Australia  ,  Austria ,  डेनमार्क  ,  यूनानियों   ,  Ireland  ,   इटली  , Latvia ,  liechtenstein  , Luxembourg  ,  Malaysia  ,   माल्टा  , New  जीलैंड  , Norway and Portugal remain  opposed  to nuclear  शक्ति   .
Color motion picture film refers both to  unexposed  color  फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक  film  in   a  format suitable for use in  a   गति  picture camera  ,  and  to  finished motion picture film ,  तैयार  for use in  a   प्रोजेक्टर  , which  bears  images  in   रंग   .
The  पहला  color cinematography was  by  means of additive color systems such  as  the one patented in England  by  Edward Raymond Turner in 1899 and tested in 1902  .
A simplified additive  प्रणाली   थी  developed  by  George  अल्बर्ट  Smith and  सफलतापूर्वक  commercialized  in  1909 as Kinemacolor  .
These  जल्दी   प्रणालियों  used black-and-white  फिल्मी  to photograph and  प्रोजेक्ट  two or more component images through different  रंग  filters  .
स्टिल  from footage  अंकित  by  एडवर्ड  Turner in 1902
साथ  the present-day technology , there are  दो  distinct processes :  eastman   रंग   ऋणात्मक  2  रसायन  ( camera  ऋणात्मक  stocks , duplicating  interpositive   और  internegative  स्टॉक्स  )  और  Eastman  रंग  Positive 2  रसायन  ( positive  prints  for direct projection )  ,   प्रायः  abbreviated  as  ECN-2 and ECP-2 .
फुजी  's products  हैं  compatible with ECN-2 and ECP-2 .
ashanti   shequoiya  Douglas ( born  अक्तूबर  13 , 1980 ) is an American singer-songwriter  ,   रिकार्ड  producer , and actress  .
Ashanti is most  प्रसिद्ध  for her  eponymous   डेब्यू  album  ,  which featured the hit song  ``  Foolish `` , and sold over  503,000  copies in its first week  of  release throughout  the  U.S. in April 2002  .
the   एल्बम  set a Soundscan record as the biggest opening week sales  लिये   a  new  मादा   कलाकार  ,  outselling  debuts  by  Alicia Keys  और  Lauryn  हिल   .
In  the   वही   सप्ताह  , she  became  the  पहला  female performer to simultaneously  थाम  the  शीर्ष  two places on the  बिलबोर्ड  Hot 100 singles  चार्ट   साथ   ``  Foolish '' , and `` What 's  luv  ? ``
(  with Fat Joe  )  .
Ashanti  broke  records again  by  having  तीन  top ten songs  ,   ``  Foolish , '' `` What 's Luv  ?  '' and `` Always on Time  ``   ,  on the Billboard  hot  100 charts  in  the same week , being the first woman to accomplish  इस   feat  and  होने  second only  to   the  Beatles .
in  2003 ,  the  self-titled debut album won  ashanti  her first Grammy Award for Best  समकालीन  R & B album .
As of  अप्रैल  1st 2013  ,  Ashanti has sold over 27.7 million records worldwide .
ashanti  ended the decade  (  2000–09 ) as the third top  नई   r  &  b  artist behind Alicia Keys and Beyoncé  .
She also  ended  the decade  at   क्रमांक  38 on the  शीर्ष  Artist  of  the Decade list  .
वो  is currently on the list of  the  Twenty Best Selling  म्यूज़िक  Singles Since 1990 for her single Foolish for selling  7.2  million copies  to-date  .
ashanti   रै  an estimated net worth of  $  40  लाख   डॉलर  [ USD  ]   .
Ashanti wrote  और   संग  background on  जेनिफर   लोपेज़  's `` Ai n't It  मजेदार  (  हत्या  Remix  )  `` ,  जिससे  reached number one  on  Billboard  hot   100  , which  थी  also in  the   शीर्ष   10  chart at the same time  as   ``  Foolish  ''  , `` Always on  समय  '' ( with  ja  Rule  )   ,  and  ``  What  's   luv  '' ( with Fat Joe  )  .
Later  कि   साल  ,  वो   थी   acclaimed  as the  ``   राजकुमारी   of  Hip-Hop & R & B '' by  उसके  label and capped off her successful debut by  जीतना  eight Billboard awards  और  two American Music  पुरस्कार   .
भीतर  seven years  of   ashanti  's  करियर  , she has  scored  16 top 40 hits on the Hot 100 .
Ashanti has endorsed numerous  उत्पाद  including Gap  ,   हर्बल  Essences and  mudd  Jeans .
Ashanti  cites  Whitney Houston  ,  Janet Jackson  ,  Prince ,  मैडोना   ,  Tupac Shakur ,  मरियम  J. Blige ,  एला  Fitzgerald , Smokey Robinson , Donna Summer ,  और  Blue  जादू   as  her musical influences .
Praised  as   a   gifted  songwriter by  उसके  peers and critics alike ,  ashanti   रै   written/co-written   the  bulk of all  उसके  music .
She  is  currently  working   on  her own publishing company entitled Written  entertainment   .
She  released   उसके  fourth studio album  हकदार   the  Declaration on  जून  3 , 2008 and is currently  in  the studio working on her  पांचवां  .
She also  performed   the  charity tune `` Just Stand  up   ``  alongside  15   अन्य  female singers for the `` Stand  up  to  कर्कट   ''  live  टेलीविज़न  special  जिससे   helped  raise  $  100 million dollars for cancer research .
the  United  राज्य  Army  एयर  Forces ( USAAF  or   aaf  ) was the  सैन्य  aviation arm of the United States of America during and immediately after  संसार  War  ii  , and  the  direct predecessor  of  the  संयुक्त  States Air Force  .
The AAF  थी  a component of the  संयुक्त  States Army  ,  which  in  1942  थी   विभाजित   functionally  by executive  अनुक्रम  into three autonomous forces  :   the  Army  मैदान  Forces , the Services of Supply ( which in 1943 became the Army Service Forces ) , and the AAF .
Each of  ये  forces had a commanding general who reported directly to  the  Chief  of   स्टाफ   of  the United States  फौज   .
the  AAF administered all parts of  सैन्य   विमानन  formerly distributed among the  फौज   एयर   corps   ,  General  मुख्यालय  Air  फ़ोर्स  , and  मैदान   शक्तियां  corps  क्षेत्रफल  commanders , and thus became  the   पहला   एयर  organization of the  u.S.  Army to  कंट्रोल   इसके  own installations and support personnel  .
In  अभ्यास  ,  the  AAF was virtually autonomous inside  the   फौज   .
The peak size  of  the  aaf   थी   over  2.4 million men  और   महिलाओं   in  service and nearly  80,000  aircraft in 1944 , and  783  domestic bases  in  December 1943 .
By VE  दिन  it had  1.25  million  मेन   stationed  overseas  और   संचालित  from more  than  1,600  airfields  worldwide .
The  एयर   corps  became the Army Air  शक्तियां  in  जून   1941  to provide the  एयर  arm a greater autonomy in which  to  expand more efficiently , and to  provide  a  ढांचा   लिये  the additional  कमांड   echelons  required  by  a vastly increased force .
Although  अन्य   राष्ट्र  already had separate air forces  स्वतंत्र   of  the army or  नेवी  ( such as  the   अंग्रेजों   royal   एयर   फ़ोर्स  and  the  German  luftwaffe   )  , the AAF  remained   a  part of  the   संयुक्त   राज्य   फौज  until the United States  एयर  Force came into being in September 1947 .
However , in its expansion  और  conduct of  the  war  ,   the   aaf   became   अधिक  than just an  भुजा  of  the  greater  संगठन  .
By the end  of   संसार  War II  the  AAF had become virtually an independent service  .
By  विनियमन  and executive order  ,   the   aaf  was  a   अधीनस्थ   एजेंसी   of  the War  विभाग  tasked  तभी  with organizing , training , and equipping combat units ,  सीमित   in   जिम्मेदारी   to  the continental  संयुक्त  States , as were  the  Army  मैदान   शक्तियां  and  the  Army Service  शक्तियां  .
in  reality ,  मुख्यालय  AAF controlled  the   conduct  of all  पहलुओं  of the air  युद्ध  in  प्रत्येक  part  of   the  world , determining air policy and issuing orders  बगैर  transmitting them through the  मुख्य   of  Staff  .
This ``  कंट्रास्ट   between  theory and fact is ... fundamental to an understanding of the AAF . ''
The Freedom of Information Act ( FOIA )  is  a  संघीय  freedom  of  information law that allows for the full  or   आंशिक  disclosure of previously unreleased information  और  documents controlled by  the  United  राज्य  government .
the  Act  defines  agency  रिकॉर्ड  subject to  प्रकटीकरण  , outlines mandatory disclosure procedures and grants  नौ  exemptions to the statute .
it  was  originally   हस्ताक्षरित  into law by President  lyndon   B.  Johnson  ,  despite  उसके  misgivings ,  on   जुलाई  4 , 1966 as  और   गई  into effect the following year .
the   संघीय  Government 's Freedom  of   सूचना   अधिनियम  should not be confused with the  अलग  and  varying  Freedom  of  Information Acts  passed  by the  व्यक्तिगत   राज्य  .
Many  of   those  state acts may  be  similar but  नहीं  identical  to   the   संघीय   अधिनियम  .
the  European Union ( EU  )  is  an   आर्थिक  and political  संघ  of  27   सदस्य  states that  हैं   स्तिथ  primarily in Europe .
the  EU  operates  through a  प्रणाली  of  supranational  independent institutions and intergovernmental  negotiated  decisions by the member states  .
संस्थानों  of the EU include  the  European Commission ,  the  Council of the  यूरोपीय  Union ,  the   यूरोपीय   परिषद  , the Court  of   इंसाफ   of   the  European Union  ,   the  European Central Bank , the Court of Auditors , and  the  European  पार्लियामेंट   .
The European  पार्लियामेंट   is  elected  प्रत्येक   पाँच  years  by   eu  citizens .
The EU 's de facto  पूंजी  is Brussels  .
The  eu   traces  its  origins  from the European Coal  और  Steel Community  (  ECSC ) and the European  आर्थिक   जातियाँ  ( EEC  )   ,  formed by the Inner  छह  countries in  1951  and 1958 respectively  .
In the intervening years  the  community and its  successors  have grown in  आकार  by the accession of new member states  और  in  शक्ति   by   the  addition of policy areas to its  remit  .
The Maastricht Treaty established  the  European  संघ  under  इसके   वर्तमान  name in  1993  .
The latest major  amendment   to  the constitutional basis of the  eu  , the Treaty of Lisbon , came  into  force in 2009  .
the   eu   रै   विकसित  a single market  through   a  standardised system of laws that apply in  सब  member states .
Within the Schengen  क्षेत्रफल  (  जिससे  includes 22  eu  and  4   non-eu  states ) passport controls have been abolished .
EU  नीतियों  aim to ensure the  फ़्री  movement of people , goods , services  ,   और   पूंजी  ,  enact  legislation in  इंसाफ  and home  अफेयर्स  , and maintain common policies on trade , agriculture , fisheries  और  regional  विकास  .
A monetary  संघ  , the  eurozone  , was established in 1999 and is  रचित  of 17 member states .
Through the Common Foreign  और   सुरक्षा  Policy the EU  रै   विकसित  a role  in  external  संबंध  and defence .
Permanent diplomatic missions  have  been  स्थापित  around the world  .
the  EU is  represented   at  the  संयुक्त  Nations  ,  the  wto  , the G8 and the  g-20   .
With a combined population of  over   500  million inhabitants  ,  or  7.3  %  of   the   संसार  population  ,  the EU ,  in  2012 ,  उत्पन्न  a nominal gross domestic product  (   जीडीपी  )  of  16.584  खरब  US  डॉलर   ,  representing  लगभग  20 % of the global GDP when measured in  शर्तें   of  purchasing power parity ,  और  represents the largest  नाममात्र  GDP  और  GDP PPP  in   the  world .
The EU was  the  recipient  of   the  2012 Nobel Peace Prize  .
the   वेल्स  national rugby league team represent  वेल्स  in international rugby  लीग   फ़ुटबॉल   मिलान  .
फिलहाल  the  टोली  is seventh in the RLIF World Rankings .
The team  यहूद  run under the auspices of  the   रग्बी  Football League  ,  but an  स्वतंत्र  body , Wales  रग्बी  League ,  अभी  runs the team from  कार्डिफ  .
A total  of  three Welsh players have been entered into the Rugby League Hall Of Fame .
समान   to  many other Welsh  नेशनल  sporting  टीमों  ,  वेल्स  strip  रै  been  primarily  red for many years  ,  including now  .
However  in   उनके  last World Cup campaign  in  2000  वे   किया   पहनें   a   कमीज़  featuring  the   वेल्श  flag ,  adding   a   टच  of green and  श्वेत   .
the  team is known as `` The Dragons '' and  so  the teams logo on the shirt is a red dragon .
The team date back  to  1907  ,  making  उन्हें  the third  oldest   नेशनल  side after  इंग्लैण्ड  and New Zealand .
और   it  was  a  touring New  जीलैंड   पक्ष  that Wales first played against in  1908   ,  winning 9-8 at  aberdare  .
Since then  वेल्स  have  regularly  played  इंग्लैण्ड   ,   चूंकि  1935 France , as well as  सत्कार  the touring  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  and New Zealand teams  ,  although they  rarely   toured  themselves , not  playing   a   मैच   in  the  दक्षिणी  Hemisphere until 1975 .
For twenty-six  सालो  Wales competed against their  दो  biggest rivals , England and France  ,   in  the European Nations Cup , winning  the   ट्रॉफी  four times .
Wales have also competed in  the  World  कप   on   तीन  occasions , the first time being in 1975 .
In 1995 and 2000 they had their most successful  tournaments  to date  ,  surprisingly making  the  Semi-Finals  on  both occasions  पहले  being  पिटे   by  England and Australia respectively .
Wales failed to qualify  लिये   the  2008 World Cup  ,  being  the   दूसरी   उच्चतम   क्रमित  side  नहीं  to do so ,  having  lost to Scotland  on  points difference over  दो   मिलान  .
In 2008 Australian John Dixon became  the   नई  head  कोच  and appointed  ली  Briers as captain , having played  लिये   वेल्स   चूंकि   1998  .
In  हाल  seasons Wales  have  taken massive  strides  under former player Iestyn  हैरिस  who has coached Wales  to  back  to  back  यूरोपीय   कप   सफलताओं  , which  culminated  in a Four  राष्ट्र  appearance in 2011 .
Cardiomyopathy (  वस्तुतः  `` heart muscle disease ''  )   is  the measurable deterioration of  the  function of the myocardium (  the  heart muscle  )  for any reason ,  प्रायः  leading  to  heart failure  ;  common symptoms  हैं   dyspnea  ( breathlessness ) and  परिधीय   एडिमा   (   सूजन   of  the  टाँगे   )  .
People with  cardiomyopathy   हैं  often at risk  of  dangerous forms of irregular heart beat and sudden  हृदय   मौत  .
the   सबसे  common form of  cardiomyopathy   is  dilated cardiomyopathy .
बकवास   in  its literal meaning refers  to   the  act of  यौन  intercourse .
It is  an  English  शब्द  that is often  प्रयुक्त   as  a  profanity  , either to  denote  disdain or as an  intensifier   .
the  origin of the  शब्द  is obscure .
It is usually  माना  to  be   पहला  attested to  around  1475 , but it  may  be  considerably  older .
In  आधुनिक  usage ,  बकवास  and  इसके  derivatives  (  such  as  fucker and fucking ) can  be  used  in  the  स्थिति  of a noun ,  a  verb , an  क्रियाशील  or  an  adverb  .
There  हैं  many common phrases which make use of  the  word ,  as  well  as   a  number of  यौगिकों   incorporating   it  , such as  motherfucker  .
नोट  :  इस  article adopts the U.S.  विभाग  of Transportation 's definition of a passenger  गाडी   ,   to  mean a car or truck  ,  used for passengers , excluding buses and trains .
The United States  is  home to  the   largest   यात्री   गाडी  market of any country  in  the world  .
Overall , there were an estimated  254.4  million registered passenger vehicles in  the  United States  according   to  a  2007   बिन्दु  study  .
इस  number  ,  along with the average  आयु  of vehicles , has increased steadily since  1960  ,  indicating  a growing number  of   वाहनों   प्रति  capita  .
The Chinese car market  ,   however   ,  is  poised  to soon exceed the United States ; by  the  end of  2012  ,  वहीँ  were over 240  लाख  cars on the road  in  China  .
The United  राज्य   is   भी  home  to  three large  गाडी   निर्माताओं   :  General Motors , Ford  मोटर  Company and Chrysler ,  जिससे  have  historically  been referred to  as   the  `` Big  तीन   .   ''
क्रिसलर  however  is  no longer  among  the top three ; but is number  पाँच  , behind Toyota  और  Honda .
the  motor car  रै   clearly  become an integral part  of  American life , with  वाहनों   outnumbering  licensed drivers .
Clinical laboratory  in   a  Hospital setting showing several  स्वचालित   analysers  .
A  चिकित्सा  laboratory  or   नैदानिक  laboratory  is  a  प्रयोगशाला  where tests are done on clinical specimens in  अनुक्रम   to  get information about the health of a patient as pertaining to  the  diagnosis , treatment  ,   और  prevention of disease  .
In poker , players  construct   हैंड्स   of  five  ताश   according  to predetermined rules , which vary according  to   जिससे  variant of poker  is  being played .
These hands are compared  using   a  hand  रैंकिंग   प्रणाली  that is  मानक  across all variants of  पोकर  ,  the  player  साथ  the highest-ranking  हाथ  winning that particular deal  in   सबसे  variants of  पोकर  .
In some variants  ,  the  lowest-ranking  hand  can   जीत   or  tie .
These  हाथ  rankings are  भी  used in  कुछ  other card  खेल  ,  और  in poker dice .
The  रैंकिंग  of  a  particular hand is increased by  सहित  multiple cards of the same  कार्ड   रैंक  ,  by  all five cards being  इससे  the same  सूट  , or  by   सब  five cards being  of  consecutive rank .
the  relative ranking  of  the various hand categories is based on the  संभाव्यता  of being randomly dealt such a hand from a  well-  shuffled  डेक   .
ब्रूस  Randall Hornsby ( born November 23  ,  1954 ) is  an   अमरीकी   virtuoso  ; a  सिंगर  , pianist ,  सिंथेसाइज़र   ,  accordion , and dulcimer player , and  songwriter   .
Known  लिये   the  spontaneity  और  creativity of his  सजीव   प्रदर्शन  , Hornsby draws  अक्सर   इससे  classical , jazz ,  ब्लूग्रास  , folk  ,  Motown , gospel ,  चट्टान  ,  ब्लूज़   ,  and jam band musical traditions with his songwriting  और   the   seamless  improvisations contained within .
Hornsby 's recordings  have  been recognised on  a  number of  अवसरों   साथ   उद्योग  awards , including the Best  नई  Artist Grammy in 1987  साथ  Bruce Hornsby and  the  Range , the Best Bluegrass  रिकॉर्डिंग  Grammy in 1990  ,  and  the   बेहतरीन  Pop  इंस्ट्रूमेंटल  Grammy  in  1993  .
Hornsby has  भी  achieved recognition for his solo albums and  प्रदर्शन  , his touring  बैंड  Bruce Hornsby  और  the Noisemakers ,  उसके   ब्लूग्रास  project  साथ   रिकी   skaggs  and his appearances  as  a session- and guest-musician  .
he  also  collaborated   साथ  Grateful  मुर्दे  and  थी  a member of the  बैंड  from September 1990 to  कूच   1992  , playing at over  एक  hundred shows during  कि  period .
Sugarcane  वृक्षारोपण  in rural Cuba
Agriculture  in  Cuba has played  an   महत्वपूर्ण  part  in   the  economy  लिये   अनेक   सौ   सालो   .
कृषि   contributes  less than 10 percent  to   the  gross domestic product ( GDP  )  , but it  employs  roughly 20  प्रतिशत  of the working population  .
परिचय  30  प्रतिशत  of the  देश   's   जमीन  is used for crop cultivation  .
The inefficient agricultural industry  in  Cuba has led  to  the need to import large amounts  of  foods .
Cuba now imports about 80 %  of  the food  it   rations   to  the  पब्लिक  .
The rationing program  खाते  for about a  तीसरा  of  the  food energy the average Cuban  consumes  .
overall   ,  however , Cuba is  निर्भर  on imports  लिये  only 16  %  of its food  .

Mega Millions  (  initially  पुकारा  The  बिग   खेल  Mega Millions as  the  successor of The  बिग   खेल   )  is  an  American multi-jurisdictional $ 1  लॉटरी  game  .
The  पहला  ( The  बिग  Game ) Mega Millions  आरेखण  was in 2002 ( see below ) .
The minimum Mega Millions advertised jackpot  is   $  12,000,000 , paid in  26  equal  वार्षिक  installments ( unless the cash option  is  chosen )  ;  usually , the jackpot increases when there is no top-prize  विजेता  .
However ,  despite  no jackpot winner for the $ 12,000,000 December 18  ,  2012  आरेखण  ,  the   जैकपॉट  remained at $ 12,000,000 for  the  drawing to be held  on  December 21  .
(   देखिए   नीचे  for information on how  the  game 's jackpot is funded .  )
reflecting   आम   अभ्यास  among American lotteries , the  जैकपॉट  is  advertised  as a  नाममात्र  value of annual installments  .
a  cash value option  (  the  usual  choice ) , when chosen by  a  jackpot winner  (  see below ) , pays  the  approximate present  मान  of the  किश्तों   .
Mega Millions  फिलहाल  uses a 5/56 ( white balls )  प्लस  1/46  (  the Mega  बॉल  ) double matrix  to  select its winning numbers .
Each game  लागत   $  1 .
in  43  of  the 44 Mega  लाखो  jurisdictions ( California is the exception ) ,  वहीँ   is  an  विकल्प   ,   पुकारा   megaplier   (  such games are  $  2  प्रत्येक   )   जहाँ  non-jackpot prizes  हैं  multiplied by 2  ,  3 , or 4 .
The Megaplier was made available  to  all Mega Millions jurisdictions in  जनवरी   2011  ; it  began  as a Texas  -only  option .
Mega Millions is  drawn  at  10:59  p.m. Eastern time Tuesdays  और  Fridays  ,  including  छुट्टियाँ  .
Mega Millions  is  administered  by  a  consortium  of its 12 original lotteries and the drawings are  आयोजित   at   wsb-tv  in Atlanta , Georgia .
पर्यवेक्षित  by the  जॉर्जिया  Lottery .
The largest jackpot in Mega Millions , as well as in  अमरीकी   लॉटरी   इतिहास  , was $  656,000,000  annuitized ( with a cash option of $  474,000,000   )   लिये   the  March 30  ,  2012 drawing  in  which  वहीँ   यहूद   तीन  jackpot-winning tickets  ;  one  प्रत्येक  in Illinois , Kansas  ,  and Maryland .
All three  टिकटें  had been claimed as of April 18  ,  with each set of winners choosing the cash  विकल्प  .
is  a  Japanese  manga  series created  by  writer  tsugumi  Ohba and  manga  artist Takeshi Obata  .
The main character is Light Yagami  ,   a   ऊँची   स्कूल   छात्र  who  discovers  a supernatural notebook , the  ``  Death  नोट  '' , dropped on Earth by  a  shinigami  (  a god  of  death ) named  ryuk   .
The Death Note grants its user the ability  to   मार  anyone whose  नाम   और   फेस  they  जान  , by writing the name  in  the  कोपी  while  picturing  their  फेस  .
The  श्रेणी  centers around  लाइट  's attempt to  बनाएँ  and rule a world `` cleansed of  दुष्ट  '' as `` God ''  using  the notebook  ,  and the efforts of a detective known  as  L to stop  उसे  .
Death  नोट   थी   पहला  serialized in 108 chapters  by  Shueisha in  the   जापानी  manga  पत्रिका   साप्ताहिक  Shōnen Jump from December 2003 to  may  2006 .
The  श्रेणी  was  भी   प्रकाशित  in  tankōbon   स्वरूप   in  Japan  starting  in  may   2004  and  समाप्ति  in October 2006 with a total  of  thirteen  आयतन   .
the  anime series  aired   in  Japan from October 3 , 2006 , to June 26 ,  2007   .
Composed  of  37 episodes , the anime  थी  developed  by  Madhouse  और   निर्देशित  by Tetsuro  araki  .
A  लाइट  novel  आधारित  on  the  series , written by Nisio Isin , was  released  in Japan .
Additionally , various video games have been  प्रकाशित   by  Konami for Nintendo DS  .
The series  थी  adapted into live-action films  released  in Japan  on   जून   17  , 2006 , November 3  ,   2006   ,  and February  2  , 2008 .
Viz Media licensed  the   मौत   नोट  manga  in  North America and has published all the  बारह   आयतन  from the series , a 13th volume  जिससे  serves as  a  `` reader 's  मार्गदर्शिका  '' , as well  as   the  light novels .
the  episodes from  the   दुश्मनी  first appeared in North  अमेरिका  as  downloadable  by IGN  .
Viz  बाद   licensed  the  दुश्मनी   श्रेणी   और  it  aired  on Bionix in  कनाडा  and on Cartoon Network in  the  United States .
the  live-action  films  briefly played in certain North  अमरीकी  theaters since 2008 .
However , none of  the  video  खेल   have  thus  दूर  been published in North America or Europe  .
Death  नोट  is  एक  of Weekly Shōnen Jumps best-selling  manga  series of all time  ,   साथ  sales  over  26.5 million copies .
Halloween  or   hallowe'en  ( a  संकुचन   of  ``  सब  Hallows '  संध्या   ``  ) , also known  as  All Hallows ' Eve ,  is  a yearly celebration observed in a number of countries on October 31 ,  the  eve  of  the Western Christian  feast  of  सब   hallows   (  or All Saints ) and the  दिन   initiating  the triduum of Hallowmas .
according  to many  विद्वानों  ,  सब   hallows   '  Eve  is  a Christianised  feast  originally influenced by western European harvest  त्यौहार  ,  और  festivals  of  the dead  साथ  possible pagan roots ,  विशेषकर   the  Celtic Samhain .
Other  विद्वानों  maintain  कि  it originated  independently  of Samhain  और  has solely  ईसाई  roots  .
Typical  त्यौहार  Halloween activities  शामिल   trick-or-treating  ( also known as  ``  guising ``  )  , attending costume parties  ,  carving pumpkins  into  jack-o'-lanterns , lighting  bonfires   ,  apple bobbing , visiting haunted  आकर्षण   ,   playing  pranks ,  telling  scary stories  ,  and watching horror films .
नई   यॉर्क   नगर  taxicabs during Midtown rush hour in Manhattan
the   taxicabs   of  New York City  ,   साथ  their  distinctive  yellow paint  ,   हैं  a  widely   पहचाना   प्रतीक  of the  नगर  .
Taxicabs  हैं  operated by private companies and licensed by the New York City Taxi  और  Limousine Commission ( TLC ) .
It  भी  oversees over 40,000  अन्य  for-hire vehicles , including ``  ब्लैक   गाड़ियाँ  '' ,  commuter  vans and ambulettes  .
``  medallion   टैक्सी   ,  '' the familiar yellow cabs , are the  तभी  vehicles  in  the city permitted  to  pick up  यात्री   in  response to a  गली  hail .
Schematic cross section of part  of  leaf  ,   जाइलम  shown as  रेड   वृत्त  at  फिगर  8 .
जाइलम  is one  of  the  दो   प्रकार  of transport tissue in vascular plants  (   फ्लोएम  is  the   अन्य  ) .
the   शब्द   जाइलम  is derived  इससे  the Greek word  ξύλον  ( xylon ) ,  अर्थ  `` wood  ''   ;   the   best-known   जाइलम  tissue  is   लकडी   ,  though it is  मिला  throughout the plant .
Its basic function is to transport water  ,   लकिन  it also  transports  some  nutrients  through  the  plant  .
U.S.  महिलाओं  suffragists  demonstrating  for the right to vote ,  फ़रवरी  1913 .
Women 's suffrage  भी   ज्ञात  as woman suffrage is the  सही   of  women to vote and to run for office .
Limited voting rights  यहूद  gained  by  women in Sweden , Finland and  कुछ  western  u.S.  states in  the  late 19th century .
International organizations were formed to coordinate efforts , especially the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Council  of  Women ( 1888 ) and  the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Woman Suffrage Alliance ( 1904  )   .
In 1893  ,  New Zealand , then a self-governing British colony , granted adult  महिलाओं  the  सही  to  vote  and the  self-governing  British colony of South  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  did the  वही  in 1895  ,   लकिन  also permitted women to  चलाएं  for office  .
ऑस्ट्रेलिया  federated in 1901 , and women acquired the  सही  to vote and stand in federal elections from 1902 , though  uneven  restrictions on Aboriginal women voting in national  चुनावों  were not completely removed  जबतक  1962  .
the  first European country  to   introduce  women 's suffrage was the Grand  duchy  of Finland ,  तब  part  of  the  रूसी   साम्राज्य   ,  which also  उत्पादित  the  संसार  's first female  सदस्यों   of  parliament in  the  1907  संसदीय  elections .
Norway  followed  ,  granting  full women  's   suffrage  in 1913  .
In most Western countries  ,   महिलाओं  's suffrage came  बाद  World I War I  i  ,  साथ  some important  लेट   अनुकूलक  being France in 1944  और  Switzerland in  1971  .
Women  's  suffrage  रै  generally been recognized after  राजनैतिक  campaigns to obtain  it  were waged .
In many countries it was granted before universal suffrage  .
Women 's  suffrage  is explicitly  stated  as  a  right  अंतर्गत  the Convention  on  the Elimination  of  All  फ़ॉर्म  of Discrimination  विरूद्ध  Women , adopted by  the   संयुक्त  Nations  in  1979 .
The  तेरहवीं  Tale ( 2006 )  by  Diane Setterfield  is  a gothic suspense novel ,  the  author 's first  प्रकाशित   किताब  .
यहोवा  's  गवाह  is a  millenarian  restorationist Christian denomination with nontrinitarian beliefs  पृथक  from mainstream Christianity .Sources  लिये   descriptors  : •  millenarian  :  •  Restorationist : • Christian  :  • Denomination  :   the  organization reports worldwide membership of  over  7.78 million adherents  शामिल  in  इंजीलवाद  ,  सम्मेलन   उपस्थिति  of over 12 million  ,   और  annual Memorial attendance of  over  19 million .
वे  are  निर्देशित   by   the  Governing Body  of  Jehovah 's Witnesses  ,   a  group of elders in  ब्रुकलीन   ,   नई  York , that  establishes  all doctrines .
Jehovah 's  गवाह  ' beliefs are based on  उनके  interpretations  of  the  बाइबल   और  they prefer to  उपयोग  their own  अनुवाद  ,  the  New  संसार  Translation of the Holy Scriptures .
They believe  कि   the   विनाश  of  the   उपस्थित  world  प्रणाली  at Armageddon is imminent ,  और  that  the  establishment  of  God  's  kingdom on earth is the  तभी  solution  लिये  all problems faced  by   mankind  .
The group emerged from the  बाइबल   छात्र  movement —founded in  the  late 1870s by Charles Taze  रसेल   साथ   the   गठन   of  Zion 's Watch Tower Tract Society —with  significant  organizational and  doctrinal  changes  अंतर्गत  the leadership  of  Joseph  फ्रैंकलिन   रदरफोर्ड  .
The name  यहोवा   's  witnesses , based  on  Isaiah 43:10–12 ,  थी  adopted  in  1931 to distinguish themselves from other Bible Student groups and symbolize a break with the legacy of Russell 's  परंपराओं  .
Jehovah  's  Witnesses are  बेहतरीन  known for  उनके  door-to-door  उपदेश   ,   distributing   साहित्य   ऐसे  as The Watchtower and Awake !
,  and  refusing  military service and blood transfusions .
वे   consider   उपयोग   of  the name Jehovah  vital   लिये  proper worship  .
They reject  trinitarianism   ,   अंतर्निहित  immortality  of  the soul  ,  and hellfire , which they consider  to   be   unscriptural   doctrines  .
वे  do  नहीं  observe Christmas ,  ईस्टर   ,  birthdays , or  अन्य   छुट्टियाँ   और  customs they  consider   to  have pagan  origins   असंगत  with Christianity .
Adherents  commonly  refer to their body of  मान्यताओं  as `` the truth '' and consider themselves to be ``  in  the truth ''  .
They  consider   धर्मनिरपेक्ष  society to be  morally  corrupt  और  under the  influence  of Satan  ,  and  सबसे   सीमा   उनके   सोशल   बातचीत  with  non-witnesses  .
संकीर्तन  disciplinary  क्रियाएँ  include disfellowshipping ,  उनके   पद   लिये  formal expulsion and  shunning   .
Baptized individuals  जो   formally  leave are considered disassociated  और   हैं  also shunned .
disfellowshipped   और   disassociated   individuals   may  eventually  be   reinstated  if  deemed  repentant .
The religion 's position regarding conscientious  आपत्ति  to  सैन्य  service and refusal to salute  नेशनल  flags has  brought   it  into conflict  साथ  some  सरकारें  .
Consequently ,  यहोवा   's  Witnesses have been  persecuted   और  their activities  हैं   बैन  or restricted in  कुछ  countries  .
Persistent  विधिक  challenges  by  Jehovah 's  गवाह  have influenced legislation related to civil rights in several  देशों  .
पिछला   टैंगो  in Paris  (   )   is  a 1972 Franco-Italian  रोमांटिक  Drama  फिल्मी  directed by Bernardo Bertolucci  जिससे   portrays  a  हाल  American widower who  begins  an  बेनाम  sexual  संबंध   साथ  a young ,  betrothed  Parisian woman .
It stars  मार्लोन  Brando , Maria Schneider , and  jean-pierre  Léaud  .
The film  's   कच्चा  portrayal  of  sexual violence and emotional turmoil led to international  विवाद  and  खींचा  various  स्तर  of  सरकारी   सेंसरशिप   .
the  MPAA  दिया  the film an X  दरजा  upon release in  the   संयुक्त  States .
After revisions were  बना  to the  mpaa   दरजा  code , it was  वर्गीकृत  as  an  NC-17 in 1997 .
mgm  released  a  censored R-rated  काटें   in  1981 .
The  फिल्मी  has its NC-17 rating  लिये  `` some  सुस्पष्ट  sexual content . ''
खिड़कियाँ  XP is an operating  प्रणाली  produced by  microsoft   लिये  use on personal  कंप्यूटर   ,   सहित  home and business desktops , laptops and media centers .
First  released  to computer manufacturers  on  August  24   ,  2001 , it is  the  second most popular version of Windows  ,  based on installed user base .
the   नाम  ``  xp  '' is short  लिये  ``  अनुभव   ''  ,  highlighting  the enhanced user experience .
खिड़कियाँ  XP , the  successor   to   खिड़कियाँ   2000  and Windows ME , was the first consumer-oriented operating system produced by Microsoft to  be  built on the Windows  nt   कर्नेल  .
Windows XP was  released  worldwide for retail sale on  अक्तूबर   25  ,  2001  , and over 400 million copies were in use in  जनवरी  2006 .
It was  succeeded  by Windows Vista  in  January 2007 .
सीधा  OEM and  खुदरा   बिक्री  of Windows XP ceased on  जून  30 ,  2008  .
Microsoft  जारी   to  sell Windows XP through their System  बिल्डर   (   छोटी  OEMs who sell assembled computers ) program until January 31 , 2009  .
On  अप्रैल  10 , 2012 ,  microsoft  reaffirmed that extended support  लिये  Windows XP  और  Office 2003 would end on April  8  , 2014 and  सुझाया   कि  administrators begin preparing  to  migrate to  a  newer OS  .
The NT -based versions  of  Windows , which are  प्रोग्रामित   in  C  ,  C++ , and  सभा  ,  हैं  known for their improved stability and  दक्षता   over  the 9x  संस्करण   of   microsoft  Windows .
Windows XP presented a significantly redesigned graphical  उपयोक्ता  interface  ,  a  बदलें  Microsoft  प्रचारित  as more user-friendly than previous versions of Windows .
In an  attempt  to  further  ameliorate the `` DLL hell  ``  that plagued the past versions  of  Windows , improved side-by-side assembly  प्रौद्योगिकी   in  Windows  xp  allows side-by-side  संस्थापना  , registration and servicing of multiple versions of globally shared software  components  in full isolation .
It is also  the   पहला  version  of   खिड़कियाँ  to  उपयोग   उत्पाद  activation to combat illegal copying .
During Windows  xp   's  development , the  प्रोजेक्ट  was codenamed `` Whistler  ''   ,   बाद   whistler   ,   अंग्रेजों  Columbia , as many Microsoft  कर्मचारी  skied at  the  Whistler-Blackcomb ski  रिज़ॉर्ट  .
according   to  web analytics data generated  by  Net Applications ,  खिड़कियाँ   xp  was the most widely  प्रयुक्त  operating system until  अगस्त   2012  , when  खिड़कियाँ  7  overtook  it .
,  Windows XP market share  is  at 38.99 % , having decreased almost every  माह   चूंकि  at  तनिक  November 2007  ,  the  पहला  month for which statistics are publicly available from Net Applications .
``  पोर  una Cabeza  ''  is  an  Argentine  टैंगो   साथ  music and lyrics  लिखा  in 1935  by   कार्लोस   gardel  and  अल्फ्रेडो  Le Pera respectively .
The  नाम   is   a  Spanish  horse-racing   phrase  meaning  ``   by  a head  ''  , which refers to a  घोड़ा  winning a race by the  लंबाई   of  one head .
The  गीत   बोलो  of a  बाध्यता  horse-track gambler who compares his addiction  लिये  horses with his attraction to  महिलाओं  .
Alfredo Le Pera was a Brazilian from  são  Paulo ,  a  much Italian-influenced  क्षेत्रफल  in Brazil ,  और  also the  जन्मस्थान  of  zequinha  de Abreu ,  composer  of Tico-Tico no Fubá  .
Le Pera and Gardel died  in  an airplane crash in Medellín ,  (  Colombia ) , on  जून  24 , 1935 .
Por una Cabeza
The tango  रै   चूंकि  been performed  by  numerous tango orchestras .
Tango scenes  साथ   ``   पोर   ऊना  Cabeza '' appear in Delicatessen ( 1991 ) , Scent  of   a   स्त्री  ( 1992  )  , Schindler 's List  (  1993 ) , True  झूठ  ( 1994 )  ,  Titanic ( 1996 ) , Bad Santa  (   uncut   संस्करण  ,  2003  ) , All the King 's  मेन  (  2006  ) , Planet 51  (   2009  )  ,   एपीसोड   37   of   nip/tuck  ( 2003–2010 )  ,  episode 9  of  South  कोरियाई  drama  श्रेणी   मीठी  Spy ( 2005–08 ) ,  the  beginning  और  ending credits  of  the South Korean drama broadcast I 'm Sorry , I Love You (  2004  ) ,  और  the  एपीसोड   ``  Down the Rabbit  छेद   ``  ( 2007  )   .
In  the  movie Frida (  सलमा   हायेक   ,  2002 ) , Gardel is heard  गायन   it  on a  रेडियो  .
it  is  भी  quoted  in   दाउद   डेल  Tredici 's `` Good News  !
Nilda  is  Back ''  (  from the song cycle  miz   inez  Sez ) .
in  Scent  of  a  स्त्री  ( 1992  )  , the tango  is   performed  by the  ``  The Tango Project '' ,  जो  actually appear  in  the dancing scene starring Al  पचिनो  ( the recording  प्रयुक्त   is  available on  एक  of their CD albums ) .
John Williams  arranged   a  version of the piece that  appears  on the album `` Cinema  serenade  ''  साथ  the violin  सोलो  performed by Itzhak Perlman .
Perlman and Williams  (  conducting  )  have  भी   performed  the piece together in  सजीव   कॉन्सर्ट  .
In 2012  a   नृत्य   संस्करण   थी   released  by the  समूह   ``   da  Carrera ''  featuring  the original vocal  रिकॉर्डिंग   by   कार्लोस  Gardel  .
The  baroreflex  or baroreceptor reflex  is  one of  the  body 's homeostatic  mechanisms   लिये  maintaining blood pressure  .
It  provides   a  negative feedback loop  in   जिससे   an   elevated  blood pressure reflexively causes heart  रेट  to decrease therefore causing  रक्त   दबाव  to decrease ; likewise  ,  decreased  रक्त  pressure  activates  the baroreflex ,  causing  heart rate  to  increase thus causing  an   बढ़ाएँ   in  blood  दबाव   .
The system relies on  specialized  neurons ,  ज्ञात  as baroreceptors  ,  in  the  aortic arch  ,  carotid  साइनस  , and elsewhere to monitor changes  in  blood pressure and relay them to  the  brainstem  .
Subsequent changes in  रक्त   दबाव  are mediated by the autonomic nervous system .
अलिंदी  natriuretic peptide forms a parallel  ऋणात्मक  feedback loop in  an  endocrinological contrast to the renin-angiotensin  प्रणाली  .
the   loma   prieta  earthquake , also  ज्ञात   as  the Quake  of   '89  and  the  World  श्रेणी  Earthquake , was a major earthquake that  struck  the San Francisco Bay Area of California on October  17  , 1989 , at  5:04  pm local  समय  .
Caused  by  a slip along the San Andreas Fault  ,   the   भूकंप  lasted  10–15  seconds and measured 6.9 on both the  पल   परिमाण   स्केल  ( surface-wave magnitude 7.1 )  और   on  the open-ended Richter  स्केल  .
The quake killed  63  people  throughout  northern California , injured 3,757  और  left  कुछ  3,000–12,000 people homeless .
the  earthquake occurred  दौरान   the   warm-up  practice for  the  third  खेल  of  the  1989 World Series  ,   featuring  both  of  the Bay  क्षेत्रफल  's Major League Baseball teams ,  the   ओकलैंड  Athletics  और   the  San Francisco Giants .
Because of game-related sports coverage  ,  this was the first  प्रमुख  earthquake  in  the United  राज्य  to  have   इसके   आरंभिक  jolt broadcast live on  टेलीविज़न  .
साहूकार  in the standard Staunton pattern
the  pawn ( ♙♟ ) is  the  most numerous and in most circumstances  the  weakest piece in the  खेल  of chess  ,  historically representing  infantry   or  ,  अधिक  particularly , armed peasants  or   pikemen  .
In chess , each player begins the game with eight  प्यादे  ,  एक  on each square  of  the  रैंक  immediately in front of the other pieces .
(  In algebraic notation , the white pawns start  on  a2 , b2 , c2 , ... , h2  ,   जबकि   ब्लैक  pawns start on a7 , b7  ,  c7 ,  ...  , h7 . )
व्यक्तिगत   प्यादे  are  referred   to  by the file on which  वे  stand  .
लिये  example , one speaks of `` White  's  f-pawn ''  or  `` Black  's   b-pawn   ''  , or less commonly  (  using descriptive notation  )   ,  `` White 's king 's bishop pawn ''  or  `` Black 's queen 's  नाईट  pawn '' .
it  is also common to refer  to  a  rook  pawn , meaning any  साहूकार   on  the  a-  or  h-file  ,  a  knight  साहूकार  ( on  the  b-  or  g-file )  ,   a  bishop pawn ( on the c-  or  f-file ) ,  a  queen pawn (  on  the  d-file  ) ,  a   किंग  pawn ( on the e-file )  ,   और  a central  साहूकार   (  on  either   the   d-  or e-file )  .
the  military forces of the world have  differing  approaches to  the   enlistment  of homosexual (  gay  and  लेस्बियन   )   और  bisexual individuals .
the  armed forces of most developed countries have now removed  नीतियों  excluding non-heterosexual individuals ( with  सख्त  policies on sexual  उत्पीड़न  )  .
Nations that permit gay people  to  serve openly  in   the   सैन्य  include  the  4  of   the  5  सदस्यों  of the UN Security Council ( United  राज्य   ,  United Kingdom  ,  France  ,  and Russia ) , the Republic of China ( Taiwan ) , Australia  ,  Israel  ,   दक्षिण   अफ़्रीकी   ,  Argentina ,  और  all  नाटो   सदस्यों  excluding Turkey  .
हाइड्रोजन  production  is  the family  of  industrial methods  लिये   generating  hydrogen .
फिलहाल  the dominant technology for direct production  is  steam reforming  इससे  hydrocarbons .
Many other methods are  ज्ञात  including electrolysis and thermolysis .
in  2006 ,  the   संयुक्त  States  थी   अनुमानित   to  have a production  क्षमता   of  11 million tonnes of hydrogen .
5   लाख  tonnes of hydrogen were  खपत  on-site in oil refining , and in the  उत्पादन   of  ammonia (  haber  process  )  and  methanol  ( reduction  of  carbon  मोनोऑक्साइड  )  .
0.4  लाख  tonnes  यहूद  an  incidental  by-product  of   the  chlor-alkali process .
Hydrogen  उत्पादन  is an estimated $ 100  अरब  industry  .
A  आधार  point ( often denoted  as   bp  , colloquially referred to in  the   बहुवचन   as  `` bips ''  ,  also  ज्ञात  as  a  `` beep ''  )  is a  ईकाई  equal to  एक  hundredth of a percentage point  ,  or one  भाग  per ten thousand  ,   1/10000  .
the  same unit is also ( rarely  )  called a permyriad , literally meaning 'for ( every  )  myriad  (   टेन  thousand )  '  , and in  कि  context is written  साथ   जिससे  looks like  a  percent sign (  %  ) with two  अतिरिक्त   zeroes  at the end (  जैसे  a stylized form of the  चार  zeros in the denominator  ,  although  it  originates  as  a natural extension of the percent  (   %   )  and permille  (  ‰  )   लक्षण   )  .
A basis point  is  defined as:
1 basis point = 1 permyriad =  एक   one-hundredth   प्रतिशत
1 bp  =   1  =  0.01  % = 0.1‰ =  10−4  = =  0.0001
1  %  = 100 bp = 100
Basis  अंक   हैं  used  as   a  convenient unit  of   मापन   in  contexts  जहाँ  percentage  मतभेद  of less than 1 % are discussed  .
The  सबसे  common  उदाहरण   is  interest rates ,  जहाँ  differences  in   ब्याज  rates  of  less than  1   %   प्रति   साल  are usually meaningful  to  talk about .
For example  ,  a difference of 0.10 percentage points is equivalent  to  a change  of   10  basis  अंक   (  e.g . a 4.67 %  रेट  increases by 10 basis points to 4.77  %  ) .
Like  प्रतिशत  points , basis points avoid  the  ambiguity between  सापेक्ष  and absolute discussions about interest  दरों   by  dealing only  साथ  the  निरपेक्ष  change in  न्यूमेरिक  value  of   a  rate  .
For example ,  if   a  report says there  रै  been  a  `` 1  %   बढ़ाएँ  '' from a 10  %  interest  रेट   ,  this could refer to an  बढ़ाएँ  either from 10 % to 10.1  %   (  relative , 1 % of 10 %  )   ,  or from 10  %  to 11 % ( absolute , 1  %   प्लस   10   %   )  .
if  , however , the report  says   वहीँ  has been a `` 10 basis point increase  ''  from  a  10 %  ब्याज  rate ,  तब  we know that  the   ब्याज  rate of  10  % has increased by  0.10  % (  the  absolute change  )  to a  10.1  % rate .
it   is  common  अभ्यास  in the financial  उद्योग   to  use basis  अंक  to denote a rate  बदलें   in  a financial instrument  ,  or the difference (  स्प्रेड   )   between  two interest rates  ,   सहित  the yields  of   fixed-income  securities  .
Since certain loans  और  bonds may  commonly   be  quoted in relation to some  अनुक्रमणिका  or underlying security  ,   वे   होगा  often be quoted as a spread over ( or under  )  the index .
For example , a loan that bears interest of 0.50 %  प्रति  annum above the London Interbank Offered Rate ( LIBOR ) is  कहा  to  be  50 basis  अंक   over   libor  , which is commonly expressed as `` L+50bps  ''   or  simply  ``  L+50 ''  .
The term `` basis point '' has its  origins  in  व्यापार   the  ``  आधार   ''   or  the spread between two interest rates .
चूंकि   the  basis  is  usually small , these are quoted multiplied up  by  10000 ,  और   hence  a ``  पूरा  point '' movement in the  ``   आधार  ''  is   a  basis point .
Contrast with pips in FX forward markets .
the  relationship between percentage changes and  आधार  points can be summarized as follows : 1 percentage  पाइंट  change =  100   आधार   अंक  , and  0.01  percentage  अंक  = 1 basis  पाइंट  .
So , a  बंध  whose yield  increases  from  5  %  to   5.5  % is said to increase by  50   आधार  points ; or interest rates that have risen 1 percentage point are said to  have  increased  by   100  basis points .
The British  royal   परिवार   is  the group of close relatives of the  monarch   of   the  United  किंगडम   .
The term  is   भी  commonly  लागू  to the same group  of   लोगों  who  हैं   the  relations of  the  monarch  in  her  or   उसके  role as  sovereign  of any of the  अन्य  Commonwealth realms , thus sometimes  at   variance  with official national terms for the family .
Members  of   the   royal  Family belong to  ,  either  by  birth  or  marriage , the  हाउस  of Windsor  ,  since  1917  , when George  v   बदला   the   नाम  of the royal house  इससे  Saxe-Coburg and Gotha .
This decision was primarily taken  क्युकी  Britain  और  her  साम्राज्य  were  at  war with  जर्मनी   और  given  the  British  royal   परिवार   's  strong German ancestry  ;  it  थी  felt that its public  चित्र   could  be  improved   by  choosing a more British house  नाम  .
the  new  नाम   चुनी   ,   विंडसर  , had absolutely  no  connection other  than  as  the   नाम   of   the   किला   जिससे  was  और  continues  to  be a  royal  residence  .
हालांकि  in the United Kingdom there is  no  strict legal  or  formal definition of who is or is not a member of the  royal  Family  ,   और   अलग  lists will include different people ,  those  carrying the style Her or His Majesty ( HM ) , or Her or  उसके   royal  Highness (  hrh  ) are always considered members  ,   जिससे   प्रायः  results in the application of the term to the  monarch  ,  the  consort of  the  monarch , the widowed  consorts   of  previous monarchs , the  children  of the  monarch   और  previous monarchs ,  the  male-line grandchildren of  the  monarch and  पिछला  monarchs , and the spouses  और  the widows of a monarch 's and  पिछला   monarch   's   बेटे   और  male-line grandsons .
On 30 November 1917 ,  किंग  George  v   जारी  Letters Patent defining who are members of the  royal   परिवार  ;  the  text  of   the  notice  इससे  the  लंदन  Gazette is as  follows:
In 1996 ,  उसके  Majesty The Queen modified these  अक्षर   पेटेंट  , as was  evidenced  by this Notice  इससे  the London Gazette:
in  2013 Letters  पेटेंट  were issued to extend a title and a  स्टाइल  borne by members of the  royal  Family to additional persons to  be   born  , evidenced by this  सूचना  from the  लंदन  Gazette:
Members and relatives of the British  royal   परिवार   historically  represented the monarch  in  various places throughout the British  साम्राज्य   ,   sometimes  for  विस्तारित  periods as viceroys , or  लिये   विशिष्ट  ceremonies or  कार्यक्रम  .
आज   ,  they often perform ceremonial and social duties throughout the  संयुक्त  Kingdom and abroad on behalf  of  the United  किंगडम  .
aside   इससे   the   monarch  , their  तभी  constitutional  भूमिका  in the affairs of government  is  to serve ,  if  eligible and when appointed by letters patent ,  as   a  Counsellor of  राज्य   ,  two or  अधिक  of whom  कसरत  the  प्राधिकार  of the  क्राउन  ( within stipulated limits )  in  the indisposal  or  absence from the British realm of the  monarch  .
in  the other realms of the Commonwealth  रॉयल्टी  do not serve as Counsellors of State .
however  in  प्रत्येक  such realm the monarch 's family members  may  act on  निमित्त   of   ,   हैं  funded by  ,   और  represent  the   sovereign  of  कि   particular  state ,  और  not the United  किंगडम   .
The  महारानी  ,  उसके  consort ,  उसके   children  and grandchildren ,  as   खूब   as  all former sovereigns ' children  और  grandchildren  थाम  places in the  पहला   भाग   of  the official  आदेश  of precedence  in  England and Wales  ,   स्कॉटलैंड  , and Northern Ireland .
Wives  of   the   कहा  enjoy  उनके  husbands  '  precedence , and  पतियों  of princesses are unofficially but  habitually  placed  साथ  their wives  as  well .
however   ,  the Queen changed the  निजी  order of precedence in  the  Royal  परिवार  in favour of  राजकुमारियों  Anne  और  Alexandra , who henceforth take private  पूर्वता  over the Duchess of Cornwall  ,   जो  is otherwise the realm 's highest  रैंकिंग  woman after the Queen herself  .
She did  नहीं  alter  the  relative  पूर्वता  of other  born-princesses  , such as the daughters  of   उसके  younger sons .
हैती  ( ; Haitian  क्रियोल   ayiti  ) , officially  the  Republic of Haiti  (  ; )  ,  is a Caribbean  देश   .
it  occupies  the   पश्चिमी  , smaller portion of  the  island  of  Hispaniola  ,   in  the  वृहद  Antillean archipelago ,  जिससे  it shares  साथ  the Dominican Republic .
ayiti  (  जमीन  of  ऊँची   kyu  ) was the indigenous Taíno or  amerindian   नाम  for the  द्वीप  .
The  देश  's  उच्चतम  point is Pic la  selle  , at .
The total area of Haiti  is  and its  पूंजी  is Port-au-Prince .
Haitian Creole  और   फ्रेंच  are  the  official  भाषाएं   .
Haiti 's regional  ,  historical ,  और  ethno-linguistic  स्थिति  is  अद्वितीय  for several  कारण  .
it  was the first  स्वतंत्र  nation of Latin  अमेरिका   और  the Caribbean , the first black  -led   गणतंत्र  in the world , and the second republic in  the  Americas when it gained independence in 1804 as part of a successful slave revolution  स्थायी  nearly a  दशक   .
In 2012 , Haiti announced its intention  to  seek associate membership status in the African Union .
Haiti is  the  most  populous  of the predominantly  francophone  independent  राष्ट्र  in the Americas .
It is  एक   of   तभी  two  स्वतंत्र  nations in the Americas ( along with Canada ) to designate  फ्रेंच   as  an official language ; the other French-speaking  क्षेत्रों  are  सब   विदेशी  départements ,  or  collectivités ,  of  France .
Haiti  is   the  most populous full  member-state  of  the  Caribbean Community ( CARICOM ) .
It  is  the poorest country in the  americas  as measured  by  the Human Development Index .
Political violence  रै   occurred  regularly throughout  इसके   इतिहास  , leading to government instability .
Most  recently   ,  in February 2004 ,  a  coup d'état originating  in   the  north of the  देश   मजबूर  the resignation and exile of President Jean-Bertrand  aristide  .
A provisional government took control  साथ  security provided  by   the  United Nations Stabilization Mission in Haiti (  minustah   )  .
Michel  martelly  ,  the  current president , was  निर्वाचित  in  the   haitian  general election  ,  2011 .
The  द्वीप   रै   था   a   इतिहास  of destructive earthquakes  .
A 7.0  परिमाण   भूकंप   struck   हैती   on  12  जनवरी  2010 and  तबाह  Port-au-Prince .
The highest  विश्वसनीय  death  गिनती   थी  estimated at 220,000  .
Haitian government  estimates  were  उच्चतर  .
the  Presidential palace ,  पार्लियामेंट  and many  अन्य   महत्वपूर्ण  structures were  नष्ट  , along with countless  घरों  and  व्यवसायों  ,  leaving  hundreds of thousands  of  people  बेघर   .
The country  रै   yet   to  recover  इससे  the  2010  earthquake ( and subsequent  incidents  ) due to both the  गंभीरता  of the  क्षति   हैती   endured  in 2010 , as well  as   a  government  कि  was ineffective well before  the   भूकंप  .
संयुक्त  States aid organizations  have  donated $  2  billion  .
Combined with other international donations ,  ये  funds are intended to contribute to the rebuilding of the  देश  .
The Bloody Beetroots  is  the pseudonym of Sir Bob Cornelius Rifo , the Italian electro  हाउस   और   dance-punk  music producer  ,  DJ and photographer  .
The  खूनी   beetroots   is   well-known  for the black Venom  मुखौटा  he  wears  during performances .
In fact  ,   the   तभी  identifying  पब्लिक  feature  of  Rifo is  the   साल   ``  1977 '' tattooed across  उसके  chest  ,  which  is  both the year that the producer and punk-rock was born .
`` The Bloody  beetroots  DJ  नियत  '' contains Sir Bob Cornelius Rifo and Tommy  चाय  .
A Motorola Advisor alphanumeric  पेजर  used in Brazil  in   the  1990s ,  संचालित  by  teletrim
A  पेजर  is a wireless  दूरसंचार   यंत्र  that receives and displays numeric  or  text  संदेश  ,  or   receives  and announces voice  संदेश  .
One-way  pagers  can  तभी   प्राप्त  messages , while response pagers and  two-way   pagers  can also acknowledge  ,  reply to , and  originate  messages using an  आतंरिक   ट्रांसमीटर  .
Pagers  operate   as  part  of   a  paging system which includes  एक  or  अधिक  fixed transmitters  (  or in the case  of  response pagers and two-way pagers , one  or  more base  स्टेशन   )  ,  as  well as a number of pagers  carried  by mobile users .
These systems can  दायरा   इससे  a restaurant system with  a  single low-power transmitter  ,  to a nationwide system with thousands of high-power base  स्टेशन  .
One  of  the first practical paging  सेवाएं  was launched  in   1950  for physicians in the  नई  York City area  .
physicians  paid  us  $ 12 per  माह  for the  सेवा   और  carried  a  ( 6 oz  )   पेजर   कि   होता  receive phone messages within ( 25  mi  )  of  a single transmitter  मीनार   .
The system  थी   manufactured  by the Reevesound  कम्पनी  and operated  by   telanswerphone  .
In 1960 , John  फ्रांसिस  Mitchell  संयुक्त  elements of Motorola 's  walkie   talkie   और  automobile radio technologies to create  the  first transistorized pager ,  और  from this point , paging  प्रौद्योगिकी  continued to  अग्रिम  , and pager  अपनाना  continued to expand ,  जबतक  the  जल्दी  1990s .
however  ,  by  the mid-1990s  ,  as cellular technologies  became  cheaper and more  widely  available  ,   उन्नत  services began to displace paging as a commercial  उत्पाद  .
Today , pagers  मौजूद  largely as niche  उत्पाद   ,   ढूंढना   preferential  use in applications such as  अस्पताल  ,  पब्लिक  safety , and retail locations where their simplicity , high reliability  ,  and low cost represent significant advantages .
reevesville  is a town  in  Dorchester County  ,  South  कैरोलिना  , United States .
The  जनसांख्यिकी  was  196   at   the  2010  जनसांख्यिकी  .
As  पारिभाषित   by  the U.S. Office of Management and  बजट   ,  and used by  the  U.S. Census Bureau for  सांख्यिकीय  purposes only , Reevesville is  शामिल  within  the  Charleston-North Charleston-Summerville metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  .
Frida Kahlo de Rivera ( born  magdalena   कार्मेन   frieda  Kahlo  y   calderón  ; July  6  , 1907  –   जुलाई   13   ,  1954 )  थी   a   मैक्सिकन  painter  ,  born in Coyoacán , who  is  best known for her self-portraits  .
Kahlo 's life began and ended  in  Mexico City  ,  in her home  ज्ञात  as  the  Blue  हाउस   .
She gave her birth date as July  7   ,   1910  , but her  जनम  certificate  shows   जुलाई  6 ,  1907   .
Kahlo  था  allegedly wanted  the   साल   of  her birth to coincide with the  साल  of the beginning of the Mexican revolution so that her life would begin  साथ  the birth of modern  मैक्सिको  .
Her work  रै  been  मनाये  in  मैक्सिको  as emblematic  of  national  और  indigenous tradition ,  और  by feminists for its uncompromising depiction  of  the female  अनुभव  and form .
मैक्सिकन  culture and  amerindian  cultural tradition  हैं  important  in  her work ,  जिससे  has  महरूम   sometimes   characterized  as Naïve  आर्ट   or  folk art  .
Her  कार्य   रै  also been described  as  ``  surrealist  ''  ,   और   in  1938 André  ब्रेटन  , principal  initiator  of the  surrealist  movement , described Kahlo 's art  as  a `` ribbon around  a  bomb '' .
Kahlo had a volatile marriage with the famous Mexican  कलाकार  Diego Rivera .
वो  suffered lifelong health problems  .
Many of her  स्वास्थ्य  problems  यहूद  the result  of  a traffic accident  वो  survived  as  a teenager .
Recovering  इससे  her  चोटों  isolated  उसके  from  अन्य  people and this isolation influenced her works  ,   अनेक  of  जिससे  are  self-portraits  of one  sort   or  another .
Kahlo suggested , `` I paint myself because I am so often alone and  क्युकी  I  am   the  subject  i  know  बेहतरीन  . ''
She also stated  ,  `` I was  born   a  bitch .
I was  born   a  painter . ''
