Theresienwiese on the  दिन  before  oktoberfest  2006
oktoberfest   is   a  16-day  पर्व  celebrating  बियर  held annually in Munich , Bavaria , Germany  ,  running from  लेट  September to the  पहला  weekend in October  .
It is  एक  of the most famous events in Germany and is the world 's  largest  fair , with more  than   6  million  लोगों  from around the world  उपस्थित  the event every  साल  .
To  the  locals , it is not called  oktoberfest   ,  but `` die  wiesn  ''  ,  after  the  colloquial name  of  the fairgrounds  themselves  .
The  oktoberfest   is  an important part of  bar   संस्कृति  , having  महरूम   आयोजित   चूंकि  1810 .
Other  शहरों   आरपार  the  संसार  also  थाम  Oktoberfest celebrations , modeled after  the  original Munich  इवेंट  .
The Munich  oktoberfest  originally took place during  the  sixteen days  up  to  ,  and including ,  the  first  संडे   in  October .
In 1994 , the schedule  थी  modified in  जवाब  to  जर्मनी  reunification  so  that if  the  first Sunday  in  October falls on the 1st or  2nd  , then the  पर्व   होता  go  on  until October  3   (  German Unity Day ) .
Thus ,  the  festival is now  17  days  जब  the first  संडे  is  अक्तूबर  2 and  18  days when  it  is October 1 .
In  2010   ,  the festival lasted until  the  first Monday  in   अक्तूबर   ,  to mark the anniversary of  the  event  .
the  festival is held in an area named  the  Theresienwiese ( field ,  or  meadow , of Therese ) , often called Wiesn for short ,  स्तिथ  near Munich 's  बीच   .
Large  quantities   of  Oktoberfest Beer are consumed  ,  with almost 7  लाख  liters served  दौरान  the  16  day festival in 2007 .
विज़िटर  may also  आनंद  a  चौड़ी  variety of traditional food such as Hendl  (   मुर्गा  )  ,  Schweinebraten ( roast pork ) , Schweinshaxe ( grilled ham hock )  ,  Steckerlfisch (  ग्रील्ड  fish on a stick ) , Würstl ( sausages )  साथ  with Brezeln ( Pretzel )  ,  Knödel ( potato  or  bread  पकौड़ी  ) ,  käsespätzle   (   चीज   नूडल्स  ) , Reiberdatschi ( potato pancakes  )  , Sauerkraut or Rotkohl/Blaukraut ( red cabbage  )  along  साथ  such Bavarian delicacies as Obatzda ( a spiced cheese-butter  स्प्रेड   )  and  weisswurst   (  a  श्वेत   सॉसेज  ) .
a  platter with  चीज   और  garnishes
Wheels of  gouda
Cheese  is  a generic term for a diverse  समूह   of  milk-based food  उत्पाद  .
Cheese is produced in  wide-ranging   जायका  , textures ,  और   फ़ॉर्म  .
Cheese consists of proteins and fat from  मिल्क   ,   प्रायः   the  milk of cows  ,  buffalo , goats  ,   or  sheep .
it   is   उत्पादित  by coagulation  of  the milk protein casein .
Typically ,  the  milk is  acidified  and addition of the  एंजाइम  rennet causes  जामन  .
the   solids   हैं  separated and  दबाया  into  फाइनल   रूप  .
Some cheeses  have  molds on the rind or throughout .
Most cheeses melt at cooking temperature .
Hundreds  of   प्रकार   of   चीज  from various countries are produced .
Their styles ,  बनावट  and flavors  निर्भर  on the  उत्पत्ति  of  the  milk ( including  the  animal  's  diet )  ,   whether  they  have  been pasteurized ,  the   butterfat   सामग्री  , the bacteria and mold , the  प्रसंस्करण  ,  और  aging  .
Herbs , spices , or wood  धुँआ  may be used as flavoring  एजेंटों  .
The  पीला  to red color of many cheeses ,  ऐसे  as Red  लीसेस्टर   ,  is normally formed  इससे  adding annatto  .
For a few cheeses , the milk is curdled  by  adding acids such as vinegar or  नीबू   रस  .
Most cheeses are acidified to  a  lesser degree by bacteria , which turn  मिल्क  sugars  into  lactic  एसिड  , then the addition  of  rennet completes  the  curdling .
Vegetarian alternatives  to   rennet   हैं   उपलब्धियाँ  ; most  हैं  produced by  fermentation  of  the  fungus  mucor  miehei  ,  but  अन्य  have been extracted from various species of  the   cynara  thistle family .
Cheese  is  valued for its portability  ,  long life  ,  and high content of fat  ,  protein ,  कैल्सियम   ,  and  फॉस्फोरस   .
Cheese is  अधिक  compact  और  has a  longer  shelf life  than   मिल्क   ,  although how long  a   चीज  will keep  may  depend on the type of cheese ; labels  on  packets of  चीज  often  अर्जी   कि   a  cheese  चाहिए  be consumed  भीतर  three to five days  of  opening  .
generally  speaking , hard cheeses last longer than soft cheeses ,  ऐसे  as Brie or  बकरी  's milk cheese .
Cheesemakers near a dairy  प्रदेश  may  लाभ   इससे  fresher , lower-priced milk , and lower shipping  लागत  .
the  long  भंडार   जीवन  of  कुछ  cheese , especially if  it   is  encased in a protective rind , allows selling  जब  markets are favorable .
Additional ingredients may  be  added to some  cheeses  , such as black peppers , garlic , chives or cranberries .
A  विशेषज्ञ  seller of  चीज   is  sometimes known  as  a  cheesemonger  .
To become  an   विशेषज्ञ  in this  फ़ील्ड   ,   जैसे  wine or cooking , requires some  औपचारिक   शिक्षा  and  सालो  of tasting and hands-on experience .
इस  position is  typically  responsible for  सब  aspects  of   the   चीज  inventory  ;  selecting the  चीज  menu , purchasing , receiving , storage  ,  and ripening  .
Legal  citation   सिग्नल  are  a   नियत   of  brief  abbreviated  phrases or  शब्द  used to clarify  the  authority or  significance  of  a   विधिक  citation as it relates to  a  proposition .
Signals help a  रीडर   जल्दी   discern   अर्थ  or usefulness of a  particular  reference when the reference itself does not provide adequate  सूचना  .
सबसे  citation  सिग्नल   हैं  placed in front of the citation  to   जिससे   वे   लागू   .
For  उदाहरण  , in  the   अनुच्छेद  When  लिखने   a   विधिक  argument , it is  महत्वपूर्ण  to  refer  to primary  स्त्रोत  .
To assist readers  in   locating   ये   स्त्रोत  , it is desirable to use a  मानकीकृत  citation format .
See  generally  Harvard Law  पुनर्विलोकन  Association  ,  The Bluebook : A Uniform System of Citation  (   18th  ed  .  2005 ) .
Note  ,  however , that some courts may require  कोई   विधिक   papers   कि  are  सुपुर्द  to  उन्हें  to conform to  a   अलग  citation format .
the signal is the phrase  ``  see  generally  , ''  जिससे  indicates that  the  citation `` The Bluebook :  a  Uniform System  of  Citation ( 18th ed . 2005 ) ''  provides  general  पृष्ठभूमि  information on the  टॉपिक   .
Neil Alden  आर्मस्ट्रांग  (  अगस्त  5  ,   1930   –   अगस्त  25  ,   2012   )   थी  an American  astronaut   और  the first person to walk on the  चंद्रमा  .
He  थी  also an aerospace engineer  ,  naval aviator ,  परीक्षण  pilot ,  और  university professor .
Before becoming an  astronaut   ,   आर्मस्ट्रांग  was  an  officer in the  u.S.   नेवी  and  परोसा  in the Korean War  .
After the war ,  he   अर्जित  his  स्नातक  's  उपाधि   at  Purdue University and  परोसा  as a  परीक्षण  pilot at the National  सलाहकार   कमेटी   लिये  Aeronautics  high-speed  Flight  स्टेशन  ,  अभी   ज्ञात  as the Dryden Flight  शोध   बीच  , where he logged over 900 flights .
He later  समाप्त  graduate studies  at  the University of Southern California  .
A  भागीदार  in the U.S.  एयर  Force  's  Man  in  Space Soonest and X-20  dyna-soar  human spaceflight programs  ,  Armstrong joined the NASA  astronaut  Corps  in   1962  .
He made his first space flight  ,  as  कमांड   पायलट  of Gemini 8 , in 1966  ,  becoming NASA 's  पहला   civilian   astronaut  to fly  in   स्पेस  .
on  this mission ,  he  performed the first docking of two spacecraft , with pilot David Scott .
Armstrong 's second and  पिछला  spaceflight  थी  as mission commander of the Apollo  11  moon  लैंडिंग  ,  in  July 1969  .
On this mission , Armstrong and  बज़   एल्ड्रिन  descended to the lunar  सतह  and spent two  और  a  हाफ  hours exploring , while  माइकल  Collins remained in lunar  कक्षा  in the Command  मोड्यूल  .
Along with Collins and  एल्ड्रिन  ,  आर्मस्ट्रांग  was awarded  the  Presidential Medal of  स्वतंत्रता  by President Richard  निक्सन  ;  in  1978 ,  अध्यक्ष  Jimmy  कार्टर  presented Armstrong  the  Congressional  स्पेस  Medal of Honor in 1978 ;  he  and his  पूर्व   crewmates  received the Congressional Gold Medal in 2009 .
Armstrong  died  in  सिनसिनाटी   ,  Ohio , on  अगस्त  25 , 2012 , at the  आयु   of  82 , after complications  इससे  coronary  धमनी  bypass surgery  .
Secretariat  (   कूच  30 , 1970  –  October 4 , 1989  )  was an American Thoroughbred  racehorse  that in 1973 became the first U.S . Triple Crown champion in 25 years .
He set  रेस  records  in   सब   तीन  events in the  श्रेणी  —  the   केंटकी  Derby  (  1:59.4 ) , the  preakness  Stakes ( 1:53 ) ,  और  the Belmont Stakes (  2:24  ) —  रिकॉर्ड   कि  still stand today .
he  is  माना  to  be   एक  of  the   महानतम  Thoroughbreds of all  समय  .
in  1999  ,  ESPN  क्रमित  Secretariat the 35th best athlete  of  the  20th  century  ,   the  highest ranking racehorse on  the   सूची   url_http  .
He ranked second behind Man o ' War in The  blood-horse   's   सूची  of  the  Top  100  U.S. Racehorses of the 20th Century .
Secretariat  थी   sired  by Bold Ruler out of  somethingroyal   ,   by  Princequillo  .
He was foaled  at   the  Meadow in  कैरोलीन   काउंटी  , Virginia .
Like his famous  पूर्ववर्ती  Man o ' War ,  सचिवालय  was  a   विशाल  chestnut colt  और  was given the  वही  nickname  ,   ``  Big  रेड  . ''
Secretariat 's grandsire  ,  Nasrullah ,  is  also the great-great-grandsire of 1977 Triple Crown winner Seattle Slew .
Owned by  पैनी  Chenery , he was trained by Lucien Laurin and mainly ridden by Canadian  jockey   रॉन  Turcotte , along with  प्रशिक्षु  jockey Paul Feliciano  (   पहला   दो  races  )   ,  and  दिग्गज  Eddie  मेपल  ( last race ) .
He  raced  in Chenery 's  मर्ग  Stable 's blue and  श्वेत  checkered colors and his groom was Eddie Sweat .
Secretariat  stood  approximately tall ,  और   weighed  , with a 75-inch girth  ,  in his racing  प्रधान  .
Madrid ( , )  is  the capital and largest city of Spain .
the   जनसांख्यिकी   of  the city is  roughly  3.3 million  और   the  entire  जनसांख्यिकी  of the Madrid metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  is  गणना  to be around 6.5 million  .
It is the third-largest  नगर  in the  यूरोपीय   संघ  , after London and  बर्लिन   ,  and  इसके   महानगर  area is  the   third-largest  in  the  European Union  बाद  London  और   पेरिस  .
The  नगर   spans   a   कुल  of .
the  city is located  on  the  manzanares   नदी  in the  केन्द्र  of both the country and the  जातियाँ  of Madrid ( which comprises the  नगर  of Madrid , its  conurbation  and  विस्तारित  suburbs and villages ) ;  इस   जातियाँ  is bordered  by   the  autonomous communities of  castile  and León and Castile-La Mancha .
as   the  capital city of Spain , seat of government , and  निवास  of  the   स्पेनी  monarch ,  मैड्रिड  is also the  राजनैतिक  ,  आर्थिक   और   सांस्कृतिक  centre of Spain .
The  वर्तमान   महापौर  is Ana Botella from the People 's Party  (   pp  ) .
The Madrid urban agglomeration  रै   the   third-largest  GDP in the European Union  और  its  प्रभाव  in politics  ,  education  ,   entertainment   ,  environment  ,  media , fashion , science ,  संस्कृति  , and the arts all contribute to  इसके   औकात  as  एक  of the  संसार   's   प्रमुख   वैश्विक  cities .
Due  to   इसके  economic  आउटपुट   ,  high standard of living ,  और  market size , Madrid is  माना  the major financial  केन्द्र  of Southern  यूरोपीय  and the Iberian  प्रायद्वीप  ; it hosts  the   सिर  offices  of  the  विशाल  majority  of  the major Spanish companies ,  ऐसे  as Telefónica ,  iberia   or  Repsol  .
मैड्रिड   is  the  सबसे  touristic city  of   स्पेन  , the fourth-most touristic of the  महाद्वीप  , and  the   सातवाँ  most visited  नगर   in   the  world according to  फोर्ब्स   .
Is the 10th  सबसे  livable city  in   the   संसार  according to Monocle  पत्रिका  , in its 2010 index .
Madrid also  बाँधने  among the  12  greenest European  शहरों  in 2010. <  संदर्भ   name=  '' http : //www.citymayors.com/environment/greenest-cities-europe.html  ''   >  Madrid is currently a  प्रत्याशी  City for the 2020 Summer  ओलंपिक  .
मैड्रिड   घरों   the   मुख्यालय  of the World Tourism Organization ( WTO ) , belonging to the United Nations Organization  (   un  ) ,  the   segib  , the Organization of  ibero-american  States ( OEI )  ,   और  the  पब्लिक  Interest Oversight Board ( PIOB ) .
It also hosts  प्रमुख  international institutions regulators of Spanish  :  the  खड़ा  Committee  of  the Association  of  Spanish Language  अकादमियों  ,  मुख्यालय  of the Royal Spanish Academy  (  RAE ) , the Cervantes Institute and  the  Foundation  of  Urgent Spanish (  fundéu  ) .
Madrid organizes fairs as FITUR  ,  ARCO , SIMO  tci   और  the  cibeles  Madrid Fashion Week .
While Madrid possesses a modern infrastructure  ,  it has preserved the look and feel of many of  इसके  historic  neighbourhoods  and streets  .
इसके   लैंडमार्क  include the Royal Palace of Madrid ; the Teatro Real ( Royal theatre ) with its restored 1850 Opera House ; the Buen Retiro Park , founded in 1631 ;  the  19th-century National Library building ( founded in 1712 )  containing  some of Spain 's  ऐतिहासिक   अभिलेख  ;  a  large  क्रमांक  of National museums ,  और  the  सुनहरी  Triangle of Art ,  स्तिथ  along  the  Paseo  डेल  Prado and  comprising  three art  संग्रहालय  : Prado Museum ,  the  Museo Nacional Centro  de  Arte Reina Sofía  ,  a museum of modern  आर्ट   ,  and  the  Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum , which completes the  त्रुटियां  of the other  दो   संग्रहालय   .
Cibeles Palace and Fountain have become the  स्मारक   प्रतीक  of  the   नगर   .
The path of the  via   appia   और  of  the  Via Appia Traiana .
remains  of the Appian Way  in   रोम   ,  near  quarto  Miglio
Near Rome .
The Appian Way ( Latin and  इतालवी  :  via  Appia  )  was one of the earliest and strategically most important  रोमन  roads of the ancient republic .
It connected  रोम   to   brindisi  ,  apulia   ,   in  southeast Italy  .
इसके  importance is  indicated  by its common name , recorded by  statius   :
Appia  teritur  regina longarum viarum
`` the Appian  रास्ता  is the queen of  the  long roads ''
The road is named after Appius Claudius Caecus , the  रोमन  censor who began and  समाप्त  the first  खण्ड  as a military  सड़क  to  the   दक्षिण  in 312 BC during  the  Samnite  युद्धों  .
the  Draupner wave , a single giant  वेव   measured  on New Year 's Day 1995 , finally confirmed the existence of freak waves , which  था  previously been considered near-mythical
Rogue  लहरें   (   भी  known as freak waves  ,  monster waves , killer  लहरें   ,   चरम  waves  ,   और   असामान्य   लहरें  ) are relatively large and  spontaneous  ocean surface  लहरें  that  occur  far out at sea  ,  and are a threat  भी  to  विशाल   जहाजों  and  समंदर   liners  .
in  oceanography  ,  they  हैं  more precisely defined as  लहरें  whose  ऊँचाई  is more than twice the  significant  wave height (  swh  ) , which is itself defined  as  the  औसत   of  the largest third  of  waves in a  वेव  record .
Therefore  दुष्ट   लहरें   हैं   नहीं  necessarily the biggest waves  मिला  at sea  ;  they  हैं  , rather  ,  surprisingly  विशाल  waves  लिये  a  दिए   समुद्र  state  .
Rogue  लहरें  seem not  to  have a  सिंगल  distinct  कारण  ,  लकिन   occur  where physical factors such as high  हवाएँ   और  strong currents cause waves  to   विलय  to create a single exceptionally  विशाल  wave  .
electress  Sophia of  हनोवर  ( 1630–1714  )
the   लकीर  of  उत्तराधिकार  to  the   अंग्रेजों   सिंहासन  is the ordered  अनुक्रम   of   सब  those people eligible to succeed to  the  throne of the United  किंगडम  and the other  15  Commonwealth realms .
The  अधिनियम  of  उपनिवेश  1701 bestowed succession on the Electress  sophia  of Hanover  और   उसके  descendants while excluding Roman Catholics .
The  अंग्रेजों  government  करता   नहीं  publish an official list of all  those  in line  to  succeed  ,   लकिन  the  कार्य  of genealogical  लेखक  and amateur  शोधकर्ताओं  suggests that there are several thousand  लोगों  potentially in line .
at  a  समिट  in Perth , Western  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  in 2011 , the heads of government  of   सब   16   राष्ट्रमंडल  realms agreed to take steps  to  adopt absolute  primogeniture   ,   समाप्त  the exclusion  of  people married  to   रोमन  Catholics ,  और  make  अन्य  changes in the  उत्तराधिकार   नियम   .
The line  of  succession is also  प्रयुक्त  to  चुनें  the Counsellors  of  State  (  and  a  regent  if  the need  arises  )  अंतर्गत   the  provisions  of   the  Regency Act 1937 .
For earlier versions of  the  line of succession ,  देखिए  History of  the   अंग्रेजों  line  of   उत्तराधिकार   .
Edward Montgomery  क्लिफ्ट  (  अक्तूबर   17  ,  1920july  23  ,  1966  )  was  an  American  फिल्मी  and stage  कर्ता   the  New York  times’  obituary noted  उसके  portrayal of ``  मूडी  ,  संवेदनशील  young men '' .
He often  निभाई  outsiders and ``  victim-heroes  ''  ;   उदाहरण  include the social climber in George Stevens 's A Place in the Sun , the  anguished  Catholic  पुजारी   in  Hitchcock  's  I  कबूल   ,  the  doomed  regular soldier  रॉबर्ट  E. Lee  prewitt   in  Fred Zinnemann 's From Here  to   शाश्वत  ,  और  the Jewish GI bullied by antisemites in  एडवर्ड  Dmytryk 's The Young  शेर   .
Later  ,  after a disfiguring car  क्रैश  in 1956  ,   और  alcohol and prescription drug abuse , he became erratic .
Nevertheless important roles  यहूद  still his ,  सहित  ``  the  reckless , alcoholic  ,  mother-fixated rodeo  यजमान  '' in John Huston  's   the  Misfits ,  the  title role  in  Huston 's  ,  and  the  concentration camp victim in  स्टेनली  Kramer  's  Judgment at Nuremberg . ''
क्लिफ्ट   प्राप्त  four Academy Award  nominations  during  उसके   करियर  ,  तीन   लिये  Best  कर्ता  and  एक  for Best Supporting Actor .
The War on Terror ( also known as the Global War  on   आतंक  ) is a  पद  commonly  लागू  to an international military campaign  जिससे  started  as   a   परिणाम  of the 11 September 2001 terrorist  हमले  on the  संयुक्त  States  .
इस  resulted in  an  international  सैन्य   अभियान   to  eliminate  al-qaeda  and other militant organizations .
The United Kingdom  और  many  अन्य  NATO and non-NATO nations  participate  in the conflict .
the  phrase 'War  on  Terror  '  was first used by US President George W. Bush on  20  September 2001  .
The Bush administration  और  the  पश्चिमी  media have  चूंकि  used the  पद   to  signify a global military ,  राजनैतिक   ,  lawful  ,  and conceptual struggle—targeting both organizations designated  as  terrorist and  regimes  accused of  supporting  them .
It was  typically  used with a particular  फ़ोकस   on  militant Islamists ,  al-qaeda  , and other  जिहादी  groups .
Although the term is  नहीं   officially  used by the administration  of  US President  बराक  Obama  (  which instead  उपयोग  the  पद  Overseas Contingency Operation )  ,  it is still commonly  प्रयुक्त  by  राजनेता   ,  in the media and by some aspects  of  government  officially  ,  ऐसे  as the  संयुक्त  States '  वैश्विक  War on  आतंक  Service Medal  .

The  प्रमुख  causes of  संसार  War II  यहूद  nationalistic issues  ,   अनसुलझे  issues  ,  and  resentments  resulting from World  युद्ध  I  और   the  interwar period in Europe  ,  in  जोड   to  the effects  of  the Great  अवसाद  in the 1930s .
The  culmination  of events that led to the  outbreak   of  war are generally understood  to   be   the  1939  आक्रमण  of Poland by Germany and  सोवियत  Russia and the 1937 invasion  of  the Republic of China by the Empire  of  Japan .
ये  military aggressions were the  परिणाम   of  decisions made  by   the   सत्तावादी   सत्ताधारी   नाजी   elite  in  जर्मनी  and  by  the leadership  of  the Kwantung Army in Japan .
संसार  War II  प्रारंभ   बाद   ये  aggressive actions were met with  an  official declaration of war and/or armed  प्रतिरोध  .

The Mitsubishi Galant is  an  automobile manufactured  by   मित्सुबिशी  Motors between  1969  and 2012 .
The  नाम  was derived from the French word galant  ,  meaning `` chivalrous ''  .
There have been nine distinct generations  ,  and  संचयी  sales now exceed five million .
It began  as   a  compact  सेडान   ,  but over  the   कोर्स  of its life has  विकसित  into  a  larger mid-size car .
Initial production was only based in Japan , but  चूंकि  1994 the  अमरीकी  market has been served by vehicles assembled  at  the  पूर्व  Diamond-Star Motors ( DSM ) facility in  सामान्य  , Illinois .
Blood  दबाव  (  bp  ) , sometimes  referred   to   as  arterial blood pressure ,  is  the pressure exerted by circulating  रक्त  upon the  दीवारें  of blood  बरतन   ,  and  is  one of the principal  vital   लक्षण  .
When used without  further  specification  ,   ``  blood pressure  ''   प्रायः  refers  to   the  arterial pressure of the systemic circulation  .
During each heartbeat ,  रक्त   दबाव  varies between  a  maximum (  systolic  ) and a minimum  (  diastolic ) pressure  .
The  रक्त  pressure  in   the   परिसंचरण  is principally due to  the   pumping  action of  the  heart .
Differences in  औसत  blood pressure  हैं   जिम्मेदार   लिये   रक्त  flow from one  स्थान  to another in the  परिसंचरण  .
The rate of  औसत   रक्त   प्रवाह  depends on the resistance to  प्रवाह   प्रस्तुत  by  the  blood vessels  .
औसत   रक्त  pressure decreases  as  the circulating  रक्त   चालें  away from  the   दिल  through arteries and capillaries  due  to viscous losses of energy .
औसत   रक्त  pressure drops over the whole  परिसंचरण  , although most  of   the  fall occurs along the small arteries and arterioles  .
Gravity  affects  blood  दबाव  via  hydrostatic  forces  (  e.g. ,  दौरान   खड़ा   )  and valves in veins , breathing , and  pumping  from  संकुचन  of skeletal  मांसपेशियां  also influence blood  दबाव  in veins  .
Blood pressure without further specification usually refers to the systemic arterial pressure  measured  at  a   व्यक्ति   's   अपर  arm  और  is a  माप  of the pressure in the brachial  धमनी   ,  the  प्रमुख  artery  in   the  upper arm .
a  person’s blood pressure is usually expressed  in  terms  of  the systolic pressure over diastolic pressure and  is  measured in millimetres of mercury  (   mmhg   )  , for  उदाहरण  120/80 .
A veto  –   लैटिन  for `` I  forbid   ''   –   is  the  शक्ति  ( used  by  an officer  of  the state ,  लिये  example  )  to  unilaterally  stop an  आधिकारिक  action  ,  especially  the  enactment  of  legislation  .
a   वीटो  can  be  absolute , as for instance  in  the  संयुक्त  Nations Security Council  ,  whose permanent  सदस्यों   (  China ,  फ़्रांस  , Russia , United Kingdom  ,  United States of America  )  can  ब्लाक   कोई  resolution  .
or  it can be  सीमित  ,  as   in  the  विधान  process  of  the United States , where a two-thirds  vote  in  दोनो  the House and Senate may override a Presidential  वीटो  of legislation .
A veto  तभी  gives power  to   रोकें  changes , not  to  adopt them  (   मगर  for  the  rare ``  amendatory  veto '' ) .
Thus  a   वीटो  allows its holder  to   protect  the  औकात   quo  .
the  concept of  a  veto body  originated  with the  रोमन  consuls and tribunes  .
Either of the two consuls  पकड़कर  office in a given year  could  block a military  or  civil  निर्णय  by the  अन्य  ; any tribune had the power  to  unilaterally block legislation passed by the Roman Senate .
गंधक  dioxide  (   भी  sulphur dioxide  )  is the chemical compound with the  सूत्र  .
it   is   a   विषाक्त  gas with  a   pungent  , irritating  महकते  , that is released  by  volcanoes and in various industrial processes  .
Since coal and petroleum often contain sulfur  यौगिकों  , their combustion generates sulfur dioxide unless  the   गंधक  compounds  हैं  removed before burning the  ईंधन   .
Further oxidation of SO2 , usually in the  उपस्थिति  of a catalyst  ऐसे   as  NO2 , forms  h2so4   ,  and thus  एसिड  rain .
Sulfur dioxide  emissions   हैं  also a precursor to particulates in  the  atmosphere .
Both of these impacts are cause for  चिंता  over  the  environmental impact of  ये  fuels  .
Myasthenia gravis ( from Greek μύς `` muscle '' ,  ``  weakness  ''  , and  ``  serious ''  ;  abbreviated MG ) is  an   असंक्राम्य  neuromuscular disease leading to fluctuating muscle weakness and fatigability .
It is  an  autoimmune disorder , in  जिससे   कमज़ोरी   is  caused by  circulating  antibodies that  ब्लाक  acetylcholine receptors  at   the  postsynaptic  neuromuscular   जंक्शन  , inhibiting the excitatory effects  of  the neurotransmitter acetylcholine  on   nicotinic  receptors  throughout  neuromuscular junctions .
Myasthenia is  treated  medically with  acetylcholinesterase   inhibitors  or immunosuppressants ,  और   ,  in selected cases ,  thymectomy  .
The  बीमारी  incidence is 3–30 cases  प्रति  million per  साल  and rising as a result  of   increased   जागरूकता   .
MG must be  विशिष्ट  from congenital  myasthenic  syndromes  कि  can present similar symptoms but  प्रस्ताव   no  response to  immunosuppressive  treatments .

polarizing  filter film with a vertical axis to polarize light  as  it enters  .
Glass substrate with ITO electrodes .
The  आकार  of these  electrodes  will determine  the  shapes that  होगा  appear when the LCD is turned  on   .

(   in  a  backlit  LCD  ,  this  परत  is  replaced  with a  लाइट   सोर्स  . )
a   liquid-crystal  display  (  LCD ) is a flat panel display , electronic visual  प्रदर्शक   ,  or  वीडियो  display that  उपयोग  the light modulating properties of liquid  crystals  .
द्रव   crystals  do not  emit   लाइट  directly  .
LCDs are  उपलब्धियाँ  to  प्रदर्शक   मनमानी  images ( as  in  a general-purpose  कंप्यूटर  display ) or fixed images which  can  be  प्रदर्शित   or  hidden , such as  preset   शब्द  , digits ,  और  7-segment  प्रदर्शक   as  in a  डिजिटल  clock .
They use the same basic technology , except  कि  arbitrary images are  बना   up   of  a large number of  छोटी  pixels , while other  प्रदर्शक  have larger elements .
LCDs are used in  a  wide range of applications  सहित  computer monitors , televisions  ,  instrument panels , aircraft cockpit displays , and signage .
वे  are common in consumer devices such as video players , gaming devices , clocks , watches , calculators  ,  and telephones , and have  replaced  cathode  रे  tube  (  CRT ) displays in most  अनुप्रयोग  .
वे  are available  in  a wider  दायरा  of screen  आकार  than CRT and  प्लाज्मा  displays , and since they  do  not use phosphors ,  वे  do  नहीं  suffer image burn-in .
LCDs  हैं   ,   however  ,  susceptible  to image persistence .
the  LCD screen is more energy efficient and can be disposed of more safely than a CRT .
Its low  विद्युत   शक्ति  consumption enables it to be used in  बैटरी  -powered electronic equipment  .
it  is  an   electronically  modulated optical device  बना  up  of  any  क्रमांक  of segments filled  साथ  liquid crystals and arrayed in  सामने  of a light source (  backlight   )  or reflector to produce images in color or monochrome .
Liquid crystals were first discovered in 1888 .
By 2008 , worldwide  बिक्री   of  televisions  साथ  LCD screens  exceeded  annual sales  of  CRT units ; the CRT  became  obsolete for most purposes  .
The  borgata   होटल  Casino and Spa is a luxury hotel , casino , and spa in Atlantic City ,  नई   जर्सी  , United  राज्य   .
it   is  owned  by  Marina District Development  ,   a  joint  venture  between  boyd  Gaming  और  a divesture trust  स्थापित  by MGM Resorts International .
The $ 1.1 billion casino hotel  सुविधाएँ  2,002 rooms and  is  the largest hotel in  नई   जर्सी  .
The  borgata   खोली   in  July  2003   as  a  लास   vegas-style   megaresort  and is  the   top-grossing   कसीनो  in Atlantic  नगर   .

A vitamin (  or  ) is an organic compound  जरूरी   by   an   सजीव   as  a vital  nutrient  in limited amounts .
An organic chemical compound  (  or  सम्बन्धित  set  of  compounds  )  is called a vitamin when it can not be synthesized  in  sufficient  quantities  by  an   सजीव  , and must be obtained from the  आहार  .
Thus  ,  the  पद  is  सशर्त   दोनो  on  the  circumstances and on  the  particular organism .
लिये  example , ascorbic acid ( vitamin  c  ) is a vitamin for humans ,  लकिन  not  लिये  most other animals , and biotin and  विटामिन  D are required in the human diet  तभी  in certain circumstances .
By  सम्मेलन  , the term vitamin  शामिल  neither other essential  nutrients  , such as  dietary   खनिज  , essential fatty acids , or essential  अमीनो  acids (  जिससे   हैं   needed  in  larger  amounts  than  vitamins ) nor the large  क्रमांक  of other  nutrients  that promote health  लकिन  are  वरना  required less often .
Thirteen vitamins are universally recognized  at  present .
Vitamins are classified by their  biological   और   रासायनिक  activity , not  उनके   ढांचा  .
Thus , each  ``  vitamin '' refers to a  क्रमांक  of  vitamer  compounds that  सब  show the  biological  activity associated with  a  particular vitamin .
Such  a  set of  रसायन  is  grouped   अंतर्गत  an alphabetized  विटामिन   ``  generic descriptor ''  शीर्षक  ,  ऐसे  as ``  विटामिन  A ``  ,  which includes the compounds  retinal   ,   रेटिनॉल  , and four known carotenoids  .
Vitamers by definition  हैं   convertible   to  the active form of the vitamin in  the  body , and are sometimes  inter-convertible  to one another  ,   as   खूब  .
Vitamins have diverse biochemical  कृत्यों   .
Some have hormone-like functions as regulators of mineral metabolism (  ऐसे  as vitamin  d  ) , or  regulators   of  cell  और  tissue growth and differentiation  (   ऐसे   as  some forms of  विटामिन  A  )   .
अन्य   फलन   as   antioxidants  ( e.g. , vitamin  e   और  sometimes vitamin C ) .
The  largest  number of vitamins ( such as B  जटिल  vitamins  )  function  as   precursors   लिये  enzyme  cofactors  , that  सहायता  enzymes  in   उनके  work as  catalysts   in  metabolism  .
In this role ,  विटामिन  may be  tightly  bound to  एंजाइमों  as part  of   prosthetic  groups :  लिये  example  ,  biotin  is  part of  एंजाइमों  involved in making fatty acids  .
Vitamins  may   भी  be less tightly bound to enzyme catalysts  as  coenzymes , detachable molecules that function  to   carry  chemical groups or electrons  between  molecules .
For example , folic acid may  carry   मिथाइल  , formyl ,  और  methylene groups  in  the cell .
Although these roles  in  assisting enzyme-substrate reactions are  विटामिन  '  best-known  function , the other  विटामिन  functions are equally important .
Until the mid-1930s  ,  when the first commercial  yeast-extract   विटामिन   b   जटिल  and semi-synthetic vitamin C supplement  टैबलेट   यहूद  sold  ,   विटामिन   यहूद  obtained solely through food  सेवन  , and changes in diet ( which  ,  for example , could occur during  a   particular  growing season ) usually greatly  altered   the  types and  amounts  of vitamins ingested  .
However , vitamins have been produced  as  commodity chemicals  और  made widely available as inexpensive  semisynthetic  and synthetic-source  multivitamin  dietary and food supplements and  एडिटिव  ,  चूंकि  the middle  of  the 20th century  .
World Muslim population  by  percentage (  pew  Research Center , 2009  )
World Muslim  जनसांख्यिकी  in millions
Islam is the world  's   दूसरी  largest religion after Christianity .
According to a  2010  study  ,  Islam  रै  1.62 billion  adherents  , making  up  over 23  %   of  the world population .
Islam  is   the   predominant  religion in the Middle East ,  in   सहेल  , in  the  Horn of Africa  और  northern  अफ़्रीकी  , and in some parts of Asia  .
Large  समुदायों  of Muslims are  भी  found  in   चीन  , the Balkans ,  और   रूस  .
Other  भाग  of  the  world host large Muslim immigrant communities  ;  in Western Europe , for instance , Islam is the second largest religion after  christianity  ,  जहाँ  it  represents  6 % of the total  जनसांख्यिकी  .
According to  the   pew  Research Center in 2010 there  यहूद  49 Muslim-majority countries  .
Around 62 % of  the  world 's  मुसलमान   सजीव  in South and Southeast Asia , with over  1  billion adherents .
The  largest   मुस्लिम   देश   is  Indonesia  ,  home  to  12.7 % of  the  world 's  मुसलमान   ,  followed  by  Pakistan ( 11.0  %  ) , India (  10.9   %  ) , and Bangladesh  (   9.2  % )  .
परिचय  20  %   of  Muslims  सजीव  in  अरब  countries .
In the  मध्य   ईस्ट   ,   the  non-Arab  देशों  of Turkey and Iran are  the  largest Muslim-majority countries ; in  अफ़्रीकी  , Egypt and Nigeria have  the  most  populous  Muslim communities  .
a   पढ़ाई   conducted  by the Pew Research Center  in  2010  और  released  जनवरी  2011  मिला  that there are  1.62  billion Muslims around the world .
The study  मिला  more Muslims in the United  किंगडम  than in  लेबनान   और  more in  चीन  than in Syria  .
Rhode  द्वीप   (  or  )  , officially  the  State  of   rhode  Island and Providence Plantations , is a  राज्य   in   the  New  इंग्लैण्ड  region of the United States .
rhode  Island  is   the   smallest   in  area ,  the  eighth least populous  ,  but the second  सबसे  densely  आबादी  of  the   50   us   राज्य   पीछे   नई   जर्सी  .
rhode   द्वीप  is bordered by Connecticut to the west and  मैसाचुसेट्स   to  the north and  ईस्ट  ,  और  it shares a  जल   boundary  with  नई  York 's Long Island to the southwest  .
Rhode  द्वीप  was the first of the 13  असली  colonies  to  declare independence from  अंग्रेजों  rule ,  declaring   itself  independent  on  May 4  ,  1776 , two  महीने  before any other colony .
The State was also the last of the  तेरह   असली  colonies to ratify  the   संयुक्त  States  संविधान  .
Rhode Island  's   आधिकारिक  nickname is ``  the  Ocean State  ''  , a  सन्दर्भ  to  the  State 's  भूगोल  , since Rhode Island has several large bays and inlets that amount to about 14  %  of  इसके  total area .
Its land  क्षेत्रफल  is  ,  but  इसके  total area is  significantly   larger  .
Dubai ( ; ' , ) is a city in the  संयुक्त  Arab Emirates , located  भीतर  the emirate of the same name .
the   अमीर  of Dubai is  स्तिथ  on  the   southeast  coast  of  the  पारसी   गल्फ   on   the  Arabian Peninsula and is  एक  of  the  seven  अमीरात  that make up the  देश  .
It  रै   the  largest population in the  uae  ( 2,106,177  )  and the second-largest land  territory   by  area ( 4,114 km2  )  after Abu Dhabi  .
Dubai  और  Abu Dhabi  ,  the national capital , are  the  only two emirates to have veto  शक्ति  over critical  matters  of national importance in the country  's  legislature .
The city of Dubai is  स्तिथ  on the emirate  's  northern coastline  और   heads  up the Dubai-Sharjah-Ajman  महानगर  area .
Dubai  is  nowadays often misperceived as  a  country or city-state  और  ,  in   कुछ  cases ,  the  UAE  as   a  whole has  महरूम  described as 'Dubai  '  .
The earliest mention of  दुबई  is in 1095 AD  ,   और  the earliest  अंकित  settlement  in  the region dates from 1799 .
The Sheikhdom of Dubai  थी  formally established in  1833   by  Sheikh  maktoum  bin Butti Al-Maktoum when  he   persuaded  around  800  members of  उसके  tribe of the Bani  yas  , living  in   कया  was then  the  Second Saudi State  और  now  भाग  of Saudi Arabia ,  to  follow him to the Dubai  क्रीक  by  the  Abu Falasa clan  of  the Bani Yas .
It remained  अंतर्गत  the tribe 's control when  the  United Kingdom  assumed   सुरक्षा  of  the   sheikhdom   in   1892  and joined the nascent United Arab Emirates upon independence  in  1971  as   the  country  's  second  अमीर  .
Its strategic geographic location made the town an important trading hub and  by  the beginning of the 20th century ,  दुबई  was already  an  important regional  बंदरगाहों  .
Today , Dubai has emerged as a cosmopolitan metropolis  कि  has grown steadily  to   become  a global city  और  a business and cultural  हब  of  the  Middle East  और  the  पारसी   गल्फ  region  .
Although  दुबई  's economy  थी  historically  निर्मित   on  the  आयल   उद्योग   ,  the emirate 's Western-style model  of  business  ड्राइव  its  अर्थव्यवस्था  with the main revenues now  coming   इससे  tourism  ,  real estate  ,   और   वित्तीय   सेवाएं  .
दुबई  has  recently  attracted world  ध्यान  through many  अभिनव  large construction projects and  खेल  events .
The city has become symbolic  लिये  its  skyscrapers   और  high-rise buildings , such as  the  world  's  tallest Burj  खलीफा  ,  in   जोड  to ambitious development projects including man-made  आइलैंड्स  , hotels ,  और  some  of   the  largest shopping malls in the region and the world .
इस  increased attention has also highlighted  मजदूर   और  human rights  मुद्दे  concerning  the   नगर  's  largely  South Asian paid workforce .
दुबई  's property  मार्केट  experienced a  प्रमुख  deterioration in 2008–2009  as   a  result of the worldwide economic  downturn   following  the  वित्तीय  crisis of 2007-2008 .
however  ,  दुबई  has  बना  a  स्थिर  and  क्रमिक  recovery with help  coming   इससे   neighboring  emirates  .
The  handful  of  नई  projects  कि  are  in  the pipeline have  महरूम  able to help  दुबई   रियल   एस्टेट  make a  वापसी  .
As  of  2012  ,  Dubai is the 22nd most expensive city in  the   संसार  , and  the  most  महंगी  city  in  the  मध्य   ईस्ट  ,  surpassing  Israel  's  Tel Aviv  (  31st ) .
Dubai has also been  रेटेड  as one of  the  best places to live  in   the  Middle East , including by  us  American  वैश्विक   परामर्श   कड़  Mercer who rated the city as the best place to  सजीव  in  the  Middle East  in   2011  .
the  following is a  सूची   of   कॉलेजों  and  विश्वविद्यालयों  in the U.S. state  of   इलिनोइस  .
सतह  of the Atlantic ocean meeting the  धरती  's planetary boundary layer and troposphere  .
Waves on an ocean coast .
This animation  उपयोग  Earth science  आंकड़ा   इससे  a variety of sensors  on  NASA Earth observing satellites to measure  शारीरिक   oceanography  parameters such as ocean  currents   ,  ocean winds , sea  सतह   ऊँचाई  and sea surface temperature .
An  समंदर  ( ; the  संसार  Ocean  of  classical antiquity ) is a  देह   of  saline  जल  that composes  a  large part  of   a  planet 's hydrosphere  .
in  the  कॉन्टेक्स्ट   of  Earth  ,  it  refers  to one  or  all of  the  major divisions of the planet 's World Ocean –  वे  are ,  in   descending  order of area ,  the  Pacific ,  अटलांटिक   ,  Indian ,  दक्षिणी  ( Antarctic )  ,   और   आर्कटिक  Oceans .
The word `` sea `` is often used interchangeably  साथ  `` ocean '' , but strictly speaking  a  sea is a body  of  saline water ( possibly a  प्रभाग  of  the  World  समंदर  )  partly  or fully enclosed by land .
धरती  is the only planet known to have  an   समंदर  (  or  any large amounts of  खोलें  liquid water  )  .
Approximately 72 %  of  the planet 's  सतह  ( ~3.6x108 km2 )  is  covered by saline  जल   कि   is  customarily  विभाजित   into  several principal oceans and smaller seas , with  the   समंदर  covering  लगभग  71 % of  the   धरती  's surface .
In terms of the hydrosphere of  the  Earth , the ocean contains 97 %  of  the Earth 's  जल  .
Oceanographers have stated that  आउट  of  97  % , only  5   %  of the ocean as a whole on Earth has been explored  .
क्युकी  it is  the  principal component of Earth 's  जलमंडल  , the world ocean is  अभिन्न  to  सब  known  जीवन  , forms part of the carbon cycle , and  प्रभाव   जलवायु  and  मौसम   पैटर्न  .
The total volume is approximately 1.3 billion cubic  किलोमीटर  ( 310 million cu  mi  )  साथ  an average depth of .
It  is  the habitat of 230,000  ज्ञात  species , although much of  the  ocean  's  depths remain unexplored and it is estimated that over two million marine  प्रजाति   मौजूद  .
The origin  of  Earth 's oceans  is  still unknown ,  लकिन   महासागर  are believed to  have   formed  in the Hadean  काल  and may have been the  impetus  for  the  emergence of life  .
Extraterrestrial  महासागर  may be  रचित   of   a  wide range  of  elements  और  compounds .
The only confirmed  विशाल  stable bodies  of  extraterrestrial  सतह   liquids   हैं   the  lakes of Titan , although there is evidence for the existence of oceans elsewhere in the Solar  प्रणाली  .
Early in their geologic histories , Mars and Venus are  theorized   to   have   था  large  जल   महासागर  .
the  Mars ocean hypothesis suggests that nearly  a   तीसरा  of the surface of Mars was  एकबार  covered  by  water , though the  जल  on Mars  is  no longer  oceanic  ,  और   a  runaway  ग्रीनहाउस  effect may have boiled away  the   वैश्विक  ocean of Venus .
Compounds such  as  salts  और  ammonia dissolved in  जल  lower  इसके  freezing  पाइंट  , so that water might  मौजूद  in large  quantities  in extraterrestrial environments as  brine   or   convecting  ice  .
Unconfirmed oceans are speculated beneath  the  surface of many  बौना  planets and natural satellites ;  notably  ,  the  ocean of Europa  is  believed  to  have over  twice  the  जल  volume of  धरती   .
the  Solar System  's   गैस  giant  ग्रह   हैं  also believed  to  possess liquid atmospheric  परतों  of  yet  to be confirmed compositions .
महासागर  may also  मौजूद   on   exoplanets  and exomoons , including  सतह   महासागर  of liquid water within a circumstellar habitable  मण्डल  .
Ocean planets  हैं   a  hypothetical type of  ग्रह  with  a  surface completely  covered   साथ  liquid  .
एल्विस  Aaron Presley  (   जनवरी  8 , 1935 – August  16  , 1977 ) was an  अमरीकी  singer and actor .
A cultural icon  ,  he  is   commonly  known by the single name Elvis  .
One of the most popular musicians of  the   20th  century , he is  प्रायः  referred to as the `` King of Rock and Roll ''  or  `` the King ''  .
Born in Tupelo , Mississippi  ,  Presley moved to  मेम्फिस  , Tennessee  ,  with his  परिवार   at   the   आयु  of 13 .
He  began   उसके  career there  in  1954  ,  working  साथ  Sun Records owner Sam Phillips , who  चाही  to bring the sound of African-American music to a  wider  audience .
Accompanied by guitarist Scotty Moore  और  bassist  विधेयक  Black , Presley  थी  the most important  popularizer   of  rockabilly ,  an  uptempo  ,  backbeat -driven fusion of country  और  rhythm and  ब्लूज़  .
आरसीए  Victor  acquired  his  अनुबंध  in  a  deal arranged  by   कर्नल  Tom  पार्कर   ,  who went  on  to manage  the   सिंगर   लिये  over  दो   दशकों  .
Presley  's   पहला   आरसीए  single  ,   ``  Heartbreak Hotel `` , released in January  1956  , was  a  number-one hit .
He became the leading figure of the newly popular sound of rock and  फेंकें  with  a  series of network television appearances and chart-topping records  .
उसके  energized interpretations of songs ,  अनेक  from African-American sources , and his uninhibited performance style made him  enormously  popular—and controversial .
In November 1956 , he  बना   उसके  film  डेब्यू  in  प्रेम  Me Tender  .
Drafted into military service in 1958  ,   प्रेस्ली   relaunched  his recording career two years later with  कुछ  of his most commercially  कामयाब   कार्य  .
He staged few concerts however  ,   और  guided  by   पार्कर  , proceeded to devote much of the 1960s to making  हॉलीवुड  movies and  साउंडट्रैक  albums  ,  most of  उन्हें  critically derided .
In 1968 , after seven years away from the  स्टेज  , he returned to live performance  in   a  celebrated comeback television special that led to an  विस्तारित   लास  Vegas concert residency  और  a string  of  profitable tours .
in   1973   प्रेस्ली   मंचन   the   पहला  concert broadcast globally via satellite  ,   aloha  from Hawaii .
नुस्खा  drug abuse severely deteriorated  उसके  health ,  और  he died  एकाएक  in 1977 at the age of 42 .
Presley is  regarded  as one  of  the most important  आंकड़े   of  20th-century  लोकप्रिय  culture  .
He had  a   बहुमुखी  voice and unusually wide  कामयाबी  encompassing  अनेक   जाति  , including country , pop ballads , gospel , and blues .
He is the best-selling  सोलो  artist in the history of popular music .
मनोनीत  for 14 competitive Grammys , he  जीती  three  ,   और  received the Grammy Lifetime  उपलब्धि   पुरस्कार  at age  36  .
He has been inducted into  अनेक  music halls of  कीर्ति  .
A glass  of   रूट  beer with  झाग
रूट   बियर   is  a  कार्बोनेटेड   ,  sweetened  पेय  , originally made using the root of  a   sassafras  plant ( or the bark of  a  sassafras tree  )  as the primary flavor  .
Root beer , popularized  in  North America , comes in two forms : alcoholic  और  soft drink .
The  ऐतिहासिक   रूट  beer was analogous to  छोटी  beer  in  that  the  process provided  a   पेय  with  a  very low alcohol  सामग्री  .
Although roots are  प्रयुक्त   as  the source of many soft  पेय  throughout the world , often  अलग   names  are  प्रयुक्त  .
Fluorescent minerals  emit  visible light when exposed  to  ultraviolet light
Fluorescence is the  उत्सर्जन  of  लाइट  by  a  substance that has absorbed light  or  other  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक   विकिरण  .
It is a  रूप  of luminescence .
In most cases  ,  the  उत्सर्जित   लाइट  has a longer wavelength , and therefore lower energy ,  than  the  अवशोषित   विकिरण   .
However , when the absorbed electromagnetic  विकिरण  is intense , it is possible for one electron  to  absorb  दो   photons  ; this two-photon absorption can lead  to  emission of radiation  having  a  shorter  wavelength  than  the absorbed radiation  .
The  उत्सर्जित  radiation may  भी  be of the same wavelength as the absorbed  विकिरण  , termed ``  अनुनाद   प्रतिदीप्ति  '' .
the  most  striking  examples of  प्रतिदीप्ति  occur  जब   the  absorbed radiation is in  the  ultraviolet region of the  वर्णक्रम  , and  यूँ  invisible to  the  human  नजर  , and  the   उत्सर्जित   लाइट   is  in  the  visible  प्रदेश  .
Fluorescence  रै  many  व्यावहारिक  applications , including mineralogy  ,  gemology ,  रासायनिक  sensors  (  fluorescence  स्पेक्ट्रमिकी  ) ,  fluorescent   लेबलिंग  , dyes , biological detectors , and , most  commonly  , fluorescent lamps .
Informal logic  ,  intuitively  ,  refers to the principles  of  logic and logical thought outside  of   a   औपचारिक   सेटिंग  .
However ,  शायद  because of the informal in the title  ,  the  precise  definition of  अनौपचारिक   लॉजिक  is  a  matter of  कुछ  dispute .
Ralph H.  जॉनसन  and  J.   एंथोनी  Blair define informal  लॉजिक  as `` a  शाखा  of logic  जिनकी  task is to  develop   non-formal  standards ,  मापदण्ड  , procedures for  the  analysis  ,  interpretation  ,   मूल्यांकन  , criticism and construction of  argumentation   .  ''
This definition reflects  कया   था   महरूम   अव्यक्त   in   उनके   अभ्यास  and what others  यहूद  doing in their informal logic texts .
Informal logic is associated with ( informal ) fallacies  ,  critical thinking , the Thinking Skills  गति  and  the  interdisciplinary inquiry known  as  argumentation theory  .
Frans H. van Eemeren  writes  that the label ``  अनौपचारिक  logic '' covers  a   ``  collection of normative approaches to  the  study of reasoning in ordinary language that remain closer to the practice of argumentation  than  formal logic . ''
यूएसए  annual real GDP 1910–60  ,  with the  सालो  of the Great  अवसाद  ( 1929–1939  )   highlighted  .
बेरोजगारी  rate  in   the  US 1910–1960 , with the  सालो  of the  ग्रेट  Depression  (  1929–1939 ) highlighted .
The Great Depression began in August  of  1929  ,  when the United States economy first went into an economic recession  .
हालांकि  the country spent two months with  घटती  GDP  ,   it  was not until the  वॉल  Street Crash  of  October , 1929 that the effects  of  a  घटती  economy were  लगा  , and a  प्रमुख  worldwide economic  downturn  ensued  .
The market crash marked the beginning of a  दशक  of high unemployment  ,   गरीबी  , low profits ,  अपस्फीति   ,  plunging farm incomes , and  खोया  opportunities for economic growth and personal  उन्नति  .
Although its causes  हैं   स्टिल   अनिश्चित  and  विवादास्पद   ,   the  net effect was a sudden and general loss of confidence in the economic  भविष्य  .
the  usual  स्पष्टीकरण  include numerous factors , especially high consumer  कर्ज़  ,  ill-regulated  markets that permitted  overoptimistic  loans by banks and investors  ,  and  the  lack of  high-growth   नई  industries , all interacting to create  a  downward  आर्थिक   सर्पिल  of  घटाया  spending  ,  falling confidence , and lowered production .
उद्योग   कि  suffered the most  शामिल   निर्माण  ,  कृषि  as  dust-bowl   शर्तें  persisted in  the  agricultural  heartland  ,  शिपिंग  , mining ,  और  logging as  खूब  as durable goods  जैसे  automobiles  और   उपकरण  that could be  स्थगित  .
The  अर्थव्यवस्था  reached bottom in the  शीत  of 1932–33  ;  then came four years of very rapid growth until 1937 , when  the  Recession  of   1937  brought back 1934 levels of unemployment  .
The Depression caused major  राजनैतिक  changes in America .
Three  सालो   into  the depression , Herbert  हूवर   खोया  the  1932  presidential  चुनाव   to  Franklin Delano Roosevelt  in   a  sweeping landslide  .
Roosevelt  's   आर्थिक  recovery plan ,  the   नई  Deal , instituted unprecedented  कार्यक्रम  for relief ,  रिकवरी  and reform  ,  and  brought  about a major realignment  of  American politics .
The  अवसाद   भी  resulted  in  an increase of emigration of  लोगों  to  अन्य   देशों  for the first  समय  in American  इतिहास  .
For example , some  आप्रवासियों  went back to their  देशी   देशों   ,  and  कुछ  native US citizens went to Canada , Australia ,  और  South Africa  .
It also resulted  in  the mass migration of people from badly hit areas in the Great Plains and the South to  स्थान  such as California and the North , respectively  (   देखिए   okies  and  the  Great  माइग्रेशन  of African Americans ) .
Racial tensions  भी  increased during this time .
By  the  1940s immigration  था   लौटे  back  to   सामान्य  ,  और   करणों   अस्वीकृत  .
A well-known example of an emigrant was Frank McCourt , who went to Ireland ,  as  recounted in  उसके  book Angela 's Ashes  .
The memory of the  अवसाद  also  तराशा  modern  theories   of  economics and  resulted  in  अनेक   परिवर्तन   in   कैसा   the  government dealt with  आर्थिक   downturns  , such as the use  of  stimulus  पैकेज   ,   keynesian  economics , and  सोशल  Security  .
It  भी  shaped modern American  साहित्य  , resulting  in  famous novels such  as  John Steinbeck 's `` The Grapes of Wrath `` and ``  of  Mice and Men `` .
The  ग्रेट  Depression  of  the 1930s started with the stock market crash of  अक्तूबर  1929 .
Turkey (  )  , officially the Republic of Turkey ,  is  a transcontinental country ,  स्तिथ   ज़्यादातर  on Anatolia in Western Asia and  on  East Thrace in Southeastern  यूरोपीय   .
Turkey  is  bordered by eight countries : Bulgaria  to  the  उत्तरपश्चिम  ;  यूनानियों  to the  वेस्ट   ;  Georgia to the  पूर्वोत्तर  ; Armenia , Iran  और  the  अज़रबैजानी  exclave  of   nakhchivan  to the east ; and Iraq  और   सीरियाई  to the southeast .
The Mediterranean Sea  is  to the south  ;   the  Aegean Sea is to the  वेस्ट  ; and the  ब्लैक  Sea is to  the  north  .
the  Sea of  मरमरा   ,   the   bosphorus  and the Dardanelles ( which together form the  तुर्की  Straits ) demarcate  the   boundary  between  thrace   और   आनातोलिया  ; they also separate  यूरोपीय   और  Asia .
Turkey  's  location at  the  crossroads of Europe and Asia makes it a country of significant geostrategic importance .
the  country  's  official language is Turkish , a  turkic  language , which is spoken by approximately 85 % of the population as mother tongue .
The most numerous  जातीय  group is  the  Turks , who  constitute   between   70  % and 75 %  of  the  जनसांख्यिकी  according  to  The World Factbook .
Kurds  हैं  the largest  जातीय  minority and  ,  according to the  वही  source ,  क्रमांक   around   18  % of the  जनसांख्यिकी  while other  जातीय   अल्पसंख्यकों  are estimated to be at 7–12  %  .
The vast  बहुमत  of the  जनसांख्यिकी   is  Muslim  .
The area  अभी  called  तुर्कों  has been inhabited since the Paleolithic , including  विभिन्न  Ancient  आनातोलियाई   सभ्यताओं  and Thracian peoples .
After Alexander the Great  's  conquest  ,  the  क्षेत्रफल   थी  Hellenized , which continued  साथ  the  रोमन  rule and the transition into  the  Byzantine Empire .
the  Seljuk Turks began migrating  into  the  क्षेत्रफल  in  the  11th century , starting  the  process of Turkification  ,  which was  greatly   त्वरित  by the Seljuk  विजय   over  the Byzantines at the Battle of Manzikert in  1071  .
The  सलजूक़  Sultanate of Rûm ruled Anatolia until the Mongol invasion  in  1243 , upon which  it  disintegrated  into  several small Turkish beyliks .
Starting from the late  13th  century  ,   the  Ottoman beylik  संयुक्त  Anatolia and created an  साम्राज्य  encompassing  much  of Southeastern Europe  ,  Western  एशिया  and North  अफ़्रीकी  .
बाद  the  उस्मानी   साम्राज्य   collapsed  following its  शिकस्त  in  संसार   युद्ध  I , parts of it were  occupied   by  the  विजयी  Allies .
a  cadre of  यंग   सैन्य   अधिकारियों  , led  by  Mustafa Kemal Atatürk and his colleagues , organized a successful resistance to the Allies ; in 1923 they established the modern Republic of Turkey , with Atatürk as its  पहला  president .
Turkey is a democratic , secular ,  एकात्मक   ,  constitutional  गणतंत्र   साथ  a diverse cultural heritage  .
Turkey has become increasingly integrated  साथ  the West through membership in  संगठनों  such as the  परिषद  of Europe , NATO , OECD , OSCE and the G-20 major economies .
Turkey began full membership  negotiations   साथ  the European Union  in   2005  ,  having  been an associate member of the European Economic Community  चूंकि  1963 and having joined the  eu  Customs  संघ  in 1995 .
Turkey has also fostered  बंद  cultural  ,  political and economic relations with the  मध्य  East , Caucasus  ,  the  turkic   राज्य  of  सेंट्रल  Asia and  the  African countries through  सदस्यता  in  संगठनों  such as the  turkic  Council  ,  Joint Administration of Turkic Arts  और  Culture , Organisation of  इस्लामी  Cooperation  और  the  आर्थिक   सहयोग  Organisation  .
Turkey 's  growing   अर्थव्यवस्था   और  diplomatic initiatives  have  led  to  its recognition as a regional power  .
तुर्कों  is the world 's  17th  largest economy by nominal  जीडीपी   और  the 16th largest  by   खरीदना  power parity  .
Caryn Elaine  जॉनसन   ,  best known  as  Whoopi Goldberg  (  , ( born November  13   ,   1955  ) is an  अमरीकी  comedienne ,  अभिनेत्री   ,   singer-songwriter   ,  political activist ,  लेखक  and  बात   दिखाएँ  host .
गोल्डबर्ग  made her  फिल्मी  debut in  the  Color Purple  (  1985 ) ,  playing   celie   ,  a mistreated  ब्लैक  woman in  the  Deep South .
She received  a  nomination  लिये  the  अकादमी  Award for Best Actress and won her first  सुनहरी  Globe  पुरस्कार   लिये   उसके  role  in  the film .
In 1990 , she  निभाई   oda  Mae Brown , a  wacky   मानसिक  helping  a  slain man (  पैट्रिक  Swayze ) save his lover (  demi  Moore  )  in  the   ब्लॉकबस्टर  Ghost .
This performance won  उसके   a   दूसरी  Golden Globe  और  an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress  ;  this made Goldberg  तभी   the  second black  स्त्री  in the history  of  the  अकादमी  Awards to win an  एक्टिंग   oscar—the   पहला  being Hattie  mcdaniel   जो  won for Gone With the Wind in  1939   .
notable  later films include  सिस्टर  Act and  सिस्टर  Act  2  , The Player  ,   बना   in  America  ,  How  स्टेला  Got  उसके  Groove Back , Girl ,  बाधित  and Rat Race  .
वो  is also acclaimed  लिये  her  भूमिकाएँ   as   the  bartender  guinan   in  Star Trek : The Next Generation , as  टेरी  Doolittle in  jumpin  ' Jack Flash  ,  and as  कार्मेन  Tibideaux in Glee  ,  as well as the  आवाज़   of   shenzi   the   लकड़बग्घा  in The  शेर  King  .
Goldberg has been nominated  लिये   13  Emmy Awards  लिये   उसके  work  in  television .
She was co-producer  of  the popular game show Hollywood  वर्गों  from 1998 to 2004  .
She has been the moderator of the daytime talk show The View since  2007  .
Goldberg has  a  Grammy , two Daytime  emmys   ,  two Golden Globes ,  a   टोनी   (  for production , not acting ) , and  an  Oscar .
In  जोड   ,  Goldberg has  a   अंग्रेजों  Academy  फिल्मी   पुरस्कार  , four People 's Choice Awards ,  और   रै  been honored with a star on the  हॉलीवुड  Walk of  कीर्ति  .
She  is  one  of  the few entertainers who have won  an  Emmy  ,   ग्रैमी  , Oscar , and Tony Award .
Augusta is  a  consolidated city  in   the  U.S.  राज्य  of  जॉर्जिया  , located  at   the   पतन   लकीर  of  the  Savannah River ,  at  the head  of  its  navigable  portion  .
As of the  2010  census , the Augusta– Richmond County population  थी  195,844 not  गिनती   the   unconsolidated  cities of Hephzibah and  blythe  .
Augusta is the principal  नगर  of  the  Augusta  –  Richmond  काउंटी  Metropolitan  सांख्यिकीय  Area ,  जिससे  as of  2010  had an estimated  जनसांख्यिकी  of 556,877 , making it both the second-largest city and the  second-largest  metro area in the state after Atlanta  .
it   is  the 116th-largest city in the  संयुक्त  States .
Internationally  ,  Augusta is best known for hosting  the  Masters  टूर्नामेंट  in golf each spring .
A CD-ROM ( )  is  a  pre-pressed  compact disc which contains  आंकड़ा  .
the   नाम  is an  एक्रोनिम  which stands for  ``  Compact Disc Read-only memory  ``  .
कंप्यूटर  can  पढ़ा  CD-ROMs , but can  नहीं  write on  उन्हें  .
cd-roms  are  popularly   प्रयुक्त   to   वितरित  computer software , including video games and multimedia  अनुप्रयोग  , though any data can be stored  (  up to  the  capacity  सीमा  of a disc  )  .
कुछ   cds   ,   पुकारा  enhanced CDs , hold both computer  आंकड़ा   और  audio with the  latter   सक्षम  of being  निभाई  on a CD player , while data (  ऐसे  as software or  डिजिटल  video  )  is  तभी  usable on a computer ( such  as  ISO 9660 format PC CD-ROMs  )  .
The Yellow Book  is  the  तकनीकी  standard  कि  defines the  स्वरूप  of CD-ROMs  .
एक  of  a  set of  color-bound  books  कि   contain  the  तकनीकी   विशेषताएँ  for  सब  CD formats , the Yellow Book , created by Sony and Philips  ,   थी  the  पहला   एक्सटेंशन   of   कॉम्पैक्ट  Disc Digital Audio .
It  adapted  the format to  थाम  any form  of   आंकड़ा  .
The  शिकागो  Blackhawks ( spelled as Black Hawks before  1986  ,  और  known colloquially  as  the Hawks ) are a professional ice  हॉकी   टोली  based in Chicago , Illinois .
They  हैं   सदस्यों  of the Central Division  of   the   पश्चिमी  Conference  of   the  National Hockey League ( NHL ) .
वे  have  जीती   चार  Stanley Cup  championships  since  उनके   founding  in  1926   ,   सबसे  recently  in  2009–10 .
The Blackhawks are one of the  असली  Six  एनएचएल   टीमों  , along with  the   डेट्रॉयट  Red Wings ,  मॉन्ट्रियल  Canadiens , Toronto Maple Leafs ,  बोस्टन   bruins   और   नई  York Rangers .
Since the Blackhawks have played their  घर   खेल  at the United Center after  having  spent 65 years playing at Chicago  स्टेडियम  .
lent  celebrants carrying  आउट  a street procession during Holy  सप्ताह   .
The violet  रंग  is  प्रायः  associated with penance  और  detachment .
समान   ईसाई   penitential  practice is seen in other  कैथोलिक  countries , sometimes associated with  mortification  of the flesh .
Granada  ,   निकारागुआ  .
Lent  (  Latin  :  Quadragesima )  is  a solemn  observance  in the liturgical year of many  ईसाई  denominations ,  स्थायी  for a period of approximately six weeks leading up to Easter  संडे   .
in  the  सामान्य  Latin-rite  और   सबसे  Western  denominations  Lent  is  taken  to  run from Ash  बुधवार  to Maundy Thursday ( Holy Thursday )  morning  or to Easter  संध्या   .
in  the Catholic  गिरिजाघर  , Lent lasts until  पावन  Thursday  ,  while other denominations run  जबतक  Easter Eve  .
The traditional purpose  of   lent   is  the preparation of the believer through prayer , penance , repentance , almsgiving  ,  and self-denial .
Its  संस्थागत   purpose   is   heightened  in the  सालाना   commemoration   of   पावन   सप्ताह  , marking the death , burial and resurrection of  यीशु  ,  जिससे   recalls  the events of the Bible when Jesus is crucified on Good  शुक्रवार   ,  which then  culminates   in   the  celebration on Easter Sunday of the Resurrection of  यीशु   मसीह   .
दौरान  Lent  ,  many of the  वफादार   कमिट  to fasting or  giving  up  निश्चित  types of  luxuries  as a  रूप   of  penitence .
the   स्टेशन   of  the Cross  ,   a  devotional commemoration of Christ 's carrying the Cross  और  of his execution , are often observed .
Many Roman Catholic  और  some  प्रोटोस्टेंट  churches remove flowers  इससे   उनके  altars  ,  while crucifixes ,  धार्मिक   मूर्तियाँ   ,  and  अन्य  elaborate  धार्मिक  symbols  हैं  often veiled in violet fabrics in solemn observance  of  the event .
In certain pious  कैथोलिक  countries  ,  some adherents mark the season with the traditional abstention from the  खपत   of   मांस  .
In some  देशों   ,  grand religious  जुलूसों  and  सांस्कृतिक   कस्टम  are observed , and  the  faithful attempt to visit seven  चर्च  during Holy Week in  सम्मान  of  यीशु  Christ heading to Mount  कलवारी  .
Lent is traditionally described as lasting for  चालीस  days  ,  in commemoration of  the  forty days which  ,   according  to the Gospels of Matthew  ,  Mark  और  Luke  ,  Jesus  खर्च   उपवास  in  the  desert before the beginning of  उसके  public ministry  ,  where he  endured   प्रलोभन  by the  शैतान  .
However , different Christian denominations  गणना  the forty days  of  Lent differently .
In  सबसे   पश्चिमी   परंपराओं   the  Sundays are  नहीं  counted as  भाग  of  lent  ; thus the period  इससे  Ash  बुधवार  until Easter  consists  of 40 days  जब   the  Sundays are excluded  .
However in  the  Roman Catholic  गिरिजाघर  Lent is  अभी  taken to end  on   पावन   गुरुवार   बल्कि   than   ईस्टर  Eve , and  hence  lasts 38 days  excluding  Sundays  ,  or  44   दिनों  in  कुल  .
This  इवेंट   ,  along with  इसके   परहेज़गारों  customs  हैं  observed by Catholics  ,  Lutherans  ,   methodists   ,   presbyterians   ,  and Anglicans .
