the   chernobyl   विपत्ति   (  , Chornobylska Katastrofa – Chornobyl Catastrophe ) was a catastrophic nuclear accident that  occurred   on  26 April 1986 at the Chernobyl Nuclear  शक्ति  Plant  in  Ukraine (  तब  officially the Ukrainian SSR )  ,  which  थी   अंतर्गत   the   सीधा   क्षेत्राधिकार   of  the  सेंट्रल  authorities  of   the  Soviet Union .
an  explosion and fire released large quantities  of   रेडियोसक्रिय  particles  into   the  atmosphere ,  जिससे  spread over much of the western  ussr  and  यूरोपीय  .
the   chernobyl  disaster  is  widely considered  to  have been the worst nuclear  शक्ति  plant accident in history , and is  एक  of only two classified as a level 7 event on the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   नाभिकीय   इवेंट  Scale ( the other being the Fukushima  daiichi   नाभिकीय  disaster in 2011  )  .
The  बैटल  to  contain  the contamination and  avert  a greater catastrophe ultimately involved over  500,000  workers and cost an estimated  18   अरब  rubles  .
The  आधिकारिक  Soviet casualty count of 31 deaths has been disputed , and long-term effects such as cancers  और  deformities  हैं  still being  accounted  for .
In grammar  ,  a  विषय   पूरक  is a predicative expression that follows a linking verb  (  copula ) and  कि  complements  (   completes  ) the  विषय   of  the sentence by either ( 1 )  renaming   it  or ( 2  )   describing  it .
in  the former  मामला   ,   a  renaming noun  phrase  such as  a  noun or pronoun is called  a  predicative nominal  .
An adjective  following  the copula  और  describing the subject is called a predicative adjective  .
in  either case the predicative complement in effect  mirrors  the  विषय  .
विषय   complements   हैं  used with a  छोटी  class  of   क्रियाएँ  called linking verbs or copula , of  जिससे  be is  the   सबसे   आम  .
Since copula are  stative  verbs ,  विषय  complements are not affected by  कोई   कार्रवाई   of  the  क्रिया  .
विषय   complements  are typically not clause arguments , nor  हैं  they  clause  adjuncts .
Throughout  the  fifty-five year history of the  ग्रैमी  Awards  ,  many significant records have been set .
इस  page  तभी  includes  the  competitive awards won by  विभिन्न  artists .
इस   करता  not include the various special  पुरस्कार  that are  प्रस्तुत  by  the   नेशनल   अकादमी  of Recording Arts  और  Sciences such  as   आजीवन   उपलब्धि  Awards  ,  Trustees Awards , Technical Awards or  लेजेंड  Awards  .
The page however does include  अन्य  non-performance related Grammys ( known  as   the   शिल्प  &  उत्पादन  Fields ) that  may  have been presented to the artist  (   s  ) .
Marshall Bruce Mathers III ( born October 17 ,  1972  )  ,  better  ज्ञात  by his stage  नाम  Eminem  (  stylized as  eminǝm  ) and by  उसके   alter  ego Slim  छायादार   ,   is  an American rapper  ,  record producer , songwriter  और   कर्ता  .
एमिनेम  , along with his  सोलो   करियर  ,  is   a  member  of  his group D12  ,  and also one half of the hip  हॉप   duo  Bad Meets Evil , with Royce  da   5'9  ''  .
Eminem is one of the  best-selling   कलाकारों   in  the  संसार  and is the best-selling artist  of   the   2000s  .
he   रै  been  सूचीबद्ध  and ranked as one of  the  greatest  कलाकारों  of all time by  अनेक  magazines , including  रोलिंग   स्टोन  magazine which ranked him  82nd  on its list of  the  100 Greatest Artists  of  All Time .
The  वही  magazine declared  उसे  The  किंग  of  हिप  Hop .
Including his work with  d12   और  Bad Meets Evil , Eminem has achieved ten number-one albums on the Billboard 200 .
he   रै  sold more than 100  लाख  records worldwide , including 42 million  ट्रैक्स   और   49.1  million  एल्बम  in  the  United States .
As an underground rapper Eminem  released  his debut  सोलो   एल्बम  ,  अनन्त  in 1996 .
the  album was a critical and commercial failure .
He  gained  mainstream  लोकप्रियता  in 1999  बाद  the  रिलीज   of  his major-label debut album The Slim Shady LP .
The  lp  also earned Eminem his first Grammy  पुरस्कार   लिये  Best Rap Album  .
उसके   अगला  two  रिकॉर्ड   the   मार्शल  Mathers LP  ,  and The  एमिनेम  Show , also won Best Rap  एल्बम  Grammy  पुरस्कार  , making  एमिनेम  the  पहला  artist  to   जीत   बेहतरीन  Rap  एल्बम  for  तीन  consecutive LPs  .
This was followed by  another   स्टुडियो  release in 2004 titled  encore  .
एमिनेम  then  गई  on hiatus after  touring  in 2005 .
He  released  his first  एल्बम  in five years  titled   पतन   ,  on May 15 , 2009  .
In  2010   ,  Eminem released  उसके  seventh studio  एल्बम   रिकवरी  .
Recovery was an international success and was  नामित  the best selling album of 2010 worldwide ,  joining  The Eminem  दिखाएँ  , which  थी  the  बेहतरीन  seller of  2002  .
Eminem  जीती   ग्रैमी  Awards  लिये   दोनो   पतन  and Recovery ,  giving  him  a   कुल  of 13  grammys  in his career  .
एमिनेम  has  खोली  other ventures , including his own record label  छायादार  Records with  उसके  manager Paul Rosenberg .
he   भी   रै  his  अपना  radio channel , Shade 45 on  sirius  XM Radio .
Eminem began an  एक्टिंग  career  in  2002 , when he starred  in   the  hip hop drama film 8 Mile .
he  won the Academy Award for Best  असली  Song , becoming the first rap artist ever  to   जीत  the award .
He has also  बना  cameo appearances  in  The Wash  (  2001 ) , Funny People  (  2009 ) and  the  television  श्रेणी   अनुगामी  .
The  एकड़  is  a   ईकाई  of  क्षेत्रफल  used in  the  imperial and U.S.  प्रथागत  systems  .
An  एकड़  is  परिचय  40 % of a hectare –  थोड़ा  smaller than an American football field .
the  acre is  no  longer commonly used ,  हालांकि  a few notable  अपवाद  include  the  United States , Australia  ,  Burma and the  संयुक्त  Kingdom  (  as of 2010 , the acre is no longer officially used in  the  United  किंगडम  , though is  स्टिल   प्रयुक्त  in  रियल   एस्टेट  descriptions ) .
It  is   स्टिल  used , to some  extent  ,  in  Canada  .
the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   प्रतीक  of  the  acre  is   ac   ,  and is defined  as  1/640 of a square mile  .
the   सबसे  commonly used acre today is the international  एकड़  .
In  the  United States both the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   एकड़   और  the slightly different US survey  एकड़   हैं  in use .
The most common  उपयोग  of the acre is  to   माप  tracts of land  .
एक   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   एकड़  is defined  as   4046.8564224   वर्गाकार  metres .
दौरान   the  Middle Ages  ,  an acre was the amount of  जमीन  that could be plowed in  एक  day with a yoke of oxen .
एंटोनी   लाव्वाज़्ये  's discovery of  the  Law of Conservation of Mass  led  to many new findings in the 19th century  .
जोसेफ   proust   's  law of  definite  proportions  और  John Dalton  's  atomic theory branched  इससे  the discoveries  of   एंटोनी  Lavoisier .
Lavoisier 's quantitative experiments  नाज़िल  that combustion involved oxygen  बल्कि   than  what  थी   previously  thought to be phlogiston .
The law of  संरक्षण  of  द्रव्यमान  , or principle of mass conservation ,  राज्य  that  लिये  any  प्रणाली  closed  to  all transfers of matter and  उर्जा   (  both of which have mass ) ,  the  mass of the system must remain  निरंतर  over time , as system  द्रव्यमान  can not change  मात्रा  if it is not added  or   removed  .
Hence , the quantity of mass is `` conserved '' over time .
the  law implies  कि   द्रव्यमान  can neither be  निर्मित  nor destroyed  ,  although it may be  rearranged  in space  ,   or  the  entities   संबद्ध  with it  may  be  बदला  in form , as for example when light  or   शारीरिक  work is transformed  into  particles  कि  contribute  the   वही  mass to  the  system  as   the  light or work had contributed  .
The law implies ( requires )  कि  during any  रासायनिक  reaction , nuclear  प्रतिक्रिया  , or  रेडियोसक्रिय  decay  in   an  isolated  प्रणाली   ,  the mass of  the   reactants  or starting  सामग्री  must  बराबर  the mass of the products  .
The concept of mass  संरक्षण  is  widely  used in  अनेक  fields  ऐसे  as  रसायन   ,  mechanics , and  द्रव  dynamics .
historically  ,  द्रव्यमान  conservation  थी   खोजा  in chemical  प्रतिक्रियाएँ  by Antoine Lavoisier in the  लेट  18th  सदी  , and was  of   निर्णायक  importance  in  the  प्रगति   इससे  alchemy to the modern natural science  of  chemistry  .
The closely  सम्बन्धित  concept of  पदार्थ  conservation was found to hold good in chemistry  to  such high approximation that it  विफल  only for the  ऊँची   energies   treated  by  the  later  refinements  of relativity theory  ,  but  वरना  remains  उपयोगी  and sufficiently accurate for most chemical calculations , even in  आधुनिक  practice .
In  खास  relativity ,  needed   लिये  accuracy  जब   विशाल  energy  हस्तांतरण  between systems is involved , the difference between thermodynamically closed and  पृथक  systems  becomes   महत्वपूर्ण  ,  चूंकि   संरक्षण  of  द्रव्यमान  is strictly  और  perfectly upheld only  लिये   so-called  isolated systems , i.e . those  completely  isolated from all exchanges with the  पर्यावरण   .
In this circumstance , the  mass-energy   equivalence  theorem  राज्य   कि  mass  संरक्षण   is  equivalent  to  total energy  संरक्षण   ,  which  is  the first law of thermodynamics  .
By contrast  ,  for a  thermodynamically  closed system (  i.e.  , one which is  बंद  to exchanges of matter  ,  but open to exchanges of non-material energy  ,  such  as  heat and  कार्य  , with the  परिवेश  ) mass  is   (  usually )  तभी  approximately conserved .
The input or output of non-material energy must change the  द्रव्यमान  of the system  in   आपेक्षिकता  theory , although  the  change  is   प्रायः  small  ,  since  अपेक्षाकृत  large  amounts   of  such  उर्जा  (  by  comparison with ordinary experience ) carry only a  छोटी   राशि   of   द्रव्यमान  ( again  by  ordinary standards of measurement )  .
In  खास  relativity ,  द्रव्यमान   is   नहीं   परिवर्तित   to   उर्जा  ,  चूंकि  energy  in  all of its  फ़ॉर्म  always retains its  समतुल्य   राशि   of  mass  throughout  any transformation  or   translocation   into  , or out of ,  a  system .
however   ,   निश्चित  types of  पदार्थ   (  a different concept  )  may be converted  to  energy , so long as  the   द्रव्यमान   of  the  प्रणाली  is unchanged in the process .
However ,  if   ऐसे   उर्जा   is  removed  इससे   प्रणालियों  , they  जरूर  lose the  द्रव्यमान  that is  संबद्ध   साथ  it .
In general  आपेक्षिकता  , mass ( and energy  )  conservation in expanding  आयतन   of  space is a complex concept  ,  subject to  अलग  definitions , and neither mass nor energy  is  as strictly and simply  conserved  as is  the   मामला  in special relativity and in Minkowski space  .
लिये  a discussion  ,  see mass  in   सामान्य  relativity  .
A pig  is  any of the animals  in  the genus Sus  ,   भीतर  the Suidae family of even-toed  ungulates  .
Pigs include  the  domestic pig ,  इसके   पूर्वज  the wild boar , and several other  जंगली  relatives  .
Young and small pigs are known as  piglets  .
Pigs are omnivores  और  are highly  सोशल  and intelligent animals .
8-inch , -inch , and -inch floppy  डिस्क
8-inch  ,  -inch  (  पूरा  height )  ,  and -inch drives
A 3.5-inch  diskette  's `` floppy '' magnetic  सामग्री  ,  removed   इससे  its housing
A floppy disk , or diskette  ,  is a disk  भंडार  medium composed  of   a   डिस्क   of  thin and flexible magnetic  भंडार  medium , sealed  in  a rectangular plastic  वाहक  lined with fabric that removes dust  अणु  .
वे  are read  और  written by a floppy disk  ड्राइव   (  FDD )  .
Floppy disks  ,  initially as media and  बाद  in  और   3.5-inch   (  90 mm  )   आकार   ,  were  a   सर्वव्यापी  form  of  data storage and exchange from the  mid-1970s  well into the  पहला  decade  of  the 21st century .
by   2010  , computer motherboards were rarely manufactured with  फ्लॉपी   ड्राइव   support  ; `` floppies could  be  used  as  an  बाह्य  USB drive , but ``  ,  8  ``  ,  और   non-standard   ड्राइव  could  तभी   be   संभाला  by old equipment .
While floppy disk  ड्राइव  still  have  some  सीमित  uses  ,   विशेषकर  with  विरासत   औद्योगिक  computer equipment , they have been superseded  by  data storage  विधि  with  much  greater capacity , such as USB  फ्लैश   ड्राइव  , portable external  मुश्किल  disk drives  ,  optical discs  ,   मेमोरी   ताश  , and computer  संजाल  .
An animated  आरेख  of  a   कटर
in   बेसबॉल   ,   a   कटर   ,   or   काटें  fastball , is a  प्रकार  of fastball which breaks slightly toward the pitcher 's glove side as it reaches home plate  .
इस   पिच  is  कही   between   a  slider and a fastball  ,  as  it  is usually  thrown  faster than a slider  लकिन  with  अधिक  motion than a typical  fastball  .
Some  pitchers  use  a  cutter as a way  to  prevent hitters  इससे   expecting   उनके  regular fastballs .
A common technique used  to  throw  a  cutter is  to  use a four-seam  fastball  grip with the baseball set slightly  बंद   बीच  in the hand .
When a  बैटर  is able  to  hit a cutter  पिच  , it  प्रायः  results in soft contact and  an  easy  आउट  , due to the  पिच  's  गति   keeping  the  बॉल  away from the bat  's  sweet spot .
The  कटर  is  typically   2–5  mph slower than a  पिचर   's  four-seam  fastball  .
in   2010   ,   the   औसत  pitch classified as a  कटर   by  PITCHf/x thrown by  a  right-handed  पिचर  was  88.6  mph  ;  the average  four-seamer  was  92.1  mph .
``  What It Takes '' is  a  power  ballad   by  American hard  चट्टान  band  एरोस्मिथ  .
It was  लिखा  by Steven Tyler , Joe  पेरी  , and Desmond Child .
it  was  released  in 1990 as the third single from  एरोस्मिथ   's  critically and commercially successful  1989   एल्बम  Pump  .
In  the  video  the  Making of Pump , A & R man John Kalodner described the  सोंग  as  ``  a masterpiece '' .
During live  प्रदर्शन  , Tyler sings the first  श्लोक   a  cappella and belts out  एक   of  his  हस्ताक्षर   चिल्लाती  right before  the  chorus  .
The album version of the  सोंग  is followed by an untitled hidden track  .
सिर  of Odysseus from a Greek 2nd century BC marble  समूह  representing  odysseus  blinding Polyphemus , found at  the   विला  of Tiberius  at  Sperlonga
विवरण   of  an ancient Roman mosaic of Ulysses  in   ट्यूनीशिया
odysseus  (  or  ;  यूनानी  :  ,  ) , also known  by  the Roman  नाम   ulysses  ( ; ) , was a  legendary  Greek king  of   ithaca   और  a hero  of  Homer 's epic  कविता  the Odyssey .
Odysseus also plays a key role in  होमर   's   इलियड  and  अन्य  works in that same Epic Cycle .
Husband  of  Penelope , father of Telemachus , and son of Laërtes ( or  sisyphus  ) and  anticlea  , Odysseus is renowned for his brilliance , guile ,  और  versatility  (   polytropos   )  , and is hence known by the epithet  odysseus   the   cunning  (  mētis   ,   or  `` cunning  प्रज्ञा  `` )  .
He  is  most  प्रसिद्ध  for the  टेन   eventful  years he took to return home after the decade-long  trojan   युद्ध   और  his  प्रसिद्ध  Trojan Horse  ploy  to  कैप्चर  the  नगर   of   ट्रॉय  .
Erie is a Statutory Town  in  Boulder and Weld counties  in  the U.S. state of Colorado .
The population according  to  the 2010 census is  18,135   और  was recorded as  6,291  at  the  2000  जनसांख्यिकी  .
The Town of Erie is located  बस  west  of  I-25 for  आसान  access to  i-70   ,   डेनवर  International Airport and Colorado 's entire  सामने  Range .
Erie  's  Planning Area spans  48   वर्गाकार  miles , extending  इससे  the north  पक्ष  of  राज्य  Highway  52   दक्षिण  to State Highway 7  ,   और  between US 287  on  the  वेस्ट   और  Interstate  25   to   the  east  .
Erie is approximately  35   मिनट्स   इससे  Denver International Airport  ,  25 minutes to Denver and 20 minutes from Boulder .
The Board of Trustees serves as the legislative and  शासी  body of the Town of Erie  और  is  जिम्मेदार   लिये  establishing  कस्बा   नीतियों   और  goals .
The  फलक  has  the   प्राधिकार  to adopt laws , ordinances and resolutions as needed to conduct the business  of  the Town ,  और  by  अध्यादेश  may enter into  अनुबंध   or   intergovernmental  agreements  to   furnish   ,   प्राप्त  services or to provide for  सहकारी  service delivery .
नियुक्त  by and serving at  the  pleasure of  the  Board  of   trustees  , the Town Administrator is  the   मुख्य  operating and administrative officer of the Town and is responsible for providing professional  नेतृत्व  in  the  administration  और   निष्पादन  of policies and  उद्देश्य  formulated by  the  Board .
The  मिशन  of the Erie Police  विभाग   is  to communicate  और  work with the  जातियाँ  to  maintain  a safe  पर्यावरण  ,  prevent  crime  और   enforce   the  law , while protecting the  अधिकारों  of  सब  .
erie   नगरपालिका  Airport  (  EIK ) is owned and operated by the Town  of  Erie  और  is strategically located in  the  Denver-Boulder  महानगर  area on Colorado Highway  7  , a little over three  मील   वेस्ट   of  Interstate 25 .
The main  रनवे   is   कंक्रीट   प्रशस्त   और  4,700 feet  long  .
the  is a home  वीडियो  game console  उत्पादित  by  सोनी   कंप्यूटर  Entertainment .
It is the successor  to  the PlayStation 2  ,  as  भाग   of  the  प्लेस्टेशन  series .
The PlayStation 3 competes  साथ   microsoft  's Xbox  360  and Nintendo 's Wii as part  of  the  सातवाँ   पीढी  of video game  consoles  .
It was first released  on   नवम्बर  11 , 2006  ,  in Japan ,  साथ   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   बाज़ार  following shortly thereafter .
The console was  पहला  officially announced at E3 2005  .
Originally  नियत  for a  वसन्त  2006 release  तिथि  , it was delayed several times until finally hitting stores at  the  end  of  the year .
It was the first and  फिलहाल  only  कंसोल   to  use Blu-ray  डिस्क  as its primary storage  मीडियम  .
Major features of the console include  इसके  unified online gaming  सेवा   ,   the  PlayStation Network , and its connectivity with the  प्लेस्टेशन  Portable  और  PlayStation Vita  ,  In  सितंबर   2009  the updated PlayStation  3  Slim ,  थी   released  .
इस   पतला  is lighter  और  thinner than the original version  ,   हालांकि   it   lacks  PlayStation 2 backwards  संगतता  ( removed on later  असली  models  )  , but notably  प्रदर्शित   a  re-designed logo and  विपणन  design  .
As  of  November 4  ,  2012  ,  70 million  प्लेस्टेशन  3s  have  been sold worldwide  .
इसके  successor ,  प्लेस्टेशन   4  ,  is   नियत  for a  q4  2013  रिलीज   .
Salvador Domingo Felipe Jacinto Dalí i Domènech  ,   1st  Marqués de  dalí   de  Pubol ( May 11 , 1904January  23  , 1989 ) , known  as  Salvador Dalí (  )  ,  थी  a prominent Spanish surrealist painter  born  in  figueres   ,   स्पेन  .
Dalí was  a   skilled   draftsman  ,  बेहतरीन  known for the striking and  विचित्र  images  in  his  surrealist  work .
His painterly skills are  प्रायः  attributed to the influence  of   पुनर्जागरण  masters .
उसके  best-known  कार्य  , The Persistence  of  Memory , was completed in 1931 .
dalí  's  expansive  artistic repertoire included film , sculpture , and  छायाचित्र  , in collaboration with a  दायरा  of artists  in   a  variety  of  media  .
dalí   attributed  his `` love  of  everything  कि  is gilded and excessive , my  जुनून   लिये  luxury and my  प्रेम   of  oriental clothes ''  to  a  self-styled  `` Arab  lineage   ''  ,  claiming  that his ancestors were descended from  the  Moors  .
Dalí was highly imaginative  ,  and  भी  enjoyed indulging  in   असामान्य  and  वैभवशाली  behavior .
His eccentric manner and  attention-grabbing  public actions  sometimes  drew more attention than his artwork  ,   to  the dismay  of   those   जो   आयोजित  his work in high  esteem  , and to the irritation of his critics .
पारस   प्लेटो  by  silanion
The humanities  हैं  academic disciplines  कि  study human culture ,  using   विधि  that are primarily  विश्लेषणात्मक  ,  नाजुक  , or speculative  ,  and having a significant historical element , as  विशिष्ट  from  the   मुख्यतः   अनुभवजन्य  approaches  of  the  प्राकृतिक   sciences  .
The humanities include  प्राचीन  and  आधुनिक  languages , literature  ,   दर्शनशास्त्र  ,  धर्म  , and  विज़ुअल   और  performing arts such as music and theatre  .
The humanities that are also  regarded  as  सोशल   sciences   शामिल  history ,  मानवशास्त्र   ,   क्षेत्रफल  studies  ,  communication studies , cultural  अध्ययन  , law ,  अर्थशास्त्र  and  भाषाविज्ञान  .
Scholars working  in  the humanities are  sometimes  described as `` humanists '' .
however  , that  पद  also  describes  the philosophical position of humanism , which some ``  antihumanist   ``  scholars in the humanities reject .
Some secondary schools offer  मानवता  classes ,  प्रायः   consisting   of  English literature ,  वैश्विक  studies  ,  and art .
Human  disciplines  like history , cultural  मानवशास्त्र  and psychoanalysis study subject matters to which the experimental method does not apply , and they have  अभिगम  instead to  the  comparative  विधि   और  comparative research .
the  2005 Blue Room Christmas Tree
the   श्वेत  House Christmas  पेड़  , also known as  the  Blue Room  क्रिसमस  Tree , is the official indoor  क्रिसमस  tree  at  the  निवास  of  the  President of the United States , the White House  .
The first indoor Christmas tree  थी   संस्थापित  in the  श्वेत  House sometime in  the  19th century  (  there are varying claims as  to  the  सटीक  year  )  and since 1961 the  पेड़  has had  a  themed motif at  the   discretion  of  the  First  महिला  of  the   संयुक्त  States .
The President of  the  United  राज्य   of   अमेरिका  ( POTUS  )  is the head of state  और  head of government of  the   संयुक्त  States .
the  president leads  the  executive branch of  the  federal government and  is   the  commander-in-chief of  the  United States Armed  शक्तियां  .
Article II of the U.S. Constitution vests  the  executive  शक्ति  of the United States in the president and charges him with  the  execution  of  federal law , alongside  the  responsibility of appointing federal  कार्यपालिका   ,   राजनयिक   ,   नियामक  ,  और  judicial officers  ,  and concluding  treaties   साथ  foreign powers ,  साथ  the advice and  सहमति   of  the Senate .
The president is further empowered  to  grant  संघीय   pardons   और  reprieves , and to  convene   और  adjourn either  or  both  घरों  of Congress under extraordinary circumstances .
Since  the   founding  of  the   संयुक्त  States  ,   the  power of the  अध्यक्ष  and the federal government have  grown  substantially and each modern president , despite possessing no formal legislative powers beyond  हस्ताक्षर  or vetoing congressionally  passed  bills  ,   is   largely  responsible for dictating  the   विधान  agenda  of  his  पार्टी  and the foreign and domestic policy of the United States  .
the  president is frequently  वर्णित   as  the most  शक्तिशाली  person in the world .
The president is indirectly elected by the people through the Electoral College  to  a four-year term , and is one of only  दो  nationally  निर्वाचित  federal officers  ,  the other being  the  Vice  अध्यक्ष  of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  .
The  twenty-second  Amendment  ,  adopted in 1951  ,  prohibits  anyone  from  कभी  being  निर्वाचित   to   the  presidency  लिये  a third  पूरा  term .
it  also prohibits a person from being elected to  the  presidency more than  एकबार   if  that person previously  था  served  as   अध्यक्ष  , or  एक्टिंग  president  ,  for more  than  two years of another person 's term  as  president  .
In all ,  43  individuals have served 55 four-year terms  .
on   जनवरी  20  ,  2009  ,  Barack Obama  became  the 44th and current  अध्यक्ष  .
On November  6  , 2012  ,  he was re-elected and is  अनुसूचित  to serve until January  20   ,  2017 .
Senses are physiological capacities of organisms  कि  provide data  लिये  perception .
The senses and  उनके  operation , classification , and  सिद्धान्त  are overlapping topics  पढ़ाई  by a  किस्में  of  फ़ील्ड  ,  सबसे   notably  neuroscience , cognitive psychology  (  or  संज्ञानात्मक   विज्ञान   )  , and philosophy of perception  .
The nervous system has  a  specific sensory system or  अंग  ,  समर्पित   to  each sense .
इंसानो  have a multitude  of   होश  .
sight  ( ophthalmoception )  ,   सुनना  ( audioception ) , taste ( gustaoception  )  ,  महकते  (  olfacoception  or olfacception ) , and touch ( tactioception  )  are  the  five  traditionally  recognized .
While the ability  to   detect  other stimuli beyond those  governed   by   the  traditional senses exists ,  सहित  temperature ( thermoception ) , kinesthetic sense  (  proprioception  )  , pain ( nociception ) ,  संतुलन  ( equilibrioception  )  , acceleration (  kinesthesioception  ) , and various  आतंरिक  stimuli ( e.g  .  the different chemoreceptors  लिये   detecting  salt  और  carbon dioxide concentrations  in  the blood ) , only a small number of  ये  can safely be classified as separate senses in  और  of  themselves  .
What constitutes a sense  is   a  matter  of  some  बहस   ,  leading  to  difficulties in defining what exactly a sense  is  .
Animals also have receptors to sense  the  world  around   उन्हें   ,  with  डिग्री   of  capability  varying  greatly between  प्रजाति   .
Humans have  a  comparatively  कमजोर  sense of smell ,  जबकि  some animals  may  lack one  or  more  of   the   परंपरागत  five senses .
कुछ  animals  may   भी   सेवन  and interpret sensory  stimuli  in very different  तरीके  .
Some  प्रजाति   of  animals are able to  भाव  the world in a way that  इंसानो  can  नहीं   ,   साथ  some species able  to  sense electrical  और   चुम्बकीय  fields ,  और  detect  जल  pressure and  currents  .
Spiders ( order  araneae  )  हैं  air-breathing arthropods that have  आठ  legs  और  chelicerae with fangs that  इंजेक्ट  venom .
They are the  largest   अनुक्रम  of arachnids and  रैंक  seventh in  कुल  species diversity  among   सब  other groups  of   जीवों  .
Spiders are  मिला   विश्वव्यापी  on  प्रत्येक   महाद्वीप  except for Antarctica , and  have  become  स्थापित  in nearly every  आवास   साथ  the exception of  एयर  and sea colonization .
as  of 2008  ,  at  तनिक  43,678 spider species ,  और  109  परिवारों  have  महरूम  recorded by taxonomists ;  however   ,   वहीँ  has been confusion within  the  scientific community as to  कैसा   सब  these families should be classified , as  evidenced  by the over  20   अलग   classifications  that have been proposed  चूंकि   1900  .
Anatomically  ,   मकड़ियों  differ  इससे  other arthropods in that the usual body  खण्ड   हैं  fused into two tagmata  ,  the  cephalothorax   और   उदर  ,  और  joined by  a  small , cylindrical pedicel  .
Unlike insects  ,  spiders do  नहीं  have antennae .
in   सब  except  the  most  आदिम   समूह  ,  the   mesothelae   ,  spiders have  the  most  centralized   बेचैन  systems of  सब  arthropods ,  as   सब  their  ganglia  are  fused  into one mass  in  the cephalothorax  .
Unlike  सबसे  arthropods , spiders have no extensor muscles  in  their limbs  और   बजाय  extend them  by   हाइड्रोलिक  pressure  .
उनके  abdomens bear appendages that have  महरूम   परिवर्धित   into   spinnerets   कि   extrude  silk  इससे  up to  छह   प्रकार  of silk glands within their  उदर   .
Spider  webs   vary   widely   in   आकार  , shape and  the  amount of sticky thread used .
It now appears  कि  the  सर्पिल   orb  web may be one of the  earliest  forms  ,  and spiders that produce tangled  cobwebs  are more abundant  और  diverse than  orb-web  spiders  .
spider-like  arachnids with  silk-producing  spigots appeared in the Devonian period  परिचय  ,  लकिन  these animals  जाहिर  lacked spinnerets .
True spiders  have  been found in  carboniferous  rocks  इससे  , and are  बहुत   समान   to  the  सबसे   आदिम  surviving  अनुक्रम  , the  mesothelae  .
the  main groups of modern spiders , Mygalomorphae and Araneomorphae , first  appeared  in the  triassic  period ,  पहले  .
a  herbivorous species , Bagheera kiplingi , was  वर्णित   in   2008  , but  सब  other known species  हैं   परभक्षी  ,  ज़्यादातर   preying   on  insects and on other  मकड़ियों  , although a  few  large  प्रजाति  also take birds and lizards .
Spiders use a  चौड़ी  range  of   रणनीति  to capture prey  :   trapping  it in sticky webs , lassoing it with sticky bolas , mimicking the prey to avoid detection ,  or  running it down .
Most detect prey mainly by sensing vibrations , but  the  active hunters have acute vision ,  और  hunters of the genus Portia show  लक्षण  of  प्रज्ञा  in their choice  of  tactics and ability  to   develop  new  ones   .
Spiders '  गुस्ताखी  are too narrow  to  take solids ,  और   वे   liquidize   उनके  food by flooding it with digestive enzymes and grinding  it  with  the   bases  of their pedipalps  ,  as they do not have  सच्चा  jaws .
Male  मकड़ियों  identify themselves by a variety  of  complex  प्रेमालाप  rituals to  avoid  being eaten by  the  females  .
Males of  सबसे   प्रजाति  survive a  few   matings  , limited mainly by their short life  spans   .
Females weave silk egg-cases  ,  each of which may  contain   सैंकड़ों   of  eggs .
Females of many  प्रजाति  care for  उनके   यंग  , for  उदाहरण  by  carrying   उन्हें  around or by sharing food  साथ  them .
A  अल्पसंख्यक  of  प्रजाति  are  सोशल  , building communal webs that may house  anywhere  from a few to 50,000 individuals .
Social behavior ranges from precarious toleration ,  as  in  the  widow  मकड़ियों   ,  to co-operative  शिकार  and  food-sharing  .
Although most spiders live  लिये  at most two  सालो  , tarantulas  और  other mygalomorph spiders can  सजीव  up to  25  years in captivity .
While  the  venom of a  few   प्रजाति  is dangerous  to   इंसानो  ,  वैज्ञानिकों   हैं   अभी  researching  the  use of spider venom in medicine and as non-polluting pesticides  .
मकड़ी  silk  provides  a combination  of  lightness  ,   शक्ति  and elasticity  कि  is  श्रेष्ठ  to  कि  of synthetic materials ,  और   मकड़ी  silk  जीनों  have been  inserted  into mammals and plants  to  see if these can be used as  रेशा  factories .
as   a  result of their wide range  of  behaviors , spiders have become common  प्रतीकों  in  आर्ट   और  mythology  symbolizing  various combinations  of   सब्र  , cruelty and  रचनात्मक  powers  .
धूसर  's  anatomy  is  an  American  टेलीविज़न  medical drama that premiered on the American Broadcasting Company (  एबीसी   )  ,  as  a  mid-season  replacement on March 27  ,   2005   .
The  श्रेणी   रै   aired  nine seasons , and focuses  on  the fictional lives of surgical interns and residents as  वे   धीरे  evolve into  seasoned  doctors  ,   जबकि  trying to maintain personal lives .
The show 's premise  originated  with Shonda  rhimes  ,  जो   serves   as  an  कार्यपालिका  producer , along with Betsy Beers , Mark  गॉर्डन  , Krista  vernoff   ,  Rob Corn  ,  Mark Wilding , and  allan  Heinberg  .
The series  थी   निर्मित  to  be  racially diverse ,  utilizing  a  color-blind  casting technique  .
It is primarily filmed  in  Los Angeles  ,  California .
the  series  '   समर्थक  is Dr. Meredith Grey ( Ellen  pompeo  )  ,   जो  originally is accepted  into  the  रेसिडेंसी  program at  the   fictional   सिएटल  Grace Hospital  .
Meredith is assigned to  कार्य   अंतर्गत  Dr. Miranda  बेली  ( Chandra Wilson ) ,  साथ   साथ  Dr. Cristina  यांग  (  सैंड्रा  Oh  )  , Dr. George O'Malley (  T.  R.  नाईट  ) , Dr.  izzie  Stevens ( Katherine  heigl  ) ,  और  Dr. Alex Karev (  जस्टिन   कक्षों  ) .
Following  o'malley  's death  और   स्टीवंस  ' departure , the hospital 's merger with  रहमत  West brings in  dr.  Jackson  एवेरी  ( Jesse Williams ) and  dr.  April Kepner ( Sarah Drew )  ,   in  the sixth season  .
The surgical wing is  primarily  supervised by  dr.  Richard Webber ( James  pickens  , Jr. )  ,  who is eventually replaced by Dr. Derek Shepherd  (  Patrick Dempsey ) , and later  dr.  Owen  हंट  ( Kevin McKidd )  .
Dr. Preston Burke (  यशायाह  Washington ) departs at  the  conclusion of the  तीसरा  season , and is  replaced  by Dr. Erica  hahn  ( Brooke Smith ) ,  जो  leaves the  दिखाएँ  during the fifth season  ,  and later Dr.  टेडी  Altman ( Kim Raver  )  ,  जो  departs at the end  of   the  eighth season .
introduced   in   the  second season is Dr. Addison  मोंटगोमरी   (  Kate Walsh ) ,  जो   पत्ते   the  show at  the   समाप्त  of  the   तीसरा   ऋतु  , in order to launch her  अपना   spin-off  medical  नाटक  Private Practice  .
Dr. Callie Torres ( Sara Ramirez  )   और  Dr. Mark Sloan ( Eric Dane ) also enter the show in the second season ,  जबकि   the  latter dies  in  the premiere of  the  ninth season  .
मेरेडिथ   's  half-sister ,  dr.   lexie  Grey  (  Chyler  leigh   )   ,   appears  from season three  और  dies at the end  of  season  आठ   .
dr.  Arizona Robbins ( Jessica Capshaw  )   is  given series regular status at  the  beginning of the  छठे   ऋतु  .
Grey 's Anatomy is  the  highest-rated  नाटक  in  the   कुंजी  18–49 demographic .
previously   among  the overall  top-ten  rated shows in the United States , Grey 's Anatomy has been well received by critics  .
Considered an impact on  संस्कृति  ,  the   श्रेणी  has received numerous awards , and  रै   भी  been  शामिल  in various critics '  शीर्ष  ten lists  .
The  दिखाएँ  has  उत्पादित  several specials , as  खूब   as  distributed  सब  seasons  to  DVD , and released a collection of merchandise .
In  2012  , Grey  's  Anatomy  थी  named the fifth-highest revenue earning show , in terms  of   विज्ञापन  per half-hour .
on  May 11  ,  2012 , the series was  नवीनीकृत  for a ninth  ऋतु  , which premiered on September 27 ,  2012   .
Schizophrenia ( or )  is   a  mental disorder characterized by a  विश्लेषण   of  thought processes and by a deficit of typical emotional responses .
आम  symptoms include auditory hallucinations , paranoid or bizarre  delusions  , or disorganized  वाक  and thinking , and it is accompanied  by  significant  सोशल  or occupational dysfunction .
The onset of  लक्षण  typically occurs  in  young adulthood , with a global lifetime prevalence of  परिचय  0.3–0.7 % .
Diagnosis is  आधारित  on  observed   बर्ताव   और  the  रोगी   's  reported experiences  .
Genetics  ,  early environment  ,  neurobiology , and psychological and  सोशल  processes  appear  to  be  important  contributory   कारकों   ;   कुछ  recreational  और   नुस्खा   दवाएँ   appear  to cause or worsen  लक्षण  .
Current research  is   केन्द्रित  on  the  role of neurobiology , although  no   सिंगल  isolated organic  कारण   रै  been  मिला  .
the   अनेक  possible combinations of symptoms have  triggered  debate  परिचय  whether the  निदान  represents  a   सिंगल  disorder  or  a number of discrete syndromes  .
despite   the  etymology of the term from the Greek  जड़ें  skhizein  (  σχίζειν , `` to split ''  )  and phrēn , phren- (  φρήν  ,  φρεν-  ; `` mind '' ) , schizophrenia  करता  not  imply   a   ``   विभाजित  personality '' , or `` multiple  व्यक्तित्व  disorder ''  (  which is known these days as  dissociative  identity  विकार  ) —a condition with which it is often confused  in  public  बोध  .
बल्कि  , the term means a  ``  splitting of  दिमागी  functions  ''  , because  of  the symptomatic presentation  of  the illness .
the  mainstay  of  treatment  is  antipsychotic medication , which  primarily   दबा  dopamine ( and sometimes serotonin  )  receptor activity .
Psychotherapy  और  vocational and  सोशल  rehabilitation  हैं  also important in treatment .
In more serious  cases—where  there is risk to self and others— involuntary hospitalization may  be  necessary  ,  although  हॉस्पिटल  stays are  अभी   shorter  and less frequent  than  they  एकबार  were .
the  disorder  is  thought  मुख्यतः  to affect  संज्ञान  , but it  भी   प्रायः   contributes  to chronic problems with behavior  और   जज्बात  .
People with schizophrenia  हैं  likely  to  have additional (  comorbid  ) conditions , including major depression and anxiety disorders ;  the  lifetime  occurrence   of   पदार्थ  use disorder is  लगभग  50 % .
Social  समस्याएं  ,  ऐसे  as  long-term   बेरोजगारी  ,  गरीबी  ,  और  homelessness are common .
The  औसत   जीवन   प्रत्याशा   of  people  साथ  the disorder  is  12  to  15 years less than those without  ,  the result of increased physical health  समस्याएं  and  a  higher  आत्महत्या   रेट  (  परिचय   5  % ) .
Paul Leslie  snider   (   अप्रैल  15 , 1951–August 14 , 1980 )  थी  the estranged  husband  and manager of Playboy model Dorothy Stratten , whom he murdered before killing  खुद  the same day .
The Epic  of  Gilgamesh , an epic  कविता  from  मेसोपोटामिया  , is amongst the earliest surviving  works  of literature .
the  literary history of Gilgamesh begins with  पाँच  independent  sumerian  poems about  'bilgamesh  ' ( Sumerian  लिये  Gilgamesh ) , king of Uruk  .
Four of these were used as source material for a combined  एपिक  in  अक्कादी   .
This first combined epic , known as  the   ``  Old  babylonian  ''  संस्करण  ,  तिथियाँ  to the  18th   सदी  BC and is  titled   बाद   इसके  incipit  ,  Shūtur eli sharrī (  ``   surpassing   सब  Other Kings ''  )  .
Only a few fragments of it have survived .
the   बाद  `` Standard  babylonian  ''  संस्करण  dates from the 13th  to  the 10th centuries BC  और  bears the incipit Sha  naqba   īmuru  ( `` He  जो   देखी  the  गहन  ''  )  .
Fragments  of  approximately two thirds of this  longer  ,  twelve-tablet  version have been recovered  .
कुछ   of   the   बेहतरीन   नक़ल  were  खोजा   in   the  library ruins of the 7th-century BC Assyrian  किंग  Ashurbanipal .
The  स्टोरी  centers on  a  friendship between Gilgamesh and Enkidu .
enkidu  is  a  wild man  निर्मित  by the  देवताओं   as  Gilgamesh 's equal to distract  उसे  from oppressing the  लोगों  of Uruk .
Together , they journey  to  the  देवदार   पहाड़  to defeat Humbaba , its  monstrous  guardian .
बाद  they kill the Bull of Heaven  ,  which the  देवी   इश्तार  sends to punish Gilgamesh  लिये  spurning  उसके   अग्रिम  .
As a  दंड  for these actions  ,  the gods sentence  enkidu  to  मौत  .
The  दूसरी  half  of  the epic focuses  on  Gilgamesh  's   तकलीफ  at Enkidu 's death  ,   और  his quest  लिये   अमरत्व  .
In order to learn  the  secret of eternal life  ,   gilgamesh   undertakes  a long  और  perilous  यात्रा  .
he  learns  कि   ``   the   जीवन  that you  हैं   seeking  you will never find .
When the gods created man they allotted to  उसे  death ,  लकिन  life they retained in their  अपना  keeping . ''
This  उद्धरण  was originally attributed to Siduri in  the   बूढ़ा  Babylonian version of the epic ,  और  then  attributed  to the  अमर  flood  नायिका   utnapishtim  in the  अक्कादी  version of the  एपिक  .
nevertheless  ,  gilgamesh  's  कीर्ति  lived on after  उसके  death ,  क्युकी  of  उसके   ग्रेट   भवन   प्रोजेक्ट  , and his account of  कया  Utnapishtim told  उसे  happened during the flood  .
The story has  महरूम  translated into  अनेक  different languages , and Gilgamesh has since become  adapted   in  works of popular fiction .
a  eukaryote  (  or  )  is an  सजीव  whose cells contain complex  structures  enclosed within membranes .
Eukaryotes may more  formally   be  referred to as  the  taxon Eukarya or Eukaryota .
The defining membrane-bound  ढांचा   कि   सेट  eukaryotic cells apart  इससे  prokaryotic  कोशिकाएं  is the nucleus , or nuclear  लिफाफा   ,  within which the genetic  सामग्री  is carried .
the  presence  of   a  nucleus gives eukaryotes  उनके  name , which comes from the Greek  (  eu , `` good '' )  और  (  karyon  , `` nut '' or  ``  kernel  ''  ) .
Most  eukaryotic  cells  भी   contain  other membrane-bound organelles such  as  mitochondria ,  chloroplasts  and the Golgi apparatus  .
All large complex  जीवों  are eukaryotes  ,   सहित   पशु  ,  पौधे  and fungi .
the   समूह  also includes many  एककोशिकीय   जीवों  .
Cell  प्रभाग   in  eukaryotes  is  different from that in organisms without a  केंद्रक   (  Prokaryote ) .
It  involves  separating the duplicated chromosomes ,  through  movements directed by microtubules .
वहीँ  are two types of division  प्रक्रियाओं   .
in  mitosis , one cell divides  to  produce two genetically  एकसमान  cells .
In  meiosis  , which  is  required  in  sexual reproduction  ,  one diploid cell  (  having two  उदाहरण   of  each  chromosome  ,  एक   इससे   प्रत्येक  parent ) undergoes recombination  of  each pair of parental chromosomes , and then  दो   चरण  of cell division , resulting  in  four haploid cells  (  gametes  )  .
Each gamete has just one complement  of  chromosomes , each  a   अद्वितीय  mix of the  सम्बन्धित  pair of  parental  chromosomes  .
eukaryota   appears  to be monophyletic , and so makes  up  one of  the  three domains  of  life .
the   दो  other domains , Bacteria and Archaea ,  हैं  prokaryotes and have  none   of   the  above  सुविधाएँ  .
Eukaryotes  represent  a tiny minority of all living  बाते  ; even in a human body there  हैं  10  टाइम्स  more microbes than human cells .
However , due to their much  larger  size their collective  विश्वव्यापी   बायोमास  is estimated  at  about equal  to   कि  of  prokaryotes  .
They are considered  to   have   पहला   विकसित  approximately 1.6–2.1  अरब  years ago .
The  उपयोग   of   अंतरजाल   सेवाएं  or software with  अंतरजाल  access to defraud victims or  to  otherwise take advantage  of  them , for example  by  stealing personal  सूचना  , which can even lead to identity  चोरी  .
a  very common  रूप  of Internet fraud  is  the  वितरण  of rogue security  तन्त्र  .
Internet  सेवाएं  can  be   प्रयुक्त  to present  बेईमान   solicitations  to  prospective  victims , to conduct  बेईमान  transactions , or to  संचारण   the   proceeds  of fraud to financial institutions or to others connected with the scheme  .
Internet fraud can  occur  in chat rooms ,  ईमेल  ,  संदेश   फलक   ,  or on websites  .
The International Security Assistance  फ़ोर्स   (  ISAF ) is  a  NATO -led security mission in  अफगानिस्तान   कि  was  स्थापित  by  the  United Nations Security Council in  दिसम्बर   2001  by Resolution 1386  ,   as  envisaged by  the  Bonn Agreement .
Its main purpose is to  ट्रैन  the  अफगान  National Security Forces ( ANSF ) and assist  अफगानिस्तान   in  rebuilding key government institutions but is  भी  engaged in the 2001-present war with insurgent  समूह   .
ISAF  थी  initially charged with  securing   काबुल  and surrounding  क्षेत्रों   इससे  the Taliban , al Qaeda and  factional   warlords  , so  as  to allow  लिये  the  स्थापना  of  the  Afghan Transitional Administration headed  by  Hamid Karzai .
in  October 2003  ,  the UN Security Council  प्राधिकृत   the  expansion of the ISAF  मिशन  throughout Afghanistan  ,  and ISAF  subsequently  expanded the  मिशन  in  चार  main  चरण  over the  पूरे  of  the   देश  .
From  2006  to 2011  ,  ISAF had been  शामिल  in increasingly more intensive combat  परिचालन   in   दक्षिणी  and  पूर्वी   अफगानिस्तान   .
troop  contributors include from the United States ,  संयुक्त  Kingdom , NATO member states and a  क्रमांक  of other  देशों   .
the   तीव्रता  of the combat faced  by  contributing nations  varies   greatly  , with the United States , United Kingdom  ,   और  Canada sustaining the majority of  हताहत   in  intensive combat operations , with other  योगदानकर्ता  sustaining significantly less  .
As of early 2010 , there  यहूद  at least 700 military bases inside  अफगानिस्तान   लकिन  more were  अपेक्षित   to  be built in the coming years  .
परिचय  400 of these were used by American‐led NATO  शक्तियां  and  300  by  ansf  .
कोका  ( benzoylmethylecgonine ) ( INN ) is  a  crystalline  tropane   एल्कलॉएड  that is obtained  इससे   the  leaves of the  कोका  plant .
The  नाम   आता   इससे   ``  coca ''  और   the   एल्कलॉएड  suffix -ine , forming cocaine  .
It is a stimulant  ,  an  भूख   suppressant  , and a topical  anesthetic  .
biologically   ,  cocaine  अधिनियमों  as  a  serotonin–norepinephrine–dopamine reuptake inhibitor , also known as a  ट्रिपल  reuptake  inhibitor  (  ट्राई  ) .
it  is addictive  क्युकी   of  its effect  on  the  mesolimbic  reward  pathway  .
Unlike most molecules , cocaine  रै  pockets with both  ऊँची  hydrophilic and lipophilic efficiency  ,  violating the  नियम  of hydrophilic-lipophilic balance  .
This  कल्याणकारी  it to cross the blood–brain barrier far better than other psychoactive chemicals and may  भी  induce blood-brain barrier breakdown .
It is illegal  to   possess  , produce , or  वितरित  cocaine for non-medicinal and  non-government-sanctioned   उद्देश्य  in  लगभग  every  देश  .
पूरे  beef tri-tip rump  ,  roasted medium  विरल
the   tri-tip   is   a  cut of beef from the  नीचे  sirloin  primal  cut .
It is a small  triangular  muscle  ,  usually 1.5 to  2.5  lbs . ( 675 to 1,150g ) per side  of  beef .
The scientific name of  इस  muscle is tensor fasciae latae ,  inserted  in the fascia lata , the connective tissue covering the  quadriceps  femoris , also called quadriceps extensor ,  a   समूह  of four muscles which in  फेरे  insert in the  पटेला  , or  घुटना   कैप  of  the   एनिमल   .
Willmar  is  a city in ,  और  the  काउंटी  seat  of   ,  Kandiyohi  काउंटी  , Minnesota , United States .
The population was 19,610 at  the  2010 census .
Willmar  रै  been assigned ZIP code  56201   by  the United States Postal Service .
U.S . Routes 12 and  71  and Minnesota State  राजमार्गों  23  और   40  are four of the main  रूट  in the  नगर  .
The  स्पीकर  of  the   संयुक्त  States House of  प्रतिनिधि   (  or  स्पीकर  of the House ) is the presiding officer of  the  chamber .
The office was  स्थापित  in 1789  by  Article  i   ,   खण्ड  2 of the United States Constitution ,  जिससे  states in part ,  ``  The House of  प्रतिनिधि   shall   chuse  their Speaker ... ''
The  वर्तमान  Speaker  is  John  boehner   ,  a Republican  जो   represents   ओहियो   's   8th   congressional   ज़िला   .
the  Constitution does  नहीं  require that  the  Speaker  be  a  सदस्य   of  Congress  ,  but no non-member has ever been  निर्वाचित  to the  दफ्तर   .
the  Speaker  is  second in  the  United  राज्य  presidential line of succession , after the  वाइस  President  और  ahead of the President pro tempore of the U.S. Senate .
Unlike some  वेस्टमिंस्टर   प्रणाली  parliaments , in which  the   दफ्तर  of  स्पीकर  is considered non-partisan , in  the   संयुक्त  States the Speaker of the House is  a  leadership position and the office-holder actively works to  नियत  the majority party 's  विधान  agenda .
the  Speaker  प्रायः   करता   नहीं  personally preside over  debates   ,   बजाय   delegating  the  ड्यूटी   to  members of  the  House from the  बहुमत  party .
Aside from  कर्तव्य  relating to heading the  हाउस   और  the majority  राजनैतिक  party , the Speaker  भी  performs administrative and procedural functions , and  represents  his  or  her  congressional   ज़िला   .
a   सायकिल   फ़्रेम  is  the   प्रमुख  component  of   a  bicycle ,  on  to  जिससे   पहियों  and  अन्य  components are fitted .
The modern and most common frame design  लिये  an upright bicycle is  आधारित   on  the safety bicycle ,  और   consists  of two triangles  ,  a  प्रमुख   त्रिभुज  and a paired rear  त्रिभुज  .
इस  is  ज्ञात  as the diamond  फ़्रेम  .
फ्रेम्स  are required  to  be strong , stiff and light  ,  which they  do   by  combining different materials and shapes .
`` Simple gravity pendulum '' model assumes no friction or air resistance .
an  exemplar animation of a  लोलक  showing the velocity  और  acceleration vectors
A  लोलक   is  a  वज़न   निलंबित  from  a  so that it  can  swing  freely  .
When  a  pendulum is displaced sideways  इससे  its resting equilibrium position  ,  it is  विषय  to a  restoring  force due to gravity that  होगा  accelerate it back toward  the   संतुलन  position .
When released  ,   the   restoring   फ़ोर्स  combined with the pendulum  's  mass causes it  to  oscillate  परिचय  the  संतुलन   स्थिति  , swinging back and  forth  .
The time for one complete cycle ,  a  left  झूले  and a right swing  ,  is called  the  period .
a  pendulum  swings   साथ   a  specific period which depends (  मुख्यतः  ) on its length  .
From its  डिस्कवरी  around 1602 by Galileo Galilei  the  regular motion of pendulums  थी  used for timekeeping , and was  the  world 's most accurate  timekeeping   प्रौद्योगिकी  until the  1930s   .
pendulums  are  प्रयुक्त  to regulate pendulum  घड़ियाँ  , and are used in  वैज्ञानिक  instruments  ऐसे   as  accelerometers  और  seismometers .
Historically  वे   यहूद  used as  gravimeters  to  माप  the acceleration  of  gravity in geophysical surveys , and even  as  a standard  of  length .
The word 'pendulum '  is  new Latin , from the  लैटिन  pendulus  ,  meaning 'hanging  '   .
the  simple  गम्भीरता  pendulum is an idealized  गणितीय  model  of  a pendulum .
इस  is  a  weight (  or  bob )  on  the end  of   a  massless cord  निलंबित  from a , without friction .
जब   दिए  an initial push , it will swing  वापस   और  forth  at   a   निरंतर  amplitude .
Real pendulums  हैं   विषय  to friction and air drag ,  so  the amplitude of  उनके   swings  declines .
The First Battle of  सांड   चलाएं   ,  also  ज्ञात  as First Manassas (  the  name  प्रयुक्त  by Confederate  शक्तियां  ) ,  थी  fought on July  21   ,  1861 , in  प्रिंस  William County ,  वर्जिनिया   ,  near the city of  manassas  .
It was  the  first  प्रमुख  land  बैटल   of  the American Civil War  .
बस  months  बाद  the start of  the  war  at  Fort Sumter ,  the  Northern public clamored  लिये   a  march against  the  Confederate  पूंजी  of  रिचमंड   ,  Virginia , which they expected to bring an early end to the rebellion  .
Yielding to  राजनैतिक   दबाव  , Brig .  gen.   irvin  McDowell  led  his  unseasoned   संघ  Army  आरपार  Bull Run  विरूद्ध  the equally inexperienced Confederate Army  of  Brig  .  Gen. P. G.  T.  Beauregard camped  निकट  Manassas Junction .
mcdowell   's   महत्वाकांक्षी   योजना   लिये  a surprise  पार्श्व  attack on the  confederate  left  थी  poorly executed by his officers  और   मेन  ;  nevertheless  , the Confederates , who had  महरूम   नियोजन   to   आक्रमण  the  संघ   बाएँ  flank , found  themselves  at  an  initial  disadvantage   .
Confederate reinforcements under  ब्रिगेडियर  .  gen.  Joseph E. Johnston arrived from  the   shenandoah  Valley by railroad and the course  of  the battle quickly  बदला  .
A brigade  of  Virginians under a relatively unknown  कर्नल  from the Virginia Military  संस्थान  , Thomas J.  जैक्सन   ,  stood their  मैदान   और  Jackson  प्राप्त   उसके  famous nickname  ,  ``  stonewall  Jackson  ''   .
The Confederates then launched a strong  counterattack  , and as the  संघ  troops  began   withdrawing  under  आग  , many panicked and it turned into a rout as McDowell 's men frantically ran without order in  the   दिशा   of   वॉशिंगटन  , D.C .
Both armies were sobered by  the   fierce  fighting  और   अनेक  casualties  ,  and realized the  युद्ध   थी  going to be much  longer  and bloodier  than  either had  anticipated  .
Thunderstorm near Garajau  ,   madeira
Weather is the  राज्य   of  the atmosphere , to the degree that it  is  hot  or  cold  ,  wet or dry , calm or stormy , clear  or   cloudy   .
Most  मौसम  phenomena occur in the troposphere , just below the stratosphere  .
मौसम  generally  refers  to day-to-day  तापमान  and precipitation activity ,  whereas  climate is the term for  the  average atmospheric conditions over longer periods of time .
When  प्रयुक्त  without  योग्यता  , ``  मौसम  '' is understood to be the weather of  धरती   .
Weather is driven  by   एयर  pressure ( temperature and  नमी  ) differences between one place and another .
These pressure  और  temperature differences can  occur  due to the sun angle at  कोई  particular spot  ,  which varies  by  latitude from the tropics .
The  दमदार  temperature contrast  between  polar  और  tropical air gives rise to the jet stream .
Weather systems in the  mid-latitudes  , such as extratropical cyclones , are  caused   by  instabilities of the jet stream  प्रवाह  .
क्युकी  the  धरती  's axis  is   tilted  relative to its orbital  प्लेन  ,  धूप   is  incident at different angles at different times  of   the   साल  .
On Earth 's  सतह  , temperatures usually  दायरा   ±40   °c  ( −40  °f  to 100  °f  )  annually  .
Over thousands of years , changes  in  Earth 's  कक्षा  affect the  राशि  and distribution of solar energy received by  the  Earth and influence  long-term  climate and global climate change .
Surface temperature  मतभेद  in turn cause pressure  मतभेद  .
उच्चतर   altitudes   हैं  cooler than lower  altitudes  due  to  differences in compressional heating  .
Weather forecasting is the  अनुप्रयोग  of science and technology to predict  the  state of  the   माहौल  for  a  future  समय   और   a  given location .
The  माहौल   is   a   chaotic  system  ,  so small changes to one part of  the  system can grow to  have  large effects  on  the system as a whole .
Human attempts to control  the   मौसम  have occurred throughout human  इतिहास  , and there  is  evidence that human activity  ऐसे  as agriculture  और   उद्योग  has  inadvertently   परिवर्धित  weather patterns .
अध्ययन  how  the  weather works on other planets has been helpful in understanding  कैसा  weather works on Earth .
A famous landmark in the Solar  प्रणाली  , Jupiter 's  ग्रेट  Red Spot , is  an  anticyclonic  तूफ़ान  known to have existed  लिये  at least 300 years .
However  ,  weather is  नहीं   सीमित  to planetary bodies  .
a  star 's  किरीट   is   constantly  being lost to  स्पेस  , creating what is essentially a very thin  माहौल  throughout the Solar System .
The movement of mass ejected  इससे  the Sun is known  as   the  solar wind .
Katy Perry is  an  American singer-songwriter from Santa Barbara ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
She  हस्ताक्षरित  with Capitol Records .
Perry has released three  स्टुडियो   एल्बम   ,  including  उसके  debut  ईसाई   प्रयत्न  Katy Hudson , One  of   the  Boys , and Teenage Dream  .
Perry 's  मुख्यधारा   करियर  was kicked  बंद  with the massive chart  कामयाबी  of her debut single `` I Kissed a Girl `` .
During  उसके  career , Perry has been nominated for numerous major music awards  ,  primarily for Teenage Dream and  एक   of  the Boys  .
The following is  a  list of  sovereign  states  और  territories where English is an  आधिकारिक  language or language  of  government  .
In 2012  ,   वहीँ  were 88  राज्य  in total ( 60  sovereign   राज्य  and 28 non-sovereign states ) .
in  many countries English  is   the   प्रबल  language  ,  but does  नहीं  have official  औकात  .
In Australia , English  is  spoken by the vast majority  of   the  population and is the only language used in government institutions  ,  but Australia does not  have  an  आधिकारिक  language .
The case is the  वही   in  the  संयुक्त  Kingdom and the United States , though many states and regions  भीतर  the  u.S.  do have English as an  आधिकारिक  language .
English is the dominant language  of   नई  Zealand  और  an official language of  कनाडा  ( along  साथ  French  )  , India ( along with  हिंदी  and several other languages ) , Ireland ( along with Irish ) ,  और  the  फिलीपीन  ( along with Tagalog ) .
English  is  the sole  आधिकारिक  language of the Commonwealth of Nations and the Commonwealth Games .
English is  एक  of  the   आधिकारिक   भाषाएं   of   the  United Nations ,  the   यूरोपीय   संघ  and the International Olympic  कमेटी  .
Many of these  देशों  are  वर्तमान  or former colonies or  dependencies  of the United  किंगडम  ( see  भी  British Empire  )  , or  of  the United States ,  itself   a  former  उपनिवेश   of   the  UK  .
Notable exceptions include Rwanda ,  जिससे  was a former Belgian colony and Eritrea , which was an Italian colony where the British Empire spanned  इसके  control  तभी  in World War II and shortly  बाद  (  1941-1952  )  .
India 's linguistic picture  is   जटिल   .
According to the Constitution  of   इण्डिया  , ``  हिंदी  in  the   देवनागरी  script  ''   is  the official language of  the   संघ   ;  and  अंग्रेज़ी  the 'subsidiary official language ' ; however , English is mandated for  the  authoritative texts of all federal laws and  परम्   अदालत  decisions and (  साथ  with Hindi )  is  one of  the  two languages of the Indian Parliament .
अंग्रेज़ी   is  used almost  exclusively   लिये   उच्चतर  education  ,  business and  विज्ञान  .
पाठ्यक्रम  in majority of the schools are taught  exclusively  in English .
English  is  extensively used  लिये  administrative purposes  in  India .
India is the  second-largest  English-speaking  देश  in the world  by  number of  अध्यक्षों  ,  बाद  the United States .
As such ,  अनेक  consider English to be the de  facto  official  भाषा  of  इण्डिया  .
See Official languages  of   इण्डिया   .
the   भाषाई   मेकअप  of Pakistan is  similarly  complex  .
While the national  भाषा  is Urdu  ,   अंग्रेज़ी  is an  आधिकारिक   भाषा  and  प्रयुक्त  in business  ,  government and  विधि   .
अंग्रेज़ी  is  a  compulsory language in  स्कूलों  .
All school courses are  सिखाया  in English .
पाकिस्तानी  is  the   9th  largest English-speaking country in the world by population .
Southern Cone ( , )  is   a  geographic region composed  of  the southernmost  क्षेत्रों  of  दक्षिण  America , south  of   the   tropic   of   मकर   .
Although  geographically  this includes Southern and part  of  Southeast ( São Paulo  )  of Brazil ,  in  terms  of   राजनैतिक  geography  the  Southern  कोन  has traditionally comprised Argentina ,  चिली   ,  Paraguay , and Uruguay .
in  the narrowest  भाव   ,  it only covers Argentina ,  चिली  and  उरुग्वे   ,  bounded on  the  north by the states of Brazil , Paraguay  ,  Bolivia and Peru ,  on  the west by the  प्रशांत   समंदर  , and  दक्षिण  to the junction between  the   प्रशांत  and Atlantic Oceans  ,  which it  is  the closest  महाद्वीपीय  area of Antarctica ( 1000 km )  .
High life  प्रत्याशा   ,  the  उच्चतम  Human  विकास  Index of  लैटिन  America ,  ऊँची  Standard of  जीना   ,   significant   भागीदारी   in   the  global markets  और  the emerging economy  of  its members  मेक  the Southern Cone  the  most  prosperous   macro-region  in  दक्षिण  America .
For multi-event athletic competitions see Track and Field Competitions , section ``  बैठक  ''  .
बैठक  are sometimes  आयोजित   around  conference tables .
In a meeting , two  or  more people come  साथ  to discuss  एक   or   अधिक  topics , often  in   a  formal  सेटिंग  .
An  आधिकारिक   खेल  in baseball ,  भी  sometimes  पुकारा   a  regulation  खेल   ,   is   a   खेल   कि  has  progressed   परे  the point at which it  can   be   माना   पूरा  if necessary  .
This is approximately the halfway point of  the  game .
In  the  case of inclement weather , any  खेल  which has reached this  पाइंट   may  be  रोका   और  shortened as needed ,  साथ  the result being  फाइनल  ,  और  all records and statistics counted .
A game  जिससे  has not  पहुँचे   इस   पाइंट  before  होने  stopped is  either  considered  a   निलंबित  game  (  to be continued at a later  तिथि   इससे  the point of stoppage ) , or  is   बस   रद्द  and replayed  इससे  the start .
(  This  depends   on  the rules of each individual league . )
in  either  मामला   ,   no  statistics are  गिने   जबतक  the game becomes official .
चूंकि   सबसे  professional baseball games  हैं  nine innings long , the fifth  inning  is  प्रयुक्त  as the threshold for an official  खेल   .
if  the  visiting  team  is  leading  ,   or  the game is tied  ,  the  समाप्त  of the fifth inning marks  इस  point  .
if  the home team  (  which bats last  )  is  already   ahead  in the  स्कोर   ,  and  theoretically   होता  not need  इसके  half of  the   पांचवां   inning  ,  तब  41⁄2  पारी  ( i.e.  ,  the middle of  the  fifth  )  is considered  an  official game .
the   खेल   is   भी   माना   आधिकारिक   if   the   घर   टोली  scores to take the  सीसे  in  the  bottom of the  पांचवां  inning ,  चूंकि  the game would end immediately if  the   वही   बात  happened  in  the ninth .
in   nearly  all  मामले  , the  ``   आधिकारिक  game  ''  status is  प्रयुक्त  to  determine   whether  a rain check will be honored for  प्रशंसक  holding tickets .
if  a  खेल  is  प्रारंभ   लकिन  does  नहीं  reach the point of becoming official  ,   प्रशंसक  are entitled to a  नई  ticket for  the  make-up  खेल  or (  in  most cases  )   कोई  other  उपलब्धियाँ  game of  उनके  choice .
if  a  खेल  is halted  बाद  it becomes official  ,  the  खेल  is simply shortened and  no  rain check is given  .
The `` official  खेल  '' statistic  प्राप्त   कुछ  attention during  the  1995  ऋतु  , when Cal  ripken  ,  jr.  was  approaching  the  रिकार्ड   लिये  consecutive games  निभाई  , previously held by Lou Gehrig .
विशाल  numbers were hung on the side of the B  &  O  गोदाम  at  oriole  Park at Camden Yards to  दिखाएँ  the number of  खेल  in Ripken 's streak  .
प्रत्येक  day , a  नई   क्रमांक  was unfurled during  the  fifth  inning   बाद   प्रत्येक  game had  become  official (  चूंकि  the statistic  होता   नहीं  have counted if the game  था  been  रोका  before  कि  point )  .
A similar  अभ्यास   रै  been  प्रयुक्त   to  count  bas  toward the  demolition  of  अनेक  stadiums ( including Veterans  स्टेडियम   in  Philadelphia  in  2003 ,  बुच   मेमोरियल  Stadium in St. Louis in 2005  ,  and the original Yankee Stadium and Shea Stadium in New York City in  2008   )  ; as each game  became   आधिकारिक  ,  the  team  होता   unveil  a new ( lower ) number showing the  क्रमांक   of  games left to be played in  the  stadium  .
a   टेलीफोन  number  or  phone  क्रमांक  is a sequence  of  digits used  to  call  इससे  one telephone  लकीर  to  another  in  a  public switched telephone network .
When  टेलीफोन  numbers were invented , they  यहूद   छोटी   —  as few as one , two or  तीन  digits  —  and were given orally to  a  switchboard  ऑपरेटर   .
As phone systems  have  grown and  interconnected   to  encompass the world , telephone numbers  have  become  longer  .
In addition to  telephones  , they now access other devices , such  as   कंप्यूटर  and fax machines .
the  number contains the  सूचना  necessary to identify uniquely the  intended  endpoint for the telephone call  .
प्रत्येक  such endpoint must have a unique number within  the  public  switched  telephone network  .
सबसे   देशों  use  फिक्स्ड  length  संख्याएँ  (  लिये  normal  लाइनों  at least ) and  इसलिए  the  क्रमांक  of endpoints determines the necessary length of the  टेलीफोन  number .
It  is  also possible for each subscriber to have a  नियत   of  shorter numbers  लिये  the endpoints most often used .
ये   ``   आशुलिपि  ''  or   ``   गति   कॉलिंग  '' numbers are automatically translated to unique  टेलीफोन   संख्याएँ  before the call can be  कनेक्ट  .
Some special  सेवाएं   have  their own short  संख्याएँ   (  e.g.  ,   1-1-9   ,  9-1-1  ,   0-0-0  , 9-9-9 , 1-1-1  ,  and 1-1-2  होने  the Emergency Services  संख्याएँ   लिये   चीन  ,  जापानी  ,  दक्षिण  Korea ,  ताईवान  and  श्री  Lanka  ;  Canada and the United States  ;  Australia ; the United Kingdom  ,  Ireland , South Africa  ,  Poland  ,   सऊदी   अरब  , the United Arab  अमीरात  , Morocco  ,   मकाओ   ,  Bahrain , Qatar , Bangladesh  ,  Botswana , Ghana  ,  Kenya , Hong Kong , Malaysia , Mauritius  ,  Singapore  ,  Zimbabwe ,  त्रिनिदाद  , Tobago ;  नई   जीलैंड  ; Kuwait and the European Union ,  क्रमशः  .  )
अनेक  systems also  allow  calls  भीतर   a  local  क्षेत्रफल  to be  बना   बगैर  dialing the local area code  .
लिये  example , a  फोन  number  in   उत्तर  America  होगा   प्रारंभ  with three numbers (  ऐसे  as  661  ) ,  जिससे   is  the area code , followed by  सात   अंक  split into sections of  तीन   और  four  (   ऐसे  as 550-1212 ) ,  जिससे   is  the  लोकल  number .
Some  क्षेत्रों   अभी  have  अनिवार्य  ten-digit dialing in  प्लेस   ,  even for local calls .
Most telephone networks today (  अपवाद  being  निजी  intercom and secure  फोन  networks  )   हैं  interconnected in the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  telephone network , where the  स्वरूप   of  telephone numbers is standardized by  itu-t  in the recommendation E.164 .
इस   specifies   कि  the entire number should  be  15 digits or shorter , and  शुरू   साथ  a country prefix .
लिये   सबसे   देशों   ,  this is  followed  by an area code or city code  और  the subscriber  क्रमांक  ,  जिससे  might  consist   of  the code for a particular telephone  एक्सचेंज  .
itu-t  recommendation  e.123   describes   कैसा  to represent  an   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  telephone number  in   लिखने   or  print  ,  starting with a  प्लस   चिह्न  (  ``   +  ''  )  and the country code .
When  कॉलिंग   an   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  number  इससे   a  fixed line phone , the  +  must be  replaced   साथ  the international  कॉल   उपसर्ग  chosen by  the   देश   the   कॉल  is  होने   बना  from .
Some mobile  फोन   allow  the + to be entered  सीधे  .
The  स्वरूप  and  आवंटन  of  लोकल  phone numbers are controlled by  प्रत्येक   स्वदेश  's  संबंधित  government , either  सीधे   or  by sponsored organizations (  ऐसे   as  NANPA overseen by NeuStar Inc.  )   .
Before a telephone  कॉल   is  connected  ,   the  telephone number must  be  dialed by  the  calling  पार्टी  or Caller .
The called party  might  have  उपकरण   कि   presents  caller  id  before  the   कॉल  is answered .
a  collection agency  is  a  कारोबार  that  pursues  payments  of  debts  owed  by individuals or  व्यवसायों  .
Most collection  एजेंसियों  operate  as  agents of creditors and  collect   debts  for a fee or percentage of the  कुल   राशि   owed  .
There are many types  of   संग्रहण   एजेंसियों  .
First-party agencies are oftentimes subsidiaries of the original company  the   कर्ज़   is   owed   to  .
Third-party agencies are separate companies  contracted   by  a company  to  collect debts on their behalf for  a  fee .
Debt buyers  खरीदें   the   कर्ज़   at  a percentage  of  its value ,  तब  attempt  to  collect it  .
Each  देश  has its  अपना  rules  और   regulations  regarding them  .
Cannabis flower with  दृश्य  trichomes
Cannabis , also known  as  marijuana (  इससे  the Mexican Spanish marihuana ) ,  और  by  अन्य  names , is a  तैयारी  of the Cannabis plant intended  लिये  use as  a  psychoactive drug and as  आयुर्विज्ञान  .
Pharmacologically  ,  the principal psychoactive  constituent  of cannabis  is  tetrahydrocannabinol ( THC ) ; it is one  of   483  known compounds in the plant  ,  including  at   तनिक  84  अन्य   cannabinoids  , such as cannabidiol ( CBD ) , cannabinol  (  CBN  )  ,  tetrahydrocannabivarin  ( THCV ) .
and cannabigerol (  cbg   )  .
This  is  a list  of  American football quarterbacks who  have  started  लिये  the  वॉशिंगटन  Redskins , as well as  इसके  predecessors the  बोस्टन  Braves  (  1932 ) and Boston  redskins   (  1933 –  1936  ) ,  in   the  National Football  लीग  (  एनएफएल  ) .
The  वॉशिंगटन   redskins   मताधिकार   थी   originally  founded in Boston  ,   मैसाचुसेट्स  as the Boston Braves , named after the  लोकल  baseball franchise  .
The name was changed the  following  year to  the  Redskins .
In  1937  ,  the  franchise moved to  वॉशिंगटन  , D.C .
Of  the  49 Redskins starting  quarterbacks  ,  दो  have been inducted  into  the Pro  फ़ुटबॉल  Hall  of  Fame :  सैमी  Baugh and Sonny Jurgensen .

1st Special Forces  operational  Detachment-Delta ( 1st  sfod-d   )  , popularly known as Delta Force ,  is  one of  the  United States ' four secretive tier-one counter-terrorism and Special Mission  इकाई  .
It was formerly listed as the Combat Applications Group by  the  Department of  रक्षा  but has since been officially re-designated the Army  compartmented  Elements  (  ACE  )  .
While 1st SFOD-D is administratively supported by USASOC , it  जलप्रपात  under  the  operational  कंट्रोल   of  the Joint Special  परिचालन  Command .
Delta Force  और  its Navy counterpart  ,  the  नवल  Special Warfare Development Group , are the United States military 's  प्राथमिक  counter-terrorism units  .
Delta  फ़ोर्स  's primary  कार्य   हैं  counter-terrorism , direct action  ,  and national intervention operations  ,  although it is  an   अत्यधिक  versatile group capable of conducting many types of  गुप्त   मिशन   ,  including , but not  सीमित  to  ,  hostage rescues and raids .
the   सेंट्रल  Intelligence Agency 's highly secretive Special Activities Division ( SAD ) and more specifically  इसके  elite Special Operations Group ( SOG ) often works with – and recruits –  ऑपरेटर   इससे   डेल्टा   फ़ोर्स  .
Alpha decay  is  one  उदाहरण  type of radioactive decay  ,  in  जिससे   an  atomic nucleus emits an alpha  कण  , and thereby transforms  (   or   'क्षयs   '  )  into  an atom with a  द्रव्यमान  number 4 less and  परमाणु  number  2  less .
Many other types of  decays  are possible .
Radioactive  क्षय  ,  भी   ज्ञात  as nuclear  क्षय  or  radioactivity  ,  is  the process  by  which  a   केंद्रक  of an  अस्थिर   अणु  loses energy by emitting particles  of  ionizing  विकिरण  .
A material that spontaneously emits this kind of radiation — which includes the emission of energetic  अल्फा  particles  ,  beta  अणु   ,  and gamma  किरणें  — is considered  रेडियोसक्रिय   .
There are  अनेक  different  प्रकार   of  radioactive  क्षय  ( see table  नीचे  ) .
a  decay , or loss of energy  ,  results when an atom with one type of  केंद्रक   ,  called  the  parent radionuclide , transforms to an atom  साथ   a   केंद्रक   in  a different state  ,  or  to  a different  केंद्रक  containing different numbers of protons and neutrons .
Either of  ये  products is named the daughter nuclide .
in   कुछ  decays  the   जनक  and  बेटी   हैं  different chemical elements , and thus the  क्षय  process  परिणाम  in  नाभिकीय  transmutation ( creation of  an   अणु   of   a  new element ) .
The first decay processes to be discovered  यहूद   अल्फा  decay ,  बीटा   क्षय  , and gamma decay .
अल्फा  decay occurs  जब  the nucleus ejects an  अल्फा  particle ( helium  केंद्रक  ) .
This is  the   सबसे  common  प्रक्रम  of emitting nucleons , but in rarer types of decays , nuclei can eject  protons  , or  विशिष्ट   nuclei  of other elements  (   in   the  process  पुकारा  cluster  क्षय   )   .
Beta  क्षय  occurs  जब  the nucleus  emits  an  इलेक्ट्रॉन  or positron  और  a type of  न्यूट्रिनो  , in a process that changes a  प्रोटॉन  to a neutron or the  अन्य  way around .
the   केंद्रक   may   कैप्चर   an  orbiting electron  ,  converting a proton into a neutron ( electron capture )  .
All of these  प्रक्रियाओं  result  in   नाभिकीय  transmutation .
By contrast , there exist  रेडियोसक्रिय   क्षय   प्रक्रियाओं  that do not result in  transmutation   .
The  उर्जा  of an  उत्साहित  nucleus may be emitted  as  a gamma ray in gamma  क्षय  , or  प्रयुक्त  to eject an  कक्षीय  electron by  बातचीत  with the excited  केंद्रक  in a  प्रक्रम  called internal  परिवर्तन  .
Radioisotopes occasionally emit neutrons , and this results in a change in an element from one isotope to another  .
One type  of  radioactive decay  परिणाम  in  उत्पाद  which are not defined , but  appear   in  a range  of   ``  pieces  ''  of the original nucleus .
This  क्षय   is   पुकारा  spontaneous  परिवर्द्धन  .
इस   क्षय  happens  जब  a large  अस्थिर  nucleus  अनायास  splits into two ( and  occasionally   तीन  ) smaller daughter nuclei  ,  and usually  emits  gamma  किरणें  , neutrons , or other particles as a  consequence   .
Radioactive decay is a stochastic ( i.e.  ,  random ) process  at  the  स्तर  of  सिंगल   अणु  , in  कि  , according  to   क्वांटम  theory  ,   it   is  impossible  to  predict when a  particular   अणु   होगा  decay .
However , the chance  कि  a  दिए  atom will decay is constant over  समय  .
For  a   विशाल  number of  अणु  , the decay rate for the collection  is  computable from the measured decay  स्थिरांक  of  the   न्यूक्लाइड  ( or equivalently from the half-lifes ) .
Waxing  is  a form  of  semi-permanent hair  हटाना  which removes  the  hair  इससे  the root .
नई   बाल  will not grow back  in   the  previously waxed area for two to eight weeks  ,  although some people  होगा  start  to   देखिए  regrowth  in  only a week  .
Almost any area of the body can be waxed , including eyebrows  ,   फेस   ,  bikini area  ,   टाँगे  ,  बाहें  , back , abdomen and feet  .
There  हैं   अनेक  types of waxing suitable for removing unwanted hair .
Strip waxing  is   संपन्नता   by  spreading a  मोम  thinly over  the  skin .
a   cloth  or  पेपर   स्ट्रिप   is  then pressed on the  शीर्ष   और  ripped  बंद  the direction of  बाल  growth .
This  removes  the wax along with the hair .
Strip  मोम  can  भी  be made at  घर  using  नीबू   रस  , water , sugar and  मधु  .
Hot waxing utilizes Hot  मोम   (  as opposed  to  strip wax ) .
In this  मामला  , the wax is applied  somewhat  thickly and with no cloth or paper strips .
The wax then hardens  जब  it  cools   ,  thus allowing  the   आसान  removal  by   a   चिकित्सक  without the aid of cloths .
This  वैक्सिंग   विधि   is   बहुत  beneficial to  लोगों  who have sensitive skin .
वॉल  painting (  1st   सदी   ad  )  इससे   pompeii  depicting a multigenerational banquet
Ancient Roman culture  existed  throughout the almost 1200-year  इतिहास  of the civilization of Ancient Rome .
the  term refers to the  संस्कृति  of the  रोमन   गणतंत्र   ,  later  the   रोमन   साम्राज्य   ,  which  ,  at  इसके  peak , covered an area  इससे  Lowland Scotland and  मोरक्को  to the Euphrates  .
Life in  प्राचीन  Rome revolved  around   the  city  of   रोम  , its famed seven  पहाड़ियाँ   ,  and its monumental structures such as the Flavian  amphitheatre  ( now called  the  Colosseum ) , the  फ़ोरम  of Trajan  ,  and  the   pantheon  .
The city  भी  had several theaters , gymnasiums , and many  taverns  ,  baths  , and  brothels  .
Throughout the territory  अंतर्गत  ancient Rome 's control , residential  वास्तुकला  ranged from very modest houses to country villas , and  in   the   पूंजी   नगर  of  रोम   ,  there  यहूद   इम्पीरियल   निवास   on  the elegant Palatine Hill , from which  the   शब्द  palace  is  derived .
The  विशाल  majority of  the  population lived in the city center ,  packed   into  insulae ( apartment blocks ) .
the  city of Rome was the largest megalopolis  of   कि   समय  , with a population that  may  well  have  exceeded one million people , with  a  high end  अनुमान  of  3.6  million and  a   कम   समाप्त  estimate of 450,000 .
Historical estimates  indicate  that around 30 percent  of   the  population under the  नगर   's   क्षेत्राधिकार  lived in  innumerable  urban  centers  , with population  of  at  तनिक   10,000  and  अनेक  military  settlements   ,   a  very  ऊँची   रेट  of urbanization  by  pre-industrial  मानकों  .
The  सबसे  urbanized part  of  the Empire was  इटली  ,  जिससे   था  an estimated rate of urbanization of 32 % ,  the  same  रेट  of  शहरी   of  England in 1800 .
Most  रोमन  towns and cities had a forum ,  मंदिरों  and the same type of buildings  ,  on a smaller scale  ,   as  found in Rome .
The large urban population  जरूरी  an endless supply of  खाना   जिससे  was  a  complex logistical task  ,   सहित   acquiring  , transporting  ,  storing and distribution  of   खाना   लिये  Rome and  अन्य  urban centers .
Italian farms supplied vegetables and  फल  ,  लकिन  fish  और   मांस   यहूद  luxuries  .
aqueducts   यहूद   निर्मित  to  लाओ  water  to  urban centers and wine and oil were imported from Hispania , Gaul and Africa .
There was  a  very large amount  of  commerce between the provinces of the Roman Empire ,  चूंकि   इसके  transportation technology was  बहुत   कुशल   .
the   औसत  costs of transport and  the  technology were comparable with 18th-century Europe .
The  बाद   नगर  of  रोम   किया  not  भरण  the  स्पेस   भीतर  its ancient Aurelian  दीवारें   जबतक   बाद  1870 .
Eighty percent of the  जनसांख्यिकी  under  the   क्षेत्राधिकार   of   प्राचीन  Rome  जिया  in the countryside in  settlements   साथ  less than 10  हजार  inhabitants  .
जमींदार  generally resided in cities and their estates were left in  the  care  of  farm managers .
The plight of rural slaves was  generally  worse than  उनके  counterparts  working  in  शहरी  aristocratic households .
to  stimulate  a  higher  मजदूर  productivity most landlords freed a large number of slaves and many  प्राप्त   मजदूरी   .
Some records indicate  कि  ``  as   अनेक  as  42   लोगों  lived in one  छोटी  farm hut  in  Egypt , while six families owned a single olive  पेड़  . ''  .
Such a rural  पर्यावरण   जारी  to induce migration  of  population to  शहरी  centers until the early 2nd century , when the urban  जनसांख्यिकी   रोका  growing  और   प्रारंभ   to  decline .
Starting  in  the middle  of   the  2nd  सदी   bc   ,   निजी   यूनानी  culture  थी  increasingly in ascendancy , in spite of tirades against the `` softening ''  प्रभाव  of  hellenized   संस्कृति  from the conservative moralists  .
By the time of Augustus  ,  cultured Greek household  स्लेव   सिखाया  the Roman young  (   sometimes  even the girls  )  ; chefs  ,  decorators ,  secretaries   ,  doctors , and hairdressers—all came from  the   यूनानी  East .
Greek sculptures  सुशोभित   hellenistic   लैंडस्केप  gardening on the  palatine   or  in the villas ,  or   यहूद   imitated  in Roman sculpture  गज  by  यूनानी  slaves  .
The Roman cuisine preserved in  the   cookery   किताबे  ascribed to Apicius is  essentially   यूनानी  .
रोमन  writers  disdained  Latin for a cultured Greek style .
Only in law and governance was the Italic  प्रकृति   of  Rome 's  accretive   संस्कृति   परम्  .
Against this  इंसान   पृष्ठभूमि  , both the urban and rural setting , one  of  history 's most influential civilizations  took   आकार   ,   leaving  behind a cultural  विरासत   कि   survives  in part  आज  .
James Joseph  ``  Duffy ''  waldorf   ,   jr.   (  born August  20  , 1962 )  is  an American professional  मनःस्थिति  .
