A modern  ``  French  kilner  '' jar
Glass production  involves  two  प्रमुख  methods – the  फ्लैश   कांच  process ,  जिससे  produces sheet glass  ,  and glassblowing which produces bottles and other  containers  .
a  season is a  subdivision   of  the year  ,  marked by changes in weather ,  पारिस्थितिकी  , and hours of daylight .
Seasons  परिणाम  from  the  yearly revolution of the  धरती  around  the  Sun and the tilt of the Earth 's  अक्ष   सापेक्ष  to the plane of revolution .
In temperate and polar  regions  , the  सीज़न  are marked by changes  in  the intensity of sunlight that reaches the Earth 's surface ,  विसंगतियाँ  of  जिससे  may cause  पशु  to go  into  hibernation  or   to  migrate , and plants to  be  dormant .
During May ,  जून  and July , the northern hemisphere is exposed  to   अधिक   सीधा  sunlight because the hemisphere  चेहरों  the sun .
the  same is true  of   the  southern hemisphere in November ,  दिसम्बर  and  जनवरी   .
It is  the  tilt of the Earth that causes  the  Sun to  be  higher in the sky during  the  summer months which increases  the  solar flux  .
However , due to  मौसमी   lag  , June , July and August are the hottest months in the northern  गोलार्ध  and December , January and February  हैं  the hottest  महीने  in the  दक्षिणी  hemisphere  .
In  शीतोष्ण  and subpolar regions , generally  चार  calendar  -आधारd  seasons ( with their adjectives ) are  पहचाना  : spring (  vernal  ) , summer  (  estival ) , autumn ( autumnal ) and winter (  hibernal  )  .
However ,  ecologists  mostly use a six  ऋतु  model for temperate climate regions that  शामिल  pre-spring ( prevernal )  और  late summer (  serotinal   )  as distinct  सीज़न   साथ   साथ  the  परंपरागत   चार  .
Hot regions have two or three  सीज़न  ; the rainy ( or wet , or monsoon ) season and the  शुष्क  season , and  in  some tropical areas  ,  a cool  or  mild season .
in  some  भाग  of the  संसार  , special ``  सीज़न  ''  हैं  loosely defined based  on   महत्वपूर्ण  events such as  a   hurricane  season  ,   बवंडर  season or a  दावानल  season .
The  छह   ecological  seasons
The four calendar seasons , depicted in an  प्राचीन   रोमन   मोज़ेक   इससे   ट्यूनीशिया
the  Battle of Fort Sumter ( April 12–14 , 1861 ) was the  बमबारी   और  surrender of Fort Sumter  ,  near Charleston ,  दक्षिण   कैरोलिना  , that started the  अमरीकी  Civil War .
Following  घोषणाओं  of  secession  by seven Southern states ,  दक्षिण  Carolina demanded that  the  U.S. Army  लापरवाही  its facilities in Charleston  हार्बर  .
on  December  26  , 1860  ,  U.S.  प्रमुख  Robert Anderson  surreptitiously   स्थानांतरित  his  छोटी  command from  the  indefensible Fort  moultrie   on  Sullivan  's  Island to  फोर्ट   sumter  ,  a   substantial   किला  controlling the entrance of Charleston Harbor  .
An  attempt  by U.S. President James Buchanan  to  reinforce  और  resupply Anderson  ,  using the unarmed merchant  जलयान  Star of  the   वेस्ट  , failed when  it   थी  fired  upon  by shore batteries on January  9  ,  1861  .
South Carolina authorities then  जब्त   सब  Federal  प्रॉपर्टी  in  the   चार्ल्सटन   क्षेत्रफल  , except for  फोर्ट  Sumter .
दौरान   the   जल्दी   महीने  of 1861 , the  हालात  around Fort Sumter  increasingly  began to resemble a  घेरा  .
In March ,  ब्रिगेडियर  . Gen.  P.   G.  T.  beauregard  , the first  सामान्य  officer  of  the  newly  formed  confederate  States of America ,  थी  placed  in   कमांड  of  confederate   शक्तियां  in Charleston .
Beauregard energetically directed the  strengthening  of batteries around  चार्ल्सटन  harbor aimed at  फोर्ट  Sumter  .
Conditions in the fort  grew  dire as the  संघ  soldiers rushed to  पूरा  the installation of  अतिरिक्त  guns .
एंडरसन  was  छोटी   of  men  ,  food ,  और  supplies .
the   resupply  of Fort Sumter  became  the  पहला  crisis of the administration of President  अब्राहम  Lincoln .
He  notified  the Governor of South Carolina , Francis W. Pickens , that he  थी   sending  supply ships  ,  which resulted in an ultimatum  इससे  the  confederate  government :  evacuate  Fort Sumter immediately  .
Major  एंडरसन  refused  to  surrender .
Beginning at 4:30 a.m.  on   अप्रैल  12  ,  the Confederates  bombarded  the  फोर्ट   इससे  artillery batteries surrounding the harbor .
Although  the  Union garrison returned fire  ,  they  यहूद   significantly   outgunned  and , after 34  घंटों  , Major  एंडरसन  agreed to evacuate .
वहीँ  was  no   घाटा   of  life on either side as a  सीधा  result of this engagement , although a  गन   विस्फोट  during  the   आत्मसमर्पण  ceremonies on April 14 caused two  संघ  deaths .
Following the  बैटल   ,  there was widespread  support  from  दोनो  North and  दक्षिण  for further  सैन्य  action .
Lincoln 's immediate call for  75,000   स्वयंसेवक   to  suppress  the  rebellion resulted  in  an additional four southern  स्लेव  states  भी  declaring  उनके  secession  और  joining the  confederacy   .
The  सिविल   युद्ध  had  begun  .
3G , short for third  पीढी   ,  is the third generation of mobile telecommunications technology .
3G  दूरसंचार  networks support services  कि  provide  an   सूचना  transfer rate  of   at  least 200 kbit/s  .
However  ,  many services advertised  as  3G  provide  higher  गति  than  the   न्यूनतम  technical  आवश्यकताएँ  for  a   3g  service .
Recent 3G  रिलीज   ,  often denoted 3.5G and  3.75g  , also  provide   मोबाईल  broadband  अभिगम  of  अनेक  Mbit/s to  स्मार्टफ़ोन  and  मोबाईल  modems in laptop computers .
3G finds application  in   बेतार   आवाज़  telephony , mobile  अंतरजाल  access , fixed wireless Internet access , video  काल्स  and mobile TV .
``  Mazel Tov ! '' written on a  वाइन   कांच  tag
Traditionally , after the  दूल्हे  breaks the  कांच  , the guests shout `` Mazel Tov ! `` .
a   जन्मदिवस   केक  , iced with the words  ``  מזל  טוב  '' ( mazal tov ) , as  is  often done  in  Israel .
Here the  phrase   is  written in Hebrew cursive .
``  mazel  tov ''  or  `` mazal tov '' (  यहूदी  /  यहूदी  :  ``  מזל טוב ''  ,  Hebrew :  ``   mazal  tov  ''  ; Yiddish  :  ``  mazel  tov '' ;  lit   .
`` good luck '' )  is   a  phrase used to express congratulations  लिये  a happy and significant occasion or event .
hepatitis  C is  an  infectious disease affecting primarily the liver , caused by the hepatitis C  वायरस  ( HCV  )   .
The infection is  प्रायः  asymptomatic , but  दीर्घकालिक  infection can  सीसे  to scarring of the liver and  ultimately   to  cirrhosis ,  जिससे  is generally apparent  बाद  many years .
In  कुछ  cases , those with cirrhosis will  go  on to develop liver  विफलता   ,  liver cancer or life-threatening esophageal and gastric varices .
HCV is spread primarily by  blood-to-blood  contact  संबद्ध  with intravenous  ड्रग  use  ,   poorly  sterilized medical  उपकरण  and  transfusions  .
an   अनुमानित  130–200 million  लोगों   विश्वव्यापी  are  संक्रमित  with .
The existence of  (  originally ``  non-   a   non-   b   hepatitis  '' )  थी   postulated  in the 1970s and  सिद्ध  in  1989  .
only infects humans and chimpanzees .
The virus persists in  the  liver in  परिचय  85 % of  those  infected  .
This  persistent  infection can  be  treated  साथ   दवा  :  the  standard therapy is  a   संयोजन  of peginterferon  और  ribavirin , with either boceprevir or telaprevir  added  in some cases .
Overall , 50–80  %  of people treated are  cured   .
Those who develop  cirrhosis  or liver cancer may require  a  liver transplant .
is   the  leading cause of liver transplantation , though the virus usually  बारंबार  after  प्रत्यारोपण  .
No vaccine  विरूद्ध  is available  .
A flexible  बिता  account (  fsa  )  ,  also known as a flexible spending  व्यवस्था  , is one of a number of tax-advantaged  वित्तीय  accounts that can  be  set up  through   a  cafeteria plan of an employer  in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य   .
An  fsa  allows an  कर्मचारी  to set aside a portion of earnings to pay for qualified expenses as established  in  the cafeteria  योजना  ,  सबसे  commonly  लिये  medical expenses  लकिन  often  लिये  dependent care  or  other expenses .
Money deducted from  an  employee  's  pay into an FSA is  नहीं  subject to payroll taxes ,  resulting   in   substantial  payroll  कर  savings  .
One significant disadvantage to using  an  FSA is that funds not used by  the  end of  the   योजना  year are lost to the  कर्मचारी   ,  known as  the   ``  use it or  खोना  it  ''  rule  .
The most common  प्रकार  of flexible spending account , the medical expense  fsa   (   भी  medical FSA or health  fsa   )  , is  समान   to  a health savings  खाता  ( HSA  )   or  a health reimbursement  खाता  (  hra  ) .
However ,  जबकि   hsas  and HRAs are almost exclusively used as  components  of a consumer driven health  परवाह  plan ,  चिकित्सा   fsas  are commonly offered with more  परंपरागत   स्वास्थ्य  plans  as  well .
In addition , funds  in   a  health  बचत  account are not lost when the  योजना  year is over , unlike funds in an  fsa   .
Paper forms or an FSA  डेबिट  card ,  भी  known as a Flexcard ,  may  be used to access the account  निधि  .
टेनेसी  (  )   (  ) is a  u.S.   राज्य  located in  the  Southeastern United States  .
टेनेसी   is  the 36th most extensive  और  the  17th  most populous of the 50 United States  .
Tennessee is bordered by Kentucky  और   वर्जिनिया  to the  उत्तर  , North Carolina  to  the east , Georgia  ,  Alabama , and Mississippi  to  the  दक्षिण  , and Arkansas  और   मिसौरी  to the  वेस्ट  .
the  Appalachian  kyu  dominate the  पूर्वी  part  of   the  state  ,  and  the  Mississippi River forms the state  's   पश्चिमी   किनारा  .
टेनेसी  's capital  और  second largest city is Nashville  ,  which has a  जनसांख्यिकी  of 609,644 .
Memphis  is  the state 's  largest  city , with  a  population of  652,050  .
The state of Tennessee is rooted  in   the   watauga  Association ,  a  1772 frontier pact  generally  regarded as the  पहला  constitutional  सरकारी   वेस्ट  of the Appalachians .
What is now Tennessee was  initially   भाग   of   उत्तर  Carolina , and  बाद   भाग  of  the   दक्षिणपश्चिम  Territory  .
Tennessee  थी  admitted to  the  Union as the 16th  राज्य  on June 1  ,  1796  .
Tennessee was  the  last state to leave the Union and join  the  Confederacy at the outbreak of  the  U.S.  सिविल  War  in  1861  ,  and the first state  to  be readmitted to the  संघ  at  the  end  of  the war .
Tennessee furnished more  सैनिको  for the  confederate  Army  than  any other state , and  अधिक  soldiers for the  संघ  Army than any other Southern  राज्य  .
In the 20th  सदी   ,   टेनेसी   transitioned  from  an  agrarian economy  to  a more  diversified   अर्थव्यवस्था  ,  aided  at times  by  federal entities  ऐसे  as the Tennessee Valley Authority  .
in  the  जल्दी   1940s   ,  the city of Oak  लकीरें  was established to  हाउस  the Manhattan Project 's uranium enrichment facilities  ,  helping to  निर्माण  the world 's  पहला  atomic  बमबारी  .
टेनेसी   रै  played  a  critical role  in  the development of  अनेक  forms  of   अमरीकी  popular music  ,  including  चट्टान   और  roll ,  ब्लूज़  , country , and rockabilly .
Beale  गली  in  मेम्फिस  is considered by many to  be  the birthplace of  the  blues , with musicians such as W.C .  सुलभ   performing  in its clubs  as  early  as  1909 .
Memphis was  भी  home to Sun Records , where musicians  ऐसे   as  Elvis Presley ,  इसहाक़  Hayes  ,  Johnny Cash , Carl Perkins , Jerry  ली   लुईस  , Roy Orbison , and Charlie  समृद्ध  began their recording careers , and where rock and roll  took   आकार  in the 1950s .
the  1927 Victor recording  सत्र  in  ब्रिस्टल  generally mark the beginning of  the  country music  विधा   और  the rise of the  ग्रैंड  Ole Opry  in  the  1930s   helped  make  नैशविले   the  center of the country  म्यूज़िक   रिकॉर्डिंग  industry  .
Three bricks and mortar museums recognize  टेनेसी  's  भूमिका   in  nurturing various forms of popular music  :  the Memphis Rock N ' Soul Museum , the  देश  Music Hall of Fame  और  Museum in Nashville , and the International  rock-a-billy  Museum in Jackson .
In addition  ,  the  rockabilly  Hall of Fame , an online site recognizing the development of rockabilly in which Tennessee played a crucial  भूमिका  ,  is  based in Nashville  .
Tennessee 's major  उद्योग  include  कृषि  ,  निर्माण  , and tourism  .
Poultry , soybeans , and cattle  हैं   the  state 's primary agricultural products ,  और   प्रमुख  manufacturing exports include  रसायन   ,  transportation  उपकरण  , and electrical equipment .
the  Great  smoky   kyu   नेशनल  Park ,  the   स्वदेश  's  सबसे   visited   नेशनल  park ,  is  headquartered in the  पूर्वी  part of the state ,  और  a section of  the  Appalachian Trail roughly follows the  tennessee-north  Carolina  किनारा  .
Other  प्रमुख   पर्यटक  attractions  शामिल  the Tennessee  एक्वेरियम  in  चट्टानूगा   ,  the Sunsphere in  knoxville  ,  dollywood  in Pigeon  forge  ,  the   पार्थेनन  , the Country Music Hall  of   कीर्ति  and Museum , and Ryman  ऑडिटोरियम   in   नैशविले  ,  और  Elvis Presley 's  graceland  residence and tomb  in   मेम्फिस   .
One  डिज़ाइन   रूपांतर   of   a  cock ring .
a  cock  रिंग  is a ring that can be placed  around   a  man 's penis  ,   प्रायः  at the base ,  primarily   to   slow  the flow of blood  इससे  the erect  penile   ऊतक   ,   यूँ  maintaining an erection  लिये  a much longer period of  समय  .
Cock rings can be worn  around   बस   the  penis or both the penis  और  scrotum  ,   or  just  the  scrotum  अलोन  , though this is  प्रायः  called a  testicle   कफ  .
Rings can  be  made of a  किस्में  of different  सामग्री  , most commonly leather , rubber ,  or  silicone  ,  though nylon and metal  हैं   भी  used either  as  the main  घटक  or part of the closure .
The  पद  cock ring  is   sometimes   प्रयुक्त   as   a  synonym  लिये   a   प्रिंस  Albert piercing , a piercing of the penis that  is  usually  ,   हालांकि  not  सदा  , a metal ring  .
When used in cases of erectile dysfunction  वे  are known by various  names  such as  ``  erection  रिंग  ''  और   ``   टेंशन  ring '' .
The headquarters  of  Major League Baseball  at  245 Park Avenue , Midtown Manhattan  ,   नई  York City , USA  .
Major League Baseball ( MLB ) is a  पेशेवर  baseball league , consisting of teams that play in  the  National League and the American League  .
Dating  to   1876  and 1901 respectively , the  दो   लीग   मिलाया  in 2000  into  a single  संगठन  led  by  the Commissioner of Baseball , after 100  सालो  as  पृथक   विधिक  entities .
MLB constitutes  एक   of   the   प्रमुख  professional sports leagues of the United  राज्य  and Canada .
it  is composed of 30  टीमों  —  29  in the United  राज्य  and one  in  Canada .
Teams in MLB play  162  games  प्रत्येक   ऋतु   over   छह  months ( April through September ) .
Five teams in  प्रत्येक  league  अग्रिम  to  a  four-round postseason tournament  कि  culminates in the World Series , a  best-of-seven-games  championship series between  the  two league champions which dates to 1903 .
The  संगठन  oversees many minor-league baseball leagues  जिससे  operate about 240 teams  संबद्ध  with the  major-league   क्लब   .
साथ  the International Baseball Federation ,  the  league  भी  manages the international  संसार  Baseball  क्लासिक  tournament .
MLB has the highest season attendance of  कोई  sports league in the world with nearly 75 million  spectators  in 2012 .
Delaware ( )  is  a U.S. state located on the  अटलांटिक   coast  in the Mid-Atlantic region  of  the United States .
it  is bordered to  the  south and west  by  Maryland , to the  पूर्वोत्तर  by New Jersey , and  to   the  north  by  Pennsylvania .
the   राज्य  takes  इसके   नाम   इससे   थामस  West  ,   3rd  Baron  de  La  warr  ,  an  English nobleman  और   वर्जिनिया   's  first  औपनिवेशिक  governor  ,  after  जिसको  what is  अभी   पुकारा  Cape Henlopen was originally  नामित   .
डेलावेयर  is  स्तिथ  in the northeastern  portion  of  the  Delmarva  प्रायद्वीप  and  is  the  दूसरी  smallest , the sixth least  populous  , but the  छठे  most densely  आबादी  of the fifty United  राज्य  .
डेलावेयर  is divided into three counties .
From north to south ,  ये  three counties are New Castle , Kent ,  और  Sussex .
While  the  southern  दो  counties have  historically  been predominantly agricultural  ,   नई  Castle County has been more industrialized .
Before  इसके  coastline  थी  explored by Europeans  in  the 16th century  ,  Delaware was inhabited  by  several  समूह  of Native  अमेरिकी   ,  including the Lenape  in  the north and Nanticoke in  the  south .
It  थी  initially colonized by  डच   व्यापारियों   at  Zwaanendael , located near the present town of Lewes , in 1631 .
Delaware was one of the 13 colonies participating  in  the American Revolution and on December 7 ,  1787  , became the  पहला  state  to  ratify the Constitution of the  संयुक्त  States , thereby  बनने  known as The First State .
Energy Transformation  in  Energy Systems Language
Energy transformation or  उर्जा  conversion is the  प्रक्रम  of changing  एक   रूप  of energy to another .
in   भौतिकी  , the term energy  describes   the   क्षमता  to produce certain changes  भीतर  a system , without  लिहाज़  to limitations in  परिवर्तन  imposed by Entropy .
परिवर्तन  in total energy  of   प्रणालियों  can only be  संपन्नता  by adding  or  subtracting energy from them  ,  as energy is a  मात्रा  which  is   conserved  , according  to  the first  विधि  of  ऊष्मागतिकी   .
According  to  special relativity , changes  in  the energy of systems will also coincide with changes in  the  system  's  mass ,  और  the total  राशि  of  द्रव्यमान  of a system is a measure of its energy  .
Energy in  a   प्रणाली  may  be   रूपांतरित   so  that it resides  in   a  different state  ,   or  a different type of energy .
Energy  in  many states may  be   प्रयुक्त  to do many varieties of physical work  .
उर्जा  may be used  in  natural processes  or   मशीने   ,   or  else  to  provide  कुछ   सेवा   to  society  (  such  as  heat  ,  light , or  गति  )  .
For example , an internal  दहन  engine  converts  the  संभावित  chemical energy in gasoline and  ऑक्सीजन  into heat , which is then transformed into the propulsive energy ( kinetic energy that  चालें  a  गाडी  )  .
A solar cell converts solar radiation into  विद्युत   उर्जा  that  can  then  be   प्रयुक्त  to  लाइट   a   बल्ब  or  शक्ति  a computer .
The  जेनेरिक  name for a device  जिससे   converts   उर्जा  from one form to another , is a transducer .
In  सामान्य   ,  most types of  उर्जा  , save for  थर्मल   उर्जा  , may be converted  efficiently  to any  अन्य  kind of energy  .
Sometimes this occurs with  an  efficiency of essentially 100 % ,  ऐसे  as  जब  potential energy is converted to kinetic energy  as  an object  जलप्रपात   in  vacuum  ,   or   जब  it orbits  nearer  or farther from  another   ऑब्जेक्ट  ,  in  space  .
Conversion  of   अन्य  types of energies to heat may also  occurs  with nearly perfect  दक्षता  ( many types of  घर्षण  do this  )  .
Exceptions for perfect  परिवर्तन  efficiency (  भी  for isolated  प्रणालियों  ) occur when  उर्जा  has already been partly distributed among  अनेक   उपलब्धियाँ  quantum states for a collection of particles , which are  freely   अनुमत  to explore any  राज्य   of  momentum  और   स्थिति   (  phase  स्पेस   )  .
In  ऐसे  circumstances  ,  a measure called Entropy ,  or   evening-out  of  उर्जा   वितरण  in such  राज्य  , dictates  कि  future states of  the   प्रणाली  must be of at least equal evenness  in  energy distribution .
( There is no way , taking  the  universe as a whole , to collect energy into fewer states ,  एकबार  it has  स्प्रेड  to them ) .
A consequence  of  this  आवश्यकता  is  कि  there are limitations to the efficiency  साथ  which thermal energy can be converted to  अन्य  kinds of energy  ,  since thermal energy in equilibrium at a given temperature already  represents  the maximal evening-out of energy between  सब  possible states .
ऐसे  energy is sometimes  माना   ``   degraded  energy , '' because it  is   नहीं  entirely  usable   .
The second  विधि  of thermodynamics is  a  way of stating that , for  इस  reason , thermal energy  in  a  प्रणाली  may be converted to other kinds  of   उर्जा  with efficiencies approaching 100  %  ,  तभी  if the entropy  (   even-ness   or  disorder ) of  the  universe is increased by other means  ,   to  compensate for the decrease in entropy associated with  the  disappearance of  the  thermal energy and  इसके  entropy content .
Otherwise  ,   तभी  a part of thermal  उर्जा   may  be converted to other  kinds  of energy ( and thus , useful work  )   ,  since the remainder of  the  heat must be reserved to be transferred to  a  thermal reservoir at a lower temperature , in  ऐसे  a way  कि  the increase in Entropy for this process more than compensates for the entropy decrease  संबद्ध   साथ   परिवर्तन  of the  बाकी   of  the heat into other types  of  energy  .
The  नेशनल   हॉकी  League (  एनएचएल  ; )  is  an ``  unincorporated  not-for-profit association '' which  operates  a major professional ice hockey league of 30  franchised   सदस्य  clubs ,  of  which  सात  are currently  स्तिथ  in Canada and 23  in  the  संयुक्त  States .
Headquartered  in  New York City , the NHL  is   widely   माना  to be  the  premier professional ice hockey  लीग  in the world , and  एक  of the major professional sports leagues in the United States  और  Canada  .
the   स्टेनली  Cup  ,  the oldest professional  खेल  trophy in North America , is  awarded   annually   to  the  लीग   playoff  champion at the end of each season .
The league was organized  on  November  26   ,  1917 ,  in  Montreal  ,  Quebec , Canada , after  the   बर्खास्तगी   of   परिचालन  of its predecessor  संगठन  , the National Hockey Association  (   नह   )   ,  which had been founded in 1909 .
it  started with four teams and ,  through  a series of expansions ,  contractions   ,   और  relocations ,  the   लीग  is  अभी  composed  of  30  क्रियाशील  franchises  .
the  nation to which  the  name  of   the  league originally referred was Canada  ,  although  the  league has now  महरूम  binational since 1924  जब  it  विस्तारित  into the  संयुक्त  States .
बाद  a  श्रमिक   विवाद  that led  to  the cancellation of the entire  2004–05   ऋतु   ,  the league resumed play under a new collective bargaining  अनुबंध  that included a salary cap .
In  2009  , the  एनएचएल  enjoyed  रिकार्ड   highs  in  शर्तें   of   sponsorships  , attendance  ,  and television audiences  .
The NHL  draws   अनेक  highly  skilled  players from  सब   over  the  संसार  and currently has players from  परिचय  20 different countries  .
हालांकि  Canadians have historically constituted the  बहुमत  of the  खिलाड़ी  in the NHL  ,  over the past  चार  plus decades the percentages of US and European  खिलाड़ी  have increased both  क्युकी  of  the  NHL 's continued expansion from six  to   तीस   क्लब  since 1967 , and the increased availability of highly skilled  यूरोपीय  players .
This  is   the  complete  सूची   of  the ratified  और  unratified  amendments  to  the   संयुक्त  States  संविधान   जिससे  received the approval of  the  United  राज्य  Congress .
twenty-seven  amendments have  महरूम  ratified since the  असली  signing  of   the  Constitution , the  पहला  ten of which are known collectively as the Bill of Rights  .
the  procedure  लिये   amending  the  संयुक्त  States  संविधान  is governed  by  Article V of the original text .
वहीँ  have been many  अन्य   प्रस्ताव  for amendments to the United States  संविधान   introduced  in  कॉंग्रेस  , but not  सुपुर्द   to  the  राज्य   .
Before an amendment  can   लो  effect ,  it  must  be  proposed  to   the  states  by   a  two-thirds  vote   of  both houses  of   कॉंग्रेस  or by  a  convention  (  known  as  an Article V convention )  पुकारा  by two-thirds  of  the  राज्य  , and  ratified  by three-fourths of  the   राज्य  or by three-fourths of conventions thereof , the  विधि   of  ratification  होने   संकल्पित  by Congress at  the  time  of  proposal .
to  date  ,  no  सम्मेलन   लिये   proposing  amendments has been  पुकारा   by  the states  ,  and only once—in 1933  लिये  the ratification  of   the   twenty-first  amendment —has  the   सम्मेलन   विधि  of  अनुसमर्थन  been employed .
FMR LLC (  वफ़ादारी  Management and Research ) or Fidelity  निवेश  is an American  बहुराष्ट्रीय  financial services  निगम  .
It  is  one  of  the largest mutual fund and  वित्तीय  services  समूह   in   the   संसार  .
It was founded in  1946   और   serves  North American  निवेशकों   .
वफ़ादारी   ventures  is  इसके  venture capital arm .
Fidelity  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Limited (  फील  ) , was  an   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   संबद्ध  founded  in   1969  ,  सेवारत  most countries in  the  rest of the world .
In  सितंबर   2011   ,  FIL was rebranded as  'fidelity  Worldwide Investment  '  .
वफ़ादारी  Investments  manages  a large  परिवार  of mutual funds ,  provides  fund distribution and investment  सलाह  services , as  खूब   as  providing discount  brokerage  services  ,   रिटायरमेंट   सेवाएं  , wealth  प्रबन्धन  ,  प्रतिभूति   निष्पादन   और  clearance ,  जीवन   बीमे  and  a  number of other services .
June  2006  was  the  sixth month  of  that year .

समाजशास्त्र  is the scientific study of human society and  इसके  origins , development , organizations , and institutions .
It  is  a  सोशल  science which uses various methods of empirical investigation and critical  विश्लेषण   to  develop a body of knowledge  परिचय  human social activity , structures  ,   और   कृत्यों  .
A  लक्ष्य  for  अनेक   sociologists  is to conduct research which may be  लागू   सीधे  to social policy and welfare  ,  while others focus primarily on refining the  सैद्धांतिक  understanding of social  प्रक्रियाओं  .
Subject  पदार्थ  ranges from the micro  स्तर   of  individual agency and interaction to the macro level of systems  और  the social  ढांचा   .
the  traditional  focuses  of sociology include social  स्तरीकरण   ,  social class , culture , race and ethnicity , gender and sexuality , social  गतिशीलता   ,   धर्म  , secularization  ,   विधि  , and deviance .
as   सब  spheres  of   इंसान  activity are affected by  the   interplay  between  सोशल  structure and individual  एजेंसी   ,   समाजशास्त्र   रै  gradually expanded its  फ़ोकस  to  further   विषय   ,   ऐसे   as  health ,  चिकित्सा  , military and penal  संस्थानों  , the Internet , environmental  समाजशास्त्र  ,  राजनैतिक  economy and the role  of  social  कार्यकलाप   in  the  विकास   of  scientific  ज्ञान  .
The  दायरा  of social scientific methods has also expanded  .
सोशल  researchers draw upon a  किस्में  of qualitative and  quantitative   तकनीकों   .
The linguistic  और  cultural turns of the  mid-twentieth  century led  to   increasingly  interpretative , hermeneutic , and philosophic approaches  to   the   विश्लेषण   of  society .
conversely   ,  recent decades  have  seen the rise of new analytically , mathematically  और   computationally  rigorous techniques , such as agent-based modelling and social network analysis  .
Sociology should not be  उलझन   साथ  various  सामान्य   सोशल  studies courses which bear little relation  to   समाजशास्त्रीय   सिद्धान्त  or  सोशल   विज्ञान  research methodology  .
Thunder is  the  sound caused by  बिजली  .
Depending on the nature of the lightning and distance of the  श्रोता  ,  थंडर   can  range  इससे  a sharp , loud  क्रैक  to a long  ,  low rumble ( brontide ) .
The sudden increase  in  pressure and temperature from  बिजली  produces  रैपिड   विस्तार  of  the  air  surrounding  and within a bolt of lightning .
In turn , this  विस्तार   of  air  creates  a sonic  शॉक  wave , similar to a sonic boom  ,  which produces  the   ध्वनि  of thunder  ,  often referred to as  a  clap  ,  crack , or  peal   of   थंडर  .
The distance of  the  lightning  can  be calculated by  the  listener based  on   the  time interval  इससे  when the lightning  is  seen  to   जब  the sound is heard .
Palma  (  , , ) ,  in  full Palma  de  Mallorca , is the major city and  बंदरगाहों   on  the island of Majorca (  mallorca   )  and capital city of  the   autonomous  community of  the  Balearic Islands in  स्पेन   .
The  names   ciutat   de  Mallorca ( City of  majorca  ) and Ciutat  (  City ) were  प्रयुक्त  before the War  of   the  Spanish Succession and are still used by people in Majorca  .
However  ,  the official name was Mallorca , the same  as   the  island .
it  is  situated  on the south coast of  the   द्वीप  on  the  Bay  of   पालमा  .
As  of   the  2009 census  ,  the  जनसांख्यिकी   of   the   नगर  of Palma proper was 401,270 , and  the  population of  the  entire urban  क्षेत्रफल   थी  517,285 ,  रैंकिंग  as  the  twelfth largest  शहरी  area  of   स्पेन   .
Almost half of the total population  of  Majorca live in Palma  .
The  cabrera   द्वीपसमूह  , though widely separated from Palma proper  ,  is administratively considered part of the  नगरपालिका  .
इसके   विमानक्षेत्र  , Son Sant Joan , serves over 22 million  यात्री  each  साल  .
the   marivent  Palace was offered by  the  city  to  the then Prince  जुआन   कार्लोस  I  of   स्पेन   .
The royals have  चूंकि  spent their  गर्मियाँ  holidays in Palma .

Alexander  जोसेफ   ``  Lex '' Luthor  is   a   fictional  character , a supervillain appearing in comic books  प्रकाशित   by  DC Comics .
Luthor  is  the archenemy of  सुपरमैन   ,  and as a high-status supervillain  ,  has also come into  विरोध  with  बैटमैन  and other superheroes in the DC Universe .
निर्मित  by  जेरी   siegel  and Joe Shuster ,  the  character first appeared in  कार्रवाई  Comics #  23  ( April 1940 ) .
Luthor  is   वर्णित  as `` a power-mad ,  दुष्ट  scientist  ''  of high intelligence and incredible  technological  prowess .
luthor   's  goals  typically  center  on   हत्या  Superman , the foremost obstacle  to  achieving the villain  's  megalomaniacal goals .
Despite periodically  wearing  a powered exoskeleton , Luthor has traditionally  lacked  superpowers or a dual identity .
The character  थी  originally depicted as a mad scientist who , in the vein of pulp novels , wreaks havoc on the world  साथ  his futuristic  weaponry   .
In his earliest appearances  ,  Luthor is shown with a  पूरा  head of red hair  .
despite  this ,  the  character later  became  hairless  as  the result  of   an  artist  's  mistake  .
a  1960 story by Jerry Siegel  विस्तारित  upon Luthor 's  उत्पत्ति   और  motivations , revealing him  to  be a  बाल्यकाल   dost  of Superman 's who lost his  बाल  when a fire  नष्ट  his  प्रयोगशाला   ;  Luthor vowed revenge .
Following the  1985  limited series  संकट   on  Infinite Earths , the  अक्षर  was re-imagined  as   a   machiavellian  industrialist  और  white-collar criminal , even briefly serving as President of the United States .
In recent years , various  लेखक  have  revived  Luthor  's   mad   वैज्ञानिक  persona from the 1940s  .
the  character was  क्रमित  as the 8th Greatest  विलेन   by  Wizard on its 100 Greatest Villains  of  All Time list .
IGN 's list  of  the Top  100   कॉमिक  Book  खलनायक  of  सब  Time ranked  luthor   as   #  4 .
luthor  is also  वर्णित  as a  ``   megavillain   ''   by  comic book critic  पीटर   sanderson  , one  of   a  few genre-crossing  खलनायक   जिनकी   adventures   लो  place `` in a world  in  which  the  ordinary  कानून  of nature are slightly suspended ''  ;  characters such  as  Professor  moriarty  ,  गिनती  Dracula , Hannibal Lecter , Doctor Doom , and  darth  Vader  ,   भी   अनुरूप   इस  description .
Martin  लूथर   किंग  ,  jr.  Day  is  a United States federal holiday  अंकन  the birthday  of  Rev  .  Dr.  मार्टिन  Luther King ,  jr  .
it  is observed on the third  सोमवार   of  January  प्रत्येक  year  ,  which is around the time  of  King 's  जन्मदिवस  ,  जनवरी  15 .
The  फ्लोटिंग  holiday is  समान  to holidays  नियत  under  the  Uniform Monday Holiday  अधिनियम   ,  though the  अधिनियम  predated the  स्थापना  of  मार्टिन  Luther King , Jr. Day by 15 years .
King was the chief spokesman for  nonviolent   सक्रियता  in  the   सिविल  rights movement ,  जिससे   सफलतापूर्वक  protested racial discrimination  in   संघीय  and state law  .
The campaign for a federal holiday in King  's  honor began soon after his  हत्या  in  1968  .
रोनाल्ड  Reagan  हस्ताक्षरित   the   अवकाश  into  विधि  in 1983  ,  and it was  पहला  observed on  जनवरी  20 , 1986 .
at  first  ,  some  राज्य  resisted observing  the   अवकाश  as such ,  giving  it alternative names or combining it  साथ  other holidays  .
It was  officially  observed in all  50  states  लिये   the  first time  in  2000  .
The camera phone solution  allows  instant sharing of  तस्वीरें  .
As it 's automatic and instant ,  the  user does not have  to   उपयोग   a  cable or  removable  media  to   कनेक्ट  to a personal computer .
a  camera  फोन  is  a  mobile phone  जिससे   is  able to capture still photographs (  और   प्रायः   वीडियो  ) .
Since early in the 21st  सदी   the  majority  of  mobile phones in use are  कैमरा  phones .
Most camera phones are simpler than  पृथक  digital cameras  .
Their  usual  fixed  फ़ोकस  lenses and  छोटी   सेंसर  limit their performance in poor lighting .
Lacking a physical shutter  ,   सबसे   have   a  long shutter  lag   .
फ्लैश  , where present , is  प्रायः   कमजोर  .
ऑप्टिकल  zoom  और  tripod screws are rare .
कुछ  also lack a USB  कनेक्शन  , removable memory card , or  अन्य  way of transferring their  तस्वीरें   अधिक   जल्दी   than  by  the  phone 's inherent  संचार   विशेषता  .
Some of  the   अधिक  expensive  कैमरा  phones have only a few of these technical disadvantages , which apply  सबसे  acutely  in  low light conditions and in any case  have  not inhibited their widespread  उपयोग  .
Most model  लाइनों  improve in  ये  regards every year  or  two  .
Some  ,  such as the Droid Incredible only have a menu choice  to  start  an  application program to activate the camera .
अन्य  , such as the BlackBerry  तूफ़ान  2 ,  droid  X  ,  Motorola V980 and Nokia  5800  also have a separate  कैमरा  button for quickness  और  convenience .
खिड़कियाँ   फोन  can  be  configured  to   operate   as   a  camera even if the phone is asleep .
Some  कैमरा  phones are designed to  resemble  separate low-end digital  कॉम्पैक्ट   कैमरे  in  रूप  and to  कुछ  extent in features and picture quality , and  हैं   ब्रांडेड   as  both mobile phones and cameras  ,  including certain Sony phones .
The  प्रिंसिपल   लाभ  of camera phones  हैं  cost  और  compactness ;  बेशक   लिये   a   उपयोक्ता  who carries a  मोबाईल  phone anyway  ,   the  additional size and cost are negligible .
Smartphones that are  कैमरा  phones may run mobile applications to add  सामर्थ्य   ऐसे  as geotagging and image stitching .
A few high  समाप्त  phones can use their touch  स्क्रीन   to   सीधा  their  कैमरा   to  focus  on  a particular object in the  फ़ील्ड  of  दृश्य  ,  giving  even an inexperienced user a  उपाधि   of  focus control  exceeded  only by  seasoned  photographers using  हस्तचालित   फ़ोकस  .
`` Whatever Happened  to   the   man  of  कल   ?  ''  is  a  1986  comic book story featuring  the   dc  Comics character of Superman .
Written  by   एलन  Moore with help from long-time  ,  and  जल्द   to  be retiring , Superman editor  ,  Julius  schwartz  ,  the  story  थी  published in two parts  ,   शुरूआत  in Superman  #  423  और   समाप्ति  in Action  कॉमिक्स  # 583 , both  प्रकाशित  in  सितंबर  1986 .
the  story was drawn  by  long-time artist  रूखा  Swan , in his  फाइनल  major contribution to  the  Superman  शीर्षक  , and was inked by George Pérez in the  समस्या   of  Superman and  कर्ट  Schaffenberger  in  the  समस्या  of Action  कॉमिक्स  .
The story was  an   काल्पनिक   टेल   जिससे  told the final story of the Silver Age Superman and his  long   इतिहास  ,  जिससे  was being  rebooted  following the events  of  Crisis on Infinite Earths , before his modern  परिचय  in the John Byrne series , The Man of Steel .
Moore  चाही  his plot  to  honor the long history  of  the character and to  serve  as a complete conclusion to his mythology  .
The story  is  a frame story  नियत  ten years  बाद  Superman was last seen  ,  where  लोइस  Lane  recounts  the tale of the  समाप्त   of   सुपरमैन   's  career to a reporter from the Daily Planet .
उसके  story includes numerous violent attacks against  सुपरमैन   by  his enemies , the public revelation of his secret identity  of  Clark Kent and a  क्रमांक   of  deaths of those closest  to   उसे   .
The  स्टोरी  has been cited as  एक  of  the  best stories of the  अक्षर  of Superman ,  और   आलोचकों  and audiences frequently choose it  as   एक  of the most memorable comics ever published .
It is  प्रयुक्त   as  an  उदाहरण  of how to close the long-time continuity of a comic book  अक्षर   .
The  स्टोरी  's legacy  रै  endured with  समान  stories written as tributes to it  .
The title is a  सन्दर्भ  to one  of  the nicknames  of   सुपरमैन  as the Man of  कल  , and  थी  used in  the  title  of  another  सुपरमैन  .
The Bugatti Veyron EB  16.4  is  a  mid-engined grand touring car , designed and developed  by  the Volkswagen Group and manufactured in Molsheim  ,  France by  bugatti   ऑटोमोबाइल   s.a.s   .
The  सुपर  Sport version  of  the Veyron  is  the fastest street-legal production  car  in the world ,  साथ  a top  गति  of  .
The original version has a  शीर्ष  speed of  .
It  थी  named Car  of  the Decade ( 2000–2009  )  by the  बीबीसी  television  कार्यक्रम   शीर्ष  Gear .
The  मानक   veyron  won Top Gears Best Car Driven  सब  Year  पुरस्कार  in 2005 .
On  6   अप्रैल   2013  , Bugatti  नियत  the record  लिये   the  fastest  roadster  in  the  world with  the   veyron  Grand Sport Vitesse  ,  reaching on  औसत  a top speed of .
The Veyron 's chief  पंक्तियां  was Hartmut Warkuss , and the exterior  थी  designed by Jozef Kabaň of Volkswagen , with much of the engineering work being  conducted  under  the   मार्गदर्शन   of  engineering  मुख्य   वुल्फगांग   schreiber  .
A  क्रमांक  of  खास  variants  have  been produced .
in  December 2010 ,  bugatti   began   offering   prospective  buyers the ability to customize  exterior  and interiors colours by  using  the Veyron 16.4 Configurator application on  the  marque 's official website .
the  institution of the Eucharist has been a key  थीम   in   the   depictions  of the Last Supper  in   ईसाई   आर्ट   ,   as  in  इस  16th-century  जुआन  de Juanes  पेंटिंग  .
`` At the Last Supper  ,  on the night he  थी   गद्दारी   ,  our Savior instituted  the  Eucharistic sacrifice of his Body and Blood . ''
(  catechism   of  the Catholic Church  1323  )
Eucharist in  the  Catholic  गिरिजाघर  refers  to  both the celebration  of   the   द्रव्यमान  ,  कि  is , the Eucharist  liturgy  , and the bread and  वाइन  which  बाद  the consecration are  transubstantiated  (  बदला   in  substance )  into  the body  और   रक्त  of Jesus Christ , Lord and God , a declaration  प्रतिपादित  by the  परिषद   of  Trent with an anathema against anyone  जो   अस्वीकृत  this  .
Blessed Sacrament is a  devotional  term used in the  रोमन  Catholic Church to refer to the  eucharistic  species ( the  देह  and  रक्त  of Christ ) .

A short  स्टोरी   is  a  ब्रैड  work of  साहित्य  , usually written in  कथा  prose .
Emerging from earlier oral storytelling traditions  in  the  17th  century  ,  the short story  रै  grown to encompass a body  of   कार्य  so diverse as to defy  आसान  characterization .
at   इसके  most prototypical the short story  सुविधाएँ  a  छोटी  cast of  नामित  characters  ,  and focuses on a self-contained incident with  the  intent of evoking  a  `` single effect '' or mood .
In  so  doing ,  छोटी   कहानियां   मेक  use  of   प्लाट   ,   अनुनाद  , and other dynamic components  to  a far greater degree  than   is  typical of an  किस्सा   ,  yet to a far  lesser  degree than  a  novel .
While the short story is largely distinct from  the  novel  ,  authors of  दोनो  generally draw from  a  common pool of  साहित्यिक  techniques .
Short  कहानियां  have  no  set length .
in   शर्तें  of  शब्द  count there  is  no official demarcation  between   an  anecdote  ,  a  छोटी  story , and a novel  .
बल्कि  , the  रूप  's parameters are given by the rhetorical and practical context in  जिससे  a given story is produced and considered , so that what constitutes  a  short story may differ between genres  ,  countries , eras  ,  and commentators .
Like  the  novel , the short story  's   predominant   आकार  reflects the demands of  the  available  बाज़ार   लिये   प्रकाशन  , and the evolution of the  रूप  seems closely  tied  to  the  evolution of the publishing industry and  the   सबमिशन  guidelines of  इसके  constituent  घरों  .
The  छोटी  story has been considered both  an  apprenticeship  रूप   preceding  more lengthy  works  , and a crafted form in its  अपना   सही  , collected  साथ  in books of similar  लंबाई   ,  price , and distribution  as  novels  .
Short story writers may  define  their works as  भाग   of  the artistic  और  personal expression of  the  form .
They may also attempt  to  resist categorization by genre and fixed form .
Area codes  in  Michigan
Area code 810 is the telephone area  कोड  serving  पूर्वी   मिशिगन   .
The raccoon (  ,   procyon  lotor ) , sometimes  spelled  racoon ,  भी   ज्ञात  as the  आम  raccoon , North American  raccoon   ,   उत्तरी  raccoon and  colloquially  as coon  ,  is  a  medium-sized  स्तनधारी   देशी  to  उत्तर  America .
the  raccoon is  the  largest of the  procyonid   परिवार  ,  having   a  body length of and a body weight of  .
इसके  grayish  कोट  mostly consists  of   घना  underfur  जिससे  insulates  विरूद्ध  cold weather  .
Two of the  raccoon   's  most  distinctive  features  हैं   इसके  extremely dexterous  सामने  paws  और  its  फेशियल  mask , which are themes in the mythology of  अनेक   देशी  American tribes .
raccoons   हैं  noted  लिये   उनके  intelligence , with studies showing that they are  समर्थ  to  याद  the solution to  कार्य  for up  to  three years .
The  आहार  of the omnivorous raccoon  ,  which is usually nocturnal , consists  of  about 40  %  invertebrates , 33 % plant foods , and  27  % vertebrates .
The  असली  habitats of the  raccoon  are deciduous and mixed  वनों  , but due to their  adaptability  they have extended their range to mountainous areas ,  तटीय   marshes  ,  और  urban areas ,  जहाँ  some homeowners consider them  to   be  pests .
As  a   परिणाम   of   escapes   और  deliberate introductions in the mid-20th century , raccoons  हैं  now also distributed across the  यूरोपीय  mainland , the Caucasus region and Japan  .
हालांकि  previously thought  to  be solitary , there  is  now  प्रमाण   कि  raccoons engage in gender-specific social behavior  .
सम्बन्धित   महिलाओं   प्रायः   share  a common  क्षेत्रफल  ,  जबकि  unrelated  males   सजीव   साथ  in groups  of  up  to  four animals to  maintain  their positions against foreign males during the mating  ऋतु  , and other potential invaders .
Home range sizes vary anywhere from  3  hectares  (   7  acres )  लिये  females  in   शहरों  to 50 km2 ( 20 sq  mi   )   लिये  males in prairies  .
After a gestation period of about 65 days , two  to  five young , known  as  `` kits '' ,  हैं  born in spring  .
the  kits are subsequently raised by their mother  जबतक   dispersion  in  लेट   पतन  .
Although  खिलाते  raccoons  have  been known to live  over  20 years , their  औसत  life expectancy in  the   जंगली  is only 1.8 to 3.1 years  .
In many  क्षेत्रों   ,   शिकार   और  vehicular injury are  the  two  सबसे  common causes of death .
The 2010 Haiti  भूकंप  was a catastrophic magnitude 7.0  mw   भूकंप  ,  साथ  an  उपरिकेंद्र  near  the  town of Léogâne ( Ouest Department ) ,  लगभग  west  of  Port-au-Prince , Haiti  's  capital .
the  earthquake occurred  at   16:53  local  समय  ( 21:53  utc  ) on Tuesday , 12  जनवरी  2010 .
By 24 January , at least  52  aftershocks  measuring  4.5  or   वृहद  had been recorded  .
An estimated three  लाख  people were affected  by   the  quake  .
the   उच्चतम  reliable death count was  अनुमानित  at 220,000 .
Haitian government estimates were higher  .
The government of  हैती  estimated  कि  250,000 residences  और  30,000 commercial buildings had  collapsed  or  यहूद  severely damaged .
the   भूकंप   caused  major damage in Port-au-Prince , Jacmel  और   अन्य   settlements  in the region  .
Many  notable  landmark buildings were significantly  क्षतिग्रस्त  or destroyed , including the Presidential Palace , the  नेशनल   सभा   भवन  , the Port-au-Prince Cathedral , and the main jail .
Among those  मारे  were Archbishop of Port-au-Prince Joseph  सर्ज   miot  , and opposition leader Micha  gaillard   .
The headquarters of the United Nations  स्थिरीकरण   मिशन   in   हैती   (  MINUSTAH  )  , located in  the  capital , collapsed , killing  अनेक   ,  including the  मिशन  's Chief , Hédi Annabi  .
Many  देशों  responded to appeals for  humanitarian   सहायता  , pledging  निधि  and dispatching  बचाव   और   चिकित्सा  teams , engineers and support personnel  .
Communication systems ,  एयर  ,  जमीन  , and sea  हस्तांतरण   सुविधाएं   ,   अस्पताल  ,  और  electrical networks had been damaged by the earthquake , which  hampered  rescue and aid efforts ; confusion  over  who was in charge  ,   एयर  traffic congestion  ,  and problems with  prioritisation  of flights further complicated early relief work .
Port-au-Prince  's  morgues  यहूद   अभिभूत   साथ  tens  of  thousands of bodies .
These  था   to   be  buried in mass graves  .
as  rescues tailed  बंद  , supplies  ,  medical care and sanitation became priorities .
देरी  in  सहायता   वितरण  led to angry appeals from aid workers  और  survivors , and looting  और  sporadic violence were  observed  .
On  22  January the United  राष्ट्र  noted that  the  emergency phase  of   the   राहत  operation was  आरेखण  to  a  close  ,  and on  the  following day the Haitian government officially  पुकारा  off the search for survivors .
Mister  ed  is a  fictional   talking  horse , originally appearing in  छोटी  stories by Walter  R.  Brooks , and  बाद  in an American television situation  कॉमेडी  produced  by   filmways  that  पहला  aired in syndication from  जनवरी   5   to   जुलाई   2   ,  1961 , and  तब   on  CBS  इससे  October 1  ,  1961 to February  6   ,  1966 .
The stars of the  दिखाएँ   यहूद   मिस्टर   ed  , a  palomino  horse who could  ``  talk ''  ,  played by gelding Bamboo  harvester  and voiced  by  former Western  स्टार   allan  Lane  (  who  गई   uncredited   लिये  the entire  लंबाई  of  the  series ) , and  उसके   मालिक  ,  an  eccentric and enormously  klutzy  ,  yet   दोस्ताना   ,  architect  नामित  Wilbur Post  (  Alan  यंग  ) .
Much  of  the program 's  ह्यूमर  stemmed from the  फैक्ट  Mister Ed would speak  तभी  to Wilbur , as well as Ed 's notoriety as a troublemaker .
Other running  चुटकुले  centered  on   wilbur   's  character being  a   विशाल  klutz and  inadvertently  causing harm  to  himself or others .
According to  the  show  's  producer , Arthur Lubin , Young  थी  chosen  as  the lead character  क्युकी   he  `` just  लगा  like the sort of guy a horse would  बात   to  ''  .
lubin  , a friend of Mae West , scored a  तख्तापलट   by  persuading the  स्क्रीन  icon to guest star in one  एपीसोड  .
In the United States , reruns aired on  उपनाम   at  Nite  इससे   कूच   3  , 1986 ,  to  February 1  ,  1993  .
Sister station TV Land also reran the show from 1996–98 and  again  from  2003-06  .
The series  is  currently  ब्रॉडकास्ट  every morning on  इस  TV  ,  along with Highway Patrol ,  और  The Patty  ड्यूक  Show .
It is  भी   फिलहाल  broadcast on Hallmark Movie Channel .
As of January 1  ,  2011 ,  the  first two seasons  of   the  show are  उपलब्धियाँ   on  Hulu .
the   rapture   is  a  पद   in  Christian eschatology  जिससे   refers   to  the  ``  being caught up '' discussed in 1  thessalonians  4:17 , when  the   ``  dead in Christ  ''   और  ``  we  who are alive  और  remain '' will  be   ``  caught  up  in the clouds  ''  to meet  ``   the   रब  in  the   एयर  '' .
the  term ``  rapture   ''  is  प्रयुक्त  in at least  दो  senses  .
In  the  pre-tribulation  दृश्य  , a group of people will  be  left behind  on   धरती  after another  समूह  literally  पत्ते   ``  to meet the Lord in the  एयर  . ''
This is now  the   सबसे  common use  of  the term ,  विशेषकर  among fundamentalist Christians  और  in the United States .
the  other , older  उपयोग  of the  पद  `` Rapture '' is  बस  as a synonym  लिये  the final resurrection  generally   ,  without  a   विश्वास  that  a   समूह  of people is  बाएँ  behind on earth for an extended Tribulation period after  the   कार्यक्रम   of  1  thessalonians  4:17 .
This distinction is important as  कुछ   प्रकार  of Christianity  never  refer to ``  the  Rapture  ''  in religious education , but might  उपयोग  the older and more general sense  of   the  word `` rapture  ''  in referring  to   कया  happens during  the  final resurrection  .
There are many  दृश्य  among Christians  regarding  the  समय   of   मसीह  's return ( including whether  it  will occur in one event  or  two ) , and various views regarding the  गंतव्य  of the aerial gathering described in 1 Thessalonians 4 .
Denominations such  as   रोमन  Catholics , Orthodox Christians  ,  Lutheran Christians , and Reformed  ईसाइयों   मानना   in  a rapture  तभी  in  the  sense  of   a   सामान्य  final  क़यामत  , when Christ returns a single time .
They do not  मानना  that a group of people is  बाएँ  behind on earth  लिये  an extended Tribulation  काल  after  the  events of 1  thessalonians  4:17 .
Pre-tribulation  rapture   धर्मशास्त्र   थी   विकसित  in  the   1830s   by   जॉन  Nelson  darby   और  the  plymouth  Brethren  ,  and  popularized  in  the  United  राज्य   in   the   जल्दी  20th century  by  the wide  परिसंचरण   of   the   scofield  Reference Bible .
Kris Nathan Humphries ( born February  6   ,  1985 )  is  an American  पेशेवर  basketball player  साथ  the  ब्रुकलीन  Nets  .
the   philistine  cities of Gaza , Ashdod , Ashkelon , Ekron  ,   और   gath
The Philistines ( , , , or ; , Plištim ) ,  pleshet  or Peleset  ,  were  a  people who as part  of  the Sea Peoples appeared  in   the  southern coastal area of Canaan at the beginning of the Iron Age (  circa  1175 BC  )  , most probably from the Aegean region .
According to the Bible , they  शासित  the  पाँच  city-states ( the `` Philistine Pentapolis  ''  ) of Gaza ,  ashkelon   ,   ashdod  ,  ekron  and Gath ,  इससे  Wadi Gaza in  the   दक्षिण  to the Yarqon River in the north  ,  but with no fixed  किनारा   to  the  ईस्ट   .
the  Bible paints them as the  किंगडम  of Israel  's  most dangerous enemy  .
originating   कही  in the Aegean  ,  their population  थी  around  25,000  in the 12th century  bc  ,  उठती  to a peak of  30,000   in  the  11th   सदी  BC , of which  the  Aegean  तत्व  was not more  than  half  the  total , and perhaps much  कम  .
nothing  is known  लिये   निश्चित  about the original language or languages of the Philistines , however  वे  were  नहीं   भाग   of  the Semitic  canaanite  population .
वहीँ  is  कुछ  limited evidence  in   पक्ष   of  the assumption  कि   the  Philistines were  indo-european-speakers   either   इससे   यूनानियों  and/or Luwian speakers  इससे   the  coast of Asia Minor .
Philistine-related words found in the Bible are not  सामीती   ,   और  can in some cases ,  साथ  reservations , be traced  वापस  to  proto-indo-european  roots .
by   the  beginning of the 1st Millennium BCE they had adopted  the  general Canaanite language  of   the  region  .
the  Armed Services Vocational Aptitude Battery (  asvab   )  is a multiple choice  परीक्षण  ,  administered   by   the  United  राज्य  Military  प्रवेश   प्रसंस्करण  Command , used  to   determine  qualification for enlistment  in  the  संयुक्त  States armed  शक्तियां  .
It  is   प्रायः  offered  to  American high school  विद्यार्थी  when  वे  are in the 10th , 11th and  12th  grade , though  anyone  eligible  लिये  enlistment may  लो  it .
Although  the  test  is  administered  by   the   सैन्य  , it is not  (  and  never  has been  )  a requirement  कि   a   test-taker   साथ  a qualifying score  enlist  in the armed forces .
in  financial  हिसाब  , a  संतुलन  sheet or statement of financial position is  a  summary  of   the  financial balances  of  a sole proprietorship , a business partnership , a corporation or other  कारोबार   संगठन  , such  as  an LLC or an LLP  .
Assets ,  देनदारी  and ownership equity are listed as of a specific  तिथि  , such  as  the end of  इसके   वित्तीय  year .
a  balance  चादर   is  often described as a `` snapshot of a company 's  वित्तीय   कंडीशन   ''   .
of  the  चार  basic financial statements  ,   the   संतुलन  sheet is  the   तभी  statement which applies to a single point in time of a  कारोबार  '  पंचांग  year .
A standard company balance  चादर  has three parts  :   एसेट  , liabilities  और  ownership equity .
the  main  श्रेणी   of   एसेट   हैं  usually  सूचीबद्ध   पहला  , and typically in order of liquidity .
Assets  हैं  followed  by  the liabilities .
The difference between the  एसेट   और   the  liabilities  is  known  as   इक्विटी   or   the  net assets or the net worth  or  capital  of  the  कम्पनी  and according to the  हिसाब  equation ,  जाल  worth must  बराबर  assets  ऋण  liabilities .
Another  रास्ता  to look at the  वही  equation is that assets equals liabilities plus owner 's equity .
Looking at the  समीकरण  in this  रास्ता  shows how  एसेट  were financed :  either   by  borrowing  धन  ( liability ) or by  using  the owner  's  money  (   मालिक   's  equity  )  .
संतुलन   चादरें  are  प्रायः   प्रस्तुत  with assets in one section  और  liabilities and net worth  in  the other  खण्ड  with the two  भाग  `` balancing . ''
A business operating entirely in cash can measure its  profits   by  withdrawing  the  entire bank  संतुलन   at   the  end of  the   काल   ,   प्लस  any cash  in  hand .
However  ,  many businesses are not paid immediately ;  वे  build  up  inventories of goods  और  they acquire buildings and equipment .
In  अन्य   शब्द   :  businesses have  एसेट   और   so  they can  नहीं  ,  भी   if   वे  want  to   ,  immediately  फेरे   ये   into  cash  at   the  end  of  each period .
Often , these businesses owe money to  आपूर्तिकर्ता  and to tax  अधिकारियों   ,  and the proprietors do not  withdraw  all  उनके  original capital and profits at the end  of  each period  .
in   अन्य   शब्द  businesses also  have  liabilities .
.17   hornady   मैग्नम  Rimfire ,  commonly  known as  the  .17 HMR , is  a   rimfire  rifle cartridge developed by the  ammunition   कम्पनी  Hornady  in  2002  .
It descended  इससे   the  .22  मैग्नम  by necking down  the  .22 Magnum case  to  take  a  .17  कैलिबर  ( 4.5 mm )  गोली  , and  it  is more costly  to   shoot  than traditional  .22  caliber rimfire cartridges .
commonly  loaded with a 17 grain ( 1.1 g ) bullet , it  can   उद्धार  muzzle velocities in excess  of  2550  ft/s  ( 775 m/s  )  .
The  schaumburg  Flyers were a professional  बेसबॉल   टोली   आधारित   in  Schaumburg ,  इलिनोइस   ,  in the United States  .
The  flyers  were to be a  चार्टर  member  of  the North American League  ,  which is not affiliated with Major  लीग  Baseball , however , the team  folded   in   कूच  2011  ,  before they began play in the NAL .
From  the  1999 season  to  the 2010 season  ,   the   flyers  played their home  खेल  at Alexian Field  ,  near the Elgin O'Hare Expressway .
The team formerly played in  थंडर  Bay ,  ओंटारियो  , where they were known as the  थंडर  Bay Whiskey  jacks  .
the  team was  originally  a member of the Northern League from 1993 to 2010  .
on   जुलाई  27 , 2009 , the Flyers played host to Battle of the Sexes II  ,  which pitted the Flyers against  the   नेशनल  Pro  fastpitch  Softball Champions ,  the  Chicago Bandits .
Played  by  official softball rules  ,  the game was seen by an  अतिप्रवाह   रिकार्ड  crowd of 8,918  ,   और  was  जीती  by the Bandits  4-2  .
In 1999 , the  flyers   नियुक्त  their  पहला   मैनेजर  , Ron Kittle .
Kittle is best  ज्ञात  for his playing  दिनों  with the Chicago  श्वेत  Sox  ,  and former  शिकागो  Cubs and White  sox   खिलाड़ी  Greg Hibbard was the pitching  कोच  .
During the early  सालो  of  the  franchise , Kittle did a series of TV commercials to promote the team  ,  using the  gimmick  `` Ma Kittle . '' where he played  दोनो   खुद  and  उसके   ``   ma  . ''
The ads  यहूद  successful at sparking some  आरंभिक   ब्याज  in the team as  the  Flyers hoped to steal away fans from  the  nearby Kane County Cougars  .
The ad mimicked the highly successful Converse ads where Larry Johnson  स्ट्रक्चर   as  both himself  और  `` Gramama . ''
At the end of the 2001 season , however ,  kittle   resigned  from  उसके   managerial   स्थिति   ,   और  Jim Boynewicz  थी  hired to replace him .
in   2004  , the  flyers  made it  to  the  उत्तरी  League  चैंपियनशिप  Series against the St.  पॉल   संतो  .
Despite  अग्रणी   the   five-game  series 2-1 ,  schaumburg   आखिरकार   खोया   the  series  .
in   खेल  5  ,  Flyers  राहत   पिचर   lyle  Prempas allowed a game winning  ग्रैंड  slam  by  St.  पॉल  infielder Marc  mirizzi  in  the  ninth inning .
the  Flyers  appeared  in the  उत्तरी   लीग   playoffs   चार   टाइम्स  ( 1999  ,   2003   ,  2004 ,  2006  )  लकिन  never won the championship  .
कुछ  famous players who played  लिये  the  flyers   यहूद   पूर्व   ओकलैंड  A  's  outfielder Ozzie  canseco   और   पूर्व  Chicago Cubs outfielder  ड्वाइट  Smith  .
Rachel  हन्ना  Weisz ( / vice / ; born  7  March 1970 ) is  an  English film  और   थिएटर  actress  और  former fashion  मॉडल  .
Weisz  began  her  एक्टिंग  career  at   ट्रिनिटी   हॉल   ,  Cambridge in the early  1990s  ,  तब   प्रारंभ   working  in  टेलीविज़न  ,  appearing  in Inspector  मोर्स  , the  अंग्रेजों  mini-series Scarlet and  ब्लैक  , and  the   टेलीविज़न   फिल्मी  Advocates II .
She  बना  her film début  in  the film  मौत   यंत्र  ( 1994 ) ,  लकिन  her  भेदन  role came  in  the film  कड़ी  Reaction ( 1996  )  , leading to  a  high-profile  भूमिका  as Evelyn Carnahan-O'Connell in  the  films  the  Mummy ( 1999 ) and The  मम्मी  Returns (  2001  )  .
Other  notable   films  featuring  वाइज़  are  दुश्मन  at  the   गेट्स   ,  About a Boy ,  constantine  , The Fountain  और  The  निरंतर  Gardener  ,  for  जिससे  she received  an   अकादमी   पुरस्कार  , a Golden  ग्लोब  and a Screen  अभिनेताओं  '  गिल्ड  award  लिये   उसके  supporting role as Tessa  quayle  .
She  रै  been  labelled  an `` English  रोज़  ''  चूंकि  her minor role  in  Stealing Beauty ( 1996 ) .
Weisz also works  in  theatre .
Her stage breakthrough was  the   1994  revival of  noël  Coward  's  play Design for Living  ,  which  अर्जित  her  the   लंदन  Critics  वृत्त   पुरस्कार  for the most promising  newcomer  .
वाइज़  's  प्रदर्शन  also include the 1999 Donmar Warehouse production of Tennessee  विलियम्स  ' Suddenly , Last Summer , and their 2009 revival  of   a  Streetcar  नामित  Desire  .
Her  portrayal   of  Blanche  dubois  in the  latter   खेल  earned her the Critics ' Circle Theatre  पुरस्कार  for  बेहतरीन   अभिनेत्री  .
वो  has  recently  played Evanora in  oz  the Great and Powerful  .
the  American Civil War  (  ACW )  ,  also known  as  the War between  the  States or simply the  सिविल  War ( see naming  )  ,  थी  a civil  युद्ध  fought from  1861  to 1865 between the  संयुक्त  States  (  the  ``  Union ''  or   the  `` North  ''   )  and several Southern  स्लेव   राज्य   कि  declared their secession and formed  the  Confederate States of  अमेरिका   (   the   ``  Confederacy  ''  or the `` South  ''  ) .
The war had  इसके   उत्पत्ति  in  the   समस्या  of  गुलामी  ,  विशेषकर  the  एक्सटेंशन  of slavery into the  पश्चिमी  territories .
Foreign  शक्तियां  did not intervene .
बाद  four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and  नष्ट  much of the South  's  infrastructure  ,  the Confederacy  collapsed   ,  slavery was abolished , and the  मुश्किल  Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and  guaranteeing   अधिकारों  to  the  freed slaves began  .
in  the 1860 presidential  चुनाव  , Republicans  ,  led by  अब्राहम  Lincoln , opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories  .
Lincoln  जीती  , but  पहले  his inauguration  on  March  4  , 1861 , seven cotton-based  स्लेव   राज्य   formed   the  Confederacy .
Outgoing  लोकतांत्रिक  President James  बुकानन  and  the  incoming  republicans  rejected secession as illegal .
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his administration would  नहीं   initiate   सिविल   युद्ध   .
आठ   बाकी  slave states  जारी  to reject  काल्स  for secession .
confederate   शक्तियां   जब्त  numerous federal  दुर्गों   भीतर  territory claimed  by  the  confederacy  .
A Peace Conference  विफल  to find a compromise  ,  and both sides  prepared   लिये   युद्ध   .
The  confederates  assumed that European  देशों   यहूद   so   निर्भर  on `` King  कपास  `` that they would intervene  ;   none  did and none recognized the  नई   confederate  States of America  .
Hostilities began  on  April  12   ,  1861 ,  जब   confederate  forces  fired   upon  Fort  sumter  , a key fort  आयोजित   by  Union  सैनिकों  in South  कैरोलिना  .
Lincoln called for  प्रत्येक  state  to  provide troops  to   retake   the   फोर्ट   ;  consequently  ,  four more slave states  joined   the  Confederacy , bringing  उनके  total to eleven  .
The Union soon controlled the border states  और  established  a  naval blockade  कि   अबोध  the southern  अर्थव्यवस्था  .
The Eastern Theater was  inconclusive  in  1861–62  .
the  autumn 1862 Confederate  अभियान  into Maryland ( a Union state ) ended with Confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam  ,   dissuading  British intervention .
Lincoln issued  the   emancipation  Proclamation  ,  which  बना  ending slavery a  युद्ध  goal .
to  the west , by summer 1862  the  Union destroyed the Confederate river navy  ,   तब  much of their western armies  ,   और  the Union  at   vicksburg  split the Confederacy  in   दो  at  the  Mississippi River .
In 1863 , Robert E.  ली   's   confederate  incursion north ended at  the   बैटल  of Gettysburg .
Western successes led to  ulysses  S.  ग्रान्ट  command of  सब   संघ  armies in 1864  .
in   the   पश्चिमी  Theater ,  विलियम  T. Sherman drove  ईस्ट  to  कैप्चर   अटलांटा  and marched  to  the sea ,  destroying   confederate   अवसंरचना  along the  रास्ता  .
The Union  marshaled  the resources and manpower to attack  the   confederacy  from all  दिशानिर्देश  , and could afford to fight  लड़ाइयों  of attrition  through  the Overland Campaign towards Richmond , the Confederate  पूंजी  .
The  defending  Confederate  फौज   विफल  , leading to  ली   's   आत्मसमर्पण   to  Grant  at  Appomattox Court House on  अप्रैल   9  ,  1865   .
the  American Civil War  थी  one of the earliest  सच्चा   औद्योगिक  wars .
Railroads  ,   the   टेलीग्राफ  ,  steamships  , and  mass-produced   हथियार   यहूद   employed   extensively  .
The  mobilization  of civilian factories , mines  ,  shipyards , banks  ,  transportation and food supplies all foreshadowed World  युद्ध   i  .
it   remains  the  deadliest  war in  अमरीकी  history  ,  resulting  in  the  मौतों  of an  अनुमानित   750,000  soldiers and an  undetermined  number of civilian casualties .
Historian John Huddleston  estimates  the death toll at  टेन  percent of all Northern males 20–45 years  बूढ़ा  ,  और   30  percent of  सब   दक्षिणी  white males aged 18–40 .
आलू  bread is  a  form  of  bread in which potato replaces a portion  of   the   नियमित   गेहूं   आटा   .
It is cooked  in   a  variety of methods , including  by  baking it on  a  hot griddle  or  pan , or in  an   ओवन   .
it   may   be  leavened or unleavened  ,   और  may have a variety  of  other ingredients baked  into  it .
The ratio of potato to wheat flour  varies   significantly  from recipe to recipe ,  साथ   कुछ  recipes having  a  majority of potato  ,   और  others  having  a  बहुमत   of   गेहूं   आटा   .
Some recipes  कॉल  for mashed potatoes , with others  कॉलिंग  for dehydrated potato flakes .
It is available  as   a  commercial product in many  देशों  ,  साथ  similar variations in ingredients  ,   कुकिंग   विधि  , and other variables .
The Pacific  समय  Zone  observes   मानक  time by subtracting eight  घंटों  from Coordinated  सार्वभौमिक  Time ( ) .
The  क्लॉक  time in  इस   मण्डल  is  आधारित  on the mean  सौर  time of the 120th meridian west of  the   ग्रीनविच  Observatory .
During  daylight  saving time  ,   इसके  time offset is .
In the United  राज्य  and Canada ,  इस   समय  zone is  generically   पुकारा  Pacific Time  (  PT )  .
Specifically ,  it  is Pacific Standard  समय  ( PST )  जब   observing  standard  समय   (   शीत  )  ,   और  Pacific Daylight Time ( PDT )  जब  observing daylight saving time  (  summer )  .
सबसे  of  कनाडा  uses daylight saving  समय   .
In  मैक्सिको  the UTC−8  समय   मण्डल  is known as the Northwest  मण्डल   ,  which is  synchronized  with the  u.S.  PDT daylight saving schedule .
The  largest  city  in  the Pacific Time  मण्डल   is  Los Angeles in California  इससे  USA ; the city 's metropolitan area  is  the largest in the zone .
The zone  is  one hour ahead of the  अलास्का  Time Zone ,  एक   घंटा  behind the  पहाड़  Time Zone  और  three hours behind the  पूर्वी  Time  मण्डल  .
Stereo 8 ,  commonly   ज्ञात   as   the  eight-track cartridge  ,   eight-track  tape , or simply eight-track ,  is  a magnetic  टेप  sound recording technology  .
it  was popular in the United States from  the  mid-1960s  through  to  the  early 1980s  ,  but was relatively unknown in  अनेक   यूरोपीय  countries .
it  was , however , very  लोकप्रिय  in the United  किंगडम  during this period  .
Stereo  8  was  निर्मित  in 1964  by  a consortium led  by   विधेयक  Lear of Lear Jet Corporation ,  साथ   साथ  Ampex  ,  Ford  मोटर   कम्पनी  ,  सामान्य  Motors , Motorola , and  आरसीए   विक्टर  Records  (  RCA ) .
It  थी   a  further  विकास  of the similar Stereo-Pak four-track cartridge  निर्मित  by Earl `` Madman '' Muntz .
A later  quadraphonic  version  of  the format was announced  by  RCA in April 1970  और  first known as Quad-8 ,  तब  later changed  to   बस  Q8  .
Ramesses II (  1303  BC –  जुलाई   or   अगस्त   1213  BC  ;  Egyptian : ,  alternatively  transcribed  as   rameses  and Ramses or  )  ,  referred  to as Ramesses the Great , was the  तीसरा  Egyptian pharaoh  (   reigned  1279 BC – 1213 BC  )  of the Nineteenth dynasty .
He is often regarded as the greatest , most celebrated , and most powerful pharaoh  of  the Egyptian Empire .
His successors and later Egyptians called him the `` Great  पूर्वज  . ''
रामेसेस  II led several military expeditions into the Levant  ,   re-asserting  Egyptian  कंट्रोल  over Canaan .
he  also led expeditions to the south ,  into  Nubia , commemorated in inscriptions at Beit el-Wali and Gerf Hussein .
at  age fourteen , Ramesses was appointed Prince  रीजेंट  by  उसके  father Seti I .
he   is  believed  to  have taken  the  throne  in   उसके  late teens  और  is known to have ruled Egypt  इससे   1279  BC  to   1213  BC for 66 years and  2  months , according to both Manetho and Egypt  's  contemporary  ऐतिहासिक  records .
he  was once said to  have  lived to be  99  years old , but  it  is  अधिक  likely that he died in  उसके  90th  or   91st   साल  .
If he became Pharaoh  in  1279 BC  as  most  egyptologists   आज  believe , he  होता   have  assumed the  सिंहासन  on  may  31  ,  1279  bc  , based on  उसके  known accession  तिथि  of III Shemu day  27  .
Ramesses II celebrated an  unprecedented   14   sed   त्यौहार  (  the   पहला  held  बाद  thirty years of  a   pharaoh  's  शासनकाल   ,  and then every  तीन  years ) during his  reign—more   than  any other  pharaoh   .
On  उसके   मौत   ,   he  was  दफ्न  in a tomb in the Valley of  the   किंग्स  ;  उसके  body was later  स्थानांतरित   to  a royal  संचय  where  it   थी  discovered in 1881 , and  is   अभी   on   प्रदर्शक  in the  कायरो  Museum  .
The early part of his  शासनकाल  was focused  on   भवन   शहरों  ,  मंदिरों   और   स्मारक  .
He  स्थापित  the city of Pi-Ramesses  in  the  nile  Delta as his new capital and  प्रमुख  base for his campaigns in  सीरियाई  .
इस  city was built  on  the remains of the  नगर  of  avaris  ,  the   पूंजी  of the Hyksos when they took  over  ,  और  was the location of the main Temple of Set .
He is also known  as  Ozymandias in the Greek sources , from a transliteration  into   यूनानी  of a  भाग   of  Ramesses 's  सिंहासन  name  ,   ,  ``  ra   's  mighty truth , chosen of Ra '' .
the   टेक्सास   रेंजरों  are a professional baseball team located in  the   dallas-fort  Worth Metroplex  ,   आधारित  in Arlington  ,  Texas .
the   रेंजरों  franchise  is   फिलहाल  a member  of   the  Western Division  of  Major  लीग  Baseball 's  अमरीकी  League  .
चूंकि  ,  the  Rangers  have   निभाई  in  रेंजरों  Ballpark in  आर्लिंगटन  in Arlington , Texas  .
The team  's  name is borrowed from  the  famous  विधि  enforcement  एजेंसी   of  the  वही   नाम   .
The franchise was established in  1961  by the name  of  the Washington Senators , an expansion team awarded  to  Washington  ,   d.C.   ,   बाद  the city  's   पहला  ballclub , the original Washington Senators  ,  moved to  मिनेसोटा  and  became  the Twins .
बाद  the season , the new Senators moved  to  Arlington , Texas ,  और   debuted  as the Rangers  the  following  वसन्त  .
The  टेक्सास  Rangers Baseball Club has made  छह   दिखावे   in  the  एमएलबी  postseason ,  सब  following division championships ,  in   1996  , 1998 , 1999 ,  2010   ,  2011  और  2012 .
In 2010 , the Rangers advanced past the Division  श्रेणी  for the  पहला   समय   ,  defeating the Tampa Bay Rays .
टेक्सास   तब  brought home their first  अमरीकी  League  pennant   बाद   धड़कन  the New York Yankees  in   छह  games .
In the 2010 World Series ,  the  franchise 's first , the Rangers  गिरी   to  the San Francisco  दिग्गज  in five  खेल  .
Their lone victory made  उन्हें  the first Texas  टोली  to win  a  World  श्रेणी  game , the Houston Astros having been  swept  in their 2005 World Series appearance .
They repeated as  अमरीकी  League  champions   the  following  साल   ,   तब  lost the 2011  संसार   श्रेणी  to the St.  लुई   कार्डिनल्स  in seven games .
Gaius  जूलियस  Caesar (  ,  July 100  bc  – 15 March  44   bc  ) was a  रोमन  general , statesman , Consul  और  notable author of Latin prose  .
he  played  a   नाजुक  role  in   the   कार्यक्रम  that led to  the   निधन  of the Roman Republic  और  the rise of  the  Roman  साम्राज्य  .
In 60 BC  ,  Caesar , Crassus and Pompey  formed  a political alliance that was to dominate Roman politics for several years .
उनके  attempts to amass  शक्ति  through  populist   tactics   यहूद  opposed by  the  conservative elite within  the  Roman Senate , among them Cato the Younger with  the  frequent support  of  Cicero  .
Caesar 's conquest of  gaul  ,  समाप्त  by 51  bc  , extended Rome 's  territory  to the  अंग्रेज़ी  Channel and the Rhine .
Caesar became the first  रोमन  general to cross  दोनो  when he built a bridge  आरपार  the  राइन  and conducted  the  first  आक्रमण  of Britain  .
ये  achievements granted him  बेमेल   सैन्य  power and threatened to  ग्रहण  the standing of Pompey  ,  who had realigned himself with  the  Senate after the  मौत  of Crassus in  53  BC .
With the  gallic  Wars concluded  ,   the   सीनेट  ordered Caesar to  lay  down his  सैन्य  command and return to Rome .
सीज़र   refused  ,  और   चिह्नित   उसके  defiance in  49  BC by crossing the Rubicon with  a   लीजन  , leaving his province and illegally entering Roman  territory  under arms .
सिविल  war resulted , from which he emerged  as   the  unrivaled leader of Rome .
After  assuming  control  of   सरकारी  , Caesar began a  कार्यक्रम  of social  और  governmental reforms ,  सहित  the creation  of  the Julian calendar .
He centralised  the   अफसरशाही   of  the Republic  और   थी   आखिरकार  proclaimed `` dictator  in   perpetuity   ''  .
But the  underlying   राजनैतिक  conflicts had  नहीं  been  resolved   ,  and on the Ides  of  March ( 15  कूच  )  44  BC , Caesar was  assassinated   by  a group  of  senators led by  मार्कस   junius  Brutus .
A  नई  series  of  civil  युद्धों  broke  आउट  , and the constitutional government of the Republic  थी  never  लौटी   .
Caesar 's adopted heir  octavian  ,  बाद   ज्ञात  as  augustus  ,  रोज़  to sole power , and the  era  of  the  Roman Empire  began  .
Much of Caesar 's  जीवन   is   ज्ञात   इससे  his  अपना   खाते  of his military campaigns ,  और  from other  समकालीन  sources ,  मुख्यतः  the letters  और  speeches of Cicero and the  ऐतिहासिक  writings  of  Sallust .
The later biographies of Caesar by  suetonius  and Plutarch  हैं   भी   प्रमुख   स्त्रोत  .
Caesar is deemed to be one  of  the greatest  सैन्य  commanders of history  .
