There are hundreds  of   भाषाएं  spoken in Nigeria .
The  प्रमुख  languages are  योरूबा   ,  Hausa ,  इग्बो  , Edo , Fulfulde , Kanuri  ,   और  Ibibio  .
The official language of Nigeria ,  अंग्रेज़ी   ,  the former  औपनिवेशिक  language , was chosen  to  facilitate  the  cultural  और   भाषाई  unity  of  the  देश  .
अंग्रेज़ी  , however , remains an exclusive  बचाना  of the country  's  urban elite , and is not widely spoken  in   ग्रामीण  areas , which comprise  तीन  quarters  of  the countries population .
सीरियल  's linguistic diversity is a microcosm of Africa as a  पूरे  , encompassing three major  अफ़्रीकी   भाषाएं  families  :  Afroasiatic , Nilo-Saharan , and Niger–Congo .
Nigeria also has  अनेक  as-yet unclassified  भाषाएं  ,  ऐसे   as   cen  Tuum , which may represent a relic of an even greater diversity prior  to  the  स्प्रेड  of  the  current language  परिवारों  .
Daucus carota ( common  names  include wild carrot ,  (   uk  )  बर्ड   's  nest ,  बिशप   's  lace  ,   और  Queen Anne 's lace ( North America )  )  is a  flowering  plant in the  परिवार  Apiaceae ,  देशी  to temperate regions of Europe  ,   दक्षिणपश्चिम   एशिया  and naturalised  to  North America and Australia  .
Domesticated carrots are  cultivars   of  a subspecies  ,  Daucus carota subsp .  sativus   .
In the  संयुक्त   राज्य  , the title of  संघीय  judge  प्रायः  means a  न्यायधीश  appointed  by  the President of the  संयुक्त  States and confirmed  by   the  United States Senate  pursuant  to the  नियुक्ति  Clause in Article II  of  the  संयुक्त  States Constitution  .
In  जोड  to the Supreme Court  of   the  United States , whose  अस्तित्व  and  कुछ  aspects of whose  क्षेत्राधिकार   हैं   परे  the  संवैधानिक  power of  कॉंग्रेस  to  alter  , acts of Congress  have  established  13  courts  of  appeals ( also called  ``  circuit courts '' ) with appellate  क्षेत्राधिकार   over  different regions of the  संयुक्त  States , and 94  संयुक्त  States district  न्यायालयों  .
प्रत्येक   न्यायधीश  appointed to  ऐसे   a  court may be categorized as a federal judge  ;   ऐसे  positions include the Chief Justice and  संबद्ध  Justices of the Supreme Court , Circuit Judges of the courts of appeals , and district  न्यायाधीशों  of  the  United States district courts .
All  of   ये  judges  वर्णित  thus  दूर  are  referred  to sometimes  as  `` Article III  न्यायाधीशों   ''  because  वे  exercise  the  judicial power  vested  in the judicial  शाखा   of  the  संघीय   सरकारी  by Article  iii   of  the U.S. Constitution .
In addition , judges of the  अदालत  of International Trade exercise  न्यायिक  power pursuant to  आलेख  III  .
Other judges serving  in  the federal courts  ,  including magistrate judges and bankruptcy judges  ,  are also  sometimes  referred to as  ``  federal judges  ''  ; however , they are neither appointed by the  अध्यक्ष  nor confirmed  by  the Senate  ,  and  उनके  power derives from  आलेख   i  instead .
See Article I and Article III tribunals  .
Nelly Kim Furtado  (  born  दिसम्बर  2  ,  1978 )  is  a Canadian singer  ,   songwriter   और  actress .
She has sold 20 million albums  विश्वव्यापी  and  अधिक  20  लाख  singles , bringing her  कुल   बिक्री  to  over  40  लाख   रिकॉर्ड  around the  संसार  .
Furtado  पहला  gained fame with  उसके  debut album , Whoa , Nelly !
, which  शाखित   दो  successful  singles  , `` I 'm  जैसे   a  Bird ``  और  `` Turn  बंद  the Light `` .  ``
i  'm  जैसे  A Bird  ''  won a 2001 Juno Award for Single of the  साल   और   a  2002  ग्रैमी  Award for Best Female Pop Vocal  प्रदर्शन  .
in  2003 ,  फ़र्टाडो   released  Folklore  ,  which  उत्पादित  three international singles—  ``  Powerless (  कह  What You Want )  ``  ,  ``  Try  ``  and  ``  Força  ``  .
तीन  years later  वो  released  ढीला   ,  a  विश्वव्यापी   वाणिज्यिक  success  .
the   एल्बम  spawned four  number-one   हिट्स  : ``  promiscuous   ``  , `` Maneater `` , ``  कह   it  Right ``  और  ``  सब  Good Things (  आइये  to  an   समाप्त  ) `` .
After  a  three-year  ब्रेक  , she released her  पहला   full-length   स्पेनी   एल्बम  , Mi  योजना  , and Furtado received  a  Latin Grammy for Best  मादा  Pop Vocal Album  .
In 2012 , Furtado 's  चौथी  English-language  स्टुडियो  album , The Spirit  अविनाशी   थी  released .
Furtado 's  कार्य   रै  earned  उसके   numerous   पुरस्कार   और  accolades , including 2 Grammy Awards  ,  10 Juno Awards , 3 MuchMusic Video Awards and a star  on  Canada 's Walk  of  Fame .
जीव  of the  रात्रि  is the  दसवाँ   स्टुडियो  album by  चुंबन  .
it  is  the  band 's last  एल्बम  for  कासाब्लांका  Records , the only label the group had ever recorded for at  कि  point  .
the  album  थी  dedicated to the memory of Casablanca founder and early Kiss supporter Neil Bogart  ,  who  था  died  of  cancer  दौरान  the  रिकॉर्डिंग  sessions .
It is  भी  the band 's last album recorded with Ace  frehley  credited as an  आधिकारिक  member ( until 1998  's  Psycho  सर्कस  ) , and  इसके  first album  साथ  Vinnie  विंसेंट   as  the  initially  uncredited lead guitarist (  विंसेंट  would later be credited , but not featured pictorially on the cover , of 1985  's  reissue  of   the  album ) .
Touch is a crucial means of receiving  सूचना  .
This  फ़ोटो   shows   tactile  markings  identifying  stairs for  visually   impaired  people .
the   somatosensory  system is  a  diverse sensory system comprising  the   receptors  and processing centres to produce  the   संवेदी  modalities such as  टच   ,  temperature , proprioception (  देह  position ) , and nociception  (  pain ) .
the  sensory  receptors  cover  the   स्किन  and epithelia , skeletal muscles , bones and joints ,  आतंरिक  organs , and the cardiovascular  प्रणाली  .
While touch is considered one  of  the five  परंपरागत   होश  , the impression of touch is formed  इससे  several modalities .
In medicine , the  colloquial  term `` touch '' is  प्रायः  replaced with ``  दैहिक  senses  ''   to  better reflect the variety  of  mechanisms involved .
Somatic  होश  are sometimes referred  to  as  somesthetic   होश  , with  the  understanding  कि  somesthesis includes touch ,  proprioception  and ( depending on usage  )   भी  haptic perception  .
The system reacts to diverse stimuli using different receptors  :  thermoreceptors , nociceptors  ,  mechanoreceptors and chemoreceptors  .
Transmission of information  इससे  the receptors passes via sensory nerves through tracts in the spinal  cord  and into the brain .
प्रसंस्करण  primarily occurs in the primary somatosensory area in the parietal lobe of the cerebral cortex .
The cortical  homunculus  was devised by Wilder Penfield .
At its  सरलतम  , the system  works  when  कार्यकलाप  in a  संवेदी  neuron is triggered by a specific stimulus such as heat ;  इस  signal  आखिरकार  passes to an area in the brain uniquely  attributed  to that area  on   the   body—this   allows  the processed stimulus to be  लगा  at the correct  स्थान  .
The point-to-point mapping  of  the body  सतहों   in   the  brain  is   पुकारा  a  homunculus  and  is  essential in the creation of  a  body image .
This brain-surface  (   ``  cortical  ''  )  मैप  is not  अपरिवर्तनीय  , however  .
नाटकीय  shifts can occur in response  to  stroke or  चोट   .
Magnolia is a large  genus  of about 210 flowering plant species in the subfamily  magnolioideae  of the family  magnoliaceae  .
It is named  बाद   फ्रेंच  botanist  पियरे   magnol  .
Magnolia is an ancient genus .
appearing  before bees did  ,   the   पुष्प  evolved to  प्रोत्साहित  pollination  by  beetles .
to   avoid   क्षति  from  pollinating  beetles ,  the  carpels  of  Magnolia  पुष्प   हैं  extremely  मुश्किल  .
Fossilised specimens of Magnolia acuminata have  महरूम  found dating to  20   लाख  years ago , and of plants  identifiably  belonging to the Magnoliaceae  डेटिंग   to   95  million  सालो   पहले  .
another  aspect  of  Magnolias that is considered to represent an  ancestral  state  is  that the  पुष्प  bud is enclosed in  a  bract rather than in sepals ;  the  perianth  भाग   हैं  undifferentiated and  पुकारा   tepals  rather  than  distinct sepals and petals .
magnolia  shares the tepal characteristic with several other flowering plants near the base of the flowering plant lineage  ऐसे  as Amborella and Nymphaea ( as well as  साथ  many  अधिक   recently  derived plants such as Lilium ) .
The  प्राकृतिक   दायरा   of  Magnolia species is  a   disjunct   वितरण  , with a main centre  in  east  और   southeast  Asia and a secondary  केन्द्र   in   पूर्वी  North  अमेरिका  ,  सेंट्रल  America ,  the  West Indies ,  और   कुछ  species in South America .

`` White Christmas '' is an Irving Berlin song reminiscing  परिचय  an old-fashioned  क्रिसमस  setting .
According to the Guinness  किताब   of   संसार  Records  ,  the version sung by Bing Crosby  is  the  best-selling  single  of  all time  ,   साथ  estimated  बिक्री  in excess of 50 million  नक़ल  worldwide .
Accounts vary as to when  और   जहाँ  Berlin wrote  the  song  .
एक  story is that he  लिखा  it in 1940 , in warm La Quinta , California  ,  while staying at  the  La Quinta  होटल   ,  a  बारंबार  Hollywood retreat also favored  by   writer-producer   फ़्रैंक  Capra  ,  although the Arizona  biltmore  also claims  the  song  थी  written there  .
He often stayed up all night writing  —  he told his secretary , `` Grab your pen and  लो   bas   इस  song .
I just wrote the best  सोंग  I 've ever written  —  heck  ,  I  बस  wrote the best  सोंग  that  anybody   's  ever written ! ''
cross-country  skiing ( or XC skiing ) is  a  form  of   स्की  touring in which  भागीदार  propel  themselves  across snow-covered terrain  using  skis and poles .
the   कार्यकलाप   is  popular in many places with  विशाल  snowfields , primarily  उत्तरी  Europe  ,  Canada , and  अलास्का  .
cross-country   स्कीइंग   is  part  of  the Nordic skiing  खेल  family , which includes ski  कूद  , Nordic  संयुक्त   (  cross-country skiing and ski jumping ) , Biathlon ( skiing  और   राइफल   marksmanship   )  and  ski-orienteering  (  जिससे   शामिल  map navigation along snow trails  और   ट्रैक्स   )  .
Cross-country skiing is the  आधुनिक   स्टाइल  of skiing that most resembles prehistoric skiing , particularly when done  in  the backcountry .
it   is  also related to Telemark skiing  .
a  use tax in United States  is  complementary  to  sales tax which means  ,  if you buy a Taxable product/services without paying any Sales tax  to   विक्रेता   ,   तुम   owe  use tax .
तुम   जरूर   स्वः  assess  उपयोग  tax and  अदा  it directly to  the   राज्य  where the  उत्पाद  were consumed or services were rendered .
Use  कर   typically  is  a  tax on consumption  लकिन  if you buy an  मद  ( without  paying  sales tax  )  and store  it  in  अपना   गोदाम   initially  , use tax applies to that location where goods were  भंडारित   .
बाद  on when  the  final consumption takes  प्लेस  at some other location , you are required to pay  the  differential of tax  रेट  to  the  jurisdiction of ultimate place of  खपत  .
This really means  कि  you do n't have  to   अदा  both Sales Tax  as  well as Use Tax on one transaction .
it  is only one or the other that you  हैं  required  to   अदा  on  खरीदें  of  taxable   products/services  .
If  विक्रेता  does n't charge any  बिक्री  tax on  इसके  invoice then  it  is the obligation  of  the  खरीदार  to self assess  उपयोग  tax  और  pay it  to   the  appropriate Jurisdication  .
उपयोग  Tax  is  generally charged at the same tax rate of  बिक्री  Tax  लकिन  in  कुछ   राज्य  the tax rate  is  different  .
उपयोग  tax is  भी  termed as ``  खपत  Tax '' or `` Consumer  उपयोग  Tax ''  .
a  use tax  is   a  type of excise tax levied in  the  United States by numerous state governments .
it  is  assessed  upon tangible personal property  खरीदा   by  a resident of the assessing state for  उपयोग  , storage ,  or   खपत  in  कि  state (  नहीं  for resale  )  , regardless of  जहाँ   the  purchase took place  .
If a resident of a state makes a purchase  भीतर   उसके  home state  ,  full sales tax is  सशुल्क  at the time of the transaction .
The  उपयोग  tax  applies   जब  a  निवासी  of the  assessing  state  purchases  an item that  is  not  विषय  to his home  राज्य  's sales  कर  .
Usually , this is due to out-of-state purchases ,  as  well as ordering  वस्तुएं  through the mail ,  by  phone  ,   or  over the Internet  इससे  other states .
the  use tax is  typically  assessed  at  the  वही  rate as the sales tax that would  have   महरूम  owed (  if  any ) had the same  goods  been purchased  in  the state  of   निवास   .
For example  ,  a resident of Massachusetts , with a  6.25   %   ``   बिक्री   और   उपयोग  tax '' on  निश्चित  goods and  सेवाएं   ,  purchases non-exempt goods or services in  नई   हैम्पशायर   लिये  use ,  भंडार  or  अन्य  consumption  in  Massachusetts .
Under New  हैम्पशायर  law , the New Hampshire  विक्रेता  collects no sales taxes on  the  goods , but the Massachusetts purchaser/user must still pay 6.25 %  of  the  बिक्री  price  सीधे  to the  विभाग  of Revenue in  मैसाचुसेट्स  as a use  कर  .
If the same goods are purchased in a  us   राज्य  that  करता  collect  बिक्री  tax for such goods  at   समय  of purchase  ,   whatever  taxes were paid by  the  purchaser to that state can be deducted ( as a tax credit )  इससे  the 6.25 % owed  लिये  subsequent use ,  भंडार  or  खपत  in Massachusetts .
With few exceptions  ,  no state  's  vendors will charge  the  native state 's sales tax on goods shipped  आउट   of  state , meaning  सब   goods  ordered from  out-of-state   हैं  essentially free of sales  कर  .
the  purchaser  is  therefore required to declare and  अदा   the  use tax to his home state on  ये  ordered goods .
The assessing jurisdiction  may  make the use  कर  payable annually  ,  but some states  आवश्यकता   a  monthly payment .
For example , where  a   वर्मांट   निवासी   रै   नहीं  paid at  तनिक  6 %  बिक्री  tax on property  brought  in for use in the state , Vermont law requires filing a tax return  (  Form  su-452  and payment )  by  the 20th  दिन   of  the month following non-exempt purchases to  avoid   a  $ 50  लेट  fee , a 5 %  दंड   प्रति  month , to a maximum of 25 %  ,   प्लस  statutory interest on the unpaid tax and penalties .
Typical exemptions include  purchases   by  charitable  non-profit   संगठन  or governmental  एजेंसियों  , purchases for resale  in   कॉमर्स   ,  and purchases via `` casual sales '' by individuals not in the ordinary course of business .
Also  नोट  that  वहीँ  are thousands of tax jurisdictions in the U.S.  और   अनेक  have  ever-changing   सूचियाँ  of  विशिष्ट  types of goods  और   सेवाएं  that  हैं  not  taxable   .
as  an illustration of the complexities : a 2006 Massachusetts law requires payment  of   कर  on ``  pre-written  '' ( not custom ) software purchased and downloaded over the Internet  लिये  installation and use in  मैसाचुसेट्स  , regardless  of  where it originates .
however  , the  वास्तविक  use  of  the same  तन्त्र  downloaded by a Massachusetts resident to a server in another state remains a non-taxed `` service '' .
in  contrast , Arkansas generally does not tax anything delivered  over  the Internet ( such as downloaded  तन्त्र  or  म्यूज़िक  ) , except VoIP  जिससे   is   specifically   पारिभाषित   as  taxable `` telecommunications services '' .
तन्त्र  ( pre-written or custom )  ``   वितरित  thru a tangible medium '' ( i.e. , on disk ) in Arkansas  is  taxable even if ordered  ऑनलाइन  , except `` custom  तन्त्र  for a particular customer ''  जिससे  is  non-taxable  `` programming services  ''   भी  if  वितरित  on a disk  .
in  most cases , this complexity is part of  the  underlying sales tax  कानून   ;  but  जबकि  a brick-and-mortar store has to deal  साथ  only the sales tax laws  of  its own location  ,  remote sellers have  to  deal  साथ  the use  कर  laws of many jurisdictions—up  to  every US state  और  locality that  प्रकृती  them ,  if  the  कम्पनी   रै   a  presence or `` nexus  ''  in  प्रत्येक   राज्य  ( as  विशाल   ``   brick-and-mortar  '' sellers like Wal-Mart  और  Best  ख़रीदे   do  )  .
In  आयुर्विज्ञान  , pulmonary hypertension ( PH )  is   an  increase of  रक्त  pressure in  the  pulmonary artery  ,  pulmonary vein , or  pulmonary   capillaries  , together known as the lung  vasculature   ,   अग्रणी  to  shortness  of  साँस  , dizziness , fainting  ,  and  अन्य  symptoms , all of  जिससे   हैं  exacerbated by exertion .
pulmonary  hypertension can be a  कठोर   बीमारी   साथ  a markedly decreased exercise  सहिष्णुता   और   दिल   विफलता   .
it  was  पहला  identified by  dr.  Ernst von Romberg  in   1891  .
according   to   the  most  हाल   वर्गीकरण  ,  it  can be one of  पाँच  different  प्रकार  : arterial  ,   venous  ,  hypoxic  ,  thromboembolic   or  miscellaneous .

sanuk   ,  a  प्रभाग   of  Deckers Outdoor Corporation ,  is  a footwear brand based in Southern  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
Sanuk , the Thai  शब्द  for fun  ,  was founded by Southern California native Jeff  kelley  when he started  बनाना  sandals out of indoor-outdoor  पिंजरा   .
the   पहला  product created was green  carpeted   और  entitled  the  `` Fur Real ''  बाद  one  दूकान   मालिक  asked  if  the novelty  चन्दन   थी   ``  For Real .  ''
The  फर  Real first became  a   runaway  hit through boutique stores and not the intended surf shops  .
the  novelty act was followed up by a sandal wrapped  in  wire mesh  ,  a  तेंदुआ  print version , and styles made out  of   a  poncho material in a  किस्में  of  रंगों   .
Sanuk has grown to include style options for  मेन  ,  महिलाओं   और  youth  और   is   वितरित  across  the  United  राज्य   और   in   over   50  countries throughout Europe , Asia  ,  South America and Australia .
Sanuk centers itself around a  धनात्मक  lifestyle  वकालत  the slogan  ,   ``  Smile ,  pass   it  on ! `` .
In computer science , array programming  भाषाएं  ( also known  as  vector or multidimensional languages  )  generalize operations on  scalars  to apply transparently  to  vectors , matrices  ,  and  उच्चतर   आयामी  arrays  .
सरणी  programming primitives concisely express broad ideas about data  हेरफेर  .
The  स्तर  of  conciseness  can  be   नाटकीय  in certain cases :  it  is not  uncommon   to   ढूँढें  array programming language one-liners that  आवश्यकता   अधिक  than  a  couple of  पृष्ठों  of Java code .
apl  , designed by  केन  Iverson , was  the  first programming language to provide array  प्रोग्रामिंग  capabilities .
The mnemonic APL  refers  to the title  of   उसके  seminal book ``  a  Programming Language '' and not  to  arrays  प्रति   se  . Iverson  's   योगदान  to rigor  और  clarity was  संभवतः   अधिक  important than the simple extension of  आयाम   to  functions  .
In  the  United States an annuity contract is  निर्मित  when an insured party  ,  usually  an  individual ,  pays  a life insurance company a single premium  कि  will later  be  distributed back to  the   insured  party over  समय  .
Annuity contracts traditionally  provide  a  गारंटी  distribution of  आय  over time  ,  such  as   via  fixed  भुगतान  , until  the   मौत  of  the  person or persons  नामित  in the  अनुबंध  or until a final date , whichever comes first  .
However ,  the  majority of  आधुनिक  annuity  ग्राहक   उपयोग  annuities only  to   accumulate  funds  फ़्री  of income and  पूंजी  gains taxes and to later take lump-sum  withdrawals  without using the guaranteed-income-for-life  विशेषता   .
President Barack  ओबामा   .
Barack Obama with  उसके  first Supreme  अदालत   nominee   ,  Sonia Sotomayor  .
following   is  a list  of   सब  United States  संघीय  judges appointed by President  बराक  Obama during his presidency  .
as  of April 30 ,  2013  , 187 Obama nominees to Article III judgeships have been  पुष्टि  by the United States Senate , namely  दो  Justices to the Supreme Court  of   the   संयुक्त  States ,  35  judges to the United States  न्यायालयों  of appeals  और   150   न्यायाधीशों  to the United States district  न्यायालयों  .
25   further  nominations are  फिलहाल  awaiting Senate action .
There  हैं  currently 16  vacancies  on  the   संयुक्त  States Courts of Appeals , 67  vacancies   on   the   संयुक्त   राज्य  district courts and 22 additional federal judiciary vacancies that  हैं  anticipated to  occur  before  the  end of  ओबामा  's  दूसरी  term .
Obama has not  बना  any recess  नियुक्ति   to   the  federal  न्यायालयों  .
ओबामा  has made two nominations to  the   संयुक्त  States  अदालत   of   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Trade , an Article III  ट्रिब्यूनल  .
Obama  भी  designated sitting judge  एमिली  C. Hewitt  of   the  United States Court  of   संघीय  Claims , an Article  i  court  ,  to be Chief  न्यायधीश  of that court  .
इस   is  a list of  एयरपोर्ट   in  Mexico , sorted  by  location .
Mexico  रै  about 1,834 airports  ,  ranking  2nd  in  क्रमांक  of airports in North America , and 3rd  in  the world .
Only major National and International  एयरपोर्ट  are  दिखाया  .
Agency  कर्ज़  also  ज्ञात   as   an   एजेंसी  bond is  a  security , usually a bond ,  जारी   by  a U.S. government-sponsored agency .
the  offerings  of   ये  agencies are backed  लकिन  not  गारंटी   by  the US  सरकारी  since  the   एजेंसियों  are private entities .
Some prominent issuers of these securities  हैं   छात्र  Loan Marketing Association ( Sallie  mae   )   ,   संघीय  National Mortgage Association ( Fannie  mae  )  और  Federal Home Loan  बंधक   निगम  ( Freddie Mac  )   .
एजेंसी  securities are usually exempt from state  और   लोकल  taxes , but not federal tax  .
एजेंसी  debt is  भी   पुकारा   an  agency security .
The Susquehanna Steam  इलेक्ट्रिक   स्टेशन   ,   a   खौलते   जल  reactor .
the  reactors are located inside the rectangular containment buildings towards the front of the cooling towers .
Three nuclear-powered  अमरीकी   warships   ,  ( top to  नीचे  ) nuclear cruisers USS Bainbridge and  uss  Long  बीच   साथ   uss  Enterprise the first  nuclear-powered  aircraft  वाहक  in 1964 .
Crew members are  स्पेलिंग  out  आइंस्टीन   's   mass-energy  equivalence formula E  =  mc2  on  the flight  डेक  .
The  रूसी   nuclear-powered   हिमभंजक  NS Yamal on  a  1994 joint expedition with the NSF .
नाभिकीय  power  is  the  उपयोग  of sustained nuclear fission  to  generate heat  और   विद्युत  .
Nuclear power  पौधे   provided  about 5.7 % of  the  world  's  energy  और   13  %  of   the  world  's   विद्युत  ,  in  2012 .
in  2013  ,   the  IAEA report that there  हैं  437 operational nuclear  शक्ति  reactors  (   हालांकि   नहीं   सब  are producing electricity ) , in 31  देशों  .
In addition , there are approximately 140  नवल  vessels using nuclear propulsion  in  operation  ,  powered by  कुछ  180  रिएक्टरों   .
वहीँ  is an ongoing debate about the  उपयोग  of nuclear energy .
Proponents , such as the  संसार  Nuclear Association ,  the  IAEA  और  Environmentalists for Nuclear  उर्जा   contend  that nuclear power is  a  sustainable energy source that reduces carbon emissions .
Opponents , such  as  Greenpeace International and NIRS ,  मानना  that nuclear power poses many threats to people and the environment .
Nuclear power plant accidents include the Chernobyl disaster (  1986   )  , Fukushima Daiichi nuclear  विपत्ति  (  2011  ) ,  और   the  Three Mile Island  दुर्घटना   (  1979 )  .
वहीँ   have  also been  कुछ  nuclear-powered submarine mishaps  .
Research into safety  सुधार  is  continuing  and nuclear  संलयन  ,  believed  to be  safer   ,  may be used in the future  .
as   of  2012 , according to the IAEA  ,  worldwide there  यहूद  68 civil  नाभिकीय   शक्ति  reactors  अंतर्गत  construction in  15  countries .
In the US the  पंक्तियां  of almost half  इसके   रिएक्टरों  have been extended to  60  years , and plans to build  another   दर्जन  are under serious consideration  .
However , Japan 's 2011 Fukushima  daiichi   नाभिकीय  disaster  prompted  a rethink of nuclear energy  नीति  in many  देशों   .
जर्मनी   decided  to  बंद   सब  its reactors  by  2022 , and Italy has banned nuclear  शक्ति  .
Following  फुकुशिमा  , the International Energy Agency halved  इसके   अनुमान   of  additional nuclear generating capacity to  be  built by 2035 .
Photograph of the Berlin  वॉल  taken from  the  West  पक्ष  .
the   वॉल  was  निर्मित  in  1961   to   prevent  East  germans  from fleeing  इससे  Communism  .
It  थी  an  iconic  symbol of  the  Cold  युद्ध   और  its fall  in   1989  marked the end of the War .
the  Cold  युद्ध  , often dated from 1947 to 1991  ,  was  a  sustained  राज्य  of political and military  टेंशन  between powers in the Western Bloc , dominated  by   the  United States with NATO  among  its allies , and  शक्तियां  in the Eastern  bloc  , dominated by the  सोवियत   संघ   साथ  with  the  Warsaw Pact .
This began after the success of their temporary wartime  गठबंधन  against Nazi Germany , leaving  the  USSR  और   the   us   as  two superpowers with  profound  economic and political differences .
A neutral faction arose with the  non-aligned  Movement founded by Egypt ,  इण्डिया   ,   और  Yugoslavia ; this  गुट  rejected  संघ  with either the  us-led  West or the Soviet-led East  .
The Cold  युद्ध  was so named because the two major powers—each possessing  नाभिकीय  weapons and thereby threatened with mutual assured destruction —never met in direct military combat .
बजाय   ,   in  their struggle for global  influence  they  सगाई   in  ongoing psychological warfare and  in  regular indirect  confrontations  through  प्रॉक्सी   युद्धों  .
Cycles of relative  शांत  would be followed by high tension  ,  which could have led to  संसार  war  .
the  tensest times were  दौरान  the Berlin Blockade (  1948–1949   )  , the Korean War ( 1950–1953 ) , the Suez Crisis ( 1956 ) ,  the  Berlin Crisis  of   1961   ,  the  क्यूबन   मिसाइल  crisis ( 1962  )  , the Vietnam  युद्ध  ( 1959–1975 )  ,   the   योम  Kippur  युद्ध  ( 1973  )   ,  the  सोवियत  war in  अफगानिस्तान  ( 1979–1989  )  , the Soviet downing of Korean  एयर  Lines Flight 007  (  1983 )  ,  and  the   ``  Able Archer '' NATO military  exercises  (  1983  ) .
The conflict was expressed through  सैन्य  coalitions , strategic conventional  फ़ोर्स  deployments ,  extensive  aid  to  client states ,  espionage  , massive  प्रचार  campaigns ,  conventional  and  नाभिकीय   बाहें  races ,  appeals  to neutral nations  ,  rivalry at  खेल   कार्यक्रम   (  in particular the  ओलंपिक   )   ,  and technological competitions  ऐसे  as the Space Race  .
the   us   और  USSR became involved  in   राजनैतिक  and military  विरोध   in  the Third World countries of Latin America  ,  Africa , the Middle  ईस्ट  ,  और  Southeast Asia  .
To  alleviate   the  risk of a potential nuclear war ,  दोनो  sides  sought  relief of  राजनैतिक  tensions  through  détente  in  the 1970s  .
In the 1980s  ,  the United States increased diplomatic , military  ,   और  economic pressures on the Soviet  संघ  , at  a  time when the communist state  थी  already suffering from  आर्थिक  stagnation .
In the mid-1980s  ,  the new Soviet President  मिखाइल  Gorbachev introduced the liberalizing reforms of  perestroika  ( `` reorganization  ''  ,  1987  ) and  ग्लास्नोस्त  ( `` openness ''  ,  ca . 1985 ) .
Pressures for national independence grew  stronger  in Eastern Europe  ,  especially Poland .
वे  reached a  तोड़कर  point when  गोर्बाचेव  refused  to   उपयोग  Soviet  सैनिकों  to  support  the  faltering  government  of  East  जर्मनी  in late  1989  .
भीतर  weeks all the satellite states broke free  इससे  Moscow in a peaceful wave of revolutions (  वहीँ   थी  some violence in Romania ) .
The  pressures   escalated  inside the Soviet Union , where Communism fell and the  ussr   थी   formally  dissolved in late 1991 .
the   संयुक्त  States  remained  as the  संसार  's only  महाशक्ति  .
The Cold War  और  its events have  बाएँ  a significant legacy ,  और  it is often  referred  to in popular culture , especially in media  featuring  themes of  espionage  and  the  threat of  नाभिकीय  warfare  .
Pikes  शिखर  State Park is a state park of Iowa  ,  USA , featuring a  bluff  overlooking the Upper Mississippi  नदी  opposite the confluence of the Wisconsin River .
The  पार्क  is operated  by  the Iowa  विभाग  of Natural Resources  .
It is nearly a  हजार  acres ( 4 km2 ) in extent .
The nearest city  is  McGregor , Iowa .
Iowa Highway 76 approximately defines  इसके  northern  boundary   .
It gets  इसके  name from  the  Iowa  अवतार  of Pikes Peak , a particularly  ऊँची  point overlooking the gorge of  the  Upper  मिसिसिपी  , and  जैसे   pikes  Peak in Colorado ,  is  named for Zebulon Pike .
वहीँ  are hiking  trails  , campgrounds  और  RV facilities  .
पहाड़   बाइक  are  permitted  in  निश्चित   portions  of the park  .
aside   इससे  recreational development ,  the  land in the park was never  साफ   और  to a  विशाल  extent  remains  as  it  was before the advent  of   श्वेत   उपनिवेश  .
It is  भाग  of a larger complex of  पार्क  ,  reserves   और  refuges  जिससे   शामिल   पुतला  Mounds National  स्मारक  ,  the  various  components  of the  पीला  River State Forest ,  the  enormous  अपर  Mississippi  नदी  National Wildlife and Fish Refuge  और  much smaller , much less well known Driftless Area  नेशनल  Wildlife Refuge .
the  Northeast Iowa Legacy Trail System is undergoing  विकास  , and will connect  तत्व  of these  साइट  .
Zac Brown  बैंड   is  an American  country/folk  band based in Atlanta ,  जॉर्जिया  .
The  लाइनअप  consists of Zac Brown  (  lead vocals ,  गिटार  ) , Jimmy  de   मार्टिनी  ( fiddle , vocals  )  , John Driskell Hopkins ( bass guitar  ,   vocals  ) , Coy  bowles  (  गिटार  , keyboards )  ,  Chris Fryar  (   ड्रम   )  ,  मिट्टी   कुक   (  guitar ,  keyboards  , mandolin ,  स्टील   गिटार  , vocals  )  ,  और  Daniel de  लॉस   रेयेस  (  percussion  ) .
the  band has toured throughout the  संयुक्त  States ,  सहित   a  slot on the 2009 and  2010  Bonnaroo Music  पर्व  .
They have also recorded five studio albums , and charted nine Number  एक  singles on  the  Billboard country  चार्ट  : `` Chicken Fried `` , `` Toes  ``  ,  ``  Highway 20 Ride ``  ,  `` Free  ``   ,  `` As She 's Walking  दूर  `` , ``  colder  Weather `` ,  ``  Knee  गहन   ``  , `` Keep  me  In Mind `` ,  और  `` Goodbye  in  Her Eyes ``  in  addition  to  the singles `` Whatever It Is ``  और  `` No Hurry  ``   ,  which peaked at number 2  on   the   वही  chart .
बात   रेडियो  is a radio  स्वरूप  containing  चर्चा  about  topical  issues  .
सबसे  shows are regularly hosted by  a  single individual  ,   और  often feature interviews with a number of different  अतिथि   .
Talk  रेडियो  typically  शामिल  an element of listener participation  ,  usually by  प्रसारण  live conversations between  the  host  और  listeners who `` call in '' (  प्रायः  via telephone ) to the show .
Listener  योगदान  are usually  screened  by a show  's  producer  (  s  )  in  अनुक्रम  to  अधिकतम   दर्शक  interest  और  ,  in  the case of  वाणिज्यिक   बात  radio , attract advertisers .
generally   ,   the   shows  are  व्यवस्थित  into  खण्ड  ,  प्रत्येक  separated  by  a pause  लिये   विज्ञापन  ;  however   ,  in public  or   non-commercial   रेडियो  ,  म्यूज़िक  is sometimes played  in  place  of  commercials to separate the program segments .
Variations of talk radio include conservative  बात   ,  hot  बात  ,  उदार  talk  और   खेल   बात  .
While talk radio  रै   historically  been  संबद्ध  with  am/fm   ,  starting  around  2005 the technology  लिये   internet-based  talk-radio shows became cost effective in the  रूप  of podcasts .
Now , it is possible for an individual to  उपयोग  a  किस्में  of  सेवाएं   to  host an Internet-based  talk-radio  show without carriage by a  परंपरागत  radio station  .
In addition  tv  programming from talk  और  news outlets such  as  BBC , CNN  ,  Bloomberg  और   फॉक्स  are now often available expanding the world of talk radio  further  .
Talk  रेडियो   सुनना  is now enjoyed not  तभी  on  radios  , but a wide variety  of  other  डिवाइस  and services including  pcs  using iTunes , station directories  ऐसे  as Tunein  ,  show directory smartphones with  ऐप्स  such  as  Stitcher .

hippa  picta ( Heller , 1861 )
Hippa  strigillata  ( Stimpson ,  1860  )
Hippa testudinaria  (  Herbst ,  1791  )
Hippa  truncatifrons  ( Miers  ,  1878 )
It is  closely   सम्बन्धित  to the genus Emerita , and  प्रजाति  have  प्रायः  been  transferred   between  the  दो  genera  .
जकार्ता  ( ) , officially  ज्ञात  as  the  Special Capital  प्रदेश  of Jakarta (  )   ,  is  the  capital and largest city of  इंडोनेशिया  .
Located on  the  northwest  coast   of   जावा   ,  Jakarta is the country 's economic ,  सांस्कृतिक   और  political  केन्द्र  ,  और  with a population  of  10,187,595  as  of  नवम्बर  2011  ,  it is the most populous city in Indonesia and in  southeast   एशिया   ,  and is the  तेरहवीं  most populated city in the world  .
The official metropolitan area , known as Jabodetabek ( a  नाम  formed by  combining   the  initial  syllables   of  Jakarta ,  bogor   ,  Depok , Tangerang  और  Bekasi ) , is the second largest  in  the world  ,  yet  the  metropolis 's suburbs still continue  परे   it  .
जकार्ता  is listed as a global city in  the   2008  Globalization and World Cities Study Group  और  Network  (   gawc   )  research  .
and has  an   क्षेत्रफल  of  .
इस  area has  जनसांख्यिकी  of well  over  28 million , making  it  one of the world 's largest conurbations in terms of number of  निवासियों   .
in  2011 , Jakarta  क्रमित  17th  among   the  world 's 200 largest cities , a  जम्प  from its 2007  रैंकिंग   of  171 .
Jakarta has grown more rapidly  than  Kuala  lumpur  , Beijing  और  Bangkok .
स्थापित   in   the  fourth century  ,   the   नगर  became an important trading port for the Kingdom  of  Sunda .
It was the de facto  पूंजी  of the Dutch East Indies ( when it was known as  batavia  )  और  has continued  as   the  capital of  इंडोनेशिया  since the  देश  's  स्वतंत्रता  was  घोषित  in 1945 .
The  नगर   is  the  सीट  of  the  ASEAN Secretariat  .
Jakarta is served by the Soekarno–Hatta  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   विमानक्षेत्र  , Halim Perdanakusuma International  विमानक्षेत्र   ,   और  Tanjung Priok  harbour  ; it is  कनेक्ट   by  several intercity and commuter railways , and served by several bus lines  कार्यशील  on reserved  busways  .
A  ठेठ  home air conditioning window unit  .
Air conditioning is  the   प्रक्रम  of altering the properties  of  air  (   primarily   तापमान  and humidity  )  to  अधिक  favourable  शर्तें  .
अधिक  generally  ,   एयर  conditioning can  refer  to any form of technological cooling , heating , ventilation , or disinfection that  modifies  the condition of air .
an  air conditioner  (  often referred  to  as air con  ,  AC  or  A/C , and not to be  उलझन   साथ   the   संक्षिप्त  for alternating  वर्तमान  )  is   a  major or home  appliance   ,  system ,  or   यांत्रिकी  designed to change the  एयर   तापमान  and humidity within an area ( used for cooling and sometimes  हीटिंग   depending  on the air  गुण  at  a  given time ) .
The cooling  is  typically done  using  a simple refrigeration  साईकिल   ,  but  sometimes  evaporation is used , commonly for comfort cooling in buildings and  मोटर   वाहनों   .
In construction , a complete  प्रणाली  of  हीटिंग  , ventilation and  एयर  conditioning is referred  to   as  `` HVAC `` .
``  6   पैर   7  Foot '' ( also styled as `` 6'7 ''  )  is a song by American rapper Lil Wayne featuring  लेबल  mate , Cory Gunz .
It  is  taken  इससे  his ninth studio  एल्बम  ,  tha  Carter IV ( 2011  )   .
it  was officially  released  on iTunes  on  December 16 , 2010 .

The song samples `` Day-O  (  The  banana   नाव  Song ) `` by Harry  belafonte  .
DC Talk  (  styled as dc Talk  )  ,  is  a Grammy -winning Christian rap trio .
The group was  formed   in  Lynchburg , Virginia in 1987  by  Toby McKeehan , Michael Tait ,  और   केविन   अधिकतम  Smith .
They  have  released five  प्रमुख  studio  एल्बम  together : DC  बात   (   1989  )  ,   nu  Thang  (  1990 ) , Free  at   पिछला  (  1992   )  , Jesus Freak  (  1995  )  ,  और  Supernatural ( 1998 )  .
In 2002  ,  the Encyclopedia  of  Contemporary Christian Music  पुकारा  DC Talk  ``   the  most popular overtly Christian act of all time . ''
In 2000 , the group released  an  EP  titled   सोलो  which contained  दो  solo songs from each member  .
Since  कि  time  ,  DC  बात  has  महरूम  on an  indefinite   अंतराल  ,  और  the three  बैंड  members have  प्रत्येक  led  सोलो  careers .
वे  have performed  और  recorded individual songs together several times  दौरान  the 2000s ,  हालांकि  the group never  officially  reunited or disbanded  .
The  समूह  's musical style evolved significantly throughout  उनके   करियर  .
Their first two releases  ,  DC Talk  और   nu  Thang , were of the  हिप  hop genre .
DC Talk  's  third album ,  फ़्री   at   पिछला   ,   भी  mainly took influence from  the  hip  हॉप   स्टाइल  , although  उनके  music began taking on a rock sound .
the  trio 's  पिछला  two albums , Jesus Freak  और  Supernatural , were predominantly pop rock  .
the  Bible is a compilation of many shorter books written at  अलग  times and  बाद   समवेत  into  the   biblical  canon  .
All but  the   shortest  of these books have  महरूम  divided into  अध्याय   ,   generally  a page  or  so in  लंबाई   ,  since the early  13th   सदी  .
Since the mid-16th century  ,  each  अध्याय   रै   महरूम   further  divided  into  ``  आयतें  ''  of  a  few   छोटी  lines or sentences .
Sometimes  a   वाक्य   spans  more than one  श्लोक   ,  as in the case of  ,  and sometimes there  is  more than  एक  sentence  in  a single verse  ,  as in the case of .
As the chapter  और  verse divisions were not part  of   the  original texts  ,  they  रूप   भाग  of the paratext of the Bible .
The Jewish divisions of the  यहूदी  text differ at various points from those used  by  Christians .
For  उदाहरण  ,  in   यहूदी   परंपरा  , the  ascriptions  to many Psalms are regarded as independent verses  ,  making  116   अधिक  verses  ,   whereas  the  स्थापित   ईसाई  practice is to count  और  number each Psalm ascription together with the  पहला  verse following it .
Some chapter divisions also occur in different places ,  e.g   .  in Hebrew Bibles is numbered  as  in Christian translations .
An index ( plural  :   indexes   )   is   a   सूची   of   शब्द   or  phrases (  'headings  ' )  और  associated pointers ( 'locators '  )  to  जहाँ  useful material relating to that heading can  be   मिला   in  a document .
In a traditional back-of-the-book index the headings  होगा   शामिल   names  of people ,  स्थान  and events  ,   और  concepts selected by  a  person as  होने  relevant and of  ब्याज  to a possible reader of the book .
the  pointers are typically page numbers , paragraph  संख्याएँ   or  section numbers .
In a library catalog the words  हैं  authors  ,  titles ,  विषय  headings , etc.  ,  and the pointers  हैं  call  संख्याएँ   .
Internet search engines  ,   ऐसे  as  google   ,  and full text  searching   सहायता  provide  अभिगम  to information  लकिन   हैं   नहीं  as selective as an index ,  as  they provide  non-relevant   कड़ी  , and  may   मिस   प्रासंगिक  information if  it  is not  phrased  in exactly the way they expect .
in  United States  वित्तीय  regulation , a  संदिग्ध  activity report ( or SAR  )  is a  रपट  made  by  a financial institution  to  the Financial Crimes  प्रवर्तन  Network ( FinCEN )  ,  an agency of the United  राज्य  Department of the  राजकोष   ,   regarding  suspicious or  potentially   संदिग्ध  activity .
Facebook  on  the Ad-tech  2010
Facebook  is   an  online social  नेटवर्किंग  service  ,  whose name  तना  from the  colloquial   नाम  for  the   किताब  given to students at the  प्रारंभ  of the  अकादमिक   साल  by some university administrations in  the  United States  to   सहायता  students get  to   जान  each other .
It  थी   संस्थापित  in  फ़रवरी  2004 by Mark Zuckerberg with his  कॉलेज   roommates   और  fellow Harvard  विश्वविद्यालयों  students Eduardo  saverin   ,   एंड्रयू  McCollum ,  डस्टिन  Moskovitz  और  Chris  ह्यूजेस  .
The website  's  membership was initially limited by  the  founders to Harvard students , but was expanded to other  कॉलेजों  in the Boston area , the Ivy  लीग  , and  स्टैनफोर्ड   विश्वविद्यालयों  .
It gradually added support for  विद्यार्थी  at  विभिन्न  other universities before opening to  ऊँची  school students  ,  and eventually to anyone  aged   13  and  over  .
फेसबुक  now  allows  any  उपयोक्ता  who declare  themselves  to  be   at  least 13  सालो   बूढ़ा   to  become  पंजीकृत  users  of  the site .
Users must register  पहले   using  the site  ,  after which they may  बनाएँ  a personal profile , add  अन्य  users as  मित्रों  , and exchange messages , including  स्वचालित  notifications when they update  उनके   प्रोफ़ाइल  .
Additionally , users may join  common-interest  user groups  ,  organized by workplace  ,  school or  कॉलेज  , or other  विशेषताएँ  , and  categorize   उनके  friends into lists such  as  ``  लोगों  From Work '' or `` Close Friends '' .
As of September 2012 , Facebook  रै  over  एक  billion  क्रियाशील  users .
According to a May 2011  उपभोक्ता  Reports  सर्वेक्षण   ,  there are 7.5 million  children  under 13  साथ   खाते  and 5 million under 10 , violating the site  's  terms of service .
In May 2005 , Accel partners invested $ 12.7 million in Facebook , and  जिम  Breyer added  $  1 million of his own  धन  to the  घट   .
A January 2009  compete.com   पढ़ाई   क्रमित  Facebook  as  the most used  सोशल  networking service by worldwide monthly active users .
Entertainment Weekly  शामिल  the  साईट  on  इसके  end-of-the-decade `` best-of  ''  list  ,   saying  ,  ``  How on earth did we stalk our exes , remember our co-workers ' birthdays , bug  हमारी  friends  ,   और  play  a  rousing  खेल  of Scrabulous  पहले  Facebook  ?   ''
आलोचकों  , such  as  Facebook Detox , state that  फेसबुक  has turned into a  नेशनल   obsession   in  the  संयुक्त  States  ,  resulting  in  vast amounts of time  खोया   और   प्रोत्साहित  narcissism  .
quantcast  estimates Facebook has 138.9  लाख  monthly unique U.S. visitors in May  2011  .
According to Social Media Today  ,   in   अप्रैल  2010 an estimated 41.6 % ( 129.5 million )  of   the  U.S. population had a  फेसबुक   खाता  .
Nevertheless , Facebook  's  market growth  प्रारंभ  to stall in some regions , with  the  site  खोने  7  लाख  active users in  the  United States  और  Canada  in  May 2011 .
Facebook eventually filed for an initial public offering  on   फ़रवरी   1  , 2012 , and was  headquartered  in Menlo Park ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   .
फेसबुक  Inc. began  selling   भण्डार  to the  पब्लिक   और   व्यापार   on   the   नैस्डैक  on May 18 , 2012 .
Sulfonamide  कार्यात्मक  group
Hydrochlorothiazide  is  a  सल्फोनेमाइड   और   a   thiazide  .
Furosemide  is  a  सल्फोनेमाइड  , but not a thiazide  .
Sulfonamide or sulphonamide is the  आधार  of several groups of drugs .
The original antibacterial sulfonamides (  sometimes   पुकारा  sulfa drugs or  sulpha  drugs  )  are synthetic antimicrobial agents that contain the  सल्फोनेमाइड  group .
Some sulfonamides  हैं  also devoid of antibacterial  कार्यकलाप  , e.g. , the anticonvulsant  sultiame  .
the   sulfonylureas   और  thiazide diuretics  हैं  newer drug  समूह  based on the  जीवाणुरोधी  sulfonamides .
Sulfa allergies are common , hence medications  containing   sulfonamides  are  विहित  carefully .
It is important to  मेक  a distinction  between  sulfa  दवाएँ  and other  sulfur-containing  drugs and additives , such as  sulfates  and  sulfites  , which are chemically unrelated to  the  sulfonamide group , and do not  कारण   the  same hypersensitivity  प्रतिक्रियाएँ  seen in the sulfonamides .

Domestic geese ( Anser anser domesticus or  आंसर  cygnoides ) are  domesticated  grey geese  (  either Greylag Geese or Swan Geese ) kept as poultry for  उनके  meat ,  अंडे   ,  and down feathers  चूंकि  ancient times  .
30 Seconds to Mars is an  अमरीकी  rock band  इससे  Los Angeles , formed in 1998 .
Since  2007  , the band has consisted of actor Jared Leto ( lead vocals , rhythm guitar , songwriter )  ,  Shannon  leto   (  drums , percussion  )  and  tomo  Miličević ( lead  गिटार  , keyboards ) .
Following the departure of Matt Wachter  (  now  of  Angels & Airwaves ) in 2007 ,  टिम  Kelleher  became  the  bassist  for the group ,  performing   सजीव   तभी   साथ  both  jared   और  Miličević recording bass  लिये  studio recordings , while Braxton Olita ( keyboards ) was added to the touring lineup in 2009  .
previously   ,  the group also featured guitarists Solon Bixler (  अभी  of Great Northern  )  and  केविन   ड्रेक   (  now of Polaroid Kiss ) .
To date  ,   30  Seconds to  मंगल   have   released  three studio  एल्बम   –  30 Seconds  to  Mars ( 2002  )  ,  a  Beautiful Lie  (   2005  )  ,   इस  Is  युद्ध   (  2009  )  and three extended  plays   –  AOL Sessions Undercover  (  2007  )  ,  to  the Edge of the Earth (  2008  ) , and  एमटीवी  Unplugged : 30  सेकेंड   to   मंगल   (   2011  ) .
30 Seconds to Mars  '   म्यूज़िक  has been associated mostly with neo-prog  ,   प्रगतिशील   मेटल  and post-grunge , but they have also  शामिल  emo , screamo , space  चट्टान  and synthrock into  उनके  music .
वे  have been compared to Pink  floyd  ( who were  an  influence on their work  )   और  Tool because  of  their use  of   philosophical  and spiritual lyrics , concept albums and their use of experimental music .
A  क्रिसमस  Story  is  a 1983 American Christmas comedy film based on  the  short  कहानियां  and semi-fictional anecdotes of author  और  raconteur Jean Shepherd , based on  उसके   किताब  In  परमेश्वर  We Trust , All Others  अदा  Cash  ,  with some elements  निकला  from Wanda  हिक्की  's  रात्रि  of Golden Memories .
It was directed by Bob Clark .
the   फिल्मी  has since  become  a holiday classic and  is  shown numerous  टाइम्स   on  television  दौरान   the  Christmas  ऋतु   on   the   संजाल  TBS , often in a 24-hour  मैराथन   .
In 2012 ,  the   फिल्मी   थी  selected for preservation in the  नेशनल   फिल्मी  Registry by the Library of Congress for being  ``  culturally  ,   historically   ,  or  aesthetically  significant  ''  .

The New York Passenger Ship  टर्मिनल  (  भी  known as the Luxury Liner  पंक्ति  or Manhattan Cruise  टर्मिनल  or  नई  York Cruise Terminal ) is a  टर्मिनल  for  ocean-going   यात्री   जहाजों  on Manhattan  's   वेस्ट  side  .
The  टर्मिनल   consists   of  North River Piers  88  , 90 , 92 and 94 on the Hudson River between West 46th  और   वेस्ट   54th  Street .
( As a general  नियम  ,  बांध  numbers  in  Manhattan can be determined by adding 40 to the corresponding cross-street . )
जहाजों  now dock at Piers  88   ,  90 and  92  .
Pier  94   on  the north side  is   अभी   प्रयुक्त  for exhibition space  .
Pier  86  , once used by United States Lines , is  अभी  home  to  the  uss  Intrepid  .
in   2003  , the terminal handled  900,000   यात्री  .
The city is forecasting  कि  1.5 million will use  the   टर्मिनल  by 2017 .
the   पियर  are long  और  apart  .
वे  were first  समाप्त   in   1935  to replace  the   चेल्सी  Piers as the city 's  लक्ज़री   लाइनर  terminal .
The new terminal  थी  built to handle bigger ships  कि   था   outgrown   the  Chelsea  पियर  .
The  पियर  were renovated  in  1970 and are currently undergoing  another   $  150  लाख  renovation .
The  संवर  plans call for it to handle three  विशाल  ships at  a  time  .
in  doing  renovations   ,  the city is  भी  considering  decommissioning  Pier 92 .
लोगो  of  the  New York  क्रूज   terminal.for
decades the  टर्मिनल  was the  तभी   ocean-going   यात्री  terminal  in  New York  हार्बर  .
With an upsurge in  क्रूज  ship traffic and the terminal  's  ability to  हैंडल  comfortably only three  विशाल   जहाजों  at a  समय   ,  two new terminals have opened in the  हार्बर   —   the  Cape Liberty Cruise Port opened  in   2004   in  Bayonne , New Jersey ( used  by  Royal Caribbean Cruise Line , Celebrity Cruises and Azamara Cruises ) ,  और   the  Brooklyn  क्रूज   टर्मिनल  ( used by the  महारानी  Mary 2  और  other  जहाजों  of the Carnival Corporation cruise  ब्रांड्स   )  opened  in  2006 in Brooklyn , New  यॉर्क  .
the  West Side Highway takes a small jog  ईस्ट  from the piers to below West 42nd  गली  because when the terminal  थी   निर्मित  land  था   to  be taken  दूर   इससे   मैनहटन  to allow for longer piers .
The  us   फौज   corps  of Engineers ,  जो   कंट्रोल  the  waterfront  dimension  ,  would  नहीं   extend   the  pierhead  लकीर  farther  into  the river , so the city  विस्तारित  the  बांध  by cutting away  at   the  land .
the  city earlier  किया   इस   लिये  the Chelsea Piers ;  however   in  Chelsea  तभी  landfill was taken away .
At the Passenger  टर्मिनल  actual Manhattan schist was taken away  .

अनेक  major passenger ships have  docked  there , including the  rms  Queen  मरियम  2 and Freedom of the  समंदर   ,  before  the  Brooklyn and Bayonne  terminals  opened  .

Christian right is  a  term used in the  संयुक्त  States to  describe  right-wing Christian  राजनैतिक   समूह   कि   हैं   characterized  by  उनके  strong  support  of  socially   रूढ़िवादी  policies  .
ईसाई  conservatives principally seek to apply their  समझना  of  the   शिक्षाओं  of Christianity to politics and public policy by proclaiming the value of those  शिक्षाओं  and/or  by  seeking  to  use those teachings to influence law and public policy .
in  the  u.S.  ,  the  Christian right is  an  informal  गठबन्धन   formed   around  a core of  धर्मान्तरण  Protestants that  draws  `` support  इससे  politically conservative Catholics , Jews  ,  Mormons  ,  and occasionally  secularists  '' who share their goals .
the  movement has  इसके  roots in  अमरीकी   राजनीती  going back as far the 1940s  और  has been  विशेषकर   influential   चूंकि   the   1970s   .
उनके  influence  draws   ,  in part , from grassroots activism as well as their focus on social issues and  क्षमता   to   motivate   the   electorate   around  those issues  .
The Christian right is  notable  today for advancing socially conservative positions on issues including school  दुआ  , stem  कोशिका  research  ,   समलैंगिकता  , contraception , abortion , and  pornography  .
Although the  ईसाई  right  is  usually associated with the  u.S.   ,   the   गति  has  महरूम  a key factor in the politics of  कनाडा   ,   the  Netherlands , Northern  आयरलैंड   और  Australia  ,   among   अन्य   .
Far East Movement  (  stylized as Far★East Movement or abbreviated FM ) is an American hip hop  बैंड  quartet based  in  Los Angeles .
the  group formed  in   2003  and  consists  of Kev  nish  ( Kevin Nishimura ) ,  prohgress  (  जेम्स  Roh  )  , J-Splif  (  Jae Choung ) , and DJ Virman (  virman  Coquia )  .
Far East  गति  's  पहला  claim to fame was  उनके  song ``  गोलाकार  Round  ''  featured  in  the Hollywood movie ,  the  Fast  और  the  क्रोधित   :   टोकियो   बहाव   ,  and its subsequent soundtrack  ,  video game and DVD  .
Since ``  गोलाकार   गोलाकार  ''  ,  the group has been featured on various  संजाल  shows  सहित  , , Entourage , Gossip  लड़की  , and  finishing  the Game (  a  featured film at Sundance  2007   )  .
Their single `` Like  a   g6   ``   hit  number  एक   on  the  बिलबोर्ड  Hot 100 Chart and on  itunes  as well  in   लेट  October 2010 .
दूर  East Movement also  रै  the distinction  of   होने  the first Asian-American group to earn a # 1 hit on the  बिलबोर्ड  Hot 100 in the  संयुक्त  States  .
lr44  is the  आईईसी  designation for an alkaline 1.5 volt  बटन  cell , commonly used  in  small LED  flashlights   ,  digital thermometers  ,  calculators , calipers ,  घड़ियाँ   ,   घड़ियाँ   ,  toys  और  laser pointers .
lr44  alkaline  कोशिका
the   बैटरी   नामकरण  is defined  by  the International Electrotechnical Commission ( IEC ) in its 60086-3 standard ( Primary batteries , part 3  देखें  batteries ) .
The  अक्षर   l   indicates   the  electrochemical system  प्रयुक्त  ; a zinc negative electrode ,  मैंगनीज   डाइऑक्साइड   depolarizer  and  धनात्मक   एलेक्ट्रोड  ,  और  an alkaline electrolyte .
R44 indicates a  गोलाकार  cell 11.4±0.2 mm diameter and  5.2±0.2   mm  height as defined  by  the IEC standard  60086  .
निर्माताओं   have  their own part  संख्याएँ  for IEC type LR44  बैटरी   including:
LR44 , LR44G  ,   lr44gd  , LR44H

4.5-volt , D ,  c   ,   aa  ,  aaa  , AAAA ,  a23   ,  9-volt , CR2032 and LR44  बैटरी
Other types of batteries  हैं   or   यहूद  made in the R44 size .
Formerly  ,   पारा   बैटरी   यहूद  made as  बटन   कोशिकाएं  ( types MR44 and NR44 )  .
Zinc-air  बैटरी  type PR44  आवश्यकता  air  to   कार्य  .
silver-oxide  batteries type SR44  may  provide extra  क्षमता   compared  to  lr44  types but have slightly different voltage characteristics .
Performance of a  यंत्र   meant  to  उपयोग  a  silver-oxide   बैटरी   may  be  degraded  with substitution  of  LR44 types .

Hurricane  कैटरीना   थी   the  deadliest  और  most destructive Atlantic hurricane of the 2005  अटलांटिक   hurricane   ऋतु   .
it  was the costliest natural  विपत्ति  ,  as   खूब  as  एक  of the five deadliest hurricanes , in the  इतिहास   of  the  संयुक्त  States  .
Among  अंकित  Atlantic  hurricanes  , it was  the  sixth strongest overall .
At least  1,833  people died in  the  hurricane and subsequent floods , making it the  deadliest   u.S.  hurricane since  the  1928  okeechobee   hurricane  ; total property damage  थी  estimated at $  81  billion ( 2005 USD ) , nearly  ट्रिपल  the damage  brought   by  Hurricane Andrew  in  1992  .
hurricane  Katrina  formed  over the  बहामा   on  August 23 ,  2005  and crossed southern  फ्लोरिडा  as a moderate Category 1 hurricane  ,  causing some  मौतों  and flooding there  पहले   strengthening  rapidly in the Gulf  of  Mexico .
The  hurricane  strengthened to a Category 5  hurricane   over  the  गरम  Gulf water ,  लकिन  weakened before making its second  landfall  as a Category  3  hurricane on  the  morning  of  Monday , August 29 in southeast Louisiana .
it  caused severe  विनाश   साथ  the  गल्फ   coast  from central  फ्लोरिडा   to  Texas ,  much  of it due to the storm surge .
The most significant number of  मौतों  occurred  in  New Orleans  ,   louisiana   ,  which flooded  as  the levee system catastrophically  विफल   ,   in  many cases  घंटों  after the  तूफ़ान   था  moved inland .
Eventually  80   %  of the  नगर  and  विशाल  tracts of neighboring parishes became  flooded   ,   और  the floodwaters lingered for weeks .
However  ,  the worst property damage occurred  in  coastal  क्षेत्रों  ,  ऐसे  as all Mississippi beachfront towns , which  यहूद  flooded  over   90  % in  घंटों  , as  नौकाएँ  and  कसीनो  barges rammed buildings , pushing cars  और   घरों  inland , with waters reaching 6–12 miles (  10–19   km  ) from the beach .
The hurricane  surge  protection  असफलताओं   in  New Orleans are  माना  the  worst   सिविल  engineering disaster in U.S. history  और  prompted  a  lawsuit against the U.S. Army  corps   of   इंजीनियर्स  ( USACE  )  ,  the  designers and builders of the  तटबन्ध  system  as  mandated by  the  Flood Control Act  of  1965 .
Responsibility  लिये   the   असफलताओं  and flooding  थी  laid squarely on the Army Corps  in  January 2008 by Judge Stanwood Duval  ,  U.S. District Court ,  लकिन   the  federal agency could not be held financially liable due to sovereign immunity in  the   बाढ़  Control Act of 1928 .
There was also  an  investigation of  the  responses  इससे  federal ,  राज्य  and local governments ,  resulting  in the resignation of  संघीय  Emergency Management Agency  (  FEMA ) director Michael  D.  Brown , and  of  New  ऑरलियन्स   पुलिस   विभाग  ( NOPD )  अधीक्षक   एडी   कम्पास  .
Several agencies including  the  United  राज्य  Coast Guard ( USCG )  ,  National Hurricane  बीच  ( NHC )  ,   और  National Weather Service ( NWS )  यहूद  commended for their actions .
They provided accurate hurricane  मौसम   ट्रैकिंग  forecasts with sufficient  सीसे   समय   .
Even the most insistent appeals  इससे  national , state and local  पब्लिक  officials  to  residents to evacuate  पहले  the storm  किया   नहीं  warn that the levees  could  breach and  असफल  .
U.S. debt from 1940 to 2011 .
रेड  lines  indicate   the   ``  debt held by the  पब्लिक  '' and black lines indicate  the  total national debt or gross  पब्लिक  debt  .
The  अंतर  is the  ``   intragovernmental  debt ,  ''   जिससे  includes  दायित्वों   to  government programs such  as   सोशल  Security .
Stated as  a   सूत्र   ,  National Debt = Debt  आयोजित  by  the  Public +  intragovernmental  Debt .
The second panel  shows  the two debt  आंकड़े  as  a  percentage of  u.S.  GDP  (  dollar value of U.S. economic production for  कि  year ) .
The  शीर्ष  panel is  deflated  so every year is  in   2010   डॉलर  .
The United States public  कर्ज़  is the money borrowed by the federal government of the  संयुक्त  States through  the  issuing of securities by the Treasury and other federal government agencies  .
US  पब्लिक  debt consists of two components:
कर्ज़   आयोजित  by  the   पब्लिक   शामिल  Treasury securities held  by   निवेशकों  outside  the  federal government  ,  including that held by individuals , corporations , the Federal  आरक्षित   प्रणाली  and  विदेशी   ,  state  और  local governments .
Debt  आयोजित  by government  खाते  or  intragovernmental  debt  शामिल  non-marketable Treasury securities held in  खाते  administered by the  संघीय  government that  हैं  owed to program  beneficiaries  , such as the Social Security  विश्वास   निधि   .
Debt held  by  government accounts represents  the   संचयी   surpluses   ,   सहित  interest  आय  , of  ये  accounts that have been invested in  राजकोष  securities  .
पब्लिक  debt  increases  or decreases  as  a  परिणाम  of the annual  एकीकृत  budget deficit  or  surplus  .
the   संघीय  government  बजट  deficit or surplus  is  the  अंतर   between  government receipts and spending , ignoring intra-governmental transfers .
however  , some spending  कि   is  excluded  इससे  the  deficit   (   supplemental  appropriations  )  also adds  to   the  debt .
historically  , the  us  public debt  as  a share of GDP increased during wars and  recessions  , and subsequently  अस्वीकृत  .
For  उदाहरण  , debt held by  the  public as a  share  of GDP peaked  बस  after World War  ii  ( 113 % of GDP in  1945   )   ,   लकिन   तब  fell  over  the following 30 years .
in  recent decades ,  however   ,  large budget deficits and the resulting increases in debt have led to concern about  the  long-term sustainability of the federal government 's  फिस्कल  policies .
on  2 April  2013   ,   कर्ज़  held by the  पब्लिक  was  लगभग  $  11.959  trillion or about 75 % of GDP .
Intragovernmental holdings stood  at   $  4.846  खरब  , giving a combined total public  कर्ज़  of  $  16.805 trillion .
As of January  2013  ,  $  5.6  खरब  or approximately  47  % of the debt held by the public was owned by foreign investors , the  largest   of  which were  the  People  's   गणतंत्र  of China and  जापानी  at just over $  1.1  trillion  प्रत्येक   .
in  basketball , an assist  is  attributed to a player who passes the  बॉल  to a teammate  in   a   रास्ता  that  लीड  to a score by field goal  ,  meaning that  he  or she was ``  assisting  '' in the basket  .
There is some judgment involved  in  deciding  whether   a  passer should be credited with an  assist  .
an  assist can be scored  लिये  the passer even if the  खिलाड़ी   जो   receives  the pass makes a  बास्केट  after  ड्रिब्लिंग  the  बॉल  .
however  , the  असली  definition of an  assist  did  नहीं  include  ऐसे  situations  ,  so the  तुलना  of  assist  statistics across eras is  a  complex matter .
तभी   the   pass  directly before the score may be counted  as  an assist  ,  so  no   अधिक   than  one assist can be recorded per field  लक्ष्य  ( unlike in other sports , such as ice hockey )  .
A pass that  लीड   to   a  shooting  बेईमानी   और  scoring by free  throws  does not count as  an  assist  in  the NBA  ,   लकिन   करता   in   fiba  play  (  only one assist is  awarded   प्रति  set of free  throws  in which  at  least  एक   फ़्री  throw  is  made  )   .
Point guards tend  to   मिलेंगी   the  most assists per  खेल   (  apg ) , as their role is primarily  कि  of  a   passer   और   ballhandler  .
Centers tend  to   मिलेंगी   कम  assists , but  centers   साथ  good floor presence and court vision can dominate a team  by  assisting .
Being inside the key , the  बीच  often has the best angles and the best position for  ``  dishes  ''  and other short passes in the  स्कोरिंग  area .
Center Wilt Chamberlain led the NBA in assists in 1968  .
a  strong center with inside-scoring  prowess  ,  ऐसे   as  former NBA center Hakeem Olajuwon ,  can  also  be  an effective assistor  क्युकी  the defense 's  double-teaming   tends  to open  up  offense  in   the  form of  निशानेबाज  .
The NBA single-game  assist  record  is   30  , held  by  Scott  skiles   of  the Orlando Magic  विरूद्ध  the  डेनवर   टेंडर्स   ,   on  December 30 , 1990 .
The  एनबीए   रिकार्ड  for most career  assists   is   आयोजित  by John  स्टॉकटन  with 15,806 .
the  mill or mille ( )  (  sometimes  mil  in the UK ,  जब  discussing property taxes in the United States , or previously in Cyprus  और   माल्टा  ) is a now-abstract unit of currency used  sometimes  in accounting .
In the United States , it is a notional unit equivalent to  of  a United States dollar (  a  tenth of  a  cent ) .
in   the  United  किंगडम  it was proposed during  the   दशकों  of discussion on the decimalization of the  पाउंड  as  a  division of the pound sterling  .
Several other currencies used the mill ,  ऐसे   as   the  Maltese  लीरा  .
The term  आता   इससे  the Latin  ``  millesimum  ''  , meaning `` thousandth part '' .
The Greco-Persian  युद्धों  ( also often  पुकारा  the  पारसी   युद्धों  ) were a series of conflicts between the Achaemenid  साम्राज्य  of  फारस   और  city-states of the  हैलेनिक   संसार  that started in  499  BC and lasted until 449 BC .
The collision between the  fractious  political world of  the  Greeks and  the  enormous empire  of   the   फारसियों   began  when Cyrus the Great conquered  ionia  in 547 BC .
struggling   to  rule the independent-minded cities of Ionia  ,  the Persians appointed tyrants to  नियम   प्रत्येक  of  उन्हें  .
इस  would prove to be the source  of  much trouble for  the  Greeks and Persians  alike  .
In  499   bc  ,  the   तब  tyrant of Miletus , Aristagoras ,  embarked   on  an expedition to conquer the island of Naxos , with Persian support ; however , the expedition was  a  debacle  और   ,  pre-empting his dismissal , Aristagoras  incited  all  of  Hellenic Asia Minor into rebellion against the  फारसियों  .
इस  was  the  beginning of  the  Ionian Revolt , which would last until 493 BC  ,  progressively  आरेखण  more regions  of  Asia Minor into the conflict .
Aristagoras  secured  military support from Athens  और  Eretria  ,  and in  498   bc  these  शक्तियां  helped  to  capture  और  burn the  पारसी  regional capital of Sardis  .
The Persian king Darius  the   ग्रेट   vowed   to   have  revenge on Athens  और   eretria   लिये  this act  .
the   विद्रोह  continued  ,  with the two sides  effectively   stalemated  throughout 497–495 BC  .
In  494  BC , the Persians regrouped , and attacked the  epicentre  of the revolt  in  Miletus .
At the Battle of  lade  ,  the  Ionians suffered a decisive defeat  ,  and  the  rebellion collapsed , with the final members  होने   stamped  out the following year .
Seeking  to  secure his  साम्राज्य  from further revolts  और   इससे  the  हस्तक्षेप  of the  मेनलैंड  Greeks , Darius embarked on a scheme to conquer Greece and  to  punish Athens and Eretria  लिये  burning Sardis .
The  पहला  Persian invasion of Greece began in 492 BC ,  साथ  the  पारसी  general Mardonius  conquering  Thrace and Macedon before several mishaps forced an early end to the  अभियान   .
In 490 BC a  दूसरी  force was sent to Greece , this time  आरपार  the Aegean Sea ,  अंतर्गत   the   कमांड   of  Datis and Artaphernes .
This expedition subjugated the Cyclades , before besieging  ,  capturing  और   razing  Eretria .
However , while en route  to  attack Athens , the Persian force  थी  decisively defeated by the Athenians  at  the Battle of  मैराथन  , ending Persian efforts for the  समय  being .
Darius  तब  began  to  plan to complete the conquest of Greece  ,  but died in 486  bc  and  जिम्मेदारी  for the  conquest  passed to  उसके  son Xerxes I .
In 480  bc  , Xerxes personally  led  the second Persian  आक्रमण  of Greece  साथ   एक   of   the  largest ancient armies ever assembled  .
Victory  over   the  'Allied  '  Greek states ( led by Sparta and Athens  )  at the  बैटल  of Thermopylae allowed the Persians to torch Athens and  overrun  most  of   यूनानियों  .
however  , while seeking  to  destroy  the  combined Greek  बेड़े   ,  the Persians suffered a severe defeat at the Battle of Salamis .
the  following year  ,  the confederated Greeks went on the offensive  ,   defeating  the Persian army at the Battle  of  Plataea  ,  and  समाप्ति  the invasion of Greece  .
The  अलाइड  Greeks followed  up  their success by  destroying  the rest of the Persian fleet at  the  Battle of  mycale  ,  पहले  expelling Persian garrisons from Sestos  (   479  BC )  और   byzantium  ( 478 BC ) .
The actions of the  सामान्य  Pausanias  at  the siege  of   byzantium  alienated  अनेक  of  the   यूनानी   राज्य   इससे   the  Spartans , and the  anti-persian   गठबंधन  was  इसलिए   reconstituted  around  athenian  leadership , as the so-called Delian League  .
The Delian League continued to campaign against Persia  लिये  the next three decades , beginning with  the  expulsion of the remaining Persian garrisons from Europe  .
At  the   बैटल   of  the Eurymedon  in  466 BC  ,  the  लीग   जीती  a double victory that finally secured freedom for  the   शहरों  of Ionia .
however  ,  the  League 's  भागीदारी   in  an Egyptian revolt (  इससे   460–454  BC ) resulted  in  a  विनाशकारी  defeat ,  और  further campaigning was suspended .
A  बेड़े  was sent to  साइप्रस   in   451  BC  ,   लकिन  achieved  छोटी  , and when it  withdrew   the   greco-persian  Wars drew to  a  quiet end .
कुछ  historical sources  सुझाएँ  the end  of  hostilities was marked by a peace treaty between  एथेंस  and Persia ,  the   so-called  Peace of Callias .
hooverville  near Portland  ,   ऑरेगॉन
a   ``  Hooverville  ''  is the popular  नाम  for shanty towns built  by   बेघर  people  दौरान   the  Great Depression .
They  यहूद  named after  हर्बर्ट  Hoover , who was  अध्यक्ष  of the United  राज्य   दौरान   the  onset of the Depression and widely  blamed  for it .
the  term was coined by Charles Michelson ,  publicity  chief of  the  Democratic National Committee .
मैथ्यू  Michael Hasselbeck ( born  सितंबर   25   ,   1975   )   is  an American football quarterback for the Indianapolis Colts of  the  National Football League (  एनएफएल  ) .
He was drafted  in   the  sixth round of  the  1998 NFL Draft by the Green  खाड़ी   पैकर्स  .
बाद   a  season on the practice squad and two  सीज़न  backing  up  Brett Favre  ,  he  थी  traded to the Seattle Seahawks  in   2001  .
Hasselbeck gained the  starting  role in  2003  , and led Seattle  to   छह  playoff  दिखावे   और   a  Super Bowl appearance ; he was selected to three Pro  प्याले   और   an  All-Pro  चयन  .
Following  टेन   सीज़न  with the Seahawks , Hasselbeck joined  the   टेनेसी  Titans in 2011 .
hasselbeck  then signed a contract with the  इंडियानापोलिस  Colts in 2013 less than 24 hours after being  released  by the  टेनेसी  Titans .
ICT  is  inevitably related to the computer network .
सूचना   और  Communications Technology  or  (  आईसीटी  )  ,  is often  प्रयुक्त  as an extended synonym for  सूचना   प्रौद्योगिकी  ( IT ) , but  is  a more  विशिष्ट  term that stresses the  भूमिका  of unified communications and the integration of  दूरसंचार  ( telephone  लाइनों  and wireless signals  )  , computers as well as  जरुरी   एंटरप्राइज़  software , middleware , storage , and audio-visual systems  ,  which  enable  users to  अभिगम   ,  store  ,  transmit , and manipulate  सूचना  .
the  phrase ICT  था  been used  by  academic researchers  चूंकि  the 1980s  ,  but it became popular  बाद  it was  प्रयुक्त   in   a  report to the  uk  government by Dennis  stevenson   in  1997  और  in the revised National Curriculum  लिये  England  ,   वेल्स  and Northern Ireland in 2000  .
The term  आईसीटी  is now also used to refer to the convergence  of  audio-visual and telephone networks  साथ  computer networks through a single cabling  or  link system .
There  हैं   विशाल  economic incentives  (   विशाल  cost savings due to elimination of  the  telephone network  )  to merge the  audio-visual  , building management and telephone  संजाल  with the  कंप्यूटर  network system using a  सिंगल  unified  प्रणाली  of cabling  ,  signal distribution and management .
the  term Infocommunications  is   प्रयुक्त  in some cases as  a  shorter form of information  और  communication ( s ) technology .
In fact Infocommunications is the expansion of telecommunications with information  प्रसंस्करण  and content handling functions on  a   आम   डिजिटल  technology base .
For  a   तुलना   of  these  और  other terms  ,  see .
For  आईसीटी  Development Index around  the  world  ,  see .
This  is  a list of characters from  जार्ज   लोपेज़   .
A schematic presentation of  the  plum pudding model of  the   अणु  ;  in  Thomson  's  mathematical model the  ``   corpuscles   ''  (  or  modern electrons ) were arranged  non-randomly  , in rotating rings
the  current model of the sub-atomic structure involves  a  dense nucleus  घिरी  by a probabilistic ``  बादल   ''  of electrons
The plum pudding model  of  the  अणु  by J. J. Thomson  ,   जो  discovered  the  electron in  1897   ,   थी  proposed  in  1904  पहले  the  डिस्कवरी  of the  परमाणु   केंद्रक  in order to add the electron to the atomic  मॉडल   .
In  इस  model , the atom  is  composed  of  electrons ( which  thomson  still called  ``  corpuscles  ''  , though G. J. Stoney had proposed that atoms of electricity be called electrons in 1894  )  surrounded by a soup  of  positive charge  to  balance  the   electrons  '  ऋणात्मक  charges , like negatively charged `` plums `` surrounded by positively charged `` pudding `` .
The electrons (  as   we  know them today )  यहूद   विचार  to be  positioned  throughout  the  atom ,  लकिन  with  अनेक   structures  possible  लिये   positioning  multiple electrons  ,  particularly  घूर्णन   बजती   of  electrons ( see below ) .
बजाय  of a soup , the atom was  भी   sometimes  said  to  have had a `` cloud '' of  धनात्मक  charge .
साथ   इस   मॉडल  , Thomson abandoned his earlier  ``   nebular  atom ''  परिकल्पना  in which  the  atom was  रचित   of  immaterial vortices .
Now  ,  at least part of the atom was to be composed of  thomson  's particulate  ऋणात्मक   corpuscles   ,   हालांकि  the rest of the positively  चार्ज  part of the  अणु  remained somewhat nebulous and ill-defined .
The 1904 Thomson  मॉडल  was disproved  by  the 1909 gold foil experiment of Hans Geiger and Ernest  मार्सडेन  .
This  थी  interpreted by Ernest Rutherford in 1911
to  imply  a  very small nucleus of the atom containing a  बहुत  high  धनात्मक  charge  (   in   the  case of  सुनहरा   ,   पर्याप्त   to  balance about  100  electrons ) , thus leading to  the  Rutherford  मॉडल  of the atom .
Although gold has an  परमाणु  number of 79 ,  तत्काल  after Rutherford 's paper appeared in 1911 Antonius Van den Broek made the  सहज   सुझाव   कि  atomic  क्रमांक  is nuclear charge .
The matter  जरूरी  experiment to  decide   .
हेनरी  Moseley 's  कार्य  showed experimentally in  1913  ( see Moseley 's  विधि   )  that  the   प्रभावी   नाभिकीय   चार्ज  was very  बंद  to the atomic number  (  Moseley found only one unit  अंतर  ) ,  और  Moseley referenced  तभी  the  papers   of  Van  डेन  Broek  और   रदरफोर्ड   .
This work culminated in  the  solar-system-like ( but quantum-limited  )  Bohr model of  the  atom  in  the same year ,  in   जिससे  a nucleus containing an  परमाणु   क्रमांक   of  positive charge is surrounded  by   an  equal  क्रमांक   of  electrons in orbital shells  .
Bohr had  भी  inspired Moseley 's work .
thomson  's model was  compared  ( though  नहीं  by Thomson  )  to  a  British dessert called plum pudding , hence the name  .
thomson   's  paper was published in the March 1904 edition  of   the   philosophical   पत्रिका   ,  the leading British  विज्ञान  journal of the day .
In Thomson 's  दृश्य  : ... the atoms  of   the  elements consist of a  क्रमांक   of  negatively electrified  corpuscles  enclosed in  a  sphere of uniform positive  विद्युतीकरण  ,  ...
In this model  ,  the  electrons  were free to rotate within the blob or cloud of positive substance .
ये   orbits   यहूद  stabilized in  the   मॉडल  by the fact  कि  when an  इलेक्ट्रॉन   स्थानांतरित  farther from  the   बीच   of  the positive cloud ,  it  felt a larger net positive inward force ,  क्युकी  there  थी  more material of  विपरीत  charge ,  अंदर  its orbit (  देखिए  Gauss  's   विधि  ) .
In Thomson 's  मॉडल  ,  electrons  were  फ़्री  to rotate  in  rings which  यहूद  further stabilized by  interactions  between the  electrons  ,  और  spectra  यहूद  to be  accounted  for  by  energy  मतभेद   of  different  रिंग  orbits  .
Thomson attempted to make his model  खाता  for some of  the  major spectral  लाइनों  known for some elements , but  थी   नहीं   notably  successful at this .
Still  ,  Thomson 's model ( along with a similar  saturnian  ring  मॉडल   लिये  atomic  electrons  ,  भी  put  आगे   in  1904  by   nagaoka  after  जेम्स  Clerk Maxwell 's model  of   शनि   's  rings ) , were earlier harbingers of the later and more  कामयाब   solar-system-like  Bohr  मॉडल   of  the atom .
ठेठ  strip of bacon .
Bacon  is  a  cured   मांस  prepared from a pig  .
It is first cured using  विशाल  quantities of salt  ,  either  in  a brine or in a  शुष्क   पैकिंग  ;  the  result  is  fresh bacon  (  also known as green  बेकन  ) .
Fresh bacon may then be further dried for weeks or months  in  cold  एयर   ,  or  it  may  be  boiled or smoked .
Fresh and  सूखी   बेकन  is typically cooked before eating .
Boiled bacon  is   तैयार  to  खा   ,   as   is  some smoked bacon , but may be cooked further before eating .
Bacon is  prepared  from several different cuts of meat .
it   is   प्रायः  made from side and back  कटौती   of   पोर्क  , except  in   the  United States  ,  where  it   is  almost always prepared  इससे  pork  पेट  ( typically referred to  as  `` streaky '' , `` fatty  ''   ,  or `` American style '' outside of  the  US  और  Canada ) .
The side  काटें   रै   अधिक  meat and less  मोटे   than   the   पेट   .
Bacon may be  prepared   इससे   either  of  दो   पृथक  back cuts : fatback , which is almost pure  मोटे   ,   और  pork loin ,  जिससे  is very  झुकना  .
Bacon-cured  पोर्क  loin is known as back  बेकन   .
Uncooked pork belly bacon strips  .
Bacon may be eaten smoked , boiled , fried  ,  baked , or grilled , or used as a minor  संघटक   to  flavor dishes  .
Bacon is also  प्रयुक्त  for barding and larding roasts , especially game , e.g  .   venison  , pheasant .
the   शब्द  is derived  इससे   the  Old High  जर्मनी   bacho  , meaning  ``  buttock '' ,  ``  ham  ''  or `` side of bacon ''  ,  and cognate with the  बूढ़ा  French  बेकन   .
In continental Europe , this part of  the   सुअर   is  usually not  स्मोक्ड  like  बेकन  is  in  the United States  ;  it is  प्रयुक्त   primarily  in cubes  (  lardons ) as a cooking ingredient , valued both as a source  of  fat and for its  स्वाद  .
In  इटली   ,   इस  is  पुकारा  pancetta  और   is  usually cooked  in  small cubes or served  uncooked  and thinly sliced  as  part of an antipasto  .
मांस  from other animals  ,   ऐसे   as  beef , lamb , chicken  ,   बकरी  , or turkey  ,  may  भी  be cut  ,  cured  ,   or   वरना  prepared to resemble bacon , and may  भी  be referred to as  ``  bacon  ''  .
Such  उपयोग  is common in areas with  significant  Jewish  और  Muslim populations  .
The USDA defines  बेकन  as  ``  the cured belly of  a  swine  carcass   ''   ;  other cuts  और  characteristics  जरूर  be separately  योग्य  ( e.g. , `` smoked pork  loin   बेकन   ''  ) .
For safety , bacon  जरूर  be treated to prevent trichinosis , caused  by  Trichinella , a parasitic roundworm which can be destroyed by heating , freezing , drying , or smoking  .
Bacon is distinguished  इससे  salt pork and ham by differences  in  the brine (  or  dry packing )  .
Bacon brine  रै   added  curing ingredients  ,  most notably  सोडियम   नाइट्राइट  ,  और   occasionally  sodium nitrate or potassium  नाइट्रेट  (  साल्टपीटर  ) ; sodium ascorbate or erythorbate are added to  accelerate  curing and stabilize color .
Flavorings such as brown sugar  or  maple  हैं  used for some products  .
If used  ,  sodium  polyphosphates  are  added  to  improve  sliceability and reduce  spattering  when the bacon is pan  fried   .
Today , a brine  लिये  ham ,  लकिन   नहीं  bacon , includes  a   विशाल  amount of sugar  .
Historically  ,   ``   हैम  '' and `` bacon '' referred  to  different cuts of meat that were brined or  packed  identically , often together in the same barrel .
The  कर्मचारी  Retirement Income  सुरक्षा  Act of 1974 ( ERISA ) ( ,  संहिताबद्ध  in part  at  ) is  a  federal  विधि  which  establishes  minimum standards  लिये  pension plans  in  private industry and provides for extensive rules on  the  federal income tax effects of  ट्रांजेक्शन   संबद्ध  with  कर्मचारी   लाभ  plans .
ERISA was enacted to protect the interests  of  employee benefit  योजना   भागीदार  and their beneficiaries by:
Requiring  the  disclosure of  वित्तीय  and  अन्य  information concerning  the  plan  to   beneficiaries  ;
Establishing standards  of  conduct for plan fiduciaries  ;
Providing  लिये  appropriate  remedies  and access to  the  federal courts .
ERISA is sometimes used to refer to the full  देह  of laws regulating  कर्मचारी  benefit plans  ,  which are found  मुख्यतः  in the Internal Revenue Code  और  ERISA itself  .
Responsibility for  the  interpretation  और  enforcement of  erisa  is divided among the Department of Labor , the Department of the Treasury ( particularly the Internal Revenue Service )  ,   और  the  पेंशन  Benefit Guaranty Corporation  .
Illegal immigration to the  संयुक्त   राज्य  is the act of foreign  नागरिकों  entering  the  United States  ,  without government permission  और  in violation of United States  राष्ट्रीयता   विधि   ,  or staying  परे  the  termination  date of a  वीज़ा  , also in violation  of  the law .
a  warning  चिह्न  at the international boundary  between   the  United States  और  Canada  in  Point  रॉबर्ट्स  , Washington .
a   much  different  दृष्टिकोण  at  the   u.s.-mexico   किनारा  near El Paso , Texas
the  undocumented  अप्रवासी  population  of   the  United States  in  2008  थी  estimated  by  the Center  लिये   आव्रजन   अध्ययन  to  be  about 11 million people , down from 12.5 million people  in  2007 .
Other estimates range from 7  to   20  million  .
according  to a 2005 Pew  हिस्पैनिक  Center report  ,   56   %  of undocumented immigrants  यहूद   इससे  Mexico ; 22  %   यहूद  from  अन्य  Latin American countries ; 13  %   यहूद  from Asia ; 6 %  यहूद  from Europe and Canada ; and  3   %  were  इससे  Africa  और  the rest of the  संसार  .
Alvin Independent School  ज़िला   is  a school district based in Alvin  ,   टेक्सास  ( USA  )  .
Alvin ISD  is   a  large  suburban  school district south of Houston in the communities of Alvin  ,  Manvel ,  pearland  ,  hillcrest  , Rosharon ,  आयोवा  Colony , Liverpool  ,   और  Amsterdam .
AISD  serves  Pearland city 's  rapidly  growing western  portion  of the city including the  नई   विशाल  master-planned communities of  छाया  Creek Ranch  ,  South Fork  ,  and Southern  trails   .
