In human  anatomy   ,  the ulnar nerve  is  a nerve  जिससे   रनों  near the ulna  अस्थि  .
the  ulnar  collateral  ligament of  कोहनी  joint is in relation with  the  ulnar nerve .
The nerve  is  the largest unprotected nerve in  the   इंसान   देह   (  meaning unprotected by muscle  or  bone ) , so  चोट  is common .
इस   तंत्रिका   is   सीधे   कनेक्ट  to  the  little finger  ,  and  the   सटा  half of the ring  उंगली  , supplying the palmar  पक्ष   of   ये  fingers , including both front and back of the tips ,  शायद  as far back as the  fingernail  beds .
One  विधि  of injuring  the  nerve  is   to   स्ट्राइक  the medial  epicondyle  of the humerus from  posteriorly  , or inferiorly with  the  elbow  flexed  .
The  ulnar  nerve is trapped between the bone and the overlying skin at  इस  point .
इस   is   commonly  referred to  as  bumping one 's `` funny  अस्थि   ''  .
This  नाम  is thought to be a pun  ,   आधारित   on  the sound resemblance between the name  of   the   अस्थि   of  the upper arm  ,  the `` humerus  ``  and the word `` humorous  ``   .
Alternatively , according  to  the  ऑक्सफोर्ड  English  शब्दकोष   it  may  refer  to `` the peculiar  सनसनी  experienced when  it  is struck '' .
हॉग्वार्ट्स  School of Witchcraft and Wizardry  ,  shortened Hogwarts , is a fictional  अंग्रेजों   स्कूल  of magic  लिये  students  aged   ग्यारह  to  अठारह   ,  and is  the   प्राथमिक  setting for  the  first  छह  books in  j.K.  Rowling 's  हैरी  Potter  श्रेणी   .
Rowling has suggested that she  may  have inadvertently taken the name from the  hogwort  plant  (  Croton capitatus  )  , which she had  देखी  at Kew Gardens  कुछ  time  पहले  writing the series , although the names `` The Hogwarts '' and ``  hoggwart  ''  appear   in  the 1954 Nigel  molesworth  book How To Be  topp  by  geoffrey  Willans .
Hogwarts school was voted as  the  36th best  स्कॉटिश  educational  स्थापना  in a 2008  ऑनलाइन  ranking ,  outranking  Edinburgh 's Loretto  स्कूल   .
According to  a   निदेशक  of  the   स्वतंत्र  Schools Network Rankings  ,  it  थी  added  to   the   स्कूलों  listing  ``  for  मजा  '' and was then  voted  on  .
The U.S. subprime mortgage crisis was a set of  कार्यक्रम   और   शर्तें   कि   led  to  a  financial crisis and subsequent recession  कि  began  in  2008 .
It  थी  characterized by  a   वृद्धि  in  subprime  mortgage  delinquencies   और  foreclosures  ,  and the resulting decline  of   प्रतिभूति  backed  by  said mortgages  .
अनेक  major financial institutions  collapsed  in September 2008 , with significant  disruption  in the  प्रवाह  of  क्रेडिट  to  व्यवसायों  and  उपभोक्ता  and the onset of a severe global recession  .
वहीँ  were  अनेक  causes of the  संकट  , with  टीकाकारों   assigning  different levels of blame to financial institutions , regulators  ,  credit agencies  ,  government housing policies  ,  and  उपभोक्ता   ,  among others .
A proximate  कारण   थी  the rise in  subprime  lending .
The percentage  of  lower-quality subprime  mortgages  originated  दौरान  a  दिए  year  रोज़   इससे  the historical  8   %   or  lower range to approximately 20 %  इससे   2004  to 2006 , with  much  higher  ratios  in some  भाग   of  the U.S  .
a  high  प्रतिशत   of  these subprime mortgages  ,   over   90  % in 2006 for example , were adjustable-rate  mortgages   .
These two changes were part of a broader trend  of  lowered  lending  standards  और   higher-risk  mortgage products .
further  , U.S. households had become increasingly  ऋणी  , with the  अनुपात  of debt to disposable personal income  उठती  from 77  %  in  1990  to  127   %  at the end  of  2007  ,  much of this increase mortgage-related .
जब  U.S.  घर  prices declined  steeply  after peaking  in   mid-2006  , borrowers ' ability to refinance their loans  became  more difficult .
as  adjustable-rate mortgages began  to  reset at higher interest rates (  causing  higher monthly payments ) , mortgage delinquencies soared .
Securities backed  साथ  mortgages  ,   सहित  subprime mortgages ,  widely  held  by   वित्तीय  firms globally  ,  lost most of their value  .
Global  निवेशकों  also drastically reduced purchases  of  mortgage-backed debt and other securities as  भाग  of a decline in the  क्षमता   और  willingness of  the   निजी  financial system to support lending .
Concerns about  the   soundness  of U.S.  क्रेडिट  and financial  बाज़ार  led to tightening  क्रेडिट  around the world and  slowing   आर्थिक  growth  in  the U.S. and  यूरोपीय  .
The crisis  था   कठोर  , long-lasting consequences for the U.S. and European economies .
The U.S. entered a  गहन  recession ,  साथ   nearly   9  million  कार्य   खोया  during 2008 and  2009  , roughly  6  % of the workforce .
U.S. housing prices  गिरी   nearly  30 %  on  average and the U.S. stock market fell approximately 50  %  by  जल्दी  2009 .
as  of early 2013 , the U.S. stock market had  बरामद   to  its pre-crisis  शिखर  but housing  कीमतें  remained near  उनके  low point  और  unemployment remained  elevated  .
आर्थिक  growth remained below pre-crisis levels .
यूरोपीय   भी  continued to  संघर्ष   साथ  its own  आर्थिक  crisis .
कार्ल   जंग   in  1910 .
Myers  और  Briggs extrapolated their  mbti  theory from  जंग   's   कृतियाँ   in  his book Psychological  प्रकार   .
The Myers-Briggs Type Indicator  (   mbti  ) assessment is a psychometric questionnaire designed  to  measure psychological preferences in  कैसा  people  perceive  the  संसार  and  मेक  decisions .
ये  preferences were extrapolated from  the   typological  theories proposed by Carl Gustav  जंग   और   पहला  published  in  his  1921  book Psychological  प्रकार   (  English  संस्करण  , 1923  )  .
जंग  theorized that there are  चार  principal psychological functions  by  which we experience  the  world : sensation , intuition , feeling , and  सोच   .
One  of   ये  four functions is dominant most of the time .
The original developers of the  व्यक्तित्व   inventory  were Katharine Cook Briggs and her daughter  ,   इसाबेल  Briggs Myers  ;  these  दो   ,  having studied  extensively   the  work  of  Jung , turned  उनके   ब्याज  of human behavior  into  a devotion  of   turning  the theory of psychological types to  व्यावहारिक  use .
They began  बनाना  the  indicator   दौरान  World War  ii  , believing  कि  a knowledge of personality  वरीयताओं  would help women who were entering the industrial  workforce  for the first time to  पहचानो  the  sort  of war-time  कार्य  that would be  ``  most comfortable and effective '' .
The  आरंभिक  questionnaire grew into the  myers-briggs  Type Indicator ,  जिससे  was  पहला   प्रकाशित  in  1962  .
The MBTI focuses on normal populations and emphasizes the value of naturally occurring  मतभेद  .
Robert Kaplan and Dennis Saccuzzo  मानना  `` the underlying assumption of the MBTI is  कि  we  सब  have specific preferences in the way we construe our experiences , and these preferences underlie  हमारी  interests  ,   needs   ,  values , and motivation ''  (  p. 499 )  .
``  Judas '' is a song by American recording artist Lady Gaga ,  इससे  her  दूसरी  studio album Born This  रास्ता  ( 2011 )  .
It  थी  released by  interscope  Records on April 15 , 2011 ,  चार  days ahead of its  अनुसूचित   रिलीज  .
लिखा  and produced by Lady Gaga and RedOne ,  ``  Judas  ''  is a  नृत्य  and  इलेक्ट्रो  house  सोंग  about a woman  in  love with  a  man who betrayed  उसके   .
It  embodies   the  incidents that have haunted Gaga in  the  past ,  और  its  कोर  meaning  refers   to  the negative  भाग   of  her  जीवन   कि   वो  ca  n't  escape .
गागा  has further  समझाया  that the song was also about  honoring  one  's   भीतरी  darkness in  अनुक्रम  to  लाओ  oneself  into  the  लाइट  .
The  कलाकृति   लिये   the  single was  designed  by  गागा  in Microsoft Word .
in  spite of a polarizing  प्रभाव   on  several religious groups , the song was  generally  well  प्राप्त   by   आलोचकों  , who  likened  the song to `` Bad Romance ``  साथ   कुछ  noting it should have been the album 's lead single .
The song has a similar sound to Gaga 's previous RedOne-produced tracks , including `` Poker  फेस  `` , `` LoveGame ``  ,  `` Bad  रोमांस   ''  , and `` Alejandro ``  .
It contains three distinct  hooks   और  a house -influenced break down  .
गागा  explained  कि  the lines  बोला  during the  विश्लेषण  talk  परिचय   उसके   as  beyond  मोचन  ,  regarding  the traditional views of what  a   स्त्री  should be .
``  यहूदा   ''   initially   था  a strong sales opening , but was less  कामयाब   commercially  in comparison  to  Gaga 's  पिछला  singles .
The song reached the top ten of  the  charts  in  most major music markets , and  भी   पहुँचे  the top of  the   चार्ट  in  दक्षिण   कोरियाई  .
A music video for  the   सोंग   थी  filmed  in   अप्रैल  2011  ,   co-directed  by Gaga and Laurieann Gibson and co-starring  नॉर्मन   reedus   .
it  has a Biblical storyline where  reedus  played Judas  इस्कैरियट  and Gaga  निभाई  Mary Magdalene .
The video portrays  उन्हें  as modern  दिन  missionaries  going  to Jerusalem .
It included the Biblical story  of  Judas  betraying  Jesus  ,  and ended with Gaga as  magdalene   getting  stoned to death  .
पहले  its  रिलीज   ,  the Catholic League condemned Gaga for the alleged use of religious imagery  और  her  भूमिका  in the video .
However , critics generally praised the video  ,  not  ढूंढना  any  अप्रिय  content .
the  video was nominated  लिये  two awards  at  the 2011 MTV Video Music Awards .
Gaga has performed  ``  Judas '' on a number of  टेलीविज़न  shows , including The Graham Norton  दिखाएँ  , Saturday Night Live  ,  Good Morning  americas  `` Summer  कॉन्सर्ट   श्रेणी  ''  ,   the  French  x   फ़ैक्टर  as well  as  on The Ellen DeGeneres Show .
Marvin Gaye  (   अप्रैल  2  ,  1939April  1  , 1984 ) , born Marvin  pentz  Gay ,  jr.   ,  was  an  American  singer-songwriter  and musician .
gaye   helped  to shape the sound of  motown   रिकॉर्ड   in   the   1960s  with a string of  हिट्स  including `` How  मीठी  It  is  ( To  be  Loved By You ) `` and `` I Heard  it  Through the  grapevine  `` and duet recordings  साथ  Mary Wells and Tammi Terrell ,  बाद  earning  the  titles  ``  Prince of Motown ''  और  ``  प्रिंस  of Soul '' .
During the 1970s , Gaye recorded the concept  एल्बम   कया   's  Going  on  and Let 's  मिलेंगी   it   on  and  became  among the  पहला  artists  in  Motown to  ब्रेक   दूर   इससे  the  बागडोर  of its  उत्पादन   कम्पनी   .
Gaye 's  बाद  recordings influenced  अनेक  R & B subgenres such as quiet storm  और  neo-soul  .
following  a period  in   यूरोपीय  under  a  tax exile in the  जल्दी  1980s  ,  Gaye released the 1982  ग्रैमी   award-winning  hit `` Sexual  healing  `` and the Midnight  प्रेम  album .
Since his death  in   1984  , Gaye has been  मरणोपरांत  honored by  अनेक  institutions , including the  ग्रैमी  Lifetime Achievement  पुरस्कार  and  the  Rock and  फेंकें  Hall of  कीर्ति  .
the   अकादमी   पुरस्कार   लिये  Best  चित्र  is  एक  of the  अकादमी  Awards of Merit  प्रस्तुत   annually   by  the Academy  of  Motion Picture  कला  and  sciences   (   ampas  )  to   निर्माता  working in the motion picture industry and is the only category  in  which every member is  योग्य  to  मनोनीत  for .
Best  चित्र  is considered the  सबसे  important  of  the Academy Awards , as  it  represents all  the  directing , acting  ,  music  composing  , writing  ,  editing and other efforts  put  forth  into  a  फिल्मी  .
Consequently , Best Picture is  the  final  पुरस्कार  and the conclusion of the  सालाना  Academy Awards ceremony .
the   ग्रैंड  Staircase columns  at  the Dolby  थिएटर  in Los Angeles  ,   जहाँ   the  Academy  पुरस्कार  ceremonies  have  been held since  2002   ,   शोकेस  every film  कि  has won  the  Best  चित्र   शीर्षक  since the  पुरस्कार   's  inception 85  सालो   पहले  .
भारी   बरसात  is  an  interactive drama action-adventure video game created by French developer Quantic Dream exclusively  लिये  the  प्लेस्टेशन  3 .
The game is written  और   निर्देशित  by Quantic Dream 's founder and  सीईओ  David Cage .
Heavy Rains story  is  a  नाटकीय  thriller modelled  बाद  film noir , featuring four  protagonists  involved with the  रहस्य   of  the Origami Killer  ,   a  serial  कातिल  who  उपयोग  extended periods  of   वर्षा   to  drown his victims .
Ethan Mars  is   trying  to save his  बेटे  from being the next  शिकार  , while  investigative  journalist Madison Paige ,  एफबीआई  profiler  नॉर्मन  Jayden  ,  and private detective Scott Shelby are  प्रत्येक  trying to track  bas  clues  to   the  Origami  कातिल  's identity .
The player interacts  साथ  the game by  performing   क्रियाएँ  highlighted on screen related to motions on the  नियंत्रक  , and in some  मामले  , performing a series of quick time events  दौरान  fast-paced action sequences .
The player 's decisions and actions during the game  होगा   affect  the narrative .
The main  वर्ण   can   be   मारे  , and certain actions may lead  to   अलग  scenes and endings .
A playable demo was released on 11  फ़रवरी  2010  .
The demo  थी   released  prior to this  तिथि  for people who took part  in  a Four Day Challenge  on  5 February 2010 .
a  patch to allow use  of  the PlayStation Move controller to  खेल  the game  थी  released  in  September 2010 .
Heavy Rain  थी   critically  acclaimed and has sold over  दो  million copies .
It won 2010 's Game of  the  Year from  सीएनएन  and  गेमिंग   संघ  , and  बेहतरीन  PS3 Game of 2010 by  gamespy  and IGN .

In 2010  ,  the game was included in  the   किताब   1001  Video  खेल  You Must Play Before You Die .
कुल  superannuation  उद्योग   देनदारी  : members funds  और  reserves  (  A $ millions  )  since  1988  .
Annual total superannuation  उद्योग  asset  विकास   1996-2005  .
superannuation  in Australia refers  to  the arrangements which people make in Australia to  have   निधि  available for them in retirement .
In Australia , superannuation  इंतजाम   हैं  government-supported  और   प्रोत्साहित  , and  न्यूनतम  provisions are compulsory for employees .
For example , employers  हैं  required to pay a proportion  of  an employee 's salaries  और   मजदूरी  ( currently 9 %  )  into a superannuation fund ,  लकिन  people are encouraged to put aside  अतिरिक्त  funds  into  superannuation .
The minimum obligation  जरूरी   by  employers  is  set  to  increase to 12 % gradually stepping  annually  from 2013 to  2020  .
An individual can  withdraw   निधि  out of  a   superannuation  fund  जब  the person meets  एक  of the conditions of release contained in  अनुसूची  1  of  the Superannuation  उद्योग  (  पर्यवेक्षण  )  regulations   1994  .

चुनावी  College map  प्रर्दशित   the  results  of   the   2012  U.S.  अध्यक्षीय  election .
अध्यक्ष  Barack Obama  (  D  -   il  )  जीती  the popular vote in  26  states and the District  of   कोलंबिया  (  denoted   in  blue  )  to capture 332  चुनावी  votes .
Former  राज्यपाल   mitt  Romney ( R -  ma  ) won  the  popular vote  in  24  राज्य  ( denoted in  रेड  ) to capture  206  electoral votes .
Cartogram representation of the  चुनावी   कॉलेज  vote for the 2012 election  ,   साथ  each square representing one electoral  vote  .
The United States Electoral  कॉलेज  is  the  institution that officially elects the  अध्यक्ष  and Vice President  of  the United States every four years .
The President  और  Vice President are not elected directly by  the   मतदाता  .
बजाय  , they are  निर्वाचित   by  ``  निर्वाचक  '' who are chosen by popular vote  on  a state-by-state  आधार   .
निर्वाचक   हैं   apportioned   to  each state and the District of Columbia ,  लकिन   नहीं  to  territorial   possessions  of the United States , such  as   प्यूर्टो  Rico and Guam .
The number of  निर्वाचक  in each state is  बराबर  to the number of members  of   कॉंग्रेस  to which the state is entitled .
The Twenty-third  amendment  has always resulted in  the  District  of  Columbia  having   तीन  electors .
वहीँ   हैं   538  electors  ,  based on there being  435   प्रतिनिधि  and 100 senators ,  प्लस  the  तीन  electors from  the   ज़िला   of   कोलंबिया  .
निर्वाचक   हैं   pledged   to  particular presidential and vice presidential  उम्मीदवार  , though unpledged  निर्वाचक  are possible .
In all states ,  मगर  Maine and Nebraska , electors  हैं  elected on  a  `` winner-take-all  ''  basis  .
That is , all electors pledged  to  the presidential  प्रत्याशी  who wins the most votes in a  राज्य  become electors for that state  .
Maine and  नेब्रास्का  use  the  ``  congressional   ज़िला  method '' , selecting  एक  elector  भीतर  each congressional district by popular  vote  and  selecting   the  remaining two  निर्वाचक   by  a  राज्यव्यापी  popular  vote  .
Although  no   elector   is  required  by   संघीय  law to  सम्मान   a  pledge  ,  there  have  only been very  few  occasions  जब   an   elector  voted contrary to a  प्रतिज्ञा  .
The Twelfth Amendment specifies how a President and Vice President are elected  और   requires  each elector  to  cast  एक   vote  for  अध्यक्ष  and  another  vote for  वाइस  President .
Critics argue that the Electoral College is  inherently   undemocratic   और  gives  झूले  states disproportionate influence in electing the President and Vice President .
The Electoral  कॉलेज  gives a  न्यूमेरिक   लाभ   in   the  election of the president to the  छोटी   राज्य  , as  the   न्यूनतम  number  of  electors for the small states is three compared to one for the election of representatives .
On the other hand , the winner-take-all  विधि  of voting favors the larger states .
A number  of  constitutional amendments have been proposed seeking  to   alter  the Electoral College  or  replace  it  with a direct  लोकप्रिय  vote .
Barack Hussein Obama  ii   (  ; born August 4 , 1961 )  is  the 44th  और  current  अध्यक्ष  of the United States  ,  the first African American  to  hold the office .
born   in  Honolulu  ,  Hawaii  ,   ओबामा  is  a   ग्रैजुएट  of Columbia  विश्वविद्यालयों  and  हार्वर्ड   विधि  School  ,  where  he  was president of  the   हार्वर्ड   विधि  Review .
He was  a  community  आयोजक   in  Chicago before earning his law  उपाधि   .
he   worked   as   a   सिविल  rights  attorney  in  शिकागो  and taught  संवैधानिक  law at the University of  शिकागो   विधि   स्कूल  from 1992  to  2004  .
He served  तीन  terms representing the 13th District  in  the Illinois Senate  इससे  1997 to 2004 , running unsuccessfully for  the  United States House of Representatives in 2000  .
In  2004  , Obama received national attention during  उसके   अभियान  to  represent   इलिनोइस   in  the United States  सीनेट  with  उसके  victory in  the   कूच   लोकतांत्रिक   पार्टी  primary  ,   उसके   keynote  address at the Democratic  नेशनल  Convention  in   जुलाई  , and his election to the Senate in November .
he  began  उसके   अध्यक्षीय  campaign in  2007   ,  and in 2008 , after a close  प्राथमिक  campaign against Hillary Rodham Clinton , he won sufficient delegates  in   the  Democratic Party primaries to receive the presidential nomination .
he  then defeated Republican  nominee  John McCain  in  the  सामान्य  election  ,  and  थी  inaugurated as president  on   जनवरी  20 , 2009  .
नौ   महीने  later , Obama  थी  named the  2009  Nobel Peace Prize laureate .
He  थी  re-elected president in November 2012 , defeating Republican nominee Mitt Romney , and was sworn in for a  दूसरी  term on  जनवरी  20  ,  2013  .
Early in his first term in office ,  ओबामा  signed into law economic  stimulus   विधान  in response to the  ग्रेट  Recession in  the  form of the  अमरीकी  Recovery  और  Reinvestment Act of  2009  and  the  Tax Relief , Unemployment  बीमे  Reauthorization , and Job Creation Act of 2010  .
Other major domestic initiatives in his presidency include the  रोगी   सुरक्षा   और  Affordable  परवाह  Act , often  referred  to as ``  obamacare   ''   ;   the   dodd–frank  Wall  गली  Reform and  उपभोक्ता   सुरक्षा   अधिनियम  ; the  do  n't  पूछो   ,  Do n't Tell  repeal  Act of 2010 ; the  बजट  Control Act of  2011  ;  और  the American Taxpayer Relief  अधिनियम   of   2012  .
in  May 2012 ,  he  became the  पहला  sitting U.S.  अध्यक्ष  to  सरेआम  support same-sex marriage and in  2013  his  प्रशासन   दायर  briefs which urged the  परम्  Court to rule in favor  of  same-sex couples in two high-profile cases .
In foreign policy , Obama ended  u.S.  military involvement in the Iraq  युद्ध  ,  increased  troop levels in Afghanistan , signed  the  New START arms control  सन्धि  with Russia ,  ordered   u.S.  military involvement in  लीबिया  , and  ordered  the military operation  कि  resulted  in  the death of Osama  बिन   लादेन   .
The Honda CBR1100XX Super Blackbird  थी  a Honda motorcycle  बना  from  1996  to 2007 .
the  bike was  विकसित  to challenge  the   कावासाकी  Ninja ZX-11 as the world 's  तीव्रतम   उत्पादन  motorcycle , and Honda succeeded with a  शीर्ष  speed  of   .
Two years  बाद   the  title passed  to   the   suzuki  Hayabusa ,  जिससे  reached  .
The Blackbird is named after  the  Lockheed SR-71 ,  भी  a  गति  record holder .

An electronic  स्वास्थ्य  record ( EHR )  is  an evolving concept defined  as   a  systematic collection of  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  health  सूचना  about  व्यक्तिगत  patients or populations  .
it  is  a  record in  डिजिटल  format that is theoretically capable of being shared  आरपार  different health care  जमावट   .
In some cases  इस  sharing can occur  by  way of  network-connected  enterprise-wide information  प्रणालियों   और  other  सूचना  networks or exchanges  .
EHRs  may   शामिल  a range  of  data  ,  including demographics , medical  इतिहास  , medication  और   allergies   ,   immunization   औकात  , laboratory test results , radiology images ,  vital   लक्षण   ,  personal stats like age and weight ,  और   बिलिंग  information .

The  rime  of the Ancient Mariner (  originally   the  Rime of the  ancyent  Marinere ) is  the  longest major  कविता  by the  अंग्रेज़ी  poet Samuel  टेलर  Coleridge , written  in  1797–98  और   प्रकाशित  in 1798 in the first edition of Lyrical  ballads   .
आधुनिक   संस्करण  use a  बाद   संशोधित   संस्करण  printed  in  1817 that  प्रदर्शित   a  gloss .
Along  साथ   अन्य  poems  in  Lyrical  ballads  , it was  a  signal shift to modern poetry and the beginning of  अंग्रेजों  Romantic literature  .
A proxy  auto-config   (  PAC  )  file defines how web browsers and other  उपयोक्ता  agents can  automatically  choose the appropriate proxy  सर्वर  ( access method ) for fetching a given URL  .
A  pac  file contains a JavaScript function “FindProxyForURL  (  url , host ) ”  .
This  फलन   रिटर्न  a string with  एक  or more access method  विशेषताएँ   .
These specifications cause the user agent to  उपयोग  a particular proxy server or  to  connect  सीधे  .
अनेक  specifications provide a fall-back  जब  a  प्रॉक्सी   fails  to  respond  .
The  ब्राउजर  fetches this PAC file  पहले  requesting other URLs .
the  URL of  the   pac  file is  either   विन्यस्त   हस्तचालित  or  संकल्पित  automatically by the Web Proxy  autodiscovery  Protocol  .
Zendaya Coleman  (  born September 1 ,  1996  ) , known mononymously as Zendaya , is  an  American actress , singer  और  dancer  .
she stars  on  the Disney Channel sitcom Shake It  up  as Rocky  ब्लू  .
She  रै   स्ट्रक्चर  in two films and played one of  the  lead roles in the film Frenemies  as  Halley  ब्रैंडन   .
She voiced Fern  in  the Pixie Hollow Games .
She  appeared  in  शुभ   लक  Charlie as Rocky  ब्लू  and in a Good Luck  चार्ली   और   शेक  It  up  crossover title Charlie Shake  it   up  .
She appeared on PrankStars as herself  in  the episode `` Walk  the   शरारत   ''  and on A.N.T  .   फार्म  as Sequoia Jones in the episode `` Creative ConsultANT  .  ''
Zendaya is also  a   संगीतकार   .
She  हस्ताक्षरित  a deal  साथ  Hollywood  रिकॉर्ड  on August 8  ,  2012 and  प्रारंभ   रिकॉर्डिंग   गीतों  for her  डेब्यू  album  on  August 12 ,  2012  .
She released  a  single  इससे   an  independent label  पुकारा  `` Swag It Out  ``  and another  सिंगल   साथ  Bella Thorne  पुकारा   ``  Watch Me , '' which  is   प्रदर्शित   on  the Break It  bas  album .
On March  20  , 2012  ,   zendaya  and Bella Thorne  released   an  album together called  शेक  It Up  :  Live  2   नृत्य  , each have  उनके   अपना  song on  it  ,  साथ  with a  mash-up  of  दोनो  songs  साथ  as one .
On August 21 , 2012 , Zendaya  और   बेला  Thorne released an EP called  शेक  It Up : Made In  जापानी   .
zendaya  has  a  Christmas song called  ``   शेक   सांता  Shake , '' which  is  on  the   डिज़्नी   चैनल  Holiday Playlist CD , which  थी  released  on   अक्तूबर   2   ,  2012 .
On March 5 , 2013  the  third  शेक   it   up   साउंडट्रैक  was released , entitled I < 3 Dance ;  on  it , Zendaya has  दो   गीतों   साथ  Bella - `` Contagious  प्रेम  '' and `` This Is My Dance  मंजिल  '' - as  खूब  as  एक  solo song , `` Beat of My Drum . ''
This is  a   सूची   of  airports in Pennsylvania ( a U.S.  राज्य  ) , grouped by type  और  sorted by  स्थान  .
it  contains  सब  public-use and military airports in the  राज्य  .
Some private-use and former  एयरपोर्ट  may be included where notable  ,  such as airports that were previously  public-use  , those with commercial enplanements recorded  by  the FAA or airports assigned an IATA  विमानक्षेत्र  code  .
iOS (  previously   iphone  OS ) is a  मोबाईल  operating system  विकसित  and distributed by  ठहराना   inc  . Originally released in  2007   लिये  the iPhone and iPod Touch platforms  ,  it  रै  been  विस्तारित   to  support  अन्य   ठहराना   डिवाइस  such  as   the  iPad  और  Apple TV .
Unlike Microsoft  's  Windows Phone and Google 's Android , Apple  करता   नहीं   अनुज्ञा   आईओएस   लिये   संस्थापना  on non-Apple  हार्डवेयर   .
,  Apple 's  app  Store  contained  more than  700,000  iOS applications ,  जिससे  have collectively  महरूम  downloaded more than 30 billion times .
It  था   a  21 % share of the smartphone mobile  ऑपरेटिंग  system units  shipped   in  the fourth quarter  of  2012  ,  behind only Google 's Android  .
In June 2012  ,   it  accounted  लिये  65 % of  मोबाईल   वेब   आंकड़ा   खपत   (   सहित  use on  दोनो   the  iPod Touch and  the  iPad ) .
At  the   हाफ  of 2012  ,  there were 410 million devices  activated   .
According  to   the  special media event held  by  Apple on September 12 , 2012  ,   400  million devices have been sold  through  June 2012 .
The  उपयोक्ता  interface of iOS  is   आधारित  on  the   अवधारणा  of direct  हेरफेर  , using  multi-touch   इशारों  .
इंटरफ़ेस  control elements consist  of  sliders , switches ,  और   बटन  .
Interaction with the OS  शामिल  gestures such as swipe  ,  tap  ,  pinch ,  और  reverse  पिंच  , all of which have specific definitions within  the  context of the  आईओएस   ऑपरेटिंग  system and its multi-touch interface  .
आतंरिक   accelerometers  are used  by  some applications  to  respond  to  shaking the device ( one  आम  result  is  the undo command  )  or rotating it in three dimensions ( one common result is switching from portrait to landscape mode  )  .
आईओएस  is derived from OS X ,  साथ   जिससे   it  shares the Darwin  न्यास  .
iOS is Apple  's  mobile version  of   the   os  X  ऑपरेटिंग  system  प्रयुक्त  on Apple computers  .
in  iOS , there  हैं  four abstraction  परतों  : the Core OS layer ,  the  Core Services layer  ,  the Media  परत   ,  and  the  Cocoa  टच  layer  .
the  current  संस्करण  of the  ऑपरेटिंग   प्रणाली   (  iOS 6.1.3  )   dedicates  1-1.5 GB  of  the device 's flash memory for  the   प्रणाली   विभाजन   ,   using   roughly   800  MB  of  that partition  (   varying  by model )  लिये  iOS itself .
आईओएस   फिलहाल  runs on iPhone  ,   ipad   ,  iPod touch and Apple TV  .
The  plymouth  Superbird  is  famous for  इसके  extremely high  पश्च  wing .
1987 Audi  खेल   quattros1  with  इसके  large wings at Pikes Peak
A spoiler  is   an  automotive aerodynamic device whose intended  डिज़ाइन  function is  to  'spoil ' unfavorable  एयर  movement  आरपार  a body  of  a vehicle in  गति  , usually described as turbulence  or  drag  .
विघ्न   on  the front  of  a vehicle are often called  एयर   dams   ,  because in addition to  directing   एयर  flow they also  reduce   the   राशि  of  एयर   बहती  underneath  the  vehicle which  generally   reduces   aerodynamic  lift and drag  .
Spoilers are  प्रायः  fitted to  रेस  and high-performance  खेल  cars  ,  although  वे  have  become  common on  यात्री  vehicles as well  .
Some  विघ्न  are added  to  cars primarily for  स्टाइलिंग   उद्देश्य  and  have  either little aerodynamic benefit  or  even make the aerodynamics  बदतर  .
Spoilers for cars are  प्रायः  incorrectly  उलझन  with ,  or  the term used  interchangeably  with  ,  wings  .
Automotive  विंग्स  are devices whose  intended   डिज़ाइन  is  to  generate downforce  as  air  गुजरता  around them  ,   नहीं  simply disrupt  मौजूदा   airflow  patterns .
Mario , who serves  as   निन्टेंडो   's  mascot , is a  fictional  character created by game designer Shigeru  miyamoto   और  voiced by Charles Martinet  .
This is a list of video games where the  अक्षर  Mario plays  a  part , either  as  the  समर्थक  , antagonist  ,  supporting character , as  भाग  of an ensemble  डाल  , as a cameo ,  or   in  a game  भीतर   a   खेल  .
it  does not include simple  सन्दर्भ   to  the character , such as the portraits  of  Mario found in  the  Legend of Zelda :  a  Link to the  पास्ट  .
The year indicated  is  the year the  खेल   थी  first released  ,   सबसे   commonly   in  Japan ; games were sometimes released years later  in   अन्य  regions of  the  world .
the   सूची  includes  पोर्ट   ,   remakes   और   compilations   .
It does n't include any Virtual  कंसोल  re-releases .
``  Man  of  Constant  विषाद  ''  (  also known as `` I Am A Man  of   निरंतर  Sorrow '' ) is a traditional American  लोक  song  पहला  recorded  by  Dick Burnett ,  a  partially blind  fiddler  from Kentucky  .
The song was  originally   अंकित   by  Burnett as  ``  Farewell Song '' printed in a  रिचर्ड  Burnett songbook  ,   circa  1913 .
An early version was  अंकित   by   emry   आर्थर  in 1928 ( Vocalion Vo 5208 )  .
पब्लिक  interest in the song  थी   नवीनीकृत  after the release  of  the 2000 film  o  Brother , Where Art  thou   ?
,   as  it  plays   a  central  भूमिका  in  the   फिल्मी  's plot  .
The song was also included in  the  film  's  highly successful  ,   multiple-platinum  selling  साउंडट्रैक  .
Josephson junction  सरणी  chip developed by the National Bureau of Standards  as   a   मानक  volt
the  volt ( symbol :  v  ) is the SI derived unit  लिये  electric potential ( voltage ) , electric potential difference , and electromotive  फ़ोर्स  .
the  volt  is   नामित   in  honor of the Italian physicist Alessandro Volta ( 1745–1827 ) ,  जो  invented the  वोल्टायिक  pile  ,   संभवतः   the  first  रासायनिक   बैटरी   .
A plaque commemorating the location of  the  Sarajevo assassination and steps  of   gavrilo   princip  ( image taken in 1987 ,  पहले   कदम  were removed  in  1992 and plaque changed  इससे  Cyrillic  to  Latin script )
a   प्लैक   commemorating   the  location of the  साराजेवो  assassination ( image taken  in   2009  )
On 28 June  1914   ,  Archduke  फ्रांज  Ferdinand of Austria , heir presumptive to the Austro-Hungarian throne , and his  बीवी   ,  Sophie , Duchess  of  Hohenberg , were shot dead in Sarajevo ,  by  Gavrilo  princip   ,   एक  of a  समूह  of  छह  Bosnian Serb assassins coordinated  by   डेनियल   ilić  .
The political objective of the assassination was to  ब्रेक  off Austria-Hungary 's south-Slav provinces  so   वे  could be combined into a Greater Serbia  or   a  Yugoslavia  .
The  हत्यारे   '  motives  यहूद  consistent with  the   गति  that later became known as Young Bosnia  .
सर्बियाई  military officers  stood   पीछे  the attack .
at  the top of these Serbian military  षड्यंत्रकारियों   थी   मुख्य   of   सर्बियाई  Military Intelligence Dragutin  dimitrijević   ,  his  righthand  man Major Vojislav Tankosić , and Masterspy  rade   malobabić  .
Major Tankosić armed the  हत्यारे  with bombs  और   pistols  and trained them .
The assassins were given  अभिगम   to   the  same  clandestine  tunnel of safe-houses and agents that Rade  malobabić  used for the infiltration of weapons  और  operatives into Austria-Hungary .
the  assassins  ,  the  कुंजी  members  of  the  clandestine   टनल   ,  and the  कुंजी  Serbian  सैन्य   षड्यंत्रकारियों  who were still  जिंदा  were arrested , tried  ,   convicted  and punished  .
Those  जो   यहूद  arrested  in  Bosnia were tried  in  Sarajevo in  अक्तूबर   1914   .
the  other conspirators were arrested and tried before a  सर्बियाई  kangaroo court on the  french-controlled  Salonika Front in 1916–1917 on unrelated false charges  ;   सर्बिया   चलाया   तीन  of  the  top military conspirators .
Much of what is known  परिचय  the assassinations comes from these two trials and  सम्बन्धित  records .
Assignment of responsibility  लिये  the bombing and murders  of  28 June is highly controversial because the attack led to  the  outbreak of World War I one month later .
Mission  सैन  Juan  capistrano  was a Spanish mission  in   दक्षिणी  California , located  in   present-day  San Juan Capistrano  .
it  was founded on  सब   संतो  ' Day November 1 ,  1776  ,  by   स्पेनी  Catholics of the  franciscan  Order .
Named for Giovanni da Capistrano  ,  a  15th  century  theologian  and  ``   योद्धा   पुजारी   ''   जो   resided  in the Abruzzo  प्रदेश  of  इटली   ,  San  जुआन  Capistrano  रै   the  distinction of being  घर  to the oldest building in California still in  उपयोग  , a chapel built in 1782  .
ज्ञात  alternately as `` Serra 's Chapel  ''  and `` Father Serra 's Church , '' it is the  तभी  extant structure where  it  has been  प्रलेखित   कि  the padre Junipero Serra  मनाये  mass .
एक   of  the best known of the Alta California missions ( and one of the  few   मिशन   to  have actually been founded twice—others being Mission San Gabriel Arcángel and Mission  la  Purísima Concepción  )  .
The site  थी  originally  consecrated  on  अक्तूबर  30 ,  1775  ,  by   पिता  Fermín  lasuén   ,  but was quickly abandoned due to unrest among  the  indigenous  जनसांख्यिकी  in  सैन  Diego .
the  success of  the  settlement  is   evident  in its historical records  .
prior   to  the  आगमन   of  the missionaries  ,   कुछ  550  natives  were scattered  throughout  the  लोकल   क्षेत्रफल  .
by   1790   ,  the  क्रमांक  of converted Christians had grown  to  700 , and  बस  six years later  nearly  1,000 ``  neophytes  ``  (  recent  converts   )   जिया   in  or around  the   मिशन  compound  .
1,649 baptisms  यहूद  conducted  कि  year alone , out  of  the  कुल  4,639  souls  converted between 1776 and  1847  .
More than 2,000  पूर्व  inhabitants ( mostly Juaneño Indians ) are buried  in  unmarked  क़ब्रों   in   the  Mission 's cemetery ( campo  सेंटो  ) .
The remains of  पिता  (  बाद   monsignor  ) St. John O'Sullivan ,  जो   पहचाना   the  property 's  ऐतिहासिक   मान  and  working  tirelessly to  conserve  and rebuild  इसके  structures ,  हैं  buried  at   the  entrance  to  the cemetery  on  the  वेस्ट  side of the property , and a  प्रतिमा  raised  in   उसके  honor stands at  the   सिर   of  the crypt .
The surviving  चैपल  also serves  as  the final resting place of  तीन   पैड्रेस   जो  passed on while  सेवारत  at the Mission :  fathers  José  barona  , Vicente Fustér  ,  and  विसेंट  Pascual Oliva are  सब  entombed  beneath  the sanctuary  मंजिल   .
the  Criolla or  ``  Mission grape , '' was first planted  at  San Juan  capistrano  in  1779  ; in 1783 , the first  वाइन  produced in  alta  California emerged from  the  Mission 's winery .
The  मिशन   डाला   a   long   काल   of   क्रमिक  decline after  secularization  in 1833 .
numerous  efforts were made  over   the  years to restore  the  Mission  to  its former glory , but  none   मिले  with  ग्रेट  success  जबतक  the arrival of Father  o'sullivan  in 1910 .
Restoration efforts continue , and `` Serra 's  चैपल   ''   is  still used for religious services  .
परिचय   half-a-million   विज़िटर   ,  including 80,000 school children , come to the Mission each year .
And while the ruins of `` The  ग्रेट  Stone Church  ''   (  which was all but  leveled  by  an  1812  भूकंप  ) are a renowned  architectural  wonder  ,  the Mission is  शायद  best known  लिये  the annual `` Return of the  दात  ''  जिससे  is traditionally  observed   प्रत्येक  March  19   (  Saint  जोसेफ  's  दिन  ) .
Mission San Juan  capistrano  has  परोसा  as  a   पसंदीदा   विषय  for  अनेक  notable artists  ,   और  has been  immortalized   in  literature and on film numerous times , perhaps  अधिक   than  any other mission .
in  1984 , a modern church complex was constructed just north and west of the  मिशन  compound  और  is  अभी   ज्ञात  as Mission Basilica San Juan Capistrano  .
आज  , the  मिशन  compound serves as  a  museum , with the Serra  चैपल  within the  यौगिक  serving as a  चैपल  for the mission parish  .
Better Off Dead is a 1985 American teen  रोमांटिक  comedy  फिल्मी  starring  जॉन   cusack   और  written  और  directed  by  Savage Steve Holland .
it  tells the story of high school  छात्र   लेन   myer   जो   is  suicidal after  उसके   गर्लफ्रेंड  breaks up with him .
Mercedes-Benz Superdome (  originally  Louisiana Superdome and commonly The Superdome ) is a  खेल  and exhibition  स्टेडियम   ,  located in the Central Business District of New Orleans  ,   louisiana  , USA .
योजनाएँ  were drawn  up  in 1967 ,  by   the  New Orleans modernist architectural  कड़  of  कर्टिस   और   डेविस  .
Its steel  फ़्रेम   कवर   a  expanse .
Its dome  is  made of a  lamella  multi-ringed frame and has  a  diameter  of  , making  it  the largest  फिक्स्ड  domed  ढांचा  in the  संसार  .
It is home to the  एनएफएल  's  नई  Orleans Saints  ,  the NCAA 's Division  i-a  Tulane Green Wave football team ( the largest football stadium in Conference USA ) , the State Farm Bayou  क्लासिक   ,  the R+L Carriers New Orleans Bowl , the Allstate Sugar Bowl  और  ,  प्रत्येक   चौथी  year ,  the  BCS National Championship  खेल  .
Because of the  आकार  and location  in   एक  of the major tourist destinations  in  the United States , the Superdome  routinely  makes the  ``  short list '' of candidates being considered  लिये  major  sporting  events  ,  such as the Super  कटोरी   और  the Final Four  .
In  2005  , the Superdome gained  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  attention of  a   अलग   प्रकार  when it housed thousands  of  people seeking shelter from  hurricane  Katrina .
the  building  suffered  extensive damage as a result  of  the  तूफ़ान   ,  and was  बंद  for many  महीने  afterward .
On October 3 , 2011  ,   it  was announced that German automaker Mercedes-Benz purchased naming rights to  the   स्टेडियम   .
the  new  नाम  took effect on October 23  ,  2011 .
It is the third stadium that has  नामकरण   अधिकारों   इससे  Mercedes-Benz  (  and first  in  the United  राज्य  )  ,  after  the   mercedes-benz  Arena , the stadium  of  Bundesliga club VfB Stuttgart  ,   in  Stuttgart , Germany  और  the Mercedes-Benz Arena in Shanghai ,  चीन   .

Disney  's  Animal Kingdom  आवास  is an African-themed deluxe resort at  the  Walt Disney  संसार   रिज़ॉर्ट  .
It opened on April 16 , 2001  .
the   रिज़ॉर्ट  is owned and operated by  वॉल्ट  Disney Parks and  रिसॉर्ट  .
Disney  's   एनिमल   किंगडम  Lodge is located  in   the  Animal  किंगडम  Resort  क्षेत्रफल  ,  सटा  to Disney 's  एनिमल   किंगडम  .
It gives guests the opportunity to  दृश्य   चरने  wildlife outside their rooms and public  क्षेत्रों  in the resort  भीतर  proximity  of  the animals ,  conveying  the feeling of  होने   in  an  अफ़्रीकी   सवाना  .
The People  's  Party  ,  also known as  the  `` Populists '' ,  थी  a  short-lived   राजनैतिक  party in the United States  स्थापित   in  1891  दौरान  the Populist  गति  (  संयुक्त  States ,  19th   सदी  ) .
It was  सबसे  important  in   1892-96   ,  and  तब   rapidly  faded away .
Based among  ग़रीब  , white  कपास   किसानो  in  the  South (  विशेषकर   उत्तर  Carolina , Alabama  ,  and Texas ) and hard-pressed wheat farmers in the  मैदान   राज्य  ( especially Kansas and Nebraska ) , it represented  a  radical crusading form of  agrarianism   और   दुश्मनी  to banks  ,   railroads  ,  और  elites generally .
it  sometimes formed coalitions  साथ  labor unions , and in 1896 the  डेमोक्रेट  endorsed  उनके  presidential nominee , William Jennings  ब्रायन  .
the  terms  ``   populist   ''  and `` populism  ``   हैं  commonly used for anti-elitist appeals in opposition  to  established interests and mainstream parties .
भाषाई  map  of   सीरियल  , Cameroon , and  बेनिन  .
Sign in  अंग्रेज़ी   ,   बाहर   the  University of  लागोस
There are hundreds of languages spoken in  सीरियल  .
The major languages are Yoruba ,  हौसा   ,  Igbo , Edo , Fulfulde ,  कनूरी   ,   और  Ibibio .
the  official language of Nigeria , English  ,  the former colonial language  ,  was  चुनी   to  facilitate  the  cultural  और   भाषाई  unity of  the  country  .
English , however ,  remains  an exclusive preserve  of   the  country 's urban elite ,  और   is   नहीं  widely  बोला  in  ग्रामीण  areas  ,   जिससे  comprise  तीन  quarters of the countries population .
सीरियल  's linguistic diversity  is  a microcosm of  अफ़्रीकी  as a whole  ,  encompassing three  प्रमुख   अफ़्रीकी  languages  परिवारों  : Afroasiatic  ,   nilo-saharan   ,  and  niger–congo   .
सीरियल   भी  has  अनेक  as-yet unclassified languages , such  as  Cen Tuum  ,   जिससे  may  represent  a relic of an  भी  greater  विविधता  prior to the  स्प्रेड   of  the  वर्तमान   भाषा   परिवारों  .
A series of events led to the attack  on   पर्ल  Harbor .
युद्ध  between Japan and  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  had been  a  possibility  कि  each  स्वदेश   's  military  शक्तियां   नियोजित   लिये  since  the   1920s  , though real  टेंशन  did  नहीं   शुरू  until the 1931 invasion  of  Manchuria by Japan .
over  the  अगला   दशक   ,  Japan expanded slowly  into  China  ,   अग्रणी   to  all out war  between  the two  in  1937  .
in  1940 Japan invaded French Indochina  in  an effort to embargo all imports into  चीन  , including  युद्ध  supplies purchased  इससे   the  U.S .
This move prompted  the   संयुक्त  States  to  embargo all oil exports  ,  leading  the  Imperial Japanese  नेवी  to estimate that it had less than two  सालो   of   बंकर   आयल  remaining and  to   support  the existing  योजनाएँ  to seize oil resources  in  the Dutch  ईस्ट   इंडीज  .
नियोजन   था  been underway  लिये   कुछ  time on  an   आक्रमण   on   the  `` Southern Resource  क्षेत्रफल  '' to add it to the Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity  गोला  that Japan envisioned in the Pacific  .
the   फिलीपीन   आइलैंड्स   ,  at that time an  अमरीकी  territory , were  भी   a  Japanese target  .
The Japanese military  concluded   कि  an invasion of the Philippines would provoke an  अमरीकी   सैन्य  response .
Rather  than   seize  and fortify the  आइलैंड्स   ,  and wait for the  अपरिहार्य   us   counterattack  , Japan 's military leaders instead decided  on  the pre-emptive Pearl Harbor attack  ,   जिससे  they assumed would  negate  the American forces needed for the liberation and reconquest of the islands .
Planning  लिये  the attack had  begun  in very early  1941  ,  by   admiral  Isoroku Yamamoto .
He finally won  assent   इससे  the  नवल  High  कमांड  by , among other things , threatening  to   इस्तीफा  .
the   आक्रमण  was  स्वीकृत  in the summer  at  an Imperial Conference and  again  at a second  सम्मेलन  in  the  fall .
Simultaneously over  the   साल   ,   पायलटों  were trained , and ships  prepared  for its  निष्पादन  .
Authority for the attack  थी  granted  at  the second  इम्पीरियल   सम्मेलन  if a  राजनयिक   परिणाम  satisfactory to Japan was not reached  .
बाद   फाइनल   स्वीकृति   by   सम्राट  Hirohito the order  to  attack was  जारी  at  the   शुरूआत  of December  .
A common  दफ्तर  stapler
a  common school stapler
A stapler is a  mechanical  device that joins sheets of paper or similar material  by  driving a  पतला  metal staple through the sheets and folding the ends  .
Staplers are  widely   प्रयुक्त  in  सरकारी  ,  कारोबार  , offices , homes and schools .
The  शब्द  ``  stapler  '' can actually refer  to  a  क्रमांक   of  different devices of varying  उपयोग  .
in  addition to joining paper sheets together , staplers  can  also  be  used in a surgical setting to join tissue together  साथ  surgical staples to close a surgical  घाव  (  much  in the same way as stitches  or  sutures  )  .
typically  , most staplers are  प्रयुक्त  to  जुड़ें  multiple  चादरें   of   पेपर  .
Paper staplers come in two  पृथक   प्रकार  :  हस्तचालित   और   इलेक्ट्रिक  .
हस्तचालित   staplers  are  सामान्यतः  hand-held , although models  कि   हैं  used  जबकि  set on a desk  or  other surface are not uncommon  .
इलेक्ट्रिक  staplers exist in  a  variety  of  different designs  और  models  .
उनके   प्राथमिक  operating function is to join  विशाल   संख्याएँ  of paper  चादरें  together in rapid succession .
कुछ   इलेक्ट्रिक   staplers   can  join up to 20 sheets at  a  time  .
swallowing  ,  ज्ञात  scientifically as deglutition  ,  is the process in the  इंसान   or  animal body that makes  कुछ  pass from  the  mouth , to the pharynx ,  और   into  the esophagus , while  shutting  the epiglottis  .
if  this fails  और  the  ऑब्जेक्ट  goes through the trachea , then choking  or  pulmonary  aspiration   can  occur .
in   the  human body it  is  controlled by  the  swallowing  reflex   .
Thaddeus Stevens (  अप्रैल  4  ,   1792  – August 11 ,  1868  )  ,  of  पेन्सिलवेनिया   ,  was a  नेता  of the  कट्टरपंथी  Republican faction of the Republican  पार्टी  and a  fierce  opponent of slavery .
He was  एक  of the most  influential   सदस्यों  in the history of  कॉंग्रेस   .
As chairman  of  the  शक्तिशाली  House Ways  और  Means Committee  ,  Stevens , a  witty  , sarcastic speaker and flamboyant  पार्टी  leader , dominated the  हाउस  from 1861  जबतक  his death  .
he  wrote much  of  the financial legislation that paid  लिये  the American Civil War .
Stevens and Senator  चार्ल्स   sumner  were the prime leaders of the Radical Republicans  दौरान   the   युद्ध  and Reconstruction era .
Scholarly views of Stevens have swung sharply since his death as  interpretations  of  पुनर्निर्माण  have  बदला  .
Historians of  the  Dunning School ( 1890s–1940s  )   आयोजित  Stevens  जिम्मेदार   लिये  demanding harsh  उपचार  of the  श्वेत   दक्षिण   और   violating  American traditions of  republicanism  , depicting Stevens as a villain for  उसके  advocacy of  हर्ष  measures  in  the South  ऐसे  as  disfranchising   सब  ex-Confederates  .
This  अत्यधिक  negative characterization held sway into  the  1950s .
The  वृद्धि   of   the  neo-abolitionist school  in  the  1950s   led  to  a   दमदार  positive  सराहना  of Stevens '  कार्य   on  civil rights for  freedmen  .
A recent biographer characterizes  उसे   as  ,  ``   the   ग्रेट  Commoner  ,  savior of free public  शिक्षा  in Pennsylvania  ,   नेशनल   रिपब्लिकन  leader  in   the  struggles  विरूद्ध  slavery  in  the United  राज्य  and intrepid mainstay of the attempt to secure racial  इंसाफ   लिये   the   freedmen  during Reconstruction , the only member  of  the House of  प्रतिनिधि  ever  to  have been known as the 'dictator ' of Congress . ''
अवलोकन   of  the translation of eukaryotic messenger  rna
आरेख  showing the translation of mRNA and the synthesis of  प्रोटीन  by a ribosome
in   आणविक  biology and genetics , translation is the process through  जिससे  cellular  ribosomes  manufacture  प्रोटीन  .
It  is  part of  the   प्रक्रम  of gene expression .
In translation , messenger RNA ( mRNA ) produced  by   ट्रांसक्रिप्शन  is decoded by the ribosome to produce  a  specific amino acid chain  ,  or  polypeptide  , that will  बाद  fold into an active protein .
In bacteria  ,  translation occurs  in  the cell 's cytoplasm ,  जहाँ   the  large  और  small subunits of the  राइबोसोम   हैं  located  ,  and bind to the mRNA .
In eukaryotes , translation  occurs  across the membrane of the endoplasmic  reticulum  in a process called  vectorial  synthesis .
The ribosome  facilitates  decoding by  inducing  the binding  of  tRNAs with complementary anticodon sequences to that of  the  mRNA  .
the  tRNAs  carry   विशिष्ट  amino acids that are chained together into a polypeptide as  the   mrna  passes  through  and  is   ``  read  ''  by the ribosome  in  a fashion reminiscent to  कि  of  a   भण्डार  ticker  और  ticker tape  .
In many instances , the  संपूर्ण   ribosome/mrna  complex binds  to  the outer membrane of  the  rough endoplasmic reticulum  और  releases  the  nascent protein polypeptide inside  लिये   बाद  vesicle transport and secretion outside of  the  cell .
Many  प्रकार  of transcribed RNA  ,  such  as   ट्रांसफ़र  RNA  ,  ribosomal RNA , and small  नाभिकीय  RNA ,  do  not undergo  अनुवाद   into  proteins  .
अनुवाद   proceeds  in four phases : initiation , elongation ,  translocation  and termination (  सब   describing   the   विकास  of  the   अमीनो   एसिड  chain , or polypeptide  कि  is the product of translation ) .
Amino  acids   हैं   brought   to  ribosomes and assembled into  प्रोटीन   .
In activation , the correct  अमीनो  acid is  covalently  bonded to  the  correct  ट्रांसफ़र  RNA  (  tRNA )  .
the  amino  एसिड  is joined by  इसके  carboxyl  समूह  to  the   3  '  oh   of   the  tRNA by an ester bond  .
When the  trna   रै  an  अमीनो  acid  linked  to it ,  it  is termed ``  चार्ज  '' .
दीक्षा   involves  the small subunit of the ribosome  बाइंडिंग   to   the  5  '  end  of  mRNA with the help  of  initiation factors ( IF )  .
termination  of the polypeptide happens  जब  the  a  site of the ribosome faces a stop codon ( UAA  ,   uag  , or  uga  )  .
no  tRNA  can   recognize  or  bind  to this  codon  .
Instead , the stop codon induces the binding of a release  फ़ैक्टर  protein  कि  prompts  the   disassembly  of the entire  ribosome/mrna   जटिल  .
a  number of antibiotics act by inhibiting  अनुवाद  ; these include anisomycin  ,  cycloheximide , chloramphenicol , tetracycline  ,   streptomycin  , erythromycin , and  puromycin  , among  अन्य  .
Prokaryotic ribosomes have a  अलग   ढांचा   इससे  that  of   eukaryotic  ribosomes  ,  and thus antibiotics can specifically target  बैक्टीरियल   infections  without any detriment to a eukaryotic host 's cells .
A multimedia message  on   a  mobile  फोन  .
Multimedia Messaging Service  (  MMS )  is   a  standard way to send messages that include multimedia content to and from  मोबाईल  phones  .
It extends the core SMS (  छोटी   संदेश  Service )  काबिलियत  that allowed exchange  of  text messages  तभी  up to  160   वर्ण   in   लंबाई  .
The most popular  उपयोग   is   to  send photographs from camera-equipped handsets , although it is  भी   लोकप्रिय   as  a method of delivering news and  entertainment   सामग्री  including videos  ,  pictures  ,  text pages and  ringtones  .
The standard is developed by the Open Mobile  गठबंधन  (  ओमो  ) , although during development  it   थी  part  of   the   3gpp  and WAP groups .
Smallpox was an infectious  बीमारी  unique to humans  ,  caused by either of two virus variants , Variola  प्रमुख  and Variola minor  .
The  बीमारी  is  भी   ज्ञात  by  the   लैटिन  names Variola or Variola vera , derived from  varius  (  ``   spotted  '' ) or varus ( ``  मुंहासे  '' ) .
The  बीमारी   थी   originally  known in English  as  the  ``   चेचक  '' or `` red  प्लेग  '' ;  the   पद  ``  smallpox  '' was first  प्रयुक्त   in   ब्रिटेन  in the 15th century to distinguish variola from the `` great pox  ''  ( syphilis  )  .
The  पिछला  naturally occurring case of smallpox ( Variola minor ) was diagnosed on  26  October  1977  .
smallpox  localized in small blood vessels of the skin and in the  मुँह  and  गला   .
In the skin it resulted in a  characteristic  maculopapular rash and ,  बाद  ,  उठाया  fluid-filled blisters .
V.   प्रमुख   produces   a  more  गंभीर  disease  और  has an overall mortality  रेट   of   30–35  % .
V.  minor  कल्याणकारी  a milder  रूप  of  बीमारी   (  also  ज्ञात  as alastrim , cottonpox , milkpox , whitepox , and Cuban  खुजली  ) which kills  परिचय  1 % of its  पीड़ितों  .
long-term   जटिलताओं  of V. major  संक्रमण  include  characteristic  scars  ,   commonly  on the face , which occur in 65–85 % of  survivors  .
Blindness resulting from  corneal  ulceration and scarring , and  limb  deformities due  to  arthritis and  osteomyelitis  are less common complications , seen in about 2–5 %  of  cases .
Smallpox is believed  to  have  उभरा   in   इंसान   populations  about 10,000  bc  .
The  earliest  physical  प्रमाण   of  it is  संभवतः  the pustular  खाज  on the  mummified  body  of  Pharaoh Ramses  v  of Egypt .
The  बीमारी   मारे  an estimated 400,000  europeans  annually during  the  closing  सालो   of  the 18th century ( including  पाँच  reigning  monarchs  ) , and was responsible  लिये   a   तीसरा  of all  दृष्टिहीनता  .
Of  सब  those infected , 20–60 % —and over 80  %  of infected children—died  इससे   the  disease  .
Smallpox was responsible for an  अनुमानित   300–500  million  मौतों   दौरान  the 20th century .
as  recently as 1967  ,  the World  स्वास्थ्य   संगठन  ( WHO ) estimated that 15 million people contracted the disease and  कि  two  लाख  died in that year  .
After vaccination campaigns  throughout   the  19th and 20th centuries  ,  the WHO certified the eradication of  smallpox   in  1979 .
Smallpox  is   एक   of  two infectious  रोगों  to  have  been eradicated , the other being rinderpest , which was declared eradicated in 2011 .
``   i  Want  to  Hold  अपना  Hand ''  is   a   सोंग  by  the   अंग्रेज़ी   चट्टान  band  the   बीटल्स  .
लिखा  by John  लेनन  and Paul  mccartney   ,   और   अंकित   in  October 1963  ,   it  was the first Beatles record to be made  using  four-track equipment .
With  अग्रिम  orders  exceeding  one  लाख  copies in the United  किंगडम  , `` I Want  to   थाम  Your  हाथ  ''  होता  ordinarily have gone  सीधा  to the top of  the  British record  चार्ट  on its  दिन  of  रिलीज  (  29  November  1963  ) had it not been blocked  by  the group 's first  लाख  seller ``  वो  Loves You `` , the Beatles '  पिछला  UK single , which was having a resurgent spell in  the   शीर्ष  position following  तीव्र   मीडिया  coverage of the group  .
Taking two weeks  to  dislodge its predecessor  ,  ``  i  Want  to  Hold  अपना  Hand '' stayed at number one  लिये   पाँच   सप्ताह  and remained in  the   uk   शीर्ष   पचास  for twenty-one weeks  in  total .
it   थी   भी  the group 's first American number one  ,  entering  the  Billboard Hot 100  चार्ट   on   18  January  1964  at number  forty-five  and starting the British invasion  of   the  American  म्यूज़िक   उद्योग  .
By 1 February it held the number one spot — for  सात  weeks — before  होने   replaced  by  ``  She Loves You '' ,  a  reverse scenario of  कया  had occurred in  ब्रिटेन  , and remained in the US  चार्ट  for  a  total of fifteen weeks .
`` I Want to Hold  अपना  Hand ''  became   the  Beatles  '  best-selling  सिंगल  worldwide .
A gasser was a type of hot  लाठी  originating on the dragstrips of the  संयुक्त  States  in  the late 1950s and continued until the early 1970s .
Gassers were based on production models from  the  1930s to mid-1960s ,  जिससे  have been stripped  of  extraneous weight  और   jacked  up using a  ट्रक  beam axle to provide  बेहतर  weight distribution on acceleration ( Beam  axles  are also  हल्का   than  an independent front suspension ) , though a raised stock front  बर्खास्तगी  is  आम  as well .
Common weight  कटौती  techniques include fiberglass  देह  panels  ,  stripped interiors  और  plexiglass windows (  sometimes   रंग   tinted  ) .
Because  वे  were primarily built  लिये  racing  ,  these cars  typically  had the engine swapped to a larger  or   अधिक  powerful  एक  ,  the  existing stock engine  परिवर्धित  ( often  heavily   )  or  दोनो  .
It was very common  to  fit a Roots supercharger and mechanical fuel injection ,  ऐसे  as one from  algon  , Hilborn , or Crower .
With form being dictated by function , their appearance is often very top heavy  और  ungainly  ,  largely  due   to   सामने  ends  होने  raised  उच्चतर  than stock , to assist  in   the  weight transfer during rapid acceleration ( racing  )  .
Having their exhaust  पाइप  exit through the front fender well  is  a  आम   characteristic  of gassers  ,   as   is  having bodies painted in flamboyant metalflakes , pearls , and candy  finishes  complemented  by  lettering in wild  फ़ॉन्ट्स  .
the  name  arose  because they competed in  a   गैसोलीन  -fueled  खीचें   रेसिंग   क्लास  , rather  than  one using methanol  or  nitromethane .
the   gasser  is the predecessor  of  the modern Funny Car .

Electrocardiography ( ECG or  ईकेजी  from )  is  a transthoracic ( across the thorax or  छाती  ) interpretation  of   the  electrical activity of the heart over a period of time , as detected by  electrodes  attached to the surface  of   the  skin and recorded by a device external to  the  body .
The recording produced  by   इस  noninvasive procedure is termed  an  electrocardiogram ( also ECG or EKG ) .
an  ECG is  प्रयुक्त  to measure the rate and regularity of  heartbeats   ,   as   खूब   as  the size and  स्थिति   of  the  कक्षों  , the presence  of  any damage  to  the heart , and the effects of drugs or  डिवाइस  used to  विनियमित  the  दिल   ,  such  as   a   pacemaker   .
Most ECGs  हैं  performed for  निदान   or  research purposes on  इंसान   दिल  , but may  भी  be performed on animals ,  प्रायः   लिये  diagnosis  of  heart  abnormalities  or research .
Donald John Trump ,  sr.  (  born  June  14   ,  1946 ) is an American business magnate , television personality and author  .
He is  the   अध्यक्ष  and president  of  The Trump Organization  और  the founder of Trump Entertainment Resorts .
Trump 's  हद   जीवनशैली   ,   outspoken   manner   ,  and role on  the   एनबीसी  reality  दिखाएँ  The  प्रशिक्षु  have  बना   उसे  a  well-known  celebrity who was No .  14  on the 2012 Forbes Celebrity 100 list .
ट्रम्प  is the son of  फ्रेड   ट्रम्प   ,  a wealthy  नई  York City  real-estate  developer .
he  worked for his father  's  firm , Elizabeth Trump &  बेटे   ,  while attending  the  Wharton School of the University of  पेन्सिलवेनिया   ,   और  in 1968  officially  joined  the  company .
He was given control  of  the company in 1971  और  renamed it The  ट्रम्प   संगठन  .
in   2010  ,  ट्रम्प   expressed  an  ब्याज  in becoming a candidate for  अध्यक्ष  of the  संयुक्त  States  in  the  2012  election , though in May 2011 , he announced he  होता  not  be   a  candidate .
In December 2011 ,  ट्रम्प  was  सुझाया   as  a  संभावित  vice presidential selection by Michele Bachmann , if she were to win  the  Republican nomination .
`` A  बदलें   is  Gon na Come  ''  is a 1964 single  by  R & B singer-songwriter Sam Cooke , written  और  first recorded in 1963 and released under  the   आरसीए  Victor label shortly after his death in  लेट   1964  .
हालांकि   तभी  a  modest  hit for Cooke in comparison with his previous  singles  ,  the  song came to exemplify the  1960s  ' Civil Rights Movement .
the   सोंग   रै  gained in  लोकप्रियता  and  नाजुक  acclaim in the decades since  इसके  release , and  is   #  12  on  Rolling Stone  's  500 Greatest Songs  of  All Time .

Geothermal  उर्जा  is thermal energy generated and stored in the Earth  .
Thermal energy is the  उर्जा  that determines the  तापमान  of  पदार्थ   .
The Geothermal energy of the Earth  's  crust  originates  from the original formation of  the   ग्रह  ( 20  %  ) and from radioactive decay  of  minerals ( 80 % ) .
The geothermal  अनुपात   ,  which is  the  difference in temperature between  the  core of  the  planet and  इसके  surface , drives  a  continuous conduction of thermal energy  in   the   रूप  of  ऊष्मा  from  the   कोर  to the  सतह   .
The adjective geothermal originates from the  यूनानी   जड़ें  γη ( ge ) ,  अर्थ   धरती  , and θερμος ( thermos ) ,  अर्थ   hot  .
at   the  core of the  धरती  , thermal energy is  निर्मित   by  radioactive decay  और  temperatures  may  reach over 5000 °C (  9,000  °F ) .
ऊष्मा  conducts  इससे  the core to surrounding cooler rock  .
the  high temperature and pressure cause some rock to melt , creating magma  संवहन  upward  चूंकि  it is lighter  than   the  solid rock  .
the   मैग्मा  heats rock and water  in  the crust , sometimes  up  to  370  °C (  700  °F  )   .
From  hot   स्रोतों   ,   geothermal  energy has been  प्रयुक्त   लिये  bathing since Paleolithic times and for space heating since ancient Roman  टाइम्स  , but it is now better  ज्ञात   लिये   विद्युत  generation  .
विश्वव्यापी  ,  परिचय  10,715 megawatts  (  MW  )  of geothermal  शक्ति  is online in 24 countries .
an  additional 28  gigawatts  of direct geothermal heating capacity  is  installed for  ज़िला  heating  ,  space heating ,  स्पा  , industrial processes , desalination and agricultural applications .
Geothermal  शक्ति  is cost effective  ,   विश्वसनीय  , sustainable  ,  and environmentally friendly  ,  but  रै  historically been limited to areas near  tectonic  plate boundaries .
Recent  technological  advances have dramatically expanded the  दायरा  and size of  सुगठित  resources , especially for applications such as home heating  ,  opening a potential  लिये  widespread exploitation  .
Geothermal wells release greenhouse gases trapped deep within the  धरती  , but these emissions  हैं  much lower per energy unit than those of fossil  fuels   .
As a result  ,   geothermal   शक्ति   रै  the potential to  सहायता  mitigate global warming  if  widely deployed in  प्लेस  of fossil fuels  .
the  Earth  's  geothermal  संसाधन  are theoretically  अधिक  than adequate  to  supply humanity 's energy needs , but only a very small fraction  may   be  profitably exploited  .
Drilling  और  exploration for deep  संसाधन  is very expensive .
Forecasts for  the   भविष्य  of  geothermal  power depend  on  assumptions about  प्रौद्योगिकी   ,   उर्जा  prices , subsidies , and interest  दरों   .
Pilot programs like EWEB  's  customer opt in Green Power  कार्यक्रम  show  कि   ग्राहक  would  be   willing  to pay  a  little more  लिये  a renewable energy source  जैसे  geothermal .
But as a result of government  assisted  research and industry experience , the  लागत  of generating geothermal power has decreased by 25 % over the past two decades .
in  2001  ,   geothermal  energy  लागत  between two and ten cents per  सम्पात   .
Ownership  of   प्रॉपर्टी  may be private , collective , or  आम   और  the property may be  वस्तुएँ   ,  land/real  एस्टेट  , or intellectual property .
determining  ownership in law  involves  determining who has certain rights and  कर्तव्य   over   the  property .
These  अधिकारों  and  कर्तव्य  ,  sometimes  called a 'bundle of rights  '  , can  be  separated and  आयोजित  by different  पार्टियों   .
The question of ownership  पहुँच  back to the ancient  दार्शनिकों   ,  Plato and Aristotle , who held  अलग  opinions  on  the subject  .
प्लेटो  ( 428/427 BC  –  348/347 BC ) thought  निजी  property created divisive inequalities  ,   जबकि   अरस्तू   (  384 BC – 322 BC ) thought private property enabled  लोगों  to receive the  पूरा  benefit of  उनके  labor  .
Private property  can   circumvent  what is now referred  to   as  the  “  tragedy of the commons ”  प्रॉब्लम  , where  लोगों  tend  to  degrade  आम  property  अधिक  than they  do   निजी  property .
Given a  short-sighted  owner , however , a  निजी  property system can make these tragedies worse—for  उदाहरण   ,  a  निजी  owner of a  टुकड़ा  of  oil-rich   प्रॉपर्टी  , depending  on  his worldview , might be more  दिलचस्पी  in short-term financial gain than incremental use  साथ  an  नजर  toward  अन्य  's  चिंताएं  ( e.g. , those of future generations , the disenfranchised , etc .  )   .
While  अरस्तू  justified  the   अस्तित्व   of  private ownership  ,   he  left  खोलें   सवाल  of (  1  ) how to allocate property between what  is  private  और  common and (  2  ) how to allocate the private property within society .
Over the millennia  ,  and across cultures  कया   can  be property and how it is regarded  culturally  have  varied  widely .
Ownership is the basis for many other  अवधारणाओं  that form the  मूलाधार  of  प्राचीन  and modern societies such as money , trade  ,   कर्ज़   ,   दिवालियापन   ,  the  criminality  of theft  ,   और  private  vs.  public  प्रॉपर्टी  .
Ownership  is  the key  भवन  block in the development  of  the capitalist socio-economic system .
आदम   स्मिथ  stated that  एक  of the sacred laws  of  justice was  to  guard a person 's  प्रॉपर्टी   और  possessions .
the  process and mechanics of ownership  हैं   fairly   जटिल  : one  can  gain , transfer  और  lose ownership of property  in  a number of ways  .
To acquire property one can purchase  it  with money  ,  trade  it  for  अन्य   प्रॉपर्टी   ,   प्राप्त  it as a gift , steal it  ,   ढूँढें   it  , make , it or  होमस्टीड  it .
एक  can  ट्रांसफ़र   or   खोना  ownership of property by selling  it  for money , exchanging it  लिये   अन्य   प्रॉपर्टी  , giving  it   as  a gift , being robbed  of  it , it , or having  it   stripped  from one  's  ownership through legal means such as  eviction  ,  foreclosure  , seizure , or  लेने  .
Ownership is self-propagating in that  the  owner  of  any  प्रॉपर्टी  will  भी   अपना  the  आर्थिक   लाभ   of   कि   प्रॉपर्टी   .
`` What  's  My Name ?  ''  is  a  song recorded  by  Barbadian recording artist Rihanna , for her  पांचवां  studio album  लाउड  ( 2010 )  .
Featuring guest  vocals   इससे  Canadian rapper Drake ,  the   सोंग  was released as  the  second single from Loud on October 29 , 2010 through Def  jam  Recordings .
The R  &   b  song was  उत्पादित   by  the  नॉर्वेजियाई  production duo StarGate , and was written by the  duo  along  साथ  Ester Dean , Traci Hale  ,   और  Drake .
Lyrically , it incorporates themes of sexual intercourse  और  romance  .
Music critics gave  the  song  धनात्मक  reviews  ,  citing it some of  रिहाना   's   बेहतरीन  vocal work to date  ;   वहीँ  was a praise regarding  इसके   रोमांटिक   प्रकृति   ,  as well  as  its sexual tones .
``  कया  's My Name ?  ''   थी  a commercial success and  अव्वल  the  us  Billboard Hot 100  चार्ट  , giving  रिहाना  her third number-one single  in  2010 ,  as   खूब  as her eighth overall  on   the  chart  .
the  song also topped the charts  in   हंगेरियाई  and  the  United Kingdom  और  reached  the  top five  in  Canada , Ireland  ,  New Zealand , Norway  और  Slovakia  .
The song received a  नामांकन   at  the  54th  Grammy Awards for Best Rap/Sung Collaboration .
An  accompanying  music video  ,  directed by  फिलिप  Andelman  ,   portrays   a  romantic encounter between  रिहाना   और   ड्रेक   in   a  grocery store along with romantic scenes  between  the  जोड़ी   और  Rihanna walking through  मैनहटन  's Lower East Side .
`` What  's  My Name ? '' was promoted with  सजीव  performances across both sides of the Atlantic  ,   सहित   शनिवार   रात्रि  Live  in  America  और  the series seven  finale  of  the  X Factor in the  संयुक्त   किंगडम  .
The  latter   प्रदर्शन  resulted in  an  investigation from  the   देश  's media  नियामक  , Ofcom , for the  raunchy   प्रकृति  of Rihanna  's  outfit .
A mathematical constant is a  खास   क्रमांक  , usually a  रियल  number , that is  ``  significantly  दिलचस्प   in   कुछ  way '' .
Constants  उठता  in many different  क्षेत्रों  of mathematics , with  स्थिरांक  such as e  (  mathematical  निरंतर  )  |  and pi|  occurring   in  such diverse contexts as  भूगोल   ,   क्रमांक  theory and calculus .
What  it  means for a constant  to  arise  ``  naturally '' , and what makes a  निरंतर   ``   दिलचस्प  '' , is ultimately  a   पदार्थ   of  taste ,  और  some mathematical constants are notable more for historical reasons than  लिये  their intrinsic mathematical interest  .
The  अधिक  popular  स्थिरांक   have  been studied throughout the ages and  computed   to  many decimal places .
All mathematical constants are definable  संख्याएँ  and  प्रायः  are also  computable  numbers  (  Chaitin 's constant  होने   a  significant  एक्सेप्शन  )  .
Elections to the United  राज्य  Senate were held on  नवम्बर  2 ,  2010  , for 37 of the United States  सीनेट  's 100 seats .
(  A special  चुनाव   on  January 19 , 2010  in  Massachusetts  थी  held earlier in the year . )
thirty-four  of  the  seats were  लिये  six-year terms to the  सीनेट  's `` class three '' ,  और  three were  खास   चुनावों  for  shorter  terms .
Of  the  37 elections  ,  19 featured incumbent Democrats ( 7 of whom retired  or  were defeated  in  the primary ) and 18 featured incumbent Republicans  (  eight of whom retired or  यहूद  defeated  in  the primary )  .
बाद   the  previous elections ( in 2008  )  , the United States Senate  थी  composed  of  58 Democrats , 40  republicans  , and 2 independents who caucus with the Democrats .
Republicans won  चार  seats held by retiring Democrats  और  Republicans defeated two incumbent Democrats .
This was the largest number of Republicans gains since  the  1994  चुनावों  and  भी   the  first  समय  since that election that Republicans successfully  defended   सब  of  उनके  own seats .
This was the fourth  लगातार   चुनाव  of  ``  class 3  ''  senators  जहाँ  Democrats have  विफल  to gain  सीटे  and  the   तीसरा   लगातार   mid-term  election held in  a  president 's first  पद   जहाँ   republicans  have picked-up  सीटे  .
Despite these Republican wins  ,  however ,  the  Democrats retained a majority of the Senate  साथ  51  सीटे   प्लस   2  independents who caucus  साथ   उन्हें   ,   compared   to  the 47  republicans  .
A  संक्रांति  is an  खगोलीय   इवेंट  that occurs  twice  each  साल  as the Sun reaches its highest or  न्यूनतम  excursion  सापेक्ष   to   the   celestial  equator  on   the   celestial   गोला  .
as   a  result , on the day of  the  solstice  ,  the Sun appears to have reached its highest or lowest annual altitude in the sky  ऊपर  the horizon  at  local solar noon  .
the  word solstice  is  derived  इससे  the Latin sol  (  sun ) and sistere (  to  stand still )  ,   क्युकी  at  the   solstices  , the Sun stands still in declination ; that is , the seasonal movement of  the  Sun 's path (  as  seen from Earth )  आता  to  a  stop  पहले  reversing direction .
The  solstices  , together with  the  equinoxes , are connected with the seasons .
In many cultures the solstices  चिह्नित  either the beginning or  the  midpoint  of  winter and summer .
The term  संक्रांति  can also be  प्रयुक्त  in a broader sense , as the  तिथि   (  day )  जब  this occurs  .
The  दिन  of the solstice is either the  longest  day of the year ( in summer )  or  the  shortest  day of the  साल  ( in winter ) for any place  बाहर  of the  ऊष्णकटिबन्ध  .
Jerry Lee  लुईस  (  born  September 29  ,  1935  )   is  an American  चट्टान  and roll and  देश   म्यूज़िक   singer-songwriter  and pianist  .
He is known by the nickname ``  the   कातिल  '' and is often viewed  as   “rock   &   फेंकें  's first great wild man” .
An early pioneer  of   चट्टान  and roll music  ,  in 1956  लुईस   बना  his first recordings at Sun Records  .
`` Crazy  बाहें  `` sold 300,000 copies  in  the  दक्षिण  , but  it  was his  1957  hit ``  पूरे  Lotta Shakin ' Going On `` that  शॉट  Lewis to fame  विश्वव्यापी   .
लुईस   followed  this in that same year when he recorded  गीतों   ऐसे  as `` Great  गेंदें  of  आग  `` ,  ``  Breathless ``  और  `` High School  गोपनीय  ``  .
Lewis sold more  रिकॉर्ड  than  एल्विस  Presley  at   इस  time .
However ,  लुईस   '  rock  'n   '  roll career faltered  in  the wake  of  his  विवाह  to his young  cousin  .
he   था  little success in  the  charts following  the   कांड  and  उसके  popularity quickly  धुंधली   .
His live performance fees plummeted from $ 10,000  प्रति  night to $ 250 .
in   the  meantime  he  was determined  to  gain back  कुछ  of his popularity .
दौरान  the early 60’s he did  n't   have  much chart success  साथ   few   अपवाद  such  as  `` What 'd I Say  ``   .
His live performances at  इस  time were increasingly  जंगली  and energetic .
उसके  album Live at  the  Star  क्लबों  ,  हैम्बर्ग   इससे  1964 is often regarded by many music  पत्रकारों  and  प्रशंसक  as one of the  wildest  and  महानतम   चट्टान  and roll concert albums ever  .
बाद   रिकॉर्डिंग  songs such  as  ``  i  'm  on  Fire '' for several years  साथ  little success , in  1968  Lewis made  a  transition into country music  और   था  hits with songs  ऐसे  as `` Another  प्लेस  , Another Time  ''  .
This  reignited  his career and  throughout   the  late '60s  और  '70s he regularly topped the  country-western   चार्ट  .
His #  1  country hits  शामिल  `` To Make Love Sweeter For  तुम   ``  , `` There Must  be  More  to  Love Than This  ``  ,  ``  Would You Take  another  Chance on  me  ``  और   ``  Me And Bobby McGee ``  .
लुईस  's successes continued  throughout   the  decade and he  embraced  his  चट्टान  'n ' roll  पास्ट   साथ  songs such as  a  cover  of  the Big Bopper 's `` Chantilly Lace `` and  ``   rockin  ' My  जीवन  Away `` .
In the  21st  century  लुईस  continues to tour to audiences around the world and still releases new  एल्बम  .
एक  such album ,  titled  Last  man  Standing , is  उसके  best selling  to  date  at   over  a  लाख  copies sold worldwide .
This was followed by  औसत  Old Man  जिससे  has  प्राप्त  some of  the   बेहतरीन   बिक्री  of  lewis’s  career .
Lewis has had  a  dozen  सुनहरा  records in both rock and country , won  अनेक   ग्रैमी   पुरस्कार  , including a Lifetime Achievement Award .
लुईस   थी  inducted into  the  Rock and Roll  हॉल   of  Fame in 1986 , and his pioneering  योगदान  to  the   विधा  has  महरूम   पहचाना   by  the Rockabilly Hall  of  Fame .
in  1989  ,  his  जीवन  was chronicled  in  the movie Great Balls of Fire , starring  डेनिस  Quaid .
In  2003  ,  रोलिंग  Stone Magazine listed his box set All  कातिल  , No Filler :  the   anthology   क्रमांक  242 on their  सूची  of ``  500  greatest  एल्बम   of   सब  time ``  .
In 2004 , they ranked  उसे   क्रमांक  24 on their list of the  100   महानतम   कलाकारों   of  All  समय  .
Lewis is the  पिछला   surviving  member  of  Sun Records  '  Million Dollar Quartet  और  the Class  of   '55  album , which also included  जॉनी  Cash ,  कार्ल  Perkins , Roy  orbison  and Elvis Presley .
हेनरी  Louis Stephens , untitled  watercolor  ( 1863  )  of a man  पढना  a newspaper  साथ   शीर्षक  `` Presidential Proclamation /  गुलामी  '' .
The  emancipation   उदघोषणा   थी   an  order  जारी  to  सब  segments of the Executive  शाखा   (   सहित  the  फौज   और   नेवी  )  of   the   संयुक्त  States by  अध्यक्ष   अब्राहम  Lincoln on  जनवरी   1  , 1863  ,  during the American Civil War  .
it   थी   आधारित  on the  अध्यक्ष  's  संवैधानिक  authority as commander  in   मुख्य  of the armed forces ; it was not a law passed by Congress  .
it  proclaimed all those  enslaved  in Confederate territory to be  forever  free , and  ordered  the Army (  और   सब  segments  of  the  कार्यपालिका   शाखा   )   to  treat as free all those  enslaved  in ten  राज्य  that were still in rebellion , thus applying to 3.1 million of the 4 million slaves in the U.S .
the  Proclamation could not be  enforced   in   क्षेत्रों  still  अंतर्गत   विद्रोह   ,  but as the army took control of  confederate  regions ,  the  slaves in those regions were emancipated rather  than  returned to their masters  .
इससे   20,000  to 50,000 former slaves in  regions   जहाँ  rebellion  था  already been subdued  यहूद   तत्काल  emancipated ,  और  over 3  लाख  more  यहूद   emancipated   as  the Union army advanced  .
The Proclamation did not apply to  the  five  स्लेव  states that were not in rebellion , nor to  सबसे  regions already controlled by the Union army  ;   emancipation  there would  आइये  after separate state actions  and/or  the December  1865  ratification of the  तेरहवीं  Amendment , which made slavery illegal everywhere in  the  U.S  .
The Proclamation  किया  not  compensate  the owners , did not itself outlaw slavery , and did not  मेक  the  ex-slaves   (   पुकारा  freedmen ) citizens  .
It  बना  the  eradication  of slavery an explicit war goal ,  in  addition to the goal of  reuniting   the   संघ  .
On  सितंबर   22  , 1862  ,  Lincoln  था  issued  a  preliminary proclamation that he would order the  emancipation  of all  स्लेव  in any state of the Confederate States of America that  किया  not return  to   संघ  control by  जनवरी  1 , 1863 .
None returned , and the order , signed and issued  जनवरी   1  , 1863 , took effect  मगर   in  locations  जहाँ  the  संघ   था  already mostly regained control .
The Proclamation outraged white Southerners who  envisioned  a race war  ,   angered  some Northern  डेमोक्रेट   ,   सक्रिय  anti-slavery forces  ,  and weakened  शक्तियां  in Europe that wanted to intervene to help the Confederacy .
it  also lifted  the   आत्माओं  of African Americans  दोनो  in the  दक्षिणी  and  उत्तरी  States , and  led   to  many  स्लेव   escaping  their masters  और  running behind  संघ   लाइनों  in  अनुक्रम   to   have  their emancipation enforced  .
Sucker  पंच   is  a 2011 American fantasy action film directed by Zack Snyder and co-written by him and  स्टीव   शिबुया  .
It  is  Snyder 's first film  आधारित  on an  असली  script .
The  फिल्मी  stars Emily  ब्राउनिंग  ,  abbie  Cornish ,  जेना  Malone , Vanessa Hudgens ,  जेमी   चुंग   ,   और  Carla Gugino  .
The storyline  फ़ॉलो   the  fantasies of a young woman  जो  is committed to  a  mental institution  ,  as she  makes  a plan to  एस्केप   the  hospital before suffering a lobotomy  .
the  film was released in both conventional and  imax   थिएटर   in   the  United  राज्य  at  मध्यरात्रि   on   कूच  25  ,  2011  .
it  received  generally  negative reviews from critics , but  थी  a moderate  बक्सा   दफ्तर   कामयाबी  .
