Haselblad 503CW  साथ   ixpress  V96C digital back , an example  of  a professional digital  कैमरा  system
a   डिजिटल  camera ( or digicam  )  is a camera that  takes   वीडियो   or  still photographs by recording images on  an  electronic  चित्र  sensor .
Most  कैमरे  sold  आज  are digital  ,  and digital cameras  हैं  incorporated into many devices ranging from  गुस्से   और  mobile phones  (   पुकारा  camera phones  )  to vehicles .
डिजिटल  and film cameras share an optical  प्रणाली   ,  typically  using   a   लेंस  with a variable diaphragm  to  focus light onto an image pickup device  .
The diaphragm and  शटर  admit the  सही  amount of light to the  imager   ,   बस   as  with film but the image pickup device is electronic rather  than  chemical .
However  ,  unlike film cameras , digital cameras can  प्रदर्शक  images on a screen  तत्काल  after being recorded , and store and  हटाएँ  images from memory .
अनेक   डिजिटल  cameras can also record moving  वीडियो  with sound  .
Some digital cameras can  क्रॉप  and stitch pictures and perform other elementary  चित्र  editing .
The inside and front of a  डेल   poweredge  web  सर्वर   ,  a  कंप्यूटर   designed   लिये  rack mounting
अनेक   वेब   सर्वर  may be used for a high traffic website  ,   यहाँ  four  सूर्य  Fire  x4200   सर्वर  are installed together
Web  सर्वर   can  refer to either the  हार्डवेयर  (  the  computer  )   or   the  software ( the  कंप्यूटर  application ) that helps to  उद्धार   वेब   सामग्री  that can be accessed  through  the Internet .
the   सबसे  common use of web  सर्वर  is  to  host  वेबसाइटों  ,  लकिन  there are other uses such  as   गेमिंग  , data  भंडार  or  कार्यशील   एंटरप्राइज़  applications .
the  American Red Cross ( ARC ) , also  ज्ञात  as the American  नेशनल  Red Cross , is a humanitarian  संगठन  that  provides  emergency assistance  ,   विपत्ति  relief and education  अंदर  the United States .
it   is   the  designated U.S. affiliate of the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Federation of Red Cross and  रेड  Crescent Societies .
आज  , in addition to domestic  विपत्ति  relief , the American  रेड   क्रॉस   offers  services in  पाँच   अन्य  areas :  जातियाँ  services  कि  help  the   मोहताज  ; communications  सेवाएं   और  comfort  लिये  military  सदस्यों  and their family  सदस्यों   ;   the   संग्रहण  , processing  और  distribution of blood and blood products  ;  educational  कार्यक्रम   on   preparedness  , health , and safety  ;   और  international relief and development  कार्यक्रम  .
Issued  a  corporate charter by the United  राज्य  Congress under Title 36  of   the   संयुक्त  States Code  ,   खण्ड   3001   ,  the American National Red Cross is governed by volunteers  और  supported by community  दान   ,  income from health and safety training and  उत्पाद  ,  और  income from blood products .
The American  रेड  Cross is headquartered in Washington  ,   d.c   .
the   अध्यक्ष  of the Board of  राज्यपालों  , serving her  दूसरी   three-year  term , is Bonnie McElveen-Hunter  .
the  current President and  मुख्य   कार्यपालिका  Officer is Gail J.  mcgovern  .

A rooster ( also  पुकारा   a   cockerel  or cock  )  is a male  gallinaceous  bird  .
It usually  refers  to  a  male chicken ( Gallus gallus )  .
Immature male  मुर्गियों  less than one  साल  old are called cockerels  .
the  term `` rooster '' originates in the United  राज्य  , and  the   पद   is  widely used throughout North America  ,  as well  as   ऑस्ट्रेलिया  and New Zealand .
In  the   संयुक्त  Kingdom and  आयरलैंड   the  older term `` cockerel ''  is  more  commonly   प्रयुक्त  .
`` Cock '' is in general  उपयोग   as  the  नाम  for a  पुरूष  of other species of bird  ,  for example ``  मुर्गा   गौरैया  ''  .
``  roosting  '' is the action of perching  aloft  to sleep at  रात्रि  ,  और  is done  by  both  लिंगों  .
The rooster is polygamous ,  लकिन  can not guard several  nests  of eggs at  एकबार  .
He guards  the  general area  जहाँ  his hens are nesting  ,   और  will  आक्रमण  other roosters that  डालें   उसके  territory  .
दौरान  the daytime  ,  he usually sits  on  a high  पर्च  , usually 3–5 feet  बंद   the   मैदान   to   serve  as a lookout  लिये  his flock  .
He  होगा  sound a  distinctive  alarm  कॉल  if predators are nearby  .
the  Pokémon  व्यापार   कार्ड   खेल  ( Pokémon TCG ) is  a   collectible  card game based on the Pokémon video game series  ,   पहला  published in  अक्तूबर  1996  by  Media Factory in  जापानी   .
In  the  US ,  it  was  initially  published by Wizards of the Coast , the company that  produces  ,  in  December  1998  .
Nintendo took  over  publishing in June 2003 .
It is one of Nintendo 's last  बाकी  strong  कड़ी   to  its heritage  as   a   playing  card  कम्पनी  .
Land Rover is  a   अंग्रेजों   car  manufacturer with its  मुख्यालय  in  gaydon   ,  Warwickshire , United Kingdom  जिससे   specialises   in  four-wheel-drive vehicles .
It is part of  the  Jaguar  जमीन  Rover group  ,  a  subsidiary  of Tata Motors of  इण्डिया  .
It is  the  second  oldest  four-wheel-drive  car  brand in the world ( after Jeep ) .
the  Land  रोवर   नाम  was originally used by the Rover  कम्पनी  for one  विशिष्ट  vehicle model , named simply  the  Land Rover , launched  by  Rover  in  1948  .
Over  the  following  सालो  it  विकसित  into a marque encompassing a range of four-wheel-drive models  ,   सहित  the Defender  ,  Discovery  ,  Freelander , Range Rover  ,  Range Rover Sport and Range  रोवर  Evoque  .
जमीन  Rovers are  फिलहाल  assembled  in  the  कम्पनी  's Halewood and Solihull  पौधे  , with  शोध  and development taking  प्लेस  at JLR 's  gaydon  and Whitley engineering centres  .
जमीन  Rover sold 194,000 vehicles  विश्वव्यापी  in  2009  .
Although the brand  originates  from the original 1948 model , Land  रोवर  as a company  रै   तभी  existed since 1978 .
Prior to this , it was a product line of the Rover Company  जिससे   थी  subsequently absorbed into  the  Rover-Triumph  प्रभाग  of  the  British  leyland  Motor Corporation ( BL  )   following  Leyland Motor Corporation ’s takeover  of  Rover in 1967 .
The ongoing commercial success of the original Land  रोवर   श्रेणी  models  ,  and latterly the Range Rover  in  the 1970s in  the  midst of BL’s well  प्रलेखित  business troubles prompted  the   स्थापना   of  a  पृथक  Land Rover company  लकिन  still  अंतर्गत  the  bl  umbrella ,  बाकी   भाग  of  the  subsequent Rover Group in  1988  ,  अंतर्गत   the   स्वामित्व  of British  aerospace  after the remains of British Leyland were broken  up   और  privatised .
In 1994 Rover  समूह   पीएलसी   थी  acquired by  bmw  .
In 2000 , Rover Group was broken-up  by   bmw   और  Land  रोवर  was  बेची  to Ford Motor Company  ,  becoming part of its Premier Automotive  समूह  .
In  2006  Ford purchased  the  Rover brand  इससे  BMW for around £6 million  .
इस  reunited  the  Rover and Land Rover  ब्रांड्स  for the  पहला  time since 2000 when the  रोवर  group was broken  up  by  bmw   .
In June 2008 ,  घाट   बेची  both Land Rover and Jaguar Cars to  tata  Motors .
This sale  भी  included the  dormant   रोवर   ब्रांड
the  cover of the  पहला  DVD compilation released by Aniplex of  the  New Captain Shūsuke Amagai arc
the  ninth season of the  ब्लीच   दुश्मनी  series  is  named .
the  series is based  on  Tite  kubo  's manga with  वही   नाम   .
The  एपीसोड   हैं  directed by  noriyuki  Abe and produced by  tv  Tokyo , Dentsu , and  स्टुडियो  Pierrot  .
The episodes ' plot focuses  on   the  introduction of a new  आत्मा  Reaper captain ,  shūsuke  Amagai , and the mystery surrounding  the   kasumiōji  clan ,  एक  of the families  कि  constitute the nobility  of  Soul Society  .
The season  began   airing   on  April 23 , 2008  in  Japan  on  TV Tokyo and ended on  अक्तूबर  7 ,  2008  .
The English adaptation of  the  Bleach  दुश्मनी  is  licensed  by  viz  Media , and  इस   चाप   began  airing on August 28  ,  2010 on Cartoon Network 's  वयस्क  Swim ,  और  finished  on   जनवरी  29 , 2011  .
Five DVD compilations  ,  each containing  चार   एपीसोड  of  the  season  ,  have been  released  by  aniplex  ;  the  first DVD compilation was released  on  November 26 , 2008 and  the  fifth on  कूच   25  , 2009 .
a  DVD box  होगा  be published by  viz  Media on December 13 , 2011 .
the  episodes use three  टुकड़े   of  theme music : one opening theme and two closing themes  .
The opening theme is  ``  Chu-Bura ``  by   kelun  .
The  पहला  closing theme is ``  नारंगी   ''  by  lil'b   ,  used for episodes 168 to 179 ,  और  the  दूसरी   closing  theme is ``  gallop  ''  by  pe'zmoku , used for  the   शेष  of the  एपीसोड  .
The regulation  of  prostitution in  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  is not  among  the  enumerated  powers  of  the  संघीय  government ;  अंतर्गत  the  दसवाँ  Amendment to the United States Constitution , it is  इसलिए  exclusively the domain  of  the states to permit , prohibit  ,  or  वरना  regulate commercial sex , except insofar as Congress  may  regulate it as part of  अंतरराज्यीय   कॉमर्स   साथ  laws like the Mann Act  .
In most states  ,  prostitution is considered a misdemeanor in  the  category of public  अनुक्रम  crime  ,   a  crime that disrupts  the  order of a community  .
it  was at one  समय   माना  to be a vagrancy crime .
फिलहाल  , Nevada is the only state  to  allow brothel prostitution ,  the  terms of  जिससे   हैं  stipulated in the Nevada  संशोधित   statutes  .
तभी  8 counties currently contain  क्रियाशील  brothels  .
सब   फ़ॉर्म  of  वेश्यावृति   हैं   illegal  in Clark County ( which contains the Las Vegas–Paradise metropolitan area )  ,  Washoe County ( which contains Reno )  ,  Carson City ,  डगलस  County , and Lincoln  काउंटी  .
The other counties theoretically allow brothel  वेश्यावृति  , but some of these counties currently  have  no  क्रियाशील  brothels .
Street prostitution  ,  `` pandering ,  ''  and  जीना  off of  the  proceeds of a prostitute  remain  illegal under Nevada  विधि   ,   as  elsewhere  in  the country .
As  साथ   अन्य  countries  ,   वेश्यावृति  in the United  राज्य  can  be   विभाजित  into three  व्यापक  categories : street prostitution , brothel  वेश्यावृति   ,   और  escort  वेश्यावृति  .
the  East Coast  of  the United  राज्य  , also known as  the   पूर्वी   seaboard  or the  अटलांटिक  Seaboard  और  commonly  shortened  to East Coast ,  refers  to the easternmost coast of the United States along the  अटलांटिक  Ocean  .
the  states  जिससे  have shoreline on  the  East Coast  हैं  , from north to south , the U.S. states  of  Maine , New Hampshire , Massachusetts  ,  Rhode  द्वीप  ,  कनेक्टिकट   ,  New  यॉर्क   ,  New Jersey , Delaware ,  मेरीलैंड  , Virginia ,  उत्तर  Carolina , South Carolina  ,  Georgia , and Florida  .
रिचर्ड  Milhous Nixon ( January 9 ,  1913  –  अप्रैल  22 ,  1994  ) was  the   37th  President of the United States ,  सेवारत  from 1969 to  1974  ,  जब  he became  the  only president to resign the office .
Nixon  था   previously  served  as  a Republican U.S. representative  और   सीनेटर   इससे  California and as the  36th   वाइस  President of the  संयुक्त  States from 1953  to  1961  .
निक्सन  was born  in   yorba   लिंडा  , California .
He graduated from Whittier  कॉलेज  in 1934 and  ड्यूक  University School of  विधि   in  1937 , returning  to  California to practice law  .
He  और   उसके   बीवी   ,  Pat  निक्सन  ,  स्थानांतरित  to Washington  to   कार्य  for the federal government in 1942 .
he  subsequently served  in  the United  राज्य  Navy during World  युद्ध  II .
निक्सन   थी  elected  in  California to  the   हाउस   of   प्रतिनिधि  in 1946 and to  the  Senate in 1950 .
His pursuit  of  the  alger  Hiss  मामला   स्थापित   उसके   प्रतिष्ठा  as a leading  anti-communist  , and elevated him to national prominence .
he  was the running  mate  of  ड्वाइट  D. Eisenhower , the  रिपब्लिकन   पार्टी  presidential  nominee   in  the 1952  चुनाव   .
निक्सन  served for eight years  as   वाइस  president .
He waged an  unsuccessful   अध्यक्षीय  campaign in  1960  , narrowly losing  to  John F. Kennedy  ,  and lost a race for Governor of California in  1962  .
In 1968  ,   he  ran again for the presidency  और  was elected  .
हालांकि  Nixon initially  escalated  America 's involvement  in  the  वियतनाम  War , he subsequently  ended  U.S.  भागीदारी  in  1973   .
Nixon  's   विज़िट  to the People 's  गणतंत्र  of  चीन  in 1972 opened  राजनयिक  relations  between  the two nations , and he initiated détente and the  anti-ballistic  Missile Treaty  साथ  the  सोवियत  Union the same year .
Domestically , his  प्रशासन  generally  embraced  policies that transferred  शक्ति  from  वॉशिंगटन  to  the   राज्य   .
Among other things  ,  he  शुभारम्भ  initiatives  to  fight  कर्कट   और  illegal drugs , imposed wage and price controls , enforced  desegregation  of some Southern  स्कूलों  , and established the Environmental Protection Agency .
Though he presided over  the  lunar landings  शुरूआत  with Apollo  11  , he scaled  वापस   मानवयुक्त  space exploration  .
He was re-elected  by  a landslide in  1972  .
Nixon 's second term  देखी  an Arab oil embargo ,  the   इस्तीफा  of his vice president , Spiro Agnew , and a  continuing  series of revelations about  the  Watergate scandal and other misconduct by  सदस्यों   of   the  administration .
The scandal escalated , costing  निक्सन  much of  उसके  political support  ,  and on  अगस्त   9   ,  1974 ,  he   resigned  in the  फेस  of  लगभग  certain impeachment and  हटाना   इससे  office .
After  उसके   इस्तीफा  , he  controversially  received  a  pardon issued by his successor ,  जेराल्ड   घाट  .
In retirement , Nixon  's  work  as  an elder  statesman   ,   authoring  several books and undertaking  अनेक  foreign trips , helped to rehabilitate  उसके  public image  .
he   suffered  a  debilitating   स्ट्रोक  on April 18 , 1994 , and died four days  बाद  at the  आयु  of 81 .
Sertraline hydrochloride ( trade names Zoloft ,  lustral   )  is an antidepressant of  the  selective serotonin reuptake  inhibitor  ( SSRI ) class .
It was introduced to  the   मार्केट  by  फाइजर  in  1991   .
sertraline  is primarily  विहित  for  प्रमुख  depressive disorder in adult outpatients  as  well as obsessive–compulsive , panic  ,  and social anxiety disorders in both adults  और  children .
In  2011  , it was the  second-most  prescribed antidepressant on the U.S. retail market  ,  with 37,208,000 prescriptions .
the  efficacy of sertraline for  अवसाद   is  similar to  कि  of older tricyclic  antidepressants  , but its  पक्ष  effects  हैं  much less pronounced .
Differences with newer antidepressants  हैं  subtler and also mostly confined to  पक्ष   प्रभाव  .
प्रमाण  suggests that  sertraline   may  work better than  fluoxetine  ( Prozac ) for  कुछ  subtypes of  अवसाद   .
उपचार  of panic disorder with sertraline results in  a   significant  decrease of  the  number of  दहशत  attacks  और  in improved quality of life .
For obsessive-compulsive disorder , sertraline  is  not as effective  as   संज्ञानात्मक  behavioral therapy ;  the  best results  have  been achieved  by  combining these two  उपचार  .
हालांकि  approved for social  phobia  and  posttraumatic  stress  विकार  , sertraline  लीड  to only modest  सुधार   in  these  शर्तें  .
Sertraline  भी  alleviates  the   लक्षण  of premenstrual dysphoric  विकार   और   can  be used in sub-therapeutic doses or  intermittently  for its treatment .
Sertraline shares  the  common  पक्ष  effects  और  contraindications of other  ssris  , with  ऊँची   दरों  of nausea ,  अतिसार  ,  अनिद्रा   ,   और  sexual  पक्ष   प्रभाव  ; however  ,  it does not cause weight gain , and its effects on both  संज्ञान  and vigilance are relatively  mild  .
In pregnant women taking sertraline , the drug  थी  present in significant concentrations in fetal blood  ,  and was also associated with a higher  रेट  of  विभिन्न   जनम  defects .
Similarly to other  antidepressants  , the use of  sertraline   लिये   अवसाद  may  be  associated  साथ  a higher  रेट  of  suicidality   .
The Five  heartbeats   is   a  1991  musical  drama film  निर्देशित   by   रॉबर्ट   टाउनसेंड  ,  जो  co-wrote the  स्क्रिप्ट  with Keenan  आइवरी  Wayans  .
वितरित  by 20th  सदी  Fox ,  the  film 's main  डाल   शामिल  Townsend ,  माइकल  Wright , Leon Robinson , Harry  J.  Lennix , Tico Wells ,  हेरोल्ड   निकोलस  of  the  Nicholas  भाइयो  , and Diahann  कैरल  .
the  plot of the  फिल्मी  ( which is loosely based  on  the  जीवनदान  of several artists : The  dells  , The Temptations  ,   चार   टॉप   ,  Wilson Pickett , James Brown , Frankie Lymon , Sam Cooke and others ) follows the three decade  करियर  of the R & B  गायन  group  the   पाँच  Heartbeats .
The film depicts the rise and  पतन  of a Motown  प्रेरित  soul act  through  the eyes of  the  film 's main protagonist  ,  Donald `` Duck '' Matthews (  portrayed  by Townsend  )  , who serves as  a  narrator throughout  the  film .
However , a majority of  the   सिनेमा  is  प्रस्तुत  in a consecutive time  लकीर  as opposed to traditional flash backs .
the  film includes  a  significant amount of original music conceived by  विभिन्न  artists for the  फिल्मी  's soundtrack , including singles  ऐसे  as  ``  A Heart Is a House  लिये  Love `` ,  ``  We  have   n't  Finished  yet  ''  ,  and `` Nothing  लकिन  Love ''  .
The  फिल्मी  was released  to  most  उत्तर  American audiences March 29 ,  1991   however   it  was  नहीं  made available to  ऑडियंस  in other  महाद्वीपों  until 2002 when a DVD was released  prior  to another DVD release in  2006  for  the  film  's  15th anniversary .
The movie received mixed reviews from critics .
सचिवालय  ( March  30   ,   1970   –  October 4  ,  1989 )  थी  an  अमरीकी  Thoroughbred racehorse that in 1973 became  the  first  u.s  .  ट्रिपल  Crown champion in  25   सालो  .
He set  रेस  records in  सब  three events in the Series — the Kentucky  डर्बी  ( 1:59.4  )  , the Preakness Stakes (  1:53  )  ,  and the Belmont  stakes  (  2:24  ) — records that still  स्टैंड   आज  .
He is considered to be one of the  महानतम  Thoroughbreds of  सब  time .
In 1999 , ESPN  क्रमित  Secretariat the 35th best athlete of  the  20th century  ,   the  highest ranking racehorse on the list  url_http  .
He ranked second behind Man o ' War in The  blood-horse  's List of  the   शीर्ष  100 U.S. Racehorses of  the  20th Century .
Secretariat was sired  by  Bold  शासक   आउट  of  somethingroyal  , by Princequillo .
He was foaled at The Meadow in Caroline County  ,  Virginia  .
Like  उसके  famous predecessor Man  o  ' War  ,   सचिवालय   थी  a large chestnut colt and was given  the  same nickname , `` Big Red . ''
Secretariat 's grandsire , Nasrullah ,  is  also the  great-great-grandsire  of 1977 Triple Crown  विजेता   सिएटल  Slew .
Owned by Penny Chenery ,  he   थी   प्रशिक्षित  by Lucien Laurin and  मुख्यतः   ridden  by Canadian jockey  रॉन  Turcotte , along with apprentice jockey Paul Feliciano ( first two races ) , and veteran Eddie Maple  (  last race ) .
he  raced  in  Chenery 's Meadow Stable 's blue and white  checkered  colors  और  his  दूल्हे  was  एडी  Sweat .
सचिवालय  stood approximately  लम्बा   ,  and  weighed  ,  साथ  a  75-inch  girth  ,   in   उसके  racing prime .
A  ठेठ  12 V , 40 Ah Lead-acid car battery
An automotive  बैटरी  is  a  type of  rechargeable   बैटरी  that supplies  इलेक्ट्रिक  energy to  an   ऑटोमोबाइल  .
Usually  इस  refers to an SLI battery (  starting   ,  lighting ,  प्रज्वलन   )  to  शक्ति  the  प्रारंभ   मोटर   ,  the lights ,  और   the  ignition  प्रणाली   of  a  vehicle’s  engine .
Automotive  sli   बैटरी   हैं  usually lead-acid type , and  हैं  made of six galvanic cells in  श्रेणी   to  provide a 12 volt system .
Each cell  provides   2.1  volts for a total of  12.6  volt at  पूरा  charge  .
Heavy vehicles such as  राजमार्ग  trucks or tractors , often equipped  साथ   डीज़ल  engines , may have two batteries in  श्रेणी  for a 24 volt system , or  may  have parallel  स्ट्रिंग्स  of batteries .
Lead-acid batteries are made up of plates of lead and separate plates of lead dioxide , which are submerged into an electrolyte solution  of  about 38 % sulfuric  एसिड   और  62 % water .
इस  causes a chemical reaction that releases electrons  ,   allowing  them to flow through conductors to produce  विद्युत  .
as  the battery  discharges  ,  the   एसिड  of  the   electrolyte   प्रतिक्रियाएँ  with the materials of  the   प्लेटों  ,  बदलना  their surface to lead sulfate .
जब   the  battery is recharged , the  रासायनिक   प्रतिक्रिया  is reversed : the lead sulfate reforms into  सीसे  dioxide and lead .
With the plates  लौटी   to   उनके   असली  condition , the process may now be repeated .
Battery recycling of automotive  बैटरी   reduces  the  need  for  संसाधन   जरूरी  for manufacture  of  new  बैटरी   ,   diverts  toxic  सीसे  from landfills , and prevents  रिस्क  of improper disposal .
Full-time employment  is  employment  in   जिससे   a  person works a minimum number  of   घंटों  defined as  ऐसे   by  his/her  नियोक्ता  .
Full-time employment often comes with benefits that are not typically offered to part-time , temporary , or flexible workers , such as annual leave , sickleave ,  और  health  बीमे   .
Full-time  कार्य  are often considered  करियर  .
वे   generally  pay more  than  part-time jobs , and  प्रायः  carry more  घंटों  per week .
The Fair  मजदूर  Standards  अधिनियम   (  FLSA  )   करता  not define full-time  नियुक्ति  or part-time employment .
This is a matter generally to  be  determined by the  नियोक्ता   (   us   विभाग   of  Labor )  .
The definition by employer  can  vary and  is   generally  published in a company 's Employee Handbook .
Companies  commonly  require from 30–35  or   40   घंटों   प्रति  week to  be  defined as full-time and therefore  योग्य  for  लाभ  .
Full-Time status varies between company and  is   प्रायः  based on the shift the employee must  कार्य  during each work week .
The  ``   मानक  '' work week consists  of  five eight-hour days  ,   commonly  served between  9:00am  to 5:00PM  totaling   40  hours .
While a four-day week generally  consists  of four  ten-hour  days ; it may also consist of as little as nine hours for a total of  a   36  hour work week .
Twelve-hour  शिफ्ट  are often three days per week  ,  unless  the  company has the intention of paying out the employee  ओवरटाइम   .
ओवरटाइम  is legally paid out  anytime   an  employee works more than 40  घंटों  per  सप्ताह  .
the   विधिक  minimum for overtime starts  at   आधार   अदा   +  One-Half .
The  increased   भुगतान  is considered  to   compensate  slightly for the increased  थकान  which a  व्यक्ति  experiences on such long  शिफ्ट  .
Shifts can also be very irregular ,  as  in retail , but are still full-time if the  जरूरी   क्रमांक   of  hours is reached .
There are  कुछ   परिस्थितियों  where a person  जो  needs full-time work is  dropped  to part-time ,  जिससे   is  sometimes a  रूप   of  constructive dismissal  to   avoid   paying  unemployment benefits  to   a  laid-off worker .
Seahorse  is  the title given to 54 species of marine fish in the  genus  Hippocampus  .
`` Hippocampus '' comes  इससे  the  प्राचीन  Greek hippos meaning `` horse  ''  and  kampos   अर्थ  `` sea monster '' .
The  नियंत्रित   substances   अधिनियम  ( CSA )  थी   enacted   into   विधि  by the  कॉंग्रेस  of the United States as  शीर्षक  II of  the  Comprehensive Drug  गाली  Prevention and  कंट्रोल   अधिनियम  of 1970 .
The CSA  is   the  federal U.S.  ड्रग   नीति  under which  the  manufacture , importation , possession , use and distribution of certain substances is regulated .
The  अधिनियम  also served  as  the national implementing legislation  लिये   the  Single Convention  on   narcotic   दवाएँ   .
The legislation created five Schedules ( classifications  )   ,  with  varying   योग्यता   लिये  a substance to  be   शामिल  in each  .
Two  संघीय  agencies , the  ड्रग   प्रवर्तन  Administration  और   the  Food and Drug Administration , determine  जिससे  substances are  added   to   or  removed from the various schedules , though  the  statute passed by Congress  निर्मित  the initial listing ,  और   कॉंग्रेस   रै  sometimes scheduled other substances  through  legislation such  as  the Hillory  J.  Farias and  सामन्था   reid  Date-Rape Prevention  अधिनियम  of  2000   ,   जिससे  placed gamma hydroxybutyrate in Schedule I . Classification  निर्णय  are required to be made on criteria  सहित  potential for abuse ( an  अपरिभाषित  term ) , currently accepted  चिकित्सा   उपयोग   in  treatment  in  the United States  ,  and international treaties  .
Maya numerals
Maya numerals are a vigesimal (  आधार   -  twenty ) numeral  प्रणाली  used by the Pre-Columbian Maya civilization .
The numerals are made  up  of  तीन  symbols  ;  zero (  शेल  shape )  ,  one (  a  dot ) and  पाँच  (  a  bar  )  .
For example , thirteen  is   लिखा  as three  dots  in a horizontal row above two  आड़ा  lines stacked above  प्रत्येक  other .
Lyndon Baines Johnson  (   अगस्त  27 , 1908 – January  22   ,  1973  )   ,  often referred  to  as LBJ , was the 36th President of the United  राज्य   (  1963–1969 ) , a  स्थिति  he  assumed  after his service as  the  37th Vice  अध्यक्ष  of the  संयुक्त  States  (  1961–1963  )  .
he  is one  of  only  चार  people who  परोसा  in all four  निर्वाचित  federal  कार्यालयों   of  the  संयुक्त  States : Representative  ,  Senator , Vice President ,  और   अध्यक्ष   .
जॉनसन  , a  डेमोक्रेट   इससे   टेक्सास  , served  as  a  संयुक्त  States Representative from 1937–1949  और   as   a  Senator from 1949–1961 , including  छह  years as  संयुक्त   राज्य   सीनेट  Majority Leader ,  दो  as Senate Minority Leader  और   दो  as Senate  बहुमत  Whip .
After campaigning unsuccessfully for the Democratic nomination in 1960 , Johnson was  पूछा  by John  F.   कैनेडी   to   be  his running mate for  the  1960  अध्यक्षीय  election .
Johnson succeeded to the  प्रेसिडेंसी  following the assassination of  जॉन  F.  कैनेडी  on November 22 , 1963 , completed Kennedy 's term  और  was  निर्वाचित  President  in  his own right  ,  winning  by  a large margin  over  Barry Goldwater in  the  1964 election .
जॉनसन  was  greatly   समर्थित   by  the Democratic Party and as President , he was responsible  लिये   डिजाइनिंग   the  `` Great Society ``  विधान  that included laws  कि  upheld  सिविल  rights  ,  public broadcasting , Medicare  ,  Medicaid , environmental protection  ,  aid to education ,  और  his  ``  War on Poverty . ''
जॉनसन   थी  renowned for his domineering  व्यक्तित्व  and the `` Johnson treatment  ,  '' his coercion of powerful politicians in order to  अग्रिम   विधान  .
Meanwhile , Johnson escalated American involvement  in  the  वियतनाम  War , from 16,000 American advisors/soldiers  in  1963 to 550,000 combat troops  in  early  1968   ,  as  अमरीकी  casualties soared  और   the  peace process bogged down .
The  भागीदारी   stimulated   a  large angry  antiwar   गति   आधारित  especially on university  campuses  in the U.S.  और  abroad .
गर्मियाँ  riots broke out in most major  शहरों  after 1965 , and crime rates  soared   ,   as  his opponents  उठाया  demands for  ``  law and order '' policies  .
The Democratic Party  विभाजित  in multiple  feuding   गिरोहों   ,  and after Johnson  किया  poorly in the  1968  New  हैम्पशायर  primary , he ended his  बोली   लिये   reelection   .
रिपब्लिकन  Richard Nixon was elected to succeed him .
इतिहासकारों  argue  कि  Johnson 's presidency  चिह्नित   the  peak  of   आधुनिक   उदारतावाद  in  the  United States after  the  New Deal era .
जॉनसन  is  क्रमित  favorably by some  इतिहासकारों   क्युकी  of his domestic policies .
प्रोजेस्टेरोन  also known as P4  (  pregn-4-ene-3,20-dione ) is a  c-21  steroid hormone involved in the female menstrual cycle  ,  pregnancy (  supports   gestation   )  and embryogenesis  of  humans  और  other  प्रजाति   .
प्रोजेस्टेरोन  belongs to a class of hormones  पुकारा  progestogens  ,   और  is the major naturally occurring human progestogen  .
बिग  Bird is  a  protagonist of the children  's  television  दिखाएँ  Sesame  गली   .
Officially performed by Caroll Spinney  चूंकि   1969  , he is  an  eight-foot two-inch ( 249 cm  )   लम्बा  bright primrose-yellow bird  .
He can roller skate ,  बर्फ  skate  ,   नृत्य  , sing , write  काव्य  , draw and  भी  ride a unicycle  .
But  despite   इस  wide array of talents , he is  prone  to  बारंबार  misunderstandings , on one occasion  भी  singing  the  alphabet as  एक  big  long   शब्द   (   इससे  the  सोंग  called `` ABC-DEF-GHI , ''  सुनाया  `` ab-keddef-gajihkel-monop-quristuv-wixyz '' )  ,  pondering  कया  it could  कभी  mean .
he   जीवनदान   in  a  विशाल  nest behind the  123   तिल  Street brownstone and has a  टेडी   भालू   नामित  Radar .
webtrends  is a  निजी   कम्पनी  headquartered  in  Portland , Oregon , United States .
It  provides  web  ,   सोशल   ,  and mobile analytics  और   अन्य  software  समाधान   सम्बन्धित  to marketing  प्रज्ञा  .
the  company was founded in 1993 and  अभी   serves  more than 10,000 large and  छोटी   कड़s.  < ref name='Intelligent Enterprise 2007-05-21 '  >
The Second Crusade  (   1145–1149  )  थी   the  second  प्रमुख  crusade launched from  यूरोपीय  .
The Second Crusade was started  in   जवाब  to  the   पतन  of the County  of   edessa  the  पिछला  year to the forces of Zengi .
the  county  था   महरूम   संस्थापित  during  the  First Crusade  (  1096–1099 ) by Baldwin of Boulogne  in  1098 .
While  it  was the first  जेहादी   राज्य  to be founded , it was  भी  the first to fall .
The Second Crusade  थी  announced  by  Pope  यूजीन  III  ,   और  was the  पहला  of the crusades to be led  by  European  किंग्स  , namely  लुई  VII of France and Conrad III  of   जर्मनी   ,   साथ   सहायता  from a number of  अन्य  European nobles .
the  armies of the two kings marched separately  आरपार  Europe  .
After crossing  बीज़ान्टिन  territory into  आनातोलिया  ,  दोनो   सेना  were separately defeated by the Seljuq  turks   .
the  main  पश्चिमी  Christian source  ,  Odo of  deuil  ,  और  Syriac  ईसाई  sources  अर्जी  that the Byzantine emperor Manuel  i   comnenus   secretly  hindered  the  crusaders  '   प्रगति  , particularly  in   आनातोलिया  where he  is   कथित   to   have  deliberately ordered Turks to  आक्रमण  them .
Louis and  कोनराड  and the remnants of their  सेना  reached Jerusalem and ,  in   1148  , participated in an ill-advised attack on Damascus  .
the   crusade  in  the   ईस्ट  was a failure  लिये  the crusaders  और   a  great  विजय  for the Muslims .
It would ultimately have a  कुंजी   influence  on the  पतन  of Jerusalem  और  give rise  to   the   तीसरा   crusade  at the end  of   the   12th  century  .
the  only success of the  दूसरी  Crusade came to a combined force  of  13,000 Flemish ,  frisian   ,  Norman  ,  English  ,  Scottish , and German crusaders  in  1147 .
Travelling from England , by ship , to  the  Holy Land , the  फौज  stopped  और  helped the smaller ( 7,000  )  Portuguese  फौज   in   the   कैप्चर   of  Lisbon , expelling its  मूरिश  occupants  .
wal-mart  Stores , Inc. (  )   ,  branded as Walmart  ,  is an  अमरीकी   बहुराष्ट्रीय   खुदरा  corporation  कि  runs chains of  विशाल  discount department  स्टोर्स  and warehouse stores .
The company is the  संसार  's third largest  पब्लिक  corporation  ,  according to the Fortune Global 500  सूची   in  2012 , the biggest private  नियोक्ता   in   the  world  साथ  over two million employees  ,  and  is  the largest retailer in the world  .
Walmart  remains  a  family-owned  business , as  the  company is controlled by the Walton family  ,   जो  own a 48 percent stake in Walmart .
It is also one of  the  world  's   सबसे  valuable companies .
The company was founded by Sam Walton  in  1962 , incorporated  on  October 31  ,   1969  , and publicly traded on the New  यॉर्क  Stock Exchange in  1972   .
It is headquartered  in  Bentonville ,  अरकंसास  .
Walmart  is  also  the   largest   किराना   रिटेलर  in the  संयुक्त  States .
In 2009 , it  उत्पन्न  51  प्रतिशत  of its  us   $  258  अरब   बिक्री   in  the  u.S.  from grocery business .
It also owns  और  operates the Sam  's  Club  खुदरा  warehouses in  उत्तर  America .
By  1988   ,  Wal-Mart was the  सबसे  profitable  रिटेलर  in the  us  , and by November 1990 , it outsold K-mart .
by  1991  it   outsold  Sears in retail ,  बनाना  it America 's largest  रिटेलर  , a distinction  it  still  holds  .
Walmart  रै   8,500  stores  in   15  countries , under 55 different names .
the   कम्पनी   operates  under  the  Walmart  नाम  in  the  United States  ,  including the  50  states and Puerto Rico .
It operates in Mexico as Walmex , in the United Kingdom as  asda  , in Japan as  seiyu  , and  in   इण्डिया  as Best  दाम  .
it  has wholly owned operations  in  Argentina , Brazil , and Canada .
Walmart 's  निवेश  outside North  अमेरिका  have  था  mixed results : its operations in  the   संयुक्त  Kingdom  ,  South America , and China are  अत्यधिक  successful , whereas  ventures   in  Germany and  दक्षिण   कोरियाई   यहूद  unsuccessful .
रॉबर्ट  William Gary  मूर  ( 4  अप्रैल   1952  –  6   फ़रवरी   2011  )  ,  was a  उत्तरी  Irish  संगीतकार   ,   सबसे  widely  recognised  as a singer and guitarist  .
In a career dating back  to  the  1960s  , Moore  निभाई  with artists including  फिल  Lynott and Brian Downey during  उसके  teens  ,  leading him  to   सदस्यताएँ  with the Irish bands Skid  पंक्ति  and Thin Lizzy on three  पृथक  occasions .
मूर  shared  the   स्टेज   साथ  such blues  और   चट्टान   luminaries  as B.B  .  King ,  अल्बर्ट  King  ,   कोलोसियम   ii  , George Harrison and Greg Lake ,  as   खूब  as having  a  successful solo career  .
He guested  on  a number  of   एल्बम  recorded  by  high profile musicians , including  a  cameo appearance playing the lead guitar solo on  ``  She 's  my  Baby `` from Traveling Wilburys Vol . 3 .
An example of rack mounted servers
A web  होस्टिंग  service is  a  type of Internet hosting  सेवा  that allows  individuals  and  संगठन   to  make  उनके  website  accessible   via  the World Wide  वेब  .
Web hosts  हैं  companies that  provide  space on a server owned  or   leased  for  उपयोग  by  क्लाइंट  , as  खूब  as providing Internet connectivity , typically  in   a  data center .
वेब  hosts can also provide  आंकड़ा   बीच  space and  कनेक्टिविटी   to  the Internet for other servers  स्तिथ   in  their data center , called colocation ,  भी   ज्ञात  as Housing in Latin  अमेरिका  or  फ़्रांस   .
The scope of web hosting  सेवाएं  varies greatly .
The  सबसे  basic  is  web page and small-scale  संचिका   होस्टिंग  , where  फाइलें  can be uploaded via File Transfer Protocol ( FTP  )  or a Web interface .
The files are  प्रायः  delivered  to  the Web `` as is '' or with  minimal   प्रसंस्करण   .
Many Internet service providers ( ISPs ) offer  इस  service free to  सदस्य  .
Individuals and organizations may also  obtain  Web  पेज   होस्टिंग  from alternative  सेवा   प्रदाताओं  .
निजी  web site hosting  is  typically free , advertisement-sponsored , or inexpensive .
Business web  साईट  hosting often has  a   उच्चतर  expense depending upon the size  और  type  of  the website .
Single page hosting is generally  sufficient  for personal web pages .
A complex site calls for  a   अधिक  comprehensive package that  provides  database  support   और  application development platforms ( e.g  .  PHP ,  जावा   ,   माणिक्य   on   rails  , ColdFusion  ,  or  asp.net  ) .
ये  facilities allow customers to write or install scripts for applications like forums  और   सामग्री   प्रबन्धन   .
Also  ,  Secure Sockets  परत   (  SSL  )  is typically used  लिये  e-commerce  .
The host may also provide  an   इंटरफ़ेस   or  control panel for  मैनेजिंग   the  Web  सर्वर  and installing scripts , as  खूब  as  अन्य   मौड्यूल  and service  अनुप्रयोग   जैसे  e-mail .
Some hosts specialize  in  certain software or services (  e.g  . e-commerce ) , which are commonly used by  larger  companies that  outsource  network infrastructure .
obstetrics   (   इससे  the  लैटिन   obstare  ,  ``   to   स्टैंड   by   ''  ) is the medical specialty  dealing  with the care  of  all  महिलाओं  's  reproductive   tracts  and their children during  गर्भावस्था  ( prenatal period ) , childbirth and the  postnatal  period .
Many obstetricians are  भी  gynecologists , meaning they perform in  दोनो  specialties .
in   the   संयुक्त  States , these physicians are commonly referred  to  as OB/GYNs .
The  राइट  brothers  ,   orville  ( August 19 , 1871 – January 30 ,  1948   )  and Wilbur  (  April 16  ,   1867   –   may   30  ,  1912  ) , were two  अमरीकी  brothers , inventors , and  विमानन   pioneers   जो  were credited  साथ  inventing and building the world 's  पहला  successful airplane and  बनाना   the  first  नियंत्रित   ,  powered and sustained heavier-than-air human flight ,  on  December  17   ,  1903  .
From 1905  to  1907 , the  भाइयो   विकसित  their  उड़ती   यंत्र   into   the   पहला   व्यावहारिक  fixed-wing aircraft .
Although not the  पहला  to build  और   मक्खी  experimental  वायुयान  , the  राइट  brothers were the first to invent  वायुयान   नियंत्रण   कि  made fixed-wing  संचालित  flight possible .
The  भाइयो  '  आधारभूत  breakthrough was their invention  of  three-axis control , which  सक्रिय  the pilot to  steer   the  aircraft effectively and to  maintain  its equilibrium .
इस   विधि   became   मानक  and  remains   मानक  on fixed-wing aircraft of all kinds .
इससे  the beginning of their aeronautical work , the  राइट  brothers focused on developing a reliable method of pilot control as  the   कुंजी  to solving  ``  the flying problem  ''  .
This approach differed significantly from other  experimenters   of  the time who put more emphasis on  विकासशील   शक्तिशाली   इंजन  .
Using a small  homebuilt  wind tunnel  ,   the  Wrights  भी  collected more  सटीक  data than  कोई  before ,  enabling  them to  डिज़ाइन  and  निर्माण  wings and  propellers  that were more efficient  than   कोई  before .
Their first U.S. patent , 821,393 , did not  अर्जी  invention of  a  flying  यंत्र  , but  बल्कि  ,  the  invention  of  a system of  aerodynamic  control that  manipulated   a  flying machine 's surfaces .
वे  gained the mechanical skills  अनिवार्य  for their success  by   working  for years in their shop  साथ   मुद्रण  presses , bicycles , motors , and other machinery .
Their work with bicycles  in  particular influenced their belief that an unstable  गाडी   जैसे  a flying  यंत्र   could  be controlled and balanced  साथ  practice .
From  1900   जबतक  their  पहला   संचालित  flights in late 1903  ,  they  conducted  extensive  glider   परीक्षण   कि   भी   विकसित   उनके  skills  as  pilots .
Their bicycle shop employee Charlie Taylor became  an  important part  of   the  team , building their first aircraft engine in close collaboration with  the  brothers  .
The Wright  भाइयो  ' status as inventors of the  वायुयान   रै  been  विषय  to counter-claims by various  पार्टियों  .
Much  विवाद  persists  over  the  अनेक   स्पर्धा   दावा  of early aviators .
America 's Next Top Model ,  साईकिल  12 is  the  twelfth cycle of  अमेरिका   's  Next Top Model and the sixth  ऋतु  to  एयर   on   the  CW  संजाल  .
it  premiered on March  4   ,  2009 .

A modeling contract with  elite   मॉडल  Management .

A 100,000 contract with CoverGirl cosmetics  .
The first  हाफ   of   the  cycle  took  place  in  New York City  ,  moving  the  show back  इससे   लॉस   एंजिल्स  last  ऋतु   .
The international destination  लिये  this cycle is São Paulo  ,  Brazil ,  the  series  पहला  visit  to  South America  .
The number  of   लड़कियों   थी  reduced  to  13  ,  the first time since Cycle  9  ,  बाद  being maintained at 14 in the last two  चक्र  .
This was the  पिछला  time Paulina Porizkova  participated  as judge .

इस  season averaged 4.35 million viewers  प्रति  episode .
Exxon  mobil   निगम  ,  or  ExxonMobil  ,  is  an   अमरीकी  multinational  आयल  and gas corporation  headquartered  in Irving , Texas  ,  United States .
It is a direct descendant of John D.  rockefeller   's  Standard Oil company , and was  formed  on November 30 ,  1999   ,   by  the  विलय   of  Exxon and Mobil .
It is affiliated with Imperial Oil  जिससे   operates  in Canada .
ExxonMobil  is   the  world 's largest company by revenue and  in   2013  , became the largest publicly traded company  by   मार्केट  capitalization in the  संसार  .
the  company is ranked  #  5 globally in Forbes Global  2000  list in  2013   .
exxon  Mobil 's reserves were 72 billion oil-equivalent barrels  at  the end of  2007   और  , at then ( 2007 ) rates of production , are expected to  पिछला  over 14  सालो  .
With 37  आयल  refineries  in   21   देशों   constituting  a combined daily  शोधन  capacity of , Exxon  mobil   is  the  largest   refiner  in the world , a title that was also associated  साथ  Standard Oil since its incorporation in  1870  .
exxonmobil  is the largest  of  the world  's  supermajors with daily production of  3.921   लाख   boe  ( barrels  of  oil equivalent ) .
In 2008  ,  this was  लगभग  3 % of  संसार  production , which  is  less than several of the largest  state-owned   पेट्रोलियम   कंपनियाँ  .
When ranked  by  oil and  गैस   reserves  it  is   14th  in the world with less than 1 % of  the   कुल   .
A  2012   आलेख   in  The Daily Telegraph  says  that  exxonmobil  has  ``  grown  into  one  of   the  planet’s most  hated  corporations  ,  able to determine  अमरीकी   विदेशी   नीति  and the fate  of  entire nations  ''  .
in  terms  of  its  पर्यावरणीय  record , ExxonMobil  increasingly  drills in  terrains  leased to them by dictatorships , such  as  those  in   chad  and  भूमध्यरेखीय   गिनी   .
Lee Raymond , the corporation’s chief  कार्यपालिका  until 2005  ,   थी   ``   notoriously  sceptical about climate change and  disliked  government interference  at  any level ''  .
The company was  widely   criticized  for its slow response to cleaning  इसके  1989 Valdez oil spill in  अलास्का  .
This  आलेख  is  परिचय  the Globe Theatre  of   शेक्सपियर  .
For the  आधुनिक  reconstruction in  लंदन  , see  शेक्सपियर  's  ग्लोब  .
For other uses , see  ग्लोब  Theatre ( disambiguation )  .
the  Globe  थिएटर   थी  a theatre in London  संबद्ध  with William Shakespeare  .
It was  निर्मित  in 1599  by  Shakespeare 's  playing  company , the  रब  Chamberlain  's  Men  ,  on land  स्वामित्व  by Thomas  brend  and inherited by his son , Nicholas  brend   और  grandson Sir  मैथ्यू  Brend , and was destroyed by fire on 29 June  1613  .
A  दूसरी  Globe Theatre  थी  built on the  वही  site  by  June 1614 and closed  in   1642   .
A modern reconstruction of the Globe  ,  named ``  शेक्सपियर  's Globe ``  ,  opened  in   1997  approximately  इससे   the   साईट  of the  असली  theatre  .
it  's a Wonderful Life is  a  1946  अमरीकी   क्रिसमस   नाटक   फिल्मी  produced and directed  by  Frank Capra  ,  based on the short story `` The Greatest Gift `` , which  फिलिप   वैन   doren  Stern wrote in 1939 and privately published in  1945  .
The film is considered  एक   of  the most loved films in American  सिनेमा   और  has become traditional viewing during  the  Christmas  ऋतु  ,  alongside  popular classics such  as  Charles  डिकेंस  ' A  क्रिसमस  Carol .
the   फिल्मी  stars James Stewart as  जार्ज  Bailey , a  man   जो  has given up his dreams in order to help others  और  whose imminent suicide on  क्रिसमस   संध्या   brings  about the intervention of his guardian angel  ,  Clarence Odbody ( Henry Travers  )  .
Clarence  shows  George all the lives he has touched and  कैसा  different  जीवन   in  his community of Bedford  जलप्रपात   होता   be  had he  never  been born .
Despite  initially  performing  poorly  at  the  box office  due  to high production costs and  stiff  competition at the time of its release  ,  the  फिल्मी  has come to be  regarded  as a classic  और  is a  स्टेपल   of   क्रिसमस  television around the world  .
Theatrically , the film 's break-even point was  दरअसल  $  6.3  million  ,  approximately  twice  the production cost ,  a   फिगर  it never  आए  close to  achieving   in  its initial release .
An appraisal  in  2006  reported  : ``  हालांकि   it  was not  the  complete  बक्सा  office  विफलता   कि  today  everyone  believes ... it was initially a major  निराशा  and confirmed  ,   at   तनिक  to the  studios   ,  that Capra was  no  longer capable of turning  आउट  the populist  सुविधाएँ   कि  made his  films   the   must-see  ,  money-making   कार्यक्रम  they once were  .  ''
The  फिल्मी  was  मनोनीत   लिये  five Oscars  और   रै  been  पहचाना  by the American Film  संस्थान  as  एक   of   the   100  best American films ever made , placing  क्रमांक  11  on   इसके  initial  1998   महानतम  movie list  ,  and would also place number  एक   on  its list of the most inspirational American films of all time .
Data  गोदाम  Overview
In computing  ,  a  आंकड़ा   गोदाम  or enterprise  आंकड़ा  warehouse (  dw   ,   dwh  , or EDW ) is a database used for  रिपोर्टिंग  and  आंकड़ा   विश्लेषण  .
It  is  a  सेंट्रल  repository of data which is  निर्मित  by integrating data from one  or   अधिक  disparate sources .
Data  warehouses  store current as  खूब   as  historical data and are used for  बनाना  trending reports for senior  प्रबन्धन   रिपोर्टिंग   ऐसे   as  annual  और  quarterly comparisons .
The data stored in  the  warehouse are  अपलोड  from the operational systems ( such  as  marketing , sales etc. , shown  in  the figure to  the  right  )  .
The data may pass  through   an   operational  data store  लिये  additional operations before  वे   हैं  used in  the  DW  लिये  reporting  .
The  ठेठ   etl  -based data warehouse uses staging  ,  data integration  ,  and access  परतों   to  house its key functions  .
the  staging layer  or  staging  डेटाबेस   स्टोर्स  raw data  निकाली  from each of  the   disparate  source data systems .
the   संयोजन  layer integrates the disparate data  सेट   by  transforming the data  इससे  the staging layer often storing this  रूपांतरित   आंकड़ा   in   an  operational data store (  ods  )  डेटाबेस  .
The integrated data are then moved to yet  another  database ,  प्रायः  called  the   आंकड़ा  warehouse  डेटाबेस  , where the  आंकड़ा  is arranged into  hierarchical   समूह   प्रायः  called  आयाम  and into facts and aggregate  तथ्य   .
the  combination of facts and dimensions is  sometimes   पुकारा  a star  स्कीमा   .
The access layer helps users retrieve data .
a  data warehouse constructed from an  एकीकृत  data  सोर्स  systems  करता  not  आवश्यकता  ETL , staging databases ,  or   operational  data store  databases  .
The  एकीकृत  data source systems may be  माना  to  be  a part of a distributed operational data store  परत  .
आंकड़ा  federation methods or  आंकड़ा  virtualization  विधि  may  be   प्रयुक्त   to   अभिगम  the distributed  एकीकृत  source data systems to  consolidate  and aggregate data directly into the data warehouse database tables .
Unlike the ETL-based  आंकड़ा   गोदाम  , the integrated  सोर्स  data systems and the data warehouse are all integrated since there  is  no  परिवर्तन  of  आयामी  or reference data .
This integrated data warehouse architecture supports the drill down from the aggregate data of the data warehouse to  the   transactional  data of  the  integrated source data  प्रणालियों  .
Data warehouses can be subdivided into data marts .
आंकड़ा  marts store subsets  of  data from a  गोदाम  .
This definition  of   the  data  गोदाम  focuses  on  data storage .
The main source of the data is cleaned , transformed , cataloged and made available for  उपयोग  by  प्रबंधक   और  other business  पेशेवर  for data mining  ,   ऑनलाइन  analytical processing , market research and decision support ( Marakas  &   o'brien  2009 )  .
However ,  the  means to retrieve and analyze data , to  निकालें  ,  रूपांतरण  and load data  ,  and to manage the data dictionary are also  माना  essential components of a  आंकड़ा   warehousing  system  .
Many  सन्दर्भ  to data warehousing  उपयोग  this  broader   कॉन्टेक्स्ट   .
यूँ   ,  an expanded  परिभाषा  for data warehousing includes business intelligence tools ,  टूल्स  to extract  ,  transform and load  आंकड़ा  into  the  repository  ,  and  टूल्स  to  मैनेज  and retrieve metadata .
Portland stone quarry on the  आइल  of Portland , England
An abandoned construction  कुल  quarry near  एडिलेड   ,  South Australia
a  quarry is a type  of  open-pit mine from which  चट्टान   or   खनिज   हैं   निकाली   .
Quarries  हैं  generally used for extracting building materials , such as dimension stone ,  निर्माण   कुल  ,  riprap  , sand  ,   और  gravel  .
They are  प्रायः   collocated   साथ  concrete and asphalt  पौधे  due to the requirement for large amounts of aggregate  in  those materials  .
Open  खानों  that produce minerals  हैं  typically referred to as open pit mines .
the  word  पाषाण   can  include  भूमिगत  quarrying  लिये  stone , such as  नहाना  stone .
Mormons ( ) are  a  religious  और   सांस्कृतिक  group related to Mormonism  ,  the principal branch of the Latter Day  संत  movement of  restorationist   christianity   ,  which began with the  visions  of Joseph  स्मिथ  in  upstate  New  यॉर्क  during the  1820s  .
After Smith 's death in 1844 the Mormons followed Brigham Young to what would become the Utah Territory  .
आज  Mormons  हैं  understood  to  be members  of   the   गिरिजाघर  of  यीशु  Christ of Latter-day Saints (  lds  Church )  .
Some  mormons  are  भी  either  स्वतंत्र  or  non-practicing  .
The center  of  Mormon  सांस्कृतिक  influence is  in   यूटा  , and North America has  अधिक  Mormons  than   कोई   अन्य   महाद्वीप  , though the majority  of  Mormons  सजीव  outside the United States .
Mormons have  विकसित   a  strong sense of communality that stems from their doctrine  और   इतिहास  .
दौरान   the  19th  सदी  Mormon converts tended to gather to a  सेंट्रल   भौगोलिक   स्थान   ,   और  between 1852 and  1890  a minority of  mormons  openly practiced  बहुवचन   विवाह  , a form of  धार्मिक   polygamy   .
Mormons dedicate large amounts of time and resources  to   सेवारत  in  उनके   गिरिजाघर   ,  and many young Mormons choose to serve a  full-time  proselytizing mission  .
mormons   have  a health code  कि   eschews  alcoholic  पेय   ,  tobacco  ,  coffee ,  चाय  , and other addictive  substances  .
They tend to  be  very  family-oriented  ,  और   have   दमदार  connections  आरपार  generations  और   साथ   विस्तारित  family  ,  reflective of their  विश्वास  that families  can  be sealed  साथ  beyond  मौत  and  throughout   शाश्वत  .
mormons  also have a strict law  of  chastity , requiring abstention from sexual relations  बाहर   of  marriage and  सख्त  fidelity within marriage .
mormons  self-identify  as  Christian , though some of  उनके  beliefs  differ  from mainstream  christianity  .
Mormons believe  in   the  Bible  ,   as   खूब  as  अन्य   किताबे  of scripture ,  ऐसे   as  the Book  of  Mormon  .
वे  have a unique view of cosmology , and believe  कि  all  लोगों  are spirit-children  of  God .
mormons   मानना   कि  returning to God requires following the example of Jesus Christ  ,  and accepting his atonement  through  ordinances  ऐसे   as  baptism .
They  मानना   कि  Christ 's church was restored through Joseph  स्मिथ  , and is  हिदायत  by living prophets and apostles  .
Central to Mormon  आस्था   is  the belief that God speaks  to  his  children  and  जवाब  their  प्रार्थनाएं  .
In financial accounting , assets are  आर्थिक  resources .
Anything tangible or intangible  कि   is  capable  of  being owned or controlled to produce value and that is held to have positive  आर्थिक  value  is  considered  an  asset .
Simply  stated   ,   एसेट  represent value  of   स्वामित्व   कि  can  be  converted  into  cash (  हालांकि  cash  itself  is also  माना  an asset ) .
The  संतुलन  sheet  of   a  firm records the monetaryJ .
G.  Siegel ,  N.  Dauber & J. K. Shim  ,  `` The Vest  जेब   cpa   ''  ,  wiley  , 2005.There are different methods  of  assessing the monetary value  of  the assets recorded on the  संतुलन  Sheet .
In  कुछ  cases , the  ऐतिहासिक  Cost is  प्रयुक्त  ; such  कि   the   मान  of  the  asset  जब   it   थी  bought in the past  is  used as the monetary value  .
In other  उदाहरण  , the present  मेला  market  मान  of the asset is  प्रयुक्त  to determine the value shown on the balance sheet  .
मान  of the assets  स्वामित्व  by the firm .
It is money and  अन्य  valuables belonging  to   an  individual or business  .
दो   प्रमुख  asset classes are tangible assets  और   intangible  assets .
Tangible assets contain various  subclasses   ,  including current  एसेट  and  फिक्स्ड   assets.j  .
Downes ,  j.e   .  Goodman , `` Dictionary of  वित्त   &  Investment Terms  ''  , Baron 's  वित्तीय   मार्गदर्शिका  ,  2003  Current assets include inventory , while fixed assets include such  वस्तुएं  as buildings  और   उपकरण  .J . Downes , J.E .  गुडमैन   ,  `` Dictionary of  वित्त  &  निवेश  Terms ''  ,  Baron 's Financial Guides , 2003 ;  और  J. G. Siegel  ,   N.   dauber  & J.  K.  Shim  ,  `` The  बनियान   जेब  CPA ''  ,  Wiley , 2005  .
Intangible assets are  nonphysical  resources  और   अधिकारों   कि  have a value to  the   कड़   क्युकी  they  दे  the firm some kind of advantage in  the  market  प्लेस  .
उदाहरण  of intangible  एसेट  are goodwill , copyrights  ,  trademarks  ,  patents and computer programs  ,  and financial assets ,  सहित  such items as  खाते   receivable  ,  bonds   और   स्टॉक्स   .
A neuron  (  or ; also known as  a   neurone  or nerve cell  )   is   an  electrically  excitable  cell that processes and transmits information through  विद्युत  and chemical signals .
A chemical signal occurs  via   a  synapse , a specialized connection  साथ  other  कोशिकाएं  .
न्यूरॉन्स   कनेक्ट  to each other  to  form  neural  networks  .
Neurons are the core  components   of  the nervous  प्रणाली  , which includes the brain  ,  spinal cord  ,  and peripheral ganglia .
A number of specialized types of neurons exist :  संवेदी   न्यूरॉन्स   respond   to  touch  ,   ध्वनि  , light  और   numerous  other  stimuli  affecting  कोशिकाएं  of the sensory  अंगों  that  तब  send signals to the spinal cord and brain  .
Motor neurons receive signals from the brain and  स्पाइनल   cord  , cause muscle contractions , and affect glands .
interneurons  connect neurons to  अन्य  neurons within  the  same region of  the  brain or spinal cord  .
A typical  न्यूरॉन  possesses a cell body  (   प्रायः  called the  सोम   )  ,  dendrites  ,  और   an  axon .
dendrites  are  पतला   structures   कि  arise  इससे  the  कोशिका  body ,  प्रायः  extending for hundreds of micrometres  और   branching   अनेक   टाइम्स  ,  giving  rise to a  जटिल  `` dendritic tree '' .
an  axon  is  a special cellular extension that arises from the cell body at a site  पुकारा  the axon hillock and  ट्रेवल्स  for a distance , as far  as  1  मीटर   in  humans or  भी  more  in  other  प्रजाति  .
The  कोशिका  body of  a  neuron frequently gives rise to multiple  dendrites   ,  but never to  अधिक   than  one axon , although the axon may  शाखा  hundreds  of  times before it  terminates   .
at  the majority of synapses ,  सिग्नल   हैं   भेजा   इससे  the axon of one  न्यूरॉन   to   a  dendrite of another .
There are ,  however  , many  अपवाद  to these rules  :  neurons that  कमी  dendrites ,  न्यूरॉन्स  that have  no  axon , synapses  कि   कनेक्ट   an  axon to another  axon   or  a dendrite to another dendrite , etc .
All  न्यूरॉन्स  are electrically  excitable   ,   maintaining  voltage gradients across their membranes  by  means of metabolically driven ion pumps ,  जिससे   combine   साथ  ion channels  अंतःस्थापित  in the membrane  to   generate   intracellular-versus-extracellular   विशेषज्ञता  differences of ions such as  सोडियम  , potassium , chloride , and calcium .
परिवर्तन  in the  cross-membrane  voltage can alter the function of  voltage-dependent  ion  चैनल्स  .
If the voltage  परिवर्तन  by a  विशाल  enough amount  ,   an  all-or-none electrochemical  पल्स  called an  कार्रवाई   संभावित  is generated  ,  which travels rapidly along the  कोशिका  's axon ,  और  activates synaptic  कनेक्शन्स  with other  कोशिकाएं   जब  it  आगमन  .
Neurons do  नहीं  undergo  कोशिका   प्रभाग  .
In most cases , neurons are generated by special  प्रकार  of stem cells .
Astrocytes , a type  of  glial cell ,  have   भी  been observed  to  turn into neurons by virtue of  the  stem cell characteristic pluripotency .
In humans , neurogenesis  largely  ceases  दौरान  adulthood—but  in  two brain areas , the hippocampus and olfactory bulb  ,  there is  दमदार  evidence for  पीढी  of substantial numbers of new  न्यूरॉन्स  .
सुपर  Bowl XLIII  थी  an American football  खेल  between the  अमरीकी  Football Conference ( AFC  )   चैंपियन  Pittsburgh  स्टीलर्स  and  the  National  फ़ुटबॉल  Conference ( NFC )  चैंपियन  Arizona  कार्डिनल्स  to decide the National Football League  (  NFL ) champion for  the   2008  season .
The  स्टीलर्स  defeated the Cardinals by  the  score of  27–23  .
The game  थी  played  on  February 1  ,   2009  , at Raymond James Stadium  in  Tampa , Florida .
With  इस  win , the Steelers became  the  first team to  जीत  six Super Bowls .
Pittsburgh , who finished the  नियमित   ऋतु  with a 12–4  रिकार्ड   ,  also won their second Super Bowl in four years after winning  सुपर   कटोरी  XL at the end  of  the 2005 season .
The Cardinals  डाला  the  खेल   seeking   उनके   पहला  NFL title since  1947  ,  the  longest championship drought  in   the  league .
The club became an unexpected  विजेता  during the  नियमित  season , compiling a 9–7  रिकार्ड  , and  the   playoffs   साथ   the  aid of  सिर  coach Ken  whisenhunt   ,  who was  the  Steelers ' offensive coordinator in Super  कटोरी  XL ,  और  the re-emergence of quarterback  कर्ट  Warner  ,  who was the Super  कटोरी  MVP in Super Bowl XXXIV with his  पूर्व  team , St. Louis  मेढ़ों  .
Pittsburgh  कूद   to  a 17–7 halftime lead  ,  aided by  linebacker  James Harrison  's   सुपर  Bowl record 100-yard interception  वापसी   लिये   a  touchdown  .
trailing  20–7 at the start  of   the   चौथी  quarter  ,  Arizona  scored  16  अनुत्तरित  points , including wide receiver Larry  fitzgerald  's  64-yard  touchdown reception , to take the  सीसे  with 2:37 remaining in the game  .
लकिन  the Steelers  marched  78  गज  to  स्कोर  on  चौड़ी   receiver  Santonio Holmes ' 6-yard game-winning touchdown catch with 35 seconds left  .
Holmes , who  caught   नौ  passes for 131  गज  and  a  touchdown , including  चार  receptions for 73 yards on that final game-winning  ड्राइव   ,  was named Super  कटोरी  MVP .
He became the sixth wide receiver to win  the   पुरस्कार  , and  भी  was the third Pittsburgh  receiver   to  win  the  award , following Lynn  swann  and Hines Ward .
Despite the global financial crisis  और  limited amount of ancillary festivities that  हैं  normally held  पहले  the game ,  the  NBC television network  ब्रॉडकास्ट   आकर्षित  an average U.S. audience of 98.7  लाख   दर्शक   ,  making  it  the most watched Super  कटोरी  in history  to  that  पाइंट   .
A diagram of the electromagnetic spectrum  ,  showing various properties  आरपार  the range  of  frequencies  और  wavelengths
The  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  spectrum is  the  range of  सब  possible frequencies of electromagnetic radiation .
the   ``   इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  spectrum '' of an  ऑब्जेक्ट  has a different meaning  ,  and is instead the characteristic distribution of electromagnetic radiation  उत्सर्जित  or absorbed by  कि  particular object .
The electromagnetic  वर्णक्रम  extends  इससे   नीचे  the  कम  frequencies used for modern  रेडियो  communication to gamma radiation at the short- wavelength (  high-frequency   )  end , thereby covering wavelengths  इससे   हज़ारों  of kilometers down to a  भिन्न  of the size of an  अणु  .
The limit  लिये  long wavelengths is the size  of  the universe itself  ,  while  it  is  विचार  that the short wavelength  सीमा  is in  the  vicinity of the Planck  लंबाई  , although in principle the spectrum  is  infinite and continuous .
Most parts of  the  electromagnetic spectrum are used  in  science for  spectroscopic   और   अन्य  probing  interactions  , as  तरीके  to study and characterize matter  .
In addition ,  विकिरण   इससे   विभिन्न   भाग  of the spectrum  रै  found many  अन्य  uses for communications and  निर्माण  ( see electromagnetic radiation  लिये  more applications  )  .
