Marchantia ,  a   liverwort
Bryophyte  is  a traditional name used to  refer  to  सब  embryophytes ( land plants  )   कि  do not  have   सच्चा   vascular  tissue and are therefore called  '  non-vascular plants ' .
Some bryophytes  do  have  specialized   ऊतकों  for the transport of water  ;  however since  ये  do  नहीं   contain   lignin  ,  वे  are not  माना  to be  सच्चा  vascular  ऊतक  .
Currently  bryophytes  are  विचार  not  to  be a natural or monophyletic group  ;  however the name  is  convenient and remains in use as  a   सामूहिक  term for  mosses  , hornworts  ,   और   liverworts   .
Bryophytes produce enclosed reproductive structures  (  gametangia and  sporangia  ) , but  वे   उपज  neither flowers nor  बीज  ,  reproducing  via spores .
The  पद  bryophyte comes from Greek βρύον , bryon ,  ``  tree-moss  ,  oyster-green ''  +  φυτόν  -   phyton  `` plant '' .
a  bank is  a  financial institution and  a  financial intermediary  कि  accepts deposits and channels  those  deposits into lending activities , either directly  by  loaning or  indirectly  through  पूंजी   बाज़ार  .
A bank is the  कनेक्शन  between  ग्राहक  that  have  capital deficits and customers with capital surpluses .
Due to their influence within a financial system  और  an  अर्थव्यवस्था  , banks are  generally  highly  regulated  in most countries .
सबसे  banks operate under a system  ज्ञात  as fractional reserve  बैंकिंग  where they  थाम   तभी   a   छोटी  reserve  of   the  funds deposited  और  lend out the  बाकी  for  लाभ   .
They  हैं   generally  subject to  न्यूनतम  capital requirements which  हैं  based on an international set  of  capital standards ,  ज्ञात   as  the Basel  accords   .
the  oldest bank still  in  existence is Monte dei Paschi di  सियेना  , headquartered in Siena  ,   इटली  , which has  महरूम   ऑपरेटिंग  continuously  चूंकि  1472  .
it   is  followed  by  Berenberg  बैंको   of   हैम्बर्ग  ( 1590 ) and Sveriges Riksbank of  स्वीडन  ( 1668 ) .
Banking  in  its modern  भाव  evolved in rich  शहरों  of Renaissance Italy ,  ऐसे   as  Florence  ,   वेनिस   और   जेनोआ  .
In the  इतिहास   of   बैंकिंग  ,  a  number of banking  dynasties  —among  उन्हें  notably  medici   ,   fugger  ,  welser   ,  Berenberg  ,   baring  and Rothschild —have played a central role  over  many centuries .
The Xbox  is  a  वीडियो  game console manufactured  by  Microsoft .
it  was released on November  15  , 2001 in North  अमेरिका  , February  22  ,  2002  in Japan , and March 14  ,  2002 in Australia and  यूरोपीय   .
It was Microsoft  's  first foray into the gaming console market .
as  part  of   the   sixth-generation  of gaming ,  the  Xbox competed with Sony 's PlayStation  2  , Sega 's Dreamcast  (  which stopped American sales before the  एक्सबॉक्स  went  on  sale  )  ,  और  Nintendo  's  GameCube .
The Xbox was the first console  offered   by  an American  कम्पनी   बाद  the Atari Jaguar stopped  बिक्री   in   1996  .
The  एकीकृत  Xbox Live service launched  in   नवम्बर   2002  allowed  खिलाड़ी  to play games  ऑनलाइन  with  a  broadband connection .
It  पहला   competed  with Dreamcast 's  ऑनलाइन  service but later primarily competed with  प्लेस्टेशन   2  's  ऑनलाइन  service .
Although these two are free while Xbox Live  जरूरी  a subscription  ,   as  well as broadband-only  कनेक्शन  which was not  completely  adopted yet , Xbox  सजीव   थी  a success due to  बेहतर  servers , features  ऐसे  as a buddy  सूची  , and milestone titles like Halo 2 released in  नवम्बर  2004  ,   जिससे  is the  best-selling  Xbox  वीडियो  game and was by far  the  most popular  ऑनलाइन  game for years .
Xbox 's successor , the Xbox  360   ,   थी   शुभारम्भ   in  November 2005 .
the   एक्सबॉक्स  was discontinued in late 2005  in  Japan where sales  यहूद   ग़रीब   .
it  was discontinued in late 2006  in  Europe and early 2007 in  उत्तर  America  .
the   पिछला   एक्सबॉक्स  game in Europe was Tony Hawk 's  प्रोजेक्ट  8 released in  नवम्बर  2006 ,  और   the  last game  in  North America was Madden NFL 09 released in  अगस्त  2008 .
Support for out-of-warranty Xbox consoles was  discontinued  on  कूच   2  ,  2009   ,   stating  that any  in-warranty  repair now  needed   होगा  not be undertaken .
Xbox access to  एक्सबॉक्स   सजीव   थी  stopped on April 15 , 2010 .
The Gospel  according  to John  (  Greek  τὸ  κατὰ Ἰωάννην  εὐαγγέλιον  ) , commonly referred to as the Gospel of John  or  simply John and often  referred  to  in   नई  Testament scholarship as the Fourth Gospel , is an  खाता  of  the  public  मंत्रालय  of Jesus .
It begins  साथ  the witness and  प्रतिज्ञान   by  John the  बैपटिस्ट  and  concludes  with the death ,  दफ़न   ,   क़यामत   ,   और  post-resurrection appearances of Jesus .
इस   खाता   is  fourth  of  the canonical gospels , after the synoptics Matthew  ,  Mark and Luke .
राज्य  that the book  गर्भाशयी  from the  गवाही  of the ' disciple  जिसको  Jesus loved .  '
Along with Peter , the unnamed  शिष्य  is especially close  to   यीशु  , and early-church  परंपरा   पहचाना   उसे  as John the  apostle  , one of Jesus  '  Twelve  रसूलों   .
the  gospel  is  closely related  in  style and content to  the   तीन   surviving  Epistles of John such that commentators treat  the  four books together , yet  ,  according to most modern scholars , John was  नहीं  the author  of  any  of  these books .
Recent Christian Scripture scholarship  अधिक   और   अधिक  has placed John within  a   first-century  Jewish context .
रेमंड  E. Brown  किया  pioneering work to  ट्रेस   the   विकास  of  the   परंपरा  from which the gospel arose  .
The discourses seem to be concerned  साथ   the  actual issues  of  the church-and-synagogue debate at  the  time when  the  Gospel was written .
It is notable that , in the  इन्जील  ,  the   जातियाँ   स्टिल  appears to define itself primarily against Judaism ,  बल्कि   than  as part  of  a  wider  Christian church .
हालांकि  Christianity  प्रारंभ   as  a movement  भीतर  Judaism , gradually Christians  और   यहूदियों  became bitterly opposed .
John presents a ``  उच्चतर   ''   christology  than  the   synoptics  , meaning  कि  it describes Jesus as the  अवतार  of the divine Logos  through  whom all things were  बना  , as the object of veneration  ,   और   अधिक   explicitly  as God  incarnate  .
Only in John does Jesus talk at length about  खुद   और   उसके  divine  भूमिका  , often shared with  the  disciples only .
Against the synoptics , John focuses largely on different miracles ( including resurrecting  lazarus  ) , given as signs meant to  engender   आस्था   .
synoptic  elements such as  parables  and exorcisms are  नहीं   मिला  in John .
It  presents   a  realized  eschatology  in which salvation is  already  present for the believer .
The  plagues  of Egypt (  )  , also called the Ten  plagues  ( ) or the Biblical  plagues  ,  यहूद  ten calamities  कि  , according to  the   biblical  Book of Exodus  ,   इसराईल  's  परमेश्वर  , Yahweh , inflicted  upon  Egypt to  राजी  Pharaoh to release the ill-treated  israelites  from slavery .
pharaoh   capitulated   बाद  the  दसवाँ  plague ,  triggering  the  exodus  of the Jewish people .
The plagues were designed to  कंट्रास्ट  the power of Yahweh  साथ  the  नपुंसकता  of  मिश्र   's  various gods .
कुछ  commentators have associated several of  the  plagues  साथ   निर्णय  on specific gods associated with  the  Nile  ,   प्रजनन   और  natural phenomena .
The plagues of Egypt are also mentioned  in   the  Quran (  7,133–136  ) .
according  to the  किताब   of  Exodus , God proclaims  कि   सब   the  gods  of  Egypt will be judged through the  दसवाँ  and  फाइनल  plague:
John Martin 's painting of the  प्लेग  of hail and fire  (  1823  )   .
A role-playing game ( RPG and sometimes roleplaying  खेल  )  is   a  game in which players assume the roles of characters in  a   fictional   सेटिंग   .
खिलाड़ी  take responsibility  लिये  acting  आउट  these  भूमिकाएँ  within  a  narrative  ,   either  through literal acting or through  a   प्रक्रम  of structured decision-making or character  विकास   .
क्रियाएँ  taken within many games succeed or  असफल   according   to  a formal system of rules and  दिशानिर्देश   .
वहीँ  are several forms of  आरपीजी   .
The original  रूप  , sometimes  पुकारा  the tabletop RPG , is conducted  through  discussion ,  whereas  in live action  role-playing   खेल  ( LARP ) players  physically   perform  their characters ' actions .
In both of  ये  forms  ,  an arranger called a game master (  gm  )  प्रायः   decides  on the  नियम  and  सेटिंग  to be used and acts as  रेफरी  , while each of  the  other players  plays  the role of a  सिंगल   अक्षर  .
अनेक  varieties of RPG also exist in electronic media , such as  multi-player   text-based  MUDs and their graphics-based  successors   ,  massively multiplayer  ऑनलाइन  role-playing  खेल   (  MMORPGs ) .
Role-playing games also include  single-player   ऑफ़लाइन  role-playing video games in which players  कंट्रोल  a character or team who undertake quests  ,  and may include capabilities that advance using statistical mechanics .
ये  games often  share  settings and rules with  tabletop  RPGs  ,  but emphasize character  उन्नति  more  than   collaborative  storytelling  .
despite  this variety of forms , some game  फ़ॉर्म   ऐसे  as trading card games  और  wargames that are related to role-playing  खेल  may not be  शामिल   .
Role-playing  कार्यकलाप  may  sometimes  be present in such games  ,  but it  is  not the primary  फ़ोकस  .
the  term  is   भी  sometimes used to  describe  roleplay simulation games and exercises used in teaching , training  ,  and  अकादमिक   शोध  .
The American Civil War ( ACW ) , also known as the War  between   the  States or  बस  the  सिविल   युद्ध   (  see naming )  ,   थी  a civil  युद्ध   लड़ा  from 1861 to 1865 between  the   संयुक्त  States  (  the ``  संघ  '' or  the   ``   उत्तर   ''  )  और  several Southern  स्लेव  states that declared their  secession  and  formed  the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the  ``   दक्षिण  '' ) .
the   युद्ध  had  इसके  origin in the issue of slavery  ,   विशेषकर  the extension of  गुलामी   into  the western territories  .
Foreign  शक्तियां  did not  intervene  .
बाद  four years of  खूनी   कॉम्बैट  that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed  much   of  the South 's  अवसंरचना  , the Confederacy  collapsed  , slavery was abolished  ,   और  the difficult  पुनर्निर्माण  process  of  restoring  नेशनल  unity and guaranteeing rights to  the  freed slaves began  .
in  the 1860 presidential election , Republicans  ,  led  by  Abraham Lincoln , opposed expanding  गुलामी  into  संयुक्त   राज्य  ' territories .
lincoln  won ,  लकिन  before  उसके  inauguration on March  4   ,   1861   ,  seven cotton-based  स्लेव  states formed the Confederacy  .
Outgoing Democratic President James Buchanan and the incoming  republicans  rejected secession  as  illegal  .
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared his administration would not  initiate  civil war  .
Eight  बाकी  slave states continued to reject  काल्स  for secession .
Confederate forces  जब्त  numerous  संघीय   दुर्गों  within territory claimed by the Confederacy .
a   सलाम  Conference failed to find a compromise , and both sides prepared for war .
The  confederates  assumed that European  देशों  were  so  dependent on `` King Cotton `` that  वे  would  intervene  ;  none  did  और  none recognized  the  new Confederate States  of   अमेरिका  .
Hostilities began  on  April  12  , 1861 , when  confederate   शक्तियां  fired upon Fort  sumter  , a  कुंजी   फोर्ट  held  by   संघ   सैनिकों  in  दक्षिण   कैरोलिना  .
lincoln   पुकारा   लिये  each  राज्य  to provide  सैनिकों  to retake  the   फोर्ट  ; consequently  ,   चार  more slave  राज्य  joined the Confederacy , bringing  उनके   कुल  to eleven .
the  Union soon controlled  the   किनारा   राज्य   और  established  a  naval blockade that crippled the southern economy .
The  पूर्वी  Theater  थी  inconclusive  in  1861–62  .
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign  into  Maryland  (  a  संघ  state ) ended with Confederate  रिट्रीट  at the Battle  of  Antietam , dissuading  अंग्रेजों  intervention .
Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation , which made ending slavery a war goal .
to  the west  ,  by summer  1862  the Union destroyed  the  Confederate river navy  ,   तब   much  of their  पश्चिमी  armies , and the  संघ   at  Vicksburg split the Confederacy in  दो  at the Mississippi River  .
in  1863 ,  रॉबर्ट  E. Lee 's  confederate  incursion north ended at  the  Battle of  gettysburg   .
Western successes  led  to  ulysses  S. Grant command of all  संघ  armies  in   1864   .
in  the Western Theater  ,  William T.  शरमन  drove east to  कैप्चर  Atlanta and marched  to  the sea , destroying Confederate infrastructure along the  रास्ता  .
The  संघ  marshaled the resources  और  manpower to attack  the  Confederacy from all  दिशानिर्देश  , and could afford to fight battles of attrition through the  overland   अभियान  towards Richmond , the Confederate  पूंजी   .
The defending  confederate  army failed  ,  leading to  ली  's surrender  to  Grant at Appomattox Court House  on  April 9 , 1865 .
the   अमरीकी   सिविल  War was  एक  of the earliest  सच्चा   औद्योगिक   युद्धों  .
Railroads ,  the  telegraph , steamships ,  और  mass-produced weapons  यहूद  employed  extensively  .
The  mobilization   of  civilian factories ,  खानों  , shipyards , banks , transportation and  खाना  supplies  सब  foreshadowed World  युद्ध  I .
It remains  the   deadliest   युद्ध   in   अमरीकी  history , resulting in the deaths of  an  estimated  750,000  soldiers  और  an undetermined number of civilian  हताहत  .
इतिहासकार  John Huddleston estimates  the  death toll at ten  प्रतिशत  of all  उत्तरी   males  20–45 years old  ,  and 30 percent of all  दक्षिणी   श्वेत  males  aged  18–40  .
The definition of the  संसार   's  busiest airport has  महरूम  specified by the Airports Council International in Geneva , Switzerland .
The ACI defines  और  measures the following  तीन  types  of  airport  traffic:
यात्री   ट्रैफ़िक  :  कुल  passengers emplaned and deplaned , passengers in  पारगमन   गिने  once
Cargo traffic : loaded and  मोड  freight and mail in  मीट्रिक   टन
Traffic  आंदोलनों  :  अवतरण  and take-offs of aircraft
World War I ( WWI  )   थी  a  वैश्विक  war  केंद्रित  in  यूरोपीय  that began  on   28   जुलाई  1914 and lasted until 11 November 1918  .
It was predominantly  पुकारा  the World War or the Great  युद्ध   इससे  its occurrence until  the   प्रारंभ  of  संसार   युद्ध  II  in   1939  , and the  पहला   संसार  War or World War I thereafter .
it  involved all the world  's   ग्रेट   शक्तियां  ,  जिससे  were  समवेत  in two opposing  alliances  : the Allies ( based  on  the Triple  entente  of the United  किंगडम  , France  और  Russia ) and the  सेंट्रल  Powers (  originally  the Triple  गठबंधन  of Germany , Austria-Hungary and Italy ;  लकिन  , as  austria–hungary  had  लिया   the  offensive  विरूद्ध  the agreement  ,  Italy did not enter into  the  war )  .
These alliances were  दोनो   reorganised   और  expanded  as   अधिक  nations  डाला  the war : Italy , Japan and the  संयुक्त  States joined the Allies ,  और   the  Ottoman Empire  और  Bulgaria the  सेंट्रल  Powers .
Ultimately , more than 70  लाख  military personnel ,  सहित   60   लाख  Europeans ,  यहूद  mobilised in one of the largest wars  in  history  .
अधिक  than 9  लाख  combatants were killed , largely because of  technological  advancements that  led   to  enormous increases in the lethality of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility .
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict  in  world history ,  subsequently   paving  the way for various political changes , such as revolutions  in  many of  the  nations involved .
One of  the  long-term causes of the war was  the  resurgence of imperialism in the  विदेशी  policies of  the  great  शक्तियां   of   यूरोपीय  .
More immediately , the assassination of Archduke  फ्रांज   फर्डिनेंड  of Austria , the heir to the throne of  austria-hungary   ,  on 28 June  1914  by  यूगोस्लाव  nationalist Gavrilo Princip  in   साराजेवो   triggered  a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an  ultimatum  to the Kingdom of  सर्बिया   .
Several alliances formed over  the  previous decades were invoked .
Within weeks  ,  the major powers were  at  war and , via  उनके  colonies , the conflict soon  स्प्रेड  around the world .
on  28 July ,  the  Austro-Hungarians fired  the   पहला  shots  of  the  युद्ध   as   तैयारी   लिये  the  आक्रमण  of  सर्बिया   .
While the Russians  mobilised   ,  the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the  रास्ता  to France , providing a casus  belli  for Britain 's declaration of  युद्ध  against Germany .
After the  जर्मनी   कूच  on  पेरिस  was brought to a  halt—the  so-called Miracle  of  the Marne —the Western Front settled into  a   स्थिर  battle of attrition with  a  trench line that changed little until 1917 .
On  the   पूर्वी   सामने   ,   the   रूसी  army was successful  विरूद्ध  the Austro-Hungarians  ,  but was stopped  in  its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans .
in  November  the   उस्मानी   साम्राज्य   joined  the war ,  खोलने  up fronts in the Caucasus , Mesopotamia and the Sinai .
Italy and Bulgaria went  to   युद्ध  in 1915  और  Romania in  1916   .
in  Russia , the tsar 's government collapsed in  कूच   1917  and a subsequent revolution  in   नवम्बर  brought the Russians  to   शर्तें  with the Central Powers  .
After  a   1918  German  अप्रिय  along  the  western front  ,  the  allies   drove  back the  germans  in a  श्रेणी  of successful offensives and American  शक्तियां   began   प्रवेश  the trenches .
Germany  ,  which had its own trouble with revolutionaries ,  सहमत   to  an armistice  on   11  November 1918  .
The  युद्ध   ended   in   विजय   लिये  the  allies  .
Events on the  घर  fronts were as tumultuous  as  on the battle fronts , as the  भागीदार   आजमाया   to  mobilize their manpower and economic resources  to  fight  a  total war  .
by  the end  of  the war ,  चार  major imperial powers—the German , Russian , Austro-Hungarian and  उस्मानी   empires—ceased  to exist .
The successor states of the former two lost  a  great amount of territory ,  जबकि   the  latter two  यहूद  dismantled entirely  .
The map of central  यूरोपीय   थी  redrawn  into  several  छोटी  states .
the  League  of   राष्ट्र   थी  formed  in  the  आशा   of  preventing another such conflict  .
The European nationalism spawned by  the  war  और   the  breakup  of   empires  , the  परखना   of  Germany 's defeat and  समस्याएं  with the  सन्धि   of  Versailles  हैं  agreed to be  कारकों   contributing  to World War II  .
The  deepwater  Horizon  आयल  spill ( also referred to as the  bp   आयल  spill , the  bp  oil disaster , the  गल्फ   of  Mexico oil  spill   ,  and the Macondo blowout ) was  an  oil  spill  in the Gulf  of  Mexico  on   the  BP  -operated   macondo  Prospect , considered the largest accidental marine oil  spill   in  the history  of  the  पेट्रोलियम   उद्योग  , estimated to  be  between 8 % and 31 %  larger  in  आवाज़  than the earlier  ixtoc  I oil  spill  .
following   the  explosion  और   डूब   of  the  deepwater  Horizon oil  रिग   ,  which  claimed   11  lives ,  a  sea-floor  आयल   gusher  flowed unabated for 87 days , until it was capped on 15 July 2010  .
The  कुल   निर्वहन  is estimated  at   .
A massive response ensued to  protect  beaches ,  वेटलैंड्स  and  मुहानों  from  the  spreading  आयल  utilizing skimmer ships , floating booms , controlled burns and of Corexit  आयल   dispersant   .
After several  विफल  efforts  to  contain the flow , the  खूब  was declared sealed  on  19 September  2010   .
Some reports  indicate  the  खूब  site continues  to   लीक  .
Due  to  the months-long  spill   ,  along with  प्रतिकूल   प्रभाव  from the  जवाब  and cleanup  क्रियाएँ  ,  extensive  damage to marine and  वन्यजीव  habitats ,  फ़िशिंग  and tourism industries , and human health problems  have  continued through  2013.three  years after the  spill  , tar balls  could  still be found  on  the  मिसिसिपी  coast .
Numerous investigations explored the causes of the explosion and record-setting spill  .
notably   ,  the U.S. government 's  सितंबर  2011 report pointed to defective  सीमेंट  on the well , faulting mostly BP , but also  खूब  operator Transocean and  ठेकेदार   halliburton   .
Earlier in 2011 , a White House commission likewise blamed BP  और  its partners  लिये   a  series of cost-cutting decisions and an insufficient safety  प्रणाली  , but also  concluded  that the spill  resulted  from  ``  systemic  ''  root causes and  ``  absent significant reform in both industry  practices  and government policies , might  खूब  recur '' .
in   नवम्बर   2012  , BP  और  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  Department of Justice settled federal criminal charges with BP pleading  अपराधी  to 11  रिश्तो  of manslaughter  ,   दो   misdemeanors  ,  और  a  felony   गिनती   of  lying to Congress .
bp  also  सहमत  to four years of government monitoring of its safety practices and ethics  ,  and the  पर्यावरणीय   सुरक्षा  Agency  घोषित  that  bp  would be temporarily banned  इससे   नई  contracts with  the   us  government .
bp   और  the  विभाग   of  Justice agreed to  a   record-setting  $ 4.525 billion  in  fines  और  other payments but  further  legal proceedings not  अपेक्षित  to  conclude  until  2014   हैं   जारी  to determine payouts  और   जुर्माना  under the  साफ  Water Act and the Natural  संसाधन  Damage  मूल्यांकन   .
As  of  February 2013  ,  criminal  और  civil  settlements   और  payments  to   a  trust fund had cost the company  $  42.2 billion  .
`` Where the  गलियों  Have No Name '' is  a  song by rock  बैंड   u2  .
It is the opening track from their  1987   एल्बम   the  Joshua  पेड़  and was  released  as the album  's  third  सिंगल   in  August 1987  .
The song 's  आँकड़ा   is  a repeating guitar  arpeggio   using  a delay  प्रभाव  , played during  the  song  's   परिचय  and again at the  समाप्त  .
Lead  vocalist  Bono wrote the lyrics in  जवाब   to   the  notion that it is possible to identify  a  person 's  धर्म  and income  आधारित   on  the street on which they lived ,  विशेषकर   in   belfast   .
During the band 's difficulties  रिकॉर्डिंग  the song ,  निर्माता  Brian Eno considered erasing the song  's   टेपों   to   have   उन्हें  start from scratch .
`` Where the Streets Have  no  Name ''  थी  praised  by   आलोचकों  and became  a  commercial success , peaking at  क्रमांक  thirteen in the US , number fourteen in Canada  ,  number ten in  the  Netherlands  ,  and  क्रमांक  four in the United Kingdom .
The song  रै   become  one of the band  's  most popular songs and  रै   remained   a  staple of  उनके  live act since the  सोंग  debuted in  1987  on The Joshua Tree  दौरे   .
The song was notably performed on a Los  एंजिल्स  rooftop  लिये  the filming of  इसके   म्यूज़िक   वीडियो   ,   जिससे  won a Grammy Award for Best  प्रदर्शन  Music Video  .recently   the  song  रै  been used  by  the  एनएफएल  's  बाल्टीमोर  Ravens as their  प्रवेश  song in Super Bowl XLVII
थामस  Jeffrey `` Tom '' Hanks ( born July 9  ,   1956   )  is  an  American actor  ,  producer ,  लेखक   ,  and director .
Hanks  is  known for his  भूमिकाएँ  in Apollo  13   ,  Big , That  बात  You  do  !
, The  ग्रीन  Mile , You  've  Got  मेल  , Sleepless  in  Seattle , Charlie  विल्सन  's  युद्ध  , Catch Me If You Can  ,   फॉरेस्ट  Gump , Cast  दूर   ,   a  League  of   उनके  Own , The Da  विंची   कोड  ,  फ़रिश्ते   &  Demons , as well as  एनिमेटेड  films  जैसे  the Toy Story film  श्रेणी  ,  the  Polar Express  ,  and The Simpsons Movie  .
He has earned  और  been  मनोनीत  for numerous  पुरस्कार   दौरान   उसके  career ,  सहित   जीतना  a  सुनहरी  Globe for Best Actor and an  अकादमी  Award for Best Actor  लिये   उसके  role in Philadelphia and  a   सुनहरी  Globe ,  an   अकादमी  Award , a Screen Actors  गिल्ड   पुरस्कार   ,   और  a People 's Choice Award for Best Actor for  उसके  role in Forrest Gump , and earning  the  Stanley Kubrick Britannia Award for Excellence in Film from the BAFTAs  in   2004  .
Hanks is also  ज्ञात  for  उसके  collaboration  साथ  film  निदेशक  Steven Spielberg on Saving Private Ryan and the  mini-series  Band of  भाइयो  , which  शुभारम्भ  Hanks also as a  कामयाब  director , producer and writer .
As of  2012   ,   हैंक्स  ' films have grossed over  $  4.2 billion at the  संयुक्त  States box  दफ्तर  alone , and over  $  8.5 billion  विश्वव्यापी  making him the  उच्चतम  all-time  बक्सा  office star  .
the   केप  is an American superhero drama series .
it   premiered  on NBC during the 2010–2011 television season  as  a mid-season replacement beginning with  a  two-hour  पायलट  episode on Sunday , January  9  , 2011 at 9 pm  पूर्वी  and Pacific  समय  .
An  encore  played on  सोमवार  , January 10 , with follow-up episodes  continuing  on Monday evenings  in  the 9 pm timeslot beginning on January  17  .
NBC subsequently cut the total number of episodes to be aired from 13 to 10 as a  परिणाम   of  low ratings  .
On  कूच  2  ,  2011 , NBC  घोषित  that the  श्रेणी  finale would only be aired on the  संजाल   's  website .
Halley 's Comet or Comet Halley (  or   )   ,  officially designated 1P/Halley , is the best-known of the short-period comets and is  दृश्य  from Earth  प्रत्येक  75–76  सालो  .
हैली  is  the  only short-period comet that  is  clearly visible to  the  naked  नजर  from Earth , and thus  the  only naked-eye  धूमकेतु  that might appear twice in  a  human  आजीवन  .
अन्य   naked-eye  comets may  be  brighter  और   अधिक  spectacular  ,   लकिन  will  appear  only  एकबार  in thousands  of  years .
Halley 's returns to the inner Solar System have been  observed  and recorded  by   खगोलशास्त्रियों   चूंकि   at  least 240 BCE  .
Clear records of  the  comet 's appearances  यहूद  made  by  Chinese  ,   babylonian  , and medieval European chroniclers , but were  नहीं  recognized as reappearances  of   the   वही   ऑब्जेक्ट   at  the  समय  .
The  धूमकेतु  's periodicity was first determined  in  1705 by English astronomer Edmond Halley , after whom it  is  now named .
Halley 's Comet  पिछला  appeared  in   the  inner  सौर  System  in  1986 and will next  appear  in mid-2061 .
दौरान  its  1986  apparition , Halley became  the   पहला  comet to be observed in detail by spacecraft , providing the first  observational  data on the structure of a comet nucleus and the  यांत्रिकी  of coma and  टेल  formation  .
These observations supported a number of  longstanding  hypotheses about comet  निर्माण  , particularly Fred  whipple  's `` dirty snowball  ''  model , which correctly predicted that Halley would be composed of  a  mixture of volatile  ices   –  such as  जल  ,  कार्बन   डाइऑक्साइड   और  ammonia – and dust  .
the   मिशन   भी  provided  आंकड़ा  which  substantially   reformed   और   reconfigured   ये   विचार  ; for  उदाहरण  it  is  now  समझा  that  हैली  's  सतह   is  largely composed of dusty ,  non-volatile  materials , and that  तभी  a small  portion  of  it  is icy .
The following is a list of  the  most populous incorporated places of the  संयुक्त  States of America  .
as   पारिभाषित   by  the United States Census Bureau  ,  an  ``   incorporated  place  ``  includes a variety of  designations   ,  including  नगर  , town  ,  village , borough , and municipality .
A few  असाधारण  Census Designated Places ( CDPs  )  are  भी   शामिल   in   the  Census Bureau 's  लिस्टिंग   of  incorporated places  .
Consolidated city-counties  represent  a  पृथक  type  of  government  कि  includes the entire population of a county , or county equivalent .
कुछ  consolidated city-counties , however , include multiple incorporated places .
इस  list  presents  only that  portion  ( or `` balance '' )  of  such  संचित   city-counties  that are not a part of  another   incorporated   प्लेस   .
Note  कि  this list refers only to  the  population  of  individual municipalities within their defined  हद  , which does  नहीं  include  अन्य  municipalities or  unincorporated  suburban areas within urban  agglomerations  .
a   अलग  ranking  is   evident  when considering U.S.  महानगर   क्षेत्रफल  populations  .
The  mayflower   थी  the  जलयान  that  in  1620  transported  102 English Pilgrims , including a core group  of  Separatists , to New England .
Their  स्टोरी  is one  of   travail  and survival in  a  harsh New World environment .
a  New  जीलैंड  forward  (  in white ) takes a shot  on  goal  विरूद्ध  Cameroon  in   the   2011  FIFA U-20 World Cup .
Forwards  ,  also  ज्ञात  as  strikers   ,  are the  खिलाड़ी   on   a  team in association football who  खेल  nearest to  the  opposing team  's  goal  ,  and  हैं  therefore principally  जिम्मेदार  for scoring  लक्ष्य  .
This very advanced position  और   इसके   सीमित  defensive responsibilities mean forwards  सामान्यतः   स्कोर  more goals than other players .
This position  requires  intelligence , speed , and power , both  of  execution  और   of  thought ,  to  perform the role well  .
आधुनिक  team formations usually include one to three forwards ; two is the most  आम  .
Coaches typically field one striker who plays in an advanced  स्थिति   (  the centre forward ) , and another attacking  आगे  who plays somewhat  deeper  and assists in  बनाना  goals  as   खूब   as  scoring ( the second striker  )  .
It  चाहिए  be noted that inside forwards develop  इससे   attacking   midfield  positions  और  hence are naturally midfielders .
बार्सिलोना   fc  star Lionel Messi is  a  typical Attacking Midfielder seen as a forward due to his  शॉट  accuracy .
a  California domestic  साझेदारी  is  a  legal relationship available  to  same-sex couples ,  और  to certain  opposite-sex  couples in which at  तनिक  one  पार्टी  is at least  18  years of age .
it   affords  the  युगल  `` the same rights  ,  protections  ,  and benefits  ,   और  ... the same  जिम्मेदारियों  , obligations , and duties under law  ...   ''  as married spouses .
Enacted  in  1999 , the domestic  साझेदारी  registry was  the  first of its  दयालु  in the  संयुक्त  States created by a legislature without  अदालत  intervention .
Initially , domestic  partnerships  enjoyed very few privileges—principally just  hospital-visitation  rights and the right to be  claimed   as  a next  of  kin of the estate of  a   मृतक  partner .
The legislature has since  विस्तारित   the  scope of California domestic  partnerships  to include all of  the   अधिकारों  and  जिम्मेदारियों  common to  विवाह  .
As such , California domestic partnerships are  functionally   समतुल्य   to   सिविल   संघ   offered  in several other states .
Although  the  program  enjoys  broad support  in   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , it  रै  been the source of some controversy  .
Groups opposed to  the   मान्यता  of same-sex  परिवारों   have  challenged  the  expansion of domestic  partnerships   in  court .
Conversely ,  अधिवक्ताओं  of same-sex marriage  contend   कि   anything  less than full marriage  अधिकारों  extended to  same-sex  partners is  analogous  to  the  `` separate but  बराबर  '' racial laws of the  जिम  Crow era .
Mark  A.   जैक्सन   (   born  April  1   ,  1965 ) is an  अमरीकी  basketball coach , and former player who is the current head coach of the  सुनहरी   राज्य  Warriors  of  the NBA .
a  point  गार्ड  from  st.  John  's  University ,  he  played  लिये   the  New York Knicks ,  इंडियाना  Pacers  ,  Los Angeles Clippers  ,   डेनवर  Nuggets  ,   टोरंटो  Raptors , Utah Jazz and Houston Rockets in the  एनबीए  in  a  career spanning from  1987  to 2004 .
Jackson has also worked as a  कमेंटेटर   लिये  ESPN and  एबीसी  alongside his former  कोच  Jeff Van Gundy and play-by-play man Mike  breen  .
he  was previously an NBA  विश्लेषक  for  the   यस   संजाल   's  New Jersey Nets  खेल  .
दक्षिण  Africa has eleven  आधिकारिक   भाषाएं  :  अफ्रीकी  ,  अंग्रेज़ी  , Ndebele , Northern Sotho  ,  Sotho , Swazi  ,   tswana  , Tsonga  ,   venda  , Xhosa and  ज़ुलू  .
Fewer  than  two percent of South  africans  speak a  पहला   भाषा   अन्य  than an official one .
सबसे   दक्षिण  Africans  can  speak  अधिक  than one language .
Dutch and  अंग्रेज़ी  were  the  first official  भाषाएं  of South Africa from  1910  to 1925 .
Afrikaans  थी  added as  a  part of Dutch in 1925  .
Dutch was  replaced  by Afrikaans when South Africa became a  गणतंत्र  in 1961 , and  डच   थी  dropped  in  1983 , so between 1983 and 1994 , South Africa had two  आधिकारिक  languages :  अंग्रेज़ी  and Afrikaans .
the  English version  of  the South African  संविधान  refers to the languages by  the  names in  those   भाषाएं   :  isiZulu ,  isixhosa  , Afrikaans , Sepedi ( referring to  उत्तरी  Sotho ) ,  setswana   ,   अंग्रेज़ी  , Sesotho  (   referring  to Southern Sotho ) ,  xitsonga  , Siswati ,  tshivenda   और   isindebele   (  referring to  दक्षिणी  Ndebele ) .
in  South Africa  ,  Southern Ndebele is  ज्ञात  simply  as   ndebele  ,  as  most  अध्यक्षों  of Northern Ndebele  सजीव  in Zimbabwe .
The 1993 version of  the  Constitution  referred  to  उत्तरी   sotho  as  sesotho   sa  Leboa , but the  1996  version referred to the language as Sepedi .
Different government departments  और  official bodies use different  शर्तें  to denote Northern  sotho  .
the  main  भाषा   of  government  is  English even if South  africans  often take pride in using  स्वदेशी  languages for any purpose .
अफ्रीकी  also  सुविधाएँ  prominently in commerce together with English as  the  languages  साथ  the highest  क्रमांक  of  धाराप्रवाह  speakers  हैं  Afrikaans  और   अंग्रेज़ी  .
In  शर्तें  of linguistic classification ,  the  official languages include two West-Germanic languages ( English  और  Afrikaans ) and nine  bantu   भाषाएं   .
Four of these  हैं   nguni  languages (  ज़ुलू   ,   ख़ोसा   ,  Swati and  ndebele  ) and three  हैं   sotho–tswana   भाषाएं  ( Northern Sotho , Southern Sotho and Tswana ) .
सोंगा  is a  tswa–ronga  language  .
South African Sign Language is a  पृथक   हालांकि   incompletely  emerged national standard language which also subsumes  a  cluster of  semi-standardised  dialects .
एल्युमिनियम   नाइट्रेट  is a salt of aluminium  और  nitric acid , existing  सामान्यतः  as a crystalline  हाइड्रेट   ,  most commonly as aluminium  नाइट्रेट  nonahydrate  ,  Al  (   no3  )  3·9h2o  .
the  New York Jets are a  पेशेवर  football team  headquartered  in  florham  Park ,  नई  Jersey , representing the  नई   यॉर्क   महानगर  area .
the  team is a  सदस्य  of the Eastern Division of the American  फ़ुटबॉल  Conference  (  AFC ) in the National Football League ( NFL ) .
in  a unique arrangement for the league ,  the  Jets share MetLife Stadium in  ईस्ट  Rutherford , New  जर्सी  with  the  New  यॉर्क  Giants .
The franchise is  legally  and  corporately  registered as New York  jets   ,  LLC .
the  team was  संस्थापित  in 1959 as the Titans of New York  ,   an  original member of the  अमरीकी  Football  लीग  ; later ,  the  franchise joined  the  NFL in the  afl–nfl  merger .
the  team began  to   खेल   in  1960 at the Polo  grounds  .
Under new  स्वामित्व   ,   the  current  नाम  was adopted in  1963   और  the  मताधिकार   थी   relocated  to  shea   स्टेडियम  in 1964 and then  to  the Meadowlands Sports  जटिल  in  1984  .
The Jets  उन्नत  to the playoffs for the first time in  1968   और  went on to  compete  in Super Bowl III where they defeated the Baltimore Colts , becoming  the  first AFL  टोली  to  शिकस्त   an  NFL  क्लबों   in  an AFL-NFL World Championship Game  .
चूंकि  1968 , the Jets have appeared  in   the  playoffs thirteen times , and in the  afc  Championship  खेल  four  टाइम्स  , most recently losing to the Pittsburgh  स्टीलर्स   in  2010  .
however  ,  the   jets   have  never returned  to  the Super Bowl ,  बनाना  them one of three NFL  टीमों   to   जीत  their lone  सुपर   कटोरी   रूप   ,  along  साथ   the  New Orleans Saints  और   tampa  Bay Buccaneers .
The  टोली  's training facility , Atlantic Health Jets Training Center , which  खोली  in 2008 , is located in Florham Park  .
The team currently holds their  सालाना   प्रशिक्षण  camp  सत्र  on the  कैम्पस  of the State  विश्वविद्यालयों  of New  यॉर्क  at  cortland   in   cortland  ,  नई  York while holding  occasional   सत्र   at  the Florham Park complex .
psilocybe  semilanceata
Psilocybin mushrooms , also known  as   साइकेडेलिक  mushrooms , are fungi  कि   contain  psychoactive indole alkaloids .
There are multiple  colloquial   शर्तें   लिये  psilocybin  मशरूम   ,  the  सबसे  common being shrooms and magic mushrooms .
Biological genera  containing   psilocybin  mushrooms include Agrocybe  ,   conocybe  ,  copelandia   ,   galerina  , Gerronema ,  gymnopilus  ,  hypholoma  , Inocybe ,  mycena   ,  Panaeolus ,  pluteus   ,   और  Psilocybe .
There  हैं  approximately  190  species  of  psilocybin mushrooms and most  of  them fall in the genus Psilocybe  .
Psilocybin mushrooms have likely  महरूम  used  चूंकि   प्रागैतिहासिक  times and may have been depicted in  चट्टान  art  .
अनेक  cultures have used these  मशरूम  in  धार्मिक  rites .
In  आधुनिक  Western society  वे   हैं  used recreationally  लिये  their psychedelic  प्रभाव   .
Recent  अध्ययन  done  at   इम्पीरियल   कॉलेज  London and  जॉन्स  Hopkins School of  आयुर्विज्ञान  conclude that when used  properly  ,  psilocybin  acts as  an  anti-depressant  as  suggested by fMRI brain scans  .
Alaska  (  )  is  a state  in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  , situated in the  उत्तरपश्चिम  extremity of the North American continent , with  the  international boundary  साथ  Canada  to   the   ईस्ट  , the Arctic Ocean to the  उत्तर  , and the Pacific  समंदर   to  the west and south , with Russia further west  आरपार   the  Bering Strait .
अलास्का  is the largest state in the United States by area ,  the  4th least populous and  the   तनिक  densely populated of the 50 United States .
Approximately half  of  Alaska 's 731,449 residents  सजीव  within the Anchorage metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल   .
Alaska 's economy  is  dominated  by  the  आयल   ,   प्राकृतिक   गैस   ,   और  fishing industries ;  it  has  ये  resources in abundance .
Alaska was purchased from Russia on March 30 , 1867 , for  $  7.2  लाख   (  $ adjusted for inflation ) at approximately  दो  cents per acre  (  $ 4.74/km2 ) .
The  जमीन  went through several  प्रशासनिक  changes before  बनने  an organized (  or   incorporated   )  territory on May 11 ,  1912   ,  and  the  49th state of the  u.S.  on  जनवरी  3 , 1959 .
The  नाम   ``   अलास्का  ''  (  Аляска  )  was  already   introduced  in the  रूसी  colonial period , when  it  was used only for  the   प्रायद्वीप  and is derived from the Aleut  alaxsxaq  , meaning  ``  the mainland '' or , more literally , `` the  ऑब्जेक्ट  towards which  the  action  of  the sea is directed '' .
it   is  also known  as  Alyeska  ,  the `` great land  ''   ,  an Aleut word derived from  the   वही   रूट   .
The 101 French departments  हैं  divided into  342  arrondissements  ,  which may be translated  into  English  as  districts  .
the  capital of an arrondissement/district is called a subprefecture .
When an arrondissement contains the prefecture  (  capital )  of  the  विभाग  , that  प्रीफ़ेक्चर   is  the capital of the arrondissement ,  एक्टिंग  both as  a  prefecture  और  as  a  subprefecture  .
Arrondissements are further  विभाजित   into   cantons  and communes .
The vagina (  इससे  Latin vāgīna  ,  literally `` sheath '' or  ``  scabbard `` ) is  a  tubular tract which is  a  sex organ and has two  प्रमुख  functions ; sexual intercourse  और   प्रसव  .
in  humans  ,   इस  passage  लीड  from the opening of the vulva  to   the   गर्भाशय   (  womb  )   ,  but the vaginal tract ends at the  ग्रीवा  .
Unlike men ,  जो   have   तभी  one genital orifice , women have  दो   ,  the urethra and the vagina  .
the  vaginal  खोलने  is much  larger  than the urethral opening ,  और  both openings are protected by the labia  .
The inner  सांचे  of the vagina has a foldy texture which  can  create friction for  the  penis  दौरान   मैथुन  .
दौरान  arousal , the vagina gets moist to  सुकर   the  entrance of  the   शिश्न  .
The  latinate   बहुवचन   ``  vaginae ''  is  rarely  प्रयुक्त   in   अंग्रेज़ी  .
colloquially  , the word  योनि  is often  प्रयुक्त  to  refer  to  the  vulva  or  to the female genitals  in  general .
However ,  by   इसके   शब्दकोष  and anatomical  परिभाषाएं   ,  vagina refers exclusively  to   the  specific internal  ढांचा  .
The Cincinnati Reds are a Major League  बेसबॉल   टोली  based in Cincinnati ,  ओहियो  .
They are members of  the  National League Central Division .
स्थापित  in  1881  as  an  independent club  ,  the  टोली   became  a charter  सदस्य  of the American Association in 1882 , and  joined   the  National League in 1890 .
The club traditionally traces its origin to baseball  's  first openly professional team  in  1869 .
The Reds have  जीती  five World Series  शीर्षक  , one American  संघ  pennant , nine  नेशनल   लीग   pennants  and  टेन  division titles  .
The Reds played in  the  National  लीग  West between  1969  and 1993 and have been in the  नेशनल  League Central since  1994  .
Since  2003  , the Reds have played at Great American Ball Park  ,  built next to their  घर  from 1970 to 2002 , Riverfront Stadium  .
Bob Castellini  रै  owned the Cincinnati Reds since  2006  .
A prank stink  बमबारी  .
A stink bomb is a device designed to create an unpleasant smell .
They range in effectiveness from simple pranks to  सैन्य  grade malodorants or riot control chemical  एजेंटों  .
the  Guinness Book of Records  सूचियाँ   दो  smelliest substances  .
One is `` US Government  मानक   बाथरूम  Malodor  ''   ;  a  मिश्रण  of  आठ   रसायन  with a  stench  resembling human feces , only much stronger , designed to test the  efficacy   of  deodorizers and air fresheners  .
another   एक  , `` Who me  ?  `` , is  a  mixture of five sulfur-containing chemicals and smells like rotting food and carcasses  .
The adage ``  a  picture is worth a thousand words '' refers to the notion  कि  a complex idea can be conveyed with  बस   a  single  स्टिल  image  .
It  भी  aptly  characterizes  one of the main  लक्ष्य  of  कल्पना   ,   namely   बनाना  it  संभावित  to absorb large amounts of data quickly .
the   अभिव्यक्ति  `` Use a  चित्र  .
It  's  worth a thousand  शब्द  . ''  appears  in a  1911  newspaper article quoting  समाचारपत्र  editor Arthur Brisbane discussing journalism and publicity .
1913  newspaper  विज्ञापन
A similar phrase ,  ``  One Look Is  लायक  A Thousand Words '' , appears in  a   1913  newspaper  विज्ञापन  for the Piqua  स्वचालित   सप्लाई  House of Piqua , Ohio .
An  जल्दी  use  of   the  exact phrase appears  in  an 1918  समाचारपत्र  advertisement for the  सैन  Antonio  लाइट  which  says  : One  of  the  स्वदेश  's Greatest Editors Says : One Picture is  लायक   a  Thousand Words  the  San  अंतोनियो   लाइट   's  Pictorial  पत्रिका   of  the War Exemplifies the truth of the above  बयान  -- judging from  the   गरम  reception it  रै  received at the hands of  the   संडे   लाइट  readers  .
It is  believed  by some  कि  the modern use of the phrase stems from an article by  फ्रेड   R.  Barnard in  the  advertising trade journal Printers '  स्याही  , promoting  the  use of  बिंब  in advertisements that appeared on the sides of  streetcars  .
The December  8   ,  1921 issue  carries  an ad entitled  ,  ``  एक   dekh  is  लायक  A Thousand  शब्द  . ''
Another  ad  by  बर्नार्ड  appears in the  कूच  10 , 1927 issue with  the  phrase `` One Picture Worth Ten Thousand Words , '' where it is  labeled   a  Chinese proverb ( 一圖勝萬言 ) .
the   घर   किताब  of  proverbs  ,  maxims  , and Familiar Phrases  उद्धरण  Barnard  as  saying  he  called it  ``   a  Chinese proverb ,  so  that  लोगों  would take  it  seriously . ''
जल्द   बाद  ,  the  proverb would become  popularly  attributed  to  Confucius .
The  चर्चा   of  ``  एक   चित्र  Worth Thousand  शब्द  '' versus `` One  चित्र  Worth Ten Thousand Words  ''  Wan yen  i   hua  and  10.000  miles  लायक   10.000  books is  cited  in Information graphics where the concept of many  in  different disciplines  और  cultures .
A picture is  लायक  a thousand  शब्द
despite   इस  modern  उत्पत्ति  of  the   लोकप्रिय  phrase , the sentiment has been expressed  by   पहले  writers .
For example the Russian  लेखक   इवान   तुर्गेन्येव  wrote (  in   fathers  and Sons in  1862  )  ,  ``  a   चित्र   shows  me at a glance  कया   it  takes dozens of pages of a book  to   expound  .  ''
कंप्यूटर  programmer and  लेखक  Fred Brooks makes an opposite statement regarding  प्रोग्रामिंग   in   the   mythical  Man-Month : ``  दिखाएँ  me your  flowcharts  and conceal your tables  ,  and I  shall  continue  to   be  mystified .
Show me your tables ,  और  I  won’t  usually need your  flowcharts  ;  they’ll  be  स्पष्ट  . ''
The phrase has also been spoofed by John  मैकार्थी  , the famous computer scientist , to make the opposite point :  ``  As the Chinese say , 1001  शब्द  is worth  अधिक  than a picture  .  ''
A season is a  subdivision   of  the year  ,  marked by changes in weather ,  पारिस्थितिकी   ,  and hours  of  daylight .
सीज़न  result from  the  yearly revolution of the  धरती  around the  सूर्य   और   the  tilt of the Earth  's  axis relative to the plane of revolution .
In  शीतोष्ण  and polar regions , the seasons  हैं  marked by changes  in   the  intensity  of  sunlight that  पहुँच   the  Earth 's surface , variations of which may cause  पशु   to  go  into   शीतनिष्क्रियता  or to  migrate  , and plants  to  be dormant .
During May ,  जून  and July  ,   the  northern  गोलार्ध  is exposed to more direct  धूप  because the  गोलार्ध   चेहरों  the  सूर्य   .
the  same is true of  the  southern hemisphere in  नवम्बर  , December and January  .
It is the tilt  of  the  धरती  that causes  the  Sun to be higher in the  आसमान   दौरान   the   गर्मियाँ  months  जिससे   increases   the   सौर  flux  .
However , due to seasonal  lag   ,  June , July and August  हैं  the  hottest  months  in  the northern hemisphere  और  December , January and February are  the  hottest  महीने  in the southern  गोलार्ध  .
In temperate and subpolar regions , generally  चार  calendar -based seasons ( with  उनके  adjectives ) are  पहचाना   :  spring ( vernal )  ,  summer (  estival  ) , autumn ( autumnal  )  and winter  (  hibernal ) .
However ,  ecologists  mostly use  a   छह   ऋतु  model for temperate climate regions  कि  includes pre-spring ( prevernal )  और  late summer  (  serotinal  )  as distinct seasons along with the traditional four .
Hot regions have two or three  सीज़न   ;  the  बरसात  ( or wet ,  or  monsoon )  ऋतु   और   the  dry season , and in some tropical  क्षेत्रों  , a  कूल  or mild  ऋतु  .
in  some  भाग  of  the  world , special `` seasons  ''  are  loosely  defined  आधारित   on  important events  ऐसे  as a hurricane season , tornado season or a wildfire season  .
the   छह  ecological  सीज़न
The  चार  calendar seasons , depicted in  an   प्राचीन  Roman  मोज़ेक  from Tunisia
डच  exports  in   2006
At the time of  लिखने  the Netherlands is the 17th  largest  economy  of  the world .
(  देखिए  : List of  देशों  by GDP ( nominal ) )
GDP per  capita  is roughly $ 42,000 which puts it  in   the  top 10 of  richest  nations in the world ( see :  सूची  of countries by  जीडीपी  ( PPP )  प्रति   capita   )  .
Between  1996  and  2000  annual  आर्थिक  growth ( GDP ) averaged  over  4 % , well above the European average  .
विकास  slowed  considerably   in  2001-05 as part of  the  global economic  slowdown  .
2006 and  2007  however showed economic growth of  3.4  % and 3.9  %  .
The Dutch economy  थी  hit considerably by the ongoing global financial crisis and the ensuing European debt crisis .
Several  बैंको  went bankrupt , and a  क्रमांक  of others  था   to   प्राप्त   सरकारी   सहायता  .
in  2009 the  अर्थव्यवस्था  declined with 3.5  %  , followed  by   दो  years  of  mild growth .
the   डच   अर्थव्यवस्था  is  फिलहाल   in  a recession  again  ,  साथ  an economic  मनाही  of  0.5  % in 2012  .
Inflation is  at  3.2 %  in  February 2013  .
Unemployment  रै  been relatively low  compared  to other EU nations  लिये  decades but after  mid-2012   it  has seen  a   तेज़  increase and  in  February 2013 it  रै  hit 7.7 % .
the  Netherlands  प्रबंधित  to maintain its AAA  दरजा  at least until March  2013  according to the three major credit rating agencies .
Historically , the Dutch introduced  और  invented  the   भण्डार  market  by  the  merchandise  trading through Dutch West India Company  .
The Netherlands is a founding member of the European  संघ   ,  the OECD and  the  World Trade Organization  .
Loyal  to  the  खेल  is the tenth studio album and sixth  स्टुडियो  album  by  Tupac Shakur .
It contains remixes of previously  unreleased  music recorded  by  Shakur before his death in 1996 .
released  in the  संयुक्त   राज्य  on December 14  ,  2004  (  December  12  in  the   संयुक्त  Kingdom )  ,  Loyal to the Game was  उत्पादित  by Eminem  .
The original panel of The View ; Meredith Vieira  ,   स्टार   जोन्स  , Debbie Matenopoulos and Barbara Walters in  1997  .
The  दृश्य  is  an  American talk show  ब्रॉडकास्ट  on ABC that debuted in 1997 as part of  the  network 's daytime programming block .
Created by Barbara Walters  और  Bill Geddie  ,   जो  both also serve as the show  's   कार्यपालिका  producers ,  the  program  सुविधाएँ  a panel of women as co-hosts .
साथ  with Walters , the current panel includes Whoopi Goldberg ,  जो  serves as the  मॉडरेटर   ,  Joy Behar , Elisabeth  hasselbeck  , and  sherri  Shepherd .
अंतरराष्ट्रीय   संस्करण  of the program are aired in several  देशों  .
As  of  the  2012–13  season  ,  its 16th , The View is  the  fourth-longest running  नेशनल  daytime talk  दिखाएँ   in   इतिहास  , behind The Phil Donahue Show ( 29 )  ,  the variously-named Live !
कार्यक्रम  ( 25 ) , and The Oprah Winfrey Show  (   25   )  .
prunus  virginiana , commonly called  bitter-berry  , chokecherry , Virginia bird cherry and  पश्चिमी   chokecherry  ( also black  chokecherry  for  P.  virginiana  var  .  demissa  ) , is a  प्रजाति  of bird cherry ( Prunus subgenus  padus  ) native to  उत्तर  America ; the natural  ऐतिहासिक   दायरा   of  P. virginiana includes most of the continent , except for  the  far north and far  दक्षिण  .
Los Angeles International  विमानक्षेत्र   is  the  प्राथमिक  airport serving  the  Greater Los Angeles Area , the second-most  आबादी  metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  in the  संयुक्त  States .
It is most often referred to by  इसके  IATA  विमानक्षेत्र  code LAX  ,   साथ  the  अक्षर  pronounced individually .
LAX is located in southwestern  लॉस  Angeles  साथ  the Pacific coast in  the  neighborhood  of  Westchester , from  the  downtown core and is  the   प्राथमिक   विमानक्षेत्र   of   लॉस   एंजिल्स  World  एयरपोर्ट  ( LAWA  )  , an agency  of  the Los Angeles city government formerly known  as  the Department  of   एयरपोर्ट  .
In 2011 ,  lax   थी   the  sixth busiest airport  in  the world after  hartsfield-jackson   अटलांटा  International Airport  ,  Beijing  पूंजी  International Airport , London Heathrow  विमानक्षेत्र  , Chicago  o'hare  International Airport ,  और  Tokyo Haneda International Airport  साथ  61,862,052 passengers  .
The airport holds the claim for ``  the  world 's busiest origin and destination ( O &  d  ) airport '' in 2011 that  involves  non-connecting passenger traffic .
it  is also  the  only airport  to   रैंक  among the top  पाँच  U.S. airports  लिये   दोनो  passenger  और  cargo traffic .
LAX is the busiest  विमानक्षेत्र  in the  वृहद  Los Angeles Area ,  लकिन  other airports including  bob   आशा   विमानक्षेत्र  , John Wayne Airport , Long Beach Airport , LA/Ontario International Airport  ,  and  ताड़  Springs International  विमानक्षेत्र  also serve  the  region .
LAX is also the busiest  विमानक्षेत्र  in California  और  the  वेस्ट  Coast of the United States in  शर्तें   of   उड़ान   परिचालन  , passenger traffic and air  कार्गो   कार्यकलाप  , leading it  to  be referred to  as  the  ``  Gateway  to  the Pacific Rim `` .
Peyton Williams Manning ( born March 24 ,  1976  ) is an American  फ़ुटबॉल  quarterback for the Denver Broncos of  the  National  फ़ुटबॉल  League ( NFL  )   .
he  played for  the   इंडियानापोलिस  Colts for  14  seasons from 1998 to 2011 .
He  is  the  बेटे   of  former NFL quarterback  आर्ची   मैनिंग  and an  elder   bhai  of New York Giants  क्वार्टरबैक  Eli Manning .
Manning played  कॉलेज   फ़ुटबॉल   लिये  the  विश्वविद्यालयों  of Tennessee , leading the Volunteers to the 1997 SEC Championship in his senior season  .
however  , No  .  3  टेनेसी  lost to the No . 2  नेब्रास्का  Cornhuskers 42-17 in  the  Orange Bowl giving  नेब्रास्का  and Tom Osborne  उनके  3rd national championship in 4 years .
He was chosen by the Indianapolis  कोल्टस  with  the  first  overall  pick in  the   1998   एनएफएल  Draft .
From 1998 to 2010 , he  led  the Colts to eight ( seven AFC South and  एक   afc  East  )  division championships , two AFC championships , and to  a  Super Bowl  चैंपियनशिप  ( Super  कटोरी   xli  ) .
He has won a record four league most  मूल्यवान  player awards  ,   थी  the  सबसे  valuable  खिलाड़ी  of Super Bowl XLI , has been  नामित  to twelve  प्रो   प्याले  , has twelve 4,000-yard  गुजर  seasons ,  और   is  the Indianapolis Colts  '  all-time leader in passing yards ( 54,828 ) and touchdown passes ( 399 ) .
In 2009 , he was named the best player in  the   एनएफएल  and  फॉक्स  Sports  साथ  with Sports  illustrated   नामित  him the NFL  खिलाड़ी  of the decade of the 2000s .
in  May  2011   ,  he  underwent  neck  सर्जरी  to alleviate  गर्दन  pain  और  arm  कमज़ोरी  he dealt with during the previous  few  seasons  पहले  signing  a  five-year  ,  $ 90 million contract extension with  the  Colts  in  July 2011  .
मैनिंग  had  hoped  to play in  the  2011 season , but in  सितंबर  2011 , he underwent a much more serious second surgery : a level one  सर्वाइकल  fusion procedure .
Manning  था  never missed  an   एनएफएल   खेल  in his career  ,  but was forced to miss the  संपूर्ण   2011  season .
He was released  by  the Colts  on  March 7 , 2012  ,   और  after  an  almost two-week period where he visited  साथ   और  worked out  लिये   अनेक   एनएफएल   टीमों   ,  he  हस्ताक्षरित  with the Denver Broncos on  कूच  20 , 2012 .
Manning 's pre-snap routine has earned him the nickname ,  ``  The Sheriff ''  और   is  one of the most  recognizable   और   parodied  in  the  NFL .
The Indianapolis  कोल्टस  ' almost  विशेष  use of the hurry-up offense led to  मैनिंग  using an array  of  gestures and  मौखिक   कमांड  to call  the   खेल   at   the  line  of   मुठभेड़   बल्कि   than  in the huddle .
the  America Tower of the American  सामान्य  Center ,  the   मुख्यालय  of Baker Hughes
बेकर  Hughes is one of the world 's  largest   oilfield   सेवाएं  companies .

Baker  ह्यूजेस  has its  मुख्यालय  in the America Tower in  the  American General Center in  neartown   ,  Houston .

Each  of  these  regions   is   subdivided  into  बाज़ार  .
The United  राज्य  one- cent coin , commonly known  as   a  penny  ,  is a  ईकाई   of  currency equaling one one-hundredth  of  a United States  डालर  .
the  cent  's  symbol is ¢  .
Its obverse has  प्रदर्शित  the  प्रोफ़ाइल   of   अध्यक्ष   अब्राहम   lincoln   चूंकि  1909  ,  the centennial of  उसके   जनम   .
From 1959 ( the sesquicentennial of  lincoln  's  जनम  ) to 2008 ,  the  reverse featured  the   lincoln  Memorial .
Four  अलग  reverse  डिजाइन  in 2009  सम्मानित   lincoln   's  200th  जन्मदिवस  and a  नई   ,  permanent reverse –  the  Union  शील्ड   –  was  introduced  in 2010 .
The coin is 0.75  इंच   (  19.05  mm  ) in diameter and  0.061  inches ( 1.55 mm ) in thickness .
the   u.S.   मिंट   's  official name for a penny is  ``  '' and  the  U.S. Treasury 's official name is ``  एक   cent  piece ''  .
the  colloquial  पद  penny derives from the British coin of the same  नाम  , the pre-decimal  संस्करण  of which  था  a similar value  .
In American English , pennies  is  the  बहुवचन   रूप   ,  other  बहुवचन  forms  पेंस   और  pee ( standard use in British English ) are not used .
As  of  2012 , it  लागत  the U.S. Mint 2.00 cents to  मेक   a  cent because of  the   लागत  of materials and production .
This figure includes the Mint’s  फिक्स्ड  components for distribution and  fabrication  ,  अनुमानित  at $  13   लाख  in FY 2011 .
it  also includes Mint overhead allocated  to   the  penny  ,   जिससे  was  $  17.7 million  लिये  2011  .
Fixed costs and overhead would  have  to be absorbed by other  circulating  coins without  the  penny .
The loss in  profitability  due  to  producing the one  cent  coin in  the  United States for  the  year of 2012 was  $  58,000,000  .
इस  was a slight decrease from 2011  ,  the year before , which  था   a  production loss of  $  60,200,000 .
or more  specifically   ,  are  शोभायमान  varieties of domesticated common carp (  cyprinus  carpio  )  that  हैं  kept  लिये   सजावटी  purposes in  बाहरी  koi ponds or  जल   gardens  .
कोई  varieties are  विशिष्ट  by coloration  ,  patterning , and scalation .
Some  of  the major colors are white  ,  black , red  ,  yellow  ,  blue , and cream .
The most  लोकप्रिय  category of koi is the Gosanke  ,  which is made  up  of the Kohaku  ,   taisho   sanshoku   ,  and Showa Sanshoku varieties .
the  American Federation of Government Employees ( AFGE ) is  an   अमरीकी  labor union representing over 650,000  कर्मचारी  of the federal  सरकारी   ,   परिचय  5,000  कर्मचारी  of the District of  कोलंबिया  , and a few hundred  निजी  sector  कर्मचारी  , mostly in and  around   संघीय   सुविधाएं   .
AFGE is the largest union for civilian , non-  डाक  federal  कर्मचारी  and the largest  संघ  for District  of  Columbia  कर्मचारी   जो  report directly to  the  mayor ( i.e. , outside of D.C. public schools ) .
it  is  संबद्ध  with  the  AFL-CIO .

Green : A  spore  tetrad  .

the  evolution of plants has resulted  in  increasing levels of complexity , from the  earliest   algal   मैट्स  , through bryophytes , lycopods  ,   ferns   to  the complex  gymnosperms  and angiosperms of  आज   .
जबकि   अनेक  of  the  groups which appeared earlier continue to thrive ,  विशेषकर  in the  environments  in which  वे   विकसित   ,  for a time  प्रत्येक  new grade of organisation became  अधिक   ``  successful ''  than  its  पूर्ववर्तियों  .
In the Ordovician period ,  around   ,  the first land plants  appeared   .
ये   began   to   diversify  in the  लेट  Silurian  काल  , around ,  और  the results  of  their diversification are  प्रदर्शित  in remarkable detail  in   an   जल्दी  Devonian fossil assemblage from the Rhynie chert  .
इस  chert  preserved   जल्दी   पौधे   in  cellular detail ,  petrified  in  volcanic  springs .
By  the   मध्य   of  the  devonian  Period , most of  the  features recognised in plants today are present ,  सहित   जड़ें  , leaves and secondary wood ; and , by late  devonian   टाइम्स   ,  seeds had evolved .
लेट  Devonian plants  था  thereby  पहुँचे  a degree  of  sophistication  कि  allowed  उन्हें  to form  वनों  of tall trees  .
Evolutionary innovation  जारी   into   the  Carboniferous period and is still ongoing today .
Most plant groups  यहूद   अपेक्षाकृत  unscathed  by  the Permo-Triassic extinction  इवेंट  , although the structures of communities changed .
This may have set the scene for the  रूप   of  the flowering plants in the Triassic (  ~  ) ,  और  their later diversification  in  the Cretaceous and Paleogene .
The latest major group of plants to evolve were the  grasses  , which became  महत्वपूर्ण   in  the mid-Paleogene , from around .
The grasses  ,   as   खूब  as many  अन्य   समूह   ,  evolved  नई  mechanisms  of   चयापचय  to survive the low and warm  ,  dry conditions  of  the tropics over the  पिछला  .
the  winning  सुपर  Bowl  टोली  receives  the  Vince Lombardi Trophy  .
the  Super Bowl is an annual  अमरीकी  football game that determines the champion of the National Football League  (   एनएफएल  ) .
the  contest is held  in  an American city that  is  chosen three to four years beforehand  ,  usually in warm-weather or  domed   साइट   .
Since 1971 ,  the  winner  of   the  American Football  सम्मेलन  ( AFC )  चैंपियनशिप  Game has faced  the  winner of the National  फ़ुटबॉल  Conference ( NFC  )  Championship Game in the culmination of the NFL playoffs .
Before the  1970  merger between the American Football League ( AFL ) and  the  National  फ़ुटबॉल  League ( NFL )  ,   the  two leagues  मिले  in four  ऐसे  contests .
the   पहला  two were known as the `` AFL-NFL World  चैंपियनशिप   खेल  . ''
Super  कटोरी   iii  in  1969  was the first such game that  carried   the  `` Super  कटोरी  '' moniker , the  names  ``  सुपर   कटोरी   i  `` and `` Super Bowl II ``  यहूद   retroactively  applied to the first two  खेल  .
The  nfc  /NFL  लीड   in  Super Bowl  विन्स  with 25  ,  while the AFC /AFL has  जीती  22 .
अठारह  different  franchises  ,  सहित  teams that relocated to another city , have  जीती  the Super Bowl .
The Pittsburgh Steelers have  जीती  the  सबसे  Super Bowls with six championships (  रिकार्ड   6–2   )  ,  जबकि   दोनो  the  डलास   cowboys  and San  फ्रांसिस्को   49ers  have  पाँच  wins  प्रत्येक  ( Cowboys  5–3  ; 49ers 5–1 ) .
Dallas  और  Pittsburgh have  the  most  सुपर  Bowl appearances with eight , while the Buffalo Bills have  the  most consecutive  दिखावे   साथ   चार  losses in  a   पंक्ति  from 1990 to 1993  .
The New England Patriots , Denver Broncos  और   मिनेसोटा  Vikings  have  also  खोया  a record four Super Bowls .
Buffalo and Minnesota are both 0–4  ,  Denver  is  2–4 and New England  is  3–4 .
The  रिकार्ड   लिये  consecutive wins is two  और   is  shared by seven franchises  :  the  1966-67  Green Bay Packers , the  1972-73  Miami Dolphins  ,  the  1974-75  and 1978-79  पिट्सबर्ग  Steelers ( the only team to accomplish this feat  twice  )  ,  the 1988-89 San Francisco  49ers  , the 1992-93 Dallas Cowboys ,  the  1997-98  डेनवर  Broncos  ,  and  the  2003-04 New England Patriots .
The  तभी  team with multiple Super Bowl appearances and no losses  is  the Baltimore Ravens , who in  जीतना  Super  कटोरी  XLVII unseated and  replaced  the 49ers in  कि  position  .
Four current  एनएफएल   टीमों   have   never  appeared in a Super Bowl  ,  including franchise  relocations  and renaming :  the  Cleveland Browns , Detroit Lions , Jacksonville Jaguars , and Houston Texans  ,  though both the Browns and Lions had  जीती  NFL Championship  खेल  prior to the creation of the Super  कटोरी  .
मार्टिन  County is  a  county located  in  the U.S. state of Texas  .
As of the  2010  census , its population  थी  4,799  .
Its  सीट   is  Stanton .
The  काउंटी  is named  लिये  Wylie Martin  ,  an  जल्दी  settler .
Martin  काउंटी  is  एक  of 30 prohibition ,  or  entirely dry ,  काउंटी  in  the   राज्य  of Texas  .
Alkaline phosphatase ( ALP  ,   alkp  ) (  )   is   a   hydrolase   एंजाइम  responsible for removing  फास्फेट  groups from many types of molecules , including nucleotides , proteins ,  और  alkaloids .
the  process of  निकालना  the phosphate group is called dephosphorylation .
As  the  name suggests ,  क्षारीय   phosphatases  are most  प्रभावी  in an alkaline environment .
It  is  sometimes used synonymously as  मौलिक   phosphatase   .
Triticale (  ×  Triticosecale  )  , ( ) is  a  hybrid  of  wheat ( Triticum  )  and  rye   (   secale  ) first bred in laboratories  दौरान  the late 19th century .
the  grain was  originally  bred  in   स्कॉटलैंड  and Sweden .
Commercially available triticale is almost  सदा  a second generation  संकर   ,  i.e. , a  क्रॉस  between two kinds  of   प्राथमिक  ( first cross ) triticales .
as  a rule , triticale combines the yield potential and  अनाज   विशेषता  of wheat with the  बीमारी  and environmental  सहिष्णुता  ( including soil  शर्तें  ) of rye .
Only recently has  it   महरूम  developed into a commercially viable  क्रॉप  .
Depending on  the  cultivar  ,   triticale  can more or less  resemble  either of  इसके  parents .
it  is grown mostly for forage  or  fodder , although some triticale-based foods can  be  purchased at health  खाना  stores or are to be  मिला  in some  नाश्ता   cereals  .
When  क्रासिंग  wheat  और  rye  ,  wheat is used as the female parent  और   rye  as the male parent ( pollen donor ) .
the   resulting  hybrid is sterile , and must be treated with  colchicine  to  induce  polyploidy and thus the ability to reproduce  itself  .
the  primary producers  of  triticale are  कैंडल   ,  Germany  ,  France , Belarus and Australia .
In 2009 , according  to  the Food  और   कृषि  Organization (  fao  ) , 15.0 million  टन  were harvested in 29 countries  आरपार   the  world  .
the  triticale  संकरण   हैं  all amphidiploid ,  जिससे  means the  संयंत्र  is diploid for two genomes  निकला  from different species .
in  other words , triticale is  an  allotetraploid .
In earlier years  ,  most work was done on octoploid triticale .
Different ploidy levels  have   महरूम  created and evaluated over time .
The  tetraploids  showed little promise , but hexaploid  triticale  was  कामयाब   पर्याप्त   to   ढूँढें   वाणिज्यिक  application .
The  cimmyt   triticale   सुधार  program wanted  to  improve food production  और  nutrition in  विकासशील   देशों   .
Triticale has potential  in  the production of  ब्रैड   और  other food products , such as  कुकीज़   ,  pasta ,  पिज़्ज़ा  dough  और   नाश्ता   cereals  .
The  प्रोटीन   सामग्री   is  higher  than  that of  गेहूं  , although the glutenin fraction is less .
The grain  रै  also been stated to  have   उच्चतर  levels of lysine  than  wheat .
Assuming increased acceptance , the milling industry will have  to  adapt to triticale  ,  as the milling techniques  employed  for  गेहूं   हैं  unsuited  to  triticale  .
बेचें   et  al  .  found triticale  could  be used as a feed grain  ,  and  बाद   शोध  found its  मंड  was  विशेषकर  readily digested .
as   a  feed grain , triticale  is  already well established  और  of high economic importance .
It has  प्राप्त   ध्यान  as a  संभावित   उर्जा  crop ,  और  research  is   फिलहाल  being conducted  on   the  use of  the  crop  's   बायोमास   in  bioethanol production .
``  Puff , the Magic Dragon ''  is  a song written by Leonard Lipton  और   पीटर   yarrow  ,  और  made popular by Yarrow 's group Peter , Paul  और  Mary in  a   1963  recording  .
the  song  हासिल  great popularity  .
A college football national championship in the highest  स्तर   of  collegiate  खेल  in  the   संयुक्त   राज्य   ,  currently the National  कॉलेजिएट  Athletic Association ( NCAA  )  Division I Football Bowl Subdivision ( FBS ) , is  a  designation awarded  annually   by  various  third-party  organizations to their  चयन   (  s ) of the best  कॉलेज   फ़ुटबॉल  team (  s   )  .
Division I  fbs  (  formerly  Division  i-a   )   फ़ुटबॉल  is the only NCAA sport in which a  वार्षिक  champion is not determined by an NCAA sanctioned  चैंपियनशिप  event .
Because the championship team  is  not  संकल्पित  by a NCAA championship or  टूर्नामेंट  event , it is sometimes unofficially referred  to   as   a  `` mythical  नेशनल   चैंपियनशिप   ``   .
Since the  ncaa  ,  the  sport 's  शासी  body , does not determine or  घोषित   a  national  चैंपियन   in  this  फ़ील्ड  , determination of such has  प्रायः   engendered  controversy .
A championship  टोली  is  independently  declared by various individuals and organizations , often referred to  as  ``  चयनकर्ताओं  '' .
These choices are sometimes at odds  साथ  each other  .
While the NCAA has never officially  endorsed   an  annual championship team  ,  it  रै  documented the choices of several selectors in  the   आधिकारिक  NCAA Football Bowl  subdivision  Records .
In addition  ,   विभिन्न  third party analysts have independently published their  अपना  lists of what they  have   संकल्पित  to  be  the most  legitimate   चयन  for each season  .
These are also often at  हालात   साथ   प्रत्येक   अन्य   as  well as  व्यक्तिगत  school 's claims on national championships ,  जिससे   ,  for  कोई  particular  ऋतु  ,  may  or  may   नहीं  correlate to the  चयन  published elsewhere .
Currently , two  widely  recognized national  champions  selectors are  the   संबद्ध   दबायें   ,   जिससे   conducts   a   पोल   of   फ़ुटबॉल  sportswriters , and the USA  आज  Coaches '  पोल   ,  a  पोल  of  अमरीकी   फ़ुटबॉल  Coaches Association  क्रियाशील  coaches that is contractually  obligated  to  नाम  the winner  of  the Bowl  चैंपियनशिप   श्रेणी   चैंपियनशिप   खेल  as its national  चैंपियन  .
The  मिल्वौकी  Brewers are a professional  बेसबॉल  team  आधारित  in Milwaukee , Wisconsin .

The team is so named because of the  नगर   's  association  साथ  the brewing industry .
The Washington Nationals are  a  professional baseball  टोली   आधारित   in  Washington ,  d.c  .
the  Nationals  हैं   a   सदस्य  of the  ईस्ट  Division  of  the National League of Major League  बेसबॉल  ( MLB ) .
The team 's home ballpark is  नागरिकों  Park  ,  located  on   दक्षिण  Capitol  गली   in   southeast  D.C. , near  the  Anacostia  नदी   .
The  पार्क  opened  in  2008 , replacing RFK Stadium , the  टोली   's  home from  2005  to 2007  .
The Nationals  '   नाम   गर्भाशयी  from the  पूर्व  Washington baseball  टोली   कि  had  the  same name  (  used interchangeably with Senators  )  .
Their  उपनाम   is   ``  the  nats  ''  —a  shortened  संस्करण  that was also  प्रयुक्त   by   the  old D.C.  टीमों   .
an  expansion  मताधिकार  , the club was  संस्थापित  in  as  the Montreal Expos , the first major league team in Canada .
They were based in Montreal , Quebec , and played their home games  at  Jarry Park Stadium  और   बाद  in Olympic Stadium .
In ,  the   expos  won  a   प्रभाग  championship  ,   जीती  their first-ever playoff series  by  defeating the Philadelphia  फ़िलीज़  ,  3–2  , and advanced to the National League  चैंपियनशिप  Series  ,  where  वे  would  go  on to  खोना  to the Los  एंजिल्स  Dodgers , 3–2  ,   in  their  तभी  postseason appearance during the strike-shortened  ऋतु   .
The Expos had  उनके  highest winning  प्रतिशत  in the strike-shortened  ऋतु  of ,  जब  the  टोली   था  the best record in baseball  .
the  team  's  subsequent shedding of players  caused   प्रशंसक   ब्याज   to  drop off  .
बाद  the  2001   ऋतु  , MLB considered revoking the  टोली  's  मताधिकार   ,   साथ  with either the  मिनेसोटा   जुड़वा  or the Tampa  खाड़ी  Devil  किरणें  .
After being purchased by MLB in 2002 , the team was  स्थानांतरित   पहले   the  season  to  Washington  और  renamed the Nationals , the first relocation since the  दूसरी   वॉशिंगटन  Senators moved  to  Arlington  ,  Texas ,  और  became  the  Texas  रेंजरों   in  .
the  Nationals are one of two MLB franchises ,  और   the  only one  in  the  नेशनल   लीग   ,  that has  never  played in a World Series ( the Seattle Mariners are  the   अन्य  )  .
A contingent fee (  in   the   संयुक्त   राज्य  )  or  conditional fee  (  in England  और  Wales  )  is any  शुल्क  for services  provided  where the fee is payable only if  वहीँ   is  a favourable result  .
in  the law  ,  it is defined as  a  `` fee charged for a  वकील  's  सेवाएं  only if  the  lawsuit is  कामयाब  or is favorably settled out of  अदालत  ...  .
Contingent fees are usually calculated as  a   प्रतिशत  of the client 's net  रिकवरी  . ''
In  the  English legal system , it is generally  referred  to  as  no  जीत  no fee  .
A conditional fee  अनुबंध   between   a   विधि   कड़  and  a  client  .
the  usual  रूप   of   इस   अनुबंध  is that the solicitor  होगा  take  a  law  मामला  on the  समझना  that if lost  ,  no payment is made .
However , if the case is won  ,   the  lawyer  होगा  be entitled to the  सामान्य  fee based on hourly  बिलिंग  , plus a success fee  .
The  कामयाबी   शुल्क  in  इंग्लैण्ड   जरूर   be  as a  प्रतिशत  no  वृहद  than 100 % of the  सामान्य  fee .
This  contrasts  with  the  contingency fee in  the   us  , which  देता  the successful  attorney  a percentage of the damages awarded in favor  of  his client .
This  makes  it  easier   लिये  the poor to pursue their  सिविल  rights since otherwise ,  to   मुकदमा  someone  लिये  a  अपकृत्य  , one  जरूर  first  be  wealthy  पर्याप्त  to pursue such litigation in the first place .
however  , because of the  ऊँची   रिस्क   ,  few  attorneys  will  लो   मामले  on a  आकस्मिकता  basis unless they feel  the  case has  शुभ   मेरिट  .
According to  a  2004 book by law  प्राध्यापक   हर्बर्ट  Kritzer ,  निर्भर   शुल्क  were  अनुमत  as of that year in the following  देशों  : Australia , Brazil ,  कनाडा   ,   the  Dominican Republic  ,   फ़्रांस   ,   यूनानियों   ,  Ireland  ,   जापानी  , New Zealand , the United Kingdom  और  the United States .
They  हैं  also  अनुमत  in personal  चोट  actions  in  Lithuania .
Recently , they have been  अनुमत  in Belgium as  खूब  .
a  Convocation  (  Latin 'calling together  '  , translating  the   यूनानी   ecclesia  ) is a group of people formally assembled  लिये  a special purpose  .

The third season of the series attracted an average of 4.9  लाख  viewers  प्रति  week , making  it  FX 's highest  रेटेड   श्रेणी  ever , surpassing  fx   's  other hits The  शील्ड  ,  nip/tuck  ,  और   बचाव   me   .

those   शामिल  in the production of the  श्रेणी   imply  that a  सातवाँ   और  final season is creator Kurt Sutter 's plan .
the  Grímsvötn sub-glacial lakes  (   ;   vötn  = `` waters ''  ,  singular : )  और  the volcano of the  वही  name are in  south-east   आइसलैंड  .
They  हैं   in  the highlands of Iceland at  the  northwestern side of the Vatnajökull ice-cap .
The lakes  हैं   at   ,  at an elevation  of   .
Beneath  the  lakes is  the  magma chamber of the  grímsvötn   ज्वालामुखी  .
Grímsvötn is  a   basaltic  volcano  जिससे  has the highest eruption frequency of all the volcanoes in Iceland and has  a  southwest-northeast-trending fissure system .
The massive  climate-impacting  Laki  फिशर   फटना  of  1783–1784  was a part of the same  फिशर   प्रणाली  .
Grímsvötn was  erupting   at  the same time as  laki   दौरान   1783  ,  लकिन  continued  to  erupt until 1785 .
Because  सबसे   of  the volcano lies  underneath   vatnajökull   ,  most of its eruptions  have   महरूम   subglacial  and the interaction  of  magma and meltwater  इससे  the ice causes phreatomagmatic explosive activity .
On 21  may  2011 at 19:25  utc  , an  फटना   began  ,  साथ  high plumes accompanied by multiple earthquakes ,  resulting  in cancellation of 900 flights  in  Iceland , and  in   the  United Kingdom , Greenland ,  जर्मनी  ,  आयरलैंड   और   नार्वे  on 22–25 May .
Until  25  May the eruption  स्केल  had been larger  than   कि  of the 2010 eruption of  eyjafjallajökull  .
The  फटना  stopped at  02:40  UTC on 25 May 2011 ,  हालांकि  there  थी   कुछ  explosive activity from  the  tephra vents affecting only the area around the  crater  .
vetting   is  the process of performing a  पृष्ठभूमि  check on someone before offering  उन्हें   नियुक्ति   ,   डाक्टरेट  an award  ,  etc .
A prospective person or project may be vetted before making  a   भर्ती   निर्णय  .
In addition , in intelligence  महफ़िल   ,   एसेट  are vetted to determine their usefulness .

Caesars Entertainment Corporation ( formerly  harrah  's  entertainment   इससे   1995  to 2010  )  is an American  पब्लिक   गेमिंग  corporation that owns and operates  over  50 casinos  ,  hotels , and  सात   गोल्फ़   पाठ्यक्रम  under several  ब्रांड्स  .
