caesars  is a public company , with a joint venture of Apollo Global Management and  टेक्सास  Pacific Group ownig a  विशाल   portion   of  the  स्टेक  and Blackstone Group also  पकड़कर   a   significant  stake .
the   नाम   बदलें  from  ``   harrah   's  Entertainment Inc. '' to `` Caesars Entertainment  निगम  ''  थी  made official on November 23 ,  2010  .
Harrah 's remains a key brand in  the   कम्पनी  .
On  नवम्बर  5  ,  2010 , Harrah 's  घोषित   an   आरंभिक  public offering of 31,250,000  साझा   लकिन  retracted this  offering   on   नवम्बर   19  .
A Permanent Resident  in   कनाडा  is a person who is not a  कनाडाई  citizen but  जो   रै  been  granted  permission to  सजीव  and  कार्य  in  कनाडा  without any time limit on his  or   उसके   रहो   .
a  permanent resident must  सजीव   in  Canada  लिये  two years out of every five or risk  खोने   कि   औकात   .
a   स्थाई   निवासी   holds  many  of  the  वही  rights and  जिम्मेदारियों  as a  कनाडाई   नागरिक   ,  among others the right to work for  कोई   एंटरप्राइज़  as well as for  the   संघीय   or  provincial  सरकारी  ( under  प्रतिबंध  of access rights to certain  regulated  professions ) .
The  प्रमुख   मतभेद  are that residents can not  :
vote in  चुनावों  in Canada ;
run  लिये  elected office  ;
थाम  Canadian passports ;
In addition  ,  they  may  be  अनुमत  to join  कनाडा  's armed  शक्तियां   if   the   नेशनल   ब्याज  would  नहीं   be  prejudiced .
Permanent residents also  रिस्क   प्रत्यर्पण  for  गंभीर  crimes committed while resident  in  Canada .
Permanent residents may apply  लिये  Canadian citizenship after three years  in  Canada  ;  however this is  नहीं  mandatory .
Erica  केन  is  a  fictional character from the American ABC Daytime soap opera  सब  My Children .
The character was portrayed  by  actress Susan Lucci from her debut  on  January  16  ,  1970  until the  पिछला  broadcast television episode  aired   on  September  23   ,  2011  .
on  February 11 , 2013 , it was announced that Lucci will guest-star on the  prospect   पार्क  's continuation of  सब  My Children .
In the U.S. , Erica  is  considered to be the  सबसे  popular  अक्षर  in soap opera  इतिहास  .
regarding   the  North-American market , TV Guide calls her `` unequivocally the  सबसे   प्रसिद्ध  soap opera character in the history  of  daytime TV  ''   ,  and included her in their  2013   सूची  of The  60  Nastiest  खलनायक   of  All  समय   .
A  आलेख  of the US CPI  इससे  1913 to 2006 (  in   ब्लू   )  , and its percent  सालाना  change ( in red  )
a   उपभोक्ता  price  अनुक्रमणिका   (  CPI ) measures  परिवर्तन   in  the price level of  a  market basket of consumer goods and services purchased by households .
The CPI in  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  is defined by the Bureau of  मजदूर  Statistics as `` a measure  of  the average change over time in the  कीमतें  paid  by  urban consumers  लिये  a  मार्केट  basket of consumer  goods  and services . ''
The CPI  is  a  सांख्यिकीय  estimate  constructed   using   the  prices of  a  sample  of   प्रतिनिधि  items whose prices are  एकत्रित  periodically .
Sub-indexes  और  sub-sub-indexes are computed for different categories  और  sub-categories of goods and services  ,  being  संयुक्त  to produce the overall index  साथ   weights  reflecting  उनके  shares in the total of the consumer expenditures covered  by  the index .
It is one of several  दाम  indices calculated  by   सबसे  national statistical  एजेंसियों  .
The  सालाना  percentage change in a  cpi  is used as a measure of inflation .
a  CPI  can  be used to  अनुक्रमणिका  (  i.e.  , adjust for the effect of inflation  )   the  real  मान   of  wages , salaries , pensions  ,   लिये  regulating prices and for deflating monetary magnitudes  to  show changes in  रियल  values .
In most  देशों   ,  the CPI  is  , along with  the   जनसांख्यिकी   जनसांख्यिकी  and the  यूएसए  National Income and  उत्पाद  Accounts  ,   एक  of the most closely  देखी  national  आर्थिक   आंकडे   .
Knocking on wood , or  to   टच   लकडी  , refers  to  the apotropaic tradition in western folklore of  वस्तुतः  touching/knocking on wood , or merely stating that you  हैं  doing  or   intend   वही  , in order  to  avoid `` tempting fate `` after  बनाना  a favourable  अवलोकन   ,  a boast , or declaration concerning one 's own death .
Rocker arm
Generally referred to  भीतर  the context of the internal combustion engine  of  automotive , marine , motorcycle and  प्रत्यागमनी  aviation engines ,  the  rocker arm is  an  oscillating lever that conveys  रेडियल   गति  from  the  cam  पालि  into linear movement at the poppet valve to  खोलें   it  .
One end is  उठाया  and lowered by a  घूर्णन  lobe of the camshaft ( either directly or via a tappet  (  lifter  )  and pushrod )  जबकि   the  other  समाप्त  acts  on  the valve stem .
When the camshaft lobe raises the outside  of  the arm , the inside  दबाता  down  on  the valve stem , opening  the  valve  .
When the  बाहर  of the arm  is  permitted to return due to  the   camshafts   रोटेशन  , the inside rises , allowing the valve spring to close the  वाल्व  .
The drive  कैम  is driven by the  camshaft  .
This pushes the rocker arm  up   और  down about  the   trunnion  pin  or  rocker shaft .
Friction may be reduced  at   the  point of contact with the valve stem by a  रोलर  cam follower .
A similar arrangement transfers the motion via  another  roller cam follower to a second rocker arm .
This  घुमाता  about  the   रॉकर  shaft  ,   और   हस्तांतरण   the  motion  via   a  tappet to the  poppet  valve  .
In this  मामला  this opens the intake valve  to  the cylinder head  .
the  effective  leverage  of the arm ( and  यूँ   the  force it  can  exert on the valve  स्टेम  ) is determined by  the  rocker arm ratio , the  अनुपात  of the distance  इससे   the  rocker  भुजा  's center of rotation to  the  tip divided by the distance  इससे  the center of rotation to  the   पाइंट   acted  on by the camshaft or pushrod .
Current automotive  डिज़ाइन  favors rocker arm  ratios  of  परिचय  1.5:1  to  1.8:1 .
However , in the past  छोटी  positive ratios  (   the   वाल्व  lift is  वृहद  than the cam  लिफ्ट   )   और   भी  negative ratios  (   वाल्व  lift smaller than the  कैम  lift  )  have been used  .
Many pre-WW2 engines use 1:1 (  न्यूट्रल   )  ratios .
For  car  engines the rocker  बाहें   हैं  generally  स्टील  stampings  ,   providing  a  उचित  balance  of  strength ,  वज़न  and economical cost .
क्युकी   the  rocker arms are  ,  in part , reciprocating weight  ,  excessive mass especially  at  the lever ends  हद  the engine 's ability to  पहुँचें   ऊँची   ऑपरेटिंग  speeds  .
``  the   रात्रि  the  लाइट्स   गई  Out in  जॉर्जिया  '' is a  दक्षिणी  Gothic  सोंग  written  by  songwriter Bobby Russell  और  performed in 1972 by  उसके   then-wife  Vicki Lawrence  .
Reba  mcentire  later  covered  it  in   1991  .
अंकित  in late October 1972 in United/Western Studios on  सूर्यास्त  in Hollywood and released less than two weeks later in  नवम्बर  1972 , the  सोंग   centers  around  the  older brother of the  narrator   ,   falsely  convicted of  और  executed for a  हत्या   ,  which the  narrator  herself  रै  committed .
In  डाक  mail , a return  पता  is an explicit  समावेश   of  the  पता   of  the person sending  the   संदेश  .
It provides  the  recipient ( and sometimes authorized intermediaries )  साथ  a means to  determine  how to  respond  to the  प्रेषक   of  the  संदेश   if  needed .
The return address need not include a  प्रेषक   's   नाम   ,   लकिन  should  शामिल  address  or  P.O  .  box  विवरण  in the same  रास्ता  as the delivery address should  .
In some countries , the return address is conventionally located in the upper left hand corner of the  लिफाफा  ,  कार्ड  , or label .
in  the United  किंगडम  , the return address  is  usually placed on  the  reverse of the envelope  ,  near the top  .
Businesses often use envelopes  preprinted  with  a  return address .
Many individuals have  चादरें  of  चिपकने  labels  preprinted  with their home address  to   affix  to their  पत्राचार  .
धर्मार्थ  sometimes  शामिल   ऐसे  sheets in  mailshots  .
Rolls of Return  पता  Labels can be  खरीदा   इससे  companies that  बेचें  personalized labels to  provide  individuals an easy  रास्ता  to peel and stick  वापसी  address labels to their envelopes .
The return address is not  जरूरी  on postal  मेल  .
However , lack of a  वापसी   पता  prevents the postal service from being able  to   वापसी   the  item if it proves undeliverable ; such as  इससे  damage ,  postage  due , or invalid  गंतव्य  .
ऐसे  mail may thus become dead  अक्षर  mail  .
Should  the   वापसी   पता  be  of   a  different state or country  ,  the mail  may   be   routed   through  that location for ease of  वापसी  .
A nerve guidance  conduit  ( also  referred  to as an  कृत्रिम  nerve conduit  or  artificial nerve graft  ,  as opposed to an autograft  )  is an artificial  अर्थात्  of  guiding   axonal  regrowth to facilitate  तंत्रिका  regeneration and  is   एक  of  अनेक   नैदानिक  treatments  लिये  nerve  चोटों   .
When direct suturing of the two stumps of a  severed  nerve can not be accomplished  बगैर  tension ,  the   मानक  clinical treatment  लिये   परिधीय  nerve injuries is  autologous  nerve grafting  .
due   to  the  सीमित  availability of donor tissue and  कार्यात्मक  recovery  in   autologous  nerve grafting ,  neural  tissue engineering research  रै   केन्द्रित  on the development  of  bioartificial nerve guidance conduits as an alternative treatment , especially for large  दोषों   .
Similar  तकनीकों  are also being explored for nerve  मरम्मत  in  the   स्पाइनल   cord   लकिन  nerve regeneration in the  सेंट्रल   बेचैन  system poses a  वृहद   चुनौती  because its  axons  do not regenerate appreciably  in   उनके   देशी  environment  .
the  creation  of  artificial conduits  is   भी  known as  entubulation  because the nerve ends  और  intervening  गैप  are enclosed within a tube composed of biological or synthetic materials .
Whether  the  conduit is in  the   रूप  of a  biologic   ट्यूब  , synthetic  ट्यूब  or  tissue-engineered  conduit  ,   it   चाहिए  facilitate neurotropic  और  neurotrophic communication between the  proximal  and distal ends  of   the  nerve gap  ,   ब्लाक   बाह्य  inhibitory factors , and provide a  शारीरिक  guidance for axonal regrowth .
The  सबसे   मौलिक  objective of  a  nerve guidance  conduit   is   to   combine  physical , chemical , and biological cues under conditions  कि   होगा  foster tissue formation  .
सामग्री  that have been  प्रयुक्त   to  make biologic  tubes  include  रक्त  vessels and skeletal muscles , while nonabsorbable  और   bioabsorbable  synthetic tubes have been  बना  from silicone and polyglycolide respectively .
Tissue-engineered  तंत्रिका  guidance  conduits   हैं  a  संयोजन  of many  तत्व  : scaffold structure  ,   scaffold  material  ,  cellular  therapies   ,   neurotrophic  factors and biomimetic materials  .
The choice of which physical  ,   रासायनिक  and biological  cues   to  use is  आधारित   on  the  गुण  of the  तंत्रिका   पर्यावरण   ,  which is critical  in   बनाना  the most desirable  पर्यावरण  for  axon   regeneration  .
the  factors that control material  चयन  include  biocompatibility  , biodegradability  ,  mechanical integrity ,  controllability  during  तंत्रिका  growth ,  implantation  and sterilization .
Hardcore Pawn  is  an American  वास्तविकता   टेलीविज़न  series  उत्पादित   by   rdf  USA ( later  zodiak   यूएसए  ) and Richard Dominick Productions  लिये  truTV about  the   day-to-day  operations of American Jewelry and  ऋण  ,  a   family-owned  pawn  दूकान  located at 20450  greenfield  Road , between 8 Mile  सड़क  and the  जॉन  C. Lodge Freeway  in   डेट्रॉयट  ,  मिशिगन  .
the   श्रेणी   premiered  on  अगस्त  16 , 2010 ,  delivering  two  लाख   दर्शक   ,  setting a  रिकार्ड  as truTV  's  most-watched series premiere ever  .
Amoxicillin BP
Amoxicillin (  इन  )  ,   formerly  amoxycillin (  बैन  ) ,  और   abbreviated  amox  ,  is  a  moderate-spectrum , bacteriolytic ,  β-lactam  antibiotic used to  दावत   बैक्टीरियल  infections caused by susceptible microorganisms .
it  is usually the drug of choice  भीतर  the class because it is better absorbed  ,   following  oral administration , than other  β-lactam  antibiotics .
Amoxicillin  is  one  of  the  सबसे  common antibiotics prescribed for children  .
the  drug became available  in   1972  .
Amoxicillin is susceptible to degradation by β-lactamase -producing bacteria , which are  resistant  to  a  broad spectrum of β-lactam antibiotics , such  as   पेनिसिलीन  .
लिये  this reason , it is often combined  साथ  clavulanic acid , a β-lactamase  inhibitor  .
This  increases  effectiveness by reducing  इसके  susceptibility to β-lactamase resistance .
lyndon   baines  Johnson ( August 27 ,  1908   –  January 22 , 1973 ) , often  referred  to as LBJ  ,  was the  36th  President of  the   संयुक्त  States  (   1963–1969   )   ,  a  स्थिति  he  assumed  after his service as  the  37th  वाइस   अध्यक्ष   of  the  संयुक्त  States ( 1961–1963 ) .
He  is   एक  of only  चार  people who served in all four elected federal offices of the United States : Representative  ,  Senator , Vice  अध्यक्ष   ,  and  अध्यक्ष  .
Johnson  ,  a Democrat from  टेक्सास  , served as  a  United  राज्य  Representative from  1937–1949  and as a  सीनेटर  from 1949–1961  ,  including six years  as   संयुक्त  States Senate Majority  नेता  , two  as  Senate  अल्पसंख्यक  Leader and two as Senate Majority Whip .
After  campaigning  unsuccessfully  लिये   the  Democratic nomination in 1960  ,  Johnson was asked  by  John F.  कैनेडी  to  be  his running mate  लिये  the 1960 presidential  चुनाव   .
Johnson  succeeded  to the  प्रेसिडेंसी  following the  हत्या  of John F.  कैनेडी  on November 22 , 1963 , completed Kennedy  's  term and was elected  अध्यक्ष  in his own right ,  जीतना  by  a  large  हाशिया   over  Barry Goldwater in the  1964  election  .
Johnson was  greatly   समर्थित  by the Democratic  पार्टी  and as President  ,  he was responsible for designing the  ``  Great  समाज   ``   विधान  that  शामिल   कानून  that upheld civil rights  ,   पब्लिक  broadcasting , Medicare , Medicaid  ,  environmental protection  ,  aid  to   शिक्षा  , and his  ``  War  on  Poverty . ''
Johnson  थी   प्रसिद्ध   लिये  his  domineering   व्यक्तित्व   और   the  `` Johnson  उपचार  ,  ''  his coercion of powerful politicians in order to advance  विधान  .
Meanwhile , Johnson  escalated  American involvement in  the   वियतनाम   युद्ध   ,  from 16,000 American advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000  कॉम्बैट  troops  in  early 1968 , as American casualties  soared  and  the   सलाम   प्रक्रम  bogged down .
The involvement  stimulated   a  large angry  antiwar  movement based  विशेषकर  on university campuses  in  the  u.S.  and abroad .
Summer  दंगे  broke  आउट   in  most  प्रमुख  cities after 1965 , and crime rates soared , as his opponents  उठाया  demands for `` law and order '' policies .
the  Democratic Party split  in  multiple feuding factions , and  बाद  Johnson did poorly  in  the 1968 New Hampshire primary , he  ended  his bid for reelection .
Republican  रिचर्ड  Nixon was elected  to   सफल  him .
इतिहासकारों  argue  कि  Johnson  's  presidency marked the peak  of  modern  उदारतावाद   in   the  United States  बाद   the   नई  Deal  era  .
Johnson is ranked favorably by some historians  क्युकी  of his  घरेलू  policies .
The Big Bang  सिद्धान्त  cast at  कॉमिक   कॉन  2009 , from  बाएँ   :   कुणाल  Nayyar , Simon  helberg  , Kaley Cuoco , Jim Parsons  ,   और   जॉनी  Galecki
The American sitcom The Big  बंग   सिद्धान्त  ,  निर्मित   और  executive produced by Chuck Lorre  और   विधेयक   prady  , premiered on CBS  on  September 24 ,  2007  .
the  show  centers  on five  वर्ण   :  roommates Sheldon Cooper and  लियोनार्ड   hofstadter  ,  दो  Caltech physicists  ;   पैनी  , a  वेट्रेस   और  aspiring actress who lives across the  हॉल  ;  और   लियोनार्ड  and  शेल्डन  's friends and co-workers aerospace  इंजीनियर   हावर्ड  Wolowitz  ,  and astrophysicist  राजेश   koothrappali  .
Over time , several supporting characters have  महरूम   प्रचारित  to  अभिनीत  roles :  लेस्ली  Winkle ( season 1 recurring  ;  season 2 regular ; season 3  अतिथि  ) , a  physicist  colleague , and , at different times  ,   a  lover  of  both Leonard  और  Howard ; Bernadette Rostenkowski-Wolowitz ( season 3 recurring ; season  4-present   नियमित   )  , a microbiologist  ,  Howard 's fiancée  और  subsequent wife ,  और  former part-time  वेट्रेस  alongside Penny  ;  neuroscientist  एमी   farrah  Fowler ( season 3  अतिथि  ; season 4 recurring  ;  season 4-present regular ) , who joins  the   समूह  after  होने   matched  to Sheldon on a dating  जालस्थल  ; and comic  किताब  store-owner , Stuart  खिलते  ( seasons  2–5  recurring  ;  season 6-present regular ) , who replaces Howard as Raj  's   बेहतरीन  friend when Howard  is  in space  .
The show  भी  features numerous supporting characters  ,  each of whom  plays  a prominent role  in  a small  समूह  of  एपीसोड  .
the  American Civil  युद्ध   (  ACW )  ,   भी   ज्ञात  as the War  between  the States or simply the  सिविल  War  (  see naming ) , was a civil war  लड़ा   इससे   1861   to  1865 between the United States ( the `` Union ''  or  the ``  उत्तर  '' )  और  several Southern slave states  कि  declared  उनके   secession  and formed the  confederate   राज्य  of  अमेरिका  ( the `` Confederacy ''  or   the  `` South '' )  .
The  युद्ध  had  इसके   उत्पत्ति   in   the  issue of slavery ,  विशेषकर  the extension of  गुलामी  into the western  territories   .
Foreign powers did not intervene .
After  चार   सालो   of  bloody  कॉम्बैट  that left  over  600,000 soldiers  मुर्दे  and  नष्ट  much  of  the South 's infrastructure ,  the  Confederacy  collapsed   ,  slavery was  abolished  , and  the  difficult  पुनर्निर्माण  process of restoring  नेशनल   एकता  and guaranteeing rights to the  freed  slaves began .
In the  1860  presidential election  ,  Republicans , led by  अब्राहम  Lincoln , opposed  expanding  slavery  into  United States '  territories  .
Lincoln  जीती  , but before  उसके  inauguration on March  4  ,  1861  ,  सात   cotton-based  slave  राज्य  formed the  confederacy  .
Outgoing Democratic  अध्यक्ष   जेम्स   बुकानन  and  the  incoming Republicans  अस्वीकृत  secession as  illegal  .
lincoln  's inaugural address declared his administration would not initiate civil war .
Eight remaining slave states  जारी   to  reject calls for secession .
Confederate  शक्तियां   जब्त  numerous federal forts  भीतर  territory claimed  by  the Confederacy .
A Peace Conference  विफल   to   ढूँढें   a  compromise  ,  and both  पहलू  prepared for war .
The Confederates assumed  कि  European  देशों  were so dependent on  ``  King  कपास   ``  that  वे  would  intervene  ;  none   किया  and none  पहचाना   the  new Confederate  राज्य  of  अमेरिका  .
Hostilities began on April 12 , 1861  ,   जब  Confederate forces fired upon Fort Sumter , a key fort held by Union troops  in  South Carolina .
Lincoln called for each  राज्य  to  provide   सैनिकों  to retake the  फोर्ट  ; consequently , four more slave  राज्य  joined the Confederacy ,  bringing  their total to  ग्यारह   .
The Union soon controlled the  किनारा   राज्य  and  स्थापित  a naval  नाकेबंदी  that crippled the southern economy .
the  Eastern Theater  थी  inconclusive in 1861–62 .
The autumn 1862 Confederate  अभियान  into Maryland (  a  Union state ) ended with  confederate  retreat at  the  Battle  of  Antietam ,  dissuading   अंग्रेजों  intervention .
Lincoln issued the  emancipation  Proclamation , which made ending slavery a  युद्ध  goal  .
To the west , by summer  1862   the  Union destroyed the Confederate river navy ,  तब   much   of   उनके   पश्चिमी  armies , and  the  Union  at  Vicksburg split the Confederacy  in  two at the Mississippi River  .
In 1863 , Robert  E.  Lee  's   confederate  incursion north ended at the Battle of  gettysburg  .
Western  सफलताओं   led  to Ulysses S. Grant command of all  संघ  armies in  1864  .
in  the Western Theater , William T. Sherman  drove  east to capture Atlanta  और  marched  to  the  समुद्र  , destroying  confederate  infrastructure along  the   रास्ता   .
the  Union marshaled the resources  और  manpower to attack the Confederacy from all directions ,  और  could afford to fight battles of attrition through the Overland  अभियान  towards  रिचमंड  , the  confederate  capital .
The defending  confederate  army failed , leading to Lee  's   आत्मसमर्पण  to Grant at Appomattox Court House on April 9 ,  1865  .
The American Civil  युद्ध  was  एक  of the earliest  सच्चा  industrial wars  .
Railroads ,  the  telegraph , steamships ,  और  mass-produced weapons were employed  extensively   .
the   mobilization  of  civilian  factories  ,  mines , shipyards ,  बैंको   ,   परिवहन   और   खाना  supplies  सब  foreshadowed World War I .
It  remains   the  deadliest war in American  इतिहास  , resulting in the  मौतों  of  an  estimated  750,000  soldiers and an undetermined  क्रमांक  of  civilian   हताहत  .
Historian John  huddleston  estimates the death toll at ten percent of all Northern  males  20–45 years  बूढ़ा  , and 30 percent of all  दक्षिणी   श्वेत  males aged 18–40 .
Human evolution refers to the evolutionary process  अग्रणी   up  to  the  appearance of modern  इंसानो   .
While  it  began with  the  last  आम  ancestor  of  all life , the topic usually  कवर   तभी   the  evolutionary  इतिहास  of primates ,  in   particular   the   genus  Homo , and the emergence  of   होमो  sapiens as a  पृथक  species of hominids  (   or  ``  ग्रेट  apes ''  )   .
the  study of human  एवोल्यूशन  involves many scientific disciplines  ,  including physical  मानवशास्त्र  , primatology , archaeology  ,   भाषाविज्ञान  , evolutionary psychology  ,  embryology and genetics .
According to genetic  अध्ययन   ,   primates  diverged  इससे  other mammals about in  the  Late Cretaceous  काल  , and  the  earliest  जीवाश्मों  appear in the Paleocene , around .
The family Hominidae diverged from  the  Hylobatidae (  गिबन  ) family 15-20 million years  पहले   ,  and  around   ,  the Ponginae (  orangutans  )  ,   diverged  from the  मानवनुमा   परिवार  .
bipedalism  is the basic adaption of the Hominin  लकीर   ,  and  the   earliest  bipedal Hominin is considered to  be  either  sahelanthropus  or Orrorin , with  ardipithecus  , a  पूरा  bipedal  ,   coming  somewhat later  .
The  गोरिल्ला  and chimpanzee diverged around the  वही  time , about 4-6 million years ago , and  either   sahelanthropus  or  orrorin   may   be   हमारी  last shared ancestor with  उन्हें   .
The  जल्दी  bipedals eventually evolved into  the  australopithecines and later the genus Homo .
The earliest documented members  of  the genus Homo  हैं  Homo habilis which evolved around  ;  the earliest species for which  वहीँ  is  धनात्मक  evidence of use of stone  टूल्स  .
The brains of  ये   जल्दी  hominins were  परिचय  the same size as  कि  of a  चिंपैंजी  .
During  the  next million  सालो   a  process of encephalization  began  , and with the arrival  of  Homo  इरेक्टस  in  the   चट्टान   रिकार्ड   ,   cranial  capacity  था   doubled  to 850  cm3  .
Homo erectus and Homo  ergaster   यहूद  the  पहला   of  the hominina  to  leave  अफ़्रीकी  , and these species  स्प्रेड  through Africa , Asia ,  और   यूरोपीय  between .
It is believed  कि  these species were the first to use fire and complex  टूल्स  .
According to the  हाल  African  ancestry   सिद्धान्त  ,  आधुनिक   इंसानो  evolved in Africa  संभवतः  from Homo heidelbergensis , Homo rhodesiensis  or   होमो  antecessor and  migrated  out of the  महाद्वीप  some 50,000 to 100,000 years  पहले  , replacing local populations of Homo erectus ,  होमो  denisova , Homo floresiensis  और  Homo neanderthalensis .
Archaic  होमो  sapiens  ,   the  forerunner  of  anatomically modern humans ,  विकसित   between  400,000  और   250,000  years ago .
हाल   डीएनए  evidence suggests that several haplotypes of Neanderthal origin  हैं  present among  सब  non-African  populations  , and Neanderthals and other hominids  ,  such as  denisova   hominin  may have contributed up to 6 % of  उनके  genome to present-day humans.  <   संदर्भ  name=  ''  10.1126/science.1209202  ''  > Anatomically modern  इंसानो  evolved from archaic  होमो  sapiens in the Middle Paleolithic  ,   परिचय   200,000  years  पहले  .
the  transition to  behavioral  modernity with  the   विकास  of symbolic culture  ,  language , and specialized lithic technology  happened   around  50,000 years  पहले   according  to many  विज्ञानियों  although some  सुझाएँ   a  gradual change in behavior  over  a longer time  स्पैन  .
Lisa Cuddy ,  m.d   .   ,  is a  fictional   अक्षर   on  the Fox network medical  नाटक  House .
She is portrayed by Lisa Edelstein  .
Cuddy was the Dean of  आयुर्विज्ञान  and hospital  व्यवस्थापक  of  the  fictional Princeton-Plainsboro  शिक्षण  Hospital in  नई  Jersey .
वो  also becomes  हाउस   's  love interest through the years  to  start a relationship with him in season seven .
Cuddy quit her job  बाद  the events of season  सात   's  finale ``  चलती  On  ``  .
Track  और  field is  a   खेल  comprising  विभिन्न  competitive athletic contests based  on   कार्यशील   ,   कूद  , and throwing .
The  नाम   of   the  sport derives from  the  competition  स्थान  : a  स्टेडियम  with an oval running track  around  a grass  फ़ील्ड   .
The  फेंकना  and  कूद   कार्यक्रम  generally take  प्लेस  in the central  enclosed  area  .
Track and  फ़ील्ड   जलप्रपात   अंतर्गत  the  छतरियाँ  sport of athletics , which also includes road running  ,   क्रॉस  country running  ,  and  रेस  walking .
The  दो  most prestigious international  track  and field competitions  हैं  held  अंतर्गत  the banner  of   एथलेटिक्स   :  the athletics  प्रतियोगिता  at the Olympic Games and the IAAF  संसार   championships  in Athletics .
The International  संघ  of Athletics  federations  is  the  international governing  देह  for track and field  .
Track  और  field  कार्यक्रम  are generally individual sports  साथ   एथलीट  challenging each other  to  decide a single victor .
The racing events  हैं  won  by  the athlete with the fastest time  ,  while the jumping  और  throwing  कार्यक्रम  are won  by   the  athlete who has achieved the greatest distance or height in the contest  .
the  running events are categorised as  sprints  , middle and long-distance  कार्यक्रम  , relays , and  hurdling   .
Regular jumping events  शामिल  long  जम्प  ,  ट्रिपल  jump ,  ऊँची  jump  और  pole vault ,  जबकि   the  most common throwing  कार्यक्रम  are shot put , javelin  ,  discus and hammer .
There are  भी   ``  combined events '' ,  ऐसे  as heptathlon and decathlon ,  in  which athletes compete in a number of  the  above events  .
रिकॉर्ड  are kept  of  the best performances  in  specific events  ,  at  संसार   और  national levels ,  सही   bas  to a  निजी   स्तर  .
However , if  एथलीट  are deemed  to  have violated the event 's rules or  regulations   ,  they  हैं  disqualified  इससे  the competition and their marks are erased .
In North America , the term track  और   फ़ील्ड  may  be  used to  refer   to  athletics  in  general , rather  than  specifically  track  and field events .
the   गल्फ   युद्ध  ( 2  अगस्त  1990  –  28 February 1991 ) , codenamed  आपरेशन  Desert Storm  (  17  जनवरी  1991 – 28 February  1991  ) was a war waged by a  u.n.-authorized  Coalition force from  34  nations led by  the   संयुक्त  States , against Iraq in  जवाब  to Iraq  's  invasion and annexation  of   कुवैत  .
The war is  भी   ज्ञात  under other names  ,   ऐसे   as  the Persian  गल्फ   युद्ध   ,   पहला  Gulf War , Gulf  युद्ध  I  ,  or the First  इराकी   युद्ध  , before the  पद   ``  Iraq  युद्ध   ''  became identified instead with the  2003  Iraq  युद्ध  ( also referred to in  the   u.S.  as `` Operation Iraqi  स्वतंत्रता  '' ) .
Kuwait 's  आक्रमण   by  Iraqi  सैनिकों  that began 2 August 1990  थी   मिले   साथ   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  condemnation , and brought immediate economic sanctions against Iraq by members  of  the  u.N.  Security  परिषद   .
U.S. President  जार्ज  H. W. Bush deployed U.S.  शक्तियां   into  Saudi  अरब  ,  और   urged   अन्य   देशों  to send their own forces  to   the  scene .
an  array of nations joined  the  Coalition .
The great majority of the  गठबन्धन   's  military forces were from the  u.S.  , with Saudi Arabia , the United Kingdom and Egypt as  अग्रणी   योगदानकर्ता  ,  in  that order .
सऊदी  Arabia  सशुल्क  around  us   $   36   अरब  of the US $ 60 billion cost .
The war  थी  marked by  the  beginning of live news  on   the  front lines  of   the  fight , with the primacy  of  the U.S. network  सीएनएन  .
The war has also earned the nickname Video  खेल   युद्ध  after  the  daily broadcast images on board  the   u.S.  bombers during Operation Desert Storm  .
the  initial conflict to expel Iraqi  सैनिकों  from  कुवैत   began  with an  aerial   बमबारी  on  17  January 1991 .
This  थी  followed by  a  ground  उत्पीड़न  on 24  फ़रवरी  .
This was  a   निर्णायक  victory for the  गठबन्धन  forces ,  जो  liberated  कुवैत  and advanced into Iraqi  territory  .
The Coalition  ceased  their advance  ,   और  declared a cease-fire 100 hours after the ground campaign started .
Aerial  और  ground  कॉम्बैट  was  confined  to Iraq  ,  Kuwait  ,  and  क्षेत्रों  on Saudi Arabia  's  border  .
Iraq launched Scud missiles against Coalition military targets in Saudi Arabia and against Israel .
the   निकल  , in  अमरीकी  usage , is a five-  cent  coin issued by the United States Mint .
Composed of 75 % copper and 25 % nickel , the  टुकड़ा  has been struck since 1866 .
the   चांदी  half dime , equal  to  five cents  ,  had been issued  चूंकि  the 1790s  .
the  American Civil  युद्ध  caused economic hardship , driving gold and silver  इससे   परिसंचरण  ; in response , in place of low-value coins , the government at first  जारी  paper currency .
in  1865 , Congress abolished  the  five-cent fractional  करेंसी  note after  स्पेंसर  M.  क्लार्क  , head  of  the Currency  ब्यूरो  ( today the  ब्यूरो  of Engraving and  मुद्रण  )  ,  placed his own portrait on  the   denomination  .
After successful  परिचय  of  two-cent  and three-cent  टुकड़े  , without precious metal , Congress also authorized  a  five-cent piece consisting of base  मेटल  ; the Mint began  striking  this version in  1866  .
the  initial  डिज़ाइन   of   the  Shield nickel  थी  struck until 1883 ,  तब  replaced by the Liberty Head nickel .
the   भैंस  nickel  थी  introduced in 1913 as part of a  ड्राइव   to  increase the beauty of American coinage ; in  1938   ,  the Jefferson  निकल  followed  .
in  2004 and  2005  , special designs  in  honor of the  bicentennial   of  the  लुईस  and  क्लार्क  Expedition  यहूद  issued .
in  2006  ,  the  मिंट   reverted  to using Jefferson nickel designer Felix  schlag  's original reverse ( or ``  tails  ''  पक्ष  ) , although a new obverse  ,  by Jamie Franki , was substituted  .
As  of  2013  ,   it   लागत  more than eleven cents to produce  a  nickel  ;   the  Mint is  exploring  the possibility  of   reducing  cost by using  कम  expensive  धातुओं  .
A  पोस्टर  with  पुष्प  or clusters  of  flowers produced by twelve species  of  flowering plants  इससे  different  परिवारों
A flower  ,  sometimes known as  a  bloom or blossom , is the reproductive structure  मिला  in  flowering  plants ( plants  of  the  प्रभाग  Magnoliophyta  ,  also called angiosperms ) .
The biological  फलन  of a flower  is  to effect reproduction , usually by providing a  यांत्रिकी   लिये  the  संघ  of sperm with eggs .
पुष्प   may  facilitate outcrossing  (  fusion of sperm  और  eggs from different  individuals   in  a population )  or  allow  selfing   (  fusion  of  sperm and egg  इससे   the  same flower )  .
Some flowers produce diaspores without fertilization ( parthenocarpy ) .
Flowers contain  sporangia  and are  the  site where  gametophytes  develop  .
Flowers give rise to fruit  और  seeds .
Many  पुष्प   have  evolved to be attractive to animals , so  as  to cause  उन्हें  to be vectors for  the  transfer of  पराग   .
In addition to facilitating the  जनन   of  flowering  पौधे  ,  पुष्प   have  long been admired and  प्रयुक्त  by humans  to  beautify their  पर्यावरण  , and also  as   वस्तुएँ  of romance ,  अनुष्ठान  , religion , medicine  और  as a  सोर्स  of  खाना  .
The McDonnell Douglas ( now  बोइंग   )  F-15 Eagle is  a  twin-engine ,  all-weather  tactical fighter  designed  by  mcdonnell  Douglas  to   लाभ  and  maintain   एयर  superiority  in  aerial combat .
It is  माना   among  the most successful modern fighters , with over 100 aerial combat victories with  no  losses  in  dogfights  .
Following  समीक्षाएँ  of proposals , the  संयुक्त  States Air Force selected McDonnell  डगलस  ' design in  1967   to  meet the service  's   need   लिये  a dedicated air superiority fighter  .
The Eagle  पहला  flew  in  July 1972 ,  और   डाला   सेवा   in   1976  .
Since  the  1970s  ,   the  Eagle has  महरूम   exported   to  Israel ,  जापानी   ,  Saudi Arabia  ,  and other  राष्ट्र  .
The F-15 was  originally  envisioned as a pure air  बड़प्पन  aircraft .
Its design included  a  secondary ground-attack capability that was largely unused  .
The design  proved   लचीली  enough  कि  an  all-weather   स्ट्राइक  derivative ,  the  F-15E  स्ट्राइक   त्रिभुज  , was later  विकसित  ,  और  entered service  in  1989 .
The F-15 Eagle is expected to be in service with the U.S.  एयर  Force  पास्ट  2025  .
Mimio is a  ब्रांड  name of a  लकीर  of technology products aimed  at  the education market .
the  primary products are  केन्द्रित  around computer whiteboard interactive teaching devices  .
MimioCapture devices  भी  allow  उपयोक्ता  to capture all of  the  ink strokes that  हैं   लिखा   on   the  whiteboard  .
When used in conjunction with a video  प्रोजेक्टर  it turns  the  ordinary  whiteboard   सतह  into a fully  इंटरैक्टिव   whiteboard   .
the   उत्पाद  line was originally designed  by  Virtual Ink  .
on   अक्तूबर  4  ,   2006  Newell Rubbermaid acquired the Mimio interactive  whiteboard   (   iwb  ) product line  .
Rahab of  जेरिको
Rahab  ,  ( ; ;  )   थी   ,   according  to  the   किताब   of   जोशुआ  ,  a  woman who lived in Jericho in the  promised  Land and assisted the  israelites  in capturing the  नगर  .
Nearly all  अंग्रेज़ी   अनुवाद  of Joshua describe her  as   a   बदचलन  or  वेश्या  .
The  संगठन  of American  राज्य  (  स्पेनी  : Organización de los  estados  Americanos  ,  Portuguese  :   organização   डॉस   estados  Americanos , French : Organisation  देस   états  américains ) , or  the   oas  , is a  क्षेत्रीय  international  संगठन  .
the  OAS was founded on 30 April 1948 ,  और  has its headquarters in Washington ,  d.C.   ,  United States  .
Its members  हैं  the 35 independent  राज्य  of the  americas  .
चूंकि   26   may  2005 , the Secretary General  of   oas   रै  been José Miguel Insulza  .
Christopher Columbus ( Italian : Cristoforo Colombo ;  स्पेनी  :  cristóbal  Colón ; Portuguese :  cristóvão  Colombo ; before  31  October  145120  May 1506 ) was an Italian explorer  ,  navigator , and colonizer , born in  the  Republic  of   जेनोआ  ,  in  what is today northwestern Italy .
Under the  auspices  of the  कैथोलिक  Monarchs of Spain , he  समाप्त  four voyages across the  अटलांटिक   समंदर  that led  to  general European awareness of the  अमरीकी  continents .
Those voyages , and  उसके  efforts to  स्थापित  permanent settlements  on  the  द्वीप  of  हिस्पानिओला  , initiated  the  Spanish colonization of the New World .
in  the context of  उभरते   पश्चिमी  imperialism  और   आर्थिक  competition between European  kingdoms  seeking  माल   through   the  establishment of trade routes and colonies , Columbus  's   सट्टे  proposal  ,  to reach the East Indies  by   sailing   westward   ,   आखिरकार  received the support of the Spanish crown ,  जिससे   देखी  in it a  वादा  ,  however  remote , of gaining the upper hand over rival powers  in  the contest for the lucrative spice trade  साथ  Asia  .
During his  पहला  voyage in 1492 , instead  of  reaching Japan as  he  had intended , Columbus  उतरा  in the Bahamas archipelago , at a locale  he  named San Salvador .
Over the course of  तीन   अधिक   voyages  , Columbus  visited  the  वृहद   और  Lesser Antilles , as well as  the  Caribbean coast  of  Venezuela  और  Central  अमेरिका  , claiming  उन्हें  for  the  Spanish Empire .
Though Columbus was  नहीं  the first  यूरोपीय  explorer  to  reach  the   americas  (  having   महरूम  preceded by the Norse expedition led by Leif  ericson  in the  11th  century ) , Columbus  's   voyages  led to the first lasting European contact with  the   americas  ,  inaugurating  a period of European exploration  ,  conquest , and colonization  कि  lasted  लिये   अनेक  centuries .
They had , therefore , an enormous impact  in  the  ऐतिहासिक  development  of  the modern Western world .
Columbus himself saw his accomplishments primarily in the  लाइट   of  the  spreading  of the Christian religion .
Never admitting  कि  he  था  reached a  महाद्वीप  previously unknown to  europeans  , rather than the East Indies he  था  set out for , Columbus called the inhabitants  of  the lands  he  visited indios ( Spanish for `` Indians  ``   )  .
कोलंबस  's strained relationship with  the   स्पेनी   क्राउन  and its appointed  औपनिवेशिक  administrators in America  led   to  his  गिरफ़्तार  and dismissal as governor  of  the settlements on the  द्वीप  of Hispaniola in 1500  ,  and later to protracted  वाद  over the benefits  जिससे  Columbus  और  his heirs claimed were owed to them by the crown .
करवाया  in Germany , the Boxer is  a  breed of stocky , medium-sized  ,   short-haired  dogs .
the  coat is  चिकना   और  tight-fitting ;  रंगों  are fawn or brindled , with  or  without white  markings  ,  जिससे  may  कवर   the  entire body .
Boxers  हैं  brachycephalic  (   वे   have  broad , short skulls )  ,  and have a square muzzle , mandibular prognathism  (  an underbite  )  , very strong jaws , and a  शक्तिशाली  bite ideal  लिये  hanging on  to  large prey .
The  boxer  was bred  इससे   the   बूढ़ा  English Bulldog  और  the now extinct Bullenbeisser ,  और  is  भाग   of   the  Molosser group  .
मुक्केबाज  were first exhibited in  a  dog  दिखाएँ  for St. Bernards in Munich in  1895  , the first  boxer  club  होने  founded the  अगला   साल  .
Based on 2012  अमरीकी  Kennel Club statistics , Boxers held steady as  the  seventh  सबसे  popular breed of  श्वान  in the United  राज्य  for the  तीसरा   लगातार  year  .
Serial ATA (  sata  ) is  a  computer bus interface that connects host  बस  adapters  to  mass  भंडार  devices  ऐसे  as  मुश्किल  disk drives and optical drives  .
Serial  ata   replaces  the  पुरानी  AT Attachment  मानक  ( ATA ; later  referred  to as Parallel ATA or PATA  )  , offering  अनेक  advantages over the  पुरानी  interface : reduced  केबल   आकार  and cost (  सात  conductors instead of 40 )  ,  native hot swapping , faster  आंकड़ा  transfer through  उच्चतर  signalling rates , and more efficient transfer through  an  ( optional ) I/O  queuing   प्रोटोकॉल   .
sata  host adapters and devices communicate  via  a high-speed serial cable over  दो  pairs of  conductors  .
In  कंट्रास्ट  , parallel  ata   (  the redesignation for the legacy  ata  specifications  )  used  a  16-bit wide data  बस   साथ  many additional  support  and control signals  ,   सब   ऑपरेटिंग  at  much  lower  आवृत्ति  .
To ensure  पिछड़ा   संगतता  with legacy ATA  तन्त्र   और  applications  ,  SATA uses the same basic ATA  और   atapi  command-set  as  legacy ATA  डिवाइस  .
SATA has replaced parallel  ata   in  consumer desktop and laptop computers , and  रै   largely  replaced PATA  in  new embedded applications  .
SATA 's market  share   in  the  डेस्कटॉप  PC market was 99 %  in   2008  .
PATA remains widely  प्रयुक्त   in  industrial  और  embedded applications that use CompactFlash storage , even  हालांकि   the  new  cfast  standard  is  based  on  SATA  .
सीरियल  ATA industry  संगतता  specifications originate from The  सीरियल   ata  International  संगठन  ( aka  .
sata-io  , serialata.org ) .
The SATA-IO  समूह  collaboratively creates  ,   समीक्षाएँ  , ratifies , and publishes the interoperability specifications , the test cases , and  plug-fests   .
As with many other  उद्योग   संगतता  standards , the  sata  content ownership is transferred to other  उद्योग  bodies  :  primarily  the  INCITS T13 subcommittee ATA ,  the   incits  T10 subcommittee ( SCSI ) ; a  subgroup  of T10  जिम्मेदार  for Serial Attached SCSI (  sas  )  .
The complete  specification   इससे  SATA-IO .
the  remainder of this  आलेख  will try to use the  शब्दावली   और  specifications of  sata-io  .
The history  of  the Internet began  साथ  the development  of  electronic  कंप्यूटर  in  the  1950s .
The  पब्लिक  was first introduced to the  अवधारणाओं  that would  सीसे   to  the  अंतरजाल  when a  संदेश   थी  sent  over   the   arpanet   इससे   कंप्यूटर  science  प्राध्यापक  Leonard Kleinrock 's laboratory  at  University of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , Los Angeles  (  UCLA  )   ,  after  the  second piece  of  network equipment was installed at Stanford  शोध  Institute (  श्री   )  .
Packet  switched   संजाल  such as  arpanet  , Mark  i   at  NPL in the  uk  , CYCLADES ,  मेरिट  Network , Tymnet  ,   और   telenet   ,   यहूद  developed in the late 1960s and early 1970s  using  a variety of protocols .
The  arpanet   in   particular  led to the development of protocols for internetworking  ,  in which  अनेक   पृथक   संजाल  could  be  joined together into a network of networks  .
in  1982 , the Internet protocol suite  (  TCP/IP  )  was standardized , and  नतीजतन   ,  the concept of a world-wide  संजाल   of  interconnected TCP/IP  संजाल  , called the Internet ,  थी  introduced  .
Access  to  the ARPANET was expanded in 1981  जब  the  नेशनल  Science Foundation ( NSF  )  developed the Computer  विज्ञान  Network ( CSNET ) and again in  1986  when NSFNET provided access to supercomputer sites in  the  United  राज्य  from  शोध  and  शिक्षा   संगठन  .
Commercial Internet service providers (  isps  )  began   to  emerge  in  the late 1980s and early 1990s .
the  ARPANET was decommissioned in 1990 .
The  अंतरजाल   थी  commercialized in  1995   जब  NSFNET was decommissioned , removing the last restrictions on the use of the Internet to  carry  commercial traffic .
Since the mid-1990s  ,  the  अंतरजाल  has  था  a revolutionary impact on culture and commerce ,  सहित  the  वृद्धि  of near-instant communication  by  electronic  मेल   ,  instant messaging , Voice over Internet Protocol  (   voip  ) `` phone  काल्स  '' , two-way interactive video calls , and  the   संसार   चौड़ी  Web  साथ  its discussion  forums   ,   ब्लॉग  , social networking , and online shopping  साइट  .
The research  और   शिक्षा  community  continues   to  develop  और  use advanced  संजाल   ऐसे   as  NSF 's very  ऊँची  speed Backbone Network Service ( vBNS  )  ,  internet2  , and National  lambdarail  .
Increasing amounts  of  data  हैं  transmitted  at  higher  और  higher  speeds  over  रेशा  optic networks operating at 1-Gbit/s ,  10-gbit/s   ,  or more .
the  Internet 's  कब्ज़ा  over the  वैश्विक  communication landscape was almost  तत्काल  in historical  शर्तें   :   it  only communicated 1  %  of  the   सूचना  flowing through two-way telecommunications  संजाल   in   the  year 1993 , already  51   %  by 2000 , and more than 97 %  of   the  telecommunicated information by 2007 .
Today  the   अंतरजाल  continues to  grow   ,  driven by  कभी   वृहद  amounts  of  online  सूचना  , commerce , entertainment , and social networking .

Boyle  hinted  that the album has a  1960s   महसूस   ``  because that was [ her ] era  ''  .

Professor  ऐल्बस  Percival Wulfric  ब्रायन   डम्बल्डोर  is  a   प्रमुख  character  और  protagonist of  J.   K.   रोलिंग   's  Harry Potter series .
लिये   सबसे   of   the  series ,  he  is  the  headmaster of  the  wizarding school Hogwarts .

Dumbledore is portrayed by Richard Harris in the film adaptions  of  Harry  कुम्हार  and  the  Philosopher 's Stone  और  Harry Potter  और   the   कक्ष   of  Secrets  .
After  हैरिस  '  मौत   ,   माइकल  Gambon  portrayed  Dumbledore for all of the remaining films .
Rowling stated  वो   chose  the name Dumbledore  ,  which is an  जल्दी   आधुनिक  English word for ``  bumblebee   ``   ,   क्युकी   of  Dumbledore  's  love of  म्यूज़िक   :  she imagined  उसे  walking around `` humming to himself a lot '' .
Calcitonin ( also  ज्ञात  as thyrocalcitonin ) is a  32-amino   एसिड  linear  polypeptide   हार्मोन  that is produced in humans  primarily   by   the  parafollicular cells ( also known as C-cells ) of  the  thyroid , and in  अनेक   अन्य  animals  in  the ultimobranchial body .
It acts to reduce blood  कैल्सियम  ( Ca2+ ) ,  opposing  the effects  of   parathyroid  hormone (  pth  )  .
Calcitonin has  महरूम   मिला   in  fish , reptiles  ,  birds ,  और   स्तनधारियों  .
इसके  importance in  इंसानो  has  नहीं  been as well established as  इसके  importance in  अन्य  animals , as its function  is  usually not significant in the regulation  of   सामान्य  calcium homeostasis .
It belongs  to  calcitonin-like protein family .
A mousepad with a  padded   कलाई  rest .
A  mousepad  ( US ) or mouse mat  (   uk  ) is  a  surface  लिये  placing and moving a computer mouse  .
a  mousepad  enhances   the   उपयोगिता  of  the  mouse compared to  using  a  चूहा   सीधे  on a  तालिका   by  providing a surface to allow the  ट्रैकिंग   led   or  ball  (  in former  मॉडल  )  to  measure movement accurately and  बगैर  jitter .
Some  mousepads  increase ergonomics by providing a padded wrist  बाकी  .

the   सिनसिनाटी   bengals  ' Paul  भूरा  Stadium  is   in  the  अलहदा  .
Riverfront Stadium  (   1970–1995   )  , later  ज्ञात  as  cinergy  Field ( 1996–2002  )  ,  थी   the   घर  of  the  Cincinnati  लाल   नेशनल  League baseball  टोली  and  the  Cincinnati Bengals National  फ़ुटबॉल  League team .
Located  on  the Ohio River in downtown  सिनसिनाटी  ,  the  stadium was best  ज्ञात  as the home  of  `` The Big Red Machine `` ,  as   the  Reds were often  पुकारा  in  the  1970s .
निर्माण   began  on February  1  , 1968  ,  and  थी  completed  at   a   लागत  of less than $ 50  लाख   .
On  जून  30 ,  1970  ,  the   लाल  hosted the Atlanta Braves in their grand opening , with  हांक  Aaron  hitting  the  पहला   कभी  home  चलाएं  at Riverfront  .
Two weeks  बाद  on July 14  ,  1970  ,  Riverfront hosted the  1970  Major League Baseball  all-star   खेल  .
इस  game  is  best remembered for the often-replayed collision  at   घर  plate between Reds  स्टार  Pete Rose and catcher  रे  Fosse of the  क्लीवलैंड  Indians .
in   सितंबर   1996  , Riverfront Stadium was renamed ``  cinergy  Field  ''  in  a  sponsorship deal with Greater Cincinnati 's energy company  ,  Cinergy Corporation  .
In 2001  ,  to make room for Great  अमरीकी  Ball  पार्क   ,  the  seating  capacity at  cinergy  Field was reduced to 39,000 .
There was a huge  वॉल  in Center  फ़ील्ड  visible after the renovations  ,  to serve  as  the batter  's  eye .
the  stadium was  demolished  by  implosion  on December  29  , 2002  .
Nexen Tire is a tire manufacturer  ,  headquartered  in  Yangsan , South Gyeongsang Province  ,  and Seoul , both in South  कोरियाई  .
Its major domestic competitors  हैं  Hankook  टायर  and Kumho  टायर  .

The silent majority is  an   अनिर्दिष्ट   विशाल   बहुमत  of people  in  a  देश   or  group who do  नहीं   एक्स्प्रेस  their opinions publicly  .
the  term  थी  popularized ( though not  पहला  used ) by  u.S.  President Richard  निक्सन   in  a November 3  ,  1969 , speech  in   जिससे  he said , `` And  so  tonight—to you , the great  मूक  majority of  my  fellow Americans—I  पूछो  for your  support  . ''
In  इस  usage it  referred  to those Americans  जो   किया  not join in the  विशाल  demonstrations  विरूद्ध  the Vietnam War  at  the time , who did not  जुड़ें   in  the  counterculture  , and who  किया   नहीं  participate in public discourse .
Nixon along with many others saw this group of Middle  अमेरिकी  as being  निष्प्रभ  in  the   मीडिया  by the more vocal  अल्पसंख्यक   .
the   phrase  was used in the 19th century as a euphemism  referring  to all the people who  have   died  , and others  have  used  it  before  और  after  निक्सन  to  refer  to groups  of   मतदाता  in various nations of the world  .
Sam ,  a   rhesus  monkey ,  उड़ाया  to  an   ऊँचाई  of 88 km  in  1959  .
( NASA  )
पहले  humans went into space , several animals were launched into space ,  सहित  numerous  बंदरों  ,  so   कि  scientists  could   investigate  the biological effects of space travel .
the   संयुक्त  States  शुभारम्भ  flights  containing  primate  कार्गो  primarily  between  1948-1961 with one flight in 1969 and one in 1985 .
फ़्रांस  launched  दो  monkey-carrying  फ़्लाइट   in   1967   .
the  Soviet Union and Russia launched  बंदरों   between  1983  और  1996  .
Most  बंदरों  were anesthetized before lift-off  .
Overall thirty-two monkeys flew in the  स्पेस   कार्यक्रम  ;  none   उड़ाया   अधिक   than  once .
Numerous back-up monkeys  भी  went  through  the  कार्यक्रम  but never flew .
बंदरों  from several  प्रजाति  were used , including  rhesus  monkeys ,  cynomolgus  monkeys , squirrel monkeys ,  और  pig-tailed  macaques  .
Some chimpanzees ( which are apes  बल्कि   than  monkeys )  यहूद   भी  used .
RAID  (  redundant array of independent  डिस्क  , originally redundant array  of  inexpensive disks )  is  a storage technology  कि   combines  multiple disk drive components into a logical unit  .
आंकड़ा  is distributed  आरपार   the   ड्राइव   in   एक  of several ways called  ``   रेड  levels  ''  , depending on the level  of   अतिरेक  and performance required .
The  पद  ``  रेड  ''  थी   पहला  defined by David Patterson  ,  Garth A.  गिब्सन  ,  और  Randy  katz   at  the University of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , Berkeley  in  1987 .
Marketers representing industry RAID manufacturers later attempted  to  reinvent the term  to  describe a redundant array of  स्वतंत्र  disks as a means of  disassociating   a   low-cost  expectation from RAID  प्रौद्योगिकी  .
RAID  is   अभी  used  as   an  umbrella term for computer  आंकड़ा   भंडार  schemes  कि   can  divide and  replicate  data  among  multiple  शारीरिक  drives :  रेड  is an example  of  storage virtualization and the  सरणी  can be  पहुँचा   by   the  operating system as  एक  single drive .
The different  योजनाएं  or  architectures  are named  by  the word RAID followed  by  a number (  e.g  .  रेड   0  , RAID 1 )  .
प्रत्येक   योजना   provides  a  अलग  balance between  the   कुंजी  goals  :   विश्वसनीयता   और   उपलब्धता  , performance and capacity .
RAID  स्तर  greater than RAID  0   provide  protection against unrecoverable (  सेक्टर  )  पढ़ा  errors , as well as  पूरे  disk  विफलता  .
A  lymphocyte  is  a  type of white blood  कोशिका   in  the vertebrate immune system .
Under  the  microscope  ,  lymphocytes can be divided into large  lymphocytes   और   छोटी   lymphocytes  .
विशाल  granular lymphocytes include natural killer cells (  nk  cells ) .
Small lymphocytes  consist   of   t  cells  और  B  कोशिकाएं  .
The Big Lebowski is a 1998  अंधेरा  comedy  फिल्मी  written  और   निर्देशित  by Joel and Ethan Coen .
जेफ़  Bridges  सितारों   as  Jeff  lebowski  , an unemployed  लॉस  Angeles slacker and  avid  bowler , nicknamed `` The Dude .  ''
After a case  of  mistaken identity  ,  The  यार  is  introduced   to  a  करोड़पति  also named Jeffrey  lebowski  .
When the millionaire Lebowski  's  trophy  बीवी   is   बाद  kidnapped  ,  he commissions The Dude to  उद्धार   the  ransom  to   सुरक्षित   उसके  release  .
The  योजना   goes   awry  when  the  Dude 's friend Walter Sobchak ( John  गुडमैन   )  schemes to keep the full ransom  .
Steve  buscemi   ,   फिलिप  Seymour Hoffman , David Huddleston , Julianne  मूर  , Tara Reid  ,  and John  turturro  also star in the  फिल्मी  , which is narrated  by  a  काउंटी  known  तभी   as  ``  the   अजनबी  '' ,  निभाई  by Sam Elliott .
The  फिल्मी  is loosely inspired by the work of  रेमंड  Chandler  .
जोएल  Coen stated : `` We  चाही  to do  a  Chandler kind  of   स्टोरी   –   कैसा  it moves  episodically  , and  सौदे  with  the  characters  trying  to  सुलझाना  a mystery , as well  as  having  a   hopelessly  complex plot that 's ultimately  महत्वहीन  . ''
The  असली  score was composed by Carter  burwell  , a longtime  collaborator  of the Coen  भाइयो   .
The Big Lebowski was  a  disappointment at the  u.S.  box office and received mixed reviews  at  the time of its  रिलीज  .
Reviews have  trended  towards the positive  over   समय  , and the film  रै  become a  cult  favorite , noted for its idiosyncratic  वर्ण   ,  dream  sequences  , unconventional dialogue ,  और  eclectic soundtrack .
सेवेरस  Snape  is  a fictional character in the Harry Potter book series  लिखा   by  J.K. Rowling .
In the first  अनोखा  of  the   श्रेणी   ,   he  is hostile toward  हैरी   और  is  निर्मित  up to  be  the primary  विपक्षी  until the final  अध्याय  .
As the  श्रेणी  progresses  ,  Snape 's  अक्षर  becomes more layered and complex .
रोलिंग   करता  not fully  खुलासा  the details of  उसके  true loyalties until the end of the  फाइनल  book  ,   हैरी  Potter and the  deathly  Hallows .
over  the course of the  श्रेणी   ,  Snape 's portrayal evolves from that of  a  malicious and partisan teacher  to   कि   of   a  pivotal character of considerable complexity and moral ambiguity .
Snape  primarily   सिखाती   potions  at  हॉग्वार्ट्स   ,  though in the sixth  अनोखा  he teaches  रक्षा  Against the  अंधेरा  Arts ,  a  position which he was  ज्ञात  to have  desired  throughout the  श्रेणी   .
he  ultimately becomes  हेडमास्टर  of Hogwarts in  the  final novel .
Rowling has  वर्णित   उसे   as  `` a gift of  a  character  ''  .
Grits refers to a ground-corn food of Native American origin  ,   कि   is  common in  the   दक्षिणी  United States and  मुख्यतः  eaten  at  breakfast  .
आधुनिक  grits are  commonly   बना  of  alkali-treated  corn  ज्ञात  as  hominy  .
grits   हैं  similar  to   अन्य  thick maize-based  porridges  from around the world such as  polenta  or the thinner farina .
``  तत्काल  grits  ''  have been  processed  to speed cooking .
the  word `` grits  ''  derives from  the  Old English word ``  grytt  , '' meaning coarse meal .
इस   शब्द  originally referred to wheat and other  porridges  now  ज्ञात  as groats  in  parts of the  u.K..
मक्का  , unknown in Europe  in   the   मध्य  Ages ,  is  a food derived from corn  (  a New World  संयंत्र   )  and `` corn '' had been used to describe wheat products in many European regions  .
``  Grits '' may be either singular or plural ; historically , in  the  American  दक्षिण   the  word was  invariably  singular notwithstanding its plural form (  cf  . such food  names  as `` spaghetti '' or  ``  linguine  ''  ,  likewise   बहुवचन  in form  ,  but  एकवचन  in  उपयोग  ) .
Sometimes , grits are called  sofkee   or  sofkey  (  from a  देशी  American Muskogee word ) .
In molecular biology , human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) is  a  hormone  उत्पादित  by the  निषेचित  egg after  धारणा   .
Later during  गर्भावस्था   it  is made by  the  developing  placenta  , and later by the placental component syncytiotrophoblast .
कुछ  cancerous  tumors   उपज  this  हार्मोन  ;  इसलिए  , elevated  स्तर  measured when the patient is  नहीं  pregnant can lead  to  a  कर्कट  diagnosis .
However , it is not  ज्ञात  whether this production is a contributing cause or  an  effect of tumorigenesis .
The pituitary analogue of hCG  ,  known as luteinizing hormone  (  LH ) , is  उत्पादित   in  the  pituitary  gland of males and females of  सब  ages .
,   the   एफडीए   रै   निषिद्ध  the  बिक्री   of  `` homeopathic ''  और  over the  काउंटर   hcg  diet products and declared them fraudulent and  illegal  .

Coca-Cola is a  कार्बोनेटेड  soft drink sold in  स्टोर्स   ,  restaurants , and vending machines in every country except Cuba and North  कोरियाई   .
it  is produced by The Coca-Cola Company of  अटलांटा  , Georgia ,  और  is often  referred  to simply  as  Coke ( a registered trademark  of   the   coca-cola   कम्पनी   in  the  संयुक्त  States since March 27 , 1944 ) .
originally   intended   as  a patent medicine when  it  was  invented   in   the  late 19th century by John Pemberton , Coca-Cola was  खरीदा  out by  बिजनेसमैन  Asa  griggs  Candler  ,  whose marketing  tactics  led Coke  to  its  दबदबा   of  the world soft-drink market throughout  the   20th  century .
The  कम्पनी  produces  concentrate  , which  is  then sold to licensed Coca-Cola bottlers  throughout   the  world  .
The bottlers , who  थाम   territorially  exclusive contracts with the company  ,   उपज  finished product  in  cans and bottles from the concentrate  in  combination with  filtered   जल   और  sweeteners .
The  bottlers  then sell , distribute  और  merchandise Coca-Cola to  खुदरा  stores and vending  मशीने  .
Such  bottlers  include  coca-cola  Enterprises , which is the largest  सिंगल  Coca-Cola bottler  in  North America and western  यूरोपीय  .
the  Coca-Cola Company also sells  concentrate  for soda  स्रोतों  to major restaurants and food service  वितरकों   .
The  coca-cola   कम्पनी  has , on  अवसर   ,  introduced other  कोला  drinks  अंतर्गत  the Coke brand name .
The  सबसे  common of these is Diet  कोक  , with others including Caffeine-Free  coca-cola  , Diet Coke Caffeine-Free  ,  Coca-Cola  चेरी  ,  coca-cola   शून्य  , Coca-Cola Vanilla ,  और  special versions with  नीबू  ,  लाइम  or coffee .
Based on Interbrand  's  best global brand 2011 ,  coca-cola  was the world 's most valuable brand .
An ombudsman is  an  official  ,  usually  नियुक्त  by the government  or   by  parliament  लकिन  with a significant degree  of  independence , who is  चार्ज   साथ  representing  the  interests of  the  public by investigating and addressing complaints of maladministration or violation of rights .
In  कुछ   देशों   an  Inspector  सामान्य  , Citizen Advocate  or   अन्य   आधिकारिक  may have  कर्तव्य  similar to  those  of a national ombudsman  ,  and may also be appointed by the legislature .
Below  the   नेशनल  level an ombudsman may  be  appointed by a state , local or municipal  सरकारी  , and unofficial  ombudsmen  may be appointed  by  , or  भी  work  लिये  , a  निगम  such as a utility  प्रदायक  or a  समाचारपत्र  ,  लिये  an NGO , or for a professional  नियामक  body .
Whether appointed  by   the   विधानमंडल  , the  कार्यपालिका  , or an organization  (  or , less frequently , elected by  the  constituency that he  or   वो  serves  )  , the typical duties  of  an ombudsman are to investigate complaints and attempt to resolve them  ,  usually through recommendations (  बाइंडिंग   or  not ) or mediation .
ombudsmen   sometimes   भी  aim  to   पहचानो  systemic issues leading  to   ग़रीब   सेवा   or  breaches of people 's rights  .
At the national level ,  सबसे   ombudsmen  have  a   चौड़ी  mandate  to  deal  साथ  the  संपूर्ण   पब्लिक  sector  ,  and  sometimes  also  तत्व  of the  निजी  sector ( for example , contracted  सेवा   प्रदाताओं   )  .
In some cases ,  वहीँ  is  a   अधिक   प्रतिबंधित  mandate ,  लिये   उदाहरण   साथ   particular  sectors of society  .
More  हाल   developments  have included the creation  of   specialised  Children  's   ombudsman  and Information Commissioner agencies .
in  some  jurisdictions   an  ombudsman  चार्ज  with  the   हैंडलिंग  of  चिंताएं  about  नेशनल   सरकारी  is more  formally  referred  to  as the  ``  Parliamentary  कमिश्नर   ''  ( e.g .  the  United Kingdom Parliamentary Commissioner for Administration , and  the   पश्चिमी  Australian state Ombudsman  )   .
In  अनेक  countries  जहाँ  the  ombudsman   's  remit  extends  beyond dealing with alleged  maladministration  to promoting  और  protecting human  अधिकारों  ,  the  ombudsman  is   recognised  as the national human  अधिकारों  institution .
The post of ombudsman had by the  समाप्त  of  the   20th  century  महरूम  instituted by  सबसे  governments and by  कुछ  intergovernmental  संगठन  such as  the   यूरोपीय  Union .
Making a complaint to  an   ombudsman  is usually free of  चार्ज   .
