New England is a  प्रदेश   in   the  northeastern corner of  the   संयुक्त  States  consisting  of  the  six  राज्य  of Maine ,  नई  Hampshire , Vermont  ,  Massachusetts , Rhode Island , and Connecticut .
New England is bordered by New York state to the  दक्षिणपश्चिम  ,  क्यूबेक  to  the   उत्तरपश्चिम  , and New Brunswick and the Atlantic Ocean to the east .
In one of the earliest  अंग्रेज़ी  settlements in North America  ,  Pilgrims  इससे  England first settled in New England  in   1620  , to form Plymouth Colony  .
Ten  सालो   बाद   ,  the  puritans  settled north of Plymouth Colony in Boston  ,  thus forming  मैसाचुसेट्स  Bay  उपनिवेश  .
Over  the  next 130  सालो  , New England fought  in  four French and Indian Wars , until the  अंग्रेजों  defeated the French and  उनके   देशी   allies  in North America .
in  the late  18th  century , the  नई  England Colonies initiated the  प्रतिरोध   to   the  British Parliament 's efforts  to  impose  नई  taxes without the consent of the colonists .
The Boston Tea Party was a  विरोध   to   जिससे  Great Britain  responded  with  a  series of punitive laws stripping Massachusetts of self-government  ,  which were termed the `` Intolerable Acts `` by the colonists .
The confrontation led to open warfare in 1775 , the expulsion of the British authorities from  नई  England  in  spring 1776 ,  और   the  Declaration  of  Independence in  जुलाई  1776 .
कुछ   of   the   पहला  movements of American  साहित्य  , philosophy , and education originated in New  इंग्लैण्ड  .
the  region  निभाई   a   prominent  role in the  गति   to  abolish slavery ,  और  was the  पहला   प्रदेश  of the United States  to  be transformed by  the  Industrial Revolution  .
Today ,  नई  England is a major  संसार  center of education  ,  high  प्रौद्योगिकी   ,  insurance , and  आयुर्विज्ञान   .
Boston is its cultural , financial , educational  ,  medical and transportation center .
Each state is principally subdivided into small  incorporated  municipalities known as New  इंग्लैण्ड  towns  ,  which are often governed by town meeting .
The only unincorporated territory  in  New  इंग्लैण्ड  exists in the sparse ,  उत्तरी  regions of  वर्मांट  ,  नई   हैम्पशायर  , and Maine .
चूंकि  1970 ,  मतदाता   have  more  प्रायः   समर्थित   उदार  candidates  at  the state and federal level  than  those  of  any  अन्य  region in the United States .
New  इंग्लैण्ड   is  the only  एक  of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  Census Bureau  's  nine  क्षेत्रीय   विभाजन   जिनकी   नाम   करता   नहीं   derive  from  इसके  geography  ,  and it  is  the  तभी   multi-state   प्रदेश  with clear ,  सतत  boundaries  .
It  maintains   a  strong sense of  सांस्कृतिक   पहचान  set  अलावा  from the rest of the country ,  हालांकि  the terms  of  this identity are often contested ,  combining  Puritanism with liberalism , agrarian life  साथ  industry  ,  and isolation with immigration .
आपात  !
is   an   अमरीकी  television series  कि   combines  the medical  नाटक  and action-adventure genres  .
It  थी  produced  by   चिह्नित  VII Limited and distributed by Universal Studios .
It debuted as a midseason  बदलना   on  January  15  , 1972  ,   on  NBC , replacing the two  short-lived  series The  साझेदार  and The Good Life  ,  and ran until September 3 , 1977 , with six  अतिरिक्त  two-hour television films during  the  following two years .
Emergency  !
was created  और  produced by  जोकर  Webb and Robert A. Cinader , both of whom were  भी  responsible for the  पुलिस  dramas Adam-12 and  dragnet   .
The Eastern Time Zone ( ET ) encompasses  17  U.S. states in the eastern part  of   the   संलग्न   संयुक्त  States , parts of  कनाडा   और  three  देशों  in South  अमेरिका   .
स्थान   कि  use Eastern Standard Time ( EST )  जब  observing standard time  (  autumn/winter  )   हैं   5  hours behind Coordinated  सार्वभौमिक   समय  (  )  .
Eastern  daylight  Time ( EDT ) , when observing daylight saving  समय  ( spring/summer )  is   4   घंटों   पीछे   समन्वित   सार्वभौमिक  Time ( ) .
in   the  northern  भाग  of the  समय  zone , during  the   दूसरी   संडे   in  March  ,   at   2:00  a.m. EST ,  घड़ियाँ  are advanced to 3:00 a.m.  edt  leaving a one  घंटा   ``   गैप   .  ''
During the first Sunday in November , at 2:00 a.m. EDT  ,  clocks are moved  वापस  to 1:00 a.m.  est  , thus  ``  duplicating '' one hour .
Southern  भाग  of the  मण्डल  ( Panama and the  caribbean   )  do not observe daylight  छायांकन  .
मानक   रूप  of the  आवधिक  table .
the   रंगों   represent  different categories of  तत्व  explained below  .
the   आवधिक  table  is   a   table  display of  the  chemical elements  ,  organized on the  आधार  of their  परमाणु  numbers , electron configurations , and recurring  रासायनिक   गुण  .
Elements are  प्रस्तुत  in  अनुक्रम   of  increasing atomic  क्रमांक   (  number  of  protons  )  .
The  मानक   रूप  of table comprises an  18   ×  7 grid or  प्रमुख  body  of   तत्व   ,  positioned above a  छोटी  double  पंक्ति  of  तत्व  .
The  तालिका  can also be deconstructed into  चार   आयताकार  blocks : the s-block to  the  left ,  the  p-block  to  the right , the d-block  in   the  middle  ,  and the f-block  नीचे  that  .
The rows of the table are  पुकारा  periods ;  the  columns of the  s-  , d-  ,  and p-blocks are  पुकारा   समूह  ,  साथ  some of these  having  names  ऐसे  as the halogens or the noble gases  .
चूंकि  , by definition  ,  a periodic  तालिका   incorporates  recurring  रुझान   ,   कोई  such table can  be  used  to   derive  relationships between  the   गुण  of  the  elements and predict the properties of new , yet to be discovered or  synthesized   ,   तत्व  .
As  a   परिणाम  , a  आवधिक   table—whether  in the standard  रूप  or some other variant—provides a useful framework  लिये  analyzing  रासायनिक   बर्ताव   ,  and  ऐसे   टेबल  are widely used in chemistry and other sciences .
हालांकि  precursors exist , Dmitri Mendeleev is  generally  credited with the publication  ,  in 1869  ,   of  the first  widely  recognized periodic  तालिका  .
He developed his table to illustrate periodic  रुझान  in the properties  of  the then-known elements .
Mendeleev also predicted some  गुण  of  then-unknown  elements  कि  would  be   अपेक्षित  to fill  गैप   in  this table .
Most  of  his predictions were proved correct  जब  the  तत्व   in  question were subsequently discovered .
Mendeleev 's periodic table  रै  since  महरूम   विस्तारित  and  परिष्कृत  with  the   डिस्कवरी  or synthesis  of  further new  तत्व  and the development of new  सैद्धांतिक  models  to  explain chemical behavior .
All elements  इससे   परमाणु   संख्याएँ  1 ( hydrogen ) to  118   (   ununoctium  ) have been  खोजा  or  synthesized   .
The  तत्व   इससे  1 to 98  (  californium )  have   महरूम  found to  मौजूद   naturally  , although  कुछ  are found only in trace  amounts   और   यहूद   initially  discovered by  संश्लेषण  in laboratories  .
the  elements after 98 have only  महरूम   synthesized  in laboratories  .
Production of  तत्व  beyond  ununoctium  is being pursued  ,   साथ  the question  of   कैसा   the  periodic table may need  to  be  परिवर्धित  to accommodate any  ऐसे  additions being a matter of  जारी   बहस  .
Numerous synthetic radionuclides  of   naturally  occurring  तत्व   have  also  महरूम  produced in  laboratories   .
Minecraft is  a  sandbox indie  खेल  originally created  by  Swedish programmer  markus   ``   पायदान  ''  persson  and later developed  और  published by Mojang .
it   थी   सरेआम  released for the  pc  on May 17  ,  2009 , as a  developmental  alpha  संस्करण   और  , after gradual updates , was  प्रकाशित   as   a  full release version  on  November 18 , 2011 .
A version for  एंड्रॉइड  was released  a  month earlier on October  7  , and an iOS version was released on  नवम्बर  17 , 2011 .
On  may  9 ,  2012  ,  the  game was released  on  Xbox 360 as  an  Xbox  सजीव  Arcade game  ,   co-developed  by 4J  studios  .
All  संस्करण   of  Minecraft receive periodic updates .
The  रचनात्मक  and building  पहलुओं  of Minecraft allow players to build constructions  आउट  of  textured  cubes  in  a  3d   procedurally  generated  संसार   .
Other  क्रियाएँ  in the game include exploration , gathering resources ,  crafting   और   कॉम्बैट   .
Gameplay in its  वाणिज्यिक  release  रै  two principal modes : survival ,  जिससे  requires players to acquire resources  और   maintain  their health and hunger  ;  and  रचनात्मक   ,  where  खिलाड़ी  have an unlimited  सप्लाई   of  resources  ,   the   क्षमता  to fly  ,  and no health or hunger .
A  तीसरा  gameplay mode named hardcore is the  वही  as  अस्तित्व  , differing only in difficulty ;  it  is set  to   hardest  setting  और  respawning is disabled  ,  forcing players to delete their worlds  upon  death  .
Minecraft received five  पुरस्कार  from  the   2011  Game Developers Conference  :  it  थी  awarded the Innovation Award  ,  Best Downloadable  खेल   पुरस्कार  ,  और  the Best Debut  खेल  Award from the  खेल   डेवलपर  Choice Awards ; and the Audience Award ,  as  well as the Seumas McNally Grand  पुरस्कार  , from the Independent Games  पर्व  in  2011   .
In 2012 , Minecraft  थी  awarded a Golden Joystick Award in the category  बेहतरीन   downloadable   खेल  .
As  of  April 8  ,  2013  ,  the game  रै   बेची  over 10  लाख   नक़ल  on PC and as of January 22 , 2013 , over 20 million copies  आरपार  all platforms .
The Dark  नाईट  is a 2008 British-American superhero film  निर्देशित  , produced  ,  and co-written  by  Christopher  नोलन   .
Based on the DC  कॉमिक्स  character Batman , the film is the second part of Nolan 's  बैटमैन  film  श्रेणी  and  a  sequel to 2005 's  बैटमैन  Begins  .
Christian Bale  reprises  the lead role of Bruce  wayne/batman   ,  with a returning cast  of  Michael Caine  as  Alfred  pennyworth   ,   गेरी   oldman  as James Gordon and  मॉर्गन  Freeman  as  Lucius Fox .
the  film introduces  the  character  of  Harvey  डेंट   (  Aaron Eckhart )  ,   गोथम  's newly elected District  attorney   और  the consort of Bruce Wayne 's childhood friend Rachel  dawes   (   मैगी  Gyllenhaal ) ,  जो  joins Batman and the police in  combating  the new rising threat  of  a  दण्ड  mastermind calling himself  ``  The Joker `` ( Heath Ledger )  .
Nolan 's inspiration for the film  थी  the Joker 's  कॉमिक   किताब  debut in 1940  ,   the   1988  graphic novel , and the  1996  series  ,   जिससे  retold  two-face  's origin .
the   उपनाम  `` the Dark Knight  ''  was first applied to Batman in Batman No . 1  (  1940 )  ,   in   a  story written by Bill Finger .
The Dark  नाईट  was filmed  primarily  in Chicago , as well  as   in   अनेक  other locations in the United States , the United Kingdom ,  और  Hong Kong .
Nolan used an IMAX camera to film some sequences  ,   सहित  the Joker 's first appearance in  the  film .
on  January  22  , 2008 , some months after  he   था  completed filming on The  अंधेरा  Knight  और  six months before the film  's  release , Heath  लेजर  died from a toxic combination  of  prescription  दवाएँ  , leading to  तीव्र  attention from the press and  movie-going  public .
Warner Bros. had  initially  created a  वाइरल   विपणन  campaign  लिये  The Dark Knight ,  विकासशील  promotional websites and trailers highlighting screen shots of Ledger as the Joker , but after Ledger  's   मौत  , the studio refocused its promotional campaign .
the  Dark Knight was  released  on July 16 , 2008 in Australia , on July 18 ,  2008  in  उत्तर   अमेरिका  , and on July 24 ,  2008  in the  संयुक्त   किंगडम  .
Considered one of  the  best films of the 2000s  और  one  of  the best superhero  films  ever made , the film  प्राप्त  highly  धनात्मक  reviews and  नियत  numerous  रिकॉर्ड  during  इसके   नाट्य  run .
साथ   over  $ 1 billion in  आय  worldwide , it  is  the  14th-highest-grossing   फिल्मी   of   सब  time , unadjusted for inflation .
The film  प्राप्त   आठ  Academy  पुरस्कार  nominations ; it won  the  award  लिये  Best  ध्वनि  Editing and Ledger  थी  posthumously awarded  बेहतरीन  Supporting Actor .
The Dark  नाईट  Rises ,  the  final  भाग   of  the trilogy  ,   थी  released on July 20  ,   2012  .
The timeline of  रेडियो   सूचियाँ   भीतर   the   इतिहास   of  radio , the technology and  कार्यक्रम  that produced instruments that  उपयोग   रेडियो  waves and activities that people undertook .
Later  ,  the history  is  dominated by  प्रोग्रामिंग   और  contents , which  is  closer to  सामान्य  history .
The Sydney Opera  हाउस  is a multi-venue performing arts  केन्द्र  in New South Wales  ,   ऑस्ट्रेलिया  .
it   थी   conceived   और  largely  निर्मित  by  डैनिश  architect Jørn  utzon   ,  opening in 1973  बाद  a  long  gestation that began with his competition-winning design in  1957   .
जोसेफ  Cahill  's  New South Wales Government  दिया   the  go-ahead  लिये  work to begin  in  1958 .
The government 's bold decision to  चुनें  Utzon  's   डिज़ाइन  is often overshadowed by  the  scandal  कि   followed  .
It is  on  Bennelong  पाइंट  in Sydney Harbour , close  to  the  सिडनी  Harbour Bridge .
it  sits at  the  northeastern tip  of  the Sydney central business district  (  the CBD ) , surrounded on  तीन   पहलू  by the  harbour  ( Sydney  कोव  and  फार्म  Cove ) and inland by  the  Royal  botanic  Gardens .
Contrary to its  नाम  ,  it  houses multiple  प्रदर्शन  venues .
It is among the busiest performing arts  केंद्रों   in  the  संसार  , hosting  over  1,500 performances each year attended by some 1.2 million people .
It provides a  स्थान  for many performing-arts  कंपनियाँ  , including  the  four key resident companies  ओपेरा  Australia ,  the  Australian Ballet  ,  the Sydney Theatre  कम्पनी  and the Sydney  सिंफनी   ऑर्केस्ट्रा   ,   और   presents  a wide range  of   प्रोडक्शन्स  on its own  खाता  .
It is also one of  the  most  लोकप्रिय  visitor attractions in Australia , with more than seven million people visiting each year , 300,000 of whom take  a  guided tour  .
It is administered  by  the  सिडनी  Opera House Trust  ,  under  the  New South Wales Ministry of  the  Arts .
on  28 June 2007  ,  it  थी   बना   a  UNESCO World Heritage  साईट  .
It  is  one  of   the  20th century 's most distinctive buildings and one of  the   सबसे  famous performing arts centres  in  the world .
A graph  of   देह   द्रव्यमान  index as a function of body mass and  देह  height is shown  ऊपर  .
The  dashed  lines represent subdivisions within a major class .
लिये  instance  the  `` Underweight ''  वर्गीकरण  is further  विभाजित  into  ``   कठोर  '' , ``  मॉडरेट  '' , and `` mild ''  subclasses   .
the   देह  mass index ( BMI ) ,  or   quetelet   अनुक्रमणिका  ,  is   a  measure for human  देह  shape based  on  an individual  's  weight and height .
it  was devised between  1830   और  1850 by the Belgian  बहुश्रुत  Adolphe Quetelet  दौरान   the  course of developing  ``  social physics ''  .
देह   द्रव्यमान  index is defined as  the  individual 's  देह  mass divided by  the   वर्गाकार   of  their height  .
The formulae  universally  used  in  medicine produce a unit  of   माप   of  kg/m2  .
BMI  can  also  be  determined using a BMI chart  ,  which displays BMI as a  फलन  of  वज़न  ( horizontal axis  )  and  ऊँचाई  ( vertical axis )  using  contour  लाइनों  for different  मान  of BMI or colors for  अलग  BMI categories  .
† The factor for UK/US units is  अधिक   precisely  703.06957964 , but that  स्तर  of  परिशुद्धता  is  नहीं  meaningful for this calculation .
To  कार्य   इससे  stone  और   पाउंड  first  गुणा   the  stone by 14 then add  the   पाउंड  to give  the  whole  द्रव्यमान  in pounds ; to work  इससे  feet and  इंच  first multiply the feet  by  12  तब  add  the  inches to give the whole  ऊँचाई   in   इंच  .
Thomas Paine  (  January 29  ,  1737 ( NS February 9 , 1737  )   –  June  8   ,   1809   )  was an English-American political  activist   ,   लेखक  ,  राजनैतिक   theorist   और   क्रांतिकारी  .
as  the  लेखक  of two  अत्यधिक  influential pamphlets at the start of  the  American Revolution , he  प्रेरित  the Patriots  in  1776 to declare independence from Britain .
उसके   विचार   reflected  Enlightenment era rhetoric  of  transnational  इंसान   अधिकारों  .
He has been called `` a  corsetmaker   by  trade  ,   a   पत्रकार   by  profession , and  a  propagandist by inclination . ''
Born  in  Thetford  ,   इंग्लैण्ड  , in  the   काउंटी   of   नॉर्फ़ोक   ,  Paine  emigrated  to the British American colonies  in  1774  साथ   the   सहायता  of Benjamin  फ्रैंकलिन   और   he  arrived  in   समय   to   participate   in  the  अमरीकी   क्रान्ति   .
His principal contributions were the powerful  ,   widely  read  pamphlet  Common  भाव   (  1776 ) ,  the   all-time  best-selling  अमरीकी  book that  advocated  colonial  अमेरिका   's   स्वतंत्रता   इससे   the  Kingdom of  ग्रेट  Britain  ,  and  the  American Crisis ( 1776–83 ) , a  pro-revolutionary   pamphlet  series  .
Common  भाव  was so influential  कि   जॉन  Adams said ,  ``  Without the  कलम  of the author of Common Sense , the  तलवार  of Washington would have been  उठाया  in vain.”
Paine lived in  फ़्रांस   लिये  most  of  the 1790s , becoming  deeply  involved in the French  क्रान्ति  .
He wrote  the  Rights of Man (  1791   )  ,  in   भाग   a  defence of the  फ्रेंच   क्रान्ति  against  इसके  critics .
His attacks on British  लेखक   एडमंड  Burke  led  to a trial and conviction  in  absentia  in  1792 for the crime of seditious  मानहानि  .
In 1792 , despite  नहीं  being able  to   बोलो  French , he was elected to the  फ्रेंच   नेशनल  Convention  .
the  Girondists regarded him  as   an  ally .
Consequently , the Montagnards ,  विशेषकर   robespierre  ,  regarded  him as an enemy .
In December  1793  ,  he  was arrested  और  imprisoned in Paris , then  released  in  1794   .
he  became  बदनाम   क्युकी  of The  आयु   of  Reason  (  1793–94  )  ,  उसके  book  कि  advocates deism ,  promotes  reason and  freethinking  ,  और  argues  विरूद्ध  institutionalized  धर्म  in general  और  Christian doctrine in  particular  .
He  भी   लिखा  the  pamphlet  Agrarian  इंसाफ  (  1795  )  ,   discussing  the origins  of  property ,  और  introduced the  अवधारणा  of a  गारंटी  minimum income .
in  1802 , he returned  to  America where he died  on  June 8  ,  1809 .
Only six people attended his  अंत्येष्टि   as  he  था   महरूम  ostracized for his  उपहास   of  Christianity .
Clinical trials  हैं   सेट  of tests in medical  शोध   और  drug development  कि   generate  safety  और  efficacy data ( or more  specifically   ,  information about adverse drug reactions  और  adverse effects of other treatments  )   लिये  health  interventions   (  e.g. , drugs , diagnostics  ,   डिवाइस   ,   चिकित्सा   प्रोटोकॉल  )  .
They are  conducted  only after satisfactory information has  महरूम  gathered on the quality of the non  नैदानिक  safety ,  और  health  authority/ethics   कमेटी  approval is granted in  the  country  जहाँ   स्वीकृति  of  the  drug or device  is  sought  .
previously  , many emerging countries did  नहीं   आवश्यकता  local trials for product approvals .
Now ,  हालांकि   उभरते  countries still accept  आंकड़ा  from U.S./Europe ,  वे  also require  कुछ  local  ट्रायल  .
Depending on the type  of  product  और  the stage of its development ,  जांचकर्ताओं  initially  enroll  volunteers and/or patients into small pilot  अध्ययन   ,  and  subsequently  conduct  larger   स्केल  studies in  मरीजों   कि  often compare the new product with others already approved for the  affliction  of interest .
As positive  सुरक्षा  and  efficacy  data are  gathered  , the number of patients  is  typically  increased  .
नैदानिक  trials can vary in size , and  can  involve a single research entity  in  one country or many such  entities   in  multiple  देशों  .
A  पूरा  series of trials  may   incur  sizable costs  ,  and the  बोझ   of  paying  लिये  all  the  necessary people  और  services  is  usually  borne  by the sponsor , which may be a governmental  संगठन  or a pharmaceutical ,  जैवप्रौद्योगिकी  or medical device  कम्पनी  .
जब  the  विविधता  of required support roles exceeds  the  resources of  the   प्रायोजक   ,  a  नैदानिक  trial is managed by  an  outsourced partner  ,  such as  a  contract research organization  or  a  नैदानिक  trials unit  in  the academic sector .
the  Green  खाड़ी   पैकर्स  are  an  American  फ़ुटबॉल  team  आधारित   in  Green Bay , Wisconsin .
They are  सदस्यों  of the North  प्रभाग   of  the  नेशनल  Football  सम्मेलन  ( NFC )  in  the National Football  लीग  ( NFL  )   .
Green  खाड़ी   is  the third-oldest franchise in  the  NFL , having been organized  और  playing in 1919 .
The Packers are  the  only non-profit , community-owned major league professional sports  टोली   in  the  संयुक्त  States  .
The Packers  हैं   the  last vestige  of  `` small town teams '' that were  एकबार  common in the  एनएफएल   दौरान  the 1920s  और  1930s .
Founded in 1919 by Earl `` Curly '' Lambeau (  hence   the  name  lambeau   फ़ील्ड  on  जिससे   the  team plays )  और  George Whitney Calhoun ,  the   ग्रीन  Bay Packers can  ट्रेस  their lineage to  अन्य  semi-professional teams in Green  खाड़ी  dating back  to   1896  .
In  1919   और  1920 the  पैकर्स   competed  as a  semi-professional  football  टोली  against clubs from around Wisconsin and the Midwest .
They joined  the  American Professional  फ़ुटबॉल  Association (  apfa  )  in   1921  , the forerunner to  कया  is known today  as   the  National Football  लीग  (  एनएफएल  ) .
Although  ग्रीन  Bay  is  the last  एनएफएल   ``  small town  ''  team ,  इसके   लोकल  fan base  और  media extends into nearby Milwaukee ; the team also played selected home  खेल  there between  1933   और  1994  .
the   ग्रीन  Bay Packers have won  13   लीग   championships   (  more than  कोई  other team in the NFL ) , including  नौ  NFL championships  prior  to  the  Super Bowl era and four Super Bowl victories  —in   1967  (  सुपर  Bowl I  )  ,  1968  ( Super  कटोरी  II )  ,  1997 ( Super  कटोरी  XXXI ) and  2011  ( Super Bowl XLV  )  .
The  पैकर्स   have  long-standing ,  कड़वा  rivalries with  उनके   nfc  North ( formerly the NFC Central ) opponents ,  the  Chicago Bears , Minnesota  वाइकिंग्स  and the Detroit Lions  .
The  bears-packers  rivalry is one of the oldest  rivalries  in  एनएफएल  history , dating back  to   1921   .
Ethanol fuel is ethanol  (   ethyl  alcohol ) ,  the  same type  of   दारू  found  in  alcoholic  पेय  .
it  is most often used as  a   मोटर  fuel ,  मुख्यतः  as  a   biofuel  additive for gasoline .
संसार   इथेनॉल  production for transport  ईंधन  tripled between  2000  and 2007 from 17  अरब  to more than  52  billion  liters  .
From 2007 to  2008   ,  the  share  of  इथेनॉल   in   वैश्विक  gasoline type fuel use increased from  3.7   %  to 5.4 %  .
in   2011  worldwide ethanol fuel  उत्पादन   पहुँचे   22.36   अरब  U.S. liquid gallons  (   bg  )  (   84.6   अरब   liters   )  , with  the   संयुक्त  States as the top producer with 13.9  bg   (  52.6 billion liters ) ,  हिसाब   लिये  62.2 %  of  global  उत्पादन  , followed by Brazil with 5.6 bg (  21.1  billion  liters  ) .
Ethanol  ईंधन  has  a   ``  gasoline  गैलन   equivalency   ``  (  gge  ) value of , which means 1.5 gallons  of  ethanol  उपज  the energy of  एक  gallon of gasoline .
Ethanol fuel is widely used in  ब्राज़ील  and  in   the  United States , and together both  देशों  were responsible  लिये  87.1  %  of the world 's ethanol  ईंधन   उत्पादन  in  2011  .
Most cars on the road today in the  u.S.  can run on blends of  up  to 10 % ethanol  ,  and ethanol represented 10 % of the  u.S.  gasoline fuel  सप्लाई  derived  इससे   घरेलू  sources  in  2011 .
Since  1976  the  ब्राज़ीलियाई  government  रै   बना   it  mandatory  to  blend ethanol with gasoline , and since 2007  the  legal blend is around 25 % ethanol and 75  %  gasoline (  e25   )   .
By December 2011 Brazil had a  बेड़े  of  14.8   लाख  flex-fuel  ऑटोमोबाइल  and light trucks and 1.5 million flex-fuel  मोटरसाइकिल   कि  regularly  उपयोग   neat  ethanol fuel  (  known  as   e100  ) .
bioethanol   is   a   रूप  of renewable  उर्जा  that can be produced from agricultural feedstocks .
it   can   be  made from very common crops  ऐसे  as sugar cane , potato  ,  manioc and corn  .
There has  महरूम  considerable  बहस  about  कैसा  useful bioethanol will be in replacing gasoline  .
Concerns  परिचय   इसके   उत्पादन  and  उपयोग  relate to  increased   खाना  prices  due  to the  विशाल   राशि  of arable land required  लिये   फसलों   ,  as  खूब  as the energy and pollution balance of the  पूरे   साईकिल  of  इथेनॉल  production , especially from corn  .
Recent  developments  with cellulosic  इथेनॉल  production  और  commercialization may allay some of these  चिंताएं  .
cellulosic   इथेनॉल   offers   वादा   क्युकी  cellulose fibers  ,   a  major and universal component  in  plant cells walls ,  can  be used to produce ethanol  .
according   to  the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   उर्जा  Agency , cellulosic  इथेनॉल  could allow ethanol fuels to play a  much  bigger  भूमिका  in  the  future  than   previously  thought .
साब   9-3  SportCombi BioPower .
The  दूसरी   e85  flexifuel model  introduced  by Saab in the Swedish market .
A  प्लैक  commemorating the location of the Sarajevo  हत्या   और  steps  of   gavrilo  Princip  (  image  लिया  in 1987  ,  before  कदम  were removed  in  1992 and plaque  बदला   इससे  Cyrillic to  लैटिन  script )
A plaque commemorating the  स्थान   of  the Sarajevo assassination  (   चित्र   लिया  in 2009 )
On  28  June 1914 , Archduke Franz Ferdinand  of  Austria , heir  presumptive  to the Austro-Hungarian throne  ,   और  his wife ,  सोफी  , Duchess of Hohenberg , were shot  मुर्दे   in  Sarajevo  ,   by  Gavrilo  princip  , one of a group  of   छह  Bosnian  serb   हत्यारे  coordinated by Danilo Ilić .
the  political objective of the assassination was to  ब्रेक  off Austria-Hungary  's  south-Slav provinces so they could  be   संयुक्त  into a Greater Serbia or a Yugoslavia  .
the  assassins ' motives were consistent with the  गति  that later became  ज्ञात  as  यंग   बोस्निया  .
Serbian military officers  stood  behind  the   आक्रमण   .
At the top of these  सर्बियाई  military conspirators  थी  Chief of Serbian Military  प्रज्ञा  Dragutin  dimitrijević  , his righthand man Major  vojislav  Tankosić  ,   और  Masterspy Rade  malobabić   .
प्रमुख  Tankosić armed the assassins with bombs and pistols and trained  उन्हें  .
the  assassins were given  अभिगम  to the same  clandestine  tunnel of safe-houses and  एजेंटों   कि   rade   malobabić  used  लिये  the infiltration  of  weapons and operatives into  austria-hungary  .
The assassins , the key  सदस्यों  of the clandestine tunnel , and the key  सर्बियाई   सैन्य  conspirators who were  स्टिल  alive were arrested  ,  tried ,  convicted  and  punished  .
those  who were  गिरफ्तार  in Bosnia were  आजमाया  in  साराजेवो  in  अक्तूबर   1914   .
The other conspirators were arrested  और   आजमाया   पहले  a Serbian kangaroo court on the French-controlled Salonika  सामने  in 1916–1917 on unrelated  गलत  charges ; Serbia  चलाया   तीन  of the top military conspirators .
Much  of   कया   is   ज्ञात  about  the  assassinations comes from these two trials and related  रिकॉर्ड  .
Assignment of responsibility for  the  bombing and murders  of  28  जून  is highly controversial because the attack led to the  outbreak  of  संसार  War I  एक  month later .
Renée Kathleen Zellweger ( born April  25  , 1969 ) is  an  American actress  और   निर्माता  .
zellweger  first gained  फैली  attention for her  भूमिका  in  the  film  जेरी   मैग्वायर  ( 1996  )  , and subsequently received  दो   nominations  for the  अकादमी   पुरस्कार  for  बेहतरीन  Actress for her  भूमिकाएँ  as Bridget Jones in the comedy Bridget Jones  's  Diary ( 2001  )   ,  and as  roxie  Hart in  the  musical Chicago  (   2002   )  .
She won the  अकादमी   पुरस्कार  for  बेहतरीन  Supporting Actress  लिये   उसके  performance  in  the  नाटक  Cold Mountain ( 2003  )   .
She has won an  अकादमी  Award , three  सुनहरी   ग्लोब  Awards , three Screen  अभिनेताओं   गिल्ड  Awards , and a  bafta  Award ; was named Hasty Pudding  's   स्त्री   of  the Year in 2009 ; and established herself as one of the  highest-paid  Hollywood actresses as of  2007   .
The ossicles ( also called auditory ossicles ) are the  तीन   smallest  bones  in  the human  देह  ,  the   malleus  ,  the  incus  और  the  stapes   .
They are contained within the middle ear  स्पेस  and serve to transmit  ध्वनि  from the air to the fluid-filled labyrinth (  cochlea  )  .
the   अनुपस्थिति  of the auditory ossicles would constitute a moderate-to-severe hearing  घाटा  .
The term `` ossicles  ''  literally means `` tiny bones ''  और   commonly  refers to the auditory ossicles , though the term may refer to any small  अस्थि  throughout the body .
the   नई  Covenant (  यहूदी  • •  —  Greek • •  diatheke  kaine ) is a  biblical  interpretation  originally  derived from a phrase in  the  Book of Jeremiah  ,  in the Hebrew Scriptures .
It  is  often  विचार   of   as   an  eschatological Messianic Age or world to come and is related to  the  biblical concept  of  the Kingdom  of  God  .
generally  , Christians believe that  the   नई  Covenant was instituted at the Last Supper as  भाग  of the Eucharist , which  in  the Gospel of John  शामिल  the New  commandment   .
There  हैं   अनेक   ईसाई  eschatologies that further define the New  वचन   ,  as an example an  उदघाटन  eschatology defines and describes  the   नई  Covenant as  an  ongoing  संबंध  between Christian believers and God that  होगा  be in full fruition  बाद  the Second Coming of Christ ; that is  ,   it  will not only  be   in   पूरा  fruition  in   believing  hearts , but  in  the future external  संसार   as   खूब   .
The connection between  the  Blood  of   मसीह   और   the  New Covenant is seen in  सबसे  modern  अंग्रेज़ी   अनुवाद   of  the  नई   वसीयत  with the saying  :  ``  इस  cup that is  poured  out for you is  the  new  वचन  in my blood '' .
Christians believe that Jesus is  the   मध्यस्थ  of the  नई   वचन   ,  and  कि  the Blood of  मसीह   शेड  at his crucifixion  is   the   जरूरी  blood of  the  covenant  .
As  साथ  all covenants between God and man described in the Bible , the New Covenant  is  considered  ``   a  bond  in  blood sovereignly administered by  परमेश्वर   .  ''
it  has  महरूम   theorized  that the  नई  Covenant  is  the Law of Christ  as   बोला  during his Sermon  on  the Mount  .
The following  सूची   of   लोगों   pardoned  or granted clemency  by  the President of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  documents the  सबसे   prominent  cases of each presidency  .
as  granted  by   the  Constitution ( Article II ,  खण्ड  2 , Clause 1 ) , Presidents have the power to grant  दया  in one or more of the following ways  :  the  क्षमता  to grant a full pardon  ,  to commute a sentence , or  to  rescind a fine  .
U.S. Presidents have  no  power  to   ग्रान्ट   दया  for  अपराधों  prosecuted  अंतर्गत  state law  .
As  to  the difference between a pardon and a commutation:
A pardon  is  an  कार्यपालिका  order vacating a  conviction  .
A commutation is  the  mitigation of the sentence  of  someone  फिलहाल  serving a  वाक्य  for a crime pursuant to a conviction ,  बगैर  vacating the conviction itself  .
Approximately  20,000  pardons  और  clemencies  यहूद  issued by  u.S.  presidents  in  the 20th century  अलोन  .
The records of acts of clemency  यहूद  public until  1934  .
In 1981  the  Office of the  pardon  Attorney was created and  रिकॉर्ड  from President H.  W.   बुश  forward are now  सूचीबद्ध  .
This list  शामिल   pardons   और  commutations .
Tampa ( ) is a city in the  u.S.  state  of  Florida  .
it  serves as  the   काउंटी   सीट   लिये   hillsborough  County and  is  located on the west coast of Florida , on Tampa Bay  निकट  the  गल्फ  of Mexico .
the  population of  tampa  in 2011  थी   346,037  .
The current location of  tampa  was once  inhabited  by indigenous  peoples  of the  सुरक्षा  Harbor  संस्कृति   ,  most notably the  tocobaga   और  the Pohoy , who lived along the shores  of  Tampa  खाड़ी   .
it  was briefly explored by  स्पेनी   explorers  in  the  early 16th century , but  वहीँ  were  no  permanent  अमरीकी  or European settlements within  आज  's city limits until after the United  राज्य  had  acquired   फ्लोरिडा   इससे  Spain in 1819 .
In 1824 , the  संयुक्त   राज्य  Army  स्थापित  a  frontier   चौकी   पुकारा  Fort Brooke at the mouth of  the   hillsborough   नदी   ,  near the site  of  today  's   tampa  Convention Center  .
the  first civilian residents  यहूद  pioneers who settled near the fort for protection from the nearby  seminole  population  .
The town grew  धीरे   जबतक  the 1880s , when railroad  कड़ी  , the discovery  of   फास्फेट   ,  and the arrival  of   the   सिगार  industry  jump-started   tampa  's  विकास  and helped it  to  grow  into  an important city by  the   जल्दी  1900s .
आज  , Tampa is a part of the metropolitan area most commonly referred to as the Tampa Bay  क्षेत्रफल  .
For U.S.  जनसांख्यिकी  purposes , Tampa  is   भाग   of  the  tampa-st.   petersburg-clearwater  ,  फ्लोरिडा  Metropolitan Statistical Area  .
the   four-county  area is composed  of  roughly 2.7 million residents ,  बनाना   it   the   दूसरी  largest metropolitan statistical area  (   एमएसए   )  in the  राज्य   ,   और   the  fourth largest  in   the  Southeastern  संयुक्त  States  ,  behind Miami  ,   वॉशिंगटन  , D.C. , and  अटलांटा  .
The Greater Tampa Bay  क्षेत्रफल   रै  just over  4  million  निवासियों   और  generally includes the Tampa  और  Sarasota metro areas .
The Tampa Bay Partnership and U.S. Census data showed  an  average  सालाना  growth of 2.47 percent , or a  लाभ  of  लगभग   97,000  residents per  साल  .
between  2000  और   2006  ,  the  Greater Tampa Bay Market  अनुभवी   a  combined growth rate of 14.8  प्रतिशत  ,  growing  from 3.4 million to 3.9 million and hitting the  4  million people mark on April 1 , 2007 .
A  2012  estimate shows the Tampa Bay area population to have  4,310,524  people and  a  2017  प्रक्षेप  of 4,536,854 people .
tampa  has  a  number  of  sports teams , such as the Tampa  खाड़ी  Buccaneers of the National Football  लीग   ,  the Tampa Bay Lightning of the National Hockey League  ,  and  the   tampa   खाड़ी   तूफ़ान  of the Arena Football League .
The  tampa  Bay  किरणें   in  Major  लीग   बेसबॉल  and the  tampa  Bay  rowdies  of the North American Soccer League play  उनके  home games  in   neighboring   st.  Petersburg  ,  Florida .
In  2008   ,  Tampa  थी  ranked as the 5th best outdoor city by Forbes .
a  2004  सर्वेक्षण   by  the  nyu  newspaper Washington Square News ranked Tampa as  a   शीर्ष   नगर  for  ``   twenty-somethings   .  ''
tampa  is now  क्रमित  as  a  `` Gamma  ''  world  नगर   by  Loughborough  विश्वविद्यालयों  .
According to  loughborough   ,  Tampa ranks alongside  अन्य  world cities such  as  Phoenix ,  सेंटो  Domingo , and  ओसाका   .
In recent  सालो  Tampa has seen a notable upsurge  in  high-market  माँग  from consumers , signaling  अधिक  wealth concentrated in  the   क्षेत्रफल  .
Tampa hosted the 2012 Republican National  सम्मेलन  .
the   शेवरलेट  Cavalier was a compact automobile produced from 1982  to   2005  by General Motors .
Built on the  कम्पनी  's  j  platform , the Cavalier  उत्पादित  the highest sales  in  1984 .
AT & T Mobility  llc   ब्रांडेड   और  referred  to  as AT & T ( formerly  cingular  Wireless LLC  )  , is a  wholly  owned  subsidiary  of AT &  t  Inc. that provides wireless services to 107  लाख   सदस्य   in  the United States ,  सहित  Puerto Rico and the  u.S.  Virgin Islands  .
at   &  T Mobility  is   the   दूसरी  largest wireless  दूरसंचार  provider in  the   संयुक्त  States and Puerto Rico , behind  verizon   बेतार  , which serves  115.78  million customers  as   of   the   चौथी  quarter of 2012  .
AT  &  T Mobility is headquartered in the Lenox Park  क्षेत्रफल   of   dekalb  Co.  जॉर्जिया  ,  बस  outside  अटलांटा  .
Originally  cingular   बेतार  LLC from  2000  to 2007  ,   a   संयुक्त   venture  between SBC Communications  और   bellsouth  , the company acquired the  बूढ़ा  AT & T Wireless in  2004   ;  SBC later  acquired   the  original AT & T  और   re-branded  as `` AT &  t  '' .
Cingular became wholly owned by  at  & T in December 2006  as   a  result  of  AT & T 's acquisition of BellSouth  .
In January 2007 ,  cingular  confirmed  it  would re-brand itself under  the   at  &  t   नाम  .
हालांकि   the  legal  कॉरपोरेट  name  बदलें   occurred   तत्काल  ,  लिये  both regulatory  और  brand-awareness reasons both  ब्रांड्स  were used  in   the  company 's  साइनेज   और  advertising  दौरान  a transition  काल  .
The transition  concluded  in late  जून  , just prior  to   the   rollout  of  the   ठहराना  iPhone  .
On  कूच   20  , 2011 , AT  &   t   गतिशीलता  announced  इसके  intention to acquire T-Mobile USA from Deutsche  telekom  for  $   39   अरब   .
if  it had received government and  नियामक  approval ,  at   &  T would have  था  more than 130 million  सदस्य  .
However , the  u.S.  Department of Justice ,  the  Federal Communications Commission  ,  and AT  &  T Mobility 's competitors ( such  as  Sprint Nextel ) opposed the  मूव  on  the  grounds that it  होता   reduce  competition  in  the cellular  संचार  market .
In December  2011   ,  in the face of both governmental and  फैली  consumer opposition , AT &  t  withdrew their offer to complete the merger .
मार्टिन   लूथर  King , Jr. ( January 15 ,  1929   –  April  4   ,  1968 )  थी  an  अमरीकी  clergyman , activist ,  और  leader  in  the African-American  सिविल  Rights Movement .
he  is best known for his role  in  the advancement of  सिविल  rights  using  nonviolent  सिविल   disobedience  .
किंग  has become a national icon  in  the  इतिहास  of  अमरीकी  progressivism .
A Baptist minister  ,  King became a civil  अधिकारों  activist early in his career .
he  led the  1955  Montgomery  बस  Boycott and  helped  found the Southern Christian Leadership Conference ( SCLC ) in  1957   ,   सेवारत  as its first president .
साथ  the  sclc  , King  led  an  unsuccessful  struggle against  पृथक्करण  in  albany  ,  जॉर्जिया  , in 1962  ,  and organized  nonviolent   विरोध  in Birmingham  ,  Alabama ,  कि   आकर्षित  national attention following  टेलीविज़न  news coverage of  the  brutal police response  .
King  भी  helped  to  organize the 1963  कूच  on  वॉशिंगटन  ,  जहाँ  he delivered his `` I Have  a  Dream  ``  speech .
There , he established his reputation as one of  the  greatest orators in American  इतिहास  .
He also established  उसके  reputation as a radical ,  और   became   an   ऑब्जेक्ट  of the Federal  ब्यूरो  of Investigation 's COINTELPRO for  the  rest  of  his life .
FBI agents  investigated  him  लिये  possible communist ties  ,  recorded his extramarital liaisons and reported on them to  सरकारी   officials   ,   और   on   एक  occasion ,  mailed  King  a  threatening anonymous letter that he  interpreted   as  an attempt to  मेक  him commit suicide .
On October 14 , 1964  ,  King received  the  Nobel Peace Prize for combating racial inequality through  nonviolence   .
In 1965  ,   he  and the SCLC helped to  व्यवस्थित   the  Selma to Montgomery marches  और  the following year  ,  he took the  गति   उत्तर  to  शिकागो  .
In  the  final years of his life ,  किंग  expanded  उसके   फ़ोकस  to include poverty and the Vietnam War ,  alienating  many of his liberal  allies  with a 1967 speech titled  ``  Beyond  वियतनाम   ''   .
किंग  was planning a national  occupation  of Washington  ,   d.C.   ,  called  the  Poor People  's  Campaign  .
King  थी  assassinated  on  April 4 , 1968 , in Memphis ,  टेनेसी   .
His  मौत   थी   followed  by  दंगे   in  many U.S. cities .
दोषारोपण  that James Earl Ray , the man convicted  of  killing King ,  था  been framed or  acted  in  कॉन्सर्ट  with government agents persisted  लिये   दशकों   बाद  the shooting , and the jury of a 1999 civil trial found Loyd Jowers to be complicit in  a   षड्यंत्र  against  किंग  .
किंग  was  awarded  the Presidential Medal  of  Freedom  और  the Congressional  सुनहरा  Medal  मरणोपरांत  .
Martin Luther King  ,  Jr. Day  थी  established as a U.S.  संघीय  holiday in 1986 .
Hundreds  of  streets in the  u.S.  have  महरूम  renamed in his  सम्मान  .
A  मेमोरियल  statue  on   the   नेशनल  Mall was opened to the public in 2011 .
The  बाघ  ( Panthera tigris  )   is   the  largest cat  प्रजाति  ,  reaching  a total body length  of  up to and  weighing  up  to  .
It is  the  third  largest  land carnivore ( behind only the polar bear and  the   भूरा  bear ) .
Its most recognizable  विशेषता   is  a  पैटर्न  of  अंधेरा  vertical stripes  on  reddish-orange  फर  with a lighter underside .
it  has exceptionally stout  दांत   ,  and the canines  हैं  the  longest   among   जीना  felids with  a  crown  ऊँचाई  of  as  much  as  or even .
In zoos ,  टाइगर्स  have lived for  20  to  26  years , which also seems to be  उनके  longevity in  the  wild  .
They are territorial  और  generally solitary but  सोशल  animals  ,   प्रायः  requiring large contiguous  क्षेत्रों  of habitat that support  उनके  prey requirements  .
This , coupled  साथ   the  fact that  वे  are  स्वदेशी   to  some of the more densely populated places on  धरती  , has caused significant  विरोध  with humans .
टाइगर्स   एकबार  ranged  widely  across Asia  ,  from Turkey in the west to  the  eastern  coast  of Russia .
Over  the  past 100  सालो  , they have lost 93 % of their  ऐतिहासिक  range , and  have  been extirpated from  दक्षिणपश्चिम  and central Asia  ,  from the islands of  जावा   और  Bali , and from large areas of  southeast  and Eastern Asia .
आज   ,  they range  इससे   the  Siberian taiga to  खोलें  grasslands and tropical mangrove  swamps  .
The remaining six tiger  subspecies  have been  वर्गीकृत  as endangered by IUCN .
the  global population  in   the  wild  is   अनुमानित  to  क्रमांक   between  3,062  और  3,948 individuals , down from around 100,000 at the  प्रारंभ  of  the  20th century  ,  with most remaining populations occurring  in   छोटी  pockets isolated  इससे  each  अन्य   .
Major reasons  लिये  population decline include habitat destruction  ,  habitat fragmentation and poaching  .
The extent  of  area  occupied  by tigers  is   अनुमानित   at  less  than  , a 41 % decline  इससे  the area estimated  in  the  mid-1990s  .
टाइगर्स   हैं  among the  सबसे  recognisable and popular of  the  world  's  charismatic megafauna  .
They  have  featured prominently in ancient mythology  और   लोकगीत  , and continue  to  be depicted  in  modern  films   और  literature .
Tigers appear on many flags ,  coats  of arms , and as mascots for  sporting  teams  .
The Bengal tiger is the national animal  of  both  इण्डिया  and Bangladesh .
The simplified internal structure of a  हरितलवक
अवलोकन   of  the  calvin   साईकिल  and carbon  fixation
The  light-independent   प्रतिक्रियाएँ  of photosynthesis are chemical reactions that convert  कार्बन   डाइऑक्साइड  and  अन्य  compounds into glucose .
ये   प्रतिक्रियाएँ  occur in the stroma  ,  the fluid-filled area  of  a chloroplast  बाहर  of the  thylakoid   झिल्लियों  .
These reactions take the  light-dependent  reactions  और   perform  further chemical processes on them .
There are three phases  to  the  light-independent   प्रतिक्रियाएँ   ,   collectively  called the Calvin cycle  :  carbon  fixation  , reduction reactions  ,  and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration .
despite  its  नाम   ,   इस   प्रक्रम  occurs only  जब  light  is  available .
Plants do not carry out the Calvin cycle by night .
They , instead , release sucrose into the phloem  इससे   उनके  starch reserves  .
This process  happens  when light  is  available independent of the kind of  photosynthesis  ( C3 carbon fixation  ,  C4 carbon fixation  ,  and Crassulacean Acid Metabolism  )  ; CAM  पौधे  store  malic  acid in their vacuoles every night and release it by day in order to make this process work .
a  linen handkerchief with pulled thread  कढ़ाई  around  the  edges
लिनेन  cloth recovered from  qumran  Cave 1  निकट  the Dead Sea .
Linen  (  )  is  a  वस्त्र  made  इससे  the fibers of the flax plant , Linum usitatissimum  .
Linen  is  labor-intensive to manufacture ,  लकिन  when it is made into garments  ,   it  is valued for its exceptional coolness  और  freshness  in   hot  weather .
The word  ``   लिनेन  '' is  of  West Germanic origin  और   cognates  with the Latin name for  the  flax plant  linum  , and the earlier  यूनानी  λινόν  (  linon  )  .
This  शब्द   इतिहास   रै   दिए  rise  to  a number of other terms in  अंग्रेज़ी  , the  सबसे  notable of  जिससे  is  the  English word line  ,  derived from  the  use of a  लिनेन  ( flax )  लड़ी  to determine  a  straight line .
वस्त्र  in  a   लिनेन   बुनते   बनावट  , even when made of  कपास  , hemp and other non-flax  मछली   हैं  also  loosely  referred to as ``  लिनेन  '' .
Such fabrics generally have their  अपना   विशिष्ट  names  अन्य  than linen ;  लिये  example , fine cotton yarn  in  a linen-style weave is called  madapolam  .
The collective term  ``  linens ``  is  still often  प्रयुक्त  generically to describe  a  class  of   woven  and even knitted bed  ,   नहाना  ,  तालिका  and kitchen textiles  .
The  नाम   linens  is  retained   क्युकी   traditionally   ,  linen was  प्रयुक्त  for many  of  these items .
in  the past  ,  the  शब्द  `` linens '' was also used to mean lightweight undergarments such  as  shirts  ,   chemises  , waistshirts , lingerie (  a  word also cognate with linen ) , and detachable  कमीज़  collars and  cuffs  ,  जिससे   यहूद  historically made  लगभग  exclusively  आउट   of  linen .
The  अंदर   cloth  layer of fine  कम्पोजिट  clothing  garments  ( as for  उदाहरण   jackets   )  was traditionally  बना  of linen ,  और   इस  is the origin of the word lining  .
लिनेन   वस्त्र  appear  to   be  some  of   the  oldest in the  संसार  : their history  goes  back many thousands  of   सालो  .
Fragments of  स्ट्रॉ   ,  seeds  ,   मछली  ,  yarns  , and various  प्रकार  of  fabrics  which date back to  परिचय   8000   bc  have been found in  स्विस  lake dwellings .
Dyed flax fibers  मिला  in a prehistoric cave in  जॉर्जिया  suggest  the  use of  woven  linen fabrics from wild flax may date back  भी  earlier to  36,000  BP .
Linen was sometimes used as currency in  प्राचीन  Egypt .
Egyptian mummies were  लपेटा  in linen because it was seen  as   a  symbol  of  light  और  purity , and  as  a display of wealth .
कुछ  of these  fabrics  , woven from hand  spun   yarns  , were very fine  लिये   उनके   दिन   ,  but are  coarse  compared to  आधुनिक  linen .
आज  , linen is usually an expensive  वस्त्र  , and is produced in  अपेक्षाकृत  small quantities .
It has a  long  `` staple '' (  व्यक्तिगत  fiber  लंबाई  ) relative to  कपास   और  other natural fibers .
Many products are made  of  linen : aprons  ,   बैग  , towels ( swimmers , bath  ,  beach , body and  धो  towels )  ,  napkins , bed linens  ,  linen  चौके  , runners , chair  कवर  , and  मेन  's  &   महिलाओं  's  पहनें  .
the  FIFA World Cup , often  बस  the World Cup  ,  is an  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  association football  प्रतियोगिता  contested by  the  senior men 's national  टीमों   of  the members of  fédération   internationale   de  Football Association (  फीफा  )  ,   the  sport 's  वैश्विक  governing  देह   .
The championship  रै  been awarded  प्रत्येक  four  सालो   चूंकि  the inaugural  टूर्नामेंट  in 1930 ,  मगर  in  1942   और  1946 when  it   थी  not held because  of  the  दूसरी  World War .
the  current champions  हैं  Spain  ,  who won  the   2010  tournament .
The  वर्तमान  format of  the  tournament  involves  32 teams competing for the title  at  venues within the host nation  (   s  ) over a period of about  a  month ;  इस   phase  is  प्रायः  called  the  World  कप   फाइनल   .
a   योग्यता   phase   ,  which currently takes place  over   the  preceding  तीन   सालो   ,  is  प्रयुक्त  to determine which  टीमों  qualify for the  टूर्नामेंट  together  साथ   the  host  स्वदेश  ( s  )  .
The 19  संसार  Cup  tournaments  have been  जीती  by eight different national teams  .
Brazil  have   जीती   पाँच   टाइम्स   ,  and they are the only team to have played in every tournament .
The other  संसार  Cup winners  हैं   इटली  , with  चार   शीर्षक  ; Germany  ,  with three titles ;  अर्जेंटीना  and inaugural  विजेता   उरुग्वे  ,  साथ   दो  titles each ;  और  England ,  फ़्रांस  , and Spain  ,   साथ  one  शीर्षक   प्रत्येक   .
the  World  कप  is the world  's  most widely  viewed  sporting event ; an estimated  715.1   लाख  people watched  the  final match of  the  2006 FIFA World Cup held  in  Germany .
The next  तीन  World Cups will be hosted by  ब्राज़ील   in   2014  ,  रूस  in 2018 ,  और  Qatar  in  2022 .
The is  an  expansion device  लिये   the   वी   रिमोट  video game controller for the Wii  कि  allows  it  to more accurately capture complex motion .
According  to  Nintendo , the sensor  in  the device supplements the accelerometer and Sensor  बार   सामर्थ्य  of  the  Wii  रिमोट  to  enable   क्रियाएँ  to be rendered identically  on  the  स्क्रीन   in  real time .
the  Wii  's  successor console , the Wii  u  , supports the Wii  motionplus  and  इसके  peripherals  in   खेल  where use of its touchscreen-built-in primary  नियंत्रक  is not necessary .
Majulah  singapura  ( Onward Singapore )  is  the  नेशनल  anthem  of  Singapore .
रचित   by  Zubir Said  in  1958 as  a   थीम  song  लिये  official  कृत्यों  of the City Council  of  Singapore ,  the   सोंग   थी  selected in 1959  as  the island 's  गान  when it  attained  self-government  .
Upon  पूरा  independence  in  1965  ,   majulah  Singapura  थी  formally  अपनाया  as Singapore  's  national anthem .
By law  the  anthem may only be  सुंग   साथ   इसके  original Malay lyrics ,  हालांकि   वहीँ  exist  प्राधिकृत  translations of the lyrics of the  गान  in Singapore 's three other  आधिकारिक   भाषाएं  :  अंग्रेज़ी  , Mandarin and Tamil .
Originally composed in  the  key of  g   प्रमुख   ,  in  2001  the national anthem was  officially  relaunched in the lower key of F  प्रमुख  as this was  कहा  to  allow  for a `` grander  और  more inspiring arrangement '' .
The national anthem is regularly performed  or  sung  in  schools and armed forces camps at ceremonies  आयोजित  at the beginning  and/or  the end  of  each  दिन  , during which the national  ध्वज  is also raised  और  lowered  और  the  नेशनल  pledge is taken .
Singaporeans are  विशेषकर   प्रोत्साहित  to  गाओ   the  national anthem  on   अवसरों  of  नेशनल  celebration or  नेशनल  significance such  as  at the National  दिन  Parade ,  at   नेशनल   दिन  observance ceremonies conducted by  शैक्षणिक  institutions  और  government departments  ,   और   at   sporting  events at which Singapore teams are participating .
An expedition  's  shipwrights  भवन  a  brigantine  ,  1541  .
Shipbuilding  is  the construction  of  ships  और   फ्लोटिंग  vessels .
It normally takes place  in  a specialized  सुविधा  known  as   a   डॉकयार्ड  .
shipbuilders   ,   भी  called shipwrights  ,  follow a  specialized  occupation that  traces  its roots  to  before recorded  इतिहास  .
Shipbuilding and ship  मरम्मत  , both  वाणिज्यिक  and  सैन्य   ,   हैं   referred  to as `` naval  अभियान्त्रिकी  '' .
The construction of boats is a similar activity called boat building .
the   dismantling  of ships  is  called ship  तोड़कर  .
Wakonda  is  a town in  मिट्टी   काउंटी   ,   दक्षिण  Dakota , United States .
The population  थी  321 at the 2010 census .
the   following  is a list  of  the  सबसे   populous   incorporated  places of the  संयुक्त   राज्य   of  America .
As defined by the United States  जनसांख्यिकी  Bureau ,  an  `` incorporated place `` includes  a   किस्में  of designations , including  नगर  ,  कस्बा  ,  गाँव  , borough , and municipality  .
A few exceptional Census  designated   स्थान  ( CDPs  )  are  भी  included in the Census  ब्यूरो  's listing  of  incorporated places .
Consolidated city-counties  represent  a distinct  प्रकार  of government that includes the entire population  of  a  काउंटी  , or county equivalent .
Some consolidated city-counties , however , include multiple incorporated places  .
This list  presents  only that portion ( or  ``  balance  ''  ) of such  संचित   city-counties   कि  are  नहीं  a part of another incorporated place  .
Note  कि   इस   सूची   refers  only  to  the population  of  individual municipalities within their defined limits ,  जिससे   करता  not  शामिल  other municipalities or  unincorporated  suburban areas within urban agglomerations .
a  different  रैंकिंग   is  evident when considering  u.S.  metropolitan area populations .

Nintendo DS  भंडार  devices are devices used to store a licensed  डेवलपर  's work-in-progress  बिंब  ,  homebrew  video  खेल  and  डाउनलोड  commercial  खेल  ( since  the  Nintendo DS is not sold  साथ  a rewritable storage medium  )  .
licensed  developers  ,  however , can use a blue Intelligent Systems Nitro Emulator box to flash cards .
ये   डिवाइस  are  भी  known as `` flashcarts  ''  or `` flashcards '' .
There are two main classes  of  flashcarts : older devices which fit in  slot-2  (  the  Game Boy  अग्रिम   खेल   पाक   स्लॉट   )   और  newer  डिवाइस   कि  fit in  slot-1  (  the  DS Game Card  स्लॉट  ) .
Slot-2  (  or first-generation ) devices  have  been historically cheaper  due   to  economies  of   स्केल  (  inherited  from their  उपयोग  with  खेल  Boy Advance ) ,  लकिन  require a booting  औजार  in Slot-1  in  order to use the  टच   स्क्रीन  and  अन्य   ds   सुविधाएँ   .
Second-generation  डिवाइस   (   those   जिससे   तभी  use Slot-1 ) do  नहीं  work with  gba  homebrew ,  लकिन  became  कम  expensive and easier  to   उपयोग  ,  rivaling  many Slot-2 devices in price .
First-generation devices include GBA flash  कारतूस  , GBAMP CF ,  supercard  , and M3 .
Second-generation devices  शामिल   r4  Revolution , CycloDS , G6  रियल  and DS-X .
the  storage device either contains flash memory  or   a  slot for a  मेमोरी   कार्ड   to   स्टोर  homebrew .
Storage devices  साथ  a  memory-card  slot usually have  अधिक  storage capacity than flash-memory devices .
हालांकि  flash-memory capacity  is  usually  measured   in  megabits ( Mb  )  , memory-card  क्षमता  is usually measured  in   मेगाबाइट   (   mb  ) ( where 8 Mb is 1 MB ) .
Storage-device brands differ in  उनके  support for homebrew ; DS  और  Game Boy Advance ROMs ; special features ( such as ability  to  play media  फाइलें  ) ; physical size and cost .
Strictly speaking  ,  a storage  यंत्र  is not necessary for DS  साथ   flashme   संस्थापित  because  homebrew  can be sent to the DS using WMB .
However  ,   इस  is not an easily-portable method because the  ds   needs  to be  भीतर  range  of  a suitable Wi-Fi  कार्ड  .
are American people  of  Japanese  विरासत   .
Japanese Americans have historically been among the three  largest   एशियाई   अमरीकी   समुदायों   ,  but in  हाल   दशकों   ,   it  has become the sixth  largest   समूह  at roughly 1,304,286 , including those of mixed-race or mixed-ethnicity .
In the 2010 census  ,  the largest Japanese American  समुदायों  were found  in   कैलिफ़ोर्निया   साथ  272,528 , Hawaii with 185,502 , New York with 37,780 ,  वॉशिंगटन   साथ   35,008   ,  and  इलिनोइस  with 17,542 .
Southern California  रै  the  largest  Japanese-American  जनसांख्यिकी  in North America .

इस  is  a  comprehensive  लिस्टिंग   जिससे  highlights significant  उपलब्धियाँ  and milestones based  upon  Billboard magazine 's singles  चार्ट  , most notably the  बिलबोर्ड   hot   100   .
इस  list  spans  from  the  issue dated  जनवरी  1 , 1955 to present  .
The  बिलबोर्ड  Hot 100 began  साथ  the issue  दिनाँक   अगस्त  4  ,  1958  ,   और  is currently the standard popular music chart  in  the United States .
prior  to  the  creation  of  the Hot 100 , Billboard published four  singles   चार्ट  : `` Best Sellers in  स्टोर्स   ''  , ``  सबसे  Played by Jockeys '' , `` Most  निभाई   in   jukeboxes  '' and ``  the  Top 100 '' .
These  चार्ट  , which ranged from  20   to   100   स्लॉट  ,  यहूद  phased out at different times between 1957 and 1958 .
हालांकि  technically not  भाग   of  the Hot 100 chart history , their data is  शामिल  for computational  उद्देश्य  , and to avoid  unenlightening  or misleading characterizations .
All  वस्तुएं   सूचीबद्ध  below are from the Hot  100  era  ,  unless otherwise noted ( pre-Hot 100 charts ) .
V is an  अमरीकी  science fiction television series that ran for two seasons on  एबीसी   ,  from  नवम्बर  3  ,  2009 to March  15   ,  2011  .
a  remake  of  the 1983 miniseries  निर्मित   by  Kenneth Johnson , the  नई  series chronicles  the  arrival  on   धरती  of a technologically  उन्नत  alien species  जिससे  ostensibly  आता  in peace  ,  but actually has sinister motives  .
V  सितारों  Morena Baccarin , Lourdes Benedicto ,  मॉरिस  Chestnut ,  जोएल  Gretsch  ,  Logan Huffman ,  चार्ल्स   mesure   ,  Elizabeth Mitchell , Laura Vandervoort and  स्कॉट  Wolf , and  थी  executive  उत्पादित  by Scott  rosenbaum   ,  Yves Simoneau  ,  Scott  पीटर्स  , and  jace  Hall  .
the  series was  उत्पादित   by  The Scott Peters  कम्पनी  ,  hdfilms  and  warner  Bros. Television .
Geocaching is  an   बाहरी  recreational  कार्यकलाप  , in which the participants use a Global Positioning  प्रणाली  (  gps  )  receiver  or mobile device and other navigational techniques to hide and seek containers  ,  called  ``  geocaches  ''  or ``  caches  ''  ,  anywhere in the world .
a   ठेठ  cache is a  छोटी   waterproof  container  containing  a logbook where  the  geocacher  enters  the date they  मिला  it and signs  it  with their established code  नाम  .
After  हस्ताक्षर  into the  log  , the  संचय  must be placed back  exactly  where the person found it .
Larger containers such as plastic storage  containers  ( Tupperware or similar ) or ammunition boxes  can  also contain items  लिये  trading , usually toys or  trinkets   of  little  मान  .
Geocaching shares many aspects  साथ  benchmarking ,  trigpointing   ,  orienteering , treasure-hunting , letterboxing  ,   और  waymarking .
बोगी   bas  Productions was a  हिप  hop  समूह   कि   थी  originally  रचित   of  KRS-One  ,  D-Nice ,  और   dj  Scott La Rock .
DJ Scott  la   चट्टान  was murdered on  अगस्त  27 ,  1987  ,  महीने   बाद  the release of BDP  's  debut album , Criminal Minded  .
the  name of  the  group , Boogie  bas   ,  derives  इससे   a  nickname for  the  South Bronx section of The Bronx ,  एक  of  the  five  boroughs  of  नई  York City .
The group  pioneered  the  संलयन  of dancehall reggae and hip hop music and their debut LP Criminal Minded  contained  frank descriptions of life  in  the  दक्षिण  Bronx of the late  1980s   यूँ  setting  the  stage for what  होता  eventually become gangsta rap .
A municipal  बंध   is  a bond issued by a local government  ,   or  their agencies  .
Potential  issuers   of  municipal bonds  शामिल   राज्य  ,  शहरों  ,  काउंटी  ,  redevelopment  agencies , special-purpose districts , school districts  ,  public utility districts  ,  publicly owned airports and seaports , and any other  सरकारी   एंटिटी   (   or   समूह  of  सरकारें   )  at  or  below the state level .
Municipal  bonds  may be general obligations of  the  issuer or secured  by  specified revenues .
In  the  United States , interest  आय  received  by   धारकों  of municipal  bonds  is  प्रायः   exempt  from  the  federal income tax and  इससे   the  income  कर  of  the  state in which they  हैं   जारी  , although municipal  bonds  issued for certain purposes may  नहीं  be  कर  exempt .
Unlike  नई   समस्या   स्टॉक्स   कि   हैं   brought  to market with price restrictions until  the   सौदे  is  बेची  , municipal bonds  हैं   फ़्री   to   व्यापार  at  कोई  time once  वे  are purchased by  the  investor .
पेशेवर  traders  regularly  trade  और  retrade the same  bonds   अनेक  times a week .
`` Gim me Some  lovin   '  ''  is   a  song written  by  Steve Winwood , Spencer Davis and  muff  Winwood , and originally performed by  the  Spencer  डेविस  Group .
The basic  रिफ  of  the   सोंग   थी  borrowed from the Homer Banks song  ``  (  ai  n't That ) A  लॉट  of Love ''  ,   लिखा  by  बैंको  and Willie Dean ``  deanie  ''  पार्कर  .
`` Gim me Some Lovin '  ''   थी   a   uk   #   2  in the Autumn of 1966 and  a  US # 7  .
The  सोंग  is ranked # 247 on the Rolling Stone magazine 's list of  the   500  Greatest Songs of All  समय   .
The version issued  in  the UK (  और  probably most of Europe  )  is different from that  जारी  in the US  on  the United Artists  लेबल   ,   होने  slower ,  और  lacking the backing vocals  और  `` live sounding '' performance  मिला  on the US single .
(  the   us  version  रै  more often  महरूम  used on reissue CDs , even  those  coming from Europe .  )
The single  सुविधाएँ  the sound of  the  Hammond B-3 organ .
the  Internet Movie  डेटाबेस  ( IMDb  )  is  an  online database of information related  to   films  , television programs , and video  खेल  .
This includes actors , production  क्रू   कर्मियों   ,   और   fictional  characters  प्रदर्शित  in  ये  three visual entertainment media .
it  is  एक  of the most popular  ऑनलाइन  entertainment  गंतव्यों  , with  over  100 million  अद्वितीय  users  प्रत्येक   माह  and a  ठोस  and rapidly  growing   मोबाईल  presence .
आईएमडीबी  was launched  on   अक्तूबर  17 ,  1990  ,  और  in 1998  थी  acquired by Amazon.com .
As of  अप्रैल  27 ,  2013  , IMDb had 2,503,783  शीर्षक  (  शामिल  episodes )  और   5,192,493  personalities  in   इसके  database  ,  as  खूब  as  43   लाख  registered users .
The website has an  एलेक्सा  rank of 48 .
Fibre Channel Host Bus  एडाप्टर   (  64-bit PCI-X card )
SCSI Host Bus Adapter ( 16-bit  isa   कार्ड  )
in  computer hardware  ,  a host controller  ,  host adapter , or host bus  एडाप्टर  (  hba  )  connects   a  host  प्रणाली  ( the computer ) to other  संजाल  and  भंडार   डिवाइस   .
The terms are primarily  प्रयुक्त  to refer  to   डिवाइस  for connecting SCSI , Fibre Channel  और  eSATA devices .
However  ,  devices for connecting to  आईडीई  , Ethernet ,  firewire   ,  USB  और   अन्य  systems may also be called  मेजबान   adapters  .
Recently  ,  the advent  of   iscsi  and Fibre Channel over Ethernet has brought  परिचय  Ethernet HBAs  ,  which  हैं  different from Ethernet NICs in that they  शामिल   टीसीपी  Offload Engines  .
वहीँ   हैं  also converged HBAs that support both Ethernet and  fibre  Channel  पुकारा  Converged  संजाल  Adapters ( CNAs  )  .
cashmere  Scarves
आधुनिक  men 's cashmere sweaters for sale .
Cashmere  ऊन  , usually simply known as cashmere  ,   is   a  fiber obtained  इससे  Cashmere  बकरियों  and other types of goat  .
the   शब्द  cashmere  गर्भाशयी   इससे  an old spelling of Kashmir  .
cashmere  is fine in texture , strong , light  ,  and soft  .
Garments made from it provide excellent insulation  .
In the  संयुक्त  States , under  the   u.s   .  Wool  उत्पाद   labeling   अधिनियम  of  1939  , as amended ,  (  15 Uction  68b   (  a  )  ( 6  )  ) , states that a  ऊन  or textile  उत्पाद   may  not  be  labeled as containing  cashmere   unless:
ऐसे  wool  उत्पाद   is  the fine ( dehaired  )   undercoat   मछली  produced  by  a cashmere goat ( Capra  hircus  laniger ) ;
the average diameter  of  the fiber of such  ऊन  product does  नहीं  exceed 19 microns ; and
such wool product does not contain  अधिक  than 3 percent (  by  weight ) of cashmere  मछली  with average  diameters   कि   exceed  30  माइक्रोन  .
The average fiber diameter  may   be  subject  to  a coefficient  of   विभिन्नता   around   the  mean that shall  नहीं  exceed 24 percent .
Jennifer  convertibles  Inc.  is   the  owner and licensor of sofabed and  चमड़े  specialty retail stores in the United  राज्य   ,  with  स्टोर्स  located throughout the Eastern  seaboard  , in the Midwest  ,  on the West  coast  and in  the  Southwest .
the   कम्पनी  was founded in  1975  and is based  in  Woodbury ,  नई  York .
on  July 19 , 2010 , the  कम्पनी  announced  कि  it had  दायर   लिये  bankruptcy as a consequence of `` substantial losses '' .
according   to  Furniture Today the  कम्पनी  was  क्रमांक  48 among furniture retailers with US  $   114  million in  बिक्री   लिये  the year  समाप्ति   अगस्त  29 ,  2009  .
It  subsequently  emerged from Chapter 11  अंतर्गत  the  कंट्रोल  of its  प्रमुख   प्रदायक   ,  the Haining Mengnu Group  .
Egg  फेंकें   is   a  term  प्रयुक्त  for many  अलग   भोजन   around   the  world .
2__Egg_roll  __  Varieties  of   अंडा  rolls are found  in  mainland  चीन   ,  many  chinese-speaking   regions  of Asia ,  और  Chinese  अप्रवासी  communities around the  संसार  .
Egg rolls  as  referred to in China  .
In Guangdong  और  Hong Kong , egg roll usually refers to  बिस्किट   फेंकें  .
This is  a   प्रकार  of biscuit  .
the   संघटक   शामिल  egg ,  आटा   और  sugar .
Egg roll also is  a  dish  in   कैण्टन  and  हांग   काँग  , this  is   प्रायः  made  साथ  vegetable .
Within China egg rolls are eaten  predominantly  in the southeast and are not as commonly consumed  in   the  north and  पश्चिमी   भाग  of China .
In  अमरीकी   चाइनीज  cuisine , an  अंडा  roll is  a   savory   डिश  typically  परोसा  as an  क्षुधावर्धक  .
It is usually stuffed with chicken ,  पोर्क  or shrimp  ,   गोभी  , carrots ,  टमाटर  , bean sprouts  और  other vegetables  ,  and then deep fried .
This variety of the egg  फेंकें  is very common and  लोकप्रिय  , across even regional varieties of American Chinese food  ,  and is  प्रायः  included as part of a ``  संयोजन  platter '' .
In Montreal  ,  Canada , open-ended eggrolls are a Jewish-Chinese fusion  डिश   .
They can  be   either  kosher certified or merely kosher style  .
पीड़ा  and suffering is the legal  पद   लिये  the physical and emotional stress caused from an injury ( see also pain  और  suffering ) .
Some damages that might  be  under this category would be :  aches  , temporary and  स्थाई  limitations on activity , potential shortening  of   जीवन  , depression or  scarring   .
When  दाखिल  a  मुकदमा  as a  परिणाम  of an injury  ,  it is common  लिये  someone to seek  धन  both in compensation for  वास्तविक   धन  that is lost and  लिये  the pain and stress  संबद्ध  with  वस्तुतः  any injury .
in   a  suit , pain and suffering is part of the  ``   सामान्य  damages '' section of the claimant 's  अर्जी   ,  or  ,  alternatively ,  it  is  an  element of ``  compensatory   ''   non-economic  damages that  allows  recovery for the mental anguish and/or physical pain endured by the  claimant  as a  परिणाम   of   चोट  for  जिससे   the  plaintiff seeks  परितोष  .
Apart from money damages awarded in trial , money damages are also given informally outside the  न्यायिक  system in mediations , arbitration ( both of which may be  अदालत   annexed  or  गैर   litigated  claims )  as  well  as  in  दिनचर्या  insurance settlements .
Individual claimants or those  represented  by  वकील  often  उपस्थित  demands to  insurers  to settle  लिये   धन   .
These  माँग  for  bodily  injury compensation monies often set out damages  कि  are  similarly  used  in  the court  litigated  pleadings  .
Demands  हैं  usually written  summaries  of  a  claimant  's  medical care and the facts  जिससे   resulted  in the injury .
Sample of a Medallion signature guarantee stampIn
the United  राज्य   और  Canada ,  a  medallion signature guarantee  is  a special  हस्ताक्षर  guarantee for the transfer of securities .
it   is  a guarantee by the transferring financial institution that the  हस्ताक्षर  is genuine and the financial institution accepts liability for any forgery  .
हस्ताक्षर  guarantees  protect   शेयरधारकों  by  preventing  unauthorized  हस्तांतरण  and possible  निवेशकों   नुकसान   .
They also limit  the  liability of the  ट्रांसफ़र  agent who  स्वीकृत  the  प्रमाणपत्र  .
Different  संस्थानों   have   अलग  policies as  to  what type of identification they require to provide the guarantee  और  whether they charge a fee for such  सेवा  ( usually nominal if any ) .
Most institutions will not guarantee a signature  of  someone  जो   रै  not  already  been their customer .
a  medallion  हस्ताक्षर  guarantee is not  the  same  as  an acknowledgment by a notary  पब्लिक  , in  the  sense that a `` signature  गारंटी  '' is  a   प्रमाणन   by  the  संस्था  that the signature is authentic  ,  and an  acknowledgment  is a certification  by  a notary public  attesting  that the signer signed a document voluntarily .
Some banks may no longer provide this  सेवा   ,  however ,  अनेक  still  do  as well as other financial  संस्थानों  such as a Savings and Loans  और   क्रेडिट  Unions .
at  their sole discretion , these institutions may still decline to provide  the  Medallion Signature  guarantees  .
When US  नागरिकों   हैं  abroad , some financial  संस्थानों  may accept  संयुक्त   राज्य  Embassy Seals , in  प्लेस   of   the  Medallion  हस्ताक्षर  Guarantee  स्टैम्प  .
Pacific Electric Railway streetcars stacked at a junkyard on  टर्मिनल  Island , Los Angeles County  ,   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , March 1956
The General  मोटर्स  streetcar conspiracy ( also known as  the  Great American streetcar  कांड  )  refers  to  दोषारोपण   और   convictions  in relation to a program  by   सामान्य  Motors ( GM  )  and other  कंपनियाँ  who purchased  और  then  dismantled  streetcar  और   इलेक्ट्रिक  train  प्रणालियों  in many  अमरीकी  cities  .
between  1936 and 1950 , National City Lines and Pacific City Lines —with investment from GM  ,   firestone  Tire  ,  Standard  आयल   of  California  ,  Phillips Petroleum , Mack  ट्रक   ,  and the Federal Engineering  corporation—bought   over   100   इलेक्ट्रिक  surface-traction systems in 45  शहरों  including Baltimore , Newark  ,  Los  एंजिल्स  , New York City , Oakland  और  San Diego and  परिवर्तित   उन्हें  into bus  आपरेशन  .
Several of the companies involved  यहूद   convicted  in  1949   of   षड्यंत्र   to  monopolize  अंतरराज्यीय   कॉमर्स  but were acquitted  of  conspiring to monopolize the  स्वामित्व  of  ये   कंपनियाँ  .
कुछ  suggest that this program played a key role in the decline of public transit in cities across the  संयुक्त  States ;  notably  Edwin J.  quinby   ,   जो  first drew attention  to   the  program in  1946  ,  और  then Bradford C. Snell , an anti-trust  attorney  for the United States Senate whose controversial 1974 testimony to a Senate inquiry brought  the  issue to national  जागरूकता  .
Both Quinby  और  Snell argued that the deliberate destruction  of  streetcars was  भाग   of   a  larger strategy to push the United States into automobile  निर्भरता   .
Others say that  स्वतंत्र   आर्थिक   कारकों  brought about changes  in  the transit system ,  सहित  the Great  अवसाद   ,   the   पब्लिक  Utility Holding Company Act of 1935 , labor  अशांति   ,  market forces , rapidly increasing traffic  जमघट  ,  शहरी   sprawl   ,  taxation policies  कि  favored private  गाडी   स्वामित्व   ,   और   सामान्य  enthusiasm for  the  automobile  .
एक   लेखक   on  the  विषय   रै   सुझाया  that Snell and others fell into simplistic conspiracy  सिद्धान्त  thinking  ,   bordering  on  paranoid  delusions saying ``  clearly   ,   gm  waged a war on  इलेक्ट्रिक  traction .
It was indeed an all out assault , but  by   no  means the single reason for the  विफलता  of rapid transit .
भी   ,  it is just as clear that actions  और  inactions by government contributed significantly to the  विलोपन  of  इलेक्ट्रिक  traction .  ''
Only a small handful of U.S.  शहरों   have  surviving effective  rail-based   शहरी  transport systems based on streetcars or trams  ,  including Newark , Philadelphia  ,   सैन  Francisco ,  पिट्सबर्ग  , and Boston  ;   अन्य   हैं  re-introducing them .
the  story has  महरूम  explored several times  in  print , film and other media , notably in Who  framed  Roger  खरगोश  , Taken for a Ride  और  The  समाप्त   of   suburbia  .
corwin  House  ,  Salem ,  मैसाचुसेट्स  , built  ca  . 1660 ,  पहला   काल   अंग्रेज़ी
American  औपनिवेशिक   वास्तुकला  includes several building design styles associated with  the  colonial period  of   the  United States  ,   सहित  First Period English ( late-medieval ) ,  फ्रेंच  Colonial , Spanish Colonial  ,   डच  Colonial  और  Georgian  .
ये  styles are associated with the houses  ,   चर्च  and  सरकारी  buildings of the period from about  1600  through the  19th   सदी  .
`` In the  मनोदशा  '' is a  बिग  band era # 1 hit recorded by American  bandleader  Glenn  मिलर  .
It  अव्वल  the charts in 1940  in   the  U.S.  और   एक   साल   बाद  was featured  in  the movie Sun  घाटी  Serenade .
In 1999 , National  पब्लिक  Radio ( NPR )  शामिल  the  1939  Glenn Miller recording  on   आरसीए  Bluebird on the NPR 100  ,  the list of  ``  The  100   सबसे   महत्वपूर्ण  American musical works of the  20th  century '' .

the   वरुण  Canada project is the  world’s  first regional-scale underwater ocean observatory that  plugs  directly into the  अंतरजाल  .
Since  दिसम्बर  2009 ,  it  has  अनुमत   लोगों  to  ``  surf ''  the  seafloor while ocean scientists  चलाएं  deep-water  प्रयोग  from labs and universities around  the  world  .
साथ  with  इसके  sister  प्रोजेक्ट  , VENUS , NEPTUNE offers  a   अद्वितीय   दृष्टिकोण  to ocean science .
traditionally  ,  समंदर  scientists  have  relied  on   infrequent  ship cruises  or  space-based satellites to  carry  out their  शोध  ,  जबकि  the NEPTUNE project uses a  remotely  operated crawler  .
A gramophone  रिकार्ड  , commonly  ज्ञात  as a phonograph record  (  in  अमरीकी  English ) , vinyl  रिकार्ड  (  in  reference to vinyl , the material most  commonly   प्रयुक्त  after about 1950 ) , or colloquially , `` a record ''  ,   is   an  analog sound storage medium  consisting   of  a flat disc  साथ   an   inscribed  , modulated spiral groove .
the   नाली  usually starts near  the  periphery and ends  निकट   the  center of the disc .
Phonograph  रिकॉर्ड  are generally described  by   उनके  diameter in inches ( 12-inch ,  10-inch  ,  7-inch   ,  etc . ) ,  the   rotational  speed at  जिससे   वे   हैं   निभाई   (   ``  33 rpm `` ,  ``   78   ''  , ``  45  ''  ,  etc .  )   ,  their  समय  capacity  (   ``   long  playing ''  )  , their reproductive accuracy  ,   or  ``  वफ़ादारी   ``   (  `` high  वफ़ादारी   ''   ,   ``   orthophonic  ''  ,   ``   full-range  '' , etc .  )  ,  और  the number of  चैनल्स   of  audio provided  (  `` mono ``  ,   ``   स्टीरियो   ``  , `` quadraphonic  ``  , etc . ) .
Phonograph records were the  प्राथमिक  medium used for  म्यूज़िक   जनन  for most  of  the 20th  सदी  , replacing  the  phonograph cylinder  ,   साथ  which it  था  co-existed  ,  by the 1920s  .
by  the late 1980s , digital  मीडिया  had  gained  a larger  मार्केट  share  ,  and the  विनाइल   रिकार्ड   बाएँ  the  मुख्यधारा  in 1991 .
They continue to be manufactured  और  sold in  the   21st   सदी  .
In 2008 ,  nearly   2.9   लाख  units shipped , the most in any year since  1998  and the format has continued to slowly regain  लोकप्रियता  .
They are especially used by DJs and audiophiles  लिये  many types of music .
as  of  2013  ,  विनाइल  records continue  to  be used  लिये  distribution  .
