Grasslands are areas where the vegetation  is  dominated by grasses  (  Poaceae )  ,  however  sedge   (  Cyperaceae ) and  फटाफट   (  Juncaceae ) families  can  also be found  .
grasslands  occur naturally  on   सब   महाद्वीपों  except Antarctica .
In  शीतोष्ण   latitudes  , such as  northwestern  Europe and the Great Plains and  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  in North America , native grasslands are dominated by perennial bunch grass species , whereas  in   warmer   climates  annual  प्रजाति  form a greater component  of   the  vegetation .
Grasslands are found in most  ecoregions  of the Earth .
लिये   उदाहरण  there are five  स्थलीय  ecoregion classifications ( subdivisions ) of the  शीतोष्ण   grasslands  , savannas , and shrublands biome  (  ' ecosystem  '   )  , which  is  one of eight terrestrial ecozones  of   the   धरती   's  surface .
हिना  ( Lawsonia  inermis   ,  also called  हिना  tree ) or Hina is a flowering plant , the sole species in  the   genus   lawsonia  in  the  family Lythraceae .
The English name `` henna ''  आता  from  the   अरबी  ( ALA-LC :  ḥinnāʾ   /   सुनाया  ) or colloquially , loosely pronounced .
The name is  भी   प्रयुक्त   लिये  dye preparations derived from  the  plant  ,  and  लिये  the  आर्ट   of  temporary  गोदना  based on those dyes .
Henna  रै  been used  चूंकि  antiquity to dye skin ,  बाल  ,  और   fingernails  ,  as  well  as  fabrics including  रेशा   ,  wool and leather  .
Additionally , the  नाम  is misused  लिये   अन्य  skin  और  hair dyes , such  as   ब्लैक   हिना  or neutral  हिना   ,  which  हैं  not derived from the plant .
A thin  फिल्मी   is  a layer  of  material ranging from  भिन्नों   of  a nanometer  (  monolayer ) to  अनेक  micrometers in thickness .
Electronic semiconductor devices and optical  coatings   हैं  the main  अनुप्रयोग  benefiting  इससे  thin-film  निर्माण  .
A familiar application of thin films is  the  household  दर्पण  , which  typically  has a thin  मेटल   कोटिंग  on the back of a sheet of glass  to   रूप  a reflective  इंटरफ़ेस   .
The  प्रक्रम  of silvering was once commonly used to  उपज   mirrors   .
A  very-thin-film   कोटिंग  (  कम  than  a  nanometer thick ) is used to  उपज   two-way  mirrors  .
The performance  of   ऑप्टिकल  coatings  (  e.g . antireflective  ,  or  ar  ,  coatings  )  हैं   typically   उन्नत   जब  the  thin-film  coating  consists  of multiple  परतों  having varying  thicknesses   और  refractive  indices   .
Similarly , a periodic structure of alternating  पतला  films of different materials may  collectively   रूप  a so-called  superlattice  which exploits the phenomenon of quantum confinement  by  restricting electronic phenomena to two-dimensions .
Work is being done with  ferromagnetic  and ferroelectric  पतला  films for use as computer memory .
It is also being applied  to   दवाएँ  , via thin-film  ड्रग  delivery  .
Thin-films  हैं  used to produce thin-film batteries .
पतला  films are also used in  dye-sensitized  solar cells .
Ceramic  पतला  films are in wide use .
The relatively high  कठोरता  and inertness  of  ceramic  सामग्री  make this  प्रकार   of   पतला  coating of  ब्याज   लिये  protection of substrate materials against corrosion ,  ऑक्सीकरण  and wear .
In  particular   ,   the   उपयोग   of  such coatings on cutting tools can extend the life of  ये   वस्तुएं  by  अनेक  orders of magnitude .
शोध  is  होने   किया  on a  नई  class of thin-film  अकार्बनिक  oxide materials , called amorphous heavy-metal cation multicomponent  आक्साइड  , which could  be  used to make transparent transistors  कि  are inexpensive ,  stable   ,  and environmentally benign  .
गियर्स  of War is  a  military science fiction  third-person  shooter video game developed by  एपिक   खेल  and  प्रकाशित  by Microsoft Game  studios  .
It was initially released  as  an exclusive title for  the  Xbox 360  in  November  2005  in North  अमेरिका  ,  ऑस्ट्रेलिया   ,  and most of Europe and included  a  ``  सीमित   कलेक्टर   's   संस्करण  ''  साथ  added content and an  आर्ट  book titled  नष्ट  Beauty that detailed  much  of the game 's back-story  .
Despite the  आरंभिक  statements of Xbox 360 exclusivity ,  a   microsoft   खिड़कियाँ   संस्करण  of  the  game  थी   विकसित  in  संयोजन  with People Can Fly and released a year later  ,  featuring  नई   सामग्री   सहित   अतिरिक्त   अभियान   स्तर  ,  a  new multiplayer  खेल  mode , and  खेल  for Windows Live functionality .
The game  focuses  on the troops of Delta Squad as they wield  a  desperate , last-ditch  attempt   to   सहेजें   the  remaining human inhabitants of the  fictional  planet  sera   इससे  a relentless and seemingly  अजेय  subterranean  दुश्मन  known as  the   टिड्डी  Horde .
The player assumes  the   भूमिका   of  Marcus Fenix (  लकिन  can also play  as   डोमिनिक  Santiago ) , a  पूर्व  prisoner  और  war-hardened soldier .
the  game is based on the  उपयोग  of cover and strategic fire for the  खिलाड़ी  to advance  through   the  scenarios ; a  दूसरी  player can play cooperatively through the main campaign to  assist   .
The  खेल   भी  features several online multiplayer  खेल  modes for  up  to eight players  .
Gears of War sold  over  three million copies in just  टेन  weeks and  थी  the fastest-selling video game  of  2005 as  खूब  as the second-most played game over Xbox Live during .
It currently  स्टैंड  as the 5th best selling Xbox 360  खेल   of   सब  time .
The game has since sold over five million copies by  सितंबर   2008  .
The game was well received by critics , who praised its gameplay and detailed visuals ,  और  it won  अनेक   ``   खेल   of  the Year  ''   पुरस्कार  in 2006  .
The  कामयाबी  of the game has led  to   the  development of the Gears of War  मताधिकार  , including the 2008 sequel Gears of War 2 and  इसके   follow-up   ,   गियर्स   of  War 3 , which was  released  on September  20  , 2011  ,  after  having  initially been set to have  महरूम   released  on April 5 ,  2011  , the date upon  जिससे  Epic Games  '  Cliff Bleszinski  थी  a guest on Late Night with Jimmy Fallon .
adaptations  to  किताबे   ,  comics , as  खूब   as  a  विशेषता  film are  to   be  expected .
a  Tree  grows  in Brooklyn is a 1943  अनोखा  written  by  Betty Smith  .
The story focuses on an Irish-American family  in  Williamsburg , Brooklyn  ,  New  यॉर्क  City .
the  novel  is  set in the first and  दूसरी  decades  of   the  20th century .
The  किताब  was  an   immense  success  .
The  प्रमुख   रूपक  of  the   किताब   is  the hardy Tree  of  Heaven , native to China  और  Taiwan  ,  now considered invasive  ,  and  आम   in   the  vacant  लोट  of  नई  York City .
संसार  map  साथ  the intertropical  मण्डल   highlighted   in  red .
तीव्र  climate  zones  of the Earth where all twelve  महीने   have  mean  temperatures  above 18  °c  (  64  °F ) .
The tropics  is  a  प्रदेश  of the Earth surrounding the  equator  .
It is limited in  अक्षांश  by the  tropic  of Cancer  in  the northern hemisphere at  लगभग  N and the Tropic of Capricorn  in   the  southern hemisphere at S  ;  these latitudes correspond  to  the axial tilt  of  the Earth  .
the  tropics are  भी  referred  to   as  the tropical zone and the torrid zone  (  see geographical zone ) .
the  tropics  शामिल  all  the  areas on the  धरती  where the Sun  पहुँच  a point  सीधे  overhead  at  least once during the solar year  .
the  tropics are distinguished  इससे  the other  climatic   और  biomatic regions  of  Earth , the middle latitudes and the  ध्रुवीय   regions  on either  पक्ष   of  the equatorial zone  .

``  कया  You Need '' is  an  episode of  the  American television anthology series The Twilight  मण्डल  .
It  is  based on the short story of the  वही  name by Lewis  padgett   (   हेनरी   kuttner  and C. L. Moore )  .
PlayhouseSquare , in the  क्लीवलैंड  Theater District in downtown Cleveland , Ohio , is the second-largest  थिएटर  complex in  the   संयुक्त  States , second only to New York City 's Lincoln Center ) .
constructed  in a span of 19 months in the  जल्दी  1920s ,  the  theaters were subsequently  बंद  down , but were revived  through  a  grassroots  effort .
Their renovation and reopening helped usher in a  नई   era   of  downtown revitalization in  क्लीवलैंड   ,  and was  पुकारा   ``  one of  the   शीर्ष  ten  सफलताओं  in Cleveland history  .  ''
The driver  और   यात्री  front airbags  ,  after having been deployed , in  a  British Peugeot 306  car  .
An  एयरबैग  is a vehicle  सुरक्षा  device .
It is an occupant restraint  प्रणाली  consisting of a  लचीली  fabric  लिफाफा  or cushion designed to inflate rapidly during an automobile collision  .
Its  purpose  is  to  cushion occupants during  a  crash  और  provide protection to  उनके  bodies  जब  they  स्ट्राइक  interior objects such as the steering wheel  or  a window .
Modern vehicles may contain multiple airbag  मौड्यूल  in various  पक्ष   और  frontal locations of the passenger  seating   स्थितियाँ   ,  and sensors may  तैनात  one or  अधिक  airbags  in  an  प्रभाव   मण्डल  at variable rates based on the type ,  कोण  and severity  of   प्रभाव  ;  the  airbag  is  designed  to  only  inflate   in  moderate to severe frontal crashes  .
Airbags  हैं  normally  designed  with the intention of supplementing the protection of an  occupant  who is  correctly  restrained with a  seatbelt  .
सबसे   डिजाइन   हैं   inflated  through pyrotechnic means  और   can  only be  संचालित  once .
Newer side-impact airbag modules  consist  of  संपीडित  air  सिलेंडर  that are triggered in the  इवेंट  of a side  प्रभाव   गाडी   प्रभाव  .
The first commercial designs  यहूद  introduced in passenger automobiles  दौरान  the 1970s with limited success .
Broad  वाणिज्यिक   अपनाना   of  airbags occurred in many markets during the late 1980s and early  1990s  with a  ड्राइवर  airbag ,  और  a front passenger  एयरबैग   as  well on  कुछ  cars  ;  and many modern vehicles now include four or more  इकाई   .
irs  tax  फ़ॉर्म  are used for  करदाताओं  and tax-exempt organizations  to  report financial information to the  आतंरिक   आय   सेवा  ( IRS )  of  the United States .
वे  are used to  रपट   आय   ,   गणना   कर  to be paid  to   the  federal  सरकारी  of  the   संयुक्त  States  ,  and disclose other information as  जरूरी  by the Internal  आय  Code ( IRC ) .
There are over 800 various forms and schedules .
The best-known  of  these is Form 1040  प्रयुक्त  by  individuals  .
In the United States , driver  's   पंक्तियां  are  जारी   by  each  व्यक्तिगत  state ( including Washington , D.C.  और  territories ) ,  बल्कि  than  the  federal  सरकारी   क्युकी  of  the  political concept of federalism .
Drivers are normally required to obtain  a  license from their  राज्य  of residence and all states recognize each other 's  पंक्तियां  for temporary  विज़िटर  subject to  सामान्य   आयु  requirements .
A state may also suspend an individual 's driving privilege within its borders for  ट्रैफ़िक  violations  .
Many states  share  a  आम  system of  अनुज्ञा  classes  ,  with some  अपवाद  , and commercial license  वर्ग  are  मानकीकृत  by  संघीय   विनियमन   at  49 CFR part 383 .
China has  महरूम   the  source of many  आविष्कारों  , including the Four  ग्रेट  Inventions  :  papermaking , the compass , gunpowder , and printing ( both  woodblock  and  movable   प्रकार   )  .
The  सूची   नीचे   contains  these and other inventions  .
The Chinese invented technologies  involving  mechanics , hydraulics , and  गणित   लागू  to horology , metallurgy ,  खगोलशास्त्र  ,  कृषि  , engineering , music  सिद्धान्त  ,  craftsmanship  , nautics ,  और   warfare  .
by  the Warring States Period  (  403–221 BC  )  , they had advanced  metallurgic  technology , including  the  blast furnace and cupola furnace ,  जबकि  the finery forge  और   puddling  process were known by the Han  राजवंश  (  202   bc   –  AD 220 ) .
A sophisticated economic  प्रणाली  in China gave birth to inventions such as paper money during  the   सोंग  Dynasty  (   960–1279  )  .
The invention of gunpowder by the  10th   सदी   led  to  an  array of inventions such as  the  fire lance , land mine , naval  मेरा   ,  hand cannon , exploding cannonballs ,  multistage  rocket  ,  and rocket  बम  with aerodynamic  विंग्स  and  विस्फोटक  payloads  .
With the navigational  सहायता  of  the   11th-century   कम्पास  and ability  to  steer at  ऊँची   समुद्र  with  the  1st-century sternpost rudder ,  premodern  Chinese sailors sailed as far as East  अफ़्रीकी  and Egypt  .
In  water-powered   clockworks   ,   the  premodern  चाइनीज  had used the escapement mechanism since the 8th century and the endless power-transmitting chain  ड्राइव  in  the  11th century  .
They also made large mechanical puppet theaters driven by waterwheels and carriage wheels and wine-serving automatons  चलित  by paddle wheel  नौकाएँ  .
The contemporaneous Peiligang and Pengtoushan  संस्कृतियों   represent   the  oldest  पाषाणकालीन  cultures of China and were formed around  7000   bc  .
कुछ  of the first inventions of Neolithic ,  प्रागैतिहासिक  China  शामिल  semilunar and  आयताकार  stone  knives   ,  stone  hoes  and  हुकुम  , the cultivation of millet  ,  rice and the soybean  ,  the refinement  of  sericulture  ,   the   भवन  of  rammed  earth structures with  लाइम  -plastered  हाउस  floors ,  the  creation of the potter  's   व्हील   ,   the   सृष्टि  of pottery with cord-mat-basket designs ,  the  creation of pottery tripods and  pottery  steamers  ,  and the development  of  ceremonial vessels and scapulimancy for  उद्देश्य   of  divination .
Francesca  ब्रे  argues that the domestication of the ox  और   भैंस  during the Longshan culture  (   c.  3000–c .  2000  BC  )  period  ,   the  absence of  longshan-era   सिंचाई  or high-yield  फसलों  , full evidence of Longshan cultivation of  dry-land   खाद्यान्न  crops which gave high  yields  `` only when the soil  थी   carefully  cultivated , '' suggest that  the  plow was known at  तनिक  by the  longshan  culture period and explains the high  agricultural  production  yields  which allowed the  वृद्धि  of Chinese  सभ्यता  during  the  Shang Dynasty ( c. 1600–c  .  1050 BC ) .
साथ  later  आविष्कारों  such as the multiple-tube  बीज   ड्रिल   और  heavy  moldboard  iron plow  ,  China 's agricultural  आउटपुट  could sustain  a   much   larger  population  .
For the purposes  of  this list , inventions are regarded as technological firsts developed in China , and as  ऐसे  does  नहीं  include foreign  technologies  which the Chinese  acquired  through contact  ,   ऐसे   as   the  windmill from  the   मध्य  East  or  the  दूरदर्शी  from Early modern Europe .
It  भी   करता   नहीं   शामिल  technologies developed elsewhere  और  later invented  separately  by  the   चाइनीज   ,  such as the  ओडोमीटर  and  कड़ी   पंप   .
Scientific , mathematic or  प्राकृतिक   discoveries  , changes in minor concepts of design  or   स्टाइल   और   कलाकारी  innovations can not be regarded as inventions and do not appear  on   the  list .
Gross domestic product in 2011  us  dollars per capita ,  समायोजित  for inflation and purchasing  शक्ति  parity ( log  स्केल  )  इससे   1860  to  2011  , with population ( disk  क्षेत्रफल   )  for the US ( yellow ) , UK  (  orange ) , Japan ( red ) , China (  रेड  ) , and  इण्डिया  ( blue ) .
वैश्वीकरण  ( or globalisation—see  स्पेलिंग  differences ) is the process of  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  integration arising from the  इंटरचेंज  of world views  ,  products , ideas , and other aspects of culture .
Put in simple terms , globalization refers  to   प्रक्रियाओं  that promote world-wide exchanges of national  और  cultural  संसाधन  .
Advances  in   परिवहन  and  दूरसंचार  infrastructure , including the  वृद्धि  of the Internet  ,  are major  कारकों   in  globalization , generating further interdependence of economic  और  cultural  क्रियाएँ  .
Though several scholars  प्लेस  the  origins  of globalization  in  modern times , others trace its history long before the European age of discovery  और   voyages  to the New World .
कुछ  even trace the origins to  the  third millennium BCE .
Since the beginning  of   the   20th  century ,  the  pace of globalization  रै   intensified   at  a rapid  रेट  ,  विशेषकर   दौरान  the Post Cold  युद्ध   era  .
The  पद  globalization has  महरूम  in increasing use since  the  mid-1980s and especially since  the   mid-1990s  .
In 2000  ,  the International Monetary Fund  (  IMF ) identified four basic aspects of globalization : trade  और  transactions , capital and  निवेश  movements ,  माइग्रेशन  and  गति  of  लोगों  and the  dissemination   of  knowledge .
Further ,  पर्यावरणीय  challenges such as climate  बदलें   ,  cross-boundary water  और  air pollution , and over-fishing of  the  ocean  हैं  linked with globalization  .
Globalizing  प्रक्रियाओं  affect and are affected by business  और   कार्य  organization ,  अर्थशास्त्र  , socio-cultural resources , and the natural environment  .
The Replacements is a 2000 American sports comedy film  निर्देशित  by Howard  deutch  .
It stars Keanu  रीव्स   ,  Gene Hackman  ,  and Brooke Langton  .
an  American Airlines aircraft takes  बंद  from Dallas/Fort Worth  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Airport .
इस   विमानक्षेत्र  is the airline  's  largest hub  .
American Airlines flies  to  79 domestic  गंतव्यों  and 78  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  destinations  in   48  countries  .
(   as  of December 2012 )
The  सूची   शामिल  the  नगर  ,  देश  , the codes of  the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   एयर  Transport Association (  iata  airport  कोड  )  और   the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Civil Aviation Organization ( ICAO  विमानक्षेत्र  code  )  ,  और  the airport 's name , with the airline 's hubs ,  फ़ोकस   शहरों  and seasonal  गंतव्यों   चिह्नित  .
The list also  contains   गंतव्यों  no longer served by the airline , which are marked as terminated destinations .
it   करता  not  शामिल  destinations served for American Airlines by its regional affiliates  अमरीकी  Eagle  एयरलाइंस  , Executive Airlines  ,   और  AmericanConnection .
``  Day-O ( The  banana  Boat  सोंग  ) ''  is  a traditional  jamaican   mento  folk  सोंग  ,  the  best-known version of which was  सुंग  by Harry Belafonte  और  an alternate  संस्करण  interspersed with  another  Jamaican folksong , Hill and  गुल्ली   सवार  , by  dame  Shirley  bassey   .
Despite  the  song  's   mento  influences , `` Day-O ( The Banana Boat  सोंग  ) '' is widely known as an  उदाहरण  of  कैलिप्सो   म्यूज़िक  .
it  is a  कार्य  song ,  इससे  the point  of  view of  डॉक   मजदूर   working  the night shift loading  केले  onto ships  .
Daylight  रै  come , the shift is over and they want  उनके  work to  be   गिने  up  so   कि  they can  go  home .
संसार  War  i  ( WWI ) was a global war  केंद्रित  in Europe that began on  28  July 1914  और  lasted  जबतक   11  November 1918 .
It was  predominantly  called  the  World War  or  the Great War from  इसके   occurrence   जबतक  the start  of  World  युद्ध  II in  1939  ,  और  the  पहला  World War  or  World War I  thereafter   .
It involved all the  संसार  's great powers  ,  which were  समवेत  in two opposing alliances  :  the Allies (  आधारित  on the Triple  entente  of the  संयुक्त  Kingdom  ,  France and Russia )  और   the  Central  शक्तियां  ( originally the  ट्रिपल  Alliance of Germany  ,   austria-hungary  and Italy ; but , as Austria–Hungary had taken  the  offensive against the agreement , Italy did  नहीं  enter  into  the war  )   .
ये  alliances were both reorganised and  विस्तारित  as more nations entered the war : Italy , Japan and the United States joined the Allies , and  the   उस्मानी  Empire and  बुल्गारिया  the Central Powers  .
ultimately   ,  more  than  70 million military personnel , including 60 million Europeans  ,   यहूद  mobilised in  एक   of  the  largest  wars in history .
More than 9 million combatants  यहूद  killed ,  largely  because of  technological  advancements that led to enormous increases in the lethality  of  weapons without corresponding improvements  in  protection or  गतिशीलता  .
it  was the fifth- deadliest  विरोध  in  संसार  history , subsequently paving the way for  विभिन्न  political changes , such as  revolutions  in many of the nations involved  .
One  of   the  long-term causes of the war was  the  resurgence of imperialism  in   the  foreign  नीतियों  of the great  शक्तियां  of  यूरोपीय   .
अधिक  immediately , the  हत्या   of   archduke   फ्रांज   फर्डिनेंड  of Austria  ,  the heir to  the   सिंहासन   of  Austria-Hungary  ,  on 28  जून   1914  by  यूगोस्लाव  nationalist Gavrilo  princip  in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis when  austria-hungary  subsequently  वितरित  an  ultimatum   to  the Kingdom of Serbia .
अनेक  alliances formed over the  पिछला  decades were invoked  .
भीतर  weeks ,  the  major powers were at war and  ,   via  their  colonies  , the conflict soon  स्प्रेड  around the world .
on  28  जुलाई  , the Austro-Hungarians fired the first shots of  the  war as preparation for the invasion of Serbia  .
While the Russians mobilised , the Germans  invaded   न्यूट्रल  Belgium and Luxembourg  on   the  way to  फ़्रांस  , providing a casus  belli  for Britain 's declaration of war  विरूद्ध  Germany .
बाद  the German  कूच   on  Paris was  brought  to a halt—the so-called Miracle  of  the Marne  —the  Western Front settled into a static battle of  अपघर्षण  with a  गर्त   लकीर  that changed little until  1917  .
On the Eastern Front , the  रूसी  army was successful  विरूद्ध   the   austro-hungarians  , but was stopped in its  आक्रमण   of  East Prussia  by   the  Germans .
in   नवम्बर   the  Ottoman Empire joined the  युद्ध  , opening up fronts in the  काकेशस   ,  Mesopotamia  और  the Sinai .
Italy and  बुल्गारिया  went to war  in  1915 and Romania in 1916 .
in  Russia , the tsar 's  सरकारी  collapsed  in  March 1917 and a  subsequent  revolution in November  brought   the   russians   to   शर्तें  with the Central Powers .
After a 1918 German  अप्रिय  along the western  सामने  , the  allies  drove back the Germans in  a   श्रेणी  of  कामयाब   offensives  and  अमरीकी   शक्तियां  began entering  the   trenches  .
Germany , which had its  अपना  trouble with  क्रांतिकारियों   ,  agreed to  an  armistice on 11 November 1918  .
the   युद्ध  ended in victory  लिये   the  Allies  .
Events  on  the  घर   fronts   यहूद   as   उग्र  as  on  the battle fronts  ,  as the participants tried to  mobilize  their manpower and economic resources to fight a total war .
By the  समाप्त  of  the  war  ,  four  प्रमुख   इम्पीरियल  powers—the German  ,  Russian ,  austro-hungarian  and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist .
The successor states  of  the former two  खोया   a  great amount of territory ,  जबकि   the   latter  two  यहूद  dismantled entirely .
The map of central Europe  थी  redrawn into  अनेक  smaller  राज्य  .
The  लीग  of Nations was formed in  the  hope of preventing another such  विरोध   .
the   यूरोपीय  nationalism spawned  by  the war  और  the breakup  of   empires   ,  the repercussions of Germany 's defeat and problems  साथ   the  Treaty of  versailles  are agreed to  be  factors contributing to World War  ii  .
Nurse Jackie is  an  American series that premiered  on  June 8  ,   2009  , on Showtime , Movie  सेंट्रल  and The Movie Network .
The  श्रेणी  stars Edie Falco as  the  title character Jackie Peyton , an  आपात   विभाग  nurse at All  संतो   '  Hospital in New York  नगर  .
For  जैकी  ,  ``   प्रत्येक   दिन  is a  ऊँची   तार   अधिनियम  of juggling patients  ,  doctors  ,  fellow nurses  और   उसके   अपना  indiscretions . ''
keeping   up  with the Kardashians (  प्रायः  referred to simply  as  The  kardashians   )  is an American reality television series  कि  premiered  on  October 14 ,  2007  , on E  !  .
it  follows the lives of the Kardashian/Jenner family , including sisters Kourtney  ,  Kim  ,  and Khloé Kardashian  .
the   श्रेणी   '   कामयाबी  has led to  the   spin-offs  Kourtney and  किम  Take  नई  York  ,  Khloé & Lamar ,  कोर्टनी  and  khloé  Take Miami , and Kourtney and Kim Take Miami .
अफगानिस्तान   (  ; ; ) , officially  the   इस्लामी  Republic  of  Afghanistan  ,   is   a  landlocked sovereign state forming  भाग  of  दक्षिण   एशिया  , Central Asia ,  और   to  some extent Western Asia .
It  रै  a population  of  around 30  लाख  inhabiting an  क्षेत्रफल  of approximately ,  बनाना   it  the  42nd  most populous and  41st  largest nation in the world  .
It is bordered by Pakistan in the south and  the  east , Iran in  the  west , Turkmenistan , Uzbekistan and  ताजिकिस्तान  in  the   उत्तर   ,  and China in the far northeast .
Afghanistan has been  an   प्राचीन   फोकल  point of the  रेशा  Road and  इंसान  migration .
archaeologists  have  मिला   प्रमाण   of   इंसान  habitation  इससे  as far back  as  the Middle  paleolithic  .
शहरी  civilization may have begun in the area as early  as   3,000  to  2,000  BCE .
बैठे  at an important geostrategic location that  connects  the Middle  ईस्ट  culture with  सेंट्रल  Asia and the  भारतीय   उपमहाद्वीप  ,  the  land has been home to various peoples  through  the  आयु   और   witnessed  many military  अभियान   ,  notably  by   सिकंदर  the Great  ,  Genghis Khan , and in modern era Western forces .
the  land also served as  a   सोर्स   इससे  which  the  Greco-Bactrians  ,  Kushans , Hephthalites  ,  Saffarids ,  ghaznavids  ,  ghorids  , Khiljis ,  timurids  ,  मुगलों  , Durranis ,  और  others  have  risen  to  form major empires  .
the  political  इतिहास   of  the modern state  of  Afghanistan begins in 1709 , when the  hotaki   राजवंश   थी  established  in  Kandahar followed by  अहमद   शाह  Durrani 's rise to power  in  1747 .
in  the late 19th century  ,  Afghanistan became a buffer  राज्य   in  the ``  ग्रेट  Game ``  between  the British and Russian empires .
following  the 1919 Anglo-Afghan War , King Amanullah began a European style modernization of the country but was stopped by the ultra-conservatives  .
During the  ठंडा  War ,  बाद   the  withdrawal of the  अंग्रेजों   इससे  neighboring India in  1947   ,  the  संयुक्त  States and  the  Soviet Union began  spreading  influences in Afghanistan , which led to a  खूनी  war between the US-backed mujahideen forces and  the  Soviet-backed Afghan government  in  which  over   a   लाख   afghans  lost their  जीवनदान  .
This was followed by  the  1990s civil  युद्ध  , the  वृद्धि  and fall  of  the extremist Taliban government and the 2001–present war .
In December 2001 ,  the  United Nations Security Council authorized the creation of the International Security  सहायता  Force ( ISAF ) to help  maintain  security in Afghanistan  और  assist the Karzai  प्रशासन  .
तीन   दशकों  of  युद्ध  made Afghanistan one of the world 's  सबसे  dangerous countries , including  the   largest  producer  of   शरणार्थियों  and asylum  जरुरतमंदों  .
जबकि  the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  community is  पुनर्निर्माण  war-torn Afghanistan  ,  terrorist  समूह  such as the Haqqani Network and Hezbi Islami are actively  शामिल  in  a  nationwide Taliban  -led  insurgency ,  जिससे  includes hundreds of assassinations  और  suicide attacks .
According to the United  राष्ट्र  , the insurgents were responsible for 80  %   of   civilian  casualties in  2011  and 2012 .
The American Civil War  (  ACW ) , also known  as  the  युद्ध  between  the  States or simply the Civil  युद्ध  ( see naming )  ,  was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865  between   the  United States  (   the   ``   संघ  '' or  the   ``  North '' ) and several Southern slave  राज्य  that declared  उनके  secession and  formed  the Confederate States of America ( the ``  confederacy  ''  or  the `` South  ''  ) .
the  war  था  its origin in the issue of  गुलामी  , especially the extension of slavery into the western territories  .
Foreign powers did not intervene .
After four years of bloody combat that left over  600,000  soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure  ,  the  confederacy  collapsed , slavery was abolished  ,  and the difficult Reconstruction  प्रक्रम  of restoring national unity and  guaranteeing  rights  to  the freed slaves began  .
In the 1860 presidential election , Republicans  ,  led by Abraham  lincoln  , opposed expanding slavery into United States '  territories  .
Lincoln won , but before his  उद्घाटन   on  March 4 , 1861  ,  seven cotton-based slave states formed  the  Confederacy  .
outgoing  Democratic  अध्यक्ष  James Buchanan  और  the incoming  republicans  rejected secession  as  illegal .
lincoln  's  inaugural  address declared his  प्रशासन  would not initiate  सिविल   युद्ध  .
Eight remaining slave  राज्य  continued  to   अस्वीकृत   काल्स   लिये   secession   .
Confederate forces seized numerous federal forts within  territory   claimed  by the Confederacy .
A Peace  सम्मेलन  failed to find a compromise , and both sides  prepared  for  युद्ध  .
The Confederates assumed that European  देशों  were so  निर्भर  on ``  किंग  Cotton `` that  वे  would  intervene   ;  none did and none recognized  the  new Confederate States  of   अमेरिका  .
Hostilities began on April 12  ,  1861 ,  जब  Confederate forces fired upon  फोर्ट  Sumter  ,   a   कुंजी  fort  आयोजित  by  संघ   सैनिकों  in South Carolina .
lincoln   पुकारा   लिये  each state to provide troops to  retake  the fort ;  नतीजतन  , four more slave  राज्य  joined  the   confederacy  , bringing  उनके  total  to   ग्यारह  .
The Union  जल्द  controlled the border  राज्य  and established a naval blockade that  अबोध   the  southern  अर्थव्यवस्था  .
the  Eastern  थिएटर  was inconclusive in 1861–62 .
the  autumn 1862  confederate  campaign into  मेरीलैंड   (  a Union state  )  ended with Confederate  रिट्रीट  at  the  Battle of Antietam  ,  dissuading  अंग्रेजों   हस्तक्षेप  .
Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation ,  जिससे  made  समाप्ति  slavery a war goal  .
To the  वेस्ट  , by  गर्मियाँ  1862  the  Union  नष्ट  the Confederate  नदी  navy , then much of their western  सेना  , and  the  Union at Vicksburg split  the   confederacy  in two  at   the  Mississippi River  .
In  1863  , Robert E. Lee 's Confederate incursion north ended at the  बैटल  of Gettysburg .
पश्चिमी  successes led to Ulysses S. Grant command  of  all  संघ   सेना   in   1864  .
In the Western Theater , William T. Sherman drove east to  कैप्चर   अटलांटा  and  marched   to  the sea , destroying Confederate infrastructure  साथ  the way .
The Union marshaled  the  resources and  जनशक्ति   to  attack the Confederacy from  सब  directions ,  और   could  afford  to  fight  लड़ाइयों  of  अपघर्षण   through   the  Overland Campaign  towards  Richmond , the  confederate  capital .
The defending Confederate  फौज  failed , leading  to  Lee 's surrender  to   ग्रान्ट  at  appomattox  Court House  on  April 9 , 1865 .
the   अमरीकी   सिविल   युद्ध   थी  one of the earliest true  औद्योगिक  wars  .
Railroads ,  the  telegraph , steamships  ,  and mass-produced  हथियार   यहूद  employed  extensively  .
The mobilization  of   civilian   कारखानों  , mines ,  shipyards  ,  बैंको   ,  transportation and  खाना  supplies  सब  foreshadowed World War I  .
it  remains  the  deadliest war in  अमरीकी   इतिहास   ,  resulting in the deaths of an estimated  750,000   सैनिको  and  an   undetermined   क्रमांक  of  civilian   हताहत  .
Historian John Huddleston  estimates  the  मौत  toll at ten percent of all Northern  males   20–45  years old , and 30 percent of all Southern white  males  aged 18–40 .
Cost  of  goods  बेची   (  COGS )  refer  to  the  inventory costs of those goods a  कारोबार  has sold during a particular period .
Costs  हैं   संबद्ध   साथ  particular goods using one of several formulas  ,   सहित  specific  पहचान  , first-in first-out ( FIFO  )   ,  or average cost  .
Costs include all  लागत  of purchase , costs  of  conversion and other costs  incurred   in   bringing   the  inventories to  उनके  present  स्थान  and  कंडीशन  .
Costs of goods made by the business  शामिल  material , labor , and allocated overhead .
the  costs of those goods  नहीं   yet  sold are  deferred  as costs of inventory until the inventory  is  sold or  लिखा  down  in   मान  .

A confectionery store  (   अधिक  commonly referred to as a sweet shop in the United Kingdom ,  a  candy store in the  उत्तर  America ,  or   a  lolly  दूकान  in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  )  बिकता  confectionery and is usually targeted  to  children  .
सबसे  confectionery stores are filled with an  assortment  of sweets far  larger  than a  पंसारी  or convenience store could  accommodate  .
वे  often offer a selection  of  old fashioned  ट्रीट   ,   और  sweets from different countries  .
बहुत  often unchanged in layout  चूंकि  their  inception   ,  confectioneries  हैं   ज्ञात  for their warming and  उदासीन   महसूस   .
The village of Pateley  सेतु  claims to have  the  oldest confectionery store in England  .

ओक्लाहोमा   (  ) (  pawnee  :  uukuhuúwa  , Cayuga :  gahnawiyoˀgeh  ) is a state located in  वेस्ट  South Central United States  .
Oklahoma is the 20th most  extensive  and the 28th most populous  of  the 50  संयुक्त  States  .
The state 's name is derived  इससे  the  choctaw   शब्द  okla and humma , meaning `` red people '' ,  और   it  is  ज्ञात  informally  by  its nickname  ,   the  Sooner State  .
Formed by  the  combination of Oklahoma Territory and Indian Territory on  नवम्बर  16 , 1907  ,  Oklahoma  थी  the  46th   राज्य  to  डालें   the  union .
Its  निवासियों   हैं  known as Oklahomans or ,  informally   ``   okies  '' ,  और  its  पूंजी   और  largest  नगर  is Oklahoma City  .
a   प्रमुख  producer  of   प्राकृतिक   गैस  , oil , and agriculture ,  ओक्लाहोमा  relies on an economic  आधार   of  aviation  ,  energy , telecommunications  ,  and biotechnology  .
it   रै  one of the fastest  growing  economies in the  स्वदेश  , ranking  among   the  top states in per capita  आय  growth  और  gross  घरेलू   उत्पाद   विकास  .
ओक्लाहोमा  City  और   तुलसा  serve as  ओक्लाहोमा   's  primary economic anchors  ,   साथ  nearly two  तिहाई  of Oklahomans living  भीतर   उनके  metropolitan statistical  क्षेत्रों   .
With small mountain ranges , prairie  ,  mesas , and  पूर्वी  forests ,  सबसे  of Oklahoma lies  in   the   ग्रेट  Plains  और   the  U.S . Interior Highlands —a region especially prone  to  severe weather .
In addition  to  having a  व्यापकता  of English ,  जर्मनी  , Scottish , Irish and Native American ancestry  ,  more than 25 Native  अमरीकी   भाषाएं   हैं   बोला  in Oklahoma  ,  second only  to  California  .
ओक्लाहोमा  is located  on  a  संगम   of  three major American cultural  regions   और  historically  परोसा  as a route for cattle  ड्राइव  ,  a  destination  लिये   दक्षिणी   settlers   ,  and a  government-sanctioned  territory  लिये  Native Americans  .

A tire ( or tyre ) is  a  ring-shaped  covering  that fits around a wheel  's  rim to protect it and enable better  गाडी   प्रदर्शन  .
Most tires  ,   ऐसे   as  those for automobiles and bicycles  ,   provide  traction  between  the vehicle and the road while providing a flexible cushion that absorbs shock  .
the   सामग्री  of modern pneumatic tires are  सिंथेटिक  rubber  ,  natural rubber , fabric and wire , along with  कार्बन   ब्लैक  and other chemical  यौगिकों  .
वे  consist of a tread and a body  .
the   tread  provides traction while the body provides containment for a quantity of compressed air .
Before rubber was developed , the first versions of  टायर  were simply bands of metal  कि  fitted  around  wooden wheels to prevent wear and  आंसू   .
Early rubber tires were solid ( not pneumatic  )  .
आज  , the  बहुमत  of tires are pneumatic inflatable  structures  , comprising a doughnut-shaped body  of   रस्सियाँ  and  wires  encased in  रबर  and generally filled with compressed air to  रूप  an  inflatable  cushion .
न्यूमेटिक  tires are  प्रयुक्त  on  अनेक  types  of  vehicles , including  गाड़ियाँ  , bicycles , motorcycles , trucks , earthmovers ,  और   वायुयान  .
Metal tires are still  प्रयुक्त   on  locomotives and railcars , and solid rubber (  or  other polymer )  टायर   हैं   स्टिल   प्रयुक्त  in various non-automotive  अनुप्रयोग   ,  such as  कुछ  casters ,  कार्ट  , lawnmowers ,  और  wheelbarrows .
Dr.  जोसेफ   वारेन   (   जून  11 , 1741 – June 17  ,  1775 ) was an American doctor who played a leading role in American  patriot  organizations  in   बोस्टन   in  early days  of   the  American  क्रान्ति  ,  आखिरकार  serving as president  of  the  क्रांतिकारी  Massachusetts Provincial Congress .
Warren  आयोजिक   पॉल  Revere and William Dawes on  अप्रैल  18 , 1775 ,  to   छोड़  Boston and  स्प्रेड   the  alarm that the British garrison in Boston was  सेटिंग  out  to  raid the town  of  Concord and arrest rebel leaders John Hancock and Samuel Adams .
Warren  participated   in   the  next day 's  लड़ाइयों   of  Lexington and Concord , which  हैं  commonly  माना  to be the opening  engagements  of the American  क्रांतिकारी  War .
वारेन   था  been commissioned a  प्रमुख  General  in  the colony  's  militia shortly before  the  June 17 , 1775 Battle of Bunker Hill .
बल्कि   than  exercising his rank ,  वारेन  served in the  बैटल  as a private  सिपाही  , and was killed  in  combat  जब   अंग्रेजों   सैनिकों  stormed the redoubt atop  नस्ल  's  हिल  .
His death  ,   immortalized   in  John  trumbull   's  painting  ,  The Death  of  General Warren at  the  Battle of  बंकर  's Hill , June 17  ,   1775  , galvanized  the  rebel  शक्तियां  , and he  रै  been memorialized  in  many place names in the United States .
stm  image of self-assembled supramolecular  जंजीरों  of the  सशुल्क  semiconductor Quinacridone  on   ग्रेफाइट  .
An organic semiconductor is  an  organic material with  सेमीकंडक्टर  properties  ,  that is  ,  with  an  electrical conductivity  between  that of insulators and that  of  metals  .
Single  अणुओं  , short chain ( oligomers ) and  सशुल्क  polymers can  be  semiconductive  .
Semiconducting small molecules ( aromatic hydrocarbons ) include the polycyclic aromatic  यौगिकों  pentacene ,  anthracene  , and rubrene  .
Polymeric  सशुल्क  semiconductors include poly ( 3-hexylthiophene  )  , poly ( p-phenylene vinylene ) , as well  as  polyacetylene and its derivatives  .
वहीँ  are two  प्रमुख  overlapping classes  of  organic  semiconductors  .
ये  are  सशुल्क   charge-transfer  complexes  और   विभिन्न  linear-backbone conductive  polymers  derived from polyacetylene .
Linear backbone  सशुल्क   semiconductors   शामिल   polyacetylene   itself  and its derivatives polypyrrole , and  polyaniline  .
at  least locally  ,   charge-transfer  complexes often exhibit similar conduction mechanisms to  अकार्बनिक  semiconductors .
Such mechanisms arise from the  उपस्थिति  of hole  और  electron conduction  परतों  separated by a band gap .
While such classic mechanisms  हैं  important  locally   ,   as   साथ  inorganic amorphous semiconductors ,  tunnelling  , localized states , mobility gaps  ,  and  phonon  -assisted  hopping  also significantly  योगदान  to conduction ,  विशेषकर   in   polyacetylenes   .
जैसे   अकार्बनिक  semiconductors  ,  organic semiconductors  can  be doped  .
Organic  semiconductors  susceptible  to  doping  ऐसे  as polyaniline  (  Ormecon  )   और   हैं  also known as organic metals .
Typical current  वाहक  in  सशुल्क  semiconductors  हैं   छेद  and electrons in  π-bonds  .
Almost  सब  organic  solids  are  insulators  .
But  जब  their  constituent  molecules  have   π-conjugate   प्रणालियों  , electrons can  मूव   via   π-electron  cloud overlaps , especially by hopping  ,  tunnelling and related  mechanisms   .
polycyclic  aromatic  hydrocarbons  and  phthalocyanine  salt  crystals  are  उदाहरण  of this type  of  organic semiconductor  .
Mainly due to low mobility , even unpaired electrons may  be  stable  in  charge-transfer  देवालय   .
Such unpaired electrons can function as current  वाहक  .
This type of  सेमीकंडक्टर   is   भी   प्राप्त  by pairing  an   इलेक्ट्रॉन  donor molecule with an  इलेक्ट्रॉन   acceptor  molecule .
Female  स्खलन  is the  expulsion  of  द्रव  by human  महिलाओं   इससे   the  paraurethral  नलिकाएं   through   और  around the  मादा  urethra during or  पहले  an  orgasm   .
It  is  also known colloquially as gushing or  squirting   ,  although these are considered  to  be different phenomena  in  some research publications .
the   सटीक   सोर्स  and nature of the fluid continue to be  a  topic of debate among medical professionals , which is also  सम्बन्धित  to  संदेह  over the existence of  the   g-spot  .
The FIFA Women 's World Cup  is  an  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   संघ   फ़ुटबॉल  competition contested  by  the senior women  's   नेशनल  teams of the members of Fédération Internationale de  फ़ुटबॉल   संघ   (   फीफा  )  ,   the  sport 's global  शासी  body .
The championship has been  awarded  every  चार  years  चूंकि  the inaugural  टूर्नामेंट  in 1991 .
जापानी  won the 2011  टूर्नामेंट   in  a  दंड  shootout .
the  current format of the tournament  involves   16   टीमों  competing for  the  title at  venues  within the  मेजबान   स्वदेश  (  s   )   over   a  period of  परिचय   तीन   सप्ताह  ; – this phase is often called the World Cup  फाइनल  .
A qualification phase  ,  which  फिलहाल  takes place  over  the preceding three  सालो  ,  is  used to determine which  टीमों  qualify  लिये  the tournament together with  the  host nation ( s ) .
The FIFA Women 's  संसार   कप   is  recognized as the most important International competition in women 's  फ़ुटबॉल  and is  निभाई  amongst women 's national  फ़ुटबॉल  teams of the  सदस्य  states of FIFA ,  the   खेल   's   वैश्विक  governing  देह   .
The  पहला   महिलाओं  's World Cup tournament  ,  named the  महिलाओं  's World Championship ,  थी   आयोजित  in  1991  ,  sixty-one  years after the men  's  first  फीफा   संसार   कप  tournament in 1930  .
The six World Cup tournaments have been  जीती  by  चार  different national teams  .
The next World  कप  will be hosted by Canada in 2015 .
Scorpions is a young adult  अनोखा  written by Walter  डीन   मायर्स  ,  पहला  published  in   the   संयुक्त  States  by  Harper &  पंक्ति   on  June 20 , 1988 .

'son  of man  '  is the translation of  विभिन्न   यहूदी   और  Greek phrases  प्रयुक्त  in both  the   यहूदी  Bible  और  the  नई   वसीयत  .
It has diverse  meanings  ,  ranging  from a normal  इंसान   होने  to  a  prophesied eternal ,  दैवी  ruler .
The  यहूदी   अभिव्यक्ति  ``  बेटे  of  man  '' ( בן–אדם i.e . ben-'adam ) appears  एक  hundred and seven  टाइम्स   in  the  यहूदी  Bible .
This  is   the  most  आम  Hebrew  निर्माण   लिये  the singular  लकिन  is used mostly in Ezekiel  (  93 times ) and 14 times elsewhere .
In  तीस  two cases the phrase  appears  in  इंटरमीडिएट   बहुवचन   रूप  ``  बेटे  of men ''  ,  i.e .  इंसान  beings  .
as  generally interpreted by Jews  ,  it  denotes  humankind generally  .
in  the Koine Greek of the New Testament , `` the son of man '' is invariably used  as  ``  ὁ  υἱὸς τοὺ ἀνθρώπου '' with  a   definite  article .
the  use  of  the  definite  article  in  `` the son of man '' in the Christian gospels  is  novel , and before its  उपयोग  there  ,  no  रिकॉर्ड  of its use in  कोई  of  the  surviving Greek documents  of  antiquity exist  .
Geza Vermes has  stated  that ``  the  Son of man '' in the Christian gospels is unrelated to Hebrew Bible usages .
in  Christian usage , unlike  the   बेटे   of  God  शीर्षक   ,  which has  महरूम  an essential  तत्व  of Christian  creeds  since the  अपोस्टोलिक   आयु  , the proclamation of  ``   यीशु   as  the  बेटे  of  man  '' has never been an article of faith in Christianity  .
The interpretation  of  the use  of   ``  the Son of  man   ''  in the  नई  Testament has remained  चुनौतीपूर्ण  and after  150   सालो   of   बहस  no consensus  on   the   समस्या   रै  emerged among scholars .
Master of  foxhounds  leads the  फ़ील्ड  from  powderham   किला  in Devon  ,  England , with the hounds in  सामने  .
Fox  शिकार   is  an  कार्यकलाप  involving  the   ट्रैकिंग  , chase , and  sometimes  killing of a fox  ,  traditionally  a  red fox , by  प्रशिक्षित  foxhounds or other  सैंट  hounds , and  a   समूह  of  निहत्थे  followers led by a  निपुण  of foxhounds ,  जो   follow  the  hounds   on   पैर  or  on  horseback .
Fox hunting originated in  the   रूप  practised  जबतक  recently in  the  United  किंगडम  in the  16th  century , but is practised all  over   the   संसार  , including in Australia ,  कनाडा  , France  ,  Ireland  ,   इटली  and  the   संयुक्त  States  .
In Australia ,  the  term also refers  to  the  शिकार  of  foxes  with firearms similar to spotlighting  or  deer hunting .
In much of the world  शिकार  in  सामान्य   is  understood to  सुनाना  to any game animals or weapons  (   e.g.   ,   हिरण  hunting with bow  और   तीर  ) ; in  ब्रिटेन  and Ireland ,  ``  hunting '' without qualification  implies  fox hunting (  or   अन्य  forms of hunting with hounds- beagling ,  स्टैग  hunting , mink hunting  ,  drag hunting  or  hunting the  साफ  boot ) as  वर्णित  here .
The sport is controversial , particularly in the UK  ,  where  it  was banned in  स्कॉटलैंड  in  2002  , and in England and Wales in  नवम्बर  2004 ( law enforced from  फ़रवरी  2005 )  ,  though  शूटिंग   foxes  as vermin  remained  legal .
Proponents of  फॉक्स   शिकार  view  it  as an  महत्वपूर्ण  part of rural  संस्कृति  and useful for reasons  of  conservation and pest control  ,  while opponents  argue  that it is cruel and  अनावश्यक  .
तम्बाकू   विज्ञापन  is  the  advertising of tobacco products or use (  typically  cigarette smoking )  by  the tobacco industry  through   a  variety  of  media including sponsorship ,  विशेषकर  of sporting events .
It is now one of the  सबसे  highly  regulated   फ़ॉर्म  of marketing  .
Some or all forms  of  tobacco advertising are  बैन  in many countries  .
Bally Technologies ,  inc.   is  a manufacturer  of  slot machines  और   अन्य  gaming technology based  in   लास  Vegas  ,  Nevada .
The company was  संस्थापित  in 1968 as Advanced  पेटेंट  Technology .
it  eventually changed  इसके  name to Alliance  गेमिंग  and  acquired  , in 1996 , Bally  गेमिंग  International , a former  प्रभाग  of Bally Manufacturing .
In  2006  , the entire company adopted  the  Bally  नाम  , a  ट्रेडमार्क  that originated  in   1932   by  the Bally Manufacturing Corporation .
gustave   doré   's   engravings  illustrated the Divine Comedy ( 1861–1868 )  ;   यहाँ  ,  दांते  is lost in Canto 1 of the  inferno  .
Inferno (  इतालवी   लिये   ``  Hell ``  )  is the  पहला   भाग  of  दांते  Alighieri 's 14th-century epic poem Divine  कॉमेडी  .
it  is  followed  by Purgatorio  और  Paradiso .
It is  an   allegory   telling  of the journey of  दांते  through Hell , guided by the Roman poet  वर्जिल   .
In the poem  ,  Hell  is  depicted as nine circles of suffering located within the Earth .
Allegorically ,  the  Divine Comedy represents  the  journey of the  आत्मा  towards God  ,  with the Inferno describing the recognition and rejection of sin .
Smirnoff  is  a brand of  वोदका  owned  और   उत्पादित  by the British company Diageo  .
The  स्मरनॉफ  brand  began  with a vodka distillery founded in  मास्को  by Pyotr  arsenievich  Smirnov  (  1831–1898  )  .
it  is now distributed  in  130 countries .
it  is produced  in  several countries including India , Ireland , Italy  ,  the  संयुक्त   किंगडम   और   the  United States .
Smirnoff products include vodka ,  flavoured  vodka ,  और  malt  पेय   .
In March 2006 , Diageo North  अमेरिका  claimed that Smirnoff vodka was the best-selling  आसुत   स्पिरिट  brand in the world .
Big Brown ( foaled April  10  ,  2005   in   केंटकी  ) is  a  retired champion American Thoroughbred racehorse  और  winner  of  the 2008 Kentucky Derby  और  2008 Preakness Stakes .
Bred by Dr. Gary B. Knapp 's  monticule   खेतो  in  lexington  , Kentucky , he  जीती  his first five race starts  .
He was sired by Grade  iii   विजेता  Boundary , a son  of  North American Champion sire Danzig  ,  a son  of   उत्तरी   नर्तकी  .
Big Brown 's dam was Mien , also a  पोती  of  उत्तरी  Dancer  through   उसके  sire ,  nureyev  .
The  serenity   दुआ   is   the   आम  name  लिये   an   originally  untitled prayer  by  the American  theologian  Reinhold Niebuhr ( 1892–1971 ) .
it  has been  अपनाया  by  alcoholics   बेनाम  and  अन्य  twelve-step programs .
the   best-known  form is  :   परमेश्वर  ,  ग्रान्ट  me the serenity  to  accept the things I can not  change,
the  courage to change the  बाते   i  can,
And wisdom to  जान   the  difference .
The  घोषणा  and  resolves  of the First  महाद्वीपीय  Congress  (  also  ज्ञात  as the Declaration  of   औपनिवेशिक   अधिकारों   ,  or the Declaration  of   अधिकारों  ) ,  थी  a statement  अपनाया  by the  पहला  Continental Congress  on   अक्तूबर  14 , 1774 , in response  to  the  असहनीय   अधिनियमों  passed by the British  पार्लियामेंट  .
The Declaration outlined colonial objections  to  the  असहनीय  Acts  ,  listed a colonial bill of rights  ,   और   provided  a detailed  सूची  of grievances  .
It was similar to the Declaration of  अधिकारों  and  grievances  , passed by the Stamp Act  कॉंग्रेस  a decade earlier  .
The  घोषणा   concluded  with an  रूपरेखा   of  Congress  's   योजनाएँ   :  to enter  into   a  boycott of  अंग्रेजों   व्यापार  ( the  महाद्वीपीय   संघ  )  जबतक   उनके  grievances were redressed ,  to  publish addresses to  the   लोगों  of  ग्रेट  Britain  और  British America ,  और   to  send  a   याचिका  to  the  King  .
पल्स  pressure is  the  pressure  कि  is felt when feeling the pulse  .
measured   in  millimeters of mercury ( mmHg  )  , the pressure  अंतर   between  the systolic  और  diastolic  pressures   is  the  दबाव  change to  बनाएँ  the pulse , which is the pulse pressure .
if  resting blood pressure is ( systolic/diastolic  )  120/80 millimeters of mercury ( mmHg )  ,  pulse pressure is 40 .
the   पहाड़ियाँ  is  a  reality  टेलीविज़न  series  जिससे  originally aired on MTV from May 31 , 2006 until  जुलाई  13 ,  2010  .
the  show uses a  वास्तविकता   टेलीविज़न  format , following the personal lives  of  several young  वयस्कों  living  in  Los Angeles , California ,  लकिन  tends towards a narrative format more  commonly  found in scripted genres such as soap operas  .
The series  originally  followed the personal  जीवन  of former Laguna  बीच  star Lauren Conrad  और  her  मित्रों   '   नई  lives  in  Los Angeles .
After  पाँच   सीज़न  ,  कोनराड  left the series and  थी  replaced by  another   पूर्व   लगुना  Beach star ,  kristin  Cavallari ,  शुरूआत  in the second  हाफ  of  the   पांचवां  season  .
the   श्रेणी  concluded at  the   समाप्त  of  the  sixth  ऋतु  .
Entertainment  साप्ताहिक  ranked The Hills 82nd on their list of `` The 100  बेहतरीन  Shows  of   the  Last 25  सालो  , ''  stating   कि   the  series  थी   a  ``  नई  Classic . ''
एओएल  TV called  it  TV 's Biggest  अपराधी   ख़ुशी   .
The  श्रेणी  premiered in  अनुप्रयोग  in  the   पतन  of  2009  alongside Laguna Beach : The  रियल  Orange County  .
in   पोकर   ,   ख़राब  beat is a subjective term for a hand in  जिससे   a   खिलाड़ी  with what  appear   to   be   दमदार  cards nevertheless  loses   .
it   सबसे   प्रायः   occurs  where one player  bets  the clearly stronger  हाथ   और   उनके  opponent  makes  a poor call that  आखिरकार  `` hits  ''   और  wins  .
There is  no  consensus among poker players as to what exactly constitutes a bad beat and often players will  असहमत  about  whether  a particular hand was a  ख़राब   ताल  .
the   goldfish  (  carassius   auratus   auratus  )  is  a freshwater fish  in   the  family  cyprinidae  of order  cypriniformes  .
it   थी  one of the  earliest  fish  to   be   domesticated  , and  is  one  of  the most commonly kept aquarium fish .
a   अपेक्षाकृत  small  सदस्य  of the  कार्प  family ( which also includes  the  koi carp and  the   crucian   कार्प   )  , the goldfish is a  domesticated  version of  a   less-colorful  carp  (   carassius  auratus ) native  to  east  एशिया  .
It was  पहला  domesticated in  चीन  more than a thousand years  पहले  ,  और  several distinct  breeds   have  since been  विकसित   .
Goldfish  breeds  vary  greatly  in size , body shape  ,   जोडे  configuration and  coloration   (  various combinations  of  white , yellow , orange , red ,  भूरा  , and black are  ज्ञात  ) .
uncooked  Rouladen
rouladen   (  or Rinderroulade ,  एकवचन  : roulade )  is   a   जर्मनी  meat  roulade  usually consisting of bacon , onions  ,   सरसों   और  pickles  लपेटा  in  thinly  sliced beef which is then cooked .
In some  देशों  , the roulade is  भी   ज्ञात   as  `` beef  ज़ैतून   ''  .
Beef  or   वील  is used as meat  हालांकि  some food scholars tend  to  believe that the original  संस्करण  was probably venison  or   पोर्क  , and  पोर्क  is still popular in some areas .
The beef  rouladen   as  we know them today have become popular over  the  last century .
the  cut is  प्रायः  topside beef or silverside since this is  the  cheaper cut .
The more  महंगी  version would be  the  round steak  ,   भी   ज्ञात   as  rump steak .
the  meat is  काटें  into large ,  पतला  slices .
The filling is  a   मिश्रण  of smoked  और  cooked pork belly , chopped onions and  कटा  pickles  (  gurken )  जिससे  is  at   टाइम्स  varied by  adding  minced meat  ,  sausage meat , pine nuts and  सरसों  .
The mixture varies from region to region .
rouladen  are traditionally served  लिये   डिनर  .
Red  वाइन  is often served with  इस  dish .
ठेठ   eukaryotic   कोशिका  .
Cellular respiration  is  the  नियत  of  the  metabolic  प्रतिक्रियाएँ  and processes that  लो  place in the cells of  जीवों  to convert biochemical energy from  nutrients   into  adenosine triphosphate ( ATP  )  ,  और   तब   रिलीज  waste products .
The reactions involved in respiration are  catabolic  reactions , which break  विशाल  molecules  into  smaller ones , releasing  उर्जा   in   the   प्रक्रम  as weak  so-called  ``  high-energy  ''  bonds   हैं  replaced  by  stronger bonds  in   the  products .
Respiration is  एक   of  the key  तरीके  a  कोशिका  gains  उपयोगी   उर्जा  to fuel cellular activity .
सेल्यूलर  respiration is  माना   an  exothermic  रेडॉक्स   प्रतिक्रिया  .
The overall reaction is  टूटा  into many smaller ones  जब   it  occurs in the  देह  ,  सबसे  of which are redox reactions  themselves   .
हालांकि   technically  , cellular  श्वसन  is  a   दहन   प्रतिक्रिया   ,  it clearly does not resemble one when  it  occurs in a  जीना  cell .
This difference is  क्युकी  it occurs in many separate steps .
While the overall reaction is  a   दहन  reaction ,  no  single reaction that comprises  it  is a combustion reaction .
nutrients  that are commonly used  by  animal and plant  कोशिकाएं   in  respiration  शामिल   शुगर  , amino  acids  and fatty acids ,  और  a  आम  oxidizing agent (  इलेक्ट्रॉन  acceptor ) is molecular  ऑक्सीजन   (  O2 ) .
The  उर्जा  stored in ATP ( its third phosphate group is  weakly   बंधुआ  to the rest of the molecule and is cheaply broken allowing stronger bonds to form ,  thereby   transferring   उर्जा  for use  by  the cell )  can  then be used to  ड्राइव   प्रक्रियाओं  requiring energy , including biosynthesis , locomotion or transportation of molecules  आरपार  cell  झिल्लियों  .
Countries by  2011  GDP ( nominal )  according  to the  सीआईए   संसार  Factbook .
इस  article  शामिल  a list of  देशों   in  the  संसार  sorted by their gross  घरेलू   उत्पाद   (  GDP  )   ,  the  मार्केट   मान   of   सब   फाइनल  goods and services from a nation  in  a  दिए  year .
the   जीडीपी  dollar estimates presented here are calculated at market  or  government official exchange rates .
अनेक   economies   जिससे  are not considered  to  be  देशों  ( world , the  eu  , and some dependent territories ) are included  in   the  lists because they appear in the  स्त्रोत  .
These economies are  नहीं  ranked in the charts  यहाँ   ,  but are listed  जहाँ  applicable .
the  figures presented here do not  लो   into  account differences in  the  cost of living in  अलग  countries , and the results can vary greatly from one  साल  to another  आधारित   on  fluctuations in the exchange rates of  the  country 's currency .
ऐसे  fluctuations  may  change a country 's  रैंकिंग  from one year to  the   अगला  ,  भी   हालांकि  they often make little or no difference to  the  standard of living of its  जनसांख्यिकी  .
Therefore  ये  figures should  be  used with  सावधानी  .
Some  countries/regions   may  have  नागरिकों   जिससे  are  on   औसत  wealthy  .
ये  countries/regions could appear in this list as  having  a small  जीडीपी  .
This would  be  because the country/region  सूचीबद्ध  has a small population , and therefore  छोटी   कुल   अर्थव्यवस्था  ;  the  GDP is calculated as  the  population times the  माल  per capita .
Comparisons  of  national wealth  हैं  also frequently  बना   on   the  basis of purchasing power parity (  ppp  )  ,  to  समायोजन  for  मतभेद  in the  लागत  of living in different countries .
(  See  सूची   of  countries by  जीडीपी  (  ppp  ) )
ppp  largely  removes  the exchange rate problem , but has its own drawbacks ; it does not  प्रतिबिंबित  the value  of   आर्थिक   आउटपुट   in  international trade , and it  भी  requires  अधिक  estimation than nominal  जीडीपी  .
On the whole , PPP per capita figures  हैं   अधिक  narrowly spread than nominal  जीडीपी  per  capita  figures .
the   पहला  list  शामिल   आंकड़ा  compiled  by  the United Nations  आंकडे  Division for 2011  .
The second  सूची  largely  शामिल  data  (  estimate  )  compiled  by  the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   मौद्रिक   निधि  for 2012 .
The  तीसरा  list shows  the  World Bank 's mostly 2011 estimates , and the  चौथी  list includes  ज़्यादातर  2012  estimates  from the CIA World  factbook  .
Lapping is a machining  प्रक्रम  ,  in  which  दो  surfaces are rubbed together with an abrasive between  उन्हें  , by hand movement or  by  way  of  a  यंत्र  .
This can take two forms  .
The  पहला  type of lapping (  traditionally  called grinding )  ,  typically involves  रगड़  a brittle  सामग्री  such as  कांच  against a surface such as iron or glass  itself   (  also  ज्ञात  as the  ``  lap '' or grinding tool  )  with an abrasive such  as  aluminum oxide  ,  jeweller 's  रूज  ,  optician   's  rouge  ,  emery ,  सिलिकॉन   कार्बाइड  , diamond , etc.  ,  in between them  .
इस  produces microscopic  conchoidal  fractures as the abrasive  रोल्स   परिचय  between the two  सतहों   और   removes  material  इससे  both .
The other form of lapping  involves  a softer  सामग्री  such as  पिच   or  a  सिरेमिक   लिये  the  गोद   ,  which is `` charged '' with  the  abrasive .
the  lap is then  प्रयुक्त  to cut a harder material—the workpiece .
The  अक्खड़  embeds  भीतर  the softer material which holds it and  permits  it  to  score across and cut the  harder  material  .
Taken  to  a finer  सीमा  , this will produce a polished surface  ऐसे  as with a polishing  cloth   on  an automobile ,  or  a polishing cloth or polishing pitch  upon  glass  or  steel .
लिया  to the  परम   सीमा  , with the aid  of   सटीक   interferometry   और  specialized polishing machines or  skilled  hand polishing ,  lensmakers   can  produce surfaces that are flat to better than 30 nanometers .
इस  is one  बीसवीं  of  the  wavelength  of   लाइट  from  the  commonly  प्रयुक्त   632.8  nm helium  नियॉन   लेज़र  light  सोर्स   .
Surfaces this  चपटा  can be molecularly bonded ( optically  contacted  )  by  bringing them  साथ  under  the   सही  conditions  .
( This  is  not the same as the wringing effect of Johansson blocks ,  हालांकि   it   is   समान  ) .
the   पद   ``   अमेरिका  's Team  ''  is a popular nickname  in  the United  राज्य   कि  refers  to  the Dallas Cowboys in the National  फ़ुटबॉल  League .
the  nickname originated  साथ  the team 's  1978  highlight  फिल्मी   ,  where the  narrator   opens   साथ  the following  परिचय  :  the  term  is   पहचाना  and often  प्रयुक्त  by media outlets , including ESPN , Yahoo !  ,  HBO Sports , and Sports Illustrated  .
My Babysitter 's  a   पिशाच  ( French : Ma gardienne est un  पिशाच   )  is a  2011   कनाडाई   टेलीविज़न  series , based on the television film  of  the same  नाम  .
In Canada  ,  the series premiered in  फ्रेंच  on Télétoon  on  February 28 , 2011 ,  in  English on Teletoon  on  March  14   ,  2011 , and on Disney Channel in  the  United States on June  27  , 2011 .
The show was  निर्मित   by   भैस  TV , creators of  6teen  and Total Drama .
The show follows  ethan   मॉर्गन  ( Matthew Knight )  ,   जो  , in the  टेलीविज़न  film , learns  कि   उसके   दाई  Sarah ( Vanessa Morgan )  is  a vampire .
in  the film  ,  he learns he is able to have visions and  उसके  best friend  बेनी  Weir ( Atticus Mitchell  )  is a spellmaster .
The series follows  the  three as they take  on   अलौकिक  forces and have adventures  ,   साथ  occasional  सहायता  from fellow vampires Rory ( Cameron Kennedy )  और  Erica  (  Kate Todd ) , while dealing  साथ  the troubles of regular high  स्कूल   जीवन  .
A  दूसरी   ऋतु  was confirmed to start production  in  September  2011   और  it  पहला  premiered on  डिज़्नी   चैनल   on  June  29  , 2012 , it premiered  on  Teletoon September 6  ,  2012  .
Télétoon started  featuring  season 2 sneak-peak episodes on October 28  ,  2012 and premiered it on January 10  ,  2013

A pickup  ट्रक   or  pick-up  ,  often simply referred to as a pickup , is a light motor vehicle with an open-top , rear  कार्गो  area (  bed   )  .
in  North  अमेरिका  , the term pickup is used  लिये   लाइट  trucks  साथ   a  lighter  ड्यूटी   chassis  and factory built , integrated bed  ,   as  well as for  coupé  utility vehicles , often based on  a  personal car chassis , but  भी  often on a  खास  dedicated chassi  लिये  such use  .
Some  देशों  have their  अपना   शर्तें  similar  to   पिकअप   ,  such as ute in Australia and  नई  Zealand ,  or  bakkie  in  South Africa  .
Large pickup  ट्रक   हैं   somewhat   विरल  in Europe , where vans and light lorries are commonly used for similar roles .
the   अध्यक्ष   of   the  United  राज्य  of America  (  POTUS )  is  the head  of   राज्य   और  head of government  of  the United  राज्य  .
The president  लीड  the  कार्यपालिका   शाखा  of  the  federal government and  is  the commander-in-chief of the United States Armed  शक्तियां  .
Article II  of   the  U.S.  संविधान  vests  the   कार्यपालिका   शक्ति   of  the  संयुक्त  States in the  अध्यक्ष  and charges him with  the  execution of  संघीय  law , alongside  the  responsibility of  appointing  federal executive  ,   राजनयिक  , regulatory , and  न्यायिक  officers ,  और   concluding  treaties  साथ  foreign  शक्तियां   ,   साथ  the advice and consent of the Senate .
The president is further empowered  to  grant federal pardons and reprieves ,  और  to convene and adjourn either or  दोनो   घरों  of Congress under extraordinary circumstances .
चूंकि  the founding  of  the United  राज्य   ,   the   शक्ति  of  the  president and the federal government have  grown  substantially  और  each modern president , despite possessing no formal legislative powers beyond  हस्ताक्षर  or vetoing  congressionally   passed  bills ,  is  largely  जिम्मेदार  for dictating the  विधान  agenda  of  his  पार्टी  and the foreign and domestic policy  of  the United States .
The president is frequently described as the  सबसे   शक्तिशाली   व्यक्ति  in the  संसार   .
the  president  is  indirectly  निर्वाचित  by the people through the Electoral College to a four-year  पद  , and is one of only two  nationally  elected federal  अधिकारियों  , the other being the  वाइस  President  of  the United States  .
The Twenty-second  amendment  , adopted in 1951 , prohibits  anyone   इससे  ever being  निर्वाचित   to  the presidency for  a  third full term .
it  also prohibits  a  person  इससे  being elected  to  the presidency more  than  once if that person previously  था  served as president  ,  or  एक्टिंग  president , for  अधिक  than two years of another person 's term as president .
In all , 43 individuals have  परोसा  55 four-year  शर्तें   .
On January 20  ,  2009 , Barack  ओबामा  became the 44th and  वर्तमान  president .
on  November 6 ,  2012  , he was re-elected and is scheduled to serve  जबतक   जनवरी  20 ,  2017   .
Bottled mineral  जल
बोतलबंद  water is drinking water  (  e.g. , well water , distilled water , Mineral water , or spring water  )  packaged in plastic or  कांच  water bottles .
Bottled water  may  be carbonated  or  not .
आकार  range from small single serving  बोतलों  to large carboys  लिये   जल  coolers  .
