Map showing rivers and flood prone areas  in  India
Rivers of India  खेल  an important  भूमिका  in  the  lives of  the  Indian people  .
the  river systems  provide   सिंचाई  , potable  जल  , cheap  परिवहन   ,  electricity ,  और  the livelihoods  लिये  a  विशाल  number  of  people  सब  over the  देश  and to rural areas .
This easily explains  क्यों  nearly all the major  शहरों  of India  हैं  located by the  बैंको  of  नदियाँ  .
the   नदियाँ  also  have  an important role in Hindu mythology and are considered holy by  सब  Hindus in the country .
सात  major rivers along with  उनके   numerous   tributaries  make up the  नदी  system of India  .
Most  of   the   नदियाँ  pour their waters into  the   खाड़ी  of Bengal ; however  ,  some of  the  rivers whose  पाठ्यक्रम   लो  them through  the  western  भाग  of the country and towards the east of  the  state of  himachal  Pradesh empty into the Arabian Sea  .
Parts  of   लद्दाख  , northern parts of the Aravlli  दायरा  and  the  arid parts of  the  Thar Desert have  अंतर्देशीय  drainage  .
dr.francis  Buchanan surveyed the courses of the rivers of India along with their tributaries and branches  in  1810-11 AD and presented  a   मिनट  account  of  it .
the  shifting of the courses  और   bed   over  the centuries is very remarkable .
Many of the channels  उल्लेखित  in  कि  survey have  अभी   become   मुर्दे  , dried or even extinct .
All  प्रमुख  rivers of India originate  इससे   एक  of the three main watersheds  :
The Himalaya and the  काराकोरम  ranges
Vindhya and  satpura   सीमाएँ   और  Chotanagpur plateau in central India
Sahyadri or Western Ghats in western  इण्डिया
the  Bretton Woods system  of  monetary  प्रबन्धन  established the  नियम   लिये  commercial and  वित्तीय   संबंध  among  the  world 's major industrial  राज्य  in the mid-20th century .
The  bretton  Woods  प्रणाली   थी   the   पहला  example of a fully negotiated monetary order  intended  to govern monetary relations among independent nation-states  .
Preparing  to  rebuild the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  economic system as World War II  थी  still  raging  , 730 delegates  इससे  all 44 Allied  राष्ट्र  gathered  at  the  माउंट  Washington Hotel  in  Bretton Woods  ,  New  हैम्पशायर  , United States , for  the  United Nations Monetary  और  Financial Conference  .
The delegates  deliberated  during 1–22 July  1944  ,  और  signed the Agreement on  इसके  final day .
सेटिंग  up  a   प्रणाली  of  नियम  , institutions , and procedures to regulate the international monetary system  ,  the  planners   at  Bretton Woods  स्थापित  the International  मौद्रिक   निधि  ( IMF ) and the International Bank  लिये   पुनर्निर्माण   और  Development ( IBRD  )   ,   जिससे  today is part  of   the  World Bank Group  .
These  संगठन  became operational in  1945  after a sufficient number  of  countries  था   ratified  the agreement  .
the   मुख्य  features of  the  Bretton Woods  प्रणाली   यहूद  an obligation  लिये  each country to adopt a monetary policy that maintained the exchange  रेट   by   tying  its  करेंसी   to  the U.S. dollar and the  क्षमता   of  the IMF to bridge temporary imbalances of payments .
On 15  अगस्त  1971 , the  संयुक्त  States  unilaterally   terminated  convertibility of the US $ to gold .
This brought the Bretton Woods  प्रणाली  to an  समाप्त   और   देखी  the dollar  become  fiat currency  .
This action ,  referred  to as the Nixon shock , created the situation  in   जिससे  the United  राज्य  dollar became a reserve currency used by many states  .
At the same time , many fixed currencies (  ऐसे  as  gbp  , for example ) ,  भी   became  free  फ्लोटिंग  .
Ducati Motor Holding S.p.A. is  an  Italian company that  डिजाइन  and manufactures motorcycles .
Headquartered in Bologna  ,  Italy  ,   डुकाटी  is owned by Audi  through  its Italian subsidiary Lamborghini  .
a  credit score  is  a numerical expression  आधारित   on   a  statistical analysis of a person 's credit files , to represent the creditworthiness of that person .
a  credit score is primarily based on credit report information  typically  sourced from  क्रेडिट  bureaus  .
Lenders , such as banks and credit  कार्ड   कंपनियाँ  , use credit scores to  evaluate  the  संभावित   रिस्क  posed by lending money to  उपभोक्ता   और  to  mitigate  losses due  to  bad debt .
Lenders use  क्रेडिट   स्कोर   to   determine   जो  qualifies  लिये   a   ऋण   ,  at what  ब्याज  rate ,  और   कया  credit  हद   .
lenders   भी   उपयोग  credit  स्कोर   to  determine  जिससे   ग्राहक  are  संभावित  to bring in the most  आय  .
the  use of  क्रेडिट  or identity  स्कोरिंग   prior   to  authorizing access or granting credit  is  an implementation of a  विश्वसनीय  system .
Credit  स्कोरिंग  is  नहीं  limited to banks  .
अन्य   संगठन  , such as  मोबाईल   फोन   कंपनियाँ  , insurance companies , landlords , and government departments  employ  the  वही   तकनीकों  .
क्रेडिट   स्कोरिंग   भी   रै  a lot  of  overlap  साथ  data mining  ,  which  उपयोग  many similar techniques  .
ये  techniques  combine  thousands of  कारकों   लकिन  they are  अधिक  or  कम  similar  or   the  same .
The seven SI  आधार  units and  the  interdependency of  उनके  definitions  :  for example , to extract the definition of the metre from the speed of light , the definition  of  the second must be known while  the  ampere and candela  हैं   दोनो  dependent  on   the  definition of energy which in turn is  पारिभाषित   in  terms of length  ,  mass and time .
The  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  System  of  Units (  si  ) defines seven  इकाई   of  measure  as  a  मौलिक  set from which all other  si  units  हैं   निकला  .
These SI base units and  उनके  physical quantities are:
metre for length  (  US  अंग्रेज़ी  : meter  )
किलोग्राम  for mass  (  note : not the gram  )
दूसरी  for time
ampere  for electric current
kelvin for  तापमान
candela for luminous  तीव्रता
mole for the  राशि  of substance .
the  SI  आधार  quantities form a  नियत   of   mutually  independent dimensions as  जरूरी  by dimensional  विश्लेषण   commonly  employed in  विज्ञान  and  प्रौद्योगिकी   .
However , in a  दिए  realization of these units they may well be  interdependent   ,  i.e  .  defined in terms of  प्रत्येक  other .
The names  of   si  units are written in  लोअरकेस  characters ( the 'degree  सेल्सियस   '   meets   इस  rule , as 'degree '  is  the unit ,  और  'Celsius ' is a  modifier   )   .
The symbols of units  हैं  written in  लोअरकेस  ( e.g . metre  रै   the  symbol m ) , except  कि  symbols  लिये  units named  बाद  persons are written with  an  initial  पूंजी  letter ( e.g. , the hertz  रै  the uppercase symbol  hz   )   .
Many other units  ,  such as the litre ( US English : liter  )  , are  formally   नहीं  part of the  si  ,  लकिन  are accepted  लिये  use  साथ  SI .
स्मारक  Canyon
Colorado National Monument ( locally referred to as The  स्मारक  )  is  a part  of   the  National Park  सेवा  near the city  of   ग्रैंड  Junction , Colorado .
Spectacular canyons cut deep  into  sandstone and  भी   granite–gneiss–schist  rock formations ,  in   कुछ  areas .
This is an area  of   मरुस्थल  land high on the Colorado Plateau  ,  with pinion and juniper forests on the plateau  .
The park hosts a  चौड़ी  range of wildlife ,  सहित  red-tailed  चीलों  and golden eagles , ravens  ,  jays , desert bighorn sheep , and coyotes .
Activities include hiking ,  horseback  riding , road bicycling , and scenic drives ; a  आगंतुक   बीच  on the west  पक्ष  contains  a  natural history museum and gift  दूकान  .
There are magnificent views from trails  और  the  रिम  Rock  ड्राइव   ,   जिससे  winds along  the  plateau  .
आसपास  are the  किताब  Cliffs , and the  largest   flat-topped   पहाड़  in  the   संसार   ,  the Grand Mesa .
Its feature  आकर्षण   is  Monument Canyon , which  रनों  the  चौडाई  of  the  park  ,  and  शामिल   चट्टान  formations such as Independence  स्मारक  , the  चुंबन  Couple ,  और  Coke Ovens .
The  स्मारक  includes  20,500  acres (  32   वर्गाकार   मील  )  ,   much  of which has been recommended to Congress for  नामांकन  as  wilderness  .
left to right :  यूटिलिटी  Uniform  ,  Blue Dress Uniform  ,  Service Uniform , and  संध्या  Dress uniforms
The Uniforms of the United States Marine Corps  serve  to distinguish Marines  इससे  members  of  other services .
Among current  वर्दी   in  the United  राज्य   हथियारबंद  Forces , the  marines  ' uniforms have been  in   सेवा   the   longest  .
The  समुद्री  Dress Blue uniform has ,  साथ  few changes  ,  been worn in essentially  इसके   वर्तमान  form since the 19th century .
North  अमरीकी  telephone area codes 419 and 567 serve the northwest quadrant of the U.S.  राज्य  of Ohio  .
The  largest   नगर  served by  ये  area codes is Toledo  (   और  its  उपनगरों  of  हॉलैंड  , Maumee , Northwood  ,   ऑरेगॉन   ,  Ottawa  पहाड़ियाँ  ,  perrysburg   ,   rossford   ,   sylvania  , Swanton ,  waterville   ,  and Whitehouse  )  .
अन्य   शहरों  served by  ये  area codes include  एडीए  ,  ashland   ,  Bellevue  ,  Bluffton , Bowling  ग्रीन  , Bryan , Bucyrus , Celina , Clyde , Crestline  ,   defiance   ,  Delphos ,  एडिसन  , Erastus ,  findlay  ,  fostoria  , Fremont , Galion ,  kenton   ,  Lima  ,  Mansfield  ,  Mount Gilead ,  नेपोलियन  , Norwalk ,  ओक   हार्बर   ,  Port Clinton  ,  Sandusky ,  शेल्बी  , St. Marys ,  tiffin   ,   अपर  Sandusky  ,  Van Wert , Wapakoneta  ,  Wauseon  ,  Willard .
अन्य   क्षेत्रों  served include the Lake Erie  आइलैंड्स  north  of   बंदरगाहों   क्लिंटन   और  west  of   sandusky   .
The main  क्षेत्रफल   कोड  , 419  ,  was created as one of  the   असली  area codes in October 1947  ;  the overlay area code 567 was  निर्मित  on  जनवरी  1 , 2002  .
Despite the presence of  टोलेडो  , the state 's fourth-largest  नगर  ,  419  was the last of Ohio  's   असली   चार  area codes to have been split or overlaid  .
Mickey Leroy Gilley ( born March 9  ,  1936 ) is an American  देश   म्यूज़िक  singer  और  musician .
Although  he   प्रारंभ  out singing  straight-up  country and western material in  the   1970s  ,  he  moved  towards  a more pop -friendly  ध्वनि  in the 1980s ,  bringing  him  further  success  on   नहीं  just the country charts  ,  but the pop charts as well  .
Among his  biggest   हिट्स  are  ``  Room  पूरा  of  गुलाब  , '' ``  do  n't the  लड़कियों  All Get  prettier  at Closing Time  ,  '' and the remake  of  the  आत्मा  hit  ``   स्टैंड   by   me  `` .
he  is  भी  the  cousin   of  Jerry  ली  Lewis , Carl  mcvoy  , Jim Gilley and Jimmy  swaggart  .
According to the  संघीय  Aviation Administration , Gilley is  a  licensed  पायलट  , who  holds  an instrument  दरजा   साथ  commercial pilot  privileges  for multi-engine  airplanes  , as well as private pilot privileges  लिये  single engine  वायुयान  .
The September  11  attacks ( also  referred   to   as  September  11  , September  11th  , or 9/11 ) were a series of  चार  coordinated terrorist attacks  शुभारम्भ  by the Islamic terrorist group al-Qaeda upon the United States in New York  नगर  and the  वॉशिंगटन   ,  D.C. area on  सितंबर  11 ,  2001  .
Four  यात्री  airliners were  hijacked  by 19  al-qaeda  terrorists so they  could  be  flown  into  इमारतें  in suicide  हमले   .
Two of those  planes  , American Airlines Flight  11  and  संयुक्त  Airlines  उड़ान  175 ,  यहूद   क्रैश  into  the  North and South towers  ,  respectively  ,   of  the  संसार   व्यापार  Center complex in New York City  .
भीतर  two  घंटों  , both  मीनारें   collapsed  with  मलबा  and  the  resulting fires causing  आंशिक  or  पूरा   पतन   of   सब   अन्य  buildings in the WTC complex , as  खूब  as major  क्षति  to ten  अन्य  large surrounding structures .
A third  प्लेन  ,  अमरीकी  Airlines Flight  77   ,  was crashed into the Pentagon  (  the headquarters  of  the  संयुक्त  States Department  of  Defense  )  ,  अग्रणी   to  a partial collapse in  इसके  western side .
the   चौथी  plane  ,   संयुक्त  Airlines Flight  93  , was targeted at the  संयुक्त  States Capitol in Washington , D.C. , but  क्रैश  into a  फ़ील्ड  near  shanksville  , Pennsylvania  ,  after  इसके  passengers tried  to   overcome  the hijackers .
In  कुल  , almost 3,000 people died in the attacks  ,  including the 227 civilians and 19 hijackers aboard the four planes .
Suspicion  जल्दी  fell on al-Qaeda  .
Although the group 's  नेता  ,  ओसामा  bin  लादेन   ,  initially  अस्वीकृत  any involvement , in 2004  he  claimed responsibility for the attacks  .
Al-Qaeda and bin  लादेन   cited   u.S.  support  of  Israel ,  the  presence of  u.S.  troops  in  Saudi Arabia , and sanctions against Iraq  as  motives  लिये   the  attacks  .
The  संयुक्त  States  responded   to   the  attacks by  शुभारंभ  the War on Terror  और  invading Afghanistan  to  depose  the  Taliban , which  था  harbored al-Qaeda  .
Many countries strengthened their anti-terrorism legislation and expanded law enforcement powers .
Having  evaded  capture for years , bin Laden  थी  located and killed by  u.S.   शक्तियां   in  May 2011 .
The destruction of  the  Twin Towers and other properties caused  गंभीर   क्षति  to the economy  of  Lower Manhattan and had a significant effect  on  global markets .
क्लीनअप  of the World  व्यापार  Center site  थी  completed in May 2002  ,  and  the  Pentagon was repaired  भीतर   a  year .
Numerous  memorials  have been  constructed  , including  the  National September 11 Memorial & Museum  in  New York , the Pentagon Memorial , and the Flight  93  National Memorial in  पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
After a lengthy  विलंब  , the  एक  World Trade Center is expected to be completed at Ground  शून्य  in  नई  York City  in  2013  .
Finding  nemo  is a 2003 American computer-animated comedy-drama  एडवेंचर   फिल्मी   लिखा  and  निर्देशित  by Andrew  stanton  , released  by   वॉल्ट  Disney Pictures , and  the  fifth film produced  by   पिक्चर्स  Animation  studios  .
it  tells the  स्टोरी   of  the over-protective clownfish named  marlin   (  Albert Brooks ) who  ,  along  साथ   a  regal tang named Dory ( Ellen DeGeneres )  ,   खोज  for his  abducted  son  nemo   (  Alexander Gould  )  all  the  way  to  Sydney  harbour   .
साथ  the way  ,  Marlin learns to take risks  और  let Nemo take care  of  himself  .
It is  पिक्चर्स  's first film to  be   released   in  cinemas in the northern  गोलार्ध  summer .
the   फिल्मी  was re-released for the  पहला  time in 3D  on   सितंबर   14   ,  2012  ,  and it  थी   released  on Blu-ray on December 4  ,  2012  .
A sequel , Finding Dory  ,  is currently in  विकास   ,   नियत  to be released on November  25   ,   2015   .
The  फिल्मी   प्राप्त  universal  नाजुक  acclaim and won the  अकादमी  Award for  बेहतरीन  Animated Feature  ,  and was nominated in three more  श्रेणी  including  बेहतरीन  Original Screenplay .
it  was the second highest-grossing film of  2003  , earning a  कुल   of  $ 921  लाख  worldwide .
Finding Nemo  is  also  the   best-selling   dvd  of all time  ,  with over 40 million copies sold as of 2006 , and was  the   highest-grossing   g-rated  film  of   सब  time  पहले   पिक्चर्स  's own Toy Story  3  overtook it  .
It  is  also the 23rd highest-grossing film  of   सब  time  ,  as well as  the  3rd highest-grossing animated film .
In 2008 , the American Film  संस्थान  named it the tenth  महानतम  animated film ever  बना  during their Top 10  .
the   छठे  season of America 's  बेहतरीन  Dance  क्रू  , also  ज्ञात  as America  's  Best  नृत्य  Crew : Season of the Superstars , premiered  on   अप्रैल  7  ,  2011  और  concluded  on   जून   5  , 2011  .
auditions  were  आयोजित  in  चार   शहरों   इससे   जनवरी  21  through  February 5 :  शिकागो   ,  Houston ,  नई  York ,  और  Los Angeles .
इस   ऋतु   takes  a different  रूट   इससे  past  सीज़न   .
The crews must  perform  to  the   म्यूज़िक  of  एक  specific artist  प्रत्येक   सप्ताह   ,  including Rihanna ,  लील   वेन  , and other  लोकप्रिय  stars .
This season also  सुविधाएँ  special guest  दिखावे  by various music celebrities  सहित  Justin Bieber , The  ब्लैक  Eyed  मटर  , Katy Perry  ,  Kesha , Nicki Minaj , and Kanye  वेस्ट  .
Dominic `` D-Trix  ''   sandoval   ,   a  former member of Quest Crew , the winner of the third season of  अमेरिका  's Best Dance Crew  ,   joins   returning  judges Lil Mama and  jc  Chasez  as  the newest judge .

in  the  संयुक्त  States , Social  सुरक्षा  refers  to  the Old-Age ,  survivors  , and  विकलांगता  Insurance  (  OASDI ) federal program .
The original  सोशल  Security  अधिनियम  (  1935  )  और  the current version  of   the  Act ,  as  amended  ,  encompass several  सोशल  welfare and social  बीमे   कार्यक्रम   .
सोशल  Security is primarily  वित्तपोषित  through dedicated  payroll   कर  called Federal Insurance  योगदान  Act tax ( FICA )  .
Tax deposits  हैं  formally  entrusted   to   the  Federal  old-age   और   survivors  Insurance  विश्वास  Fund , the Federal Disability  बीमे  Trust  निधि  , the Federal Hospital Insurance  विश्वास   निधि  , or  the  Federal Supplementary Medical  बीमे  Trust Fund  जिससे  comprise the Social Security Trust Fund .
Upward redistribution of income is responsible  लिये  about  43  % of the projected Social Security shortfall over the next  75   सालो  .
according  to economist Martin  feldstein  ,  the  combined  बिता  for all social insurance programs  in  2003 constituted 37 % of government  व्यय  and 7  %  of  the  gross domestic  उत्पाद  .
Social Security is currently estimated to keep roughly 40 percent of all Americans  आयु  65 or older  आउट  of  गरीबी  .
The  सोशल  Security Administration is headquartered in Woodlawn , Maryland  ,   बस  west  of  Baltimore .
the   दारू  by volume shown on  a  bottle of absinthe .
दारू  by volume ( abbreviated as ABV ,  abv  , or  alc/vol  ) is a standard  माप  of how much  दारू   (   इथेनॉल   )   is   contained  in an alcoholic beverage  (   expressed  as  a  percentage  of  total volume )  .
The ABV standard is used worldwide .
In  कुछ   देशों  , alcohol  by   आवाज़   is  referred to as degrees Gay-Lussac ( after the French  केमिस्ट  Joseph Louis Gay-Lussac  )   .
Laurel  खोखला   is   a   गाँव   in  the Town  of  Oyster Bay in Nassau County , New York  in  the  संयुक्त  States  .
The  जनसांख्यिकी  was 1,952 at the 2010 census .
चार्ल्स   जॉन   huffam  Dickens ( ; 7 February 1812  –  9 June  1870  ) was an English writer and social critic  .
He created some of the world 's  सबसे  memorable fictional characters and is  generally  regarded  as   the  greatest  उपन्यासकार  of the  विक्टोरियन   काल  .
During  उसके   जीवन   ,  his works enjoyed unprecedented  कीर्ति   ,  and by the twentieth  सदी   उसके   साहित्यिक  genius  थी   broadly  acknowledged by critics  और  scholars .
उसके   novels  and  छोटी   कहानियां   continue  to  be   widely   लोकप्रिय   .
born  in Portsmouth , England , Dickens left school  to  work in a  फैक्टरी   बाद  his father was thrown into  कर्जदार   '   थाना  .
Although  he  had little formal education , his  जल्दी  impoverishment drove him  to   सफल  .
over  his career he edited a weekly  जर्नल   लिये   20  years , wrote 15 novels  ,  5 novellas and  सैंकड़ों  of  छोटी   कहानियां  and non-fiction articles  ,  lectured  और   performed  extensively  ,   थी  an indefatigable letter writer , and campaigned  vigorously  for children  's  rights ,  शिक्षा   ,  and other  सोशल   reforms  .
Dickens sprang to  कीर्ति   साथ  the 1836 serial publication of The Pickwick Papers .
Within  a   few  years he  था  become  an   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   साहित्यिक  celebrity  ,  famous for his humour , satire  ,  and keen observation  of  character and society .
उसके   novels   ,  most published in monthly or weekly instalments , pioneered  the   सीरियल  publication  of  narrative fiction  ,  which became the dominant  विक्टोरियन   विधि  for  अनोखा   प्रकाशन  .
The  किस्त  format allowed  डिकेंस   to   evaluate  his audience  's   प्रतिक्रिया   ,   और   he  often  परिवर्धित   उसके  plot  और  character development  आधारित  on such feedback .
For example  ,  when his wife  's  chiropodist expressed distress at the way  मिस   mowcher  in  दाउद  Copperfield seemed to reflect her disabilities  ,  Dickens went on to improve the character  साथ   धनात्मक   lineaments  .
Fagin in  ओलिवर   ट्विस्ट  apparently mirrors the  प्रसिद्ध  fence  ikey  Solomon  ;  His  कैरीकेचर  of Leigh Hunt  in  the  फिगर  of Mr Skimpole in  bleak  House  थी  likewise toned down on advice from some of his  मित्रों   ,  as they read episodes  .
In  the  same  अनोखा   ,  both Lawrence  boythorne  and Mooney the  beadle  are drawn from  रियल  life – Boythorne from Walter Savage Landor  और   मूनी  from 'Looney ' , a beadle at Salisbury  वर्गाकार  .
His  भूखंड   यहूद  carefully constructed ,  और   डिकेंस  often wove in  तत्व  from  topical  events  into   उसके  narratives .
masses   of  the  अनपढ़   ग़रीब   chipped  in  ha'pennies  to have each new  मासिक  episode read to them , opening up and inspiring a new  क्लास   of  readers .
Dickens  थी  regarded as the  साहित्यिक  colossus of his age .
His 1843 novella , A  क्रिसमस   कैरोल   ,  is one  of  the most influential works ever written  ,  and it remains popular and  continues  to inspire  adaptations  in every  कलाकारी  genre  .
His creative genius  रै   महरूम  praised by fellow  writers—from  Leo  टालस्टाय  to  G.  K.  चेस्टरटन  and George Orwell —for  इसके   यथार्थवाद  , comedy , prose  स्टाइल   ,  unique characterisations  ,  and  सोशल  criticism .
On the other  हाथ  Oscar Wilde  ,  Henry  जेम्स  and  वर्जिनिया  Woolf complained  of  a lack of  मनोवैज्ञानिक   गहराई  , loose  लिखने  , and a vein  of  saccharine sentimentalism  .
मार्टिन  Luther King and other civil rights leaders  in  front of the statue of Abraham Lincoln , August  28  ,  1963
the   सिविल  rights movement was a series of worldwide political movements for  समता   पहले   the  law that peaked in the 1960s .
In many situations it took the form  of  campaigns of civil resistance aimed at achieving change  by  nonviolent forms of  प्रतिरोध   .
In some situations  it  was accompanied , or followed , by civil unrest and armed rebellion .
The process was long  और  tenuous in many  देशों  ,  और  many of  ये  movements did  नहीं  fully achieve their  लक्ष्य  although , the efforts  of  these movements did  सीसे  to improvements in the legal rights of previously  दलित   समूह  of people  .
The  प्रमुख  aim of  the   सिविल  rights movement  शामिल   ,   और  include  ,  ensuring that  the   अधिकारों  of  सब  people  हैं  equally  सुरक्षित  by the law ,  सहित  the rights of  अल्पसंख्यकों   .
Civil rights movements ranging from  the   वैश्विक  LGBT rights movement  to  the global Women  's  rights movement to  विभिन्न  racial  अल्पसंख्यक   अधिकारों  movements  around  the world continue .
the  2010  फीफा  World Cup was the 19th FIFA  संसार  Cup , the  संसार  championship for men  's  national  संघ  football teams .
it   took  place in South Africa from  11  June  to   11   जुलाई   2010  .
The bidding process  लिये  hosting the tournament finals  थी  open only to  अफ़्रीकी   राष्ट्र  ; in 2004  ,  the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   फ़ुटबॉल   संघ  ,  फीफा   ,   चयनित  South  अफ़्रीकी  over Egypt  और   मोरक्को  to become  the  first  अफ़्रीकी  nation to host the finals .
The matches were played in ten stadiums  in   नौ  host cities  around   the  country  ,  with the final  निभाई  at  the  Soccer City stadium in South Africa 's  largest   नगर  , Johannesburg .
Thirty-two teams were selected for participation  via  a worldwide  योग्यता  tournament that began  in  August 2007 .
In  the  first  गोलाकार  of the tournament  फाइनल   ,  the teams competed in round-robin  समूह  of four  टीमों  for points  ,   साथ   the   शीर्ष  two teams  in   प्रत्येक  group proceeding .
ये  sixteen  टीमों   उन्नत  to the  नॉकआउट  stage , where three rounds of play decided which teams  होता   participate  in the final  .
In  the  final  ,  Spain  ,   the  European champions , defeated third-time  finalists  the Netherlands 1–0 after  अतिरिक्त  time ,  साथ   आन्द्रेस  Iniesta  's  goal in the 116th  मिनट   giving   स्पेन  their first world  शीर्षक  ,  बनने   the   आठवीं  nation to win  the   टूर्नामेंट   ,  and the  पहला  European  स्वदेश  to win  the   टूर्नामेंट  outside its home  महाद्वीप  .
Host nation South Africa , 2006  संसार  champions Italy and 2006 runners-up  फ़्रांस   यहूद  all eliminated in the first  गोलाकार  of the tournament .
It was  the   पहला  time that  the  hosts were eliminated in  the  first round  .
नई  Zealand with their  तीन   draws  were the  तभी  undefeated team in  the  tournament , but  यहूद   भी  eliminated in the first round  .
The  mcmuffin  is a family of breakfast sandwiches  in  various sizes  और  configurations , sold by  the  fast-food  रेस्तरां  chain  मैकडोनाल्ड  's .
The Egg McMuffin  is  the signature breakfast  सैंडविच  ;  it  was invented by the late McDonald 's  वाल  Herb Peterson in  the   लेट  1960s and was introduced nationwide in 1972 .
John Lennon was an English musician who gained worldwide  कीर्ति  as one of  the  founders  of   the  Beatles , for his  subsequent  solo career  ,   और   लिये  his  राजनैतिक   सक्रियता  and pacifism .
he  was shot by Mark David  chapman   at  the entrance of  the  building where he lived , The Dakota ,  in   नई  York City on 8 December 1980 .
लेनन  had just returned  इससे   रिकार्ड  Plant  स्टुडियो  with his wife  ,  Yoko Ono .
लेनन  was pronounced  मुर्दे  on  आगमन  at  st.   luke's-roosevelt  Hospital Center  ,  where  it   थी   stated   कि  nobody could have lived for more  than   a  few minutes after  sustaining  such injuries .
shortly  after local news  स्टेशन   reported  Lennon 's death , crowds gathered at Roosevelt  हॉस्पिटल  and in front of the  डकोटा  .
लेनन   थी  cremated on 10 December 1980  at  the Ferncliff Cemetery in Hartsdale ,  नई  York ; the ashes were  दिए   to   ओनो   ,  who chose not  to  hold a  अंत्येष्टि  for  उसे  .
The first report  of   लेनन  's death to a U.S. national  दर्शक  was announced by Howard Cosell , on ABC  's  Monday Night  फ़ुटबॉल  .
New  ऑरलियन्स  ( or  ,   locally  or ;  )   is   a  major United  राज्य  port  और  the  largest   नगर  and  महानगर  area in  the  state of Louisiana .
The population of the city was 343,829 as of  the  2010  u.S.  Census .
The New Orleans metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  ( New Orleans–Metairie–Kenner Metropolitan Statistical  क्षेत्रफल  )  था  a population  of  1,167,764  in  2010  और  was the 46th largest in the United States .
The New  orleans–metairie–bogalusa  Combined Statistical  क्षेत्रफल  , a  larger  trading area ,  था  a 2010  जनसांख्यिकी  of 1,214,932 .
The  नगर  is named after Orléans  ,  a city located on  the  Loire  नदी   in   केन्द्र   ,  France  ,  and is well known  लिये   इसके  distinct  फ्रेंच  Creole architecture  ,   as  well  as  its cross-cultural  और   बहुभाषी  heritage .
नई   ऑरलियन्स   is  also  प्रसिद्ध  for its cuisine , music  (  particularly  as  the birthplace of jazz ) ,  और  its annual celebrations and festivals , most  notably   mardi  Gras .
the  city is  प्रायः  referred to as the ``  सबसे  unique '' in America .
नई  Orleans is located in southeastern  louisiana  , straddling  the  Mississippi  नदी   .
The city and Orleans Parish ( )  हैं  .
The  नगर  and parish  हैं  bounded by  the  parishes of St. Tammany to the north ,  st.  Bernard to the  ईस्ट   ,  Plaquemines to the south and  जेफरसन  to the  दक्षिण   और  west .
Lake Pontchartrain ,  भाग  of which  is  included  in  the city  हद  , lies to the  उत्तर   और  Lake  borgne  lies to the east .
The United States presidential election of 1968 was  the  46th  quadrennial  presidential election ,  आयोजित   on  Tuesday  ,  November 5  ,   1968   .
The  रिपब्लिकन  nominee , former  vice-president  Richard  निक्सन  , won the  चुनाव  over the  लोकतांत्रिक  nominee ,  लाज़िम   vice-president   ह्यूबर्ट  Humphrey .
Nixon ran on a campaign that promised to restore  विधि   और   अनुक्रम  to the  स्वदेश  's cities , torn by riots and crime .
Analysts have argued  the  election  of  1968 is a  realigning  election as  it  permanently disrupted the  नई  Deal Coalition  कि  had  वर्चस्व  presidential  राजनीती   लिये  36 years  .
Coming four years after  डेमोक्रेट   lyndon  B. Johnson  जीती  in a  ऐतिहासिक   भूस्खलन   ,   the  election saw  the  incumbent president  मजबूर  out of the race and a Republican elected for the  पहला  time in twelve  सालो  .
It was a wrenching national  अनुभव   ,  conducted  दौरान   a  year of violence that included the assassination  of  civil rights leader Martin  लूथर   किंग   ,   jr.  , and  subsequent  race riots across the nation  ,  the  assasination   of   लोकतांत्रिक  presidential candidate Robert F.  कैनेडी  , widespread  विपक्ष  to the Vietnam  युद्ध  across university campuses  ,   और  violent confrontations between police and anti-war protesters  at   the  1968 Democratic National Convention as  the   लोकतांत्रिक  party  विभाजित   again  and again .
The  चुनाव  featured the strongest  तीसरा   पार्टी  effort since 1912 by former Alabama Governor George  वालेस   ,  a  डेमोक्रेट  .
क्युकी   वालेस  's campaign opposed federal  हस्तक्षेप  in the South to end school segregation  ,  he carried the  गहन  South and ran well  in  ethnic industrial districts in the North .
This was  the  last election in which New York  था  the most votes in  the  electoral  कॉलेज   (  43  मत  ) .
After the 1970  जनसांख्यिकी  ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  gained  the  most electoral  मत  and  रै   remained  the  सबसे  populous state  चूंकि  then .
This is the  नवीनतम  election  जहाँ   a   अध्यक्षीय  ticket  जीती  without carrying the  वाइस  presidential  प्रत्याशी  's home state  .
Karak  (  ; also known  as  Garak , Garrak  ,   और  Gorg  )   is  a village  in  Gamasiyab Rural District , in  the  Central District of  nahavand  County , Hamadan Province ,  इरान  .
At  the  2006  जनसांख्यिकी  , its  जनसांख्यिकी   थी  294 ,  in  65 families  .

कर्ट   डोनाल्ड  Cobain ( February  20  , 1967 – April 5  ,  1994 ) was an  अमरीकी   संगीतकार  and artist , best known as the lead singer  ,  guitarist and primary songwriter  of  the grunge band Nirvana .
Cobain formed  निर्वाण  with  krist  Novoselic in  एबरडीन   ,  Washington  in   1985  and established it as  भाग   of  the Seattle music scene , having  इसके   डेब्यू  album  ब्लीच   released  on the independent  रिकार्ड  label  sub   पॉप   in  1989 .
After signing with major label DGC Records  ,  the band  मिला   भेदन  success with  ``  Smells Like Teen  स्पिरिट  `` from  इसके   दूसरी   एल्बम  Nevermind  (   1991   )   .
Following  the  success  of  Nevermind , Nirvana  थी  labeled `` the flagship band '' of Generation X  ,  and Cobain  hailed   as  `` the spokesman of  a  generation ''  .
Cobain  ,  however , was  प्रायः  uncomfortable and  कुंठित   ,  believing  उसके  message and  कलाकारी   दृष्टि   to  have been  misinterpreted  by the public , with his personal issues often  विषय  to media attention .
he  challenged Nirvana  's   दर्शक  with its  फाइनल   स्टुडियो  album  in  Utero ( 1993 ) .
During the last years  of  his life  ,   कोबेन  struggled with heroin addiction ,  बीमारी  and depression  .
He also had difficulty coping with  उसके  fame and public  चित्र   ,  and  the   पेशेवर  and  lifelong  personal pressures surrounding  खुद  and  उसके   बीवी  ,  संगीतकार   कोर्टनी  Love .
on  April 8 ,  1994   ,  Cobain  थी   मिला  dead at his home in  सिएटल  , the victim  of   कया   थी  officially ruled  a  suicide  by  a  self-inflicted   shotgun  wound to the head .
The circumstances  of   उसके   मौत  at age  27   have  become a topic  of  public fascination and  बहस   .
चूंकि  their debut  ,  Nirvana  ,  with Cobain as a songwriter  ,  has sold over 25  लाख   एल्बम  in  the  U.S.  ,  and  over  50 million  विश्वव्यापी  .
A millwright  is  a craftsman or tradesman  सगाई   साथ   the  construction  और  maintenance of machinery  .
More  generally   in  the English  बोलना   संसार  ,  जल्दी  millwrights were specialist carpenters who  erected  machines used  in  agriculture , food processing and  प्रसंस्करण   lumber   और   पेपर  .
In  the  early part of the Industrial Revolution , their skills were pressed  into  service building the earliest powered  वस्त्र  mills .
Modern millwrights work  साथ  steel and other materials  in   जोड   to  wood and must often combine  the  skills  of  several skilled  ट्रेड  in  अनुक्रम  to successfully  fabricate   औद्योगिक   मशीनरी  or to assemble  मशीने   इससे  pre-fabricated parts  .
The  आधुनिक  millwright must  भी  be able to  पढ़ा  blueprints and other schematics to  सहायता  him  in  the  निर्माण  of complex  प्रणालियों  .
Millwrights  हैं   अक्सर  unionized , with around  45  % unionized  in   the   us  , although  अनुभवी  millwrights often  नियत  themselves  up   as  independent contractors  .
The Adjustment  ब्यूरो  is  a  2011 American romantic  कार्रवाई  thriller film loosely  आधारित  on the Philip K.  लंड  short story ,  ``   समायोजन  Team `` .
the  film was written and directed by George  nolfi   और   सितारों   मैट   डैमन  and Emily Blunt  .
the  cast also includes Anthony Mackie  ,   जॉन  Slattery ,  माइकल  Kelly , and Terence Stamp .
The score was composed  by  Thomas  न्युमैन  ,  साथ  two songs by Richard Ashcroft ( ``  भविष्य  's  उज्जवल  '' for  the  opening sequence  ;  `` Are You Ready ? '' for the closing  क्रेडिट  ) .
Sodium azide is the inorganic compound with the  सूत्र  NaN3 .
This colorless salt  is  the gas-forming  घटक  in many  car  airbag systems  .
it  is used for  the  preparation of  अन्य  azide compounds .
it  is an ionic substance , is highly  घुलनशील  in  जल   ,  and is very acutely toxic .
Double rainbow and supernumerary  rainbows  on  the  inside of  the  primary  चाप  .
The  छाया   of  the photographer 's head on the bottom marks the centre of the  रेनबो   वृत्त   (   antisolar   पाइंट  ) .
a   रेनबो   is  an optical  और  meteorological phenomenon that  is  caused by reflection of light  in  water droplets in the Earth 's atmosphere , resulting in a spectrum  of  light appearing in the  आसमान  .
it  takes the  रूप   of  a multicoloured arc  .
Rainbows  caused  by  धूप  always  appear   in   the  section  of  sky directly  विपरीत   the  sun .
In  a  `` primary rainbow '' , the arc shows red on the outer  भाग  and violet  on  the  भीतरी   पक्ष  .
This  रेनबो   is  caused by  लाइट  being refracted while entering a droplet of water  ,  then reflected inside on  the   वापस  of the  droplet  and  refracted  again when leaving  it   .
in   a   दोगुना  rainbow , a  दूसरी  arc is  देखी   बाहर  the primary arc  ,  and  रै   the   अनुक्रम  of its  रंग  reversed  ,  red facing  toward  the  अन्य   एक  , in  दोनो  rainbows .
इस  second rainbow  is  caused  by  light reflecting twice  अंदर  water droplets .
the  Conservative Party , officially  the  Conservative  और  Unionist Party and colloquially referred to as the Tory Party or the Tories , is a centre-right political party in the United Kingdom that  espouses  the philosophies  of   कोसा   और  British unionism .
it  is the largest  राजनैतिक  party  in  the United Kingdom , being the largest  सिंगल  party in the House of Commons with 303  mps   ,  the largest party in local government  साथ   9,391   पार्षदों  , and the largest  अंग्रेजों  party in  the   यूरोपीय  Parliament with  25  MEPs  .
It governs in coalition with the  उदार  Democrats , with party leader  दाउद   cameron   as  Prime  मंत्री  .
the   रूढ़िवादी  Party was founded  in   1834   ,  and was one  of   दो  dominant parties  in   the  19th  सदी  , along with the Liberal  पार्टी  .
it   बदला  its name to  the  Conservative and  यूनियनिस्ट  Party in  1912   बाद   विलय   साथ  the  उदार  Unionist Party  ,  although that name is  rarely  used and  it   is  generally referred to as simply  the   रूढ़िवादी   पार्टी  .
In the 1920s ,  the   उदार   vote  greatly  diminished  and  the  Labour Party became the Conservatives  '  main rivals .
Conservative Prime Ministers led governments for 57  सालो  of the  20th  century  ,   सहित  Winston Churchill ( 1940–45 ,  1951–55  )  और  Margaret Thatcher  (  1979–90 ) .
Thatcher  's  tenure led to wide-ranging economic  उदारीकरण  and saw the Conservatives  become   the  most eurosceptic  of  the three major parties .
The party was returned  to  government in coalition  ,   having   विफल   to   जीत  a majority ,  in   2010  under  the   अधिक   ``  liberal  ''  leadership  of  David  cameron  .
In the European  पार्लियामेंट  , the Conservatives are the largest British  पार्टी  with  25  MEPs , who  बैठना  with  the   नरम  eurosceptic European Conservatives  और  Reformists (  ecr  ) parliamentary group , while the party itself is a member  of  the  गठबंधन   of  European Conservatives and  reformists  ( AECR ) Europarty  .
They are  the  third-largest party  in   the  Scottish Parliament and second-largest  in  the Welsh  सभा  .
They were formally allied to  the  Ulster Unionist Party  (  UUP ) as part  of  the Ulster Conservatives and Unionists  व्यवस्था   ,  with  the   uup  currently participating in  the  five-party Northern Ireland Executive .
Destiny  's  Child was an American  r  & B girl  समूह  whose final , and perhaps most recognizable  ,   line-up  comprised  बेयोंस  Knowles , Kelly Rowland and  मिशेल  Williams .
Formed in  1990  in  ह्यूस्टन  , Texas  ,  Destiny 's Child members began  उनके  musical endeavors as Girl 's Tyme comprising , among others , Knowles  ,  Rowland , LaTavia Roberson and LeToya  luckett  .
After years of limited  कामयाबी   ,  they  यहूद  signed to  कोलंबिया  Records as Destiny  's   चाइल्ड   .
नियति  's  चाइल्ड  was launched into mainstream  मान्यता  following  the  release  of   उनके  best-selling second album , The Writing 's on the Wall  ,  which contained the number-one singles `` Bills , Bills , Bills ``  और  `` Say My Name  ``  .
Despite  नाजुक  and commercial  कामयाबी  , the group was plagued by internal conflict  और  legal  turmoil  ,  as   roberson  and Luckett attempted to split from the  समूह  's  मैनेजर   mathew   नॉलेस   ,  citing  favoritism  of Knowles and Rowland ,  उसके  daughter and niece  ,  respectively .
Both Roberson  और   luckett  were soon replaced with Williams  और  Farrah  फ्रैंकलिन   ;  however ,  in   2000  , Franklin was dismissed ,  leaving   उन्हें  as a trio  .
उनके   तीसरा  album ,  उत्तरजीवी  , which contains themes  the   पब्लिक  interpreted  as  a channel to the  समूह   's  experience  ,  contains  the  worldwide hits ``  स्वतंत्र  Women `` , `` Survivor `` and  ``   bootylicious   ``  .
In 2002 , they announced a hiatus and re-united  दो  years later for the release  of  their fourth  स्टुडियो  album ,  नियति  Fulfilled ( 2004 ) .
नियति   's  Child has sold  अधिक   than  50 million records  विश्वव्यापी  to date  .
Billboard  पत्रिका  ranks the  समूह  as one  of  the greatest  musical   trios  of all time ,  the  ninth most successful artist/band of  the  2000s , and placed the group  68th  in its All-Time Hot  100   कलाकारों  list  in  2008 .
the  Centers  लिये  Disease Control and Prevention (  सीडीसी  ) is  a  United States  संघीय  agency  अंतर्गत  the Department of  स्वास्थ्य  and Human Services headquartered  in  Druid Hills , unincorporated DeKalb County ,  जॉर्जिया   ,   in  Greater Atlanta .
it   works   to   protect   पब्लिक  health and safety by providing information to enhance health  निर्णय   ,  and  it  promotes health  through  partnerships with state health  विभाग  and other organizations .
the  CDC focus national attention on developing and  applying   बीमारी  prevention and  कंट्रोल  (  विशेषकर   संक्रामक  diseases and foodborne pathogens and other microbial infections ) , environmental health , occupational safety and health ,  स्वास्थ्य   प्रमोशन  ,  चोट  prevention and education  क्रियाएँ  designed  to  improve the health of the people of the United States .
The CDC is the United States ' national  पब्लिक  health  संस्थान  and is a founding  सदस्य   of  the International Association  of   नेशनल   पब्लिक   स्वास्थ्य   संस्थान  .
Earthquake  भविष्यवाणी   ``   is   प्रायः  defined  as  the specification  of  the  समय   ,   स्थान   ,  and  परिमाण   of   a   भविष्य   भूकंप  within stated limits '' ,  और   विशेषकर  of `` the  अगला  strong earthquake to occur in a  प्रदेश   .  ''
इस  can be  विशिष्ट  from earthquake forecasting , which  is   the  probabilistic assessment of general earthquake hazard  ,  including the frequency and magnitude of damaging earthquakes  ,  in  a  given area over periods of  सालो  or decades  .
This can be further distinguished  इससे  real-time earthquake warning systems ,  जिससे  , upon detection of  a  severe earthquake , can provide  neighboring   regions  a  few  seconds  चेतावनी   of  potentially significant shaking .
To be useful  ,   an  earthquake prediction must be precise enough to warrant  the  cost of increased  एहतियात   ,   सहित  disruption of ordinary  क्रियाएँ  and commerce ,  और  timely  पर्याप्त  that preparation  can   be  made .
पूर्वानुमान   जरूर  also be reliable  ,  as false alarms and cancelled alarms  हैं  not only economically  costly  , but  seriously  undermine confidence in ,  और  thereby the effectiveness of  ,   कोई  kind  of   चेतावनी  .
With over 7,000  भूकंप  around the world each year with a magnitude of 4.0 or  वृहद  , trivial  कामयाबी  in earthquake prediction is  easily  obtained using  fear   व्यापक   पैरामीटर्स   of  time , location ,  or   परिमाण  .
However  ,  such trivial  ``  successful  पूर्वानुमान   ''  are not useful .
Major earthquakes  हैं  often followed  by  reports that  वे  were  पूर्वानुमानित  , or  at  least  anticipated   ,   लकिन  no claim of a successful prediction of a  प्रमुख   भूकंप  has survived  बंद  inquiry  .
In  the  1970s there  थी   तीव्र   आशावाद  amongst  वैज्ञानिकों   कि  some method of predicting earthquakes  might   be  found , but by the 1990s continuing failure led many scientists to question whether it was even possible .
जबकि  many  वैज्ञानिकों  still  थाम  that , given enough resources ,  भविष्यवाणी  might be  संभावित   ,  many  अन्य   maintain  that earthquake prediction is  inherently   नामुमकिन  .
Deborah Ann `` Debby '' Ryan  (   born   may   13  , 1993 ) is an American actress  ,  singer , musician , songwriter and record  निर्माता  .
Ryan  is   बेहतरीन  known for starring  as  Bailey Pickett in the Disney Channel Original Series The Suite  जीवन   on  Deck .
In 2008  ,   the  Suite Life on Deck ranked  as  TV 's top series  among  kids 6-11 and  the  No  .  2 scripted series among tweens 9-14 .
Ryan started acting  in   पेशेवर  theatres  at  the  आयु   of  seven ; in 2007 she appeared in the Barney & Friends straight-to-DVD film Barney : Let  's  Go to the Firehouse and  तब   थी   खोजा  in a  देशभर   ढूंढें  by  डिज़्नी  .
She  is  also known  लिये  appearing in the 2008 feature film The Longshots as  एडिथ  .
In 2009 ,  वो  guest starred  in   an  episode  of   wizards  of  waverly   प्लेस  in Wizards on Deck with Hannah  मोंटाना   as   बेली  Pickett along  साथ   उसके  other cast  mates   इससे  The Suite Life  on  Deck  .
तब  ,  in  2010 , she starred in the film  16  Wishes , which was the  सबसे  watched cable  कार्यक्रम   on  the day  of   इसके  premiere  on  the  डिज़्नी   चैनल  .
16  बधाइयां  introduced Ryan to new audiences ;  the  movie received high viewership in the adults  जनसांख्यिकी  (  18-34  )  .
Soon after  कि  , Ryan starred  in  the independent  नाट्य   फिल्मी   ,  What If ... , which  premiered  on August  20   ,  2010 .
Ryan also starred  in   the  new Disney Channel  असली  movie ,  रेडियो  Rebel ,  जहाँ  she  portrays  the  भूमिका  of Tara Adams  ,  a shy 17-year-old  लड़की   जो  adopts the radio personality  ,  Radio Rebel .
released  February  17  , 2012 .
Ryan stars in the titular role in  the   डिज़्नी   चैनल  Original  श्रेणी   ,  Jessie  .
Stührling Tourbillon Movement  (  ) .
In horology ,  a   tourbillon   (  ; `` whirlwind '' ) is an  जोड  to  the  mechanics of a  देखें   escapement   .
Developed around 1795 by  the  French-Swiss watchmaker  abraham-louis   breguet  from an  पहले   विचार  by  the   अंग्रेज़ी  chronometer maker John Arnold  ,   a  tourbillon  aims  to counter the effects  of   गम्भीरता  by mounting the escapement  और   संतुलन  wheel in a rotating cage , to  negate  the effect of gravity when the timepiece (  यूँ   the   escapement   )  is  stuck   in  a certain position .
Originally an attempt to  improve  accuracy , tourbillons are still included in some  महंगी  modern watches as a novelty and  demonstration  of watchmaking  virtuosity  .
the  mechanism  is  usually exposed on the  देखें  's face to show  it  off .
The  खिड़कियाँ  Installer ( previously known as Microsoft Installer ) is a software  घटक  used for the  संस्थापना  , maintenance , and removal of software on modern Microsoft Windows systems .
The installation information , and  प्रायः  the files themselves ,  हैं  packaged in installation packages  ,  loosely relational  databases  structured as  com  Structured  storages  and commonly  ज्ञात   as  `` MSI  फाइलें  '' , from their default file extension .
Windows Installer contains significant changes  इससे  its predecessor ,  सेटअप   api   .
New features  शामिल   a  GUI framework and  स्वचालित   पीढी   of   the   uninstallation   अनुक्रम  .
Windows Installer  is   positioned   as  an alternative to  stand-alone  executable installer frameworks such  as  older versions  of   installshield  and NSIS .
microsoft  encourages third parties to use Windows Installer as the basis  लिये  installation frameworks  ,  so  कि  they synchronize  correctly  with other installers and keep the  आतंरिक   डेटाबेस   of  installed products consistent .
Important  सुविधाएँ   ऐसे  as rollback and versioning  निर्भर  on  a  consistent  आतंरिक  database  लिये  reliable operation  .
furthermore  ,  खिड़कियाँ   installer  facilitates the principle  of   तनिक  privilege by performing software  संस्थापना   by   प्रॉक्सी  for unprivileged  उपयोक्ता  .
Four  लोको   is   a  line  of  alcoholic  पेय  , originally marketed as  उर्जा   पेय  ,  बेची  by Phusion Projects of Chicago  ,  Illinois .
phusion  operates as Drink Four Brewing Company .
Four  लोको   ,  the company 's most popular beverage ,  debuted   in  the United States market in 2005 .
it  is  अभी   बेची   in   48  states , and in  कनाडा  , The Bahamas  ,   बोलीविया  , Honduras  ,  and Europe .
The name `` Four  ''  is derived from the original  उर्जा  drink 's four main ingredients :  दारू  , caffeine ,  taurine   ,   और  guarana .
चार  branded products have been  the  object  of  legal , ethical , and health concerns  सम्बन्धित  to the  कम्पनी  allegedly marketing  उन्हें  to the underaged and the  purported  danger  of  combining alcohol and  कैफीन  .
After  the   पेय  was banned  in  several states , a  उत्पाद  reintroduction in  दिसम्बर  2010  removed  caffeine  ,  taurine ,  और  guarana  as   संघटक  , and the malt beverage is  no   longer   marketed  as an  उर्जा   पेय  .
The neck  of  a guitar showing  the  nut ( in the background , coloured white ) and  पहला  four metal  frets  .
A fret is  a  raised element on the  गर्दन  of a stringed  यंत्र  .
Frets  प्रायः  extend across the full  चौडाई  of  the  neck .
On most  आधुनिक   पश्चिमी   fretted  instruments ,  frets  are metal strips  inserted  into  the   fingerboard   .
On some historical instruments  और  non-European instruments  ,  frets  हैं  made of pieces of string tied around the  गर्दन  .
Frets divide  the  neck into fixed  खण्ड   at  intervals related to a  musical   फ्रेमवर्क  .
on  instruments such  as  guitars  ,  each fret  represents  one  semitone   in  the standard western system where  एक  octave is divided into  बारह  semitones .
Fret is often used as  a  verb  ,   अर्थ  simply  ``   to  press down the  स्ट्रिंग  behind a fret . ''
fretting   प्रायः  refers  to  the frets and/or their system of placement  .
There was consumption  of  alcohol  दोनो  during and after  निषेध   .
the  18th Amendment  निषिद्ध  the production  ,   वितरण  and sale of alcoholic beverages in the  संयुक्त  States and was widely supported by the American  पब्लिक  when it went into effect in 1920 .
the   temperance   गति   था  popularized the belief  कि  alcohol was the  प्रमुख   कारण  of most personal and  सोशल  problems and prohibition was seen as the solution  to  the nation 's poverty , crime ,  हिंसा  , and other  ills  .
Upon ratification  of  the  amendment  , the  प्रसिद्ध  evangelist  बिली   संडे  said that `` The  slums  will  जल्द   be  only a  मेमोरी   .
We  होगा  turn our prisons  into  factories  और   हमारी  jails into storehouses and corncribs .  ''
(  compare  Christianity and alcohol  .   )
Since  दारू  was to be banned  और  since it was seen as  the   कारण  of  सबसे  ,  if   नहीं  all , crime  ,  some  समुदायों  sold their jails  .
The nation  थी  highly optimistic and the leading prohibitionist  in  the United States  कॉंग्रेस  confidently asserted that `` There is  as  much chance of repealing the  eighteenth   amendment   as  there is for a hummingbird  to   मक्खी  to the  ग्रह  Mars  साथ  the Washington Monument tied to its tail.”
The metre ( meter in American English  )  , ( SI  ईकाई   प्रतीक  : m ; SI  आयाम  symbol  :   l  ) , is the fundamental unit of  लंबाई   in   the  International System  of   इकाई  ( SI  )   .
Originally  intended  to  be  one ten-millionth of the  अलहदा  from the Earth  's   equator  to the  उत्तर  Pole (  at  sea level )  ,  its definition has been periodically  परिष्कृत   to  reflect growing  ज्ञान  of metrology  .
Since 1983  ,  it has been defined as `` the  लंबाई   of  the  पाथ  travelled by  लाइट  in vacuum during  a  time interval  of   1/299,792,458  of a  दूसरी  . ''

Geologists explaining  the  importance  of   volcanic  ash layers to  विद्यार्थी  on  फ़ील्ड  in  आइसलैंड
A geologist  is  a  वैज्ञानिक  who studies the solid and liquid matter  कि  constitutes the Earth  as  well  as   the   प्रक्रियाओं   और  history that has shaped it .
Geologists usually engage in studying geology  .
Geologists ,  अध्ययन  more of  an  applied  विज्ञान   than   a   सैद्धांतिक  one , must approach Geology using  भौतिकी  , chemistry and biology as well as other  sciences  .
Geologists ,  compared  to scientists engaged  in   अन्य  fields , are  generally   अधिक  exposed  to   the   बाहरी   than  staying  in   laboratories  ; although some  geologists   prefer  to perform most of their studies  in  the  lab  .
Geologists  हैं  engaged  in  exploration for  खनन  companies in search  of  metals , oils , and  अन्य  Earth resources .
They are also in the forefront of natural  जोखिमों  and  आपदाओं  warning and mitigation , studying earthquakes  ,   volcanic  activity , tsunamis  ,   मौसम  storms , and the  जैसे  ; their  अध्ययन   हैं  used to warn the  सामान्य  public of  the  occurrence  of  these events .
फिलहाल   ,  geologists  हैं  also engaged in the discussion of climate  बदलें  , as they study the  इतिहास  and evidence  लिये  this Earth  प्रक्रम  .
Below  is   a  comprehensive drill and tap  आकार  chart for  सब  drills  ,  imperial and metric ,  और  taps up  to  36.5 mm  .
Modern  वैक्यूम   tubes  , mostly miniature style
in  electronics , a  वैक्यूम  tube , electron  ट्यूब  (  in  North  अमेरिका  ) , thermionic valve , tube ,  or  valve  is  a  यंत्र   controlling  electric  वर्तमान  through  a  vacuum in a sealed container .
the  container is often  पतला  transparent  कांच  in  a  roughly cylindrical shape .
The simplest vacuum  ट्यूब  , the diode  ,  is essentially an incandescent light bulb with an  added  electrode inside .
When  the  bulb  's  filament  is  heated white-hot  ,  electrons  हैं  `` boiled '' off its surface  और  into the vacuum inside the  बल्ब   .
If the electrode -- called a `` plate ''  or  ``  धनाग्र  ''  --   is  made more  धनात्मक  than the  hot  filament  ,   a  direct  वर्तमान   बहती   through  the  वैक्यूम  to the  एलेक्ट्रोड  ( a  demonstration  of the  एडिसन  effect )  .
As  the  current only flows in  एक  direction , it makes it possible to convert an alternating current applied  to  the filament to direct  वर्तमान  .
the   परिचय   of  a third  एलेक्ट्रोड  , a grid between the filament  और   the  plate , yields  another  function  .
a  voltage  लागू  to  the  grid  नियंत्रण  the current flowing  इससे  the filament  to  the plate  .
Thus , it allows the device to be used as an electronic amplifier .
Vacuum  tubes  are thus used for  rectification  , amplification , switching  ,  or similar processing  or  creation  of   विद्युत  signals .
The  विशाल  majority of modern  दिन   tubes  consist of  a  sealed  संग्राहक  with  a   वैक्यूम   अंदर  , and essentially rely on thermionic  उत्सर्जन  of electrons from a hot filament  or   a  cathode  heated  by the filament .
Some exceptions to this are dealt with in  the  section about  gas-filled   tubes  below  .
वैक्यूम  tubes were critical  to  the development of  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक   प्रौद्योगिकी   ,   जिससे  drove the expansion and commercialization of radio broadcasting ,  टेलीविज़न  , radar , sound reinforcement , sound  रिकॉर्डिंग  and  जनन  , large telephone networks ,  एनालॉग   और   डिजिटल  computers , and industrial process  कंट्रोल  .
Although some  अनुप्रयोग   था  counterparts using  पहले  technologies such as the spark gap  ट्रांसमीटर  or mechanical computers  ,   it  was the invention of the vacuum  ट्यूब  with three electrodes (  पुकारा   a   ट्रायोड  )  और   इसके  capability of electronic amplification  कि   बना  these technologies  फैली  and practical .
In most applications  ,   solid-state  devices such as  transistors   और  other semiconductor  डिवाइस  have  replaced   tubes  .
Solid-state devices  पिछला  longer  और  are smaller , more efficient , more reliable , and cheaper than tubes .
Tubes can be  नाजुक  , sometimes  generate  significant unwanted heat  ,   और  can take many seconds—many minutes in critical applications—after  powering   on  to  गरम   to  a temperature  जहाँ  they perform  भीतर  operational tolerance .
however   ,  tubes still  ढूँढें  uses where solid-state devices  have  not been developed ,  हैं  impractical  ,  or  जहाँ  a  ट्यूब   रै  superior performance  ,   as  with  कुछ  devices in professional audio  और  high-power radio transmitters  .
Tubes are still produced  लिये  such applications .
Tubes are less likely than semiconductor  डिवाइस  to  be  destroyed  by  the electromagnetic pulse  उत्पादित  by  नाभिकीय  explosions and geomagnetic storms produced by giant  सौर  flares .
Skittles is a  ब्रांड  of  fruit-flavoured  sweets , currently produced and marketed  by  the Wm . Wrigley  jr.  Company , a  प्रभाग  of Mars , Inc  .
They have hard  शुगर  shells which carry  the   अक्षर  S .
The inside  is  mainly sugar  ,  corn syrup , and hydrogenated  ताड़  kernel oil along with fruit juice ,  साइट्रिक   एसिड  , and natural  और   कृत्रिम   चटपटा   .
The  confectionery  has  महरूम  sold  in  a variety  of  flavour collections , such as Tropical  और   जंगली  Berry .
सर  Winston  लियोनार्ड   spencer-churchill  ,  (  30  नवम्बर  1874 – 24  जनवरी  1965 )  थी   a   अंग्रेजों  politician who was  the  Prime Minister of the  संयुक्त  Kingdom from 1940 to 1945  और  again  इससे   1951  to  1955  .
Widely regarded as one of the  महानतम  wartime leaders  of  the 20th  सदी  ,  चर्चिल  was also  an  officer in the  अंग्रेजों   फौज  , a historian , a writer , and an  कलाकार  .
he  is  the  only British Prime Minister  in  history to have  प्राप्त   the  Nobel Prize in Literature ,  और  was also  the   पहला  person to be  बना   an  Honorary Citizen of  the   संयुक्त   राज्य   .
चर्चिल  was  born  into an aristocratic family as the grandson  of   the  7th Duke  of   marlborough  .
His father , Lord  randolph   चर्चिल   ,   थी  a charismatic  राजनेता   जो   परोसा   as  Chancellor  of   the   exchequer  ;  उसके  mother  ,  Jennie Jerome , was an American socialite .
As a  यंग   फौज  officer , he saw action  in  British India , The  सूडान  , and the Second Boer War .
He  gained  fame  as  a  युद्ध   correspondent  and wrote books  परिचय  his campaigns  .
At the forefront of politics  लिये   पचास  years , he held many political  और   कैबिनेट   स्थितियाँ  .
पहले  the  पहला  World War  ,  he served as President  of   the  Board  of  Trade  ,  Home Secretary  ,  and First Lord of the  admiralty   as  part of the Asquith  उदार  government  .
दौरान   the  war , he continued as First Lord  of  the Admiralty until the disastrous  gallipoli   अभियान  caused  उसके  departure from  सरकारी  .
He  तब  briefly  resumed   क्रियाशील  army  सेवा  on the  पश्चिमी  Front as commander  of   the  6th  बटालियन  of  the  Royal  स्कॉट्स  Fusiliers  .
He returned to  सरकारी  as Minister  of  Munitions ,  सचिव  of  राज्य   लिये  War , and  सचिव  of State for  एयर   .
बाद  the War , Churchill served as Chancellor of the Exchequer in the  रूढ़िवादी   (   baldwin   )  government of 1924–29  ,   controversially   returning  the pound  स्टर्लिंग   in  1925 to the gold standard at its pre-war parity , a  मूव  widely seen as creating  deflationary  pressure  on  the UK economy .
भी  controversial was his opposition to increased  घर  rule  लिये   इण्डिया  and his  प्रतिरोध   to  the 1936  abdication  of  एडवर्ड  VIII  .
आउट   of  office and politically `` in  the  wilderness '' during  the  1930s , Churchill  took   the  lead in warning  परिचय   नाजी  Germany and in campaigning for rearmament .
on   the  outbreak  of  the Second  संसार   युद्ध  ,  he  was  again  appointed First Lord  of  the  admiralty   .
following  the resignation of  नेविली   चेम्बरलेन  on 10  may  1940  ,  Churchill became  प्रधान  Minister .
His steadfast refusal  to   consider  defeat ,  आत्मसमर्पण  , or  a  compromise peace  helped  inspire British resistance  ,  especially during the difficult early days of the War when Britain stood alone among European  देशों  in its  क्रियाशील   विपक्ष  to Adolf Hitler  .
Churchill was particularly noted for  उसके  speeches and radio broadcasts , which helped inspire the  अंग्रेजों  people .
He led Britain  as  Prime Minister until victory over Nazi Germany had been  secured  .
After the Conservative  पार्टी  lost the 1945  चुनाव  ,  he  became Leader  of  the Opposition to the Labour  (   attlee  )  सरकारी  .
बाद  winning the 1951 election , he again  became  Prime Minister , before  retiring  in  1955  .
Upon his death ,  एलिज़ाबेथ   ii  granted him the honour  of  a  राज्य  funeral ,  जिससे   देखी  one of the  largest  assemblies of  संसार  statesmen in history .
नामित  the Greatest Briton of all  समय  in a 2002  पोल   ,  Churchill  is  widely  regarded  as being among the most influential  लोगों  in  अंग्रेजों  history .
Ruby  gloom  is an animated television show  आधारित   on   an   वस्त्र  franchise .
the  show is  उत्पादित  by Nelvana and  began  airing  on  October 13 ,  2006  in Canada  on  the  संजाल  YTV .
It stars the voices of Sarah  gadon   ,  Emily  हैम्पशायर   ,   और  Peter  keleghan   .
The Ford  फ़ोकस  is  a   कॉम्पैक्ट  car  (  C-segment  in   यूरोपीय  )  manufactured   by  the Ford Motor Company  चूंकि  1998 .
घाट  began sales of the Focus  to  Europe in July  1998   और  in North  अमेरिका  during 1999  लिये  the 2000 model year  .
In Europe , South  अमेरिका  , North America  और   दक्षिण  Africa , the  फ़ोकस  replaced the various versions of  the  Ford Escort  बेची   in  those markets .
In  एशिया   और   australasia  , it replaced the Ford Laser .
As of  the  first  हाफ  of 2012 , the  फ़ोकस  surpassed the  टोयोटा  Corolla  to  become the  संसार  's best selling  ऑटोमोबाइल  nameplate .
The  फ़ोकस  has been considered  एक  of the 50  महानतम   गाड़ियाँ  of the  पास्ट  fifty  सालो  by  अंग्रेजों  magazine  car  .
An agar plate -- an example  of   a  bacterial growth medium .
Specifically , it is a streak plate  ;  the orange  लाइनों   और  dots are formed  by  bacterial  colonies  .
A growth medium or culture medium is  a  liquid  or   gel  designed  to   support  the growth of microorganisms or  कोशिकाएं  , or small plants like  the   मॉस  Physcomitrella patens .
वहीँ   हैं  different  प्रकार  of media  लिये  growing different types of cells .
There are two major  प्रकार  of growth media : those used for cell culture ,  जिससे   उपयोग  specific cell  प्रकार  derived  इससे  plants or animals ,  और   microbiological  culture , which are used  लिये   growing  microorganisms , such as bacteria or yeast .
The most common growth  मीडिया  for microorganisms are  nutrient   broths   और  agar  प्लेटों   ;  specialized media  हैं   sometimes  required  लिये   microorganism  and cell  संस्कृति  growth .
कुछ  organisms , termed fastidious  जीवों  ,  आवश्यकता  specialized environments  due  to complex  nutritional  requirements .
Viruses , for  उदाहरण  , are obligate intracellular parasites and require a growth medium containing living cells .
A talent agent , or  बुकिंग  agent ,  is  a person who finds  कार्य  for actors , authors  ,  film directors , musicians  ,  models , producers ,  पेशेवर   एथलीट   ,  writers and other people  in  various  entertainment  businesses .
An agent also defends  ,   supports  and promotes the interest of his/her clients .
Agents can not produce their own  shows  due  to  conflict of  ब्याज   .
A talent agent must be familiar with their clients  .
an  agent  रै  to know what kind  of  work  the  client can  और  can  नहीं  do in  अनुक्रम  to match them with various jobs .
Having an agent  is  not required , but does help the artist  in  getting  कार्य   .
in   अनेक  cases casting directors ,  or  other businesses , go to talent agencies to find artists they are looking for .
the  agent  is  paid a  प्रतिशत   of  the star 's  आय   (  typically  10   %  ) .
एजेंटों  sometimes will be  referred  to as `` 10 percenters . ''
There are different regulations  कि  govern  अलग  types of agents that  हैं   स्थापित  by  कलाकार   's  unions and the legal jurisdiction in which  the  agent operates .
There are also professional  संगठन  that license talent agencies .
Since  the  decline  in   viewership   in  theaters  ,   इससे  the 1950s to  1960s   ,   इस  caused a monumental  शिफ़्ट   in   कैसा  studios  होता   उपज  films and thus reducing  the  cost of exclusive and expensive  अभिनेताओं  .
Actors and actresses  यहूद  working for the studios but were not  स्वामित्व  by  एक  major studio entity and so were  समर्थ  to work on within  उनके  time  और  with other studios .
Because  of  this , agents were now seen  as  a  necessity  instead of an option .
Agents now became  तीसरा  parties  कि  negotiated between studios and  क्लाइंट  , this making their  सेवाएं  imperative  between  each  पार्टी   .
Since talent agencies  हैं   working  with lucrative contracts  ,  all talent agencies must be  licensed  under  खास  sections of the California Labor  कोड   ,  which calls  an   एजेंट   a  `` person or corporation who  engages   in  the  occupation  of procuring ,  offering  , promising ,  or  attempting  to   procure   नियुक्ति  for artist or artists .  ''
मंगल  has two known  moons  , Phobos and Deimos , which are thought to be captured asteroids .
Both  satellites  were discovered  in   1877  by Asaph  हॉल   और  are named after the  वर्ण   phobos  ( panic/fear  )   और  Deimos  (  terror/dread  )  who , in Greek mythology  ,  accompanied their  पिता   एरीस  , god of war , into  बैटल  .
Ares was known as Mars to  the  Romans .
It is possible that  मंगल  may  have  moons smaller than 50  -  100 meters  और  a dust ring between Phobos and Deimos may  be  present but none have been discovered  .
In  विधि  enforcement  parlance  , the term murder book  refers   to  the case file of  a  murder investigation  .
Typically  ,  murder books include crime scene photographs  और  sketches  ,  autopsy and  forensic  reports , transcripts of investigators ' notes and  गवाह  interviews  .
The  हत्या  book encapsulates the  पूरा  paper trail of a murder investigation  ,   इससे  the time the murder is first reported through  the  arrest of a  suspect  .
Law  प्रवर्तन  agencies typically  गार्ड  murder books carefully  ,  and it  is   असामान्य   लिये  civilians to be given unfettered  अभिगम  to these kinds of  रिकॉर्ड  , especially for unsolved  मामले   .
a   melon  baller
Melon balls are  गेंदें  of melon made using a melon  baller  that  varies   इससे   around  1  centimeter  to  3  centimeters  (  about 3/8  इंच   to   1  inch  )  .
They are  generally  used in fruit salad  .
a  KSA , or  ज्ञान  , Skills , and Abilities ,  is   a   श्रेणी  of narrative statements  कि   हैं   जरूरी   जब  applying  to  United States  संघीय  government job  उद्घाटन  .
KSAs are used to determine ,  साथ  with  resumes  , who the best applicants are  जब  several candidates  qualify  for a job  .
The  ज्ञान  , skills and  abilities   (  KSAs )  जरुरी  for the successful performance of a position are  contained  on  प्रत्येक   जॉब  vacancy announcement  .
In  2009   the  Office of Personal  प्रबन्धन  asked  संघीय  agencies  to   रोकें  requiring job  आवेदकों   to  fill out the questionnaires ,  to  be  phased  out within a year .
KSAs are brief  और   केन्द्रित  essays about  एक   's  career and educational background that presumably qualify  एक  to perform  the  duties of the  स्थिति  being applied  लिये   .
A  ज्ञान  ,  कौशल  , and abilities ( KSA  )  is  a  concise essay  परिचय   एक   's  talent  और  expertise and related  अनुभवों  ( work , education , volunteer ) and accomplishments .
A series of  ksa  statements are usually required  जब  applying for most federal government and some state  और  city government  कार्य  .
KSAs are  प्रयुक्त  as  a  yardstick  to   assess  the capabilities of a prospective  आवेदक  in terms  of  likely  क्षमता   to  perform  the  duties  of  the job  .
सबसे   सरकारी  hiring  officials   dekh   लिये  a  छोटी   ,  crisp and  साफ  KSA that emphasizes results or accomplishments  प्राप्त  in  पिछला  work .
KSA statements are also  ज्ञात   as  Evaluation  कारकों  .
अन्य  agencies sometimes call  उन्हें  `` Rating  कारकों  '' , `` Quality Ranking Factors '' , `` Knowledge , Abilities , skills and  अन्य  Characteristics '' ,  or  ``  जॉब  Elements  ''   .
The name can be just a name but often  it   प्रभाव   सामग्री  and length of the essay .
Every agency has its own regulations but most of the time the each KSA factor should be  1/2  to 11⁄2 pages long .
The below definitions are defined by  the   u.S.  Office of Personnel Management :
Knowledge  ,  Skills , and Abilities ( KSAs  )  - The attributes required to perform a  जॉब  and  हैं  generally demonstrated through  qualifying   सेवा   ,  education  ,  or training .
Knowledge - Is  a  body of information applied directly  to  the performance of a  फलन   .
Skill - Is  an  observable competence to  perform  a  सीखे  psychomotor  अधिनियम   .
क्षमता  - Is competence  to   perform  an observable  बर्ताव  or a  बर्ताव  that results in an  observable  product .
The scoring  of  KSA  essays  is based on  a  scale of from one  to   100   .
Job applicants  जरूर   स्कोर  above 70 to be  माना   लिये  the  स्थिति  .
High  स्कोर   हैं  derived through  answering   the  KSA question as specifically  as  possible , providing examples from  पिछला  employment  or   प्रशिक्षण   कि  clearly demonstrate you meet the qualifications .
जब  applying to federal government positions  ,  a  संघीय  Resume is usually required  in   जोड  to  ksa   कथन  .

Love  सदा  is the debut  एल्बम  of  अमरीकी  R &  b   duo  K-Ci &  जोजो   ,   released   on  June  17   ,  1997 ,  by   mca   रिकॉर्ड  .
It was recorded at various studios in  नई  York and the  लॉस  Angeles area in 1996  और  1997  .
It was produced by  जोजो  and several others , including DeVante Swing , James  mtume  , and  जेफ़  Redd .
The  duo  were originally a  भाग   of  Jodeci before this album .
The album peaked at sixth on the US  बिलबोर्ड  200  और  also appeared on  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   चार्ट   .
the   सिंगल  ``  सब  My  जीवन   ``  charted number  एक  in  अनेक  countries ,  और  all  चार  of  the  album 's singles  peaked  above the top 25 in the US Hot R & B/Hip-Hop  गीतों   और   the  New Zealand Top 40 Singles  .
प्रेम   सदा  was received  favorably   by  critics , who  praised  the brothers ' singing ability  और  the production .
The album has  महरूम  certified three times platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America ( RIAA ) and gold by Music  कनाडा   और  IFPI Sweden .
as  of June 1999 it had  बेची  2.9 million  नक़ल  in the United States .
A  variable-rate   बंधक  , adjustable-rate  बंधक  (  भुजा  ) , or tracker mortgage is a  बंधक   ऋण  with the interest rate on  the  note periodically  समायोजित   आधारित  on an index which reflects the cost  to   the  lender  of   उधार  on  the  credit  बाज़ार  .
The  ऋण  may be offered at the lender 's standard variable rate/ base rate .
वहीँ  may  be  a direct and legally-defined link to  the  underlying  अनुक्रमणिका  , but where the lender offers  no  specific link to the underlying market or  अनुक्रमणिका   the  rate can be changed  at  the lender 's discretion .
The term ``  variable-rate  mortgage '' is most common outside the United  राज्य  , whilst in  the  United States ,  ``   adjustable-rate   बंधक   ''  is most common , and  implies  a mortgage  regulated   by  the Federal  सरकारी  , with  कैप्स  on charges  .
In many countries  ,   समायोज्य  rate mortgages are  the  norm  ,  and in  ऐसे   स्थान  , may  बस   be  referred to as mortgages  .
among  the most common  indices  are the  दरों   on  1-year  constant-maturity  Treasury ( CMT )  प्रतिभूति   ,  the Cost of Funds  अनुक्रमणिका  ( COFI ) , and the London Interbank  offered  Rate  (   libor  )  .
A  few  lenders use  उनके  own  लागत  of funds  as  an index  ,   बल्कि   than  using other  indices   .
This is done to ensure a steady  हाशिया  for  the  lender , whose  अपना  cost  of   funding   होगा  usually be related to the  अनुक्रमणिका  .
Consequently , payments  बना  by the  borrower  may  बदलें  over  समय  with  the   बदलना  interest rate ( alternatively , the term of  the  loan may change ) .
इस   is  distinct  इससे  the graduated payment mortgage ,  जिससे   offers  changing  भुगतान   amounts  but a  फिक्स्ड  interest rate .
अन्य   फ़ॉर्म  of  बंधक  loan  शामिल   the   ब्याज  only mortgage ,  the  fixed rate mortgage , the negative amortization mortgage  ,  and the balloon payment mortgage  .
Adjustable rates transfer  भाग  of the  ब्याज  rate risk from the lender to  the  borrower  .
They can be used  जहाँ  unpredictable interest rates  मेक  fixed rate loans difficult to obtain .
The borrower benefits if  the   ब्याज  rate  जलप्रपात  but loses if  the  interest rate increases .
The  borrower   लाभ   इससे   घटाया  margins to the  underlying  cost  of  borrowing compared  to  fixed or  capped  rate mortgages .
the  assassination of  रॉबर्ट  Francis  ``  Bobby '' Kennedy , a United States  सीनेटर  and brother of assassinated President John Fitzgerald  ``   जोकर  '' Kennedy , took place  shortly   बाद  midnight on June 5 ,  1968   ,   in  Los Angeles , California , during  the   अभियान   ऋतु   लिये  the United States Presidential election , 1968 .
After  जीतना  the California and South Dakota primary elections for  the   लोकतांत्रिक  nomination  लिये  President of the United States  ,  Kennedy was shot as he  walked   through  the kitchen  of   the  Ambassador Hotel and died  in  the  शुभ  Samaritan Hospital twenty-six hours later  .
sirhan   sirhan  , a 24-year-old Palestinian / Jordanian immigrant  ,  was convicted of  कैनेडी  's murder and is serving a life sentence for the crime .
sirhan  's lawyers  have  released  कथन  claiming  प्रमाण  that he  थी  framed .
The  शूटिंग  was recorded  on  audio tape  by  a  freelance  newspaper reporter , and the aftermath was captured on  फिल्मी  .
कैनेडी  's body lay  in  repose  at  St.  पैट्रिक  's Cathedral in New  यॉर्क  for two days  पहले  a  अंत्येष्टि  mass  थी   आयोजित  on June 8 .
His body  थी   interred  near  उसके   bhai  John at Arlington National Cemetery .
His death  prompted  the protection of presidential candidates by  the  United States Secret Service .
Hubert Humphrey went on to win the Democratic  नामांकन  for  the  presidency , but ultimately narrowly  खोया  the  चुनाव   to  Richard Nixon .
As  साथ  his  bhai  Jack 's death ,  bobby   's   हत्या  and the circumstances surrounding it  have  spawned a variety of conspiracy theories  .
as  of  2013  Kennedy remains  एक  of only  दो  sitting United  राज्य  Senators  to  be assassinated ( the other being Huey  long  ) .
The Modern Age  of  Comic Books is an informal name for the period in the  इतिहास  of  मुख्यधारा   अमरीकी   कॉमिक  books generally considered to last  इससे  the mid-1980s until present  दिन  .
In this period , comic book  वर्ण   generally   became   गहरा   और   अधिक   psychologically   जटिल  ,  creators  became  better-known  and active in changing the  उद्योग   ,  independent  कॉमिक्स   flourished  ,  और   larger  publishing houses  became   अधिक  commercialized .
an  alternate name  लिये   इस  period  is  the Dark  आयु  of Comic Books , due to  the  popularity and artistic influence of grim titles , such as and Watchmen .
When Harry Met Sally ...  is   a   1989  American romantic comedy film written by Nora Ephron and  निर्देशित  by  रोब   reiner  .
It stars Billy  क्रिस्टल  as  हैरी  and Meg Ryan as Sally  .
The  स्टोरी   फ़ॉलो   the  title characters from  the  time they  मिलें   बस  before sharing a cross-country drive  ,  through twelve years or so  of   मौका  encounters in New York City .
the  film raises  the  question `` Can  मेन  and women ever  बस   be  friends  ?  '' and advances  अनेक  ideas  परिचय  relationships that became household  अवधारणाओं  , such as those of  the  ``  ''   गर्लफ्रेंड  and the `` transitional person '' .
the   origins  of the film  आए  from  reiner   's   वापसी  to  सिंगल  life after  a   तलाक   .
An interview Ephron  conducted  with Reiner provided  the   आधार  for Harry  .
सैली  was  आधारित  on Ephron  और  some  of  her  मित्रों  .
क्रिस्टल  came on  फलक  and made his own contributions to  the  screenplay , making Harry funnier .
Ephron supplied  the  structure of the  फिल्मी   साथ  much of the  संवाद  based on the real-life friendship between  reiner  and Crystal .
The  साउंडट्रैक  consists  of  standards performed  by   हैरी  Connick  ,  Jr. ,  साथ   a   बिग  band  और  orchestra arranged by Marc Shaiman .
Connick  जीती  his first Grammy Award for Best  जैज़  Male Vocal Performance .
Columbia Pictures released the  फिल्मी  using the  ``  platform '' technique ,  जिससे  involved opening it in  a   few  select cities , letting  धनात्मक  word of mouth generate  ब्याज  ,  और  then gradually expanding distribution over subsequent weeks .
When  हैरी   मिले   सैली  ... grossed a  कुल  of US  $  92  .8  million in North  अमेरिका  .
Ephron received  a  British Academy Film  पुरस्कार  , an Oscar nomination ,  और  a Writers  गिल्ड   of   अमेरिका  Award nomination for her screenplay .
The film is  क्रमित   23rd  on  एएफआई   's  100  सालो   ...  100 Laughs list of  the  top  कॉमेडी  films  in  American cinema and number 60 on  ब्रावो  's `` 100 Funniest Movies ''  .
in   जल्दी  2004 , the film was adapted for the  स्टेज  in a  उत्पादन   अभिनीत  Luke Perry and Alyson Hannigan .

Hamburger  हेल्पर  is a  लकीर  of packaged food  उत्पाद  primarily  consisting  of boxed pasta bundled with a packet or packets of  powdered  sauce or  seasonings   .
the  contents of each box are  संयुक्त  with browned ground beef  ,  water and milk to  बनाएँ  a complete dish  .
The  उत्पाद  line  भी   सुविधाएँ   उत्पाद  with other starches such as rice  or  potatoes instead of  पास्ता   .
It is made by General Mills .
Although the  क्लासिक   boxed  Hamburger  हेल्पर  products only supply  the   मंड  item  और  the sauce  पैकेट्स  , some  किस्में  of  the  product  शामिल   मैदान  beef .
These  शामिल   a  frozen food line  ,  which features some of the brand 's classic varieties in  a  complete meal  kit   रूप  , with frozen ground beef  और   frozen   सॉस  packaged separately  इससे  the  नूडल्स  in  the   वही  bag .
वहीँ   is  also an `` instant '' version of Hamburger Helper containing  निर्जलित   मांस   ,  noodles  और   seasonings  in  a  small pouch , requiring  तभी  water to be  added   .
The Hamburger Helper mascot is the  ``  Helping Hand  ''  , an anthropomorphic animated , four  fingered  left-hand glove , which  appears  in  the   उत्पाद  's  टेलीविज़न   commercials  and on the  पैकेज  .
