A dwarf  ग्रह  is a planetary-mass  ऑब्जेक्ट   कि   is  neither a planet nor a  उपग्रह  .
More explicitly , the International Astronomical Union ( IAU ) defines a  बौना  planet as  a   celestial  body in  सीधा  orbit of  the  Sun that is massive  पर्याप्त  for  इसके  shape to  be  controlled by gravitation ,  लकिन  that unlike a planet  रै  not cleared  इसके  orbital region of other objects  .
The term  बौना  planet was adopted  in  2006 as part of a three-way categorization of bodies  orbiting  the Sun  ,   brought  about by an increase in discoveries of trans-Neptunian  वस्तुएँ  that  rivaled   प्लूटो  in size  ,   और   आखिरकार   precipitated  by the discovery of an  भी  more  विशाल   ऑब्जेक्ट  , Eris  .
इस   वर्गीकरण  states that  लाशें  large enough to  have  cleared the neighbourhood  of  their orbit are defined  as  planets  ,  while those that are not massive enough to be  rounded   by  their own gravity are defined as  छोटी   सौर  System  लाशें   .
Dwarf  ग्रह  come  in  between .
The exclusion of dwarf  ग्रह  from the  रोस्टर  of planets by  the   iau   रै  been both  praised   और  criticized ;  it  was said to be the  ``  right decision  ''   by  Mike Brown , who discovered  और  other new dwarf planets , but has been  अस्वीकृत   by  Alan  stern   ,  who had coined the term  बौना   ग्रह  in 1990 .
the  IAU currently recognizes  पाँच  dwarf planets  in   the  Solar System : , Pluto  ,   ,  , and .
However , only two of these  लाशें  , Ceres and Pluto  ,  have been  observed  in enough detail to demonstrate  कि  they  अनुरूप  the  परिभाषा   .
Eris has been accepted as a dwarf planet because it  is  more massive than  प्लूटो  .
The IAU subsequently decided that unnamed trans-Neptunian  वस्तुएँ  with an absolute  परिमाण  brighter than  +1  (  और  hence a diameter  of  ≥838 km assuming a geometric  ऐल्बीडो   of   ≤1  ) are  to  be named under  the   assumption  that they are  बौना   ग्रह  .
The only two such objects known  at  the time  ,  Makemake and Haumea , went  through  this naming procedure and were declared to be dwarf  ग्रह   .
It  is  suspected that another  सौ  or so known objects in the  सौर   प्रणाली   हैं  dwarf planets .
Estimates are that  up   to  200 dwarf planets may be  मिला  when the  संपूर्ण   प्रदेश  known as  the  Kuiper belt is explored  ,   और  that  the  number may exceed 10,000 when objects scattered  बाहर  the Kuiper belt are  माना   .
Individual  खगोलशास्त्रियों  recognize  अनेक   of  these  ,  and in August 2011  माइक   भूरा   प्रकाशित  a list of  390  candidate objects  ,   ranging  from `` nearly certain  ''   to  `` possible '' dwarf planets  .  '
Brown  identifies  nine  ज्ञात  objects  –  the five accepted by the  iau   प्लस  , ,  ,  and  –  as  ``   वस्तुतः   निश्चित   ''   ,  with another two  दर्जन  highly likely  ,  and there  हैं   संभवतः  a  सौ   or   so  such  वस्तुएँ  in  कुल  .
the  classification  of  bodies in other planetary systems  साथ   the  characteristics  of  dwarf planets has  नहीं  been addressed .
A debit card ( also known as a  बैंको   कार्ड  or  जाँच   कार्ड   )   is  a plastic payment card that provides  the  cardholder electronic access  to  his  or  her  बैंको  account ( s  )   at  a financial institution .
Some  ताश  have a  भंडारित  value  साथ  which a payment  is  made  ,   जबकि  most  रिले   a  message to the cardholder 's bank to  withdraw   निधि  from a payee  's  designated bank account .
The card , where accepted , can be used  बजाय  of cash when making purchases .
In some cases , the primary account  क्रमांक  is assigned exclusively for  उपयोग   on  the Internet and  वहीँ   is  no physical  कार्ड  .
In many countries ,  the   उपयोग  of debit cards has  become  so widespread that their  आवाज़  has overtaken or  entirely   replaced  cheques and , in some instances  ,   नकदी  transactions .
the  development of debit cards  ,  unlike credit cards and  चार्ज  cards , has generally been country  विशिष्ट  resulting in a  क्रमांक   of   अलग   प्रणालियों   around  the world  ,  which  यहूद  often incompatible .
Since the  mid-2000s  ,  a  number of  पहलों   have  allowed  डेबिट  cards  जारी  in one country  to  be  प्रयुक्त  in other countries and allowed their use for internet and phone purchases  .
Unlike credit and  चार्ज  cards ,  भुगतान  using a  डेबिट  card are  तत्काल  transferred from the cardholder  's  designated bank  खाता   ,  instead of them paying the money back  at   a  later date .
डेबिट  cards usually  भी  allow for  तत्काल   वापसी  of cash , acting as the ATM  कार्ड   लिये  withdrawing  नकदी  .
Merchants may  भी  offer  cashback  facilities to customers , where a customer can  withdraw  cash along with their purchase  .
Francois Henri ``  जोकर   ''   lalanne   (  September 26  ,  1914 - January 23 , 2011 )  थी  an American  फ़िटनेस  , exercise , and nutritional  विशेषज्ञ   और  motivational  स्पीकर  who  is  sometimes called  ``  the  गॉडफादर  of fitness '' and the ``  पहला  fitness  सुपरहीरो   .  ''
He described  खुद  as  होने  a ``  sugarholic  ''  और  a `` junk food junkie '' until  he   थी  15 .
He  भी  had  behavioral  problems  ,   लकिन  `` turned his  जीवन   around  '' after  सुनना  to a public  लेक्चर   by  Paul  ब्रैग   ,  a  well-known   पोषण  speaker .
During  उसके  career , he  आए   to  believe that  the  country  's  overall  स्वास्थ्य  depended  on   the   स्वास्थ्य  of  इसके  population  ,  writing that  ``  physical culture and nutrition — is  the  salvation of America . ''
Decades before health and  फ़िटनेस   began  being  प्रचारित  by celebrities like  जेन  Fonda  और  Richard Simmons  ,   lalanne  was already widely recognized for publicly preaching the health benefits of regular exercise and a  शुभ  diet .
He published numerous books on fitness and hosted a fitness television show  between   1953  and 1985 .
as  early  as  1936 , at age 21 ,  he  opened one of the  स्वदेश  's  पहला   फ़िटनेस   gyms   in  Oakland  ,  California , which became a  प्रोटोटाइप  for dozens of  समान   gyms   using   उसके   नाम  .
One  of  his 1950s television  कसरत  programs was  aimed  toward women  ,   जिसको   he  also encouraged to join his health  क्लब  .
He invented a number  of  exercise  मशीने  , including leg-extension and  चरखी   डिवाइस  .
Besides producing his  अपना  series of videos ,  he  coached  the  elderly  और  disabled not to  forgo  exercise , believing it  होता  enable them  to  enhance their strength .
LaLanne  भी  gained recognition for  उसके  success as a  bodybuilder   ,  as well as  लिये  his prodigious feats of strength .
अर्नाल्ड  Schwarzenegger once stated  ,  ``  कि  Jack  lalanne  's an  एनिमल   !  , ''  बाद   lalanne  , at 54 , beat a 21-year-old Schwarzenegger `` badly '' in an informal contest .
on  the occasion of LaLanne 's death  ,  Schwarzenegger credited  lalanne   लिये   होने  `` an  apostle  for fitness '' by inspiring ``  अरबों   सब  over  the   संसार  to live healthier lives  ,  '' and  ,  as  राज्यपाल  of California  ,  had  पहले   लगाई  him on  उसके  Governor  's  Council on Physical Fitness .
Steve  रीव्स   credited  LaLanne  as  his inspiration  to   निर्माण   उसके  muscular physique while keeping a  पतला  waist  .
He was inducted to the  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  Hall of Fame and has  a  star  on  the Hollywood  चलना  of Fame .
Air forces of most of the  देशों  use system  समान  to Armies  .
However , the RAF and the air forces  of  many Commonwealth  देशों  , or those  formerly  under  a   अंग्रेजों  influence  ,   उपयोग  a different set of ranks loosely based  on  naval equivalents ;  लेफ्टिनेंट  , Commander , Captain  और  Commodore are  prefixed  for air force use  साथ  Flight ,  wing  , Group and Air ,  क्रमशः   (  the  पहला  three  होने   the   इकाई  that  वे  used to  कमांड   )  .
Penélope Cruz Sánchez ( ; born  अप्रैल  28  ,  1974 )  is  a Spanish actress  .
Signed  by  an  एजेंट  at  आयु  15  ,  she made  उसके   एक्टिंग  debut  at  16 on  टेलीविज़न  and her feature film debut the following year in  jamón   ,   jamón  ( 1992 ) , to critical acclaim .
Her subsequent roles in the 1990s and 2000s included Open  अपना  Eyes  (   1997  ) ,  the  Hi-Lo Country ( 1999 ) , The Girl  of   अपना  Dreams (  2000  ) and  स्त्री  on Top  (  2000 )  .
क्रूज़  achieved recognition  लिये   उसके  lead roles in  the  2001 films Vanilla Sky and Blow  .
She has  चूंकि  built  a  successful career ,  appearing  in films from  a   चौड़ी   दायरा   of  genres , including the comedy Waking Up in Reno ( 2002 )  ,  the  थ्रिलर  Gothika ( 2003  )   ,  the Christmas  फिल्म   नोएल   (  2004  )   ,   और  the action adventure  सहारा   (   2005  )  .
She  रै   प्राप्त  critical acclaim for her  भूमिकाएँ  in Volver  (   2006  ) and Nine ( 2009 ) receiving Golden Globe and  अकादमी   पुरस्कार  nominations  लिये  each .
She won the  अकादमी  Award  लिये  Best Supporting Actress in 2008 for  विक्की  Cristina Barcelona .
She  थी  the first Spanish actress in  इतिहास  to  प्राप्त   an   अकादमी  Award and the first Spanish  अभिनेत्री   to  receive  a   स्टार   at   the  Hollywood  चलना  of Fame .
Cruz has  modeled   लिये  companies  ऐसे  as  आम   ,  Ralph  लॉरेन  and L'Oréal  .
Penélope and her  younger   सिस्टर  Mónica Cruz have designed items  लिये  Mango  .
She has donated both  उसके  time and money to charities .
Cruz has volunteered in  युगांडा   और   इण्डिया  , where she spent  एक  week working for Mother  टेरेसा  ; she  दान  her  सैलरी  from ' to help  निधि  the  लेट  nun 's mission  .
A wax sculpture of Cruz  होगा   be  placed  in  a  प्रीमियर   स्पॉट   in  the Grevin Wax Museum in Paris  .
File Explorer  ,  previously known as Windows Explorer ,  is  a file manager application and  भी  a navigation tool  कि  is included with releases of the Microsoft Windows  ऑपरेटिंग  system  इससे  Windows 95 onwards .
it   provides   a   आलेखीय  user interface for  accessing  the file systems  .
It is  भी  the component  of  the  ऑपरेटिंग   प्रणाली   कि  presents many user interface  वस्तुएं  on  the  monitor such as the taskbar and desktop .
Controlling the computer  is  possible without Windows Explorer running ( for example , the  संचिका  | Run  कमांड  in Task Manager on NT-derived versions of Windows will function without it , as  होगा   कमांड  typed  in  a  कमांड  prompt window ) .
स्तिथ  in the  c  : \Windows directory  ,  it is  sometimes  referred  to   as  the  खिड़कियाँ   शेल  ,  explorer.exe  , or simply “Explorer”  .
The Care Bears  हैं   वर्ण  created by American Greetings in 1981 for  उपयोग  on  ग्रीटिंग  cards .
The  असली  artwork for  the   ताश  was  चित्रित  by artist Elena Kucharik .
In 1983 , Kenner turned the Care  bears  into  plush   टेडी   bears  .
The Care Bears appeared  in   उनके  own TV specials called The Care Bears  in   the  Land Without  जज्बात   (  1983 ) and The  परवाह  Bears Battle the Freeze Machine (  1984  ) .
They also had their own television series  इससे  1985  to   1988  , in addition  to   तीन  feature films : The Care Bears  फिल्म   (   1985  ) , Care Bears Movie II :  a  New Generation ( 1986 )  ,  and The  परवाह  Bears  एडवेंचर   in  Wonderland ( 1987 )  .
प्रत्येक  Care  भालू  comes  in  a different color and has  a  specialized insignia on  इसके  belly that represents  इसके  duty and  व्यक्तित्व   .
This  तमगा  was known as  उनके  ``  tummy  symbol . ''
however   ,  the  फिल्म   परवाह  Bears  :  Oopsy Does It ! renamed them `` belly  बैज  '' .
Adding to the Care Bear family  हैं  the `` Care Bear Cousins  ''  , which  विशेषता  a  शेर  , rabbit  ,  penguin ,  raccoon  , and other such animals  निर्मित   in   the  same style  as  the teddy  bears   .
In 2002  ,   the  bears were reintroduced  साथ  new toys  .
Made by Play-Along  खिलौने   ,  the new toys offered features  ऐसे  as  illuminated   bellies  upon touch  ,  aerobic bears ,  और  glow-in-the-dark bears  .
As  भाग  of  इस   वापसी  , the Bears have  appeared  in  दो  computer-animated  फिल्मों  : Care Bears :  यात्रा  to Joke-a-lot  (   2004  ) and  the   परवाह   bears  ' Big Wish Movie ( 2005  )  .
In 2007  ,   the   मताधिकार  celebrated  इसके   25th  anniversary  ;   another  relaunch took place , as well  as   the  release of Care  bears   :  Oopsy Does It  !   .
In  mid-2011  , AG announced a  पुनरुद्धार  TV animated  श्रेणी  titled ``  परवाह  Bears  :   स्वागत  to Care-a-Lot  ``   .
The premiere of the series  utilizes   ``  30 years of  देखभाल  '' .
It premiered on The  हब  on June  2  ,  2012  .
As of  2013  , Care Bears  merchandise  is  स्टिल  being marketed .
During 2008  और  2009 , Canada 's Cookie  जार   समूह   और  France 's  moonscoop  Group attempted to acquire  the  franchise from AGC  ,  with  no  apparent  कामयाबी  .
Interstate 70  (  I-70 ) is an  अंतरराज्यीय  Highway in  the   संयुक्त  States that  रनों  from Interstate 15  निकट  Cove  फोर्ट   ,  Utah , to a Park and Ride near Baltimore  ,  Maryland .
it  was  the  first Interstate Highway project in the  संयुक्त  States .
i-70  approximately  traces   the  path  of  U.S. Route  40  ( and  भी   the  old National  सड़क  ) east of  the  Rocky Mountains  .
वेस्ट  of the Rockies , the  रूट  of I-70 was derived from multiple sources  .
I-70  is  the  पांचवां  longest Interstate Highway ,  बाद   i-90  , I-80  ,  I-40 , and I-10 .
the  construction of  i-70  in Colorado and Utah  is   माना  an engineering  आश्चर्य   as   the  route passes through the Eisenhower  टनल  ,  glenwood  Canyon ,  और  the  सैन   राफेल  Swell  .
The Eisenhower Tunnel  is  the highest point  साथ  the  अंतरराज्यीय  Highway system with an elevation of .
The  भाग  of the  अंतरराज्यीय  in  मिसौरी   और  Kansas have laid  अर्जी  to be  the  first  अंतरराज्यीय  in  the  United  राज्य  .
हालांकि  disputed , the Federal Highway  प्रशासन   रै  claimed the  खण्ड  of  i-70  through Glenwood Canyon ,  समाप्त   in  1992 , was the last  टुकड़ा   of   the  Interstate Highway system , as  originally   नियोजित  , to open  to  traffic .
Photo of  1999   कुल  eclipse
as  seen from the Earth , a  सौर  eclipse occurs when the  चंद्रमा  passes between the Sun and Earth  ,  and the Moon  fully   or   partially  blocks (  ``   occults  `` ) the Sun  .
इस  can happen only  at  new moon ,  जब  the  सूर्य  and the Moon are in conjunction as seen  इससे   धरती   in  an alignment referred to  as   syzygy   .
In a total eclipse , the  डिस्क  of the Sun is fully obscured  by  the Moon .
in  partial and  annular  eclipses only part  of   the  Sun is obscured .
if   the  Moon  यहूद  in a perfectly circular orbit , a little closer to the Earth , and in  the  same orbital  प्लेन   ,  there would be total solar eclipses every single  माह  .
However , the  चंद्रमा  's orbit is inclined (  tilted  )  at   अधिक  than  5   डिग्री   to  Earth 's  कक्षा  around the Sun ( see  ecliptic  )  so  its shadow  at  new moon usually misses Earth  .
Earth 's orbit is called  the   ecliptic   प्लेन   as   the  Moon 's orbit must cross this plane in  अनुक्रम   लिये  an eclipse ( both  सौर  as well  as  lunar  )  to  occur  .
In addition  ,  the Moon 's actual orbit is elliptical  ,  often taking  it  far  पर्याप्त   दूर   इससे   धरती  that  इसके  apparent size  is  not large enough to block the Sun totally .
The orbital planes  क्रॉस   प्रत्येक  year at a  लकीर  of nodes resulting  in   at  least two ,  और  up to  पाँच  ,  सौर   eclipses   occurring  each year  ;  no more  than   दो   of  which can be  कुल  eclipses .
However , total  सौर  eclipses are rare at  कोई  particular  स्थान  because totality  exists  only along a  सीमित  path on Earth 's surface traced by  the   चंद्रमा  's  छाया   or  umbra  .
An eclipse is a natural  घटना  .
nevertheless   ,   in   कुछ   प्राचीन  and modern cultures  ,   सौर  eclipses have been attributed  to  supernatural causes or regarded as bad omens  .
A total solar eclipse can  be  frightening to  लोगों   जो   हैं  unaware of  इसके  astronomical explanation , as the Sun seems  to  disappear during the day and the sky darkens in a  पदार्थ  of minutes .
Because it is  खतरनाक  to  dekh  directly at the Sun , observers should use special eye  सुरक्षा  or  अप्रत्यक्ष  viewing techniques when viewing a  आंशिक  eclipse ,  or   the  partial phases of  a  total eclipse  .
It is  सुरक्षित  to view the total  phase  of a total  सौर   ग्रहण  with the unaided eye and without  सुरक्षा   ,  however .
People referred  to   as   ग्रहण  chasers  or   umbraphiles   होगा  travel to remote  स्थितियाँ   to  observe or  गवाह  predicted central solar eclipses  .
a  political party (  इससे   ,  Genitive partis  ,  `` part '' , `` portion '' ) is a political  संगठन   कि  typically seeks to influence , or entirely control  ,  government policy  ,  usually by nominating candidates with  लकीर   राजनैतिक  views and  trying  to  सीट   उन्हें  in political office  .
Parties participate in  चुनावी   अभियान   और  educational  मंगवाने   or   विरोध  actions  .
Parties often  espouse  an ideology or vision , expressed in a party  कार्यक्रम  ,  bolstered  by a written platform with  विशिष्ट  goals , forming a  गठबन्धन   among  disparate interests .
the   आम   is  a fleshy  स्टोन  fruit belonging to  the  genus Mangifera , consisting of numerous tropical  fruiting  trees  in   the  flowering  संयंत्र   परिवार  Anacardiaceae .
The mango  is   देशी  to  दक्षिण  Asia , from  जहाँ   it   रै   महरूम  distributed worldwide to become one of the most cultivated fruits  in   the   ऊष्णकटिबन्ध   .
जबकि  other  mangifera  species ( e.g . horse mango , M. foetida ) are also grown on a  अधिक  localized  आधार  ,  mangifera  indica –  the  'common mango ' or  'इण्डियाn  mango ' – is the only mango tree  commonly   cultivated   in  many  तीव्र  and subtropical  regions  .
It  is  the national fruit of India ,  पाकिस्तानी  and Philippines .
in  several cultures , its fruit  और   पत्ते   हैं   ritually  used as floral decorations at weddings  ,   पब्लिक  celebrations and religious ceremonies .
गिल  Arnette Byrd , <  संदर्भ  name > http  :  //www.pro-football-reference.com/players/B/ByrdGi00.htm (  born   फ़रवरी  20 , 1961 in San  फ्रांसिस्को   ,  California ) is a former professional  अमरीकी  football player .
he   थी   a   दो  time  प्रो  Bowl cornerback  in   1991   और   1992  for the  सैन   डिएगो  Chargers after  graduating   इससे  San Jose  राज्य  University .
Byrd was inducted into the  chargers  Hall of Fame in 1998 .
He was an All-City running  वापस   और  defensive back at Lowell High  स्कूल  (  सैन  Francisco ) , helping to lead the Cardinals  to   the  city  चैंपियनशिप  in his senior  ऋतु  of 1978 .
World map showing the  tropic  of Cancer
the  Tropic of Cancer , also referred  to   as   the  Northern  tropic  ,  is  the circle of  अक्षांश  on the  धरती   कि   marks  the most northerly position  at  which the  सूर्य  may  appear  directly overhead at its zenith .
इस   इवेंट  occurs  एकबार   प्रति  year , at the time  of  the June  संक्रांति  , when  the   उत्तरी   गोलार्ध  is tilted toward the  सूर्य  to  इसके  maximum  extent   .
It  फिलहाल  ( Year 2013 ) lies at  23°   26′  15.143′′ north of the Equator .
इसके  Southern Hemisphere counterpart , marking  the   सबसे  southerly position at which the Sun may appear  सीधे  overhead ,  is  the  tropic  of  मकर  .
ये  tropics are  दो  of  the  five major degree  उपायों  or major  वृत्त  of latitude  कि   चिह्नित  maps of the Earth ,  besides   the   आर्कटिक   और  Antarctic Circles and the Equator  .
the   स्थितियाँ   of   ये   वृत्त  of latitude ( other  than  the  equator  ) are dictated by the tilt of the Earth 's axis of rotation relative  to   the   प्लेन  of  इसके  orbit .
dvd-video  is a consumer video  स्वरूप  used to  स्टोर  digital video on DVD discs ,  और  is  फिलहाल  the dominant consumer  वीडियो  format in  एशिया  , North America , Europe , and Australia .
Discs  using   the  DVD-Video specification require  a  DVD drive and an H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 decoder ( e.g. , a DVD player , or a  कंप्यूटर   dvd   ड्राइव  with a software DVD player )  .
वाणिज्यिक  DVD  फिल्मों   हैं  encoded  using  a  संयोजन  of H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2  संपीडित  video and audio of varying formats ( often multi-channel  स्वरुप  as  वर्णित  below )  .
Typically  ,   the  data rate for DVD movies ranges  इससे  3 Mbit/s to  9.5  Mbit/s ,  और  the  बिट  rate is usually  अनुकूली  .
It  थी  first available for retail around  1997  .
The DVD-Video specification was created by DVD Forum  और  can be  प्राप्त  from  dvd  Format/Logo Licensing Corporation for  a  fee of  $  5,000  .
The specification is not publicly  उपलब्धियाँ  , because every subscriber  जरूर  sign a non-disclosure agreement .
Certain information in the  dvd  Book is proprietary and confidential .
in  computing and  specifically  Internet  ,   a  leech  is   एक  who benefits  ,  usually deliberately  ,   इससे  others '  सूचना   or  effort but does not offer anything in  वापसी  , or makes only token offerings  in   an  attempt to avoid being called a  जोंक   .
In  अर्थशास्त्र   ,  this type of behavior  is  called  ``  free riding '' and is  संबद्ध  with  the  free rider problem .
Depending on  कॉन्टेक्स्ट   ,   leeching  does not  necessarily   refer  to illegal  उपयोग  of computer  संसाधन  ,  लकिन  often instead to  लालची  use  according  to  तहज़ीब  : to wit ,  using  too  much  of what is  freely  given  बगैर  contributing a reasonable  राशि  back  to   the  community that provides  it  .
the  name derives  इससे   the   जोंक   ,  an animal that  झंझट  blood and  तब  tries to leave unnoticed .
अन्य   शर्तें   हैं  used , such as  ``   freeloader  ''  ,  but leech  is   the  most common .
The full eagle logo  ,  used in various versions from 1970  to  1993 .
The United States Postal  सेवा  ( USPS  )  ,  भी  known  as  the  पोस्ट  Office and  u.S.   मेल  , is an independent  एजेंसी  of  the  United States federal government responsible for providing postal service in the United States .
It is  एक  of the few government agencies explicitly  प्राधिकृत  by the United States Constitution .
The USPS traces its  जड़ें  to 1775 during the Second Continental Congress  ,  where  बेंजामिन   फ्रैंकलिन  was appointed the first  postmaster  general .
The cabinet-level Post Office Department was created in 1792 from  फ्रैंकलिन   's  operation  और  transformed into its current form  in  1971  अंतर्गत   the  Postal  reorganization  Act .
The  usps  employs  over  574,000  मजदूर  and operates over 260,000 vehicles .
The  usps   is   the   ऑपरेटर  of  the  largest vehicle  बेड़े  in the world .
The USPS is legally obligated to serve all Americans ,  regardless  of geography , at uniform price and quality .
The  usps   रै  exclusive access to  अक्षर   बाक्स  marked `` U.S. Mail  ''   और  personal letterboxes in the United States , but still  competes   विरूद्ध  private package delivery services  ,   ऐसे  as  यूपीएस  and  fedex  .
The USPS has not directly received taxpayer-dollars since the  जल्दी   1980s   साथ  the minor exception of subsidies  लिये  costs associated with  the   निष्क्रिय  and overseas voters  .
Since  the  2006 all-time peak mail  आवाज़   ,   बाद  which  कॉंग्रेस  passed  the  Postal Accountability  और  Enhancement Act `` , ( which mandated $ 5.5  अरब   प्रति  year to be  सशुल्क   into  an account to pre-fund retiree health-care  ,  75  सालो   into  the future , a requirement unique among  संगठन  and businesses in the U.S. )  ,  revenue dropped sharply due to recession-influenced declining mail volume  ,   prompting  the postal  सेवा   to  look to  अन्य   स्त्रोत  of revenue  जबकि   कटिंग  costs  to  reduce its budget deficit  .
वॉशिंगटन  , D.C.  रै  been  the  capital of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  since  1800  .
आठ  other cities have served  as   the  meeting place for Congress and  हैं  therefore considered to  have   एकबार  been the capital of  the   संयुक्त  States .
In addition  ,   प्रत्येक  of  the  50 U.S. states  और  the five principal territories  of   the  United States maintains its  अपना  capital .
Princess cut diamond set  in  a  रिंग
The Princess  काटें   is  the second most popular cut shape for  ईंट  ,  अगला   to  a round brilliant .
The face-up  आकार  of  the  princess  काटें  is square  or  rectangular  और   the   प्रोफ़ाइल  or side-on  आकार   is  similar to that of an inverted pyramid  साथ  four beveled  पहलू   .
The princess cut is a  अपेक्षाकृत   नई  diamond cut , having  महरूम   निर्मित  in  the  1960s .
it  has gained in popularity in recent years as  a   अधिक  distinctive alternative to  the  more  लोकप्रिय   गोलाकार   शानदार  cut , in which the top of  डायमंड  , called  the   क्राउन  ,  is  cut  साथ  a round face-up shape  और  the bottom ,  पुकारा  the pavilion , is  तराशा   समान  to a  कोन  .
a  princess cut with  the  same width as  the   व्यास   of   a  round  शानदार  will  तौल   अधिक  as it  रै  four corners which would otherwise  have  been cut off and rounded to form a round brilliant .
The princess  काटें  is sometimes  referred  to  as  a square  परिवर्धित  brilliant  .
However , while displaying  the   वही  high degree of  brilliance  , its faceting style  is  unique and completely different  इससे   कि  of a round  शानदार  .
the  Princess cut had  इसके   origins   in  the early `` French '' cut  ,  having a step-modified `` Double-French '' or  ``   क्रॉस   ''  cut crown and a series of  अद्वितीय  , chevron-shaped facets  in  the pavilion which combine to give  a  distinct  cross-shaped   प्रतिबिंब  when the stone is  viewed  directly  through  the table .
effectively  , the Princess cut  combines  the high degree of  लाइट  return of a round  शानदार  cut  साथ  a distinctive square or  आयताकार  shape .
The square  राजकुमारी  cut diamond  is   प्रायः   थोड़ा  cheaper than round  शानदार  cut diamonds of the same carat weight  क्युकी   it  retains about 80 %  of  the rough diamond , as opposed  to  the round brilliant which retains  तभी   परिचय  50  %  of  the  rough .
The  क्षमता   to  retain more crystal  वज़न   makes  this shape popular amongst  डायमंड  cutters  .
Accredited Gem Appraisers (  आगा  )  और  American Gem Society Laboratory (  agsl   )   और  European Gem Laboratories-USA  (   egl-usa  ) are currently  the   तभी   लैब्स  that grade the Princess  काटें  for cut  .
There  is  no universal definition of  कया  measurements  मेक  an ideal princess cut diamond and  अनेक   डायमंड   निर्माताओं  market ideal diamonds with  differing  facet patterns and angles as `` ideal cut ''  .
in  contrast to the AGSL , AGA , and  egl-usa  the Gemological Institute  of  America ( GIA  )  has  stated  that there is not enough industry consensus  or  empirical data to specify  काटें  grading  मानकों  for  राजकुमारी  cut  ईंट   और  to do  so  is at the  रिस्क   of   उपभोक्ता  who  may  be deceived by diamonds accompanied  by  unqualified Ideal  or  Excellent cut grades .
The  नाम  ``  राजकुमारी  Cut '' was originally used in connection  साथ  another diamond  काटें  , otherwise known as the  ``   प्रोफ़ाइल  '' cut  ,  designed by Arpad  nagy   ,  a London  कटर  ,  in  1961 .
the   वही  name  थी  later  प्रयुक्त  and made popular  by  Ygal Perlman ,  betzalel   ambar   ,  and Israel Itzkowitz in Israel in 1979  .
A similar cut with only 49 facets ,  as  opposed  to  the original  58  facets  of   the  princess  काटें  ,  थी  later branded the ``  quadrillion  '' and initially distributed  by  Ambar Diamonds in Los  एंजिल्स  .
Three years of optical research yielded a square stone with faceting similar to that of a round brilliant  काटें  diamond  .
a  Comparison
The number of  chevrons  can affect the overall outlook  of   a   राजकुमारी  cut  डायमंड  .
This can usually be determined by  the  wire diagram that  is  plotted in diamond grading reports .
By  adding  more chevrons on the  मण्डप  side of the diamond  ,   the  individual facets of the diamond will now be broken down into smaller facets .
As  a  result  ,  it  can  give  a  princess cut  डायमंड  a `` crushed  बर्फ   ''   dekh  .
वाइस  versa  ,   जब   a  princess  काटें  diamond has  lesser  chevrons  ,  it tends to  दे  the diamond  a  chunky outlook due to broader facets  .
The domestic  श्वान  ( Canis  lupus  familiaris ) is  a  subspecies  of  the gray wolf ( Canis  lupus   )  , a member  of  the  कैनिडाए  family  of  the  mammalian  order Carnivora .
The term `` domestic dog '' is generally used  लिये  both  domesticated  and feral varieties .
The dog has been the  पहला   एनिमल  to  be  domesticated and has been  the  most widely  रखा   working  ,  शिकार  , and pet animal in  इंसान   इतिहास  .
The word `` dog '' may also mean  the  male  of  a canine species , as opposed to  the  word `` bitch  ''   लिये  the female of the species .
MtDNA  प्रमाण  shows an evolutionary split between the modern dog 's lineage and  the   आधुनिक  wolf 's  lineage  around 100,000  सालो  ago  लकिन  , , the oldest  चट्टान  specimens genetically linked  to  the modern dog  's  lineage  तिथि   to  approximately  33,000-36,000  years  पहले  .
Dogs ' value to early human hunter-gatherers led to them quickly becoming ubiquitous  आरपार  world cultures  .
Dogs  perform  many roles for people , such as hunting ,  herding  , pulling loads  ,  protection ,  assisting  police and military  ,   companionship  ,  और  ,  अधिक   recently   ,  aiding handicapped individuals  .
इस  impact  on   इंसान  society has given them the nickname `` Man 's Best Friend ''  in   the   पश्चिमी   संसार  .
In some cultures  ,  dogs  हैं  also a source  of  meat .
In 2001 , there were estimated to  be   400  million dogs in the world .
Most  breeds  of dogs are at most a few hundred years old , having been artificially  चयनित  for particular  morphologies  and  व्यवहार  by  लोगों  for specific  कार्यात्मक   भूमिकाएँ  .
through  this  चयनात्मक  breeding , the dog has  विकसित  into  सैंकड़ों   of  varied breeds , and  shows  more behavioral  और  morphological  विभिन्नता  than  कोई   अन्य   जमीन   स्तनधारी  .
For example  ,  height measured  to  the  withers  ranges from in the Chihuahua to about  in  the  आयरिश  Wolfhound  ;   रंग   varies   इससे   श्वेत  through  grays  ( usually called `` blue  ''  )  to  black  ,  and  भूरा  from light ( tan  )   to   अंधेरा  ( `` red  ''  or `` chocolate  ''   )  in a wide variation of  पैटर्न   ;  coats can be short or long , coarse-haired to wool-like  ,   सीधा  , curly , or smooth .
it  is  आम   लिये   सबसे  breeds to shed  इस   कोट   .
आरेख  of a  हस्तांतरण  electron microscope
A 1973 Siemens  इलेक्ट्रॉन  microscope ,  musée  des Arts et  métiers   ,  Paris
An electron microscope (  em  ) is a type  of  microscope that uses an electron  बीम  to illuminate a  नमूना   और   उपज   a  magnified image  .
An EM has  वृहद  resolving  शक्ति  than a light microscope and  can   खुलासा   the   ढांचा   of  smaller objects  क्युकी   electrons  have wavelengths about  100,000  times  shorter  than visible  लाइट  photons .
They can achieve better than 50 pm resolution and magnifications of up  to  about 10,000,000x whereas ordinary  ,  non-confocal  लाइट  microscopes are limited by diffraction to about 200  nm  resolution and  उपयोगी  magnifications below 2000x .
The electron microscope uses electrostatic and electromagnetic  lenses  to control the electron beam  और   फ़ोकस  it  to   रूप   an  image .
ये  electron optical  lenses  are analogous  to  the glass  lenses  of  a  light optical microscope  .
Electron microscopes  हैं  used to investigate the  ultrastructure   of  a wide range of biological  और  inorganic  नमूनों  including microorganisms , cells , large molecules , biopsy  नमूने  , metals , and  crystals  .
Industrially ,  the  electron microscope is often used for quality control and  विफलता  analysis  .
आधुनिक  electron microscopes produce electron micrographs , using specialized  डिजिटल  cameras or  फ़्रेम  grabbers  to  capture the image .
Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen is  a  chain of  fried   मुर्गा  fast food restaurants founded in 1972 in New  ऑरलियन्स   ,  Louisiana .
Often referred  to  as Popeyes and  sometimes  as Popeyes Chicken & Biscuits or Popeyes Chicken & Seafood , It was acquired  by  Sandy Springs , Georgia  -आधारd   afc  Enterprises ,  originally   अमेरिका  's Favorite  मुर्गा  Company  ,  in 1993 .
According to a company press release dated  जून   29  , 2007 ,  popeyes  is  the  second-largest  ``   quick-service  chicken  रेस्तरां   समूह  ,  measured  by  क्रमांक  of  इकाई  ''  ,  with more than  1,800   रेस्तरां  in more  than  40 states and the District of Columbia , and over 22 countries  विश्वव्यापी  including Turkey  ,   उत्तरी   साइप्रस  ,  बहरीन  , China , Hong  काँग  ,  इराकी  , Indonesia ,  जॉर्डन  ,  कुवैत   ,  United  अरब   अमीरात  , Japan ,  मलेशिया  ,  सऊदी  Arabia ,  दक्षिण   कोरियाई  , Singapore , Canada  ,  Jamaica , Guyana ,  सूरीनाम  ,  मैक्सिको  , Trinidad , Puerto Rico , Honduras , Vietnam , Panama , Peru , and Costa  रिका   .
परिचय   तीस  locations are  company-owned  , the rest franchised  .
The leg press  is  a weight  प्रशिक्षण   कसरत  in  जिससे  the individual pushes a weight or resistance  दूर  from them using their legs .
The term  लेग   दबायें  also  refers   to  the apparatus used to perform this  कसरत  .
the  leg  दबायें  can be  प्रयुक्त   to   evaluate   an  athlete 's overall lower  देह   शक्ति  ( from knee  संयुक्त  to hip ) .
Using the diagonal sled-type leg  दबायें   यंत्र  .
वहीँ  are two  प्रमुख  types of  लेग  press:
The diagonal or  लंबवत   'sled  ' type  लेग  press .
वज़न  disks ( plates  )  are attached directly to the sled ,  जिससे   is   आरोहित  on rails  .
The  उपयोक्ता   sits   नीचे  the sled and pushes it upward with their  फीट   .
ये  machines normally  शामिल  adjustable safety brackets that prevent  the  user  इससे  being trapped under  the  weight  .
the  'cable ' type  लेग  press , or  'seated  leg press  '  , commonly found on multigyms .
The  उपयोक्ता  sits upright and  pushes   आगे  with  उनके   फीट   onto  a  थाली   कि  is attached  to   the   वज़न   स्टेक  by means  of  a long steel cable .
Wendy Williams  शिकारी   (  born  वेन्डी   जोन  Williams  ;  July  18  , 1964 ) is an American  मीडिया  personality  ,   अभिनेत्री  and author .
She hosts a  syndicated  television talk show , The Wendy Williams Show .
Prior to television  ,  Williams was a  ``  shock jockette `` on  अनेक   रेडियो  shows .
Williams has gained notoriety  लिये   उसके  on-air spats with celebrities .
She was the  विषय  of  the  2006  vh1  reality TV series  पुकारा  The Wendy Williams Experience which broadcast  कार्यक्रम  surrounding  उसके   रेडियो  show .
वो  has written an  आत्मकथा   और   अनेक   अन्य  books  ,   और   रै  created  a  product  लकीर   पुकारा  Adorn by Wendy Williams .
पैट्रिक  Henry `` Treason '' speech before the House  of   burgesses  in an 1851 painting by Peter F.  rothermel
`` Give me  स्वतंत्रता  , or give me death  !  '' is a quotation attributed  to  Patrick Henry from a speech  he   बना  to the Virginia  सम्मेलन  .
On that  दिन  , at St. John  's  Church in Richmond  ,   वर्जिनिया   ,   और  is credited  साथ   having   swung  the balance in convincing the Virginia  हाउस   of  Burgesses to pass a  रेज़ोल्यूशन  delivering the Virginia troops to  the   क्रांतिकारी   युद्ध  .
Among the delegates to the convention were  भविष्य  US  राष्ट्रपतियों  Thomas Jefferson  और  George Washington  .
Newfoundland and  labrador   (  , locally )  is   the  easternmost province of Canada .
Situated in  the   देश  's  अटलांटिक  region ,  it  incorporates  the   द्वीप   of  Newfoundland and mainland Labrador to  the  northwest , with a combined  क्षेत्रफल   of  .
In 2011 , the  प्रांत  's population was 514,536 .
लगभग   92  percent of the  प्रांत   's  population lives on the  द्वीप  of Newfoundland  (  including  इसके  associated smaller islands  )  , of which more than half live  on  the  avalon  Peninsula .
The province is Canada 's most linguistically  homogenous  , with 97.6  %  of  निवासियों  reporting  अंग्रेज़ी  ( Newfoundland English  )  as  उनके  mother tongue in the 2006 census ; .
historically  , Newfoundland was also home to unique  किस्में   of   फ्रेंच  , and Irish  ,  as well as the  now-extinct  Beothuk language  .
In  labrador  , local  dialects  of Innu-aimun and Inuktitut are also spoken .
Newfoundland  और   labrador  's  पूंजी  and largest city  ,   st.  John 's ,  is  Canada  's  20th-largest Census Metropolitan Area , and is home to almost  40  percent of the province  's  population .
St. John 's is the seat  of   सरकारी  , home  to   the   हाउस  of Assembly of Newfoundland  और   labrador   और   the  highest court in the jurisdiction , the Newfoundland  और  Labrador Court of Appeal .
A former colony and dominion of the United  किंगडम  ,  न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड  and Labrador  became  the  दसवाँ  province to  डालें   the  Canadian  कनफेडरेशन  on March 31 , 1949 ,  as  Newfoundland  .
On December 6 , 2001 , an amendment was made to the  संविधान  of Canada to change  the  province  's  official  नाम  to Newfoundland and  labrador  .
In day-to-day conversation , however , Canadians generally still refer to the  प्रांत   itself  as Newfoundland and to the region  on   the  Canadian  मेनलैंड  as  labrador  .
Theodore `` T.R . ''
Roosevelt  ,  Jr. ( ; October  27  ,  1858—january  6 ,  1919  ) was the 26th President of  the  United States  (   1901–1909  )  .
he  is noted for his exuberant personality , range  of  interests and achievements , and his leadership of  the  Progressive Movement , as  खूब  as  उसके  ``  काउंटी  `` persona and robust masculinity  .
He  थी   a  leader  of  the Republican  पार्टी   और  founder of  the   पहला  incarnation of the  short-lived  Progressive (  ``  Bull  मूस  '' )  पार्टी   of  1912 .
पहले  becoming President , he  आयोजित  offices at  the   नगर  , state , and federal levels  .
रूज़वेल्ट  's achievements  as  a naturalist , explorer , hunter , author ,  और   सिपाही  are as much a part of  उसके  fame  as  any office he  आयोजित  as a politician .
Roosevelt was 42 years  बूढ़ा   जब  sworn  in  as President  of  the  संयुक्त   राज्य   in  1901 , making  उसे   the  youngest president  कभी  ; he beat out  the  youngest elected president , John F. Kennedy ,  by  only one year .
Roosevelt  थी  also the  पहला  of  तभी   तीन  sitting presidents to  have  won  the  Nobel Peace Prize .
The Teddy  भालू  is  नामित  after him  ,   despite   उसके  contempt for being called  ``  Teddy ''  .
born  into a wealthy family in New  यॉर्क  City , Roosevelt  थी  a sickly  चाइल्ड   जो   suffered  from asthma and stayed at  घर  studying natural history  .
to  overcome his physical weakness , he  embraced  a  ज़ोरदार  life .
home-schooled  ,  he   became  an eager student  of  nature .
He attended Harvard  विश्वविद्यालयों   ,  where he  पढ़ाई   जीवविज्ञान  ,  boxed  and developed  an   ब्याज  in naval affairs .
In  1881  ,  एक  year out  of   हार्वर्ड  , he was  निर्वाचित  to the New York State  सभा  , where  he  became a  नेता  of  the  reform faction of his  रिपब्लिकन  Party (  the   ``  GOP  ''  )  .
उसके  The Naval War  of  1812 (  1882  ) established  उसके  professional  प्रतिष्ठा  as  a  serious historian  ;  he wrote numerous books on hunting , the outdoors  ,  and current political issues ,  as   खूब   as  frontier history  .
In 1884  ,  his first wife and  उसके  mother died on  the  same day  .
He temporarily left  राजनीती  and went to the frontier , becoming  a   rancher  in  the   ``  Badlands '' in the  dakotas  .
Returning to New  यॉर्क  City  ,  he ran for mayor in 1886  ,   finishing   तीसरा  with  60,000  votes .
He  बाद  gained  कीर्ति  by taking  vigorous  charge  of  the city police .
At  the  national  स्तर  , he was a leader in civil  सेवा   सुधार   .
the   spanish–american  War broke out in 1898 while  रूज़वेल्ट  was , effectively ,  कार्यशील   the   विभाग   of  the Navy  .
He promptly  resigned  and formed the  अशिष्ट  Riders – a volunteer cavalry  रेजीमेंट  that  लड़ा   in  Cuba .
The war hero was elected governor in  1898  and in 1900  थी  nominated for vice president .
He successfully  सक्रिय   the   gop  base as a  अत्यधिक   दृश्य   प्रचारक   to   reelect  President William McKinley on  a  platform of  ऊँची  tariffs  ,  the  सुनहरा   मानक   ,   साम्राज्यवाद  , prosperity at home  और  victory abroad  .
In 1901  ,   अध्यक्ष  William McKinley was  assassinated  and Roosevelt  became  President .
He attempted  to   मूव  the  रिपब्लिकन  Party ( GOP ) toward Progressivism , including trust  busting  and  increased  regulation of  व्यवसायों  .
रूज़वेल्ट   became  the  पहला  person elected to a term in his own right in  1904  after having ascended  to  the  प्रेसिडेंसी  ( from  the   vice-presidency  ) upon  the  death of his predecessor , winning the  largest   प्रतिशत  of the popular vote  चूंकि  the uncontested election  of  1820 .
Roosevelt  coined  the  phrase  `` Square Deal  ``  to describe his domestic agenda  ,  emphasizing that the average citizen  होता  get  a  fair share  अंतर्गत  his policies .
As an outdoorsman and naturalist , he promoted the conservation  गति  .
On  the  world stage ,  रूज़वेल्ट   's  policies were characterized by his  स्लोगन   ,   ``  Speak softly and  carry  a  बिग  stick `` .
A cousin  is   a  relative with  जिसको   a   व्यक्ति  shares one or more common ancestor ( s )  (  other than a parent  ,  child/descendant  ,  sibling  ,   child/descendant  of a  सहोदर  , or  सहोदर   of  a parent/ancestor ) .
However in common  parlance   ,  `` cousin ''  सामान्यतः  specifically means  ``  first cousin '' .
प्रणालियों  of ``  डिग्री   ''  and ``  removals  '' are used in  the  English-speaking world  to  describe the exact relationship between  दो   cousins  ( in  the   व्यापक  sense  )   और  the ancestor they have  in  common .
विभिन्न  governmental  entities  have established  प्रणालियों   लिये  legal  उपयोग   कि  can more  precisely   बताएँ  kinships with  आम  ancestors existing any number  of   पीढियां   in  the  पास्ट  , though common usage often  eliminates  the  डिग्री  and removals and refers  to  people  साथ  common  ancestry  as simply `` distant cousins '' or  ``   रिश्तेदारों  '' .
वेबस्टर  is an American situation comedy that aired on ABC  इससे  September  16  , 1983 until May 8 ,  1987  ,  और  in first-run syndication from  सितंबर  21 , 1987 until March  10   ,  1989 .
The series was  निर्मित  by  stu   चांदी  .
the   दिखाएँ  stars Emmanuel  लुईस   in   the  title  भूमिका  as a  यंग   लड़के   जो  , after  खोने   उसके   अभिभावक  , is adopted by  उसके  NFL -pro  गॉडफादर   ,  portrayed  by  Alex  karras  , and his new socialite  बीवी  , played  by   सुसान   क्लार्क  .
The focus was largely  on   कैसा  this impulsively  शादीशुदा  couple had  to  adjust to their  नई  lives and sudden  parenthood  , but it was  the   अनुकूल  Webster himself  जो  drove  much   of  the plot .
the  series was produced by  जॉर्जियाई  Bay Ltd. , Emmanuel Lewis  entertainment  Enterprises , Inc. (  1986-1989   )  and  सर्वोपरि  Television  .
जैसे  NBC 's  पहले  hit  diff'rent  Strokes ,  वेबस्टर  featured a  यंग  African-American  लड़के  adopted by a  श्वेत  family .
Three types of cell division
Cell  प्रभाग   is   the  process by  जिससे  a parent  कोशिका   divides   into   दो   or  more daughter cells  .
कोशिका   प्रभाग   प्रायः   occurs  as part of a larger cell  साईकिल   .
In  eukaryotes  , there are  दो  distinct  प्रकार   of   कोशिका   प्रभाग   :  a vegetative division  ,   whereby  each daughter cell  is  genetically identical to the  जनक  cell  (  mitosis ) ,  और  a  reductive  cell division  ,   whereby   the  number of chromosomes in  the  daughter cells is  घटाया  by half , to produce haploid gametes (  meiosis  ) .
दोनो   of  these  कोशिका   प्रभाग  cycles are required in sexually reproducing organisms at some  पाइंट  in their life  साईकिल  ,  और  both are believed to be  उपस्थित  in the last eukaryotic common ancestor  prokaryotes  also undergo a vegetative cell division known as  शब्दकोष   परिवर्द्धन  , where  उनके  genetic  सामग्री  is segregated equally into  दो  daughter  कोशिकाएं  .
सब  cell divisions ,  regardless  of  सजीव  , are  preceded   by  a single round of  डीएनए   replication  .
लिये  simple unicellular organisms such as  the   amoeba   ,  one cell division  is  equivalent to reproduction – an entire new organism is  निर्मित  .
On  a  larger scale  ,  mitotic cell  प्रभाग  can create  progeny   इससे  multicellular  जीवों  , such as plants that grow from cuttings .
Cell  प्रभाग  also enables  sexually  reproducing organisms to  develop  from the one-celled zygote , which itself was produced  by   कोशिका   प्रभाग  from gametes .
And after growth ,  कोशिका  division allows for continual construction  और   मरम्मत  of  the   सजीव  .
a   इंसान  being  's  body experiences about  10,000  trillion  कोशिका  divisions in a lifetime .
Cell  प्रभाग  has been  modeled  by finite  subdivision   नियम  .
The primary concern of cell division is  the  maintenance of  the  original cell 's genome .
Before  प्रभाग  can occur  ,  the  genomic  information that  is  stored in chromosomes must be  replicated   ,   और  the duplicated genome must be separated cleanly between cells .
A great deal of cellular  अवसंरचना   is   शामिल  in keeping genomic information  सतत  between `` generations '' .

Howard Jones ( born John Howard Jones , 23 February 1955 , Southampton  ,  Hampshire , England )  is  a British musician  ,   सिंगर   और  songwriter  .
According  to   the  Guinness Book of British Hit  singles  &  एल्बम  , ``  जोन्स  is an accomplished singer-songwriter who  थी  a  नियमित  chart visitor in the  mid-1980s  with his brand of  synthpop   .
Jones , who was equally popular in the  u.S.  , appeared  at  Live  सहायता  `` .
allmusic  journalist ,  स्टीफन  Thomas Erlewine adds ,  ``  Jones was one  of  the defining figures of mid-1980s synthpop  .
His  म्यूज़िक  merged the technology intensive  ध्वनि  of New Wave  साथ   the  cheery  आशावाद  of hippies and  लेट  1960s pop  .
Jones racked  up   a  string of hits in the  मिड  and  लेट  1980s , before  he  retreated into being a cult figure  in  the  1990s   ''  .
The International Isle of Man TT (  पर्यटक  Trophy  )  Race is  a   मोटरसाइकिल   रेसिंग  event held on  the   आइल  of  man   और  was for  अनेक   सालो  the  सबसे  prestigious  मोटरसाइकिल   रेस  in  the  world .
the  event  थी  part of  the  FIM Motorcycle Grand  प्रिक्स   संसार  Championship during the period  1949–1976   पहले  being transferred to  the  United Kingdom after  सुरक्षा  concerns and run by the  fim  as  the  British Grand Prix for the  1977  season .
the  Isle  of   man  TT Races became  भाग  of the TT  सूत्र   1  Championship  इससे   1977  to  1990  to  बचाना  the event  's   रेसिंग   औकात   .
From  1989   the  racing  रै  been  विकसित   by  the Isle of Man Department of Tourism as the Isle of  man  TT Festival .
the   रेस  is run in a time-trial format on public  सड़कें   बंद  for racing  by  the provisions of an Act of Tynwald  (  the parliament of the Isle  of  Man  )   .
The first race was  आयोजित  on Tuesday 28 May 1907 and  थी  called the International Auto-Cycle Tourist Trophy  .
The event was  संगठित  by the Auto-Cycle Club over 10 laps  of  the St John  's   छोटी  Course of 15 miles 1,470 yards  लिये   road-legal   touring  motorcycles with exhaust  silencers  , saddles , pedals and mud-guards  .
The  विजेता  of  the  single-cylinder  क्लास   ,  and overall winner of  the   पहला  event  in  1907 ,  थी  Charlie Collier riding a Matchless motorcycle  in  a  समय   of  4  घंटों  , 8  मिनट्स  and 8 seconds at an average race speed  of  38.21  किमी   .
The  विजेता  of  the   twin-cylinder   क्लास   थी   rem  Fowler  सवारी   a   peugeot   एंजिन   नॉर्टन  in a time of 4 hours 21 minutes and  52   सेकेंड  at an  औसत   रेस  speed of  36.21   किमी  .
The trophy  प्रस्तुत  to Charlie Collier as the winner  of   the  1907 Isle of Man  tt  Race , was donated by the Marquis de  mouzilly   st.  Mars .
It featured  a  stylised version of  ओलम्पिक  God Hermes  by  Giovanni  da  Bologna as a silver  figurine  astride a  winged  wheel  .
the  trophy  थी   समान  in design to the  18  carat gold  montague  Trophy presented to John Napier  (  Arrol-Johnston )  as   the   inaugural  winner  of  the Isle of  man  Tourist Trophy  car  race  in   1905  now known as the  rac   पर्यटक  Trophy .
the   बिल्ले  de  mouzilly  St.  मंगल  Trophy is now presented annually to  the  winner  of   the  Isle of  man  Senior TT  motor-cycle  Race .
The 2007  आइल  of Man TT was  the  Centenary event which ran between 26 May and  8  June 2007 and  प्रदर्शित   a  special  re-enactment  of the 1907 Isle of Man TT Race held on the  गाँव  green next to Tynwald Hill  in  St John 's  on  Monday 28 May  2007   .
the  vintage parade of 100 classic motorcycles for the Centenary Re-enactment on  the   असली  St John 's Short Course was flagged away by  पूर्व  World  motor-cycle  Champion Geoff  ड्यूक  .
The first of the participants to be  flagged  away  थी  the recently restored twin-cylinder  peugeot-norton  ridden by  rem  Fowler during the  पहला  Isle  of  Man TT Race  in  1907 .
Also participating in the  2007  Re-enactment was TT race competitor Guy  मार्टिन  riding a  1938  Triumph  बाघ  100 500  cc  and  अन्य  former TT competitors including Alan  cathcart  , Sammy Miller , Nick Jefferies and Mick Grant also completed the  re-enactment  lap .

Unemployment ( or  joblessness  ) occurs when  लोगों  are without  कार्य   और   actively  seeking work .
The unemployment rate is a measure of the prevalence of unemployment  और  it is calculated  as  a percentage  by   dividing  the number of unemployed  individuals  by all individuals  फिलहाल  in the labor force .
During periods of recession  ,   an   अर्थव्यवस्था  usually experiences  a  relatively high unemployment rate .
According to  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Labour Organization report , more than  197  million people globally  हैं  out of  कार्य   or   6   %  of the world  's   workforce  were without  a  job in 2012  .
There  remains  considerable  सैद्धांतिक  debate  regarding  the  कल्याणकारी  ,  consequences   और  solutions  लिये   बेरोजगारी   .
Classical economics , New classical economics , and the Austrian  स्कूल  of  अर्थशास्त्र   argue   कि   मार्केट  mechanisms are reliable  अर्थात्   of   resolving  unemployment .
These theories argue  विरूद्ध  interventions imposed  on  the  मजदूर  market from the  बाहर   ,   ऐसे  as unionization , minimum  मजदूरी  laws , taxes ,  और  other regulations  कि  they claim discourage the hiring of workers .
Keynesian economics emphasizes  the   cyclical  nature of unemployment  और   अनुशंसा   सरकारी  interventions  in   the  economy that it claims will  reduce   बेरोजगारी   दौरान   recessions  .
This  सिद्धान्त  focuses on recurrent  झटके   कि  suddenly reduce aggregate demand for goods and services  और  thus reduce demand  लिये   मजदूर  .
keynesian  models recommend government  interventions  designed to  बढ़ाएँ  demand for  मजदूर  ;  ये  can include financial stimuli ,  सरेआम  funded job creation  ,   और  expansionist  मौद्रिक  policies .
In addition  to   ये   व्यापक  theories of  बेरोजगारी  ,  वहीँ  are  a   few  categorizations  of   बेरोजगारी   कि  are  प्रयुक्त   to  more precisely model  the   प्रभाव   of   बेरोजगारी   भीतर  the economic  प्रणाली  .
the   प्रमुख   प्रकार   of  unemployment include  संरचनात्मक   बेरोजगारी   जिससे  focuses  on   संरचनात्मक  problems in  the   अर्थव्यवस्था  and inefficiencies inherent in labour markets ,  सहित  a  बेमेल  between the supply and demand  of  laborers with necessary skill  सेट  .
Structural arguments emphasize  कल्याणकारी  and solutions  सम्बन्धित  to disruptive technologies and globalization .
Discussions of frictional  बेरोजगारी  focus on voluntary decisions to  कार्य  based  on  each individuals '  valuation   of   उनके   अपना   कार्य   और  how that compares to current wage rates plus the time  और  effort required to  ढूँढें  a job .
Causes and solutions for frictional unemployment often address  जॉब   प्रविष्टि  threshold and wage  दरों  .
Behavioral  अर्थशास्त्रियों   हाइलाइट  individual  biases  in  निर्णय  making  ,  and  प्रायः  involve problems  और   समाधान  concerning  स्टिकी   मजदूरी   और  efficiency wages .
Collectivism is any  philosophic   ,  political  ,  religious ,  आर्थिक  , or social outlook  कि  emphasizes the interdependence of  प्रत्येक   इंसान   होने  in  a  society  or  civilization .
Collectivism  is  a  मौलिक  cultural element that exists as the  रिवर्स  of  व्यक्तिगत  in human  प्रकृति  ( in the same  रास्ता   ऊँची  context culture exists  as  the reverse  of   कम  context  संस्कृति  ) .
Collectivist  orientations  stress the importance of cohesion within social groups  (  such as an  ``  in-group ''  ,   in  what  विशिष्ट   कॉन्टेक्स्ट  it is  पारिभाषित  ) and in some cases ,  the  priority  of  group  लक्ष्य  over individual  लक्ष्य  .
Collectivists often focus on community  ,   समाज  , nation  or  country .
It has been  प्रयुक्त   as  an  तत्व   in  many different and diverse types  of   सरकारी  and political ,  आर्थिक  and  शैक्षणिक  philosophies throughout history and  सबसे  human societies in  अभ्यास  contain elements of both individualism and  collectivism   .
Some  उदाहरण  of collectivist  संस्कृतियों  include India and Japan  .
Collectivism can be divided into horizontal collectivism and  लंबवत  collectivism .
आड़ा  collectivism stresses collective decision-making  among  equal individuals  ,   और  is thus usually  आधारित  on decentralization and  समतावाद  .
Vertical collectivism is based on hierarchical structures of  शक्ति  and  on   moral  and cultural conformity ,  और  is therefore  आधारित  on centralization  और  hierarchy  .
A cooperative enterprise  होता   be  an  उदाहरण  of horizontal  collectivism  , whereas a  सैन्य  hierarchy would  be  an example of vertical collectivism .
Acute disseminated encephalomyelitis ( ADEM )  is  an immune mediated disease of  the   दिमाग  .
It usually occurs following  a  viral infection but may appear following vaccination , bacterial or  parasitic  infection ,  or   भी   appear   अनायास   .
as  it involves autoimmune demyelination , it is similar  to  multiple sclerosis  ,  and  is  considered  भाग  of the  अनेक  sclerosis borderline diseases .
the  incidence rate  is  about  8  per  1,000,000  people  प्रति   साल  .
Although it occurs  in  all ages , most reported cases are in children and adolescents , with the average age  around   5   to  8 years  बूढ़ा  .
The  मृत्यु   रेट  may  be  as  ऊँची  as 5  %  ,  पूरा  recovery is seen in 50  to  75 % of  मामले   ,  while up to 70 to 90 % recover with some  नाबालिग  residual disability  .
The  औसत   समय   to  recover  is  one  to  six months  .
ADEM  produces   अनेक   जलन  lesions  in  the  दिमाग   और  spinal cord , particularly in the white matter  .
Usually these are found in the  subcortical  and central white matter and cortical gray-white junction of both cerebral hemispheres ,  cerebellum  , brainstem , and spinal cord ,  लकिन  periventricular white matter and gray matter of  the  cortex  ,   thalami  and basal ganglia may also be  शामिल  .
When the patient suffers more than one demyelinating  एपीसोड  , it is called  तूल  disseminated  encephalomyelitis   or   multiphasic   disseminated   encephalomyelitis   (  MDEM ) .
The stomach  is  a  muscular  , hollow  ,  dilated part of the digestion  प्रणाली  which functions as an important organ of  the  digestive tract in  कुछ   पशु   ,   सहित  vertebrates ,  echinoderms  ,  कीट   (   mid-gut  )  ,   और  molluscs .
it   is  involved  in  the second phase of digestion , following mastication (  चबाने  ) .
The stomach  is   स्तिथ   between  the esophagus and  the   छोटी  intestine .
It secretes protein-digesting enzymes called  protease  and strong  acids   to  aid  in  food digestion , ( sent to it via esophageal peristalsis ) through smooth  muscular   contortions  (  पुकारा   segmentation  ) before  sending  partially digested  खाना  ( chyme ) to the small intestines .
the  word stomach is derived from  the  Latin  stomachus  which is derived from  the   यूनानी  word stomachos ( στόμαχος  )  ,  ultimately  from stoma ( ) , ``  मुँह   ''   .
the  words gastro- and gastric  (  meaning related to  the  stomach  )  are both derived from the  यूनानी  word gaster  (  ) .
1940 Pontiac  खास  Series 25  woodie
A woodie  is  a  car   देह  style ,  विशेषकर  a  स्टेशन   वैगन  ,  जहाँ  the rear  bodywork   is   constructed   of   लकडी  framework with  infill  panels  of  wood  or  painted  मेटल  .
बाद  the demise of actual wood construction , manufacturers used simulated woodgrain  चादर  vinyl—sometimes augmented with three-dimensional , simulated framework—to recall wood  निर्माण  .
In 2008 , wood construction  थी  evoked abstractly on the Ford  फ्लेक्स  with a  श्रेणी  of  पक्ष   और  rear  आड़ा  grooves .
A pearl is a hard  ऑब्जेक्ट   उत्पादित  within the  नरम  tissue ( specifically the mantle  )   of  a living shelled  mollusc   .
बस  like the shell of a clam , a  पर्ल  is  बना  up of calcium carbonate in  मिनट  crystalline form  ,  which  रै  been deposited in  केंद्रिय  layers .
the  ideal pearl is perfectly round and smooth  ,  but  अनेक   अन्य   आकार   of  pearls ( baroque pearls )  occur  .
the  finest quality  प्राकृतिक  pearls have been highly valued as gemstones and objects  of  beauty for many  सदियां   ,   और  because  of  this , the word  पर्ल  has become  a  metaphor for something  बहुत  rare  ,  fine , admirable  ,  and  मूल्यवान   .
The most valuable  मोती   occur   अनायास  in the wild , but they are extremely rare .
These wild  मोती  are referred  to  as natural  मोती  .
संस्कारी   or  farmed pearls  इससे  pearl  oysters  and freshwater  mussels  make  up  the  बहुमत  of  those  that are currently  बेची  .
Imitation  मोती   हैं  also widely sold  in  inexpensive  आभूषण  ,  लकिन  the  विशेषता  of  उनके   iridescence  is usually very poor , and often  ,   कृत्रिम  pearls  हैं  easily distinguished  इससे   वास्तविक   मोती  .
मोती  have been  harvested  and  cultivated  primarily for use in jewelry  ,   लकिन  in  the   पास्ट   वे  were also stitched onto lavish clothing  .
Pearls  have  also been crushed and  प्रयुक्त   in  cosmetics , medicines , and in paint formulations .
Whether wild  or   संस्कारी   ,  gem quality  मोती   हैं  almost always nacreous  और   ,  as is the interior of the  शेल  that produces them  .
However , almost all species of  shelled  molluscs are  सक्षम   of  producing pearls ( formally  referred  to as `` calcareous  concretions  '' by  कुछ  sources ) of lesser shine or less spherical  आकार  .
Although these may also  be  legitimately  referred  to  as  `` pearls  ''  by gemological labs and also under U.S.  संघीय  Trade Commission rules  ,  and are formed in the same  रास्ता  , most of them have no  मान  ,  मगर  as curiosities .
Bing  (  known  previously   as  Live Search  ,  Windows  सजीव  Search ,  और   एमएसएन   ढूंढें   )  is a  वेब  search engine ( advertised  as  a ``  निर्णय  engine `` ) from Microsoft  .
bing  was unveiled by Microsoft CEO  स्टीव   बाल्मर  on May 28 ,  2009  at the All Things Digital conference  in  San Diego for release on  जून   1   .
notable  changes include  the  listing  of  search  सुझाव   जबकि  queries  हैं  entered  और  a list  of  related searches (  पुकारा   ``  Explore pane ''  )  based  on   semantic  technology from  powerset  which  microsoft  purchased  in  2008  .
On July 29  ,  2009  ,  Microsoft and Yahoo ! announced a  सौदे  in which Bing would  शक्ति  Yahoo  !  Search .
सब  Yahoo ! Search global customers and partners are expected to have  बना  the transition by  जल्दी  2012  .
In October 2011  ,  Bing announced it  थी  working on new back-end search infrastructure ,  साथ   the  goal  of  delivering faster and  थोड़ा  more relevant  ढूंढें   परिणाम  for users .
ज्ञात  as ``  बाघ  '' , the new index-serving technology has been incorporated into Bing globally  ,   चूंकि  August 2011 .
In May  2012   ,  Bing  घोषित  another redesign of  इसके  search engine that  शामिल  `` Sidebar '' ,  a  social  विशेषता   कि   खोज   उपयोक्ता  ' social  संजाल   लिये  information relevant to the search query .
