In American football ,  प्रत्येक  team has  ग्यारह  players on the field  at  one time  .
The specific role that a  खिलाड़ी   takes   on  the  फ़ील्ड   is  called their position .
अंतर्गत  the modern  नियम   of  American football ,  टीमों  are allowed unlimited subsititutions  ,  that is teams may change  कोई  number of players  बाद   कोई  play .
इस  has resulted in the development of  तीन  `` platoons  ''   of  players ,  the  offense ( the  टोली  with the ball ,  जो  is  trying  to score ) , the  रक्षा  (  the   टोली  trying to  prevent  the other team from  स्कोरिंग   ,  and to take  the   बॉल  from  उन्हें  ) , and the special  टीमों  ( who play in kicking situations )  .
Within those platoons  ,  various  विशिष्ट  positions exist depending on  कया  the player 's main  जॉब  is .
The Irish people  (  or  na  hÉireannaigh ; Ulster-Scots  :   airish  fowk )  हैं   an  ethnic group who  originate  in Ireland ,  an   द्वीप   in  northwestern Europe  .
Ireland has  महरूम  populated  लिये  around  9,000   सालो  ( according to archaeological studies ,  देखिए  Prehistoric Ireland )  .
the  Irish people  's   earliest  ancestors are  अंकित  in legends – they are  claimed  to  be  descended from  समूह   ऐसे  as the  nemedians  , Fomorians  ,  Fir Bolg , Tuatha  dé  Danann  और  the  milesians  .
Lebor  gabála  Érenn , a book of  आयरिश  mythology tells that Milesians were Scythian  वंशजों  .
The main groups that interacted with the Irish in the  मध्य  Ages include  the   picts   ,   स्कॉट्स   ,   और  the Vikings  .
Due to this contact , Icelanders are noted for  having   कुछ  Irish descent .
the   anglo-norman   आक्रमण   of  the High  मध्य  Ages ,  the  English plantations  और  the subsequent English rule of the  देश  introduced the  normans  and  फ्लेमिश  into Ireland .
Welsh , Picts , Bretons , and small parties of  gauls  and  भी  Anglo-Saxons are  ज्ञात  in  आयरलैंड  from  much  earlier  टाइम्स  .
वहीँ  have been many  notable  Irish people throughout history .
The  6th  century Irish  भिक्षु  and missionary  columbanus   is  regarded as one  of  the ``  fathers  of Europe '' , followed  by  Kilian of Würzburg and Vergilius of Salzburg  .
The scientist Robert Boyle is  माना  the `` father  of  chemistry  ``  .
Famous  आयरिश  explorers include Brendan the  नाविक  , Robert  mcclure   ,  Ernest Shackleton and Tom Crean .
By some  खाते  , the first European  चाइल्ड  born  in   उत्तर  America had  आयरिश  descent on  दोनो  sides  ;  and an Irishman was the first European to set  पैर  on American soil  in  Columbus ' expedition of 1492  .
There are  वंशजों  of Irish people  जीना  in  अनेक  western countries  ,  particularly  in  English-speaking  देशों   .
Historically  ,  emigration has been caused  by  politics  ,   अकाल   और  economic issues .
an  estimated  50  to 80  लाख   लोगों  are  वंशजों  of Irish  लोगों   ,  primarily in the United  किंगडम   ,  the  संयुक्त  States  ,  Australia , Canada and Iceland ; there  हैं   भी   छोटी  numbers  in  Argentina , Chile , Mexico  ,   जमैका  , Barbados  ,   दक्षिण   अफ़्रीकी  , New Zealand ,  फ़्रांस  , Germany and Brazil .
The largest number of  वंशजों   of  Irish people live  in   the  United States .
The number of people  जीना  in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  who are of  आयरिश  descent is higher  ,  as a percentage of  कुल  population  ,   than  that of  कोई   अन्य  country .
लगभग  forty percent of the settlement population of Iceland came from Ireland or Scotland .
The very  पहला  inhabitants of  आइसलैंड   यहूद  Irish .
The Hubble  स्पेस  Telescope  (  HST )  is  a space telescope  कि  was  carried  into orbit  by   a  Space Shuttle in 1990 and remains  in  operation .
a  aperture telescope in  कम   धरती   कक्षा  , Hubble  's   चार  main  यंत्र   observe  in the near  पराबैंगनी   ,  visible , and near infrared .
The telescope  is  named  बाद  the astronomer Edwin Hubble  .
हबल  's  कक्षा  outside the  distortion  of Earth 's atmosphere allows  it  to take extremely sharp images with almost no  पृष्ठभूमि   लाइट   .
हबल  's  गहन  Field  have  been some of the most  विस्तृत  visible-light images ever  ,  allowing  a  deep view  into  space and  समय   .
Many Hubble  observations  have led to breakthroughs in astrophysics  ,  such as accurately determining the rate of expansion of the universe .
Although not  the   पहला  space telescope ,  हबल  is one of  the  largest and most versatile , and is well known  as  both a  vital  research tool and  a  public relations boon for  खगोलशास्त्र   .
The HST was built  by  the United  राज्य  space agency NASA ,  साथ  contributions from  the   यूरोपीय  Space  एजेंसी  ,  और   is  operated by  the   स्पेस  Telescope Science  संस्थान   .
The HST is one of  नासा   's  Great  observatories   ,  along with the Compton Gamma  रे   वेधशाला   ,  the Chandra  x-ray  Observatory , and the Spitzer Space  दूरदर्शी   .
Space  telescopes   यहूद  proposed  as  early as  1923  .
Hubble  थी   वित्तपोषित   in  the 1970s  ,  with a proposed  लॉन्च  in  1983  ,  लकिन   the   प्रोजेक्ट  was beset by technical delays  ,  budget  समस्याएं  ,  और   the  Challenger disaster  .
जब   आखिरकार  launched in  1990  , scientists found that the main  दर्पण   था   महरूम  ground incorrectly , compromising the telescope 's capabilities .
The telescope was restored  to  its intended quality  by  a servicing mission in 1993  .
Hubble is  the   तभी  telescope designed to be  सर्विस  in space by astronauts .
Between 1993 and 2002 ,  चार  missions repaired , upgraded ,  और  replaced  प्रणालियों  on the  दूरदर्शी   ;  a fifth mission was canceled  on  safety grounds  following  the  कोलंबिया  disaster .
However  ,   बाद  spirited public discussion , NASA administrator Mike  griffin   स्वीकृत  one final servicing mission  ,   समाप्त  in  2009  by Space Shuttle  अटलांटिस  .
The telescope is now expected  to   फलन  until  at  least 2013 .
Its  वैज्ञानिक  successor ,  the   जेम्स   webb  Space Telescope  (  JWST )  ,  is to be launched in  2018   or  possibly later .
anti-inflammatory   refers   to  the property of a  पदार्थ  or treatment that reduces inflammation .
Anti-inflammatory drugs  मेक   up  about half of analgesics ,  remedying  pain  by  reducing inflammation as opposed to opioids  ,  which  affect   the  central  बेचैन   प्रणाली  .
The Tonight Show is a US late-night talk show that has  aired   on   एनबीसी  since 1954  .
It is the longest currently running  regularly  scheduled entertainment program  in   the  US  और   the  third longest-running show on NBC after Meet  the   दबायें  and  आज  .
The Tonight Show was hosted by  स्टीव   एलन   (  1954–1957  )  ,  जोकर   paar  ( 1957–1962 )  ,  Johnny Carson  (  1962–1992 ) , Jay  लीनो  (  1992–2009   ,  2010–present ) , and Conan O'Brien ( 2009–2010 ) .
अनेक  guest hosts also appeared , particularly during the Paar  और  Carson  eras  .
The longest-serving host to  तिथि  was  जॉनी   कार्सन  , who hosted The  tonight  Show Starring  जॉनी   कार्सन  for 30  सीज़न  from the  पतन  of  1962  through the  वसन्त  of 1992 .
The current  मेजबान  of the  दिखाएँ   is  Jay Leno  ,  who had previously hosted  the  show from 1992 to  2009   और  began his second  कार्यकाल  on March 1 , 2010 .
On April 3 , 2013 , NBC announced  jimmy  Fallon  होता  become the new host of  the  Tonight  दिखाएँ  .
The  tonight   दिखाएँ   साथ  Jimmy Fallon will  प्रीमियर   फ़रवरी  24 , 2014 ,  the   दिन   बाद  the closing ceremonies of the 2014 Winter Olympics .
SS Andrea Doria .
सुनाया  was an ocean liner for the  इतालवी  Line ( Società di  navigazione  Italia ) home ported  in   जेनोआ   ,  Italy , most famous  लिये  its sinking in  1956   ,  when 52 people died ( 51 from immediate impact  )  .
नामित  after the 16th-century Genoese admiral Andrea Doria ,  the  ship had a gross  पंजीकरण  tonnage  of  29,100  और  a capacity of about 1,200  यात्री  and 500 crew .
लिये   a  country attempting to rebuild its  अर्थव्यवस्था  and reputation after World  युद्ध  II ,  एंड्रिया  Doria  थी  an icon of Italian national pride .
Of all  इटली   's  ships at  the   समय   ,  Andrea Doria  थी  the largest  ,   तीव्रतम  and supposedly safest .
Launched  on  16 June  1951   ,  the ship undertook its maiden  voyage   on  14 January  1953  .
On 25 July 1956 ,  जबकि  the Andrea Doria was  approaching   the  coast of Nantucket , Massachusetts  ,  bound for New  यॉर्क  City  ,  the  eastbound  of the  स्वीडिश  American Line collided  साथ  it in  कया   became  one of history 's most  infamous  maritime  आपदाओं  .
Struck in  the  side  ,  the top-heavy Andrea Doria  तत्काल  started to list severely to starboard , which left half  of   इसके   lifeboats  unusable .
the  consequent shortage of  lifeboats   might  have resulted in significant loss of life ,  लकिन  the efficiency of the ship  's  technical design allowed  it  to stay afloat  लिये  over 11 hours after the ramming  .
The good  बर्ताव   of  the crew  ,   सुधार  in communications and  the   रैपिड  response of  अन्य  ships averted  a  disaster similar  in  scale  to  that of the  in   1912  .
1,660  यात्री   और  crew were rescued and survived , while  46  people died as a consequence of the collision  .
the   evacuated   लक्ज़री  liner  capsized  and  sank  the following morning  .
This accident  remains  the worst  मेरीटाइम   विपत्ति  to  occur  in  संयुक्त  States  waters  since  the  sinking  of   the  in 1915 .
the  incident and its aftermath were heavily  covered  by  the   न्यूज   मीडिया  .
While the  बचाव  efforts were  दोनो   कामयाब   और   commendable  ,  the  cause of the  टक्कर   साथ  the Stockholm and the loss  of   एंड्रिया   डोरिया  generated much interest in the media and many lawsuits .
Largely because of  an   out-of-court  settlement agreement  between  the two  शिपिंग  companies during hearings immediately after the disaster , no  determination   of  the  कारण   (  s  )  was ever formally published  .
Although  वृहद  blame appeared initially to  पतन   on  the Italian liner , more  हाल  discoveries have indicated  कि  a misreading  of  radar on the Swedish ship may  have   initiated  the collision course  ,  leading to  त्रुटियाँ  on  दोनो   जहाजों  .
Andrea Doria  थी  the  पिछला  major transatlantic passenger  पोत  to  डूबना   पहले   वायुयान  became the preferred method of  सफर  .
Dialysis tubing
डायलिसिस  tubing  is  a type of semi-  or  partially permeable  झिल्ली  tubing made from regenerated cellulose or  सेलोफेन  .
it  can  be  used  लिये   diffusion   साथ  solutes or osmosis if used with water only .
Osmosis  is  when water passes  through   a   semi-permeable  layer to reach equilibrium .
Diffusion  ,  on the other hand , allows  the  movement of molecules  इससे  high concentration  to  low concentration  .
It will only  allow  molecules to pass  through  a semi-permeable membrane or layer  if  the  अणु  is  छोटी  enough to  अनुरूप   through  the  झिल्ली  or a membrane  's   pore  .
इस  usually results with the effects of diffusion through a membrane only really affects  छोटी  molecules , and almost never larger  अणुओं   .
Dialysis tubing is used in clinical circumstances to ensure  a  filtered flow of molecules , preventing the flow  of   larger  solute molecules .
Small  अणुओं   can   be  `` washed  ''  out  of  a solution which is pumped through  the   tubing  into a solvent ,  प्रायः  water ,  जिससे  surrounds it and in which they can be flushed away  .
In  demonstrations  of  semi-permeable  membranes ,  a  solution  containing  several  प्रकार   of  molecules  ,  usually  ग्लूकोज  and starch , is  लगाई   into  a  semi-permeable  dialysis bag , such as  a  cellulose membrane  साथ  pores , and the bag is sealed  साथ   a  knot  or  elastic band  .
The sealed dialysis bag is placed in a container  of  a  अलग   समाधान  , or  जल   .
अणुओं   छोटी   पर्याप्त  to pass  through  the tubing (  जल  , salts , monosaccharides  ,   और   अन्य  small molecules )  tend  to move into or  आउट  of the dialysis bag in  the   दिशा   of  decreasing concentration  ,  therefore displaying  diffusion  .
Larger  अणुओं  ( such as proteins ,  or  polysaccharides )  कि   have  dimensions significantly greater  than   the  pore diameter are retained inside the  डायलिसिस  bag .
The water and smaller  solutes  in  a  hypotonic solution (  a  solution that has  a   lesser  solute concentration  than  the solution it is  संदर्भित   to  ) will  क्रॉस  a semi-permeable  झिल्ली   ,   जैसे   डायलिसिस   tubing  , into a hypertonic solution ( a  समाधान  that has a higher  solute  concentration  than   the   समाधान  it is  संदर्भित  to ) in an  attempt   to   पहुँचें  equilibrium  ,  where the  solute  concentration of  प्रत्येक  solution is in equilibrium .
पारा   प्रयोगशाला  thermometer
a  thermometer  (  from the  यूनानी  ,  thermos  , meaning ``  hot   ''   और   μἐτρον  ,  metron  ,  ``  measure '' ) is  a  device that measures temperature  or   तापमान  gradient using  a   किस्में  of different principles  .
A  थर्मामीटर   रै  two important elements : the temperature  सेंसर  ( e.g . the bulb  on  a mercury-in-glass thermometer  )  in  जिससे  some physical change occurs  साथ  temperature , plus  कुछ   अर्थात्  of  converting  this  शारीरिक  change into a numerical  मान  ( e.g  .   the  visible scale that is marked  on  a mercury-in-glass thermometer ) .
There are many types  और  many uses for thermometers ,  as  detailed below in sections  of  this  आलेख   .
हिम  White and the Seven Dwarfs is a 1937  अमरीकी   एनिमेटेड  musical  काल्पनिक  film produced by Walt Disney and released  by  RKO Radio Pictures .
Based  on  the  जर्मनी   परी   टेल  by the Brothers  grimm   ,  it is the first full-length  cel   एनिमेटेड  feature film and the  earliest  in the  वॉल्ट  Disney Animated  क्लासिक  series  .
The story  थी  adapted  by  storyboard artists Dorothy Ann  रिक्त  , Richard Creedon ,  मेरिल  De Maris ,  ओटो  Englander , Earl Hurd , Dick Rickard , Ted  सियर्स  and Webb Smith .
David Hand was the  supervising  director  ,   जबकि  William Cottrell  ,   विल्फ्रेड  Jackson  ,   लैरी   morey   ,  Perce Pearce  ,  and  बेन   sharpsteen  directed the  फिल्मी   's   व्यक्तिगत  sequences .
Snow  श्वेत   premiered  at  the   carthay  Circle Theatre on  दिसम्बर  21  ,  1937 , followed by a  देशभर  release  on  February 4 , 1938 ,  और   साथ   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  earnings of  $   8  million during its initial  रिलीज  briefly assumed  the   रिकार्ड  of highest grossing  ध्वनि  film at  the  time  .
The popularity of the film has led to it being  re-released  theatrically  अनेक  times , until its home video release in the  1990s  .
समायोजित   लिये   महंगाई   ,  it  is   एक  of  the  top  टेन  performers at  the  North  अमरीकी   बक्सा   दफ्तर  .
At  the   11th  Academy Awards , Walt  डिज़्नी  was awarded  an  honorary  ऑस्कर  , and the  फिल्मी  was nominated for  बेहतरीन  Musical  स्कोर   .
It was added to  the  United States National Film Registry in 1989  और  is ranked in the American  फिल्मी  Institute 's list of the 100 greatest American films , who  भी   नामित  the film as the greatest American animated film  of  all  समय  in 2008 .
Disney 's  लो  on the fairy tale has had  a  big cultural impact , resulting in  a  popular theme  पार्क   आकर्षण  , a video game , and a Broadway musical .
Childbirth , labour ,  डिलीवरी  , birth , partus , or parturition is  the   culmination   of   a  pregnancy  काल  with the expulsion of one or more  नवजात  infants  इससे  a  स्त्री   's  uterus .
The process  of  normal childbirth is categorized in three stages of labour  :  the  shortening  and dilation  of   the   ग्रीवा  , descent and  जनम  of  the  infant ,  और   जनम   of  the  placenta  .
In many cases and with increasing frequency , childbirth is achieved  through  induction of labor  or  caesarean section , which is the removal  of   the  neonate through  a  surgical incision in the  उदर   ,   बल्कि  than  through   vaginal   जनम   .
Childbirth by C-Sections increased 50 % in the  u.S.  from 1996 to 2006 ,  और  comprise  nearly  32 % of births  in  the U.S. and  कनाडा  .
With respect to induced  मजदूर  , more than 22 %  of  women undergo induction  of   श्रमिक  in the United  राज्य  .
Medical professional  नीति  makers find that induced births  और   elective  cesarean can be harmful to  the  fetus  और  neonate as well as harmful or without benefit to the  माँ  , and  have  established  सख्त  guidelines for non-medically  indicated  induced births and elective cesarean before 39 weeks .
Viva La Bam was an MTV & Viva  दिखाएँ  which  followed  Bam  margera  and  उसके  crew as they undertook  चुनौतियां  , performed stunts and traveled the  संसार   .
The show ran for  5  seasons  between   2003  and  2005  .
flushed  Away  is  a 2006 British/American  कंप्यूटर   एनिमेटेड  action /  एडवेंचर  comedy film directed  by  David Bowers and Sam Fell .
It  थी  made  in  the partnership  between   aardman  Animations  और   ड्रीमवर्क्स  Animation ,  और   is  Aardman 's first completely  computer-animated  feature as  opposed   to  the usual  stop-motion  .
The  फिल्मी  stars  the  voice talents of Hugh  जैकमैन  , Kate  विंसलेट   ,  Andy Serkis  ,   विधेयक  Nighy  ,  Ian McKellen , Shane  richie   और   जां   रेनो  .
The story was by  sam  Fell  ,   पीटर  Lord  ,  Dick Clement ,  और  Ian La Frenais  ,  and the  पटकथा  was  लिखा   by  Dick Clement ,  इयान  La Frenais , Christopher  लॉयड  , Joe Keenan  ,  and  विलियम   davies  .
the  film  थी  released in US on 3 November  2006  , and in UK on December 1  2006  ,  और  was  वितरित   by  Paramount Pictures , except  लिये   स्विट्ज़रलैंड  , Spain , and  the   नीदरलैंड्स   ,  which were handled  by   सार्वभौमिक   तस्वीरें  .
the  Atlanta Braves are a  पेशेवर  baseball team  आधारित  in Atlanta .
The Braves are  a  member of the Eastern Division of  प्रमुख   लीग   बेसबॉल  's National League .
the  Braves  have  played in Turner Field  चूंकि   1997  .
The ``  braves   ''  name ,  जिससे   थी   पहला   प्रयुक्त  in 1912 , originates from  a   पद  for a Native American  योद्धा  .
They are nicknamed  ``  the  bravos  '' , and often referred to as  ``   अमेरिका  's  टोली  `` in  सन्दर्भ  to the team  's  games  होने   ब्रॉडकास्ट   on   the   nationally  available TBS from the 1970s until 2007  ,  gaining a  चौड़ी  fanbase .
From 1991 to 2005  the  Braves were one  of   the  most successful  franchises  in baseball  ,  winning division titles an unprecedented 14  लगातार   टाइम्स   in  that  काल  (  omitting  the strike-shortened 1994 season in which  वहीँ  were no  आधिकारिक  division  champions  )  .
The  braves  won  the   nl  West 1991–93 and the NL  ईस्ट  1995–2005 ,  और   लौटे  to the playoffs  as  the National League Wild  कार्ड  in  2010   .
The Braves advanced to the  संसार  Series five times in the  1990s  , winning the title in 1995 .
चूंकि  their debut in the  नेशनल   लीग   in   1876  ,  the  franchise  रै  won 16 divisional  शीर्षक   ,  17 National  लीग  pennants  ,  as well as  तीन  World Series championships—in 1914 as the Boston Braves  ,  in 1957  as   the  Milwaukee  braves  , and in 1995 in  अटलांटा  .
the  Braves  हैं  the  तभी  MLB franchise to  have  won the  संसार  Series in three  अलग  home cities .
the  club is one of the National  लीग   's   दो  remaining  चार्टर  franchises (  the   अन्य  being  the  Chicago Cubs ) and was founded  in  Boston , Massachusetts  ,  in  1871   as  the  बोस्टन   रेड   stockings   (   नहीं  to be confused with the American League 's Boston Red Sox ) .
They are considered `` the oldest  लगातार   playing  team in major  उत्तर  American sports  .  ''
वहीँ  is  an   तर्क  as  to  who  is  actually older because although the  शावक  are  a  full season  ``  older  ''  (  formed  as the Chicago  श्वेत   stockings  in 1870 )  शिकागो  lost  दो   सीज़न  to the  ग्रेट  Chicago Fire , thus the Braves have played more  लगातार  seasons .
After various name  परिवर्तन   (  such  as  the  बोस्टन   beaneaters  ) , the team operated as  the   बोस्टन  Braves for most of the first half of the 20th century .
In 1953  ,  the team moved to  मिल्वौकी  , Wisconsin and became  the  Milwaukee Braves  ,  followed  by  the move  to   अटलांटा  in 1966 .
The team 's  कार्यकाल  in Atlanta is famous  लिये   हांक   आरोन  breaking  बेब  Ruth 's career  घर  run  रिकार्ड  in 1974 , though  the  majority of Aaron 's home  रनों   यहूद  hit while the  टोली  was in Milwaukee  .
His record stood  जबतक  2007 ,  जब  San  फ्रांसिस्को   बाएँ  fielder  बैरी  Bonds  broke  the record .
The leaves of a Beech tree
3d  rendering of a μCT scan of a leaf  टुकड़ा  , resolution circa  40  μm/  voxel  .
a  leaf is an organ  of  a  vascular   संयंत्र  , as defined in botanical terms  ,  and  in  particular in plant  morphology  .
Foliage  is  a mass  संज्ञा  that refers  to  leaves as a feature  of   पौधे   .
Typically a leaf is  a  thin , flattened organ  borne  above  मैदान   और  specialized for  photosynthesis  , but many  प्रकार  of leaves are  adapted   in  ways almost unrecognisable in  those  terms : some are  नहीं  flat  (  for example many  रसीले  leaves  और  conifers ) , some  हैं  not  ऊपर  ground  (  such as bulb scales ) , and  कुछ  are  बगैर  major photosynthetic  फलन  (  consider   लिये  example  cataphylls  ,  कांटे  ,  और   cotyledons   )   .
Conversely , many structures of non-vascular  पौधे  , or  भी   of   कुछ  lichens , which are  नहीं  plants at all (  in   the  sense of being members of the kingdom Plantae  )   ,  do look and function much like  पत्ते  .
Furthermore , several structures  मिला  in vascular plants  dekh  like leaves but are not  दरअसल   पत्ते  ; they differ from leaves in  उनके  structures and  origins  .
Examples  शामिल   phyllodes   ,  cladodes ,  और   phylloclades  .
Title  कार्ड  for the  1937  Our  गिरोह  comedy Rushin '  बैले   .
Our  गिरोह  ( also known  as  The  छोटी   दुष्टों   or  Hal Roach 's Rascals  )  are a series of American comedy short  films  about a group  of  poor neighborhood children and their adventures .
Created by comedy  निर्माता  Hal  रोच  , the  श्रेणी  is  विख्यात  for showing children  behaving  in a  अपेक्षाकृत  natural way  ,   as   रोच   और  original  निदेशक   रॉबर्ट  F. McGowan worked to film the unaffected , raw nuances  apparent  in regular  children   बल्कि  than have them imitate adult acting styles .
In addition ,  हमारी  Gang notably put boys  ,   लड़कियों  ,  whites   और  blacks together in a  समूह  as equals  ,  something that ``  broke  new ground , '' according  to   फिल्मी   इतिहासकार   लियोनार्ड  Maltin  .
ऐसे  a thing had  never  been  किया  before in  सिनेमा  but  रै  since been repeated after  the  success  of  Our Gang  .
the  first production at the Roach  स्टुडियो  in  1922  was a series of silent short subjects .
When Roach changed distributors from Pathé to Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer ( MGM  )  in  1927  , and  परिवर्तित  the series to sound in  1929  , the  श्रेणी  took off  भी   further   .
उत्पादन   जारी  at the Roach studio until  1938  , when the series was  बेची  to  mgm  ,  जो  then continued  producing  the comedies until 1944 .
The Our Gang  श्रेणी  includes a total  of  220 shorts  और  one feature film  ,  General Spanky , featuring over forty-one  चाइल्ड  actors .
as  MGM  retained  the rights to  the  Our  गिरोह  trademark following their purchase  of  the  उत्पादन  rights , the 80  roach-produced  ``  टॉकीज़  '' were  syndicated   लिये  television under the title The Little Rascals beginning in 1955 .
Both  रोच  's The Little  दुष्टों  package  (  now  स्वामित्व  by  सीबीएस   टेलीविज़न   वितरण  ) and MGM 's Our  गिरोह   पैकेज  ( now owned by  warner  Bros.  entertainment   )  have since remained in syndication , with  आवधिक   नई   प्रोडक्शन्स   आधारित  on the shorts surfacing  over  the years  ,  including  a  1994 Little Rascals feature film released  by  Universal  तस्वीरें  .
zacharias   janssen  ( also Zacharias Jansen or  sacharias   जानसन  )  (  b.1580-88 , d.pre-1632 to 1638 )  थी  a Dutch spectacle-maker from Middelburg  संबद्ध  with the  आविष्कार   of  the first optical telescope .
Janssen is  sometimes  also credited  लिये  inventing the first truly compound  सूक्ष्मदर्शी   .
However , the  उत्पत्ति  of the microscope  ,  just like the  उत्पत्ति  of the  दूरदर्शी  ,  is  a matter of debate .
Lake Tahoe ( ; Washo : dáʔaw )  is  a  विशाल   freshwater   झील  in the  सिएरा  Nevada of the United  राज्य   .
At a surface elevation  of  , it is located along the border between California and  नेवाडा  , west of Carson City .
Lake Tahoe is  the  largest alpine lake in North  अमेरिका   .
इसके  depth is , making it the United State 's second-deepest  (   the  deepest  is  Crater  झील  in  ऑरेगॉन   ,  being deeper , at  )  .
additionally   ,   झील  Tahoe is  सूचीबद्ध  as the 26th largest lake  by  volume  in   the  world  at   .
the  lake  थी  formed  परिचय  2  लाख  years  पहले  and  is  a part of the Lake  tahoe   जलाशय  with the modern  झील  being shaped during  the  ice ages .
it   is  known for  the   स्पष्टता  of its water and  the  panorama of  surrounding   kyu  on all sides  .
the  area surrounding the lake is  भी   referred  to as  झील  Tahoe , or simply  tahoe  .
Lake Tahoe is a major tourist attraction in  दोनो  Nevada  और   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
It is home to  a  number  of   स्की  resorts  ,   गर्मियाँ  outdoor  मनोरंजन  , and tourist attractions .
हिम  and  स्कीइंग  are a significant  भाग   of  the area 's economy and reputation  .
पहाड़  and lake scenery are attractions throughout  the   साल  .
The Nevada side also includes large casinos .
Highways provide  year-round  access from Reno , Carson City , and  sacramento   .

the  Twenty-seventh  amendment  ( Amendment XXVII ) prohibits any law that increases  or  decreases the  सैलरी  of  सदस्यों   of  the Congress  इससे  taking effect  जबतक  the  प्रारंभ   of  the next set of terms of  दफ्तर  for Representatives .
it  is  the  most  हाल   amendment  to the United States Constitution .
It  थी  submitted to  the  states for ratification in 1789 and was adopted in 1992 .
“first  they  आए  ...  ”  is a famous statement  और  provocative  कविता  attributed to pastor Martin  niemöller  (  1892–1984  ) about the  सुस्ती  of  जर्मनी   intellectuals  following the  nazis  '  वृद्धि  to power and the subsequent purging  of   उनके  chosen targets , group after group .
There is some disagreement  over  the exact wording of the  quotation  and  जब   it  was created ;  the  content  of  the quotation may  have  been presented differently  by  Niemöller on different occasions .

Four Thirds  लोगो
The Four  तिहाई   प्रणाली   is  a standard created  by  Olympus  और  Kodak for digital single-lens reflex  कैमरा  ( DSLR  )  design  और   development.  <  संदर्भ  name='DPReview.com 2001-02-13  '   >
the  system  provides  a  मानक  that ,  साथ  digital  कैमरे  and lenses available from multiple  निर्माताओं  , allows for  the  interchange  of  lenses and bodies  इससे  different  निर्माताओं  .
seems to cover the  मानक  .
Proponents describe it as  an  open  मानक  , but  कंपनियाँ  may only  उपयोग   it  under  a  non-disclosure agreement .
नापसंद  older SLR systems ,  चार  Thirds has  महरूम   designed  from the  मैदान  up to be  entirely   डिजिटल   .
Many lenses are extensively  computerized   ,  to the point that  ओलम्पस  offers  फर्मवेयर   अद्यतन   लिये   अनेक   of  them .
Lens design  रै  been tailored to the requirements  of  digital  सेंसर  , most notably  through  telecentric  डिजाइन  .
The size of the sensor is significantly  छोटी  than  लिये   सबसे  DSLRs  और  this  implies   कि  lenses , especially  telephoto  lenses  ,  can be smaller  .
लिये  example  ,  a Four Thirds lens with  a  300  mm  focal  लंबाई   होता  cover about  the  same angle  of   दृश्य  as a 600 mm focal  लंबाई  lens  लिये   the   35   mm   फिल्मी  standard ,  और  is correspondingly  अधिक  compact .
Thus ,  the  Four  तिहाई  System has crop  फ़ैक्टर  ( focal  लंबाई  multiplier  )  of about 2 ,  और  while this  enables  longer  फोकल   लंबाई   लिये  greater  आवर्धन   ,  it  करता  n't  सहायता  the manufacture of  चौड़ी  angle  lenses  .
The image sensor  स्वरूप  , generally intermediate  between  those of larger SLRs  और  smaller compact cameras , generally  देता  levels  of  cost ,  प्रदर्शन  and convenience intermediate between those two classes .
HVAC systems use ventilation air ducts installed  throughout   a   भवन  to supply conditioned  एयर   to  a room through  आउटलेट  vents , called diffusers  ;   और  ducts to remove air through  return-air  grilles .
HVAC (  हीटिंग  , ventilation ,  और  air conditioning ) is the technology of indoor and automotive environmental  सुकून  .
hvac  system design is a subdiscipline  of  mechanical  अभियान्त्रिकी  , based on  the  principles  of   ऊष्मागतिकी  , fluid  यांत्रिकी   ,   और  heat transfer .
Refrigeration  is  sometimes  added  to  the  field 's abbreviation as  hvac   &  R or HVACR  ,  or  ventilating   is  dropped as in  hacr  ( such as the designation  of  HACR-rated  सर्किट   ब्रेकर्स   )  .
HVAC  is  important  in   the   डिज़ाइन   of  medium to  विशाल   औद्योगिक  and office buildings  ऐसे  as  skyscrapers  and in marine environments such as aquariums , where safe and healthy building  शर्तें  are regulated with  आदर   to  temperature and humidity  ,  using fresh  एयर  from  बाहरी   .
Ventilation  on  the downdraught system ,  by  impulsion  ,  or the 'plenum ' principle , applied  to   schoolrooms   (  1899 )
हीटिंग  , ventilating ,  और  air conditioning is based on inventions and  discoveries   बना  by Nikolay  lvov  , Michael Faraday , Willis  वाहक  , Reuben Trane  ,  James Joule , William Rankine ,  sadi  Carnot , and many others .
the   आविष्कार  of the components  of   hvac  systems went hand-in-hand with  the  industrial revolution , and new methods of  modernization  , higher efficiency ,  और  system  कंट्रोल  are constantly introduced  by  companies  और  inventors worldwide .
the  three  सेंट्रल  functions of heating , ventilating  ,  and air-conditioning are interrelated , especially  साथ  the need to provide  थर्मल   सुकून  and acceptable indoor air quality within  उचित   संस्थापना  ,  आपरेशन  , and  मेंटेनेंस  costs  .
HVAC  प्रणालियों   can   provide  ventilation , reduce air infiltration , and maintain pressure relationships between spaces .
the  means  of  air  डिलीवरी  and  हटाना   इससे   स्पेसेस  is known  as  room  एयर  distribution  .
The starting point in carrying out  an  estimate both  लिये  cooling  और   हीटिंग   depends  on  the   exterior   जलवायु   और   आंतरिक  specified  शर्तें  .
However before taking  up  the heat load calculation , it  is  necessary to  ढूँढें   भैस  air  आवश्यकताएँ  for each area in detail , as pressurization  is  an important  विचार  .
In modern buildings the design , installation , and control systems of  ये   कृत्यों  are integrated  into  one or  अधिक   hvac  systems  .
For very small buildings ,  ठेकेदारों  normally capacity engineer and select HVAC systems and equipment .
For  larger  buildings , building services  designers  and engineers ,  ऐसे  as mechanical ,  architectural   ,   or   भवन  services  इंजीनियर्स   analyze  , design , and specify  the  HVAC systems ,  और   specialty   mechanical  contractors  fabricate  and commission  उन्हें   .
Building permits and  code-compliance  inspections of the  संस्थापना  are normally required  लिये  all sizes of buildings .
the   hvac  industry  is  a worldwide  एंटरप्राइज़  , with  भूमिकाएँ  including  आपरेशन   और  maintenance  ,  system design  और  construction ,  उपकरण  manufacturing  और  sales , and  in   शिक्षा  and research  .
the  HVAC industry was historically regulated by  the   निर्माताओं  of HVAC  उपकरण  , but  regulating   और  standards  संगठन   ऐसे   as  HARDI , ASHRAE , SMACNA , ACCA , Uniform Mechanical Code , International Mechanical  कोड   ,   और   amca  have been established to  support   the   उद्योग  and  प्रोत्साहित  high  मानकों  and achievement .
Royal Navy  कमांडर   जेम्स   बंध  , CMG , RNVR  ,  is a  fictional  character created by British journalist and  उपन्यासकार  Ian Fleming in 1953 .
He is  the   समर्थक   of  the James  बंध  series  of   novels  , films  ,  comics and video games .
Fleming wrote twelve  बंध   novels  and two short story  संग्रहण   पहले  his death , although the  पिछला   दो  books— The Man  साथ   the  Golden Gun and  octopussy  and  the  Living Daylights  —were  published posthumously  .
The  बंध  character is a Secret  सेवा  agent  ,  code number 007 ,  residing  in London but active  internationally  .
Bond was a  कम्पोजिट  character who was based on a number of  कमांडो   जिसको   फ्लेमिंग  knew during his service  in  the Naval Intelligence Division during World War II  ,  to whom Fleming added  उसके   अपना   स्टाइल  and a  क्रमांक   of   उसके  own tastes ; Bond 's name was  appropriated  from American ornithologist James Bond .
बंध  has a number  of  character traits  जिससे   चलाएं  throughout the  किताबे  , including an  enjoyment  of cars , a love  of   खाना  and drink  ,  and an average intake  of  sixty custom-made cigarettes a  दिन  .
Since Fleming 's  मौत  in 1964 , there  have  been  अन्य  authorised  लेखक  of Bond material ,  सहित  John  गार्डनर  , who wrote  चौदह  novels and two  novelizations   और  Raymond Benson ,  जो   लिखा  six novels  ,  three novelizations and three short stories .
There have also been three  लेखक  who  लिखा  one book each ,  किंग्सले  Amis  (  writing  as  Robert Markham )  ,  Sebastian Faulks and  jeffery  Deaver .
Additionally a series of novels based on Bond  's  youth—  यंग  Bond —was written by Charlie Higson .
As spin-offs  इससे   the   साहित्यिक  works ,  वहीँ  was  a  television  अनुकूलन  of  the  first  अनोखा   ,  Casino Royale , in which Bond was played as  an  American  एजेंट   .
A comic strip series  भी   भागा  in  the   रोज़  Express newspaper .
वहीँ  have also  महरूम  twenty-five  बंध  films ; seven  अभिनेताओं  have played Bond  in   ये  films .
``  प्रकृति  Boy  ''  is a song  by   ईडन  Ahbez , published in 1947 .
The song tells a fantasy of  a   ``  strange enchanted boy ...  जो  wandered  बहुत   दूर   ''  only to learn  कि  ``  the  greatest thing ... was just  to  love  और  be loved in return '' .
Nat  किंग  Cole  's  1948 recording of  the  song  थी  a  प्रमुख  hit  और  `` Nature Boy ''  रै   चूंकि  become  a  pop and jazz standard , with dozens  of  major artists interpreting the song .
Louisiana ( or  ;  , ; Louisiana  क्रियोल   :  Léta  de  la Lwizyàn ) is  a  state  स्तिथ  in the southern region of  the   संयुक्त  States  of  America .
Louisiana is  the   31st  most  extensive  and the 25th most populous  of  the 50 United States .
Its capital is Baton Rouge and largest city is New Orleans .
louisiana   is  the only state  in  the U.S.  साथ  political subdivisions termed parishes , which are  लोकल  government 's equivalent to counties .
The largest  मोहल्ला  by population is East Baton  रूज  Parish ,  और   the   largest   by   जमीन  area  is  Cameron Parish .
Much of the state  's  lands were formed from sediment washed down the Mississippi River , leaving enormous deltas and vast  क्षेत्रों   of  coastal marsh and swamp .
These  contain   a  rich southern biota ; typical examples  शामिल  birds  ऐसे   as  ibis  और  egrets .
वहीँ  are  भी  many  प्रजाति   of  tree frogs ,  और   मछली  such as sturgeon and paddlefish  .
in  more elevated areas , fire is a  प्राकृतिक   प्रक्रम  in  the  landscape  ,  and has produced  extensive   क्षेत्रों  of longleaf pine  वन  and  गीला   savannas  .
These support an  exceptional  large number of plant species ,  सहित  many species of orchids and carnivorous plants .
Some Louisiana urban environments have a multicultural  ,  multilingual  विरासत  , being so strongly influenced by an admixture of  18th-century   फ्रेंच  ,  स्पेनी   ,   देशी  American (  भारतीय  ) and African cultures that they are considered to be somewhat exceptional in the  u.s  .
पहले  the American purchase of the territory , the  वर्तमान   louisiana  State had been  दोनो  a Spanish  और  French  उपनिवेश  .
In  जोड   ,  the pattern  of  development included importing  numerous  African slaves in the  18th  century  ,  with  अनेक  from  the  same region of West Africa , thus concentrating their  संस्कृति  .
in   the  post-Civil War environment  ,  Anglo-Americans  increased   the   दबाव  for Anglicization , and in 1915 , English was made the only official language of the state  .
महिलाओं   's  rights are  the  rights and entitlements claimed  लिये  women and girls  of  many  समाजों  worldwide .
In some  स्थान  these rights are  institutionalized   or  supported by  विधि  ,  लोकल   कस्टम  ,  और  behaviour , whereas  in  others  वे   may  be  उपेक्षित   or  suppressed .
They differ from broader  धारणाएं   of  human rights  through  claims  of  an inherent historical  और   परंपरागत  bias against the exercise of rights by women and girls in favour of men and boys .
Issues commonly  संबद्ध   साथ  notions  of   महिलाओं   's  rights include  ,  though  हैं   नहीं   सीमित   to   ,  the right : to bodily integrity and autonomy ;  to  vote ( suffrage ) ; to hold public office ; to work ;  to  fair wages or equal  अदा  ; to  अपना  property ; to education ; to serve  in  the  सैन्य   or  be conscripted ;  to  enter into  विधिक   अनुबंध   ;   और  to have marital , parental  और   धार्मिक  rights  .
The laws  of  science or  वैज्ञानिक   कानून  are statements  कि   describe  , predict ,  और   शायद  explain why  ,   a   दायरा  of phenomena  व्यवहार   as   वे   appear  to in  प्रकृति  .
The  पद  `` law  ''  has diverse usage  in  many cases : approximate ,  सटीक   ,  broad or narrow theories  ,   in  all  प्राकृतिक   वैज्ञानिक  disciplines ( physics , chemistry , biology , geology  ,   खगोलशास्त्र  etc . ) .
An  analogous   पद   लिये  a  वैज्ञानिक  law  is   a   principle  .
Scientific laws:
summarize  a large collection of  तथ्य  determined by experiment into a single statement,
can  usually be formulated mathematically as one or several  कथन   or   समीकरण  , or at least  stated   in  a single  वाक्य  , so that it can be used to predict the outcome  of   an  experiment ,  दिए  the  आरंभिक  , boundary  ,  and other physical conditions of  the  processes which take place,
are strongly supported by  अनुभवजन्य  evidence - they are  वैज्ञानिक  knowledge  कि  experiments have repeatedly  सत्यापित  ( and never falsified ) .
Their accuracy does not change when  नई  theories  हैं  worked out , but rather the scope  of  application , since the equation  (   if   कोई  )  representing   the   विधि  does not  बदलें   .
As  साथ  other  वैज्ञानिक  knowledge , they do not  have  absolute certainty  जैसे  mathematical theorems or identities , and it  is  always  संभावित  for a  विधि  to be  विकल  by future  observations  .
are often quoted as a  आधारभूत  controlling  influence   बल्कि   than  a description of  observed  facts  .
I.e  .  `` the  कानून  of  गति  require that ''
Laws differ from hypotheses and postulates  ,   जिससे  are proposed  दौरान   the  scientific process before and  दौरान   validation  by  प्रयोग  and observation  .
ये  are  नहीं  laws since  वे  have  नहीं  been verified to the  वही  degree and may  नहीं  be sufficiently  सामान्य   ,  although  वे   may  lead to the formulation  of  laws  .
A law is a more  solidified  and formal statement , distilled  इससे  repeated experiment .
Although  the  concepts of a law  or  principle in nature is borderline  to   दर्शनशास्त्र   ,  and presents the depth  to  which  गणित  can  describe  nature  ,  scientific laws are  माना  from a  वैज्ञानिक  perspective and follow the  वैज्ञानिक   विधि  ; they  ``  serve their purpose '' rather  than  `` questioning  वास्तविकता  '' ( philosophical  )  or `` statements of  लॉजिकल  absolution '' ( mathematical ) .
लिये  example ,  whether  a law  ``  refers to reality ''  is  a  philosophical  issue , rather than scientific  .
Fundamentally , all scientific laws  follow  from physics  ,  laws which occur  in  other sciences ultimately follow from physical laws .
प्रायः  ,  इससे  mathematically fundamental viewpoints , universal constants  emerge  from scientific laws .
The  लॉन्च   of  the  प्लेस्टेशन   3   into  the Japanese  मार्केट   on  10  नवम्बर  2006 marked the second major seventh  पीढी  entertainment  प्रणाली  to be released  .
The  प्रणाली   थी  released seven days later on 17 November in the  संयुक्त   राज्य  .
Introduction  into  other  संसार   बाज़ार  was delayed  by  a  shortage  of  diodes   लिये   उपयोग  in the Blu-ray disc player ; the device  थी  launched  in   यूरोपीय  and  अन्य  world  बाज़ार  in  the  first  हाफ   of   2007  .
Lauren Fenmore Baldwin ( formerly Williams and  grainger   )  is a fictional  अक्षर  from  the   सीबीएस  soap operas  the  Young  और  the Restless and The Bold and the Beautiful  ,  portrayed  by  Tracey  E.   bregman  .
वो  made  उसके  debut during the episode airing on January  21  ,  1983  .
In 1992  ,   bregman  began making  विरल  appearances on The Bold and the Beautiful , later  resulting   in  the character migrating  वहीँ  fully in 1995 .
Following a  अतिथि   रूप  in  2000   ,  Bregman returned  to  The Young and  the  Restless on  अगस्त  24 , 2001  ,  remaining on recurring status .
In 2013 , it  थी  announced  कि  Bregman  था   महरूम  placed  on  contract .
Much of Lauren 's history  रै  revolved  around  her romances with Paul Williams ,  स्कॉट  Grainger  ,  Sr.  ,  and Michael  baldwin  among  अनेक   अन्य   causing   a  fierce rivalry  साथ  Traci Abbott  connolly  .
लॉरेन  is  भी  famous  लिये  her long ,  हिंसक  rivalry with Sheila  कार्टर  .
The  2010   एनबीए  Finals was the  नेशनल  Basketball Association ( NBA ) championship series for the 2009–10 season  .
the  best-of-seven playoff  थी  contested between  the  Los  एंजिल्स  Lakers , champions of  the  Western  सम्मेलन  and  defending  NBA  champions  , and the Boston Celtics  ,  champions of the  पूर्वी  Conference .
The Lakers  पराजित   the  Celtics  ,   चार   खेल  to three  ,  to win the franchise 's  16th  NBA championship .
the  64th  संस्करण  of  the  championship series  थी  played between  जून  3  और   जून   17  ,  थी  broadcast on  एबीसी   ,  and  थी   देखी   by  an average of 18.1 million people .
the  Celtics earned their berth into  the  playoffs  by   जीतना   the  Atlantic Division .
The  लेकर्स  won the  प्रशांत   प्रभाग  to earn their berth .
The Celtics reached  the   एनबीए  Finals by defeating  the   मियामी   ऊष्मा  in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference First  गोलाकार  , the  क्लीवलैंड  Cavaliers in  the  best-of-seven  पूर्वी  Conference Semifinals  ,  and  defending  Eastern  सम्मेलन  champion  ऑरलैंडो   जादू  in the best-of-seven  पूर्वी   सम्मेलन  Finals .
The Lakers reached the NBA Finals by defeating the  ओक्लाहोमा  City Thunder in  the  best-of-seven Western Conference First  गोलाकार   ,  the Utah Jazz in the best-of-seven Western  सम्मेलन  Semifinals  ,  and the Phoenix Suns in  the   best-of-seven  Western Conference  फाइनल  .
The NBA Finals were  अनुसूचित  in the Major League Baseball World Series 2–3–2 seven game format  ,   साथ   the   लेकर्स  possessing  home-court  advantage as a reward for finishing with better regular  ऋतु   रिकार्ड   than  the Celtics .
Repeated  baskets  from  स्टार्टर  Kobe Bryant , Pau Gasol , and Ron Artest brought the Lakers close to victory in Game 1  .
a  record  तोड़कर   प्रदर्शन   इससे  Ray Allen 's eight three-point  baskets  ensured the Celtics a Game  2  triumph  .
डेरेक  Fisher ’s 11 points in the  चौथी  quarter helped the Lakers win  खेल  3 .
the  Celtics won Game 4 ; it  किया   n't  hurt  कि   वे  netted an excellent performance in baskets  by   the  team’s reserves , while Paul  पियर्स  led  the  team to a Game 5 win with  27  points  on  57  %  shooting from the  मंजिल  .
the  Lakers avoided  विलोपन   by   जीतना   a  decisive Game 6 with 24 points contributed by their bench  .
Although they trailed the Celtics by 13 points early in  the   तीसरा  quarter  ,   the   लेकर्स  rallied  और   जीती   उनके  second  लगातार  championship by taking over  an  exciting  खेल   7  aided by late contributions on offense by Pau  gasol  and Artest and  rebounding  .
ब्रायंट  was named Most Valuable Player of the Finals for his  दूसरी  consecutive trophy .
This was the first  एनबीए  Finals  to  go  the  full seven games since and only the  चौथी  since  the  NBA Finals  लौटे  to a 2–3–2  स्वरूप  in  .
The  laker   मताधिकार  has 16 NBA Championships  (  Five in  मिनियापोलिस  ,  11  in Los Angeles ) trailing  the   सेल्टिक्स   '  seventeen championships .
The NBA  फाइनल  used  the  `` World Series ''  स्वरूप  in 1949 Minneapolis Lakers defeated  the   वॉशिंगटन  Capitols 4  खेल  to 2  ;  in 1953  मिनियापोलिस  defeated  the  New  यॉर्क  Knicks 4  खेल  to  1  ; in 1954 Minneapolis defeated the Syracuse Nationals 4 games to 3 ;  और  in 1955 Syracuse  नागरिकों   पराजित   the   फोर्ट  Wayne  पिस्टन्स  4 games to 3  .
the  NBA would return to the  2–2–1–1–1   नेशनल  Hockey League  सात  game series format until 1985 .
Black  pepper  ( Piper nigrum ) is a flowering vine in the  परिवार  Piperaceae , cultivated for its  फल   ,  which  is   प्रायः   सूखी   और   प्रयुक्त  as  a   मसाला  and seasoning .
The  फल  ,  ज्ञात   as  a peppercorn  जब  dried , is approximately in diameter , dark red  जब   fully  mature , and ,  जैसे   सब  drupes , contains a single seed .
Peppercorns , and the ground pepper derived from  उन्हें   ,   may  be described simply as  pepper   ,  or  अधिक  precisely  as  black pepper (  पकाया   और  dried unripe fruit  )  ,  ग्रीन  pepper (  सूखी  unripe  फल  )  और   श्वेत  pepper ( dried ripe seeds )  .
Black pepper is  देशी   to   दक्षिण  India  ,   और  is extensively cultivated  वहीँ  and  elsewhere   in  tropical  regions   .
Currently Vietnam is the world 's largest  निर्माता  and  निर्यातक  of pepper , producing  34   %  of  the   संसार  's Piper nigrum crop as of 2008 .
Dried ground pepper  रै  been used since antiquity for both  इसके  flavour  और  as a medicine .
Black pepper is  the  world 's most  traded   मसाला   .
It is one  of  the most common  मसाले   added   to  European  भोजन   और  its descendants .
the  spiciness of black  pepper  is  due  to the  रासायनिक  piperine ,  नहीं   to  be  उलझन  with the capsaicin that gives fleshy peppers theirs  .
it  is in the modern world  ,  often paired with  नमक  .
In cardiovascular physiology , ejection fraction (  ef  ) represents the  आयतनी   भिन्न  of blood  उत्तेजित  out of the  ventricle  ( heart ) with  प्रत्येक   दिल  beat  or  cardiac cycle  .
It can  be  applied  to   either  the right ventricle  जिससे   ejects   via  the pulmonary valve into the pulmonary circulation or  the  left ventricle which ejects via the  aortic   वाल्व   into   the  systemic circulation  .
Imaging of  the  physiology  of  the mammalian heart is the art that allows meaningful mathematical expression defining EF .
Noninvasive cardiac imaging  रै  become  a  worldwide utility  enabling  study of cardiac performance reproducibly and inexpensively .
सरलीकृत  , Ejection fraction  is  a mathematical product  अनुमत  by  हृदय  imaging .
As a  गणितीय   पद  , Ejection  भिन्न  is an extension of the work of Adolph Fick  in  cardiac output .
समर्पित   प्रौद्योगिकी  such as Echocardiography  ,  Computed Tomography ,  चुम्बकीय   अनुनाद  Imaging and  muga  scanning  have  definitively  अनुमत   clinically  relevant mathematics regarding Ischemia , Congenital  दिल   बीमारी  and  दिल   विफलता  .
the  prosecutor is  the  chief  विधिक   प्रतिनिधि  of the prosecution in countries with  either  the common law adversarial system ,  or  the  सिविल  law inquisitorial system .
The  अभियोजन  is the  विधिक  party responsible  लिये  presenting  the  case in a criminal trial against an  व्यक्तिगत  accused  of   तोड़कर  the law .
स्ट्रॉबेरी  shortcake  सबसे   commonly   अर्थात्   a  dessert in  the  shortcake family  of  cakes  .

abū  al-Qāsim Muḥammad  इब्न  ʿAbd Allāh ibn ʿAbd al-Muṭṭalib  इब्न  Hāshim ( ) ( circa|  570   –   circa|  8 June 632 )  ,   भी  transliterated as Muhammad  (   )  , was a religious , political , and military  नेता  from Mecca who unified  अरब  into  a  single religious polity under  islam  .
He is believed by Muslims  और  Bahá'ís to be  a  messenger and prophet of God .
मुहम्मद  is  लगभग   universally  considered by Muslims as the last  नबी   भेजा  by  परमेश्वर  for mankind .
Non-Muslims  लिहाज़  Muhammad  as  the  संस्थापक   of  Islam  .
Muslims consider him to be  the  restorer of an unaltered original monotheistic faith  of   आदम   ,  Noah , Abraham ,  मूसा  , Jesus  ,   और   अन्य  prophets  .
Born in about 570 CE in  the  Arabian city of Mecca , he was  अनाथ  at an  जल्दी  age and  brought   up  under  the  care  of  his  ताऊ   abu  Talib  .
He  बाद   worked   ज़्यादातर  as a merchant  ,  as  खूब  as a shepherd  ,   और  was first  शादीशुदा  by  आयु   25   .
Being in the  आदत  of  periodically   retreating  to a cave in the surrounding mountains for several nights of seclusion and prayer , he later reported that  it  was  वहीँ  , at age 40 , that he received his first  रहस्योद्घाटन   इससे  God .
Three  सालो  after this event Muhammad  प्रारंभ   उपदेश  these  खुलासे   सरेआम  ,  proclaiming  that `` God  is  One ``  ,   कि  complete ``  आत्मसमर्पण  '' to Him ( lit  .
islām  ) is the only way ( dīn ) acceptable to  परमेश्वर  , and  कि  he himself  थी  a  नबी  and  मेसेंजर  of God , in the same  रग  as other  इस्लामी   नबियों   .
Muhammad gained few followers  जल्दी   on   ,   और  was  मिले  with hostility from some Meccan tribes  ;  he and his followers were treated harshly .
To  एस्केप   persecution  , Muhammad  भेजा   कुछ  of his followers  to  Abyssinia before  he   और   उसके  followers in Mecca  migrated  to  मदीना  (  तब  known as  yathrib  ) in the year 622  .
This event ,  the   हिज्र  , marks the beginning  of  the Islamic calendar , which is also known  as  the Hijri Calendar .
in  Medina , Muhammad united the tribes  अंतर्गत  the  संविधान  of Medina .
After  आठ  years of fighting with the Meccan tribes  ,   उसके  followers  ,  who  by  then  था  grown to 10,000 , took control of  मक्का  in  the  largely peaceful  conquest  of  मक्का  .
He destroyed the pagan idols in  the  city and then sent his  अनुसरणकर्ता   आउट   to  destroy all of  the   बाकी  pagan temples  in  Eastern  अरब   .
In 632 , a few months after returning  to   मदीना   इससे   the  Farewell Pilgrimage  ,   मुहम्मद  fell ill and died .
By the time  of   उसके  death  ,  most of the Arabian Peninsula  था  converted to  islam  , and he had united Arabia into  a  single Muslim  धार्मिक  polity .
The  खुलासे  ( or Ayah , lit  .
`` Signs  [  of God ] ''  )  — which  मुहम्मद   reported   receiving   जबतक  his death  –  form the verses  of   the  Quran  ,  regarded  by   मुसलमान  as  the  `` Word of God '' and  around  which the religion is based .
Besides the Quran ,  मुहम्मद   's  life  (  sira ) and traditions (  सुन्नत  ) are also upheld by Muslims as  the  sources of sharia  विधि  .
वे   discuss  Muhammad  और   अन्य   नबियों  of  islam  with reverence , adding  the   phrase  peace  be  upon him  whenever  their  names   हैं  mentioned .
जबकि   conceptions  of  मुहम्मद  in medieval Christendom and  premodern  times  यहूद  largely negative ,  appraisals   in  modern history have been far less so .
the  Great Books  (  second edition )
Great Books of  the  Western  संसार   is  a series of books originally published in the  संयुक्त  States  in  1952  by   ब्रिटैनिका  Britannica  inc.  to present the  ग्रेट  Books  in  a single package  of  54 volumes  .
the  series is now in its second edition  और   contains  60  आयतन   .
The original  सम्पादक  of  the  series  chose   तीन   मापदण्ड  for  समावेश  : a book must be  प्रासंगिक  to  समकालीन  issues , and  नहीं  only  महत्वपूर्ण   in  its historical context ; it must reward rereading ; and it must  be  a part  of   ``  the great  वार्तालाप  about the great  विचार  ,  ''   प्रासंगिक  to at  तनिक   25  of the 102 great ideas identified by the editors .
Books were not  चुनी  on the  आधार  of ethnic or cultural inclusiveness  ,  historical influence , or  the  editors  '  agreement with the views  expressed  .
`` Cocaine '' is a  सोंग   लिखा  and recorded by JJ Cale in  1976  , but also  ज्ञात  as a cover version recorded by Eric Clapton .
Allmusic calls the  latter  `` among  [  Clapton 's  ]  most enduringly popular hits  ''  and notes that `` even for  an  artist like Clapton with a huge  देह  of  high-quality  work , 'Cocaine ' ranks among  उसके   बेहतरीन   .   ''
glyn  Johns , who had previously worked  साथ   the  Who , Led Zeppelin and  the  Rolling  पत्थरों  , produced the  क्लैप्टन  recording , which was  released  on Clapton 's  1977   एल्बम   slowhand  and as  a  single in 1980 .
The live version of `` Cocaine '' , from the  बस  One Night album recorded in Tokyo , charted  on  the  बिलबोर्ड  Hot 100 as the  b-side  of `` Tulsa Time `` , which  थी  a  no  . 30 hit in 1980. ``
Cocaine ''  थी  one  of  several  of  Cale 's songs recorded by Clapton , including ``  बाद  Midnight `` and ``  travelin   '   लाइट   ''  .
the  attack  on   पर्ल   हार्बर  (  पुकारा  Hawaii Operation or  आपरेशन  AI by the Japanese  इम्पीरियल   सामान्य   मुख्यालय  ( Operation Z  in   नियोजन  ) and  the  Battle of  पर्ल   हार्बर  )  थी   a  surprise military  स्ट्राइक   conducted  by  the   इम्पीरियल  Japanese Navy against  the  United States naval base  at  Pearl  हार्बर   ,  Hawaii , on the morning of  दिसम्बर   7  , 1941 (  दिसम्बर   8   in   जापानी  )  .
इससे  the standpoint  of  the  defenders  ,  the  attack commenced  at  7:48 a.m. Hawaiian  समय  .
The attack  थी  intended  as  a preventive  कार्रवाई  in order to keep the U.S. Pacific Fleet  इससे  interfering with military actions  the  Empire  of   जापानी   थी  planning in  southeast  Asia against  विदेशी  territories of the United Kingdom  ,  the  नीदरलैंड्स  , and the United States .
The base  थी  attacked by 353  जापानी  fighters , bombers and torpedo planes  in  two waves  ,   शुभारम्भ  from six aircraft carriers .
सब  eight U.S. Navy battleships were damaged , with four being sunk  .
दो  of  ये  were  बाद  raised , and with the remaining four repaired  ,  six battleships returned to service  बाद  in the war .
The Japanese  भी  sank or damaged  तीन  cruisers  ,   तीन  destroyers ,  an  anti-aircraft  प्रशिक्षण  ship , and one  minelayer   .
188  u.S.   वायुयान  were destroyed ;  2,402  Americans  यहूद  killed and 1,282 wounded .
महत्वपूर्ण  base installations  ऐसे  as the power station ,  डॉकयार्ड  , maintenance , and  ईंधन  and torpedo  भंडार  facilities ,  as  well as  the   पनडुब्बी   पियर  and headquarters  भवन  ( also home of the intelligence section  )  were not attacked  .
Japanese  नुकसान  were  लाइट  : 29 aircraft and  पाँच  midget submarines lost , and  65  servicemen killed  or  wounded .
One Japanese sailor was  captured   .
The  आक्रमण  came as  a  profound  शॉक  to the  अमरीकी  people and led directly  to  the  अमरीकी  entry  into  World War II in both  the  Pacific and European theaters .
the  following day (  दिसम्बर  8 ) , the United States declared war on  जापानी  .
Domestic support for non-interventionism , which had been strong , disappeared .
clandestine   support   of  Britain  (  for example  the  Neutrality Patrol ) was replaced by active alliance  .
subsequent  operations by the U.S. prompted Germany  और  Italy to declare  युद्ध  on the U.S.  on  December  11  , which  थी  reciprocated by the U.S. the  वही   दिन  .
वहीँ  were numerous  ऐतिहासिक  precedents for unannounced  सैन्य   कार्रवाई  by Japan .
however  ,  the  lack of any formal warning , particularly while negotiations were still  जाहिर  ongoing  ,  led  अध्यक्ष   फ्रैंकलिन  D. Roosevelt  to   proclaim  December 7 , 1941 , `` a date which will live in infamy `` .
प्रोजेक्ट  Runway  ऋतु  2 was the second  ऋतु  of Bravo 's successful Project  रनवे   ,  a  वास्तविकता   प्रतियोगिता  for fashion designers .
ऋतु   2  began airing on December 7  ,  2005 .
following  a nationwide search earlier in  the   साल   ,  sixteen designers were chosen  as  semi-finalists and brought to New York City in June , 2005 .
After  the  first challenge , called `` Road To  the   रनवे  ''  ,  fourteen went on to compete as  finalists  .
The  जीतना   पंक्तियां   ,  Chloe Dao  ,   प्राप्त  $ 100,000 in  बीज  money to help launch her own line , a  2007  Saturn  आसमान   roadster   ,  a spread in  elle   पत्रिका  ,  और  a mentorship with the Banana Republic Design  टोली  .
Winning  alongside   dao  was her  मॉडल  ,  अनुग्रह  Kelsey ,  जो  received  the   elle   पत्रिका  spread .
Michael Kors and Nina Garcia  लौटे   as  judges  लिये   the  second season .
The fourth  judging   सीट  rotated each week , based  on   the  challenge  .
Tim Gunn , fashion  कुर्सी   at  Parsons The New  स्कूल  for  डिज़ाइन   ,   लौटे   as  a mentor for the designers .
Kara Janx later appeared  in  Project Runway : All Stars in 2012 , where she finished 7th out of  13  .
Andrae Gonzalo ,  in  the  वही  year , competed in the second season of the All Stars edition placing 10th out  of   13  .
An  उदाहरण  of  a  Heraclius mule
In  numismatics  ,  a  mule is a coin  or  medal minted with obverse and reverse designs not normally seen on the same  टुकड़ा  .
These can be intentional or produced by error  .
This type of error  is  highly sought  बाद   ,  and  उदाहरण   can  fetch steep prices  इससे  collectors .
The  earliest  mules are found among ancient Greek and  रोमन   सिक्के  .
Opinion is  विभाजित   between  those who think  कि  they are accidental , the result of  an   गलत  combination  of  a new die with one  कि  had  officially  been withdrawn from use  ,  or the work of coiners working with  मरता  stolen from an official mint , perhaps at a time when  एक  of  उन्हें  should have  महरूम   नष्ट  .
the   नाम   गर्भाशयी   इससे  the mule ,  the   संकर  offspring of  a   घोड़ा  and  a  donkey , due to such a  सिक्का  having two  पहलू  intended for different coins , much  as  a mule  रै  parents  of  two different species .
This page  दस्तावेज़  the tornadoes  और   बवंडर  outbreaks of 2010 .
The majority of  tornadoes   रूप  in the U.S. ,  लकिन  they can occur almost  anywhere  under the right conditions .
A  lesser  number occur outside the  u.S.   ,  most notably  in  parts  of   neighboring  southern  कनाडा   दौरान  the Northern  गोलार्ध   's  summer season ,  लकिन   हैं  also known in South America , Europe  ,   एशिया   ,  and Australia .
There were 1,531 tornadoes reported  in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य   in  2010 ( of which at least 1,266 were confirmed )  ,   साथ   45  confirmed  fatalities  .
elsewhere  in the world , 11  लोगों  were  मारे  in  tornadoes  , six in  अर्जेंटीना   ,  three in the Bahamas  ,  one in Bangladesh ,  और   एक   in   जर्मनी  .
The year  थी   निकट   औसत  for  tornadoes  despite  an  extremely  शांत  early  वसन्त  period , however  ऐसे  changed after a huge  upswing  starting in late April and a  व्यस्त   लेट   वसन्त  and  गर्मियाँ  period .
The autumn months were  थोड़ा   ऊपर  average .
A lymphocyte is a type  of   श्वेत  blood cell in  the  vertebrate immune system .
अंतर्गत  the  सूक्ष्मदर्शी  , lymphocytes can  be   विभाजित  into large lymphocytes and  छोटी  lymphocytes  .
विशाल   granular  lymphocytes  शामिल  natural  कातिल  cells ( NK cells ) .
Small lymphocytes  consist   of  T cells and B  कोशिकाएं  .
Windows  powershell   is  Microsoft  's   कार्य  automation  फ्रेमवर्क  , consisting of a  command-line  shell  और   संबद्ध  scripting language  निर्मित  on .NET Framework .
PowerShell  provides  full  अभिगम  to COM  और   wmi  , enabling  प्रशासकों   to   perform   प्रशासनिक  tasks on  दोनो  local and remote Windows systems .
In PowerShell ,  प्रशासनिक  tasks  हैं   generally   performed   by  cmdlets (  सुनाया   command-lets  ) ,  जिससे  are specialized .NET classes  implementing  a particular operation .
Sets of cmdlets may be combined together  in  scripts ,  executables   (   जिससे   हैं  standalone applications  )  , or  by   instantiating   नियमित  .NET  वर्ग  ( or WMI/COM Objects  )  .
ये   कार्य   by   accessing  data in different  आंकड़ा   स्टोर्स   ,   जैसे  the  filesystem  or registry ,  जिससे  are  बना  available to the  powershell   runtime   via  Windows  powershell  providers .
Windows  powershell  also provides  a  hosting  api   साथ  which the  खिड़कियाँ   powershell  runtime can  be  embedded inside other applications .
These  अनुप्रयोग  can then use Windows  powershell   कार्यक्षमता   to   implement   निश्चित  operations , including those exposed via the graphical interface .
This capability  रै  been used by Microsoft Exchange  सर्वर  2007 to  expose  its management functionality as  powershell  cmdlets  और   प्रदाताओं  and implement the  आलेखीय  management  टूल्स   as  PowerShell  होस्ट  which invoke the necessary cmdlets  .
Other  microsoft  applications  सहित  Microsoft SQL Server 2008 also expose their management interface via PowerShell cmdlets .
With PowerShell  ,  graphical  interface-based  management applications on Windows are layered on top of  खिड़कियाँ  PowerShell .
a  PowerShell scripting interface  लिये   खिड़कियाँ  products is mandated by  the  Common Engineering  मापदण्ड  .
Windows PowerShell  शामिल  its own extensive , console-based help  ,   समान  to man pages  in  Unix shells , via  the   get-help  cmdlet .
Mary Poppins  is   a   1964   musical  film starring  जूली  Andrews , Dick Van  dyke   ,  David Tomlinson , and  glynis  Johns  ,  produced by Walt  डिज़्नी  , and  आधारित  on the Mary Poppins books  श्रेणी   by  P. L. Travers  .
The  फिल्मी  was  निर्देशित  by Robert Stevenson and written by Bill Walsh and Don  dagradi   ,  with songs  by  the Sherman Brothers .
it  was shot at Walt  डिज़्नी  Studios in Burbank ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
Julie  एंड्रयूज  won  the  Academy Award for Best  अभिनेत्री  for her  प्रदर्शन   as  Mary  poppins  and the  फिल्मी  also won Oscars for Best Film  संपादन  ,  असली  Music  स्कोर   ,  Best Song for  ``  Chim Chim  cher-ee  ''  और  Best Visual Effects , and received  a  total of 13 nominations .
a  story arc is an extended or continuing storyline  in  episodic storytelling  मीडिया  such  as  television ,  कॉमिक  books ,  कॉमिक  strips  ,  boardgames ,  वीडियो  games  ,   और  in  कुछ  cases ,  films  .
On  a  television program , for example , the story would  unfold  over many episodes .
In television , the  उपयोग  of the story  चाप   is  much more common in dramas than in comedies , especially in soap operas .
webcomics   हैं  more  संभावित   to   उपयोग  story arcs than  समाचारपत्र  comics ,  as  most web  कॉमिक्स  have readable  अभिलेख   ऑनलाइन  that a  newcomer   to  the strip can  पढ़ा   in   अनुक्रम   to  understand what is going  on  .
Although  स्टोरी   arcs  have existed for decades ,  the  term `` story  चाप  '' was  coined   in   1988   in   संबंध  to  the  television series Wiseguy , and was quickly adapted for other uses  .
Many  अमरीकी   कॉमिक  book  श्रेणी   हैं   अभी   लिखा  in four or six-issue arcs , within a  continuing   श्रेणी  .
छोटी  story arcs  हैं  easier to package as trade  paperbacks  for resale  ,  and more accessible to the casual reader  than   the   never-ending  continuity that  एकबार  characterised  कॉमिक्स  .
Black Friday  is  the day following Thanksgiving Day  in   the  United States , often regarded as  the   शुरूआत  of  the  Christmas shopping season .
In recent  सालो   ,  most major retailers have opened  अत्यधिक   जल्दी  and  offered  promotional  बिक्री  to kick  बंद  the holiday shopping  ऋतु  ,  समान  to  मुक्केबाज़ी  Day sales in  अनेक  Commonwealth  राष्ट्र   .
ब्लैक  Friday is  नहीं   an  official public holiday  as   ऐसे  , but many  non-retail  employees and  स्कूलों   have  both Thanksgiving  और  the  दिन  after off , followed by a weekend , thereby  increasing  the  क्रमांक  of potential shoppers .
It  रै  routinely been the busiest  खरीदारी   दिन  of the year since  2005   ,  although news reports , which  at  that  समय  were  inaccurate  ,  have  described  it  as  the  busiest shopping day of the year for a much longer period of time .
The  दिन  's  नाम  originated in Philadelphia , where it originally was  प्रयुक्त  to describe  the  heavy  और   विघटनकारी   पैदल  and vehicle  ट्रैफ़िक  which would occur  on   the   दिन   बाद  Thanksgiving  .
Use of the term started before  1961  and began to  देखिए  broader  उपयोग   बाहर  Philadelphia around 1975 .
Later  an  alternative  स्पष्टीकरण  began to be offered  :  that `` Black Friday  ''  indicates  the  point at which retailers begin to  फेरे  a profit , or  हैं   ``  '' .
लिये  many  सालो   ,  it  थी   आम  for retailers to  खोलें  at 6:00 a.m.  ,  but in the late 2000s many had  crept  to 5:00 or  भी  4:00 .
इस  was taken  to  a  नई  extreme in  2011  , when several retailers (  सहित  Target , Kohl 's  ,  Macy 's , Best Buy , and Bealls ) opened  at   मध्यरात्रि  for the first time .
In 2012 , Walmart and several other retailers announced  कि  they  होता   खोलें  most of  उनके  stores  at  8:00 p.m.  on  Thanksgiving  दिन  ( except  in  states where opening on  थैंक्सगिविंग  is  निषिद्ध  due to  ब्लू  laws  ,  such as Massachusetts where they  स्टिल  opened around  मध्यरात्रि   )   ,  prompting calls  लिये  a walkout among some workers .
ब्लैक  Friday shopping  is  known for attracting aggressive crowds  ,  with  सालाना  reports of assaults ,  shootings  , and throngs of people trampling on other shoppers in an  attempt  to  मिलेंगी  the best deal on a product before  आपूर्तियाँ  run out  .
the  Family That Preys  is   a  2008 American movie drama written , produced  ,  and directed by  टायलर  Perry .
the  screenplay focuses on two  परिवारों  ,  एक   धनवान  and the other working class ,  जिनकी   जीवनदान  are intertwined in both love and business .
the  movie is the  दूसरी  of four in which  पेरी  's  हस्ताक्षर  character  ,  Madea , does  नहीं  make  an   रूप  .
It is also  the  second Perry-directed film (  alongside   पापा  's Little Girls ) that is  नहीं  based on  कोई   of   the  filmmaker  's  stage plays .
Net 10 , Net 15 , Net 30 and Net  60  ( also  जाल  10 days , et al )  हैं   फ़ॉर्म   of  trade credit which specify  कि  the net amount (  the  total outstanding on the invoice )  is   अपेक्षित  to  be  paid in full  और   प्राप्त  by the  विक्रेता  within 10 , 15 , 30 or 60  दिनों  after the goods are dispatched or  सेवा  is completed  .
Net 30 or  जाल  60  शर्तें  are  प्रायः  coupled with a credit for  जल्दी   भुगतान  .
The  शब्द   जाल   in   इस  sense means  ``  total after all discounts  .  ''
it  originally derives  इससे  the  लैटिन  nitere ( to  चमक  ) and  nitidus  ( elegant ,  trim   )  , and more  recently  from  the   फ्रेंच  net ( sharp ,  neat  ,  साफ  ) .
Roadtown  ,   tortola
The British West Indies were the islands in  और  around the  caribbean  that  यहूद  part  of   the  British Empire .
in  1912 ,  the  British  वेस्ट   इंडीज  were  विभाजित  into  आठ   colonies  : The Bahamas  ,   बारबाडोस  , British Guiana , British Honduras , Jamaica ( with its dependencies  the  Turks and  caicos   आइलैंड्स   और  the Cayman Islands ) , Trinidad  और  Tobago ,  the  Windward Islands and  the  Leeward  आइलैंड्स  .
Between  1958   और   1962  , all of  the  island territories  मगर   the  British Virgin Islands  ,  the Bahamas ,  अंग्रेजों  Honduras and British Guiana  यहूद  organised into  the  West  इंडीज  Federation .
It  थी  hoped that the Federation would  become  independent as a single nation ,  लकिन   it  had  सीमित  powers  ,   अनेक  practical  समस्याएं   ,  and a lack of popular support .
Consequently  ,  the West Indies Federation was  dissolved  .
Most of the  territories  , including all the larger ones  ,   हैं  now independent  as  separate countries , with membership to many international forums such as the  संगठन   of  American  राज्य  , the Association  of   caribbean  States  ,   the   संसार  Trade Organization , the  संयुक्त  Nations ,  the   caribbean  Community , the Commonwealth of  राष्ट्र   और  the  caribbean  Development Bank among  अन्य  .
The remainder are British overseas territories .
All the former nations of the British  वेस्ट  Indies ,  मगर  the Commonwealth of Dominica , Guyana  और  Trinidad and  टोबैगो   ,  are Commonwealth  realms  .
The  पद  is still  प्रयुक्त  for  अंग्रेजों  Overseas Territories in  the  Caribbean , such as  the  Cayman Islands .
The remaining British West  इंडीज
``  कया  a Wonderful World  ''   is  a song  लिखा  by Bob Thiele  (  as  ``  George Douglas  ''  ) and George David Weiss  .
it  was first recorded by  लुई   आर्मस्ट्रांग   और   released  as  a  single in 1967 .
Thiele and Weiss were both prominent  in   the   म्यूज़िक  world  (   thiele   as  a producer and Weiss  as  a composer/performer ) .
Armstrong 's  रिकॉर्डिंग   थी  inducted  in  the  ग्रैमी  Hall  of  Fame  in  1999 .
The publishing for this  सोंग  is  नियंत्रित   by   मेमोरी  Lane Music Group  ,  Carlin Music Corp. , and Bug Music , Inc .

The inauguration of  the   अध्यक्ष   of  the  संयुक्त  States is  a  ceremonial event marking the commencement  of   a  new four-year term of a president of the United  राज्य  .
The day a presidential  उद्घाटन  occurs is known as `` Inauguration  दिन   ''   और  occurs on January 20 ( or 21st if the  20th  is a Sunday  )  .
(  prior  to the  बीसवीं  Amendment , the  तिथि   थी   कूच  4 , the day of the year  on   जिससे  the  संविधान  of the United States  पहला   took  effect  in  1789 ; the last inauguration to take  प्लेस  on  the  older date was Franklin  D.  Roosevelt 's first one on March 4 , 1933 . )
The most  हाल   पब्लिक   अध्यक्षीय  inauguration  रस्म  , the swearing in of  अध्यक्ष   बराक  Obama to  शुरू   उसके  second  four-year  term in office  ,  took place  on  Monday , January 21 , 2013 .
The only inauguration element mandated  by   the   संयुक्त  States Constitution is that the president  मेक  an oath  or  affirmation  पहले  that  व्यक्ति  can `` enter  on   the   निष्पादन  '' of the office of the presidency .
however  , over  the   सालो  , various traditions  have  arisen that have expanded the inauguration from a  सरल   oath-taking  ceremony  to  a  day-long  event , including parades  ,  speeches , and balls .
इससे  the presidency  of  Andrew Jackson through that of Jimmy Carter , the primary Inauguration  दिन   रस्म   took  place on the Capitol 's  ईस्ट   portico  .
चूंकि  the 1981 inauguration  of  Ronald Reagan , the ceremony has been held at the Capitol 's West Front  .
The  inaugurations  of  विलियम  Howard  taft  in  1909  and Reagan in 1985 were moved indoors at the  कैपिटल  due  to  cold weather .
The  युद्ध  of  1812  and World War II  caused   दो  inaugurations  to   be  held  at  other  स्थितियाँ   in  Washington , D.C  .
When George Washington was inaugurated ,  the   शपथ  was administered by Robert Livingston , Chancellor of New York State , in  1789   ,  and  by  William Cushing , Associate  इंसाफ  of  the  Supreme Court ,  in   1793   .
चूंकि   मुख्य   इंसाफ   ओलिवर  Ellsworth swore in President John  एडम्स  , no chief  इंसाफ   रै  missed an  उद्घाटन   दिन   .
When  उद्घाटन   दिन   रै   गिरे  on a Sunday , the chief justice has administered  the  oath to the president  on   the  Sunday privately and  तब  again the next  दिन  publicly  .
When a new president  takes   over   mid-term  due to  the  death or  इस्तीफा  of  a   अध्यक्ष  , the  शपथ  of office is administered but  औपचारिक  , public inauguration events have not been held .
Stefani Joanne Angelina  germanotta   (  ; born  कूच   28   ,  1986 ) ,  ज्ञात  by  उसके  stage name  महिला  Gaga ,  is  an American  सिंगर   ,  songwriter  ,  record  निर्माता  , dancer  ,  activist ,  businesswoman  , fashion  पंक्तियां   ,  actress  और  philanthropist .
Born and raised in New  यॉर्क   नगर   ,  she primarily studied at the  कान्वेंट  of the Sacred Heart and  briefly   attended  New York University 's Tisch  स्कूल   of  the Arts before withdrawing  to   फ़ोकस  on  उसके  musical  करियर  .
She  जल्द  began  performing   in   the   चट्टान  music scene of Manhattan 's Lower  ईस्ट   पक्ष  .
by  the  समाप्त  of 2007 , record executive and producer Vincent Herbert  हस्ताक्षरित   उसके   to   उसके   लेबल  Streamline  रिकॉर्ड   ,  an  imprint  of Interscope  रिकॉर्ड  .
initially   working   as   a  songwriter  at  Interscope Records  ,   उसके   गायन  abilities  captured  the attention of recording  कलाकार  Akon , who  भी  signed her to  kon   सजीव  Distribution  ,  his own label  अंतर्गत   interscope  .
Lady Gaga came to prominence as a recording  कलाकार   following  the release of her debut  एल्बम  , The Fame ( 2008 ) , which was a critical and commercial success that topped  चार्ट   around  the world and included the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  number-one singles `` Just Dance  ``   और   ``   पोकर  Face `` .
After  embarking   on   the  The Fame  बॉल  Tour  ,  she followed the album with The Fame Monster ( 2009 )  ,   जिससे  spawned the worldwide hit singles `` Bad  रोमांस   ``  , `` Telephone  ``  , and  ``  Alejandro  ``  .
The Fame Monsters  कामयाबी   अनुमत   उसके  to embark on the eighteen-month long  दानव  Ball Tour , which  बाद   became  one of  the  highest-grossing concert tours of all time  .
Her most recent  एल्बम  ,  born   इस  Way  (  2011 ) ,  अव्वल  the charts  of  most major markets and generated more international chart-topping singles ,  सहित  `` Born  इस   रास्ता  ``  ,  `` Judas ``  ,   और  `` The Edge of  महिमा   ``   .
बहकावे  by  britney  Spears ,  दाउद  Bowie , Michael Jackson , Madonna , and  महारानी   ,  Lady Gaga is recognized for her flamboyant ,  विविध  and outré  योगदान   to  the music industry through her fashion , performances and music videos  .
As  of  October 2011 , she has  बेची   an  estimated 23 million albums  और  64 million singles worldwide and her singles are some of the best-selling worldwide .
Her  उपलब्धियाँ  include five Grammy Awards  और  13 MTV  वीडियो  Music Awards  .
Lady Gaga  रै  consecutively appeared on Billboard magazine  's   कलाकारों  of the Year  (  scoring the definitive title in 2010 ) , ranked fourth in  vh1  's  सूची  of 100 Greatest Women  in  Music  ,  is  the  sixth  बेहतरीन   selling  digital singles  कलाकार  in US according to RIAA  ,   is  regularly  लगाई   on   सूचियाँ  composed by Forbes magazine and was named one of the most  influential  people in  the  world by Time magazine .
Besides her musical career  ,  she involves herself with humanitarian  कल्याणकारी  and  lgbt  activism  .
McKethan Stadium  घर   of  Gator baseball
A picture of  the  1924  बेसबॉल  team
The Florida Gators baseball  टोली   represents  the University of Florida in the sport of baseball .
The  फ्लोरिडा   gators  compete in Division  i   of   the  National Collegiate Athletics Association ( NCAA  )  , and the  पूर्वी  Division  of  the  southeastern  Conference  (  SEC ) .
They play their home games in  अल्फ्रेड  A. McKethan Stadium  on  the university 's Gainesville ,  फ्लोरिडा  campus  ,  and  हैं  currently  led  by head coach Kevin O'Sullivan .
In the  ninety-eight  season history  of   the   gators   बेसबॉल  program  ,  the team has  जीती  twelve SEC championships and has appeared in  आठ  College World Series tournaments .

a  political campaign is an organized effort  जिससे  seeks  to  influence  the   निर्णय  making process within  a  specific group .
in   democracies  , political campaigns often refer to electoral campaigns , wherein representatives are  चुनी  or  referendums  are decided .
In modern politics , the most  ऊँची  profile  राजनैतिक  campaigns are  केन्द्रित  on  उम्मीदवार  for head  of  state or head of government ,  प्रायः  a President or Prime Minister .
Elizabeth Cady Stanton  और  her  बेटी  , Harriot
Elizabeth Cady Stanton ( November  12  ,  1815   –  October 26 , 1902 ) was  an  American  सोशल   activist  , abolitionist , and leading  फिगर  of  the   जल्दी  women 's rights movement  .
Her Declaration of  sentiments   ,  presented  at  the first women  's  rights convention held in 1848 in Seneca Falls  ,   नई  York  ,   is   प्रायः  credited with initiating the  पहला  organized  महिलाओं  's rights and women 's suffrage movements in the United States .
Before  stanton  narrowed her political focus almost exclusively to women 's rights  ,  she was an  क्रियाशील   abolitionist  together  साथ  her husband ,  हेनरी  Brewster Stanton and cousin ,  gerrit  Smith .
Unlike  अनेक   of   those   शामिल  in the women  's   अधिकारों  movement , Stanton addressed various issues pertaining to women beyond voting  अधिकारों   .
उसके  concerns included  महिलाओं   's  parental and custody rights , property  अधिकारों  , employment and income  अधिकारों  , divorce  ,   the  economic  स्वास्थ्य  of the family , and birth  कंट्रोल  .
She was also  an   outspoken   समर्थक   of  the 19th-century temperance movement .
बाद   the  American Civil War ,  stanton   's  commitment to female suffrage caused a  schism  in the women 's  अधिकारों   गति   जब   वो  ,  साथ  with Susan B. Anthony ,  अस्वीकृत   to  support passage  of  the  fourteenth  and Fifteenth Amendments to the United States Constitution .
She opposed giving added  विधिक  protection and  मतदान   अधिकारों  to African American men while women  ,  black  और  white , were denied those same rights .
Her  स्थिति  on this issue , together with  उसके  thoughts on organized  christianity  and women 's issues beyond voting rights ,  led  to the formation of  दो  separate women  's   अधिकारों  organizations that were finally rejoined  ,   साथ  Stanton as president of the joint organization ,  लगभग  twenty years  बाद  her break from the  असली  women 's  suffrage   गति  .
stanton  died  in   1902  having authored both The Woman 's  बाइबल  and her  आत्मकथा   ,  along with many articles and  pamphlets  concerning female  suffrage  and women 's rights .
My Fair Lady is a musical based  upon   जार्ज   बर्नार्ड   शॉ  's Pygmalion and  साथ  book and lyrics by Alan  jay  Lerner and music by Frederick Loewe  .
The story concerns Eliza  doolittle  ,  a   काकनी   पुष्प  girl who takes speech lessons  इससे   प्राध्यापक  Henry Higgins  ,  a phoneticist  ,  so  कि   वो  may  pass  as a well-born  महिला   .
The musical 's 1956  ब्रॉडवे  production  थी   a  hit , setting  कया  was  तब   the   रिकार्ड   लिये  the longest run of any major musical theatre production in history  .
It was  followed  by a hit  लंदन  production  ,   a   लोकप्रिय   फिल्मी  version , and numerous revivals .
It has been called `` the perfect musical  ''  .
deregulation  is the  अधिनियम  or process  of  removing or reducing  राज्य   regulations   .
It  is  therefore opposite  of  regulation ,  जिससे  refers to  the   प्रक्रम  of the government  regulating  certain activities .
