This article is about  the  short story .
For the poem by  सारा  Teasdale  ,  see There  होगा  Come Soft Rains .
`` There Will  आइये  Soft Rains '' is  a  short story by  विज्ञान   fiction  author Ray Bradbury which  थी  first published  in  the  may  6  ,  1950 issue of Collier 's .
बाद  that  वही   साल   the  story was included in Bradbury 's  the  Martian Chronicles  (  1950 )  .
With over  1.2  billion people  ,  Han  चाइनीज  is the largest ethnic group  in  the  संसार  .
pashtun  people of the  pashtunistan   प्रदेश   ,  which sits in  an   क्षेत्रफल  between south of the  हिन्दू  Kush in  अफगानिस्तान  and  the   सिंधु  River in Pakistan .
They number around  50  million .
The  korowai   लोगों  of Papua  गिने  just around  3,000  people  ,  and  यहूद  uncontacted  जबतक  the  1970s  .
Ethnicity  or  ethnic group is a socially  पारिभाषित  category based on  आम   संस्कृति  or nationality  .
नस्ल  can ,  लकिन  does  नहीं   have  to , include common ancestry , appearance , cuisine ,  ड्रेसिंग   स्टाइल   ,  heritage , history ,  भाषा  or dialect ,  धर्म  , symbols ,  परंपराओं  , or other  सांस्कृतिक  factor  .
जातीय   पहचान  is constantly  reinforced  through common characteristics which set the group  अलावा   इससे  other  समूह  .
The 19.9 MW Gemasolar solar  संयंत्र  in Spain  सुविधाएँ  15  घंटों  of storage and can supply power  24  hours a day .
सौर   उर्जा   ,  radiant light  और  heat  इससे  the  सूर्य  , has  महरूम  harnessed by humans  चूंकि  ancient  टाइम्स   using  a  दायरा  of  ever-evolving   technologies  .
Solar  उर्जा  technologies  शामिल   सौर  heating ,  सौर   photovoltaics  , solar thermal  विद्युत  , solar  वास्तुकला   और  artificial photosynthesis  ,  which can make considerable contributions  to   solving  some of the most urgent energy problems the  संसार  now faces .
सौर  technologies are broadly  characterized   as  either  passive  solar  or  active solar depending on the way they capture  ,  convert and distribute  सौर  energy .
क्रियाशील   सौर  techniques include the  उपयोग  of  photovoltaic  panels and solar  थर्मल   collectors   to  harness the energy .
passive  solar  तकनीकों  include  orienting  a building to the  सूर्य   ,  selecting materials  साथ  favorable thermal mass  or   लाइट   dispersing  properties , and designing spaces  कि  naturally circulate air .
In 2011 , the International Energy Agency said that  ``  the  विकास  of affordable , inexhaustible and clean solar energy  technologies   होगा  have huge longer-term benefits .
It will  बढ़ाएँ  countries’  उर्जा  security  through  reliance  on   an  indigenous  ,  inexhaustible  और   ज़्यादातर   import-independent  resource , enhance sustainability , reduce pollution , lower the costs of mitigating climate change ,  और  keep fossil  ईंधन  prices lower than otherwise .
These advantages are global .
Hence  the   अतिरिक्त  costs of the incentives for  जल्दी   deployment  should  be   माना  learning investments  ;   वे  must be  बुद्धिमानी  spent and need to be widely shared '' .
The classical  लैटिन  alphabet or Roman alphabet evolved  इससे   a   पश्चिमी  variety  of  the  यूनानी   वर्णमाला  called the  cumaean   वर्णमाला   ,   जिससे  was  अपनाया   और  modified by the Etruscans who ruled  जल्दी   रोम   .
the   etruscan   वर्णमाला  was  in   फेरे   अपनाया   और  further modified by  the  ancient Romans to  लिखें  the Latin language .
During the Middle Ages  ,  the Latin alphabet was adapted  to   रोमांस  languages , direct descendants  of  Latin , as well as to Celtic  ,  Germanic , Baltic  ,  and some  स्लावी   भाषाएं  .
साथ  the  आयु   of  colonialism and Christian evangelism , the Latin script  थी  spread  विदेशी  ,  और  applied  to   स्वदेशी  American , Australian  ,  Austronesian , Austroasiatic , and African languages  .
More recently , linguists have also tended to prefer the Latin script or  the  International  ध्वन्यात्मक  Alphabet (  itself  largely  आधारित  on  लैटिन  script )  जब  transcribing or creating  लिखा  standards  लिये   non-european   भाषाएं  ,  ऐसे  as the  अफ़्रीकी   सन्दर्भ  alphabet .
the   पद  Latin alphabet  may   refer  to  either  the alphabet  प्रयुक्त  to write Latin ( as  वर्णित  in this article )  ,  or other alphabets based  on  the Latin  स्क्रिप्ट   ,   जिससे  is  the  basic set  of   अक्षर   आम   to   the  various alphabets  descended  from the classical  लैटिन  one , such as the  अंग्रेज़ी  alphabet .
These Latin-derived  alphabets  may discard  अक्षर  ,  जैसे   the  Rotokas alphabet ,  or  add new  अक्षर   ,  like  the   डैनिश  and Norwegian alphabet .
Letter  आकार  have changed over the centuries , including the creation  लिये   मध्यकालीन  Latin of  निम्नतर  case forms which did not  मौजूद   in  the  शास्त्रीय  period .
The  हत्या   of  United States President Abraham  lincoln  took place on  शुभ  Friday ,  अप्रैल   14   ,   1865   ,  as the American  सिविल  War was drawing to a close  .
The  हत्या  occurred  पाँच  days after the commander  of   the  Confederate Army  of  Northern Virginia  ,  General Robert E. Lee ,  surrendered  to Lieutenant General Ulysses  S.   ग्रान्ट   और   the  Union Army of the Potomac .
Lincoln was the  पहला  American president to be  assassinated   ,  though an unsuccessful attempt had been made on  एंड्रयू  Jackson  30   सालो   पहले  in 1835 .
The assassination was planned and carried  आउट  by the well-known  स्टेज  actor John  wilkes  Booth , as part  of  a  larger  conspiracy in a bid  to  revive the  confederate  cause .
Booth 's co-conspirators were Lewis Powell and  दाउद  Herold , who were  आबंटित  to kill Secretary  of  State William  H.  Seward  ,   और  George  atzerodt  who  थी   to  kill  वाइस  President Andrew Johnson .
By simultaneously eliminating the  शीर्ष  three  लोगों   in   the  administration , Booth and  उसके  co-conspirators  hoped  to sever the continuity  of   the  United  राज्य  government .
Lincoln  थी   शॉट  while watching the  खेल  Our American Cousin with his  बीवी  Mary  टॉड  Lincoln  at   घाट  's  थिएटर  in Washington , D.C. on the  रात्रि  of April 14 , 1865 .
he  died early the next  morning   .
the  rest of  the  conspirators  '  plot failed ; Powell only managed  to   घाव  Seward , while  atzerodt  , Johnson 's would-be  हत्यारे   ,   खोया  his  तंत्रिका  and  fled  Washington .
add-on  might mean:
plug-in  ( computing  )  , a piece  of  software  जिससे  enhances another software application  और  usually  can  not be  चलाएं  independently
ब्राउजर  extension  ,  which modifies the interface and/or behavior of web browsers
Add-on ( Mozilla ) , a  टुकड़ा   of  software that enhances and customizes Mozilla-based applications
Add-ons for Firefox  (   addons.mozilla.org   )   ,  the official  मोज़िला  Foundation web site which serves as a repository of add-ons for  mozilla-based  applications
Peripheral , an optional computer hardware component that significantly  पूरक  or  enhances   the  functionality  of   the  original unit
Video  खेल   accessory  , a piece  of  hardware  प्रयुक्त   in  conjunction with  a   वीडियो  game console for playing video games
क्लबों  level seating is a  खास  section of  seating  in  आधुनिक   खेल   स्टेडियम   .
The Club  स्तर  is  प्रायः  located towards the middle of the stage  of  seating  भाग  , above the  निम्नतर  deck but below the upper  डेक   .
वे   हैं  usually right next to the  लक्ज़री  Boxes ,  either  right above  ,  right below , or sandwiched  between  two  स्तर  of Luxury Boxes .
Club Level seating is considered as higher  क्लास  than sitting  anywhere  else in the  एरिना  , but lower class compared  to  the Luxury Boxes .
नापसंद  the Luxury Boxes ,  सबसे  club  स्तर  do not wrap entirely around  the  arena .
Some club levels stop at a certain point ,  giving   रास्ता  to  an  expansion of the  मेज़ानाइन  ,  जबकि  others  दे  way  to  lower class Luxury Boxes (  ऐसे  as ``  पार्टी   suites  '' ) .
A  notable  exception to this is Emirates  स्टेडियम  in London , which has  a   पूरा  tier  of   क्लबों   seating  .
Club Levels allow fans multiple  स्तर  of entertainment .
Club Level seating is open to the elements , as  opposed  to  the  entirely enclosed luxury boxes  ,  which  देता   अधिक  of an outdoors impression at roofless and open-roof  स्टेडियम  and  arenas  .
क्लबों  Level seating is normally bought  on  a  अनुबंध  basis  to   allow  for maximum profit  on   the  part  of  the stadium .
The  क्लबों   स्तर  provides fans  साथ  special access  to   an  indoor  भाग  of  the   एरिना  exclusive to fans  साथ  special tickets  .
These areas  हैं   एयर   conditioned  and allow access  to  special restaurants , merchandise stands  ,  and  लाउंज  areas of the  स्टेडियम   कि  are  नहीं   वरना  available .
Concession stands and  विक्रेता   on  the  क्लबों   स्तर   भी  often offer different  मेनू  than  in   अन्य  stands  to  give  अधिक  of a special feel to the Club  .
These areas are closed off to the  बाकी  of  the   स्टेडियम  , and  वे  usually can only be accessed  through  the exclusive , private club entrances .
Sophia Loren  (  ;  born  Sofia  villani  Scicolone ; 20  सितंबर  1934 ) is an  इतालवी  actress  .
Loren is widely recognized as Italy 's  सबसे  renowned and  सम्मानित  actress .
She was the first actress of  the   talkie   era  to win an  अकादमी  Award for  a  non-English-speaking performance , for her portrayal of Cesira in Vittorio  de   सिका  's  दो  Women .
Her other awards  शामिल   a  Grammy  पुरस्कार  , five special Golden Globes  ,   a   bafta   पुरस्कार  and a  लॉरेल   पुरस्कार  .
In 1995 she received the Cecil  B.   demille  Award for  आजीवन  achievements  ,  one of many  ऐसे  awards  .
उसके  films include : Houseboat ( 1958 ) ,  el  Cid ( 1961  )  , Yesterday , Today and  कल  (  1963  ) ,  विवाह   italian-style  (  1964  )  ,  and A Special Day ( 1977  )  .
In later years  वो   रै  appeared  in  American  blockbusters  such  as  Grumpier Old Men ( 1995 )  ,  and Nine (  2009  ) .
In 1994 she starred  in  Robert  altman   's  Prêt-à-Porter  ,  which earned her a Golden Globe nomination the same year .
She has  भी  achieved critical and commercial success  in  TV movies such  as   हिम्मत  ( 1986  )  .
मौतों   लिये  self-inflicted injuries  प्रति  100,000 inhabitants in  2004   .
incidence  of suicide is  underreported  due to  दोनो   धार्मिक  and social pressures  ,  and possibly  completely   unreported   in  some areas .
Nevertheless , from  reported  cases , certain trends  हैं  apparent  .
चूंकि   the   आंकड़ा  is skewed  ,  comparing  आत्महत्या  rates between nations is statistically unsound .
the   रुझान  themselves are not the cause , but may be indicative of a root  कारण  .
The Oprah Winfrey Leadership  अकादमी   लिये   लड़कियों   -   दक्षिण  Africa is a female boarding  स्कूल   संस्थापित  in  जनवरी  2007  और   स्तिथ  in Henley on  klip  near  meyerton  , south of  जोहान्सबर्ग  , South Africa .

Digicel is a mobile  फोन  network provider  ऑपरेटिंग  in 31 markets across the  caribbean   ,  Central America , and Oceania regions .
The  कम्पनी  is owned by Irishman Denis  o'brien  , is incorporated  in  Bermuda ,  और  based in Jamaica .
It has  परिचय  13 million  बेतार  users .
As  of   2012  , Digicel  's  markets comprise  :  Anguilla , Antigua and Barbuda , Aruba  ,  Barbados , Bermuda , Bonaire ,  the  British Virgin Islands  ,  the Cayman Islands  ,   कुराकाओ  , Dominica  ,   el  Salvador , Fiji , French Guiana , Grenada , Guadeloupe , Guyana  ,   हैती   ,  Jamaica  ,  Martinique  ,  Nauru , Panama , Papua New Guinea , Samoa ,  संत   किट्स  and Nevis  ,  Saint Lucia , Saint Vincent and the  grenadines  , Suriname  ,  Tonga , Trinidad & Tobago ,  turks  and Caicos  ,  and Vanuatu  .

Hospital Emergency  कोड   हैं  used  in   अस्पताल  worldwide to alert staff to various  emergencies  .
The use of codes is  intended   to  convey essential information quickly and with minimal  गलतफहमी   to   स्टाफ  , while preventing  तनाव  and  दहशत  among visitors to the hospital .
These codes may  be  posted  on  placards throughout the hospital , or printed on employee identification badges for  तैयार  reference .
Back  of  a  हॉस्पिटल  ID badge showing disaster codes .
Hospital emergency  कोड  may denote  अलग   कार्यक्रम  at different  अस्पताल  ,  सहित  nearby  ones   .
क्युकी   अनेक  physicians work at more than one facility  ,   इस  may  सीसे  to confusion in emergencies , so  वर्दी   प्रणालियों   have  been proposed .
the  route of the Eifel  जलसेतु  ,  साथ  its average  ढलान  .
The Eifel Aqueduct was one  of  the  longest  aqueducts of  the  Roman Empire  .
The aqueduct , constructed in  ad   80  , carried water some  इससे  the  hilly   eifel   प्रदेश  of what is now Germany  to  the ancient  नगर  of  colonia  Claudia Ara Agrippinensium  (  present-day Cologne ) .
If  the  auxiliary spurs to  अतिरिक्त  springs  हैं  included  ,  the length  थी  .
the   निर्माण  was almost entirely below  मैदान  ,  और  the flow of the water  थी   उत्पादित   entirely  by gravity .
A few bridges , including one up  to  in length , were  needed  to pass  over  valleys .
नापसंद  some  of  the other  प्रसिद्ध   रोमन  aqueducts  ,   the  Eifel aqueduct was  specifically   designed   to   minimize   the  above-ground portion  to  protect  it  from  क्षति   और  freezing .
In  रसायन   ,  a disulfide  बंध   (  Br.E . disulphide bond ) is  a  covalent bond  ,   प्रायः  derived  by  the coupling  of   दो  thiol groups .
The  linkage  is also  पुकारा   an  SS-bond  or  disulfide  सेतु   .
The  overall  connectivity is  इसलिए   r-s-s-r  .
the  terminology  is  widely used  in  biochemistry .
In  औपचारिक  terms  ,   the  connection is  a  persulfide , in analogy to its congener  ,  peroxide  (  R-O-O-R  )  ,  लकिन   इस  terminology is  अस्पष्ट  and  is   no  longer used ( except in  सन्दर्भ  to R-S-S-H  or  H-S-S-H compounds  )  .
Formal depiction of  disulfide   बंध  formation as an oxidation .

Religion in  the  United Kingdom and  in   the   देशों  that preceded it  ,  has  महरूम   वर्चस्व  , for  over  1,400  सालो  ,  by  various forms of Christianity .
according  to some surveys , a majority of  नागरिकों  still identify with Christianity ,  हालांकि  regular church attendance has fallen dramatically since  the   मध्य  of the 20th century  ,  and immigration  और  demographic change  have  contributed to the growth of other faiths .
Religious affiliations of  uk  citizens are recorded by regular surveys , the four major  ones   होने   the  UK Census  ,  the  श्रमिक   फ़ोर्स  Survey  ,  the British Social Attitudes  सर्वेक्षण  and the European Social Survey .
According  to  the  2001  UK census  ,  Christianity is the  प्रमुख   धर्म   ,  followed by Islam  ,  Hinduism , Sikhism , Judaism and Buddhism in terms of number  of   adherents  .
इस  , and  the   अपेक्षाकृत  large number of  individuals   साथ   नाममात्र   or  no  धार्मिक  affiliations has led commentators to variously describe the  संयुक्त  Kingdom as a  multi-faith  , secularised , or  post-christian   समाज   .
The United Kingdom  थी  formed by the union of previously independent countries from  1707  , and  नतीजतन  most  of  the largest religious  समूह  do not have UK-wide organisational structures .
While some groups have separate  structures  for the individual  देशों  of  the   संयुक्त  Kingdom , others may have a  सिंगल  structure covering  इंग्लैण्ड  and Wales  or   ग्रेट   ब्रिटेन  .
similarly   ,   due   to  the  अपेक्षाकृत  recent creation of Northern Ireland  in   1921   ,   सबसे   प्रमुख   धार्मिक  groups  in  Northern Ireland are organised  on   an  all-Ireland basis  .
the  1967 Newark  दंगे  were a major civil disturbance that occurred  in  the city  of   न्यूर्क   ,  New Jersey between July  12   और  July  17  ,  1967  .
The six days of rioting , looting  ,   और  destruction left  26  dead and  सैंकड़ों  injured  .
In United States college  एथलेटिक्स  , redshirt is a  विलंब   or  suspension of an athlete 's  भागीदारी   in  order  to  lengthen his or  उसके   काल  of eligibility .
Typically , a student 's  एथलेटिक  eligibility in  a   दिए  sport is four  सीज़न  , a number derived  इससे  the four years of  अकादमिक  classes that are  सामान्यतः  required to obtain  a  bachelor 's degree at an American  कॉलेज  or university .
However  ,  a  छात्र  athlete may be offered  the  opportunity to  redshirt  for up to  दो  years , which allows the athlete to spread  those  four years of eligibility over  पाँच   ,   or  sometimes  छह   सालो  .
in   a  redshirt year ,  a  student athlete  may  attend classes at the college or university ,  अभ्यास  with an athletic  टोली   ,  and dress  लिये   खेल   लकिन   he  or she  may   नहीं  compete during the  खेल  .
Using this mechanism  ,  a  छात्र  athlete has up to five  अकादमिक   सालो  to  उपयोग  the  चार   सालो  of eligibility , thus becoming  a  fifth-year senior .
The  पद  is used  as   a  verb , noun  ,  and  क्रियाशील  .
For example ,  a   कोच  may  चुनें   to  redshirt  a  player who  is  then referred to as  a  redshirt freshman or simply a  redshirt   .
the  opposite  of  this is  a   ``   सच्चा  freshman . ''
World War I ( WWI ) was a global  युद्ध  centred in Europe  कि  began on 28 July 1914 and lasted until  11   नवम्बर  1918  .
It  थी  predominantly  पुकारा  the World  युद्ध  or the Great War from its occurrence until  the  start of  संसार   युद्ध  II  in  1939  ,  and  the  First World War or  संसार  War  i   thereafter   .
It involved all the world  's  great powers  ,  which were  समवेत  in two opposing alliances :  the  Allies (  आधारित   on  the Triple Entente of  the   संयुक्त  Kingdom  ,  France and Russia )  और  the  सेंट्रल  Powers ( originally the  ट्रिपल  Alliance  of  Germany , Austria-Hungary and  इटली   ;  but , as  austria–hungary   था  taken  the  offensive  विरूद्ध   the  agreement , Italy did not enter  into   the  war  )  .
These alliances were  दोनो   reorganised   और  expanded as more nations entered  the   युद्ध  :  इटली   ,   जापानी  and  the  United States joined  the   allies  , and the Ottoman  साम्राज्य   और   बुल्गारिया   the  Central Powers .
Ultimately  ,  more than 70  लाख  military personnel ,  सहित   60  million Europeans  ,  were mobilised in one of  the  largest wars in history .
More than  9  million combatants were  मारे  , largely because  of  technological  advancements  that led to  विशाल  increases  in  the lethality of weapons without corresponding  सुधार  in protection or mobility .
It was the fifth-  deadliest  conflict in world history ,  subsequently  paving  the  way for various political changes , such as revolutions in many  of  the  राष्ट्र  involved  .
One  of  the long-term causes  of   the  war was the  पुनरुत्थान   of  imperialism in the  विदेशी  policies  of   the  great powers  of   यूरोपीय  .
More  तत्काल  , the assassination  of  Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria , the heir  to  the  सिंहासन  of Austria-Hungary , on 28 June  1914  by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo Princip  in  Sarajevo  triggered  a  राजनयिक  crisis when  austria-hungary  subsequently delivered an  ultimatum  to  the  Kingdom of  सर्बिया   .
अनेक  alliances formed over the  पिछला  decades  यहूद  invoked .
Within weeks , the major powers  यहूद  at war  और   ,   via  their colonies ,  the  conflict soon spread  around  the  संसार  .
On  28   जुलाई  , the Austro-Hungarians fired the  पहला  shots  of   the   युद्ध  as preparation for the  आक्रमण   of  Serbia .
While  the  Russians mobilised  ,   the   germans  invaded  न्यूट्रल  Belgium  और  Luxembourg on the  रास्ता  to France , providing a casus  belli  for  ब्रिटेन  's declaration of  युद्ध   विरूद्ध   जर्मनी  .
After the German march  on  Paris  थी  brought  to   a  halt—the  so-called  Miracle of the Marne —the Western  सामने   settled  into  a   स्थिर   बैटल  of attrition with a trench  लकीर  that changed little  जबतक   1917  .
On the Eastern Front , the Russian army was successful against the Austro-Hungarians , but was stopped in  इसके  invasion  of  East Prussia by the Germans .
In  नवम्बर  the Ottoman Empire joined  the  war , opening up  fronts  in  the   काकेशस  ,  मेसोपोटामिया  and the Sinai .
Italy and Bulgaria went to war in  1915   और  Romania  in  1916  .
In Russia , the  त्सार  's government collapsed in  कूच  1917 and a subsequent revolution  in  November brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers  .
After a  1918  German offensive along  the   पश्चिमी  front  ,  the Allies drove  वापस   the  Germans in  a  series of successful  offensives  and American forces began entering  the  trenches .
Germany , which had its  अपना  trouble with revolutionaries , agreed to  an  armistice on 11 November 1918 .
The war  ended   in  victory for the Allies .
Events on  the  home fronts  यहूद  as tumultuous  as  on the  बैटल   fronts   ,   as  the  भागीदार  tried to mobilize their  जनशक्ति  and  आर्थिक   संसाधन  to fight a  कुल   युद्ध   .
By the end of the war , four major  इम्पीरियल  powers—the  जर्मनी  ,  रूसी  , Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman  empires—ceased  to exist .
The  successor  states  of  the former  दो   खोया  a great amount of territory ,  जबकि  the  latter  two were dismantled  entirely  .
The  मैप   of  central Europe was redrawn into several smaller states .
the   लीग  of  राष्ट्र   थी   formed  in the  आशा  of preventing another  ऐसे  conflict .
the  European nationalism spawned by the  युद्ध  and the breakup of empires , the repercussions of Germany 's  शिकस्त  and  समस्याएं  with the Treaty  of   versailles  are  सहमत  to  be  factors contributing to World War  ii   .
Map of  देशों  that declared themselves  to   be  socialist states under the  marxist–leninist  or  माओवादी  definition -  कि   is  to  कह  ,  ``  Communist states  ''  -  between   1979  and 1983 .
This period marked the greatest territorial extent of Communist  राज्य  .
A communist state is  a  state  जहाँ   the  means of  उत्पादन   हैं  collectively owned by  the  society  .
It has a form  of   सरकारी  characterized  by  single-party  नियम  or dominant-party rule of a  कम्युनिस्ट  party ( referred as Dictatorship  of   the   proletariat   by  its proponents  )  and a professed allegiance  to  a Leninist or  marxist–leninist  ideology as the guiding principle  of  the state .
Technically ,  ``  communist state ''  is  a contradictio in terminis as a communist society as  पारिभाषित  by both Marxists and  anarcho-communists  is in  principle  stateless .
इससे   इस  perspective  ,   the   पद   marxist-leninist  state is more appropriate  .
Historically , a `` communist state '' referred  to   a  system where public ownership of all or most  अर्थात्   of   उत्पादन  by  the  Communist party  -run  state is  deemed  necessary to further the interests of  the  working class  ;  today , a communist  राज्य  can also  ,  for  उदाहरण  , refer  to  contemporary China and Vietnam , where a  कम्युनिस्ट  Party-run  राज्य  exists alongside a  मिश्रित   अर्थव्यवस्था  .
According to  marxist–leninists  , the state is a tool in the  हैंड्स   of  the ruling  क्लास  ,  जिससे  in a socialist society is the working  क्लास  ,  so  a socialist state is  ,   according  to  leninists   ,  a  राज्य  of the working class .
in  practice  ,  communist states  do   नहीं  actually refer to  themselves   as  such  .
They  do  this not to disguise the fact that  the  ruling party is  कम्युनिस्ट   ,  but  बल्कि  because  वे   do  not consider themselves to be a  कम्युनिस्ट  society  at   उपस्थित   .
Instead  ,  they constitutionally  पहचानो  themselves as socialist  राज्य  or workers  '   राज्य  .
The primary goal of these  राज्य   ,  which also explains their  आधिकारिक   नाम  , is to  मार्गदर्शिका   उनके  respective  देशों   in  the process of  भवन   समाजवादी  , ultimately leading to communism .
Communist states may have  अनेक  legal  राजनैतिक   पार्टियों  , but the communist party  is  usually  granted  a special or dominant  भूमिका  in government  ,   प्रायः  by  statute   or  under the constitution .
Consequently , the institutions  of   the  state  और  of the communist party become  intimately  entwined , such as  in  the  विकास   of  parallel institutions  .
In the  20th   सदी  , most communist  राज्य  adopted planned economies .
However , there  यहूद  exceptions : The Soviet  संघ  during the 1920s  और  late 1980s and  यूगोस्लाविया  after World War  ii  allowed limited  बाज़ार   और  a degree of worker self-management , while China  ,  Vietnam and Laos  introduced  far-reaching  मार्केट  reforms after the 1980s  .
In the 21st century , China and  वियतनाम   have  allowed a mixed  अर्थव्यवस्था  to develop .
The fundamental  अवधारणाओं  of communist states  प्रायः  diverge from  the   असली  socio-economic ideologies from which  वे   develop  .
as  a  परिणाम   ,   अनेक  adherents  of  these ideologies often oppose the political systems commonly  संबद्ध  with these  राज्य  .
लिये  example ,  dissenting  communists such as  trotskyists  were  प्रायः  opposed to the communist  राज्य  of the  20th  century  ,  claiming either  कि   वे  had nothing to do with ``  रियल  ''  साम्यवादी   or  that the  विचारधारा  of such states  था  reached a point of irrevocable  भ्रष्टाचार   .
माइकल  Fred  फेल्प्स  II  (  born June 30 , 1985 )  is  a retired American  तैराक   और  the most  सजा  Olympian of all time  ,  with  a   कुल   of  22 medals .
फेल्प्स   भी  holds  the  all-time records for Olympic  सुनहरा  medals ( 18 , double the second  उच्चतम   रिकार्ड   धारकों   )  , Olympic gold  medals  in  व्यक्तिगत  events ( 11 ) ,  और  Olympic medals  in  individual  कार्यक्रम  for  a  male  (  13 ) .
In winning  आठ  gold  medals  at the  2008   बीजिंग  Games  ,   फेल्प्स  took  the  record for the most first-place finishes at any  सिंगल   ओलम्पिक   खेल   .
Five of those  victories   यहूद   in  individual  कार्यक्रम  , tying the single Games record  .
In  the  2012 Summer  ओलंपिक  in London , Phelps won four  golds   और  two silver medals , making him the most  कामयाब  athlete of the  खेल  for the third Olympics in  a  row  .
Phelps is the long course  संसार   recordholder   in  the 100-meter butterfly  ,  200-meter butterfly  और  400-meter individual medley as  खूब  as the former  long   कोर्स  world recordholder in the  200-meter  freestyle and 200-meter individual medley .
he  has  जीती   a  total of  71  medals in  प्रमुख  international long-course competition , 57 gold , 11 silver ,  और  three bronze spanning the Olympics  ,  the World , and the Pan  प्रशांत  Championships .
Phelps 's international titles and record-breaking performances have  अर्जित  him the World  तैराक  of the Year  पुरस्कार  seven times and American Swimmer of the Year Award nine times  as  well as  the   फिना   तैराक   of  the Year  पुरस्कार   in  2012  .
His  unprecedented   ओलम्पिक   कामयाबी  in 2008 earned  फेल्प्स   खेल  Illustrated magazine 's Sportsman of  the  Year award .
After  the   2008  Summer  ओलंपिक  ,  फेल्प्स  started  the  Michael Phelps  न्यास  , which focuses on growing the  खेल  of  तैराकी  and promoting healthier lifestyles .
he  expects to do  further  work with his foundation after the  2012  Olympics  ,  which  he  has  कहा  will be his last .
लेनोवो  Group Limited (  )   is  a Chinese multinational computer hardware and  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स  company  साथ   इसके   मुख्यालय   in  Beijing , China and Morrisville , North Carolina and  इसके   पंजीकृत   दफ्तर  in  हांग   काँग  ,  चीन   .
इसके  products  शामिल   निजी  computers  ,  tablet  कंप्यूटर  , mobile  फोन  , workstations , servers  ,  electronic storage devices  ,  IT management  तन्त्र  and  smart  televisions .
लेनोवो  is the world  's  second-largest PC  विक्रेता   by   2012  unit sales .
It markets the ThinkPad line  of  notebook  कंप्यूटर  and  the  ThinkCentre line of desktops  .
Lenovo has  परिचालन  in more than 60  देशों  and sells its  उत्पाद  in  around  160 countries  .
Lenovo was founded in Beijing  in  1984 and incorporated in Hong  काँग  in 1988 under  इसके  previous name  ,  Legend .
Lenovo  is  listed on  the  Hong  काँग   भण्डार  Exchange  और  is  a  constituent  of  the  हैंग  Seng  china-affiliated  Corporations Index .
Slug is a common name  लिये   an  apparently  shell-less  terrestrial gastropod mollusk .
The word `` slug ''  is  also often  प्रयुक्त  as  भाग  of the  आम   नाम  of any gastropod  mollusc  that has no  शेल  ,  रै  a very reduced shell , or has  तभी  a small internal shell .
( This is in contrast to the  आम  name ``  घोंघा  ``  ,  which is applied to gastropods  कि  have a  नतीजे  shell that is large  पर्याप्त   कि  the soft parts  of  the  एनिमल  can retract  fully  into  it   .  )
Slugs exist on  जमीन  and in the sea  ,  and there  is  even one  genus  of freshwater slugs ,  acochlidium  .
the  unadorned word `` slug ''  is  however applied  primarily  to land slugs  ,  whereas  slugs  from  the   समुद्र   or   इससे   freshwater  are  प्रायः   referred  to as `` sea slugs `` and `` freshwater slugs  ''  .
जमीन  gastropods with a shell  कि   is   नहीं  quite vestigial ,  लकिन  is too  छोटी   to   retract  into ( like  अनेक  in the family Urocyclidae ) , are known as semislugs .
The various taxonomic families  of   slugs   रूप   भाग  of several  काफी  different evolutionary lineages which also include  घोंघे  .
Thus  ,  for example , the various families  of   जमीन  slugs are not very  closely  related to  एक  another  ,  despite a  सतही  similarity in the overall body form  .
The shell-less condition has  arisen  many times independently  दौरान  the  विकासवादी   पास्ट  ,  और  thus the category  ``  slug ''  is  emphatically a  polyphyletic   एक   .
Slugs , like  सब  other gastropods  ,  undergo  torsion   (  a 180° twisting of the internal organs ) during development  .
Internally  ,  slug anatomy  clearly  shows the  प्रभाव   of  this rotation , but externally  the   लाशें  of land  slugs   appear  to  be  more or less  सममित  , except  लिये  the positioning of the pneumostome  ,   जिससे  is  on  one side of the animal  ,  normally the  सही  hand side .
The soft ,  slimy  bodies of  slugs   हैं  prone to desiccation  ,  so land-living  slugs  are confined to moist environments  और   जरूर  retreat  to  damp hiding  स्थान  when the weather  is  dry .
the  subsequent information in this article applies to land slugs .
is  a  लैटिन   शब्द  that  अर्थात्  ``  यूँ  ''  or  ,  in  writing  ,  ``  it  was thus in the source material ''  .

Imperial Standard  of  Napoleon  i
Napoleon Bonaparte ( ,  ;  15 August  1769  – 5 May 1821 ) was a  फ्रेंच   सैन्य   और  political leader  जो  rose to prominence during the latter stages of the  फ्रेंच  Revolution and its associated wars  in  Europe .
As Napoleon I ,  he   थी  Emperor of  the   फ्रेंच  from 1804 to 1815 .
उसके  legal  सुधार  , the Napoleonic  कोड   ,  has  महरूम  a major influence  on  many civil law jurisdictions  विश्वव्यापी  , but he is  बेहतरीन  remembered for his role in the wars  led   विरूद्ध  France by a series of coalitions ,  the  so-called Napoleonic Wars .
He  स्थापित   आधिपत्य   over  most of continental Europe and sought to spread the  आदर्शों  of the  फ्रेंच   क्रान्ति  , while  consolidating   an  imperial monarchy which restored  पहलुओं  of the deposed Ancien Régime .
Due to  उसके  success in  ये   युद्धों   ,  often  विरूद्ध  numerically  श्रेष्ठ  enemies , he is  generally  regarded as one  of   the  greatest military commanders of all time  ,  and his campaigns are  पढ़ाई   at   सैन्य  academies worldwide .
नेपोलियन   थी   born   at  Ajaccio  in  Corsica in  a   परिवार   of   प्रतिष्ठित  Italian ancestry  जिससे  had  settled  Corsica in  the  16th century .
He trained as  an  artillery officer  in  mainland  फ़्रांस   .
He  रोज़   to  prominence under the  फ्रेंच  First Republic and  led   कामयाब   अभियान  against the  पहला  and Second Coalitions arrayed  विरूद्ध   फ़्रांस  .
he  led a successful  आक्रमण  of  the  Italian peninsula .
in   1799  , he  मंचन  a  तख्तापलट  d'état and installed himself as First Consul ; five years later the French Senate  proclaimed  him emperor  ,  following a  plebiscite  in  उसके  favour .
In the  पहला  decade of the  19th  century , the French Empire under Napoleon engaged in a  श्रेणी   of  conflicts—the Napoleonic  युद्धों   —that   शामिल  every major  यूरोपीय  power .
After  a  streak of  victories   ,  France secured a  प्रबल  position in  महाद्वीपीय  Europe , and Napoleon maintained  the   फ्रेंच  sphere  of   influence  through the formation of extensive  alliances  and the appointment of friends  और   परिवार   सदस्यों  to rule other European countries as French client states .
The Peninsular War and  1812  French invasion of Russia  चिह्नित  turning points  in  Napoleon 's  सौभाग्य  .
His Grande Armée was badly  क्षतिग्रस्त   in   the  campaign and  never  fully recovered  .
in  1813  ,  the  छठे  Coalition defeated his forces  at  Leipzig ; the following year the Coalition invaded France  ,  forced Napoleon to abdicate  और   exiled  him  to  the island  of  Elba .
Less than a  साल  later , he  फरार   एल्बा   और  returned to power  ,  but  थी  defeated at the  बैटल   of  Waterloo in  जून   1815   .
नेपोलियन  spent the last  छह  years of his life in  कारावास  by  the  British on the  द्वीप   of  Saint Helena .
An  पोस्टमार्टम  concluded he died of stomach cancer  ,  but  वहीँ  has been some debate  परिचय  the cause of his  मौत   ,  as some  विद्वानों  have speculated that  he   थी  a  शिकार  of arsenic poisoning .
This is  a  chronological listing of the  संयुक्त   राज्य   सीनेटरों   इससे  Pennsylvania .
United States Senators  हैं  popularly elected , for a six-year term  ,   शुरूआत  January  3  .
चुनावों  are held the  पहला   मंगलवार  after November 1 .
Before 1914  ,   वे  were chosen  by  the  पेन्सिलवेनिया  General Assembly  ,   और   पहले   1935   ,   उनके   शर्तें  began March 4  .
The South Africa national rugby union team ( known as the Springboks  )   represents  South  अफ़्रीकी  in rugby union .
They compete in the annual Rugby Championship , along  साथ   southern-hemisphere  counterparts  अर्जेंटीना  ,  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  and New Zealand .
They have won this  चैंपियनशिप  on three occasions in sixteen  सालो  .
They are currently ranked second in the world by the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Rugby Board ,  और  were named  2008  World Team of  the  Year at the Laureus World Sports Awards .
Although  दक्षिण   अफ़्रीकी   थी   इंस्ट्रूमेंटल  in the  सृष्टि  of  the   रग्बी  World Cup competition , the Springboks  किया  not compete in the first two World  cups   in  1987 and 1991  क्युकी  of  anti-apartheid  sporting boycotts of South  अफ़्रीकी  .
the   टोली   बना  its World  कप   डेब्यू  in 1995 , when the  newly   लोकतांत्रिक   दक्षिण  Africa hosted  the  tournament .
The  springboks  then defeated the  सब  Blacks 15–12  in   the  final  ,  which is now  remembered  as one  of  the greatest moments in South Africa 's sporting history , and a  watershed  moment  in  the  post-apartheid  nation-building  प्रक्रम  .
South Africa  regained  their title as champions 12 years later ,  जब  they  पराजित  England  15–6  in the 2007 final .
As a result  of  the 2007 World  कप  tournament the  springboks  were promoted  to   पहला  place  in   the   आईआरबी  World Rankings , a position they held  जबतक  July the following year  जब  New Zealand regained the  शीर्ष  spot .
The Springboks  खेल  in green  और   सुनहरा   jerseys  ,  और  their emblems are the Springbok and the Protea  .
The side has been playing  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   रग्बी  since  1891  , when a  अंग्रेजों  Isles side  toured  the nation , playing South Africa  in  their  पहला  Test on  30   जुलाई   .
South Africa was  coached  by  जेक  White , who led the Boks to the  2007  World Cup title , announcing his resignation effectively  इससे  the end  of  2007 .
His replacement  's  (  पीटर  de Villiers  )  contract  समाप्त   in   2011  , following a 11–9  शिकस्त   to  Australia  in  the Rugby World Cup quarter-final , who then stated he  होता  not be  हस्ताक्षर  a  नई  deal .
The previous captain was John Smit , who before he retired  in  2011 played  वेश्या   लिये  most of his career  ,   हालांकि  he has also been a prop , mainly  in   2008   और  2009 .
Due to Smit being  अनुपलब्ध  for the November 2010  परीक्षण  after surgery  ,  lock  विक्टर  Matfield took Smit 's place as  कप्तान  for that  दौरे  .
The current captain is  जां  de Villiers .
The Battle of Gettysburg ( ,  साथ  an sound  )  , was fought July  1–3  , 1863 , in  और  around the town of Gettysburg , Pennsylvania .
It was the battle with  the  largest number  of  casualties  in   the   अमरीकी  Civil War and  is  often described as the war  's  turning  पाइंट  .
Union  maj.  Gen. George Gordon  meade   's   फौज   of   the  Potomac defeated attacks by Confederate  gen.  Robert E. Lee 's Army of  उत्तरी  Virginia  ,  ending Lee 's  आक्रमण   of  the North .
After  उसके  success  at  Chancellorsville  in  Virginia in May 1863 ,  ली  led his army  through  the Shenandoah Valley to begin his second invasion of  the  North—the Gettysburg Campaign  .
With his army in high spirits  ,  Lee intended to shift the focus of the summer campaign from  war-ravaged  northern  वर्जिनिया   और  hoped  to  influence  उत्तरी   राजनेता  to  दे   up  their prosecution of  the   युद्ध   by  penetrating  as   दूर  as Harrisburg , Pennsylvania ,  or  even Philadelphia .
prodded  by  अध्यक्ष  Abraham Lincoln , Maj. Gen. Joseph  वेश्या   स्थानांतरित  his army in pursuit , but was relieved just  तीन  days  पहले  the battle and replaced by Meade  .
Elements of the  दो  armies initially collided at Gettysburg on  जुलाई  1  ,  1863 , as  ली  urgently concentrated his  शक्तियां  there  ,  his objective being to  engage  the Union  फौज   और  destroy it .
Low ridges to the northwest of  कस्बा  were defended initially by a Union cavalry division under  ब्रिगेडियर  . Gen.  जॉन  Buford , and  जल्द   reinforced  with two  corps  of  संघ  infantry .
However  ,  two  विशाल  Confederate corps assaulted  उन्हें  from the northwest  और  north  ,  collapsing the hastily  विकसित   संघ   लाइनों  , sending the  defenders  retreating through the streets of town  to  the hills just to  the  south  .
On  the  second  दिन   of   बैटल  , most of both armies had assembled .
The  संघ   लकीर   थी   रखी  out in a  रक्षात्मक  formation  resembling  a  fishhook   .
In the late afternoon of July 2  ,  Lee launched a heavy  उत्पीड़न  on the  संघ  left flank ,  और  fierce  लड़   raged  at Little Round Top , the Wheatfield , Devil 's  डेन  , and  the   आड़ू  Orchard .
On  the  Union right ,  demonstrations  escalated  into   full-scale  assaults  on  Culp 's  हिल  and Cemetery Hill .
All across  the  battlefield ,  despite   significant   नुकसान  ,  the  Union  defenders  held their lines .
On the  तीसरा   दिन   of  battle , July 3 , fighting resumed  on   culp  's  हिल   ,  and cavalry battles raged to the east and  दक्षिण  ,  लकिन   the  main  इवेंट   थी   a  dramatic infantry  उत्पीड़न   by   12,500  Confederates against the center of  the  Union line on Cemetery Ridge , known as Pickett 's Charge .
the  charge was repulsed by Union rifle  और  artillery  आग  , at great  नुकसान  to the Confederate army .
Lee led his army on a torturous retreat back to Virginia .
Between 46,000 and 51,000 soldiers from  दोनो   सेना  were  हताहत  in  the  three-day battle  .
That November , President Lincoln  प्रयुक्त   the  dedication  रस्म   लिये   the  Gettysburg  नेशनल  Cemetery to honor the fallen Union  सैनिको  and redefine the  purpose  of the war  in  his historic  gettysburg  Address .
an   अकादमिक  discipline  ,  or field of study  ,  is  a  branch of knowledge  कि  is taught and  शोधकार्य  at the college  or   विश्वविद्यालयों  level  .
Disciplines are defined ( in  भाग  ) ,  और  recognized by the  अकादमिक  journals in which  शोध  is  प्रकाशित  ,  और   the  learned societies  और  academic departments  or  faculties  to  which  उनके  practitioners belong .
However , there exists no  औपचारिक   मापदण्ड  for when educational programs  और  scholarly journals  रूप   an   अकादमिक  discipline .
a  huge difference exists  between  ,  on  the  एक  hand ,  खूब   स्थापित  disciplines  कि   मौजूद  in  लगभग  all universities  सब  over the world  ,  have a  long  history  ,  and have a well  स्थापित   नियत  of journals and  सम्मेलनों   ,  and , on  the  other hand , suggestions for new  फ़ील्ड   समर्थित   तभी  by few universities and publications .
Fields of  पढ़ाई   प्रायः  have  अनेक  sub-disciplines or branches  ,   और  the  distinguishing  lines between these are often both arbitrary  और   अस्पष्ट  .
PHP  is   a  server-side  एनक्रिप्शन  language designed  लिये  web  विकास  but also used as a general-purpose programming language .
PHP is now  संस्थापित  on  अधिक  than 244 million websites  और   2.1  million web  सर्वर  .
Originally created by Rasmus Lerdorf in 1995 , the reference implementation  of  PHP is now produced by The PHP Group .
While PHP originally stood  लिये  Personal Home  पेज  , it now  स्टैंड  for PHP  :  Hypertext  preprocessor  , a  recursive  acronym .
पीएचपी  code is interpreted by  a  web server with a PHP  प्रोसेसर   मोड्यूल  which  generates  the resulting web  पेज  : PHP commands can be embedded directly  into   an   एचटीएमएल   सोर्स   दस्तावेज़  rather than calling an external file to process data .
It has  भी  evolved to include a  command-line   इंटरफ़ेस  capability and  can  be  प्रयुक्त   in   स्टैंडअलोन   आलेखीय  applications  .
PHP  is   फ़्री  software released under the PHP License , which is  असंगत  with the GNU General Public  अनुज्ञा  ( GPL  )  due to restrictions on the usage of the term PHP  .
PHP can  be   तैनात  on  सबसे  web  सर्वर  and also as a  स्टैंडअलोन   शेल   on  almost every  ऑपरेटिंग   प्रणाली   और  platform , free of charge .
John  fitzgerald   ``  Jack ''  कैनेडी  ( May  29  , 1917 – November 22 , 1963 ) , often referred  to  by his  आद्याक्षर  JFK , was  the  35th  अध्यक्ष  of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  , serving from  1961  until his death in 1963  .
बाद  military service as commander of the  मोटर  Torpedo Boats PT-109 and PT-59 during World  युद्ध  II in the South Pacific , Kennedy represented  मैसाचुसेट्स   '   11th  congressional district  in  the U.S. House  of  Representatives from  1947  to 1953 as a  डेमोक्रेट   .
Thereafter  ,   he  served in the U.S. Senate  इससे  1953 until 1960 .
Kennedy defeated  वाइस  President and  रिपब्लिकन   प्रत्याशी  Richard  निक्सन  in  the  1960  u.S.  presidential  चुनाव  .
at  43 years of  आयु  , he is  the  youngest to have been  निर्वाचित  to the office , the second-youngest President  (  after Theodore Roosevelt ) , and the first person born in  the  20th  सदी  to  serve  as president  .
a   कैथोलिक  , Kennedy  is  the only  non-   प्रोटोस्टेंट   अध्यक्ष   ,  and is the only  अध्यक्ष  to have won a Pulitzer Prize .
Events during  उसके   प्रेसिडेंसी  included  the  Bay of Pigs Invasion , the Cuban Missile Crisis  ,  the building of the  बर्लिन  Wall , the Space Race  ,  the  african-american  Civil  अधिकारों   गति   ,   और  early stages of the  वियतनाम  War  .
Therein , Kennedy increased  the  number of  सैन्य  advisers , special operation forces , and  helicopters  in an effort  to  curb the spread of communism in South East Asia .
the  Kennedy administration adopted  the  policy of the  रणनीतिक  Hamlet Program which  थी   implemented   by  the  दक्षिण  Vietnamese  सरकारी  .
It involved certain forced relocation , village internment , and segregation of  ग्रामीण  South  वियतनामी  from the northern  और  southern communist insurgents  .
कैनेडी   थी  assassinated on November  22  ,  1963  in Dallas , Texas  .
Lee Harvey Oswald was charged with the crime  ,  but  he  was  शॉट  and killed  by   जोकर  Ruby two days later ,  पहले  a trial could take  प्लेस   .
The FBI and the Warren Commission  officially  concluded that Oswald  थी   the  lone assassin  .
However ,  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  House Select Committee on  assassinations  ( HSCA ) concluded that those investigations  यहूद  flawed  और  that  कैनेडी   थी  probably assassinated  as  the  परिणाम  of a  षड्यंत्र  .
However , ABC News  in  their investigation , The Kennedy Assassination  :  Beyond Conspiracy  ,  confirmed the  निष्कर्षों   of  the  वारेन  Commission ; having concluded  ओसवाल्ड   acted   अलोन  .
Kennedy 's controversial Department of Defense TFX fighter  bomber  program led to a  congressional   छानबीन  that lasted from 1963 to 1970  .
Since the 1960s  सूचना  concerning Kennedy  's  private  जीवन  has  आइये  to light .
विवरण  of Kennedy 's health problems in which he struggled  have  become better known , especially since the 1990s .
Although initially  रखा  secret from  the  general public  ,  reports of  कैनेडी   's   philandering  have garnered much  दबायें   .
Kennedy  बाँधने   अत्यधिक  in public opinion ratings  of   u.S.   राष्ट्रपतियों   .
`` Stand by Me ''  is  a song originally  performed  by Ben E. King  और  written by King ,  जेरी  Leiber  ,  and  माइक  Stoller  ,  inspired by the  आध्यात्मिक   ``  Lord Stand  by   me   ,  '' plus two lines rooted in  ज़बूर  46:2–3  .
There have  महरूम  over 400 recorded  संस्करण  of the song  .
a  political cartoon  इससे  an 1894 Puck  पत्रिका  by illustrator S.D . Ehrhart , shows a  फार्म  woman  labeled   ``   लोकतांत्रिक  Party  ''  sheltering from a tornado  of  political change  .
A metaphor is a figure of speech that describes  a  subject by asserting that  it   is  , on  कुछ  point  of   तुलना   ,  the  वही   as  another otherwise unrelated  ऑब्जेक्ट  .
Metaphor is a  प्रकार  of  सादृश्य  and  is  closely related to other rhetorical  आंकड़े   of  speech that achieve  उनके  effects via association , comparison or resemblance including allegory , hyperbole , and simile .
In  simpler  terms ,  a  metaphor compares  दो  objects or things  बगैर  using the words `` like '' or ``  as  '' .
One of the  सबसे   prominent  examples  of   a  metaphor in English  साहित्य  is the All  the   संसार   's   a  stage monologue  इससे  As  तुम   जैसे   it  :
All  the   संसार  's a stage,
And all  the   मेन  and women merely players ;
They have their exits  और   उनके  entrances ; —  विलियम   शेक्सपियर  , As You Like It , 2/7
इस   उद्धरण  is a  रूपक   क्युकी  the  संसार   is  not literally a  स्टेज   .
By figuratively  asserting   कि   the  world  is   a  stage , Shakespeare uses the points of comparison between the  संसार  and  a  stage to convey an understanding  परिचय   the   यांत्रिकी  of the world and the lives  of  the  लोगों   भीतर   it  .

printmaking  is  the   प्रक्रम  of  बनाना   artworks  by  मुद्रण  ,  सामान्यतः  on paper .
Printmaking  सामान्यतः  covers only the process of  बनाना  prints with  an  element of originality ,  बल्कि  than  बस  being  a  photographic reproduction of  a  painting  .
Except  in   the  case of monotyping , the process is capable  of  producing  multiples   of  the same  टुकड़ा   ,  which  is   पुकारा  a  छपाई  .
Each  छपाई  produced is not  माना  a ``  नक़ल  '' but rather is considered an  ``  original ''  .
This is  क्युकी   typically  each print varies to an extent  due  to variables  मूलभूत  to the printmaking process  ,  and  भी   क्युकी  the  imagery  of a print  is   typically  not  बस  a reproduction of another work  लकिन  rather is often a unique  चित्र  designed from the start to be  expressed   in  a particular printmaking technique .
A print may be known  as  an impression .
Printmaking ( other than monotyping ) is not  चुनी   तभी  for  इसके  ability to  उपज  multiple  impressions  ,  लकिन  rather  लिये  the unique  qualities  that each of the printmaking processes lends itself to .
prints  are  निर्मित  by transferring  स्याही   इससे   a   मेट्रिक्स   or  through a  prepared  screen to a sheet  of  paper or  अन्य  material  .
आम  types of matrices include  :  metal  प्लेटों  , usually  तांबे  or zinc , or  पॉलिमर  plates for  नक्काशी  or etching  ;   स्टोन  , aluminum  ,  or  पॉलिमर   लिये  lithography ; blocks of  लकडी  for woodcuts and wood engravings ;  और  linoleum for linocuts .
Screens  बना  of silk or synthetic fabrics are used for the screenprinting process .
अन्य  types of matrix  substrates  and related processes  हैं  discussed below .
अनेक   impressions  printed  इससे  the same  मेट्रिक्स  form  an  edition .
चूंकि  the  लेट  19th century ,  कलाकारों  have  generally  signed individual impressions from an edition  और  often number  the   impressions  to form a  सीमित  edition .
Prints may also be printed in book form  ,  such as  illustrated  books  or   कलाकार   's  books .
il  Divo is an English multinational  operatic   पॉप  vocal group  निर्मित   by  music manager ,  कार्यपालिका   ,  and reality TV  स्टार   साइमन  Cowell .
Formed in the United Kingdom , they  हैं  also signed to Cowell 's record  लेबल  , Syco Music  .
il  Divo is  a  group of four male singers : French pop singer Sébastien Izambard ,  स्पेनी  baritone Carlos Marín , American  टेनर  David Miller , and Swiss tenor Urs Bühler .
to  date , they  have  sold more  than   26  million  एल्बम   विश्वव्यापी  .
Su-15  ,  one of the principal Soviet  एयर   रक्षा  interceptors  in   the  1970s and  1980s
An  interceptor  aircraft ( or  बस   interceptor  ) is a type of  सेनानी  aircraft designed specifically to prevent missions of enemy aircraft , particularly bombers and  reconnaissance   वायुयान  , and destroy  उन्हें  , relying usually on great speed and powerful armament .
होने   प्रयुक्त   चूंकि  the First  संसार   युद्ध  ,  बाद  the late  1960s  , interceptors became less important due to shifting  इससे  bombers to  इंटरकांटिनेंटल  ballistic  मिसाइलें   (   icbms   )  for nuclear warfare  .
a  Vietnamese American  (  )  is  an American of  वियतनामी   descent  .
वे  make  up  about half of  सब  overseas Vietnamese ( Người  việt  Hải Ngoại )  और  are the fourth-largest Asian American group .
Mass Vietnamese  आव्रजन   to   the  United States started  बाद  1975 , after the end of the Vietnam War .
Early immigrants were refugee  नाव  people fleeing persecution  or  poverty  .
मजबूर  to flee from their homeland  और  often thrust into poor  शहरी  neighborhoods , these newcomers have  nevertheless  managed  to  establish strong communities  in   a  short  राशि   of  time  .
More  than  sixty percent of Vietnamese Americans reside  in   the  states of California ,  टेक्सास  ,  वॉशिंगटन  , Florida  ,  and Virginia .

एडोल्फ   हिटलर  committed suicide  by  gunshot on 30 April 1945  in   उसके  Führerbunker in  बर्लिन  .
His wife Eva (  née  Braun ) committed suicide with him  by   ingesting  cyanide  .
कि   दोपहर   ,  in accordance  साथ  Hitler 's prior instructions , their  remains  were  carried  up the stairs through the bunker 's  आपात  exit , doused in petrol and set alight in  the  Reich  chancellery  garden outside the bunker .
The Soviet archives  रिकार्ड  that  उनके  burnt  remains  were recovered and  interred  in successive locations until 1970 when  वे   यहूद   again  exhumed , cremated and the ashes scattered  .
Accounts  differ  as to the  कारण  of  मौत  ; one that he  died   by  poison only  और  another that he  died   by  a self-inflicted  gunshot  , while  biting  down on a cyanide capsule .
Contemporary historians have  अस्वीकृत  these accounts as  होने  either Soviet propaganda or an attempted compromise in order to reconcile the different  conclusions  .
एक  eye-witness  अंकित  that the body showed signs of having been shot through the mouth  ,  but  इस  has been proven unlikely .
There  is  also  विवाद   regarding  the authenticity  of  skull  और  jaw fragments which  यहूद  recovered .
in  2009 ,  डीएनए   परीक्षण  were performed on a  कपाल  Soviet  officials  had long  believed   to   be  Hitler 's  .
The  परीक्षण  revealed that the skull was actually that of a woman  कम  than  40   सालो   बूढ़ा   .
Location of  मिसौरी
The alcohol  कानून  of Missouri  हैं  among  the  least restrictive and most  lax   और  permissive  in  the  संयुक्त  States .
मिसौरी  is known throughout the  मिडवेस्ट  for its largely laissez-faire  दृष्टिकोण  to alcohol regulation , in sharp contrast to the  बहुत  strict alcohol laws of some of  इसके   पड़ोसी  , like Kansas and Oklahoma .
necrotizing   fasciitis   (   or  ) or NF ,  commonly  known as flesh-eating disease or  flesh-eating   जीवाणु   सिंड्रोम   ,   is  a rare  संक्रमण  of  the  deeper layers of skin and subcutaneous tissues  ,  easily  spreading  across the fascial  प्लेन   भीतर  the  subcutaneous  tissue .
Necrotizing fasciitis  is   जल्दी  progressing , having greater risk of developing in  the  immunocompromised due to  शर्तें  like diabetes  ,  cancer , etc .
It is  a  severe disease of sudden onset  और  is  प्रायः  treated  तत्काल  with  ऊँची  doses of  intravenous  antibiotics .
प्रकार  I  describes  a  polymicrobial  infection ,  whereas  Type  ii  describes  a  monomicrobial infection  .
Many types of  जीवाणु   can  cause necrotizing fasciitis ( e.g. , Group A streptococcus ( Streptococcus pyogenes )  ,   staphylococcus  aureus , Clostridium  perfringens   ,  Bacteroides fragilis  ,   aeromonas  hydrophila ) .
Such infections  हैं  more  संभावित  to occur in people with compromised immune systems  .
historically  , Group  a  streptococcus made up most cases of Type II infections .
however  , since as early as 2001 , another  गंभीर   रूप   of   monomicrobial   necrotizing   fasciitis  has  महरूम   observed   साथ  increasing frequency ,  caused  by  methicillin-resistant   staphylococcus  aureus ( MRSA  )  .
कुछ   प्रकाशित  case reports  have   implied   a  possible link between use  of   non-steroidal  anti-inflammatory  दवाएँ   और  NF , though  the  evidence  of  the link  थी  said to be weak because of a small  क्रमांक  of case patients and it  थी  unclear whether the drugs  बस  masked the symptoms of  a  secondary infection  or  were  a   कारण  per se  .
World War II  (  WWII or WW2 )  ,   भी  known  as  the Second World War  ,  was  a  global  युद्ध   कि  lasted from 1939 to 1945  .
It involved the  विशाल  majority  of  the  संसार   's  nations —including  सब  of the great  शक्तियां  —eventually forming two opposing military  alliances  : the Allies and the Axis .
It was  the  most widespread war in  इतिहास   ,  with more than 100 million people  सेवारत  in  सैन्य  units from over 30  अलग  countries  .
In  a  state  of  ``  कुल  war `` , the  प्रमुख  participants placed  उनके  entire economic , industrial  ,  and scientific  सामर्थ्य  at the service of the  युद्ध   प्रयत्न  ,  erasing  the distinction  between  civilian  और   सैन्य  resources  .
Marked by mass deaths  of   नागरिकों  , including the Holocaust and the only  उपयोग  of nuclear weapons in warfare , it resulted in 50 million to  over   75  million fatalities .
These deaths make World War II by far  the  deadliest conflict in  इंसान   इतिहास   .
the   साम्राज्य   of   जापानी  aimed to dominate East  एशिया   और  was already at war with the Republic  of  China in 1937 , but the world war is  generally  said to have begun on 1  सितंबर  1939 with the invasion of Poland by  जर्मनी  and  subsequent  declarations of  युद्ध   on  Germany by France  और  Britain .
From late 1939 to early 1941 , in  a  series of campaigns and treaties ,  जर्मनी  formed the  अक्ष  alliance  साथ  Italy ,  conquering   or  subduing  much  of  महाद्वीपीय  Europe .
following  the Molotov–Ribbentrop  अनुबंध  , Germany and the Soviet  संघ  partitioned and  annexed  territories  between  themselves of their  यूरोपीय  neighbours  ,  including  कैंडल  .
The United Kingdom and  the  other members of  the  British  राष्ट्रमंडल  were the only  प्रमुख  Allied forces continuing the fight against the  अक्ष   ,  with battles taking  प्लेस   in  North Africa as  खूब  as the long-running  बैटल   of  the Atlantic .
In  जून  1941 ,  the  European  अक्ष  launched  an  invasion of the  सोवियत  Union , giving a  प्रारंभ  to the  largest   जमीन   थिएटर  of war in history , which  tied   bas  the major  भाग  of the Axis ' military forces for the rest  of  the war .
in  December 1941  ,  Japan  joined  the Axis , attacked the United  राज्य  and European territories in the Pacific Ocean , and quickly  conquered  much of the  पश्चिमी   प्रशांत  .
The Axis advance  थी  stopped  in   1942  ,  बाद   जापानी  lost a series of naval  लड़ाइयों  and European Axis  सैनिकों  were defeated  in  North Africa and  ,  decisively , at  stalingrad  .
in  1943  ,   साथ   a  series of  जर्मनी  defeats  in  Eastern  यूरोपीय   ,  the  अलाइड   आक्रमण   of  Italy  ,   और  American victories in the Pacific  ,  the Axis lost the  पहल   और   undertook   रणनीतिक  retreat on all  fronts  .
In 1944 , the Western  allies  invaded France , while the Soviet  संघ  regained  सब  of its territorial  नुकसान  and  invaded   जर्मनी  and its  allies  .
During 1944 and 1945 the United States defeated the Japanese  नेवी  and captured key Western Pacific islands .
The  युद्ध  in  यूरोपीय  ended  साथ  the capture of  बर्लिन  by Soviet  और  Polish troops and  the  subsequent  जर्मनी  unconditional surrender on 8 May  1945  .
following  the Potsdam  घोषणा  by the Allies on 26  जुलाई  1945 , the United States dropped atomic bombs  on  the Japanese cities  of  Hiroshima  on   6  August , and Nagasaki on 9 August .
With an invasion of the Japanese archipelago  निकट  ,  और  the Soviet  संघ   having  declared war on  जापानी  by invading Manchuria ,  जापानी   surrendered   on  15 August  1945  , ending  the  war in  एशिया  and cementing  the  total  विजय  of the Allies over  the  Axis  .
World War II altered the  राजनैतिक  alignment and social structure  of  the world  .
The United Nations ( UN ) was  स्थापित   to   फोस्टर  international cooperation  और  prevent future conflicts  .
The great powers that were the  victors  of the  war—the   संयुक्त  States  ,  the  सोवियत  Union ,  चीन  , the  संयुक्त  Kingdom ,  और  France—became the permanent members of  the  United Nations Security Council .
The Soviet  संघ  and  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  emerged as rival superpowers ,  सेटिंग   the  stage for the Cold  युद्ध  ,  जिससे  lasted for the  अगला   46  years .
Meanwhile ,  the  influence of  यूरोपीय  great  शक्तियां   प्रारंभ  to decline , while the decolonisation of  एशिया   और   अफ़्रीकी   began  .
Most countries whose  उद्योग   था   महरूम  damaged  स्थानांतरित  towards economic recovery  .
Political integration , especially in  यूरोपीय   ,   उभरा  as  an  effort  to   stabilise  postwar relations  और  fight  अधिक  effectively  in   the  Cold War .
A  सीमित  liability company ( LLC  )  is a flexible form of enterprise that blends elements  of  partnership and corporate structures  .
Note than  an  LLC  is  not a  निगम   ,   और  calling an LLC a  निगम  is technically incorrect .
An  llc  is  a  legal form of company that  provides  limited liability to  इसके  owners in  the   विशाल  majority of United States jurisdictions .
LLCs do not  need  to be organized for  लाभ  .
पाँच   k-cups
The inside of  a  used K-Cup  ,  with the top foil  और  the used coffee grounds removed  .
इस  shows the filter inside the K-Cup .
k-cup  portion packs  हैं  used  साथ  Keurig or other single cup brewing systems to brew a cup  of   कॉफी  , tea  ,  or hot  चॉकलेट   .
प्रत्येक  K-Cup is a  प्लास्टिक  container with  a  coffee filter inside .
Ground coffee beans  हैं  packed in the K-Cup and sealed air-tight  साथ   a  combination plastic and foil  ढक्कन  .
जब   the  K-Cup is placed  in   a   keurig  brewer , the brewer punctures the foil lid and the bottom of the  k-cup  and  शक्तियां   hot  water under pressure through the  k-cup  and into a mug .
Keurig licenses its K-Cup  प्रौद्योगिकी  to  कॉफी  roasters  और  tea makers  ऐसे   as   ग्रीन  Mountain Coffee Roasters , Diedrich/ Gloria Jeans  ,   टिमोथी  's World Coffee  ,   वैन  Houtte ,  हिरण  Coffee  ,   celestial  Seasonings  ,   bigelow  Tea  कम्पनी  ,  twinings  ,  टली  's ,  कॉफी  People  और  Newman 's Own  .
Keurig 's patents  on  the  असली  K-Cup design expired  in  September 2012 .
Keurig holds  at  least one additional  ,  still-active US  पेटेंट  and another  पेटेंट  application ,  detailing  improvements that have subsequently  महरूम  incorporated  in  their K-Cup design  .

gallet  MultiChron Astronomic ( ca . 1959 ) —complex mechanical  chronograph   साथ  12 hour recoding capabilities  ,  automatic day , date , month  ,   और  moon  phase  display
A modern  seiko  quartz wristwatch using the chronograph function ( movement 7T92 )  .
नागरिक  Atessa Eco-Drive ATV53-3023  analog-digital  chronograph with 4 area Radio Controlled  रिसेप्शन  ( North America , Europe , China  ,   जापानी  ) .
A chronograph is  a   विशिष्ट  type  of  watch that is used as  a  stopwatch  संयुक्त   साथ  a display  देखें  .
A basic  chronograph  has an  स्वतंत्र   स्वीप  second  हाथ  ; it can  be  started , stopped , and returned to zero by  successive  pressure on the stem .
लुई   moinet   invented  the  chronograph  in 1816
conventional  PCI ( PCI  is  an initialism  formed   इससे  Peripheral  घटक  Interconnect  ,  part of  the  PCI Local Bus standard and often  shortened   to  just PCI ) is a local  कंप्यूटर   बस  for attaching hardware devices in a computer  .
The PCI  बस  supports  the   कृत्यों  found on a processor bus  ,  but  in  a  मानकीकृत   स्वरूप   कि  is independent  of  any  particular  processor  .
डिवाइस   कनेक्ट   to   the  bus appear to the processor  to  be connected  सीधे  to the processor bus , and are assigned addresses in the processor  's  address space .
Attached devices can  लो  either the form  of   an  integrated circuit  fitted  onto the motherboard itself  ,  called a planar device in  the   पीसीआई  specification , or an expansion  कार्ड  that fits into  a   स्लॉट  .
The  पीसीआई  Local Bus  थी   पहला  implemented in  ibm   pc  compatibles , where it displaced the combination  of  ISA plus  एक  VESA  लोकल   बस  as the bus  विन्यास  .
It  रै   subsequently   महरूम  adopted for other  कंप्यूटर  types .
PCI and PCI-X are  होने  replaced  by   पीसीआई   एक्स्प्रेस  ,  लकिन  , most motherboards are still made  साथ  one or more PCI slots , which are sufficient for  अनेक   उपयोग  .
The  पीसीआई   specification   कवर  the  शारीरिक   आकार  of the bus ( including the size and  अंतरण  of the circuit board edge  विद्युत   सम्पर्क  ) , electrical characteristics , bus timing , and  प्रोटोकॉल  .
The specification can be purchased from the  पीसीआई   खास   ब्याज  Group ( PCI-SIG  )   .
Typical  पीसीआई  cards used in PCs  शामिल  : network cards  ,  sound cards  ,  modems  ,  extra  पोर्ट   ऐसे  as USB or  सीरियल   ,   tv  tuner  ताश  and  डिस्क  controllers .
PCI video cards replaced ISA  और   vesa  cards  ,  until growing bandwidth requirements outgrew the capabilities of PCI  ;  the preferred interface  लिये   वीडियो  cards became AGP ,  और   तब  PCI Express  .
PCI  वीडियो  cards remain available for  उपयोग   साथ  old  pcs  without AGP or PCI Express slots .
Many devices previously provided on  पीसीआई  expansion  ताश   हैं   अभी   commonly   एकीकृत  onto  motherboards   or  available in universal  सीरियल  bus and  पीसीआई  Express versions .
Michael Whitaker  स्मिथ  ( born October  7  , 1957 ) is an American contemporary Christian  संगीतकार  , who has charted primarily  in  the contemporary Christian and  occasionally  in  the  mainstream charts .
His biggest success  in  mainstream  म्यूज़िक  was in 1991  जब  `` Place in this World '' hit No  .  6 on the Billboard Hot 100 .
Smith  is  a three-time Grammy Award winner , and has earned  40   dove   पुरस्कार  .
Over the  कोर्स  of his  करियर  ,  he   बेची  more than 13 million albums and  अंकित  29 No .  1  Hit songs  ,   चौदह   सुनहरा   एल्बम  , and five platinum  एल्बम   .
Smith is  an  American Music  पुरस्कार  recipient ;  he  was also named one of People magazine 's `` Most Beautiful  लोगों   ''  .
an  American poster from the World War II  -era  that  थी  used to inform people about  कया  they  चाहिए  do if  वे  suspect  तोड़फोड़  .
Sabotage  is  a deliberate  कार्रवाई   aimed   at  weakening  another   एंटिटी  through subversion ,  रुकावट  , disruption  ,   or  destruction  .
in  a  कार्यस्थल   सेटिंग  ,  तोड़फोड़  is the conscious withdrawal  of   दक्षता  generally directed at causing  कुछ  change in workplace conditions .
One who  engages  in  तोड़फोड़  is a saboteur .
As a rule ,  saboteurs  try to conceal their  पहचान   क्युकी  of the consequences of  उनके   क्रियाएँ   .
लिये  example , whereas an environmental pressure group might  be   प्रसन्न   to   be   पहचाना   साथ   an  act  of   तोड़फोड़  ,  it   होता  not  want  the individual identities of  the  perpetrators known .
Patrick Henry  कॉलेज  (  phc   )  is a private , independent college with  an  Evangelical  ईसाई   आधार  that focuses  on  teaching classical liberal arts  और  government  ,   स्तिथ  in Purcellville  ,  Virginia  ,  United States .
पैट्रिक  Henry is known for its conservative evangelical  ईसाई  focus  .
As of April 17 , 2007  ,   the  college was accredited  by  the Transnational  संघ   of  Christian Colleges and  स्कूलों   ,   a  national faith-related  accrediting  organization recognized by the  विभाग  of Education and the Council for Higher Education  प्रत्यायन  .
the   स्कूल   थी   संस्थापित   साथ  the  सहायता  of  the  Home  स्कूल  Legal  रक्षा   संघ   ,  and  अभी  serves as  the   मुख्यालय  for the  संगठन  , with  जिससे  it is still closely connected .
the  history  of  television  comprises   the   कार्य   of  numerous engineers and inventors in  अनेक  countries over many decades  .
the  earliest proposal was in 1908 , in a paper by A . A. Campbell-Swinton  और  postulated the use of cathode rays  .
the   पहला   व्यावहारिक  demonstrations  of  television ,  however  , were developed using electromechanical  विधि   to  scan ,  संचारण  , and  reproduce  an image .
As  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  camera and display tubes were perfected , electromechanical  टेलीविज़न  gave  रास्ता  to all-electronic systems  in  nearly all applications  .
L'Idéal Cinéma -  ज़ाक   tati  at  aniche  opened November 23rd 1905 ; the oldest still-active movie theater in  the  world
A cinema in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया
A typical multiplex ( AMC Promenade 16 in  वुडलैंड  Hills , Los Angeles ,  u.S.   )
A movie theater ( also  पुकारा  a cinema , movie house ,  फिल्मी  house  ,  film theater  or  picture house  )   is  a  स्थान  ,  प्रायः  a  भवन  ,  लिये  viewing films .
Most  लकिन  not all movie theaters are  वाणिज्यिक  operations catering to the general public , who  attend   by   खरीदना  a ticket .
The movie is projected  साथ  a movie projector onto a  विशाल   प्रक्षेप  screen  at   the  front  of  the auditorium .
Most  फिल्म   थिएटर  are now equipped for digital cinema projection , removing  the   need   to  create  और  transport a physical  फिल्मी  print .
