a  motorcycle  क्लबों  is a group of individuals whose  प्राथमिक   ब्याज  and  क्रियाएँ   involve  motorcycles .
Lyme disease , Lyme borreliosis is an  संक्रामक  disease  caused  by  at  least three species  of   जीवाणु   belonging   to  the genus  borrelia   .
borrelia   burgdorferi  sensu stricto is the  प्रमुख  cause of  lyme  disease  in  North America  ,  whereas  borrelia  afzelii and  borrelia  garinii  कारण   सबसे  European cases .
The disease is  नामित  after  the   कस्बों  of  lyme  and Old Lyme  ,  Connecticut , USA  ,  where a number  of  cases were identified in  1975  .
हालांकि  Allen Steere realized that Lyme disease was a tick-borne disease in 1978  ,  the cause of  the  disease remained  a   रहस्य  until 1981 , when  B.   burgdorferi  was identified by Willy Burgdorfer  .
Lyme disease is the  सबसे   आम  tick-borne disease in the  उत्तरी   गोलार्ध  .
Borrelia  is  transmitted to humans  by  the  काटना  of infected  ticks  belonging  to  a few species of the  genus  Ixodes  (  `` hard  ticks   ''  ) .
Early symptoms may include fever , headache  ,  fatigue , depression  ,  and a  characteristic  circular  स्किन  rash  पुकारा  erythema migrans ( EM ) .
Left untreated  ,  later  लक्षण  may involve the joints , heart ,  और   सेंट्रल  nervous system  .
In most cases , the infection  और  its symptoms are  eliminated  by antibiotics  ,   विशेषकर  if the illness is treated early .
विलम्बित  or inadequate  उपचार  can lead to more serious symptoms , which can be disabling  और  difficult to  दावत  .
Penises of minke whales on display  at  the  आइसलैंडिक  Phallological  संग्रहालय
Penis  (  plural  penises  or  penes  ) is a general  पद   लिये   the  organs with which  पुरूष  and hermaphrodite animals introduce sperm into receptive females during  copulation   .
Such organs occur  in  many animals ,  दोनो  vertebrate  और   invertebrate  ,  लकिन  males do not  भालू   a  penis in every animal species , and in  those  species  in  which the male does bear a so-called penis , the  penes  in the various species  हैं  not necessarily  समजात   .
लिये  example , the penis of a mammal is at most analogous to  the   शिश्न   of  a male insect or  barnacle  .
the  term  शिश्न  applies to  अनेक  reproductive intromittent organs  ,   लकिन  not to all  ;  for  उदाहरण   the  intromittent  अंग   of  most cephalopoda is the  hectocotylus   ,  a specialised arm  ,  and  पुरूष  spiders use their pedipalps .
In most species  of  animals in which there is an  अंग  that might reasonably be  वर्णित   as  a penis , it has no  प्रमुख  function  अन्य  than  intromission   ,   or  at least  conveying   the   शुक्राणु  to the  मादा  , but in the placental  स्तनधारियों  the penis  bears  the  distal  part of  the   urethra  , which  discharges  both urine during urination  और  semen during copulation as the occasion requires .
कलाकारों   और  repertoire  (  A & R ) is the  प्रभाग  of a record label  or  music publishing  कम्पनी  that is responsible  लिये  talent scouting and overseeing the artistic development of recording artists  and/or   songwriters  .
It also acts  as   a  liaison between artists and the  रिकार्ड  label  or  publishing company ; every activity involving artists to  the  point  of   एल्बम  release  is   generally  considered under the purview of  ,   और  responsibility of , A  &   r   .
A furlong  is   a  measure  of  distance in imperial  इकाई  and  u.S.  customary units equal  to  one-eighth  of  a mile  ,  equivalent to 220  गज   ,  660 feet , 40 rods ,  or  10 chains  .
The  सटीक  value  of   the   furlong  varies  थोड़ा   among  English-speaking countries .
पाँच  furlongs are  लगभग  1 kilometre  (  1.0058  km   is   a  closer approximation ) .
Since  the   असली  definition of  the  metre was one-quarter of one  ten-millionth   of  the  परिधि  of the  धरती  ( along the great circle coincident  साथ   the  meridian of longitude  गुजर  through Paris  )  , the  परिधि  of the Earth is about 40,000 km or about 200,000  furlongs  .
CR2032 lithium  बटन  cell battery
Lithium 9  वोल्ट   ,  AA ,  &  AAA sizes
Lithium  बैटरी  are disposable  (   प्राथमिक  ) batteries that  have  lithium metal or  लिथियम   यौगिकों   as  an anode .
They stand  अलावा  from other batteries  in   उनके   ऊँची  charge density ( long life ) and high cost per  ईकाई  .
Depending on  the  design and chemical compounds used , lithium cells  can  produce voltages  इससे   1.5  V  (  comparable  to  a  zinc–carbon  or alkaline battery ) to about 3.7 V. Lithium batteries are widely used  in   उत्पाद   ऐसे  as portable consumer electronic devices  .
रेमंड  `` Ray '' Charles  जोकर   lamontagne   (  ; born June 18  ,   1973   )  is an American singer-songwriter  .
LaMontagne  रै   released  four studio albums , Trouble , Till the Sun Turns  ब्लैक  ,  गपशप  in  the   अनाज  and God Willin ' & the Creek  do  n't  वृद्धि  .
He was born in New Hampshire and  थी  inspired to create music after hearing  an  album by Stephen Stills .
Critics have compared LaMontagne 's music to that  of  The Band  ,   वैन  Morrison  ,   उपनाम   ड्रेक  , and Tim  buckley  .
he   जीवनदान   in  Massachusetts with his wife and two children .
When the Wind Blows is  a  novel by James  पैटरसन  .
It  is   the  precursor to The Lake  हाउस  and  प्रेरित  the  अधिकतम  Ride  श्रेणी  .
The  अनोखा  is currently  नियत  to be  adapted   into  a movie .
The  पिट्सबर्ग  Steelers were founded in 1933 .
Over the  कोर्स  of the team  's   इतिहास  , the team has had  अनेक  logos while wearing virtually  the  same  वर्दी  over  the   सालो  , with subtle changes made to  दे  the uniforms an updated look  .
the   टोली  colors ,  वर्दी  , and  लोगो   हैं  often ranked as being among the best in the NFL .
Facebook on the Ad-tech 2010
फेसबुक   is  an online  सोशल  networking  सेवा  , whose name stems from the colloquial  नाम  for  the  book given to students  at  the  प्रारंभ  of the academic year by  कुछ  university administrations in  the  United  राज्य  to  सहायता   विद्यार्थी  get  to  know each other .
It  थी  founded in  फ़रवरी  2004 by Mark Zuckerberg with his college roommates and fellow  हार्वर्ड  University  विद्यार्थी  Eduardo Saverin ,  एंड्रयू  McCollum , Dustin Moskovitz  और  Chris Hughes .
The  जालस्थल   's  membership was initially  सीमित  by  the  founders  to   हार्वर्ड  students ,  लकिन  was  विस्तारित  to other  कॉलेजों  in the Boston  क्षेत्रफल  ,  the  Ivy League , and Stanford University .
It  धीरे  added support for  विद्यार्थी  at various other  विश्वविद्यालयों  before opening to high school students  ,  and eventually  to  anyone aged 13 and over  .
फेसबुक  now  allows  any  उपयोक्ता   जो  declare themselves to be  at  least 13 years old to become registered  उपयोक्ता   of  the site .
Users must register  पहले   using  the  साईट   ,   बाद  which they may create a  निजी  profile ,  add  other  उपयोक्ता   as  friends  ,  and exchange messages , including  स्वचालित  notifications when they update  उनके  profile .
additionally  , users may join  common-interest   उपयोक्ता  groups  ,   व्यवस्थित   by  workplace , school  or  college ,  or   अन्य  characteristics , and categorize their friends  into   सूचियाँ  such as  ``  People  इससे  Work '' or `` Close  मित्रों  '' .
As of September 2012 , Facebook has  over  one billion active users  .
According to a  may  2011  उपभोक्ता  Reports survey , there  हैं  7.5 million children  अंतर्गत  13 with accounts  और   5   लाख  under 10 ,  violating   the  site 's terms of  सेवा  .
In  may   2005  ,  accel   साझेदार  invested $  12.7  million  in   फेसबुक  , and  जिम  Breyer added $ 1 million  of  his own money  to   the  pot .
A January 2009 Compete.com  पढ़ाई  ranked Facebook  as  the most used social networking service by  विश्वव्यापी  monthly active users .
Entertainment  साप्ताहिक  included the  साईट  on its end-of-the-decade  ``  best-of '' list , saying , `` How on earth did we stalk  हमारी  exes ,  याद  our co-workers '  जन्मदिन   ,  bug our friends ,  और   खेल   a  rousing game  of  Scrabulous before Facebook ? ''
Critics ,  ऐसे  as  फेसबुक  Detox , state that Facebook has turned into a national obsession in  the   संयुक्त  States ,  resulting  in vast amounts of  समय   खोया  and  प्रोत्साहित  narcissism .
quantcast  estimates Facebook has 138.9 million monthly unique  u.S.   विज़िटर  in  may  2011 .
According to Social Media Today  ,   in  April 2010 an  अनुमानित  41.6 % ( 129.5 million )  of   the  U.S. population had  a   फेसबुक  account  .
Nevertheless , Facebook 's market  विकास  started to stall in some  regions  , with  the   साईट  losing  7  million  क्रियाशील  users  in  the United States and Canada  in  May 2011 .
Facebook eventually filed for  an   आरंभिक  public  offering  on  फ़रवरी   1   ,  2012 , and was headquartered in Menlo Park  ,  California  .
Facebook Inc. began selling  भण्डार   to  the public  और  trading on the NASDAQ  on   may  18  ,  2012 .
अर्विन  Johannes Eugen Rommel (  15   नवम्बर  1891 – 14  अक्तूबर  1944 )  ,  popularly known as The Desert Fox  (  Wüstenfuchs , )  ,  was  a  German Field Marshal of World  युद्ध  II  .
He  अर्जित  the respect of  दोनो   उसके  own troops and the enemies he fought .
Rommel  थी  a highly  सजा  officer in  संसार   युद्ध   i  and was  awarded   the  Pour le Mérite for his exploits  on   the  Italian front  .
In World War  ii  , he  further  distinguished himself as the commander of the  7th  Panzer  प्रभाग  during the  1940   आक्रमण   of  France .
उसके   नेतृत्व   of  German and Italian  शक्तियां   in  the  उत्तर   अफ़्रीकी  campaign established  उसे  as one  of  the  सबसे  able commanders of the war , and earned him the appellation of the  मरुस्थल  Fox .
He  is  regarded  as  one  of  the most skilled commanders of desert warfare in the conflict  .
He later commanded  the  German forces opposing the Allied cross-channel invasion in  normandy   .
His assignments never took  उसे   to  the Eastern  सामने  .
ख़बरों   is  regarded as  having   महरूम  a humane  और   पेशेवर  officer .
His Afrika  कोर्प्स  was  never   अभियुक्त  of  युद्ध  crimes , and soldiers  captured  during  उसके   अफ़्रीकी   अभियान   यहूद  reported to have been treated humanely .
आदेश  to kill  यहूदी  soldiers  ,  civilians and captured commandos  यहूद  ignored .
Late in the war , Rommel  थी  linked to the  षड्यंत्र   to   assassinate  Adolf  हिटलर   .
Since Rommel was a national hero , Hitler desired to eliminate him quietly .
He  मजबूर  Rommel to commit suicide with a cyanide pill  ,   in  return  लिये  assurances that Rommel 's family  होता  not  be   persecuted   following  his death .
Stained  कांच  representation of  the  Holy  स्पिरिट  as a dove , c. 1660  .
The seven gifts of the Holy  स्पिरिट  is an enumeration  of   सात  spiritual gifts originating with  patristic   लेखक  , later elaborated by  पाँच  intellectual virtues and four other groups of ethical characteristics  .
They are :  अक्ल  ,  समझना  , wonder  और  awe  (  fear of the Lord )  ,  counsel , knowledge  ,   fortitude  , and piety  (  reverence ) .
the   धरती  Day Flag , the  नवीनतम  proposal of  जॉन  McConnell for a flag of Earth Day
धरती   दिन  is an annual event , celebrated on  अप्रैल  22 , on which  कार्यक्रम  are held  विश्वव्यापी  to demonstrate support for  पर्यावरणीय  protection  .
It  थी   पहला  celebrated  in   1970  , and is  अभी  coordinated globally  by  the Earth Day Network  ,  and celebrated in more than  192  countries  प्रत्येक   साल   .
In 1969 at a  युनेस्को  Conference in San Francisco ,  the  date proposed was  कूच   21  , 1970 ,  the  first  दिन  of spring in the  उत्तरी  hemisphere .
This day of nature 's  equipoise  was  बाद  sanctioned  in   a  Proclamation signed by  सचिव  General U Thant at the  संयुक्त   राष्ट्र  .
A  माह  later a separate Earth  दिन  was founded  by   संयुक्त  States Senator  gaylord  Nelson as an environmental teach-in first held on  अप्रैल   22   ,   1970   .
नेल्सन  was later awarded the  अध्यक्षीय   पदक  of Freedom Award in  मान्यता  of  उसके  work .
While this April 22  धरती  Day was focused on the United States  ,  an organization launched  by   डेनिस  Hayes  ,  who  थी  the  असली  national coordinator in 1970 , took it  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  in 1990  और   व्यवस्थित  events  in   141   राष्ट्र  .
Numerous communities celebrate Earth Week , an entire week  of  activities  केन्द्रित  on environmental issues .
Iodine is a chemical element  साथ  symbol I and atomic  क्रमांक  53  .
The name is from  यूनानी   ioeidēs  , meaning violet  or  purple ,  due   to  the  रंग   of  elemental  आयोडीन  vapor .
आयोडीन  and  इसके  compounds are primarily used in  पोषण   ,  and industrially in the  उत्पादन  of acetic acid and  निश्चित   polymers   .
Iodine 's relatively high  परमाणु   क्रमांक  ,  कम  toxicity , and ease  of  attachment to  सशुल्क   यौगिकों  have made it a  भाग   of   अनेक   x-ray  contrast materials in modern medicine .
Iodine has  तभी  one stable  समस्थानिक   .
A number  of   आयोडीन  radioisotopes are also used  in   चिकित्सा  applications  .
आयोडीन  is  मिला  on Earth mainly as the  अत्यधिक  water-soluble iodide  आयन  , I− ,  जिससे  concentrates it in  महासागर   और  brine  तालों  .
Like  the  other halogens , free iodine occurs mainly as a diatomic  अणु  I2 ,  और  then  तभी  momentarily after  होने  oxidized  इससे   आयोडाइड  by  an  oxidant like  फ़्री  oxygen  .
In the universe and on Earth ,  आयोडीन  's high atomic number makes it  a  relatively rare element .
however  ,  इसके  presence  in  ocean water has given  it  a  भूमिका   in  biology .
it  is the heaviest essential element utilized widely  by  life in biological functions (  तभी  tungsten , employed in enzymes by a few species  of  bacteria , is heavier  )  .
Iodine 's rarity  in   अनेक  soils ,  due  to initial low abundance as  a  crust-element , and also leaching of  घुलनशील  iodide by rainwater  ,  has led  to   अनेक   कमियां   समस्याएं  in land animals  और  inland human populations  .
आयोडीन  deficiency  affects  about two billion people and is  the  leading  preventable  cause of intellectual disabilities .
आयोडीन  is required  by  higher animals , which use it to synthesize  थायराइड  hormones  ,  which contain the element .
क्युकी   of  this  फलन   ,   radioisotopes  of iodine are  concentrated  in the thyroid gland along  साथ  nonradioactive  आयोडीन  .
If inhaled ,  the  radioisotope iodine-131 ,  जिससे   रै   a   ऊँची  fission product  उपज  , concentrates  in  the  थायराइड  , but is easily  remedied  with  पोटैशियम  iodide treatment .
lobbying   (   भी   लॉबी  ) is the  अधिनियम  of attempting to influence  निर्णय  made  by  officials  in   the  government , most  प्रायः   विधायक   or   सदस्यों  of regulatory agencies .
lobbying  is done by many different types of people and organized groups , including  individuals   in   the  private sector  ,  corporations , fellow legislators  or  government officials  ,  or advocacy  समूह  ( interest  समूह  ) .
Lobbyists may  be  among a legislator 's constituencies ,  अर्थ   a  voter or bloc of  मतदाता  within his  or  her  चुनावी  district  ,  or not ; they may  engage  in lobbying as a business  ,  or not .
Professional lobbyists are  लोगों   जिनकी   कारोबार   is   trying   to   influence  legislation  on  behalf of  a  group or individual who hires  उन्हें  .
individuals  and nonprofit organizations can  भी  lobby as  an   अधिनियम   of  volunteering or as  a  small part  of   उनके  normal job ( for instance , a CEO meeting with a representative  परिचय  a  प्रोजेक्ट   महत्वपूर्ण  to his/her company  ,  or an activist meeting with his/her legislator  in   an  unpaid capacity ) .
Governments often  define  and regulate  व्यवस्थित   समूह   lobbying  that has become  influential  .
the   आचार  and  नैतिकता   of  lobbying  हैं   .
lobbying  is often  बोला  of with contempt , when the implication  is  that  लोगों  with inordinate socioeconomic power are corrupting  the   विधि  ( twisting it away  इससे  fairness  )  in order  to  serve their own conflict of interest .
But another side  of  lobbying is making  यकीनन   कि  others ' interests are duly defended against  अन्य  ' corruption ,  or  even  बस   बनाना  sure that minority interests are fairly  defended  against  mere   जुल्म  of the majority .
For  उदाहरण  , a medical association ,  or  a trade  संघ  of health insurance companies ,  may  lobby a legislature  in  order to counteract the  influence  of tobacco  कंपनियाँ  , in  जिससे  case  the   lobbying  would  be  viewed by  सबसे  people  as  justified (  विधिवत  defending  विरूद्ध   अन्य  ' corruption  )  .
The difficulty  in   आरेखण  objective lines  between   जिससे  lobbyists  हैं   ``  good lobbyists '' and which ones are ``  ख़राब  ones '' is compounded by the cleverness with which  lobbyists   or  their  क्लाइंट  can argue that their own lobbying is of the `` good '' kind .
At  दिल   ,   the  effort to influence legislation is  a  power struggle .
As in other forms  of  power struggle  ,  such as war or law enforcement , motives range from to self-defense  to   लड़  for justice , and the dividing line between predation and  इंसाफ  is subject  to  rationalization .
Sunshine of  अपना  love guitar riff
Cream were a 1960s British rock  supergroup   consisting  of  bassist/vocalist  Jack  ब्रूस  ,  guitarist/vocalist  Eric Clapton  ,  and drummer Ginger Baker .
उनके  sound was  characterised   by  a hybrid of blues rock , hard  चट्टान   और   साइकेडेलिक   चट्टान   ,  combining  the   psychedelia-themed  lyrics , Eric Clapton 's blues guitar  playing   और  vocals  ,  Jack Bruce 's voice  और  prominent  बास  playing  और   अदरक   बेकर   's  jazz -influenced drumming .
The  समूह  's third album  ,  Wheels  of   आग  , was the world 's first platinum-selling double  एल्बम  .
Cream are  widely  regarded as  होने  the world  's  first successful supergroup  .
in   उनके   करियर  , they sold over 15 million albums  विश्वव्यापी  .
Cream 's music  शामिल  songs based on traditional  ब्लूज़  such  as   ``  Crossroads  ``  and  ``  Spoonful  ``  , and modern blues  ऐसे   as   ``   born  Under  a  Bad Sign `` , as well as more  eccentric  songs such as  ``   अजीब  Brew `` , `` Tales of Brave Ulysses `` and  ``   टॉड  ``  .
मलाई  's biggest hits  यहूद  `` I  महसूस  Free `` (  uk  ,  क्रमांक  11  )  ,  ``  Sunshine  of  Your Love  ``   (  US ,  क्रमांक  5 )  ,  `` White Room ``  (  US , number 6 ) , ``  क्रॉसरोड्स  '' (  us  , number 28  )  , and `` Badge ``  (  UK , number 18 ) .
मलाई   बना  a significant impact on  the  popular  म्यूज़िक  of the time  ,  and ,  साथ  with Jimi Hendrix ,  और  Terry  कठ  of Chicago , popularised the use  of  the  wah-wah  pedal  .
वे  provided a  भारी  yet technically  निपुण  musical  थीम  that foreshadowed and influenced the emergence of British bands  ऐसे   as  The  जेफ़  Beck  समूह   in   the   लेट   1960s  .
The band  's  live  प्रदर्शन  influenced progressive rock  अधिनियमों  such  as  Rush .
मलाई  were inducted into the Rock and  फेंकें   हॉल  of  कीर्ति  in 1993 .
वे  were included in both Rolling Stone and VH1 's  सूचियाँ  of the  ``   100  Greatest  कलाकारों   of  All Time '' .
They were  भी  ranked number 16 on VH1 's  ``  100  महानतम  Artists of Hard Rock '' .
Hairspray is  a  1988 comedy film written  और  directed by John Waters  ,  and starring Ricki  झील  , Sonny Bono ,  डिब्बी  Harry , Michael  st.  Gerard , Shawn Thompson ,  colleen  Fitzpatrick , Jerry Stiller , and in his  पिछला   फिल्मी  role , Divine  .
Hairspray  थी   a  dramatic departure from Waters '  पहले  works  ,   साथ  a  much  broader intended audience .
In  फैक्ट  , Hairsprays PG is  the  mildest rating a Waters film has received ;  सबसे   of  his  पिछला   films  were rated X  by  the MPAA .
Set  in  1962  बाल्टीमोर  , Maryland , the film revolves  around  self-proclaimed `` pleasantly plump '' teenager  ट्रेसी  Turnblad  as  she pursues  स्टारडम  as  a   नर्तकी  on a local  tv  show and  रैलियों  against  जातिगत  segregation .
hairspray  was only a moderate  कामयाबी   upon   इसके   आरंभिक  theatrical release , earning  a  modest gross of $  8  million .
However ,  it  managed to attract a larger audience on home video in the early  1990s  and became a cult classic .
Most critics praised  the  film , although some were displeased  साथ  the overall campiness  .
In 2002  ,   the  film was  adapted  into  a  Broadway musical of the same name , which  जीती   आठ  Tony Awards  ,   सहित  Best  musical  in 2003 .
A  दूसरी  film version of Hairspray ,  an   अनुकूलन   of   the   स्टेज  musical ,  थी  also  released  by  नई  Line Cinema in 2007 ,  जिससे   शामिल  many  परिवर्तन   of  scripted items from  the   असली   .
The film also ranks # 444  on  Empire magazine 's 2008 list  of  the  500  greatest movies of all time .
A Christian denomination is an identifiable religious body under a  आम   नाम  ,  ढांचा  , and doctrine  भीतर   christianity  .
Some groups included do  नहीं   consider  themselves a denomination ( e.g. , the Catholic  गिरिजाघर   considers  itself the one true church and  the  Apostolic See , and as pre-denominational )  .
कुछ  groups viewed by non-adherents  as   denominational  actively  resist  being called a denomination  और  do  नहीं   have  any formal  denominational  structure , authority  ,   or  record-keeping beyond the local congregation  ;   अनेक   समूह  within Restoration  गति   पतन  into this  श्रेणी  .
Some groups are large  (  e.g .  catholics  ,  lutherans  ,  anglicans  or Baptists ) , while others are just  a  few small churches  ,  and  in   सबसे  cases the relative size  is  not evident in this  सूची  .
Modern movements  ऐसे   as   fundamentalist  Christianity ,  pietism  , Evangelicalism , Pentecostalism and the  पवित्रता  movement sometimes cross denominational lines ,  or  in some cases  बनाएँ   नई  denominations out  of   दो   or  more continuing groups  ,   (  as  is  the case for  अनेक   संयुक्त   और  uniting  चर्च  , for example ) .
Such subtleties and complexities are  नहीं  clearly depicted here .
Major divisions within  christianity  .
Note  :  This is  नहीं   a  complete list , but aims to provide a  comprehensible  overview of  the  diversity among  denominations   of   christianity  .
As there are reported to  be   लगभग  41,000 Christian denominations ,  अनेक  of  जिससे  can not be  सत्यापित   to  be significant , only those denominations  साथ   विकिपीडिया  articles  होगा  be listed in order  to  ensure that  सब  entries on this list are notable and  verifiable   .
Between denominations , theologians ,  और  comparative religionists there are considerable disagreements about which groups can be properly called  ईसाई  ,  मतभिन्नता  arising primarily from doctrinal differences between groups .
For the purpose  of  simplicity , this list  is  intended  to   प्रतिबिंबित  the self-understanding of each denomination .
Explanations of different opinions concerning their status  as  Christian denominations can be found at their  संबंधित  articles  .
There is  no  official recognition in most  भाग  of the  संसार  for religious bodies  ,  and  वहीँ  is  no  official  clearinghouse   जिससे  could  determine  the status or respectability of religious bodies .
Often  वहीँ  is considerable disagreement between various churches about whether other churches should be labeled with pejorative terms such as ``  cult  ''  ,  or about whether  इस  or that group  enjoys  some measure of respectability  .
Such considerations often  vary   इससे  place to  प्लेस   ,  where one  धार्मिक  group may enjoy majority status in one  प्रदेश  , but be  widely   regarded  as a `` dangerous cult ''  in  another  भाग  of the  संसार   .
समावेश  on  इस  list does not indicate  कोई  judgment about  the  size  ,   महत्व  ,  or  character of a  समूह  or its members  .
1804  मैप  of  ``   louisiana   ``   ,  edged on  the   वेस्ट  by the Rocky Mountains  .
The  louisiana  Purchase ( `` Sale of Louisiana '' ) was the acquisition  by   the   संयुक्त  States of America  in  1803  of  of France 's claim to the territory of Louisiana .
the  U.S. paid  50   लाख  francs  (   $  11 ,250,000 ) plus cancellation of  debts  worth 18 million  francs  (  $  3,750,000 )  ,  for a  कुल  sum of 15  लाख  dollars  (  less  than   3  cents  प्रति  acre ) for the Louisiana territory ( $ million in dollars ,  कम  than 42 cents per acre )  .
the  Louisiana territory encompassed  सब  or part of 15  उपस्थित  U.S. states and  दो   कनाडाई  provinces  .
the  land purchased  contained  all  of  present-day Arkansas , Missouri , Iowa , Oklahoma , Kansas , and Nebraska ;  भाग  of Minnesota that  यहूद   वेस्ट  of the Mississippi  नदी  ; most of North Dakota  ;  most  of  South Dakota ; northeastern New Mexico ;  उत्तरी  Texas ; the portions of  मोंटाना  , Wyoming ,  और   कोलोराडो   ईस्ट  of the  महाद्वीपीय  Divide  ;  Louisiana  वेस्ट  of the Mississippi River , including the  नगर  of New Orleans ; and small portions of  जमीन  that would  आखिरकार  become  भाग  of the Canadian provinces of Alberta and Saskatchewan  .
France  नियंत्रित   इस   विशाल   क्षेत्रफल   इससे  1699 until 1762 , the  साल  it gave the territory to its ally Spain .
Under Napoleon Bonaparte , France  took  back the territory in 1800  in  the hope of building an empire  in   उत्तर  America .
a  slave revolt  in  Haiti and  an  impending  युद्ध  with Britain , however , led  फ़्रांस  to  लापरवाही  these plans and  बेचें   the  entire territory to the  संयुक्त  States ,  जो   था   originally   intended  only to seek  the  purchase of New  ऑरलियन्स  and its adjacent lands  .
The  खरीदें   of   the  territory of  louisiana  took place during the presidency  of  Thomas Jefferson .
At the  समय  ,  the  purchase  faced  domestic opposition  क्युकी  it was thought  to   be   असंवैधानिक  .
Although he agreed that the U.S. Constitution did not contain provisions for  acquiring  territory  ,   जेफरसन  decided to  go  ahead with the purchase  वैसे  in order  to   हटाएँ  France  's  presence in  the  region and to protect both U.S. trade access to the port of New  ऑरलियन्स  and  फ़्री  passage on  the  Mississippi River .
Ceremony at  प्लेस  d'Armes , New Orleans marking transfer of Louisiana to the United  राज्य  ,  10  March 1804  ,   as   चित्रित  by Thure  de  Thulstrup  .
``  Cool Jerk  ''   is  a  लोकप्रिय  song written by Donald  storball  and  originally   performed  by The Capitols  .
released   in   1966  , it  पहुँचे  No  .   2  on  the  American R & B chart  और  No . 7  on  the pop chart .
The  बैकिंग  track for this song was actually recorded ( secretly ) by the  motown  house  बैंड   the  Funk Brothers .
प्रति   एक   of   the  Funk  भाइयो  , the  सोंग   थी   originally  to be called `` Pimp  झटका   .  ''
This was taken  इससे  watching neighborhood  pimps  , who  होता  dance  in  the clubs , but were too `` cool  ''  to do the jerk like regular  folks  .
Their version  थी  subsequently named `` the Pimp Jerk . ''
The producer was  भयभीत   कि   a  song with the word pimp in the title would be banned or not receive much  धनात्मक  attention  ,  and had  the   शीर्षक  changed to  इसके  current  रूप  .
the   go-go  's  ,  Todd Rundgren  ,  Big Trouble  ,   इंसान  Sexual  जवाब   ,  The  la  De Da  's  , The Creation ,  और  The Coasters  have  covered  the  song .
Todd Rundgren did his  संस्करण  in  an  odd  समय   हस्ताक्षर  ( 7/4 )  ,  giving an obviously jerky  महसूस   to  the song  .
the   go-go  's covered the  सोंग  for their 1982 album Vacation and  बाद  re-recorded  it  for  उनके  1990  एल्बम  Greatest  .
In the feature  फिल्मी  Home Alone 2 : Lost in New  यॉर्क  , Uncle  फ़्रैंक   (  Gerry Bamman ) sings `` Cool Jerk ''  in  the shower .
A version of the song with different lyrics ( `` Do the  कूल   चाबुक  ''  )   is  used in Cool  चाबुक  commercials .
A recording of  ``  Cool  झटका  '' by Ricardo Ray is featured in the feature film Donnie Brasco (  1997  )  .
The song features  in  the  फिल्मी  Standing  in  the  साए   of  Motown , performed by the  दुर्गंध  Brothers with lead vocals by Bootsy Collins .
the   सोंग  is  सुना  briefly in  the  animated feature , Madagascar 3 : Europe 's Most  चाही   .
Despite this reason  ,  it is  सूचीबद्ध   in  some  विसंगतियाँ   of   the  film 's soundtrack .
a   लीग  is  a   ईकाई   of   लंबाई   (  or ,  rarely  , area  )  .
It was  long   आम   in   यूरोपीय  and Latin  अमेरिका  , but it is  no  longer an official  ईकाई  in any nation .
The league originally  referred  to  the  distance a person  could   चलना  in  an  hour  .
चूंकि  the Middle Ages , many values have been specified in several countries .
In  the   कॉन्टेक्स्ट  of nautical distances ,  the   3  mile ( 4.8 km )  अलहदा  corresponds to how far  an   निरीक्षक  of  औसत  height (  5'9  ''  or  1.78 m  )  can  देखिए   जब  standing at sea level  .
Thus , a ship traveling one  ``   लीग  '' has  पहुँचे  what was  previously  the  farthest  visible distance on the horizon .
the   कमी  of  a  historical and global standard for  the  exact measure of a `` league  ''  can be accounted for by the variable elevation of the  निरीक्षक   (   i.e.  , sightings from a ship 's deck vs. masthead ) .
The  आयरिश   राज्य   आए  into being in  1922  as the Irish Free State ,  a  dominion  of  the British Commonwealth , having seceded  इससे  the United Kingdom under the Anglo-Irish  सन्धि  .
It  comprises   26  of  आयरलैंड  's  32  counties .
Since 1949 it  रै  existed  as  the  गणतंत्र  of Ireland  .
From its foundation , the Irish Free State  थी  embroiled in  a  civil war  between  nationalists supporting the Treaty and opponents who supported a  गणतंत्र  .
The pro-Treaty side ,  संगठित  as  cumann  na nGaedheal  उभरा  victorious from the conflict  और  won  subsequent   चुनावों   .
They  formed  the government of the state until 1932 ,  जब  they peacefully handed over power to  the  anti-Treaty  गुट   in  Fianna  fáil  ,  जो  defeated them in an election .
The Irish state , despite its  हिंसक  beginnings  ,   रै  remained a  उदार  democracy throughout its existence  .
a   नई  constitution  in   1937  removed many  of  the links  साथ  Britain established  अंतर्गत  the Treaty and Ireland 's  neutrality  in the Second World War demonstrated its independence  in   विदेशी  policy matters from  ब्रिटेन   .
In  1948  Ireland formally left the British  राष्ट्रमंडल  and adopted the  शीर्षक   of  ``  गणतंत्र  ''  .
In the economic sphere , the Irish state has  था   a  mixed performance .
On independence  ,  it was  एक  of the  wealthier   देशों  in Europe per head of population .
However it also inherited from British rule the problems of  बेरोजगारी  , emigration  ,   uneven  geographical development  और  lack of a native industrial base  .
For  much  of  इसके  history , the state  struggled  to rectify these problems .
particular  peaks of emigration were  अंकित  during  the  late 1930s ,  1950s  and 1980s , when the  आयरिश  economy recorded little  विकास  .
In the 1930s , Fianna Fáil governments attempted to create  आयरिश  domestic  उद्योग  using  subsidies  and protective tarifs .
in  the late 1950s  ,  these policies  यहूद   dropped  in  पक्ष  of  फ़्री  trade with  चयनित  countries and encouraging of  विदेशी  investment with low taxes .
This was expanded when Ireland entered  the  European Economic Community  in  1972 .
In the  1990s  and 2000s , Ireland experienced an economic  बूम  known  as  the Celtic Tiger ,  in   जिससे  the  देश   's  GDP surpassed  अनेक  of  इसके  European  पड़ोसी  .
Immigration  भी  surpassed emigration  ,   bringing  the  राज्य  's population  up   to  over 4 million  .
however   ,  since 2008 , Ireland has  अनुभवी  a severe crisis  in  the banking sector and with sovereign debt  .
The resultant economic slump has deepened  the  effect of the world recession on Ireland .
From  1937  to  1998  , the Irish constitution included a claim  on  Northern Ireland  as   a   भाग   of   the  national  territory  .
however  ,  the   राज्य  also opposed and  प्रयुक्त  its security forces against those  हथियारबंद  groups -  प्रधानतया   the  Provisional Irish Republican Army ,  जो   आजमाया  to unite Ireland by  फ़ोर्स   .
This  occurred  in the 1950s , throughout the 1970s  और  1980s and has continued on a reduced scale .
आयरिश  governments meanwhile tried to broker an  अनुबंध   to  the  विरोध  known as The Troubles  भीतर  Northern Ireland from 1968 to the  लेट  1990s .
the  British government  officially  recognised the right of  the  Irish government to be  a  party  to  the Northern negotiations  in  the  anglo-irish  Agreement of 1985 .
in   1998  , as  भाग  of  the  Good Friday Agreement , the Irish constitution was  altered  by referendum  to  remove  the  territorial  अर्जी  to Northern Ireland and  बजाय  extend  the  right of Irish  नागरिकता  to all the people of the island  चाहिए  they wish to have  it  .
जॉन  Quincy Adams (  जुलाई  11 ,  1767february  23 ,  1848   )  was the sixth President of  the   संयुक्त  States ( 1825–1829 ) .
he  served as American  राजनयिक  , Senator  ,  and Congressional representative  .
He was a member of the Federalist  ,  Democratic-Republican ,  नेशनल   रिपब्लिकन   ,   और  later  anti-masonic  and Whig  पार्टियों  .
Adams was the son of former President John  एडम्स  and Abigail Adams .
as  a diplomat , Adams played  an  important role  in  negotiating many international treaties , most notably the Treaty of Ghent  ,  which  ended  the  युद्ध  of 1812 .
as  Secretary of State , he negotiated with the  संयुक्त   किंगडम  over  अमेरिका  's northern border with Canada , negotiated  साथ  Spain  the   annexation  of  फ्लोरिडा  , and authored the Monroe Doctrine .
इतिहासकारों  agree he was  एक  of  the  greatest diplomats and secretaries of state  in  American history  .
As president , he sought to modernize the American economy and promoted education .
एडम्स  enacted a part of his agenda and paid off much  of  the national debt  .
he  was stymied by  a  Congress controlled by his enemies ,  और  his  कमी  of  patronage   संजाल   helped   राजनेता  eager to undercut him  .
He  खोया  his  1828   बोली  for re-election to Andrew Jackson .
In doing so , he became  the   पहला  president since  उसके  father  to  serve a single term  .
Adams is best known as a diplomat who shaped  अमेरिका   's  foreign policy in line with his  ardently  nationalist commitment to  अमेरिका  's republican  मान  .
More recently Howe  (  2007 ) portrayed  एडम्स  as the exemplar and moral  नेता  in an  era  of modernization  .
दौरान  Adams ' lifetime ,  technological  innovations  और  new means of communication spread  संदेश   of   धार्मिक  revival , social reform  ,   और   पार्टी  politics .
goods  ,  धन  , and  लोगों   traveled  more rapidly and efficiently  than  ever  पहले  .
Adams was elected  a  U.S. Representative from Massachusetts after  leaving  office , serving for  the   पिछला   17   सालो  of  उसके  life with  दूर  greater  acclamation   than   he  had achieved  as  president .
He is ,  so   दूर  , the only president later  निर्वाचित   to   the  United  राज्य  House of Representatives  (   हालांकि  John Tyler  थी   निर्वाचित  to the  हाउस  of Representatives  of   the  Confederate  राज्य   बस  before his death  in   1862  ) .
एनिमेटेड  by his growing  revulsion  against  गुलामी  , Adams became a leading  प्रतिद्वन्दी  of the Slave  शक्ति  .
He predicted that if a civil  युद्ध  were to  ब्रेक  out  ,  the president could abolish slavery  by  using  उसके  war  शक्तियां   .
Adams also predicted the Union 's  विच्छेद   over  the slavery issue  ,  but  कहा  that if the South  became  independent there  होता  be a series of bloody slave revolts  .
Windows Internet Explorer 9 ( IE9 ) is  a   संस्करण  of the Internet Explorer  वेब  browser from Microsoft .
it  was released  to   the   पब्लिक  on March 14 , 2011 .
Microsoft has released  अंतरजाल  Explorer 9 as a major out-of-band  संस्करण  that  is  not  tied  to the release schedule of any particular version of  खिड़कियाँ  , unlike previous versions .
It is the first version since Internet  एक्सप्लोरर  2 to not  be  bundled with a Windows operating  प्रणाली   ,  although  कुछ   oems   have  installed it with Windows 7 on  उनके   pcs  ,  as  well as  नई  Windows 7 laptops  .
the  system requirements for Internet  एक्सप्लोरर   9   हैं  Windows  7   ,  Windows  सर्वर  2008 R2  ,  Windows  विस्टा  Service Pack 2 or  खिड़कियाँ  Server 2008 SP2 with the Platform  अद्यतन   .
Windows  xp  and earlier are not supported  .
अंतरजाल  Explorer 9 is  the  last  संस्करण   of  Internet Explorer to  be   समर्थित  on Windows Vista  .
Both IA-32 and x64  builds   हैं  available .
Internet  एक्सप्लोरर   9   supports  several CSS 3 properties ,  अंतःस्थापित  ICC v2 or v4 color  प्रोफ़ाइल  support via Windows Color System  ,  and has  improved   जावास्क्रिप्ट  performance .
It is  the   पिछला   of  the  पाँच  major  वेब  browsers to  implement  support  लिये   स्केलेबल  Vector Graphics (  svg   )  .
It also features  hardware-accelerated   ग्राफिक्स  rendering  using  Direct2D , hardware-accelerated text rendering  using  DirectWrite ,  hardware-accelerated  video  रेंडरिंग  using  मीडिया   न्यास  , imaging  support   provided   by  Windows Imaging Component  ,  and high fidelity  मुद्रण   संचालित  by the  xml   पेपर  Specification ( XPS ) print  पाइपलाइन  .
Internet  एक्सप्लोरर   9  also supports  the  HTML5 video and audio tags and the  वेब  Open Font Format  .
alka-seltzer  is an effervescent  antacid  and pain  reliever  first marketed by the Dr . Miles Medicine Company .
It  थी   विकसित   by  Maurice Treener , head  केमिस्ट  at Miles ,  in   elkhart  , Indiana .
Alka-Seltzer  is  marketed for  राहत   of   नाबालिग  aches  ,  pains , inflammation  ,  fever  ,  headache , heartburn , sour  पेट  , indigestion , and hangovers ,  जबकि   neutralizing  excess  पेट   एसिड   .
It  थी  launched in 1931 .
a  spin-off of  alka-seltzer  made  to  relieve colds and  फ्लू  ,  alka-seltzer   प्लस  , was  बाद  introduced  .
A  short-lived   antacid  non-aspirin  रूपांतर   ,   alka-mints   ,  was  introduced   in   1994  and  discontinued  in 1997 .
alka-seltzer  is currently  स्वामित्व  by Bayer  schering  Pharma AG  ,  Germany .
The name `` Alka-Seltzer  ''   रै  been  विस्तारित  to incorporate an entire  लकीर   of  medications sold  over  the counter and  लिया   by  means of rapidly dissolving tablets  कि  form a  कार्बोनेटेड   समाधान   in  water .
Cherry Alka Seltzer Plus Tablet  dissolving   in  water
चित्र  showing the  छह  most common speleothems with  लेबल्स  .
Enlarge to  दृश्य  labels .
A stalactite ( , ;  इससे  the Greek stalasso , ( σταλάσσω  )  ,  ``  to drip ''  ,   और  meaning  ``  that which drips ''  )   is   a   प्रकार   of  speleothem  (  secondary mineral ) that hangs from the  छत  of limestone caves .
It is a type  of  dripstone  .
The corresponding  गठन  on the floor  of  the  गुफा  is known as a stalagmite .
उपाधि  abbreviations are used as an alternative  रास्ता  to specify  an  academic degree instead  of  spelling out the  शीर्षक  in full  ,  such as in  सन्दर्भ  books  जैसे   जो  's  जो   और  on business cards .
Many degrees have more  than  one abbreviation  .
In the  uk  ,  it   is  not  generally   the   कस्टम  to  punctuate  abbreviations for degrees with full stops (  e.g  .  ``  BSc ''  बल्कि  than ``  b.sc  . `` .
Race is  a  classification  प्रणाली   प्रयुक्त  to categorize humans into large and distinct populations or groups by  anatomical  , cultural ,  जातीय  ,  जेनेटिक   ,   भौगोलिक  ,  ऐतिहासिक   ,   भाषाई   ,  religious , or social affiliation .
पहला  used to denote national  संबद्धों   ,  the term began  to   be   प्रयुक्त  to relate to  शारीरिक  traits in  the  17th century  .
In  the  early  20th  century the term was often used , in  a  taxonomic  भाव  ,  to  denote genetically differentiated human  populations  defined  by   phenotype  .
While biologists sometimes use the  अवधारणा  of race  to  make  भेद  among fuzzy sets of traits ,  अन्य  in the scientific community  सुझाएँ   कि  the  विचार   of  race often is used in a  भोली  or simplistic way , i.e . that among humans ,  रेस  has no taxonomic significance : all  जीना  humans  belong  to the same species  ,   होमो  sapiens  और  subspecies , Homo sapiens sapiens  .
Social conceptions and groupings of races vary  over   समय   ,  involving  लोक   taxonomies
कि  define of individuals  आधारित   on  perceived  traits  .
Scientists consider  biological   essentialism  obsolete , and  generally  discourage racial explanations for  सामूहिक   differentiation   in   दोनो  physical and behavioral traits .
Since  the  second half of  the  20th century the associations  of  race  साथ  the  विचारधाराओं  and  theories  that grew out of the work of 19th-century  विज्ञानियों  and physiologists has led  to  the use of the word  रेस  itself becoming problematic  .
हालांकि  still  प्रयुक्त  in  सामान्य  contexts , it  is   अभी  often replaced  by  other words which are less ambiguous and emotionally charged , such as populations  ,  people ( s ) ,  जातीय  groups or communities depending on  कॉन्टेक्स्ट   .
Lucy Stone  (  August  13  , 1818  –  October 19 , 1893 )  थी  a prominent  अमरीकी  abolitionist and suffragist , and  a   गायन  advocate and organizer  promoting   अधिकारों  for  महिलाओं   .
In 1847 ,  स्टोन  became the first woman from Massachusetts  to  earn  a  college degree  .
She spoke  आउट  for women 's  अधिकारों   और   विरूद्ध  slavery at a time when women were discouraged  और  prevented from public speaking .
Stone  थी  the first recorded American woman to retain her  अपना   पिछला  name after  विवाह   .
स्टोन  's  organizational   क्रियाएँ  for the cause of women 's rights  yielded  tangible  gains   in  the difficult political environment  of  the  19th  century  .
स्टोन  helped  initiate  the  पहला   नेशनल  Women 's Rights Convention  और   वो   समर्थित  and  sustained  it annually along with a number  of  other local , state  और   क्षेत्रीय  activist conventions .
Stone  spoke  in front of a number of legislative bodies to promote  कानून   giving   अधिक  rights to women .
वो  assisted  in  establishing the Woman  's   नेशनल   वफ़ादार  League to help  pass   the   तेरहवीं  Amendment and  thereby  abolish slavery , after which she helped  रूप  the  largest   समूह   of  like-minded women  's  rights reformers  ,  the politically moderate  अमरीकी  Woman Suffrage  संघ   ,  which  worked  for decades at the state  स्तर  in  एहसान  of women 's right  to   vote  .
Stone wrote extensively  परिचय  a wide  दायरा   of   महिलाओं  's  अधिकारों  ,  प्रकाशन  and distributing speeches by  herself  and others , and convention proceedings  .
In the  long-running  and influential  स्त्री   's   जर्नल  ,  a  weekly periodical  कि   वो  established and promoted  ,  Stone aired both  उसके   अपना  and differing  दृश्य   परिचय  women  's  rights  .
पुकारा  ``  the  orator '' and  ``  the  morning  star of  the  woman 's rights movement '' , Stone delivered a  वाक   जिससे  sparked  सुसान   B.   एंथोनी  to take up  the   कारण   of  women 's suffrage  .
एलिज़ाबेथ  Cady  stanton  wrote that `` Lucy  स्टोन  was the first  व्यक्ति  by  जिसको  the heart of the American public was deeply  stirred  on the  स्त्री  question .  ''
Together , Anthony , Stanton , and Stone have been called  the  19th century ``  triumvirate  `` of  महिलाओं  's  suffrage   और  feminism  .
in  finance , a bond is an instrument of  indebtedness  of the bond issuer to the holders .
it  is a  कर्ज़  security , under which the issuer owes the holders a debt  और  , depending on  the  terms  of  the bond , is obliged to pay them interest ( the  कूपन   )  or  to   repay  the  प्रिंसिपल  at a later date  ,  termed the maturity .
ब्याज  is  प्रायः  payable  at  fixed intervals ( semiannual  ,   सालाना   ,  sometimes monthly ) .
बहुत  often the bond is  परक्राम्य  , i.e .  the  ownership  of  the instrument  can   be  transferred  in  the secondary  मार्केट   .
यूँ  a bond  is   a  form of loan  or   iou  : the holder  of  the bond is the lender  (  creditor  )   ,   the   जारीकर्ता  of the  बंध   is  the borrower ( debtor ) ,  और  the  कूपन  is the interest .
bonds   provide  the  borrower  with  बाह्य  funds  to   वित्त  long-term investments ,  or  , in the  मामला  of government bonds  ,  to finance current expenditure  .
Certificates of deposit  (  CDs )  or  short  पद  commercial paper are  माना  to  be  money market instruments  और  not  bonds  : the main  अंतर  is in  the   लंबाई   of  the  पद  of the instrument .
Bonds  और   स्टॉक्स  are both securities , but the  प्रमुख   अंतर  between  the   दो  is that ( capital ) stockholders  have  an equity  हिस्सेदारी  in  the  company  (  i.e . they are owners )  ,   whereas  bondholders  have  a  creditor  stake in the company ( i.e  .  they  हैं  lenders ) .
Another difference is that bonds usually  have   a  defined term , or maturity ,  बाद   जिससे  the bond  is  redeemed , whereas stocks may  be  outstanding indefinitely .
an  exception  is   an   irredeemable  bond  ,   ऐसे  as  consols  , which is a perpetuity , i.e . a bond  साथ  no maturity .

This model  can  be found  अंदर  the tower .
