Model  जहाजों   और   किला
A scale model  is  a physical model , a  प्रतिनिधित्व   or   नक़ल  of an  ऑब्जेक्ट  that is larger or  छोटी  than  the  actual size  of  the  ऑब्जेक्ट  ,  जिससे   seeks  to maintain the  सापेक्ष  proportions  (  the scale factor )  of  the physical  आकार   of  the  असली   ऑब्जेक्ट  .
बहुत   प्रायः  the scale model is  प्रयुक्त  as a  मार्गदर्शिका  to  बनाना   the  object in full size  .
स्केल  models are built or collected for many reasons .
The  zune  HD was  a  portable  मीडिया   खिलाड़ी  in  the  Zune product  परिवार  released on September 15  ,  2009 by Microsoft  .
It  थी  a direct competitor with the  ठहराना   ipod  and iPhone series of mobile devices .
It was initially released  in   16  and 32 GB capacities .
A 64 GB  संस्करण   थी  released  on  April 9 , 2010 .
it   utilized   a  touchscreen  इंटरफ़ेस   लिये  navigation and  शामिल   wi-fi   लिये   तुल्यकालन  , access to  the  Zune Marketplace  और  Web browsing .
the  Zune HD utilized  the  Nvidia  tegra  APX 2600 chip ,  allowing   it  to play  720p   वीडियो   through  the optional HDMI  zune  dock on a  high-definition  television .
Otherwise , content would be scaled  bas   to  480x272 pixels on the player 's OLED touchscreen .
बूढ़ा   sparky   ,   the  electric chair used at Sing Sing prison
Execution by electrocution ,  प्रायः  performed using an electric chair , is  an   निष्पादन  method  originating  in the United  राज्य  in which the condemned person is strapped  to  a specially built wooden  कुर्सी   और   electrocuted  through electrodes placed on the body  .
इस   निष्पादन   विधि  was created by employees  of   थामस  Edison  दौरान  the War of  currents  ,  और  has been used only in  the  United States and  ,  for  a   काल   of  several  दशकों  , in the  फिलीपीन   (   इसके  first  उपयोग   वहीँ  in 1924 under American occupation ,  पिछला  in 1976 )  .
Historically , once  the  condemned  व्यक्ति  was attached to  the   कुर्सी  , various cycles  (  differing in  वोल्टेज   और  duration )  of  alternating current would be passed  through  the  व्यक्तिगत  's  देह  ,  in   अनुक्रम  to cause  fatal  damage to the internal  अंगों  (  सहित   the  brain ) .
the  first jolt  of   इलेक्ट्रिक  current was designed  to  cause immediate unconsciousness and  दिमाग  death  ;  the second one  थी  designed  to   कारण  fatal damage to the  vital  organs .
Death  थी   अक्सर  caused  by   विद्युत  overstimulation of the heart .
हालांकि  in the United  राज्य   the  electric  कुर्सी  has  become   a   प्रतीक  of the  मौत  penalty ,  इसके  use is in decline  due  to  the   वृद्धि  of lethal injection ,  जिससे  is widely  believed  to be  a   अधिक  humane method of  निष्पादन  .
Although some states  स्टिल  maintain electrocution as a method of  निष्पादन  , today it is only maintained as a secondary method  कि  may be chosen over lethal  इंजेक्शन   at   the  request of the prisoner .
As of  2010  , electrocution is  an  optional  रूप  of execution in Alabama , Florida  ,   दक्षिण   कैरोलिना  and Virginia .
They allow the  कैदी  to choose lethal injection as an alternative method  .
In the  राज्य  of  केंटकी  and Tennessee , the electric chair has been retired except for those whose capital  अपराधों  were  वचनबद्ध  prior  to  legislated dates in 1998 (  केंटकी  : March 31 ,  1998  ; Tennessee  :   दिसम्बर  31 , 1998  )  and who chose  electrocution  .
In both  राज्य  , inmates who do  नहीं   चुनें   electrocution  or  inmates   जो   वचनबद्ध  their crimes after the  designated  date  हैं  killed  by   lethal  injection .
The electric chair  is  an  वैकल्पिक   रूप  of execution approved  लिये  potential use  in   अरकंसास   और  Oklahoma if  अन्य  forms of execution are found unconstitutional  in  the  राज्य  at  the   समय  of  निष्पादन  .
it  is the  एकमात्र   विधि   of   निष्पादन  in  वर्मांट  , where treason is  the  only capital crime .
On February  8  , 2008 , the  नेब्रास्का  Supreme Court determined that  निष्पादन   by   इलेक्ट्रिक  chair was  a   ``  cruel and unusual punishment '' under the state  's  constitution .
This brought  executions  of this type to an  समाप्त   in  Nebraska , the only remaining  राज्य  to retain electrocution as its  एकमात्र  method of execution for  हत्या  .
the  Maryland House of Delegates is  the  lower house  of  the General Assembly , the state legislature of  the   अमरीकी  State of Maryland  ,  and is  रचित   of  141  delegates  elected  इससे   47  districts  .
The House of  delegates  Chamber  is  located in the Maryland  राज्य  House  (  state  कैपिटल  ) on State  वृत्त  in Annapolis ,  जिससे   is  the state capital  .
the   राज्य  House also houses  the   मेरीलैंड   राज्य   सीनेट  Chamber and the offices  of  the Governor and  लेफ्टिनेंट  Governor of the State of  मेरीलैंड  .
Each Delegate has offices in Annapolis  ,  in the  आसपास  Casper R. Taylor  ,  Jr. House Office Building .
the   मुक्ति  of Paris ( also known as  the  Battle  लिये  Paris ) took  प्लेस   दौरान  World  युद्ध  II from 19 August  1944  until the surrender of the occupying  जर्मनी   गैरीसन   on  25 August .
The Liberation of Paris started with  an  uprising by the French  प्रतिरोध  against the  जर्मनी  garrison  .
on   24  August ,  the  French Forces  of  the Interior  (  Forces françaises de  l'intérieur  , FFI ) received reinforcements from  the  Free  फ्रेंच  Army  of  Liberation and from the  u.S.  Third  फौज   अंतर्गत  General  patton  .
the   पूंजी  region  of  France had been governed by Nazi  जर्मनी  since  the  signing  of  the  दूसरी   compiègne  Armistice in June 1940 , when the  जर्मनी  Army  occupied   उत्तरी  and  westernmost  France ,  और  when the puppet regime of Vichy France was  स्थापित  in the town of Vichy in  सेंट्रल  France .
This battle  चिह्नित  the liberation of Paris and the  निर्वासन  of the  vichy  government to  sigmaringen   in  Germany .
However , there was still  much   भारी  fighting to be  किया  before France was liberated ,  सहित   the  campaign in  दक्षिणी  France  दौरान   august-september   (   in  Provence and extending  into  the  southwestern  region  of   the   vosges  Mountains ) ,  साथ   the  German-held seaports of western France ( such  as  at  brest  and Dunkirk )  ,   in  Alsace and Lorraine in  पूर्वी   फ़्रांस   ,  and in northeastern  फ़्रांस  , such as along the Rhine and  moder   नदियाँ  .
The  जर्मनी   फौज  and SS fought doggedly  in   ये  areas  लिये  the  शेष  of  1944  and  into  1945  .
`` Feelin ' Alright ? '' also  ज्ञात  as `` Feeling  alright  ''  is  a  सोंग  written by Dave  मेसन  of  the  English rock band Traffic from  उनके  eponymous  1968   एल्बम  , Traffic .
the   सोंग  was also a hit  सिंगल  for several performers : Joe Cocker ( 1969 ,  #  69 ,  recharted  in 1972 , US #  33  ) , Mongo Santamaría  (  1969 ,  #  95 ) and Grand Funk  रेलरोड  ( 1971 ,  us  # 54  )  .
It has also  महरूम   अंकित   by  Three Dog Night ( 1969 ) , The 5th  आयाम   (  1970  )  , Lou Rawls , Freddie King , Paul Weller  ,   lulu   ,   chairmen   of  the Board (  1970   )  , Rare  धरती  , The  इलेक्ट्रिक  Concept  ऑर्केस्ट्रा  , Mother  's  Finest (  1973  )  ,  The Ohio Players ( 1971  )   ,  Diana  रॉस  with  the  Jackson 5 ( 1971 ) , Maceo  पार्कर  ,  gladys  Knight  &   the  Pips , Widespread Panic  और  The  ब्लैक   crowes  .
A Steel  ढोल   संस्करण  by  त्रिनिदाद  Oil Company  थी  reissued on the  dancefloor  jazz compilation Blue Juice 2 .
It was also featured in the  2000   फिल्मी   duets  ,  सुंग  by Huey  लुईस  .
Both the original and the Joe  cocker   कवर  were featured  in  the movie  उड़ान  ,  अभिनीत  Denzel Washington .
Devon Werkheiser ( born March  8,1991  ) is an American  कर्ता  , voice actor , singer  ,  songwriter and musician , best known for his  अभिनीत   भूमिका  as Ned  bigby  on the  निकलोडियन  sitcom Ned  's   declassified   स्कूल  Survival Guide and for his role in the 2007 TV Movie Shredderman Rules ,  as  the lead character Nolan Byrd  .
Werkheiser also  निभाई   पीटर  Parkes  in   the   चौथी   और   फाइनल   ऋतु  of the ABC Family show Greek .
Sample view of  an  electronic health  रिकार्ड  based  on   बिंब
Sample view of  an   इलेक्ट्रॉनिक   स्वास्थ्य   रिकार्ड
An electronic health record ( EHR  )   is  an evolving concept  पारिभाषित   as  a systematic  संग्रहण  of electronic  स्वास्थ्य  information about individual patients or  populations  .
It is a record in digital format that  is  theoretically capable  of  being shared across  अलग   स्वास्थ्य  care  जमावट  .
In  कुछ  cases this sharing can occur  by  way of network-connected enterprise-wide  सूचना  systems and other information networks or exchanges .
EHRs may include a  दायरा  of data  ,   सहित  demographics , medical history ,  दवा  and  allergies  , immunization  औकात  , laboratory test results , radiology  बिंब  , vital signs , personal stats like age and  वज़न  , and billing  सूचना   .
Loan origination  is   the   प्रक्रम  by which  a  borrower  applies   लिये   a   नई  loan , and a lender processes  कि   अनुप्रयोग  .
Origination generally  शामिल   सब  the steps from taking a loan application up to disbursal of  निधि   (  or  घटती  the application  )   .
Loan servicing  कवर  everything after  disbursing   the  funds until the loan is fully paid off .
Loan  origination  is  a  specialized  संस्करण   of   नई  account opening  लिये  financial  सेवाएं  organizations .
Certain people and organizations specialize  in  loan  origination  .
Mortgage brokers  और  other mortgage originator companies  serve  as a  prominent  example .
There  हैं  many different types of loans  .
लिये  more information on loan types  ,  see the loan and consumer lending  आलेख   .
कदम  involved in originating a loan vary  by  loan type  ,   विभिन्न  kinds  of   ऋण   रिस्क  , regulator , lender policy , and other factors .
Top left : The Tennessee  घाटी   प्राधिकार  , part of the New  सौदे  , being  हस्ताक्षरित  into  विधि  in  1933   .
शीर्ष  right  :  Franklin Delano  रूज़वेल्ट  , who was  जिम्मेदार   लिये   पहलों  and programs collectively known as the New Deal  .
नीचे  :  a   पब्लिक  mural  इससे  one of  the  artists  employed   by  the  नई  Deal .
The New Deal was a series of economic programs enacted in the United States  between  1933  और  1936 .
They involved presidential executive orders  or  laws passed by  कॉंग्रेस  during  the  first term  of  President Franklin D. Roosevelt  .
The  कार्यक्रम   यहूद  in response to the Great  अवसाद  , and focused on  कया  historians call  the  ``  3  Rs ''  :  Relief , Recovery ,  और   सुधार  .
That  is  Relief for  the   बेरोजगार  and poor ; Recovery of the economy to normal levels  ;  and Reform of the financial system  to  prevent a repeat  अवसाद  .
The New Deal produced a political  realignment  ,  बनाना  the  लोकतांत्रिक  Party the  बहुमत  (  as  well as the  पार्टी  that held  the  White  हाउस  for  सात  out  of  nine Presidential terms  इससे  1933  to  1969 )  ,  with its base  in   उदार  ideas ,  the  white South , traditional Democrats , big city  मशीने  , and the newly empowered labor unions and ethnic minorities  .
the  Republicans were  विभाजित   ,   साथ  conservatives opposing the entire New Deal as an enemy of business and  विकास  ,  और  liberals accepting some of  it   और  promising to  मेक  it more efficient .
the  realignment  crystallized  into  the  New  सौदे  Coalition that  वर्चस्व  most  अध्यक्षीय   चुनावों  into  the  1960s  ,  while the opposition  रूढ़िवादी   गठबन्धन  largely controlled Congress from 1937 to 1963 .
by  1936 the term `` liberal '' typically was  प्रयुक्त  for supporters of the New Deal  ,  and  ``  conservative `` for its  प्रतिद्वंद्वियों   .
From 1934 to  1938  , Roosevelt  थी  assisted in his  endeavours  by a “pro-spender” majority  in  Congress ( drawn from two-party  ,  competitive ,  non-machine  , Progressive  ,  and Left party districts ) .
As  विख्यात  by  सिकंदर   हिक्स  , “Roosevelt , backed  by  rare  ,   non-southern  Democrat majorities — 270  non-southern  Democrat representatives and 71 non-Southern Democrat senators  —  spelled  दूसरी   नई  Deal reform.”
Many  इतिहासकारों  distinguish between  a  `` First New  सौदे  '' ( 1933–34  )  and a  ``  Second New Deal ''  (   1935–38  ) ,  साथ  the second one more liberal and  अधिक  controversial .
The  ``  First New Deal '' (  1933–34  ) dealt  साथ  diverse  समूह   ,   इससे  banking and railroads to industry and farming , all of  जिससे  demanded  सहायता  for  आर्थिक   अस्तित्व  .
The Federal Emergency Relief Administration , for instance ,  provided   $  500 million for relief operations by  राज्य   और  cities , while the short-lived  cwa  ( Civil  works  Administration  )   दिया  localities  धन   to   operate   make-work  projects in 1933-34  .
the  ``  दूसरी  New  सौदे  `` in 1935–38 included the Wagner Act to promote labor unions ,  the  Works Progress Administration ( WPA ) relief  कार्यक्रम   (  which made  the   संघीय  government by far  the  largest single employer in the  स्वदेश  ) , the Social Security Act , and new programs to aid tenant farmers and migrant workers .
the   फाइनल  major items  of  New Deal legislation  यहूद  the creation of  the   संयुक्त  States Housing Authority and Farm Security Administration ,  दोनो  in 1937 , and the  मेला  Labor  मानकों  Act  of   1938  , which set maximum  घंटों  and minimum wages for  सबसे   श्रेणी  of workers .
The economic  downturn  of 1937–38 , and  the   कड़वा  split between  the  AFL and CIO  मजदूर   संघ  led to  प्रमुख  Republican gains  in   कॉंग्रेस  in  1938  .
Conservative Republicans  और  Democrats in  कॉंग्रेस  joined in the informal  रूढ़िवादी  Coalition .
By 1942–43 they  shut  down  राहत  programs  ऐसे  as  the  WPA  और  CCC and blocked major  उदार  proposals .
Roosevelt himself turned his attention to  the  war effort ,  और  won  reelection   in  1940  और   1944  .
the   परम्   अदालत  declared  the  National  रिकवरी   प्रशासन  ( NRA ) and the first version  of  the Agricultural  समायोजन  Act ( AAA ) unconstitutional , however the AAA was rewritten and then upheld .
As the first Republican president elected after FDR , Dwight D. Eisenhower  (  1953–61  )  left the  नई  Deal largely  बरकरार  , even expanding  it  in some  क्षेत्रों   .
In the  1960s   ,  Lyndon B. Johnson  's   ग्रेट  Society used  the  New  सौदे   as  inspiration  लिये   a  dramatic expansion of liberal programs ,  जिससे   रिपब्लिकन  Richard M. Nixon generally  retained  .
After  1974  ,  however   ,  the call  लिये   deregulation  of  the   अर्थव्यवस्था   gained  bipartisan support .
The  नई  Deal  विनियमन  of  बैंकिंग   (  Glass–Steagall  अधिनियम   )  was suspended in  the   1990s  .
Many New Deal programs remain active , with  कुछ   स्टिल  operating under  the  original  names  , including the Federal Deposit  बीमे  Corporation  (  FDIC )  ,   the  Federal Crop  बीमे  Corporation (  fcic  )  ,   the   संघीय   आवास  Administration ( FHA ) , and the  टेनेसी  Valley Authority ( TVA ) .
The largest programs still in existence today are  the  Social Security System and the  प्रतिभूति  and Exchange  आयोग  (  सेक  )  .
A woman ( )  ,  pl  :  women ( ) is a female  इंसान  .
The  पद   स्त्री  is usually reserved for an adult , with the term  लड़की  being the  usual  term for a female child or adolescent .
however  , the term woman  is  also  sometimes  used to  पहचानो  a female human  ,  regardless of age , as in  वाक्यांश  such as `` Women  's  rights `` .
Women  हैं  typically capable of giving birth , though older women  जो  have  गए  through  रजोनिवृत्ति   और  some  intersex  women can  नहीं  .
``  I Do n't Want to  मिस   a  Thing  ''  is a song performed by American  चट्टान   बैंड  Aerosmith  लिये   the   1998  film  armageddon  .
लिखा  by Diane Warren , the  सोंग  debuted at  क्रमांक  one  on   the   बिलबोर्ड   hot   100  ( the  पहला  # 1  लिये  the band after 28 years  साथ   )  .
The  सोंग  stayed  at  number one for four  सप्ताह   इससे  September 5  to   सितंबर   26   ,   1998   .
The song also stayed at  क्रमांक  1 for  अनेक  weeks in several other  देशों   .
In the UK , the  सोंग   peaked  at  क्रमांक  four ,  बनने  Aerosmith 's highest charting song in the  uk  , where it  थी  the  17th  best-selling single of  1998  ,  और  has sold  over   a   लाख   नक़ल  .
Although  नहीं  used  by  the majority of  the  world  's  countries ,  daylight  saving  समय  is common in  the  Western  संसार   .
Daylight saving time ( DST ) —also summer time in British English  —  is the practice  of  advancing  घड़ियाँ   दौरान   the  lighter months so  कि   evenings  have more daylight and mornings  have  less .
typically  clocks are  समायोजित  forward  एक   घंटा   निकट  the start of spring and are adjusted backward in autumn .
The  आधुनिक  idea of daylight  छायांकन  was  पहला  proposed in 1895  by   जार्ज  Vernon Hudson and it was first implemented during the First World War .
Many  देशों  have used it  at   विभिन्न  times since then  .
much  of the United  राज्य  used DST in the 1950s  और   1960s  ,  और   dst  use expanded following  the   1970s  energy  संकट  and has  महरूम   widely  used in North America  और  Europe since then .
the  practice  रै   महरूम  both praised and criticized .
Adding daylight  to  evenings benefits retailing ,  खेल  , and other activities that exploit  धूप  after working  घंटों   ,  but can  कारण  problems  लिये   संध्या   entertainment   और  other occupations  tied   to  the sun .
हालांकि  an early  लक्ष्य  of DST  थी  to reduce evening usage of  incandescent  lighting  (   formerly  a  प्राथमिक  use of electricity ) , modern heating  और   कूलिंग   उपयोग  patterns  differ  greatly  ,   और  research about how  dst  currently affects energy  उपयोग   is  limited or  contradictory   .
dst  clock  शिफ्ट  present  अन्य  challenges .
They complicate timekeeping ,  और   can  disrupt  बैठक  ,  सफर  ,  बिलिंग   ,   रिकार्ड  keeping , medical devices  ,   भारी  equipment , and sleep patterns .
Software can  प्रायः  adjust computer  घड़ियाँ  automatically  ,  but  इस  can be  सीमित  and error-prone ,  विशेषकर   जब  DST  तिथियाँ  are changed .
floorplan  of  the  Château de Montargis
Montargis is  a  commune  in  the Loiret department  in  north-central France on the Loing river .
The town is located about south of Paris  और  east of Orléans in the Gâtinais .
montargis  is the second largest  नगर  in  the   loiret  ,  बाद  Orléans  .
it  is near a large  वन  , and contains light industry and farming , including saffron .
Due to its numerous canals  और  bridges , Montargis  sometimes  bills itself as the  ``   वेनिस  of  the  Gâtinais . ''
Though quite modern ,  it  retains a  मध्यकालीन   आकर्षण  in  इसके  downtown  क्षेत्रफल  .
in   कंप्यूटर  storage ,  a  logical unit  क्रमांक  , or LUN  ,  is a number used to identify a  लॉजिकल  unit , which is a device addressed by  the   scsi  protocol or  प्रोटोकॉल  which encapsulate SCSI , such as  fibre  Channel or iSCSI  .
A  lun  may  be   प्रयुक्त   साथ  any device which supports  read/write  operations  ,   ऐसे  as  a  tape drive , but  is  most often used to refer to a logical disk as created  on  a  सैन  .
Though not  technically  correct  ,   the  term `` LUN ''  is   प्रायः  also  प्रयुक्त  to refer  to  the logical  डिस्क  itself .
The Gospel According to Mark  (  , , to euangelion kata  markon  )  ,  commonly  shortened  to the Gospel  of  Mark or simply Mark , is the second book  of  the New  वसीयत  .
इस   canonical  account of the life  of  Jesus  of  Nazareth is one of the three synoptic gospels .
It  थी  thought to  be   an  epitome  ,  which  खाते  for  इसके  place as the second gospel in the Bible .
However  ,  most contemporary scholars  अभी  regard  it  as the earliest of the canonical gospels (  c  70  )  .
That Mark was  प्रयुक्त   as  a source  लिये  the other  synoptic  gospels  इन्जील  of Matthew  और   इन्जील   of  Luke is widely held by  अनेक  ,  हालांकि   नहीं  all  ,  New Testament scholars .
The  इन्जील   of  Mark narrates the Ministry  of   यीशु  from his baptism by John  the   बैपटिस्ट  to his death  और  resurrection .
it  focuses particularly on  the   पिछला  week of his  जीवन  ( chapters 11–16 )  in   जेरूसलम  .
Its swift narrative portrays Jesus as  a  heroic  man  of  कार्रवाई   ,   an   exorcist  ,  healer  and miracle worker .
An important theme of  चिह्नित  is the Messianic Secret  .
Jesus silences  the   demoniacs  he heals ,  कोशिशें   unsuccessfully  to keep his messianic  पहचान   रहस्य  , and conceals  उसके  message  साथ  parables .
Meanwhile , the  शिष्यों   असफल  to understand both the implication  of  the  चमत्कार   of  Jesus and the  अर्थ  of the things  he   predicts  about his  गिरफ़्तार   ,  death and  क़यामत   .
Most scholars  मानना   कि  the original  टेक्स्ट  of the gospel  ends   at  Mark 16:8 with the discovery of  यीशु  ' empty  मकबरा  and  कि   the  following account of his resurrection appearances is a later addition .
according  to  परंपरा   और  some  जल्दी  church writers ,  the  author is Mark the Evangelist , the  साथी  of the apostle Peter .
The gospel , however , appears  to   rely   on   अनेक  underlying sources , varying  in   रूप  and in theology ,  जिससे  tells against the tradition that  the  gospel  थी   आधारित  on Peter 's preaching  .
The text  is   a  compilation which  may  include eye-witness  खाते  as  खूब   as   ज्ञात   अपोस्टोलिक  preachings  ,  and pre-existing written records  कि   do  not exist today but can be confirmed  इससे  2nd-century  टीकाकारों  .
कुछ   of  the  कहानियां   in  the gospel may have  महरूम  transmitted  orally  before being written down .
Various  तत्व  within the gospel suggest  कि  the author wrote in Syria or  फिलिस्तीन  for a non-Jewish Christian  जातियाँ  .
The Lord of  the   बजती  is an epic  ऊँची  fantasy novel  लिखा  by  अंग्रेज़ी  philologist and  विश्वविद्यालयों  of Oxford professor J.  R.  R.  tolkien  .
The story began as a sequel to Tolkien  's   1937   children  's fantasy novel The Hobbit , but  आखिरकार  developed into a much larger work .
it  was  लिखा  in  चरण  between 1937 and 1949  ,  much of  it  during World War  ii  .
it  is the  दूसरी  best-selling novel ever written ,  साथ  over 150 million  नक़ल  sold .
The title of  the   अनोखा  refers to the story 's  प्रमुख   विपक्षी  , the  अंधेरा  Lord Sauron ,  जो  had in  an  earlier  आयु   निर्मित   the  One Ring  to  rule the other Rings of Power  as   the  ultimate  हथियार  in his campaign to conquer and rule all of  middle-earth   .
इससे  quiet beginnings in  the  Shire , a Hobbit  जमीन  not unlike  the  English  countryside   ,   the  story ranges  आरपार  north-west Middle-earth , following the course of  the  War  of   the  Ring  through   the   आँखें   of  its characters ,  notably  the hobbits  frodo  Baggins ,  samwise   ``  Sam ''  gamgee  , Meriadoc  ``  Merry  ''   brandybuck  and Peregrin ``  pippin   ''  Took ,  लकिन   भी  the hobbits  '   मुख्य  allies and travelling companions  :  Aragorn ,  a  Human  रेंजर  ; Boromir , a man from  gondor  ; Gimli  ,  a  बौना   योद्धा   ;  Legolas , an Elven prince ; and  gandalf  , a Wizard .
The  कार्य   थी  initially intended  by  Tolkien to be one  आवाज़  of a two-volume set  ,  with the other being The  silmarillion  , but this  विचार  was dismissed by  उसके  publisher .
it   थी   decided   लिये   आर्थिक  reasons to publish The Lord of the Rings as  तीन   आयतन   over  the course of a year  इससे  29  जुलाई  1954  to   20  October 1955  ,  thus  बनाना   the  now familiar  रब  of the Rings trilogy .
the  three volumes were entitled The Fellowship of  the  Ring , The  दो   मीनारें  , and The Return  of  the  किंग   .
structurally   ,  the novel  is  divided internally into six books , two  प्रति   आवाज़   ,  with several appendices of background  सामग्री  included at  the  end of the third volume .
the  Lord of the Rings  रै   चूंकि   महरूम  reprinted numerous times and translated  into  many languages .
tolkien  's work  रै   महरूम  the subject  of  extensive  विश्लेषण  of  इसके  themes  और  origins  .
Although a major  कार्य   in  itself , the story was only the last movement  of  a larger epic Tolkien  था  worked  on  since 1917 ,  in  a process he  वर्णित   as  mythopoeia  .
Influences on  इस  earlier work  ,   और  on  the  story of The  रब   of   the  Rings , include philology  ,   mythology  , religion  और  the author 's distaste for the effects of industrialization  ,   as  well as  पहले  fantasy  works  and  tolkien  's experiences in World War  i  .
The Lord of  the  Rings  in  its turn is  माना   to  have had  a  great effect on modern  काल्पनिक  ;  the  impact  of   tolkien  's works is  ऐसे  that the use  of  the words `` Tolkienian  ''   और  ``  tolkienesque   ''  have been  अंकित  in the  ऑक्सफोर्ड  English  शब्दकोष  .
the  enduring popularity of The Lord  of  the Rings has led to numerous  सन्दर्भ  in  लोकप्रिय   संस्कृति  , the founding  of   अनेक  societies by fans  of   tolkien   's  works , and  the  publication  of   अनेक  books  परिचय  Tolkien and his works  .
The Lord of the Rings has inspired , and  continues  to inspire , artwork  ,   म्यूज़िक  , films and television  ,  video  खेल  , and  subsequent   साहित्य  .
Award-winning adaptations of  the  Lord of the Rings have been  बना  for radio  ,  theatre , and film  .
The following is an episode list for  the   निकलोडियन  sitcom  ड्रेक   &  Josh .
The series debuted on January  11  , 2004 .
A TV film  मैरी  Christmas  ,   ड्रेक  & Josh was made apart from  the  regular series on  दिसम्बर  5  ,   2008  .
There are  a  total of 60  एपीसोड  were produced spanning  चार  seasons .
Drake Bell  ,  Josh  पेक   ,  and Miranda Cosgrove were  the  only actors to appear in all  60   एपीसोड  .
the  San Francisco  49ers  conduct  प्रशिक्षण   शिविर  at the team 's  मुख्यालय   और  practice facility  in   सांता  Clara  ,   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  in August 2010 .
the  offense is  wearing   रेड  jerseys  साथ  the exception of quarterback Alex  स्मिथ   ,  who is  in   a  black  जर्सी   ;   the  defense in white  .
In the National Football  लीग  , training  शिविर  refers to the time before the  ऋतु  commences .
During this time , teams will  sometimes  congregate  at  an  बाहर  location , usually a university , to  conduct   प्रशिक्षण  camp for at least  the  first few weeks .
This is similar to baseball 's spring training .
Training camp is used  in   अनेक  different  तरीके  .
नई  players  और  coaches  उपयोग  it to  acclimate  themselves  to  new teammates and systems .
For  younger  players , it  serves  as a period of evaluation ; for  दिग्गजों  , it is time to round  वापस  into  रूप  .
Training camp is  विभाजित   into  several different  components  .
The first is scrimmages .
These  हैं  pseudo-games where teams run nearly  पूरा   खेल   '  worth of plays .
Sometimes , two practice sessions are held on the  वही  day .
इस  concept is referred to as  two-a-days  .
Other parts of  प्रशिक्षण   शिविर  include drills , meetings  साथ  coaches and other players at one  's   स्थिति  ,  वज़न  training , and pre-season games .
the  latter  हाफ  of training camp leads directly into  the   प्रदर्शनी   ऋतु   .
With  एनएफएल   प्रशिक्षण  camps  starting  in late-July , the biggest concern has  महरूम  dehydration  .
In  2001  , Minnesota  वाइकिंग्स  player Korey Stringer died of a medical condition based  इससे  dehydration  और  heatstroke .
The  मौत   of  Stringer prompted the  एनएफएल   to   बदलें  their  प्रशिक्षण  policies  .
At each practice  ,  every team  जरूर   have  the team  डॉक्टर  and trainers on the field ; additionally , an ambulance  जरूर  be present  दौरान  practices .
With NFL  प्रशिक्षण   शिविरों  beginning in late  जुलाई  , severe weather  can  affect practice  और  exhibition  खेल  .
In  2002  , a Cleveland  भूरा   प्रदर्शनी  game ended  due  to  बिजली  near Cleveland Browns Stadium , and  कठोर   तूफ़ान  have been known to disrupt training camps .
Fans  हैं   प्रायः  able to visit  उनके  favorite  टोली   's  training  शिविर   to   कैच   an  early look at  the   खिलाड़ी  ;  प्रवेश  to practices is often free  or  substantially  कम  expensive than a game ticket ,  बनाना   प्रशिक्षण  camp  यात्राएँ   a  popular  विकल्प  for fans  जो  can  नहीं   attend   अनेक  games  due  to financial  or  other reasons .
NFL teams  प्रायः  sell souvenirs  और   concessions   at   शिविर  sites  साथ  with  offering   क्रियाएँ  and events  to  make  प्रशिक्षण  camp a more fan-friendly experience  .
in  computing  ,   a  file system ( or filesystem  )  is a type of  आंकड़ा  store which  can  be used to  स्टोर  ,  retrieve  and update a set of  फाइलें  .
the  term  could  refer  to  the abstract data  structures  used  to   define  files , or  to  the actual software or firmware components  कि  implement the abstract ideas  .
Some file systems are used on local data storage devices ; others provide file access via a  संजाल  protocol  (   e.g  . NFS ,  smb  , or 9P  क्लाइंट  ) .
Some file  प्रणालियों  are `` virtual '' , in  कि  the  ``  files '' supplied  हैं  computed on  निवेदन  (  e.g  . procfs ) or are merely a mapping into a different file system used  as  a backing store .
The file  प्रणाली   manages   अभिगम   to   दोनो  the content  of  files and  the   मेटाडेटा   परिचय  those files  .
It  is  responsible  लिये  arranging storage  स्पेस  ;  विश्वसनीयता  , efficiency , and  ट्यूनिंग  with regard to  the  physical  भंडार  medium are important design  considerations   .
William Howard  taft  (  सितंबर   15   ,  1857 – March 8 , 1930  )  was the 27th  अध्यक्ष  of  the  United  राज्य  (  1909–1913   )   और  later  the   दसवाँ  Chief  इंसाफ   of   the  United  राज्य   (  1921–1930  )   .
He is the only  व्यक्ति  to  have  served in both  of  these  कार्यालयों  .
Before  बनने  President , Taft , a Republican , was selected  to  serve on the  श्रेष्ठ  Court of  सिनसिनाटी   in   1887  .
in  1890  ,  Taft was  नियुक्त   solicitor  General of  the  United States  और  in 1891 a  न्यायधीश   on  the United States Court of  appeals   लिये  the Sixth  सर्किट  .
in   1900  ,  अध्यक्ष   विलियम   mckinley  appointed Taft Governor-General of the Philippines  .
in  1904 , President Theodore Roosevelt appointed Taft  सचिव   of  War in an effort  to   दूल्हे  Taft , then  उसके  close  राजनैतिक  ally , into  उसके  handpicked  अध्यक्षीय  successor .
Taft assumed a  prominent  role in problem  solving   ,   assuming  on  कुछ   अवसरों  the role of acting  सचिव  of State  ,   जबकि   घटती  repeated offers  इससे   रूज़वेल्ट  to serve on the  परम्  Court .
Riding a wave  of   लोकप्रिय  support for  fellow  Republican  रूज़वेल्ट   ,  Taft  जीती   an  easy victory in his 1908  बोली   लिये  the presidency  .
In his only  पद   ,  Taft  's  domestic agenda emphasized  trust-busting   ,   सिविल   सेवा  reform  ,   strengthening  the  अंतरराज्यीय  Commerce  आयोग  ,  improving   the   प्रदर्शन  of  the   डाक  service , and  ड्योढ़ी  of the Sixteenth Amendment .
Abroad  ,  Taft  sought  to further  the   आर्थिक  development of nations  in  Latin  अमेरिका   और  Asia through  ``   डालर  Diplomacy `` , and showed decisiveness and  संयम   in  response to revolution in Mexico .
The task-oriented Taft was oblivious to  the  political ramifications  of   उसके  decisions , often  alienated  his  अपना  key constituencies ,  और   थी   overwhelmingly  defeated in his bid  लिये  a  दूसरी  term in the presidential election of 1912  .
In  सर्वेक्षण  of presidential scholars  ,  Taft  is  usually ranked  निकट  the middle of lists of all American  राष्ट्रपतियों   .
After  leaving   दफ्तर  , Taft spent  उसके  time  in   academia  , arbitration , and the search for world  सलाम  through  उसके  self-founded  लीग  to Enforce Peace .
In 1921 ,  बाद   the   पहला   संसार  War  ,  President Warren G.  हार्डिंग  appointed Taft Chief Justice of the  संयुक्त  States .
Taft served in this capacity  जबतक   shortly  before his  मौत  in 1930  .
The Ten  आयतें  is a 1956 epic film  उत्पादित  and directed by Cecil B. DeMille that  dramatized  the biblical story  of   the   exodus  ,  in  which  the   hebrew-born  Moses , an adopted Egyptian  प्रिंस  , becomes the deliverer  of  the Hebrew slaves .
it  starred Charlton  हेस्टन   in   the  lead role , Yul Brynner as his adoptive brother , Pharaoh Rameses II , Anne Baxter as  nefretiri   ,   एडवर्ड  G.  रॉबिन्सन  as Dathan , Yvonne De Carlo  as   sephora  ,  डेबरा   पेजेट  as Lilia ,  और  John Derek  as  Joshua .
The supporting cast includes  सर  Cedric  hardwicke   as  Pharaoh  सेती  I ,  नीना  Foch as Bithiah , Martha  स्कॉट  as  yoshebel  , Judith  एंडरसन  as Memnet , Vincent Price  as   baka  ,  और   जॉन  Carradine as Aaron  .
The  फिल्मी   थी   released   by   सर्वोपरि  Pictures in VistaVision  on  October 5 ,  1956  .
The Ten Commandments , which DeMille  narrated   ,  was  the   पिछला  film  कि  he directed  .
he  was  नियत  to direct  the   1958   रीमेक  of his 1938 film The  buccaneer  , but his  फाइनल  illness forced him  to  relinquish the directing chores to his son-in-law ,  कर्ता  Anthony  क्विन  .
DeMille had  भी   नियोजित  to  फिल्मी  the life of Lord Baden  पावेल   ,  the founder  of  the  स्काउट  movement , with  दाउद  Niven ;  इस   प्रोजेक्ट  was  never  realized  .
The Ten Commandments is a  आंशिक   रीमेक  of  demille  's 1923 silent film  .
कुछ  of  the   डाल  and crew of  the   1956   संस्करण   worked  on the original  .
It  रै  since  महरूम   remade  as a television  miniseries  broadcast  in  April  2006  .
the   टेन  Commandments is one of the most financially  कामयाब   films   कभी  made  ,  grossing  over  $ 65  लाख  at  the   u.S.   बक्सा  office .
Adjusting for  महंगाई  , this makes it the sixth  highest-grossing  film domestically ,  साथ  an  समायोजित   कुल  of $  1,025,730,000  in  2012  .
The box office  जालस्थल  ``  the  Numbers ''  सूचियाँ  the  घरेलू   सकल  at $ 80  लाख  .
In 1999  ,  The Ten Commandments was selected for preservation  in   the  United States National  फिल्मी  Registry by the  पुस्तकालयों  of  कॉंग्रेस  as  होने  `` culturally  ,  historically ,  or  aesthetically significant '' .
in  June 2008  ,  the American  फिल्मी  Institute  नाज़िल  its `` Ten Top  टेन   ``   —the  best  टेन  films in ten American  फिल्मी  genres—after polling over  1,500  people  इससे  the  रचनात्मक  community  .
The Ten Commandments was  सूचीबद्ध   as   the   दसवाँ  best film  in   the  epic  विधा  .
The  फिल्मी  received  सात   अकादमी  Award nominations including Best Picture ,  और  won  the   अकादमी  Award for  बेहतरीन  Visual  प्रभाव  .
Charlton  हेस्टन  was  मनोनीत  for a Golden  ग्लोब  Award for Best Motion  चित्र  Actor in the drama category .
Yul Brynner won  the   नेशनल   फलक  of Review Award  लिये  Best Actor for his role  as  Rameses  ,  along with  उसके  other roles in  the  King and I and Anastasia .
louisville  ( , or  )   is  a major city and the largest city in  the  U.S.  राज्य  of Kentucky and  the   काउंटी   सीट   of   जेफरसन  County .
Since  2003  , the  नगर  's borders have been with  those  of the county because of a  city-county  merger .
The city 's total  संचित  population  at  the 2010 census was 741,096  (  Louisville  's   संतुलन  total , 602,011 , excludes semi-autonomous towns  और   is  the population  सूचीबद्ध  in most sources and national  rankings  )  .
As of 2010  ,   the  Louisville metropolitan area ( MSA )  था  a population of 1,307,647 ranking  42nd  nationally  .
The metro area includes Louisville-Jefferson  काउंटी  and  12   surrounding  counties , eight in Kentucky and four in Southern Indiana ( see Geography below  )   .
The Louisville Combined  सांख्यिकीय  Area  ,  having a population  of  1,451,564 , includes  the   एमएसए  ,  hardin   काउंटी  and Larue County  in  Kentucky , and Scott County , Indiana .
An important internal shipping port in the 19th century , Louisville today is best known  as  the location of the Kentucky Derby , the first of three annual thoroughbred horse  दौड़   बनाना  up the Triple Crown .
A typical experimental setup for  an  aldol reaction  .
Both flasks are  submerged   in  a dry ice/acetone cooling bath ( −78 °C ) the temperature  of   जिससे  is being  monitored  by  a   तापयुग्म  (  the  wire on the  बाएँ   )  .
A cooling  नहाना  , in laboratory  रसायन  ( often but  नहीं  always  सशुल्क   रसायन  ) practice ,  is  a  द्रव   मिश्रण   जिससे  is used to maintain low temperatures , typically between 13 °C and  −196   °c  .
ये  low temperatures  हैं  used  to   collect  liquids  बाद  distillation  ,  to remove solvents using a rotary evaporator  ,  or to  perform  a chemical reaction below room temperature ( see :  गतिज  control  )  .
कूलिंग  baths are generally  एक  of  दो  types  :  ( a ) a  ठंडा  fluid ( particularly liquid nitrogen , water , or  भी  air  )   —  but  सबसे  commonly the  पद  refers to ( b  )  a mixture of 3 components :  (  1 )  a  cooling agent ( such as  शुष्क  ice  or  water ice ) ; ( b ) a liquid  'कैरीr  ' ( such  as  liquid  जल  , ethylene glycol , acetone , etc  .  )  ,  which transfers heat between the bath  और   the  vessel  ;   ;  and ( c )  an  additive to depress the melting-point of the solid/liquid  प्रणाली   .
( A familiar example  of  this is  the  use of an ice/rock-salt mixture to  फ्रीज   बर्फ  cream .
The phase-change of  बर्फ  into liquid water requires energy  ,  'pulling ' heat  इससे   the  system  .
Adding  नमक  lowers  the   अस्थायी   at  which  इस   happens  ,  अर्थ  more energy has  to  be absorbed  इससे   the   पर्यावरण  in order to  melt  the ice  .
This effectively  makes  the ice  'colder  ' — it  जरूर  'pull ' more heat from  इसके  environment to become liquid . )
Eating disorders are  शर्तें  defined by  असामान्य  eating habits  कि  may involve either  अपर्याप्त  or excessive  खाना   सेवन   to  the detriment of an individual 's physical and  दिमागी   स्वास्थ्य  .
bulimia   नर्वोज़ा  and  एनोरेक्सिया  nervosa are  the   सबसे  common specific forms  in  the  संयुक्त   किंगडम  .
अन्य  types of  खाने  disorders include binge  खाने  disorder and eating disorder not otherwise  निर्दिष्ट  .
Bulimia  नर्वोज़ा  is a disorder characterized by binge eating and purging .
Purging can  शामिल  self-induce  उल्टी  , over-exercising , and the  उपयोग  of diuretics ,  enemas  ,  और  laxatives .
Anorexia nervosa is characterized by extreme  खाना   प्रतिबंध   to  the point of  self-starvation  and excessive weight  घाटा  .
हालांकि  primarily thought of as  affecting  females  (  an estimated 5–10  लाख  being  प्रभावित  in  the  U.K. ) , eating  विकार   affect  males as well .
An estimated 10  –  15 % of people with eating disorders are males (  गोर्गान  ,  1999  )  .
( an  अनुमानित  1 million  u.K.   males  being affected  )  .
Although eating disorders are increasing  सब   over  the world among both  मेन  and women , there is  प्रमाण   to  suggest  कि  it is women in the Western world  जो  are at the highest  रिस्क   of   विकासशील  them  और  the  उपाधि  of  westernization  increases the risk  .
Nearly half of all  अमेरिकी  personally know someone with an eating  विकार  .
The skill to comprehend the central  प्रक्रियाओं   of  appetite  रै   increased   tremendously  since leptin was  खोजा   ,   और  the skill to observe the functions  of   the  brain  as   खूब   .
Interactions between motivational  ,  homeostatic and  self-regulatory   कंट्रोल  processes are involved  in  eating  आचरण   ,  which  is  a  कुंजी  component in eating disorders .
The precise cause of eating disorders is not entirely  समझा  ,  लकिन   वहीँ  is evidence  कि   it  may  be   linked   to  other  चिकित्सा   शर्तें  and situations  .
Cultural  idealization  of thinness and youthfulness have  contributed   to  eating disorders affecting diverse populations .
One  पढ़ाई  showed that  लड़कियों  with ADHD have a  वृहद   मौका  of  getting   an   खाने  disorder  than   those  not affected by ADHD .
Another  पढ़ाई   सुझाया   कि  women with PTSD ,  विशेषकर   due  to sexually related  आघात  , are  अधिक  likely to  develop  anorexia  नर्वोज़ा  .
One study  दिखाया   कि  foster girls are more likely to  develop  bulimia nervosa  .
Some think that peer  दबाव  and  idealized  body-types seen  in  the media are  भी  a significant  फ़ैक्टर  .
कुछ   शोध  show  कि   लिये  certain  लोगों   वहीँ  are  जेनेटिक  reasons why they may  be  prone to developing an  खाने   विकार  .
हाल  studies have  मिला  evidence a correlation between  मरीजों   साथ   bulimia   नर्वोज़ा  and substance use disorders .
In addition , anxiety disorders  और  personality  विकार  are common  आवृत्ति  with  क्लाइंट  of eating disorders  .
जबकि  proper treatment can be  अत्यधिक   प्रभावी  for many suffering from  विशिष्ट  types of eating disorders  ,  the  consequences  of eating  विकार  can  be   कठोर  ,  सहित   मौत   (  whether from direct  चिकित्सा   प्रभाव   of  disturbed eating habits or from comorbid conditions such as suicidal thinking ) .
Slavery in  the  United  राज्य  existed from  the   जल्दी  years of the colonial period ; it was  firmly  established by the time  the   संयुक्त  States sought  स्वतंत्रता  from Great  ब्रिटेन  in  1776  .
however  , by 1804  ,  all  राज्य  north of the Mason and Dixon Line had  either  abolished slavery outright or passed laws for  the   क्रमिक  abolition of  गुलामी  .
in   1787  Congress prohibited slavery in the Northwest Territory  .
But  गुलामी  gained new life in the  दक्षिण   साथ  the  कपास   उद्योग  after 1800 ,  और  expanded into  the  Southwest .
The nation was polarized into  स्लेव  and free states  साथ   the  Mason-Dixon  लकीर  , which  अलग  Pennsylvania and Maryland  .
The United States and  ग्रेट  Britain both prohibited the international slave trade in 1808 , but the domestic trade ,  साथ  sales to the Deep South , expanded dramatically , and many  captives  were  shipped  by the  coastwise  slave trade .
Before the 1840s  ,  the South was vigorously  defending  slavery  और   इसके   विस्तार  into  the  territories .
In  the  North  कुछ  abolitionists denounced  it   as  sinful , and numerous anti-slavery forces rejected  it  as detrimental to the  अधिकारों   of  free  मेन  .
बाद  failed compromises and Abraham Lincoln 's election , in 1861  ग्यारह  slave states broke  दूर  to form the Confederate States  of   अमेरिका  , leading to  the  American  सिविल  War  .
the  federal  सरकारी  in 1862 made abolition of slavery a  युद्ध  goal .
In January  1863   अध्यक्ष   lincoln   freed  slaves  in  the Confederacy through the Emancipation Proclamation  .
After  the  war  ,  the  तेरहवीं  Amendment , effective December  1865  , abolished slavery throughout  the  entire  संयुक्त   राज्य   ,  including the  किनारा  states  और  the Indian territories .
From the  16th  to the  19th  centuries , an estimated 12 million Africans  यहूद  shipped as slaves to  the  Americas .
See Slavery in  the  Americas  .
The great majority went to the sugar plantations of the  वेस्ट  Indies  or  Brazil , where mortality was high .
About  645,000   यहूद   brought   to  what is now  the  United States .
By  the  1860 United States  जनसांख्यिकी   ,  the slave population  in  the American South  था  grown  to   चार  million  .
Of all 1,515,605 families in the 15 slave  राज्य   ,  nearly  400,000   आयोजित  slaves  (  roughly  एक  in four ) ,  amounting   to  8  %  of all  अमरीकी  families .
While  कुछ   स्लेव  worked  as  house servants  और  urban artisans , the great  बहुमत  worked on plantations or large farms ,  cultivating   lucrative  cash crops  ,  such as rice , tobacco ,  शुगर   और  , after  1800  , chiefly cotton  .
By  1860  most  स्लेव  were held  in   the  Deep South  ,   जहाँ   वे  served in work-gangs  ;   two-thirds   worked   in  cotton .
In small operations , they  worked  with  उनके   स्वामी  .
in   विशाल   बागानों  they were  निर्देशित  by  श्वेत  paid overseers .
Under  the  system  कि  became chattel slavery ( ownership of a human  होने  , and of  his/her  descendants ) , a  जातिगत  element was fundamental : slaves were blacks of African  descent  and owned ,  लगभग   universally  ,  by   whites  of European descent .
In the 17th century , Virginia  ,  followed by other southern colonies , enacted law that  children  of slave mothers were  born  into slavery .
Slaves could gain freedom only  by  running  दूर   (  which was difficult and illegal to do ) ,  or  by  manumission  by owners ,  जिससे   थी  regulated by states ,  और  became increasingly  मुश्किल   or   निषिद्ध   .
In the  earliest  era of chattel slavery  ,   the  colonies also  व्यवस्थित  work  by  a system of bonded labor known as indentured  servitude  .
इस  typically lasted for several years for both poor Europeans  और   africans   alike   ,   to  pay  बंद  the costs of  हस्तांतरण  to the  colonies   .
वे  contracted for such arrangements because  of   ग़रीब   economies  in their home countries .
Between  1680  and 1700  ,  as fewer Europeans migrated to  the  colonies ,  planters  began  to  import more Africans  as   स्लेव   .
Recognizing the importance of  गुलामी   ,   the   हाउस  of Burgesses in Virginia  enacted   a  new slave  कोड  in 1705 ; it combined a  किस्में  of legislation and added new provisions  enforcing  white supremacy in the  विधि  .
Schematic cross section of part  of  leaf  ,   जाइलम  shown as  रेड   वृत्त   at  figure 8 .
Xylem is one  of   the  two types of transport tissue  in   vascular  plants ( phloem is the other ) .
the  word  जाइलम  is derived from the Greek word  ξύλον  ( xylon ) ,  अर्थ  `` wood ''  ;   the  best-known  जाइलम  tissue is wood  ,  though it is found  throughout   the  plant .
Its basic function  is  to transport water , but it also  transports  some nutrients through the plant  .
इस  clock  प्रतिनिधित्व  shows  कुछ  of the  प्रमुख   इकाई  of geological time and  निर्णायक  events of  धरती   इतिहास  .
The Hadean eon  represents  the  समय  before  चट्टान  record of  जीवन  on  धरती  ; its upper boundary is now regarded as 4.0 Ga  (   अरब  years ago ) .
Other  subdivisions  reflect the evolution  of  life ;  the  Archean and Proterozoic are both eons , the Palaeozoic ,  mesozoic  and  cenozoic  are eras  of  the  phanerozoic  eon  .
the  two million  साल  Quaternary period ,  the   समय  of recognizable humans ,  is  too small to be visible at  इस  scale  .
the  geologic time  स्केल  is a system  of  chronological measurement that relates stratigraphy to  समय  ,  और   is  used by geologists  ,  paleontologists , and other earth scientists to describe the timing and relationships  between  events that have occurred  throughout  Earth 's history .
The table of  भूगर्भिक  time spans  प्रस्तुत  here agrees with the  तिथियाँ  and nomenclature  नियत  forth by the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   आयोग  on Stratigraphy standard  रंग  codes of  the  International Commission on Stratigraphy .
Evidence from radiometric  डेटिंग  indicates that  the  Earth is about 4.54  अरब  years old  .
The geology or deep  समय  of Earth 's past has  महरूम  organized  into  various  इकाई   according  to  कार्यक्रम  which took place in each period .
Different spans of  समय  on  the   gts  are  प्रायः   सीमांकित  by  परिवर्तन   in  the composition  of  strata which  correspond  to them , indicating major geological or paleontological  कार्यक्रम  , such as  द्रव्यमान  extinctions  .
For example  ,  the  boundary   between  the Cretaceous period and  the  Paleogene period is defined by the  cretaceous–paleogene   extinction  event  ,  which  चिह्नित  the demise of the dinosaurs  और  many other  समूह  of life  .
Older time  spans  which predate the  विश्वसनीय   चट्टान  record  (   पहले   the  Proterozoic  इओन  ) are defined by absolute age .
The TI-82 is a graphing  परिपथ   बना   by   टेक्सास   यंत्र  .
the   ti-82  was designed in 1993  as  a stripped down , more user  दोस्ताना  version of the  ti-85  , and as a replacement for the  ti-81  .
It was the direct  पूर्ववर्ती  of the TI-83  .
It shares with the TI-85 a  6   mhz  Zilog  z80  microprocessor  .
जैसे  the TI-81 , the TI-82 features  a   96x64  pixel display , and the core feature  नियत   of  the  ti-81  with  अनेक  new  सुविधाएँ  .
the  cast of  वर्ण   of   the  King of  सेनानी  XI  .
the   किंग   of  Fighters fighting game series , produced by SNK  playmore   ,  includes a wide  डाल  of characters , some of which  हैं  taken from other  snk  games  .
The story takes  प्लेस  in  a   fictional  universe in  जिससे  an  सालाना  series of 3-on-3 or 4-on-4 fighting  tournaments   हैं   आयोजित  .
The first  खेल  in  the   श्रेणी  introduces the initial  प्रमुख  character of  the   श्रेणी   ,  Kyo  kusanagi  , a young Japanese fighter who is the heir to a powerful group  of   martial  artists  having   pyrokinetic   abilities  .
kyo  fights against  the  Kusanagi clan 's  दुश्मनों  , his rival  iori  Yagami , and the god  orochi   और   इसके  human followers , among  अन्य   .
The first four games in the series revolve about these fights  ,   जबकि  The King of Fighters  '99  introduces a  नई   स्टोरी  arc  ,   घूमती  around K  '  , a young man who seeks to destroy  the  mysterious NESTS organization because  वे   kidnapped   उसे  at an early  आयु   और  stripped him of his  पास्ट   यादें   ,  so that they  could  force him to  be  a  सेनानी  under  उनके   कंट्रोल  .
In The  किंग  of Fighters 2003 ,  a  new character named Ash Crimson enters the  टूर्नामेंट  , to  चोरी   the  powers of the clans  जो   sealed   the  Orochi in  the   पास्ट   लिये  an unknown  कारण   .
a  new group of antagonists , known as  those  From the Past ,  भी  appears in the series  ;  they want  to  obtain Orochi 's power for the purpose  of  giving it to  उनके   अनजान   निपुण   .
the  plot  और  the  वर्ण  came from  the  Yamata  no  Orochi  लेजेंड   .
वहीँ  are also  अनेक   वर्ण   in  the  खेल  that are parodies or homages to  अनेक  popular anime ,  manga  , and  films  .
Merchandise based  on  the characters has also been released , including  कार्रवाई  figures and keychains  .
the   वर्ण  have garnered praise from several  वीडियो   खेल   publications  for the quality  of  their  डिजाइन  and movesets  .
टिप्पणी  focused on the lack of improvements  in   कुछ  of  the   वर्ण   ,  but  added  that  the  roster  is  greatly diverse .
Whale Wars  is   a  weekly American  documentary-style   वास्तविकता  television series that premiered  on   नवम्बर  7 ,  2008  on  the  Animal Planet  केबल   चैनल  .
The program  फ़ॉलो   पॉल  Watson , founder of the Sea Shepherd Conservation  समाज  , as  he  and the crew aboard their  विभिन्न  vessels  harass   जापानी  whalers off the coast of  अंटार्कटिक  .
on  January 5  ,  2013 ,  एनिमल   ग्रह  renewed  the  series for a  छठे  season .
The Harpy Eagle  (  Harpia harpyja ) is a Neotropical  प्रजाति  of  त्रिभुज  .
It  is  sometimes known as the  अमरीकी  Harpy Eagle  to  distinguish  it  from the Papuan Eagle  जिससे  is sometimes  ज्ञात  as the New  गिनी  Harpy Eagle  or  Papuan Harpy Eagle .
It is  the  largest and most  शक्तिशाली  raptor  मिला  in the  americas  , and  among   the  largest extant species  of  eagles in the world .
It usually inhabits tropical  lowland  rainforests in the upper ( emergent ) canopy layer .
Destruction of its  प्राकृतिक   आवास  has seen it  vanish  from many parts of  इसके  former range , and it is nearly extirpated in Central  अमेरिका  .
Biological  वर्गीकरण  ,  or  scientific  वर्गीकरण  in biology , is a  विधि   of   वैज्ञानिक   taxonomy   प्रयुक्त  to  समूह  and  categorize   जीवों  into  समूह   ऐसे  as genus or species .
These groups  हैं   ज्ञात  as taxa ( singular : taxon  )  .
Modern biological classification has its root in the work  of  Carolus  लीनियस  , who grouped species  according  to  साझा  physical characteristics  .
These groupings have since  महरूम   संशोधित  to improve consistency with the  darwinian  principle of common descent .
साथ  the introduction of the  cladistic  method in  the  late 20th century ,  phylogenetic  taxonomy  in   जिससे  organisms are grouped based purely on inferred  विकासवादी   relatedness  , ignoring  morphological  similarity , has  become  common  in   कुछ   क्षेत्रों  of biology  .
Molecular phylogenetics , which uses DNA sequences  as  data  ,  has also driven many recent revisions and is  संभावित  to continue  doing  so  .
Biological classification  belongs  to the science  of   biological   systematics   .
Lennon  's  signature
John Winston Ono Lennon , ( born John Winston Lennon ; 9 October  1940   –  8 December 1980  )  was an English  संगीतकार  ,  सिंगर  and songwriter who rose to worldwide  कीर्ति  as a  संस्थापक   सदस्य  of  the  Beatles , one  of  the most commercially  कामयाब   और  critically acclaimed acts  in   the  history  of   लोकप्रिय  music .
With Paul  mccartney   ,  he formed one of the  सबसे  celebrated songwriting partnerships of the 20th  सदी  .
born  and  उठाया   in  Liverpool ,  as  a teenager Lennon became involved in  the   skiffle   craze  ;  उसके  first band , the Quarrymen , evolved into the Beatles in 1960 .
As  the  group  disintegrated  towards the  समाप्त  of the decade ,  लेनन  embarked on  a   सोलो  career that produced  the  critically acclaimed  एल्बम   जॉन   lennon/plastic  Ono  बैंड  and Imagine  ,  and iconic songs such as  ``   दे  Peace a Chance ``  और   ``   imagine  ``  .
बाद  his marriage to  योको  Ono  in   1969  , he changed his  नाम   to  John Ono Lennon .
लेनन   disengaged   खुद  from the  म्यूज़िक  business in  1975  to devote time to raising his infant son Sean , but re-emerged with Ono  in  1980 with the new  एल्बम   दोगुना  Fantasy  .
He  थी  murdered three weeks after  इसके  release  .
Lennon revealed  a  rebellious nature and acerbic wit in  उसके  music ,  लिखने  ,  drawings  , on film and in interviews .
विवादास्पद   through  his political  और  peace activism , he moved to New  यॉर्क   नगर   in   1971  , where his  आलोचना  of the Vietnam War  resulted  in a lengthy attempt by Richard Nixon 's administration to  निर्वासन  him , while some of his songs were adopted  as  anthems  by   the  anti-war  गति  .
As of  2012  , Lennon 's  सोलो   एल्बम   बिक्री   in  the United States exceed 14  लाख   इकाई   ,   और   as  writer , co-writer or performer , he is responsible  लिये  25 number-one  singles   on  the US Hot 100 chart .
In 2002 ,  a  BBC poll on the 100 Greatest Britons voted  उसे  eighth ,  और  in 2008 , Rolling  स्टोन  ranked him the  fifth-greatest   सिंगर   of  all  समय   .
He  थी   मरणोपरांत  inducted into  the  Songwriters Hall  of  Fame  in  1987 and into the Rock and  फेंकें  Hall  of  Fame in 1994 .
प्रतिमा  of  rip  van  winkle  in Irvington  ,  New York  ,  not far from  ``  Sunnyside  ``  ,  the  home  of  Washington  इरविंग
`` Rip Van  winkle   ''  is a short story by American author  वॉशिंगटन   इरविंग  published  in  1819  ,  as  खूब   as   the  name of the  स्टोरी  's  fictional   समर्थक  .
लिखा  while Irving  थी   जीना  in Birmingham  ,  England  ,   it   थी  part of  a   संग्रहण  entitled The Sketch  किताब   of   geoffrey   crayon  .
हालांकि   the  story is set in New  यॉर्क  's Catskill Mountains ,  इरविंग  later admitted  ,  ``  जब   i  wrote  the  story , I  था  never  महरूम   on  the Catskills . ''
throughout  the fifty-five year  इतिहास  of the Grammy Awards  ,   अनेक  significant records  have  been  नियत  .
This page only includes the  प्रतिस्पर्धी   पुरस्कार  won by  विभिन्न   कलाकारों   .
This does not  शामिल   the  various special  पुरस्कार   कि  are presented by  the   नेशनल   अकादमी   of  Recording Arts and  sciences   ऐसे   as  Lifetime Achievement Awards  ,  Trustees Awards ,  तकनीकी  Awards  or  Legend  पुरस्कार   .
The  पेज  however  करता  include other non-performance related  grammys   (   ज्ञात   as   the  Craft &  उत्पादन  Fields )  कि  may  have   महरूम  presented to  the  artist ( s  )  .
Pee-wee Herman is  a  comic fictional character created and portrayed  by  American  हास्य  Paul Reubens .
He  is  best  ज्ञात   लिये  his two television series  और  film series  दौरान  the 1980s .
the  childlike Pee-wee Herman character  विकसित   as  a  स्टेज  act that  जल्दी  led to  an  HBO  खास   in  1981 .
as   the  stage  प्रदर्शन  gained further  लोकप्रियता  , Reubens  took   the   अक्षर   to  motion picture with Pee-wee  's  Big  एडवेंचर  in 1985  ,  toning  bas   the  adult  innuendo  for  the   अपील  of children .
इस  paved the way for Pee-wee 's  playhouse   ,  an Emmy Award winning children 's series that ran on CBS from 1986-1991 .
another  film  ,   बिग   शीर्ष   pee-wee   ,  was  released  in 1988 .
Due to negative media  ध्यान  following a scandal in 1991 , Reubens decided to shelve  उसके  alter ego during the 1990s  ,  and then  धीरे  resurrected it during the  following  decade  .
It was  at   कि  time that Reubens addressed plans  to  write a new Pee-wee  फिल्मी  , Pee-wee 's Playhouse :  the  Movie .
in  June 2007 , Reubens  appeared  as  pee-wee  Herman for the first  समय  since  1991   at   स्पाइक   tv  's Guys '  चुनाव   पुरस्कार  .
That '70s Show is  an  American television period  sitcom  that centers on the lives  of  a group  of  teenage  मित्रों  living in  the  fictional suburban town of Point Place ,  विस्कॉन्सिन  , from May 17 ,  1976   ,  to December 31 , 1979  .
it   debuted  on the Fox television network  ,   पहला   airing  on August 23 , 1998 ,  कार्यशील   लिये  eight  लगातार   सीज़न  , and concluding with the 200th episode on May 18  ,  2006  .
The  प्रमुख  teenage  डाल  members  यहूद   topher  Grace , Mila  kunis  ,  एश्टन   कूचर  , Danny Masterson ,  लौरा  Prepon  ,  and Wilmer  valderrama  .
The  प्रमुख  adult cast members were Debra Jo Rupp , Kurtwood Smith  ,  Don  स्टार्क   और   ,  during the  पहला  three seasons  ,   तान्या   रॉबर्ट्स   .
Kansas (  )  is a U.S.  राज्य  located in the  midwestern  United States .
it   is  named after  the  Kansas River  जिससे   बहती  through it ,  जिससे  in turn  थी  named after the Kansa  देशी  American  जनजाति  , which  inhabited  the area .
The tribe  's  name ( natively  kką  : ze  )  is  प्रायः   कहा  to mean `` people of  the   हवा   ''  or `` people of the south  हवा  , '' although this was  संभवतः  not the term 's  असली  meaning .
Residents of  कान्सास  are called  ``  Kansans . ''
For thousands of  सालो  what is  अभी  Kansas was  घर  to numerous  और  diverse Native American  जनजातियों  .
Tribes  in   the  Eastern part  of   the   राज्य   generally  lived  in  villages along the  नदी  valleys .
Tribes in the  पश्चिमी  part  of  the state were semi-  nomadic  and hunted  विशाल  herds  of  bison .
कान्सास  was first settled by  यूरोपीय  Americans  in   the   1830s  , but the pace of  उपनिवेश  accelerated in the 1850s , in the  midst   of   राजनैतिक   युद्धों  over the slavery issue .
When  officially  opened to settlement by  the  U.S. government  in  1854 , abolitionist Free-Staters from  नई   इंग्लैण्ड  and pro-slavery settlers from neighboring Missouri  rushed  to the  territory   to  determine  if  Kansas would become  a  free state  or  a slave  राज्य  .
Thus , the  क्षेत्रफल  was  a  hotbed  of  violence  और  chaos in  इसके  early days as these forces  collided  , and was  ज्ञात   as  Bleeding  कान्सास  .
The abolitionists eventually  prevailed   और  on  जनवरी   29  ,  1861   ,   कान्सास  entered the Union  as   a  free state .
बाद  the  सिविल  War ,  the  population of  कान्सास  grew  rapidly  , when waves of immigrants turned  the  prairie into  farmland   .
आज  ,  कान्सास  is one of the most  उत्पादक  agricultural states , producing high  yields  of wheat , sorghum  और   sunflowers  .
Kansas is the 15th most extensive  और  the 33rd most populous  of   the   50  United States  .
Psychology is  an  academic  और  applied discipline that involves  the  scientific study of mental functions  और  behaviors .
मनोविज्ञान   रै  the immediate goal  of  understanding individuals and groups by  दोनो  establishing  सामान्य   सिद्धान्त  and researching  विशिष्ट   मामले  , and  by  many accounts  it  ultimately aims to benefit society .
in  this field , a professional  or  researcher  is   पुकारा  a psychologist and can  be  classified as a social  ,  behavioral , or cognitive  वैज्ञानिक   .
Psychologists  attempt  to understand the role of mental functions in  व्यक्तिगत   और  social behavior , while  भी  exploring  the  physiological and neurobiological processes that  underlie  certain cognitive functions  और   व्यवहार   .
Psychologists explore  अवधारणाओं   ऐसे  as  बोध   ,   संज्ञान  ,  ध्यान   ,  emotion , phenomenology , motivation  ,  brain functioning ,  व्यक्तित्व  , behavior , and interpersonal relationships .
psychologists  of diverse stripes  भी   consider   the  unconscious  दिमाग  .
Psychologists employ empirical  विधि  to infer causal and  correlational  relationships between  psychosocial  variables .
In addition , or in opposition  ,  to employing empirical and  निगमनात्मक   विधि   ,  some—especially clinical and  counseling  psychologists—at times rely upon  सांकेतिक  interpretation  और   अन्य  inductive  तकनीकों  .
मनोविज्ञान   रै  been described as a ``  हब  science  ''   ,  with psychological  निष्कर्षों   linking  to  शोध  and perspectives from the social sciences ,  प्राकृतिक  sciences  ,  medicine ,  और   the   मानवता  ,  ऐसे   as   दर्शनशास्त्र   .
जबकि   मनोवैज्ञानिक  knowledge  is   प्रायः   लागू  to  the  assessment and treatment of  दिमागी   स्वास्थ्य  problems , it is also directed towards  समझना   और   solving  problems in many different  spheres   of  human  कार्यकलाप  .
the  majority of psychologists are involved in some  दयालु  of therapeutic role , practicing in clinical ,  counseling  , or  स्कूल   जमावट  .
Many do scientific  शोध  on a  चौड़ी  range of topics related  to  mental processes and behavior ,  और  typically  कार्य  in university psychology departments or  सिखा   in   अन्य   अकादमिक  settings ( e.g.  ,   चिकित्सा   स्कूलों  , hospitals  )  .
कुछ  are  employed  in industrial  और   organizational  settings , or in other areas such as  इंसान   विकास  and aging , sports , health  ,   और  the media  ,  as  खूब   as   in   forensic  investigation and other aspects of law .
थामस  Jefferson  (  April 13  ,  1743 ( April  2  , 1743  o.S.  ) – July 4 , 1826 ) was an American Founding Father ,  the   प्रिंसिपल  author of the Declaration  of  Independence ( 1776 )  और  the third President of the United States (  1801–1809   )  .
at  the  शुरूआत  of  the  American  क्रान्ति  ,  he  served in  the  Continental Congress  ,   representing   वर्जिनिया  and  तब  served as  a  wartime Governor of Virginia ( 1779–1781 )  .
Just after  the  war ended ,  इससे  mid-1784 Jefferson served  as   a  diplomat  ,  stationed  in  Paris .
In  may  1785 ,  he   became   the  United States Minister to France .
जेफरसन   थी   the  first United States Secretary  of  State (  1790–1793  )  सेवारत  under  अध्यक्ष   जार्ज  Washington .
With  उसके  close friend  जेम्स  Madison he organized the Democratic-Republican Party ,  और  subsequently resigned from Washington 's cabinet .
Elected Vice  अध्यक्ष  in  1796  , when he came  in  second to John Adams of the  federalists   ,  Jefferson  opposed  Adams and  साथ  Madison secretly  लिखा   the   केंटकी   और  Virginia Resolutions , which attempted  to  nullify the Alien and  राजद्रोह  Acts  .
Elected  अध्यक्ष   in  what Jefferson called the Revolution of 1800 , he  oversaw   the  purchase  of  the vast  louisiana  Territory  इससे  France ( 1803 ) ,  और  sent the Lewis and  क्लार्क  Expedition ( 1804–1806  )  to explore the  नई  west .
His second term was beset with troubles  at  home  ,   ऐसे  as  the  failed treason trial of his former  वाइस  President  आरोन  Burr .
With escalating trouble with  ब्रिटेन  who was challenging  अमरीकी  neutrality and threatening shipping at sea , he tried economic warfare with his  embargo  laws which only damaged American trade .
in  1803  ,   अध्यक्ष  Jefferson initiated a  प्रक्रम  of Indian tribal removal and  relocation  to the Louisiana Territory west  of   the  Mississippi River  ,  in order to  खोलें  lands for  eventual   अमरीकी  settlers  .
A leader in the Enlightenment , Jefferson  थी  a  बहुश्रुत  who  spoke   पाँच  languages  धड़ल्ले  and  थी  deeply interested in science , invention , architecture ,  धर्म  and philosophy , interests that  led  him  to  the founding of the University of Virginia after  उसके  presidency .
He designed  उसके   अपना   विशाल  mansion on a 5,000 acre plantation  निकट  Charlottesville  ,  Virginia ,  जिससे  he  नामित  Monticello .
While not  a   notable  orator , Jefferson  थी  a skilled writer and corresponded  साथ   अनेक  influential people in America and  यूरोपीय  throughout his adult  जीवन  .
हालांकि   जेफरसन  owned many  स्लेव  , he  opposed  the institution  सब   उसके  life  और  consequently  treated  and took care of them very well and  अपेक्षित  them to work  no   अधिक  than free  किसानो  .
Since 1802 historians  और  others  have  been divided  over  the controversy of whether Jefferson  थी  the  पिता  of one or  अधिक  children belonging to Sally Hemings  ,  a slave at Monticello . ''
इतिहासकारों  are also in disagreement  साथ  how  much  Jefferson was committed  to  the anti-slavery cause .
In 1807 , President Jefferson signed into law a  विधेयक  that  बैन  the importation  of  slaves  into  the United States  .
After Martha Jefferson  ,   उसके  wife of eleven years  ,  died in 1782 ,  जेफरसन   remained  a  विधुर  for the rest of  उसके   जीवन  ; their marriage produced  छह  children , of whom two survived to adulthood .
Though Jefferson has been criticized  by  many  आधुनिक   दिन  scholars over the issue  of  slavery ,  he   remains  rated as one  of   the  greatest U.S. presidents .
`` Sun  नगर  ''  is  a  1985  protest song written by  स्टीवन  Van Zandt , produced  by  Van Zandt and Arthur Baker and recorded by  कलाकारों   संयुक्त  Against Apartheid to convey opposition  to  the South African policy  of  apartheid .
The  प्राथमिक   अर्थात्  of that opposition  is   to  declare that all the  कलाकारों  involved would refuse any and all offers to perform  at  Sun City , a resort which was located in Bantustan  of  Bophuthatswana , one of a  क्रमांक  of internationally  अपरिचित  supposed `` independent  ''   राज्य  created by the South African government to forcibly relocate its black population .

This is a  सूची  of NBA  खिलाड़ी  with most championships  जीती  as  a  player .
The  नेशनल  Basketball  संघ  ( NBA  )   is  a  प्रमुख  professional  बास्केट   लीग  in North  अमेरिका   .
It was founded in 1946 as the Basketball  संघ  of America ( BAA  )  .
The league adopted  इसके   वर्तमान  name at  the  start  of  the  जब  it merged  साथ   the  National Basketball League  (  NBL ) .
The  एनबीए  Finals  is   the  championship  श्रेणी  for  the   एनबीए  and the  निष्कर्ष   of   the  sport  's   postseason  .
The winning team of the series receives the Larry O'Brien Championship Trophy .
Players from the winning  टोली  usually receive  चैंपियनशिप  rings  इससे   the  team honoring  उनके  contribution .
However , in some rare  अवसर  , the teams opted to gave other commemorative items , such as wrist watches , instead  of  rings .
the  number  of  championships won by NBA superstars  is  often  प्रयुक्त  as a  मापन   of   उनके  greatness  .
बोस्टन  Celtics  बीच  Bill Russell holds  the  record for the  सबसे  NBA championships  जीती  with 11 titles during his 13-year playing career  .
He  जीती  his  पहला   चैंपियनशिप  with the Boston Celtics in his  रुकी  year .
Afterwards ,  he  went  on  to win 10 championships  in   the  next 12  सालो  , including  आठ  consecutive championships from  1959   to   1966  .
He  जीती  the  पिछला   दो  championships in 1968 and  1969  as  player-coach   .
Russell  's  teammate ,  sam  Jones , won  10  championships from 1959 to  1969  ,  the  second  सबसे  in  एनबीए  history  .
Four  सेल्टिक्स  players , Tom Heinsohn  ,  K.  C.  Jones ,  satch  Sanders and  जॉन  Havlicek  ,  won eight championships  प्रत्येक  .
Two other Celtics , Jim Loscutoff  और   फ़्रैंक  Ramsey , won  सात  championships each .
चार   खिलाड़ी  ,  bob  Cousy  ,  Kareem Abdul-Jabbar  ,  Michael Jordan and  scottie  Pippen  ,  won six  championships  each .
Jordan  और   pippen  are members  of  the Chicago Bulls  टोली   जो   जीती  three consecutive championships  twice  in  the   1990s  .
Robert Horry and John Salley are  the  only players to have  जीती  the championships  साथ   तीन  different teams .
Horry won seven championships with the  ह्यूस्टन  Rockets  ,  the Los Angeles Lakers  और  the San  अंतोनियो   स्पर्स   ,   जबकि  Salley won four championships  साथ  the Detroit Pistons , the Bulls and the  लेकर्स   .
Frank Saul and Steve Kerr  हैं  the  तभी   खिलाड़ी  to win  दो   championships  with two different  टीमों   in  consecutive seasons .
Saul won consecutive championships  साथ   the   रोचेस्टर  Royals and the Minneapolis  लेकर्स   in  the 1950s  ,  while  केर  won consecutive championships with the Bulls and the Spurs in  the   1990s,
Accuracy  indicates  proximity of  मापन  results to the true value , precision to the repeatability , or reproducibility of the measurement
In the  फ़ील्ड   of  science  ,   अभियान्त्रिकी  ,  उद्योग  , and statistics , the accuracy  of  a  मापन  system is the degree of closeness of measurements of a quantity to that quantity 's actual  (  true )  मान   .
the   परिशुद्धता   of  a measurement system , also called reproducibility  or  repeatability  ,  is the degree  to   जिससे  repeated measurements under unchanged  शर्तें  show the  वही  results  .
हालांकि  the  दो  words reproducibility and repeatability can  be   synonymous  in colloquial use , they  हैं  deliberately contrasted  in  the context of  the  scientific method .
A measurement  प्रणाली   can   be  accurate but not precise , precise but not accurate ,  neither   ,  or  दोनो  .
लिये  example , if  an  experiment contains a systematic error  ,  then  increasing  the sample size generally increases precision but does not improve accuracy .
The  परिणाम   होता  be  a  consistent yet inaccurate string of results  इससे  the  flawed  experiment .
Eliminating  the  systematic error improves accuracy but does  नहीं   बदलें   परिशुद्धता  .
a  measurement system  is  designated  मान्य  if it is both  सटीक  and  precise   .
Related terms include bias  (  non- random or directed effects  caused   by  a factor or factors unrelated  to  the independent variable  )  and error  (  random  variability  ) .
The terminology is also  लागू   to  indirect measurements—that is , values obtained  by  a  कम्प्यूटेशनल   कार्यविधि  from observed  आंकड़ा  .
in   जोड  to accuracy and  परिशुद्धता  , measurements  may  also have  a  measurement  रेज़ोल्यूशन  , which  is  the smallest change in the underlying physical  मात्रा  that produces a response in the measurement .
In the case of  पूरा  reproducibility ,  ऐसे  as when  rounding  a number to a representable floating point number  ,  the  शब्द  precision has a meaning not related to  reproducibility  .
For example  ,   in  the IEEE  754-2008   मानक  it means the number  of   बिट्स  in  the  significand  ,   so  it is used as a measure  लिये  the relative  सटीकता  with which an  मनमानी   क्रमांक  can  be  represented .
Fuck  in   इसके  literal meaning refers to the  अधिनियम   of  sexual intercourse .
It is  an  English word  कि  is  प्रायः  used  as  a profanity , either to denote  तिरस्कार   or  as  an  intensifier .
the   उत्पत्ति  of the word  is  obscure  .
It  is   प्रायः  considered  to  be first  attested  to around  1475  , but it may be  considerably  older .
In modern usage , fuck  और   इसके   डेरिवेटिव  ( such as fucker and fucking ) can be used in the position  of  a  संज्ञा   ,  a verb  ,  an adjective or an  क्रियाविशेषण  .
वहीँ   हैं  many  आम  phrases  जिससे  make  उपयोग  of the word , as  खूब  as a number of compounds incorporating  it  , such as motherfucker  .
एनिमेटेड   ,  color-coded  मैप  showing the various continents  और   regions  .
Depending  on  the convention  और  model ,  कुछ  continents  may  be consolidated or subdivided : for example , Eurasia is  सबसे   प्रायः  subdivided into Europe and Asia ( red  शेड्स  ) ,  जबकि  North and South America are sometimes recognized as one American continent (  ग्रीन  shades  )   .
a  continent  is  one  of  several very large landmasses on  धरती  .
They are generally  पहचाना  by  सम्मेलन  rather than any strict criteria , with up to seven regions  commonly  regarded as continents—they  हैं   (  from largest in  आकार  to smallest ) : Asia  ,  Africa , North America  ,  South  अमेरिका  ,  अंटार्कटिक  , Europe  ,  and Australia .
In geology , continents are described by  अर्थात्  of tectonic plates .
थाली  tectonics is the process and study of the  गति   ,  collision  और  division of continents  ,  earlier  ज्ञात  as  महाद्वीपीय  drift  .
Biker Boyz  is  a  2003   फिल्मी  about  a  group of  भूमिगत  motorcycle drag  racers  .
it   सितारों  Laurence Fishburne ,  djimon  Hounsou , Derek Luke , Meagan Good  ,  and  larenz   टेट  and is written and directed by Reggie  चट्टान   bythewood  .
It  भी  features Lisa Bonet ,  ऑरलैंडो  Jones ,  बच्चा   चट्टान  and  वैनेसा  Bell Calloway  .
लिये  the Steel Panther song , see Feel the Steel  .
Community property  is  a marital  प्रॉपर्टी  regime  कि  originated  in   सिविल  law jurisdictions and is now also found in  कुछ   आम  law  jurisdictions   .
The states  of  the United States that  recognize  community property are primarily in the  वेस्ट  ; it  थी  inherited from Mexico 's ganancial community system  ,   जिससे  itself was inherited from Spanish law (  a  Roman -derived  सिविल   विधि  system ) and ultimately from  the  Visigoths  .
जबकि  under Spanish rule  louisiana  adopted  the   ganancial  community  प्रणाली  of acquests and gains , which replaced the  परंपरागत  French  जातियाँ  of movables  और  acquests in its civil law  प्रणाली   .
Map of  the   संयुक्त  States  साथ  community  प्रॉपर्टी   राज्य  highlighted in red .
In  जोड   to   the  highlighted  राज्य  , Alaska  is  a  पृथक  property state that  permits  couples  to   ऑप्ट  into a community property arrangement .
In  a  community property jurisdiction ,  सबसे   प्रॉपर्टी  acquired during  the   विवाह   (  except for gifts or inheritances  )   —the  community , or communio  bonorum—is  owned  jointly  by  दोनो   spouses   और  is  विभाजित  upon  तलाक  ,  annulment   or  death .
संयुक्त   स्वामित्व   is  automatically  presumed  by law in the  अनुपस्थिति   of  specific evidence that would point to a contrary conclusion for a particular  टुकड़ा   of  property .
Division of community property may  लो  place by item , by splitting all items  or  by value .
In  कुछ   jurisdictions   ,  such as  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , a 50/50  प्रभाग   of  community property  is  strictly mandated by  statute   ,   अर्थ  that the  फ़ोकस  then shifts to whether particular items are to be classified as community or separate property  .
In other jurisdictions ,  ऐसे   as  Texas  ,  a divorce court may decree an `` equitable  वितरण  ``  of  community  प्रॉपर्टी  , which  may   परिणाम   in  an unequal  प्रभाग  of such .
In  non-community  property states property  may  be divided by  निष्पक्ष  distribution .
Generally  बोलना   ,  the property that each partner  brings  into the marriage or receives  by  gift , bequest or  मक्कारी  during marriage is called separate  प्रॉपर्टी   (  i.e.  ,  not community property ) .
देखिए  division of property .
Division of community  debts  may not be the same as  प्रभाग  of  जातियाँ  property  .
For example , in  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  ,  जातियाँ   प्रॉपर्टी   is  required to  be  divided `` equally '' while community  कर्ज़   is  required to be divided ``  equitably   ''  .
प्रॉपर्टी   कि   is  owned  by  one spouse  पहले   the  marriage is the separate property of that  जीवनसाथी  , unless  the  property is `` transmuted '' into community  प्रॉपर्टी  .
The  नियम  for this vary from  क्षेत्राधिकार  to jurisdiction .
The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge waving to  the  crowd  at  The Mall shortly  बाद  the  विवाह  .
The wedding  of  Prince William , Duke of  कैम्ब्रिज  , and Catherine Middleton took  प्लेस   on  29  अप्रैल  2011 at Westminster Abbey in London .
The groom  ,  Prince William ,  ड्यूक  of  कैम्ब्रिज  ,  is   the  eldest  बेटे  of Charles ,  प्रिंस   of   वेल्स  , and is second in  the  line of  उत्तराधिकार  to the British Throne  और   the   तख्तों  of  पंद्रह   अन्य  Commonwealth  realms   .
The bride  ,  Catherine `` Kate '' Middleton is the eldest  of  three  children   of  Michael and Carole  मिडलटन  of Bucklebury , Berkshire .
the  Dean of Westminster ,  जॉन  Hall  ,  presided  at  the service ; the Archbishop of  canterbury   ,   rowan  Williams  ,  conducted the  विवाह  ;  रिचर्ड  Chartres  ,  the Bishop of  लंदन  , preached  the  sermon ;  और   a  reading was given by  the  bride  's   bhai  , James .
विलियम  's best man was his  bhai  ,  प्रिंस  Harry , while the  बहू  's  सिस्टर  , Pippa ,  थी  maid of honour .
The ceremony was attended  by   the  bride 's and groom 's families  ,  as well  as  many foreign  रॉयल्स  , diplomats , and the couple 's chosen  निजी   अतिथि   .
After  the  ceremony ,  the  couple  बना  the traditional appearance on  the   बालकनी  of Buckingham Palace .
As Prince William was not the heir apparent  to  the throne , the wedding  थी  not a  पूरा  state occasion and  अनेक   विवरण  were left  to  the couple  to  decide , such as much of  the  guest list  of  about 1,900 .
Prince William  और  Kate Middleton met in  2001  .
उनके  engagement  on  20 October 2010 was announced on 16 November 2010 .
The build-up  to  the wedding  और  the occasion itself attracted much media attention  ,  being  compared   in  many ways  साथ  the 1981 marriage of William  's  parents .
The  अवसर  was  a  public holiday  in  the  संयुक्त  Kingdom and  प्रदर्शित   अनेक  ceremonial aspects , including use of the state  carriages   और  roles for the Foot Guards and Household Cavalry .
Events  यहूद  held around  the   राष्ट्रमंडल  to mark the wedding  ;  organisations and hotels held events across Canada , over  5,000  street parties  यहूद  held throughout  the   संयुक्त   किंगडम  ,  और  one million people lined  the  route between  वेस्टमिंस्टर   ऐबी  and  बकिंघम  Palace .
the  ceremony was  viewed  live  by  tens of millions more around  the  world , including 72 million  on   the  YouTube Royal Channel .
In the United Kingdom ,  टेलीविज़न  audiences peaked at 26.3 million viewers  ,  with  a  total of 36.7  लाख  watching part of the coverage .
Vanessa  आनन्द  Lachey (  née  Minnillo ; born November 9  ,  1980 ) is  an  American  टेलीविज़न  personality , television host ,  फ़ैशन   मॉडल  ,  और  actress .
