A hand (  मेड  . / lat . : manus  ,   pl   .  manūs ) is a prehensile , multi-  fingered  extremity  स्तिथ  at the  समाप्त   of   an  arm or forelimb  of  primates and  इंसानो  ,  chimpanzees  , monkeys  ,  and  lemurs  .
a  few  अन्य  vertebrates such as the  कोआला  ( which has two opposable thumbs on  प्रत्येक   ``  hand '' and fingerprints remarkably  समान  to human  फिंगरप्रिंट   )   हैं   प्रायः  described as having either ``  हैंड्स   ''  or  ``  paws  ''  on their  सामने  limbs .
Hands  हैं  the main structures for physically manipulating the environment  ,  used for both gross  मोटर   कौशल   (   ऐसे  as  grasping  a large object ) and fine motor skills  (  such  as  picking up a small pebble  )  .
the  fingertips contain some of  the  densest  क्षेत्रों  of nerve endings  on  the body , are  the  richest source  of  tactile feedback  ,  and have  the   महानतम  positioning capability of the body ; thus the sense  of   टच  is intimately associated  साथ  hands  .
Like other  युग्म   अंगों  (  आँखें  , feet , legs ) , each hand is  dominantly  controlled  by  the opposing brain hemisphere , so that handedness , or the preferred  हाथ   चुनाव  for  single-handed  activities  ऐसे  as writing with a  पेंसिल   ,  reflects  व्यक्तिगत  brain functioning .
Some evolutionary  anatomists  use  the  term hand to  refer  to the appendage of digits  on  the forelimb more generally — for example  ,  in the context of  whether  the three  अंक   of   the  bird hand involved the same  समजात   घाटा  of two digits  as  in the  डायनासोर  hand .
The  इंसान   हाथ  has 27 bones , not including the  sesamoid  bones which number varies between people .
14 of which are the phalanges  (   proximal  , intermediate  और  distal  )  of the fingers  .
The  metacarpals   हैं   the   हड्डियों  that connects  the  fingers and the wrist .
Each  इंसान   हाथ  has 5 metacarpals and 8 carpal bones .

Basic digital alarm clock without a  रेडियो  .
The mark  in  the top-left of the display indicates that  the  time  is  4:00pm , not 4:00am .
a  1969 radio  सचेतक  clock (  सोनी   digimatic  8FC-59W ) with an  जल्दी  mechanical-digital  प्रदर्शक  .
A digital clock is  a  type of  क्लॉक  that displays the time digitally , i.e  .  in numerals or other symbols ,  as  opposed to an analog clock ,  जहाँ  the time is indicated by the positions  of  rotating  हैंड्स  .
Digital  घड़ियाँ   हैं   प्रायः  associated  साथ   इलेक्ट्रॉनिक   ड्राइव  , but the  ``  digital '' description refers  तभी  to the display , not to the drive mechanism  .
( Both  एनालॉग   और  digital  घड़ियाँ   can   be  driven either  mechanically  or electronically  ,   लकिन  `` clockwork '' mechanisms with  डिजिटल  displays are rare . )
The biggest digital clock  is  the Lichtzeitpegel ( `` Light Time  स्तर  '' ) on the  टेलीविज़न  tower Rheinturm Düsseldorf ,  जर्मनी   .
Family Guy creator  सेठ  MacFarlane also provides  the  voices of Peter Griffin , Stewie Griffin  ,   ब्रायन   griffin   ,  and Glenn Quagmire .
Family  guy  is  an  American animated sitcom that  सुविधाएँ  five main voice actors ,  और   numerous  regular cast and recurring  अतिथि  stars .
the  principal voice  डाल  consists of show creator Seth MacFarlane  ,   एलेक्स  Borstein , Seth Green , Mila Kunis ( who  replaced  Lacey Chabert after the  पहला  season )  और   माइक  Henry  और   अभी  , the new actor  beau  Osborne .
Recurring  आवाज़   अभिनेताओं   शामिल  Patrick Warburton  ,  Adam  वेस्ट   ,   जॉन  G. Brennan , Nicole  सुलीवान  and Jennifer Tilly ,  और   repeat   अतिथि  stars include Phyllis Diller  ,  Charles Durning ,  फटाफट  Limbaugh , and Phil LaMarr .
Many cast  सदस्यों   provide   आवाज़ें  for  अनेक  characters  .
the  voice actors , in  portraying  the various  अक्षर   personalities  on the  दिखाएँ  ,  चित्रण  inspiration from celebrities  और   पॉप   संस्कृति  .
परिवार  Guy characters have been  निभाई  by more  than  one actor  ,  after members of the show left the  श्रेणी  or had  conflicting  obligations .
Kunis was nominated  लिये  an Annie Award for voicing Meg  griffin  in the season 5 episode `` Barely  विधिक  `` and MacFarlane  रै  also won an  एमी  Award for Outstanding Voice-Over Performance and  an  Annie  पुरस्कार   लिये  Best Voice  एक्टिंग  in an Animated  टेलीविज़न   उत्पादन   ,  though  no  other cast member  रै  won an  पुरस्कार  for their  कार्य   on  the series .
The  पाँच  sets of the board  खेल   एकाधिकार   चित्रित  here  दिखाएँ   the  evolution of the  खेल  's artwork  और  designs  in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य   इससे  1935–2005 .
The history of the  फलक  game Monopoly  can  be  traced   वापस  to the early 20th century .
The  earliest   ज्ञात   डिज़ाइन  was by the American  ,   एलिज़ाबेथ  Magie , patented in  1904   लकिन  existing as  जल्दी  as  1902   .
Magie 's original intent was to publish  a  board game to illustrate an  आर्थिक  principle  ,   namely  the  georgist   अवधारणा   of  a single land value  कर  .
a  series  of  board games  यहूद  developed from  1906  through  the   1930s  that involved the  खरीदे   और  selling of land and  the  development of that land .
by  1934 , a board game had  महरूम   निर्मित  much  जैसे  the  संस्करण   of  Monopoly  बेची  by Parker Brothers  और  its related companies through  the  rest of the 20th  सदी  , and into  the  21st .
अनेक   लोगों  , mostly in the  midwestern  United  राज्य  and near the East Coast , contributed to the game 's design and evolution  .
By the 1970s , the idea  कि   the  game had been created  solely   by  Charles Darrow had become popular folklore ;  it   थी  printed  in  the game 's instructions for many years ,  in  a 1974 book devoted to Monopoly ,  और   थी  cited in a general book  परिचय  toys  भी   as  recently as 2007 .
भी   a   मार्गदर्शिका  to family  खेल  published  लिये  Reader  's   डाइजेस्ट   in  2003 only  दिया   क्रेडिट  to Darrow and Elizabeth Magie  ,  erroneously stating that Magie 's original game was created in  the   1800s  , and not  acknowledging   कोई   of  the  खेल  's development between Magie  's   सृष्टि  of the game  ,  and the  eventual  publication  by  Parker Brothers .
Also in  the  1970s ,  प्राध्यापक  Ralph Anspach  ,  who had himself published a  फलक   खेल   intended  to illustrate  the   सिद्धान्त   of   दोनो  monopolies and trust busting ,  लड़ा  Parker  भाइयो  and its then parent company  ,  General Mills ,  over  the  trademarks  of the Monopoly  फलक   खेल   .
Through the research of  anspach  and others  ,  much of the early history of the game was `` rediscovered '' .
Anspach  confronted   maxine  Brady  ,   लेखक  of the  1974  book The Monopoly  किताब  : Strategy and  tactics  of the  संसार  's Most Popular  खेल  over the  वास्तविक  history of the game on  बैरी  Farber 's New York  नगर  talk show in  1975  .
Because of the  lengthy  court  प्रक्रम  , including appeals , the legal status of  पार्कर   भाइयो   '   trademarks  on the  खेल  was not  settled  until 1985  .
The game 's name remains  a  registered  ट्रेडमार्क  of Parker  भाइयो  ,  as   do  its  विशिष्ट  design elements .
at  the conclusion  of   the  court case  ,  the game  's  logo and  ग्राफिक   डिज़ाइन  elements  became  part of a  larger   एकाधिकार  brand , licensed by  पार्कर   भाइयो  '  जनक  companies onto  a  variety  of  items through  the  present day .
Despite the  ``   rediscovery  '' of the board  खेल  's early history in  the  1970s  और  1980s , and  अनेक  books and journal articles on  the   विषय  ,  हास्ब्रो   (   पार्कर  Brothers '  वर्तमान  parent company ) did not acknowledge any of the game 's  इतिहास  before Charles Darrow on its  आधिकारिक  Monopoly  जालस्थल  as recently as  जून   2012   .
Nor  किया   हास्ब्रो   acknowledge  anyone other than  darrow  in  सामग्री  published  or  sponsored  by  them  ,  at least as  recently  as  2006  .
International tournaments , first held  in  the  जल्दी   1970s  , continue to the present  ,   साथ  the next  संसार  championship likely  अनुसूचित  for 2013 .
starting  in 1985 ,  a  new generation of spin-off board  खेल  and card  खेल  appeared on both  पहलू  of the  अटलांटिक  Ocean .
In 1989 , the  पहला  of many video game and computer game editions was published  .
Since 1994  ,  many  आधिकारिक   विसंगतियाँ  of the  खेल  , based on locations  अन्य  than  अटलांटिक  City , New Jersey  (  the official U.S. setting  )   or  London  (   the   आधिकारिक  Commonwealth setting , excepting Canada ) , have  महरूम   प्रकाशित   by  Hasbro or  इसके  licensees .
In  2008  ,  हास्ब्रो  permanently changed  the  color scheme and  कुछ  of the  gameplay   of   the  standard U.S .  संस्करण  of the game to match  the  UK  संस्करण  ,  हालांकि  the  u.S.  standard edition maintains  the   अटलांटिक  City property names .
Hasbro also  परिवर्धित  the official  लोगो  to give the `` Mr  .  Monopoly '' character a 3-D computer-generated look ,  जिससे   रै  since been adopted by  licensees  USAopoly , Winning Moves and Winning  समाधान   .
And Hasbro  रै  also been including the Speed Die , introduced in 2006 's  एकाधिकार   :   the  Mega Edition by Winning Moves Games  ,  in versions  उत्पादित  directly by  हास्ब्रो  ( such as the 2009  चैंपियनशिप  Edition ) .
In baseball  ,   a  sacrifice fly  is  a batted  बॉल  that satisfies  चार  criteria:
There are fewer than two outs when the ball is hit .
The ball is  hit  to the outfield ( fair or  बेईमानी   )  , or to infield  बेईमानी  territory  .
The batter is put  आउट  because an outfielder ( or  an  infielder  कार्यशील  in the  आउटफील्ड  , or foul territory ) catches the ball  on  the fly ( alternatively if the batter  होता   have  been  आउट   if  not  लिये  an  गलती  or  if  the outfielder drops  the  ball and another  धावक  is put out ) .
a  runner who is already on base scores  on  the play .
It is  पुकारा  a  ``   बलिदान   ''   मक्खी  because the  बैटर  presumably intends to  कारण   a  teammate to score a run  ,  while  sacrificing  his own ability to do so .
Minnesota  (  ) is a U.S. state  स्तिथ   in  the Midwestern United States .
Minnesota  थी  carved  आउट  of the eastern  हाफ   of  the Minnesota Territory  और  admitted to the Union as the  32nd  state on May 11 , 1858 .
Known  as   the  `` Land of  10,000  Lakes '' , the state  's   नाम  comes from  a   डकोटा  word  लिये   ``  sky-tinted water '' .
those  waters  ,  together with  वनों   ,   पार्क  ,  और   wilderness  areas  ,  offer  निवासियों  and tourists a variety of  बाहरी  recreational opportunities  .
Minnesota is the  12th  most extensive and the 21st most  populous  of the U.S.  राज्य   .
Nearly 60 % of  इसके  residents live in  the  Minneapolis–Saint  पॉल   महानगर   क्षेत्रफल  ( known as the `` Twin  शहरों   ''   )  ,  the   बीच  of transportation , business  ,  industry , education , government and home to an internationally  ज्ञात   कला  community  .
The remainder of  the  state consists of western prairies now given  over   to  intensive  कृषि   ;  deciduous forests in the southeast , now  साफ  , farmed  और  settled ; and the less populated North Woods ,  प्रयुक्त  for mining , forestry  ,  and  मनोरंजन  .
Minnesota is known for its relatively mixed social and political orientations , and  रै  a  ऊँची  rate of civic participation and voter turnout .
मिनेसोटा  ranks among the healthiest  राज्य   ,  and  रै   a   अत्यधिक   साक्षर  population .
The large majority of  निवासियों  are of Scandinavian and German descent .
The state  is  known as a  बीच   of  Scandinavian  अमरीकी   संस्कृति  .
Ethnic  विविधता  has increased in recent decades .
Substantial  influxes  of  एशियाई   ,   अफ़्रीकी   ,  and  लैटिन  American immigrants have joined the descendants  of  European settlers  और  the  असली  Native American inhabitants .
अनुदान  are  non-repayable  funds  by   एक   पार्टी  ( grant  makers  ) , often a government  विभाग   ,  corporation , foundation or  विश्वास  , to a  ,   प्रायः  ( but not  सदा  )  a  nonprofit entity ,  शैक्षणिक  institution , business or an individual  .
in  order to receive a grant  ,  some form of ``  ग्रान्ट  Writing ''  प्रायः   referred  to  as   either  a proposal or an application is usually required  .
Most grants are made to fund a  विशिष्ट  project and  आवश्यकता  some  स्तर  of compliance  और  reporting .
The  ग्रान्ट   लिखने  process involves an applicant submitting  a  proposal ( or submission )  to   a  potential  funder  , either on  the  applicant 's own  पहल  or in  जवाब   to  a  निवेदन  for Proposal  इससे  the funder .
Other  अनुदान  can be  दिए   to  individuals  ,  such as  पीड़ितों  of natural disasters or individuals  जो  seek to open  a  small  कारोबार  .
Sometimes grant makers require grant  जरुरतमंदों  to have some form of tax-exempt status ,  be   a  registered nonprofit organization or a  लोकल  government  .
For  उदाहरण  ,  tiered  funding for a freeway are  बहुत   विशाल  grants  negotiated  at government policy level .
However smaller grants may be  provided   by  a government agency ( e.g .  नगरपालिका  government ) .
Project-related funding involving governments ,  कारोबार  , communities  ,   और  individuals is  प्रायः  arranged by application either in writing or online .
Naturally occurring  कोबाल्ट   (  Co )  is  composed of 1 stable isotope ,  59co  . 28 radioisotopes have been characterized with the most stable being 60Co  साथ  a half-life of 5.2714 years , 57Co  साथ  a half-life  of  271.79 days , 56Co  साथ  a  half-life  of 77.27 days  ,  and 58Co  साथ   a  half-life of 70.86 days  .
All of the remaining  रेडियोसक्रिय  isotopes have half-lives that are less  than   18  hours  और  the majority of these have  half-lives   कि  are  कम  than  1  second .
इस   तत्व  also has 11 meta states , all of which have half-lives  कम  than 15  मिनट्स  .
The isotopes of cobalt range in atomic weight from 47Co to 75Co .
The primary  क्षय  mode  लिये  isotopes with atomic  द्रव्यमान   ईकाई   मान  less than that of  the  most abundant stable isotope ,  59co  , is electron capture  और  the primary mode of decay for  those  of  वृहद   than  59 atomic mass units is beta  क्षय  .
the  primary decay  उत्पाद   पहले  59Co are iron isotopes and  the  primary  उत्पाद  after  हैं  nickel isotopes .

Who Moved  my  Cheese ?
An Amazing Way to Deal with  बदलें   in  Your Work and in Your  जीवन   ,  published in 1998 ,  is  a motivational  किताब  by Spencer Johnson  लिखा  in the style  of  a parable or business  fable   .
It  describes  change in  एक   's  work and life , and four typical reactions to  कहा  change by  दो  mice  और  two ``  littlepeople   ''   ,   दौरान  their hunt for  चीज  .
A  नई   यॉर्क  Times business bestseller since release  ,   जो  Moved  my  Cheese ?
remained   on   the   सूची  for almost five  सालो  and  खर्च  over 200 weeks on Publishers Weekly  's  hardcover nonfiction  सूची   .
It has sold  अधिक  than 26 million  नक़ल  worldwide in 37  भाषाएं  and remains to be  एक  of the best-selling  कारोबार  books .
निकिता  Sergeyevich  khrushchev   (  – September 11 , 1971 ) led the Soviet Union during part  of  the Cold War .
He served as  पहला  Secretary  of  the  कम्युनिस्ट   पार्टी  of the  सोवियत   संघ   इससे  1953 to 1964 ,  और  as Chairman of the Council of Ministers ,  or   प्रीमियर   ,  from 1958 to  1964  .
Khrushchev was responsible for the  आंशिक   de-stalinization  of the Soviet Union ,  लिये   बैकिंग  the  प्रगति   of  the early Soviet space  कार्यक्रम  , and for  अनेक  relatively liberal reforms in areas of  घरेलू   नीति  .
Khrushchev 's  पार्टी  colleagues removed him from power in 1964 , replacing him with Leonid  brezhnev  as  पहला  Secretary and Alexei Kosygin as Premier  .
Khrushchev was born in the Russian  गाँव   of  Kalinovka in 1894 , close  to   the  present-day  किनारा  between Russia  और   युक्त  .
he  was employed as a metalworker in his  युवावस्था  ,  और   दौरान  the Russian Civil War was a  राजनैतिक  commissar .
साथ  the  सहायता  of Lazar  kaganovich  , he  worked  his  रास्ता  up  the   सोवियत  hierarchy .
He supported Joseph Stalin  's   purges   ,   और   स्वीकृत  thousands of arrests .
In 1939 ,  स्टालिन  sent him to govern Ukraine , and he continued the purges  वहीँ   .
During what was  ज्ञात   in   the   सोवियत   संघ   as  the Great Patriotic  युद्ध  ( Eastern Front of World War  ii  ) , Khrushchev  थी  again a  commissar  ,  सेवारत  as an intermediary between Stalin  और  his  सेनापतियों  .
Khrushchev was  उपस्थित  at  the  bloody  रक्षा  of  stalingrad   ,  a fact he took great  अभिमान   in  throughout  उसके  life .
बाद  the war , he  लौटे  to Ukraine  पहले  being recalled to  मास्को   as  one  of   स्टालिन  's close advisers  .
In the  शक्ति  struggle triggered by Stalin  's  death in 1953 ,  khrushchev   ,   बाद   अनेक  years ,  उभरा  victorious  .
on  February  25  , 1956  ,   at  the 20th Party Congress , he delivered  the  ``  रहस्य  Speech , '' denouncing Stalin 's purges and ushering in a less repressive  era  in the  सोवियत   संघ   .
His domestic policies  ,   aimed   at   bettering   the  lives  of  ordinary citizens  ,  were often ineffective , especially in the area  of  agriculture  .
Hoping eventually to  rely   on  missiles for  नेशनल   रक्षा   ,   khrushchev   ordered  major  कटौती  in  conventional  forces  .
Despite the  कटौती   ,   khrushchev  's rule  देखी  the  tensest   सालो  of  the  Cold War , culminating in the Cuban Missile Crisis .
कुछ  of  khrushchev   's  policies were seen  as   erratic  , particularly by his emerging  विरोधियों  ,  जो  quietly rose  in  strength  और  deposed him  in  October 1964  .
He did not  suffer  the deadly fate of some  पिछला   losers   of   सोवियत  power  struggles   ,  but  थी  pensioned off with  an  apartment  in   मास्को   और   a  dacha in  the  countryside  .
His lengthy memoirs  यहूद  smuggled  to  the  वेस्ट  and  प्रकाशित  in  भाग  in  1970  .
Khrushchev died in 1971 of  दिल   बीमारी   .
Upper gastrointestinal ( GI  )  bleeding refers  to  hemorrhage in  the  upper gastrointestinal  ट्रैक्ट   .
The  anatomic  cut-off for  अपर   gi  bleeding is  the   स्नायु   of  Treitz , which connects the  चौथी  portion  of  the duodenum  to   the  diaphragm  निकट  the splenic flexure of the colon .
Upper GI  bleeds  are considered medical emergencies , and  आवश्यकता  admission to hospital for urgent diagnosis and  प्रबन्धन  .
Due to  अग्रिम  in medications  और  endoscopy , upper GI hemorrhage is now usually  treated  without surgery .
World  जनसांख्यिकी   estimates  from 1800 to 2100  ,  based on UN 2010 projections ( red , orange , green  )  and US Census Bureau historical estimates ( black )  .
Actual  अंकित  population  आंकड़े  are in blue .
according   to   the   उच्चतम   अनुमान  , the world population  may  rise  to  16  अरब  by 2100 ;  according  to the  न्यूनतम   अनुमान  ,  it  may decline  to  6 billion  .
The world  जनसांख्यिकी  is the total number  of   जीना  humans  on  Earth  .
As  of  today , it  is  estimated to  क्रमांक  billion by the United States Census  ब्यूरो  ( USCB ) .
The USCB  estimates  that  the  world population exceeded 7 billion on  कूच  12  ,  2012  .
according  to a separate  अनुमान  by the United Nations Population  निधि   ,  it  पहुँचे  this milestone on October 31 , 2011  .
The world population has experienced continuous  विकास  since the end  of   the   ग्रेट  Famine and the Black Death  in  1350 , when it stood at  around  370  लाख  .
The  उच्चतम   दरों  of growth – global population  increases  above 1.8 % per  साल  – were seen  briefly   दौरान   the   1950s   ,   और  for  a  longer period during  the  1960s and 1970s .
the   विकास  rate  peaked  at 2.2 % in 1963 ,  और  had  अस्वीकृत  to 1.1 % by 2011 .
Total annual births were highest  in   the   लेट   1980s  at  परिचय  138 million  ,   और  are now  अपेक्षित  to  remain  essentially constant at their  2011  level of 134 million , while deaths  क्रमांक  56 million per year , and are  अपेक्षित  to  बढ़ाएँ   to  80 million per year by 2040 .
Current  projections  show a  जारी  increase in population  in   the   निकट  future (  लकिन   a   स्थिर   मनाही  in  the  population growth rate )  ,  with the global  जनसांख्यिकी  expected to reach between  7.5  and 10.5 billion by 2050 .
Various longer-term  estimates  predict  further  growth ,  stagnation  ,  or  even overall decline in the global population by 2150 .
कुछ  analysts  have  questioned the sustainability of  further  world  जनसांख्यिकी   विकास  ,  citing  the growing pressures  on   the  environment  ,  global food supplies  ,  and energy  संसाधन   .

Knuckle mnemonic for the number of days in  प्रत्येक  month of  the  Gregorian  पंचांग  .

a  mnemonic ( , with a  मूक  `` m '' ) , or mnemonic device ,  is  any learning technique that aids  सूचना  retention .
Mnemonics aim to translate information  into  a form that  the   इंसान  brain can retain better  than   इसके  original form .
Even  the   प्रक्रम  of  applying   इस   परिवर्तन   might   already  aid the transfer of  सूचना  to  long-term   मेमोरी  .
commonly  encountered  mnemonics   हैं   प्रायः  for lists and in  auditory   रूप  , such as short poems  ,  acronyms ,  or   यादगार  phrases , but mnemonics can  भी  be for other types of  सूचना  and in visual or kinesthetic forms  .
Their use is based on the observation  कि  the human mind more easily remembers spatial ,  निजी  , surprising , physical  ,  sexual ,  humorous  , or otherwise  'relatable  ' information ,  बल्कि  than  अधिक  abstract  or  impersonal forms  of   सूचना  .
the  word  mnemonic   is   निकला  from the  प्राचीन  Greek word μνημονικός  (  mnēmonikos  )  , meaning `` of  मेमोरी  '' and is related to Mnemosyne ( ``  स्मरण   ''  ) ,  the  name of the goddess  of  memory in Greek  mythology  .
Both  of   ये   शब्द  are derived from μνήμη ( mnēmē ) , `` remembrance  ,  memory '' .
Mnemonics in  प्राचीनता   यहूद  most  प्रायः   माना  in  the  context of what  is  today  ज्ञात  as the  आर्ट  of memory .
प्राचीन  Greeks and Romans  विशिष्ट   between   दो  types of memory : the 'natural ' memory and the 'artificial ' memory  .
The former is inborn , and  is  the one that everyone  उपयोग  automatically and  बगैर   सोच   .
The artificial  मेमोरी   in   कंट्रास्ट  has to be trained and developed through the learning and practicing of  a  variety of  mnemonic   तकनीकों   .
Mnemonic  प्रणालियों  are special techniques or strategies consciously used to  improve  memory , it  helps  employ  सूचना   already   भंडारित   in   long-term  memory to make memorization an easier task .
अध्यक्ष  Bush signing  the   no  Child Left  पीछे  Act  at   हैमिल्टन  H.S . in Hamilton ,  ओहियो  .
the  No Child Left Behind Act of 2001  (  NCLB )  is  a United States  अधिनियम  of Congress  कि   is  a reauthorization  of  the  elementary  and  द्वितीयक  Education  अधिनियम  ,  जिससे  included  शीर्षक   i   ,   the  government  's  flagship  सहायता  program for disadvantaged students .
NCLB supports standards-based education reform based  on   the  premise  कि  setting high standards and  establishing  measurable goals  can  improve individual outcomes in  शिक्षा  .
The Act requires states to develop assessments  in   मौलिक   कौशल  .
राज्य  must give these  आकलन   to  all  विद्यार्थी  at select grade  स्तर   in   अनुक्रम  to receive  संघीय   स्कूल   funding  .
The Act does not assert  a  national  उपलब्धि  standard ; standards  हैं  set by each  व्यक्तिगत   राज्य  .
NCLB  विस्तारित  the federal role in public education through  सालाना  testing ,  सालाना  academic progress  ,  report  ताश   ,   टीचर  qualifications , and  funding  changes  .
the   विधेयक   passed  in the U.S. Congress with bipartisan  support   .

a   पिकअप  truck  or  pick-up , often simply  referred  to as a  पिकअप   ,   is  a  लाइट  motor  गाडी  with an  open-top  , rear cargo area (  bed  ) .
In  उत्तर   अमेरिका  ,  the  term  पिकअप  is  प्रयुक्त  for light trucks with a lighter duty chassis  और   फैक्टरी  built  ,   एकीकृत  bed  ,  as well as  लिये  coupé  यूटिलिटी  vehicles , often based  on  a personal  car  chassis , but  भी  often  on  a  खास   समर्पित   chassi   लिये   ऐसे  use .
Some  देशों  have their  अपना   शर्तें  similar to pickup , such  as  ute in Australia and New  जीलैंड  , or bakkie in South  अफ़्रीकी  .
Large  पिकअप   ट्रक  are somewhat  विरल  in Europe ,  जहाँ  vans  और   लाइट   lorries  are commonly used for similar roles .
This 15th-century depiction  of  Charlemagne  और  Pope Adrian  i   shows   a  well-bred medieval  घोड़ा  with arched neck , refined  सिर  and elegant gait .
Horses in  the  Middle  आयु  differed  in  size  ,  build and breed  इससे  the modern horse , and were ,  on   औसत  ,  छोटी   .
They were  भी  more central  to  society  than  their modern counterparts , being essential for war , agriculture , and  हस्तांतरण  .
नतीजतन   ,  specific  प्रकार  of horse developed ,  अनेक   of  which have no  आधुनिक  equivalent .
While an understanding of modern horse  breeds  and  equestrianism  is vital for any  विश्लेषण   of  the medieval horse , researchers also need to consider documentary  (  both written and pictorial ) and  पुरातत्व  evidence .
Horses in the Middle  आयु  were rarely differentiated by breed ,  लकिन   बल्कि  by use  .
This led  उन्हें  to  be  described , for example , as  ``   chargers  `` (  युद्ध   घोड़े  ) , ``  palfreys  `` ( riding horses )  ,   कार्ट  horses  or  packhorses .
Reference is also  दिए  to  उनके  place of  उत्पत्ति  , such  as  `` Spanish horses  ,  '' but whether  इस  referred to  एक  breed  or   अनेक   is  unknown  .
Another difficulty  arising   दौरान   कोई   पढ़ाई   of  medieval documents or  साहित्य  is the flexibility  of   the  medieval languages , where several words can be used for one  बात  ( or ,  conversely  , several  वस्तुएँ   हैं   referred   to  by one word  )  .
Words such  as  '  courser  ' and 'charger ' are used interchangeably  (   भी  within  एक  document  )   ,  and where  एक  epic may speak disparagingly of a rouncey  ,   another   गुणगान  its skill and swiftness .
Significant technological advances  in  equestrian equipment , often introduced  इससे  other cultures  ,  allowed  लिये   significant   परिवर्तन  in both  warfare  and agriculture .
in  particular , improved  डिजाइन   लिये  the solid-treed  काठी  as well as the arrival of  the  stirrup ,  नाल   और  horse  कॉलर  were significant advances in medieval society .
नतीजतन  ,  the  assumptions and theories  विकसित   by  historians are  नहीं   निर्णायक   ,   और   बहस  still  rages  on  अनेक  issues , such as the  प्रजनन  or  आकार  of  the   घोड़ा   ,  and a number  of   स्त्रोत   जरूर  be consulted in order  to   समझे   the   विशालता  of the subject  .
The  म्यूज़िक   man  is a musical  साथ   किताब   ,  music , and lyrics by Meredith Willson , based on  a  story by Willson  और   फ्रैंकलिन  Lacey .
the   प्लाट  concerns con man Harold  हिल   ,  who poses as a  लड़कों   '  band organizer and leader and sells band instruments and  वर्दी  to naive townsfolk  पहले  skipping town with  the   नकदी  .
In River City ,  आयोवा  ,  prim  librarian and piano teacher Marian  paroo   sees   through  him , but when Hill  helps  her younger brother overcome  उसके  fear  of  social interactions due  to  his  लिस्प   ,  Marian  begins  to fall in  प्रेम  with Harold  .
हेरोल्ड   ,  in turn falling for  marian   ,  risks being caught to win  उसके  .
In 1957  ,  the show became a hit on Broadway , winning five Tony  पुरस्कार  , including Best Musical ,  और  running  लिये  1,375 performances .
The cast album won the first Grammy Award for  ``  Best Original  डाल  Album '' and was number  एक  on the  बिलबोर्ड  charts for 245  सप्ताह  .
The show  's  success led  to  revivals and a  लोकप्रिय   1962   फिल्मी  adaptation and a 2003 television remake .
It frequently is  उत्पादित  by both  पेशेवर  and amateur  थिएटर  companies .
Surveyor 's wheel
A surveyor  's  wheel ,  भी   पुकारा  a clickwheel ,  hodometer   ,  waywiser , trundle  व्हील  , measuring wheel , or perambulator is  a  device for measuring  अलहदा  .
Largest non-polar deserts
बालू   टीले  in the Rub '  al   खली  (  ``   खाली  quarter ''  )   of  Saudi  अरब   .
Makhtesh Ramon ,  negev  desert ,  इसराईल
A desert is a landscape or region of land that  is  very  शुष्क  because  of  low  वर्षा  amounts (  वर्षण   )  ,  प्रायः  has little coverage  by  plants , and  in  which streams  शुष्क  up  जबतक  they  हैं   supplied  by water from outside areas .
Deserts can also be  वर्णित   as  areas where  अधिक   जल  is  खोया  by evapotranspiration than  जलप्रपात  as precipitation  .
मरुस्थल  plants  जरूर  have special  adaptations   to  survive with this little water .
रेगिस्तान   generally   प्राप्त  less than  25  cm of  बरसात  ( precipitation  )   प्रत्येक  year .
Semideserts or steppes are regions which receive between and  .
In the  köppen   जलवायु  classification  प्रणाली  ,  रेगिस्तान   हैं  classed  as   bwh   (  hot desert ) or BWk  (  temperate  मरुस्थल  ) .
in  the Thornthwaite climate  वर्गीकरण  system , deserts would be  वर्गीकृत   as  arid megathermal  climates   .
World  युद्ध  I  (  WWI ) was a global war  केंद्रित  in Europe  कि   began   on  28 July 1914  और  lasted until 11 November 1918 .
it  was predominantly called  the  World War  or  the Great  युद्ध  from  इसके  occurrence until the  प्रारंभ  of World War II in  1939  , and  the  First World War or  संसार   युद्ध  I thereafter  .
it  involved  सब  the world  's  great powers , which were assembled  in   दो   opposing  alliances  :  the  allies  ( based on the Triple Entente of  the   संयुक्त  Kingdom , France and Russia ) and the Central Powers  (   originally  the  ट्रिपल  Alliance of Germany  ,  Austria-Hungary and  इटली  ;  लकिन  , as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive  विरूद्ध  the  अनुबंध  , Italy  किया   नहीं  enter  into  the war ) .
These alliances were  दोनो   reorganised  and expanded as more nations entered the war :  इटली  ,  जापानी  and the United States joined the Allies  ,  and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers .
Ultimately ,  अधिक  than 70 million military personnel ,  सहित  60  लाख  Europeans  ,  were mobilised in one  of  the largest wars in history  .
More  than   9  million combatants were  मारे  , largely because of  technological   advancements   कि  led to  विशाल   increases  in the lethality of  हथियार   बगैर   सम्बन्धित  improvements in protection or mobility .
It  थी  the  fifth-  deadliest conflict in world history  ,  subsequently  paving  the way for various political changes  ,   ऐसे  as  revolutions   in  many of  the   राष्ट्र  involved .
One of  the  long-term  कल्याणकारी  of the war was the  पुनरुत्थान   of  imperialism in  the  foreign  नीतियों   of  the  ग्रेट  powers of Europe .
More immediately , the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand  of  Austria , the heir  to  the throne of Austria-Hungary , on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo Princip  in  Sarajevo triggered a  राजनयिक   संकट   जब  Austria-Hungary subsequently  वितरित  an ultimatum to the  किंगडम  of Serbia  .
Several alliances formed over the  पिछला   दशकों  were  invoked   .
भीतर  weeks , the major powers were  at   युद्ध  and , via their colonies  ,  the conflict soon spread around the world  .
on  28 July ,  the  Austro-Hungarians fired  the  first  गोलियाँ   of   the   युद्ध  as preparation for the  आक्रमण  of Serbia .
While  the  Russians mobilised ,  the   germans   invaded  neutral Belgium  और  Luxembourg on the way to  फ़्रांस  , providing a casus belli for Britain 's  घोषणा  of war  विरूद्ध  Germany .
बाद   the  German  कूच  on Paris was  brought   to  a  halt—the  so-called Miracle of the  marne  —the Western  सामने  settled into a static  बैटल  of attrition with a trench  लकीर  that  बदला   छोटी   जबतक  1917  .
On the  पूर्वी   सामने  , the Russian  फौज   थी  successful  विरूद्ध   the  Austro-Hungarians ,  लकिन  was stopped in  इसके   आक्रमण  of  ईस्ट  Prussia  by  the  germans  .
In November the  उस्मानी   साम्राज्य  joined the  युद्ध  ,  खोलने  up  fronts  in the Caucasus  ,  Mesopotamia and the  sinai  .
इटली   और  Bulgaria  गई  to war  in  1915 and Romania in 1916 .
In Russia , the tsar 's government collapsed  in  March 1917  और  a subsequent revolution in November brought the  russians   to   शर्तें  with the Central  शक्तियां   .
After a 1918 German offensive along the western front ,  the  Allies drove  वापस   the  Germans in a series  of  successful offensives and American forces began entering  the  trenches .
जर्मनी  ,  जिससे   था  its own  ट्रबल  with  क्रांतिकारियों  , agreed  to  an  armistice  on 11 November 1918 .
the  war ended in victory for  the  Allies .
Events on the  घर  fronts were as tumultuous as on the  बैटल  fronts  ,   as  the participants  आजमाया   to  mobilize their manpower and economic  संसाधन   to  fight a  कुल  war .
By  the  end  of  the  युद्ध  ,  चार  major  इम्पीरियल  powers—the German , Russian , Austro-Hungarian and Ottoman empires—ceased  to  exist .
The successor  राज्य   of   the  former  दो  lost a great  राशि  of territory , while  the  latter two  यहूद   dismantled   entirely  .
the   मैप  of central Europe was redrawn into several  छोटी  states .
The  लीग  of Nations was formed  in  the hope of preventing another such conflict .
The European nationalism  शाखित   by  the  युद्ध  and  the  breakup  of  empires ,  the   परखना  of Germany 's defeat  और  problems  साथ   the  Treaty of  versailles  are agreed to be factors contributing to World War  ii   .
``  Girls Just Want to Have Fun '' is a 1979  सोंग  originally written by Robert  जोखिम   और  made famous by singer Cyndi Lauper .
It  थी  the first major  सिंगल  released by Lauper as  a   सोलो  artist  और   the   lead-off   सिंगल  from her  डेब्यू  album She 's So Unusual .
Lauper’s version gained recognition as  a  feminist anthem  और   प्रचारित   by   an  award-winning  वीडियो  .
it  has been covered on  either  an  एल्बम   or  in  सजीव   कॉन्सर्ट  by  over  30 other  कलाकारों  .
The  सिंगल  was  lauper  's breakthrough hit  ,   reaching   #  2  on  the Billboard Hot 100  और  becoming a  विश्वव्यापी  hit throughout late  1983   और  early 1984  .
It  remains  one of  lauper  's signature songs and was a  widely  popular song during the era of its release , the  1980s  .
The ``  रोलिंग  Stone & MTV : '100 Greatest Pop  गीतों   '  :  1-50  '' , `` Rolling  स्टोन  : `` The  100  Top Music  वीडियो   ''  '' and the `` VH1  :  100 Greatest Videos  ''   सूचियाँ   क्रमित  the song  at  # 22  ,  # 39 and #  45  , respectively .
The song  प्राप्त   a  Grammy Award nomination for Record of the  साल  and Best Female Pop Vocal Performance .
View of defibrillator electrode position  और  placement  .
Defibrillation  is  a  आम   उपचार  for life-threatening  हृदय  dysrhythmias , ventricular fibrillation , and  pulseless   ventricular  tachycardia .
Defibrillation consists of  delivering  a therapeutic dose of electrical  उर्जा   to  the affected  दिल  with a  यंत्र  called  a  defibrillator .
This depolarizes a critical mass of the heart  मांसपेशी   ,   terminates   the  dysrhythmia , and  allows  normal sinus  लय  to be reestablished by  the  body 's natural  pacemaker  , in the sinoatrial node of the  दिल  .
Defibrillators can be external , transvenous  ,  or implanted , depending on the type of device used  or  needed .
Some external units , known  as  automated external  defibrillators   (   aeds  ) , automate the diagnosis of treatable  लय  , meaning  कि  lay responders or bystanders are able to use them successfully with little ,  or   in   कुछ   मामले   no  training at all .
the   केटो  Institute is an American libertarian  सोचो  tank headquartered in  वॉशिंगटन  ,  d.c  .
it   थी  founded as the Charles Koch  न्यास  in 1974 by  मरे  Rothbard ,  ed  Crane and  चार्ल्स   koch  ,  अध्यक्ष  of the  फलक   और  chief  कार्यपालिका   अधिकारी  of the  संगुटिका  Koch  उद्योग  , Inc. .
In July  1976  , the name was changed to  the  Cato  संस्थान  .
According to the 2011 Global Go  to  Think Tank Index , Cato  is  the 6th most  influential  US based think tank  ,  ranking 3rd in Economic Policy and 2nd in Social Policy .
the  Institute  's  stated  मिशन   is  `` to increase the  समझना  of public policies  आधारित   on  the principles  of  limited  सरकारी  , free markets , individual liberty  ,   और   सलाम  .
The Institute will  उपयोग  the  सबसे  effective means to originate , advocate , promote  ,   और  disseminate applicable  नीति   प्रस्ताव   कि   बनाएँ   फ़्री   ,  open  ,  and civil  समाजों  in  the  United States  और  throughout  the   संसार   .   ''
Cato  विद्वानों  were  नाजुक  of George  W.   बुश  's Republican administration ( 2001–2009 ) on several  मुद्दे  , including  the  Iraq War ,  सिविल  liberties ,  शिक्षा  ,  कृषि  , energy policy  ,  and excessive government spending .
On  अन्य   मुद्दे  , they supported Bush administration initiatives  ,  most notably health care ,  सोशल  Security , global warming , tax policy , and immigration .
During  the  2008 U.S. presidential election ,  केटो  scholars criticized both major-party candidates , John McCain and Barack Obama .
केटो   रै  criticized President  ओबामा   's  stances on policy issues since  उसके  inauguration  ,  such as fiscal stimulus  ,  healthcare reform ,  विदेशी  policy  ,  and the  युद्ध   on   दवाएँ  , while  supporting   उसके  stance on the  repeal  of Do n't Ask , Do n't Tell and liberal immigration policy  .
Dracula is an 1897 Gothic horror novel by Irish author Bram Stoker .
प्रसिद्ध  for introducing the character of the  पिशाच  Count  ड्रैकुला  ,  the  novel  tells   the   स्टोरी   of  Dracula  's  attempt to relocate  इससे  Transylvania to  इंग्लैण्ड  , and the  बैटल  between  ड्रैकुला   और  a small group of  मेन  and women led by  प्राध्यापक  Abraham Van Helsing .
Dracula has been  आबंटित  to  अनेक  literary genres including vampire  साहित्य  ,  हॉरर   fiction   ,  the gothic  अनोखा   और  invasion literature .
The novel touches on themes such as the role of women in Victorian culture ,  यौन  conventions ,  आव्रजन  , colonialism , and post-colonialism  .
Although  स्टोकर  did  नहीं  invent the vampire , he defined its modern form , and the novel has spawned numerous theatrical ,  फिल्मी   और   टेलीविज़न  interpretations .
quidditch  is  a  competitive  खेल   in  the wizarding  संसार  of the Harry Potter  ब्रह्मांड  , and  is   इससे  the series  of  children 's novels  और  movies .
It is  an  extremely rough but  बहुत  popular semi-contact  खेल  , played by  wizards   और  witches .
Matches  हैं  played between two teams of seven  खिलाड़ी   सवारी  flying broomsticks  ,   using  four  गेंदें  and  छह   elevated  ring-shaped goals  ,  three on each  पक्ष   of  the  quidditch  pitch ( field )  .
In the Harry  कुम्हार   ब्रह्मांड  , Quidditch holds a fervent  following   समान  to the position that  संघ   फ़ुटबॉल   holds   as  a  globally  popular sport  .
The sport is  स्मारकीय  throughout the wizarding world .
हैरी  plays  an  important position for his  हाउस  team at Hogwarts  :   he   is  the seeker and  becomes  the captain  in  his  छठे  year there  .
क्षेत्रीय  and international competitions are  उल्लेखित  throughout the series .
in   प्याला  of  आग  ,  quidditch   at   हॉग्वार्ट्स   is  cancelled for the  tri-wizard  Tournament  ,  but Harry  और   the   weasleys   attend   the  Quidditch  संसार   कप  .
In addition , Harry uses his  quidditch  skills to capture  a  golden egg  इससे   a   ड्रैगन  called the  हंगेरियाई  Horntail ( in  the   पहला  task  of  the  tri-wizard  Tournament )  ,  to capture a  उड़ती  key in Philosopher 's  स्टोन   ,  and on  दो  key occasions in  deathly  Hallows —  getting  hold  of  Ravenclaw  's   diadem   ,  and during the final fight  साथ   voldemort  —  the  `` unerring skill of the Seeker '' is useful to  उसे  in snatching  the  Elder Wand out of  the   एयर  .
Harry Potter has owned two broomsticks  ,  the Nimbus 2000 and the  firebolt  , both of  जिससे  are  नष्ट  by the series  '  end .
The  खेल  has been  अपनाया   in   the   रियल  world  in  the form of Muggle Quidditch .
The  संयुक्त  States Congress is the bicameral legislature of the  संघीय  government  of  the United  राज्य  consisting of  दो  houses  :  the lower house known as the House of Representatives  और  the upper house  ज्ञात  as the Senate .
कॉंग्रेस  meets  in  the Capitol in Washington , D.C .
Both representatives and senators are chosen through  सीधा  election .
Congress has a total of  535   मतदान   सदस्यों  : 435 members  in  the House of Representatives and 100  सदस्यों  in the Senate  .
Members of the House  of  Representatives serve two-year terms  representing   the  people of  a  district .
Congressional districts are apportioned to states  by  population  using  the United States  जनसांख्यिकी  results ,  प्रत्येक  state  in  the union  having  at least one representative in the House of  प्रतिनिधि   .
Regardless of  जनसांख्यिकी  , each  of  the 50  राज्य   रै  two  सीनेटरों  ;  the   100   सीनेटरों  each serve a  six-year  term .
The terms  हैं   लड़खड़ाते   so   प्रत्येक  two  सालो  approximately one-third of the Senate  is  up for election  .
Each staggered group of one-third of the senators are called  'classes   '   .
No  राज्य   of  the United States has two  सीनेटरों   इससे   the   वही   क्लास  .
Most  incumbents  seek re-election , and their historical likelihood of winning subsequent elections  exceeds  90 percent  .
in  August 2012 , a Gallup  पोल  reported that Congress’s  स्वीकृति  rating amongst Americans  थी  at 10 % ,  मिलान   a  38-year low reached  in   नवम्बर   2011  .
``  a  Little More Country  than  That '' is the  शीर्षक  of  a  song  लिखा  by  जॉय   +  Rory 's Rory Lee Feek  ,  Wynn  varble   ,  and Don Poythress , and recorded  by   अमरीकी   देश  artist Easton Corbin .
It was  released   in   अगस्त   2009   as  Corbin 's  डेब्यू  single and is included on his self-titled debut album .
in  April 2010 , the song  पहुँचे  Number  एक   on  the country  म्यूज़िक  charts  ,   बनाना  Corbin the first male solo artist in seven  सालो   to  send a  डेब्यू  single  to  Number One  .
It has been  certified  Gold by  the  RIAA .
the  BlackBerry is a  लकीर  of  बेतार  handheld  डिवाइस  and services designed and  marketed  by Research In Motion  सीमित  (  रिम  )  ऑपरेटिंग  as BlackBerry  .
The  पहला  BlackBerry device , an email pager , was released  in  1999 ;  the   सबसे  recent BlackBerry devices , the  z10  and  q10  , were announced  on  January 30 ,  2013  .
The  उपयोक्ता  interface varies by model  ;  most feature a  शारीरिक   क्वर्टी  keyboard , while newer generations have relied on a multi-touch screen and virtual  कुंजीपटल  .
A BlackBerry  can  shoot video , take photos , play music , and perform online  कृत्यों  such as  web-browsing   और   emailing  .
They can  भी  send and receive  धक्का  email and instant  संदेश  while maintaining a  ऊँची  level of  सुरक्षा  through on-device message  एन्क्रिप्शन  , and  हैं  designed to  फलन  as personal  डिजिटल  assistants  .
ब्लैकबेरी   डिवाइस  support  a  large variety of instant  messaging  features  ,  with  the   सबसे  popular being the  मालिकाना  BlackBerry Messenger service .
the  BlackBerry PlayBook is  a  tablet  कंप्यूटर  offered  by   the  company  .
the  100 millionth BlackBerry  स्मार्टफोन  was shipped in June quarter of 2010 and the 200  millionth  smartphone was shipped in September quarter of 2012  .
BlackBerry accounts for 3 %  of  mobile device  बिक्री   विश्वव्यापी  in 2011 , making its manufacturer the sixth  सबसे  popular device maker ( 25 % of  मोबाईल  device  बिक्री  are smartphones  )  .
The consumer  ब्लैकबेरी  Internet Service is available in 91  देशों   विश्वव्यापी   on   over  500 mobile service operators using various  मोबाईल  technologies .
As  of  September 2012 , there were eighty million  सदस्य  worldwide to BlackBerry  .
In  2011  the Caribbean and  लैटिन  America had the highest penetrations of BlackBerry smartphones  विश्वव्यापी  , with up to about 45 per  cent  in  the  region having  a  RIM  यंत्र  .
BlackBerry ,  iphone  , Android , and Windows  फोन   हैं  considered  the  four major smartphone  ब्रांड्स   .
ब्लैकबेरी  is widely referred to as `` CrackBerry '' in the United  राज्य   ,  which  alludes  to  इसके   excessive  use by  इसके  owners  और  is  a   सन्दर्भ  to the addictiveness  of  crack cocaine .
Use of  the   पद  CrackBerry became  so  widespread that  in   नवम्बर   2006  Webster 's New World College Dictionary named `` crackberry  ''   the  ``  नई  Word of  the   साल   .   ''
An  उदाहरण   of   a  demand curve  shifting  .
The  शिफ़्ट  from D1 To D2 means an increase in demand  साथ  consequences for  the  other variables
In economics , the demand curve is  the  graph  depicting  the relationship  between  the price  of   a   निश्चित   कमोडिटी  and the amount of  it  that consumers are willing and able to  खरीदें  at that  दिए   दाम  .
It is a graphic representation of a  माँग  schedule  .
The demand curve for all consumers together follows from the  माँग  curve of every individual consumer : the individual demands at each price are  added   साथ  .
Demand curves  हैं  used to  अनुमान   व्यवहार  in competitive  बाज़ार  , and are often combined with supply  वक्र   to  estimate the equilibrium price (  the   दाम   at   जिससे   विक्रेता  together are willing  to   बेचें   the  same amount as buyers together  हैं  willing to buy , also known as  मार्केट  clearing price )  और  the equilibrium quantity ( the amount of that good or service that will be produced and bought  बगैर  surplus/excess supply  or   shortage/excess  demand )  of  that  मार्केट  .
In a monopolistic  मार्केट  ,  the   माँग   वक्र   facing   the   monopolist  is  बस  the  मार्केट  demand curve .
historia
by  Nikolaos Gysis  (   1892   )
History (  इससे  Greek - historia , meaning  ``  inquiry , knowledge  acquired  by investigation '' )  is  an  छतरियाँ  term  कि  relates to past  कार्यक्रम  as well  as  the discovery  ,   संग्रहण  , organization , and  प्रस्तुतीकरण   of  information about these events  .
The  पद   शामिल   लौकिक  , geologic , and organic history , but  is  often generically  implied  to mean human  इतिहास  .
विद्वानों  who write about history  हैं  called  इतिहासकारों   .
इतिहास  can also  refer  to the academic  अनुशासन   जिससे  uses a  कथा   to   जाँचें   और  analyse a sequence of  पास्ट  events ,  और  objectively determine the  पैटर्न  of cause  और  effect that  determine  them .
Historians sometimes  बहस  the nature of history and  इसके   उपयोगिता  by discussing the study of the discipline as an end in itself  और  as a way of providing `` perspective '' on the problems of the present .
कहानियां  common  to   a   particular  culture , but not supported by external sources ( such  as  the tales surrounding  किंग   आर्थर  )  हैं  usually classified as cultural heritage or  महापुरूष  , because  वे   do  not support the `` disinterested investigation '' required  of   the   अनुशासन   of   इतिहास   .
Events occurring prior to written record are considered  प्रागितिहास   .
हिरोडोटस  ,  a   5th  century B.C  .  Greek  इतिहासकार  is considered within the Western  परंपरा  to be the `` father of history  ''  ,  और  , along  साथ   उसके   समकालीन  Thucydides  ,  helped form the foundations for the modern study of human  इतिहास  .
उनके  work  continues  to be  पढ़ा   आज  and the divide  between  the culture-focused Herodotus  और   the   military-focused   thucydides  remains a point  of  contention or approach  in  modern historical writing .
In the  पूर्वी   परंपरा   ,   a  state  वृत्तान्त  the  वसन्त  and Autumn Annals  थी  known to  be  compiled from  as  early as 722 BCE although  तभी  2nd century  bce   ग्रन्थ  survived .
Ancient influences have helped spawn variant interpretations  of   the  nature of  इतिहास  which have evolved  over   the   सदियां  and  continue  to change today .
The modern study  of  history is wide-ranging  ,  and includes  the   पढ़ाई  of specific  regions  and  the  study  of  certain topical or thematical  तत्व  of historical investigation  .
प्रायः   इतिहास  is  सिखाया  as part of  प्राथमिक  and  द्वितीयक   शिक्षा  , and  the   अकादमिक  study of history  is  a major  अनुशासन  in University studies .
Malcolm  x  ( ; May  19  , 1925February 21 , 1965 )  ,   born   मैल्कम  Little and also  ज्ञात  as El-Hajj  malik  El-Shabazz ( ) ,  थी  an  african-american   मुस्लिम  minister and human  अधिकारों  activist .
To his admirers  ,  he was a  साहसी  advocate for  the  rights of  अश्वेतों   ,  a  man  who indicted  श्वेत  America  in  the harshest terms  लिये  its crimes against black Americans .
detractors  accused him of  उपदेश  racism  ,   ब्लैक  supremacy , and violence .
He has  महरूम  called  एक   of  the greatest and  सबसे  influential African Americans in history  .
Malcolm X 's father died—killed by  श्वेत  supremacists  ,  it was  rumored—when  he was  यंग   ,   और  at  तनिक  one of his  uncles  was lynched .
When he  थी  13 , his  माँ  was  लगाई   in  a mental  हॉस्पिटल   ,   और  he was placed in a series of foster  घरों   .
In 1946 , at age  20   ,  he  गई  to prison for breaking  और   प्रवेश  .
In prison ,  मैल्कम   x  became a  सदस्य  of the Nation  of  Islam ;  बाद   उसके  parole  in   1952   ,   he  quickly rose to become one  of  its leaders .
For a dozen  सालो  , Malcolm X  थी   the   पब्लिक  face of the controversial group , but  मोहभंग  with Nation  of  Islam head  इलियास   मुहम्मद  led him to  छोड़  the Nation  in  March 1964  .
After a period  of  travel in  अफ़्रीकी   और  the Middle East , he  लौटे  to the United States , where he founded Muslim Mosque  ,  Inc.  और   the   संगठन  of Afro-American Unity .
In  फ़रवरी  1965  ,  less than  a   साल  after leaving the Nation  of  Islam , he was assassinated  by  three members of  the  group .
Malcolm  x   's  expressed beliefs changed substantially over  समय   .
As  a  spokesman for the Nation  of   islam   he   सिखाया  black  सर्वोच्चता   और  advocated separation  of  black and white Americans —in  कंट्रास्ट  to the civil rights movement  's   जोर  on integration  .
बाद   तोड़कर  with the Nation  of   islam   in  1964—saying of his association with  it  ,  ``  I  किया  many things as a [ Black  ]  Muslim that I 'm sorry  लिये  now .
I  थी  a zombie then ...  pointed   in  a  निश्चित  direction  और  told to  कूच  '' —and becoming  a   सुन्नी   मुस्लिम   ,   he  disavowed racism  और  expressed  willingness  to  कार्य  with  सिविल  rights leaders  ,  he  जारी   to   emphasize  Pan-Africanism , black  self-determination  , and self-defense .
Henry Merritt  ``   हांक  '' Paulson  ,  Jr. (  born  March 28 ,  1946  ) is an American banker who  परोसा   as   the  74th United States Secretary of the  राजकोष  .
He had served as  the  Chairman and  मुख्य   कार्यपालिका  Officer  of  Goldman Sachs ,  और   is   अभी   अध्यक्ष  of the Paulson Institute , which he founded in  2011  to promote  चिरस्थायी   आर्थिक  growth and a  क्लीनर  environment  around  the world ,  साथ   an  initial focus  on  the United States and  चीन   .
A virtual machine  (  VM )  is  a software implemented abstraction  of  the underlying hardware  ,  which is presented to the application layer of the  प्रणाली  .
Virtual machines may be  आधारित  on specifications  of   a  hypothetical computer or emulate  the  computer architecture  और  functions  of  a real world computer .
Spiders ( order  araneae   )   हैं   air-breathing   arthropods  that have eight legs  और  chelicerae with fangs that inject venom  .
They are the largest order of arachnids and  रैंक  seventh  in   कुल  species  विविधता  among all  अन्य  groups  of  organisms .
Spiders are  मिला  worldwide  on  every  महाद्वीप   मगर   लिये  Antarctica , and  have  become  स्थापित  in  nearly   प्रत्येक  habitat with  the  exception of  एयर   और  sea colonization .
as   of  2008 ,  at  least 43,678 spider species  ,  and 109  परिवारों   have   महरूम   अंकित  by taxonomists  ;  however ,  वहीँ  has been confusion within  the  scientific community as to how all these families should be classified ,  as  evidenced by the over 20  अलग   classifications  that  have  been proposed since 1900 .
anatomically  ,  मकड़ियों  differ from other arthropods in that the usual body segments are fused  into  two  tagmata   ,  the cephalothorax and abdomen  ,  and joined  by  a small , cylindrical  pedicel  .
Unlike  कीट  , spiders  do  not have antennae .
In  सब  except the most  आदिम   समूह   ,  the  mesothelae  , spiders have the  सबसे  centralized  बेचैन  systems  of  all  arthropods   ,  as all their ganglia are fused  into   एक  mass  in   the  cephalothorax .
Unlike  सबसे  arthropods  ,  spiders have no  extensor  muscles in their  limbs  and instead  extend  them by hydraulic pressure .
Their abdomens bear appendages that have  महरूम  modified  into  spinnerets  कि  extrude  रेशा  from up  to  six  प्रकार  of silk glands within their abdomen .
मकड़ी  webs  vary   widely   in  size , shape  और  the  राशि  of sticky thread  प्रयुक्त  .
It now  appears   कि  the  सर्पिल  orb web  may   be  one  of   the  earliest forms , and spiders that produce tangled cobwebs  हैं  more abundant  और   विविध  than orb-web  मकड़ियों  .
spider-like  arachnids with silk-producing spigots  appeared   in   the   devonian   काल  about , but  ये  animals apparently lacked  spinnerets  .
True spiders have been  मिला  in Carboniferous rocks from , and are very  समान  to the most primitive surviving  अनुक्रम   ,  the Mesothelae .
The  प्रमुख  groups of modern  मकड़ियों   ,  Mygalomorphae and  araneomorphae  , first  appeared  in the Triassic  काल   ,  before .
A herbivorous species ,  bagheera  kiplingi , was described in 2008  ,  but all  अन्य  known  प्रजाति  are predators  ,   ज़्यादातर  preying on insects and on other  मकड़ियों   ,  although a few large  प्रजाति   भी   लो   पक्षियों  and lizards .
Spiders  उपयोग  a wide range of  रणनीति   to   कैप्चर  prey : trapping  it  in sticky webs  ,  lassoing it  साथ   स्टिकी  bolas , mimicking the prey  to   avoid  detection , or running  it   bas   .
Most  detect  prey mainly by sensing  कंपन  , but the active hunters  have   अधि  vision  ,  and hunters  of  the genus Portia  दिखाएँ  signs of intelligence  in  their choice of tactics and ability  to  develop new ones  .
Spiders  '  guts are too narrow  to  take solids  ,  and  वे  liquidize their  खाना  by flooding  it  with digestive  एंजाइमों  and grinding it with the bases of  उनके  pedipalps  ,   as  they do  नहीं  have true  जबड़े  .
Male spiders  पहचानो  themselves by  a   किस्में  of complex courtship  संस्कार   to  avoid being eaten by  the  females .
Males of most species  जीवित   a   few   matings  ,  सीमित   मुख्यतः  by their  छोटी  life spans .
महिलाओं  weave silk egg-cases , each of which may  contain   सैंकड़ों  of eggs .
Females  of  many species  परवाह   लिये  their young , for example by carrying them around or by sharing food with  उन्हें   .
A  अल्पसंख्यक   of   प्रजाति  are social , building  सांप्रदायिक   webs  that may house anywhere from  a  few to 50,000  individuals   .
Social  बर्ताव  ranges from  precarious  toleration , as in the widow  मकड़ियों   ,  to co-operative  शिकार  and food-sharing .
हालांकि  most spiders  सजीव   लिये  at most  दो  years , tarantulas and  अन्य  mygalomorph  मकड़ियों  can live  up  to 25 years in captivity  .
While the venom of a  few  species  is   खतरनाक  to humans  ,   वैज्ञानिकों  are  अभी   researching  the use of  मकड़ी  venom in medicine  और  as  non-polluting  pesticides .
Spider silk  provides  a combination of lightness , strength  और   लोच  that is  श्रेष्ठ   to  that of  सिंथेटिक  materials ,  और  spider silk  जीनों  have been inserted into  स्तनधारियों  and plants to  देखिए  if these can be used  as  silk  कारखानों  .
As a  परिणाम   of  their  चौड़ी   दायरा  of behaviors  ,  spiders have become  आम  symbols in art and mythology symbolizing  विभिन्न  combinations of patience ,  क्रूरता  and creative powers  .
Donna Marie Pinciotti ( Born February  13  , 1960  )  is a fictional character and  एक   of  the  दो  female leads  in  the  फॉक्स  sitcom That '70s Show , appearing in all  आठ  seasons  .
Portrayed by Laura  prepon  , Donna is the love  ब्याज  to  eric   forman  .
US  काउंटी  household median  आय  2009  .
मध्य  US  household  income ,  2001-2011
household   आय  is  a   माप   commonly  used  by   the   संयुक्त  States government  और   निजी  institutions .
Each household  is  measured by the income of  प्रत्येक  resident over  the  age of  15  .
Income  शामिल  wages and salaries ,  बेरोजगारी  insurance  ,  disability  भुगतान  , child support payments  प्राप्त  ,  नियमित  rental receipts , as  खूब   as   कोई   निजी   कारोबार   ,  investment ,  or  other kinds of income received  routinely  .
While inflation-adjusted  (  `` real '' ) household  आय  had  महरूम  increasing almost  प्रत्येक  year from  1945  to  1999  , it has since been  चपटा  and even  decreased  recently .
u.S.  median household income fell  इससे  $  51,144  in 2010 to $ 50,502 in 2011 .
Extreme poverty in the United States ,  अर्थ  households  जीना  on less than  $  2 per day  पहले  government benefits  ,  doubled from  1996  to 1.5  लाख  households in 2011  ,  including 2.8 million children .
The residents of the household do not have  to  be related  to  the head of the household for  उनके   आय  to be considered part of the household  's  income  .
As  households  tend to share a similar  आर्थिक   कॉन्टेक्स्ट   ,  the  उपयोग  of household income remains  among  the most widely accepted  उपायों  of  आय   .
कि  the size of a  household  is not commonly taken  into  account in such measures  may  distort  कोई  analysis  of   fluctuations  within or among the household income categories , and may render  सीधा  comparisons between  quintiles  difficult or even impossible .
A  पंजीकृत  agent , also known as a resident agent or  statutory   एजेंट  , in United States business  विधि  ,  is  a business or  व्यक्तिगत  designated to receive service of process ( SOP )  जब  a  कारोबार   एंटिटी  is a party in  a   विधिक  action  ऐसे   as   a   मुकदमा  or summons .
The registered  एजेंट  's  पता  may also be where the state will  भेजें   the  paperwork for the yearly  नवीकरण   of   the  business entity 's charter  .
The  पंजीकृत  agent for a business  एंटिटी  may be an individual member of the  कम्पनी  , or  (  more often ) a third party ,  ऐसे   as   the  organization 's lawyer or a  सेवा  company  .
विफलता   to  properly maintain a registered agent can affect a company  negatively   .

`` Life , Liberty  ,  and the  pursuit   of  Happiness '' is  a  well-known phrase  in   the  United  राज्य   घोषणा  of Independence .
The phrase  is  meant  to  exemplify the `` unalienable rights '' with which  सब   इंसान  beings are endowed by their creator for their protection of which  वे  institute governments .
तलवारबाजी   ,  is typically divided into Olympic fencing , Classical fencing and historical fencing  ,   .
the  sport of fencing ( commonly  पुकारा  olympic fencing or  प्रतिस्पर्धी  fencing ) is divided into  तीन  weapon categories :  foil  ,  सब्रे  and épée .
Classical  तलवारबाजी  uses the same three weapons  ,  but  approaches   तलवारबाजी  as  a   martial  art .
प्रतिस्पर्धी   तलवारबाजी  is one  of  five sports which has been featured at every one of the modern  ओलम्पिक  Games ,  the  other four being Athletics  ,   साइकिलिंग  , Swimming  ,  and Gymnastics  .
the  quadriceps femoris  (   लैटिन   लिये   ``   four-headed  muscle  of   the  femur ``  )  , also called simply the quadriceps ,  quadriceps   extensor  , quads ,  is   a  large muscle group that includes  the  four prevailing muscles  on  the front  of  the  जांघ  .
it   is   the  great  extensor   मांसपेशी   of  the knee , forming a large  मांसल  mass which covers the  सामने  and sides of the femur .
The proper  लैटिन  plural form  of  the  क्रियाशील  quadriceps would  be   quadricipites   .
In  आधुनिक   अंग्रेज़ी   उपयोग  , quadriceps is used  in   दोनो  singular and  बहुवचन   .
The singular form quadricep  ,   उत्पादित   by  hypercorrection  ,  is frequently used .
rms   टाइटैनिक   थी  a British passenger liner that  sank  in the North Atlantic Ocean on 15 April 1912 after  colliding  with an iceberg during  उसके  maiden  voyage  from  southampton   ,  UK to New York City , US  .
The sinking of Titanic  caused   the  deaths of 1,502  लोगों  in one of the  deadliest  peacetime  मेरीटाइम  disasters in  आधुनिक  history  .
The RMS  टाइटैनिक  was the  largest  ship afloat  at  the time of  उसके  maiden  voyage  .
वो   थी  the second of three  ओलम्पिक  class ocean liners  संचालित  by the White Star  लकीर  ,  और   वो   थी   निर्मित  by the Harland and Wolff  डॉकयार्ड  in Belfast with  थामस   एंड्रयूज   ,  who  perished  with the ship , as her naval architect  .
On her  maiden  voyage , she carried 2,224 passengers and  क्रू  .
Under the command  of  Edward  स्मिथ   ,   उसके  passengers included some of  the   wealthiest  people in the world  ,  as well as  सैंकड़ों  of  emigrants  from  ग्रेट  Britain  और   आयरलैंड  , Scandinavia  और   elsewhere  throughout  यूरोपीय  seeking a new life in  उत्तर  America .
The ship was designed to be  the  last word in comfort and  लक्ज़री  ,  साथ  an on-board gymnasium ,  तैराकी  pool , libraries  ,  high-class restaurants and opulent  केबिन   .
वो   भी   था  a  शक्तिशाली  wireless telegraph provided for the convenience of passengers as  खूब   as   लिये  operational  उपयोग  .
Though  वो   था  advanced safety features such as watertight compartments  और  remotely activated watertight  द्वार  ,  वो  lacked enough  lifeboats   to   accommodate  all of those aboard .
Because of  outdated   मेरीटाइम  safety regulations ,  वो  carried only enough lifeboats for 1,178  people—slightly  more  than  half of the number  यात्राएं   on  the  maiden  voyage  ,   और  one-third her  कुल   यात्री   और   क्रू  capacity .
After  leaving   southampton  on 10 April 1912 , Titanic called at Cherbourg  in   फ़्रांस  and Queenstown ( now Cobh  )  in  आयरलैंड  before heading  westwards  towards  नई   यॉर्क  .
on   14   अप्रैल  1912 , four days  into  the crossing and about 375 miles (  600  km ) south  of  Newfoundland ,  वो  hit an  हिमशैल   at  11:40 pm ship 's time .
The glancing  टक्कर  caused  titanics  hull  प्लेटों   to  buckle  inwards  along her starboard side and opened  पाँच  of  उसके  sixteen watertight compartments to  the  sea  ;  the ship gradually  भर   साथ  water .
Meanwhile ,  यात्री   और   कुछ   क्रू  members were evacuated  in  lifeboats , many of  जिससे  were  शुभारम्भ   तभी   partly  loaded .
A disproportionate number of men  यहूद  left aboard  क्युकी  of a ``  महिलाओं  and  children  first `` protocol followed  by  some  of  the  अधिकारियों  loading the lifeboats .
By 2:20 AM , she broke apart and  foundered  , with well over one  हजार   लोगों  still aboard .
Just  अंतर्गत   दो   घंटों   बाद  the Titanic foundered , the Cunard liner RMS Carpathia  arrived  on the  झाँकी  of  the   डूब  , where she brought  सवार   an  estimated 705  survivors  .
the  disaster  थी  greeted with worldwide shock and outrage at the huge loss of life  और   the  regulatory  और  operational  असफलताओं  that  था   led   to  it  .
Public inquiries in  ब्रिटेन  and  the  United States led  to   प्रमुख   सुधार  in maritime safety .
One of their most important legacies was  the  establishment  in  1914  of   the  International Convention  लिये  the Safety  of  Life at Sea ( SOLAS ) , which still governs maritime safety today .
additionally  , several  नई  wireless regulations were passed around  the   संसार   in  an effort  to  learn from the many  missteps   in   बेतार  communications -- -which could have  saved  many more passengers  .
Many of the survivors  खोया  all of their money and  possessions  and were left destitute  ;  many  परिवारों   ,  particularly those  of  crew members from Southampton , lost their primary bread-winners  .
They were helped by an outpouring  of  public sympathy  और  charitable  दान  .
Some of the male  survivors  were accused  of  cowardice  लिये  leaving  the  ship while people were  स्टिल  on  फलक   ;   the   श्वेत  Star Line 's  अध्यक्ष  , J. Bruce Ismay , faced social  ostracism  for the  बाकी  of  उसके   जीवन  .
the  wreck of the Titanic  remains   on   the  seabed ,  विभाजित  in two and  धीरे  disintegrating at a  गहराई   of  .
चूंकि  its discovery in 1985 ,  हज़ारों  of artefacts  have   महरूम   बरामद  and put on display at museums  around   the  world  .
टाइटैनिक  has become one  of  the most famous ships in history ,  उसके   मेमोरी  kept  जिंदा  by numerous books , folk  गीतों   ,  films  ,   दर्शाती  , and memorials .
The human leg  is  the entire  निम्नतर  extremity or  limb   of   the  human  देह  , including the foot  ,  thigh and even the hip or gluteal region  ;   however  , the  precise   परिभाषा   in  human anatomy refers only to the section  of  the  निम्नतर  limb extending from  the  knee to the ankle .
टाँगे  are  प्रयुक्त  for standing  ,  walking  ,   कूद   ,  running ,  kicking  , and similar  क्रियाएँ  ,  और  constitute  a   significant  portion  of   a   व्यक्ति   's   द्रव्यमान  .
इस   आलेख  is about the demographic features of  the  population of  तुर्कों  , including population density , ethnicity , education level  ,  health of the  populace   ,   आर्थिक   औकात   ,  religious affiliations and  अन्य  aspects of the  जनसांख्यिकी  .
as  of 2010 , the population of Turkey is estimated  to  be  73.7   लाख  with a growth  रेट  of  1.21  %  प्रति  annum ( 2009  फिगर  )  .
The  जनसांख्यिकी  is relatively  यंग  with 26.6 %  गिरना  in the  0-14  age  कोष्ठक  .
According to the OECD/World Bank  जनसांख्यिकी  statistics in  तुर्कों   the  population  विकास  from  1990  to 2008 was  16   लाख  or 29 % .
