Joel Grey ( born April 11  ,  1932 )  is  an American stage and  स्क्रीन   कर्ता  , singer  ,  and dancer , known for his role as the Master of Ceremonies in both  the  stage and film  अनुकूलन  of the Kander & Ebb musical Cabaret .
He has won  the  Academy  पुरस्कार   ,   टोनी  Award and Golden Globe Award  .
He  भी  originated the role of George M. Cohan in  the  musical George M  !
in  1973  ,  the Wizard in  the  musical Wicked .
Grey also starred  in   the   ब्रॉडवे  revivals of Anything Goes  as  Moonface  मार्टिन  , and  शिकागो   as  Amos  हार्ट   .
James Madison  ,  Jr. ( March 16  ,  1751 ( O.S .  कूच   5   )  – June 28 , 1836  )  was  an  American statesman  और  political theorist , the fourth President of  the  United  राज्य  ( 1809–1817 )  .
He  is  hailed as the “Father  of  the Constitution” for  होने  instrumental in  the   drafting  of the United States Constitution and as  the   कुंजी  champion and author  of  the United States Bill  of  Rights .
He served as a politician much  of  his  वयस्क   जीवन   .
After  the  constitution had been drafted  ,  Madison became  एक  of  the  leaders in the movement to ratify  it  .
His collaboration with Alexander Hamilton  और  John Jay produced the Federalist  papers  ( 1788 ) .
Circulated only  in   नई  York  at  the  समय  , they would later be considered  among   the  most important polemics in support  of  the Constitution  .
He was also a  प्रतिनिधि   to  the Virginia constitutional  ratifying  convention  ,   और   थी  instrumental to  the  successful ratification  प्रयत्न  in Virginia .
जैसे  most  of   उसके  contemporaries  ,  Madison changed his political views  दौरान  his life .
During  the   drafting   और   अनुसमर्थन   of  the constitution , he favored  a   दमदार   नेशनल  government , though later he grew  to  favor stronger  राज्य  governments ,  पहले  settling between  the  two extremes  लेट  in his life .
In 1789 ,  मैडिसन   became  a leader  in  the new House  of   प्रतिनिधि   ,   drafting  many  मौलिक  laws .
he  is notable for drafting the  पहला  ten amendments to  the  Constitution , and thus  is   ज्ञात  as the `` Father  of  the  विधेयक   of  Rights  ``  .
Madison  worked   closely  with  अध्यक्ष  George  वॉशिंगटन  to organize the new federal government  .
Breaking with Hamilton and  कया   became  the  federalist  Party in  1791  , Madison and Thomas  जेफरसन  organized what they  पुकारा   the  Republican Party (  बाद  called  by  historians the  democratic-republican  Party )
As  jefferson’s   सचिव  of State (  1801–1809  ) ,  मैडिसन  supervised the  louisiana  Purchase , which doubled the  nation’s  size .
After  उसके  election to  the   प्रेसिडेंसी  , he  presided   over   नवीनीकृत  prosperity  लिये  several years .
as  president (  1809–17  ) ,  बाद  the failure  of  diplomatic  विरोध  and  a   व्यापार  embargo against Great  ब्रिटेन  , he led  the   स्वदेश  into the War of 1812  .
He  थी   responding  to British encroachments on American honor and rights  ;   in  addition , he wanted to end  the  influence  of   the   अंग्रेजों   among  their  भारतीय   allies  ,  जिनकी  resistance blocked  संयुक्त  States settlement in the Midwest around the  ग्रेट  Lakes .
Madison  मिला  the war to be  an  administrative nightmare , as  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  had neither a strong  फौज  nor financial  प्रणाली  ; as a result  ,   he  afterward  समर्थित  a stronger national  सरकारी   और   a  strong military  ,  as well as the national  बैंको  ,  जिससे  he had long  opposed  .
जैसे  other  वर्जिनिया  statesmen  in  the slave society  ,  he was a slaveholder who  inherited  his plantation known as  montpelier   ,   और  owned hundreds of slaves  दौरान  his lifetime to cultivate  तम्बाकू  and other  फसलों   .
Madison supported the three-fifths compromise  कि   अनुमत  three-fifths  of  the enumerated population of slaves  to   be  counted  लिये  representation .
``  रोमन  's Revenge ''  is   a  song performed by American rapper  निकी  Minaj from her debut  स्टुडियो   एल्बम  Pink Friday  .
It was  लिखा  by  minaj  and rapper  एमिनेम  ,  जो  is also featured  in  the song , and  थी   उत्पादित  by Swizz Beatz .
It was  released  exclusively on October 30 , 2010  through   the   us   itunes  Store , as a promotional release  preceding  the album 's release .
the   सोंग   initiated   a  feud between Lil ' Kim and Minaj  ,  where many  लोगों  felt  the   सोंग   थी  directed  at  Lil  '  Kim  और   regarded  around her feelings towards Minaj 's  वृद्धि   to  fame .
The song references  minaj  's alter-ego , Roman Zolanski , and Eminem 's alter-ego , Slim Shady .
the  song  garnered  very positive reviews from critics , most of which praised the  सोंग   as   a  stand-out  track  on the album .
An official remix featuring  minaj   's  mentor , Lil  वेन  , was released  to  the  us  iTunes  स्टोर  on January 19 , 2011  .
The  इंस्ट्रूमेंटल  was used  in   the  song 'Firing Squad '  by   नाल  G.A.N.G  .
Hydraulic  द्रव  being poured .
हाइड्रोलिक  fluids , also called hydraulic liquids , are the  मीडियम  by which power is  transferred  in hydraulic machinery .
Common  हाइड्रोलिक   fluids  are based on mineral oil  or   जल  .
उदाहरण  of equipment that might use hydraulic fluids include excavators  और  backhoes , hydraulic brakes ,  शक्ति  steering  प्रणालियों  ,  ट्रांसमिशन   ,  garbage trucks ,  वायुयान  flight  कंट्रोल  systems , lifts  ,  and industrial machinery .
Hydraulic systems  जैसे  the ones mentioned  ऊपर  will work most efficiently  if  the hydraulic  द्रव  used has no compressibility
महिंद्रा  Tractor
Mahindra Tractors , the  फार्म   उपकरण   प्रभाग  of Mahindra &  महिंद्रा  , builds and  स्त्रोत   tractors  that are sold  विश्वव्यापी  across  छह   महाद्वीपों  .
Mahindra is also  among  the top  तीन  tractor  निर्माताओं   in  the world  .
Mahindra has  a   विशाल  consumer base  in  India , China and America and a growing base in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  .
the   कम्पनी  builds more tractors in  इण्डिया   than  any other manufacturer  ,   और   रै  the  क्षमता   to  build 150,000 tractors a year .
In 1963 , M  &   m  formed  a   संयुक्त  venture with International Harvester to manufacture tractors carrying the Mahindra nameplate  लिये  the Indian  मार्केट  .
Armed  साथ   अभियान्त्रिकी   ,  tooling and manufacturing know-how  gained  from this relationship , M & M developed its first tractor  ,   the   b-275   .
Mahindra  tractors  with sales  of  nearly 85,000 units annually is one of the largest tractor companies  in  the world ,  और  is  क्रमांक   एक   in  sales  in   इण्डिया  - the largest  ट्रैक्टर   मार्केट  in the  संसार   .
To expand into  the  growing tractor market in  चीन  , Mahindra acquired majority stake  in  Jiangling .
to  raise awareness about  महिंद्रा  in the US ,  महिंद्रा   यूएसए   घोषित  its new  प्रायोजन  in  the  NASCAR Nationwide Series  साथ   r3  Motorsports ,  जिससे  is  participating  with a  #  23 Mahindra Tractors  शेवरलेट  .
The car will be driven  by  Robert  रिचर्डसन  , Jr.  महिंद्रा  USA ,  inc.   घोषित   a  17-race  प्राथमिक   और  18-race associate  प्रायोजन  for the 2009 NASCAR Nationwide Series  .
With  इस  sponsorship ,  महिंद्रा   थी  the  पहला   भारतीय  company  to   प्रायोजक  a car in NASCAR  .
In  2008  , Mahindra was a sponsor of  the   मैकडोनाल्ड  Motorsports team which ran  the  # 81  car  in  the  NASCAR Nationwide Series .
the  POWER6 is  a   माइक्रोप्रोसेसर  developed  by  IBM that implemented  the  Power ISA v.2.03  .
When  it   became  available in  प्रणालियों  in 2007 , it succeeded the  शक्ति5+   as   ibm  's flagship Power  माइक्रोप्रोसेसर  .
it  is part of the eCLipz  प्रोजेक्ट  ,  कहा  to have  a  goal  of   converging  IBM 's  सर्वर  hardware where practical  (   hence  `` ipz ''  in   the  acronym : iSeries , pSeries  ,   और  zSeries )  .
The American middle  क्लास  is a social class  in  the United States .
While the concept  is  typically  अस्पष्ट   in  popular  राय  and  आम  language use  ,  contemporary social scientists have put  आगे  several , more or less congruent  ,  theories  on  the  अमरीकी  middle class .
Depending on  क्लास  model used  ,   the  middle  क्लास  may  constitute  anywhere from 25  %   to  66  %   of  households .
One of the first major studies of the middle class  in   अमेरिका  was  श्वेत  Collar : The American Middle Classes  ,  published in 1951  by  sociologist C. Wright Wright_Mills  मिलों  Wright_Mills  .
Later  sociologists  such as Dennis  गिल्बर्ट  of Hamilton College commonly divide the middle class into  दो   sub-groups  .
Constituting roughly  15  %  to  20 % of households is the upper or  पेशेवर  middle class  consisting  of highly educated , salaried  पेशेवर  and managers  .
constituting   roughly  one  तीसरा   of   households  is the  निम्नतर  middle class  consisting   ज़्यादातर  of semi-professionals ,  skilled   कारीगरों  and lower-level management .
Middle-class persons commonly  have  a comfortable standard  of  living ,  significant  economic  सुरक्षा  , considerable work autonomy and rely on their expertise to  sustain  themselves  .
सदस्यों   of   the   मध्य  class belong to diverse groups  जिससे   ओवरलैप   साथ  each other  .
Overall  ,  middle-class  व्यक्तियों  , especially  upper-middle-class  individuals , are characterized by conceptualizing  ,  creating  और   परामर्श  .
Thus , college  शिक्षा  is  एक  of the main  indicators   of   middle-class   औकात  .
Largely attributed to  the  nature  of  middle-class occupations , middle class values tend to emphasize  स्वतंत्रता  , adherence to intrinsic standards , valuing innovation and respecting  non-conformity  .
नीतियां   अधिक  active than other demographics ,  कॉलेज  educated middle class professionals  हैं  split between the two  प्रमुख  parties  .
Income varies considerably  इससे   निकट  the national median to well in excess of  $   100,000  .
Household income  आंकड़े   ,  however ,  do  not  सदा  reflect class status and standard  of  living  ,  as they are  largely   बहकावे  by  the  number of income earners and fail to recognize household size .
It is therefore possible  लिये   a  large ,  dual-earner  ,  निम्नतर   मध्य  class household to out-earn  a  small  ,  one-earner  ,  upper  मध्य  class household .
the   मध्य  classes are very  influential  ,  as   वे  encompass  the  majority of voters ,  लेखक   ,  teachers  ,  journalists , and editors  .
Most societal  रुझान  in the US originate  भीतर  the  मध्य   वर्ग   .
The following is a  सूची  of Saturday  रात्रि  Live  डाल   सदस्यों   ,  past and present  .
The cast members of Saturday  रात्रि  Live were originally  referred  to as  the  ``  नहीं  Ready  लिये   प्रधान  Time  खिलाड़ी  '' .
The original  डाल  ( l to r ) :  laraine   न्युमैन  , John Belushi ,  जेन  Curtin , Gilda Radner  ,  Dan Aykroyd , Garrett Morris ,  और  Chevy Chase
तबाह   इससे   the  1906 San Francisco  भूकंप  , remembered as one of  the  worst  प्राकृतिक  disasters in  संयुक्त   राज्य  history
A disaster  is   a   प्राकृतिक  or man-made ( or technological )  जोखिम   resulting  in an event  of  substantial extent  causing  significant physical  क्षति  or destruction ,  घाटा  of life , or drastic  बदलें  to the environment  .
a  disaster can be  ostensively  defined  as   कोई  tragic  इवेंट   stemming  from  कार्यक्रम  such as earthquakes  ,  floods  ,  catastrophic accidents  ,   फ़ायर  , or  विस्फोट  .
It is a phenomenon  कि  can cause  क्षति  to life and property  और   नष्ट  the economic , social and cultural life  of  people .
in   समकालीन  academia , disasters  हैं   देखी  as the consequence of inappropriately managed risk .
These risks are  the   उत्पाद  of a  संयोजन   of   दोनो  hazard/s  और  vulnerability  .
Hazards that  स्ट्राइक  in areas with  कम  vulnerability will  never   become  disasters , as is the case in uninhabited regions .
Developing countries  suffer  the greatest costs when  a  disaster hits  –   अधिक  than 95 percent of all deaths caused by disasters occur in developing countries , and  नुकसान  due to  प्राकृतिक  disasters are 20 times greater ( as a percentage of  जीडीपी   )  in developing  देशों  than in  industrialized  countries .
in  computing ,  booting   (   भी  known as booting up ) is the  आरंभिक   नियत   of   परिचालन  that a computer system  performs  when  विद्युत  power to the CPU is switched  on  .
The  प्रक्रम  begins  जब  a computer is  turned  on for the  पहला   समय  or is re-energized  बाद   होने  turned  बंद   ,   और  ends when the computer is ready  to  perform its  सामान्य  operations .
On modern  सामान्य  purpose  कंप्यूटर   ,  this can  लो  tens of seconds  और   typically   involves  performing  a  power-on self-test ,  locating   और  initializing  परिधीय  devices  ,   और  then finding , loading and  starting  an operating  प्रणाली  .
Many computer systems also allow these operations to be initiated by a software command without cycling  शक्ति  , in what  is  known  as  a soft reboot , though some  of  the initial  परिचालन   might  be skipped on  a   नरम  reboot .
A boot  लोडर  is a  कंप्यूटर  program  कि  loads the  प्रमुख   ऑपरेटिंग   प्रणाली   or   runtime   पर्यावरण  for  the  computer after completion  of  the  self-tests  .
The computer term boot is short for bootstrap  or  bootstrap load and derives  इससे  the phrase to pull oneself  up  by one 's bootstraps .
The usage calls  ध्यान  to the requirement that , if  सबसे  software is loaded  onto   a   कंप्यूटर  by  अन्य  software  already   कार्यशील  on the  कंप्यूटर   ,  some mechanism  जरूर  exist to load  आरंभिक  software  onto  the computer .
जल्दी   कंप्यूटर  used a variety of  ad-hoc  methods to  मिलेंगी  a small program into memory to  solve  this problem .
The  आविष्कार   of  integrated  सर्किट   read-only  memory ( ROM  )   of  various  प्रकार   हल  this paradox by allowing computers to  be   shipped  with a start up program that  could  not be erased .
विकास  in  the  capacity of ROM has allowed  कभी  more elaborate start up  प्रक्रियाओं  to  be  implemented .
On  सामान्य  purpose computers , the boot process  begins  with the  निष्पादन  of an initial program stored in boot ROMs or  पढ़ा  in another fashion .
In  कुछ  older  कंप्यूटर   ,  the initial program might  have  been the  अनुप्रयोग  to run , if  no  operating system  थी  used , or the  ऑपरेटिंग  system .
In other computers  ,  the initial  कार्यक्रम  is a boot  लोडर  that  may  then load  into  random-access memory ( RAM ) , from nonvolatile secondary storage  (   ऐसे  as  a  hard  डिस्क  drive ) or , in some  पुरानी   कंप्यूटर  , from  a   मीडियम  such  as  punched  ताश  , punched tape  ,  or magnetic tape  in  older  कंप्यूटर   ,   the  binary code of an operating  प्रणाली   or  runtime  पर्यावरण  and  तब  execute  it   .
if  the boot loader is  सीमित  in its  आकार  and capabilities , it  may   ,  instead ,  लोड   a  larger and more  सक्षम  secondary boot loader , which would then load  the   ऑपरेटिंग   प्रणाली  or  runtime  environment .
Some embedded systems do not  आवश्यकता   a  noticeable boot sequence to begin functioning and when  turned  on may simply run  operational  programs  कि   हैं   भंडारित  in ROM .
Firebird  is  an  खोलें  source  एसक्यूएल   रिलेशनल   डेटाबेस  management system that runs on  लिनक्स   ,   खिड़कियाँ  , and  a  variety of Unix .
The  डेटाबेस   forked  from Borland 's open  सोर्स  edition  of   interbase   in   2000  , but since  firebird   1.5   the   कोड  has  महरूम  largely rewritten .
Outsourcing is  the  contracting  आउट  of an internal business process to a  third-party   संगठन   .
The practice of contracting a  कारोबार  process out to a third party rather  than  staffing it internally is  आम   in   the  modern economy .
the   पद  ``  आउटसोर्सिंग   ''   became   लोकप्रिय  in the United States near  the   फेरे  of the  21st  century .
Outsourcing  sometimes  involves transferring employees  और   एसेट   इससे   एक  firm to  another   ,   लकिन  not always  .
The definition  of  outsourcing includes both foreign  और  domestic  contracting  ,  और   sometimes  includes offshoring , which means relocating a business  फलन  to another country  .
Financial savings from lower  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   मजदूर  rates is a big motivation  लिये  outsourcing/offshoring .
The opposite of  आउटसोर्सिंग   is  called insourcing , which entails bringing processes handled by third-party firms in-house , and  is  sometimes accomplished via vertical  संयोजन   .
However  ,  a business can provide a contract  सेवा  to  another  business without necessarily insourcing that business process .
Human immunodeficiency virus  (  HIV )  is  a lentivirus ( slowly replicating  retrovirus  ) that  कल्याणकारी   acquired  immunodeficiency syndrome  (  AIDS  )  , a condition in humans in which progressive  विफलता  of the immune  प्रणाली   allows  life-threatening  opportunistic  infections and  cancers  to  thrive  .
संक्रमण  with HIV occurs by the transfer of blood , semen , vaginal  द्रव  ,  pre-ejaculate  , or breast milk .
भीतर  these bodily fluids ,  hiv  is  उपस्थित  as  दोनो  free virus particles and  वायरस  within infected immune cells  .
hiv  infects vital  कोशिकाएं  in the human  प्रतिरक्षा  system  ऐसे  as helper T cells  (  specifically  cd4   +  T  कोशिकाएं  )  ,   macrophages  , and dendritic cells  .
HIV infection  लीड   to  low levels  of  CD4+ T cells through  a  number of mechanisms including : apoptosis  of  uninfected bystander  कोशिकाएं  ,  सीधा  viral  हत्या  of infected cells , and killing of  संक्रमित  CD4+ T cells  by   cd8   cytotoxic   lymphocytes  that  recognize  infected cells .
When  cd4+  T  कोशिका  numbers decline below a critical level ,  cell-mediated  immunity is  खोया  , and the  देह  becomes progressively more susceptible to opportunistic infections  .
The firepole in a fire station in Toronto
A fireman 's pole (  भी  called  a   स्लाइडिंग   ध्रुव  or firepole  )  is a wooden pole or  a  metal  ट्यूब  or  पाइप  installed between floors  in  fire stations , allowing  अग्निशमन   responding  to an alarm to quickly descend  to   the   मैदान   मंजिल  faster than by  using  a  मानक  staircase  .
The  यंत्र  was invented in  the  1870s by David  kenyon  , in Chicago ,  इलिनोइस  , although it  is  often incorrectly  credited  to  the   बोस्टन  Fire Department .
Mary  poppins  is  the  title character of a series of children 's books  लिखा   by  P. L. Travers .
Throughout the Mary  poppins   श्रेणी   ,   जिससे   lasted  from  1934  to 1988 ,  मरियम  Shepard was the illustrator and  acted   as  a second author  .
The books centre on a magical English nanny , Mary Poppins .
She is blown by the  ईस्ट  wind to Number Seventeen  चेरी   पेड़  Lane  ,  London , and into the Banks ' household  to  care for  उनके  children .
Encounters with chimney sweeps  ,   दुकानदारों   और   विभिन्न  adventures  follow  until Mary Poppins abruptly  पत्ते   ,  i.e. , `` pops-out '' .
the  adventures  लो  place over a total of eight books .
However  ,  only the first three  किताबे  feature Mary Poppins arriving  और  leaving .
The  बाद  five books recount previously unrecorded adventures  इससे  her original three  विज़िट   .
as  P. L. Travers explains  in   उसके   परिचय  to Mary Poppins in  the  Park  ,  `` She can  नहीं  forever arrive  और  depart . ''
The books  यहूद  adapted  in  1964 into a  musical   डिज़्नी  film starring Julie Andrews and Dick Van  dyke  .
In 2004 , Disney  नाट्य  produced a stage musical adaptation in the West End theatre  .
The stage musical was  transferred  to Broadway in 2006  जहाँ  it ran until  इसके   closing  on March 3 , 2013  .
It has been  अत्यधिक  successful  ,  as was the  1964   फिल्मी  .
The Last Song is a 2010 American coming of age  टीन   रोमांटिक  drama  फिल्मी  developed alongside Nicholas Sparks ' novel by the  वही  name  .
the   फिल्मी  was  निर्देशित  by Julie Anne  रॉबिन्सन  in her  विशेषता  film directorial debut and co-written by  स्पार्क्स   और   जेफ़  Van Wie  .
the  Last Song  सितारों  Miley Cyrus ,  लियाम  Hemsworth , and Greg Kinnear and follows a  troubled  teenager as she reconnects with her estranged  पिता   और  falls in  प्रेम  during a  गर्मियाँ   in  a quiet  दक्षिणी  United States beach town  .
The  फिल्मी  is distributed  by  Touchstone  तस्वीरें  .
स्पार्क्स  was  approached   to  write both the film 's screenplay and  the  novel .
Sparks completed  the   पटकथा  in  जनवरी   2009  , prior to the  पूर्णता   of  the novel  ,  making The Last Song his first script to be optioned for film  .
the  setting  ,  originally in North Carolina  जैसे  the  अनोखा  , moved  to  Georgia after the states had campaigned for months to host production  .
upon  beginning production in Tybee Island , Georgia and nearby Savannah , The  पिछला   सोंग   became  the first movie  to  be both shot and  नियत  in Tybee Island .
Filming lasted from  जून   15  to August  18  , 2009  साथ  much  of  it  occurring  on the island 's  बीच  and pier .
The Last  सोंग  was originally scheduled for  चौड़ी   रिलीज  on January  8   ,  2010  ,  but was postponed to  कूच  31 , 2010 .
Written  simlish
simlish   is   a  fictional language featured  in   ea  Games ' Sim  श्रेणी   of  games  .
It  debuted  in SimCopter  ,   और  has been  विशेषकर   prominent   in  The Sims  ,  The Sims  2  and The Sims 3 .
The Sims  विकास  team created the unique Simlish language by experimenting  साथ  fractured Ukrainian , French ,  लैटिन  , Finnish  ,  English , Fijian  ,  Cebuano ,  और  Tagalog  .
Simlish can also be heard in SimCity 4  ,  SimCity  समाजों  and SimCity 2013 , but far  कम   अक्सर  .
Civilized Creatures in  spore   can  also be taught to speak Simlish .
It is also featured to an extent  in   firaxis   खेल  '  सिड  Meier  's  SimGolf .
Designer Will Wright was  सचेत   of   the  need for dialogue in the  खेल   ,  but thought that using a real language would make  it  sound  too   दोहराए  and would also be  too  costly to hire translators for  संसार  languages .
Initially ,  प्रेरित  by the Native American code  talkers  of World  युद्ध  II  ,  Sims  निर्माता  Will Wright and language  विशेषज्ञ  Marc Gimbel suggested experimenting  साथ  the Navajo language  to  create  simlish   .
however  , they ultimately  decided  that Simlish worked best as  a  `` language '' made  up   of  gibberish  शब्द  that  could   n't  be translated , so  कि   इसके  meaning would be left open to  the  imagination of  the  player .
Wright later  commented  that using  ``  nonsense language ''  turned   आउट   to   be   the  right  विकास   चुनाव  , as people were capable of  imagining  it more  realistically   than  a computer could  सिमुलेट  a real  एक  .
The actual  ध्वनि  of Simlish was  निर्मित  improvisationally by voice actors  स्टीफन  Kearin  और   gerri  Lawlor  .
An  उदाहरण  of  अल्ट्रासोनिक   परीक्षण  ( UT  )   on  blade roots of a  v2500  IAE aircraft  इंजन  .
Step 1 : The UT  जांच   is   लगाई   on   the   रूट   of  the blades to be  inspected   साथ  the help of  a   खास   borescope  tool ( video probe ) .
Step 2  :  Instrument  जमावट  are  इनपुट  .
Step 3 : The probe  is  scanned over the blade root  .
In  इस  case , an indication ( peak in the  आंकड़ा   )  through the red line  (   or   फाटक  )  indicates  a  शुभ   ब्लेड  ; an indication to the left  of  that range indicates a  क्रैक  .
Principle of ultrasonic testing .
LEFT  :  A probe sends  a  sound  वेव  into a test material .
There  हैं  two  indications   ,  one  इससे  the  आरंभिक  pulse of the probe  ,  and  the  second due to the back wall echo .
RIGHT : A defect creates a third indication and  simultaneously  reduces the amplitude of the back  वॉल  indication  .
The depth  of  the  defect  is  संकल्पित  by the ratio D/E
in   अल्ट्रासोनिक   परीक्षण  ( UT ) , very short ultrasonic pulse-waves with  बीच  frequencies  ranging  from  0.1-15  MHz  और  occasionally  up  to 50 MHz are launched into  सामग्री   to  detect  आतंरिक  flaws or to  characterize   सामग्री   .
A  आम   उदाहरण  is  अल्ट्रासोनिक  thickness measurement , which tests the thickness  of  the test object  ,  for example , to monitor pipework  संक्षारण   .
Ultrasonic  परीक्षण   is  often performed on steel and other metals  और   alloys   ,  though it  can  also  be   प्रयुक्त  on concrete , wood and  composites  , albeit  साथ  less resolution  .
it  is a form of non-destructive testing used in many industries including  aerospace   ,   ऑटोमोटिव  and other transportation sectors  .
the   vas  deferens ( plural : vasa  deferentia   )  ,  भी  called ductus deferens  (  Latin : `` carrying-away  पोत  '' ; plural  :  ductus deferentes )  ,  is  भाग  of the  पुरूष  anatomy of many vertebrates  ;  they  हस्तांतरण  sperm from the  epididymis  in anticipation of ejaculation .
Vascular ischemia of the  toes  with characteristic  cyanosis  .
in  medicine ,  ischemia   ,  also spelled  as  ischaemia  or  ischæmia  ,  ( ; from  यूनानी  language ισχαιμία , ischaimía ; isch-  रूट   denoting  a restriction or  thinning   or  to  मेक  or grow thin/lean  ,  haema blood  )  is  a  restriction in  रक्त  supply to tissues  ,   causing  a  shortage  of oxygen  और   ग्लूकोज  needed  लिये   सेल्यूलर  metabolism  (  to keep  ऊतक   जिंदा   )   .
Ischemia is generally caused by  समस्याएं  with blood vessels , with  resultant  damage to or  dysfunction  of tissue .
it  also  अर्थात्  local anemia in  a  given part  of  a body sometimes resulting from congestion  (   ऐसे  as vasoconstriction  ,  thrombosis  or  embolism  )  .
Down syndrome (  ds   )   or   bas   's   सिंड्रोम  ,  भी   ज्ञात  as  trisomy   21  , is a  जेनेटिक  disorder caused by  the  presence  of  all or  भाग  of a third  नक़ल  of chromosome 21  .
Down syndrome is the most common  chromosome  abnormality in  इंसानो  .
It is typically associated with a  विलंब  in cognitive  क्षमता   (  mental retardation ,  or  MR ) and physical growth , and a  particular   नियत  of facial  विशेषताएँ   .
The average  iq   of  young  वयस्कों  with  bas  syndrome is  around  50 , whereas young  वयस्कों   बगैर  the condition typically have an IQ of 100 .
(  MR has  historically  been defined as an  iq  below 70 . )
a  large proportion of individuals  साथ  Down syndrome  have  a  कठोर  degree  of  intellectual disability .
Down  सिंड्रोम  is  नामित   बाद  John Langdon Down , the British physician who described the syndrome in 1866 .
The  कंडीशन  was clinically  वर्णित   पहले  by  जां  Etienne Dominique Esquirol in 1838 and Edouard Seguin  in   1844  .
bas   सिंड्रोम  was  पहचाना  as a chromosome 21 trisomy by Dr. Jérôme Lejeune  in  1959 .
Down  सिंड्रोम  can  be  identified  in  a  baby  at birth or before birth  by  prenatal screening .
Pregnancies with this diagnosis  हैं   प्रायः   terminated  .
The  सीडीसी   estimates  that about one  of  every 691 babies born  in   the  United States  प्रत्येक  year  is   born  with Down  सिंड्रोम  .
Many children  साथ  Down syndrome are educated in regular school classes while others require specialised educational facilities .
Some  children  graduate from high school  ,   और  , in the US  ,   वहीँ  are increasing  अवसर  for participating  in   post-secondary   शिक्षा  .
Education and proper care has been  दिखाया  to  improve  quality of  जीवन   significantly   .
Many adults  साथ   bas   सिंड्रोम  are  समर्थ  to work at  सशुल्क   नियुक्ति   in   the  community ,  जबकि  others require a more sheltered  कार्य  environment  .
Hot flashes (  भी  known as hot  flushes  ,  or  night sweats if  वे  happen at  रात्रि  ) are a symptom which  may  have  अनेक  other  कल्याणकारी  , but which  is  often caused by  the  changing hormone levels  कि   हैं  characteristic  of  menopause  .
the  Servicemen 's  readjustment   अधिनियम  of  1944   (  P.L . 78-346 , 58  स्टेट   .  284m )  ,  known  informally  as  the  G.I . Bill , was a law that provided a range of benefits for returning World War II veterans (  commonly   referred  to  as   g.i.s  ) .
लाभ  included low-cost  mortgages   ,   low-interest  loans to start a business  or   फार्म  ,  नकदी   भुगतान  of  ट्यूशन  and living expenses  to   attend  college ,  ऊँची   स्कूल   or  vocational  शिक्षा  ,  as  well as one  साल   of  unemployment compensation .
it   थी  available  to  every veteran who had been on active  ड्यूटी  during the war years  लिये  at least  नब्बे  days  और  had not been dishonorably discharged ;  कॉम्बैट  was not required .
By  the  end  of  the  कार्यक्रम   in   1956  ,  roughly  2.2  लाख  veterans had used  the  G.I . Bill education benefits in  अनुक्रम  to attend colleges or universities  ,  and  an  additional 6.6  लाख  used these benefits for some kind of training  कार्यक्रम   .
Since the original 1944 law  ,  the term has  आइये  to include other  दिग्गज  benefit  कार्यक्रम  created to  assist  veterans of subsequent wars as well as peacetime service .
इतिहासकारों  and economists consider  the  G.I . Bill a major political success—especially in contrast  to  the treatments  of  World  युद्ध  I veterans—and  a  major  योगदान  to  अमेरिका  's  भण्डार   of  human capital that sped  long-term  economic growth .
the   वाटरगेट  scandal was a political  कांड  that occurred in  the  United States in the  1970s  as a  परिणाम   of  the June  17  , 1972 break-in at the Democratic  नेशनल  Committee headquarters  at  the Watergate office complex  in  Washington , D.C.  ,  and the Nixon administration 's attempted cover-up of its involvement  .
the  scandal  आखिरकार  led  to   the  resignation  of  Richard Nixon ,  the   अध्यक्ष   of  the United  राज्य  , on August 9 ,  1974  — the only resignation of  a  U.S. President .
The scandal  भी  resulted in the indictment , trial  ,   conviction  , and incarceration of forty-three persons , dozens  of  whom were Nixon 's top  प्रशासन  officials  .
the  affair  began  with the arrest of five men  लिये  breaking and entering  into   the  Democratic National  कमेटी   (  DNC )  मुख्यालय   at  the Watergate complex on June 17 ,  1972  .
the   संघीय  Bureau of  छानबीन  ( FBI ) connected cash  मिला  on the burglars to  a  slush  निधि   प्रयुक्त  by  the  Committee  लिये  the  re-election  of  the  President  ,  the  आधिकारिक  organization of Nixon 's campaign .
In  जुलाई   1973  , as evidence mounted against the president 's  स्टाफ  , including testimony provided by  पूर्व  staff members  in  an  छानबीन  conducted by the  सीनेट  Watergate Committee  ,  it  थी   नाज़िल   कि  President Nixon  था  a tape-recording system  in   उसके   कार्यालयों   और  he  था  recorded  अनेक   बातचीत  .
रिकार्डिंग  from these tapes  implicated  the president ,  revealing  he had attempted to cover up the questionable ( and illegal ) goings-on that had  लिया  place during  उसके  administration , both before and  बाद   the  break-in .
बाद  a protracted series of bitter court  लड़ाइयों  , the U.S.  परम्   अदालत   unanimously  ruled  कि   the  president had to hand over  the   टेपों   to  government investigators ; he  ultimately  complied  .
Facing near-certain impeachment in the House  of  Representatives  और  a strong possibility of  a   conviction   in  the Senate , Nixon resigned the presidency  on  August 9 , 1974 .
उसके   successor  ,  जेराल्ड   घाट   ,  then issued a pardon  to  him .
एलिज़ाबेथ  Imogene Webber  (  formerly Lansing  और  Spencer ) is a  fictional  character  on  the ABC  दिन  soap  ओपेरा  General  हॉस्पिटल  .
Elizabeth is the  पोती  of  dr.  Steve Hardy  (  John  beradino  ) ,  एक  of  the  originating core characters of the series .
Rebecca Herbst  originated  the character on August 1 , 1997 and has been the only  अनुबंध  actress to  खेल  the role .
एलिज़ाबेथ   is   भाग  of two supercouple pairings , Lucky Spencer  और  Elizabeth  webber  and Jason Morgan and Elizabeth  webber  .
the  United States  प्रेसिडेंसी  of Ronald Reagan ,  भी  known  as   the  Reagan administration ,  थी  a  रिपब्लिकन  administration headed by  रोनाल्ड  Reagan  इससे   जनवरी  20 , 1981 , to  जनवरी  20  ,   1989  .
Domestically , the administration  favored  reducing government  कार्यक्रम   और  introduced the largest  across-the-board   कर  cuts in American history .
The economic policies enacted  in   1981  , known  as  `` Reaganomics `` , were an example  of  supply-side economics  .
Reagan aimed  to  encourage entrepreneurship and limit  the   विकास  of  सोशल  spending , as well  as   the  reduction of  विनियमन   और  inflation  .
Economic  विकास  saw a  दमदार   रिकवरी   in  the  1980s  , helping Reagan to  जीत  a  भूस्खलन   re-election   .
The national debt increased  significantly  ,  however  .
regarding  foreign policy , the administration was  steadfastly  anti-communist  ,  calling the Soviet Union an ``  दुष्ट  empire `` and ending 1970s  détente  .
reagan   त्वरित  the massive buildup  of  the military started by his predecessor  ,  including an invasion of Grenada  ,   the  first  प्रमुख   विदेशी  action by U.S. troops since the end  of  the Vietnam War .
The  ``   reagan   doctrine  `` controversially granted aid  to  paramilitary forces  seeking  to overthrow  कम्युनिस्ट   सरकारें  , particularly in war-torn Central America and Afghanistan  .
Reagan also promoted new technologies  ऐसे  as  मिसाइल  defense  प्रणालियों   in   अनुक्रम  to confront  the   soviets  and their  allies  .
In  कूटनीति   ,  Reagan forged  a   दमदार  alliance with UK Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher , and he met  साथ  Soviet General Secretary Mikhail  गोर्बाचेव  four  टाइम्स  , aiming to shrink  the  superpowers ' nuclear  arsenals  .
Reagan 's  प्रेसिडेंसी  has  महरूम   termed   the  `` Reagan Revolution '' ,  or  the  आयु  of Reagan  in  recognition  of   the  political  realignment   दोनो  within and beyond the  u.S.   in  favor of his brand of  कोसा  and his faith in  फ़्री  markets .
The Reagan  प्रशासन   worked  toward  the   पतन   of  Soviet Communism ,  और  it did collapse just as  he   बाएँ   दफ्तर  .
Victory in the  ठंडा   युद्ध  led to a unipolar world with  the   u.S.   as  the world  's   एकमात्र  superpower  .
While the damaging Iran-Contra affair engulfed  अनेक   reagan  aides during his second term , Reagan himself left office with a 63 percent  स्वीकृति   दरजा  , one  of  the higher approval ratings  of  departing presidents .
After years  of   unstinting  praise from the right , and unrelenting criticism from  the  left , historian David  हेनरी  finds that by 2009 a consensus had emerged among  विद्वानों  that Reagan  revived  conservatism and  turned   the   स्वदेश  to the right by demonstrating a ``  pragmatic  conservatism '' that promoted ideology  भीतर  the constraints  imposed  by  the  divided political system .
Furthermore , says Henry , the consensus viewpoint agrees that he  revived  faith in the  प्रेसिडेंसी  and American self-confidence ,  और  contributed  critically   to  ending the Cold  युद्ध   .
Crude death rate by country  (   2006   )  .
Mortality rate is  a   माप  of  the  number of deaths ( in  सामान्य  , or  due   to  a specific  कारण  ) in a population .
Scaled to the size  of   कि  population ,  प्रति   ईकाई  of time .
Mortality rate  is  typically expressed in units  of  deaths  प्रति  1000 individuals  प्रति   साल  ; thus , a mortality  रेट   of  9.5 ( out of 1000 )  in  a population of  1,000  would mean  9.5  deaths per year in that  संपूर्ण   जनसांख्यिकी  ,  or  0.95 %  आउट  of  the  total .
it   is  distinct from morbidity rate , which  refers  to the number  of  individuals in  ग़रीब  health  दौरान  a  दिए   समय   काल  ( the prevalence rate  )  or  the  number of newly appearing cases  of   the  disease  प्रति  unit of  समय  ( incidence rate ) .
The term `` mortality  ``  is also sometimes inappropriately  प्रयुक्त  to refer to the number  of   मौतों  among a set of  diagnosed  hospital  मामले   लिये  a disease or injury , rather  than   लिये  the general population of a country  or   जातीय   समूह  .
इस   बीमारी   मृत्यु  statistic is more precisely referred  to   as  `` case  fatality  rate `` ( CFR  )  .
One distinguishes:
The  crude  death rate  ,   the   कुल   क्रमांक  of deaths per  साल  per  1000  people .
the  crude death rate for the  पूरे  world is about 8.37 per 1000 per  साल  according to the  वर्तमान  CIA World Factbook  .
The perinatal  मृत्यु  rate , the  योग   of   neonatal  deaths  और  fetal deaths ( stillbirths ) per 1000  births   .
the  maternal  मृत्यु  ratio , the  क्रमांक   of   मातृ  deaths per 100,000 live  births  in same  समय  period  .
the  maternal mortality rate  ,  the number of maternal  मौतों   प्रति  1,000  महिलाओं   of   reproductive   आयु  in the  जनसांख्यिकी  (  generally   पारिभाषित   as  15–44  सालो  of age  )  .
the   शिशु  mortality rate , the number of deaths of children less  than  1  साल  old per 1000  सजीव  births .
The  चाइल्ड   मृत्यु   रेट  , the number of deaths of children less than 5  सालो  old per  1000  live births .
The standardised mortality  अनुपात  (  smr   )  - This represents a proportional  तुलना  to  the   संख्याएँ  of deaths that would have  महरूम  expected  if   the  population had  महरूम  of a  मानक  composition in  शर्तें  of age , gender , etc .
The  age-specific  mortality rate  (  ASMR ) -  इस  refers  to   the  total number  of  deaths per year per  1000  people  of  a given age  (   e.g  .  आयु  62 last birthday  )  .
In regard to the or  विफलता  of medical  उपचार  or procedures ,  एक  would  भी  distinguish:
The early mortality rate , the  कुल   क्रमांक  of deaths in the  जल्दी  stages of  an  ongoing treatment , or in the  काल  immediately following an  उपचार   .
The late mortality rate  ,   the   कुल  number  of  deaths in  the  late stages of  an  ongoing treatment ,  or  a significant length  of  time  बाद   an   अधि  treatment .
Note  कि  the crude death rate  as   पारिभाषित  above  और  applied to a  पूरे  population can give a  भ्रामक  impression .
The crude death  रेट  depends  on   the   आयु  ( and  लिंग  )  विशिष्ट  mortality rates and the  आयु  (  और  gender ) distribution of  the  population .
The number of deaths per 1000  लोगों   can   be  higher for  विकसित   राष्ट्र  than in less-developed  देशों  , despite life expectancy being higher  in  developed countries due  to   मानकों  of health being better .
इस  happens  क्युकी  developed  देशों   typically  have  a  completely different  जनसांख्यिकी   आयु   वितरण  ,  साथ   a  much  उच्चतर  proportion of  पुरानी   लोगों  ,  due  to both lower recent birth rates and lower  मृत्यु  rates .
a  more complete  चित्र  of mortality is given by a  जीवन   तालिका   जिससे  shows the mortality rate separately for each  आयु  .
A life  तालिका  is necessary to  दे  a good estimate  of  life expectancy .
An  otoacoustic   उत्सर्जन   (  OAE ) is a sound which  is  generated from within the  भीतरी  ear  .
Having  महरूम   पूर्वानुमानित  by  थामस  Gold  in   1948  , its  अस्तित्व  was  पहला  demonstrated  experimentally   by  David Kemp  in  1978 and otoacoustic emissions have since been shown to arise by  a   क्रमांक  of different  सेल्यूलर  mechanisms  भीतर  the  भीतरी   कान  .
अध्ययन  have shown that OAEs disappear  बाद  the inner  कान   रै  been damaged ,  so  OAEs  हैं  often  प्रयुक्त  in  the  laboratory and the clinic as a measure  of   भीतरी  ear  स्वास्थ्य  .
Broadly speaking  ,  there are two  प्रकार   of  otoacoustic emissions  :  spontaneous otoacoustic  emissions  ( SOAEs )  ,   जिससे  can  occur   बगैर   बाह्य  stimulation  ,  and evoked otoacoustic emissions (  eoaes   )  , which require an evoking  stimulus  .
Hurricane Tomas was the nineteenth named storm and  बारहवीं  hurricane  of  the 2010 Atlantic  hurricane  season  .
टॉमस  developed from  a  tropical wave east of the Windward  आइलैंड्स  on October 29 .
Quickly intensifying into a hurricane ,  it  moved through the Windward Islands and passed very near Saint Lucia .
After reaching Category 2 status on the  saffir-simpson   स्केल   ,   टॉमस  quickly weakened  to   a  tropical storm  in   the  central Caribbean Sea  ,  due to strong wind shear and  शुष्क  air .
टॉमस  later  regained  hurricane status as it reorganized near the Windward  ड्योढ़ी   .
throughout  the hurricane 's path , 71 people  हैं   ज्ञात  to have been  मारे   ,  14 of whom were in  संत  Lucia .
Monetary losses throughout the Windward Islands were estimated  at   us  $ 588 million ,  मुख्यतः   in   संत   लूसिया  .
In the wake of the storm in Haiti , flooding intensified an ongoing cholera  outbreak  indirectly causing more  fatalities  .
According to a report released in December  2010  , 55  लोगों  were  मारे  in Cuba and Hispanola , though the  वितरण  of  ये  fatalities are unknown .
Overall  क्षति  from  the  storm was at least  $  741 million .
Victoria Jackson  (   born  August 2 , 1959 ) is an American comedian , actress , satirist , singer and internet blogger best  ज्ञात  as a cast  सदस्य   of  the NBC television sketch comedy series Saturday Night Live ( SNL  )  from 1986 to  1992   .
She has received attention as  a  vocal  आलोचक  of President  बराक   ओबामा  , and  is  an active participant in  the  Tea Party  गति  .
Postmodern literature  is  literature characterized  by  heavy reliance on techniques like fragmentation , paradox ,  और  questionable narrators  ,  and is often (  हालांकि   नहीं   exclusively  )  पारिभाषित   as  a style or trend which emerged in the  post–world  War II era .
Postmodern works are seen as a reaction against Enlightenment thinking and Modernist approaches  to  literature  .
postmodern   साहित्य  , like postmodernism as a whole  ,  tends to resist definition or classification as  a   ``  movement '' .
बेशक  , the convergence of postmodern  साहित्य  with various modes of critical theory , particularly reader-response and deconstructionist approaches ,  और  the subversions of the implicit  अनुबंध   between  author ,  टेक्स्ट  and reader by  जिससे   इसके  works are often characterised ,  have  led to pre-modern fictions such as Cervantes '  डॉन  Quixote ( 1605,1615  )  and Laurence Sterne  's   eighteenth-century  satire Tristram  shandy  being retrospectively inducted into  the   मोड़ें   .
While there is  छोटी   सर्वसम्मति  on the  precise  characteristics , scope ,  और   महत्व  of postmodern literature , as is often the  मामला  with  कलाकारी   आंदोलनों   ,   postmodern  literature is  commonly  defined  in  relation to a  precursor  .
For example ,  a  postmodern literary work tends  नहीं  to conclude with the neatly tied-up ending as  is   प्रायः   मिला  in modernist literature ,  लकिन   प्रायः  parodies  it  .
postmodern  authors tend to  celebrate  chance over craft , and further employ metafiction to undermine  the  writer 's authority  .
Another  characteristic  of postmodern literature is the questioning of distinctions  between  high  और  low  संस्कृति   through   the   उपयोग  of pastiche ,  the  combination of subjects  और   जाति  not previously  deemed   अनुरूप  for  साहित्य  .
Enigma is  an  electronic musical  प्रोजेक्ट  founded in  जर्मनी  by Michael Cretu ,  दाउद  Fairstein and  फ़्रैंक  Peterson in 1990  .
the  Romanian-born Cretu conceived  the  Enigma project while working  in  Germany , but based his recording studio A.R.T . Studios  in  Ibiza , Spain , from the early 1990s  जबतक   may  2009  ,  where he has recorded  सब  of Enigma 's studio  रिलीज   to  date .
Cretu  is  both the composer and the producer  of  the  प्रोजेक्ट   .
His  पूर्व   बीवी  ,  पॉप   सिंगर   सैंड्रा   ,   प्रायः  provided  vocals  on Enigma  ट्रैक्स   .
Jens Gad co-arranged and  निभाई  guitar on three of the Enigma  एल्बम  .
Peter  कॉर्नेलियस  also contributed  to  Enigma  दौरान  the 1990s  .
Seven studio albums  have   महरूम  produced  अंतर्गत  the name of the project .
Scooby-Doo  is   an  American animated  कार्टून  franchise , comprising several  एनिमेटेड  television series produced from 1969  to   the  present day .
The  असली   श्रेणी   ,   scooby-doo  , Where Are You  !
,  थी  created for Hanna-Barbera  प्रोडक्शन्स  by writers Joe Ruby and  केन  Spears  in  1969  .
This Saturday  morning  cartoon series featured four teenagers— Fred  जोन्स  , Daphne Blake , Velma Dinkley , and Norville  ``  Shaggy '' Rogers — and their talking  भूरा  Great Dane dog named  scooby-doo  ,  जो  solve mysteries  involving  supposedly  अलौकिक  creatures through a series  of  antics and  missteps  .
following   the  success  of  the  असली   श्रेणी  ,  hanna-barbera  and  इसके   successor  Warner  ब्रदर्स   .  Animation have produced  numerous  follow-up and spin-off animated  श्रेणी  and several related works ,  सहित   टेलीविज़न   specials   और  telefilms , a line of  direct-to-video   films  , and two  warner  Bros. –produced theatrical  विशेषता  films .
Some  संस्करण   of   scooby-doo  feature  अलग  variations on the show  's   अलौकिक   थीम  ,  और  include characters such  as  Scooby  's  cousin Scooby-Dum and nephew Scrappy-Doo  in  addition to or instead of  कुछ  of the  असली  characters .
Scooby-Doo  थी  originally broadcast on CBS from  1969  to 1976 , when it moved  to  ABC .
ABC aired the show until canceling it in 1986 , and presented  a   spin-off  featuring  the  characters as  children  ,  a  Pup Named Scooby-Doo , from 1988 until 1991 .
Two  नई  Scooby-Doo series , What 's New  ,  Scooby-Doo ?
and Shaggy and Scooby-Doo  मिलेंगी   a  a  सुराग  !  ]  ] , aired as part of Kids  wb  on The WB network and its successor , The CW network , from 2002 until 2008  .
the   सबसे  recent Scooby-Doo series , Scooby-Doo !
रहस्य  Incorporated  ,   aired  on  कार्टून   संजाल   इससे   2010   to   2013  .
Repeats of  the  various Scooby-Doo series are  ब्रॉडकास्ट   अक्सर  on Cartoon Network  और   boomerang  in  the  United States and other countries .
Call  of  Duty is a  first-person  and third-person shooter  computer/  video game  मताधिकार  .
The series  began  on the PC , and later expanded to consoles  और   handhelds  .
अनेक   spin-off  games have also been  released   .
The earlier games in the  श्रेणी  are set primarily in World War II  ,  this  शामिल  : Call  of  Duty ,  कॉल  of Duty 2 , and Call of  ड्यूटी   3   .
Beginning with Modern Warfare ,  जिससे  is set  in  modern times  ,  the series has shifted focus away  इससे  World  युद्ध   ii  .
Call  of   ड्यूटी  4  :   आधुनिक  Warfare  (  released November 2007 )  थी  followed  by  Call of Duty : World  at   युद्ध   और  Call  of  Duty :  आधुनिक   warfare  2 .
ब्लैक  Ops ( released November 2010  )  takes place  in   the   ठंडा   युद्ध  , while  आधुनिक  Warfare 3 ( released  नवम्बर   2011  )  takes   प्लेस   in  the near-future setting .
Black Ops  2  (  released   नवम्बर  13 ,  2012  ) takes place in the year 2025  .
The Call of  ड्यूटी  games are published and owned  by  Activision with Aspyr Media publishing it for  ठहराना  OS  x   .
While  the   स्टुडियो  Infinity Ward  primarily  still develops them , Treyarch has also developed several  of  the titles with the  रिलीज  of the studios ' games interlaced  साथ   प्रत्येक   अन्य  .
Some games have  महरूम  developed by Gray  पदार्थ  Interactive  ,  Spark Unlimited  ,   विस्मित  Entertainment  ,   n-space  , Rebellion Developments , Ideaworks Game  स्टुडियो   ,  Sledgehammer Games and nStigate Games .
The games use a  किस्में  of engines , including the  id  Tech 3 , the Treyarch  ngl  , and the IW 5.0  .
Other products in the franchise include a line  of  action figures designed by Plan-B Toys ,  a   कार्ड  game created by Upper Deck ,  और   a   कॉमिक  book mini-series published  by   wildstorm  .
as  of November  11  ,  2011   ,  the Call Of Duty  श्रेणी  have sold  over   100   लाख   नक़ल  .
As of March 31 , 2012 there  हैं  40  लाख   मासिक  active players across all of  the   कॉल  of Duty  शीर्षक  , with 10  लाख  Call of Duty  :  Elite  उपयोक्ता  and 2 million  paying  annual members .
Over 1.6  अरब  hours  of   ऑनलाइन  gameplay  have  been logged Modern Warfare  3   चूंकि  its 2011 release .
The  एस्टेट  tax in the United States  is  a tax imposed on the  ट्रांसफ़र  of the ``  taxable  estate ``  of  a deceased  व्यक्ति  ,  whether   ऐसे  property is transferred  via  a  होगा   ,   according   to  the state laws of intestacy or  वरना  made as an incident of the  मौत  of  the  owner , such as  a   ट्रांसफ़र  of property from  an   intestate   एस्टेट   or  trust , or the  भुगतान   of  certain life  बीमे  benefits or  वित्तीय  account  रकम   to  beneficiaries .
The  एस्टेट   कर  is one part  of  the  एकीकृत  Gift and Estate Tax system in the United States .
The  अन्य  part of the system , the gift tax , imposes a tax on  हस्तांतरण  of property during a person 's life ; the gift tax  रोकता  avoidance of the estate tax  चाहिए   a  person  want  to give away  his/her  estate  .
in  addition  to   the   संघीय   सरकारी  , many states also impose an estate  कर  , with the state version called either  an  estate tax or an inheritance tax .
प्रतिद्वंद्वियों   of  the estate  कर   कॉल   it  the `` death  कर  '' .
If an asset is left  to   a  spouse or  a  Federally  पहचाना  charity ,  the   कर  usually  करता   नहीं   लागू   .
In addition  ,  up to $  5,250,000  can  be  given by  an   व्यक्तिगत   ,   पहले  and/or upon their death ,  बगैर   रूष्ट  federal gift or estate taxes  .
Gavin McGregor Rossdale  (   born   30  October 1967  )  is an English actor and  संगीतकार   ,  known as  the  lead singer and rhythm  guitarist  of the  चट्टान   बैंड  Bush .
Following Bush 's  विरह  in  2002  , which lasted for eight years ,  he  was the  सीसे   सिंगर  and guitarist  लिये  Institute , and  बाद   began   a  solo  करियर   .
When performing solo , Gavin  plays  songs from his extensive  musical   पुस्तकालयों   .
Rossdale  रै   महरूम  ranked in the Top  100  Heavy Metal Vocalists by Hit Parader  (   #  75 )  .
Raffaello Sanzio da  urbino  (  अप्रैल   6  or March 28 , 1483 – April  6  ,  1520  ) ,  बेहतर  known simply as Raphael , was an Italian painter  और  architect  of   the  High  पुनर्जागरण  .
His work  is   admired  for its clarity  of   रूप  and ease of  संयोजन  and for its visual achievement of the  neoplatonic  ideal of human grandeur .
Together with Michelangelo and Leonardo da Vinci  ,  he forms  the  traditional trinity of great masters of that  काल  .
Raphael was enormously productive , running  an  unusually large workshop , and  despite  his death  at  37  ,   a  large body of his work remains .
Many of his works are found in the Vatican Palace , where the  frescoed  Raphael Rooms  यहूद   the  central ,  और  the largest , work of his career  .
The best known work is The  स्कूल  of Athens in the  वेटिकन  Stanza della  segnatura  .
बाद   उसके  early  सालो  in Rome much of his work was self-designed  ,  but for  the  most part  चलाया   by  the workshop from his  drawings   ,   साथ   considerable   घाटा  of quality .
He  थी  extremely  influential  in his  आजीवन  ,  हालांकि  outside Rome his work was mostly  ज्ञात  from  उसके  collaborative printmaking .
बाद  his death ,  the  influence of  उसके  great rival Michelangelo was  अधिक   फैली  until the 18th and 19th centuries , when Raphael 's more serene and harmonious  qualities  were again regarded as  the   उच्चतम  models  .
His career  जलप्रपात  naturally into three phases and  तीन  styles , first described by  giorgio  Vasari  :  his early years in Umbria , then a period of about four years (  इससे  1504–1508  )  absorbing  the  artistic traditions of Florence , followed  by  his last hectic  और  triumphant  बारह  years in Rome  ,  working for two Popes and their close associates .
Julia Fiona  रॉबर्ट्स   (  born October 28 ,  1967  ) is an American  अभिनेत्री   .
She became  a  Hollywood star after headlining  the  romantic comedy Pretty Woman (  1990  )  ,  which  grossed  $ 464  लाख  worldwide  .
बाद  receiving Golden Globe  पुरस्कार   और   अकादमी  Award  nominations  for  स्टील   magnolias  ( 1989 ) and Pretty Woman ,  वो   जीती   the  Academy Award  लिये  Best  अभिनेत्री   लिये  her  प्रदर्शन  in  एरिन  Brockovich  (  2000  )   .
Her films The Pelican Brief  (  1993 ) , My  बेहतरीन   dost   's   विवाह   (  1997 ) , Mystic Pizza  (   1988  )  ,   नॉटिंग  Hill ( 1999  )   ,  Runaway Bride ( 1999  )  ,  समंदर  's  ग्यारह  ( 2001 )  ,   समंदर  's  बारह  ( 2004 ) , Charlie Wilson  's  War ( 2007 ) , Valentine 's Day ( 2010 ) , Eat Pray  प्रेम  ( 2010 ) , and Mirror  दर्पण  ( 2012 ) have collectively brought  बक्सा   दफ्तर   रसीदें  of over  $   2.6  billion  ,   बनाना   उसके   एक   of  the most successful actresses in  शर्तें  of box office receipts .
रॉबर्ट्स   था  become  एक   of   the  highest-paid actresses  in   the  world , topping The Hollywood Reporters annual ``  शक्ति  list '' of top-earning female stars from 2005 to 2006 .
उसके  fee  लिये   1990  's  pretty   स्त्री  was $  300,000  ; in  2003  , she was paid an unprecedented $ 25 million  लिये  her role in Mona  लिसा   मुस्कान   (  2003 ) .
As of  2010  ,  रॉबर्ट्स   's  net worth was estimated to be  $  140  लाख  .
Roberts has been named one of People magazine  's  `` 50 Most Beautiful People in the World '' eleven times , tied  साथ  Halle Berry  .
In 2011 , she was named  एक   of  the  ``  100 Hottest  महिलाओं  of All-Time '' by Men 's  स्वास्थ्य   .
in   2001   ,  Ladies Home Journal ranked her as the 11th most  शक्तिशाली  woman in the  संयुक्त  States  .
Mark  इलियट   zuckerberg   (  born  may  14 , 1984 )  is  an American computer programmer and Internet entrepreneur .
He is  बेहतरीन  known as one  of  five  co-founders   of  the social networking  जालस्थल  Facebook .
As  of  April 2013 ,  zuckerberg  is the chairman  और   मुख्य   कार्यपालिका  of Facebook ,  inc.  and  in  2013  उसके  personal  माल  was estimated to  be  US $  13  .3 billion .
Together  साथ  his  कॉलेज   roommates   और   fellow   हार्वर्ड  University  विद्यार्थी  Eduardo Saverin  ,  Andrew McCollum , Dustin Moskovitz and  क्रिस   ह्यूजेस  ,  zuckerberg   शुभारम्भ  Facebook from Harvard 's dormitory  कक्ष  .
the   समूह  then introduced  फेसबुक  onto other  campuses   देशभर  and moved to Palo Alto  ,  California ,  संयुक्त  States ( U.S. ) shortly afterwards .
In 2007 ,  at   the  age of twenty-three  सालो  , Zuckerberg became a billionaire as a  परिणाम  of Facebook  और  the  क्रमांक  of Facebook users  विश्वव्यापी  reached a total of one  अरब  in  2012  .
zuckerberg   थी  involved in  विभिन्न   विधिक  disputes that were  initiated  by others in the  समूह   ,  who claimed  a   share   of   the  company  आधारित  upon their involvement during the  विकास  phase of Facebook .
Since 2010  ,   zuckerberg  has  महरूम  named among  the  100 wealthiest and  सबसे  influential people in the world by  समय  magazine as a part of  इसके  Person  of  the  साल  accolade .
Zuckerberg was played by actor Jesse Eisenberg in  the  2010 Hollywood film  the  Social Network in which the  वृद्धि   of   फेसबुक  is portrayed .
the  Mayflower  थी   the  ship that  in   1620   transported   102   अंग्रेज़ी   तीर्थयात्रियों  ,  सहित   a   कोर   समूह  of Separatists  ,   to   नई   इंग्लैण्ड   .
उनके  story is one of travail and  अस्तित्व  in a harsh New World environment  .

Committee  of  Ways and  अर्थात्   is  the chief  कर  -writing  कमेटी   of  the United States House  of   प्रतिनिधि  .
Members of the Ways and Means Committee  हैं  not allowed to serve on any other House  समितियों  unless they  लागू  for a waiver from their party 's  congressional  leadership .
the  Committee has  क्षेत्राधिकार  over  सब  taxation ,  tariffs  and other revenue-raising  उपायों  ,  as   खूब   as   a  number of other  कार्यक्रम   including:
Social Security
Unemployment benefits
Medicare
Enforcement of child support laws
Temporary Assistance for Needy Families  ,  a federal welfare program
Foster care and  अपनाना  programs
The U.S. Constitution requires that all bills regarding taxation must  originate   in   the   हाउस  of Representatives  .
Since House procedure is  कि   सब  bills  regarding  taxation  जरूर   go  through  इस  committee  ,  the  कमेटी  is  बहुत   influential  , as is its Senate counterpart , the  u.S.  Senate  कमेटी  on  वित्त  .
The Ways  और  Means Committee  in  the  111th  Congress was chaired by Charlie Rangel , who had taken a leave  of   अनुपस्थिति  as chairman  जबतक   हाउस  ethics violations were resolved .
however  ,  उसके  leave of  अनुपस्थिति   as   अध्यक्ष   थी  ruled  to  be  a  resignation .
पीट  Stark  resigned  as  एक्टिंग   अध्यक्ष   ,  so Sander  levin  held that position until  the   प्रारंभ   of  the 112th Congress .
Dave Camp became the  कमेटी   कुर्सी  for  the  112th Congress , after the  republicans  won control of the  हाउस  in the 2010 election  .
The  ब्लू  whale  (  Balaenoptera musculus ) is  a   समुद्री   स्तनधारी   belonging  to  the  suborder  of  baleen  whales  ( called  mysticeti  ) .
at  in length  और  or more in weight ,  it   is  the largest  ज्ञात   एनिमल   to   have   कभी  existed  .
Long  और   slender  ,  the  blue  व्हेल   's  body can be various  शेड्स  of bluish-grey dorsally  और  somewhat lighter  underneath  .
वहीँ   हैं  at least three distinct subspecies  :   B.  m. musculus  of  the North  अटलांटिक  and North Pacific , B. m.  intermedia   of   the  Southern Ocean  और   B.  m. brevicauda  (  also  ज्ञात   as  the pygmy blue whale ) found in  the  Indian Ocean and South Pacific Ocean .
B.  m. indica ,  मिला   in  the  भारतीय   समंदर  ,  may  be another subspecies .
As with other  baleen  whales , its  आहार   consists  almost exclusively of small  crustaceans  known  as   krill   .
Blue whales were  abundant  in nearly all the oceans on Earth  जबतक  the beginning of the twentieth  सदी  .
For over  a  century , they were hunted almost to extinction by whalers until protected by  the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  community in 1966 .
A 2002 report estimated there were 5,000 to 12,000 blue whales worldwide , located in at least five groups .
More recent  शोध  into the Pygmy subspecies suggests  इस   may  be  an   underestimate  .
Before whaling ,  the  largest  जनसांख्यिकी   थी  in the Antarctic , numbering approximately 239,000 (  दायरा   202,000  to  311,000  ) .
वहीँ  remain only much smaller ( around  2,000  )  एकाग्रता  in  प्रत्येक   of  the eastern North Pacific , Antarctic ,  और  Indian Ocean groups .
वहीँ  are two more groups in the North Atlantic , and at  तनिक  two in  the   दक्षिणी  Hemisphere .
the  globe artichoke ( Cynara cardunculus var . scolymus  )  is a  किस्में   of   a  species of thistle  cultivated  as a food .
The  खाद्य   पदार्थ  is  कलियों  that  रूप  within  the   पुष्प   heads  before  the   पुष्प  come into bloom  .
The buds  go  away or  बदलें  to a  coarse   ,   मुश्किल  edible form  जब  the flower blooms .
The uncultivated or wild variety of the species  is  called  a  cardoon  .
It is a perennial plant  देशी  to  the  Mediterranean region .
The United States one hundred-dollar bill (  $   100  ) is a denomination of  संयुक्त   राज्य   करेंसी  .
U.S. statesman  ,  inventor , and diplomat Benjamin Franklin is  फिलहाल  featured on the  obverse  of the  विधेयक  .
On the  रिवर्स   of   the  banknote is  an   चित्र   of  Independence Hall .
The  $   100  bill  is  the largest denomination that has been printed since  जुलाई  13 , 1969  ,  when  the  denominations of $ 500  ,   $  1,000 , $ 5,000 , and  $  10,000  यहूद   रिटायर्ड  .
The Bureau of Engraving and Printing says the average life of a $ 100 bill in circulation is 90 months ( 7.5 years  )   पहले  it  is   replaced  due to wear and tear .
The bills  हैं  also commonly referred to  as   ``  Benjamins '' , in reference  to  the use  of   बेंजामिन  Franklin 's portrait on the denomination , or `` C-Notes ''  ,   आधारित  on  the  Roman  numeral  for  100  .
the  bill is one of  दो  denominations printed today that does not feature a President  of   the  United States ;  the  other is the  $  10 bill ,  featuring   सिकंदर  Hamilton .
The time on the clock of  स्वतंत्रता   हॉल  on the reverse ,  according  to the U.S. Bureau of Engraving  और   मुद्रण   ,   shows   लगभग   4:10  .
One hundred hundred-dollar bills are delivered by  संघीय  Reserve Banks  in   mustard-colored   straps  ( $ 10,000 )  .
the  Series 2009 $  100   विधेयक   redesign  was unveiled on  अप्रैल  21 , 2010 ,  और  was to be issued to the public on February  11  , 2011 , but production was shut down in December 2010  क्युकी  as many as 30 % were unusable  due   to  a manufacturing  दोष  .
a  vertical crease in the paper reveals a  रिक्त  space on the bill when pulled out .
In their replacement  ,   और   continuing  the high demand of this denomination  ,   the  Series 2006A was launched  retaining  the  पिछला  design  (   1996-generation   )  .
On April 24 , 2013 , the  संघीय  Reserve announced the  नई   $  100 bill would  डालें   परिसंचरण  on October  8  , 2013 .
