miniature   इससे  the  पेरिस   psalter  .
David (  ;  ISO 259-3 Dawid  ;   '  ;  दमदार  's : Daveed )  according  to  the  Hebrew Bible , was  the  second king of the United Kingdom  of   इसराईल   ,  and  according  to the  नई   वसीयत  Gospels of  मैथ्यू   और   ल्यूक  ,  an  ancestor  of  Jesus .
His life is conventionally dated to  c.  1040–970 BCE , his reign  over  Judah c. 1010–1002 BCE  ,  and his reign over  the   संयुक्त  Kingdom of Israel c.  1002–970  BCE  .
The Books  of   सैमुएल  , 1  किंग्स  , and 1 Chronicles  हैं   the  only  स्त्रोत   of   सूचना  on David , although the Tel Dan  stele  ( dated  c.  850–835 BCE ) contains  the  phrase ( bytdwd )  ,  read  as  `` House of David  ''   ,  which most scholars take  as  confirmation of the existence in  the  mid-9th century  bce   of   a  Judean  royal  dynasty called the House  of  David .
he  is depicted as a righteous king ,  हालांकि   नहीं  without faults  ,  as  खूब  as an acclaimed warrior , musician ,  और  poet , traditionally  credited   लिये   composing  many of the psalms contained in the Book of Psalms .
David is  सेंट्रल  to  यहूदी  , Christian , and Islamic doctrine and culture  .
Biblical tradition  maintains   कि   a  direct descendant  of  David will  be  the  मसीहा  .
in   islam  he is  माना  to be a prophet and the  किंग  of a nation .
Kathmandu  (  ;  )  is the  पूंजी  and largest  शहरी   agglomerate   of   नेपाल  .
the  agglomerate  consists  of Kathmandu Metropolitan City at its core , and its sister cities  patan  ,  kirtipur   ,  Thimi , and  भक्तपुर   .
it  also includes  the   recently  recognized  शहरी  areas  of  Shankhapur , Karyabinayak ,  और   champapur   .
Banepa , Dhulikhel , and Panauti  हैं  satellite  शहरी  areas  of  Kathmandu located  बस  outside the  काठमांडू   घाटी  .
काठमांडू   is  also known informally as `` KTM '' or the `` tri-city '' .
according   to  a census conducted in  2011  , Kathmandu metropolis alone has 975,453 inhabitants ; and the  agglomerate   रै  a population  of  more than 2.5 million inhabitants .
The metropolitan city area is and has a population density of  19,250   प्रति  km2 .
The  नगर   स्टैंड  at an elevation of  लगभग   in   the  bowl-shaped Kathmandu Valley of  सेंट्रल   नेपाल  .
It is surrounded by  चार  major mountains  :   shivapuri  ,  phulchoki  , Nagarjun ,  और  Chandragiri  .
Kathmandu Valley is  भाग  of three districts ( Kathmandu ,  ललितपुर   ,  and Bhaktapur ) , has the highest population density  in  the  देश   ,  and is home  to   परिचय  a twelfth of Nepal  's   जनसांख्यिकी  .
During Rana and Shah eras , the  नाम   ``  Nepal  ''  referred only to the Kathmandu Valley ; it was what people  जो  lived outside  the  valley called it .
During this period ,  अंग्रेजों   इतिहासकारों  called  the   घाटी  itself ``  नेपाल   उचित  '' .
Today  ,  Kathmandu is not only the capital of the Federal Democratic Republic of Nepal ,  लकिन  also the  मुख्यालय  of the Central Development  प्रदेश   of  Nepal  .
The Central Region  comprises  three  zones   :  Bagmati , Narayani , and Janakpur .
Kathmandu  is  located  in  the Bagmati Zone  .
Kathmandu  is  the  गेटवे  to  पर्यटन  in Nepal .
It is  भी  the nerve  बीच  of the country  's  economy .
It  रै  the  सबसे   उन्नत  infrastructure  of  any urban area  in  Nepal ,  और  its  अर्थव्यवस्था  is  केन्द्रित  on  पर्यटन  , which accounted  लिये  3.8 %  of  Nepal  's  GDP  in  1995–96 .
(  Tourism in Kathmandu declined thereafter during a period  of  political  अशांति  , but since  तब  has  improved   .  )
the  city  रै  a rich  इतिहास  ,  spanning  nearly  2000  years , as  inferred  from inscriptions found in the valley .
धार्मिक  and cultural festivities form a  प्रमुख  part of the lives of people residing in Kathmandu .
Most of Kathmandu 's people  follow  Hinduism and many  अन्य  follow Buddhism .
There are  लोगों  of other religious beliefs as well  ,   giving  Kathmandu a  कॉस्मोपॉलिटन   संस्कृति  .
Nepali  is   the   सबसे  commonly spoken language in the city .
नेपाल  Bhasa  is   the  indigenous  भाषा   बोला   by  the Newar people .
Hindi is widely  समझा  and  अंग्रेज़ी  is understood by Kathmandu 's educated  निवासियों   .
The city 's literacy rate  is   98  % .
Kathmandu  's   सिस्टर   शहरों  ( Lalitpur  patan  )  और  Bhaktapur  हैं   अभिन्न  to  काठमांडू  's  सांस्कृतिक   विरासत  , tourism industry , and economy ;  इसलिए  UNESCO 's  संसार   विरासत   साईट   सूचियाँ  all  तीन   शहरों  ' monuments  और   आकर्षण   साथ  under one  heading   ,  `` Kathmandu Valley-  युनेस्को  World Heritage Site ``  .
फ़ील्ड   हॉकी   ,  usually referred to  बस   as  hockey , is a team  खेल  of  the  hockey  परिवार   जिससे   is   निभाई  between  दो   टीमों  of eleven  खिलाड़ी  with hockey sticks  और   a  hard  ,  solid plastic  बॉल   .
At the turn of the  21st  century , the  खेल  is played globally , with particular  लोकप्रियता   throughout  Europe , Asia , Oceania ,  और   दक्षिण  America  –   in   जोड  to being the national sport of Pakistan and India .
The  पद  `` field hockey '' is used primarily in  कनाडा  , the United  राज्य   ,   और   अन्य  regions of the world  जहाँ   the  sport of ice hockey  is  more popular .
During play , goal keepers are the  तभी   खिलाड़ी  who are  अनुमत  to touch the  बॉल   साथ  any part of their  देह  ( with  the  exception of  a  player  's  hand considered 'part of  the   स्टिक   '  ) , with this only applying  भीतर  the shooting circle ( also known as the D ,  or   शूटिंग  arc  ,   or   बस  the circle  )  , while  फ़ील्ड   खिलाड़ी  play the ball with  the  flat side of their stick .
The team that scores the  सबसे  goals by the end  of   the  match wins  .
If the score is tied  at  the end of the  खेल  , either  a   चित्रण   is  declared or the game goes  into   अतिरिक्त  time  and/or  a penalty  गोलीबारी  ,  depending  on the competition 's format  .
The  शासी   देह  of hockey is  the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Hockey Federation (  fih   )  , with men and women  होने  represented internationally in competitions including the Olympic games , Commonwealth games , Hockey  संसार  Cup ,  champions  Trophy and Junior Hockey World Cup  ,  with  अनेक   देशों  running extensive junior , senior , and  मास्टर्स  '  क्लबों  competitions  .
the  FIH is also  जिम्मेदार   लिये   organising  the  हॉकी  Rules Board and developing  the   नियम  for the  खेल  .
A  लोकप्रिय  variant of  फ़ील्ड  hockey is indoor hockey ,  जिससे  differs  in  a number of  respects  while  मूर्त  the primary principles of hockey .
अंदर  hockey is a  6-a-side  variant ,  साथ   a  field  जिससे  is  घटाया  to approximately 40m × 20m .
With  अनेक  of  the   नियम  remaining the same  ,   सहित  obstruction and  फीट   ,  there are several  कुंजी  variations -  खिलाड़ी   may  not raise the ball  जबतक   शूटिंग  on goal ,  खिलाड़ी  may not hit the  बॉल  ( instead  utilising  pushes  to  transfer the ball ) ,  और  the  sidelines  are replaced  साथ   ठोस   बाधाओं  which the ball will  rebound  off .
ethan   ``   cane   ''  Ashby ( né Atkinson  )   is  a fictional character  इससे  the American  सीबीएस   साबुन  opera The Young and  the  Restless .
He  is  portrayed  by  Australian actor Daniel Goddard  ,  who  originally  auditioned for Brad Snyder on As the  संसार  Turns but was recommended for  a  role on  the  Young and  the  Restless instead  .
The  भूमिका   थी  to be  portrayed  as  an   अमरीकी  , but  गोडार्ड  's  ऑस्ट्रेलियाई   descent  influenced  the  character  's  background .
पूर्व   सिर   लेखक  Lynn Marie Latham introduced him during  the  episode  airing   on   जनवरी  12  ,  2007  as  an Australian  बारटेंडर  in  ढूंढें   of  his  परिवार  ,  a  debut that received a  मिश्रित  response  .
Latham  निर्मित   cane   as  the son  of  Phillip  चांसलर   ii  ( Donnelly Rhodes  )  and Jill  फोस्टर   एबॉट  (  जेस  Walton )  लकिन   the  character 's background was  rewritten  by Maria Arena  घंटी   in  2009 , reestablishing him as the  बेटे   of  Colin  और  Genevieve Atkinson (  ट्रिस्टन  Rogers and Genie  फ्रांसिस  ) .
Though characterized as `` mysterious '' , Cane is ``  वफ़ादार  and dedicated  ''  , while  गोडार्ड  described the character  as  a `` typical  ऑस्ट्रेलियाई   ,   working-class   दयालु  of  guy  '' .
He  थी  the first member  of   the  Atkinson  परिवार   to  appear on  the  series , followed  by  his  अभिभावक  and  एकसमान  twin brother  .
Soon  बाद   उसके   डेब्यू  , he  became  a  अग्रणी  character , a decision praised by viewers and critics .
the  character  रै  been involved  साथ  Amber  मूर   (   adrienne   frantz   )  , Chloe Mitchell (  एलिज़ाबेथ  Hendrickson ) and  सबसे  notably Lily Winters  (  Christel  खलील  )  ,  a romance  कि  garnered  significant  fan attention .
in   2009  , Cane and  लिली  were  शादीशुदा  ; Global BC  होता  later call  लिली  the  प्रेम   of   cane  's  जीवन  .
The  जोड़ी  had two children , Charlie and Mattie Ashby .
In 2011  ,   the   कर्ता   थी   fired  , and Cane was shot to  मौत  onscreen  .
however  , Goddard  थी  rehired  जल्द   बाद  viewers campaigned for his  वापसी   ,  revealing  कि   cane   's  identical twin brother was  in  fact the man  जो  died .
This sacrificed  उसके   विवाह  to  लिली  , but the couple were  remarried  on Valentine  's  Day in  2012  .
Goddard  रै  been widely acclaimed for his portrayal ; Canyon News  कहा   कि  he portrays the character honestly ,  और   is   ``  always  dependable  , on fire and  रोमांचक  '' .
John Christopher `` Johnny '' Depp II (  born  June 9 , 1963 ) is an American actor  ,   फिल्मी   निर्माता  , and  संगीतकार  .
he  has won the Golden Globe Award and Screen Actors Guild award  लिये   बेहतरीन  Actor .
Depp rose to prominence on the  1980s   टेलीविज़न  series 21 Jump Street  ,  becoming a teen  आइडल  .
Dissatisfied with that status , Depp turned  to   फिल्मी  for more challenging  भूमिकाएँ   ;   he  played the  शीर्षक  character  of  the acclaimed Edward Scissorhands ( 1990 ) and  बाद  found  बक्सा   दफ्तर   कामयाबी  in films  ऐसे  as Sleepy Hollow  (  1999 ) , Charlie and the Chocolate  फैक्टरी  (  2005  ) , Alice in  वंडरलैंड   (  2010 ) ,  rango  ( 2011 ) and  the  Pirates of the Caribbean film series ( 2003–present  )  .
He has collaborated  साथ  director and  dost   टिम  Burton in eight films  ;   the  most recent being Dark Shadows ( 2012  )   .
Depp has gained acclaim  लिये  his portrayals of such  लोगों  as Ed  लकडी  in Ed Wood  ,  Joseph D.  pistone  in Donnie Brasco ,  शिकारी  S. Thompson in  भय  and  loathing  in  लास   वेगास   ,  George Jung in Blow , and the  बैंको  robber John  dillinger   in  Michael  मन   's  Public Enemies .
Films  featuring   डेप  have grossed over $ 3.1 billion at the  संयुक्त  States  बक्सा   दफ्तर   और  over $ 7.6 billion worldwide .
He  रै  been nominated for top  पुरस्कार  many times , winning the Best Actor Awards  इससे  the Golden  –_motion_picture_musical_or_comedy  Globes –_Motion_Picture_Musical_or_Comedy for Sweeney  टॉड  : The  राक्षस   नाई  of Fleet  गली  and from  the  Screen Actors Guild for Pirates of the  caribbean  : The Curse  of  the  ब्लैक  Pearl .
He also has garnered a sex symbol status in American  सिनेमा  , being twice named as the `` Sexiest  man   जिंदा  `` by People magazine in 2003 and  2009  .
He has been listed  in  the 2012 Guinness Book of  संसार  Records as the highest paid actor  ,  with  $  75  लाख  .
The World Wide Web  (   abbreviated  as WWW or  w3  , commonly known as  the  web ) , is a  प्रणाली  of interlinked hypertext  दस्तावेज़  accessed  via  the Internet  .
With a web  ब्राउजर  ,  एक  can view web  पृष्ठों  that may contain text , images ,  वीडियो  , and other multimedia ,  और  navigate between them via  hyperlinks  .
using   अवधारणाओं  from his earlier hypertext systems like  enquire   ,   अंग्रेजों  engineer , computer scientist and  at  that time employee  of  the  cern  , Sir Tim  berners-lee   ,   अभी  Director  of  the World  चौड़ी  Web  consortium  ( W3C ) , wrote a  प्रस्ताव  in March 1989  लिये  what  होता  eventually become the World Wide Web .
At CERN ,  a   यूरोपीय  research organisation near Geneva straddling  the  border  between  France and Switzerland , Berners-Lee and  belgian  computer scientist  रॉबर्ट   cailliau  proposed in 1990 to use hypertext  ``  to link  और  access information of  विभिन्न  kinds  as  a  वेब   of  nodes in  जिससे  the user can browse at will ''  ,  and they publicly introduced the project in  दिसम्बर  of the same year .
Mark Travis John Sanchez ( born November 11 , 1986 ) is an American football  क्वार्टरबैक   लिये  the New York Jets of  the  National Football  लीग   (   एनएफएल   )  .
He was drafted in the first  गोलाकार  of  the   2009   एनएफएल  Draft as the fifth  overall   चयन   by   the   jets  and  the  second quarterback taken overall .
He played college football at  the  University of Southern California (  यूएससी  ) .
सांचेज़  grew up in a  well-disciplined   और  athletic family .
In the eighth grade ,  he  began to play football  और  learn the intricacies of  the  quarterback  स्थिति  , training with  उसके   पिता  , Nick  .
a  well-regarded prospect ,  सांचेज़   वचनबद्ध   to   दक्षिणी  California following his  कामयाब  high school career in which he  led  his team to a  चैंपियनशिप   शीर्षक  during  उसके  final season  .
at  USC , Sanchez  थी  relegated as the backup  क्वार्टरबैक   दौरान  his  पहला   तीन  years though he  रोज़  to prominence due to his  ब्रैड  appearances  on  the field  in   2007  due to injuries suffered by  starting  quarterback John David Booty .
Sanchez also became popular within  the  community due to his Mexican-American  विरासत  .
Named  the   प्रारंभ   in  2008 , Sanchez led USC to a 12–1 record and  जीती   the  Rose  कटोरी  against Penn State  लिये  which Sanchez was awarded the Most  मूल्यवान  Player award  लिये  his  प्रदर्शन   on  offense .
Although many considered  उसे  too inexperienced  ,  Sanchez  घोषित   उसके   इरादे  to enter  the  2009  एनएफएल  Draft .
He was selected by  the   jets  after they traded up  साथ  the Cleveland Browns ,  और  was named the starting quarterback prior  to  the  प्रारंभ  of the  ऋतु  .
despite   a  subpar performance  ,  Sanchez led the Jets  to  the AFC Championship Game  ,  a losing effort to the Indianapolis  कोल्टस  ,  बनने  the fourth  रुकी  quarterback  in  NFL  इतिहास  to win his first playoff  खेल   और   the   दूसरी  to  जीत   दो  playoff games .
In his  दूसरी  season , Sanchez continued  to   develop  and led the Jets  to  the playoffs  और  the team 's second consecutive AFC Championship Game  जहाँ   वे  narrowly  खोया  to  the   पिट्सबर्ग  Steelers  ,   24–19   .
With the win over the New England Patriots the week prior  ,  Sanchez tied four other  quarterbacks  for the second most post-season road  victories  by a quarterback in NFL history .
In  अग्रणी  the Jets to two consecutive conference championships , Sanchez  joined  quarterback Ben Roethlisberger as the only  दो   quarterbacks  in NFL history to reach the  सम्मेलन  championship  in  their first two seasons in the  लीग  .
The next two seasons would  be  a regression  लिये  both the team and Sanchez as  वे  failed to  पहुँचें  the playoffs  .
Fans and media critics called  लिये  a struggling  सांचेज़  to be benched .
He  आखिरकार  was replaced towards the end of  the  2012  ऋतु  with  ग्रेग  McElroy  .
Paul Avery  (   अप्रैल  2 ,  1934december   10  , 2000  )  was an  अमरीकी  police reporter , best known for  उसके  stories on the  infamous  serial killer known as  the   zodiac  , and later for  उसके  work on  the  Patricia Hearst kidnapping .
a  small submersible AC  sump  pump with a  गार्डन  hose connector
A sump pump is a  पंप   प्रयुक्त  to remove water that has accumulated  in  a water  collecting   sump  basin ,  commonly   मिला   in  the basement  of  homes .
The  जल  may enter via  the  perimeter drains  of  a basement waterproofing system  ,   funneling  into the  जलाशय  or  क्युकी   of  rain or natural ground  जल  ,  if   the  basement is  नीचे   the  water table level .
Sump pumps are used where basement flooding happens regularly and  to  remedy dampness where the water table is  ऊपर  the foundation of a  घर   .
Sump pumps send  जल  away from a  हाउस   to   कोई  place where it is no longer problematic , such  as  a  नगरपालिका  storm drain or a dry well .
Pumps may  निर्वहन   to  the  sanitary  sewer in  पुरानी   संस्थापना  .
Once  माना  acceptable , this  अभ्यास   may   अभी  violate the plumbing  कोड  or municipal bylaws , because  it   can   overwhelm  the municipal sewage  उपचार  system .
municipalities  urge homeowners  to  disconnect and reroute sump pump discharge away from sanitary  sewers  .
जुर्माना  may  be   imposed  for  noncompliance  .
Many  homeowners  have inherited their sump pump configurations and  do  not realize  कि  the pump  discharges   to  the sewer .
If the  निर्वहन   is  fed to a laundry sink  in   the  basement ,  it  's likely  going   to  the sewer .
Usually hardwired into a home 's  विद्युत  system , sump pumps may have  a  battery backup .
The home  's  pressurized water supply powers some pumps  ,  eliminating the  need  for electricity at the expense of  using  potable water , potentially  बनाना   उन्हें  more expensive to operate  than  electrical pumps and creating  an  additional water  निपटान  problem .
Since a sump basin may  अतिप्रवाह  if not constantly pumped , a backup system is important  लिये   मामले  when  the   प्रमुख   शक्ति   is  out for prolonged periods of time ,  as   दौरान  a  कठोर  storm  .
There are generally two types of sump pumps — pedestal and submersible .
the  pedestal pump 's  मोटर  is mounted  ऊपर  the sump ,  जहाँ  it is more easily serviced ,  लकिन  is also more  conspicuous  .
The pump impeller  is  driven by  a  long , vertical  एक्सटेंशन  shaft and the impeller is  in  a scroll housing  in  the base of  the   पंप  .
The submersible  पंप  is  entirely  mounted inside  the   sump   ,  and is  विशेषकर   sealed   to  prevent  विद्युत  short circuits .
Sump pump systems are  भी   utilized  in  औद्योगिक  and commercial applications  to  control  जल  table -related  समस्याएं   in  surface soil  .
An  आर्टेसियन  aquifer or  आवधिक  high water table situation  can  cause the ground to become unstable due to  जल  saturation .
As long as  the  pump functions ,  the  surface  मृदा  will remain stable .
ये  sumps are  typically   टेन  feet  in  depth or  अधिक  ;  lined   साथ  corrugated metal pipe that contains  perforations   or  drain holes throughout .
They may  शामिल  electronic  कंट्रोल   प्रणालियों   साथ  visual and  audible  alarms and are  प्रायः  covered to  prevent  debris and  पशु  from falling in .
Bleeding Kansas ,  खूनी  Kansas  or  the Border War ,  थी  a series  of  violent political confrontations involving anti-slavery  free-staters  and  pro-slavery  `` Border Ruffian  ``  elements  ,   कि  took place  in   the   कान्सास  Territory and the neighboring  कस्बों   of  Missouri between  1854  and 1861 .
at   the  heart of the conflict was the  सवाल  of whether Kansas would enter  the   संघ  as a  फ़्री  state or  स्लेव   राज्य  .
As such , Bleeding  कान्सास  was  a  proxy war between Northerners and Southerners over  the   समस्या  of slavery in the  संयुक्त   राज्य   .
The term ``  bleeding  Kansas ''  थी  coined by Horace  greeley   of   the  New  यॉर्क  Tribune ; the events  it  encompasses directly  presaged  the American Civil  युद्ध  .
Congress had long struggled to balance the interests of  pro-slavery  forces and anti-slavery forces .
The events later known as  bleeding  Kansas were set  into  motion by the Kansas–Nebraska Act of  1854  , which nullified the Missouri Compromise  और  instead implemented  the   अवधारणा   of  popular sovereignty .
An ostensibly democratic idea  ,   लोकप्रिय   प्रभुता   stated   कि  the inhabitants  of  each territory or state should decide whether  it  would  be  a free  or   स्लेव  state ;  however   ,   इस  resulted in immigration en masse to Kansas  by  activists from both sides  .
at  one  पाइंट  , Kansas  था  two  पृथक  governments , each with its own  संविधान  , although only one was federally recognized .
On  जनवरी  29 ,  1861  , Kansas was admitted  to  the  संघ  as a  फ़्री  state , less than three  महीने  before the Battle  of  Fort Sumter which began the  सिविल  War .
Benzene  is   an   सशुल्क  chemical compound  साथ  the molecular formula C6 H|Hydrogen|H6 .
Its  अणु   is   रचित   of   6   कार्बन   अणु  joined in  a  ring , with 1  हाइड्रोजन  atom attached to  प्रत्येक  carbon atom  .
क्युकी  its molecules contain only carbon  और  hydrogen atoms  ,  benzene  is  classed as a  हाइड्रोकार्बन  .
बेंजीन   is   a  natural constituent of crude oil  ,  and  is   एक  of the most  मौलिक   petrochemicals   .
बेंजीन   is  an aromatic  हाइड्रोकार्बन   और  the second [  n  ] - annulene  (   [  6 ] -annulene ) , a cyclic hydrocarbon  साथ  a  निरन्तर  pi  बंध  .
It is sometimes  abbreviated  Ph –H .  बेंजीन  is  a  colorless  और  highly flammable liquid with a  मीठी  smell  .
It  is  mainly used as a precursor  to  heavy chemicals  ,  such as ethylbenzene and  cumene  , which  हैं  produced on  a  billion kilogram scale  .
क्युकी   it  has a high octane number , it is an important  घटक  of  गैसोलीन  , composing a  few  percent of its  द्रव्यमान  .
Most  non-industrial   अनुप्रयोग  have been limited by  बेंजीन  's carcinogenicity .
Giovanni  virginio  Schiaparelli  (  ; 14 March 1835  –  4 July 1910  )  was  an  Italian astronomer and science  इतिहासकार  .
वी  homebrew  refers   to   the  reuse of  निन्टेंडो  's Wii game  कंसोल   to  run  तन्त्र  that has not been authorized  by  Nintendo  .
It  achieves  this by defeating  the  Wii 's  नक़ल   सुरक्षा   और   कोड  signing  उपायों  .
In more general terms , Wii Homebrew refers to the use of the Wii 's hardware , accessories and software for  उद्देश्य  outside those intended by the manufacturer  .
Original efforts focused  on  using  the  Wii Remote as  a   इंगित   यंत्र   on  other operating  प्रणालियों   ,  or running  web-based   खेल   in   the  built-in web  ब्राउजर  .
subsequent   developments  in  खेल  exploits , such as the `` Twilight hack `` , ``  bannerbomb  ''  और  its later incarnation  ``   letterbomb  ''  ,  `` Smash Stack ''  ,  `` Indiana  pwns  '' , `` Yu-Gi-OWNED  ''   ,   ``  bathaxx ''  ,  and `` Return of the  jodi   ''  ,  बना   installing  the `` Homebrew Channel  ``   संभावित   .
हैडली  (  सही  ) discussing the 2006 Israel-Lebanon crisis  साथ  Bush  और  Rice .
स्टीफन  John Hadley (  born  February 13 , 1947 )  थी   the  21st U.S. Assistant to  the   अध्यक्ष  for National Security Affairs ( commonly referred  as  National  सुरक्षा   सलाहकार  )  ,   सेवारत   अंतर्गत  President George W.  बुश  .
Take identical growing plants and give  उर्वरक  to half  of  them .
if  there are differences between the fertilized  संयंत्र  group  और  the  unfertilized  `` control ''  समूह  , these differences may  be  due to the fertilizer .
A  वैज्ञानिक   कंट्रोल  is an experiment or observation  designed  to minimize the  प्रभाव   of  variables other than the  सिंगल  independent  परिवर्तनीय  .
This  increases   the  reliability of the results  ,  often through a comparison between control measurements and the other  माप   .
Scientific controls are a  भाग   of   the  scientific  विधि   .
For example , during drug testing , scientists will try to control two  समूह   to  keep them as  एकसमान  as possible , then allow  एक  group to try the drug .
Another example might be testing plant fertilizer  by  giving  it  to  तभी   हाफ  the  पौधे  in a  गार्डन  : the plants  कि   प्राप्त  no fertilizer are  the   कंट्रोल   समूह   ,  because  वे  establish the baseline level  of  growth  कि  the fertilizer-treated  पौधे   होगा  be compared against .
Without a control group , the  प्रयोग  can not determine whether the  fertilizer-treated   पौधे  grow more than they would have  if  untreated .
ideally  ,  सब   परिवर्तनीय  in an  प्रयोग  will  be  controlled ( accounted for by the control measurements ) and none  होगा  be uncontrolled .
in  such an  प्रयोग   ,  if  सब   the  controls work as expected , it  is   संभावित  to  conclude   कि  the experiment is working  as  intended and that the results of  the  experiment  हैं  due  to  the effect of the  परिवर्तनीय  being tested  .
That  is  , scientific controls allow  an   अन्वेषक  to make  a  claim  जैसे   ``   दो  situations were  एकसमान   जबतक  factor  x  occurred  .
Since  फ़ैक्टर  X is the only difference  between  the two situations  ,  the new outcome  थी  caused  by  factor X . ''

जॉन  Adams  (   अक्तूबर  30  ,  1735 ( O.S . October 19  ,  1735 ) – July  4  , 1826 ) was  the  second president  of  the United  राज्य   (  1797–1801 ) , having earlier served as the first vice  अध्यक्ष   of  the United States .
An  अमरीकी  Founding  पिता   ,   he   थी  a statesman  ,   राजनयिक   ,   और  a leading  एडवोकेट   of   अमरीकी  independence from  ग्रेट  Britain .
Well educated ,  he  was an Enlightenment political theorist who promoted republicanism and wrote prolifically about his often seminal ideas , both in published  works   और  in letters to his wife and key adviser  अबीगैल   as   खूब  as to  अन्य  Founding Fathers  .
Adams came to prominence in  the   जल्दी   चरण   of  the American Revolution .
A lawyer and  पब्लिक  figure  in  Boston ,  as   a  delegate from Massachusetts to the  महाद्वीपीय   कॉंग्रेस   ,  he  निभाई  a leading role in persuading Congress to declare independence .
he  assisted Thomas Jefferson in  drafting  the Declaration of Independence in 1776  ,   और  was its  प्राथमिक  advocate  in  the Congress .
Later ,  as  a diplomat  in  Europe , he helped negotiate  the  eventual  सलाम  treaty with Great Britain , and was  जिम्मेदार   लिये   obtaining  vital governmental  लोन  from  एम्सटर्डम  bankers .
A political  theorist  and historian  ,   एडम्स  largely  लिखा  the Massachusetts  संविधान  in  1780  , which together with his earlier  विचार  on Government , influenced American political thought .
One of his greatest roles  थी  as a judge of  अक्षर  :  in  1775 ,  he  nominated George Washington to be commander-in-chief  ,  and 25 years  बाद   मनोनीत  John  मार्शल   to  be Chief  इंसाफ  of the United States .
Adams ' revolutionary credentials  secured  him two  शर्तें  as  जार्ज   वॉशिंगटन  's  वाइस  president  और  his own election  in  1796 as  the   दूसरी   अध्यक्ष   .
दौरान  his  एक   पद   ,  he  encountered  ferocious attacks by the Jeffersonian Republicans , as well as the dominant faction in his  अपना   federalist  Party led by his bitter enemy Alexander Hamilton .
Adams signed the  विवादास्पद  Alien and Sedition Acts  ,  and built up the  फौज   और  navy  विशेषकर   in  the face of an  undeclared  naval  युद्ध  (  पुकारा  the ``  quasi-war  `` ) with France ,  1798–1800  .
The major accomplishment of  उसके  presidency was his  शांतिपूर्ण   रेज़ोल्यूशन  of the  विरोध  in  the   फेस  of Hamilton 's opposition .
In 1800 , Adams was defeated for re-election by  थामस  Jefferson and retired  to  Massachusetts .
he  later  resumed  his friendship with  जेफरसन  .
He and  उसके  wife , Abigail Adams , founded an accomplished  परिवार   लकीर  of politicians  ,   राजनयिकों  , and historians now referred to  as  the  एडम्स   राजनैतिक   परिवार  .
Adams was  the  father of  जॉन  Quincy  एडम्स   ,  the sixth President  of  the  संयुक्त  States .
His achievements have received greater recognition  in   आधुनिक   टाइम्स  , though his  योगदान  were not initially as  मनाये  as those  of  other Founders .
Adams  थी  the  पहला   u.S.  president to reside in the  भवन   कि  eventually  became   ज्ञात  as the  श्वेत   हाउस  .
A Watt steam engine .
The  भाप  engine  ,  fuelled  primarily  by  कोयले  , propelled the  औद्योगिक  Revolution in Great Britain  और   the  world .
The Industrial  क्रान्ति  was the transition to new manufacturing  प्रक्रियाओं  that  occurred  in the  काल  from  परिचय  1760 to  कुछ   समय   between   1820   और  1840 .
This transition  शामिल  going  इससे  hand production methods to machines , new chemical manufacturing and iron production processes , improved  दक्षता   of  water power  ,  the increasing use  of  steam power and development of  यंत्र  tools .
The transition also  शामिल  the change  इससे   लकडी   और  other bio-fuels to coal .
The  औद्योगिक  revolution  began  in Britain and within  a  few  दशकों   स्प्रेड  to Western  यूरोपीय  and the United States .
The  औद्योगिक   क्रान्ति   marks  a  प्रमुख  turning point  in   इतिहास  ;  लगभग   प्रत्येक  aspect  of  daily life was influenced in  कुछ  way .
Most notably  ,  average income and  जनसांख्यिकी  began to exhibit  unprecedented  sustained  विकास   .
in  the words of Nobel  पुरस्कार  winner Robert  E.  Lucas , Jr. , ``  लिये   the  first time in history , the living standards of the masses of ordinary people  have  begun to undergo  sustained   विकास   ...   nothing   remotely   जैसे  this economic behavior is  उल्लेखित   by  the  शास्त्रीय   अर्थशास्त्रियों   ,  even as a theoretical possibility .  ''
विलियम   घंटी   स्कॉट  Iron  और  Coal ,  1855-60
the   काल  of  समय  covered by the Industrial Revolution  varies   साथ  different historians .
Eric Hobsbawm held that it 'broke out '  in   ब्रिटेन  in the 1780s and  थी   नहीं  fully felt until the 1830s or 1840s , while T.  S.  Ashton held that  it  occurred roughly  between  1760 and  1830  .
Some 20th-century  इतिहासकारों   ऐसे  as John  clapham   और  Nicholas Crafts have argued  कि  the  प्रक्रम   of  economic and social change  took   प्लेस  gradually  और   the   पद  revolution is  a  misnomer .
This is still  a  subject of debate among historians .
जीडीपी   प्रति  capita was  broadly  stable before  the   औद्योगिक  Revolution  और  the  emergence  of the modern  पूंजीवादी  economy  .
the  Industrial  क्रान्ति  began an  era  of per-capita economic  विकास  in capitalist economies .
आर्थिक   इतिहासकारों  are  in  agreement  कि  the onset of  the  Industrial Revolution is  the   सबसे   महत्वपूर्ण  event in the history of humanity  चूंकि  the  domestication  of animals and  पौधे   .
The First Industrial  क्रान्ति  evolved into the Second Industrial Revolution in the transition years between 1840 and 1870 , when  technological  and  आर्थिक  progress gained momentum  साथ  the increasing adoption of  steam-powered   नौकाएँ  , ships and railways , the large scale manufacture of  यंत्र   टूल्स  and the increasing use of steam  संचालित   कारखानों  .
Juliet  annmarie  Huddy (  born   सितंबर  27  ,   1969  ) , is an  अमरीकी  television  न्यूज  reporter  ,   फिलहाल  appearing  on  Fox News Channel  .
इस  list  बाँधने  U.S.  शहरों   by   जमीन  area ( not  सहित  bodies of water  )  .
Total  क्षेत्रों  (  सहित   जल  )  हैं   भी   दिए  , but note that , when ranked by  कुल   क्षेत्रफल   ,  a number of coastal  शहरों   appear  disproportionately `` larger  ''  .
San Francisco is an extreme example ; water  makes   up  nearly 80 % of its total area  of  232  वर्गाकार   मील  ( 601  km2  )  .
Note  भी  that in many cases a city may  be   geographically  large primarily because its municipal  सरकारी  has  मिलाया   साथ   the  government of the surrounding  काउंटी  .
In  कुछ  cases the county  no  longer  exists  , while in others  the  arrangement has formed a Consolidated  city–county  ( or city-  बरो  in Alaska , or city- parish  in   louisiana  )  .

the   विशाल  intestine ( or bowel , colon  )  is  the  last part of the digestive system in vertebrate animals .
Its function  is   to  absorb water from the remaining indigestible food matter ,  और  then to pass useless waste material from the body  .
इस  article is  primarily   परिचय  the human gut  ,  though the  सूचना   परिचय   इसके  processes are  सीधे   लागू  to most  स्तनधारियों   .
The large intestine  consists   of  the  cecum  , rectum and anal  कनाल  .
it  starts  in  the  सही   iliac  region  of  the  pelvis  ,  बस  at  or  below  the   सही  waist , where it is joined to the bottom end of the small  आंत   .
From here it continues up  the  abdomen  ,  then across  the  width  of   the  abdominal  गुहा  , and then  it  turns  bas  , continuing  to  its endpoint  at  the anus .
the  large  आंत  is about  long  , which is about one-fifth  of  the  पूरे  length of the intestinal canal .
In  terminologia  Anatomica the large intestine includes the cecum , colon  ,  rectum , and  गुदा  canal .
However ,  कुछ  sources exclude  the  anal canal  .
The Green Bay Packers  हैं  an American  फ़ुटबॉल   टोली  based in Green Bay  ,  Wisconsin .
They are members  of   the  North Division of  the  National Football Conference (  nfc   )  in the National Football League  (  NFL ) .
ग्रीन   खाड़ी   is  the third-oldest franchise  in  the NFL ,  having   महरूम  organized  और  playing in 1919  .
The Packers  हैं   the   तभी  non-profit , community-owned major league professional  खेल  team in  the  United  राज्य   .
The Packers  हैं  the  पिछला   vestige   of  `` small town  टीमों  ''  कि  were once common in  the  NFL during  the  1920s  और   1930s  .
Founded in 1919 by Earl  ``  Curly  ''  Lambeau ( hence the  नाम  Lambeau Field  on  which the  टोली  plays ) and  जार्ज  Whitney Calhoun  ,  the Green Bay Packers can  ट्रेस  their  lineage  to  अन्य  semi-professional teams in Green Bay dating back to  1896   .
In  1919  and 1920 the  पैकर्स  competed as a semi-professional football  टोली   विरूद्ध  clubs  इससे   around  Wisconsin and  the  Midwest .
They joined the  अमरीकी  Professional  फ़ुटबॉल  Association ( APFA )  in  1921 , the forerunner to what is  ज्ञात  today as  the  National  फ़ुटबॉल   लीग  ( NFL  )  .
हालांकि  Green Bay is the last NFL `` small town ''  टोली   ,  its local  प्रशंसक  base  और   मीडिया   extends  into  आसपास  Milwaukee ;  the   टोली  also played selected home  खेल   वहीँ  between 1933 and 1994 .
the   ग्रीन  Bay Packers have won 13  लीग  championships  (  more  than   कोई  other  टोली  in the NFL  )  , including  नौ  NFL  championships  prior to the  सुपर   कटोरी  era and four Super Bowl victories —in 1967  (  Super  कटोरी   i  ) , 1968 ( Super Bowl  ii  ) ,  1997   (   सुपर  Bowl XXXI ) and  2011   (  Super  कटोरी  XLV ) .
The Packers have long-standing  ,  bitter  rivalries   साथ  their  nfc  North ( formerly the NFC Central ) opponents , the Chicago Bears  ,   मिनेसोटा  Vikings and  the  Detroit Lions  .
The  bears-packers  rivalry  is  one of the oldest rivalries in NFL history , dating back  to  1921 .
The  सैन  Fernando Valley ( locally  ज्ञात  as ``  the  Valley  ''  )  is  an urbanized  घाटी  located in the Los  एंजिल्स  metropolitan area  of   दक्षिणी  California , United States , defined by the mountains  of  the  अनुप्रस्थ  Ranges circling  it   .
Home to 1.76  लाख   लोगों  ,  it  lies north of the  larger  and more populous  लॉस  Angeles Basin  .
Nearly  दो   तिहाई  of the  घाटी  's  जमीन  area  is  part of the City of Los Angeles .
the   अन्य  incorporated cities  in  the  घाटी  are Glendale  ,   burbank  ,  सैन  Fernando ,  छुपा  Hills and Calabasas  .

इसके   well-known  advertising as well as a host  of   entertainment  areas and attractions , and  is  located in  अटलांटा  , Georgia ( where the company 's headquarters are located ) at  pemberton  Place  (  named  in  honor of  जॉन   pemberton   ,  the inventor of  coca-cola   )  .

it  opened to the  पब्लिक   on  May 24  ,  2007 , relocating  इससे   और  replacing the original exhibit .
Pretties is a 2005 science fiction  अनोखा  and the second book of  the  Uglies  त्रयी  written by Scott  westerfeld  .
It is set in a  भविष्य   dystopian   संसार   in  which everyone  is  turned `` Pretty  ''  by extreme cosmetic surgery upon  reaching   आयु  16  .
It tells the story of teenager Tally Youngblood who rebels against society  's  enforced conformity .
Susan Leigh  vaughan  Smith  (  born September 26  ,   1971  )  is  an American woman sentenced to life in prison for murdering  उसके   children   .
Born in Union , South Carolina  ,  and a former student of the  विश्वविद्यालयों  of  दक्षिण   कैरोलिना   संघ  , she  थी  convicted  on  July 22 , 1995 for murdering  उसके  two sons , 3-year-old  माइकल   डेनियल  Smith , born October 10 , 1991 ,  और   14-month-old   सिकंदर   टायलर  Smith , born August 5 ,  1993  .
the  case  gained  worldwide attention  shortly  after it developed ,  due  to  उसके  claiming  कि  a  ब्लैक   man  stole her car and  kidnapped   उसके   बेटे  .
She later  claimed  that she suffered  इससे  mental health issues  कि  impaired her judgment .
According  to  the South Carolina  विभाग  of Corrections , Smith will be  योग्य   लिये  parole on November 4 , 2024  ,  after  सेवारत  a minimum of  तीस  years  .
She is  incarcerated  at South  कैरोलिना   's   leath   correctional   संस्था  , near Greenwood .
Mount  mckinley  ( also  ज्ञात  as  denali  taken from the Inuit Koyukon  athabaskan   भाषा  meaning ``  the   ग्रेट  One  ''  ) is  the   उच्चतम  mountain peak  in  the United  राज्य  and  in  North America with a  समिट  elevation  of  above sea level .
at  some ,  the  base to  शिखर  rise is considered the  largest   of  any  पहाड़   situated   entirely  above sea level .
measured  by topographic prominence ,  it  is the third most prominent peak after Mount Everest and Aconcagua .
Located  in  the Alaska Range in the interior of US state of Alaska  ,  it is the centerpiece of Denali National  पार्क  and  बचाना  .
the   पहला   यूरोपीय   to   दस्तावेज़   sighting  the mountain was George Vancouver  in   1794  .
In  1903  , James  wickersham  recorded the first attempt at climbing McKinley which was  unsuccessful  .
in  1906 ,  फ्रेडरिक  Cook claimed the first ascent which was  बाद  proven  to   be   गलत  .
The first  verifiable   ascent   to  McKinley  's  summit was  हासिल   on  June  7  , 1913 by climbers Hudson Stuck  ,  Harry Karstens  ,  Walter Harper , and Robert Tatum .
in  1951 , Bradford Washburn  pioneered  the West Buttress route considered to be the safest  और   easiest   रूट  and therefore the most  लोकप्रिय  currently in use  .
the  Honda S600  is  an automobile manufactured by Honda  .
it  was launched in March 1964 .
Available as  a  roadster – bearing strong  प्रतिरूप   to  the Honda  s500  – and  as   a   fastback  coupé – introduced in March 1965 – the  s600  was  the   पहला   होंडा  available in  दो  trim  स्तर  .
दौरान   इसके  production run up to 1966  ,   the  model  स्टाइलिंग   होता   remain  pretty much the  वही  , with  the  most  notable  changes coming to  the  front grille ,  बम्पर  , and headlights .
Powered by a DOHC  ,  water-cooled , four-cylinder  इनलाइन  engine  साथ  four  carburetors  ,  the   इंजन  capacity was increased to 606 cc  इससे   the  S500 's 531 cc  .
The engine produced at  8,500  rpm and  था   a  top speed  of   .
With  the   convertible  weighing  in  at mere , the extra sheet metal of  the  coupe  तभी  added to the overall weight .
Suspension was independent with  sealed  roller chain drive to each rear  व्हील  .
The S600 was the  पहला   द्रव्यमान  marketed Honda car  .
पहला  offered only  in  right-hand  ड्राइव   ,  it soon became available  in   left-hand  drive to  अपील  to export markets  .
There were  a  few  pre-production  S500s manufactured  in  left hand  ड्राइव  , two or  तीन  even being shown  in   कुछ  early sales brochures  .
Both the  s600  roadster  और  coupé  यहूद  available  in   मानक  trim  और   a  special  ,  upgraded  पैकेज  called the SM600  जिससे  included , among other  वस्तुएं  , special paint colors , exclusive badging , a standard radio  और  speaker ,  a  special antenna in  the  passenger  पक्ष  sun visor , standard  reversing  lights , a standard cigarette  हल्का  , a  मानक   हीटर  , better cushioned seats ,  और  a detachable seat track for quick removal  of  the passenger seat .
Honda built 3,912 roadsters  in  1964 , with production  चढ़ाई  to 7,261 convertibles and  1,519  coupes in 1965  .
उत्पादन  dropped off  in  1966  (   as  they were shifting to the  s800   )  with only 111 roadsters and 281  coupes  , giving tallies  of  11,284  convertibles  and  1,800  coupes  लिये  the 3  साल   स्पैन  .
Everybody  hates  Chris is an American  टेलीविज़न   काल  sitcom that  depicts  the  teenage  experiences of comedian Chris Rock  (  who is  भी  the narrator ) while growing up  in  the Bedford-Stuyvesant neighborhood of  ब्रुकलीन  ,  नई  York .
The show  is  set between 1983 and 1987  ;  however  ,   चट्टान   खुद  was  a   किशोरावस्था  between 1978  और   1983   .
Rock grew  up   साथ  a  लड़के  named Kenny  montero  , whom he has often  referred  to  as  the inspiration  लिये  a  लॉट   of  the episodes .
In many interviews , Rock has described  केनी   as  the reason he got into comedy  in  the first  प्लेस  .
The show  's   शीर्षक  parodies the CBS  sitcom  Everybody Loves Raymond  .
Rock stated : `` Everybody Loves Raymond but  everybody  Hates Chris ! `` .
The show  's  lead actors are Tyler James Williams , Terry Crews  ,  Tichina Arnold , Tequan Richmond ,  imani  Hakim  ,  and Vincent Martella  .
In Fall 2008 , the  the   cw  moved Everybody Hates Chris and The  खेल  to the Friday night  मौत   स्लॉट   .
The fourth  ऋतु  of  the  series  premiered   शुक्रवार  , October 3  ,  2008 , at 8:00PM  eastern/7:00pm  Central .
On  may  21 , 2009 , The CW announced that it had cancelled Everybody Hates Chris  .
Prior to this , executive producer Chris Rock announced that the end  of  season 4  matched   up  with his own past—dropping out  of  high school  to  become a comedian—and that it  थी   समय   to   समाप्त  the show .
Pleural effusion is excess  द्रव   कि  accumulates between the two  pleural   परतों  ,  the   fluid-filled   स्पेस   कि  surrounds the lungs .
Excessive  amounts  of  ऐसे  fluid can impair breathing  by  limiting  the  expansion of the lungs  दौरान  ventilation .
Beowulf ( ; in  बूढ़ा  English or  )  is the  conventional  title of an  बूढ़ा   अंग्रेज़ी   वीर  epic poem consisting of 3182 alliterative long lines ,  नियत  in Scandinavia , commonly cited as one of  the  most  महत्वपूर्ण  works  of   anglo-saxon   साहित्य  .
it  survives in  a   सिंगल  manuscript  ज्ञात   as  the Nowell Codex  .
इसके   संयोजन  by  an  anonymous  anglo-saxon  poet is dated  between  the  8th  and the early  11th  century .
in   1731  , the manuscript was  badly  damaged by a fire that swept  through  a building housing a collection of Medieval  पांडुलिपियों   समवेत  by  सर  Robert Bruce Cotton .
the   कविता  fell  into   अस्पष्टता   लिये   दशकों   ,  and its  अस्तित्व  did not become widely known again until it  थी   मुद्रित  in 1815  in  an  संस्करण   prepared  by  the   icelandic-danish  scholar Grímur Jónsson Thorkelin .
In the  कविता   ,  Beowulf , a hero of the Geats  in   scandinavia  , comes  to  the help of  hroðgar  ,  the   किंग  of the  danes  ,  जिनकी  mead hall ( in Heorot )  रै   महरूम   अंतर्गत  attack by  a   दानव  known as Grendel  .
After  बियोवुल्फ़  slays him ,  grendel   's  mother  हमले  the hall and is  तब  also defeated .
Victorious , Beowulf goes home  to  Geatland in  स्वीडन  and  बाद  becomes  किंग  of the Geats .
After a period of fifty years has  passed  , Beowulf defeats a dragon , but is fatally wounded in the battle .
After his death  ,   उसके  attendants bury him in a tumulus , a burial mound , in Geatland .
Shem Ham  और  Japheth by James  tissot   1904  .
Shem ( ; Sēm ;  अरबी  : Sām  ;  Ge'ez : ሴም  ,  Sēm  ;   ``  renown ; prosperity ; name '' ) was  एक  of  the  sons  of   नूह  in the Hebrew Bible  as  well as  in   इस्लामी   साहित्य  .
He is most  popularly   regarded  as the eldest  बेटे  , though some traditions regard him as the  दूसरी   बेटे  .
Genesis 10:21 refers  to  relative  आयु  of Shem  और  his  bhai   japheth  ,  लकिन  with  sufficient  ambiguity to have yielded different  अनुवाद   .
The verse  is  translated in the KJV as `` Unto Shem also ,  the   पिता   of  all the  children  of Eber , the brother of Japheth the elder , even to him  यहूद  children born . ``  .
However ,  the  New American Standard  बाइबल  gives , ``  भी  to Shem , the  पिता  of all  the  children  of  Eber  ,   और  the older  bhai  of  japheth  , children were born .  ''
Genesis 11:10 records  कि  Shem was still 100 years old at the birth of Arphaxad , ( but nearly 101  -  see Chronology  नोट  , ) two  सालो   बाद  the flood ,  बनाना  him barely 99  at  the time the flood began  ;  and  कि   he  lived for another  500  years after  इस  , making his age at  मौत   600  years .
The children of Shem were Elam , Asshur ,  arphaxad   ,  Lud , and  aram  ,  in  addition to daughters  .
Abraham , the patriarch of  the   hebrews  and Arabs , was  एक  of the descendants of Arphaxad  .
Islamic  साहित्य  describes Shem as one of the believing  बेटे   of   नूह   .
Some  स्त्रोत  even identify  shem  as a prophet  in  his own right and  कि  he was the  अगला  prophet  बाद   उसके  father .
In one  मुस्लिम  legend  ,  Shem was  एक  of the people that God  बना  Jesus resurrect as a sign to the Children of Israel  .
The 1st  सदी   इतिहासकार  Flavius Josephus  ,   among  many others , recounted the tradition that these five sons were  the  progenitors of the nations of Elam  ,  Assyria ,  chaldea  , Lydia , and Syria , respectively  .
Semitic  is  still a  commonly  used  पद   लिये  the  सामीती   भाषाएं   ,  as a subset of  the  Afro-Asiatic languages ,  denoting  the  आम  linguistic heritage of Arabic ,  aramaic  , Akkadian  ,  Ethiopic , Hebrew and Phoenician languages .
According to  कुछ  Jewish  परंपराओं   (  e.g. , B. Talmud Nedarim  32b  ; Genesis Rabbah  46:7  ; Genesis Rabbah 56:10 ; Leviticus Rabbah  25:6  ; Numbers Rabbah 4:8  .   )  , Shem is believed to have  महरूम  Melchizedek , King  of  Salem whom Abraham  is   अंकित  to have met  बाद   the  battle of  the   चार  kings .
In a few of the many extra-biblical  स्त्रोत   कि  describe  उसे  , Shem is also credited with  हत्या   nimrod  ,  बेटे  of Cush  .
Shem is mentioned in Genesis  5:32  , 6:10 ; 7:13 ;  9:18,23,26-27   ;  10  ;  11:10  ;   भी  in 1 Chronicles 1:4 .
भौगोलिक   identifications  of Flavius Josephus , c. 100 AD  ;  Japheth 's sons  दिखाया   in  red ,  हैम   's   बेटे  in  ब्लू  ,  shem  's sons in green .
go   पापा   or  Go  पापा   समूह   inc.  is  a  privately held company that  is  primarily  an  internet  डोमेन  registrar and web hosting company  .
Go  पापा  Group Inc.  दायर   लिये  an IPO in 2006 ,  लकिन  later  रद्द  it ,  due  to `` market  uncertainties   ''  .
in  addition to  डोमेन   पंजीकरण  and  होस्टिंग  Go Daddy also sells e-business  सम्बन्धित  software and services .
On June 24 , 2011 , The  वॉल  Street Journal reported that private-equity firms  केकेआर  and Silver Lake  साझेदार  ,  साथ  with  a  third investor , were  nearing  a deal to  ख़रीदे  the  कम्पनी  for between $ 2–2.5  अरब  .
on  July 1 ,  2011   go  Daddy confirmed that KKR , Silver  झील  Partners  और  Technology Crossover  ventures  had closed the deal  .
Although the purchase  दाम   थी   नहीं   officially  announced  it  was reported  to  be $ 2.25 billion  ,  for 65 % of the  कम्पनी  .
,   bob  Parsons  था  ceded the CEO  भूमिका   of  Go Daddy to Warren Adelman  ,  who  था  been with the  कम्पनी   लिये   परिचय  10 years .

अंडोरा  ( ; , ) ,  officially   the   principality  of  अंडोरा  (  )  , also called the Principality of the  घाटियों   of   अंडोरा  ,  (  ) , is  a  landlocked microstate in  southwestern   यूरोपीय  ,  स्तिथ   in  the  पूर्वी  Pyrenees mountains and bordered by Spain  और   फ़्रांस  .
It is the sixth  smallest  nation in Europe  ,   having   an  area of and an estimated population of 85,000 in  2012   .
इसके   पूंजी   ,  Andorra  la  Vella ,  is  the highest  पूंजी  city in Europe  ,  at an elevation of above sea level .
The official  भाषा  is Catalan , although  स्पेनी  , Portuguese  ,  and  फ्रेंच   हैं  also  commonly  spoken  .
निर्मित   अंतर्गत  a  चार्टर   in  988  ,  the present  principality  was formed in 1278 .
it  is known as a principality as  it  is a monarchy headed  by  two co-princes – the Bishop of Urgell and  the  President of France  .
अंडोरा   is  a  prosperous  country  मुख्यतः  because of  इसके  tourism industry , which  सेवाएं  an  अनुमानित  10.2  लाख   विज़िटर  annually , and  भी  because of  इसके   औकात   as  a  कर  haven .
it  is not a member of the  यूरोपीय  Union  ,  but the  यूरोपियन  is the de  facto   करेंसी  .
the   लोगों  of  अंडोरा  have  the   4th  highest human  जीवन  expectancy  in  the world — 82 years at birth  .
The George  वॉशिंगटन  University  (  GW  ,  GWU ,  or  George Washington ) is  a  comprehensive  निजी  , coeducational  शोध   विश्वविद्यालयों  located  in  Washington  ,  D.C. .
it  awards certificates , Bachelor  डिग्री  , Masters degrees  ,  and PhDs across several dozen  disciplines  .
The university  थी  chartered by an  अधिनियम  of  कॉंग्रेस   on  February 9  ,  1821 as The Columbian College in  the   ज़िला  of Columbia .
Kimberly Noel  ``  Kim '' Kardashian  (  born  अक्तूबर  21 , 1980 ) is an American  socialite  , television personality and occasional  अभिनेत्री   .
In 2007  ,  she  gained  notoriety  as   the   विषय  of  a   sex   टेप  that subsequently  resulted   in  a court awarding her $ 5 million ; later in  कि   वही  year  ,  she and her family rose  to   prominence  with their E !
reality television series Keeping  up  with the Kardashians , and  इसके  subsequent spin-offs  ,  including Kourtney and Kim  लो  New York and Kourtney  और  Kim  लो  Miami  .
In  2010  , Kardashian  थी  the highest-earning reality star , with estimated earnings of  $   6  million  .
साथ   बहनों   कोर्टनी   और  Khloé  ,  Kardashian co-owns the fashion  बुटीक   कड़ी  D-A-S-H .
She has been  शामिल   in   the   उत्पादन   of  several  लाइनों  of clothing  और   सुगंध  .
In  अगस्त  2011 ,  कार्दशियन  married  बास्केट  player  क्रिस   humphries  in  a   widely   publicized  ceremony .
कि   अक्तूबर  , Kardashian filed for  तलाक   following   72  days  of  marriage .
The move garnered significant backlash from the media , who labeled it a `` publicity stunt '' .
बाद  536  दिनों  , Kardashian and Humphries reached  an   अघोषित  settlement at the Los  एंजिल्स   श्रेष्ठ  Court ,  finalizing   the   तलाक  in April 2013 .

oahu  ( )  or  Oahu  ,  known  as  ``  the  Gathering Place  ''  ,  is  the  तीसरा   largest  of the Hawaiian  आइलैंड्स  and the most populous of the  आइलैंड्स  in the U.S. state  of  Hawaii .
The state capital ,  होनोलूलू  , is  on   oahu  's southeast coast .
Including small close-in offshore  आइलैंड्स  such as Ford Island and  the  islands in  kaneohe  Bay  और   बंद  the eastern ( windward ) coast  ,  it has a total land  क्षेत्रफल  of , making it  the   20th   largest   द्वीप  in the United States .
In the greatest  आयाम  , this volcanic island  is  long and across .
the  length of the shoreline is .
The island  is  the  परिणाम  of two  पृथक   शील्ड  volcanoes : Waianae and Koolau , with a broad  ``  valley '' or saddle  (  the central Oahu  मैदान   )  between  उन्हें  .
The highest  पाइंट  is Mt . Ka'ala in  the  Waianae Range  ,   उठती   to  above sea level .
The base currency of the United States is the  u.S.   डालर  ,  और  is  मुद्रित  on bills in denominations of $  1  , $ 2 , $ 5 ,  $  10 ,  $  20  ,   $  50 , and $  100   .
At  एक  time , however , U.S. currency  शामिल  five larger denominations .
Notes  in  the  denominations  of  $  500  ,  $  1,000  , $ 5,000 , and  $   10,000  were  मुद्रित  for  सामान्य  use ,  और  a  $   100,000  note was printed for certain  आतंरिक   ट्रांजेक्शन  .
अंग्रेजों  Honduras was a  अंग्रेजों   उपनिवेश  in Central America .
In 1981 ,  the  colony gained full independence , and  is  now  the   स्वतंत्र  nation  of   बेलीज़  .
First colonised by Spaniards in the 17th century , the  territory   on  the east  coast  of Central America  ,   दक्षिण  of Mexico  ,  became a British  क्राउन  colony in  1862  .
In 1964  ,  it became a  self-governing  colony .
Belize became  fully   स्वतंत्र  from  the   संयुक्त   किंगडम  in  1981  .
Belize was  the  last  महाद्वीपीय  possession  of   the  United  किंगडम  in  the   americas  .
Spelt  ,  also known as dinkel  गेहूं  , or hulled wheat , is an ancient species of  गेहूं  from  the   पांचवां  millennium BC  .
Spelt was  an  important  स्टेपल  in parts of Europe from the Bronze Age to  मध्यकालीन  times ;  it  now  survives  as a  relict   क्रॉप  in Central Europe and northern Spain and has found a new market  as  a health food .
Spelt is sometimes considered  a  subspecies of the closely related  प्रजाति  common wheat ( T. aestivum  )  , in which case its  वनस्पति  name is  माना  to  be   triticum  aestivum subsp . spelta  .
It is a hexaploid wheat  ,   जिससे  means  it   रै  six sets  of  chromosomes .
Sherlock Holmes ( or )  is  a  fictional  detective  निर्मित  by author and physician Sir  आर्थर  Conan Doyle .
A London-based  ``   परामर्श  detective  ''  whose abilities border on the fantastic , Holmes is  प्रसिद्ध  for his astute logical reasoning  ,  his ability  to  adopt almost any disguise , and his use of forensic science skills to solve difficult cases .
Holmes  ,   जो  first appeared in publication  in   1887   ,  was featured in  चार  novels and 56  छोटी  stories  .
The first novel , A Study in Scarlet , appeared in Beeton 's Christmas Annual  in  1887 and  the   दूसरी  , The  चिह्न  of  the  Four , in  lippincott  's Monthly Magazine in 1890  .
The character  grew  tremendously in  लोकप्रियता   साथ  the  पहला   श्रेणी  of  छोटी  stories  in  The Strand Magazine , beginning with A Scandal in  बोहेमिया  in 1891 ;  further  series  of  short  कहानियां  and  दो  novels published in  सीरियल  form appeared between then and  1927  .
the   कहानियां  cover a  काल   इससे  around  1880  up  to  1914 .
All but  चार   कहानियां  are narrated  by  Holmes 's  dost  and biographer  ,  Dr.  जॉन  H.  वाटसन  ; two are narrated  by   holmes  himself ( `` The Blanched Soldier  ``  and `` The  शेर  's Mane  ``  )  और  two others are written  in   the   तीसरा   व्यक्ति  (  ``  The  mazarin  Stone `` and ``  उसके  Last Bow  ``  )  .
In two  कहानियां  ( `` The  musgrave  Ritual `` and `` The Gloria Scott  ``  ) , Holmes tells Watson  the  main  स्टोरी  from his memories , while  वाटसन  becomes the narrator of the frame story  .
The first and fourth novels , A Study in  स्कारलेट   और   the  Valley  of  Fear  ,  each include a long interval of omniscient  narration   recounting  events unknown to either  holmes   or   वाटसन  .
the   संयुक्त  States House of Representatives is one of  the  two houses  of   the  United States Congress ( a bicameral legislature  )  .
It is frequently referred  to  as the House .
the  other house  is  the Senate .
The composition and powers of the  हाउस   हैं   स्थापित  in Article One of the United States Constitution .
The major power of the  हाउस  is to pass federal  विधान  that affects the entire country although its bills must  भी  be  passed  by the Senate and  further  agreed to by the U.S. President before becoming law (  जबतक   दोनो  the House and Senate  re-pass  the  विधान   साथ  a  two-thirds  majority in each  कक्ष   )  .
The House has several  विशेष   शक्तियां   :  the power to initiate  आय  bills , to  impeach   officials  ,  और   to  elect the  u.S.  President in  मामला  there is  no  majority in  the  Electoral  कॉलेज   .
Each U.S. state is represented  in  the House  in  proportion  to   इसके  population but is entitled to  at  least  एक  representative  .
The most populous state  ,  California , currently has  53  representatives  .
The  कुल  number of voting  प्रतिनिधि  is  फिक्स्ड   by   विधि  at 435 .
प्रत्येक  representative serves  लिये  a  two-year  term .
The Speaker  of  the United States House of Representatives  ,  who presides over the chamber ,  is   निर्वाचित   by  the members of the  हाउस  ,  और  is  इसलिए  traditionally the leader  of   the   हाउस   लोकतांत्रिक  Caucus or the House Republican Conference  ,  whichever party has  अधिक  voting members .
The  हाउस  meets in the  दक्षिण  wing of the United  राज्य  Capitol  .
Jell-O  is  a brand name belonging to U.S.-based Kraft Foods for  a  number  of  gelatin desserts , including fruit gels ,  puddings  and no-bake cream pies .
The  ब्रांड   's   लोकप्रियता  has led  to  it being used as  a  generic  पद  for  जिलेटिन   मिठाई  across  the  U.S. and Canada .
Kennywood is an amusement park located  in  West Mifflin , Pennsylvania , a suburb of  पिट्सबर्ग   .
the  park first opened  in   1898  as a  ``  trolley  पार्क  '' attraction at the end of the Mellon family  's  Monongahela  गली  Railway .
The park was purchased in 1906 by F. W. Henninger and Andrew McSwigan and  यूँ   began  the  kennywood  Entertainment company that has  remained   a   closely   आयोजित   परिवार  business  लिये  over 100  सालो  .
This traditional amusement park  स्टिल   रै  structures and rides  डेटिंग  back  to   इसके  opening and  the   जल्दी  1900s  .
Along with Rye Playland  पार्क  ,  it  is one  of  only two amusement  पार्क  listed  in  the  नेशनल  Register  of  Historic  स्थान  .
Kennywood is  स्वामित्व  by  kennywood   entertainment  Company , which  जबतक  December 2007  थी  a closely held family business owned by the Henninger and McSwigan families .
Kennywood Entertainment is now operated by California-based Palace Entertainment ,  a  subsidiary of Parques Reunidos , an international  मनोरंजन  park  कम्पनी  based in Madrid , Spain  .
Parque Reunidos is  in  turn  a   subsidiary  of Candover Investments  ,  an investment  निधि  based in  the  UK  .
a  Social Security  कार्ड  issued by  the  Railroad Retirement Board  in  1943 to  a   अभी  deceased person .
In the United States , a Social Security number  (  SSN )  is   a  nine-digit number  जारी  to  u.S.  citizens , permanent  निवासियों  , and temporary ( working )  निवासियों  under section 205 ( c  )   (   2   )  of the  सोशल  Security Act  ,  codified as .
The number  is   जारी   to  an individual  by  the Social  सुरक्षा   प्रशासन   ,   an  independent agency of the  संयुक्त  States government .
Its primary  purpose  is to track  individuals  for Social Security  उद्देश्य  .
A Social  सुरक्षा   क्रमांक   may  be obtained by applying on Form  ss-5   ,  `` Application  लिये  A Social Security  क्रमांक  Card ''  .
minimalism  describes movements in various forms of  आर्ट  and design , especially visual art and music , where the work  is  set  आउट  to  expose  the  essence  or  पहचान   of   a  subject through eliminating all non-essential forms , features or  अवधारणाओं  .
Minimalism is any design or style  in   जिससे  the  सरलतम  and fewest elements are used to create the maximum effect .
As a specific  गति  in the arts  it  is identified  साथ   developments  in post–World War II Western Art  ,  most strongly with  अमरीकी  visual arts in the 1960s and early 1970s .
Prominent  कलाकारों  associated with this movement include  डोनाल्ड  Judd , John McCracken , Agnes Martin  ,  Dan Flavin ,  रॉबर्ट  Morris  ,  Anne Truitt  ,   और   फ़्रैंक  Stella .
It  is  rooted in the reductive aspects of Modernism , and is often interpreted  as  a reaction against Abstract  अभिव्यंजनावाद  and a  सेतु  to  postminimal  art practices  .
The terms have expanded to  encompass   a  movement  in  music which  सुविधाएँ   repetition  and iteration , as  in  the compositions of La Monte Young , Terry  रिले  , Steve Reich ,  फिलिप  Glass , and John Adams .
Minimalist compositions are sometimes known  as  systems music .
The term `` minimalist  ''  is often applied  colloquially   to  designate anything that is spare  or   stripped   to  its  अनिवार्य   .
It  रै  also been used to  describe  the plays  और  novels of Samuel Beckett , the  films   of  Robert Bresson , the stories  of   रेमंड  Carver , and  भी  the automobile designs of Colin  chapman   .
The word was  पहला  used in English  in  the early 20th century  to  describe the  mensheviks  .
in   रसायन   और  physics  ,  Dalton 's law ( also  पुकारा  Dalton 's law of partial  pressures  )  राज्य   कि  the  कुल  pressure exerted by  the  mixture  of  non-reactive gases is equal  to   the  sum of the partial pressures of individual gases .
इस   अनुभवजन्य  law  थी  observed by John Dalton  in  1801  और   is  related  to  the ideal  गैस  laws .
Mathematically , the pressure of a  मिश्रण  of  गैसों  can be defined as the summation
or
जहाँ  represent the partial pressure  of  each component .
It  is   assumed  that the gases do not react with each other
where is the mole fraction of the i-th component in the total mixture of  n  components .
The relationship below provides a way to determine the  आवाज़  based  विशेषज्ञता  of any individual gaseous  घटक
where is  the  concentration  of  the i-th component expressed in ppm  .
Dalton 's  विधि   is  not exactly followed  by  real gases .
Those deviations are  considerably  large at high  pressures  .
In such  शर्तें  , the  आवाज़  occupied by  the   अणुओं  can become significant compared to  the  free space between  उन्हें  .
in  particular , the short average distances between  अणुओं  raises  the   तीव्रता   of   intermolecular   शक्तियां  between gas  अणुओं  enough to substantially change the  दबाव   exerted  by  उन्हें  .
Neither of those effects are considered by the ideal gas  मॉडल  .
इस   is  a list of the largest United States  कॉलेजों  and universities by enrollment for colleges and universities in  the   संयुक्त   राज्य   .
What this list includes:
Colleges and universities within the United States
विश्वविद्यालयों  systems if the system  is   चलाएं   अंतर्गत  a  सिंगल  administration
Enrollment  is   the   योग  of the headcount  of  undergraduate and graduate students
नामांकन  is  गिने  by the Integrated  post-secondary  Education  प्रणाली   भीतर   the  U.S. Department of Education  .
Enrollment  is  the 12-month unduplicated headcount , indicating  the   क्रमांक   of  unique students who  attended  the university  दौरान  the year  .
What  इस   सूची  does not include:
Any indication of how  अनेक  of the enrolled students are full or  भाग  time  (  e.g. , some universities may have a  ऊँची  enrollment  ,  but have most  विद्यार्थी   नामांकित   in  only a single  क्लास   )
For other lists  कि   माप   विश्वविद्यालयों  enrollment  ,  see the  देखिए   भी   खण्ड   नीचे  .
``  Right Round '' is  a   सोंग   performed   by   अमरीकी   rapper  Flo Rida , released  as  the lead single from his second studio  एल्बम  ,  r.o.o.t.s  . ( 2009 )  .
The song  सुविधाएँ  guest vocals from  kesha  .
it  was released to radio on  27  January 2009 and  थी  digitally released on 10  फ़रवरी   by   पो  Boy Entertainment and Atlantic Records .
The  सोंग  lyrically  बोलती   of  Flo  rida  's net ball  रेफरी   enthusiasm  , while adapting the  कोरस   of  the 1984 Dead  or   जिंदा  song  ``  You  स्पिन  Me Round  (   जैसे  a Record ) `` in its hook .
According to one of  the   सोंग  's  लेखक   ,  the  कोरस  refers  to  oral  sex   .
Kesha contributed  अतिथि  vocals  to  the  सोंग  , but in the United States ,  दौरान   the   चलाएं  atop the chart , Kesha  थी  uncredited .
The song received mostly  ऋणात्मक  reviews from  आलोचकों   ,  who claimed it was  kitsch  and  misogynistic  .
however   ,  it was a  वाणिज्यिक   कामयाबी  ,  reaching   the   शीर्ष  ten  of  the charts in nineteen countries worldwide .
In the  संयुक्त   राज्य  , it became  flo  Rida  's  second number-one single and broke  the  record for first-week sales when it was released  to   डिजिटल  retailers  .
the  single  's   accompanying  music video  थी  directed by Malcolm Jones and  मनोनीत  for  an   एमटीवी   वीडियो  Music Award .
The song has  महरूम  used  in  several movies , such as The Hangover , The  भद्दा  Truth and the Telugu movie  pilla  Zamindar .
In  the  movie  पिच   पूर्ण  ,  the  song is performed by the a cappella group the Treblemakers .
The Chief  इंसाफ  of the United States is  the  head of the  संयुक्त  States federal court system ( the judicial branch  of   the  federal government of the  संयुक्त  States  )   और   the  chief  न्यायधीश  of the Supreme Court of the United States .
The Chief Justice  is   एक  of nine Supreme  अदालत   justices   ;  the other eight are the Associate Justices of the  परम्  Court  of  the United  राज्य  .
इससे  1789 until 1866 , the office  थी   ज्ञात  as the  मुख्य  Justice of the Supreme  अदालत  .
The Chief Justice  is   the  highest judicial  अधिकारी  in  the  country , and  अधिनियमों   as  a chief administrative officer for  the  federal courts  और   as   सिर  of the  न्यायिक  Conference of  the  United States  appoints  the director of the  प्रशासनिक  Office of the United States  न्यायालयों  .
The  मुख्य   इंसाफ  also serves as  a  spokesperson  लिये   the   न्यायिक   शाखा   .
The Chief  इंसाफ  leads the business  of   the  Supreme Court .
He  presides  over oral arguments before the court  .
When  the  court renders an opinion ,  the   मुख्य  Justice—when  in  the  majority—decides  who  writes   the  court  's   राय  .
The Chief  इंसाफ  also has significant agenda-setting power over the  अदालत  's meetings .
in  the case  of  an impeachment of a President  of  the United  राज्य  ,  जिससे  has occurred  twice  , the  मुख्य  Justice presides  over  the trial  in  the  सीनेट  .
in  modern tradition  ,  the Chief Justice  रै  the ceremonial duty of administering  the  oath of  दफ्तर   of  the President of  the  United States .
The  पहला  Chief Justice  थी  John Jay  .
the  17th and current Chief  इंसाफ   is  John  G.  Roberts , Jr .
