Prudhoe Bay Oil Field is  a   विशाल   आयल   फ़ील्ड  on Alaska 's North Slope  .
It is  the   largest  oil field  in  both the United States and in North America  ,  covering and originally containing approximately of oil .
The amount of  recoverable  oil in  the  field is more than double  कि   of   the  next  largest  field in the  संयुक्त  States , the  ईस्ट  Texas oil field .
the  field is operated by BP ; partners are ExxonMobil and ConocoPhillips Alaska .
Labor unions  हैं   legally  recognized  as  representatives  of  workers in many industries in the United States  .
Their activity today centers on collective bargaining over wages , benefits  ,   और   working  conditions for their membership , and  on  representing their  सदस्यों  in  विवादों  with management over  उल्लंघनों   of  contract  प्रावधानों   .
larger  unions also typically engage in  lobbying  activities and electioneering  at  the state and federal level .
सबसे   संघ  in America  हैं   लकीर  with one  of  two  larger  umbrella organizations :  the  AFL-CIO created in 1955 , and  the  Change to Win Federation which split from the AFL-CIO in 2005 .
दोनो   एडवोकेट  policies and  विधान   on  behalf of workers in the United States and Canada  ,  and take  an  active role  in   राजनीती  .
The  afl-cio  is especially  चिंतित  with global trade issues  .
In  2010  , the percentage of workers  belonging   to  a  संघ  in the United  राज्य   (  or total labor union  ``   घनत्व  ''  )  was  11.4   %  , compared to 18.4 %  in  Germany ,  27.5   %  in Canada  ,  and 70  %   in  Finland .
संघ  membership in the private sector  रै  fallen under 7  %  — levels not  देखी  since 1932 .
संघ  allege  कि  employer-incited opposition has contributed  to  this decline in  सदस्यता   .
The  सबसे  prominent unions  हैं   among  public  सेक्टर   कर्मचारी  such  as  teachers  और  police .
सदस्यों  of unions are  disproportionately   पुरानी  , male and  निवासियों  of  the  Northeast , the Midwest , and California .
Union workers average 10-30  %  higher  अदा   than   non-union  in America after controlling for  व्यक्तिगत   ,  job  ,   और  labor market  विशेषताएँ  .
हालांकि   much   छोटी  compared  to   उनके  peak membership in the 1950s , American unions  remain  a prominent political factor , both through mobilization  of   उनके  own  सदस्यताएँ  and through coalitions  साथ  like-minded activist organizations around  मुद्दे  such as immigrant  अधिकारों   ,  trade policy , health  परवाह  , and living wage campaigns .
to   लड़ो   कथित   नियोक्ता   anti-union  programs  ,  unions are  फिलहाल  advocating new `` card  जाँच   ``  federal legislation that would require employers  to  bargain with a  संघ   if   अधिक  than 50 % of workers signed  फ़ॉर्म  , or  ``   ताश  , '' stating  वे   काश   to   be  represented  by  that union  .
The current procedure  involves  waiting 45  to  90 days for a  federally   पर्यवेक्षित  secret-ballot employee referendum on  the  subject .
The  अर्थशास्त्री   जोसेफ  Stiglitz  रै   asserted   कि  , `` Strong unions have helped to reduce inequality  ,  whereas weaker  संघ  have  बना  it easier for CEOs  ,   sometimes   working   साथ  market forces that they have helped shape ,  to  increase it .  ''
The decline in  unionization  since WWII in the United States  रै  been associated with  a   सुनाया   वृद्धि  in income  और   माल  inequality .
A Christian Lacroix fashion boutique
A boutique is  a   छोटी  shopping outlet , especially  एक  that  specializes   in  elite and fashionable items such as clothing  और  jewelry .
The word is  फ्रेंच  for `` shop  ''   ,  via  लैटिन  from Greek ἀποθήκη (  apothēkē  ) , `` storehouse '' .
The term entered into everyday English  उपयोग  in  the  late 1960s when  ,  for a  ब्रैड  period  ,   लंदन  was the centre  of  the fashion trade  .
Carnaby Street and the Kings Road were the  फ़ोकस  of much media attention as home to  the  most fashionable  boutiques  of  the  era .
Now the East  of   लंदन   रै  been regenerated and more Boutiques  पॉप  up in fashionable areas , such as Tower Bridge Road .
It can also refer to a specialised  कड़   ऐसे   as  a  बुटीक  investment bank or  बुटीक   विधि   कड़  .
The word is often  प्रयुक्त  to describe a property in  the  independent  खण्ड  of the hotel  मार्केट   (  such  as  The Rockwell in London )  in  order to distinguish themselves  इससे  larger chains ( such  as  Hilton Hotels ) .
In such cases the establishments aim to convey  the  idea that  the  operation is elite and  अत्यधिक  specialised .
In  the  strictest  भाव  of  the  word , boutiques would be  one-of-a-kind  but more generally  बोलना  , some chains can be  referred  to as boutiques  if   वे  specialize in particular  शैलियाँ  .
recently  ,  the   पद  `` boutique '' has  प्रारंभ   होने  applied to normally-mass-market items that  हैं  either niche or produced in  intentionally  small numbers at  बहुत  high prices .
This may  be   referred   to  as boutique  निर्माण  .
For  उदाहरण  ,  पहले   the   रिलीज  of the Wii , a Time  पत्रिका  article  सुझाया  that Nintendo could become  a  ``  बुटीक  video-game  कम्पनी  '' , producing games  लिये  niche audiences , rather  than   trying  to compete directly with  microsoft   और  Sony .
In the  परंपरागत  luxury- watch industry Scalfaro International  is   माना   as  the precursor  in  manufacturing and sale of bespoke  घड़ियाँ   .
The Swiss company uses a highly flexible boutique  निर्माण  site , which  allows  producing small  श्रेणी  or even  अद्वितीय   timepieces  .
Although some boutiques specialise in hand-made items and other truly one-of-a-kind items , others  बस   उपज   t-shirts  ,  स्टिकर  , and  अन्य  fashion accessories  in  artificially small runs and sell them  at   unusually  high prices .
In  the   जल्दी  1990s Selena  प्रारंभ  manufacturing her own line of women 's clothing .
Opening two  boutiques  labeled as  ``  Selena Etc .  बुटीक  & Salon ''  एक   स्तिथ   in   कॉर्पस  Christi and  एक  located  in  San  अंतोनियो  , Texas .
One  थी  due to open in Monterrey , Mexico , in 1995  लकिन  due to  उसके   मौत   it  was not  खोली  .
around  1999 the San  अंतोनियो   स्थान  closed and  the   कॉर्पस  Christi  स्थान   थी  closed in  2009  .
In  लेट  1990s some European retail traders  विकसित  the idea of  tailoring  a shop  towards  a lifestyle  थीम  ,  in   the  form  of   ``  concept stores '' , which specialised in  cross-selling  without using  पृथक  departments .
One of the  पहला  concept stores was 10  कोरसो  Como in  मिलान  , Italy followed  by   colette  in Paris and Quartier 206 in  बर्लिन  .
Several well-known  अमरीकी   जंजीरों   ऐसे   as   शहरी   outfitters  ,  d-a-s-h   ,   और  The Gap , Australian  कड़ी  Billabong and , though less common  ,  Lord  &  Taylor adapted  to  the concept store trend  बाद  2000 .
Navy  संघीय  Credit Union (  or  Navy  संघीय  )  is  a  क्रेडिट  union headquartered in Vienna , Virginia , chartered and regulated under the authority of the National Credit  संघ  Administration  (  NCUA  )   of  the U.S. federal government .
Navy Federal is the  largest  natural member  (   or  retail )  क्रेडिट  union in  the  world , both in asset size and  in  membership .
as  of September 2012 , Navy  संघीय  had over  $  50 billion USD in  एसेट  ,  और  over 4 million members .
stevland  Hardaway Morris  (   born   may   13  ,  1950  as Stevland Hardaway Judkins ) , known by his stage name Stevie Wonder ,  is  an  अमरीकी  singer  ,  songwriter  ,   और  multi-instrumentalist , a  चाइल्ड  prodigy who developed  into  one of the  सबसे  creative musical figures of  the  late 20th century .
अँधा  since shortly after birth , Wonder signed with Motown 's Tamla  लेबल  at  the  age of eleven  ,   और  continues to perform  और  record  लिये  Motown  to  this day  .
among   अचरज  's best  ज्ञात  works are singles  ऐसे  as ``  अंधविश्वास   ``  , `` Sir  ड्यूक  `` , `` You Are the Sunshine  of  My  जीवन   ``  and  ``  I  बस  Called to  कह  I Love You `` .
Well known albums also include Talking Book , Innervisions  और  Songs in the  कुंजी  of Life .
He has recorded  अधिक  than  तीस  U.S. top  टेन  hits  और  received twenty-two Grammy Awards , the  सबसे  ever  awarded  to a male  सोलो  artist  .
अचरज  is  भी   विख्यात  for his work as  an   activist  for political causes , including  उसके  1980 campaign to make Martin Luther  किंग   ,  Jr. 's  जन्मदिवस  a holiday  in   the  United States .
In 2009  ,  Wonder was named  a  United Nations Messenger  of  Peace .
In  2008  , Billboard magazine  released   a  list of  the  Hot  100  All-Time Top Artists to  celebrate  the US singles chart 's  पचासवें  anniversary , with Wonder at number five .
By  लोकप्रिय  vote ,  स्टीवी  was inducted into The SoulMusic Hall  of  Fame  at  SoulMusic.com in December  2012  .
Psychosis (  इससे   the   यूनानी  ψυχή `` psyche '' , for mind/soul , and -ωσις `` -osis  ''  , for  असामान्य   कंडीशन   or   derangement  )  refers  to an abnormal condition of the mind  ,  and is  a  generic psychiatric term for  a  mental  राज्य  often  वर्णित   as   involving  a `` loss of contact with  वास्तविकता  `` .
People suffering from  मनस्ताप  are described as psychotic .
Psychosis is given to the more severe forms of psychiatric disorder ,  दौरान  which hallucinations and  delusions   ,   सकल  excitement or  बेहोशी  and  impaired   इनसाइट   may  occur .
the  term  ``   मनस्ताप  '' is very broad and can mean anything from  अपेक्षाकृत  normal aberrant experiences  through  to the complex and  catatonic  expressions of  schizophrenia  and  द्विध्रुवी  type 1  विकार  .
moreover   a  wide  किस्में  of central nervous system diseases  ,  from both  बाह्य   substances  and internal physiologic  बीमारी  ,  can  produce  लक्षण   of  psychosis .
This led many professionals to  कह  that psychosis  is  not specific enough  as   a  diagnostic term .
despite  this ,  ``  psychosis  ''  is generally given to noticeable  deficits  in normal  बर्ताव  ( negative  लक्षण  )  और  more  commonly  to diverse types of hallucinations  or   delusional  beliefs  (  e.g . grandiosity  ,  delusions  of   persecution  ) .
Someone  exhibiting  very obvious signs may  be   वर्णित  as  ``  frankly psychotic  ''   ,  whereas one exhibiting very subtle signs could be classified in the category of  an  `` attenuated  psychotic  risk  सिंड्रोम  ''  .
an   excess   in  dopaminergic signalling  is  traditionally linked to  the   धनात्मक   लक्षण  of psychosis  ,   विशेषकर  those of schizophrenia  .
This  is  thought to occur through a mechanism of aberrant salience  of  environmental stimuli .
Many antipsychotic  दवाएँ  accordingly  निशाना  the  dopamine  system ;  meta-analyses   of  placebo-controlled  ट्रायल  of these drugs , however  ,   दिखाएँ  either  no  significant difference between drug and placebo  ,  or a very small  प्रभाव  size  ,  suggesting that the  pathophysiology   of   मनस्ताप  is  much   अधिक  complex  than  an overactive dopamine system .
लोगों  experiencing psychosis may exhibit  कुछ   व्यक्तित्व  changes and  विचार  disorder  .
Depending on  इसके  severity ,  इस  may be  accompanied  by unusual or  विचित्र   बर्ताव  , as well as difficulty with social interaction and impairment  in  carrying  आउट  daily life  क्रियाएँ  .
General Grievous is  a   fictional   अक्षर  in the Star Wars  ब्रह्मांड  .
A  पुनरावर्ती  antagonist , he  is  the Supreme Commander of the  confederacy  of Independent Systems , a political faction  of  planetary systems  waging   युद्ध  on the Galactic  गणतंत्र  .
Trained  in  all seven forms  of  lightsaber combat by Count  dooku  , he is  a  ruthless and  शक्तिशाली  warrior  devoted  to  जेडी  's destruction during  the  Clone Wars .
His  अधिनियमों  of wanton aggression  और  high Jedi body  गिनती   होता  prompt  the  galaxy to give  उसे  the nickname  the   knightslayer  .
हालांकि  the notorious  जेडी  slayer was  the  being in  the   आकाशगंगा   दौरान  the Clone  युद्धों   जो  had killed  the  most Jedi  in  single combat  ,  he  किया   नहीं   संकोच  to flee  इससे  battles he knew he would  खोना  .
आंकडे  play  an  important role in summarizing  बेसबॉल  performance  और   evaluating  players in the sport  .
Since the flow of  a  baseball game has natural breaks to  it  , and normally players act individually rather  than   performing  in clusters  ,  the sport lends  itself  to easy record-keeping and  आंकडे  .
Statistics  have   महरूम  kept for professional baseball since the creation of the  नेशनल  League and American League  ,   अभी  part of Major League Baseball .
Many statistics are also available from outside of Major League  बेसबॉल  , from leagues such as the National Association of Professional  आधार   बॉल   खिलाड़ी  and  the  Negro  लीग  .
Dorothea  lange  's  migrant  Mother depicts destitute  मटर  pickers in California  ,   centering  on  फ्लोरेंस   ओवेन्स   थॉम्पसन  ,  आयु  32  ,  a mother of  सात  children , in Nipomo  ,  California ,  कूच   1936   .
यूएसए  annual  रियल  GDP  इससे  1910–60 , with the years  of  the Great  अवसाद  ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted .
the  unemployment rate in the US 1910–1960  ,  with the years of the Great Depression (  1929–1939   )   highlighted  .
the  Great Depression was a severe worldwide  आर्थिक  depression in  the   दशक  preceding  संसार  War II  .
The timing of  the   ग्रेट  Depression varied across nations , but in  सबसे   देशों   it   प्रारंभ  in  1930  and lasted until the  लेट  1930s or middle  1940s  .
it  was the longest , most  फैली  , and  deepest  depression of  the   20th  century  .
In the  21st  century ,  the  Great Depression is  commonly   प्रयुक्त  as an  उदाहरण  of how far the  संसार   's  economy  can  decline .
The depression originated in  the   u.S.  ,  बाद  the fall in  भण्डार  prices that began  around   सितंबर  4 , 1929  ,  and became worldwide news with  the  stock market crash of October 29 , 1929 ( known as  ब्लैक  Tuesday  )   .
the  Great Depression had devastating  प्रभाव  in countries  समृद्ध  and poor  .
Personal income , tax  आय   ,  profits and  कीमतें  dropped , while international  व्यापार  plunged  by  more than 50 % .
Unemployment  in  the U.S. rose to 25  %  , and  in   कुछ  countries rose as high as 33  %  .
Cities all around the world were hit hard ,  विशेषकर  those dependent on heavy industry .
Construction  थी  virtually  halted  in many countries .
Farming  और  rural areas suffered as  क्रॉप  prices fell by approximately 60 % .
facing  plummeting demand with  few   वैकल्पिक   स्त्रोत   of  jobs , areas dependent on primary sector industries  ऐसे  as  नकदी  cropping ,  खनन  and  लॉगिंग  suffered  the  most  .
Some  economies  started to recover by the mid-1930s  .
In many countries  ,  the negative  प्रभाव   of  the  ग्रेट   अवसाद  lasted until the  समाप्त   of  World War II .
A premature ventricular contraction  (   पीवीसी  )  ,   भी  known as  a   असामयिक   ventricular   जटिल  , ventricular premature  संकुचन   (   or  complex or  देवालय  ) ( VPC  )  ,  ventricular  premature beat  (  VPB  )  ,  or   ventricular  extrasystole  (   ves   )   ,  is a  अपेक्षाकृत   आम  event where  the   धड़कन  is initiated by  purkinje   मछली  in the ventricles rather  than  by  the   sinoatrial  node ,  the  normal heartbeat  initiator  .
The electrical  कार्यक्रम   of  the heart detected  by  the electrocardiogram allow a PVC  to  be easily distinguished from a normal heart beat .
A  पीवीसी  may be perceived  as  a `` skipped beat `` or felt as  palpitations  in the chest .
In a normal  धड़कन  , the  ventricles  contract after the  atria  have  helped  to  भरण  them by  contracting   ;  in this way the  ventricles  can pump a maximized amount of  रक्त   दोनो   to  the  फेफड़े  and to  the  rest  of  the body  .
In a PVC , the  ventricles  contract first  और  before  the  atria have optimally filled the ventricles  साथ  blood  ,   जिससे  means  कि   परिसंचरण   is   अकुशल  .
However  ,  single beat  पीवीसी  arrhythmias do  नहीं   प्रायः   पोज़  a danger and can  be  asymptomatic in healthy individuals  .
William  गेरी   busey   (   born  June  29  ,  1944  )  ,  better known  as  Gary Busey , is an  अमरीकी  film and  स्टेज  actor , and artist  .
he  has appeared  in  a variety of films , including  lethal   हथियार  ,  पाइंट  Break  ,   और  Under  घेरा  , as  खूब   as   अतिथि   दिखावे   on  Gunsmoke ,  वाकर  , Texas Ranger , Law & Order  ,  and  अनुगामी   .
he  was nominated for an Academy Award  लिये  Best Actor  in  1978 for  उसके  role  in   the  Buddy  होली   स्टोरी  .
the  Anti-Counterfeiting Trade Agreement ( ACTA  )   ,   is  a  बहुराष्ट्रीय  treaty for the purpose  of  establishing international standards for intellectual property  अधिकारों  enforcement .
the  agreement aims to establish an international  विधिक  framework for targeting counterfeit goods  ,   जेनेरिक   दवाइयाँ  and copyright  infringement  on the Internet ,  और   होता   बनाएँ  a new governing  देह  outside existing forums  ,  such as the World Trade  संगठन  , the World  बौद्धिक  Property Organization  ,   or   the   संयुक्त  Nations  .
The agreement was  हस्ताक्षरित  in October 2011 by Australia , Canada ,  जापानी  , Morocco , New Zealand , Singapore , South Korea , and  the   संयुक्त  States  .
In 2012  ,   मैक्सिको  , the  यूरोपीय   संघ  and  22  countries  जिससे  are member states  of  the European Union  हस्ताक्षरित  as well .
One signatory ( Japan )  रै   ratified  ( formally  स्वीकृत  ) the  अनुबंध  , which would come into  फ़ोर्स  in  देशों  that  ratified  it  बाद  ratification by six countries .
समर्थक   have  described the  अनुबंध  as  a  response  to  `` the  बढ़ाएँ  in  वैश्विक  trade  of   नकली   goods  and pirated  कापीराइट   सुरक्षित  works ''  .
ट्रेड  Unions representing workers in the  म्यूज़िक  , film  और   tv  industries  और   विशाल   बौद्धिक  property-based organizations such  as  the Motion Picture Association of America and Pharmaceutical Research and Manufacturers  of  America  यहूद  active in the treaty 's development .
Opponents  कह  the convention adversely affects  आधारभूत  rights including freedom of expression and  गोपनीयता  .
ACTA has also been criticised  by  Doctors  बगैर   सीमायें  for endangering access to medicines  in  developing countries  .
The  रहस्य  nature of negotiations has excluded  सिविल  society groups  ,  developing countries and the general public  इससे  the  अनुबंध  's negotiation  प्रक्रम  and it has been described as policy laundering  by   आलोचकों  including the Electronic  frontier  Foundation and the Entertainment Consumers  संघ  .
The signature of the  eu  and  अनेक  of its member states resulted in the resignation  in  protest of  the  European Parliament 's appointed  मुख्य  investigator  ,  rapporteur Kader Arif , as well as widespread  विरोध  across Europe .
In 2012  the  newly-appointed rapporteur  ,  British MEP David Martin  ,  recommended against  the   सन्धि   ,  stating  :  `` The intended benefits  of  this international  अनुबंध   हैं  far outweighed by  the  potential  खतरे   to   सिविल  liberties '' .
On 4 July  2012  ,  the  European Parliament rejected the agreement  in   plenary  session  ,  with 478  मतदान  against  the  treaty  ,  39  in   पक्ष  and  165   meps   abstaining  .
faw  semi-trailer truck in China
Tractor  साथ  side dump trailer  semi-trailer
A  ट्रैक्टर  with an auto-transport semi-trailer  .
Semi-trailer truck with sleeper behind  the   टैक्सी  .
a  semi-trailer truck is  an   articulated  vehicle that  consists   of  a towing engine , known as a  ट्रैक्टर  in  the  United States and truck  in  many other places , attached to  एक   or  more semi-trailers to carry  भाड़ा  .
It is also  ज्ञात  as  a   हस्तांतरण  in Canada , prime mover in Australia , semi , tractor-trailer , truck and trailer , transfer  ट्रक  ,  18-wheeler  , mack truck ,  बिग   रिग  in the United  राज्य  , or artic  ,  short for  articulated  lorry ,  in   ब्रिटेन   और  Ireland  .
a  semi-trailer does not trail completely behind  the   towing  vehicle , but is attached  at   a  point  कि  is just forward of  the  rear-most axle of  the  towing unit .
This is done  so  that a fraction of the weight of the trailer  is   carried  by  the  prime  प्रस्तावक  .
This arrangement means that both tractor and semi-trailer  होगा  have a  distinctly  different design  than   a  rigid  ट्रक  and trailer .
The Pittsburgh  स्टीलर्स  are a  पेशेवर   फ़ुटबॉल   टोली  based  in  Pittsburgh , Pennsylvania .
The team currently belongs  to  the North Division of the American Football Conference ( AFC  )  in  the  National Football League (  एनएफएल  )  .
Founded in  ,  the Steelers are  the  oldest franchise  in  the AFC .
Pittsburgh has won more  सुपर  Bowl titles ( six ) ,  जीती  more  afc  Championship  खेल  ( eight ) and played in (  पंद्रह   )   और  hosted more  (   ग्यारह  ) conference  चैंपियनशिप  games  than  any other AFC  or  NFC  टोली  .
the  Steelers  share  the record for most Super  कटोरी   दिखावे   साथ   the  Dallas  cowboys  (  आठ  ) .
The  स्टीलर्स  won  उनके  most recent championship ,  सुपर   कटोरी  XLIII  ,   on  February 1  ,   2009  .
The Steelers  यहूद   संस्थापित  as the Pittsburgh Pirates  on  July 8  ,  1933  ,   by   आर्ट   रूनी   ,  taking  इसके   असली   नाम  from the  बेसबॉल  team of the same name , as was common practice  लिये  NFL teams to  do   at  the time .
The ownership  of  the Steelers  रै  remained within  the  Rooney family since its founding .
The current owner  is  Art 's  बेटे  , Dan Rooney ,  जो  has given much control of the franchise  to  his son Art Rooney II .
Long one  of   the   एनएफएल   's  flagship  टीमों  ,  the  Steelers enjoy a large , widespread fanbase nicknamed Steeler  स्वदेश   .
The Steelers currently  खेल   उनके  home  खेल  at Heinz Field  on   पिट्सबर्ग  's North Side  in   the   उत्तर   shore  neighborhood  ,   जिससे  also  होस्ट  the University of Pittsburgh  पैंथर्स  .
Built in 2001 , the stadium  replaced  Three Rivers Stadium  जिससे  hosted the Steelers for 31 seasons .
Prior  to   तीन   नदियाँ  , the Steelers  था  played their games in  pitt  Stadium and Forbes Field .
Three  अलग  kinds of wheat and  rye   आटा
आटा  is a  चूर्ण  which is  बना   by  grinding cereal grains ,  or  other seeds or  जड़ें  ( like  कसावा  )  .
It is  the  main  संघटक  of bread ,  जिससे  is  a   स्टेपल  food  लिये  many cultures , making  the  availability of  पर्याप्त  supplies of flour  a   प्रमुख   आर्थिक  and  राजनैतिक  issue at various times  throughout  history .
Wheat flour  is  one of  the  most important foods  in  European , North American  ,   मध्य   पूर्वी  , Indian  और  North African cultures , and is the defining  संघटक  in most  of  their styles of breads and  pastries  .
While wheat is the  सबसे  common  आधार  for flour , corn  आटा  has been  महत्वपूर्ण  in  mesoamerican   भोजन   चूंकि  ancient times  ,  and remains  a   स्टेपल   throughout  the  americas   .
Rye flour  is   an  important constituent of bread  in  much of  सेंट्रल  Europe , and rice can also be  प्रयुक्त  in flour , though this is  अपेक्षाकृत   uncommon  .
Heart rate is  the   क्रमांक  of heartbeats per  ईकाई  of time  ,  typically expressed as beats per  मिनट  ( bpm )  .
Heart rate can  vary  as the body 's need to  अवशोषित   ऑक्सीजन  and excrete  कार्बन   डाइऑक्साइड  changes  ,  such as  दौरान   शारीरिक  exercise  ,  sleep , illness  ,   or  as a result of ingesting drugs :
Central nervous  प्रणाली  stimulants such as amphetamines  बढ़ाएँ  heart rate .
Central  बेचैन  system depressants  or  sedatives decreases  the   दिल  rate ( apart from  कुछ   विशेषकर  strange ones with equally strange effects ,  ऐसे  as  केटामाइन  which can  कारण  -  amongst  many other things -  stimulant-like   प्रभाव   ऐसे  as tachycardia )  .
There are many ways in which the heart rate speeds up or slows  bas   .
Most  involve  stimulant-like endorphins and  हार्मोन   होने   released  in  the  brain , many  of  which  हैं   those   कि  are 'forced'/'enticed ' out by  the   ingestion   और  processing of  दवाएँ  .
Due to individuals  having   a   निरंतर   रक्त  volume , one  of   the  physiological ways to deliver more oxygen to  an  organ is  to  increase  दिल  rate  to  permit blood to pass  by  the  अंग   अधिक  often .
Normal resting  दिल   दरों   दायरा  from 60-100 bpm  .
मंदनाड़ी  is defined as a  resting  heart  रेट   नीचे   60  bpm .
However , heart  दरों   इससे  50 to 60 bpm are common  among  healthy people and  do  not necessarily require  खास  attention  .
Tachycardia is defined as a resting heart  रेट   ऊपर  100 bpm , though persistent  बाकी  rates  between   80-100  bpm ,  मुख्यतः  if they are present  दौरान  sleep ,  may   be  signs  of   हाइपरथाइरॉयडिज़्म  or anemia ( see below ) .
Catherine II 's  carved  , painted  और  gilded Coronation Coach ( Hermitage  संग्रहालय  )
A carriage  is  a wheeled vehicle  लिये  people , usually horse-drawn  ;  litters ( palanquins ) and sedan  कुर्सियां  are excluded  ,   चूंकि  they  हैं  wheelless  वाहनों  .
The  carriage   is  especially designed  लिये  private  यात्री  use and  लिये  comfort or  लालित्य  ,  हालांकि  some are  भी  used  to  transport  goods  .
it  may be light , smart  और   तेज़  or  भारी  ,  विशाल  and  आरामदायक  .
Carriages  सामान्यतः  have suspension  using   पत्ता  springs , elliptical springs ( in the 19th century )  or   चमड़े   दीर्घकाय  .
A public passenger  गाडी  would not  प्रायः  be called  a  carriage  –  terms for such include  stagecoach  , charabanc  और  omnibus .
working  vehicles  ऐसे   as   the   (  four-wheeled ) wagon and ( two-wheeled ) cart  share  important parts  of  the  इतिहास  of the carriage ,  as  is the fast  (  two-wheeled  )  chariot .
the  2004 Indian Ocean  भूकंप  was an undersea megathrust  भूकंप  that  occurred   at  00:58:53 UTC on Sunday ,  26   दिसम्बर  2004 , with an epicentre  बंद   the   वेस्ट  coast of Sumatra ,  इंडोनेशिया  .
the  quake  itself  is known  by  the scientific  जातियाँ  as  the  Sumatra–Andaman earthquake  .
The resulting  सुनामी  was  दिए  various  names  , including the 2004 Indian  समंदर   सुनामी  ,  दक्षिण  Asian tsunami  ,   इंडोनेशियाई  tsunami , and  the  Boxing Day tsunami .
the   भूकंप  was caused by  subduction  and  triggered  a series of  विनाशकारी  tsunamis  साथ   the  coasts  of   सबसे  landmasses bordering the Indian Ocean  ,  killing over 230,000 people in fourteen  देशों  , and inundating coastal  समुदायों  with  लहरें   up   to   ऊँची   .
It  थी  one of the deadliest natural disasters  in   अंकित  history .
Indonesia was the hardest-hit country , followed by  श्री  Lanka  ,   इण्डिया  ,  और  Thailand .
साथ  a magnitude of Mw 9.1–9.3 , it  is  the third largest earthquake ever recorded on  a  seismograph .
The earthquake had  the  longest duration of faulting ever observed , between  8.3  and 10 minutes .
It caused the entire planet to vibrate  as  much as  और   triggered  other earthquakes  as  far away as Alaska .
Its  epicentre  was between  simeulue  and  मेनलैंड  Indonesia  .
The  दुर्दशा  of  the  affected people and  देशों  prompted a worldwide humanitarian response .
In all ,  the  worldwide community donated more  than  $  14  billion ( 2004  us  $ ) in  humanitarian  aid  .
Steam rising from the Nesjavellir  geothermal  Power Station in  आइसलैंड  .
Geothermal energy is thermal  उर्जा   उत्पन्न  and stored in the Earth .
थर्मल  energy is the energy that  determines   the  temperature of matter .
The Geothermal energy of the  धरती   's   क्रस्ट  originates  इससे  the original formation of  the  planet (  20  % ) and from  रेडियोसक्रिय  decay  of  minerals ( 80  %   )  .
The geothermal  अनुपात  , which is the  अंतर  in temperature between the core  of   the   ग्रह   और  its surface ,  ड्राइव   a  continuous  conduction  of thermal energy in  the  form of  ऊष्मा  from the  कोर  to the surface .
the  adjective geothermal originates from the Greek roots γη (  ge  ) , meaning earth , and θερμος ( thermos ) , meaning hot  .
At  the  core of the  धरती   ,  thermal  उर्जा   is  created by  रेडियोसक्रिय  decay and  temperatures   may   पहुँचें   over  5000 °C ( 9,000 °F ) .
ऊष्मा   conducts  from  the  core to surrounding  कूलर  rock .
The high temperature and  दबाव   कारण  some  चट्टान  to melt , creating magma convection  upward   चूंकि   it   is  lighter than  the   ठोस  rock .
the   मैग्मा  heats  चट्टान  and  जल  in the crust  ,   sometimes  up to 370 °C  (  700 °F ) .
From hot springs , geothermal energy has been used  लिये   स्नान   चूंकि   paleolithic  times and for space heating since  प्राचीन  Roman times ,  लकिन  it is now  बेहतर  known  लिये  electricity generation .
Worldwide ,  परिचय  10,715 megawatts (  mw   )  of geothermal  शक्ति  is online  in   24  countries .
an   अतिरिक्त  28 gigawatts of direct  geothermal  heating  क्षमता  is installed  लिये   ज़िला  heating , space heating , spas  ,  industrial processes , desalination and agricultural applications  .
Geothermal  शक्ति   is  cost effective  ,   विश्वसनीय  , sustainable , and environmentally friendly ,  लकिन  has historically  महरूम  limited to  क्षेत्रों  near  tectonic   थाली   सीमाएँ  .
Recent technological advances have dramatically expanded  the  range and size  of   सुगठित  resources , especially  लिये   अनुप्रयोग   ऐसे   as   घर  heating , opening a potential for widespread exploitation .
geothermal  wells release greenhouse gases trapped deep within the earth , but  ये  emissions are much  निम्नतर  per  उर्जा  unit than those of fossil fuels .
As  a  result , geothermal power has  the  potential  to  help mitigate global  वार्मिंग   if   widely   तैनात  in place of fossil fuels .
The Earth  's   geothermal   संसाधन   हैं  theoretically more than adequate to supply  मानवता   's  energy needs , but only a  बहुत  small fraction may  be  profitably exploited .
Drilling and  खोजी  for deep resources is very expensive .
Forecasts  लिये   the   भविष्य  of geothermal power depend on assumptions  परिचय  technology  ,  energy prices ,  subsidies  , and interest  दरों  .
Pilot programs  जैसे  EWEB 's customer opt in  ग्रीन   शक्ति  Program show that customers  होता  be willing  to  pay a  छोटी  more for  a   बेदर्दी  energy  सोर्स   जैसे  geothermal .
But  as  a  परिणाम  of government assisted research and industry experience ,  the  cost of generating geothermal power has  decreased  by  25  % over the past two  दशकों   .
In 2001 ,  geothermal  energy cost  between   दो  and ten cents per kwh .
the   पद   घन   पैर   is  an Imperial  और  US  प्रथागत  ( non- metric )  ईकाई  of  आवाज़  , used in  the  United  राज्य  and  the   संयुक्त  Kingdom .
It  is   पारिभाषित   as  the volume  of  a  घन   साथ  sides  of   एक   पैर  ( 0.3048 m ) in length  .
To  गणना   घन  feet multiply length  x   चौडाई  X height .
hồ   chí  Minh ( Northern  वियतनामी  pronunciation :  ,  Southern Vietnamese pronunciation  :   )  ;  19  May  1890   –  2 September 1969 ) ,  born  Nguyễn Sinh Cung and  भी  known as Nguyễn Tất Thành  और   nguyễn  Ái  quốc  , was a  वियतनामी   कम्युनिस्ट  revolutionary leader who was prime minister (  1945–1955  ) and president ( 1945–1969 ) of the  लोकतांत्रिक  Republic of Vietnam ( North Vietnam  )  .
He was a  कुंजी  figure in the foundation of  the  Democratic  गणतंत्र   of  Vietnam in  1945  , as  खूब  as the  people’s   फौज   of  Vietnam ( PAVN  )  and  the  Việt Cộng ( NLF  or  VC ) during the Vietnam  युद्ध   .
he  led the Việt  मिन्ह  independence movement  इससे   1941  onward ,  establishing  the communist -ruled  लोकतांत्रिक  Republic of  वियतनाम  in  1945  and defeating  the  French Union in  1954  at  the  battle of Điện Biên Phủ .
he  officially  stepped   bas  from power in 1955  due  to  स्वास्थ्य   समस्याएं  , but remained a highly  दृश्य   figurehead  and inspiration for  those   वियतनामी  fighting for his cause—a united , communist Vietnam—until his death  .
After the war ,  साइगॉन  , capital  of  the  गणतंत्र   of  Vietnam , was  renamed   hồ  Chí  मिन्ह  City  .
All  सड़कें  Lead Home is a feature  फिल्मी   released  on September  26   ,   2008   .
Directed by Dennis Fallon  ,   it  stars Peter Boyle , Patton Oswalt ,  जेसन   लंदन   ,  Vivien Cardone , Vanessa  शाखा  , Peter  कायोटी   ,   स्टीफन  Milton , and Allan Kayser  .
The movie was filmed in and  around  Kansas  नगर   ,  Missouri .
the   फिल्म  made its World Premiere  जनवरी  27 at the Santa Barbara International Film  पर्व  .
The film  रै   भी   recently   महरूम   in  several  फिल्मी   त्यौहार   ,   और   रै  received  ख़राब  reviews  .
Peter Boyle died before  the   फिल्म  's release .
It  थी  the last  फिल्म  he appeared in .
बिक्री  taxes  in  the  संयुक्त  States  हैं  taxes placed on  the  sale or lease  of   goods  and services  in  the United States  .
While no national general sales tax exists , the federal  सरकारी   levies  several national selective  बिक्री  taxes on the sale or lease of  particular  goods and services  .
Furthermore , forty-five states , the District  of   कोलंबिया   ,  and Guam  थोपने   सामान्य  sales  कर   कि  apply to the sale or  पट्टे  of most goods and some services  ,  and states also may levy selective sales  कर  on  the   बिक्री  or lease of  particular  goods or  सेवाएं   .
States may also  प्रतिनिधि  to  लोकल  governments the authority to  थोपने   अतिरिक्त  general  or  selective  बिक्री  taxes .
Sales tax is  गणना  by multiplying the  खरीदें   दाम  by the applicable tax  रेट  .
Tax rates vary  widely   by   क्षेत्राधिकार  and range  इससे  less  than   1  % to  over  10  %  .
बिक्री   कर   is  collected  by  the  विक्रेता  at the  समय  of sale  .
Use tax is self assessed by a  खरीदार  who  रै  not  सशुल्क  sales  कर  on a  taxable   खरीदें   .
नापसंद   the  value added tax ,  a  sales  कर   is  imposed  तभी  once , at  the  retail level  .
However ,  in  cases where items  हैं   बेची  at retail more than once  ,  such as used cars , the sales tax can  be  charged  on  the  वही   मद  indefinitely .
The  परिभाषा   of  retail sales  और  what goods  और  services are taxable vary among the states  .
nearly  all jurisdictions provide numerous  श्रेणी   of   goods  and services that are  exempt  from sales tax ,  or  taxed  at  reduced rates .
The  खरीदें   of  goods for  further  manufacture or for  पुनर्विक्रय   is  uniformly  exempt  from  बिक्री  tax .
सबसे  jurisdictions exempt food  बेची  in grocery stores , prescription medications ,  और  many  agricultural  supplies .
Sales taxes , including those imposed by local governments ,  हैं   generally   administered  at  the  state level .
राज्य  imposing sales tax  आवश्यकता  retail  विक्रेता   to  collect tax from customers , file returns , and  remit  the tax to the  राज्य  .
Procedural rules vary widely .
विक्रेता  generally  जरूर  collect tax from  in-state   purchasers  unless the purchaser provides an exemption certificate .
सबसे  states  allow  or  आवश्यकता  electronic remittance .
a  central processing  ईकाई  ( CPU  )  , also referred to as  a   सेंट्रल  processor unit  ,   is   the  hardware within a  कंप्यूटर  that carries  आउट   the  instructions  of   a   कंप्यूटर   कार्यक्रम   by  performing  the  basic arithmetical  ,  logical  ,  and  input/output   परिचालन  of  the  system .
the  term  रै  been in  उपयोग  in  the   कंप्यूटर  industry at least  चूंकि  the  जल्दी   1960s   .
The form , design  ,   और  implementation of CPUs  have  changed over  the  course of their  इतिहास  , but their fundamental operation remains much the same  .
A computer  can   have   अधिक   than   एक  CPU  ;  this is  पुकारा  multiprocessing .
Some integrated  circuits   (  ICs )  can  contain multiple  cpu   on   a  single chip  ;  those  ics  are called multi-core  processors  .
Two typical components of a  cpu  are the arithmetic logic unit (  alu  )  ,   जिससे  performs arithmetic and logical  परिचालन  ,  और   the  control unit ( CU )  ,   जिससे  extracts  निर्देश  from  मेमोरी  and decodes  और  executes  उन्हें  , calling  on  the ALU when  जरुरी   .
Not all computational systems  rely   on  a central processing unit  .
an  array processor or vector processor has multiple parallel computing  तत्व  , with no one unit  माना  the `` center '' .
in  the distributed  कम्प्यूटिंग  model  ,   समस्याएं  are solved by a distributed interconnected set  of  processors .
rfid  chip next to  a  grain  of   राइस  .
This  चिप  contains a radio-frequency electromagnetic field coil that modulates an external magnetic  फ़ील्ड  to  ट्रांसफ़र  a  coded  identification number when queried by a reader  यंत्र  .
इस  small type  is  incorporated in consumer  उत्पाद  , and  implanted  in  पालतु  , for identification purposes .
radio-frequency   पहचान  ( RFID ) is the wireless non-contact use of  radio-frequency   इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  fields to transfer data , for the  उद्देश्य  of automatically identifying and tracking tags attached to objects  .
The tags contain electronically stored information .
कुछ   टैग  are powered  और   पढ़ा   at   छोटी   सीमाएँ   (  a  few  meters  )  via magnetic  फ़ील्ड   (   इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  induction )  .
Others  उपयोग  a local power source such as a battery ,  or  else have no battery but collect energy from the interrogating EM  फ़ील्ड  , and then  अधिनियम  as a passive transponder  to  emit microwaves  or  UHF radio waves  (  i.e. , electromagnetic  विकिरण  at high frequencies )  .
बैटरी   संचालित  tags  may  operate  at  hundreds of meters .
नापसंद  a bar  कोड  ,  the  tag  करता  not necessarily  need  to be within line of  sight  of the reader ,  और  may be  अंतःस्थापित   in  the tracked object .
RFID tags  हैं  used in many industries .
An RFID tag attached to  an  automobile during production can  be   प्रयुक्त   to  track its progress through the assembly line .
Pharmaceuticals can be tracked  through  warehouses .
Livestock and pets may have  टैग  injected ,  allowing  positive  पहचान  of  the  animal .
Since  rfid   टैग  can be attached  to  clothing , possessions  ,  or even  implanted  within people , the  सम्भावना  of reading  personally-linked  information without consent  रै  raised privacy  चिंताएं  .
Overtime is  the  amount of time  किसी  works  परे   सामान्य  working hours  .
सामान्य  hours may be determined  in  several ways:
by  कस्टम  ( what is considered healthy or  उचित  by society ) ,
by practices  of   a  given trade or profession,
by  legislation,
by  अनुबंध  between employers and  मजदूर  or  उनके  representatives  .
सबसे   राष्ट्र   have   ओवरटाइम   मजदूर   कानून  designed  to  dissuade or prevent  नियोक्ता   इससे  forcing their  कर्मचारी   to  work  excessively   long   घंटों  .
These laws  may  take into account other considerations  than  the  humanitarian  ,  ऐसे  as  preserving   the  health of workers  so  that they  may   continue  to  be  productive  ,   or   increasing   the   overall  level  of  employment  in  the economy .
एक   आम  approach to regulating overtime is  to  require employers  to   अदा  workers  at   a  higher  hourly   रेट   लिये  overtime work  .
कंपनियाँ  may choose  to   अदा  workers  उच्चतर  overtime  अदा  even  if  not  obliged  to  do   so  by law  ,   विशेषकर  if  वे   मानना  that  वे  face a  पिछड़ा  bending supply  वक्र  of  श्रमिक  .
Overtime  अदा   दरों  can  कारण  workers to  कार्य  longer hours than  वे  would  at  a flat hourly rate .
ओवरटाइम   कानून  , attitudes toward overtime and hours of work vary greatly  इससे  country to country  और   between  different economic sectors .
Visualization of links between  पृष्ठों  on a wiki using  a  force-directed layout .
force-directed   आलेख   आरेखण   algorithms   हैं  a class  of   algorithms  for drawing  रेखाचित्र  in an  aesthetically  pleasing  रास्ता  .
उनके  purpose is to position  the  nodes  of  a  आलेख  in  two-dimensional  or  three-dimensional   स्पेस  so that all  the   किनारे  are  of   अधिक  or less equal length and there are as few  क्रासिंग  edges as possible , by assigning forces among the set  of  edges and the  नियत  of  नोड   ,  based  on   उनके  relative  स्थितियाँ  , and then  using  these  शक्तियां  either to simulate  the  motion  of   the   किनारे  and nodes  or  to minimize  उनके   उर्जा   .
While  आलेख  drawing  can  be a  मुश्किल   प्रॉब्लम   ,  force-directed algorithms  ,  being physical  simulations   ,  usually require no special knowledge about graph  सिद्धान्त  such as planarity .
Purchasing power ( sometimes retroactively  पुकारा  adjusted  लिये  inflation )  is  the  राशि  of goods or services that can  be  purchased with  a  unit of  करेंसी  .
For example  ,  if  तुम  had taken one  डालर  to a  स्टोर  in the  1950s  , you would have been able to buy a greater number  of   वस्तुएं  than you would today , indicating  कि  you would  have  had  a  greater purchasing power  in  the 1950s .
करेंसी  can  be  either  a  commodity money , like gold  or  silver , or fiat currency , or  free-floating  market-valued currency like US  डॉलर  .
As  आदम  Smith noted , having money gives  एक   the   क्षमता  to ``  कमांड  ''  अन्य  '  मजदूर  , so purchasing power to some  extent  is power  over  other  लोगों  , to the  extent   कि  they are willing  to  trade their labor or goods for money  or  currency .
If  एक   's   मौद्रिक  income stays  the   वही  , but the price level increases , the  खरीदना  power of that income  जलप्रपात  .
महंगाई  does not always imply falling purchasing power of one 's  धन  income since it may rise faster than the price  स्तर  .
A higher real  आय   अर्थात्  a  उच्चतर  purchasing power  चूंकि  real income  refers  to  the   आय  adjusted  लिये  inflation  .
For a  दाम  index ,  इसके  value in the  आधार  year  is  usually normalized  to   a   मान  of 100  .
The purchasing  शक्ति  of a unit of  करेंसी   ,  say  a  dollar , in  a  given year  ,  expressed in  डॉलर  of the base year  ,  is  100/p  , where P is the price index in that year .
So ,  by  definition  the  purchasing  शक्ति   of  a  डालर  decreases as the  दाम  level rises .
The  खरीदना  power  in  today 's money of  an  amount C of  धन  , t years  into   the   भविष्य  , can be computed with the formula  लिये   the   उपस्थित  value  :
where in this case i is an assumed  भविष्य   सालाना  inflation  रेट   .
Education  in  South Korea is viewed  as   होने  crucial for success  और  competition  is  consequently very  heated   और  fierce .
a  central administration oversees  the  process for  the  education  of  children from  किंडरगार्टन   to  the  तीसरा  and final year  of   ऊँची  school  .
Mathematics ,  विज्ञान  , Korean  ,  English , and social studies are  generally   माना  to be the most important subjects .
Normally physical education is not considered  महत्वपूर्ण  as it is not recognised , by the generally  अकादमिक   elitist  South Korean  populace  , as education and therefore many  स्कूलों   कमी  high-quality gymnasiums  और   varsity  athletics .
South Korea  थी  the  पहला  country  in  the  संसार  to provide  high-speed  internet access  to  all primary ,  जूनियर   ,  and high schools .
Although South Korean students  प्रायः  rank highly on international  तुलनात्मक  assessments when compared to  विद्यार्थी  of most Western education  प्रणालियों  , the South Korean  शिक्षा  system  is  criticised for emphasising  too   much  upon  passive   सीखना   और  memorisation .
The South Korean education system is  बल्कि   notably   सख्त  and overly structured as compared to its counterparts in most Western  समाजों  .
Also , the prevalence of non-school for-profit private institutes  ऐसे  as  अकादमियों  or cram-schools ( Hagwon  [   학원   ]  ) ,  जिससे  too  emphasise   on  passive memorisation ,  as   opposed  to  conceptual  understanding , in  विद्यार्थी   हैं   criticised   as   a  major social  प्रॉब्लम   .
The My  lai  Massacre  (  , ; ,  ,  or ) was the Vietnam War mass murder of between  347  and  504  unarmed civilians in South Vietnam on March  16  , 1968 ,  by  United  राज्य   फौज  soldiers of `` Charlie  ''  Company  of   1st  Battalion , 20th  infantry  Regiment  ,   11th   ब्रिगेड  of  the  Americal Division .
Victims included  महिलाओं  , men , children , and infants  .
Some of the women were gang-raped  और   उनके  bodies were later found  to  be mutilated and many  महिलाओं  were allegedly raped prior to the killings .
While  26  U.S. soldiers were initially charged with  दण्ड  offenses for  उनके  actions at Mỹ  lai  ,  तभी  Second Lieutenant William Calley  ,  a platoon leader in Charlie Company  ,  was  convicted  .
Found guilty of killing 22  ग्रामीणों  , he was originally given a  जीवन  sentence  ,  but  तभी  served three  और  a half years under house  गिरफ़्तार   .
the   नरसंहार  took place in the  hamlets  of My Lai and My  khe  of Son My village  .
The event is also known as the Son My  नरसंहार  , especially  in  the Vietnamese  राज्य  media .
the  U.S. military codeword for  the  `` Viet Cong stronghold ''  थी  ``  pinkville  '' .
The incident  prompted  global outrage  जब  it  became  public knowledge in 1969 .
The  नरसंहार  also increased domestic opposition to the U.S.  भागीदारी  in  the  Vietnam  युद्ध  .
तीन  U.S.  servicemen  who  था  tried to halt the  नरसंहार  and protect the wounded were initially denounced  by  several U.S . Congressmen as  traitors  .
They received hate  मेल  and death threats and found mutilated animals on  उनके  doorsteps .
The  तीन  were later  widely  praised and decorated by  the  Army for  उनके   वीर   क्रियाएँ  .
The hijackers in the September  11  attacks were 19  मेन  affiliated with  al-qaeda   ,  and 15  of  the 19 were  नागरिकों  of Saudi Arabia .
Others were from Egypt ,  लेबनान   ,   और   the  UAE .
the  hijackers were organized  into  four teams , each led by  a  pilot-trained hijacker with four  ``   मांसपेशी   hijackers  '' who were trained to help  subdue   the  pilots  ,  passengers , and crew .
The  पहला  hijackers to arrive in the  संयुक्त   राज्य  were Khalid  al-mihdhar   और  Nawaf al-Hazmi  ,   जो  settled in the San Diego area  in  January 2000  .
वे   यहूद  followed  by   तीन  hijacker-pilots  ,  Mohamed Atta , Marwan  al-shehhi  , and  ziad   jarrah   जल्दी  in the summer  of  2000  to  undertake  उड़ान  training in  दक्षिण   फ्लोरिडा  .
the   चौथी  hijacker-pilot ,  hani  Hanjour ,  arrived  in  सैन   डिएगो  in  दिसम्बर   2000  .
The rest of the `` muscle hijackers  ''  arrived in  the  spring and early summer of 2001 , just months  पहले  the September 11  हमले   .
Abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad  इब्न  ʿAbd Allāh ibn  ʿabd  al-Muṭṭalib ibn Hāshim (  )  ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 June 632  )   ,   भी   transliterated  as  मुहम्मद  ( ) , was  a   धार्मिक  , political  ,  and military leader from  मक्का  who unified  अरब   into  a  सिंगल  religious  polity  under  islam  .
he  is believed  by  Muslims and Bahá'ís to be a messenger  और  prophet of God .
Muhammad  is  almost universally considered by Muslims  as   the  last prophet  भेजा  by God for mankind .
Non-Muslims regard Muhammad as the founder of  islam  .
Muslims consider him  to   be  the  restorer   of  an unaltered  असली  monotheistic faith of Adam , Noah , Abraham , Moses , Jesus , and other prophets .
Born  in   परिचय   570  CE in the Arabian city  of   मक्का   ,  he was orphaned  at  an  जल्दी  age and brought up under the care of his uncle Abu Talib  .
He  बाद   worked  mostly as a merchant , as well as a shepherd  ,  and was first  शादीशुदा  by age 25 .
होने   in  the habit of periodically retreating to a cave in the surrounding  kyu  for several nights of  seclusion  and  दुआ   ,  he later  reported   कि  it was there , at age  40  , that he  प्राप्त  his first revelation from God  .
तीन  years after  इस  event Muhammad  प्रारंभ  preaching  ये  revelations publicly  ,   proclaiming   कि  `` God  is   एक  `` ,  कि  complete ``  आत्मसमर्पण  '' to Him ( lit .
islām  )   is   the  only way ( dīn ) acceptable to  परमेश्वर   ,  and  कि  he himself was a prophet and messenger of  परमेश्वर   ,   in   the  same vein as  अन्य  Islamic prophets  .
Muhammad gained few followers early on , and was met with hostility  इससे   कुछ  Meccan  जनजातियों   ;   he  and his  अनुसरणकर्ता  were treated harshly  .
to  escape persecution  ,  Muhammad sent some  of   उसके  followers to Abyssinia before he  और  his followers in  मक्का  migrated  to  Medina  (   तब  known  as  Yathrib )  in  the year  622  .
This event , the Hijra ,  marks  the beginning of the  इस्लामी   पंचांग  , which  is  also known as  the  Hijri Calendar .
in  Medina , Muhammad united  the  tribes  अंतर्गत   the  Constitution of Medina  .
After eight  सालो  of  लड़   साथ   the  Meccan  जनजातियों  , his followers  ,  who by  तब  had grown to  10,000  ,  took  control  of   मक्का   in   the   largely  peaceful Conquest of  मक्का  .
he  destroyed  the  pagan idols in the  नगर  and then  भेजा  his followers  आउट   to   नष्ट  all  of  the remaining  pagan  temples  in  Eastern Arabia  .
In 632 ,  a  few  महीने  after returning to Medina  इससे  The Farewell  यात्राएं  , Muhammad fell ill and  died  .
By the time of his death  ,  most of the  arabian  Peninsula  था   परिवर्तित  to Islam  ,  and he had united Arabia into a single Muslim religious polity .
The revelations ( or Ayah  ,  lit .
``  लक्षण  [ of God ] '' ) —  जिससे   मुहम्मद  reported receiving  जबतक  his death – form  the   आयतें  of the Quran  ,  regarded by Muslims as the ``  शब्द  of God '' and  around   जिससे  the  धर्म  is based .
Besides  the  Quran , Muhammad 's life ( sira ) and traditions (  सुन्नत  ) are also upheld by Muslims as  the  sources of  शरीयत   विधि  .
They discuss  मुहम्मद  and other  नबियों  of Islam with reverence , adding the phrase  सलाम   be  upon  उसे  whenever  उनके  names are mentioned .
While conceptions of  मुहम्मद   in  medieval  christendom  and premodern  टाइम्स  were largely negative , appraisals in modern history have been far less so  .
This is  a   सूची  of  टेबल  of the verified  oldest  people  in  the  संसार  in ordinal  रैंक  , such as  oldest  person or oldest man .
in   ये   टेबल  , a supercentenarian is  माना  'verified  '   if  his  or   उसके  claim  रै  been validated by an international body that  specifically   सौदे  in  आयु   शोध  , such  as  the  जराविद्या  Research Group (  grg  ) or Guinness World  रिकॉर्ड  .
The  longest  unambiguously documented  इंसान   जीवनकाल  is  कि   of  Jeanne Calment of France (  1875–1997  )  ,  who  died  at  आयु  122 years , 164 days .
She met Vincent van  gogh  when she  थी  12 or  13  .
This led to news media attention in 1985 ,  बाद   calment   turned  110  .
Subsequent investigation found  दस्तावेज़ीकरण  for  calment  's age , beyond any reasonable question , in  the  records of her native city , Arles  ,  France .
अधिक  evidence of  calment   's  lifespan has been  उत्पादित  than for any  अन्य   supercentenarian  ; her case serves as  an  archetype in the methodology for verifying  the  ages  of  the  संसार  's oldest people .
The  longest  undisputed lifespan for male supercentenarians is  कि   of   jiroemon   किमुरा   ,  who currently lives  in  Japan  और  is age as of .
Since the death of 115-year old  दीना  Manfredini  of  the United States , on 17 December  2012   ,  Kimura  ,   born  19 April 1897  ,   is  the  oldest  living person in the  संसार  whose  आयु   can  be documented .
He  रै  also been the oldest  जीना  man since  the  death of  114-year   बूढ़ा  Walter Breuning on 14 April 2011 .
Since the  मौत  of  115-year  old Koto Okubo of Japan on 12 January 2013 ,  the  oldest living  स्त्री   रै  been -year-old Misao  okawa  , also  इससे  Japan  ,  born on 5 March 1898  .
This  is   a  timeline of the African-American Civil Rights Movement .
The  सिविल  Rights movement  थी  a freedom  संघर्ष  by African Americans  in  the 1950s and 1960s to gain  समता  .
The  लक्ष्य  of  the  movement  यहूद  freedom from discrimination  ,  equal opportunity in employment ,  शिक्षा   और  housing  ,  the  सही  to vote and  बराबर  access to  पब्लिक  facilities  .
Heavy metal ( often referred to as metal  )  is a  विधा   of  rock music that developed in the  लेट   1960s   और   जल्दी   1970s  , largely in  the  United  किंगडम   और  in the United States  .
साथ  roots  in  blues  चट्टान  and  साइकेडेलिक  rock  ,  the bands that  निर्मित  heavy metal  विकसित  a thick , massive sound ,  characterized  by highly amplified distortion  ,   विस्तारित  guitar solos , emphatic  बीट्स  , and overall  loudness   .
Heavy  मेटल  lyrics  और  performance styles are generally  संबद्ध  with masculinity  और   machismo  .
The first heavy  मेटल  bands such as Led Zeppelin  ,  Deep Purple  और   ब्लैक  Sabbath attracted large  ऑडियंस   ,  though they were  प्रायः  derided by critics , a status common throughout  the   इतिहास   of  the genre .
In the  mid-1970s  Judas Priest helped  spur  the  विधा  's evolution by discarding much of  इसके  blues influence ; Motörhead introduced a punk rock sensibility and an increasing emphasis on  गति  .
bands  in the New Wave of British  भारी  Metal such as Iron Maiden followed  in  a  समान  vein .
Before the end of the  दशक   ,  heavy  मेटल   प्रशंसक  became known  as  `` metalheads ``  or  `` headbangers  ``   .
दौरान  the 1980s , glam metal became  a   वाणिज्यिक   फ़ोर्स  with groups like Mötley Crüe and Poison  .
Underground scenes produced  an   सरणी  of more extreme ,  आक्रामक  styles : thrash metal  broke  into the mainstream with bands such as Metallica ,  मेगाडेथ  , Slayer , and Anthrax  ,   जबकि  other styles of  the  most extreme subgenres  of  metal like death metal and black  मेटल   remain   subcultural  phenomena  .
Since the  mid-1990s   ,   लोकप्रिय  styles such as nu metal , which often incorporates elements of grunge and hip  हॉप  ;  और  metalcore , which blends extreme  मेटल  with hardcore punk , have  further  expanded  the  definition of the genre .
The far-right  (  also known as the extreme  सही  )  refers  to  the   उच्चतम  degree of rightism in right-wing politics .
Far  सही  politics  involves   support  of strong  or  complete social hierarchy  in  society ,  और  supports supremacy of  निश्चित  individuals  or   समूह  deemed to  be   innately   श्रेष्ठ  or preferable who are  to  be more valued than those  deemed  to be  innately  inferior or undesirable .
The far right  's  advocacy of  supremacism  is  आधारित  on what its adherents perceive as innate characteristics of people that  can   नहीं   be  changed .
This stands as  a  point of  अंतर  with the centre-right 's attribution of behaviours , such as laziness or decadence , as  the   प्राथमिक  sources  of  social  inequalities  .
The  केन्द्र  right—unlike the far right—claims  कि  people  can   समाप्त  their behavioural inferiority through  बदलना  their habits  और  choices .
The  असली  far right ,  जिससे  emerged in  फ़्रांस  after the  फ्रेंच   क्रान्ति  , refused to accept  the  French  गणतंत्र   और  supported a counter-revolution  to  restore  the  French monarchy and aristocracy .
The far  सही  is commonly associated  साथ   व्यक्तियों  or  समूह  who hold  चरम  nationalist ,  xenophobic  , racist ,  धार्मिक  fundamentalist or reactionary  दृश्य  .
The most extreme-right movements  have  pursued  दमन  and genocide against groups  of  people on the  आधार   of   उनके  alleged inferiority .
थामस  Hobbes of Malmesbury (  5  April 1588  –   4  December 1679 )  ,  in  कुछ  older texts Thomas Hobbs  of  Malmsbury  ,  was  an   अंग्रेज़ी   पारस  , best  ज्ञात  today for  उसके   कार्य   on   राजनैतिक  philosophy .
His 1651  किताब   leviathan  established the  न्यास  for most of  पश्चिमी  political philosophy from  the  perspective of  सोशल  contract theory .
Hobbes was  a  champion of absolutism for the sovereign , but he  भी  developed some of the  fundamentals  of  यूरोपीय  liberal thought : the  सही  of the individual ; the  प्राकृतिक  equality of all men  ;   the  artificial character  of   the  political order ( which led to the  बाद   भेद  between  सिविल  society and the  राज्य   )  ;  the  view that all legitimate political  शक्ति  must  be  `` representative '' and  आधारित  on the  सहमति  of the people ; and  a   उदार  interpretation  of   विधि  which leaves people free to do whatever  the  law does  नहीं  explicitly forbid .
he   थी  one of  the  founders  of   आधुनिक  political philosophy .
His understanding of  इंसानो  as being matter and motion  ,   obeying   the   वही  physical laws  as  other matter  और  motion  ,  remains  influential   ;  and his account of human nature as self-interested  सहयोग  , and  of   राजनैतिक  communities as being based upon a ``  सोशल  contract ``  remains   एक  of the  प्रमुख  topics  of  political philosophy .
In  जोड  to  राजनैतिक   दर्शनशास्त्र  , Hobbes  भी  contributed to  a  diverse  सरणी   of   अन्य  fields , including history  ,  geometry  ,   the  physics  of  gases ,  धर्मशास्त्र  , ethics  ,  and  सामान्य  philosophy  .
Emotional intelligence  (   ei  ) is the  क्षमता  to identify , assess , and  कंट्रोल   the  emotions of oneself ,  of  others , and of groups  .
it   can  be  विभाजित   into  ability  ei   और   trait  EI .
Ability EI is  प्रायः  measured  using   अधिकतम   प्रदर्शन   परीक्षण  and has stronger  संबंध  with traditional intelligence , whereas  trait  EI is usually  measured  using  self-report  questionnaires and has stronger relationships with  व्यक्तित्व  .
Criticisms have centered on whether  ei  is  a  real intelligence and whether it has incremental  वैध  over IQ and the Big Five  व्यक्तित्व  traits .
आनुवंशिकता  is  the  passing of traits to offspring from its parents or  पूर्वज  .
इस   is  the  प्रक्रम  by which an offspring cell or organism  acquires   or  becomes predisposed  to   the  characteristics of its parent cell or organism .
Through heredity ,  विसंगतियाँ  exhibited by individuals can accumulate and cause  कुछ  species to  evolve  .
The study of heredity in biology is  पुकारा  genetics , which  शामिल  the field  of  epigenetics .
लिये  United  राज्य  individual income  कर  ,  समायोजित  gross income ( AGI  )  is total gross income minus  विशिष्ट  reductions  .
Taxable income  is  adjusted gross  आय  minus allowances for personal  छूटों  and itemized deductions .
For  सबसे  individual tax purposes  ,  AGI  is  more relevant  than  gross income .
सकल  income is  बिक्री   दाम   of  goods or property  ,  minus cost of the property sold , plus other  आय  .
It includes wages  ,   ब्याज  , dividends , business income ,  rental  income  ,  and all other types  of   आय  .
समायोजित   सकल   आय  is  सकल   आय   कम  deductions from a business or rental activity and 21 other specific  वस्तुएं   .
Several  deductions  (  e.g  .  चिकित्सा  expenses and  विविध  itemized  deductions  ) are limited based on a  प्रतिशत   of  AGI .
Certain phase  outs  , including those of lower tax rates and itemized  deductions   ,  are  आधारित   on  levels  of  AGI .
अनेक  states  आधार  state  आय  tax  on  AGI  साथ   निश्चित  deductions .
``  आलसी  Eye '' is  the  third single from Silversun Pickups ' debut  एल्बम  Carnavas  .
The band performed  the  song on  the  Late  दिखाएँ   साथ  David Letterman  ,  The Tonight Show with  jay  Leno , Later With  jools   हॉलैंड  , and Last Call  साथ  Carson Daly .
the  song is a playable  track  on Rock  बैंड  2 and  गिटार   नायिका  : World  दौरे  .
An  वैकल्पिक  version of the  सोंग  , with  a  length of 7:27  ,  was played  on   xmu  before  the  shorter version was  निभाई   on  FM  और   अन्य   xm  channels .
इस   संस्करण  was featured  on   उनके  demo CD ( which featured early versions of four tracks ) .
a  telephone prefix is the first  नियत  of  अंक   of  a  टेलीफोन  number ;  in  the North American Numbering Plan countries  (  country code 1 ) ,  it  is the first three  अंक  of  a  seven-digit phone number  .
In other countries both the  उपसर्ग  and  the   क्रमांक  may  have  different lengths  .
It  shows   जिससे   एक्सचेंज  the  बाकी  numbers refer  to   .
A  पूरा   टेलीफोन  number is  प्रायः  made up of country  कोड  ( required for international calls only ) , area code ( required for calls between  टेलीफोन  areas  )  , prefix , and subscriber number .
कुछ  places restrict certain prefixes to fax numbers or  कोशिका  phones only ;  in  other places such  समर्पित   prefixes   हैं  not  प्रयुक्त  .
As  टेलीफोन   प्रौद्योगिकी  advanced , the  precise  significance of the prefix  became  blurred  in  many  स्थान  ; 485  in  London  ,   uk  ,  थी   एकबार  the GULliver exchange , but  अभी  44207485xxxx is just considered  एक   of  many  क्रमांक   ब्लॉक  served by the CLKEN  kentish   कस्बा  exchange ; 4420770703xx  is  another .
Metformin (  bp   ,   सुनाया   ,  ;  originally   बेची  as Glucophage )  is  an oral  antidiabetic  drug in  the   biguanide  class  .
it   is  the  first-line  drug  of  choice  लिये  the  उपचार   of  type  2   मधुमेह  , in particular  ,   in  overweight and obese people  और  those with normal kidney function .
Its use in gestational diabetes  रै   महरूम   सीमित   by   सुरक्षा  concerns .
It is also used in the treatment  of   polycystic  ovary syndrome , and  रै  been  investigated   लिये  other  रोगों  where insulin resistance  may   be   an  important  फ़ैक्टर   .
metformin  works by  suppressing  glucose production  by   the  liver  .
metformin  is  the  only antidiabetic drug that has  महरूम  conclusively shown to prevent the  cardiovascular   जटिलताओं  of diabetes .
It  helps   reduce  LDL cholesterol and triglyceride levels  ,   और  is not associated  साथ  weight gain .
,  metformin  is one of  तभी  two oral  antidiabetics   in  the World Health Organization Model  सूची  of  अनिवार्य  Medicines ( the  अन्य  being  glibenclamide  ) .
जब   विहित  appropriately  ,  metformin causes few  प्रतिकूल   प्रभाव  (  the   सबसे  common is gastrointestinal upset ) and is associated with a low  रिस्क   of   hypoglycemia  .
लैक्टिक  acidosis  (  a buildup  of  lactate in  the  blood ) can be a serious concern in overdose  और  when it is prescribed to people  साथ  contraindications ,  लकिन  otherwise , there is  no  significant risk .
पहला  synthesized  और  found to reduce blood  शुगर  in  the  1920s , metformin was forgotten for the  अगला   दो  decades as research shifted  to  insulin and  अन्य   antidiabetic   दवाएँ  .
Interest in metformin was rekindled in the late 1940s after several reports that  it  could reduce  रक्त  sugar levels  in  people  ,   और   in  1957 , French physician Jean  sterne  published the first clinical trial of metformin as a  उपचार  for  मधुमेह   .
It  थी   introduced  to the United Kingdom in  1958   ,  Canada in  1972  ,  और   the  United States in 1995 .
metformin  is now believed to be the most widely  विहित   antidiabetic  drug in  the  world  ;  in the United States alone , more than 48  लाख   prescriptions  were filled  in  2010 for its generic formulations .
The  माउंट  Rushmore National Memorial is a  मूर्तिकला  carved  into   the  granite  फेस  of Mount  rushmore  near  keystone  , South  डकोटा   ,  in the United States .
Sculpted by  danish-american   gutzon   borglum  and his son  ,   lincoln  Borglum  ,   माउंट  Rushmore  सुविधाएँ   sculptures  of the  heads  of four United States  राष्ट्रपतियों  : George Washington , Thomas  जेफरसन   ,  Theodore  रूज़वेल्ट  and Abraham  lincoln  .
the   संपूर्ण  memorial  कवर  and is  ऊपर   समुद्र  level .
the  tallest mountain  in  the region is Harney Peak ( ) .
दक्षिण   डकोटा  historian  दोने  Robinson is credited with  conceiving   the  idea of carving the likenesses  of   प्रसिद्ध   लोगों  into the Black  पहाड़ियाँ  region of South Dakota in order to promote tourism in the  प्रदेश  .
रॉबिन्सन   's   आरंभिक   विचार  was to sculpt the Needles ; however  ,  Gutzon Borglum  अस्वीकृत  the Needles site because of the poor  विशेषता   of  the  ग्रेनाइट   और  strong opposition from environmentalists  और  Native American groups .
वे  settled  on  the  माउंट  Rushmore location ,  जिससे  also has the advantage of facing southeast for maximum sun  एक्सपोज़र  .
Robinson wanted it to feature  पश्चिमी   नायक  like  लुईस   और  Clark , Red  बादल  and Buffalo  विधेयक  Cody but  borglum   decided  the sculpture should have a  अधिक  national  फ़ोकस   ,  and chose the  चार  presidents whose likenesses would be carved into  the  mountain .
After securing  संघीय   funding  ,  निर्माण   on  the memorial began  in  1927  ,   और  the presidents  '   चेहरों  were completed between  1934  and  1939  .
Upon Gutzon  borglum  's death in March 1941 ,  उसके  son Lincoln Borglum  took  over  निर्माण  .
Although the initial concept called for each president to  be   चित्रित  from head to  कमर  ,  कमी  of funding  मजबूर  construction  to  end in late October 1941  .
the   u.S.  National Park Service took  कंट्रोल  of the memorial in  1933  , while  it  was  स्टिल  under construction ,  और  has managed  the   मेमोरियल  to the present day .
It  attracts  nearly  तीन  million people annually  .
Charvet dress shirt from the 1930s , Norsk Folkemuseum ,  ओस्लो  .
A shirt , dress  कमीज़  , button-front , button-front shirt ,  or   button-up  shirt  is  a  परिधान  with a  कॉलर  ,  a   full-length  opening at the front  इससे   the  collar  to   the  hem  ,  and  टाँक  with cuffs .
Shirts  हैं  predominantly  प्रयुक्त   by  men , since women usually wear  blouses  .
the   सामने  opening is fastened using  बटन  or studs , and the cuffs  बंद   साथ   बटन   or  cuff links .
Shirts are normally made  इससे  woven cloth , and are often accompanied by  a  jacket and  टाई  , for example with  a   सूट  or  formalwear  ,  लकिन   शर्ट  are also worn  अधिक  casually .
in  British English , dress  कमीज़  means specifically the more  औपचारिक  evening garment worn with black- or white- tie  ,  also  discussed  below .
कुछ   of   ये  formal shirts have  stiff  fronts and detachable collars attached with collar studs .
the  term `` button-down  ''   (  which refers  a  type  of  shirt  जिससे  has a collar fastened down by buttons ) is sometimes used  in  error to apply to all shirts (  साथ  or without buttoned  bas   छल्लों  ) , being used as a  पर्याय  for ``  button-up  ''  or  ``  button-front   ''  .
Administrative Professionals  दिन  ( also known as Secretaries Day or Admin Day ) is  an  unofficial secular holiday observed in several countries to recognize the work  of  secretaries  ,   प्रशासनिक  assistants , receptionists ,  और  other administrative support professionals  .
in  North America , it is  मनाये   on  the Wednesday of  the   पिछला   पूरा   सप्ताह  of  अप्रैल  (  अप्रैल  24  in  2013  )  .
In  फ़्रांस  it is celebrated on  the  third  गुरुवार   in  April  (   अप्रैल  18 in 2013 )  .
In  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  it is celebrated on  the   पहला   शुक्रवार  in May

निकोलस  Poussin ( ; 15 June 1594  –  19  नवम्बर   1665  ) was  the  leading painter of  the  classical French  बरॉक  style , although he spent most  of   उसके  working life  in   रोम  .
His  कार्य   is   characterized  by clarity ,  लॉजिक  ,  और  order , and favors line over color .
जबतक  the 20th century he remained a  प्रमुख  inspiration for such  classically  oriented artists as Jacques-Louis  दाउद  ,  jean-auguste-dominique   ingres   और   पॉल   cézanne   .
he   worked   in  Rome for a circle of leading collectors there and elsewhere , except  लिये  a short  काल  when Cardinal Richelieu  ordered  him back to  फ़्रांस  to serve as First Painter  to  the King .
Most of his works are history paintings of religious  or  mythological subjects that very  प्रायः  have a large landscape  तत्व  .
जैकी   कैथ  Whitley ( July 1 ,  1954stambler  , Irwin  ,   और  Grelun Landon ( 2000 ) . -  देश  Music  :  The Encyclopedia . - New York  :  St. Martin  's   दबायें  .  -  p.533 .  -  ISBN 978-0-312-26487-1.—Carlin  ,   रिचर्ड  (  2003  )  .   -   देश  Music  :  A Biographical  शब्दकोष  .  -  New York : Routledge -  p.427  . -  isbn  978-0-415-93802-0.—Larkin ,  कोलिन  ( 1995 ) . - The  गिनीज   ज्ञानकोष  of Popular Music .  -   नई  York  :  Stockton Press - P.4462 .  -  ISBN  978-0-85112-662-3.—stanton  ,  स्कॉट  ( 2003 ) . - The Tombstone Tourist : Musicians  .  -  नई  York  :  Pocket Books . -  p.395   .  - ISBN  978-0-7434-6330-0.—hicks  ,  जोकर  .  -  `` Singer  कैथ   whitley   's  Memory  जिंदा   through  Songs ,  प्रेम   in  Home Town  ''  . -  the  Kentucky  पोस्ट  .  -  September  25   ,   1991.—  '' Country Music Star Keith Whitley  मुर्दे  at 33 '' . - Lexington Herald-Leader . -  may  10 , 1989.——Hurst ,  जोकर  .  -  ``  whitley  's Last Days  ''   .  -  शिकागो   ट्रिब्यून  .  -  May 14 , 1989.— '' Alcohol Kills Country Singer  कैथ  Whitley '' .  -  United Press International . - ( c/o The San Francisco  वृत्तान्त  ) .  -  May  10  ,  1989   .   —   may  9 , 1989 ) , known professionally  as  Keith  whitley   ,   थी  an American  देश  music  सिंगर   .
Whitley  's   ब्रैड   करियर   in  mainstream country music lasted  इससे  1984 until his  मौत  in 1989 ,  लकिन  he continues to influence  an  entire generation of singers and songwriters .
He charted 19 singles  on  the  बिलबोर्ड   देश  charts , including five consecutive  क्रमांक  Ones : ``  do  n't Close  अपना  Eyes `` , ``  जब   तुम  Say  nothing  at All  ``  , `` I  'm  No  अजनबी  to the  बरसात  `` , `` I Wonder Do  तुम  Think of Me  ``  and `` It  ai  n't Nothin '  ``   (   the  last two posthumously ) .
Statute of Grand Duchy of  लिथुआनिया  , written in Polish
a  statute  is  a formal written enactment of a legislative  प्राधिकार  that governs a state , city  ,   or  county .
Typically , statutes command  or   prohibit  something ,  or  declare policy .
The  शब्द  is often used to  फर्क   विधि  made  by   विधान  bodies from case law  ,  decided by courts , and regulations issued  by   सरकारी   एजेंसियों   .
statutes  are sometimes referred to as legislation or ``  ब्लैक  letter law . ''
As  a  source  of   विधि   ,   statutes   हैं   माना  primary  प्राधिकार  ( as  opposed  to secondary authority ) .
Ideally all statutes must be in harmony with the fundamental  विधि   of  the land  (  constitutional  )   .
इस   शब्द  is used  in  contradistinction to the common  विधि  .
Statutes acquire  उनके  force from  the  time of  उनके   ड्योढ़ी   ,   however  unless otherwise provided .
Statutes are  of   अनेक  kinds ; namely , Public  or   निजी  .
Declaratory or remedial .
Temporary or perpetual .
A temporary statute  is  one which  is  limited in its duration  at   the  time of its enactment .
it  continues in force until  the   समय  of its limitation has expired , unless sooner repealed .
A  perpetual   statute  is one for the continuance of which  वहीँ  is no limited time  ,  although it  may  not  be  expressly declared  to  be  so  .
If  ,   however  ,  a   statute  which did  नहीं  itself contain any limitation is to  be  governed by  another  which is temporary only , the former will also be  अस्थाई  and dependent  upon  the existence of the latter .
पहले  a statute becomes law in some  देशों  ,  it  must be agreed upon by  the  highest  कार्यपालिका   in  the government , and finally published  as  part of a code  .
in   अनेक  countries ,  statutes  are organized  in   topical  arrangements ( or  ``   संहिताबद्ध  '' ) within publications called codes , such as  the   संयुक्त   राज्य   कोड  .
In many  राष्ट्र  statutory law is distinguished  इससे  and subordinate to  संवैधानिक  law  .
The external  iliac  arteries  हैं  two  प्रमुख  arteries which  bifurcate  off the common iliac  धमनियों  anterior to  the   sacroiliac   संयुक्त  of the pelvis .
They proceed  अग्रवर्ती  and  अवर   साथ  the medial  किनारा  of the psoas major muscles  .
वे  exit the pelvic girdle posterior and inferior to  the   वंक्षण  ligament about one third  laterally  from the insertion point of the  वंक्षण  ligament  on  the  जननांग  tubercle  at   जिससे   पाइंट  they are referred to  as  the  नैया   धमनियों  .
The external iliac artery  is  usually  the  artery used to attach the  renal  artery  to   the   प्राप्तकर्ता  of  a  kidney  प्रत्यारोपण  .
Steam is a digital  वितरण  , digital rights management , multiplayer  और   संचार  platform developed by Valve  निगम  .
It is used to  वितरित  games  और  related  मीडिया  online  ,  from small independent  डेवलपर   to   larger  software houses  ;   in  October 2012 , Valve expanded the service  to  include non-gaming software .
भाप   provides  the user with installation and automatic  प्रबन्धन   of  software across multiple  कंप्यूटर  , community  सुविधाएँ   ऐसे  as  मित्रों  lists and groups ,  बादल  saving , and  in-game   आवाज़   और  chat functionality .
The software provides a freely available  अनुप्रयोग  programming interface ,  steamworks   ,  that  डेवलपर  can take advantage  of   to   integrate  many  of  Steam 's functions within  उनके  software products ,  सहित  copy  सुरक्षा  , networking and matchmaking , in-game achievements and micro-transactions , and support for user-created  सामग्री  through  भाप  Workshop .
Though  initially  developed  लिये   उपयोग  on Microsoft Windows  ,  the client has expanded to  शामिल  OS X and Linux  संस्करण  ,  और   क्लाइंट  with limited functionality on the PlayStation 3 console and for both iOS and Android  मोबाईल  devices  .
in  addition to being a  सेंट्रल  hub for gaming software  ,   वाल्व  has  निर्मित   a   संस्करण  of  भाप  with  altered  functionality to  be   प्रयुक्त   in   स्कूलों  for educational  तन्त्र   ,   सहित  a  परिवर्धित  version of  पोर्टल  2  लिये  teaching science  और   नाजुक   सोच  lessons .
,  वहीँ  are  nearly   2000  games available through Steam  ,  and 54 million active user  खाते  .
As of January 2013 ,  भाप   रै  seen over 6.6 million concurrent players  .
Steam has an estimated 50–70  %  share of the digital distribution market for video  खेल   .
The  भाप   लोगो  is a stylised left-side fly-crank and rod  इससे  the Walschaerts  वाल्व  gear of  a   भाप  locomotive .
Jerry  लुईस  ( born March 16 , 1926 )  is  an American  हास्य  ,  कर्ता   ,  singer , film producer ,  screenwriter  and film director .
He is known  लिये   उसके  slapstick humor in  फिल्मी   ,   टेलीविज़न  , stage and radio  .
he   थी  originally  युग्म  up with Dean Martin in 1946 ,  forming  the famed comedy  टोली  of Martin and  लुईस  .
In  जोड  to the  duo   's  popular  nightclub  work ,  वे   स्ट्रक्चर   in   a  successful series of comedy  films   लिये   सर्वोपरि  Pictures  .
Lewis is  भी   ज्ञात   लिये  his charity fund-raising telethons and  स्थिति  as  नेशनल   अध्यक्ष   लिये  the  muscular   dystrophy   संघ   (  MDA  )  .
लुईस  has won several awards for  आजीवन  achievements from  the   अमरीकी  Comedy Awards  ,  Los Angeles  फिल्मी  Critics Association , and  वेनिस   फिल्मी   पर्व   ,  and he has  दो   सितारों  on the  हॉलीवुड  Walk  of   कीर्ति  .
in  2005  ,   he   प्राप्त  the Governors Award  of  the  अकादमी   of  Television  कला  &  sciences  Board of Governors  ,   जिससे   is  the highest Emmy Award  प्रस्तुत  .
On February  22  ,  2009   ,   the  Academy  of  Motion  चित्र  Arts and Sciences awarded  लुईस  the Jean Hersholt Humanitarian Award .
The  राइन  ( ; ; ) is a European river  कि  runs from the  स्विस  canton  of  Grisons in  the  southeastern Swiss Alps through Germany  और  eventually flows into  the   उत्तर  Sea  coast   in   the  Netherlands  और  is the twelfth longest river in Europe , at about , with  an   औसत  discharge  of   अधिक  than .
the  Rhine and the  डेन्यूब   formed  most of the northern inland frontier of the Roman Empire and , since  those   दिनों  , the  राइन  has been a vital and navigable waterway carrying trade and goods deep inland  .
it  has  भी  served as a defensive feature  और  has been the basis for regional  और   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   सीमायें  .
The  अनेक  castles and prehistoric  fortifications   साथ   the  Rhine testify  to   इसके  importance  as  a  जलमार्ग  .
River  ट्रैफ़िक   could  be stopped at  ये  locations  ,  usually  लिये   the   purpose  of collecting tolls , by  the  state that  नियंत्रित  that portion of  the  river  .
Sri ( Sinhala )
Sri ( Devanagari : श्री ,  iast  ; Śrī ) ,  भी  transliterated as Sree or  shri  or Shree  is   a   शब्द  of Sanskrit  उत्पत्ति   ,  used in the Indian  उपमहाद्वीप  as polite form of address equivalent to the  अंग्रेज़ी   ``  Mr. ''  in   लिखा  and spoken  भाषा  ,  or  as a  शीर्षक  of veneration for deities ( usually translated as ``  पावन   ''   )  .
डिज़ाइन  of complex structures  जैसे  the International Space Station needs in-depth  समझना   of  Structural Analysis .
सिविल  engineering is  a  professional engineering discipline  कि  deals  साथ  the design ,  निर्माण  ,  और   मेंटेनेंस   of  the physical and naturally  निर्मित  environment , including works  जैसे  roads , bridges , canals  ,  dams , and buildings .
Civil engineering  is  the  oldest  engineering discipline after  सैन्य   अभियान्त्रिकी  , and it was defined to distinguish  non-military  engineering from military engineering  .
It is  traditionally  broken into  अनेक  sub-disciplines  सहित  environmental engineering , geotechnical engineering  ,  geophysics ,  भूगणित  , control engineering  ,  structural engineering  ,  biomechanics  ,  nanotechnology , transportation engineering , earth  विज्ञान  , atmospheric sciences ,  forensic   अभियान्त्रिकी   ,   नगरपालिका   or  urban  अभियान्त्रिकी  , water  संसाधन  engineering  ,  materials engineering  ,  coastal engineering ,  सर्वेक्षण  , and construction engineering .
Civil engineering  takes   प्लेस  on  सब  levels  :   in  the public  सेक्टर  from municipal through to national governments ,  और  in  the   निजी  sector from individual homeowners through to international  कंपनियाँ  .
