Katherine Dunham ( June 22  ,  1909  –   may  21  ,  2006 ) was an  अमरीकी   नर्तकी  ,  कोरियोग्राफर  , author ,  educator  , and  सोशल  activist  .
dunham   था   एक   of  the  सबसे   कामयाब  dance careers  in   अमरीकी  and European theater of the 20th  सदी  , and  निर्देशित  her  अपना  dance company  लिये  many years .
She has been  पुकारा  the ``  matriarch   और   महारानी  mother of  ब्लैक   नृत्य  '' .
During  उसके  heyday in the  1940s  and  1950s  , Dunham  थी  renowned  throughout  Europe  और   लैटिन  America and  थी  widely  लोकप्रिय   in  the United States  ,  where the Washington  पोस्ट   पुकारा  her `` dancer Katherine the  ग्रेट  '' .
For almost thirty years she maintained  the  Katherine Dunham Dance Company , the  तभी  self-supported  अमरीकी  black dance troupe  at  that time , and  over  her long career she choreographed more  than  ninety individual dances .
Dunham  थी  an innovator in African-American modern  नृत्य   as   खूब  as a leader in  the   फ़ील्ड  of  नृत्य   मानवशास्त्र  ,  or  ethnochoreology .
Sphagnum  is  a genus  of   between  1510  और  3500  प्रजाति  of mosses  ,   commonly  called  peat  moss  due   to  its prevalence  in  wet habitats where it contributes  to  the formation of peat bogs and mires .
Sphagnum accumulations can store water ,  चूंकि  both  जीना  and dead plants can  थाम  large quantities of  जल  inside their cells ;  पौधे  may hold from 16-26 times as much water  as  their dry weight depending on the  प्रजाति   .
The empty  कोशिकाएं  help retain  जल   in  drier conditions .
Hence , as sphagnum moss grows ,  it   can   धीरे  spread into drier  शर्तें   ,   forming   larger  peatlands  ,  both raised bogs and  कंबल  bogs .
ये  peat  accumulations  then  provide   आवास  for a wide array of peatland plants , including sedges and  ericaceous  shrubs , as well as orchids  और   मांसाहारी  plants .
sphagnum  and  the  peat formed from  it  do  नहीं  decay readily  क्युकी  of the phenolic compounds embedded in the moss  's  cell walls .
In  जोड   ,  bogs , like all wetlands , develop anaerobic soil conditions  ,  which  produces  slower anaerobic decay  बल्कि  than aerobic microbial action .
peat  moss can also acidify its surroundings  by  taking up cations  ,   ऐसे  as calcium and magnesium , and releasing  हाइड्रोजन  ions  .
Under the right conditions , peat can accumulate  to  a depth of many meters .
Different species of Sphagnum  have  different tolerance limits for flooding and  ph  , so any one peatland  may  have a number of different  sphagnum  species .
व्यक्तिगत   peat  moss  पौधे  consist  of  a main stem , with tightly arranged clusters of branch  fascicles  usually consisting  of  two  or   तीन  spreading  शाखाओं  and  दो   to  four hanging branches .
the  top of the plant ,  or  capitulum , has compact  क्लस्टर  of young branches .
Along the stem are  बिखरे  leaves of various shapes  ,  named  स्टेम  leaves ; the shape  varies   according  to  प्रजाति   .
The  पत्ते  consist of two  kinds  of cells ; small  ,   ग्रीन  ,  जीना   कोशिकाएं  ( chlorophyllose cells  )  ,  और   विशाल   ,  clear  ,  structural  ,  dead cells ( hyaline cells ) .
The latter have the large  water-holding   क्षमता  .
the  earliest version of the Network Card ,  जारी  manually  बल्कि   than   through  an APTIS  यंत्र  .
The first APTIS version of  the  Network Card .
This  थी  used from the start  of  the APTIS  era  in 1986/1987 until well  into  the 1990s , as  स्टॉक्स  had  to   be  used up despite the introduction of the  new-look  orange-banded  संस्करण  in 1991 .
the   परिचय   of   the   weekday  minimum fare  कंडीशन  in 2002  resulted   in  a minor change  :  the  रेड  ``  r  '' shows that this is the `` Revised '' version  of  the  railcard  .
This version is still in  उपयोग   as   of  2007 .
The Network Railcard is a  छूट  card introduced in  1986  by British Rail , upon  the   सृष्टि  of their Network SouthEast area  around   लंदन  ,  इंग्लैण्ड  .
The card is intended to encourage leisure travel by  रेल   by  offering discounts for adults and accompanying  children  on a wide range of  off-peak  fares .
The range  of  discounts available , and  the  price  of   the  card , have varied since  कि   समय   ,  but the card  रै   सदा  been  मान्य   लिये  a year  's   असीमित  use .
It can be purchased  by  any person aged 16 or over  इससे  any staffed National  रेल  station or  रेल  Appointed Travel Agent  ,  by completing  an   अनुप्रयोग  form  -  no photographic  पहचान  or  अन्य  documentation is needed to  ख़रीदे   or  use the card .
It is one  of  a number of concessionary  किराया  schemes  उपलब्धियाँ  on the British railway system .
The United Nations ( UN ; French :  संगठन   देस  Nations Unies  ,   onu  )  is  the world 's largest ,  foremost  ,  और  most  prominent  international organization .
The stated aims of the United  राष्ट्र  include promoting  और  facilitating cooperation in international  विधि  , international security , economic development , social progress , human rights ,  सिविल  rights  ,  civil liberties , political freedoms  ,   लोकतंत्र  ,  और   the  achievement of lasting world peace  .
the   un  was  संस्थापित  in 1945  बाद   संसार  War II to replace  the   लीग  of Nations , to stop  युद्धों  between  देशों  , and to provide a platform  लिये   संवाद  .
It contains  अनेक   subsidiary  organizations  to  carry out its  मिशन  .
at  its founding , the UN had 51 member  राज्य   ;  as of  2011   ,   वहीँ  are 193 .
From  इसके  offices  around  the world ,  the  UN and its specialized agencies decide  on   सत्य  and administrative  मुद्दे   in   नियमित   बैठक   आयोजित  throughout the  साल  .
The organization has  छह  principal organs : the General  सभा  ( the main deliberative  सभा  )  ;  the  सुरक्षा  Council (  लिये  deciding certain resolutions  लिये  peace and  सुरक्षा  ) ;  the   आर्थिक  and Social Council  (  for assisting  in   promoting  international economic and social  सहयोग  and development )  ;   the  Secretariat  (  for  providing  studies  ,   सूचना   ,  and facilities  needed   by   the   un  )  ;  the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   अदालत   of  Justice ( the  प्राथमिक   न्यायिक   अंग   )  ; and  the  United Nations Trusteeship  परिषद   (  which is currently inactive ) .
Other prominent UN  प्रणाली   एजेंसियों  include  the  World Health  संगठन  (  जो  ) ,  the  World Food  कार्यक्रम   (   wfp  ) and United Nations Children 's  निधि  ( UNICEF  )  .
The UN 's  सबसे   prominent  position is that of  the  office  of  Secretary-General which has been held by Ban Ki-moon of South Korea  चूंकि  2007 .
The United Nations  मुख्यालय   resides   in   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  territory in New York  नगर  ,  साथ   further   प्रमुख   कार्यालयों  at Geneva , Nairobi  ,  and Vienna  .
the  organization  is  financed from assessed and voluntary contributions  इससे  its  सदस्य   राज्य  , and has six official languages :  अरबी  ,  चाइनीज   ,  English ,  फ्रेंच   ,  Russian , and  स्पेनी   .
South Beach ,  भी   nicknamed   sobe   ,  is  a   पड़ोस  in the city of Miami Beach , Florida , United States  ,  located due east  of  Miami city  उचित  between Biscayne Bay and the Atlantic Ocean  .
The  क्षेत्रफल  encompasses  सब  of the barrier islands of Miami Beach south of Indian  क्रीक   .
This area was the first section of Miami  बीच  to be developed ,  starting   in  the 1910s  ,  thanks to the development efforts of  कार्ल  G.  फिशर  ,  the  Lummus Brothers ,  और   जॉन  S.  कॉलिन्स  , the latter whose construction of  the   कॉलिन्स  Bridge provided  the  first vital land link  between  mainland Miami and the beaches .
The area  रै  gone through numerous artificial  और   प्राकृतिक  changes  over  the  सालो  , including  a   booming  regional economy , increased tourism  ,  and the 1926 hurricane  ,  which  नष्ट  much  of   the  area .
As  of   2010   ,  about 39,186 residents  सजीव  in  दक्षिण  Beach .
The  संयुक्त  States presidential election  of  1960  थी  the 44th  quadrennial  presidential election , held  on  Tuesday ,  नवम्बर  8 ,  1960  .
The Republican Party nominated  लाज़िम   vice-president  Richard  निक्सन   ,   जबकि  the Democratic Party  मनोनीत   जॉन  F. Kennedy  ,   सीनेटर  from Massachusetts .
The incumbent President  ,  Republican Dwight D. Eisenhower  ,   थी  not  योग्य  for re-election after serving  the   अधिकतम  two terms allowed by the  twenty-second  Amendment  .
Kennedy  थी  elected with a lead of  112,827  votes , or 0.17 % of the popular vote , giving  उसे  a victory of 303 to 219 in  the  Electoral College , the  closest  since 1916  .
इस  was  the  first election  in   जिससे  all fifty of the  वर्तमान  United  राज्य  participated .
A  क्रमांक   of  factors  बताइये  why the election was  so  close  .
Kennedy gained since  वहीँ   थी  an  आर्थिक  recession which  ठेस  the incumbent Republican ,  और  he had the  लाभ   of   17   लाख  more  पंजीकृत   डेमोक्रेट   than   republicans  .
Furthermore , the new votes that  कैनेडी  gained  among  Catholics  लगभग   neutralized  the new votes Nixon gained among Protestants  .
Kennedy 's campaigning skills decisively outmatched Nixon  's   .
in  the end , Nixon  's   जोर  on his experience carried little weight , and he wasted energy  by   campaigning  in  सब  50  राज्य   बजाय  of  concentrating   on   the  swing  राज्य   .
Kennedy  प्रयुक्त  his large , well-funded campaign organization to  जीत  the nomination ,  सुरक्षित  endorsements  ,  and , with the  सहायता  of  the  last of the  big-city   bosses   ,   to  get out  the  vote in  the  big cities .
He relied on running mate Lyndon  B.   जॉनसन  to hold the  दक्षिण  and used television effectively .
इस  election is notable  as  being the first time in U.S. history that  दो   बैठे   u.s  . Senators  (   कैनेडी   और  Johnson ) were elected  as  president  और  vice-president  ,  a phenomenon  कि  has  महरूम  repeated  एकबार   ,  by Barack Obama and Joe  बिडेन   in  2008  (  in both  मामले   ,  the president  थी   the  younger  ,   अधिक  junior senator ) .
a  poster for  a  c.  1884  American production  of  Macbeth  ,  starring Thomas W.  keene  .
Depicted , counter  clockwise  from top-left , are : Macbeth and Banquo meet the witches  ;  just  बाद  the murder of Duncan ;  banquo   's  ghost ; Macbeth duels Macduff ;  और  Macbeth .
मैकबेथ  is a play written  by  William Shakespeare .
It  is  considered one of his darkest and most powerful  tragedies  .
Set  in  Scotland  ,  the  खेल  dramatizes  the  corroding psychological and  राजनैतिक   प्रभाव  produced when  इसके  protagonist , the  स्कॉटिश   रब   मैकबेथ  ,  chooses  evil as the  रास्ता  to fulfill his ambition for power  .
He  commits  regicide to become king and  तब  furthers his moral descent with  a  reign of murderous terror to  रहो  in  शक्ति  ,  आखिरकार  plunging the country into civil  युद्ध  .
In  the  end , he loses everything that gives meaning and purpose  to  his  जीवन  before losing  उसके  life  itself  .
the   खेल  is believed to  have  been written  between  1603 and 1607  ,  and is most commonly dated 1606  .
The earliest  खाता  of a performance  of  what was probably Shakespeare 's play is April 1611 ,  जब  Simon Forman recorded seeing such a play at the  ग्लोब  Theatre .
It was first published  in  the Folio  of  1623 ,  संभवतः  from a prompt book .
it  was  सबसे  likely written during the reign of James I ,  जो   था  been James VI of  स्कॉटलैंड  before he  succeeded   to  the English throne in 1603 .
James  थी  a patron  of  Shakespeare’s  एक्टिंग  company , and of all the plays Shakespeare wrote during  james’s  reign ,  मैकबेथ  most clearly  reflects   the  playwright’s relationship with the sovereign  .
मैकबेथ   is   shakespeare’s  shortest tragedy  ,  and tells the story  of  a  वीर  Scottish general named  मैकबेथ  who  receives  a prophecy  इससे  a trio  of  witches that one  दिन  he will  become   किंग   of  Scotland .
खपत   by  ambition and spurred to action by his wife , Macbeth murders  किंग   डंकन  and takes  the  throne  लिये  himself .
His reign is racked with  guilt   और   paranoia  ,  और  he soon  becomes  a tyrannical ruler  as  he is  मजबूर  to commit more and more murders  to  protect himself from enmity and suspicion  .
the  bloodbath swiftly takes Macbeth and Lady Macbeth into realms of  arrogance   ,   दीवानगी  , and death .
Shakespeare 's source  लिये  the tragedy is  the  account of King  मैकबेथ  of Scotland , Macduff , and Duncan in Holinshed 's Chronicles ( 1587 )  ,  a history of England  ,  Scotland and Ireland  परिचित  to  शेक्सपियर   और  his  contemporaries   ,  although the events in  the  play differ extensively from  the   इतिहास  of the real Macbeth  .
In the  बैकस्टेज   संसार  of theatre , some believe  कि  the play is cursed , and will not mention  इसके  title  aloud  ,  referring  to it  बजाय   as   ``   the  Scottish play `` .
Over  the  course of many centuries  ,   the  play has  आकर्षित  some of the  सबसे  renowned actors to the roles  of  Macbeth and  महिला  Macbeth  .
It has  महरूम  adapted to film , television  ,  opera  ,  novels , comic books , and  अन्य  media .
The  मिल्टन   hershey  School is a private philanthropic  (  pre-K through  12  )  बोर्डिंग  school  in  Hershey ,  पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
Originally named  the  Hershey Industrial  स्कूल  ,  the   संस्था   थी  founded  और  funded  by   चॉकलेट   उद्योगपति   मिल्टन  Snavely Hershey  और  his wife  ,  Catherine  स्वीनी  Hershey .
The school was originally  स्थापित  for impoverished ,  स्वस्थ  , Caucasian  ,  male orphans , while  आज  it serves students of various backgrounds  .
The  मिल्टन  Hershey  स्कूल   विश्वास  ,  जिससे  funds  the  school , owns controlling interest in The  hershey   कम्पनी  and owns the Hershey Entertainment  और  Resorts Company  (  HERCO )  जिससे  oversees  अनेक  of  the  area  होटल  along with a theme  पार्क  called  hersheypark   .
With  over   छह  billion  डॉलर  in  एसेट   ,  the Milton Hershey School is one  of  the wealthiest schools in the world .
the  school  is  overseen by a Board of  प्रबंधक  .
the  school  फिलहाल   serves  1,818  विद्यार्थी  ,  और  plans  to   grow   to  2,100 students by 2013  .
A member  of  CORE  :  Coalition for Residential Education ,  it  is the largest residential education program in the  us  .

the  Controlled  substances  Act ( CSA ) was  enacted  into  विधि   by   the  Congress of  the  United States as Title II of the  व्यापक  Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act  of   1970  .
The CSA is  the   संघीय   u.S.  drug policy under which  the  manufacture  ,  importation  ,  possession  ,   उपयोग  and distribution  of  certain substances is regulated .
The  अधिनियम   भी   परोसा  as the national  implementing   विधान  for  the  Single  सम्मेलन   on  Narcotic  दवाएँ   .
The legislation created five  schedules   (  classifications )  ,   साथ  varying qualifications for  a  substance to be included  in  each .
Two  संघीय  agencies  ,  the Drug  प्रवर्तन  Administration and the  खाना   और  Drug  प्रशासन  , determine which  substances  are added to or removed  इससे  the  विभिन्न  schedules , though the  statute  passed by Congress  निर्मित  the initial listing , and Congress has sometimes  अनुसूचित  other substances through legislation  ऐसे  as  the  Hillory J.  farias  and  सामन्था   reid  Date-Rape Prevention Act  of  2000  ,  which placed gamma hydroxybutyrate in Schedule I . Classification  निर्णय  are required to be made on criteria including potential for  गाली  ( an  अपरिभाषित   पद  ) , currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United  राज्य   ,  and international treaties .
second-language   अधिग्रहण   or  second-language learning is  the   प्रक्रम   by  which people  सीख  a  दूसरी  language .
Second-language  अधिग्रहण  ( often  abbreviated  to  sla  )  भी   refers   to  the scientific discipline devoted to studying  कि   प्रक्रम  .
दूसरी   भाषा  refers to any language learned in addition  to  a person  's  first  भाषा  ;  हालांकि  the concept is named second-language acquisition , it can also incorporate the learning of third  ,  fourth , or subsequent languages .
Second-language acquisition refers to what learners do ; it does not refer to practices  in  language teaching  .
The academic  अनुशासन   of  second-language  अधिग्रहण  is a subdiscipline of applied linguistics .
It is  broad-based  and relatively new .
As well as the various branches of  भाषाविज्ञान  , second-language acquisition  is  also closely related to psychology  ,  cognitive  मनोविज्ञान  , and education .
to  separate  the   अकादमिक  discipline from the learning process itself , the terms  second-language  acquisition research , second-language studies  ,  and second-language acquisition studies  हैं  also used  .
SLA research began  as  an interdisciplinary field  ,  and  क्युकी  of this  it  is difficult  to   पहचानो  a precise  starting   तिथि  .
However , it does appear  to  have  विकसित  a  ग्रेट   सौदे  since the mid-1960s .
the  term acquisition was originally used  to  emphasize the subconscious  प्रकृति   of  the learning  प्रक्रम  , but  in  recent years learning  और  acquisition  have   become  largely synonymous  .
Second-language acquisition can  चरितार्थ  heritage language learning ,  लकिन  it  करता   नहीं  usually  चरितार्थ  bilingualism  .
Most SLA researchers see bilingualism  as  being the  समाप्त   परिणाम  of learning a language  ,  not  the  process itself  ,  and see  the  term as referring  to  native-like fluency .
Writers in fields  ऐसे  as  शिक्षा  and psychology ,  however   ,  often use bilingualism loosely to refer to  सब  forms of  बहुभाषिकता   .
Second-language acquisition is also not  to   be   contrasted  with the acquisition of a foreign language  ;   बल्कि  ,  the  learning of second languages and the learning of foreign languages  involve   the   वही   आधारभूत  processes  in  different situations..
वहीँ  has been  much  debate  परिचय  exactly how language is learned , and  अनेक  issues  हैं  still unresolved .
वहीँ  are many  theories  of  second-language  acquisition , but none  हैं  accepted as a complete explanation by all SLA researchers .
due   to  the interdisciplinary nature  of   the  field  of  second-language  अधिग्रहण   ,  this  is  not expected  to  happen in the  foreseeable   भविष्य  .
Forbes list of billionaires is an  सालाना  ranking of the world 's wealthiest people  ,  compiled and published  by  Forbes ,  an  American national  कारोबार  magazine .
the  total net  लायक  of each individual on the list is  अनुमानित  ,  in  United States  डॉलर   ,   आधारित  on their assets  और  accounting for  कर्ज़  .
The list only represents each  व्यक्ति   's  valuation on a  सिंगल   दिन  , due  to  daily  fluctuations  among exchange rates and stock  valuations  .
the   संयुक्त  States Secret Service is a U.S.  संघीय   विधि   प्रवर्तन  agency  कि  is  भाग  of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  Department  of  Homeland Security .
The sworn members  हैं  divided among the Special Agents and the Uniformed Division  .
Until March 1 ,  2003  ,  the  Service was part of the United States Department of the Treasury .
The U.S. Secret Service has two  पृथक  areas of responsibility:
Financial  अपराधों   ,   covering  missions such as  रोकथाम  and investigation  of  counterfeiting of  u.S.  currency  और  U.S. treasury  प्रतिभूति  ,  और  investigation  of   प्रमुख  fraud .
Protection  ,  which entails ensuring the safety of current  और  former national leaders  और   उनके  families , such  as  the  अध्यक्ष  , past presidents ,  वाइस  presidents , presidential candidates , visiting heads of state  ,  and foreign embassies ( per  an  agreement with the  u.S.  State  विभाग   's  Bureau  of   राजनयिक  Security ( DS ) Office  of  Foreign Missions ( OFM  )  , etc . )
The  रहस्य  Service 's  आरंभिक  responsibility was  to  investigate counterfeiting of  u.S.  currency , which was rampant  following  the  u.S.  Civil War  .
The agency then  विकसित  into  the  United States '  पहला  domestic intelligence and counterintelligence agency .
Many of the  एजेंसी  's missions were later taken over by  subsequent  agencies such as the  संघीय   ब्यूरो   of  Investigation  (  FBI ) , Bureau of  दारू  , Tobacco , Firearms  और  Explosives (  atf   )   ,  Immigration and Customs Enforcement (  बर्फ  )  ,  and Internal Revenue Service ( IRS ) .
`` Me  और  Bobby McGee ''  is  a song written by Kris Kristofferson  और  Fred Foster , originally performed by Roger Miller  .
अन्य  performed  the  song later , including Kristofferson himself , and  janis  Joplin  जो  topped the  u.S.  singles chart with the song in 1971  बाद  her  मौत  ,  बनाना   the   सोंग   the  second  posthumous   number-one  single in U.S. chart history  बाद   ``  ( Sittin ' On ) The  डॉक   of   the  Bay  ``  by  ओटिस  Redding  .
फ्रैंकलिन  Delano Roosevelt ( or  ;  January 30 , 1882 – April  12   ,  1945  )  ,  भी  known by his initials , FDR , was the 32nd President of the United States (  1933–1945   )   और   a   सेंट्रल   फिगर   in  world events during  the  mid-20th century  ,  leading the United States during  a  time  of  worldwide economic  अवसाद  and  कुल   युद्ध  .
a  dominant leader of the Democratic Party and  the  only American president elected to  अधिक  than two  शर्तें   ,  he  निर्मित  a New  सौदे  Coalition  कि  realigned American politics  बाद  1932  ,  as his domestic policies defined  अमरीकी  liberalism for the middle third of the 20th century  .
साथ  the  bouncy  popular song  ``  Happy Days Are Here Again  ``   as   उसके  campaign theme , FDR defeated  लाज़िम  Republican Herbert Hoover in November  1932   ,  at the depth  of   the  Great Depression .
सक्रिय  by his personal victory over  पोलियो  , FDR 's unfailing optimism and activism contributed to a renewal of the national spirit .
He  worked   closely  with British Prime Minister Winston Churchill and  सोवियत  General Secretary Joseph Stalin in leading the Allies against  जर्मनी  and Japan in  संसार  War  ii   ,   और   restoring  prosperity to the nation 's economy .
In his first hundred  दिनों  in  दफ्तर  , which  began   कूच  4 , 1933  ,   रूज़वेल्ट  spearheaded major  विधान   और   जारी  a profusion of executive orders  कि  instituted the New Deal —a variety of  कार्यक्रम  designed to produce relief  (  government jobs for the unemployed ) , recovery ( economic growth  )  , and reform  (  through  विनियमन   of  Wall Street , banks and  परिवहन  ) .
The economy improved  rapidly   इससे  1933 to  1937  , but then relapsed into a  गहन  recession  .
The bipartisan Conservative Coalition that formed in  1937  prevented his packing the Supreme  अदालत  or  गुजर  any considerable legislation ; it abolished many of the  राहत  programs  जब  unemployment  diminished   दौरान  World War II .
Most of the  regulations   on   कारोबार   यहूद  ended about  1975–85  ,  मगर  for the  विनियमन  of  वॉल  Street by the Securities and Exchange  आयोग  , which still exists .
Along with  अनेक  smaller  कार्यक्रम   ,  major surviving programs  शामिल  the Federal  जमा  Insurance Corporation ,  जिससे  was  निर्मित  in 1933 , and Social Security , which  कॉंग्रेस  passed  in  1935  .
As World  युद्ध   ii   loomed  after 1938 ,  साथ  the  जापानी   आक्रमण   of   चीन  and the  आक्रामकता  of Nazi Germany , FDR gave strong diplomatic and financial  support  to China and Great Britain ,  जबकि  remaining officially neutral .
His  लक्ष्य   थी   to  make America  the  `` Arsenal  of  Democracy  ``  which would supply munitions to the  allies  .
In March  1941  , Roosevelt  ,  with Congressional approval  ,  provided Lend-Lease  सहायता   to  the countries fighting against Nazi  जर्मनी  with  ब्रिटेन   .
With very  दमदार   नेशनल  support , he made war on  जापानी  and Germany after the Japanese attack  on  Pearl Harbor on December  7   ,  1941 , calling it a ``  तिथि   जिससे   होगा  live in  infamy  `` .
he  supervised  the   mobilization  of the U.S.  अर्थव्यवस्था  to support the Allied  युद्ध   प्रयत्न  .
As  an  active military leader  ,   रूज़वेल्ट  implemented  an  overall war  रणनीति  on  दो   fronts  that  ended  in the defeat of the Axis  शक्तियां  and the development of  the  world  's  first atom bomb .
In  1942  Roosevelt ordered the  internment   of  100,000 Japanese American civilians .
Unemployment dropped to  2  % ,  राहत  programs largely ended , and the  औद्योगिक   अर्थव्यवस्था  grew rapidly to new heights as  लाखो  of people moved  to  new  कार्य  in  युद्ध   centers  ,  और  16 million men and 300,000  महिलाओं  were  drafted  or volunteered for  सैन्य  service .
Roosevelt  वर्चस्व   the   अमरीकी   राजनैतिक  scene not only during  the  twelve  सालो  of  उसके  presidency , but also for decades afterward  .
He orchestrated  the  realignment of voters that created  the   पांचवां  Party System  .
fdr  's New Deal  गठबन्धन   संयुक्त  labor  संघ  , big city machines , white  ethnics   ,   अफ़्रीकी  Americans and rural  श्वेत   southerners   .
He  भी  influenced  the   बाद  creation of the  संयुक्त  Nations and Bretton Woods .
Roosevelt is  consistently  rated by  विद्वानों  as  एक   of  the top  तीन   u.S.  Presidents  ,  along with  अब्राहम   lincoln  and  जार्ज  Washington  .
A liberal Democrat  ,  Roosevelt defined his ideological position  as  `` a little left of center . ''
मारा  Salvatrucha  (  commonly  abbreviated  as MS , Mara , and MS-13 ) is  a  transnational criminal  गिरोह  that originated  in  Los Angeles and has spread  to  other parts  of  the United States ,  कनाडा  , Mexico , and  सेंट्रल   अमेरिका  .
the  majority  of  the gang is ethnically composed of Central Americans and  क्रियाशील  in urban and suburban areas  .
In the  u.S.  , the MS-13 has an especially  भारी  presence  in  Los Angeles County and the San Francisco Bay Area in Northern  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  ; the Washington  ,   d.C.   महानगर  areas of  फेयरफैक्स  County , Virginia  ,   मोंटगोमरी   काउंटी  , Maryland , and Prince George 's County , Maryland  ;  Long  द्वीप  , New  यॉर्क  ;  the  Boston , Massachusetts area ; Charlotte  ,   उत्तर   कैरोलिना  ; and Houston , Texas .
There  is   भी  a presence of  ms-13   in   टोरंटो  , Ontario  ,  Canada  .
सदस्यों  of  ms  distinguish  themselves  by tattoos covering  the  body and also often the  फेस  , as well as  the   उपयोग   of   उनके   अपना  sign language .
They are notorious for their  उपयोग  of  हिंसा   और  a subcultural moral  कोड  that predominantly consists  of   merciless   बदला  and cruel retributions .
This  क्रूरता   of  the distinguished members of  the  `` Maras  ''   or  ``  mareros   ''  earned  उन्हें  a path to be  recruited  by the Sinaloa Cartel battling against Los Zetas in  an  ongoing  ड्रग   युद्ध  south of the United States border .
Their  wide-ranging   क्रियाएँ   have  drawn the attention of  the   एफबीआई  and Immigration and Customs  प्रवर्तन  , who have  initiated   wide-scale  raids against  ज्ञात  and  suspected   गिरोह  members – netting hundreds of  रखवाले  across  the  country  .
Bones  is  an American crime  comedy-drama  television series that  premiered  on  the   फॉक्स  network in the United States on  सितंबर   13  , 2005  .
the  show is based on forensic anthropology and  forensic  archaeology ,  साथ   प्रत्येक  episode  focusing  on  an  FBI case file concerning the mystery  पीछे   इंसान  remains brought by FBI Special  एजेंट  Seeley Booth (  दाउद  Boreanaz )  to  the forensic  anthropologist   dr.   temperance   ``  Bones '' Brennan ( Emily Deschanel )  .
the   बाकी  of  the  main cast includes  michaela  Conlin  ,  T. J. Thyne , Eric  millegan  , Tamara Taylor ,  जोनाथन  Adams , and  जॉन  Francis Daley .
निर्मित  by Hart Hanson  ,  the series is very  loosely  based  on   the  life  और  writings  of   उपन्यासकार  and forensic anthropologist Kathy Reichs ,  जो  also produces the  दिखाएँ  .
Its  शीर्षक  character , Temperance Brennan , is  नामित   बाद  the protagonist of  reichs   '   अपराधों   अनोखा   श्रेणी  .
Conversely  ,  Dr. Brennan writes successful mystery novels based  around   a  fictional ( in the Bones  ब्रह्मांड  )  forensic   anthropologist   नामित  Kathy Reichs  .
हड्डियों   is  a joint production  by   जोसेफसन  Entertainment , Far  फ़ील्ड   प्रोडक्शन्स  and  20th  Century  फॉक्स  Television  .
The series has completed airing  इसके  eighth season and has been renewed  लिये  a  नवीं  season .
Super  कटोरी  XXV was an American  फ़ुटबॉल  game between the American Football Conference  (  AFC ) champion Buffalo  बिल्स  and the National  फ़ुटबॉल  Conference  (  NFC  )  champion New York Giants to decide  the  National Football League ( NFL ) champion for the  1990   ऋतु   .
The Giants  पराजित   the   बिल्स   by  the score of 20–19  ,  winning their second ever  सुपर   कटोरी  .
it  is the only  सुपर   कटोरी  decided by one point .
The game  थी  held  at   tampa  Stadium in Tampa ,  फ्लोरिडा  ,  on  January 27 , 1991 , during the  ऊँचाई   of  the Gulf  युद्ध  .
It was  यूँ  played  अंतर्गत  much patriotic  fervor  .
the  proceedings  शामिल  a rousing rendition  of   ``  The Star-Spangled  ध्वज   ``  by Whitney  ह्यूस्टन  during  the   pregame  ceremonies  .
the   बिल्स  and their explosive no-huddle offense were making  उनके  first Super  कटोरी  appearance after finishing  the  regular  ऋतु   साथ  a 13-3 record , and leading the  लीग  in  कुल  points scored with  428   .
In advancing to  उनके  second Super Bowl , the Giants also posted a 13-3  नियमित  season record ,  लकिन   साथ  a ball-control offense and  a  defense that  अनुमत  a league low 211  अंक  .
the  game is  बेहतरीन  remembered for Bills  placekicker  Scott Norwood  's  last-second field goal  attempt  which went wide  सही  of the uprights , leading to  a  Giants  विजय  ,  और  starting  a   four-game  losing streak in the Super Bowl for  the  Bills .
The  दिग्गज  set  a  Super Bowl  रिकार्ड  holding possession of the  बॉल  for  40  minutes and 33 seconds .
New  यॉर्क  also  overcame   a   12-3   second-quarter  deficit  ,  and made a  75-yard  touchdown drive that consumed a Super Bowl record 9:29 off the clock .
Giants running back Ottis Anderson ,  जो   carried   the   बॉल  21 times for  102  yards and one touchdown , was named  सुपर   कटोरी  MVP .
He  थी  the first  awardee  to receive the  newly   नामित  ``  पीट   rozelle  Trophy ''  (   नामित  for the former commissioner  )   .
Anderson also  अंकित  one reception  लिये   सात  yards .
Malcolm X  (  ;  may  19 , 1925February 21  ,  1965 )  ,  born Malcolm Little and also known as El-Hajj Malik El-Shabazz (  )   ,  was an African-American  मुस्लिम   मंत्री  and human  अधिकारों  activist  .
to  his admirers , he was a courageous  एडवोकेट   लिये  the rights of  अश्वेतों  ,  a  man who indicted  श्वेत   अमेरिका   in  the harshest  शर्तें  for  इसके  crimes against black Americans .
detractors  accused him of preaching racism  ,   ब्लैक  supremacy , and  हिंसा  .
he   रै  been  पुकारा   एक   of  the  महानतम   और   सबसे  influential African Americans in history  .
मैल्कम  X  's   पिता   died—killed   by   श्वेत   supremacists   ,   it  was rumored—when  he  was young , and at least one of his  uncles  was lynched  .
When  he   थी   13  , his mother  थी  placed in  a   दिमागी   हॉस्पिटल  , and he was placed  in   a  series of foster homes .
In 1946 , at age  20   ,  he went to prison for breaking and entering .
In prison ,  मैल्कम  X  became  a member  of  the  स्वदेश  of Islam ;  बाद   उसके  parole in 1952 , he quickly  रोज़  to become one  of  its leaders .
For a dozen  सालो  ,  मैल्कम  X  थी  the  पब्लिक   फेस   of   the   विवादास्पद   समूह  , but disillusionment with Nation of  islam  head Elijah Muhammad  led  him to leave the Nation  in  March  1964  .
After a period of travel  in  Africa and  the   मध्य  East , he returned to  the  United States , where he  संस्थापित  Muslim  मस्जिदे  , Inc. and  the  Organization of  afro-american  Unity  .
in  February  1965  , less  than  a year  बाद  leaving the Nation  of   islam  , he was  assassinated  by three members  of   the   समूह  .
मैल्कम  X  's  expressed beliefs changed substantially over time .
As a  प्रवक्ता   लिये   the  Nation  of  Islam he taught black supremacy and advocated separation of black and  श्वेत  Americans —in  कंट्रास्ट   to   the  civil rights movement 's  जोर  on  संयोजन  .
After breaking with the Nation of  islam   in  1964—saying  of   उसके  association with  it   ,  `` I did many things as a  [  Black ] Muslim that I 'm  sorry  for now .
I was a  प्रेत  then ... pointed in a certain  दिशा  and told to march '' —and  बनने   a  Sunni Muslim , he  disavowed   जातिवाद   और  expressed willingness to work  साथ  civil rights leaders ,  he  continued  to  emphasize Pan-Africanism  ,  black self-determination  ,   और  self-defense .
The third  ऋतु  of 90210 ,  an  American  टेलीविज़न   श्रेणी  , premiered on Monday September 13  ,  2010 .
The CW officially renewed  the   दिखाएँ  for a third season  on  February 16  ,   2010  .

It premiered  on   सितंबर  13 ,  2010  and was met with  generally  positive  समीक्षाएँ   इससे   आलोचकों   .
The season  चयन  up at the end  of   गर्मियाँ   और  focuses on  the   विद्यार्थी  senior year  of   ऊँची   स्कूल  .
it   फ़ॉलो  Adrianna 's rise to fame , a new  संबंध  between Silver and Navid  और  a  उलझन  Teddy who  decides  to reveal  to  his family and friends  he  is gay  .
it  also deals with the aftermath of Naomi  क्लार्क  's  उत्पीड़न  .
नियमित  cast members for the  ऋतु   शामिल  Shenae Grimes  ,   ट्रिस्टन   wilds   ,  AnnaLynne McCord ,  रयान  Eggold ,  जेसिका  Stroup , Michael  steger   ,   जेसिका  Lowndes  ,   मैट  Lanter  ,  Gillian Zinser  ,   ट्रेवर   डोनोवन   और   लोरी  Loughlin .

the   ऋतु  premiered  to  1.96 million viewers and  a  0.9 rating in the  वयस्कों  18–49 demographic  .
Christmas-themed episode  ``  Holiday  दीवानगी   ''  , hit season highs  in  all key  demos  with  2.1  in The CW 's target demo of women  18–34  , a 1.4 in adults 18–34 and a 1.1 in  वयस्कों  18–49 .

the  season finale aired on May  16  ,  2011  .
the   ऋतु   averaged  1.75 million live  दर्शक  and a 0.9 adults  18–49  rating .

Elizabeth II  (   एलिज़ाबेथ  Alexandra  मरियम   ;   born   21   अप्रैल   1926   )  is  the   संवैधानिक  monarch of  16   sovereign   राज्य  , known as the Commonwealth realms  ,   और  their  territories   और  dependencies , and head of the  54-member  Commonwealth of  राष्ट्र  .
She  is  Supreme Governor  of  the Church  of  England  और   ,  in  कुछ  of  उसके  realms  ,  carries the  शीर्षक  of  defender   of  the Faith as part of her full title .
On her accession on 6 February 1952 , Elizabeth  became  Head of the Commonwealth and  महारानी   regnant  of  सात  independent Commonwealth countries  :   the   संयुक्त  Kingdom , Canada , Australia , New Zealand , South Africa , Pakistan and Ceylon  .
From 1956  to   1992  ,  the  number  of   उसके  realms varied as territories gained  स्वतंत्रता  and some  realms  became  republics  .
at  present , in  जोड  to  the   पहला   चार   aforementioned  countries ,  एलिज़ाबेथ  is Queen of Jamaica , Barbados , the Bahamas ,  हरा   ,  Papua New Guinea , the Solomon  आइलैंड्स   ,  Tuvalu , Saint  लूसिया   ,   संत  Vincent and the  grenadines   ,  Belize , Antigua  और  Barbuda and  संत  Kitts and Nevis .
उसके  reign of years is  फिलहाल   the  second longest for a British monarch  ;  only  महारानी  Victoria has reigned longer  at  over  63  years .
एलिज़ाबेथ  was born in London and educated privately  at   घर  .
उसके  father acceded  to   the  throne as George VI in 1936 on  the  abdication of his brother  एडवर्ड  VIII , from  जिससे  time  वो  was the  वारिस   presumptive  .
She  began  to undertake public duties during  the  Second World War , in which she served in the Auxiliary Territorial Service  .
In  1947  , she married Prince Philip ,  ड्यूक  of  एडिनबर्ग  , with whom  वो  has four  children  :  चार्ल्स   ,  Anne  ,  Andrew  ,   और  Edward  .
उसके  coronation service took  प्लेस   in   1953   और  was the  पहला  to be televised  .
The Queen 's many historic visits and meetings  शामिल  a state visit to the Republic of Ireland and reciprocal visits  to  and from the Pope .
The Queen has seen  प्रमुख  constitutional changes  in   उसके  realms , such  as  devolution  in  the United  किंगडम   और   the  patriation of the  कनाडाई   संविधान  .
Times of personal significance have  शामिल  the births and marriages  of  her children ,  the  births of her grandchildren  ,   the  investiture of  the  Prince of  वेल्स  , and the celebration of  माइलस्टोन  such as her  चांदी  , Golden  ,   और  Diamond Jubilees  in   1977  , 2002  ,  and 2012 , respectively .
Major events in the Queen 's reign have  शामिल  the Troubles in Northern Ireland ,  the  Falklands War , wars with Iraq and the War  in  Afghanistan .
वहीँ  have been times of  निजी   विषाद   लिये  her which include the  मौत  of her father at 56 , the  हत्या  of Prince Philip 's uncle , Lord Mountbatten , the  विश्लेषण   of  her  children   's  marriages  in   1992  (  a   साल  deemed her annus  horribilis  ) , the death in 1997 of her former daughter-in-law ,  डायना  , Princess of Wales  ,   और  the  मौतों  of  उसके  mother  और  sister in 2002 .
The  महारानी  has occasionally  faced  severe press  आलोचना  of  the  royal family and republican sentiments , but support  लिये  the  साम्राज्य  and her  निजी   लोकप्रियता  remain high .
The  2010  United States Senate election in Florida  took  place  on   नवम्बर   2  , 2010 along with other elections  to  the United States  सीनेट  in  अन्य  states as well as all  चुनावों  to the United States House  of   प्रतिनिधि  and various  राज्य  and local elections  .
Republican Marco Rubio , former  स्पीकर   of  the  फ्लोरिडा   हाउस  of Representatives ,  पराजित  independent Charlie Crist and Democrat Kendrick Meek  in  a three-way race  .
One term Senator Mel Martinez was elected  in  a very close  रेस  against Democrat Betty Castor in 2004 with 49 % of the vote .
Martinez announced  on   दिसम्बर  2 ,  2008  that  he  would  नहीं  seek  re-election   to   the  Senate , and would resign  prior   to  the end  of  his  पद  .
In August 2009 , Governor Charlie Crist  घोषित  that he would  नियुक्त   उसके  former Chief of Staff  ,  George  lemieux  , a Republican  ,  to the Senate  सीट  being vacated by Martinez .
Governor Crist  सरेआम  announced he was running for the  सीट   in   mid-2009  .
At the time  he  received  अनेक  Republican  समर्थन  ,  ऐसे  as the National Republican Senatorial Committee , Martinez ,  और   the  2008  रिपब्लिकन   अध्यक्षीय  nominee  जॉन  McCain  .
उसके   support  of  the  American Recovery  और  Reinvestment Act of 2009 hurt his  लोकप्रियता   among  conservatives , and candidate  मार्को   rubio  surged  .
In  अप्रैल  2010  crist   घोषित  he  होता  drop  आउट  of the Republican primary  और  run as an  स्वतंत्र  .
the  National Republican Senatorial Committee  withdrew  its  समर्थन  of Crist and demanded  a   refund  of  इसके  campaign funds that  it  provided  लिये  the Crist  अभियान  .
Congressman Kendrick Meek  थी  the  पहला  Democrat to  घोषित  his intention to run .
सिकंदर  Snitker  थी  the first member of the  libertarian  Party  on   the   बैलट  for senator in Florida 's  इतिहास  .

Doha (  ,  '  or  ' , literally  :  `` the big  पेड़   ''   )   is  the capital city  of  the state of Qatar .
Located on the  coast   of   the  Persian Gulf ,
it  था  a population of  998,651  in 2008  ,  and is also one of the municipalities of Qatar .
Doha is Qatar  's  largest city , with over 60  %  of the  स्वदेश   's  population residing in Doha or its surrounding suburbs , and is also the economic centre of the  देश   .
दोहा  also  serves  as the  सीट  of government  of  Qatar , which is ruled by  शेख़   हमद  bin  खलीफा  Al  थानी   .
Doha is  घर  to  the   शिक्षा   नगर   ,  an area  devoted  to  शोध  and  शिक्षा  .
Doha was the site of the first ministerial-level meeting of  the   दोहा  Development  गोलाकार  of World Trade Organization negotiations .
The city of Doha held the  2006  Asian Games , which was the largest  एशियाई  Games ever held  .
दोहा  also hosted  the   2011  Pan  अरब   खेल  and most of the games at the 2011  afc  Asian Cup .
Doha  hosted  the  unfccc  Climate  negotiations  ( COP  18   )   दिसम्बर  2012 and will  मेजबान   a   विशाल  number  of  the venues  लिये  the 2022 FIFA World  कप  .
The World Petroleum  परिषद  held the 20th World Petroleum Conference in Doha  in  December 2011  .
Paranasal sinuses are  a  group  of   चार  paired air-filled spaces that surround the nasal cavity  (  maxillary sinuses ) , above the  आँखें   (  frontal sinuses  )  , between the eyes (  ethmoid  sinuses  )   ,  and behind the ethmoids (  sphenoid  sinuses ) .
The sinuses are named  लिये  the facial bones in which  वे  are located .
झुकना  manufacturing , lean enterprise , or lean  उत्पादन  , often simply , `` Lean , '' is a production  अभ्यास  that considers  the  expenditure  of  resources for any  लक्ष्य   अन्य  than the  सृष्टि   of  value for  the  end customer  to  be wasteful  ,  and thus a  निशाना  for  विलोपन  .
working   इससे  the perspective of  the  customer who consumes a product  or  service , `` value '' is defined  as  any  कार्रवाई  or  प्रक्रम  that  a  customer would be willing  to  pay for .
Essentially , lean  is  centered on  preserving  value with less work .
झुकना  manufacturing is a management  दर्शनशास्त्र   निकला  mostly from  the   टोयोटा   उत्पादन  System  (  TPS ) ( hence  the  term  toyotism  is also prevalent  )  and  पहचाना   as  `` Lean  ''  only in the 1990s .
TPS is  प्रसिद्ध   लिये  its focus on reduction of the original Toyota seven wastes  to  improve overall customer  मान  ,  लकिन  there are  varying  perspectives on how this is best achieved .
The steady growth of Toyota ,  इससे   a  small company to the world 's largest automaker , has focused attention on how it has achieved this success  .

iCarly is an  अमरीकी   sitcom  that airs on Nickelodeon ,  जिससे  premiered on  सितंबर  8 , 2007  .
Nickelodeon  प्रचारित  many  एपीसोड   so  far such as ``  ido  ''  ,  `` iHire an  idiot  ''  ,  `` iPity the Nevel '' ,  ``  iDate Sam &  फ्रेडी  '' ,  इत्यादि  .  as  specials , despite their being regular episodes  .
प्रत्येक  episode title  begins  with a lower  मामला  i which represents the internet ,  as  in ``  icarly  '' .
The  दिखाएँ  was nominated for  an  Emmy award for Outstanding Children 's Program in  2009  .
The series starring Miranda Cosgrove  as  Carly  शे  , a 13-year-old who becomes  an   अंतरजाल  star .
The  श्रेणी   ended   on  November  23   ,  2012 with the one-hour special  एपीसोड   ``  iGoodbye '' .
a   कुल  of 7  सीज़न  and  109  episodes were  ब्रॉडकास्ट  .
The  largest   दर्शक  of the series was 11.2  लाख   दर्शक  ,  साथ  the  खास  episode  ``  iSaved  अपना  Life '' premiered in  जनवरी  2010 .
जब  Carly  (  Miranda Cosgrove ) and her sassy  बेहतरीन  friend  sam   (  Jennette McCurdy ) act funny at  a  school talent  दिखाएँ  audition  ,  tech-savvy  फ्रेडी   (  Nathan Kress )  टेपों  it and posts it online without telling  उन्हें  .
After seeing the girls ' strong chemistry  और  banter  ,   the  online  दर्शक  clamors for more and  the  iCarly webcast is born  .
जबकि  grappling with typical issues of  किशोरावस्था   ,   कार्ली  , Sam , and Freddie find out  कि   वे   have  also become online  हस्तियाँ   as  their show –  जिससे  features talent contests ,  व्यंजनों  ,  problem-solving  , and random dancing – garners international accolades  .
कार्ली  lives  in  Seattle  ,   वॉशिंगटन  with  उसके  26-year-old brother  और  guardian Spencer  (  Jerry Trainor ) and  produces  the show  in  a makeshift third-floor studio loft in their apartment .
उनके  mother has never  महरूम   देखी  or mentioned  ,  but their father  ,   स्टीवन  Shay ( David  chisum  ) , is a U.S. Air Force officer temporarily stationed on a submarine , and is often mentioned but is  तभी   देखी  in person  दौरान  the  श्रेणी  finale episode , ``  igoodbye   ''  .
Westlife were an  आयरिश  boy  बैंड  which formed in 1998 and disbanded in 2012  .
Originally  हस्ताक्षरित  by  साइमन   cowell  and managed by  लुई  Walsh  ,   the  group 's final line-up  consisted   of  Nicky Byrne , Kian Egan ,  चिह्नित  Feehily and Shane Filan  .
Brian McFadden  थी  a member from  1998  until  उसके  departure  in   2004  .
Westlife sold over 50 million records worldwide  ,  a total that  शामिल  studio albums , singles ,  वीडियो  releases ,  और   संकलन  albums .
The group  संचित  14 number-one  singles  in  the   संयुक्त   किंगडम  ( the third-highest in UK  इतिहास   )  , tying with Cliff Richard and ranking just behind  the   बीटल्स   और   एल्विस  Presley .
They achieved a  कुल  of  26  top ten  singles  over their  14-year   करियर  .
By 2010 ,  westlife  was listed in the Guinness World  रिकॉर्ड   ,  as the UK  's  top-selling album group  of  the  21st  century .
वे  also  जीती  The  रिकार्ड  of the Year  (  the only  म्यूज़िक  award  आधारित  on  पब्लिक  votes in  the   uk   )   a  record-breaking four times and in 2012 , the  आधिकारिक  Charts Company  सूचीबद्ध  Westlife  34th  amongst the biggest-selling singles  कलाकारों  in British music history .
Despite  उनके   यूरोपीय  and Asian success , Westlife never  प्रबंधित  to break  into   the  U.S. market ,  achieving   तभी   एक  hit single  in   2000  : ``  कसम  It Again `` .
in  October 2011  ,   westlife   घोषित  their intention  to  split in 2012  ,  following their  महानतम   हिट्स  Tour and  the  release of their Greatest Hits album .
The boyband 's final concerts were held on 22  और   23  June 2012 at Croke  पार्क  Stadium in  डबलिन  .
The first farewell concert  ,   offering   85,000  tickets  ,   बेची  out in  a  record-breaking  5  minutes  और   the  latter screened  सजीव  in cinemas worldwide .
विटामिन  A is  a  group of nutritionally unsaturated  hydrocarbons  , which include  रेटिनॉल   ,  retinal , retinoic acid and  अनेक  provitamin A  carotenoids  among which  beta-carotene  is the most important .
Vitamin  a   रै   अनेक  functions  ,  it is important for growth and  विकास  ,  लिये  the  मेंटेनेंस  of  the  immune  प्रणाली   और   शुभ  vision .
Vitamin A is  needed  by  the  retina  of  the eye  in   the  form of retinal  ,   जिससे   combines   साथ   प्रोटीन  opsin to  रूप  rhodopsin the light-absorbing molecule  ,  that is necessary  लिये   दोनो  low-light ( scotopic vision ) and  रंग   दृष्टि   .
Vitamin A also  कृत्यों  in a very different role as  an   irreversibly  oxidized  रूप  of retinol  ज्ञात  as retinoic acid , which  is  an  महत्वपूर्ण  hormone-like growth factor  लिये  epithelial and other cells .
in   भोजन  of animal origin ,  the  major form of vitamin  a  is an  ester   ,   primarily  retinyl  palmitate   ,   जिससे  is converted  to   रेटिनॉल  ( chemically an  दारू   )  in the small intestine .
The  रेटिनॉल  form functions as a storage form of the vitamin  ,  and can be  परिवर्तित   to  and from its visually active aldehyde  रूप  ,  retinal  .
The  संबद्ध   एसिड  ( retinoic acid  )   ,  a metabolite that can be  irreversibly  synthesized from  विटामिन  A , has only partial vitamin A  कार्यकलाप   ,  and does not function in the  retina  for  the  visual cycle .
Retinoic acid is  प्रयुक्त  for growth and  सेल्यूलर  differentiation .
सब   फ़ॉर्म  of vitamin A have a beta-ionone ring to which an  isoprenoid   कड़ी  is  संलग्न  , called  a   retinyl  group  .
Both structural  सुविधाएँ   हैं  essential  लिये  vitamin activity .
The orange pigment of  गाजर  – beta-carotene – can be represented as  दो  connected  retinyl  groups , which are used in the body  to  contribute to vitamin A  स्तर   .
Alpha-carotene  और  gamma-carotene also have  a  single retinyl group ,  जिससे  give  उन्हें  some  विटामिन   कार्यकलाप   .
None  of  the other carotenes  have  vitamin activity .
the  carotenoid beta- cryptoxanthin possesses an  ionone   समूह  and has vitamin activity  in  humans .
विटामिन  A can  be  found in  दो  principal forms  in  foods :
रेटिनॉल  ,  the   रूप   of   विटामिन   a   अवशोषित  when  खाने   एनिमल   खाना  sources  ,  is a yellow  ,  fat-soluble substance  .
Since the pure alcohol form  is  unstable  ,  the  विटामिन  is  मिला  in tissues  in   a  form of  retinyl  ester .
It is also commercially  उत्पादित  and  administered   as  esters such  as  retinyl  एसीटेट   or  palmitate  .
The  carotenes  alpha-carotene , beta-carotene , gamma-carotene  ;  and the xanthophyll  beta-cryptoxanthin   (  all  of  which  contain   beta-ionone   बजती   )  , but no other carotenoids , function as provitamin A  in  herbivores  और   सर्वाहारी  animals , which possess  the  enzyme ( 15-15'-dioxygenase ) which cleaves  beta-carotene  in the  intestinal  mucosa and converts it retinol  .
In  सामान्य  ,  carnivores  are poor converters  of   ionine-containing   carotenoids   ,  and pure carnivores  ऐसे  as  बिल्लियों   और  ferrets lack 15-15'-dioxygenase  और   can  not  बदलें  any carotenoids to retinal ( resulting  in  none of the carotenoids being forms  of   विटामिन  A for these species ) .
Selena Marie  गोमेज़  ( born July 22  ,   1992   )  is  an  American singer and actress .
She  बना  her debut as a child actress  in  Barney &  मित्रों   .
In  2007  , Gomez came to prominence as a starring cast  सदस्य  in the television series Wizards of Waverly Place  .
She  हस्ताक्षरित  to  हॉलीवुड  Records the following  साल  ,  और   became  the founder  और  lead singer of  the   पॉप  band Selena  गोमेज़  &  the  Scene .
उनके  studio  एल्बम   चुंबन  & Tell (  2009  )  ,  A Year  बगैर  Rain ( 2010 ) ,  और  When the  सूर्य  Goes  bas  ( 2011 ) were certified Gold by the  रिकॉर्डिंग  Industry Association of  अमेरिका   (  RIAA  )  and  have   शाखित  Platinum-certified  singles   ``   naturally   ``   ,   ``  Who  says   ``  , and `` Love You like a Love Song  ``  .
After the release of  टेलीविज़न  films  और   उनके   accompanying  soundtracks , Gomez  बना  her theatrical film debut in Ramona and  beezus  in  2010   और  starred in Monte Carlo in 2011  .
Upon the conclusion of Wizards of Waverly Place  और   the   अंतराल  of Selena Gomez & the Scene in 2012 , she  केन्द्रित  on her  फिल्मी  career  ,   सेवारत   as  a voice  अभिनेत्री  in Hotel Transylvania and  अभिनीत  in Spring  ब्रेकर्स  the following  साल  .
Her debut solo  एल्बम  is tentatively scheduled to be released  in   गर्मियाँ   2013   ,  and is preceded by its lead  सिंगल  `` Come  &   मिलेंगी  It `` .
Outside of her work in  the  entertainment industry , Gomez is involved in philanthropic activities  through  charity work  और   विभिन्न   सोशल  and  पर्यावरणीय   कल्याणकारी  .
Tracie Monique  स्पेंसर  ( born July 12  ,  1976 ) is  an  American  r  & B and  पॉप  singer-songwriter  ,  actress  ,  and model .
Sacramento  is  the  पूंजी  city of the U.S. state of California  और  the seat  of  government of Sacramento County .
It is located at the confluence of  the  Sacramento River  और   the   अमरीकी   नदी  in the  उत्तरी   portion  of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  's expansive Central Valley  .
साथ   an   अनुमानित  2011  जनसांख्यिकी   of  477,891 ,  it  is the sixth-largest city  in  California and the  35th  largest  नगर  in  the  United States .
Sacramento is the core cultural and economic center of the Sacramento metropolitan area which  शामिल  seven counties with an estimated 2009 population of 2,527,123 .
Its metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  is the fourth  largest   in  California  बाद  the  वृहद  Los Angeles Area ,  सैन   फ्रांसिस्को  Bay Area , and the  सैन   डिएगो  metropolitan area , as well  as  the  25th  largest in the  संयुक्त  States  .
Sacramento  थी   cited  by  समय   पत्रिका  as  अमेरिका  's most  ethnically  and  racially  integrated city  in   2002  .
Sacramento  became  a  नगर  through the efforts  of   the   स्विस   अप्रवासी  John Sutter  ,   sr.   ,  his son John Sutter  ,  Jr. , and James  W.   मार्शल  .
sacramento  grew quickly thanks to the  सुरक्षा  of  sutter   's  Fort , which was established  by  Sutter  in   1839  .
During  the   कैलिफ़ोर्निया   सुनहरा  Rush , Sacramento was  a  major  वितरण  point  ,  a commercial and  agricultural  center ,  और  a terminus for  वैगन  trains  ,   stagecoaches   ,   riverboats  ,  the   टेलीग्राफ   ,  the Pony Express ,  और  the  पहला  Transcontinental  रेलरोड   .
California  राज्य  University , Sacramento  ,   अधिक  commonly known as  sacramento  State or Sac State , is  the  largest  लोकल  university .
It is one of  the  twenty-three campuses of the  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   राज्य  University system .
Drexel  विश्वविद्यालयों   sacramento  is  स्तिथ  in Downtown , Sacramento .
University of the Pacific  's   mcgeorge  School  of  Law is  स्तिथ   in  the  ओक   पार्क  neighborhood  .
in   जोड   ,  the University  of  California , Davis is located in nearby  डेविस  , west of the capital .
The  uc  Davis Medical Center ,  a  world-renowned research hospital , is located  in  the  नगर  of Sacramento .
Memorial  दिन   is   a  United States federal holiday which occurs  प्रत्येक  year  on   the   फाइनल   सोमवार  of May .
Memorial  दिन   is  a  दिन  of  remembering   the  men and women who died while serving in  the  United States  हथियारबंद   शक्तियां   .
formerly  known  as  Decoration Day ,  it  originated after the  अमरीकी  Civil War  to  commemorate the Union and Confederate  सैनिको  who died  in  the Civil War .
By the 20th century Memorial  दिन  had been extended  to   सम्मान  all Americans who have  died   in  all  युद्धों  .
It typically marks  the   प्रारंभ  of  the  summer vacation season  ,  while  मजदूर  Day marks its  समाप्त   .
Many  लोगों  visit cemeteries  और  memorials  ,  particularly to  सम्मान  those  जो  have died in  सैन्य  service  .
Many volunteers place  an  American flag  on  each grave  in   नेशनल  cemeteries .
By the early  20th  century ,  मेमोरियल  Day was an occasion for more general expressions  of   मेमोरी   ,  as people  visited  the graves of  उनके  deceased relatives  in   गिरिजाघर  cemeteries , whether they had served in  the  military or not .
It  भी  became  a  long weekend increasingly devoted  to   खरीदारी  , family gatherings , fireworks , trips to  the  beach  ,  and  नेशनल  media events  .
Annual Decoration Days for particular cemeteries are held on a Sunday  in   लेट  spring  or   जल्दी  summer in some rural areas of the American South  ,  notably in the mountains .
In cases involving a  परिवार  graveyard where remote ancestors as well as those who were  मृतक  more  recently  are buried ,  इस  may  लो  on  the  character  of  an extended  परिवार  reunion to which some people  सफर  hundreds of miles  .
People gather  on  the designated day  और  put flowers on  क़ब्रों   और   नवीनीकृत  contacts  साथ  kinfolk and  अन्य  .
There often is a  धार्मिक  service and a `` dinner  on   the   मैदान  , '' the traditional  पद   लिये  a  potluck  meal in which people  प्रयुक्त  to  स्प्रेड  the dishes out on sheets or tablecloths on the  ग्रास  .
It is  believed   कि   इस  practice began  पहले  the American  सिविल  War and thus  may  reflect the real origin of the `` memorial day ''  विचार  .
Memorial Day  is  not to be  उलझन  with Veterans  दिन  ; Memorial  दिन  is  a   दिन  of remembering the  मेन   और  women  जो  died while serving , while Veterans Day  मनाता  the service  of  all U.S. military veterans , living  or  dead  .
Mt . Zion  गिरिजाघर  state history marker near Philadelphia  ,  Mississippi .
Freedom Summer ( also known as the Mississippi  गर्मियाँ  Project ) was a campaign  in   the  United States  शुभारम्भ  in June 1964 to attempt to register as  अनेक  African American voters  as  possible in  मिसिसिपी  ,  जिससे  had historically excluded most blacks from  मतदान   .
The project also  नियत   up  dozens of Freedom  स्कूलों   ,   स्वतंत्रता   घरों  , and community centers  in  small  कस्बों   throughout  Mississippi to  सहायता  the local black population .
The project was organized by  the  Council of Federated Organizations ( COFO ) , a coalition  of   the  Mississippi branches  of   the  four major civil rights  संगठन  (  sncc  , CORE  ,  NAACP and SCLC ) .
सबसे  of the impetus , leadership ,  और  financing  लिये  the Summer Project came  इससे   the  SNCC .
Robert Parris Moses , SNCC  फ़ील्ड   सचिव   और  co-director of COFO  ,  directed the  गर्मियाँ   प्रोजेक्ट   .
ब्लूज़  is the name  दिए  to  दोनो   a   musical   रूप  and  a  music  विधा  that originated in communities  of   primarily   the   ``   गहन  South `` of the United States  around  the  समाप्त  of the 19th  सदी   इससे   spirituals  , work songs , field  hollers   ,  shouts  और   chants  ,  और  rhymed  सरल  narrative  ballads  .
The blues form  ,  ubiquitous in  जैज़  ,  लय  and blues , and rock and  फेंकें   is  characterized by specific chord progressions , of which the twelve-bar  ब्लूज़   कॉर्ड  progression is the most common .
The  ब्लू  notes that , for expressive purposes are sung  or  played  flattened  or  धीरे  bent ( minor 3rd  to  major 3rd  )   in  relation to the  पिच  of  the   प्रमुख   स्केल   ,  are also  an  important part of the sound  .
The blues genre is  आधारित  on  the  blues  रूप   लकिन   possesses  other characteristics such as specific  गीत  , bass  लाइनों   ,   और  instruments .
Blues can be  subdivided  into several subgenres  ranging  from country  to  urban  ब्लूज़   कि   यहूद  more  or  less popular during different periods of the 20th  सदी  .
Best known are the  डेल्टा  , Piedmont  ,  Jump , and Chicago blues styles .
World War  ii  marked the transition from  ध्वनिक  to electric  ब्लूज़   और  the progressive opening of  ब्लूज़   म्यूज़िक  to a  wider   दर्शक  ,  विशेषकर   श्वेत  listeners .
In  the  1960s and 1970s , a hybrid  रूप  called  blues-rock  evolved .
The term `` the  ब्लूज़   ''  refers  to   the  ``  ब्लू   शैतानों  '' , meaning melancholy and sadness ; an  जल्दी  use  of   the  term in this sense is  मिला   in  George  colman  's one-act farce  ब्लू  Devils (  1798  ) .
Though  the  use of the  phrase  in African-American music may be older ,  it   रै   महरूम  attested to since 1912 , when  हार्ट  Wand 's  ``  Dallas Blues `` became  the   पहला   स्वत्वाधिकार   ब्लूज़  composition  .
in  lyrics  the  phrase is often  प्रयुक्त   to   describe  a  उदास  mood  .
A quarter  डालर  , commonly  shortened  to quarter , is a  सिक्का  worth 1⁄4 of a United  राज्य  dollar or 25 cents .
The quarter has been produced since  1796   .
The choice  of  25¢ as  a  denomination ,  as   opposed  to 20¢  जिससे  is more  आम  in other  भाग   of  the world  ,  originated  साथ   the  practice  of   dividing  Spanish Milled Dollars  into  eight wedge shaped segments ( cf. `` pieces of eight  ``  )  .
at  one time `` two  बिट्स   ``   ,   i.e  . two wedges , each wedge an eighth  ,  thus  a  quarter of  the  Spanish real , was a  आम  nickname  लिये  a quarter .
दिन  of the Dead  (  ) is a Mexican  अवकाश  celebrated throughout Mexico and around  the  world  in  other cultures  .
The  अवकाश  focuses on gatherings of family and friends to  दुवा  for and  याद   मित्रों  and family members  जो  have  died  .
it   is  particularly celebrated in Mexico  ,  where it  is  a national  अवकाश   ,   और  all banks  हैं  closed  .
The celebration  takes  place on November  1  and 2 , in  कनेक्शन  with  the   कैथोलिक  holidays of All  संतो   '  Day and All Souls  '  Day .
परंपराओं   कनेक्ट  with the holiday include building private  altars  honoring  the  deceased using sugar  skulls   ,  marigolds  ,   और  the favorite  भोजन  and beverages of the departed and  visiting   क़ब्रों  with these  as  gifts  .
They also leave possessions  of  the  मृतक  .
विद्वानों  trace the origins of the modern Mexican holiday to indigenous observances dating  वापस  hundreds of years  और  to  an   एज़टेक   पर्व  dedicated to the  देवी  Mictecacihuatl .
the  holiday has spread  throughout  the world  :  In  ब्राज़ील  , Dia  de   finados   is   a   पब्लिक  holiday that many Brazilians celebrate by  visiting  cemeteries  और  churches  .
In  स्पेन  , there are festivals and parades ,  और  , at the end of the  दिन  , people gather at cemeteries and  दुवा   लिये  their dead loved  ones   .
Similar observances  occur  elsewhere in Europe , and  similarly   प्रसंग  celebrations appear in many Asian and African cultures .
ANITA Mk VIII .
The ANITA Mark VII  और   अनीता  Mark VIII calculators were  शुभारम्भ   simultaneously  in late 1961  as  the world 's first  all-   इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  desktop calculators .
designed   और  built by the  घंटी  Punch Co .
in Britain  ,   और  marketed through  इसके  Sumlock Comptometer division ,  वे  used vacuum tubes and cold-cathode switching tubes in  उनके  logic  circuits   और   nixie   tubes  for their numerical  प्रदर्शक  .
वे  were  the  first of a series of  डेस्कटॉप   और  hand-held electronic calculators that  the  company was to  develop   और   बेचें  under the  अनीता   नाम  into the mid-1970s  .
George Washington ( – ,  1799   )  was  the  first  अध्यक्ष  of the United  राज्य  ( 1789–1797 ) , the commander-in-chief of the Continental Army during the  अमरीकी   क्रांतिकारी  War ,  और  one  of  the  founding  Fathers of  the   संयुक्त  States .
He presided  over  the  सम्मेलन   कि   drafted  the Constitution  ,  which replaced  the   आलेख  of  कनफेडरेशन  and established  the   स्थिति  of  अध्यक्ष  .
Washington  थी  elected President  as   the   सर्वसम्मत   चुनाव  of the 69 electors  in   1788  , and he served two terms in office .
He  oversaw  the creation of a strong  ,  well-financed  नेशनल   सरकारी  that maintained neutrality  in  the  युद्धों   raging  in Europe  ,  suppressed rebellion , and  जीती   स्वीकृति  among Americans  of  all types  .
His leadership style established many  फ़ॉर्म  and  संस्कार  of  सरकारी  that have been used since  ,  such as using a cabinet system  और  delivering an inaugural address  .
Further , the peaceful transition from his  प्रेसिडेंसी  to the  प्रेसिडेंसी  of John Adams established  a  tradition that continues  into  the 21st century .
Washington was hailed as  ``  father of his country  ``   भी   दौरान  his lifetime .
Washington was  born  into the provincial  gentry  of Colonial  वर्जिनिया  ; his wealthy  planter  family owned  तम्बाकू  plantations and slaves  .
बाद  both his  पिता  and older brother died when he  थी  young , Washington became personally and professionally  संलग्न   to  the powerful William  फेयरफैक्स  , who promoted his career as  a   निरीक्षक   और  soldier  .
Washington quickly  became  a senior officer  in  the colonial  शक्तियां  during the  पहला  stages of  the   फ्रेंच  and Indian War .
Chosen  by  the Second Continental  कॉंग्रेस  in 1775 to be commander-in-chief of  the   महाद्वीपीय  Army in the American Revolution ,  वॉशिंगटन   प्रबंधित   to  force  the  British out of Boston  in   1776   ,  but was  पराजित  and  लगभग  captured later  कि  year  जब  he  खोया  New York City .
बाद  crossing  the  Delaware  नदी   in  the dead  of  winter , he  पराजित   the  British in two  लड़ाइयों  , retook New Jersey and restored momentum to the Patriot cause .
Because of  उसके  strategy , Revolutionary  शक्तियां  captured two  प्रमुख  British armies  at  Saratoga in 1777 and Yorktown in 1781 .
Historians laud Washington  लिये  his selection  और   पर्यवेक्षण  of  उसके  generals ,  प्रोत्साहन   of  morale and ability  to  hold  साथ  the army , coordination with  the  state governors and  राज्य  militia units  ,  relations with Congress and  ध्यान  to supplies , logistics ,  और  training .
in   बैटल  , however , Washington was repeatedly outmaneuvered by British generals with larger armies  .
After victory  था  been  finalized   in  1783  ,  Washington resigned as Commander-in-chief  बल्कि  than seize power , proving his opposition to  तानाशाही  and his  प्रतिबद्धता  to American republicanism .
Dissatisfied with the  कमजोरियों  of the  आलेख   of  Confederation  ,  in 1787 Washington  presided   over   the  Constitutional  सम्मेलन  that drafted the United States Constitution  .
निर्वाचित  unanimously  as   the   पहला   अध्यक्ष  of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  in 1789  ,  he attempted to bring rival factions together to unify the nation .
He supported Alexander Hamilton  's  programs  to   अदा  off all state  और  national debt  ,  to implement an effective tax  प्रणाली   और   to  create a national bank (  despite  opposition from Thomas  जेफरसन  ) .
Washington proclaimed  the  United  राज्य   न्यूट्रल   in  the  युद्धों   raging  in Europe after  1793  .
he  avoided war  साथ   ग्रेट  Britain and guaranteed a decade of peace and profitable trade  by   securing  the Jay Treaty  in  1795 , despite intense opposition from the Jeffersonians .
Although never  officially   joining  the  federalist  Party ,  he  supported its programs .
वॉशिंगटन   's  Farewell Address was  an  influential primer  on  republican virtue  और   a  warning against  partisanship  , sectionalism , and involvement  in  foreign wars  .
he  retired from  the  presidency in 1797 and returned to his home , Mount Vernon , and  उसके   घरेलू   जीवन  where he  प्रबंधित  a variety  of  enterprises .
He  freed   सब   उसके  slaves by  उसके  final will .
Washington had a vision  of  a  ग्रेट  and  शक्तिशाली  nation  कि   होता   be   निर्मित  on republican lines  using   संघीय  power .
he  sought to use the national government  to  preserve liberty , improve  अवसंरचना  , open the western lands , promote  कॉमर्स  , found  a  permanent capital , reduce regional  तनाव  and  प्रचार   a  spirit of American nationalism  .
at  his death , Washington  थी  eulogized as `` first  in  war ,  पहला  in peace  ,  and  पहला   in  the hearts  of   उसके  countrymen  ''  by Henry Lee .
The Federalists made him the  प्रतीक  of their party but  लिये  many years ,  the   jeffersonians  continued to  अविश्वास   उसके  influence and delayed  भवन  the  वॉशिंगटन  Monument  .
as  the leader of the  पहला  successful revolution  विरूद्ध  a colonial empire  in   संसार  history  ,   वॉशिंगटन  became an  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  icon  लिये   मुक्ति   और  nationalism , especially in France  और   लैटिन  America  .

The  बजट  of the United States  सरकारी   प्रायः  begins as  the  President 's proposal to  the  U.S. Congress  जिससे   अनुशंसा  funding  स्तर  for the next fiscal  साल  , beginning October 1 .
however  ,  कॉंग्रेस   is  the body  जरूरी  by law to pass  a  budget annually and to submit the budget  passed   by  both  घरों  to  the  President for signature .
Congressional decisions  हैं   governed   by  rules and legislation  regarding  the  संघीय   बजट  process .
Budget committees set spending  हद  for the House  और   सीनेट  committees and  लिये  Appropriations subcommittees  ,  which then approve  व्यक्तिगत  appropriations bills to allocate funding to various federal  कार्यक्रम   .
if  Congress fails to pass an  सालाना  budget ( as has  महरूम  the case since 2009 ) , a series of Appropriations bills must be  passed  as  ``  stop  गैप  '' measures  .
After Congress approves  an   appropriations  bill , it is sent  to  the  अध्यक्ष  , who may sign it into law , or may veto it  (  as  he  would a budget  जब  passed by  the  Congress ) .
A vetoed  विधेयक  is  भेजा  back to  कॉंग्रेस   ,  which  can   pass  it into law with a two-thirds majority in each chamber .
कॉंग्रेस   may   भी  combine  सब  or some appropriations bills into  an   omnibus  reconciliation bill  .
in  addition , the  अध्यक्ष   may  request and the Congress  may  pass supplemental appropriations bills or emergency supplemental appropriations  बिल्स  .
अनेक  government agencies provide  बजट  data and analysis .
These include  the  Government Accountability Office  (  GAO ) , Congressional Budget Office ,  the  Office of  प्रबन्धन  and  बजट  ( OMB )  और  the  u.S.  Treasury Department .
These  एजेंसियों  have reported that the federal government is  facing   a  series  of  important financing challenges .
in  the  short-run  ,  कर  revenues have declined  significantly   due  to a severe  मंदी  and  कर  policy  चुनाव  , while expenditures have  विस्तारित  for wars , unemployment insurance and other  सुरक्षा  net spending  .
In the long-run ,  expenditures  related  to   healthcare  programs such  as   medicare   और  Medicaid are projected to grow faster  than  the  अर्थव्यवस्था   overall   as  the population  matures  .
नई  Guinea  (   भी  , Tok Pisin :  niugini  , Dutch  :   nieuw  Guinea , and ; historically  :   पापुआ  ) is the world 's  दूसरी  largest island , after  ग्रीनलैंड   ,  covering a land  क्षेत्रफल  of 786,000 km2 .
Located in the southwest Pacific  समंदर  ,  it  lies geographically to the east  of  the  मलय  Archipelago , with  जिससे   it   is   sometimes  included as part of a  वृहद   indo-australian  Archipelago  .
geologically   it  is a  भाग  of the same tectonic plate  as  Australia .
When world sea levels were low  ,  the two shared shorelines ( which now  झूठ  100  to  140 metres below  समुद्र   स्तर  )  ,   combining  with lands now inundated  into  the  tectonic  continent of Sahul , also  ज्ञात  as Greater  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  .
The  दो  landmasses became separated  जब  the area now  ज्ञात  as the  टोरेस  Strait  flooded  after the end of the last glacial  काल  .
Anthropologically ,  नई  Guinea  is  considered part  of   मॅलानिशिया  .
Politically  ,   the  western half of the island  comprises  two  इंडोनेशियाई   प्रांतों  :  पापुआ   और  West Papua .
the   पूर्वी  half forms the  मेनलैंड  of the  देश  of  पापुआ   नई   गिनी  .
The island  रै   a   जनसांख्यिकी   of   परिचय   7.5   लाख  , with  a  very low population  घनत्व  of only 8 inh/km2 .
New Guinea is differentiated  इससे  its drier  ,   खुशामद  , and  कम  fertile southern counterpart  ,  Australia , by its much higher rainfall and its active volcanic geology , with its highest point , Puncak Jaya , reaching an elevation  of  4,884  m   (  16,023 ft  )  .
yet  the two land  masses  share a  समान  animal  fauna  ,  साथ   marsupials  , including wallabies and possums , and the egg-laying  monotreme  , the  spiny  anteater  ,  or echidna .
Other than bats and some two dozen  स्वदेशी   कृंतक  genera , there are  no  pre-human indigenous placental mammals .
Pigs , several additional species of rats ,  और  the ancestor  of  the  नई  Guinea Singing Dog were introduced with  इंसान   colonization  .
The human presence on the island dates back at least 40,000  सालो  to the  oldest  human migrations out  of  Africa .
Research indicates  कि   the   हाइलैंड्स  were  an  early and independent center of  कृषि  , with evidence of irrigation going  वापस  at  तनिक  10,000 years  .
क्युकी  of  the   समय  depth of its  inhabitation   और  its highly  fractured  landscape  ,   an  unusually  ऊँची   क्रमांक   of  languages are spoken  on  the  द्वीप   ,  with  कुछ  1,000 languages ( a figure higher than that  of  most continents )  having  been  catalogued   आउट   of  an estimated world-wide pre-Columbian total of 6,000 human dialects .
Most are  वर्गीकृत  as Papuan languages , a generally accepted  भौगोलिक  term which a  अल्पसंख्यक  of authors hold  to  be a genetic  एक  .
A  क्रमांक  of  ऑस्ट्रोनीशियाई  languages  हैं   बोला  on  the   coast  and on offshore  आइलैंड्स  .
In the  16th  century  स्पेनी  explorers  खोजा  the island and  पुकारा  it Nueva Guinea .
In  हाल  history western New Guinea  थी  included in the  डच  East  इंडीज   उपनिवेश  .
The  germans  annexed the northern coast of the  पूर्वी   हाफ  of the island as German New Guinea  in  their pre–World War I  प्रयत्न  to establish themselves as a colonial power , whilst the south  पूर्वी  portion  थी   अनिच्छा  claimed by Britain  .
Following the Treaty of Versailles , the German portion was  awarded   to   ऑस्ट्रेलिया  ( which was already governing the British claim ,  नामित  the Territory of Papua ) as a League  of   राष्ट्र   जनादेश  .
The  पूर्वी  half of  the  island  थी   granted   स्वतंत्रता   इससे  Australia  as   पापुआ  New Guinea in 1975  .
The western half gained independence  इससे  the  डच   in  1961 , but  became  part of Indonesia  जल्द  afterwards  in  controversial circumstances .
`` The Van Buren Boys  ''  is the 148th  एपीसोड  of  the  sitcom Seinfeld ,  और  name of a fictional  नई   यॉर्क  street  गिरोह  .
Their  चिह्न  is  क्रासिंग  the hands , with  एक   हाथ  with  सब  the fingers 'up ' and  स्प्रेड   आउट   .
The other hand has all but the thumb and pointer finger up , for a total of  आठ   (   8  ) .
the  gang is named for the 8th  अध्यक्ष  of the United States ,  मार्टिन  Van Buren  (   जो   थी  the first president from New York )  .
This  थी   the  14th  एपीसोड  for  the  8th  ऋतु  .
It  aired  on  फ़रवरी   6   ,  1997 .
bevo  sign
Bevo  थी  a non-alcoholic malt beverage , or near beer ,  brewed  in  the  United States by the  anheuser-busch  company beginning in  the  early  20th  century  .
Bevo  enjoyed  its greatest  कामयाबी  during the time of  निषेध   ,  when beer ,  वाइन   और   आसुत   liquors  , were made illegal for thirteen  सालो   .
The  anheuser-busch  company  प्रारंभ   brewing   bevo  when  alcoholic  beverages  यहूद  prohibited in 1916 by the  संयुक्त  States armed  शक्तियां  .
Production rose  greatly  with national prohibition in  1919   ,  and Bevo was  by  far the most popular  of   the   अनेक   ``  cereal beverages  ''  or `` near beers '' of the time .
At the  शिखर   of   इसके   लोकप्रियता  in the early 1920s , more than five million cases of Bevo  यहूद  sold annually  .
renard  with a mug  of  Bevo , depicted  in  terra cotta  on  the  आंतरिक  walls of  the  Bevo building ,  st.  Louis
Labels on the bottles  billed   it  as `` Bevo  the   पेय  '' .
The name `` Bevo  ''  was coined from  the  word `` beverage '' and the  स्लावी  language word for beer ``  pivo   ''   ,   और   थी  pronounced  ``  Bee-vo '' .
Some  bevo   विज्ञापन  featured  the  character `` Renard  the  Fox ``  (  based on the protagonist of a  मध्यकालीन   फ्रेंच   folk-tale   )  , and  promotional  mugs with this character were manufactured .
In  1930  Anheuser-Busch built a series  of  boat-bodied cars in  इसके  St. Louis shops called  the  `` Bevo  नौकाएँ  '' which were used  लिये  promotion .
सात  are believed to have been built on Pierce-Arrow 8-cylinder chassis while  एक   surviving   उदाहरण   थी   आधारित  upon 1930 Cadillac 353  v8  .
बिलबोर्ड  advertising Bevo in  trenton   ,   नई  Jersey  ,  1917
a  contemporary advertisement  पढ़ा   ``   कूलिंग  and invigorating  ,   bevo  the  पेय  .
Order by the case from your grocer , druggist ,  or  dealer . ''
the  paper label on  the  back of the bottle  पढ़ा  `` The All-Year-Round Soft Drink .
Appetizing - Healthful - Nutritious  -   ताज़ा  .
मिल्क  or water may  contain   जीवाणु  .
bevo  never does  .   ''
bevo  became  भाग  of the popular culture  of  the time , and is mentioned in various  लोकप्रिय  songs and  vaudeville   skits  of  the   era  .
This  led  to secondary  कठबोली  uses of the  शब्द  ; for  उदाहरण  , in American  सैन्य  slang  a  young and inexperienced  अधिकारी  was called  a  `` Bevo ''  .
The University  of  Texas  नामित  its mascot `` Bevo '' ,  a  name which has stuck to this day .
Irving Berlin included  a  paean to  the  drink  ,  `` You Ca n't Stay Up on Bevo  ''  , in  उसके  1917 army revue  ,  Yip  यिप   yaphank  .
In the late 1920s smuggled bootleg beer and liquor as well as  ``  homebrew `` ,  काटें  into  bevo   's   marketshare  .
With sales flattening  to   100,000  cases by 1929 , Anheuser-Busch  रोका  production  .
The  bevo  Mill ,  st.   लुई   ,  in 2008
the  Bevo  भवन  ,  साथ   the  Renard  अक्षर  prominently  प्रदर्शित  at the corners , still  operates   as   a   bottling  facility at their main brewery  in  St.  लुई   ,  Missouri .
The  लैंडमार्क   bevo  Mill  ,   constructed   by  August Anheuser Busch ,  sr.  in 1917 .

Mylanta  is   an   over   the  counter  दवा   प्रयुक्त  for the treatment  of  acid reflux , heartburn , and gastroesophageal reflux disease ( also  ज्ञात  as  गर्ड  ) .
