Milk is a white  द्रव   उत्पादित  by  the  mammary glands of mammals  .
It  is  the  प्राथमिक   सोर्स  of nutrition for young mammals  पहले  they are able to digest other  प्रकार  of food .
Early- lactation milk contains colostrum ,  जिससे   carries  the mother 's antibodies to the baby  और  can reduce the  रिस्क  of many diseases  in  the  baby  .
It also  contains   अनेक  other nutrients .
As an agricultural product , milk is extracted  इससे  mammals and  प्रयुक्त  as food for humans  .
विश्वव्यापी  , dairy  खेतो  produced about 730 million tonnes  of  milk  in   2011  .
इण्डिया  is the world 's largest producer and  उपभोक्ता   of  milk ,  yet   neither   निर्यात  nor imports milk .
New  जीलैंड   ,   the   यूरोपीय  Union 's 27 member states , Australia , and the  संयुक्त  States are  the   संसार  's largest exporters of  मिल्क  and milk  उत्पाद  .
China and Russia  हैं  the world 's largest importers  of  milk and  मिल्क   उत्पाद   .
Throughout the world  ,   वहीँ  are more than 6 billion consumers  of  milk and milk products .
Over  750  million people live within dairy  खेती  households .
Milk is a key contributor to improving nutrition  और   खाना  security particularly  in   विकासशील  countries .
Improvements  in  livestock  और  dairy technology offer significant promise in  reducing  poverty and malnutrition  in  the world .
Motorcycle speedway , usually referred  to  as speedway , is  a  motorcycle sport  involving  four and sometimes  up  to  छह  riders competing over  चार  anti-clockwise laps  of  an  ओवल  circuit .
Speedway motorcycles  उपयोग   तभी  one gear and have no brakes  और  racing takes place on a  चपटा  oval  track   प्रायः   consisting  of  मैल   or  loosely packed shale  .
Competitors use this surface to slide their machines  बगलों  ,  powersliding   or  broadsiding into  the  bends .
On  the   सीधा  sections of the track the motorcycles reach  speeds  of  up   .
the  exact origins of  the   खेल   हैं  unknown  लकिन  there  is   प्रमाण  of a type of speedway racing being  practised   in  the USA before the First World  युद्ध  and  in  Australia in the late 1910s  और   जल्दी   1920s  .
वहीँ  are now  दोनो  domestic  और   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   प्रतियोगिताओं  in a  क्रमांक   of  countries  सहित  the Speedway World Cup  whilst  the  उच्चतम   overall  scoring individual in the Speedway Grand Prix events  is   सुनाया  the  संसार  champion  .
Speedway is  लोकप्रिय   in  central and  उत्तरी   यूरोपीय  and  to  a  lesser  extent  in  Australia and North  अमेरिका   .
A variant of track  रेसिंग   ,  speedway is administered internationally  by  the Fédération Internationale de  motocyclisme  ( FIM ) .
Domestic speedway events are regulated by FIM affiliated national  मोटर   खेल   federations  .
Vitamin D  is  a group of  fat-soluble  secosteroids responsible for intestinal  अवशोषण  of calcium and  फास्फेट  .
In humans  ,  the most  महत्वपूर्ण  related compounds of vitamin D are vitamin D2 and vitamin D3 .
Cholecalciferol (  विटामिन   d3  ) and ergocalciferol  (  vitamin D2 ) are unique  as  they constitute what we know as vitamin  d   और  can be  ingested  from  the  diet and/or supplements .
The  देह  can also  synthesize  vitamin D  (   इससे  cholesterol ) when  सूर्य   एक्सपोज़र   is   पर्याप्त  ( hence  इसके  nickname , the ``  सनशाइन   विटामिन   ''  ) .
Although vitamin  d  is  commonly  called a  विटामिन  , it  is  not  दरअसल  an essential  dietary   विटामिन  in  the  strict sense ,  as  it can be  synthesized  in adequate  amounts  by most mammals exposed  to   धूप   .
(  Cats and dogs can not synthesize vitamin D efficiently  और  must  प्राप्त  it in  उनके  diet .  )
an   सशुल्क   रासायनिक  compound (  or  related  नियत  of compounds ) is  तभी   scientifically   पुकारा  a vitamin when it can not be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an organism ,  और  must be obtained from their diet .
However , as with  अन्य   यौगिकों  commonly called vitamins  ,  vitamin  d  was discovered  in  an effort to find the  dietary  substance  कि   थी   lacking   in  a  बीमारी  , namely  ,   rickets  , the childhood form of osteomalacia .
additionally  , like  अन्य  compounds called  विटामिन  , in the developed world vitamin D is added  to   स्टेपल  foods ,  ऐसे   as  milk , to  avoid  disease due  to  deficiency .
Measures  of  serum levels  प्रतिबिंबित  endogenous synthesis from exposure  to   धूप  as  खूब   as  intake  इससे  the diet ,  और  it is believed  कि  synthesis may contribute  generally   to  the  मेंटेनेंस   of  adequate  सीरम  concentrations  .
The evidence indicates that the  संश्लेषण   of  vitamin D from  सूर्य  exposure  works  in a  प्रतिक्रिया  loop that prevents toxicity  लकिन  ,  क्युकी   of  uncertainty  परिचय  the  कर्कट  risk from sunlight  ,  no recommendations  हैं   जारी   by  the  संस्थान  of Medicine  ,   यूएसए  ,  लिये  the amount of  सूर्य  exposure required to meet vitamin D requirements .
Accordingly , the Dietary Reference Intakes for  विटामिन  D  assume  that  no  synthesis  occurs  and that all of a person 's vitamin D is from their diet  ,   हालांकि  that  होगा  rarely occur in practice .
In  the   जिगर  vitamin  d  is converted to calcidiol ,  जिससे  is also known as calcifediol (  इन  ) , 25-hydroxycholecalciferol  ,  or 25-hydroxyvitamin  d—abbreviated   25   (  OH  )  D ;  और  which is the specific  विटामिन  D  metabolite  that  is  measured  in  serum to determine a person 's vitamin D  औकात  .
Part of  the  calcidiol is converted by  the   गुर्दे  to calcitriol , the biologically  क्रियाशील  form of vitamin  D.   calcitriol   circulates  as a  हार्मोन   in  the  रक्त  , regulating the concentration of calcium and  फास्फेट  in the bloodstream and promoting the healthy growth and  remodeling  of bone .
Calcidiol is also converted to  calcitriol  outside of  the  kidneys for  अन्य   उद्देश्य   ,   ऐसे  as the  अप्रसार   ,   differentiation  and apoptosis  of  cells  ;   calcitriol  also affects neuromuscular function and inflammation .
परे   इसके  use  to  prevent osteomalacia  or   rickets  ,  the  evidence for other health effects of  विटामिन  D  supplementation  in the  सामान्य   जनसांख्यिकी   is  inconsistent .
The  बेहतरीन   प्रमाण   of  benefit is for bone health and a decrease in mortality in elderly women .
The Duramax  is   a   सामान्य  Motors diesel engine family for  light-  and medium duty  ट्रक  ,  designed  by Isuzu .
The 6.6-liter Duramax  is  produced  by   dmax  , a  संयुक्त   venture   between  GM and Isuzu in  moraine   ,   ओहियो   .
इस  engine was initially installed in 2001  मॉडल  year Chevy and  जीएमसी  trucks and has been an  विकल्प  since  तब  in pickups  ,   वैन   ,   और   medium-duty  trucks .
In 2006  ,  production at  moraine  was  reportedly  limited to  लगभग  200,000 engines per  साल  .
On May 9 ,  2007  , DMAX announced the production  of   the  1,000,000th  duramax  V-8  डीज़ल  at its  moraine  facility  .

balto   (   1919  – March 14 ,  1933  )  थी  a  siberian   हस्की  sled  श्वान  who  led  his  टोली   on  the final  लेग  of the  1925  serum run to  nome  ,  in   जिससे  diphtheria antitoxin was transported from Anchorage , Alaska , to  nenana  , Alaska  ,   by  train and then to Nome  by   श्वान  sled to combat  an  outbreak of the disease .
The run is commemorated  by   the  annual Iditarod Trail Sled  श्वान   रेस  .
Balto  थी  named  बाद  the  सामी  explorer Samuel Balto .
balto  died  at  the  आयु   of  14 .

the   निसान   उच्चिष्ट   is  a mid-size /  entry-level  luxury car  manufactured   by  Nissan , marketed as  the   ``   four-door  sports car '' .
The  origins  of the  उच्चिष्ट  began in  जुलाई  1976 as the Datsun 810 , an  upscale  six-cylinder version of the Bluebird , and was  spun  into its  अपना   लकीर   in  1981 ,  having   महरूम  made  लगातार   चूंकि   तब  .
The `` Maxima '' name was  लागू   धीरे  , beginning in 1981 .
सबसे   pre-2004  Maximas were  निर्मित   in   oppama  , Japan , until the current North American Maximas started being assembled in Smyrna  ,   टेनेसी  .
The `` Maxima '' has also  महरूम  applied to Cefiros and Laurels in various markets .
Propolis as hive  sealing
Propolis is a  resinous   मिश्रण  that  मधु  bees collect from tree  कलियों  , sap flows  ,  or other botanical sources .
It is used as a  sealant  for  अनावश्यक  open spaces  in  the hive .
propolis   is   प्रयुक्त  for small gaps ( approximately or less ) ,  जबकि  larger  स्पेसेस   हैं  usually filled  साथ  beeswax .
Its color  varies  depending  on  its botanical source , the  सबसे  common being dark  भूरा   .
propolis  is sticky  at  and above room temperature , .
At lower temperatures ,  it  becomes hard  और   बहुत  brittle .
स्टीवन  Tyler (  born   स्टीवन   विक्टर  Tallarico ; March 26 , 1948  )  is an American singer , songwriter , and multi-instrumentalist  ,  best  ज्ञात   as  the  frontman  and lead singer  of   the  Boston -based  चट्टान  band Aerosmith ,  in  which he  भी  plays the harmonica , and occasional piano and  percussion   .
He  is  known as  the  `` Demon  of  Screamin '  ''  due  to  his high screams and his  चौड़ी  vocal range .
he   is  also  ज्ञात  for his on-stage acrobatics .
During his high-energy performances ,  he  usually  पोशाक  in bright  ,  colorful  outfits  with his trademark scarves hanging  इससे   उसके   माइक्रोफोन  stand .
in  the 1970s , Tyler  रोज़   to  prominence as  the  frontman of Aerosmith , which released such milestone hard rock  एल्बम   as   खिलौने  in the Attic and Rocks  .
In the late  1970s  and early 1980s  ,  Tyler  था  a heavy  ड्रग  and  दारू  addiction , and the band 's popularity waned .
he  completed drug  पुनर्वास  in 1986 and subsequently  कायम   गम्भीरता  for  over  20  सालो   ,   लकिन   था   a  relapse  साथ   नुस्खा  painkillers in the  लेट  2000s  ,  for  जिससे   he  successfully  प्राप्त   उपचार  in 2009 .
After Aerosmith launched a remarkable  वापसी  in the late 1980s  और   जल्दी  1990s  साथ  the albums Permanent Vacation ,  पंप  , and Get  a  Grip  ,  Tyler became a  household  name and has  remained  a relevant rock  प्रतीक   .
as  a result  ,   he   रै   चूंकि  embarked on  अनेक  solo  endeavors  including guest  दिखावे   on  other artists ' music , film  और  TV roles ( including  as   a  judge  on  American Idol )  ,  authoring a bestselling  किताब  , and solo work (  सहित  a  शीर्ष   40   hit   सिंगल  in  2011  ) .
however   ,  he  रै   जारी   to  record music and perform with  एरोस्मिथ  , after more  than  43  सालो  in the band .
the   बैंड   's   नवीनतम  album  ,  Music from  another  Dimension !
,  थी  released on November 6 , 2012 .
Tyler  is  included among Rolling Stones 100  महानतम  Singers .
He was also ranked 3rd on  hit  Parader  's  Top  100  Metal  vocalists   of   सब  Time .
In 2001  he  was  inducted  into the  चट्टान  and Roll Hall  of  Fame with Aerosmith , and  he  was the presenter when AC/DC was inducted into the  हॉल  of Fame in 2003 .
In 2013 , Tyler and his  songwriting  partner Joe Perry will  be   प्राप्तकर्ता  of the ASCAP Founders Award and will  भी  be inducted into the  songwriters  Hall of Fame .
The liver produces urea in the urea  साईकिल  as a waste  उत्पाद  of  the  digestion of  प्रोटीन  .
Normal human adult blood should contain between 7 to 21 mg  of  urea nitrogen per 100 ml ( 7–21 mg/ dL  )   of  blood  .
व्यक्तिगत  laboratories may have different reference ranges  ,  and  इस  is because the procedure may  vary  .
वेन   fontes  ( born  फ़रवरी  2 , 1940  )  is a former  अमरीकी  football coach and college  और  professional football player  जो  was the head coach  of  the NFL 's  डेट्रॉयट  Lions from  1988   to  1996 .
His 67 wins and  71  losses are each the most for a head coach  in   टोली   इतिहास  .
the  Jews  (  ISO 259-3 Israeli pronunciation ) , also  ज्ञात   as  the  यहूदी  people , are a nation  और  an ethnoreligious group , originating  in   the  Israelites or Hebrews of the  प्राचीन  Near  ईस्ट   .
the  Jewish ethnicity , nationality , and religion are strongly interrelated , as Judaism is the traditional faith  of  the  यहूदी  nation .
converts  to  judaism  , whose status as Jews within the  यहूदी  ethnos is equal  to  those born into it , have been  अवशोषित  into the  यहूदी  people  throughout  the  सहस्राब्दियों  .
In Jewish  परंपरा  , Jewish ancestry  is  traced to the Biblical patriarchs Abraham , Isaac and Jacob in  the  second millennium  bce  .
the  modern State of  इसराईल   थी   स्थापित  as a Jewish  nation-state  , and defines itself as such  in   इसके  Basic Laws .
Its  विधि  of  वापसी  grants the  सही  of citizenship to any Jew  जो  requests  it  .
Israel is the  तभी   देश   जहाँ  Jews  हैं   a  majority of  the  population .
Jews also enjoyed political  स्वायत्तता   twice  before in ancient  इतिहास  .
The  पहला   of   ये  periods lasted from 1350 to  586  BCE ,  और   encompassed  the periods  of   the  Judges  ,   the   संयुक्त  Monarchy  ,  and the Divided  साम्राज्य  of the Kingdoms of Israel  और   यहूदा  , ending with the  विनाश  of the First  टेम्पल  .
the  second was the period of  the  Hasmonean  किंगडम  spanning from 140 to 37  bce   .
चूंकि   the  destruction  of   the  First Temple , most Jews have lived in diaspora .
A minority  in  every  देश  in which they  सजीव  ( except Israel ) ,  वे  have  अक्सर   अनुभवी  persecution throughout  इतिहास  ,  resulting  in a  जनसांख्यिकी   कि  has  fluctuated  both in numbers and distribution over the centuries .
The  संसार  Jewish  जनसांख्यिकी  reached a peak of 15 million prior to the Second  संसार  War  ,   लकिन  six million Jews  यहूद  killed in  the  Holocaust  .
Since then the population has risen again  और  ,  थी  estimated  at  13.4 million  by  the North American Jewish Data Bank  ,  or  कम  than 0.2 % of the total world population ( roughly one in every 514 people  )   .
According to this report , about  42.5  % of  सब  Jews reside in  इसराईल  (  5.7  million  )  , and 39.3  %   in  the United States ( 5.3 million  )   ,  with most of  the  remainder  जीना  in Europe ( 1.5  लाख   )  and Canada (  0.4  million  )   .
These  संख्याएँ   शामिल   सब  those who  consider   themselves  Jews  ,   whether  or not they  हैं  affiliated  साथ  a Jewish  संगठन   .
the  total world Jewish  जनसांख्यिकी  , however  ,  is difficult  to  measure .
In addition to issues  साथ  census methodology  ,  there  हैं  halakhic disputes  regarding   जो  is a Jew and secular , political , and ancestral identification factors that may  affect   the  figure considerably .

the  Feast  of  Corpus Christi  (  Latin for Body  of   मसीह  ) , also  ज्ञात  as Corpus Domini , is a Latin Rite liturgical solemnity celebrating the tradition  और  belief in the body and blood  of  Jesus Christ  और   उसके  Real Presence in the  eucharist  .
It emphasizes the joy  of  the  संस्था  of the Eucharist , which  थी   observed  on Holy Thursday  in  the  somber  atmosphere of the nearness of  शुभ  Friday .
In  the  present Roman Missal  ,  the feast is designated the solemnity of  the  Most Holy Body and Blood of  मसीह   .
It is  भी   मनाये  in  कुछ  Anglican , Lutheran , and  बूढ़ा  Catholic Churches that hold similar beliefs regarding the Real  उपस्थिति  .
The  feast  is liturgically celebrated on the Thursday  बाद  Trinity Sunday or , ``  जहाँ  the Solemnity of  the  Most Holy Body  और   रक्त  of Christ is  नहीं  a  पावन  Day of  दायित्व   ,  it is assigned to  the  Sunday after the Most  पावन   ट्रिनिटी  as  इसके   उचित  day '' .
At the  समाप्त   of  Holy Mass , there is  प्रायः   a  procession of the Blessed Sacrament ,  generally   प्रदर्शित  in a monstrance  .
the  procession is followed by Benediction of the Blessed Sacrament .
A  notable  Eucharistic procession  is  that presided over by the Pope  प्रत्येक  year in Rome , where it begins at  the  Archbasilica of  st.  John Lateran and  makes  its way  to  the  basilica  of  संत   मरियम   प्रमुख   ,   जहाँ  it concludes with  सुनाकर  .
C-reactive protein (  सीआरपी  )  is  a protein  मिला   in  the blood , the levels of which  वृद्धि  in response to  सूजन  (  i.e   .  C-reactive protein  is  an acute-phase  प्रोटीन   )  .
Its physiological  भूमिका  is to  bind   to  phosphocholine expressed on the  सतह   of  dead or dying  कोशिकाएं  ( and some types of bacteria  )   in  order to activate  the  complement system  via  the  c1q  complex .
सीआरपी   is   synthesized  by the liver in response to factors released  by   macrophages   और  fat cells  (  adipocytes )  .
It is a  सदस्य   of  the pentraxin family  of  proteins  .
it  is  नहीं  related  to   c-peptide  or protein C .
C-reactive protein was the  पहला  pattern recognition receptor  (   prr  ) to  be  identified .
The start of the systematic  यूरोपीय  colonization of the Americas is  typically   दिनाँक  to 1492 , when  a   स्पेनी   expedition   headed  by  क्रिस्टोफर  Columbus sailed for India to  खोलें   व्यापार  but inadvertently  खोजा  the Americas .
European conquest  ,  large-scale exploration and colonization  जल्द   followed  .
देखकर   कि  Europe was preoccupied  साथ  many internal wars and was slowly recovering from the many deaths  कि  the bubonic plague caused ,  the   रैपिड  expansion at which  it  grew in wealth and power was  unforeseeable  in  the  early 1400s .
The first expeditions occurred  साथ  the Caribbean coasts on  the   आइलैंड्स   of  Hispaniola ,  प्यूर्टो  Rico and Cuba ,  और  after 1500 extended into the interiors of both North and South America .
In 1497  ,  sailing  इससे  the north  on   निमित्त  of England ,  जॉन  Cabot landed on the North American  coast  ,  और   a  year  बाद  , Columbus  's   तीसरा   voyage  reached the South American  coast  .
फ़्रांस  founded colonies in much of eastern North America  ,  on a number of  caribbean  islands ,  और   in  South  अमेरिका   .
Portugal colonized Brazil .
Eventually ,  the   संपूर्ण  Western Hemisphere came under  the  control  of  European governments , leading to profound changes to  इसके  landscape , population ,  और  plant and  एनिमल  life .
In  the  19th century alone  over  50 million people left Europe for the Americas  .
The post-1492 era is  ज्ञात  as the  काल  of the  columbian   एक्सचेंज  .
कैथ   रिचर्ड्स  ( born  18   दिसम्बर  1943  )   is  an English musician ,  singer-songwriter  and  संस्थापक  member  of   the   अंग्रेज़ी  rock  बैंड  the Rolling Stones .
Rolling Stone  पत्रिका  said Richards had created  ``  rock 's greatest single body  of  riffs  ''  , ranking him 4th  on  its list of  100   बेहतरीन   guitarists  .
Fourteen songs Richards wrote with  the  Rolling Stones ' lead vocalist Mick  जैगर   हैं  listed  among  Rolling Stone magazine 's `` 500 Greatest Songs of All Time `` .
Richards '  सुर्खी   लिये  illicit drug use stems in  भाग  from several  ड्रग  busts  दौरान  the  लेट   1960s  and 1970s and his candour regarding his addiction to  और  eventual  abstinence   इससे  heroin .
टेस्टोस्टेरोन  is a  स्टेरॉयड  hormone from the androgen  समूह  and  is  found  in   स्तनधारियों  ,  सरीसृपों   ,  birds  ,  and other  vertebrates  .
In mammals , testosterone is primarily  स्रावित  in the  अंडकोष  of males  और  the ovaries of  महिलाओं   ,   हालांकि  small amounts  हैं  also  स्रावित   by  the adrenal glands  .
It is the principal male  sex  hormone and an anabolic steroid .
In men  ,  testosterone  plays  a key role  in  the development of  पुरूष   reproductive  tissues such as the testis and prostate as well as  promoting  secondary  यौन  characteristics such as increased  मांसपेशी  , bone mass ,  और  the growth  of  body  बाल  .
In addition  ,   टेस्टोस्टेरोन  is  अनिवार्य   लिये  health and  well-being  as well  as  the  रोकथाम  of  ऑस्टियोपोरोसिस  .
On  औसत   ,  in adult human males , the plasma concentration of testosterone  is  about 7–8 times as great  as   the  concentration in adult  इंसान  females '  प्लाज्मा   ,  but as the metabolic consumption of testosterone in  males  is greater ,  the   रोज़  production  is   परिचय   20   टाइम्स  greater in men .
Females also are more sensitive to  the  hormone  .
टेस्टोस्टेरोन   is   observed  in  सबसे   vertebrates  .
Fish  मेक   a   थोड़ा  different  रूप   पुकारा  11-ketotestosterone  .
Its counterpart in insects is ecdysone  .
These ubiquitous  steroids  suggest that  sex   हार्मोन  have an ancient evolutionary history  .
Cluster sampling is a  sampling  technique used when `` natural ''  लकिन  relatively homogeneous groupings are  evident  in a statistical population .
it  is often used  in  marketing research .
In this technique , the  कुल  population  is   विभाजित  into these  समूह  ( or  क्लस्टर  ) and a simple random  नमूना  of  the  groups is selected  .
तब  the required information is collected from a simple  यादृच्छिक  sample  of  the elements  भीतर  each  चयनित  group .
This may be done  लिये  every element in these groups or a subsample  of  elements  may  be selected  भीतर  each of these groups  .
a  common motivation for cluster sampling  is   to   reduce  the  कुल  number of interviews and costs  दिए  the desired accuracy .
Assuming a fixed sample size  ,  the  तकनीक  gives more accurate results when most of the variation  in  the  जनसांख्यिकी  is within the groups ,  नहीं   between  them  .
Jamestown  is  a town in  guilford  County  ,   उत्तर  Carolina , United  राज्य   ,  and is a suburb of  the  nearby cities of Greensboro and High  पाइंट   .
The population was 3,382  at  the  2010  census .
Natalie Portman  (   born  Natalie  hershlag   ;   ;  June  9  , 1981 ) is an actress  और  model  साथ  dual American and Israeli citizenship .
Her  पहला  role  थी  as an  अनाथ  taken  in  by  a  hitman in the 1994 action film ,  लकिन  mainstream  कामयाबी  came when  वो  was cast as Padmé  amidala  in the  स्टार   युद्धों  prequel  त्रयी  ( released in 1999  ,  2002 and  2005   )  .
in   1999  , she enrolled at  हार्वर्ड  University to study psychology  जबकि   स्टिल  working as an actress .
वो   समाप्त   उसके  bachelor 's degree in  2003  .
in   2001  , Portman opened in New York City 's Public  थिएटर  production of  एंटोन   चेखव  's The  सीगल   .
In  2005   ,   पोर्टमैन  received  a  nomination for the  अकादमी  Award for  बेहतरीन   supporting  Actress and won  the  Golden  ग्लोब  Award  लिये   बेहतरीन  Supporting Actress - Motion Picture for  the   नाटक  Closer .
वो  won a Constellation Award for  बेहतरीन  Female Performance and a Saturn Award for Best  अभिनेत्री   लिये   उसके  starring role  in  V  लिये  Vendetta ( 2006  )  .
वो  played leading  भूमिकाएँ  in the  ऐतिहासिक  dramas  गोया   's  Ghosts  (  2006  )  and  the  Other Boleyn  लड़की  ( 2008  )  .
in  May  2008  , she served  as   the   youngest  member of the  61st  Annual Cannes Film  पर्व  jury .
Portman 's  directorial  debut , Eve  ,  opened  the  65th Venice International Film  पर्व  's  शॉर्ट्स  competition in 2008 .
पोर्टमैन  directed  a  segment  of  the collective film New York ,  i  Love You  .
In  2011  , Portman won the Academy Award , the Golden  ग्लोब  Award  ,  the BAFTA Award ,  the   स्क्रीन  Actors Guild Award , and the Independent  स्पिरिट  Award for her lead performance as Nina Sayers in  ब्लैक  Swan .
Copper is a chemical  तत्व  with the symbol  cu  ( from ) and atomic number  29  .
It is a ductile metal with  बहुत  high thermal  और   विद्युत   चालकता   .
Pure copper is soft  और  malleable ;  a  freshly  उजागर  surface  रै  a  reddish-orange  color  .
it  is used as a  कंडक्टर  of  ऊष्मा  and electricity  ,  a building material  ,   और   a  constituent  of  various metal alloys .
The  मेटल  and  इसके   alloys  have been  प्रयुक्त   लिये  thousands of years  .
in   the  Roman  era  , copper was principally mined  on   साइप्रस  , hence the origin of  the  name of  the  metal as сyprium  (  metal of Cyprus )  ,  later  shortened   to  сuprum .
इसके   यौगिकों  are commonly encountered as copper ( II ) salts , which often impart blue or green  रंगों  to minerals  ऐसे  as azurite and turquoise and  have   महरूम  widely used historically as pigments  .
architectural  structures  निर्मित  with copper corrode  to  give green  verdigris  ( or patina )  .
सजावटी  art prominently features  तांबे  ,  दोनो  by  itself   और  as part of  pigments  .
Copper is essential to all living organisms  as  a trace dietary mineral  क्युकी  it  is  a  कुंजी   constituent  of the respiratory enzyme complex cytochrome c oxidase  .
in   molluscs  and crustacea copper is  a  constituent of the blood pigment hemocyanin , which is replaced  by   the   iron-complexed  hemoglobin  in  fish and other vertebrates .
the  main  क्षेत्रों  where copper  is  found in vertebrates are liver , muscle and bone .
In  sufficient  concentration  ,  copper compounds  हैं  poisonous to  उच्चतर   जीवों   और  are used as bacteriostatic  substances  , fungicides ,  और   लकडी  preservatives .
The major professional sports  लीग  ,  or  simply  प्रमुख  leagues ,  in  the United  राज्य   और  Canada are the  उच्चतम   पेशेवर  competitions  of  team sports in  the  two countries  .
Although individual sports  ऐसे   as   गोल्फ़  , tennis , and auto racing  हैं   भी  very  लोकप्रिय   ,  the  पद   is  usually limited to  टोली  sports  .
The term `` major league '' was first used in 1921 in reference  to  Major League  बेसबॉल  ( MLB  )   ,   the   शीर्ष  level  of  professional  अमरीकी  baseball  .
Today ,  the   प्रमुख   उत्तरी  North America professional  टोली  sports  लीग  are  प्रमुख  League Baseball ( MLB ) ,  the  National Basketball  संघ  ( NBA )  ,  the  नेशनल  Football League  (  NFL  )  ,  और  the  नेशनल  Hockey League (  एनएचएल  ) .
अन्य  notable leagues  शामिल   प्रमुख  League Soccer (  mls  ) , the Canadian  फ़ुटबॉल  League ( CFL ) ,  the  Arena Football League , Major League Lacrosse ,  the   नेशनल  Lacrosse League and the  महिलाओं  's  नेशनल   बास्केट   संघ  .
The NFL  ,  MLB  ,  NBA ,  और  NHL are commonly referred  to  as  the   बिग  Four .
Each  of  these  is   the  richest professional club competition in its  खेल   विश्वव्यापी  .
the  best  खिलाड़ी  can become cultural icons  in  both countries  और  elsewhere  in  the world , because the  लीग  enjoy a significant place  in  popular  संस्कृति  in the US and Canada .
The NFL has 32  टीमों   ,  and the others  have  30 each .
the  vast majority  of  major  लीग  teams  हैं   concentrated  in the most populous metropolitan areas of  the   संयुक्त  States .
Baseball , football , hockey , and  सॉकर  have  था  professional leagues for over 100 years ;  जल्दी  leagues such as  the  National Association  ,   ओहियो   लीग  , and National Hockey  संघ   formed   the  basis of the modern MLB ,  एनएफएल  and  एनएचएल  respectively  .
Soccer was  पहला   professionalized  in 1894 , but leagues  suffered  greatly from  कमी   of  sustainability  और  seldom lasted  अधिक  than a decade .
सॉकर  's greatest  सफलताओं  were in the form of the American  सॉकर  League  (   1921-1933   )  , the  असली  North  अमरीकी  Soccer League  (  1968-1984 ) , the National Professional Soccer League ( 1984-2001 ) and , currently , Major  लीग  Soccer  (   1996-present  )  .
Basketball is a relatively new  विकास  ;  the  NBA evolved from  the  National Basketball League and its splinter  समूह  the Basketball Association  of   अमेरिका   ,  taking  on   इसके  current form  in  1949 .
प्रत्येक  major  लीग   averages  15,000  प्रशंसक  in attendance per  खेल  or  उच्चतर  as of  2011  .
मध्याह्न  Altitude is an astronomical navigation  विधि  of calculating an  निरीक्षक  's latitude .
अर्जित  value management  (   evm  ) , or  अर्जित  value project/performance  प्रबन्धन  ( EVPM  )  is  a   प्रोजेक्ट  management technique  लिये  measuring  प्रोजेक्ट  performance and progress in an  उद्देश्य   manner  .
क्युकी  EVM has  the   क्षमता  to  combine  measurements of :
scope
अनुसूची
और  cost,
in a single  एकीकृत  system , Earned Value Management  is  able to provide accurate forecasts of project performance  समस्याएं   ,   जिससे   is   an  important contribution for  प्रोजेक्ट   प्रबन्धन  .
Early EVM research showed that the areas of planning and control  हैं  significantly impacted by its  उपयोग  ; and  similarly  , using the methodology improves  दोनो  scope  परिभाषा  as well  as  the analysis  of  overall  प्रोजेक्ट  performance .
More  हाल  research  अध्ययन  have shown that the principles  of  EVM are positive predictors of project  कामयाबी  .
लोकप्रियता  of EVM has grown significantly in recent years beyond  सरकारी   contracting  , in which  सेक्टर   इसके  importance continues to rise  (  e.g.  ,  recent  नई  DFAR  नियम  ) ,  in  part because EVM can also surface  in   और  help  substantiate  contract disputes .
रंगीन   वसन्त  garden flowers
वसन्त  is  एक   of   the  four conventional  शीतोष्ण  seasons , following winter and preceding summer .
वहीँ   हैं   विभिन्न  technical definitions  of  spring , but  लोकल  usage  of  the  पद  varies according  to  local climate , cultures and customs .
जब   it   is  spring  in   the  northern hemisphere  ,  it will be  पतझड़   in  the  दक्षिणी  hemisphere .
At the  वसन्त   विषुव  ,  दिनों   हैं   बंद  to 12 hours long with  दिन  length increasing as the season progresses .
Spring and `` springtime '' refer to the season ,  और  also to  विचार   of   rebirth   ,  rejuvenation  ,   नवीकरण  ,  क़यामत  , and regrowth ,  साथ   त्यौहार  such  as   कार्निवल   ,   ईस्टर  and Holi being celebrated  at   इस  time  .
Jamestown was a  उपनिवेश  in the Colony of Virginia , the first permanent English settlement in  the  Americas .
Established by  the  Virginia  कम्पनी   of   लंदन  as  ``  James  फोर्ट  ''  on   may   14  ,  1607  ( O.S . , May 24 , 1607 N.S . ) ,  it  followed several earlier  विफल  attempts , including  the  Lost Colony of Roanoke  .
Jamestown served as the capital  of  the colony for 83 years , from 1616 until 1699  .
The settlement was located  भीतर  the territory of  a  political entity  ज्ञात  as Tsenacommacah , the  राज्य   of   the  Powhatan Confederacy  ,   साथ   around   14,000   देशी   निवासियों   ,  and specifically  थी  in part of the subdivision known as the  paspahegh  tribe .
the  natives initially welcomed the  colonists  with dancing  ,  feasting  और  tobacco ceremonies  ,  and  वे  provided  निर्णायक  provisions and  support   लिये  the survival  of  the  colonists   ,  who were not agriculturally inclined , although relations with  the  newcomers also soured fairly early on ,  अग्रणी  to the  कुल  annihilation  of  the Paspahegh in warfare  भीतर  3 years  .
भीतर  a year  of  Jamestown 's founding ,  the  Virginia  कम्पनी  brought Polish  और   डच   colonists  to help improve  the  settlement .
In 1619  ,  the first documented Africans were brought to  jamestown  , though the modern conception of slavery in  the  future  संयुक्त  States did not begin in Virginia until  1660   .
When the colony  थी  subdivided into the original eight shires of Virginia  in  1634 , the town  became  located in the eponymous  जेम्स  City Shire  .
the  London Company  's  second settlement ,  बरमूडा   ,  claims to be the  साईट  of  the  oldest town  in  the English New World , as St. George 's ,  बरमूडा  was officially established (  as  New  लंदन  )  in  1612 , whereas James Fort , in Virginia ,  थी  not to be  परिवर्तित   into  James towne  जबतक  1619 ,  और  further  किया   नहीं   जीवित  into the  उपस्थित   दिन  .
In 1699 ,  the  capital  थी   relocated  from Jamestown to what is  आज  Williamsburg ,  बाद  which  jamestown  ceased  to   मौजूद   as   a  settlement ,  मौजूदा  today only  as  an  पुरातत्व  site  .
आज   ,  Jamestown  is  one  of  three  स्थितियाँ  comprising  the  Historic Triangle  of  Colonial Virginia , along  साथ  Williamsburg  और   yorktown  , with  दो  primary  विरासत  sites .
Historic  jamestowne  ,  the   पुरातत्व  site on Jamestown Island , is a cooperative  प्रयत्न   by   jamestown  National Historic Site ( part of  औपनिवेशिक  National Historical  पार्क   )  , and Preservation Virginia .
The Jamestown Settlement  ,   a   जीना  history interpretive  साईट  , is operated by  the   jamestown  Yorktown Foundation in  संयोजन   साथ  the Commonwealth of  वर्जिनिया   .
जेम्स  Christopher Frey  (  born  सितंबर  12  ,   1969  )  is  an  अमरीकी  writer .
उसके  books A Million Little  टुकड़े  (  2003   )  and My Friend Leonard  (  2005 )  ,   as   खूब  as Bright Shiny Morning  (  2008  )  , were bestsellers .
he   थी  the  विषय   of   a   कांड   जब  investigators discovered  कि   थाना  time and the extent  of  certain injuries were exaggerated  in   a  Million Little  टुकड़े  ,  a   अधिकारीगण  autobiographical  खाता   of  the  लेखक  's  संघर्ष  with addiction .
Deere & Company  ,  most  commonly  known  by  its  नाम  John Deere , is an American  निगम  based  in  Moline , Illinois , and  एक  of the  largest   निर्माताओं   of   agricultural  machinery  in   the  world .
in   2012  , it was listed as 97th  in  the Fortune  500   अमेरिका  's ranking and 190th in the Fortune 500 Global ranking .
Deere and Company agricultural products , sold  अंतर्गत   the  John  deere  name  ,  include  tractors  , combine harvesters ,  कपास   हार्वेस्टर  , balers , planters / seeders , sprayers ,  और  UTVs .
The  कम्पनी   is  also  a  manufacturer of construction equipment and forestry equipment ,  as  well as  a   प्रदायक  of  डीज़ल   इंजन  and drivetrains ( axles , transmissions  ,   gearboxes  ) used  in   भारी  equipment .
Additionally ,  जॉन  Deere  manufactures  equipment used in  लॉन  , grounds ,  और  turf care  ,  such as  walk-behind  lawn  mowers   ,  zero-turn  लॉन   mowers  , lawn  tractors  ,  और  snowthrowers  .
To support  the   कोर  businesses , John Deere  भी   provides   वित्तीय   सेवाएं   और  other  सम्बन्धित  activities .
the   कम्पनी  's slogan  is  `` Nothing Runs Like a  deere  '' and  रै   a  picture of  a  leaping  हिरण   as  a  लोगो  , a word play  pun  on  ``  nothing runs like a deer  ''  .
कार्ल  Westby coined  the  phrase ``  nothing  Runs  जैसे  a Deere ''  लिये   a  marketing campaign  to  sell snowmobiles .
The  कम्पनी  's  उत्पाद   हैं  also identifiable by its  distinctive  shade of  ग्रीन   पेंट  ,  प्रायः   augmented  by  पीला  trim .
the   संयुक्त  States ten-dollar  विधेयक  ( $  10  )  is   a   denomination  of United States currency .
The first  u.S.   सचिव   of   the   राजकोष  (  1789–95   )  , Alexander  हैमिल्टन  ,  is  currently featured on the obverse of the bill , while  the  U.S.  राजकोष  Building is  प्रदर्शित  on the reverse .
(  हैमिल्टन  is one  of  two non-presidents  प्रदर्शित  on currently issued U.S. bills .
The other  is   बेंजामिन  Franklin , on the  $   100   विधेयक  .
Hamilton is one  of  only four  लोगों  featured on  u.S.  paper currency ( 1861 to  the  present  )  who was  नहीं  born in the continental  संयुक्त  States , as he was from  the   वेस्ट  Indies .
The others  हैं  :  अल्बर्ट  Gallatin ,  स्विट्ज़रलैंड  ( $ 500  1862/63   विधिक  Tender )  ;  George Meade  ,  Spain ( $ 1,000 1890/91 Treasury  नोट  )  ;  and Robert Morris  ,   इंग्लैण्ड   (  $  1,000   1862/63   विधिक  Tender ; $ 10  1878/80  Silver Certificate ) .
In  जोड  ,  kamehameha  I  ,  appears on  the   2008  Hawaii state  क्वार्टर  . )
सब  $  10  bills  जारी  today are  संघीय   आरक्षित   टीप  .
The Bureau  of  Engraving  और  Printing says the average life of  a  $  10  bill in circulation is 18 months before  it   is  replaced due to wear .
Approximately 6 % of  सब  US  banknotes  printed  in  2009  यहूद  $ 10 bills .
Ten dollar  बिल्स  are delivered by Federal Reserve  बैंको  in  पीला  straps  .
The source of the face on the $ 10 bill is  जॉन   trumbull  ’s 1805  पोर्ट्रेट  of  हैमिल्टन  that belongs to the portrait  संग्रहण   of   नई   यॉर्क  City Hall .
the  $ 10 bill  is   the   तभी   u.S.  paper currency in  परिसंचरण  in which  the   पोर्ट्रेट  faces  to  the left (  the  $  100,000   विधेयक  featured a portrait  of  Woodrow Wilson  facing   to  the  बाएँ  ,  लकिन  was used only  लिये  intra-government  ट्रांजेक्शन  )  .
Andy  सैमुएल  Griffith ( June 1 , 1926 – July 3 ,  2012   )   थी  an American actor  ,   टेलीविज़न  producer ,  ग्रैमी  Award -winning  southern-gospel   सिंगर  , and  लेखक  .
He was a Tony Award nominee  लिये  two roles , and gained prominence  in  the  अभिनीत  role in  निदेशक  Elia Kazan  's  film A  फेस  in the  भीड  (  1957  )  पहले  he  became   बेहतर  known for his television roles , playing  the   सीसे  characters in the 1960–1968 situation comedy The Andy Griffith  दिखाएँ  and in the  1986–1995  legal drama  matlock   .
Theresa Penelope `` Terri ''  इरविन  , (  née  Raines ; born July 20 , 1964  )  is  an   ऑस्ट्रेलियाई  -based  ,  American -born naturalist , author , the widow  of  Australian  naturalist  Steve Irwin and  मालिक  of Australia Zoo at  beerwah  , Queensland , Australia .
She co-starred with her husband on The Crocodile Hunter , their  unconventional  television nature  वृत्तचित्र   श्रेणी  along with its  spin-off  series  ,   क्रोक  Files and The Crocodile Hunter Diaries .
She has lived  in  Australia since 1992 , when she married Steve  इरविन  .

Heliocentrism  ,  or heliocentricism  ,  is the astronomical model in which  the   धरती   और  planets revolve around a  अपेक्षाकृत  stationary Sun  at  the center of  the   सौर   प्रणाली  .
the   शब्द  comes  इससे   the  Greek ( helios `` sun  ''  and kentron  ``   बीच  '' ) .
historically  , heliocentrism  थी  opposed to geocentrism  ,   जिससे  placed the Earth at the center .
The notion  कि  the Earth  घूमती  around  the   सूर्य  had been proposed  as  early as the  3rd  century BC by Aristarchus  of   samos  ,  लकिन  Aristarchus 's heliocentrism attracted  छोटी  attention until Copernicus revived and  elaborated  it .
Lucio Russo , however ,  argues   कि  this  is   a   भ्रामक  impression  resulting  from  the  loss of scientific  works  of the Hellenistic Era .
Using  अप्रत्यक्ष  evidence  he   argues   कि  a heliocentric view  थी  expounded in  हिप्पारकस   's  work on gravity .
It was not  जबतक  the 16th century that a  fully  predictive  गणितीय  model of a heliocentric system  थी  presented , by the  पुनर्जागरण  mathematician , astronomer ,  और  Catholic cleric Nicolaus Copernicus of Poland , leading  to  the Copernican Revolution .
in   the  following century  ,  Johannes Kepler elaborated upon and expanded  इस  model to include elliptical  orbits  ,  और   supporting  observations made using a  दूरदर्शी   यहूद   प्रस्तुत  by  गैलीलियो   गैलिली  .
With  the   observations  of  विलियम  Herschel , Friedrich Bessel  ,   और  others  ,  astronomers realized that the sun was not the center of  the  universe and by the  1920s  Edwin Hubble had shown that it was part of a  आकाशगंगा  (  the  Milky Way  )  that was only one of many billions .
Norah Jones (  born   geetali   नोराह  Jones  शंकर   ;   कूच  30 , 1979 ) is  an   अमरीकी   singer-songwriter   ,  pianist  ,  and actress .
She is the daughter of  भारतीय  sitar player  रवि  Shankar and  मुकदमा  Jones .
She  is  also Anoushka Shankar 's  half-sister   .
In 2002  ,  she launched  उसके   सोलो  music career  साथ  the release  of   the  commercially successful  और  critically acclaimed album Come Away  साथ   me   ,  a fusion  of   देश   म्यूज़िक  and pop with elements of  जैज़  which was certified diamond album , selling over  26  million  नक़ल  .
The record earned Jones five  ग्रैमी  Awards , including  the  Album of the  साल  , Record of the Year ,  और  Best New Artist .
Her  subsequent  studio  एल्बम  , Feels  जैसे   घर   ,   released  in  2004   ,  Not Too  लेट  ,  released  in 2007  ,  the  वही  year she made her film  डेब्यू  in  my   ब्लूबेरी  Nights  ,  and her  2009   रिलीज  The Fall all gained Platinum  औकात  , selling over a  लाख  copies  और  were generally  खूब  received by critics .
Jones ' fifth studio album , Little Broken Hearts , was  released  on  अप्रैल  27  ,   2012  .
Jones  रै  won  नौ  Grammy Awards and was 60th  on   बिलबोर्ड  magazine 's  कलाकारों  of  the  2000–2009  दशक  chart .
Throughout  उसके  career  ,  Jones  रै  won numerous  पुरस्कार  and has sold more than  50   लाख  albums worldwide .
Billboard named her the  शीर्ष   जैज़  artist of the 2000–2009 decade .
Not  to   be  confused  साथ  Dimension of  a  physical quantity .
लिये  other uses  ,  see Dimension ( disambiguation  )  .
From left  to  right , the  वर्गाकार  , the cube ,  और  the  tesseract  .
The square  is   bounded  by  1-dimensional  lines  ,  the cube  by  2-dimensional  क्षेत्रों   ,   और   the   tesseract   by  3-dimensional volumes  .
A projection of  the   घन   is  given since it is viewed on a  two-dimensional   स्क्रीन  .
the   वही  applies to  the  tesseract , which additionally  can   तभी  be shown as a projection even  in   three-dimensional  space .
A  आरेख  showing the first four  स्थानिक   आयाम   .
In physics and  गणित  , the dimension of a space  or  object is  informally  defined as the minimum number of coordinates  needed  to specify  कोई  point within it  .
Thus a line  रै   a  dimension  of   एक  because only  एक   निर्देशांक  is needed to specify  a  point on  it  ( for  उदाहरण   ,  the  पाइंट  at 5 on a number  लकीर  ) .
A surface such  as  a  प्लेन   or  the  सतह  of a cylinder or sphere has a  आयाम  of  दो  because  दो  coordinates are needed to specify a  पाइंट  on it ( for  उदाहरण  , to  locate   a   पाइंट  on the surface of a  गोला  you  need   दोनो  its latitude and its longitude )  .
the  inside  of  a  घन  ,  a  cylinder or a sphere is three-dimensional because three coordinates  हैं  needed  to  locate  a  point within  ये   स्पेसेस   .
in   शारीरिक  terms ,  आयाम  refers to the constituent structure of all space ( volume  )   और  its position in time ( perceived as  a  scalar dimension along  the  t-axis  )  , as  खूब   as  the spatial  संविधान  of objects within—structures  कि  correlate with  दोनो   कण  and field conceptions  ,  interact  according  to relative  गुण  of  द्रव्यमान  —and are fundamentally  गणितीय  in description  .
These , or other axes  ,  may be  संदर्भित   to  uniquely identify a  पाइंट   or  structure in its  रवैया  and  संबंध  to other objects and  आवृत्ति  .
Physical theories that incorporate  समय   ,  such as general  आपेक्षिकता   ,  are  कहा  to work in 4-dimensional  ``  spacetime ``  ,   (  defined as a Minkowski  स्पेस  ) .
Modern  theories  tend to be `` higher-dimensional  ''  including quantum field and string  theories  .
The  state-space  of quantum mechanics  is   an  infinite-dimensional function  स्पेस  .
The concept of dimension is not restricted to physical objects .
high-dimensional  spaces  occur   in  mathematics  और   the  sciences for many  कारण  , frequently as configuration spaces such as in  लाग्रांजीय  or  हेमिल्टोनीय  mechanics  ;  these are abstract spaces , independent  of  the  शारीरिक  space  we  live in .
fontana  ( ) is a  नगर   of  200,762  निवासियों  in San  bernardino   काउंटी  , California  .
Founded in  1913  , it remained  essentially  rural until World War II  ,  when entrepreneur Henry  J.  Kaiser built a  विशाल   स्टील   मिल   in  the  क्षेत्रफल  .
It is  अभी   a   क्षेत्रीय  hub of  the  trucking industry , with Interstate 10  और   राज्य  Route 210  transecting  the  नगर   इससे  east to west  ,  and Interstate  15  passing diagonally through  इसके  northwestern quadrant .
It is home to the largest of  the  San Bernardino  काउंटी  system libraries , a renovated historic theater , a municipal park , and the Auto Club Speedway  on   the  site of the Kaiser Steel Mill .
Fontana  भी  hosts  the  Fontana Days Half  मैराथन  and 5K run .
This race  is  the fastest half-marathon course  in   the  world .
The U.S. 2012 Census reported that Fontana 's population was 200,762 in  2012  , making  it   the  second most populous city in  सैन   bernardino   काउंटी  county  और   14th  in the state  .
cowboys  Stadium is a stadium with a retractable roof in  आर्लिंगटन  , Texas .
it   serves   as   the  home  of  the National  फ़ुटबॉल  League 's Dallas  cowboys  .
It replaced the partially covered Texas Stadium ,  जिससे  opened  in  1971 , and served as  the   cowboys   '  home through the 2008 season .
it   थी  completed  on  May 27 , 2009 .
The stadium seats 85,000 , making  it  the third  largest  stadium in  the   एनएफएल  by seating capacity .
The maximum capacity of the stadium  ,  including standing room  ,  is 105,000 .
the  Party Pass ( open areas  )  sections are behind seats in  प्रत्येक  end zone and on a series of  छह  elevated platforms  कनेक्ट  by stairways .
It has  the  world 's  largest  column-free interior and the fourth largest high definition video  स्क्रीन  , which hangs from 20  यार्ड  line to 20 yard line .
The facility  can  also be used for a  किस्में   of  other activities outside of its  प्रमुख   purpose  ( professional  फ़ुटबॉल  ) such as concerts  ,   बास्केट  games , boxing matches , college  फ़ुटबॉल   और  high school  फ़ुटबॉल   प्रतियोगिताओं  ,  सॉकर   मिलान  ,  और  motocross  दौड़  .
कनाडाई  historians  जबतक   the  1980s tended to  फ़ोकस   on  economic history ,  सहित  labour  इतिहास  .
in   भाग  this is because Canada  रै  had  दूर   कम  political or military conflicts than other societies  .
इस  was especially true in the first half  of   the   बीसवीं  century  जब   आर्थिक  history  थी  overwhelmingly dominant .
Many of  the  most prominent  अंग्रेज़ी  Canadian historians from  इस  period were economic  इतिहासकारों  , such as Harold Innis , Donald Creighton and Arthur R.  M.   निम्नतर
Scholars  of  Canadian history were heirs to  the  traditions that developed  in  Europe and the United  राज्य   ,  but  frameworks  that  worked  well elsewhere often failed in Canada .
The heavily  मार्क्सवादी  influenced  आर्थिक  history  कि  dominates  यूरोपीय  has little relevance  to  most of Canadian history .
A  फ़ोकस  on  क्लास  , urban areas  ,  and industry  fails  to  पता  Canada 's  ग्रामीण   और   संसाधन  based  अर्थव्यवस्था  .
Similarly ,  the  monetarist school that is dominant in  the  United States also  रै  been difficult to transfer  उत्तर  of the border .
The study  of  economic history in Canada became  अत्यधिक  focused on  आर्थिक   भूगोल  , and for many years the dominant school  of  thought has been  the  staples thesis  .
This school of  विचार  bases  the  study of the Canadian economy on  the  study of  प्राकृतिक  resources .
This approach has since  भी   become  used outside of  कनाडा  in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  and in  अनेक  developing nations .
पहले  the arrival of  europeans  , the  पहला  Nations of what  होता   become  Canada  था  a large  और  vibrant trade  संजाल  .
Furs , tools ,  सजावटी   वस्तुएं  , and  अन्य  goods  यहूद  often  transported  thousands of kilometres  ,  mostly by canoe throughout the many rivers  और  lakes of  the  region  .
The early European  इतिहास   of  the  कनाडाई  economy is usually  पढ़ाई  through the staples  लेख   जिससे   argues  the Canadian economy developed through the exploitation of  a  series of staples that would be exported to Europe .
carbon-14  , 14C ,  or  radiocarbon , is a radioactive isotope of carbon  साथ  a nucleus containing 6 protons and 8 neutrons .
Its presence in  सशुल्क  materials  is  the  आधार   of  the radiocarbon dating method  pioneered  by Willard Libby and colleagues (  1949  ) to date  पुरातत्व  ,  geological   और   hydrogeological  samples .
Carbon-14 was  खोजा   on  27  फ़रवरी  1940  ,   by  Martin  कामेन  and  sam  Ruben at the  विश्वविद्यालयों   of  California Radiation  प्रयोगशाला  in Berkeley , although its existence had been suggested by Franz Kurie  in  1934  .
There are  तीन   naturally   occurring   isotopes   of  carbon on Earth :  99  % of the  कार्बन  is  carbon-12   ,  1  %  is  carbon-13  , and  carbon-14   occurs  in trace amounts ,  i.e.  , making up about 1 part per  खरब   (  0.0000000001 % ) of the carbon in the  माहौल  .
The  half-life   of  carbon-14 is 5,730±40 years  .
carbon-14  decays into  nitrogen-14   through  beta decay .
The primary natural source  of  carbon-14 on  धरती  is cosmic ray  कार्रवाई  upon  नाइट्रोजन  in the atmosphere , and  it  is  इसलिए  a cosmogenic nuclide .
However ,  open-air  nuclear  परीक्षण  between 1955–1980  contributed  to this  पूल  .
the   अलग  isotopes  of  carbon  do  not differ appreciably in their chemical properties .
इस  is  प्रयुक्त  in chemical and biological research ,  in  a  तकनीक   पुकारा  carbon labeling  :  carbon-14 atoms  can  be used to replace nonradioactive carbon , in order to trace chemical  और  biochemical reactions  involving   कार्बन   अणु  from  कोई  given organic compound .
Lightning is a highly visible  रूप  of energy transfer
Lightning strikes are electrical discharges on a massive  स्केल  between the atmosphere and an earth-bound object .
वे   ज़्यादातर   originate  in thunderclouds and terminate on the  मैदान  , called Cloud to Ground (  cg  ) lightning .
However ,  वे  may  भी  be initiated  इससे   a   बहुत  tall  grounded   ऑब्जेक्ट  and  पहुँचें   into   the  clouds .
हालांकि  ``  a  lightning strike  ''  is commonly used  to   describe  all lightning , it is rather erroneous and  a   misnomer  , as only about 25 %  of   सब  lightning events worldwide  हैं  CG , the large bulk  of  lightning  कार्यक्रम  are Intracloud  (  IC ) or Cloud to Cloud (  cc  ) , where discharge  तभी  occurs  ऊँची  in  the   माहौल  .
the   वैज्ञानिक   नाम  for the complete process  of   a   सिंगल  lightning event is a  और  it is a very  जटिल   ,  multiple stepped  बातचीत  , which is not completely understood .
Most CG flashes only `` strike  ''   एक  physical location , referred  to  as a termination .
The primary conducting channel , the bright coursing light  तुम  may see  और   कॉल  a  ``  strike '' , is only about 1 inch in diameter , although to our eyes  it  looks  much  larger .
वे  are miles long  ,   upwards  of  tens   of  miles .
And the  संपूर्ण   फ्लैश  ,  lasts  only a few fractions of  a  second  ,  most of which is not visible to human  आँखें   .
Thunder is always produced  by   बिजली  .
Just like lightning , that deceives our  आँखें  , usually looking larger or closer  than  it really  is  ,  the  earth 's atmosphere  और  our brain  's  perception  of  the  बाहर  world , ultimately determines  whether  it is  ``  heard '' or  नहीं  .
Lightning can  नहीं  happen in a  वैक्यूम  devoid of ions , nor can thunder  occur  without molecules to vibrate  .
थंडर   is  a  शारीरिक  absolute for every  सिंगल   फ्लैश  of lightning .
contrary  to popular belief , a  बिजली  strike itself  is  usually not  जिम्मेदार  for multiple deaths or injuries from a single event .
It would be impossible given the natural tendencies of a  फ्लैश  ,  जबतक  people or animals were stacked on  शीर्ष   of  each other  ,  or they were somehow arranged  खड़ा   और  part of the flash channel  .
जब  lightning ignites an available fuel source  और  an explosion occurs , it is  the  shock wave or fire causing the injuries  ,  not the  स्ट्राइक  itself .
Ground Currents  ,  also called  कदम  potential ,  of   an  earth termination is what truly causes  सबसे  injuries or death to humans and  पशु  .
the  near instantaneous rush  of  surface charges  ,   induced   by  the  ओवरहेड   thundercloud   itself   ,  race to  the   स्ट्राइक  point from  सैंकड़ों  to  हज़ारों  of  फीट  away during discharge .
This current , caused during  प्रत्येक   स्ट्रोक   ,  takes the path of  तनिक  resistance , which  may  be  आयन  rich  इंसान  or animal legs , over poorly conducting earth .
This is  क्यों  it  is  best  to  crouch , with feet close together  ,  if ever  caught   in  the open during  a  thunderstorm  .
Unfortunately , most reports  do  not draw  a  distinction  between  the real cause  of  injury or death ,  be  it  the  strike itself , a  resulting   विस्फोट  or fire  ,   or   प्रायः  responsible step  संभावित  .
Peter F. Kilmartin ( born  1962  ) is the current Attorney  सामान्य  of Rhode Island .
Kilmartin is  भी   a  retired  पुलिस  captain and  a  former member of  the   rhode   द्वीप  House of Representatives  .

Sealing  is  an  अध्यादेश  ( ritual ) performed in  latter  Day  संतो   मंदिरों  by  a  person holding  the   sealing   प्राधिकार   .
The  purpose   of  this ordinance  is  to seal familiar  संबंध  ,  बनाना  possible the existence  of  family relationships  throughout  eternity  .
LDS teachings  प्लेस  great importance on the  विशिष्ट  authority  जरूरी  to  perform  these  sealings   .
Church  doctrine  teaches that this authority ,  पुकारा  the Priesthood  ,  corresponds  to  that given  to   संत  Peter in .
Sealings are typically  performed  as marriages  or   as  sealing of children to  अभिभावक  .
वे  were performed prior to the death of  जोसेफ  Smith  ,   jr.  ( the main founder of  the  Latter Day  संत  movement ) , and  हैं   फिलहाल   performed   in  The Church of Jesus  मसीह  of  latter-day  Saints .
हालांकि   कुछ  other  denominations   ,  such  as  the Community of Christ , view sealing  as   an   centuries  of  स्मिथ  's practice of plural marriage , some  do   स्टिल   perform  them .
the  2000s , pronounced  ``  two thousands '' ,  थी  a decade that began  on  January 1  ,  2000 , and ended  on  December 31  ,  2009  .
वैश्वीकरण  ,  जिससे  had accelerated after  the  early 1990s fall of  साम्यवादी   ,  continued to be  a  force  in  the 2000s .
The growth of  the  Internet was one of the  प्रधान  contributors  to  globalization during the  दशक  ,  बनाना   it   संभावित  for people to  interact  with  अन्य  people  ,  express ideas  ,  introduce others to different cultures and backgrounds  ,  use  goods  and services  ,  sell and  ख़रीदे   ऑनलाइन  , research and learn  परिचय   बाते   ,  along with  experiencing  the  संसार  without  having  to  छोड़  home .
The  संस्थानों  , linkages  और  technologies  कि  emerged or were redefined earlier would subsequently in  इस  decade benefit many countries , in particular  चीन  and India .
However ,  in   अन्य  parts of the world such progress failed to address ongoing  struggles  with modernity  ,  most notably  characterized   by  the rise of al-Qaeda and  अन्य  Islamist groups  .
The September 11  हमले   in  2001 led  to   the   संयुक्त  States  ,  United Kingdom , Spain ,  कनाडा  and  अन्य  nations invading Afghanistan , as well as  implementing  various anti-terrorist measures at home  और  abroad in  कया  was known as the War on Terror  .
The European  संघ  saw further integration and expansion throughout much of  यूरोपीय   .
The economic growth  of   the   2000s  had  considerable  environmental consequences , raised demand for diminishing  उर्जा  resources , and was  स्टिल   दिखाया  to be vulnerable  as  demonstrated during the Global  वित्तीय  Crisis of the late  2000s  .
The  gunfight  at the O.K . Corral was a  gunfight  that  took  place at about  3:00   p.m.   on   बुधवार  , October 26 ,  1881  , in Tombstone  ,   एरिज़ोना  Territory ,  और  is generally regarded as the most famous  gunfight  in the history of the American Old West .
the  gunfight , believed to  have  lasted  तभी   परिचय   तीस   सेकेंड  , was fought between  the  outlaw Cowboys  बिली  Claiborne  ,   आइक  and Billy Clanton  ,  and Tom  और  Frank McLaury , and the opposing town Marshal Virgil Earp  और   उसके  brothers Assistant Town  मार्शल   मॉर्गन  and temporary lawman Wyatt  ,   aided   by   दस्तावेज़   हॉलिडे  designated as a temporary marshal by Virgil .
Ike  clanton   और  Billy  claiborne  ran from the fight unharmed , but Ike 's brother Billy Clanton  थी   मारे  ,  साथ  with both McLaurys .
Lawmen Virgil  और   मॉर्गन  Earp and  दस्तावेज़  Holliday  यहूद   wounded  .
Only Wyatt Earp came  through   the   लड़ो  unharmed .
The  लड़ो  has come  to  represent a time in American history  जब   the  frontier  थी   खोलें   दायरा   लिये   outlaws  opposed by  विधि  enforcement that was  स्प्रेड   पतला  over vast territories , leaving some  क्षेत्रों  unprotected  .
the  gunfight was not well known to  the  American public until 1931 when author Stuart Lake published what has since been determined to  be  a  largely   fictionalized  biography ,  व्याट   earp  : Frontier Marshal  ,  two years after Earp 's  मौत  .
Lake  retold  his story in  a  1946 book that director  जॉन  Ford  विकसित   into   the  movie My Darling Clementine .
After the movie  gunfight   at  the  o.k   .   corral  was  released  in 1957 ,  the   गोलीबारी   आए  to be known by that name .
Since then  ,  the conflict  रै   महरूम   portrayed   साथ  varying degrees of accuracy  in  numerous Western films  और   किताबे   .
Despite its name , the gunfight  दरअसल   occurred   in   a   सीमित  lot six doors  वेस्ट  of  the  rear  प्रवेश  to the  o.k  . Corral on  fremont  Street ,  और  also in the street .
The  दो   opposing  parties  यहूद   initially  only about apart .
परिचय   तीस   गोलियाँ  were fired in thirty seconds .
Ike  clanton   दायर  murder charges  विरूद्ध  the Earps and Doc Holliday but  वे  were eventually exonerated by a local judge after a 30-day preliminary hearing and then again  by  a local grand  जूरी  .
On  दिसम्बर  28 , 1881  ,   वर्जिल  Earp was maimed in an assassination attempt  by  the outlaw  cowboys  , and  on   कूच  18 , 1882 , they assassinated Morgan  earp   .
The  संदिग्धों   सुसज्जित  solid alibis , and newly appointed Deputy U.S  .  Marshal  व्याट  Earp took  matters   into  his  अपना   हैंड्स  during  the  Earp  वेंडेट्टा  Ride  ,  ironically pursued by  काउंटी   शेरिफ  Johnny Behan with warrants for  the   earp  's arrest .
HDMI  (  High-Definition Multimedia Interface ) is  a  compact audio/video interface  लिये  transferring uncompressed video  आंकड़ा  and compressed/uncompressed digital audio data from a HDMI-compliant device  (  `` the  सोर्स  device ''  )  to a compatible computer monitor  ,  video  प्रोजेक्टर  , digital  टेलीविज़न  , or digital audio  यंत्र  .
HDMI is  a  digital replacement for  मौजूदा  analog video standards .
वहीँ   हैं  a  क्रमांक  of HDMI-standard  केबल  connectors  उपलब्धियाँ  , each of  जिससे  can be used for  कोई  uncompressed  tv   or  PC video format , including standard , enhanced , high definition ,  और   3d  video signals  ;  up  to  8 channels  of  compressed  or   uncompressed  digital  ऑडियो   ;  a CEC ( Consumer  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स  Control ) connection ;  और   an  Ethernet data connection .
HDMI implements  the   eia/cea-861   मानकों   ,  which  define  video formats and  waveforms  , transport of  संपीडित  , uncompressed , and LPCM audio  ,  auxiliary data ,  और   implementations  of the VESA EDID .
the   cec  allows  hdmi   डिवाइस  to control each other  जब  necessary and allows the user  to  operate  अनेक  devices with one remote control handset .
Because  hdmi   is  electrically compatible  साथ   the  CEA-861 signals  प्रयुक्त  by digital visual interface ( DVI )  ,  no signal conversion is necessary  ,   nor  is there a loss  of   वीडियो  quality when a DVI-to-HDMI adapter  is  used  .
As an  uncompressed   cea-861  connection , HDMI is  स्वतंत्र   of   the  various digital television  मानकों  used by individual  डिवाइस   ,  such  as   atsc  and  dvb  , as these are encapsulations of compressed  एमपीईजी  video streams ( which can be decoded  और  output as an  uncompressed  video stream on HDMI ) .
उत्पादन  of consumer HDMI products started in late  2003  .
in   यूरोपीय  either DVI-HDCP or HDMI  is   शामिल   in   the  HD ready  in-store   labeling   specification  for  tv  sets  लिये  HDTV  ,  formulated by EICTA with SES  अस्त्र  in  2005   .
HDMI  began  to  appear  on consumer  hdtv  camcorders and  डिजिटल  still  कैमरे  in 2006 .
As of January 8 , 2013 , which  is  ten  सालो  after the  रिलीज   of  the first HDMI specification  ,  over  3  billion HDMI devices  have  shipped since the launch of the  hdmi   मानक  .
Bree Van  de  Kamp (  née  Mason ; also known in the series as  ब्री   होज  and Bree Weston ) is a fictional  अक्षर   और  one of the four protagonists  on  the  एबीसी   टेलीविज़न  series  हताश  Housewives .
She  is  played by actress Marcia  क्रॉस  , who has  प्राप्त  multiple  पुरस्कार   और  nominations  लिये  her  portrayal   ,  including an Emmy Award  नामांकन  , three Golden  ग्लोब  Award  nominations  , and two Screen  अभिनेताओं  Guild Awards .
Cross 's  portrayal   of  Bree has been widely  praised  by critics and fans .
Cross originally  auditioned  for  the  role of  मरियम   ऐलिस   यंग   ,  but series  निर्माता   मार्क  Cherry thought she was better suited for  the   भूमिका  of Bree .
दाना  Delany , who eventually was cast as Katherine Mayfair  ,  was originally chosen  लिये   the   भूमिका  but  turned  it down  ,  saying it was too similar to  उसके   भूमिका   in  Pasadena  .
Bree 's  प्रमुख  struggle  throughout  the series has been  उसके  attempts to maintain a perfect life  despite  various  बाधाएं  such as widowhood  ,  divorce ,  और   alcoholism   hindering  her .
She has  महरूम  married  तीन  times ; to Rex Van de  kamp  (  स्टीवन  Culp ) , Orson Hodge  (   काइल  MacLachlan  )  and  ट्रिप   वेस्टन   (   स्कॉट   bakula  ) .
See  भी  the  कस्बा   of   algoma  in  winnebago  County  ,   विस्कॉन्सिन  .
See also Algoma  (   बहुविकल्पी  )  .
Algoma is a city in Kewaunee  काउंटी   in   the  U.S.  राज्य  of Wisconsin .
the  population  थी  3,167 at the  2010   जनसांख्यिकी   .
Algoma is part  of   the   ग्रीन  Bay Metropolitan  सांख्यिकीय   क्षेत्रफल  .
The Hangover  भाग  II is  a  2011 American comedy film produced by Legendary  तस्वीरें  and distributed by  warner   भाईs.  Pictures  .
it  is the sequel to  2009   's  The Hangover and  the  second  फिल्मी  in The Hangover franchise  .
Todd Phillips directed  the   फिल्मी   in  addition to co-authoring the script with  क्रेग  Mazin ,  और  Scot Armstrong  .
The film  सितारों   ब्राडली  Cooper , Ed Helms , Zach Galifianakis ,  केन   jeong   ,  Jeffrey Tambor  ,  Justin  bartha  and Paul Giamatti  .
The Hangover  भाग   ii  tells the  स्टोरी  of  फिल   ,  Stu , Alan , and Doug  as  they travel to Thailand for Stu  's  wedding  .
After the bachelor party in Las Vegas , Stu takes no chances and  opts  for a  सुरक्षित  ,  subdued  pre-wedding brunch .
However  ,  things do not go  as   नियोजित  ,  resulting  in  another  bad hangover with no memories  of  the previous night .
Development of The  hangover  Part II  began  in  अप्रैल   2009   ,   दो  months  पहले  The Hangover  थी  released .
The principal actors  यहूद   डाल  in  कूच   2010  to reprise their roles  इससे  the  पहला  film .
Production began in October  2010  , in Ontario  ,  California , before moving on location  in  Thailand .
The film was  released   on  May 26 , 2011 and , despite receiving mostly negative reviews  इससे  critics , it became the highest-grossing R-rated comedy during its theatrical run .
A third film is set for  on   may   24  , 2013 .

the  English Renaissance was a  सांस्कृतिक  and artistic  गति   in   इंग्लैण्ड  dating  इससे   the   लेट  15th and early 16th centuries  to   the  early 17th century .
It  is   संबद्ध  with  the   pan-european   पुनर्जागरण  that  is  usually regarded as beginning  in  Italy in the late  14th   सदी  .
Like most of northern Europe ,  इंग्लैण्ड  saw little of these developments until  अधिक   than  a century later  .
The beginning of  the   अंग्रेज़ी  Renaissance is often taken  ,   as  a convenience , to be 1485 , when the Battle  of   bosworth   फ़ील्ड  ended the  युद्धों  of the Roses and inaugurated the Tudor Dynasty .
Renaissance style and ideas , however ,  यहूद   slow  in penetrating  इंग्लैण्ड   ,  and the Elizabethan era  in   the   दूसरी   हाफ  of the  16th  century is usually regarded as  the  height of the  अंग्रेज़ी  Renaissance .
Elizabeth Ann  bloomer  Warren  ``  Betty  ''   घाट  ( April 8 , 1918  –  July  8   ,   2011  ) ,  थी  First  महिला   of  the United States from 1974 to 1977 during the presidency  of  her husband Gerald Ford .
as  First Lady  ,  she was active in social policy and created precedents  as   a   नीतियां   क्रियाशील  presidential  बीवी   .
Throughout her husband  's  term in office , she  कायम   ऊँची  approval  दरजा  despite  विपक्ष  from  कुछ   रूढ़िवादी  Republicans who objected to her  अधिक  moderate and liberal  स्थितियाँ  on social issues .
Ford was noted  लिये   उठाने  breast  कर्कट   जागरूकता  following her 1974  mastectomy   और   थी   a   passionate  supporter of  ,   और  activist for , the  बराबर   अधिकारों  Amendment (  era  )  .
Pro-choice  on  abortion and  a   नेता  in the Women 's  गति  ,  वो  gained fame as one of the  सबसे  candid  पहला  ladies in history , commenting on every hot-button  समस्या  of  the  time , including feminism  ,   बराबर   अदा   ,  the ERA ,  sex   ,  drugs ,  गर्भपात  ,  और   गन  control .
She  भी  raised  जागरूकता  of addiction  जब   वो  announced  उसके   long-running  battle  साथ  alcoholism in  the   1970s   .
Following her  श्वेत  House years  ,  she continued to  लॉबी  for  the   era  and remained  क्रियाशील   in   the  feminist movement .
She was the founder ,  और   परोसा  as  the  first  कुर्सी   of   the  board of directors , of  the  Betty Ford Center  लिये  substance abuse and addiction and is a recipient of  the  Congressional Gold Medal ( co-presentation with her husband  ,  Gerald R. Ford , October 21 , 1998  )  and the Presidential Medal of  स्वतंत्रता  ( alone  ,  presented 1991  ,   by  George H.  W.   बुश  )  .
platelet  endothelial cell  adhesion  molecule  (  PECAM-1  )   भी  known as  क्लस्टर  of differentiation 31  (  CD31 ) is a protein that in  इंसान  is encoded  by   the  PECAM1 gene found  on  chromosome 17 .
pecam-1  plays a key  भूमिका   in   निकालना  aged  neutrophils  from the body .

The Miss Florida USA competition is  the  pageant that selects  the  representative  लिये  the  राज्य   फ्लोरिडा  in the Miss USA pageant .
जबकि   फ्लोरिडा   रै  been  कामयाब   in   शर्तें  of  runners-up   ,  finalists  और  semi-finalists , the  राज्य   रै  never  जीती  the Miss USA pageant  ,   हालांकि  Cheryl  patton  became Miss USA after Sylvia Hitchcock won Miss  ब्रह्मांड   .
Florida 's best  परिणाम   यहूद   दौरान   the   mid-1960s  to mid-1970s  .
Their most  हाल  finalist  थी   lissette   गार्सिया  who placed in the top 16 in 2011  .
Two former Miss Florida Teen USA titleholders  have   जीती  this  प्रतियोगिता  , and three titleholders  have  also  competed  at Miss  अमेरिका   .
The current titleholder is Michelle Aguirre of  hialeah   .
Anglo-Saxon  इंग्लैण्ड   refers   to  the period of the history  of  the part  of  Britain that  became  known as  इंग्लैण्ड  , lasting  इससे  the end of  रोमन  occupation  और  establishment of Anglo-Saxon kingdoms in the 5th  सदी  until the  नॉर्मन  conquest  of  England  in  1066 by William the Conqueror .
Anglo-Saxon  is   a   सामान्य  term  referring  to the Germanic  peoples  who  आए  to Britain during the 5th and 6th  सदियां   ,   सहित   कोण  , Saxons , Frisii ,  और  Jutes .
The  पद  also refers  to   the   भाषा   बोला  at  the  time in England , which  is  now called  बूढ़ा  English , and to  the  culture of  the  era , which has long attracted  लोकप्रिय  and  scholarly   ध्यान  .
Until the 9th century Anglo-Saxon England was dominated  by   the   heptarchy  , the kingdoms of Northumbria , Mercia , East Anglia  ,  Essex  ,  Kent , Sussex ,  और  Wessex  .
In terms  of   धर्म  the  kingdoms  followed  anglo-saxon   paganism  during the  जल्दी   काल   ,   लकिन  converted  to  Christianity during  the  7th  सदी  .
paganism  had a final  stronghold  in a period  of  Mercian hegemony during  the   640s  , ending with  the  death of Penda  of  Mercia in 655  .
Facing the threat of Viking  invasions   ,  the  हाउस  of Wessex  became  dominant during the  9th   सदी   ,   अंतर्गत  the rule of Alfred the Great .
During the 10th century  ,   the  individual  kingdoms  unified  अंतर्गत  the rule  of  Wessex into the Kingdom of  इंग्लैण्ड  , which stood  opposed  to the Danelaw , the Viking kingdoms established from the 9th  सदी  in  the  north and  ईस्ट  of  इंग्लैण्ड  .
The Kingdom  of  England fell  in  the Viking invasion from Denmark in  1013  and was ruled by the House of Denmark until 1042 , when the  anglo-saxon  House  of   wessex   थी  restored  .
the   पिछला  Anglo-Saxon  किंग  ,  हेरोल्ड  Godwinson ,  थी  killed  in   1066   at  the Battle of  हास्टिंग्स  .
