Smoked  सामन  is  a  preparation  of   सामन  , typically  a  fillet that has  महरूम  cured and hot or cold smoked  .
Due  to  its moderately high  दाम  , smoked salmon is considered  a  delicacy .
हालांकि  the term lox is sometimes applied to smoked salmon ,  वे  are  अलग  products  .
View  of  defibrillator electrode position and placement  .
defibrillation  is a  आम  treatment for life-threatening  हृदय  dysrhythmias  ,  ventricular fibrillation , and pulseless ventricular tachycardia .
Defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic  खुराक  of electrical energy to the affected heart with a  यंत्र   पुकारा  a defibrillator .
This depolarizes a critical mass of  the  heart muscle  ,  terminates the dysrhythmia ,  और   allows  normal  sinus  rhythm to be reestablished  by  the  देह   's   प्राकृतिक  pacemaker ,  in  the  sinoatrial  node of the heart .
Defibrillators can  be  external  ,  transvenous  ,  or implanted , depending on the type of device used  or  needed .
Some  बाह्य  units  ,   ज्ञात   as   स्वचालित   बाह्य  defibrillators ( AEDs ) , automate the diagnosis  of  treatable rhythms  ,  meaning  कि  lay responders  or  bystanders are  समर्थ   to  use  उन्हें   सफलतापूर्वक  with  छोटी  ,  or   in  some  मामले  no training at  सब  .
Gabrielle  ``   कोको   ''  Bonheur Chanel ( August 19 , 1883 – January 10  ,   1971  )  थी  a French  फ़ैशन  designer and founder of the Chanel brand .
वो   थी  the only fashion  पंक्तियां   to  appear  on   समय  magazine  's  list of the 100 most influential people of the 20th century .
Along  साथ  Paul Poiret , Chanel was  credited  with liberating women  इससे  the  constraints  of the `` corseted silhouette  ''  and  popularizing  the  स्वीकृति  of a  sportive  , casual  चिक  as the  feminine  standard in the post-  संसार  War I era .
A prolific fashion creator ,  चैनल  's  influence  extended beyond couture clothing .
Her design aesthetic  थी   एहसास  in jewelry , handbags  ,   और  fragrance  .
Her signature scent ,  चैनल  No  .  5 , has become an  iconic  product .
Chanel  थी  known  लिये  her lifelong determination  ,  ambition and  उर्जा  which she  लागू  to  उसके  professional and social life .
She achieved both success as a businesswoman and social prominence  धन्यवाद  to  the  connections she made through her  कार्य  .
These  शामिल   अनेक  artists  और  craftspeople  to  whom she  became   a  patron .
However , Chanel 's highly  प्रतिस्पर्धी   ,  opportunistic personality led  उसके  to make  questionable  life choices which have generated controversy  around  her reputation , particularly her behaviour  दौरान  the  जर्मनी  occupation of France  in  World War II .
Allied Mills  आटा  mill on  the   बैंको  of the Manchester  जलयान  Canal
A  gristmill  ( also : grist mill , corn mill  or  flour mill ) grinds grain into flour  .
The  पद  can refer to both  the  grinding mechanism and the building that holds  it  .
Romania ( ; dated spellings  roumania  and  rumania  ;  )   is   a  country located at the intersection of  सेंट्रल  and Southeastern Europe ,  bordering   on   the   ब्लैक  Sea  .
Romania shares  a   किनारा  with Hungary and Serbia to  the  west , Ukraine  और   moldova  to the northeast  और  east , and  बुल्गारिया  to the south  .
At , Romania is the eighth  largest   देश  of the  यूरोपीय   संघ  by area , and has the seventh largest population of the European Union with more  than  19 million people .
इसके  capital  और  biggest city is Bucharest  ,  the  11th  largest city  in  the EU .
The United Principalities emerged when the  territories  of  moldavia  and Wallachia were united under Prince Alexander  ioan  Cuza  in  1859 .
In 1866 Prince Karl  of  Hohenzollern-Sigmaringen was called to  the   सिंहासन  as the Ruling Prince of  the   रोमानियाई  Principate  और  in 1881  he  was  आखिरकार   पहनाया  as King Carol I  the  first monarch of  the  Kingdom of  रोमानिया   .
Independence from the Ottoman  साम्राज्य   थी  declared on 9  may  1877  ,  and was internationally recognized  the   following   साल  .
at  the end of World  युद्ध   i  ,  transylvania  ,  bukovina   और  Bessarabia united with the  किंगडम  of Romania .
World War II  दिया  cause  to   the  rise of a  सैन्य  dictatorship  in   रोमानिया  under fascist General Ion  antonescu  ,  जो  chose to  लड़ो  on the  पक्ष  of the Axis powers from 1941 to 1944 .
बाद  his removal , Romania switched sides in 1944  और  joined the Allies .
by  the end of  the  war , some  formerly   रोमानियाई  northeastern  territories  were occupied by the  सोवियत  Union , with Red  फौज  units  stationed  on Romanian soil  .
In 1947 Romania  forcibly  became a  लोगों  's Republic ( 1947-1965 )  और  a member of the Warsaw Pact .
In 1965 Nicolae Ceauşescu became  सामान्य   सचिव  of the  रोमानियाई   कम्युनिस्ट  Party  ,   और  the  हर्ष  austerity measures , political repression , and  cult  of  व्यक्तित्व   he  implemented  led  to the Socialist Republic of  रोमानिया  ( 1965-1989 )  बनने  the most  stalinist  police state in the  पूर्वी  bloc .
Eventually his authoritarian government  थी   toppled   in  December 1989 during the Romanian Revolution of 1989  .
With  the  fall of the Iron Curtain ,  रोमानिया  began  इसके  transition towards democracy  और  a capitalist market  अर्थव्यवस्था   .
बाद   a   दशक  of post-revolution economic problems and living-standards  मनाही   ,   extensive  reforms  fostered  economic  रिकवरी  .
as   of  2010 , Romania is an upper-middle-income country with a high human development index  .
Romania  joined  NATO on 29  कूच  2004 , and the European  संघ  on  1  January 2007 .
it   is  also a  सदस्य  of the  :  Latin  संघ  , Francophonie  ,  OSCE , WTO , BSEC , United Nations  ,  etc .
आज  , Romania  is  a unitary semi-presidential republic , in which the  कार्यपालिका  branch  consists  of  the  President  और  the  सरकारी  .
``   प्राचीन   ''   redirects   यहाँ  .
For other uses ,  देखिए   प्राचीनता  (  बहुविकल्पी   )  .
The times  पहले  writing  belong   either  to  protohistory  or to prehistory  .
Khafre 's  पिरामिड   (  4th dynasty ) and Great Sphinx  of  Giza ( c. 2500  bc  or perhaps  पहले  )
Ancient  इतिहास  is the study of  the  written past  इससे  the beginning of  अंकित  human history to the Early Middle  आयु  .
the   स्पैन  of recorded  इतिहास  is roughly 5,000  सालो  , with Cuneiform script ,  the  oldest  खोजा  form  of   सुसंगत  writing  ,  from the  protoliterate   काल   around  the 30th century  bc   .
This is the beginning of history  ,  as opposed to prehistory , according to the definition used  by  most historians .
The term  शास्त्रीय   प्राचीनता  is often used to refer to history in  the  Old World from the beginning of  अंकित   यूनानी  history  in  776 BC  (  First  ओलंपियाड  ) .
This roughly  coincides  with the traditional date of  the  founding of  रोम  in 753 BC , the beginning of the history  of   प्राचीन  Rome  ,  and  the  beginning of the Archaic period  in   प्राचीन   यूनानियों   .
Although  the  ending date of ancient history is  विवादित  , some Western scholars use the fall of the Western Roman  साम्राज्य  in 476 AD , the closure  of  the  platonic  Academy  in  529  ad  ,  the   मौत  of the emperor  जुस्तिनियन   i  , the  coming  of Islam or  the  rise  of   शारलेमेन   as   the  end of ancient and Classical European  इतिहास   .
in  India ,  the  period includes the early period of the  मध्य  Kingdoms , and ,  in  China , the  समय  up  to  the  qin  Dynasty is included .
Methylcobalamin  (  shown )  is  a  रूप  of vitamin B12  .
Physically  it   resembles  the  अन्य  forms  of  vitamin B12  ,  occurring as  अंधेरा  red crystals that freely form  cherry-colored   पारदर्शी   समाधान  in water  .
Vitamin B12 ,  विटामिन  B12  or  vitamin  b-12  , also called cobalamin  ,  is a  water-soluble  vitamin with a key role  in  the  सामान्य  functioning  of   the  brain  और   बेचैन  system ,  और  for  the  formation of blood .
It is  एक   of  the  आठ  B  विटामिन  .
It is normally involved  in  the metabolism of every cell of the  इंसान  body  ,  especially affecting  डीएनए  synthesis and  विनियमन  , but  भी  fatty  एसिड  synthesis and energy production  .
Neither  fungi  ,  पौधे  , nor animals are capable of  producing  vitamin B12 .
Only bacteria and  आर्किया  have  the  enzymes required  लिये  its synthesis , although  अनेक  foods are a  प्राकृतिक  source of B12 because of bacterial  symbiosis  .
the   विटामिन  is the  largest  and  सबसे  structurally  जटिल   विटामिन  and  can  be produced industrially only through bacterial  fermentation-synthesis   .
Vitamin B12 consists  of  a class of chemically related  यौगिकों  ( vitamers  )   ,  all of which have  विटामिन  activity  .
It contains the biochemically rare element cobalt .
Biosynthesis of the basic  ढांचा   of  the vitamin is  संपन्नता  only by bacteria ( which  प्रायः  produce hydroxocobalamin ) , but conversion between  अलग  forms of the  विटामिन  can be accomplished  in  the  इंसान  body .
A common  semi-synthetic  form of  the   विटामिन  , cyanocobalamin  ,  does not occur  in  nature , but is produced  इससे  bacterial hydroxocobalamin and then  प्रयुक्त   in  many pharmaceuticals and supplements , and  as  a food  योगात्मक  ,  क्युकी  of  इसके  stability  और  lower production cost .
in  the body it is converted to the human physiological forms  methylcobalamin   और   adenosylcobalamin  ,  leaving  behind the cyanide , albeit  in  minimal concentration  .
More recently , hydroxocobalamin , methylcobalamin  ,   और  adenosylcobalamin can be  मिला  in  अधिक  expensive  pharmacological  products  और  food supplements .
The extra utility of these is  फिलहाल  debated .
विटामिन  B12  थी   खोजा  from its relationship to the disease pernicious anemia , which is  an   असंक्राम्य   बीमारी  in  जिससे  parietal cells of the stomach  जिम्मेदार  for  secreting  intrinsic factor are destroyed .
Intrinsic factor is  निर्णायक  for the normal absorption of  b12   ,  so  a  lack of  मूलभूत   फ़ैक्टर  , as seen in pernicious anemia , causes  a  vitamin  b12  deficiency .
Many other  subtler   kinds  of vitamin B12 deficiency and their biochemical  प्रभाव  have since been  elucidated  .
The  रोमन  Empire  (  ) was  the  post- Republican period of the ancient Roman civilization  ,  characterised by an  निरंकुश   रूप   of  government and large  territorial  holdings around the Mediterranean  in   यूरोपीय  , Africa  ,   और  Asia .
The 500-year-old Roman Republic , which  preceded  it  ,  had been  destabilized  through a series  of  civil  युद्धों  .
Several  कार्यक्रम  marked  the  transition  इससे   गणतंत्र   to  Empire , including Julius Caesar  's  appointment as perpetual dictator (  44  BC )  ;   the  Battle of Actium ( 31 BC )  ;  and  the  granting  of  the honorific Augustus to Octavian by the Roman Senate  (  27  bc  ) .
The  पहला   दो  centuries  of  the Empire were a  काल  of unprecedented stability and  समृद्धि  known as  the  Pax Romana (  ``  Roman  सलाम  '' ) .
It  पहुँचे  its  महानतम   expanse  during the reign  of  Trajan ( 98–117 AD  )  .
In the  3rd   सदी  , the Empire underwent  a  crisis  कि  threatened its  अस्तित्व  ,  लकिन  was reunified and stabilized under  the  emperors  aurelian  and Diocletian  .
ईसाइयों   रोज़   to  power in the 4th century , during which time a system  of   डुअल   नियम  was developed in the Latin West and Greek  ईस्ट  .
After the collapse  of  central government in the West in  the  5th century ,  the  eastern half  जारी  as  कया  would  बाद   be  known  as  the Byzantine Empire  .
Because of the  साम्राज्य  's vast extent and  long  endurance  ,   the  institutions and  संस्कृति   of   रोम  had a profound  और   स्थायी  influence  on  the  विकास  of  भाषा  , religion , architecture ,  दर्शनशास्त्र  , law , and forms  of  government  in  the  territory  it  governed   ,  particularly  यूरोपीय  ,  और   by  means of  यूरोपीय  expansionism throughout the  आधुनिक  world .
Total body surface area (  tbsa  ) is an assessment measure of burns of the  स्किन  .
In  वयस्कों  , the  ``  rule  of  nines '' is used  to  determine  the  total percentage of area burned for  प्रत्येक  major section of the body .
in   कुछ  cases ,  the  burns may cover more than one body part  ,  or may not fully cover  ऐसे   a  part ; in these cases  ,   burns  are  measured   by  using the casualty 's palm as a reference  पाइंट   लिये  1  %  of  the  body  .
For  children   और   infants  , the Lund-Browder chart  is   प्रयुक्त  to assess the burned body surface area .
अलग  percentages are used because the ratio of  the  combined surface area of the head and neck to the surface  क्षेत्रफल   of  the limbs is typically larger in  children   than  that of  an  adult  .
Typical  मान  for  आम   समूह   of  humans follow  .

Jonah Kirsten  sorrentino  (  born   जून  26 , 1975 ) ,  बेहतर  known by his  स्टेज  name KJ-52  ,  is a Christian  rapper  from  tampa  ,  फ्लोरिडा   .
The `` KJ '' part of  उसके  name refers  to  his  बूढ़ा   रैप   alias  , `` King  J.  Mac , '' a name which  he  later  वर्णित  in  एक  of his  podcasts  as  ``  horribly cheesy .  ''
``  52  ''  , which is pronounced ``  पाँच  two '' , not  ``  fifty-two '' , is  a   सन्दर्भ  to the Biblical story of Jesus feeding the  multitude  with  पाँच  loaves and two fish ,  जिससे  is also sung about in his song ``  धक्का   up  '' from The Yearbook and in  the  `` KJ  पाँच  Two '' on It 's Pronounced 'Five Two .
He  थी   awarded  the  rap/hip  Hop Recorded Song  of   the  Year  लिये  `` Never Look Away  ''  and Rap/Hip  हॉप  Album of the Year at the GMA  dove  Awards of  2007  .
On July 28 ,  2009   ,   kj-52  released `` End of  my  Rope '' , which  is   the   पहला  single for  उसके   एल्बम  Five-Two Television .
उसके   सोंग  `` Dear Slim  ''  is  आधारित   on   एमिनेम   's   सोंग   ``   स्टेन  ``  और  is a sort of personal  संदेश  from KJ-52 to Eminem .
The  उपाधि  symbol (  °  ) is a typographical  प्रतीक   कि   is   प्रयुक्त  ,  among   अन्य   बाते   ,   to   represent   डिग्री  of  चाप  ( e.g . in  भौगोलिक  coordinate  प्रणालियों   )  , hours ( in  the   चिकित्सा  field )  ,  or  डिग्री  of temperature .
The symbol  consists  of a small raised circle , historically  a  zero  glyph  .
In  युनिकोड  it  is  encoded  at  .
This is  a  list of roots , suffixes , and  prefixes  used  in  medical terminology , their meanings  ,  and their etymology  .
There are a few rules when  using  medical  जड़ें  .
firstly  , prefixes and suffixes  ,  primarily in Greek , but also  in  Latin , have a droppable -o- .
As a general rule  ,  this -o- almost always  अधिनियमों   as   a   joint-stem  to  कनेक्ट   दो  consonantal roots , e.g . arthr- + -o- + logy = arthrology .
But  generally   ,  the -o-  is   dropped  when connecting to a vowel-stem  ;   e.g  . arthr- + itis = arthritis , instead of  arthr-o-itis   .
Secondly , medical  जड़ें  generally  go  together  according  to language : Greek  prefixes  go with Greek suffixes  और  Latin prefixes  साथ  Latin  प्रत्यय   .
हालांकि  international scientific  शब्दावली  is not stringent about  segregating   combining   फ़ॉर्म   of  different  भाषाएं  ,  it  is  advisable  when coining new  शब्द  not to mix different  lingual   जड़ें   .
Stomach cancer , or  gastric  cancer , refers to  कर्कट  arising from any part of  the  stomach  .
Stomach  कर्कट  causes about 800,000 deaths  विश्वव्यापी  per year .
prognosis  is  ग़रीब   (  5-year  अस्तित्व   <  5 to  15  %  )  because most  मरीजों  present  साथ  advanced  बीमारी   .
Sara Lynn Evans ( born  फ़रवरी   5   ,   1971  )  is  an American country singer  और   songwriter  .
For her  संपूर्ण   करियर  , she  रै  been signed to  आरसीए  Records Nashville .
Evans  '  debut  ,  Three  मदारी   और   the  Truth  ,  did not produce a Top 40 hit  on  the  hot   देश  Songs charts .
वो   followed   इस  up with  no  Place  कि  Far  (  1998 ) ,  born   to   मक्खी  ( 2000 ) ,  बेचैन   (   2003  ) and Real Fine Place ( 2005  )   .
no  Place That  दूर   प्राप्त  a  सुनहरा  certification  इससे  the  रिकॉर्डिंग  Industry Association of America ( RIAA  )  , while the  अन्य  three albums  सब   यहूद  certified  प्लेटिनम  .
ये  discs  शामिल  the number  1   singles   ``  No  प्लेस  That Far  ``   ,  ``  born  to Fly  ``  , ``  suds  in  the  Bucket `` and `` A  रियल  Fine Place  to  Start `` , plus the top 10  हिट्स  ``  i  Could  नहीं  Ask for More `` ( a  कवर  of the Edwin McCain  सोंग   )  , `` I Keep Looking ``  ,  `` Perfect `` and `` Cheatin  '  `` .
Her 2007  महानतम  Hits included the  शीर्ष  15 hits  ``  You 'll  सदा   be  My Baby `` and  ``  As If `` .

Evans has also  जीती  one award  प्रत्येक  from Billboard  ,  the Academy of Country  म्यूज़िक  ,  देश  Music  संघ  , Broadcast  म्यूज़िक  Incorporated (  बीएमआई   )   और  a Dove Award  .
The world 's principal religions and spiritual  परंपराओं  may be classified  into  a small number of major groups , although this is  by  no  अर्थात्  a  वर्दी   अभ्यास  .
This  सिद्धान्त   began   in   the   18th  century with the  लक्ष्य   of  recognizing the relative  स्तर  of civility in  समाजों   .
Berliners watching a C-54 land at Tempelhof Airport ( 1948 )
The Berlin blockade ( 24  जून  1948  –  12 May 1949 ) was  एक  of the first  प्रमुख  international crises of the Cold War .
During the multinational occupation  of  post–World War II Germany  ,   the  Soviet Union  अवरोधित  the Western Allies ' railway  ,   सड़क  , and canal access  to  the sectors of Berlin under  अलाइड  control .
उनके  aim was  to  force  the  western  शक्तियां   to  allow the Soviet zone to start  supplying  Berlin  साथ  food  और   ईंधन  , thereby giving  the  Soviets  व्यावहारिक  control over  the  entire  नगर  .
In response  ,  the Western  allies  organized the  बर्लिन  airlift  to  carry  आपूर्तियाँ  to the people in West Berlin  .
Aircrews  इससे   the  United States Air Force , the British Royal  एयर  Force , the Royal  ऑस्ट्रेलियाई  Air Force ,  the  Royal Canadian Air Force  ,  the  royal  New  जीलैंड  Air Force  ,  and the  दक्षिण  African  एयर   फ़ोर्स  flew  over  200,000  फ़्लाइट  in one  साल  , providing  up   to  4700 tons of daily necessities such as  ईंधन  and food to the  berliners  .
By  the  spring of 1949 , the effort  थी  clearly succeeding and , by April  ,  the airlift  थी  delivering more cargo than had  previously   महरूम   transported  into the  नगर   by   रेल  .
The success of the  बर्लिन  Airlift  brought  embarrassment  to   the  Soviets who  था  refused  to  believe it  could  make a  अंतर   .
The  नाकेबंदी  was lifted  in  May 1949 and  resulted  in the creation  of  two separate German  राज्य  .
The  संघीय   गणतंत्र  of Germany ( West Germany )  और  the  जर्मनी   लोकतांत्रिक   गणतंत्र  ( East  जर्मनी  ) split up  बर्लिन  .
In remembrance of the  एयरलिफ्ट  , three airports in the former  पश्चिमी   zones   of   the  city  परोसा  as  the   प्राथमिक  gateways to Germany  लिये  another fifty  सालो  .
The  यूरोपियन  sign ; logotype and handwritten .
The euro sign is the currency sign used for the  यूरोपियन  , the  आधिकारिक   करेंसी  of  the  Eurozone in the  यूरोपीय  Union (  eu   )  .
The design was presented to  the  public  by  the European Commission on 12 December 1996 .
the  international three-letter code  (  according to ISO standard ISO 4217  )  for  the  euro is EUR .
In Unicode it is  एनकोडेड  at  .
In English , the sign precedes the value .
In some  styleguides  , but not  अन्य   ,   the  euro sign is unspaced  .
Mate  (  , ;  sometimes  also spelled  maté  ) , also  ज्ञात   as  chimarrão ( ) or  cimarrón  ( ) , is a traditional South American infused drink , particularly in  अर्जेंटीना   ,  Uruguay  ,   पैराग्वे   और   the  southern  राज्य  of  ब्राज़ील  and to a lesser degree in south of  चिली   ,  the  bolivian  Chaco  ,  Syria and Lebanon .
It  is  prepared from steeping dried leaves of  yerba  mate (  llex  paraguariensis  ,  known in Portuguese as  erva-mate  ) in hot  जल  .
Mate is  परोसा  with  a  metal  स्ट्रॉ  from  a   साझा   खोखला   calabash  gourd  .
The straw  is  called a  bombilla  in  कुछ   लैटिन  American countries , a bomba in Portuguese , and a  bombija  or , more generally  ,  a masassa (  प्रकार   of  straw ) in Arabic .
The  स्ट्रॉ   is   traditionally   बना  of  चांदी  .
Modern  ,  commercially available straws  हैं   typically  made of nickel silver  ,  called Alpaca ;  बेदाग   स्टील  , or hollow-stemmed cane  .
The gourd is known as a  mate  or a  guampa   ;  while in Brazil , it  रै  the specific  नाम  of cuia  ,  or  भी   cabaça  ( the name  लिये  Indigenous-influenced calabash gourds in other regions  of   ब्राज़ील  ,  स्टिल   प्रयुक्त  for general food  और  drink  in   रिमोट  regions )  .
Even if  the  water is supplied from a modern thermos  ,  the  infusion   is  traditionally drunk from  mates  or cuias  .
As with other brewed  herbs   ,  yerba mate leaves are dried  ,   कटा  ,  और  ground  into   a  powdery mixture called yerba .
The  bombilla  acts as  दोनो  a straw  और   a  sieve  .
The submerged  समाप्त  is  flared  ,  साथ  small holes  or   स्लॉट   कि  allow the brewed liquid  in  , but block the chunky matter that  makes   up  much  of  the mixture  .
A modern bombilla design uses  a   सीधा  tube with holes  ,   or  spring sleeve to  अधिनियम  as  a  sieve .
``   tea-bag  '' type  infusions  of mate  (   mate  cocido  )  have been on  the   मार्केट  in Argentina , Paraguay and  उरुग्वे   लिये  many years under such  व्यापार  names as  ``  Taragüí Vitality '' in Argentina , ``  pajarito  '' and `` Kurupí '' in Paraguay ,  और  in Brazil under the name `` Mate Leão ''  .
इस  is considered a completely different  पेय  .
It is  never  drunk from  cuias  or  पुकारा   chimarrão  , nor  is  it associated with  the  gaucho/gaúcho culture  .
The automotive industry is a  पद  that  कवर   a   चौड़ी  range of companies  और   संगठनों  involved  in   the   डिज़ाइन   ,   विकास   ,  manufacture , marketing , and  selling  of  मोटर  vehicles  ,  towed vehicles ,  मोटरसाइकिल  and  mopeds   .
It  is  one of the  संसार   's  most important economic sectors by revenue .
The term automotive industry usually does not  शामिल   उद्योग   समर्पित  to the  मेंटेनेंस  of automobiles following delivery to  the   end-user  , such  as  repair shops  और  motor fuel filling stations .
the   पद   ऑटोमोटिव  was created from Greek  autos  ( self )  ,  and  लैटिन  motivus ( of  गति  ) to represent any form of self-powered vehicle .
इस  term was  प्रस्तावित  by SAE member Elmer Sperry  .
David Michael  ``  Dave '' Bautista  ,   jr.  (  born   जनवरी   18  , 1969 )  ,  is an American mixed  martial  artist , bodybuilder  ,  actor ,  और   पूर्व  professional wrestler  बेहतरीन  known for his time  in  World Wrestling Entertainment  स्पर्धा  under the ring  नाम  Batista .
In WWE  ,  he became a six-time world champion , winning the  संसार   हेवीवेट  Championship four times , and the WWE Championship two times .
He  is  the longest-reigning World Heavyweight  चैंपियन  in WWE history .
In  जोड  to  ये   championships  ,  बतिस्ता  has won the World Tag Team Championship three times  (   twice  with Ric Flair  और  once with John  सीना  ) and the  डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई  Tag Team  चैंपियनशिप  once (  साथ  Rey  मिस्टीरियो  )  .
Batista was also  the  winner of the 2005 Royal Rumble match and went  on   to  headline WrestleMania 21  ,   एक   of  the top five highest-grossing pay-per-view  कार्यक्रम  in pro  कुश्ती  history  .
After trying out  at  World Championship Wrestling  's  Power  संयंत्र   ,  Batista signed a contract with the WWF in  2000  and was sent  to  its  developmental   territory   ,   ओहियो  Valley Wrestling  (   ovw   )  , where  he  won the OVW Heavyweight Championship .
In August  2012  ,  bautista  signed a contract  साथ  Classic  entertainment   &  Sports to fight  in   मिश्रित  martial  कला  .
He won his  mma   डेब्यू   on  October 6 , 2012 , defeating Vince Lucero via TKO  in  the  पहला  round  .
Henry  T.   थामस  Sampson , Jr. ( born  in  Jackson ,  मिसिसिपी  in  1934  )  is  an African-American inventor .
He  ग्रैजुएट  from high school in  1951  from Lanier  ऊँची  School in Jackson  ,   मिसिसिपी  .
He  तब   attended  Morehouse College  लिये  a  युगल  of  सालो   पहले   transferring  to Purdue  विश्वविद्यालयों   जहाँ   he  became a member of  the  Omega  psi  Phi fraternity  .
He  प्राप्त  a  स्नातक   's  degree in  विज्ञान  from Purdue  विश्वविद्यालयों  in 1956 .
He  ग्रैजुएट  with  an  MS degree  in   अभियान्त्रिकी  from the University  of  California ,  लॉस  Angeles in  1961  .
sampson   भी  received his MS in  नाभिकीय  Engineering from  the   विश्वविद्यालयों  of Illinois Urbana-Champaign in  1965   ,  and  उसके   phd  in 1967 .
He  is  the first  अफ़्रीकी  American  to   earn  a  ph.d.in   नाभिकीय   अभियान्त्रिकी  in the United  राज्य  .
Some of his accomplishments include being  a  member of the United States  नेवी  between  the  years 1962 and 1964 and  कमाई   an  Atomic Energy  आयोग   सम्मान  between 1964 and 1967 .
Later he was awarded  the   ब्लैक  Image Award from Aerospace Corporation in  1982  .
He was  awarded  the Blacks in Engineering , Applied Science Award , and prize for education , by  the  Los Angeles Council of Black  पेशेवर  Engineers  in   1983   .
In  जून  2007 , Sampson was married  to  Laura Howzell  यंग  in St. Thomas , U.S. Virgin Islands .
young-sampson  is a  प्राध्यापक  in the  कॉलेज  of Education  at   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  State University San  bernardino  .
रॉबर्ट  Lane  गिब्स   (  born March  29  , 1971 ) is  a  senior  अभियान  adviser for  us   अध्यक्ष   बराक  Obama .
Previously , he  थी   the  28th White  हाउस   दबायें  Secretary  .
Gibbs was  the  communications director for then- U.S  .  Senator Obama and his 2008 presidential campaign .
Gibbs , who has worked  साथ   ओबामा  since 2004 , was press secretary  of  John Kerry 's  2004   अध्यक्षीय   अभियान  and has  previously  specialized in  सीनेट  campaigns  ,  having served as communications director for the  लोकतांत्रिक  Senatorial  अभियान  Committee and for four  व्यक्तिगत  Senate  अभियान   ,   सहित   those   of  Obama in  2004  and Fritz  hollings  in 1998 .
गिब्स   थी  also the press secretary of  प्रतिनिधि   bob  Etheridge .
on  November  22  , 2008  ,   गिब्स  was announced as  the  press secretary of the Obama administration  .
He assumed the role  of  press secretary  on   जनवरी  20 ,  2009  , and gave his  पहला  official briefing  on  January 22 .
On  जनवरी  5 , 2011 ,  गिब्स  announced  कि  he would leave the White  हाउस  to become  an  outside  adviser  to the  प्रशासन   .
He left on February 11 , 2011  .
On February 12 , 2013  ,  it  थी  announced  कि   गिब्स  had been  नियुक्त  as a contributor for  cable-news   चैनल  MSNBC  .
उसके   पहला  appearance  थी  on  the   वही   रात्रि  prior to the 2013  राज्य  Of  the  Union  पता   .
अरमांडो  Pérez (  born  January 15  ,  1981 ) , better  ज्ञात  by  उसके  stage name Pitbull ,  is  an American  rapper  , songwriter  ,   और   रिकार्ड  producer .
His first  अंकित   प्रदर्शन  was from the Lil  jon  album Kings of Crunk in  2002  .
in   2004  , he released his debut  एल्बम   titled   m.i.a.m.i  . ( short for Money Is  a  Major  समस्या  ) under TVT  रिकॉर्ड  .
Since then , he  रै   released  three  अन्य  albums under  the  label : El Mariel  in   2006  , The Boatlift in 2007 , and  ग्रह  Pit  in  2011 .
He  released   rebelution   in  2009 , which  शामिल  singles `` I Know  तुम  Want Me ( Calle Ocho ) ``  और  `` Krazy `` .
The latter peaked at No . 30 on the Hot 100 and  no   .   11  on  the  Hot Rap Tracks charts while `` I Know You Want  me   ''  peaked  at   no  . 2  on  the Hot  100  and peaked  भीतर  the top  टेन   धब्बे   of   चार्ट  in the UK  ,   कनाडा   ,   इटली  , and the Netherlands  .
The song reached No . 1 in  फ़्रांस  and  the  European Hot 100 on the week  समाप्ति  August  29  ,  2009   according   to  Billboard magazine  .
He later signed  साथ  Polo Grounds Music through  सोनी  Music and  निर्मित  his own label  mr.   305   inc   .
Another  सिंगल   इससे   rebelution   थी   ``   होटल  Room  सेवा  `` , which peaked at No . 8  on   the  Hot  100  .
Rebelution went on  to   बेचें  over  7.5  million worldwide digital singles and  एल्बम   संयुक्त  .
nevertheless   ,  he  dropped  a smash  पुकारा  ``  दे  Me  सबकुछ  ''  जिससे  reached # 1 worldwide , and featured artists  ne-yo  , Nayer ,  और  Afrojack .
he  has  भी  performed as a  प्रदर्शित  artist in the remixes of many  अन्य  hit  गीतों  , like  tik   टोक  , Scream &  चिल्लाओ  ,  lo  Hecho  esta  Hecho , Bad , Papi ,  ईंट  , How Low , Tonight ( I  'm   lovin   '  You ) ,  वीडियो   फोन   ,   over  To You  अभी  and  bumpy   सवारी  .
Pérez is  भी  the host of his  अपना  Spanish-language  कार्यक्रम  on the cable channel Mun2  titled  La Esquina  (  Spanish for The Corner ) .
In 2005 Pérez and rapper Sean 'Diddy  '  Combs co-founded Bad Boy Latino  ,  a subsidiary of Combs ' Bad Boy Records label  .
it  primarily  focuses   on  Latin hip hop , Latin soul  ,   लैटिन  pop  और  other Tropical  म्यूज़िक  ,  और  has offices in New  यॉर्क  and  मियामी   ,  Florida .
साथ  with co-founding it , Pérez currently  heads  the  a  & R division  of  the label .
Pérez has become a product endorser  ,  representing alongside Drake , Rihanna ,  और  Trey  songz  the “So  kodak”  campaign  लिये  the  कोडक   ब्रांड  and embarking  on  a  साझेदारी  with  the  soft  पेय  giant Dr Pepper as part of the campaign “ Vida 23  ”  for which he  अंकित  the song specifically featured on  उसके  album Armando .
pitbull  also announced he has  become   the   प्रवक्ता  for Voli Vodka , in which  he  holds  a  majority  इक्विटी  stake  ,   और   budweiser   रै  chosen Pitbull  to  promote  इसके  Bud  लाइट  line of beer .
the  commercials currently  हाइलाइट  Pitbull dancing and gyrating on  स्टेज  holding  up  a bottle of Bud Light .
Pitbull  रै  also purchased an equity stake in  मियामी  Subs Pizza  और   ग्रिल  .
Halloween  or   hallowe'en  ( a contraction  of  ``  सब  Hallows ' Evening  ``  ) , also known  as  All Hallows  '  Eve  ,   is  a yearly  जश्न  observed in a number of countries on October 31 ,  the  eve of  the  Western Christian feast of All Hallows  (  or  सब  Saints  )  and the  दिन  initiating the triduum  of  Hallowmas .
According to many scholars , All  hallows  ' Eve is a Christianised feast originally  बहकावे  by western European harvest festivals ,  और   त्यौहार   of  the  मुर्दे  with possible pagan  जड़ें   ,   विशेषकर   the  Celtic Samhain .
Other scholars maintain that it originated independently  of   samhain  and has solely Christian roots .
Typical festive Halloween activities  शामिल   trick-or-treating   (  also known as  ``  guising `` )  ,  attending  वेशभूषा   पार्टियों  , carving pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns  ,  lighting bonfires ,  ठहराना   bobbing  , visiting  haunted   आकर्षण  , playing pranks  ,   telling  scary  कहानियां  , and  watching  horror films .
स्वतंत्रता  of speech is the  राजनैतिक  right to  communicate  one 's  राय   और  ideas using one  's  body and property to anyone  जो   is  willing to  प्राप्त  them  .
The term freedom of expression is sometimes used synonymously , but includes any act  of  seeking ,  receiving   और  imparting information  or  ideas  ,  regardless of the  मीडियम  used .
in  practice , the right to  स्वतंत्रता  of speech  is  not absolute in any  देश  and  the  right is  commonly   विषय  to limitations ,  as   साथ   मानहानि  , slander , obscenity , sedition  (  including ,  लिये  example inciting ethnic hatred ) , copyright violation  ,  revelation  of  information that is classified or otherwise .
The right to freedom of expression  is  recognized as a human right  अंतर्गत  Article  19  of the Universal Declaration  of  Human Rights and recognized in international human rights  विधि   in  the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Covenant on Civil and Political Rights ( ICCPR )  .
Article 19 of the  iccpr  states that  ``  [  e  ] veryone shall have the right to hold  राय   बगैर  interference '' and ``  everyone   shall   have  the right to  स्वतंत्रता   of  expression ; this  सही  shall include freedom  to  seek , receive and impart  सूचना  and ideas  of  all kinds  ,  regardless of frontiers , either orally , in writing or in print ,  in   the  form of  आर्ट  ,  or  through  कोई  other media of his choice  ''  .
Article  19   goes  on to say that  the  exercise  of   ये   अधिकारों  carries  ``   खास   कर्तव्य   और   जिम्मेदारियों  `` and may ``  इसलिए  be subject  to  certain restrictions '' when  जरुरी  `` [ f ] or  आदर  of the rights or reputation  of  others ''  or  `` [ f ] or the  सुरक्षा  of national security or  of   पब्लिक  order ( order public  )  ,  or  of public  स्वास्थ्य   or  morals ''  .
Freedom of  वाक  may be legally curtailed in some  धार्मिक  legal systems  और  in secular jurisdictions where  it  is found to  कारण   धार्मिक  offense  ,  such  as   the   अंग्रेजों   जातिगत  and Religious Hatred  अधिनियम  2006 .
सिडनी  Harbour from  the   एयर  , showing the Opera House , the CBD , Circular  quay  , the Bridge ,  the   parramatta  River ,  उत्तर  Sydney  और   kirribilli  in the  अग्रभूमि
the  Sydney Harbour Bridge  is  a steel through arch bridge  आरपार  Sydney Harbour that carries rail ,  vehicular   ,   सायकिल   और   पैदल  traffic  between  the  सिडनी  central  कारोबार  district  (  CBD ) and the North Shore  .
the  dramatic view of the bridge  ,  the  harbour   ,  and  the   आसपास  Sydney Opera  हाउस   is  an iconic image  of   सिडनी  , New  दक्षिण  Wales  ,   और  Australia .
The bridge is  nicknamed  `` The Coathanger  ''  because of its  arch-based  design .
अंतर्गत   the   दिशानिर्देश   of  Dr J.J.C . Bradfield of  the  NSW  विभाग  of Public Works  ,  the bridge  थी  designed and built by British firm Dorman Long and Co  ltd  of  middlesbrough  and opened in  1932   .
The bridge 's design  थी  influenced by  the   नरक  Gate Bridge  in   नई  York .
It was the  संसार  's widest long-span bridge , at  48.8  meters (  160  feet ) wide ,  जबतक  construction  of  the  नई   बंदरगाहों  Mann Bridge  in  Vancouver  .
It  is  also the fifth longest spanning-arch  सेतु  in the  संसार  , and  it  is the  tallest  steel  मेहराब  bridge , measuring  इससे  top to water  स्तर  .
Until  1967  the  harbour  Bridge was Sydney 's tallest structure  .
The  हवाई  hotspot is a volcanic hotspot located near the namesake Hawaiian Islands ,  in  the northern Pacific Ocean  .
One of the most  well-known  and  heavily  studied  हॉटस्पॉट  in the  संसार   ,  the Hawaii plume is responsible for the creation  of  the Hawaiian –  सम्राट   seamount   कड़ी   ,  an over 5,800 kilometres  (  3,600 mi  )  long chain  of  volcanoes  ,  four  of  which are active , two of  जिससे  are dormant ,  और  more than 123 of  जिससे  are extinct , many having since been ground beneath the waves by erosion as seamounts and  atolls  .
The chain extends  इससे   दक्षिण  of  the  island  of  Hawaii to the edge  of  the Aleutian Trench , near  the  eastern edge of  रूस   .
While most volcanoes  हैं  created by geological activity  at  tectonic  थाली   सीमाएँ   ,  the Hawaii hotspot  is  located far from nearby  थाली   सीमाएँ  ;  the   क्लासिक  hotspot theory , first  प्रस्तावित  in  1963  by  जॉन  Tuzo  विल्सन  , proposes that a  सिंगल   ,  fixed  mantle   plume  builds volcanoes that then  ,  cut off  इससे  their source  by   the  movement of the  प्रशांत  Plate  ,  become increasingly inactive  और   आखिरकार  erode below sea level over millions of years  .
According  to  this theory  ,  the nearly 60°  बेंड   separating   the  Emperor and  हवाई   खण्ड  of the chain was caused  by  a sudden shift in the movement of the Pacific  थाली  .
In 2003 , fresh investigations  of   इस  irregularity led  to  the proposal of a mobile  हॉटस्पॉट  theory  ,   suggesting  that hotspots are  मोबाईल   ,  not fixed ,  और  that the 47  लाख   साल  old bend was caused  by   a   शिफ़्ट  in  the   हॉटस्पॉट  's motion  बल्कि  than the plate 's .
Ancient Hawaiians  यहूद  the first to recognize  the  increasing  आयु   और   weathered  state of the volcanoes to the north  as   वे  progressed on fishing expeditions along the islands .
the  volatile state of the Hawaiian volcanoes and  उनके  constant battle with  the  sea was  a  major  तत्व   in  Hawaiian mythology , embodied in Pele , the deity of volcanoes .
After the  आगमन  of Europeans on the  द्वीप   ,  in 1880-1881 James Dwight  दाना  directed the first formal  geological  study of  the  hotspot 's  volcanics   ,   confirming  the relationship long observed  by   the   natives   .
1912  marked the  founding  of the  हवाई   ज्वालामुखी   वेधशाला  by volcanologist  थामस  Jaggar , initiating continuous  वैज्ञानिक  observation of the islands .
In  the  1970s ,  a  mapping  प्रोजेक्ट   थी   initiated   to   लाभ  more information about the complex geology of  हवाई  's  seafloor   .
the   हॉटस्पॉट  has  चूंकि  been  tomographically  imaged , showing  it  to be wide and up to deep  ,  and olivine and  गार्नेट  -based studies have shown its magma chamber is approximately  .
In its at least 85  लाख  years  of  activity the  हॉटस्पॉट   रै  produced an estimated of rock  .
the   कड़ी  's rate of  बहाव   रै  slowly  increased  over time  ,  causing the amount of time  प्रत्येक  individual volcano is  क्रियाशील  to  घटी   ,  from 18 million  सालो  for the  76   लाख  year old  डेट्रॉयट  Seamount ,  to  just  अंतर्गत   900,000  for the  एक  million year-old Kohala  ;  on  the   अन्य  hand , eruptive volume has increased from per year to about .
Overall ,  इस   रै  caused a  ट्रेंड  towards more  क्रियाशील  but  quickly-silenced  , closely spaced  volcanoes—whereas   ज्वालामुखी  on  the   निकट   पक्ष  of the hotspot  ओवरलैप   प्रत्येक   अन्य  (  forming   ऐसे  superstructures as  हवाई  island and the ancient  मावी  Nui ) ,  the  oldest of  the  Emperor seamounts  हैं   spaced   as  far  as   अलावा   .

Eddie and the Cruisers  is  a  1983   अमरीकी  film  निर्देशित  by Martin Davidson  साथ  the  पटकथा  written by  the  director  और  Arlene  डेविडसन   ,   आधारित   on   the   अनोखा   by  P.  F.  Kluge .
It was marketed  साथ  the tagline ``  विद्रोही  .

Osteonecrosis  of  the jaw  (  ONJ ) is a  कठोर   अस्थि  disease  कि  affects  the   maxilla  and  the  mandible .
विभिन्न  forms of ONJ have been described over  the  last 160 years , and  a   क्रमांक  of causes  have  been suggested in  the  literature .
osteonecrosis  of  the   जबड़े  associated  साथ  bisphosphonate  चिकित्सा   ,   जरूरी   by   कुछ  cancer treatment regimens , has been identified and  पारिभाषित  as a pathological entity  चूंकि  2003 .
The possible risk from lower oral doses of bisphosphonates  ,  taken by patients  to  prevent  or  treat  ऑस्टियोपोरोसिस  , remains uncertain .
Various treatment options  have  been explored , however severe cases of ONJ  स्टिल  require surgical removal  of   the  affected bone .
A thorough history  और  assessement of pre-existing systemic problems and possible  साइट  of  दंत  infection are required to help prevent  the   कंडीशन  , especially if bisphosphonate therapy  is  considered .
the   बोस्टन  Red Sox are a professional baseball team based in  बोस्टन  ,  मैसाचुसेट्स  ,  और  a member of Major League Baseball  's  American  लीग   पूर्वी  Division .
Founded in  as  one of  the   अमरीकी  League  's  eight charter franchises  ,  the Red  sox  's home ballpark has  महरूम  Fenway Park since .
The `` Red Sox  ''  name  थी  chosen by the  टोली   मालिक  ,  जॉन  I. Taylor , around , following previous Boston teams that  था  been known as the `` Red Stockings ``  .
वे  have played in 11 World Series  ,   जीतना  7 .
Boston was a  प्रबल  team  in  the new  लीग   ,  defeating the  पिट्सबर्ग  Pirates in  the  first  संसार  Series  in  and  जीतना   चार   अधिक   championships   by  .
however  , they then went into one of the  longest  championship droughts in baseball history , called by some the `` Curse of the Bambino `` after its alleged  शुरूआत  with  the   रेड  Sox  's   बिक्री  of Babe  रुथ  to the rival Yankees  दो  years after their world championship in 1918 , an 86-year wait before the team 's  छठे  World Championship in .
however   ,  the team 's history during that  काल   थी  hardly one of futility , but  थी   बल्कि  punctuated  साथ  some  of  the most memorable  पल   in   संसार  Series history ,  सहित  Enos  वध  's ``  mad   डैश  `` in ,  the  `` Impossible  सपना  ``  of  , Carlton  फिस्क  's  घर  run in ,  और  Bill  buckner  's error  in  .
Red  sox  history  रै   भी  been marked  by  the team  's  intense rivalry  साथ  the New  यॉर्क  Yankees ,  arguably  the fiercest and  सबसे  historic  in  North American professional  खेल  .
The Boston Red Sox are owned by Fenway Sports Group , who also  अपना  Liverpool Football Club of the  प्रीमियर  League in England  .
The  रेड   sox  are  consistently  one of the  शीर्ष  MLB teams in average  सड़क  attendance  ,   जबकि  the small capacity of  fenway   पार्क   रोकता  them from leading  in   overall   उपस्थिति   .
इससे   may  15 ,  2003  to April 10 , 2013 , the  रेड  Sox sold out  प्रत्येक   घर  game-a total of 820  खेल  ( 794  नियमित   ऋतु  ) for  a   प्रमुख   पेशेवर  sports record  कि   lasted  almost a decade .
Mince pie filled with mincemeat
Mincemeat  is   a   मिश्रण  of chopped dried fruit ,  आसुत  spirits and spices , and  sometimes  beef suet , beef , or  venison  .
Originally ,  mincemeat  always contained meat .
अनेक   आधुनिक  recipes contain beef suet ,  हालांकि  vegetable shortening is  sometimes  used in its place  .
विसंगतियाँ   of   mincemeat  are found in Australia  ,   ब्रिटनी   ,  Canada , northern Europe ,  आयरलैंड  , South  अफ़्रीकी  , the  संयुक्त  Kingdom  और   the  United States .
In  कुछ  countries the  पद  mincemeat refers  to   minced  or  मैदान   मांस  .
Diana , Princess of  वेल्स   (   डायना  Frances ; née Spencer ; 1  जुलाई  1961  –  31 August 1997  )   थी   the   पहला  wife  of   चार्ल्स  , Prince of Wales  ,   the   ज्येष्ठ  son and  वारिस  apparent of Queen  एलिज़ाबेथ  II .
She  थी   खूब  known for her fund-raising work for  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   धर्मार्थ   और  as an  प्रतिष्ठित   हस्ती   of  the late 20th century .
Her wedding  to  the Prince of Wales  on   29  July 1981 was held  at  St Paul 's Cathedral and  देखी   by  a global  टेलीविज़न   दर्शक   of  over 750  लाख  .
While married she bore the titles Princess of Wales ,  duchess  of Cornwall , Duchess  of  Rothesay , Countess of Chester  और   बैरोनेस  of Renfrew .
the  marriage  उत्पादित   दो   बेटे   ,  the princes William and Harry  ,  who  became  second and third in line to the British  सिंहासन  .
Diana was  born  into an aristocratic  अंग्रेज़ी  family with  royal  ancestry  .
वो  was  the  fourth child of John Spencer , 8th  अर्ल  Spencer  और  his wife Frances ,  बेटी  of Maurice  रोश   ,  4th  सामन्त   fermoy  .
She became  a  public figure with  the  announcement  of  her engagement .
She also received  मान्यता  for  उसके   दान  work  और   लिये   उसके  support of the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Campaign to  बैन   landmines  .
इससे  1989  ,  she  थी   the  president of  the  Great Ormond Street Hospital for children ,  in   जोड  to  दर्जनों   of  other charities .
Diana  remained  the object of worldwide media scrutiny  दौरान  and after  उसके  marriage , which  ended  in  तलाक  on  28   अगस्त  1996  .
मीडिया  attention and public mourning were  considerable  following  उसके  death in  a   car  crash  in  Paris on 31 August 1997  .
अर्जेंटीना  , officially the Argentine  गणतंत्र   (  ) , is the  दूसरी  largest country in both South  अमेरिका   और  the  लैटिन  America region .
the  country is a federation of 23 provinces and the autonomous city of Buenos Aires ,  इसके  capital  और  largest city .
It is the eighth -largest country in the world by land area and the  largest  among Spanish-speaking nations by geographical area of 2,780,400 km2 and is  the  fourth  by  population  ,  with over 41  लाख  people .
Argentina is a founding member of  the  United Nations ,  mercosur  ,  the   संघ  of South American  राष्ट्र   ,  the  संगठन  of  ibero-american   राज्य  ,  the  World  बैंको  Group and  the   संसार  Trade  संगठन  , and is one of  the  G-15  और  G-20  प्रमुख  economies .
अर्जेंटीना  is located in South  अमेरिका   ,   bordered   by   चिली   to  the  वेस्ट  and south , Bolivia and Paraguay to the north and Brazil  और  Uruguay to the  पूर्वोत्तर   .
अर्जेंटीना  claims  प्रभुता  over part of  अंटार्कटिक  , the Falkland Islands ( )  और  South  जॉर्जिया  and the South Sandwich Islands .
अर्जेंटीना  is the successor  राज्य   of   the   viceroyalty   of  the  río  de la Plata  ,   an  overseas colony  of  the Spanish Empire  .
Argentina declared independence  दौरान  the Argentine  युद्ध  of  स्वतंत्रता  ,  जिससे  was followed by the Argentine Civil  युद्धों   दौरान  most of the 19th  सदी   .
The country faced several  सैन्य  coups and  राजनैतिक  instability during the 20th  सदी  ,  साथ  with periodic economic crisis that continue  to  this day .
A recognized  दक्षिणी   कोन   शक्ति  , and middle power ,  अर्जेंटीना   is  Latin America  's   third-largest   अर्थव्यवस्था  , with  a  ``  बहुत  high '' rating  on  the Human development index .
भीतर  Latin America ,  अर्जेंटीना  has the  पांचवां  highest  नाममात्र  GDP per capita  और  the  उच्चतम  in purchasing power  शर्तें  .
The Legatum Institute have argued that the country has  a  ``  न्यास  for future growth  due   to  its market  आकार  , levels of  विदेशी  direct investment ,  और  percentage of high-tech exports as share  of  total manufactured  goods   ''  , and  it  is classed by investors as middle emerging  अर्थव्यवस्था  .
Argentina is the  लैटिन  American country with  the  most  नोबेल  Prizes , for  a  total of  पाँच  , all obtained during  the   दूसरी  half of  the  twentieth  सदी  .
the  country has three  नोबेल   पुरस्कार   in   विज्ञान  and  दो  of  सलाम  .
the  most important aspects  of  science and technology in  अर्जेंटीना  are concerned with medicine ,  नाभिकीय   भौतिकी   ,  biotechnology , nanotechnology ,  स्पेस  and rocket technology  और   अनेक  fields  सम्बन्धित  to the  देश  's Main Economic  क्रियाएँ  .
The  देश   भी   रै  the mega exhibition  बीच   of  science ,  प्रौद्योगिकी   ,   उद्योग  and  आर्ट   कि   हैं  Latin America 's largest .
Hickory is a city  in   catawba  County  ,  with parts also  in   बुर्के  County and Caldwell County .
The city  's  2010  अनुमानित   जनसांख्यिकी   is   40,010  .
Hickory is the principal  नगर  in the  hickory-lenoir-morganton  MSA , in which  the  population at the 2010 Census was 365,497  .
Polyethylene terephthalate ( sometimes written  बहु  ( ethylene terephthalate ) ) , commonly abbreviated PET  ,  PETE , or the obsolete  petp  or PET-P  ,  is a  thermoplastic  polymer resin  of  the polyester family  और  is  प्रयुक्त   in  synthetic fibers ; beverage , food  और  other liquid  containers  ; thermoforming applications ;  और  engineering  resins   प्रायः  in  संयोजन  with  कांच  fiber .
The term polyethylene terephthalate is a  सोर्स  of  भ्रम  because  इस   पदार्थ  ,  पालतु   ,  does not contain polyethylene  .
यूँ   ,   the   वैकल्पिक   रूप  , poly ( ethylene terephthalate )  ,  is  प्रायः  used in  scholarly   जर्नल्स  for the sake of accuracy and  स्पष्टता  .
Depending  on   इसके  processing and  थर्मल  history , polyethylene terephthalate may exist both as an  amorphous  ( transparent ) and as a semi-crystalline polymer .
the  semicrystalline  सामग्री  might appear transparent ( particle  आकार   <  500 nm  )   or   अपारदर्शी  and  श्वेत   (  particle size up to a few microns ) depending  on  its  क्रिस्टल  structure  और  particle size  .
Its monomer  (  bis-β-hydroxyterephthalate )  can  be synthesized by the esterification reaction  between   terephthalic  acid  और  ethylene glycol with  जल   as   a  byproduct , or by transesterification reaction  between  ethylene  ग्लाइकोल  and  dimethyl   terephthalate  with methanol as a  byproduct   .
Polymerization  is  through  a  polycondensation  प्रतिक्रिया  of  the  monomers (  किया  immediately after esterification/transesterification  )  with water  as  the byproduct .
the   बहुमत  of  the  world 's PET production is for synthetic fibers ( in excess of 60 %  )  , with  बोतल   उत्पादन   हिसाब  for around  30  % of global demand  .
In the context of  वस्त्र  applications , PET is referred to by its common  नाम  , `` polyester  ,  '' whereas the acronym `` PET '' is  generally   प्रयुक्त  in  संबंध   to  packaging .
Polyester makes  up   परिचय   18  %  of  world polymer production and is the  third-most-produced   पॉलिमर  ; polyethylene  (  PE ) and polypropylene ( PP ) are  पहला   और  second  ,  respectively .
PET  consists  of polymerized units of the monomer  एथिलीन  terephthalate , with repeating C10H8O4 units .
PET is  commonly   recycled  , and has  the  number  ``  1 '' as its recycling symbol .
louisiana   थी  admitted to the Union on April  30   ,  1812  ,   और   elects  senators to Classes  2  and Class 3 .
इसके  current senators are Democrat Mary Landrieu  और   रिपब्लिकन  David Vitter .
Black pudding ,  रक्त  pudding  or  blood sausage is a type of sausage made  by   कुकिंग   रक्त  or  सूखी  blood with a  फिलर  until it is thick enough  to  congeal when cooled .
The  डिश  exists in various  संस्कृतियों  from Asia  to  Europe  और  the Americas .
सुअर  , cattle  ,  sheep , duck , and goat blood  can  be used depending on different  देशों   .
In Europe and the Americas  ,   ठेठ  fillers  शामिल   मांस   ,  fat ,  suet  , bread , cornmeal ,  मीठी  potato  ,  onion , chestnuts  ,  barley  ,   और  oatmeal .
in  Spain ,  पुर्तगाल   और   एशिया  , potato is often  replaced   by  rice  .
शेयरधारक  may refer  to:
Stakeholder ( corporate  )   ,  a person  ,  group ,  संगठन  ,  सदस्य  or system who affects  or  can  be  affected by  an   संगठन   's  actions
Stakeholder  ,  an  एंटिटी   कि  can be affected  by   the  results of  कि  in which they are said to  be  stakeholders  ,  i.e. , that  in  which they have a  हिस्सेदारी  .
प्रोजेक्ट  stakeholder  ,   a  person , group or organization with an  ब्याज   in   a  project
Stakeholder  सिद्धान्त  , a theory that identifies and  मॉडल   the  groups which are stakeholders of a  निगम  or project
Stakeholder analysis , the process of  identifying   those  affected by a project or  इवेंट
Stakeholder ( law  )  , a third party who temporarily holds money  or  property while its owner  is  still being  संकल्पित
Jack Smight  (  March  9  ,  1925  - September 1  ,   2003  )  थी  an American  थिएटर  and film director  .
Smight was born in Minneapolis  ,  Minnesota  और  went  to  school with future actor Peter  क़ब्रों   .
His film  क्रेडिट   शामिल  The Traveling Executioner ,  खरगोश  , Run ,  मीत  Couples , Midway  ,   हार्पर  , Airport 1975  ,  Damnation  alley  and the Emmy  पुरस्कार  -winning Eddie  ,  as well  as   अनेक  episodes of television series such as The  गोधूलि  Zone and The Alfred Hitchcock  घंटा  .
He also  निर्देशित  the 1960  ब्रॉडवे  play The 49th Cousin  और   रचित  the music for  the  film  adaption  of Roll  of  Thunder  सुन   my  Cry .
Smight  died  from cancer in  लॉस  Angeles  ,  California .
Dmitri Ivanovich  mendeleev   (  ;  8  February 1834  –  2 February 1907 O.S . 27 January  1834  – 20 January 1907  )   थी  a Russian chemist and inventor .
he   प्रतिपादित  the  आवधिक   विधि  , created his own version of the  आवधिक   तालिका   of  elements ,  और  used  it  to correct the properties of  कुछ  already discovered elements  और  also to predict  the  properties of elements yet to be discovered !
modesto   (   स्पेनी  for  ``  modest  ''  ) ,  officially   the  City  of  Modesto , is the county seat  और  largest city  of  Stanislaus County , California  ,   संयुक्त  States  .
साथ  a population of approximately  201,165  at the  2010  census , Modesto  बाँधने  as the  18th   largest   नगर  in the  राज्य  of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
The Modesto Census  काउंटी  Division , which includes the  शहरों  of Ceres  और   riverbank  , has  a  population  of  312,842 as  of  2010  .
Modesto is located in  the  central valley area of Northern  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  ,  90  miles north of Fresno ,  92  miles east of  सैन  Francisco , 68 miles  दक्षिण  of  the   राज्य  capital  of  Sacramento , 66 miles west of Yosemite National Park  ,  and 24  मील  south of Stockton .
Modesto , a  29-time  Tree City USA honoree ,  is  surrounded by rich  farmland   ,  lending to  a   रैंकिंग   लिये  the county  as  6th among all  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   काउंटी  in farm  उत्पादन  .
Led by milk  ,   बादाम   ,   मुर्गियों  ,  अखरोट  , and corn silage ,  the  county  grossed   nearly  $ 3.1  अरब   in  agricultural production in 2011 .
Modesto was  immortalized   in  the 1973 George Lucas film  अमरीकी  Graffiti .
the  award  जीतना  film  captured   the  spirit of  ``  cruising  ''  and friendship on  10th   और  11th Streets in 1962 and  led   to  the revival  of   1950   's   nostalgia  that  शामिल  the TV show  प्रसन्न  Days and the other spin-offs .
Ron Howard  ,  Harrison Ford and  रिचर्ड  Dreyfuss starred in the  फिल्मी  .
The  साउंडट्रैक  was a huge success  .
Director George  लुकास  is a  देशी  of  modesto  ,  graduating  from Downey High School in  1962  .
the  Gallup-Healthways Well-Being Index  लिये  2011  ,  which interviews 1,000 participants  रोज़   और   asks   individuals  to assess their jobs , finances , physical  स्वास्थ्य   ,  emotional state  of   दिमाग  and communities  ,  ranked Modesto 126 out  of   the   190  cities surveyed .
In December  2009  , Forbes ranked Modesto 48th out  of   100  among  ``   बेहतरीन   bang-for-the-buck  Cities '' .
In this ranking , Modesto ranked 8th  in  housing  affordability  and  सफर  time but  भी  ranked  86th   in  job forecast growth and 99th  in  foreclosures .
स्वतंत्रता  Day , commonly  ज्ञात   as   the  Fourth  of  July , is  a  federal holiday in the United States commemorating the adoption of the  घोषणा   of  Independence on July 4 ,  1776  , declaring independence from  the  Kingdom of Great  ब्रिटेन  .
Independence  दिन  is  commonly  associated  साथ  fireworks , parades , barbecues  ,   carnivals   ,  fairs , picnics ,  कॉन्सर्ट   ,   बेसबॉल  games , family reunions ,  और   राजनैतिक  speeches and ceremonies , in addition  to  various other public and private events  celebrating   the  history ,  सरकारी  , and traditions of  the  United  राज्य  .
Independence Day is  the  national  दिन  of  the  United States .
A gender  प्रतीक  denotes the sex  of   an  organism or  characterizes  an agent by  लिंग   .
The  दो  standard gender symbols denoting male  ♂  and  मादा  ♀ are derived from astrological symbols  ,  denoting the classical planets  मंगल  and  शुक्र  , respectively  .
These symbols have been  in  use since the Renaissance also  denoting   तत्व  in alchemy , specifically the  धातुओं  iron and  तांबे   .
They  यहूद  first used to denote the  प्रभावी   लिंग  of plants (  i.e  .  sex  of individual in a  दिए   crossbreed  , since most plants are hermaphroditic )  by   carolus  Linnaeus  in  1751 .
A leasehold estate  is  an ownership  of  a  अस्थाई   सही   to  hold  जमीन  or  प्रॉपर्टी  in which a lessee or a  किरायेदार  holds rights  of  real property  by  some form of title  इससे  a lessor or landlord .
Although a  किरायेदार  does  थाम  rights  to  real property , a  leasehold   एस्टेट   is  typically considered personal property .
leasehold  is a form  of  land tenure  or  property tenure where one  पार्टी   खरीदता  the  सही  to occupy land  or  a building for a given  लंबाई   of  time .
As  पट्टे   is  a legal estate  ,   leasehold   एस्टेट  can be bought and  बेची  on the open  मार्केट   .
a  leasehold thus differs from a freehold or fee simple where  the  ownership of a property is purchased  outright  and thereafter held for an indeterminate length  of  time  ,   और  also  differs   इससे   a  tenancy  जहाँ   a   प्रॉपर्टी   is  let ( rented )  on   a   आवधिक   आधार   ऐसे   as  weekly or monthly  .
Until the  समाप्त   of   the  lease period ( often measured in  दशकों   or   सदियां  ; a  99  year lease  is  quite  आम  ) the leaseholder  रै  the  सही  to remain in  occupation   as  an assured tenant paying an agreed rent to  the  owner  .
Terms of the agreement  हैं  contained in a lease , which has elements  of   अनुबंध   और  property law intertwined .
the  term estate  लिये   सालो  may occasionally  be  used  .
इस   refers  to  a   leasehold   एस्टेट  for any specific  काल   of  time ( the word  ``  years '' is  भ्रामक  )  .
An  एस्टेट   लिये  years is not automatically renewed .
Colloquially , `` lease '' and `` leasing  ``  are often a formalization  of  a longer , specific  काल   as  compared with  a  `` rental '' that created a tenancy at will  ,  terminable or renewable at  the  end of  a  short period  .
ओलिविया  ( also known  as   स्वागत   to  the  संसार  of the  सुअर  Olivia  )   is  a  british-american  children 's  एनिमेटेड   टेलीविज़न  series produced  by  media  कम्पनी  Chorion and  आधारित   on  Ian  falconer  's books .
It  is   देखी   on  Nick  jr.  in the  us  , Milkshake !
,  Nick  jr.  in the UK and Ireland , and  डिज़्नी  Junior  in  Latin America and  ब्राज़ील  , Treehouse TV  in   कनाडा  .
The show has won a  चांदी  Parents ' Choice Award for its  धनात्मक  story lines  और  characters  .
स्थान  of  पनामा  between Pacific ( bottom )  और   caribbean   (  top  )  , with canal at top  बीच
The Panama Canal  (  ) is  a  ship  कनाल  in  पनामा  that connects  the  Atlantic  समंदर   (  via the Caribbean  समुद्र   )   to   the  Pacific Ocean .
the   कनाल  cuts  आरपार  the Isthmus of Panama and  is  a key conduit for  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  maritime  व्यापार  .
There are locks at each end  to  lift ships  up   to  Gatun  झील  ( above sea-level )  .
Gatun Lake was  निर्मित  to reduce the  राशि  of  कार्य  required for the  कनाल  .
the  current locks  हैं  wide  .
A third , wider  लेन   of   ताले  is  होने   निर्मित  .
फ़्रांस   began  work on  the   कनाल  in 1881 , but had to stop because  of  engineering problems and  ऊँची   मृत्यु  due  to  disease .
The  संयुक्त  States (  us   )  later  took  over  the   प्रोजेक्ट  and took  a  decade to  पूरा  the canal in 1914 , enabling  जहाजों  to  avoid  the lengthy Cape Horn route around  the  southernmost tip of South America  (  via the  ड्रेक   ड्योढ़ी  ) or to  navigate  the Strait of Magellan  .
One of the  largest  and most difficult  अभियान्त्रिकी   प्रोजेक्ट  ever undertaken ,  the   पनामा   कनाल  shortcut made it possible for ships to  सफर   between  the Atlantic and Pacific Oceans in half  the   समय   previously   जरूरी  .
The  shorter   ,  faster , safer route to the US  वेस्ट  Coast  और  to  राष्ट्र  in and along the Pacific  समंदर  allowed  those  places to become more integrated  साथ  the world economy .
During this time , ownership of the territory  कि  is now the  पनामा  Canal  थी  first  कोलम्बियाई   ,  then French ,  और   तब  American  ;  the United States completed the construction .
The canal was  लिया   over   in   1999  by the Panamanian government  ,  as long  नियोजित   .
सालाना  traffic has  risen  from about 1,000 ships when  the  canal  खोली   in  1914 , to  14,702   बरतन  in  2008  , the latter measuring a total of 309.6 million Panama Canal/Universal Measurement System ( PC/UMS  )  tons  .
By 2008 ,  अधिक  than  815,000  vessels  था  passed through the canal , many  of  them  much  larger than the  असली  planners could  have  envisioned ;  the   largest   जहाजों  that can transit the canal today are called Panamax .
the  American  समाज   of  Civil  इंजीनियर्स  has  नामित  the  पनामा   कनाल  one of  the  seven wonders  of   the   आधुनिक  world .
Benjamin Franklin (  अप्रैल  17 , 1790 )  थी  one  of   the   founding   fathers   of   the  United States  .
A noted polymath ,  फ्रैंकलिन  was  a  leading author , printer ,  राजनैतिक  theorist , politician , postmaster , scientist ,  संगीतकार   ,  inventor , satirist  ,  civic  activist  ,  statesman  ,  और  diplomat .
As a scientist  ,  he was a major figure in the American Enlightenment  और  the history  of  physics for his discoveries  और   theories   regarding  electricity  .
he  invented  the   बिजली  rod  ,   bifocals   ,   the  Franklin  स्टोव  , a carriage  ओडोमीटर  , and the glass 'armonica '  .
He facilitated many civic organizations , including a fire department and  a  university .
फ्रैंकलिन  earned the  शीर्षक  of `` The First American '' for his early  और  indefatigable campaigning for  औपनिवेशिक  unity  ;  as  an  author and spokesman in London  लिये  several colonies , then as the first United States Ambassador to  फ़्रांस  , he exemplified the emerging American nation .
फ्रैंकलिन  was foundational in defining the American ethos as a marriage of the practical values  of   thrift  , hard work , education , community spirit ,  self-governing   संस्थानों  ,  और  opposition to  authoritarianism  both political  और   धार्मिक  , with the scientific and tolerant values  of  the Enlightenment .
in  the words of historian Henry Steele Commager , ``  in  a Franklin  could  be merged the  virtues   of  Puritanism  बगैर  its  दोषों  , the  illumination  of the Enlightenment without its heat  .   ''
To Walter Isaacson , this makes Franklin `` the most  संपन्नता  American  of   उसके  age and the most influential in  inventing  the type of society  अमेरिका  would  become  .  ''
Franklin ,  सदा   गर्व   of  his working  क्लास  roots , became a successful  समाचारपत्र  editor and printer in Philadelphia , the leading city in the  colonies  .
He was also partners with William Goddard and Joseph Galloway the three  of  whom published  the  Pennsylvania Chronicle , a newspaper that was known for its  क्रांतिकारी   sentiments  and criticisms of the British  साम्राज्य   in   the  American colonies .
he  became  धनवान  publishing Poor Richard  's  Almanack and  the  Pennsylvania Gazette  .
Franklin  gained   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  renown  as  a scientist for  उसके   प्रसिद्ध  experiments  in   विद्युत  and for his  अनेक  inventions , especially the lightning rod .
he   निभाई   a  major  भूमिका   in   establishing  the University of  पेन्सिलवेनिया  and was elected  the  first president  of  the  अमरीकी  Philosophical Society .
फ्रैंकलिन  became  a  national hero in America  जब  he  पथप्रदर्शन  the effort  to   have   पार्लियामेंट  repeal the  unpopular   स्टैम्प   अधिनियम  .
An  संपन्नता  diplomat  ,  he was widely admired  among  the French as  अमरीकी  minister to Paris and was a  प्रमुख  figure  in  the development of  धनात्मक  Franco-American  संबंध  .
For many  सालो  he was the  अंग्रेजों  postmaster for the  colonies   ,  which enabled him  to  set  up  the first national  संचार  network  .
He was  क्रियाशील  in community affairs ,  औपनिवेशिक  and state  राजनीती   ,  as well  as  national and international affairs .
From  1785  to 1788 , he  परोसा  as governor of Pennsylvania  .
Toward the end of his  जीवन  , he  freed  his slaves and became one of the  सबसे  prominent abolitionists .
उसके  colorful life and legacy of  वैज्ञानिक   और  political achievement , and  औकात  as one  of  America 's most influential Founding Fathers  ,   have   देखी   फ्रैंकलिन  honored on coinage  और  money ; warships  ;   the  names of many  कस्बों  , counties , educational institutions , namesakes  ,  and companies ;  और  more than  दो  centuries after his death , countless cultural  सन्दर्भ  .
दण्ड  Minds  is  an American  पुलिस   प्रक्रियात्मक  television program that premiered September 22 , 2005  ,  on CBS .
The  श्रेणी  follows a  टोली  of profilers from the  एफबीआई   's  Behavioral Analysis  ईकाई  ( BAU  )  based in Quantico , Virginia  .
The BAU is part of the FBI National Center  लिये   the   विश्लेषण   of   हिंसक   अपराधों   .
The show differs from  अनेक   प्रक्रियात्मक  dramas by focusing  on   प्रोफाइलिंग  the criminal ,  बल्कि  than the crime itself  .
The show is produced by The  चिह्नित  Gordon Company in association with CBS Television  studios   (  originally Paramount Network Television then CBS Paramount Network Television )  और  ABC Studios  (  originally  touchstone  Television  )   .
CBS announced in October 2009 that Legacy Interactive would develop a video game based on the show .
The game  होता  require players to examine  अपराधों  scenes for clues to help solve murder mysteries .
The  इंटरैक्टिव  puzzle game was released in 2012 , but did not  विशेषता  any  of  the voices of  the  show  's  cast , nor  थी  the  डाल  involved with  the  project .
On March 14 , 2012 , CBS renewed Criminal  minds  for an  आठवीं   ऋतु   ,  which premiered on September 26 ,  2012  .
``  heart-shaped  Box '' is  a   सोंग  by the American  grunge   बैंड  Nirvana ,  लिखा  by vocalist and guitarist Kurt Cobain .
The song was released as the  पहला  single  इससे   the   समूह   's  third  और  final studio album  ,  In Utero , in 1993 .
It was  एक  of  दो  songs from the  एल्बम  mixed  by  Scott Litt  in  order  to  augment the original production  by  producer Steve  albini   .
While Nirvana 's label DGC Records  किया  not release  a  physical single  लिये  sale  in  the United States ,  ``   heart-shaped  Box ''  प्राप्त   much  American  रेडियो   airplay  , reaching number one on the Billboard Modern Rock Tracks chart .
The  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  release  of   the   सिंगल   पहुँचे   क्रमांक  five  on  the  uk   singles  Chart .
The  सोंग  's music video , directed by  एंटोन  Corbijn , garnered critical plaudits  .
The orbital speed  of  a  देह  , generally a  ग्रह   ,  a natural  उपग्रह   ,  an artificial satellite ,  or  a multiple star , is the speed at  जिससे  it  orbits   around  the barycenter of  a   प्रणाली   ,  usually around a more massive body  .
It can be used to refer  to  either  the  mean orbital speed  ,  the average  गति  as  it   completes   an  orbit  ,   or  instantaneous  कक्षीय  speed , the speed at  a  particular  पाइंट   in   इसके  orbit  .
The orbital  गति   at  any position in  the   कक्षा  can  be  computed from the distance  to  the central body  at   कि   स्थिति  ,  और  the specific orbital  उर्जा  , which is independent  of   स्थिति  : the kinetic  उर्जा  is the total energy  ऋण  the potential energy  .

Brown Palace  होटल  is the second-oldest operating hotel  in   डेनवर  , Colorado and is one of  the   पहला  atrium-style hotel ever  निर्मित   .
it   is  now operated  by  Quorum Hotels and Resorts .
It  थी  built in  1892  ,  एक   साल  later than the  ऑक्सफोर्ड   होटल   .
It was named for its original owner  ,  Henry C. Brown  ,   और  was designed with its odd triangular  आकार   by   वास्तु  Frank  edbrooke  .
the  hotel is located at 321  17th  St , Denver ,  co  between 17th Street , Broadway  और  Tremont  street/pl   in   शहर   डेनवर  behind the  गणतंत्र   प्लाजा  .
The main entrance  द्वार   is  on  tremont  Street .
dvd-video   is  a  उपभोक्ता   वीडियो  format used to store  डिजिटल  video  on  DVD discs ,  और  is  फिलहाल   the  dominant consumer video format  in  Asia , North  अमेरिका  ,  यूरोपीय   ,   और  Australia .
Discs using the DVD-Video  specification  require a DVD drive  और  an H.262/MPEG-2  भाग  2  डिकोडर   (  e.g.  ,  a DVD player , or  a  computer DVD drive with a software  dvd  player ) .
वाणिज्यिक  DVD  फिल्मों  are  एनकोडेड   using   a   संयोजन  of  h.262/mpeg-2  Part  2  compressed video and audio  of  varying formats  (   प्रायः  multi-channel formats  as  described  नीचे  ) .
Typically , the data rate for DVD  फिल्मों  ranges from 3  mbit/s   to  9.5  mbit/s  ,  और   the  bit  रेट  is usually  अनुकूली   .
it  was  पहला  available for retail around 1997 .
the   dvd-video  specification was created  by  DVD Forum and  can  be  प्राप्त  from DVD Format/Logo Licensing Corporation for a fee of $ 5,000 .
The specification is not  सरेआम  available ,  क्युकी  every subscriber  जरूर  sign a non-disclosure agreement  .
Certain  सूचना  in the DVD Book is proprietary and confidential .
The  nautical  mile ( symbol M  ,   nm  or nmi ) is  a  unit of  लंबाई  that  is  about one minute of arc of  अक्षांश  measured along any  मध्याह्न  , or about one minute of  चाप  of  देशांतर  at the equator  .
By  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   अनुबंध  it has been set at 1,852 metres exactly  (  about 6,076 feet ) .
It is  a  non-  si   ईकाई  ( although accepted for  उपयोग   in  the International System of Units by the  bipm   )  used especially by navigators in  the  shipping and  विमानन   उद्योग  , and also in  ध्रुवीय  exploration .
it   is  commonly used in  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  law and  treaties  , especially regarding the  हद  of territorial  waters  .
It developed  इससे  the sea  मील  and the  सम्बन्धित  geographical  मील  .
the  nautical  मील  remains  in  use by sea and  एयर  navigators worldwide because of  इसके   convenience  when working with charts  .
सबसे  nautical  चार्ट  use  the  Mercator  प्रक्षेप   जिनकी  scale  varies   by  about a factor  of   छह  from  the  equator  to  80°  अक्षांश  , so charts covering large  क्षेत्रों   can  not use  a  single linear scale  .
the  nautical  मील  is  nearly  equal to  a  minute of  अक्षांश   on   a  chart ,  so   a  distance measured with a chart divider can be roughly converted to  nautical  miles  using  the chart  's  latitude scale .
Shippensburg  is  a  बरो   in  Cumberland  और  Franklin  काउंटी   in   the   u.S.   राज्य  of Pennsylvania .
Settled  in  1730 , Shippensburg  झूठ   in  the  कम्बरलैंड  Valley  ,   41   मील  ( 66 km )  west-southwest  of Harrisburg  ,  and is part of  the   harrisburg–  Carlisle Metropolitan Statistical Area .
In  1900   ,  3,228  लोगों  lived there ; in 1910 , 3,457  ;  and in 1940 ,  5,244  people  जिया  there  .
the  population was 5,492  at   the   2010  census  .
Shippensburg was incorporated as  a   बरो  on  जनवरी  21  ,   1819   .
In the past , there were  फर्नीचर  factories , engine and pump  works  , and  अन्य  industrial works located within the  कस्बा  .
shippensburg  is also  the   घर  of The  beistle  Company , the  oldest  and largest manufacturer of decorations and party goods , which sells its distinctive honeycomb paper decorations worldwide .
It is also the location of Pague  और   fegan  , the oldest continuously operated hardware store in Pennsylvania .
in   may  2012 ,  वोल्वो  Construction Equipment began a $  100  million  विस्तार   प्रोजेक्ट   to   लाओ  its American headquarters  to   shippensburg   .
Shippensburg is also  घर  to Shippensburg  विश्वविद्यालयों  of Pennsylvania ,  एक   of   14  universities of  the   पेन्सिलवेनिया  State System  of  Higher Education .
Yearly the last full  सप्ताह  of July , the  shippensburg  Community Fair  is  held .
begun  in  1958  , the fair  बिल्स  itself as Pennsylvania 's largest  bi-county  fair .
The fair includes agricultural  दर्शाती   ,  a craft show , food vendors ,  और  carnival  यात्राएँ   amongst  other  बाते  .
Every summer  on  the  पिछला   शनिवार  of August ,  shippensburg  holds the Corn  पर्व  , an event that brings regional artisans and vendors to  operate  stands downtown .
The downtown  is  closed to  ट्रैफ़िक  for at  तनिक   5  blocks for  सबसे  of  the  day .
Average  उपस्थिति   at   the  festival is estimated  at  60,000 -  70,000  each year .
Black  बालदार  tongue  (  BHT , also  termed  lingua villosa nigra )  refers  to a condition of  the  tongue where  the   filiform   papillae  elongate with black or brown discoloration , giving  a   ब्लैक   और  hairy  रूप  .
The appearance  may  be  alarming  , but it  is  a harmless condition .
predisposing   कारकों  include smoking , xerostomia ( dry  मुँह   )  , soft diet  ,  poor oral hygiene and  निश्चित  medications .
Management is by  improving   मौखिक  hygiene , especially scraping or brushing the tongue .
the  IEEE 1394 interface is  a  serial bus interface standard  लिये   high-speed  communications and  isochronous   real-time  data transfer .
it  was developed in the late 1980s  और  early  1990s  by Apple , who called it FireWire  .
The 1394 interface  is   comparable   to  USB , and often those two  technologies  are considered together ,  हालांकि  USB has more market share .
ठहराना  first included FireWire  in   कुछ  of its 1999 models ,  और   सबसे  Apple computers  चूंकि  the year 2000 have  शामिल  FireWire ports ,  हालांकि  , as of 2013 , nothing beyond the 800 version ( IEEE-1394b  )  .
The interface is also  ज्ञात  by the brand i.LINK  (  Sony  )  ,  और  Lynx (  टेक्सास   यंत्र  ) .
IEEE 1394 replaced parallel  scsi   in  many  अनुप्रयोग  , because of lower implementation costs  और  a simplified , more adaptable cabling system .
the   1394  standard  भी  defines a backplane interface , though this  is  not as widely used .
IEEE 1394  is  the  high-definition  Audio-Video Network Alliance  (  HANA )  मानक  connection  इंटरफ़ेस   लिये  A/V ( audio/visual  )  component  संचार  and control .
firewire   is  also  उपलब्धियाँ  in wireless ,  रेशा  optic ,  और   समाक्षीय  versions  using  the  isochronous  protocols .
Stephen `` Stevie '' Ray Vaughan (  अक्तूबर   3   ,  1954 – August 27 , 1990  )  was an  अमरीकी  guitarist , singer-songwriter ,  और   रिकार्ड   निर्माता  .
Often  referred   to   by  his initials SRV , Vaughan is best  ज्ञात  as a  founding  member  और  leader of Double Trouble .
साथ  with drummer  क्रिस   layton   और  bassist Tommy Shannon  ,   वे  ignited  the  blues revival of  the  1980s .
साथ  a  करियर   spanning  seven years , Vaughan  और  Double Trouble consistently  बेची  out  कॉन्सर्ट   जबकि  their  एल्बम  frequently went  सुनहरा  .
he  was born and  उठाया  in Dallas , Texas , and for a short period of  समय  lived  in   ग्राहम  ,  टेक्सास  .
As the younger  bhai  of Jimmie  vaughan   ,   vaughan  started  playing  the  गिटार  at  आयु  seven and formed several bands that  occasionally  performed  in  local nightclubs .
At age 17 ,  he  dropped out of high school  और  moved to  ऑस्टिन  to further pursue his musical  करियर  , joining groups such as Krackerjack  ,   the  Nightcrawlers  ,   और   the  Cobras .
In 1977  ,  he formed Triple Threat Revue  ,   a  band that eventually  विकसित  into Double Trouble and regularly performed  around  Austin .
In 1982 ,  vaughan   और  Double  ट्रबल   performed  at the Montreux Jazz Festival  in   स्विट्ज़रलैंड  ,  catching   the   ध्यान  of musicians  दाउद   बोवी  and Jackson Browne  .
Bowie asked  vaughan   to  play  on  his upcoming studio album Let  's  Dance ,  जबकि  Browne offered the  बैंड  free  उपयोग  of  उसके  personal studio  in   लॉस   एंजिल्स   to  record an album .
In March 1983 , Vaughan  और   दोगुना  Trouble were signed  to  Epic Records by veteran record  निर्माता  John Hammond Sr.  और  released their debut album , Texas  बाढ़  in June of that year  .
After successful touring  ,  the group released the  एल्बम   ,  Could  n't  Stand the  मौसम  ( 1984 )  और  Soul to Soul  (  1985 ) , the latter of which featured new keyboardist  रीज़  Wynans .
Although  उसके  career had progressed  सफलतापूर्वक  , Vaughan checked into a rehabilitation hospital in Atlanta , Georgia to  दे  up a cocaine and  दारू  habit  और  returned to  touring  with the band .
In June 1989  ,  In  कदम   थी  released and  अर्जित   उन्हें  a Grammy Award for  बेहतरीन   समकालीन  Blues Performance .
on  August 27  ,   1990  ,  vaughan  was killed in  a  helicopter crash  following  a  प्रदर्शन   in   ईस्ट  Troy , Wisconsin .
Vaughan  's   uniquely   eclectic  yet intense style was derived from a variety of  musical  genres  .
he   थी  influenced by blues musicians  सहित  Albert  किंग   ,  Freddie King  ,   ओटिस   फटाफट   ,  and  muddy  Waters  ,   और  rock guitarists such  as  Jimi Hendrix and Lonnie  mack  .
His  गिटार  playing reflected the  क्लासिक  blues and pentatonic scales .
He  रै   प्राप्त  wide critical recognition for his guitar playing ,  रैंकिंग  at #  6   on   रोलिंग  Stones list of `` 100 Greatest Guitarists '' in 2011  .
he   थी   मरणोपरांत  inducted into the  ब्लूज़  Hall  of  Fame in 2000 and  a   मेमोरियल  statue was erected  in  Austin  's  Auditorium Shores park .
Stevie Ray Vaughan is  widely   माना   to  be one  of  the greatest  संगीतकारों   to   आइये  from the state  of  Texas .

In  कंप्यूटर  networking  ,  gigabit Ethernet  (   gbe  or 1 GigE  )   is  a  पद  describing various technologies for transmitting  ईथरनेट  frames at a rate  of   a  gigabit  प्रति  second ( 1,000,000,000 bits per  दूसरी   )  ,  as  defined by the IEEE 802.3-2008  मानक  .
It  आए  into  उपयोग  beginning in  1999  ,  धीरे  supplanting Fast Ethernet in wired local networks  ,  where it  performed   considerably   तेज़  .
the  cables and equipment are  बहुत  similar  to  previous standards and were very common and  किफायती  by 2010 .
half-duplex  gigabit links  कनेक्ट   through  hubs are  अनुमत  by the specification ,  लकिन   full-duplex  usage with  switches   is  much more common .
