The main  components  of a stamp:
1 . Image
2 . Perforations
3  .  Denomination
4 .  देश  name
A postage stamp is a small piece of paper that is purchased and displayed on  an  item  of  mail as  प्रमाण  of payment  of   postage  .
Typically , stamps are made from  खास  paper ,  साथ  a national designation and denomination ( price )  on  the face , and  a  gum  चिपकने  on  the  reverse  पक्ष  .
postage   stamps  are purchased  इससे  a postal administration or other authorized vendor and are used to pay for the costs involved in  चलती  mail  as   खूब  as  अन्य  business necessities  ऐसे   as  insurance and registration  .
the  stamp’s shape is usually that of  a  small  आयताकार  of varying  proportions   ,   हालांकि  triangles or  अन्य  shapes are occasionally used  .
The  स्टैम्प  is affixed  to  an envelope or other postal cover ( i.e. ,  पैकेट  , box , mailing cylinder  )  that  the  customer  बधाइयां  to send .
the  item is then processed by  the   डाक  system  ,   जहाँ  a postmark  ,   sometimes  known as a cancellation mark ,  is  usually applied over the stamp and cover ;  इस   कार्यविधि  marks the stamp  as  used , which  रोकता  its reuse .
The postmark indicates the date and point  of  origin of  the  mailing  .
The mailed item is then delivered to the  पता  that the customer has  लागू  to the  लिफाफा  or cover .
postage  stamps have facilitated the  डिलीवरी  of mail  चूंकि  the 1840s .
Before this  समय  ,  स्याही  and hand-stamps  (   hence   the   शब्द  'stamp  '  ) , usually made  इससे  wood or cork , were  प्रायः  used to frank the mail and confirm  the  payment of  postage   .
The first adhesive postage stamp , commonly  referred  to as the Penny Black ,  थी  issued in  the  United Kingdom in 1840 .
The invention  of  the stamp was a part of the attempt  to  reform and improve the  डाक  system  in   the  United Kingdom of  ग्रेट  Britain  और   आयरलैंड   ,  which in the early 19th  सदी   थी   in   अस्तव्यस्तता  and  rife   साथ  corruption .
There are varying accounts of the inventor  or  inventors of the stamp  .
Before the introduction  of  postage  stamps   ,   मेल  in  the  UK  थी  paid for by the  प्राप्तकर्ता  , a system that was  संबद्ध   साथ  an irresolvable problem : the costs of delivering  मेल  were not  recoverable   by  the postal service when recipients  यहूद   असमर्थ  or unwilling to pay for delivered  वस्तुएं  , and senders had no incentive to  सीमित   the  number , size , or  वज़न   of  items sent ,  whether  or not they would ultimately be paid for .
The  postage   स्टैम्प  resolved this issue in a simple  और  elegant manner  ,  with the  अतिरिक्त  benefit  of  room for an  तत्व  of beauty  to  be introduced  .
Later related inventions  शामिल  postal  स्टेशनरी   ऐसे   as  prepaid-postage envelopes , post cards  ,  lettercards , aerogrammes and wrappers  ,  postage  मीटर  , and , more recently  ,  specialty boxes  और   लिफाफे  provided free  to   the   ग्राहक   by  the U.S. postal service for priority  or  express mailing  .
The postage stamp afforded  convenience  for both the mailer and postal  officials  ,  अधिक  efficiently  बरामद  costs for the postal service ,  और  ultimately resulted in a  बेहतर  ,  तेज़   डाक  system  .
साथ   the  conveniences  stamps   offered   ,  their use resulted in greatly  increased  mailings during the 19th  और  20th centuries  .
Postage stamps during this era  यहूद  the most popular way of paying for mail , but by the  समाप्त  of the  20th  century  यहूद  rapidly being  आत  by the  उपयोग  of  metered   postage  and bulk  mailing   by   व्यवसायों  .  )
The  वही   परिणाम   साथ  respect to  संचार  by private parties occurred  over   the  last decade  of   the  20th  सदी  and the first decade of the 21st due to declining cost  of  long distance telephone communications and  the  development and explosive  स्प्रेड   of  electronic  mailing   (  `` e-mail ''  via  the  अंतरजाल  ) and  विधेयक  paying  प्रणालियों  had .
as  postage stamps with their engraved imagery began to appear on a widespread  आधार   ,  historians and collectors began to  लो   सूचना  .
the   पढ़ाई  of postage stamps and  उनके  use is referred  to  as philately  .
Stamp collecting  can  be  दोनो  a  शौक  and  a  form of  ऐतिहासिक  study and  सन्दर्भ  , as government-issued postage stamps and their mailing  प्रणालियों   have  always been involved with the  इतिहास  of nations  .
The  विश्वविद्यालयों  of  अलबामा  at  बर्मिंघम  ( UAB )  is  a  पब्लिक   विश्वविद्यालयों  in  बर्मिंघम  in the U.S.  राज्य  of  अलबामा  .
Developing from  an  extension center established  in  1936 ,  the  institution became an autonomous institution  in  1969  और  is today one of three institutions in the  विश्वविद्यालयों  of  अलबामा  System .
uab   offers  over 140  कार्यक्रम  of  पढ़ाई  in  12  academic divisions leading to bachelor 's ,  निपुण  's , doctoral , and professional degrees in the  सोशल  and behavioral  sciences  , the liberal arts  ,  business  ,  education  ,  engineering  ,   और  health-related fields such as  आयुर्विज्ञान   ,  dentistry ,  optometry  , nursing  ,   और   पब्लिक  health .
the  school is highly  प्रसिद्ध  for its medical  शोध   और  natural sciences  कार्यक्रम   .
the   uab  Health System , one  of  the largest academic medical centers  in  the United States , is affiliated with the  विश्वविद्यालयों  .
UAB Hospital sponsors residency programs in  विभिन्न  medical specialties  ,  including internal  आयुर्विज्ञान  , neurology ,  सर्जरी   ,  radiology  ,   और  anesthesiology .
UAB  हॉस्पिटल  is the only ACS  सत्यापित  Level  i   आघात  center in Alabama ,  as  rated by the American  कॉलेज  of Surgeons Trauma Program  .
uab   is   the  state 's largest employer , with more than 18,000 faculty  और   स्टाफ  and  over  53,000  कार्य   at  the  विश्वविद्यालयों  and in the  स्वास्थ्य  system .
An estimated 10 percent of the  कार्य  in the  birmingham-hoover  Metropolitan Area and 1  in  33  कार्य   in  the state of  अलबामा   हैं  directly or  indirectly   सम्बन्धित  to UAB .
The university 's overall annual economic  प्रभाव  was  अनुमानित   to  be $ 4.6 billion  in  2010 .
In the  पतन  of  2012   ,   the   विश्वविद्यालयों   of  Alabama at Birmingham enrolled 17,999 students from  अधिक   than   110   देशों   ,  including 1,605 freshmen  .
There are plans to  commence  with an  ``  aggressive ''  विकास  in enrollment at UAB .
The current  uab  President  is  Dr.  रे  L. Watts .
टोफू  ,  भी  called bean curd  ,   is  a  खाना  made  by  coagulating  सोया  juice and  तब  pressing the resulting curds into soft  श्वेत   ब्लॉक  .
It is a component  in  many East Asian and  southeast   एशियाई   व्यंजन   .
वहीँ  are many different varieties of tofu , including fresh  टोफू  and  टोफू  that has been processed  in  some way  .
Tofu has  a   हल्का   स्वाद  and  can  be used in  savory  and sweet dishes .
It is often seasoned or marinated  to  suit  the   डिश  .
Tofu originated in ancient China some 2,000  सालो  ago  .
Chinese  लेजेंड  ascribes its  आविष्कार  to  प्रिंस  Liu An  (  Chinese : 劉安  liú  Ān , 179–122 BC ) .
Tofu and  इसके  production technique were introduced into  कोरियाई   और  then  जापानी  during  the   nara   काल  .
it  spread into  अन्य   भाग  of East  एशिया   as  well .
This spread  संभावित  coincided  साथ  the  स्प्रेड  of  buddhism   क्युकी  it is an  महत्वपूर्ण  source of protein in the vegetarian diet of  ईस्ट  Asian  buddhism  .
Li Shizhen  in  the Ming Dynasty  वर्णित  a method  of  making tofu in Bencao Gangmu .
टोफू  has a low calorie count ,  अपेक्षाकृत  large  amounts   of   प्रोटीन  , and little fat .
It  is  high in iron and depending on the  coagulant  used in manufacturing ,  may  also be high in calcium  and/or  magnesium .
बुलबुले   (  born 1983  )   is  a  आम   चिंपैंजी   ,   ज्ञात  for being  the  one-time  पालतु  of American recording  कलाकार  Michael Jackson , who bought the primate from a  टेक्सास   शोध   सुविधा  in the  जल्दी  1980s .
The animal  थी   a   बारंबार  travel companion to the singer , whose  अनुलग्नक   to  the  एनिमल   led  to media  mockery  and  ,  among other factors  ,   to  a public perception  of  Jackson as  an  eccentric .
During the Bad  संसार   दौरे  ,  लिये  example ,  जैक्सन  brought Bubbles  साथ   उसे   to  Japan , where  वे   दोनो  drank  चाय  with the mayor  of  Osaka .
बुलबुले   थी   initially  kept at the Jackson family  's  home in Encino ,  लॉस  Angeles  ,  but was  स्थानांतरित  to  neverland  Ranch in 1988 .
There , he slept  in  a  crib  in  जैक्सन   's  bedroom , used  the  singer 's  प्रसाधन   ,  and ate candy in  the  Neverland movie theater .
In 2003 the public learned that  ,  like all  खिलाते  chimpanzees  ,   बुलबुले  had matured into a large and aggressive adult  chimp  unsuitable as a companion animal .
He  थी  sent to a  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  animal trainer , where he was reported to  have  attempted suicide  .
When the trainer  shut   bas  his operation in 2004  ,   बुलबुले   थी  moved to the Center for Great Apes  ,   a   अभयारण्य  in  wauchula  , Florida  ,  where he has lived  चूंकि   2005  .
Muse are an English  चट्टान  band from Teignmouth , Devon  ,  which  formed  in  1994   .
The  बैंड   consists  of  स्कूल  friends  मैथ्यू  Bellamy ( lead vocals ,  सीसे  guitar ,  पियानो  ,  keyboards  , keytar  )   ,   क्रिस्टोफर  Wolstenholme ( bass , vocals  ,  keyboards , rhythm  गिटार  , harmonica ) and Dominic Howard ( drums , percussion , synthesisers  ,   sampling  ) .
Since the release of  उनके   2006  album Black  छेद  and Revelations  ,  keyboardist and percussionist Morgan Nicholls has performed live  साथ   the  band .
चिंतन   हैं  known for  उनके  energetic and  हद  live performances  और  their fusion of  अनेक   म्यूज़िक   जाति   ,   सहित  space  चट्टान  , progressive  चट्टान  , alternative rock  ,  heavy metal , classical music and electronica .
चिंतन  have released  छह  studio albums : Showbiz  (   1999  )  ,  Origin  of  Symmetry  (  2001 ) ,  absolution   (  2003  )  ,  ब्लैक  Holes and Revelations ( 2006 ) , The Resistance  (   2009  ) and The  2nd  Law ( 2012  )   .
They  have  also issued three  सजीव  albums , Hullabaloo Soundtrack  (  2002 ) ,  जिससे  is also a compilation of B-sides , Absolution  दौरे  ( 2005  )  , and  haarp  ( 2008 ) , which  दस्तावेज़   the   बैंड  's  प्रदर्शन  at  वेम्बली  Stadium in 2007 .
Black Holes and Revelations earned  the   बैंड  a Mercury Prize nomination and a third place  समाप्त  in the NME  एल्बम  of the Year  सूची  for 2006 .
Muse have also won a collection  of   म्यूज़िक  awards  throughout  their  इतिहास  , including five MTV  यूरोपीय  Music Awards , six Q Awards  ,   आठ  NME Awards  ,   दो   ब्रिट   पुरस्कार  —winning `` Best British Live Act '' twice , an  एमटीवी  Video  म्यूज़िक  Award ,  चार  Kerrang  !
Awards and an  अमरीकी   म्यूज़िक  Award .
They were also nominated for five  ग्रैमी  Awards ,  of  which  वे  won  बेहतरीन  Rock  एल्बम   ,  for their fifth studio album The  प्रतिरोध   (  2009 ) .
चिंतन   have  sold over 15 million albums worldwide .
bloemfontein  (  ,  ;  डच   लिये  `` fountain of flowers '' ) is the capital city  of  the Free State  प्रांत  of South Africa ; and  ,  as the judicial capital of the nation  ,  one of South Africa  's  three  नेशनल  capitals  –  the other  दो   होने  Cape Town ,  the  legislative capital , and Pretoria  ,   the   प्रशासनिक   पूंजी   .
bloemfontein   is   popularly  and poetically known as  ``  the city  of   गुलाब  ``  ,  owing to  the  abundance  of  these flowers and the  सालाना  rose festival  आयोजित  there .
The city  's  Sesotho  नाम  is Mangaung ,  अर्थ   ``   प्लेस  of cheetahs  ``   और  it has been included in the Mangaung Local Municipality since 2000 .
Bloemfontein is situated  on  dry grassland  at  , at  an   ऊँचाई  of above sea level .
The city is home to  369,568  residents , while the Mangaung Local Municipality has a population  of  645,455  .
जहाँ  Do  we  Come From  ?
What  हैं   we   ?
Where Are We Going ?
एक   of  Post-Impressionist  पॉल  Gauguin 's most famous paintings .
The  अर्थ   of   जीवन   is   a  philosophical question concerning  the  significance  of  life  or   अस्तित्व   in  general  .
It  can  also be  expressed  in different  फ़ॉर्म  , such  as  `` Why are we here ? `` ,  ``  What  is  life all about ? ``  ,  and `` What is the  purpose  of existence ? ''
It has been the subject  of  much philosophical , scientific  ,  and theological speculation  throughout  history .
There have been  a   विशाल  number of proposed answers to these  सवाल  from many different  सांस्कृतिक  and  वैचारिक  backgrounds .
The meaning of life  is  in the philosophical  और   धार्मिक   conceptions  of existence , social  ties  ,  चेतना  , and  सुख  ,  और  borders  on  many other issues , such as  सांकेतिक   अर्थ  ,  सत्तामीमांसा  , value , purpose  ,  ethics , good and evil ,  फ़्री  will , the  अस्तित्व  of one or multiple Gods , conceptions of God , the  आत्मा  , and the afterlife  .
वैज्ञानिक  contributions  फ़ोकस  primarily on describing related empirical facts about the universe  ,  exploring the context and parameters concerning the 'how  '  of life  .
Science  भी   अध्ययन   और  can  provide  recommendations  लिये  the  pursuit  of well-being  और  a  सम्बन्धित  conception of  नैतिकता  .
An  वैकल्पिक   ,   humanistic   दृष्टिकोण  poses the question `` What  is   the   अर्थ  of my life ? ''
The value of the  सवाल   pertaining  to the  purpose  of  जीवन  may  coincide   साथ  the achievement  of   परम   वास्तविकता  , or a feeling  of  oneness  ,  or even  a  feeling of sacredness .
Family Guy creator Seth MacFarlane also provides the  आवाज़ें  of Peter Griffin , Stewie Griffin , Brian Griffin  ,  and Glenn Quagmire .
Family Guy is  an  American  एनिमेटेड  sitcom that  सुविधाएँ   पाँच   प्रमुख  voice actors ,  और   numerous  regular cast  और  recurring guest  सितारों   .
the  principal voice cast  consists  of show  निर्माता  Seth  macfarlane  , Alex Borstein , Seth Green  ,  Mila Kunis (  जो  replaced Lacey  chabert  after  the  first season ) and Mike Henry and now  ,  the  नई  actor Beau Osborne .
Recurring voice actors include Patrick Warburton , Adam West , John G.  ब्रेनन  ,  निकोल   सुलीवान   और   जेनिफर   tilly  ,  और  repeat guest stars include Phyllis  diller  , Charles Durning , Rush Limbaugh  ,  and Phil LaMarr  .
Many cast members provide voices for  अनेक   वर्ण  .
The  आवाज़  actors , in portraying  the  various character personalities on  the  show ,  चित्रण  inspiration from celebrities and  पॉप   संस्कृति   .
Family Guy characters have been played by  अधिक  than one actor , after  सदस्यों  of the  दिखाएँ  left  the  series or had  conflicting   दायित्वों  .
Kunis was nominated for  an  Annie  पुरस्कार  for voicing  मेग  Griffin in the season 5 episode `` Barely Legal `` and MacFarlane  रै  also won an Emmy  पुरस्कार  for Outstanding  voice-over  Performance and an Annie  पुरस्कार  for Best  आवाज़  Acting in  an   एनिमेटेड  Television  उत्पादन  ,  हालांकि   no  other cast  सदस्य   रै  won an award  लिये  their work on  the   श्रेणी  .

`` The Princess and the Pea  ''  (  ;  literal translation : `` The  राजकुमारी  on  the   मटर  '' )  is  a literary fairy tale by  hans  Christian  andersen  about a young woman whose  royal  identity is  स्थापित  by  a   परीक्षण   of  her physical sensitivity  .
The tale was  पहला  published with three  अन्य  by  andersen  in  an   inexpensive  booklet on 8 May 1835  in  Copenhagen by C.A  .  Reitzel  .
Andersen had  सुना  the story as a  चाइल्ड  , and  it  likely has its source in folk  सामग्री  ,  संभवतः  originating  इससे  Sweden as it is unknown  in  the Danish oral tradition .
Neither `` The Princess  और  the Pea '' nor  andersen   's  other tales  of   1835  were well  प्राप्त  by Danish critics  ,  who  disliked  their casual , chatty  स्टाइल  ,  और  their lack  of  morals  .
in  1959  ``   the  Princess and the  मटर  '' was adapted to the musical stage  in   a   उत्पादन  called Once Upon a Mattress starring  कैरोल  Burnett .
जर्मनी   अमेरिकी  (  )  are citizens of  the  United States  जो   यहूद  either born in Germany or are of German  ancestry   .
They comprise  परिचय  50  लाख  people ,  बनाना   उन्हें  the  largest  ancestry  समूह  ahead of Irish Americans ,  अफ़्रीकी   अमेरिकी  and English Americans  .
वे  comprise about 1/3 of the German diaspora all over  the   संसार   .
None of  the  German  राज्य  had New  संसार  colonies  .
नहीं  until the  1670s   किया   the  first significant  समूह  of German immigrants arrive in  the  British colonies , settling  primarily  in New York and  पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
Immigration continued  in  very large  संख्याएँ  during the  19th   सदी   ,   साथ   कुछ  eight million arrivals from Germany .
वे   यहूद  pulled by  the  attractions  of  land and religious freedom  ,   और  pushed  आउट  of  यूरोपीय  by  shortages   of  land  और   धार्मिक  or  राजनैतिक   दमन  .
अनेक  arrived seeking religious or political  स्वतंत्रता  , others for economic opportunities greater than those in Europe , and  अन्य  simply  लिये  the chance  to  start  भैस   in   the  New  संसार   .
the   आमद  before 1850 were  ज़्यादातर  farmers who  sought   आउट  the most productive land , where  उनके   intensive   खेती  techniques would  अदा   बंद  .
After  1840   ,  many  आए   to   शहरों  , where  ``  Germania '' —German-speaking districts—soon  उभरा  .
German Americans  स्थापित  the first  kindergartens  in the  संयुक्त  States  ,  introduced the  क्रिसमस   पेड़  tradition  ,  and originated popular  अमरीकी  foods such  as  hot dogs and  hamburgers  .
German American celebrations are held throughout the country ,  एक  of the most  well-known  being the German-American Steuben  परेड  in  नई   यॉर्क  City  ,  held every third Saturday  in  September  .
There are  भी   प्रमुख  annual  कार्यक्रम  in Chicago ,  सिनसिनाटी  , Milwaukee  ,  Pittsburgh , St. Louis  और  other  शहरों   .
Like  अनेक  other immigrants that came to the United States , an overwhelming number of people of  जर्मनी  or partial German descent  have  essentially become  americanized   .
The  प्रस्तावना  to the  संयुक्त  States Constitution is a brief  परिचयात्मक   बयान  of  the  Constitution  's  fundamental purposes and guiding principles .
it   राज्य  in general  शर्तें  , and courts  have  referred to  it   as  reliable evidence of , the Founding Fathers  '  intentions  regarding  the Constitution 's  अर्थ  and  कया  they hoped  the  Constitution would  achieve  as it pertains to all of the  लोगों   of  the United  राज्य   .
As the phrase , ``  we   the  people '' suggests that  the   नई  government  originates  from the people of the  संयुक्त  States and it sets  into  motion a question  as  it pertains to that vast population concerning the  व्यक्तिगत  rights and equality among all people ;  इस  can be  देखी  most  broadly  in  the   divide  between  republicanism  and social  लोकतंत्र  .
The history of the  अंतरजाल  began with the  विकास   of   इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  computers in  the  1950s .
The public was  पहला  introduced to  the  concepts that would lead to  the  Internet  जब  a message was sent  over   the  ARPANet from computer science Professor Leonard Kleinrock 's laboratory at University  of   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , Los  एंजिल्स   (   ucla  ) ,  बाद  the second piece of network equipment  थी   संस्थापित  at  स्टैनफोर्ड  Research Institute (  श्री  ) .
पैकेट   switched  networks  ऐसे  as ARPANET  ,   चिह्नित  I at  npl  in the UK  ,   cyclades  , Merit Network , Tymnet , and Telenet ,  यहूद   विकसित  in the late  1960s  and early  1970s   using   a  variety  of   प्रोटोकॉल  .
The ARPANET  in  particular led to  the  development of  प्रोटोकॉल  for internetworking , in which  अनेक  separate  संजाल  could be joined  साथ   into   a  network of networks .
In 1982 , the  अंतरजाल  protocol suite ( TCP/IP ) was standardized , and consequently  ,  the  अवधारणा   of  a world-wide network of interconnected  tcp/ip   संजाल   ,  called  the  Internet  ,   थी  introduced .
Access  to   the  ARPANET  थी  expanded in 1981 when  the  National Science Foundation ( NSF  )  developed the Computer  विज्ञान  Network ( CSNET )  और  again in 1986 when NSFNET  provided  access  to  supercomputer sites in the United States from research and education  संगठन   .
Commercial Internet service providers ( ISPs ) began to emerge in  the   लेट  1980s  और   जल्दी  1990s .
The  arpanet  was decommissioned in 1990  .
The Internet was commercialized  in  1995  जब  NSFNET was decommissioned  ,  removing  the  last  प्रतिबंध  on the  उपयोग   of   the  Internet to carry  वाणिज्यिक  traffic  .
Since the mid-1990s , the Internet has  था  a  क्रांतिकारी   प्रभाव  on  संस्कृति  and commerce , including  the   वृद्धि  of near-instant communication by electronic mail , instant  messaging  , Voice over Internet Protocol ( VoIP ) `` phone calls '' , two-way  इंटरैक्टिव   वीडियो   काल्स  ,  और   the   संसार  Wide Web  साथ  its discussion forums ,  ब्लॉग   ,   सोशल   नेटवर्किंग  ,  और  online  खरीदारी  sites .
The research and  शिक्षा   जातियाँ  continues to develop and use advanced  संजाल   ऐसे   as  NSF  's  very  ऊँची  speed Backbone Network  सेवा  ( vBNS ) , Internet2 , and National LambdaRail  .
Increasing amounts  of  data are transmitted  at  higher and  उच्चतर  speeds over  रेशा  optic networks  ऑपरेटिंग   at   1-gbit/s   ,  10-Gbit/s , or more .
The Internet 's takeover over the global communication landscape was almost instant in historical  शर्तें  : it only  communicated  1 % of the information  बहती   through  two-way telecommunications networks in the  साल  1993 , already  51   %  by 2000  ,   और  more  than  97 % of  the  telecommunicated  सूचना  by 2007 .
Today the  अंतरजाल  continues  to   grow  , driven by ever greater amounts of online information  ,   कॉमर्स  , entertainment , and social networking  .
Southwest  एयरलाइंस  Co. ( ) is  a  major U.S. airline  और   the  world 's  largest  low-cost  वाहक  ,  headquartered  in Dallas  ,   टेक्सास  .
It was established  in  1967 and  अपनाया  its  वर्तमान  name in  1971   .
The airline  रै  more than 46,000 employees and operates more than 3,400 flights per day .
As of June 5 , 2011  ,  it  carries  the most  घरेलू  passengers of any U.S. airline .
as  of April 2013  ,  Southwest Airlines has scheduled service to 84  गंतव्यों  in 41 states and  प्यूर्टो  Rico  .
Southwest Airlines has solely operated Boeing  737s   ,  except for a few years  in  the 1970s and  1980s   ,   जब  it  संचालित  Boeing 727s  .
As  of  August 2012 , Southwest  is   the  largest operator  of  the 737 worldwide with  over   550  in service , each  ऑपरेटिंग  an  औसत  of six flights per day .
In  may  2011 , the airline acquired  airtran   एयरवेज़   ,  with integration of the carriers  अपेक्षित   to  be  पूरा   by  2014 .
on   कूच  1  ,  2012 , the company was  जारी  a single operating certificate , technically becoming one airline .
Rolling  चट्टान  is  a  4.6 %  abv  pale lager launched  in  1939  by  the Latrobe Brewing Company  .
Although founded  as  a local beer in Western  पेन्सिलवेनिया  , it was marketed aggressively and eventually became a national product .
The  ब्रांड  was sold to Anheuser-Busch of St. Louis ,  मिसौरी  ,  in  mid 2006  ,  which transferred  brewing  operations  to   नई  Jersey .
बेनेडिक्ट  XVI  (  , , ; born Joseph  aloisius  Ratzinger on 16 April 1927 )  is  Pope emeritus of the  कैथोलिक  Church .
he  served as  पोप  from  2005  to 2013 .
In  कि  position , he  थी   दोनो  the leader of the  कैथोलिक  Church and Sovereign of  the  Vatican City State .
Benedict  थी  elected on 19 April 2005 in a  papal   conclave   ,  celebrated his Papal  उद्घाटन  Mass on  24  April 2005 , and took possession of  उसके  cathedral , the Archbasilica of  st.  John  lateran  , on  7  May 2005 .
Ordained  as   a  priest in  1951   in  his  देशी   बायर्न  , Ratzinger established  खुद  as a highly regarded university  theologian  by the late 1950s  और  was appointed a full  प्राध्यापक  in 1958 .
After  a   long  career  as   an   अकादमिक  , serving  as  a professor of theology at  अनेक  German  universities—the  last being the University of  regensburg  , where he served as Vice  अध्यक्ष  of  the   विश्वविद्यालयों  in  1976   और  1977—he  थी   नियुक्त  Archbishop of Munich and Freising  और  cardinal by Pope Paul VI in 1977 ,  an  unusual  प्रमोशन  for someone with little pastoral experience .
In 1981  ,  he settled  in   रोम  when he became Prefect of  the  Congregation for the Doctrine of the Faith  ,   एक  of  the  most important  dicasteries  of  the  Roman Curia .
From 2002  जबतक  his election as pope ,  he  was also Dean  of  the College  of  Cardinals , and  as  such ,  the   प्राइमस  inter pares  among  the  कार्डिनल्स  .
Prior to becoming  पोप   ,  he was  ``  a major figure on  the  Vatican  स्टेज   लिये  a quarter of a  सदी  '' as `` one of  the  most respected  ,   influential  and controversial  सदस्यों  of the  कॉलेज  of  कार्डिनल्स   ''   ;  he had an influence  ``  second  to   none   जब   it   आए  to setting church  प्राथमिकताएं  and directions  ''  as  एक   of  Pope John Paul II  's  closest confidants .
He was originally a  उदार  theologian  ,  but adopted  रूढ़िवादी  views after  1968  .
His  सफल   कृतियाँ   बचाव   परंपरागत  Catholic  doctrine   और  values .
During his papacy ,  बेनेडिक्ट  XVI advocated a return to fundamental  ईसाई   मान  to counter the increased secularisation of many Western countries .
He  दृश्य  relativism 's denial of objective truth , and the  denial  of  moral  truths  in   particular  ,  as   the   सेंट्रल  problem  of  the  21st   सदी  .
He taught  the   महत्व   of  both the Catholic Church  और  an understanding of  परमेश्वर  's redemptive love .
पोप  Benedict also revived  a  number of traditions including elevating the  tridentine   द्रव्यमान  to  a   अधिक   prominent   स्थिति  .
He renewed the relationship between the Catholic Church  और  art ,  देखने  the use of beauty as a path to the sacred  ,   प्रचारित  the use of  लैटिन  , and reintroduced  परंपरागत  papal garments , for  जिससे  reason he was called ``  the  pope of aesthetics '' .
He has been described  as   ``  the main intellectual force  in   the   गिरिजाघर  ''  चूंकि   the  mid-1980s  .
Several  of   पोप   बेनेडिक्ट  's  विद्यार्थी  from  उसके   अकादमिक  career  हैं  also  prominent   churchmen  today and confidantes of  उसे  ,  notably  Christoph Schönborn .
On 11  फ़रवरी  2013 , Pope  बेनेडिक्ट  announced his  इस्तीफा   in  a speech in Latin before  the   कार्डिनल्स  , citing a `` lack  of  strength of  दिमाग  and body '' due to his  उन्नत  age .
His  इस्तीफा   became  effective on 28  फ़रवरी  2013 .
He is  the  first  पोप   to  resign since Pope  ग्रेगरी  XII in 1415 , and the  पहला  to do  so  on his  अपना  initiative  चूंकि  Pope  celestine   v   in  1294 .
As pope  emeritus  , Benedict retains the style  of  His  पवित्रता  , and the  शीर्षक  of  पोप  , and will continue  to   पोशाक  in the papal colour of white  .
He  थी  succeeded by Pope  फ्रांसिस  on 13 March 2013 , and he moved  into  the newly renovated Mater  ecclesiae  monastery for his retirement on 2 May  2013..
जेब  stereoscope  साथ   असली  test  चित्र   .
Used by military to  जाँचें   stereoscopic  pairs of aerial  छायाचित्र   .
View of Boston , c. 1860 ;  an  early stereoscopic  कार्ड   लिये  viewing a  झाँकी  from nature
Kaiser-Panorama  consisted   of   a  multi-station  देखने   apparatus  and  सेट  of  स्टीरियो  slides .
Patented  by   A.  Fuhrmann around  1890  .
Company  of  ladies  watching  stereoscopic photographs , painting by  याक़ूब   spoel  , before 1868 .
a   बहुत  early depiction of people using  a  stereoscope  .
Stereoscopy (  भी   पुकारा  stereoscopics or  3d   इमेजिंग  ) is  a   तकनीक  for creating or  बढ़ाना  the  भ्रम  of depth in an image by means  of   stereopsis  for binocular vision .
The word stereoscopy derives from the  यूनानी   ``  στερεός ''  (  stereos  )   ,   ``  firm ,  ठोस  '' +  ``  σκοπέω '' ( skopeō  )  , ``  to   dekh  '' ,  ``  to see  ''  .
Most stereoscopic  विधि  present two offset  बिंब  separately  to  the  बाएँ  and right  नजर  of  the  viewer .
ये  two-dimensional images are then combined in the brain to give the perception  of  3D depth .
This technique is  विशिष्ट  from 3D  प्रदर्शक  that display an image in three full  आयाम  , allowing  the  observer  to   बढ़ाएँ  information about the  3-dimensional  objects being displayed by head  और   नजर  movements .
John Adams  (   अक्तूबर  30 , 1735 ( O.S  .   अक्तूबर  19 , 1735  )  – July 4 ,  1826  ) was  the   दूसरी  president of the  संयुक्त   राज्य   (  1797–1801 ) ,  having  earlier served as the first vice president of  the   संयुक्त  States  .
An American Founding Father ,  he  was  a  statesman ,  राजनयिक  , and a leading advocate of American independence from Great Britain .
खूब  educated  ,  he was an Enlightenment political theorist  जो   प्रचारित  republicanism and wrote prolifically  परिचय   उसके   प्रायः   seminal   विचार  ,  दोनो  in  प्रकाशित  works and in letters to his  बीवी  and  कुंजी   adviser  Abigail as well as to  अन्य  Founding  fathers   .
Adams came to  prominence   in  the  जल्दी  stages  of   the  American Revolution .
A lawyer  और   पब्लिक  figure in Boston , as a delegate  इससे  Massachusetts to the Continental Congress , he played  a  leading role in persuading Congress to declare independence .
He assisted  थामस   जेफरसन  in  drafting   the  Declaration  of  Independence  in   1776   ,   और  was its primary  एडवोकेट   in  the  कॉंग्रेस   .
Later , as a diplomat in Europe  ,  he helped negotiate  the  eventual peace treaty  साथ  Great Britain  ,  and was responsible for obtaining vital governmental  लोन  from Amsterdam bankers .
A political theorist and historian , Adams largely wrote the Massachusetts Constitution in  1780   ,   जिससे   साथ  with his earlier Thoughts on  सरकारी  , influenced  अमरीकी   राजनैतिक  thought .
One  of  his greatest roles was as  a   न्यायधीश  of  अक्षर  : in 1775 , he nominated  जार्ज  Washington to be commander-in-chief , and 25 years later  मनोनीत   जॉन  Marshall  to  be  मुख्य  Justice of  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  .
Adams  '  revolutionary credentials secured  उसे  two terms  as  George Washington  's   वाइस  president and his own election in  1796  as  the  second president  .
During his one term ,  he   encountered   ferocious   हमले  by  the  Jeffersonian Republicans , as well  as  the dominant faction  in   उसके   अपना   federalist   पार्टी  led by his bitter enemy Alexander Hamilton  .
एडम्स   हस्ताक्षरित   the  controversial Alien and Sedition Acts , and  निर्मित  up  the  army  और   नेवी  especially  in  the  फेस  of  an  undeclared naval war ( called the ``  quasi-war  `` )  साथ  France ,  1798–1800   .
The major accomplishment of his presidency was  उसके  peaceful resolution of the  विरोध  in the face of Hamilton 's opposition .
In 1800 , Adams was  पराजित  for  re-election   by   थामस   जेफरसन   और   रिटायर्ड   to   मैसाचुसेट्स  .
He later resumed his  दोस्ती  with Jefferson .
he  and  उसके  wife  ,  Abigail Adams  ,  founded an accomplished family  लकीर  of  राजनेता  , diplomats  ,  and  इतिहासकारों  now  referred  to as the  एडम्स  political family .
Adams was the father  of  John Quincy Adams , the sixth  अध्यक्ष  of  the   संयुक्त  States .
His  उपलब्धियाँ  have received greater recognition in  आधुनिक  times , though  उसके   योगदान  were not initially as celebrated  as  those of  अन्य   संस्थापकों  .
एडम्स   थी  the  पहला   u.S.   अध्यक्ष  to reside in  the  building that  आखिरकार   became  known as the White House .
The  संयुक्त  States ten-dollar  विधेयक  ( $ 10 )  is  a  denomination  of United States  करेंसी   .
The first U.S. Secretary of the Treasury  (   1789–95  )  ,  Alexander  हैमिल्टन   ,  is currently featured on the  obverse  of the  विधेयक  , while  the  U.S.  राजकोष  Building  is  featured  on   the  reverse .
( Hamilton is one of two  non-presidents   प्रदर्शित  on currently issued U.S. bills .
The other is Benjamin Franklin , on the $  100  bill .
Hamilton is  एक   of  only  चार   लोगों  featured  on  U.S.  पेपर  currency  (   1861  to the  उपस्थित  ) who was not born  in  the continental United States  ,  as  he  was from the West Indies .
The others are  :   अल्बर्ट   gallatin  , Switzerland  (  $  500  1862/63 Legal Tender )  ;  George Meade , Spain ( $  1,000  1890/91 Treasury Note ) ; and Robert  मॉरिस   ,  England (  $  1,000  1862/63   विधिक  Tender ; $ 10 1878/80 Silver Certificate  )   .
In  जोड  ,  kamehameha   i  , appears on the  2008  Hawaii  राज्य  quarter  .  )
सब  $ 10  बिल्स  issued today are Federal  आरक्षित   टीप  .
The  ब्यूरो  of  नक्काशी  and Printing says the average life of a $  10   विधेयक  in circulation  is  18 months  पहले  it  is  replaced due to wear .
Approximately 6 %  of  all US banknotes printed in 2009  यहूद  $ 10 bills .
Ten dollar bills are delivered by  संघीय  Reserve Banks in  पीला  straps .
The source  of  the face  on  the $  10   विधेयक  is John Trumbull ’s 1805 portrait of Hamilton that belongs to the portrait  संग्रहण  of  नई  York City Hall  .
The $ 10  विधेयक  is  the  only U.S. paper  करेंसी  in circulation in  जिससे   the  portrait faces to the left  (  the $  100,000  bill featured  a  portrait of Woodrow Wilson facing to the  बाएँ   ,  but was  प्रयुक्त  only for intra-government transactions ) .
A rider on  a   यामाहा  Waverunner  xl  performing a high-speed turn .
A jetboat is a boat  propelled  by  a  jet of water ejected from the back of the craft .
Unlike  a  powerboat or motorboat  कि  uses a  propeller  in the  जल   नीचे  or behind the boat , a  jetboat   draws  the water from under the  नाव   into  a  पंप  inside the boat , then expels it through a nozzle at  the  stern  .
Jetboats were originally  designed   by   सर  William Hamilton ( who  विकसित  a  waterjet  in 1954 ) for  आपरेशन   in  the fast-flowing  और  shallow rivers of  नई  Zealand  ,  specifically to overcome the problem  of  propellers striking rocks in  ऐसे  waters .
Previous attempts  at   waterjet  propulsion had very short lifetimes  ,  generally due to  the  inefficient  डिज़ाइन  of  the   इकाई   और   the  fact that they  offered  few advantages over conventional  propellers   .
Unlike these  पिछला  waterjet developments ,  ऐसे   as   campini  's  और  the Hanley  hydrojet  , Hamilton had a specific  need  for a  नोदन   प्रणाली   to  operate in very-shallow water ,  और  the waterjet proved to be the ideal solution .
From this ,  the   लोकप्रियता  of the jet  ईकाई  and  jetboat   increased  rapidly .
Through further developments , it  थी  found  the   waterjet  offered several  अन्य   लाभ   over  propellers  लिये  a wide  दायरा  of  पोत   प्रकार   ,   और  as such ,  waterjets  are used  widely  today for many high-speed vessels ,  सहित  passenger ferries ,  बचाव  craft  ,  patrol boats and  offshore  supply vessels  .
jetboats  are  अत्यधिक   maneuverable  ,  और  many  can  , from full speed  ,  be reversed  और  brought to a stop within  छोटी  more than their own length , in a  maneuver   ज्ञात   as   a  `` crash stop  ''  .
the  well known Hamilton turn or `` jet spin '' is a  high-speed   maneuvre  where the boat 's  इंजन  throttle is cut  ,  the  परिचालन  is turned sharply  और  the throttle opened again , causing the boat to spin quickly around with a large  स्प्रे   of  water  .
There  is  no engineering limit to the size of jetboats , though  the  validity of their use depends a lot  on  the type of application  .
Classic prop-drives are generally more efficient and economical at low speeds , up to about  ,  but as boat speed increases beyond  इस   ,  the extra hull resistance generated by struts ,  rudders  , shafts  (  etc .  )  means waterjets are more efficient in  the  20-50 knot  दायरा  ( up to  )   .
भी   ,  in situations  साथ  very large propellers turning at slow  speeds  (  ऐसे  as tug  नौकाएँ  ) , the equivalent size waterjet  होता  be too  बिग  to  be   व्यावहारिक  .
For these reasons ,  the  vast  बहुमत  of  waterjet  units are  संस्थापित  in high-speed  बरतन  and  in  particular situations where shallow draught  ,  maneuverability , and  लोड   लचीलापन  are main concerns  .
The  biggest  jet-driven vessels  हैं   मिला  in  सैन्य  use or the high-speed passenger/car ferry industry .
South  अफ़्रीकी  's  s  (  लगभग  long  )  are the biggest jet-propelled vessels  so   दूर  .
भी  these  german-built  vessels are  सक्षम   of  performing `` crash stops  ''  .
uveitis  is broadly defined as  सूजन   of  the uvea .
The uvea consists of the middle , pigmented  ,  vascular structures of the eye and includes the iris  ,   ciliary  body ,  और  choroid  .
Uveitis requires an urgent referral  और  thorough examination by an  ophthalmologist  or optometrist along with urgent  उपचार  to control  the   सूजन   .

the   जगमगाता  is  a  1980 psychological  हॉरर  film  उत्पादित   और   निर्देशित   by   स्टेनली  Kubrick , co-written with novelist Diane  जॉनसन   ,  and  अभिनीत  Jack Nicholson ,  शेली  Duvall , Scatman Crothers , and Danny Lloyd .
The film is based on the Stephen King novel The  जगमगाता  .
A  लेखक  ,  जोकर  Torrance ,  takes   a  job as an off-season caretaker  at  an isolated hotel .
His  यंग  son possesses psychic abilities and is able to see  बाते   इससे   the  past  और   भविष्य  ,  ऐसे  as the ghosts who inhabit  the  hotel .
Soon after  settling  in ,  the   परिवार  is trapped in the  होटल  by a  snowstorm  ,  और   जोकर  gradually becomes influenced  by   a   अलौकिक  presence  ;  he  उतरता  into  दीवानगी  and attempts  to  murder  उसके   बीवी  and son .
Unlike previous Kubrick films , which developed an audience gradually by  भवन  on word-of-mouth , The Shining was released as  a  mass-market film , opening at first in just  दो   शहरों  on Memorial  दिन  ,  तब  nationwide a month later .
Although initial  जवाब  to the  फिल्मी   थी  mixed ,  बाद  critical  मूल्यांकन  was more favorable  और   it  is now viewed as  a  classic of  the  horror genre .
Film director Martin  स्कोर्सेसे  , writing in The  रोज़   जानवर  , ranked it as one of the  11  scariest horror  फिल्मों   of  all time  .
Film critics  ,  film students , and Kubrick 's producer ,  जन   harlan  , have remarked  on  the enormous influence the film has had  on   लोकप्रिय  culture  .
The initial European release of The Shining was 25 minutes shorter  than  the American version  ,  achieved by removing most of  the   दृश्यों  taking  प्लेस  outside the  environs  of the hotel .
आँगन  Cola Bottle
Patio  आहार   कोला  was a brand  of  diet  सोडा  introduced by  पेप्सी  in 1963  .
It  थी   निर्मित   in   जवाब  to Diet  रीति  Cola , which was the first diet cola on the market .
Fitness promoter Debbie Drake was  आँगन   आहार  Cola 's  प्रवक्ता  .
In 1964 , Patio released orange , grape , and  रूट  beer  जायका  .
इस  flavor line  थी  not  meant  to  compete   साथ   ब्रांड्स  like Orange Crush ,  लकिन  rather fill  आउट  the  लकीर  .
आँगन  sodas were  उपलब्धियाँ   in   the  cold-bottle market : grocery and  mom-and-pop  stores .
Advertising for Patio was comparatively scarce ; at the time , bottlers were regionally franchised ,  और  related advertising was  necessarily   लोकल  .
In 1964 , Patio diet cola became Diet  पेप्सी  .
The newly branded diet  सोडा  was advertised alongside Pepsi  साथ  the tagline `` Pepsi either way  ''  , which replaced the slogan `` Dances  साथ  flavor '' .
The  छोटी  life span  of  Patio  आहार   कोला   makes   it   a  great addition for bottle collectors .
सबसे  of the  बाकी   आँगन  line of  जायका  were phased  आउट  by the early 1970s , while  a   few  survived until the mid 70s
Infrastructure  is   मौलिक  physical and  organizational  structures  needed  for  the  operation of  a  society  or  enterprise , or the services  और  facilities  जरुरी  for an  अर्थव्यवस्था  to  फलन   .
it   can  be  generally   पारिभाषित  as the  नियत  of  interconnected  structural elements that provide framework  supporting   an  entire structure of development  .
It is an important term for  judging  a  देश  or region 's development .
The term typically refers to  the  technical structures that support a  समाज  , such as roads , bridges ,  जल  supply , sewers  ,  electrical grids  ,  telecommunications  ,   और  so forth , and can  be  defined  as   ``  the  शारीरिक   components  of  interrelated  systems providing  commodities  and services essential  to  enable , sustain , or enhance societal  जीना  conditions . ''
Viewed functionally , infrastructure facilitates  the   उत्पादन   of  goods and  सेवाएं  , and also the distribution of finished  उत्पाद   to  markets  ,  as  खूब   as  basic social services such as schools and hospitals ;  लिये  example ,  सड़कें   enable  the transport  of  raw materials  to  a factory .
In military parlance , the term  refers   to  the  इमारतें   और  permanent installations  जरुरी  for the support , redeployment , and operation of military forces .
To make it simple , infrastructure  is  anything that is needed everyday , an everyday  मद  .
A graphical representation  of  the ideal  इंसान  karyotype
mitochondrial  DNA  .
Human  जेनेटिक   विभिन्नता  is the genetic  मतभेद   दोनो  within and among populations .
There may be multiple  विसंगतियाँ   of  any given  जीन   in   the  human  जनसांख्यिकी  (  जीनों   )   ,  leading  to   बहुरूपता  .
अनेक  genes are  नहीं   बहुरूपी   ,  meaning  कि  only  a  single allele is present in the population : the gene  is   तब  said  to  be fixed .
No  दो  humans  हैं  genetically identical .
Even monozygotic twins  ,  who develop from one  zygote  , have infrequent genetic differences due  to  mutations occurring during  विकास  and  जीन   नक़ल  number variation  .
Differences  between  individuals  ,   भी  closely  सम्बन्धित  individuals ,  हैं   the  key to techniques such  as  genetic  फिंगरप्रिंटिंग  .
Alleles  occur  at different frequencies  in  different  इंसान  populations ,  साथ  populations  कि  are more geographically and ancestrally  रिमोट  tending to differ more .
Causes of  मतभेद   between  individuals  शामिल  the exchange  of  genes during  meiosis  and  विभिन्न  mutational events .
वहीँ  are at least two reasons  क्यों  genetic variation  exists  between  populations  .
Natural selection may confer  an  adaptive advantage  to   individuals  in  a   विशिष्ट  environment if an  allele  provides  a  competitive advantage .
alleles  under selection are likely to  occur   तभी  in those geographic regions  जहाँ   वे   confer  an  लाभ  .
the  second main cause of genetic variation is due to  the   ऊँची  degree of  neutrality   of  most mutations .
Most  mutations  do not appear to  have  any  चयनात्मक  effect one  रास्ता  or  the  other  on   the  organism  .
The  प्रमुख  cause  is  genetic  बहाव  , this is the effect  of  random  परिवर्तन  in the gene pool  .
In humans , founder  प्रभाव  and past small  जनसांख्यिकी  size  (  increasing  the  likelihood of  जेनेटिक   बहाव  )  may   have  had  an   महत्वपूर्ण  influence in  न्यूट्रल  differences between populations  .
the  theory that humans recently migrated out  of  Africa supports  इस  .
The  पढ़ाई  of human  जेनेटिक   विभिन्नता   रै   दोनो  evolutionary significance and  चिकित्सा  applications .
It  can  help scientists  समझे   प्राचीन   इंसान  population migrations as  खूब  as how  अलग  human groups are biologically related to  एक  another  .
लिये  medicine ,  पढ़ाई  of  इंसान  genetic variation  may   be  important because some disease-causing alleles occur more  प्रायः  in people from specific  भौगोलिक  regions  .
New  निष्कर्षों   दिखाएँ  that each human has  on  average 60 new mutations compared  to  their  अभिभावक   .
अलावा   इससे   mutations   ,  many genes that may  have  aided humans in ancient times  प्लेग   इंसानो   आज  .
For example  ,   it  is suspected  कि  genes  कि   allow  humans to more efficiently process food  हैं  those that make people susceptible to  मोटापा   और  diabetes today .
चाय   पार्टी  protesters on the West Lawn of  the   u.S.  Capitol and the  नेशनल   मॉल  at the Taxpayer  कूच  on Washington on September 12 , 2009 .
the   चाय   पार्टी  movement is  an   अमरीकी   राजनैतिक   गति  that advocates strict adherence  to   the  United States  संविधान   ,  reducing U.S. government spending  और  taxes , and reduction of  the  U.S. national debt and  संघीय  budget deficit .
The movement has been  पुकारा  partly conservative  ,  partly  libertarian   ,  and partly populist .
The  गति  has sponsored protests and supported political candidates since 2009  .
the  name of the movement is derived  इससे  the Boston Tea Party  of  1773 ,  an  iconic event in American history  .
Anti-tax protesters in  the  United States have often referred to the original  बोस्टन   चाय   पार्टी  for  प्रेरणा  .
References to the Boston Tea Party were part of  कर  Day protests held throughout the 1990s and  पहले  .
By  2001  , a custom  था   विकसित  among some  रूढ़िवादी   कार्यकर्ताओं  of mailing tea bags to legislators and other officials as  a  symbolic  अधिनियम  .
the  currencies of Puerto Rico  closely  follow the  ऐतिहासिक   विकास   of  Puerto Rico .
As a  उपनिवेश   of  Spain and  the  United States  ,  Puerto  रीको  was granted the use  of  both foreign and provincial currencies .
following  the Spanish colonization in  1502  ,  प्यूर्टो  Rico became  an  important port , with  इसके  own supply of  सुनहरा  .
however   ,   as  the  खनिज   reserves  ran empty  भीतर  the century ,  the  archipelago 's  अर्थव्यवस्था   suffered  .
the  Spanish  क्राउन  issued the Situado Mexicano , which meant that  a  semi-regular shipment of  सुनहरा   इससे  the Viceroyalty of New Spain  होता   be  sent to the island  ,  as a way to provide economic  support  .
between   1636  and 1637 ,  फिलिप  IV of Spain imposed a tax which had to be paid using  a  revenue stamp .
Inspired  by   इस  , Puerto Rico began producing banknotes in 1766 ,  बनने  the first colony to print 8- real banknotes in the Spanish  साम्राज्य  and  जिससे   in  the Spanish government  's  approval of subsequent  मुद्दे  .
The  situado   थी  discontinued during the  19th   सदी  , creating an  आर्थिक  crisis ,  as  a result of Mexico  gaining  its  स्वतंत्रता   इससे   स्पेन  .
Salvador Meléndez  bruna  , the colonial  राज्यपाल  in office , ordered the issue of  प्रांतीय  banknotes ,  बनाना   the  Puerto Rican peso  .
However , printing of these banknotes  ceased  after 1815 .
दौरान  the following decades  ,   विदेशी  coins became  the  widespread currency  .
In the  1860s  and 1870s  ,   banknotes   reemerged  .
On February 1  ,  1890  ,  the  banco   español   de   प्यूर्टो  Rico  थी   उदघाटन  and began issuing banknotes .
The bank designed  चार  series and placed  तीन  in circulation under  स्पेनी  rule .
In 1895 ,  a  Royal  डिक्री   ordered  the  उत्पादन   of  provincial peso coins  .
On August  13  , 1898 , the Spanish-American War ended with Spain ceding Puerto Rico to the United States  .
the  Banco  español   de  Puerto  रीको  was  renamed  Bank  of  Porto  रीको  and  जारी   बिल्स  equivalent to  the  United States dollar , creating the Puerto  rican   डालर  .
In 1902 , the  पहला  National  बैंको  of Porto Rico  जारी  banknotes  in   a  parallel manner .
Two more series were  जारी  until 1913 .
After Puerto Rico 's  अर्थव्यवस्था  and monetary system was fully integrated into  the   संयुक्त  States  '   आर्थिक  and  मौद्रिक   प्रणाली  , the  प्यूर्टो   rican  dollars were redeemed for those issued by the  संयुक्त  States  राजकोष  .
the  peso  और   डालर  have been followed by other  समकालीन   मुद्दे  , including  commemorative  banknotes , private  करेंसी  , and a quarter coin designed with Fort San  फेलिप  del Morro in  the   फेस  .
Pepsi ( stylized in lowercase  as   पेप्सी   ,   formerly  stylized  in  uppercase  as  PEPSI ) is a carbonated  नरम  drink that is produced  और  manufactured  by  PepsiCo  .
Created  और   विकसित  in 1893 and introduced as  ब्रैड  's Drink  ,   it   थी  renamed as Pepsi-Cola on August 28 , 1898 , then to  पेप्सी  in 1961  .
The Book of Ezekiel is the  तीसरा  of the Latter Prophets in the Hebrew Bible , following the books  of  Isaiah and  यिर्मयाह   और  preceding the  किताब  of the Twelve .
(  The order is somewhat  अलग  in the  ईसाई   बूढ़ा  Testament  )  .
It derives its name from  ,  and records the visions of ,  the   6th   सदी   bc  priest  और   नबी  Ezekiel .
according  to the book , the prophet ,  exiled   in  Babylon , experienced  a   श्रेणी   of  seven visions  दौरान   the  22 years from 593 to  571  BC , a period which spans the final  विनाश  of Jerusalem in  586  .
The  visions   ,   और  the book ,  हैं  structured around three themes :  (   1  )  निर्णय  on Israel (  अध्याय  1-24 ) ; (  2  )  निर्णय  on  the  nations ( chapters 25-32 )  ;   और   भविष्य  blessings  लिये  Israel ( chapters 33-48  )  .
नई  Orleans ( or  ,  locally  or   ;  ) is a major United States port and the largest city and  महानगर  area in the  राज्य  of Louisiana  .
The population of the city was  343,829   as  of the  2010  U.S.  जनसांख्यिकी  .
The  नई  Orleans  महानगर  area ( New Orleans–Metairie–Kenner Metropolitan Statistical  क्षेत्रफल  )  था  a population  of  1,167,764 in 2010 and was the 46th  largest  in the United States .
The New  orleans–metairie–bogalusa  Combined Statistical Area  ,  a larger trading  क्षेत्रफल   ,  had  a  2010 population of  1,214,932  .
the  city is  नामित  after Orléans  ,  a city located on the Loire  नदी  in Centre  ,  France , and  is  well  ज्ञात  for its distinct French  क्रियोल   वास्तुकला   ,   as  well as its  cross-cultural  and multilingual heritage .
नई  Orleans is also famous for its  भोजन   ,   म्यूज़िक  ( particularly as the birthplace of jazz  )   ,   और  its  सालाना   जश्न  and  त्यौहार   ,   सबसे  notably Mardi  ग्रा  .
The city  is  often referred to as the `` most unique  ''  in  अमेरिका  .
New Orleans is located in  southeastern  Louisiana , straddling the  मिसिसिपी  River .
The  नगर   और   ऑरलियन्स  Parish ( ) are .
the  city and  मोहल्ला  are  bounded  by  the  parishes of  st.   tammany   to   the  north  ,  St. Bernard to the east , Plaquemines to  the  south  और  Jefferson to the  दक्षिण  and west  .
Lake Pontchartrain  ,  part of  जिससे  is  शामिल  in the city limits ,  झूठ  to  the   उत्तर   और  Lake Borgne  झूठ  to  the  east .
The National Birth Control League was a birth control organization in  the  United States .
it  was founded in March 1915  by   मरियम  Dennett ,  क्लारा   gruening  Stillman and Jessie  एशले   .
इसके  main  purpose  was to  overturn  the laws  जिससे  banned  contraceptives  from the U.S. mails .
Campaigns were mounted in New York , but  in  1919 the  लीग  was disbanded  और  reformed  into  the Voluntary  parenthood  League .
कर्कट  , known medically as a  malignant  neoplasm ,  is  a broad group  of   विभिन्न  diseases , all involving  unregulated  cell growth  .
In cancer  ,  cells  divide  and grow uncontrollably ,  forming   malignant  tumors , and invade nearby  भाग   of  the body .
The cancer may also  स्प्रेड  to more distant  भाग  of the body  through  the  lymphatic  system  or   bloodstream  .
Not all tumors are  cancerous   .
Benign tumors do not grow  uncontrollably   ,  do  नहीं   invade   neighboring   ऊतकों   ,  and do  नहीं  spread throughout the body .
There are over 200 different known cancers that  पहुँचकर   इंसानो  .
Determining  कया  causes  कर्कट   is   जटिल   .
अनेक   बाते  are known to increase the  रिस्क  of  कर्कट   ,   सहित   तम्बाकू  use , certain infections , radiation  ,  lack  of  physical activity , obesity  ,  and environmental  प्रदूषक  .
These can  सीधे   क्षति  genes or combine  साथ  existing  जेनेटिक   त्रुटियां   भीतर  cells to  कारण  the disease .
Approximately  पाँच   to  ten  प्रतिशत  of  cancers   हैं  entirely hereditary  .
Cancer  can   be  detected in  a  number of ways , including the  उपस्थिति   of  certain signs and symptoms , screening tests ,  or  medical imaging .
एकबार   a  possible cancer is detected it is diagnosed by  microscopic  examination of a tissue sample .
Cancer  is  usually  treated  with chemotherapy ,  विकिरण  therapy and surgery .
The chances of  surviving  the disease vary  greatly   by   the  type and location of the  कर्कट  and  the  extent of disease at  the  start  of  treatment  .
While cancer can  affect  people of all ages , and a few types of  कर्कट  are  अधिक  common in  children   ,  the risk of developing  कर्कट   generally  increases with age .
in  2007  ,  cancer caused about  13  % of all  इंसान  deaths worldwide ( 7.9 million ) .
दरों  are rising as  अधिक  people live to  an  old age  और  as  द्रव्यमान  lifestyle changes occur  in  the developing world .

Skiing is  a  recreational activity and  प्रतिस्पर्धी   खेल  in which the  भागीदार  attaches  long   धावक   or  skis to boots  or  shoes on  the   फीट   और  uses them  to  travel on top  of   हिम  .
Aside from recreation and competition  ,  skiing has  महरूम  used  लिये  military purposes and  भी   यात्राएं  in  क्षेत्रों  that experience heavy  हिमपात  .
अनेक   प्रकार   of   प्रतिस्पर्धी  skiing events are  पहचाना  by  the  International  ओलम्पिक  Committee , and the International Ski Federation .
John Maynard  keynes   ,  1st  सामन्त   keynes  , CB , FBA ( ; 5 June 1883 – 21 April 1946 ) was a British  अर्थशास्त्री   जिनकी  ideas have fundamentally  प्रभावित  the  सिद्धान्त   और  practice of modern macroeconomics  ,  and  सूचित  the  आर्थिक   नीतियों   of  governments .
He  निर्मित   on   और   greatly  refined earlier work  on   the  causes of business cycles , and is  widely   माना   to  be one of the founders of  आधुनिक  macroeconomics  और  the most influential economist  of  the  20th   सदी   .
His ideas are  the  basis  लिये  the school of thought known  as  Keynesian economics , as  खूब  as  इसके  various offshoots  .
In many ways , subsequent developments in  20th  century economics can be  viewed  as either building on Keynes '  विचार  or reacting against  उन्हें  .
in  the  1930s  ,  keynes  spearheaded a  क्रान्ति  in  आर्थिक  thinking  ,   overturning  the  पुरानी  ideas  of   neoclassical  economics that held  कि  free markets  होता  , in  the  short  to  medium  पद  ,  automatically  provide full employment ,  as   long   as  workers were  लचीली  in their wage demands .
Keynes  बजाय   argued  that aggregate demand determined the  overall  level of  आर्थिक   कार्यकलाप  , and that inadequate  कुल  demand could  सीसे  to prolonged  अवधि  of  ऊँची   बेरोजगारी  .
he  advocated the use of  फिस्कल  and monetary measures to mitigate  the  adverse effects of economic  recessions  and depressions  .
following  the outbreak of the Second  संसार  War  ,  Keynes 's  विचार   concerning  economic policy were  अपनाया   by   अग्रणी   पश्चिमी  economies .
In 1942 , Keynes was  awarded  a hereditary peerage as Baron Keynes of Tilton  in  the  काउंटी  of Sussex .
Keynes  died  in 1946  ,  but during  the  1950s and  1960s   the  success of Keynesian economics  resulted   in   लगभग   सब  capitalist governments  adopting  its policy  सुझाव   .
Keynes  's  influence  waned  in the  1970s  ,  partly  as a  परिणाम   of  problems  कि  began  to  afflict the  anglo-american  economies  इससे   the  start of the  दशक  , and  partly   क्युकी   of  critiques  इससे   मिल्टन  Friedman and  अन्य  economists  जो  were pessimistic  परिचय  the ability of  सरकारें  to regulate the business  साईकिल  with fiscal  नीति   .
However , the  आगमन  of  the   वैश्विक  financial crisis in  2007  caused a  पुनरुत्थान  in Keynesian thought .
Keynesian  अर्थशास्त्र   provided  the theoretical underpinning for economic policies undertaken  in   जवाब  to the crisis by Presidents  जार्ज  W. Bush  और   बराक  Obama of  the  United States , Prime Minister Gordon Brown  of  the United Kingdom  ,   और  other heads  of  governments .
In 1999 , Time  पत्रिका  included Keynes in their list of the 100 most important  और   influential   लोगों  of the 20th century , commenting that :  ``  His radical idea that governments should  खर्च   धन  they do  n't  have may have saved capitalism . ''
in   जोड  to  होने  an  अर्थशास्त्री  , Keynes was also  a   सिविल  servant ,  a  director  of   the   अंग्रेजों  Eugenics Society  ,  a director  of  the Bank  of  England ,  a  patron  of  the arts and an art  कलेक्टर   ,  a part of the Bloomsbury  समूह   of   intellectuals  ,  an  advisor to several charitable trusts , a  लेखक  ,  a  philosopher , a  निजी  investor  ,  and a  किसान   .
इस  1768  parchment  (  612×502  mm )  by  Jekuthiel Sofer  emulated  the 1675 Ten  आयतें  at the  एम्सटर्डम  Esnoga  synagogue  .
the  Ten  आयतें  , also  ज्ञात   as   the  Decalogue  ,  are  a  set of  biblical   कानून   relating  to ethics and worship , which play a  आधारभूत  role in Judaism  ,  Islam and Christianity  .
They include  निर्देश  to worship only  परमेश्वर  ,  to  keep the sabbath holy and prohibitions against  idolatry  ,  इनकार  , murder ,  चोरी  , deception and adultery .
Different groups follow  थोड़ा  different traditions for  interpreting  and numbering them .
The Ten Commandments appear  twice  in  the  Hebrew Bible , in the books of  exodus  and Deuteronomy  .
According to the  स्टोरी  in  exodus   ,   परमेश्वर  inscribed  उन्हें   on  two stone tablets , which he gave to Moses  on  Mount Sinai  .
Modern scholarship has found likely influences in Hittite and  mesopotamian  laws and treaties  ,  but  is  divided  over  exactly  जब  the Ten Commandments were written and  जो  wrote  उन्हें  .
The discography of the English alternative  चट्टान  band The Smiths consists of four studio albums , one extended  खेल  ( EP ) , one  सजीव   एल्बम  ,  टेन   संकलन  albums  ,  twenty singles , one video  एल्बम  and  चौदह  music videos  on  the  अशिष्ट  Trade  ,  Sire  और   wea  record  लेबल्स  .
the  band was  formed  in 1982 in Manchester  by  vocalist Morrissey , guitarist  जॉनी  Marr ,  बास   खिलाड़ी   एंडी  Rourke and  वादक  Mike Joyce .
Despite being championed  by   बीबीसी   रेडियो  1 disc jockey John  छिलके   ,  the band 's debut  सिंगल  , `` Hand in Glove `` ( May 1983  )  , failed  to  chart  .
Its follow-up , `` This Charming Man  ``   (  October  1983  ) ,  मिले  with critical acclaim and reached number  twenty-five  on  the   uk  Singles Chart .
The Smiths '  cult  status  थी  followed by  मुख्यधारा  success in 1984 , as they reached number twelve in the UK with the `` What Difference Does  it  Make ?  ``  single and reached  क्रमांक  two on the  uk   एल्बम  Chart with their debut album , The  smiths  ( 1984  )  .
Their next three singles all  पहुँचे  the top twenty of the  चार्ट  in the UK , helping to consolidate their previous chart success .
The next studio album  ,  Meat Is Murder  (  1985 )  ,   पहुँचे   the   शीर्ष  of the British charts ; however , the only single to be released from the album ,  ``  That  चुटकुला  Is n't Funny  anymore  `` ( 1985 )  ,  failed to  ब्रेक   the  UK Top 40 .
Returning to form , The Smiths ' next  छह  singles  सब   पहुँचे  the higher than number thirty in the  uk  and their third album , The  महारानी  Is Dead (  1986  ) , reached  क्रमांक  two in the UK .
Despite the  बैंड  's  चार्ट   कामयाबी   ,  Marr left the group in August  1987   due  to a  strained  relationship  साथ  Morrissey  .
Failing to find a replacement  ,  The  smiths  disbanded by the  समय  their final  स्टुडियो  album  ,  Strangeways ,  यहाँ  We Come  ,   थी  released in  सितंबर  that year  .
Strangeways  ,   यहाँ  We Come  पहुँचे  number two  in  the UK and became the band 's highest-charting release in  the  United States when it reached number  fifty-five  on the Billboard 200  .
In early 1992  ,   wea  acquired the entire  वापस  catalogue of The  smiths  and produced two compilations  –  Best ... I and ... Best II  –  the  पहला   of   जिससे   पहुँचे   the  top  of  the UK Albums Chart .
wea  released two  further   singles  compilations in 1995 and 2001  ,  with  a  further compilation  ,  The  ध्वनि   of  The Smiths ,  released  in November 2008 .
Gone  साथ  the Wind is  a  novel written by  मार्गरेट   मिशेल  , first published in 1936  .
It is often placed  in  the  साहित्यिक  sub-genre of the  ऐतिहासिक   रोमांस  novel .
however  ,  it   रै  been  argued  the novel is a  ``  near  मिस  '' and does not contain all of the elements of  the  romance genre  ,  making  it  simply  a  historical  अनोखा  .
the  story is set  in   क्लेटन  County  ,  Georgia , and  अटलांटा  during the American Civil War  और  Reconstruction  .
It depicts the experiences  of   स्कारलेट  O'Hara  ,  the spoiled daughter  of   a  well-to-do plantation owner , who must use every means at  उसके   निपटान  to  आइये   आउट   of  the poverty  वो   पाता  herself in after Sherman 's ``  कूच  to the  समुद्र  '' .
Margaret  मिशेल  began writing Gone with  the  Wind  in   1926   to   pass  the time while  recovering  from  an   auto-crash   चोट  that refused to heal .
In April  1935  ,  हेरोल्ड  Latham of Macmillan , an editor who was looking for new fiction , read what  वो  had written  और   देखी  that  it  could be  a  best-seller .
After  लैथम   सहमत   to   प्रकाशित   the  book  ,  Mitchell  worked  for  another  six months checking  the   ऐतिहासिक  references  ,  and rewrote the opening chapter several times .
Mitchell and her husband John Marsh  ,  a copy  एडिटर   by  trade ,  संपादित  the  फाइनल  version of  the  novel .
Mitchell  लिखा  the  किताब  's final  पल   पहला  ,  और  then wrote the  कार्यक्रम  that led  up  to it .
As to what became of her lovers ,  रहेट  and Scarlett  ,  after  the  novel ended , Mitchell did not know ,  और   कहा  ,  ``  For all I know ,  रहेट   may  have found someone else who was less  मुश्किल  . ''
Mitchell received the Pulitzer Prize for Fiction  लिये  the book in  1937   .
The book was adapted into a  1939  American  फिल्मी  .
गए  with the Wind is  the  only novel by  मिशेल   प्रकाशित   दौरान  her lifetime .
Endodontics ( from  the  Greek  endo  `` inside '' ; and odons `` tooth ''  )   is  one of  the  dental  specialties  recognized by the American Dental Association , Royal  कॉलेज  of Dentists of  कनाडा  , and Royal Australasian College  of  Dental Surgeons , and deals with the tooth pulp and  the  tissues surrounding the  रूट  of a tooth  .
endodontists  perform a variety  of  procedures  सहित  endodontic therapy  (  commonly  ज्ञात   as  `` root canal  चिकित्सा  '' ) , endodontic retreatment , surgery  ,   treating  cracked teeth  ,  and treating  दंत  trauma  .
रूट   कनाल   चिकित्सा  is one of the most common procedures .
If the pulp  (  containing  nerves   ,  arterioles , venules , lymphatic  ऊतक  , and fibrous tissue  )  becomes diseased  or   घायल  ,  endodontic  treatment  is  required  to  save the tooth .
सीरियल   संलग्न  SCSI ( SAS ) is a  point-to-point  serial  प्रोटोकॉल   कि   चालें  data  to  and from computer storage devices such  as  hard drives and tape drives .
SAS replaces  the   पुरानी  Parallel SCSI  (  pronounced ``  scuzzy  '' ) bus technology that first  appeared  in  the  mid-1980s .
SAS , like its predecessor , uses the standard SCSI  कमांड  set .
SAS offers backward compatibility with second-generation SATA drives .
sata  3 Gbit/s drives may be connected  to   sas  backplanes , but SAS drives  can  not  कनेक्ट  to SATA  backplanes   .
The  t10  technical committee of  the  International Committee for Information  प्रौद्योगिकी   मानकों  ( INCITS )  develops   और  maintains  the   sas  protocol  ;   the  SCSI  व्यापार   संघ  (  scsita  ) promotes the  प्रौद्योगिकी  .
भाग  of  the  constitutional provision  as  it appeared in  1787
औकात   as  a  natural-born  citizen of  the   संयुक्त  States  is  one  of  the eligibility requirements established  in  the  संयुक्त  States Constitution for election  to   the   दफ्तर   of   अध्यक्ष  or Vice President .
इस  requirement was intended  to  protect the nation from foreign influence .
The Constitution does not define the phrase natural-born  नागरिक   ,  and various opinions have been offered  over  time regarding its  precise  meaning  .
A 2011 Congressional Research Service report  stated
The natural-born-citizen clause  रै  been  उल्लेखित   in  passing  in  several decisions  of  the United States Supreme Court and lower courts dealing with the question  of  eligibility  लिये  citizenship by birth , but the Supreme  अदालत   रै  never  सीधे  addressed the  सवाल  of a specific presidential or vice-presidential candidate 's eligibility as  a  natural-born citizen  .
kurtis   यूजीन   ``  Kurt '' Warner  (  born  जून  22 ,  1971  ) is a  पूर्व   अमरीकी  football player  .
He  निभाई  quarterback for three National Football  लीग  (  एनएफएल  ) teams : the St. Louis Rams ,  the  New York Giants  ,  and the Arizona  कार्डिनल्स  .
He was originally signed by the  ग्रीन   खाड़ी  Packers as an undrafted  फ़्री   एजेंट   in  1994 after playing college football at Northern Iowa .
Warner  होता  go on to be considered the  बेहतरीन  undrafted player  of   सब  time  ,  following a 12-year career  regarded  as one of the  महानतम  stories in NFL  इतिहास   .
Warner  पहला   attained   स्टारडम   जबकि  playing for the  st.   लुई  Rams from 1998 to  2003  , where  he  won two  एनएफएल   mvp  awards  in  1999  और  2001  as  well as the Super  कटोरी  MVP  पुरस्कार   in  Super Bowl XXXIV .
he   led   the  2008 Arizona Cardinals to  सुपर   कटोरी  XLIII  (   the   मताधिकार  's  पहला  Super Bowl berth ) , and  owns  the  तीन  highest single-game passing yardage totals in Super  कटोरी  history  .
Warner  फिलहाल   holds  the  seventh-highest  career  passer  rating  of  all-time ( 93.7  )  , and the  third-highest   करियर  completion percentage in NFL history with  65.5  % .
In 13 career playoff games , Warner  बाँधने  first all-time in completion  प्रतिशत  ( 66.5 % ) ,  गज   प्रति  attempt ( 8.55 ) , and second in passer rating ( 102.8  )  .
He  भी   holds   the   उच्चतम  completion percentage for  a  single game during the regular season , at 92.3 percent ( 24/26 ) , on September 20  ,  2009  ,  against the Jacksonville Jaguars .
He announced his retirement on January  29  ,  2010.   <   संदर्भ  name='CNN  2010-01-29  '  >
Janet Kay Ruthven Hagan  (   ;  born May  26   ,  1953 )  is   the  junior United  राज्य  Senator from North Carolina , in office since January 2009  .
previously  she  परोसा  in the North Carolina  सीनेट  from 1999  to  2009 .
She is  a  member of the Democratic  पार्टी  and is viewed as  a  moderate  सदस्य  of her party .
When Hagan defeated  रिपब्लिकन  incumbent  एलिज़ाबेथ   dole   in  the 2008  संयुक्त  States Senate election , she became the  पहला  woman  to   शिकस्त   an  incumbent woman  in  a  सीनेट  election  .
the  Heisman Memorial Trophy  पुरस्कार  ( usually known colloquially as the Heisman Trophy or  the   heisman  ) , is awarded annually  to   the   खिलाड़ी  deemed  the   सबसे   बकाया  player in collegiate football .
It was created  in  1935 as the  शहर  Athletic Club trophy and renamed in 1936 following the death of the Club  's  athletic director , John Heisman ( former Brown University  और   विश्वविद्यालयों  of Pennsylvania player ;  सिर  football coach  at   oberlin   कॉलेज  , Auburn University , Clemson University , Rice University ,  और  the University  of  Pennsylvania ; and football , basketball , and baseball head  कोच  and athletic director at Georgia Tech  )  .
The award is  प्रस्तुत  by  the   heisman  Trophy Trust in early  दिसम्बर  before the postseason bowl games .
It  is  the oldest of several overall awards in college  फ़ुटबॉल  , including  the  Maxwell Award  ,  Walter  शिविर  Award  ,  and the AP Player of  the  Year  .
The Heisman and the  ap  Player of  the  Year  हैं  the  तभी  awards to  सम्मान  the most  बकाया   खिलाड़ी  ,  जबकि   the  Maxwell  पुरस्कार  and Walter Camp Award recognize the best player , and  the  Archie  griffin   पुरस्कार  recognizes the  सबसे   मूल्यवान  player .
The United  राष्ट्र  Command ( UNC )  is  the unified command structure  लिये  the multinational  सैन्य   शक्तियां   supporting  the  गणतंत्र  of  कोरियाई  ( South Korea  or   rok   )   दौरान  and after  the   कोरियाई  War .
After  सैनिकों  of  the  Democratic People 's  गणतंत्र  of Korea  (   उत्तर  Korea or  dprk  )  invaded  South Korea on June 25 ,  1950  ,  the  United Nations Security Council adopted Resolution 82 calling on  उत्तर  Korea  to  cease  hostilities  and withdraw  to  the 38th parallel .
on  June  27  ,  1950  , it  अपनाया  Resolution 83 ,  recommending  that  सदस्यों   of  the  संयुक्त  Nations  provide  assistance to the Republic of Korea `` to repel the armed attack  और  to  restore   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  peace and security to the  क्षेत्रफल   ''   .
Security Council Resolution 84 ,  अपनाया   on  July 7 ,  1950  ,  अनुशंसित  that members providing  सैन्य  forces and other assistance to South  कोरियाई  `` make such forces  और  other  सहायता  available  to  a  एकीकृत   कमांड   अंतर्गत   the  United States of  अमेरिका  '' .
Although the  रिज़ॉल्यूशन  suggested  the  forces under  the  UNC  यहूद  `` United Nations  शक्तियां  ''  ,   और  United  राष्ट्र  itself  could  be considered  a  belligerent ,  in  practice the United  राष्ट्र  exercised no control  over   the  combat forces  ,   जिससे  were  नियंत्रित   by  the United States  .
सबसे  observers  concluded  that  the   शक्तियां   अंतर्गत  the UNC  यहूद  not in law  संयुक्त  Nations  सैनिकों  ,  और  the  अधिनियमों   of  the  unc  were not the  अधिनियमों   of  the  संयुक्त  Nations  .
The  unc  can be  regarded  as  an  alliance  of  national armies , operating  अंतर्गत   the  collective right of self-defense .
On August 29 , 1950  ,  the British Commonwealth  's  27th  infantry  Brigade  arrived  at Busan  to   जुड़ें   the  UNC  ,  which until  तब   शामिल   तभी   rok  and U.S. forces  .
The 27th Brigade moved into  the  Naktong  नदी   लकीर  west of Daegu .
Troop units  इससे  other countries of the  un  followed in rapid succession ;  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  , Belgian  संयुक्त   राष्ट्र  Command ,  कनाडा  , Colombia  ,  Ethiopia ,  फ़्रांस  , Greece  ,  Luxembourg , the Netherlands  ,   नई  Zealand  ,  the Philippines  ,   थाईलैंड   और  Turkey  .
The Union of South  अफ़्रीकी  provided air  इकाई  which  लड़ा   alongside   the   एयर  forces of other member  राष्ट्र   .
डेनमार्क  , India , Norway ,  और   स्वीडन  provided  चिकित्सा  units .
Italy provided  a  hospital , even  हालांकि  it  थी  not a  un  member .
the  United Nations Command and  the   chinese-north   कोरियाई  Command signed  the   कोरियाई   armistice  Agreement on  27  July 1953 , ending the heavy fighting .
The armistice  अनुबंध  established the Military Armistice  आयोग   (   मैक  ) , consisting of representatives of the two signatories , to  supervise  the  क्रियान्वयन  of the  armistice  terms .
The North Korean-Chinese  मैक  has been replaced by  panmumjon  Representatives under exclusive North Korean management .
Regular meetings  have   महरूम  stopped , although duty officers of Joint  सुरक्षा  Area ,  commonly   ज्ञात  as the Truce  गाँव  of Panmunjom , from each side meet regularly .
Lincoln Heights is an American family drama television series about Eddie Sutton , a Mission  विस्टा  police officer who moves  उसके   परिवार   वापस   to  his  बूढ़ा  neighborhood , Lincoln Heights  ,  to start a  नई  life and to help out his old  पड़ोस  .
It is a dangerous  प्लेस  to  उठाएँ  a family ,  और  through the many  ट्रायल   the   परिवार  goes through , they  जल्द  learn that settling  in   is  not as easy as it seems  .
जबकि   अधिकारी  Sutton struggles to cope with  प्रत्येक  day life as  a  street cop in Los Angeles  ,  his kids  कोशिश  to  अनुरूप   in  at their new schools and  साथ  their new neighbors .
the   दिखाएँ  premiered January 8  ,  2007 on the  एबीसी  Family network  साथ   13  episodes ordered for the first season .
It was approved for a  दूसरी  season ,  जिससे  premiered September 4  ,   2007  .
Vanessa Hudgens ' song , Say OK had been used in a commercial  to   प्रचार  the second season  .
To  प्रचार  the  तीसरा  season , they showed clips of Cassie  और   चार्ल्स  's  संबंध  to the song ,  crush  by the  अमरीकी  Idol  's  seventh season runner-up ,  दाउद  Archuleta  .
