A Christian denomination is an identifiable  धार्मिक  body under a  आम   नाम   ,   ढांचा   ,  and doctrine within Christianity  .
in   the  Orthodox tradition ,  चर्च  are divided often  साथ  ethnic and  भाषाई  lines , into  पृथक  churches  और   परंपराओं  .
Technically , divisions between one  समूह   और  another  हैं  defined  by  doctrine and church  प्राधिकार   .
Issues such as the nature  of   यीशु  ,  the   प्राधिकार  of  अपोस्टोलिक  succession ,  eschatology   ,   और  papal primacy separate one denomination  इससे   another   .
The Roman  कैथोलिक  Church is the largest denomination  साथ   over  1.1 billion members ,  over  half of  सब   ईसाइयों   विश्वव्यापी  , making it the  largest  denomination for any religion worldwide ( although  the  church does not  दृश्य  itself as a denomination , but as the original  pre-denominational  church ) .
Protestant denominations comprise roughly 38–39  %  of  ईसाइयों  worldwide  ,  and  साथ   the   catholics   ,  Protestants ,  anglicans  ,  और  other  closely  related denominations comprise Western Christianity .
The  पूर्वी  Orthodox Church ,  प्राच्य   परंपरागत  Churches and  the   assyrian  Church  of   the  East are  माना  Eastern Christian denominations .
पश्चिमी  Christian denominations prevail in  पश्चिमी  Europe  और  its former colonies .
Eastern Christian  denominations  are represented  ज़्यादातर  in  पूर्वी  Europe  ,   the   मध्य   ईस्ट  and North Africa .
ईसाइयों  have  विभिन्न   doctrines   परिचय  the Church , the body  of  faithful that  वे  believe was established by Jesus  मसीह  , and  कैसा  the divine church  corresponds   to  Christian  denominations   .
दोनो  the Catholics and the Eastern Orthodox consider each of themselves solely to  faithfully  represent the  एक  Holy  कैथोलिक  and Apostolic Church to the exclusion of  the   अन्य   .
Protestants separated from the  कैथोलिक  Church because of  theologies  and practices that they considered to  be  in  उल्लंघन  of their  निर्वचन   .
Generally  ,   सदस्यों  of the various denominations acknowledge each other as Christians  ,  at least to the extent that they have  mutually  recognized  baptisms  and acknowledge historically orthodox views including  the   देवत्व   of   यीशु   और  doctrines of sin  और  salvation  ,  even though  doctrinal  and ecclesiological  बाधाएं  hinder full  नियाज़  between churches .
चूंकि  the reforms surrounding Vatican II , the Catholic Church has referred to Protestant communities  as   ``  denominations '' ,  जबकि   reserving   the  term `` church ''  लिये  apostolic churches , including  the  Eastern Orthodox (  देखिए  subsistit  in   और  branch theory  )   .
वहीँ   हैं   however  some non-denominational  ईसाइयों  who  do  not  follow  any particular branch  .
The panda (  ailuropoda   melanoleuca  ,  lit  .
``  black and white  cat-foot  ''  )  , also known as the  दानव   पांडा  to distinguish  it  from the unrelated  रेड  panda  ,  is a bear native to  central-western  and south western China .
it  is easily recognized by the  विशाल  , distinctive black patches  around   इसके   आँखें   ,   over  the ears , and  आरपार  its round body  .
Though it  belongs  to the  अनुक्रम   carnivora   ,  the panda  's  diet  is  99 %  बाँसुरी   .
Pandas in the wild  होगा  occasionally  खा  other grasses , wild tubers ,  or  even meat in  the   रूप  of birds ,  rodents  or carrion  .
In  captivity   ,   वे   may  receive  मधु  , eggs , fish ,  yams  , shrub leaves , oranges , or  केले   साथ  with specially  prepared   खाना  .
The giant panda lives in  a   few  mountain ranges in central China  ,  mainly in  सिचुआन   प्रांत  ,  लकिन  also in the Shaanxi and Gansu provinces .
As a  परिणाम  of farming , deforestation and  अन्य  development , the panda has  महरूम  driven  आउट  of  the   lowland  areas where it once lived .
the  panda  is  a conservation  reliant  endangered species  .
A  2007  report shows  239  pandas living  in   captivity  inside China and another  27  outside the country .
Wild population estimates vary ; one estimate shows that there  हैं  about 1,590 individuals  जीना  in  the  wild , while a  2006  study via  डीएनए  analysis estimated  कि  this  फिगर   could  be as high  as  2,000 to 3,000 .
Some reports  भी  show that  the  number  of  pandas in the wild is on the rise .
However , the  आईयूसीएन  does not believe there is enough certainty yet to  reclassify   the   प्रजाति  from  endangered  to Vulnerable .
While the  ड्रैगन  has often served as China  's  national emblem  ,   internationally  the panda appears at least as  commonly   .
As such  ,  it is becoming widely used within China in international  contexts  , for  उदाहरण  the  पाँच  Fuwa  mascots  of  the  Beijing Olympics .
the   पतंग   धावक  is a  2007  American drama film  निर्देशित  by Marc Forster based  on  the novel of the same name  by   खालिद  Hosseini  .
it   tells  the  स्टोरी  of Amir , a well-to-do boy  इससे  the Wazir  akbar   खान  district  of   काबुल  ,  जो   is  tormented by the guilt of abandoning  उसके  friend Hassan , the son of his father 's Hazara  नौकर   .
the   स्टोरी   is   नियत  against  a   backdrop  of  उग्र  events , from  the  fall of the monarchy  in  Afghanistan through the  सोवियत  military  हस्तक्षेप  , the mass exodus of  अफगान  refugees  to  Pakistan  और  the United States ,  और  the Taliban regime  .
Though  सबसे  of the film is set in Afghanistan , these  भाग  were  ज़्यादातर  shot in Kashgar , China  ,  due  to   the   खतरों  of filming  in  Afghanistan at the  समय  .
the  majority of the film 's dialogue is in Dari , with  the  remainder  बोला  in  अंग्रेज़ी  .
The child  अभिनेताओं  are  देशी  speakers , but  अनेक  adult actors had to learn Dari .
Filming wrapped up  on   दिसम्बर  21 , 2006 , and  the  film was expected to  be   released   on   नवम्बर   2  , 2007 .
However , after concern  लिये  the safety  of   the  young actors in  the  film  due  to  fears  of violent reprisals to  the  sexual nature of some scenes  in   जिससे  they  appear  ,  इसके   रिलीज   तिथि  was pushed back six weeks to December 14  ,  2007  .
the  Kite  धावक   थी  released on DVD on March  25  , 2008 .
A  hd   dvd  release was announced for the  वही  date , but  थी   रद्द   following  the format 's demise  .
The film was nominated for  the  Golden  ग्लोब  Award for  बेहतरीन  Foreign  भाषा  Film  in   2007  .
The  फिल्मी  's score  by  Alberto Iglesias  थी  nominated for Best Original  स्कोर  at  the  Golden  ग्लोब्स   और  the Academy Awards .
the  legality  of   कैनबिस  varies from  देश  to  देश   .
Possession of  कैनबिस   is   illegal  in most  देशों  and has been  चूंकि   the   शुरूआत  of widespread  कैनबिस   निषेध  in the late 1930s .
However , many countries have decriminalized the possession of  छोटी   quantities  of  कैनबिस  , particularly in North America , South America  और   यूरोपीय  .
furthermore  ,  कब्ज़ा  is  विधिक   or  effectively legal in  the  Netherlands ,  उत्तर  Korea and  होता  be in the  u.S.   राज्य  of  कोलोराडो  and Washington  if  it were not for federal  विधि   ,  which  governs  persons  in  all  राज्य  .
The  औषधीय  use of cannabis  is  legal  in  a  क्रमांक   of  countries ,  सहित  Canada  ,   the  Czech Republic and  इसराईल  .
जबकि  federal law  in  the  संयुक्त  States bans all sale and  कब्ज़ा  of cannabis , enforcement  varies  widely  at   the  state level and some  राज्य  have  स्थापित   औषधीय  marijuana programs  in   कि  contradict federal  विधि  ; two states  (  Colorado  और  Washington  )   have   repealed   उनके   कानून  prohibiting  the  recreational use of  कैनबिस  and replaced them with a  नियामक  regime ,  भी  contrary to federal statute .
Some countries  have  laws that  हैं   नहीं   as  vigorously prosecuted  as  others but , apart  इससे   the   देशों  that offer access to medical  मारिजुआना  , most  देशों  have various penalties ranging from lenient  to   बहुत   कठोर  .
Some infractions are taken more  seriously  in some  देशों  than others in regard to  the  cultivation , use  ,  possession or transfer of cannabis  लिये   recreational  use .
A few  jurisdictions  have lessened penalties for possession  of   छोटी  quantities of cannabis , making  it  punishable  by  confiscation and a fine  ,   बल्कि  than imprisonment .
कुछ   क्षेत्राधिकारs/  drug courts use mandatory  उपचार  programs for young or frequent users ,  साथ   स्वतंत्रता  from narcotic  दवाएँ  as the goal and a few jurisdictions  परमिट  cannabis use for medicinal purposes .
वहीँ  are  भी  changes  in  a  अधिक  restrictive  दिशा  as in  कनाडा   .
Drug  परीक्षण  to detect cannabis are increasingly  आम  in  अनेक  countries and have resulted  in  jail sentences and people  खोने  their jobs .
however  , simple possession  can  carry long jail  वाक्य  in some countries  ,   विशेषकर   in  parts of East Asia and Southeast  एशिया  where the sale  of  cannabis may  सीसे   to   a   वाक्य  of life in  थाना  or even execution  .
loxahatchee  is a community located in Palm Beach County , Florida , United  राज्य  .
it  is located  in  the areas north  of  Wellington and west and  उत्तरपश्चिम  of Royal  ताड़  Beach  ,  Florida and approximately west of West Palm  बीच  .
Loxahatchee is also the name of  the   पोस्ट  Office  कि  serves this area , which  is  under the  zip  code of  33470  .
The name Loxahatchee means ``  कछुआ   नदी  . ''
loxahatchee  is located  भीतर  the  भारतीय  Trails Improvement District  और  the Loxahatchee Groves Water  कंट्रोल  District .
शेर  Country Safari , a drive-through  safari  park , is  स्तिथ   in   loxahatchee  .
In  2006   ,  the state of Florida  स्वीकृत  incorporation of part of Loxahatchee as the Town  of  Loxahatchee  groves  to  become  the 38th  नगरपालिका  in Palm  बीच  County .
The main reason  लिये  incorporating was to better protect the area from encroaching growth and to preserve the rural character of the neighborhood .
Perhaps the most rural area  भीतर  a  बंद  proximity  to  West Palm Beach ,  साथ  lot  आकार   दायरा   इससे  1-20  एकड़  .
Along with The Acreage , it  is  notable for loose  जमीन  restrictions and the native and  exotic  animal presence is  काफी  notable .
seminole  Ridge High School serves the  क्षेत्रफल  .
The Canadian Citizenship Test  is  a  परीक्षण  ,  administered  by  नागरिकता   और   आव्रजन  Canada  (   सीआईसी  )  ,  that is required for  सब  applicants  लिये   कनाडाई  citizenship  जो   हैं  aged between 18 and 54 and who meet  the   मौलिक  requirements  लिये   नागरिकता  .
The test is available in  दोनो  French and  अंग्रेज़ी  , the official languages of Canada .
Renaissance Cruises  ,  originally founded  in   1989  owned by Fearnley &  eger  Rederi  in  Oslo  -  Norway  ,  later purchased by  एडवर्ड  Rudner ( founder of Alamo Car Rental  )   as  the company faltered during  the  Gulf War .
They operated year-round cruise itineraries  to  the Mediterranean , the Greek Isles , Tahiti and the  दक्षिण  Pacific , Northern  यूरोपीय   और   scandinavia  .
the  company ceased operations  on   25  September 2001  और  accommodated up to 220,000  अतिथि   in  2000 .
While  the   कम्पनी   था  been in  ग़रीब   वित्तीय  health for quite some time , the  आर्थिक  decline resulting from the September  11th  terrorist attacks are  credited  with  the   निधन   of  this cruise  लकीर   .
The  बेड़े  is listed under List of cruise  जहाजों  .
It  थी  headquartered in  फोर्ट   lauderdale  , Florida .
Epithelium is one of the four  मौलिक   प्रकार  of animal tissue ,  साथ   साथ   संयोजी  tissue  ,  muscle  ऊतक  and nervous tissue  .
Epithelial  ऊतकों  line the cavities  और   सतहों  of  structures  throughout the body ,  और   भी   रूप  many  ग्रंथियों  .
Functions  of  epithelial cells include secretion , selective absorption , protection ,  transcellular  transport and detection of  सनसनी  .
in   यूनानी   ``  ἐπί  ''  (  ``   epi  '' ) means  ``  on '' or  ``  upon '' , and `` θηλή '' ( ``  thēlē  '' )  अर्थात्  `` nipple  ''  .
epithelial  layers are avascular , so they must  प्राप्त  nourishment via diffusion of substances from the  underlying  connective tissue  ,  through  the  basement membrane .
Epithelia  can   भी   be  organized into  क्लस्टर   of  cells that function as exocrine and endocrine  ग्रंथियों   .
केंट  E. Hovind ( born  जनवरी  15 , 1953 ) is an American young Earth creationist  .
Hovind  रै   बोला  on creation science and  रै  aimed to  मनाना  listeners  to  reject theories  of  evolution , geophysics ,  और  cosmology in favor  of  his interpretation of the Genesis creation narrative  इससे  the  बाइबल  .
hovind  's  दृश्य  are contradicted  by  scientific evidence  और  some  of  his ideas have  भी  been criticized by young Earth  creationist  organizations such as Answers in Genesis .
Hovind established  the  Creation  विज्ञान  Evangelism  in  1991 ,  और  frequently spoke on  यंग  Earth creationism  at  seminars at  निजी   स्कूलों  and  चर्च  , debates , and on  रेडियो   और  television broadcasts  .
Since January 2007 ,  hovind  has been serving  a   ten-year  prison sentence  बाद  being convicted of 58 federal counts , including  12   कर  offenses , one count  of  obstructing federal  एजेंटों  , and 45 counts  of  structuring  नकदी  transactions  .
He is incarcerated at the  संघीय  Correctional Institution at  बर्लिन  ,  नई   हैम्पशायर   .
Bride with Bindi  सजा  forehead
a   बिंदी   (  , from Sanskrit bindu , meaning ``  a  drop , small particle , dot '' ) , or  a   pottu/bottu  ( in Tamil  ,  Telugu ,  और   मलयालम  ) is a forehead decoration  worn  in South Asia  (  particularly  इण्डिया  ,  बांग्लादेश   ,   नेपाल  , Sri Lanka  और  Mauritius ) and Southeast Asia .
Traditionally it  is  a  उज्जवल  dot  of  red  रंग   लागू  in the center  of   the  forehead close to the  eyebrows  ,  लकिन  it can also  consist   of  a  चिह्न  or  टुकड़ा  of  आभूषण   worn  at  इस   स्थान  .
The New York gubernatorial election  of  2010  थी  held  on   मंगलवार  , November 2 , 2010 ,  to  elect the Governor of New York ,  to  serve  a  four-year term that  began  in January 2011  .
लाज़िम  Democratic  राज्यपाल  David Paterson , elected  as   लेफ्टिनेंट   राज्यपाल   in  2006  as  the running mate of former  राज्यपाल  Eliot Spitzer  ,  chose  नहीं  to run for a full-term  .
On  नवम्बर  2 , New  यॉर्क   attorney  General and Democrat Andrew Cuomo defeated  रिपब्लिकन   कार्ल  Paladino  .
Green Party candidate Howie Hawkins received over  57,000   मत   ,  allowing the New York Green Party to be  सूचीबद्ध   on  the ballot  लिये  the next 4 years .
The  प्रमुख  cast of Dragon Ball  at  the end of the manga .
The Dragon Ball  manga  and anime series features an  extensive   डाल   of  characters created by Akira Toriyama .
the   श्रेणी   takes  place in a  fictional  universe , the same  as  Toriyama  's  previous series Dr. Slump  ,  and follows the adventures of martial artist Son Goku from childhood to  adulthood   as  he searches for the seven spheres known as the Dragon Balls , used to summon a wish-granting dragon .
During the  कोर्स  of the story , he encounters allies such as Bulma , Yamcha ,  kuririn   और  Trunks ,  विरोधियों  such  as  Tenshinhan , Piccolo  और  Vegeta ,  और   दुश्मनों  such  as  Freeza and  कोशिका  .
While many  of  the characters are  इंसानो  with  superhuman  strength and/or  अलौकिक  abilities  ,   the   डाल  also  शामिल  anthropomorphic  पशु  and  बाद  ,  extraterrestrial  lifeforms .
The  श्रेणी   भी  includes depictions of  the   आफ्टरलाइफ  , with several characters being  देवताओं  that govern the universe .

The Comanche  हैं  a Plains Indian tribe  जिनकी   ऐतिहासिक  territory , known  as  Comancheria , consisted of present day  पूर्वी  New Mexico  ,  southern Colorado  ,  northeastern Arizona , southern Kansas , all of  ओक्लाहोमा  , and most of northwest Texas .
The Comanche people are enrolled  in  the  federally   पहचाना  Comanche Nation , in Oklahoma .
Historically ,  the  Comanches were hunter-gatherers with a horse culture .
There may  have   महरूम   as  many as  45,000  Comanches  in  the late  18th  century .
Today ,  the  Comanche  स्वदेश  Comanche tribal enrollment numbers  15,191  with approximately  7,763  members residing in  the   lawton  –  फोर्ट  Sill and surrounding areas of  दक्षिणपश्चिम  Oklahoma .
the  Comanche Nation Homecoming Powwow is held  annually  in Walters , Oklahoma in mid-July  .
the  Comanche spoke the Comanche language  ,  a Numic  भाषा   of  the Uto-Aztecan family ,  sometimes  classified as a Shoshone dialect ;  however   ,   तभी  about 1  %   of  Comanches speak it today .

It is  नियत  in  the  fictitious town  of  Starkfield , Massachusetts .
The  अनोखा  was  adapted  into a film , Ethan Frome , in 1993 .
टाइम्स  Square  studios  (  तस  )  is  an American  टेलीविज़न  studio located  in   the  Times Square neighborhood of the Manhattan borough of New  यॉर्क  City , New York .
The  स्टुडियो  is  बेहतरीन  known  as  the  उत्पादन  home  of  ABC News ' Good Morning  अमेरिका  ( GMA )  ,   a  morning news  और   बात   कार्यक्रम  and segments  लिये   जीएमए  on  एबीसी   न्यूज  Now .

Coca-Cola  is   a  carbonated soft  पेय  sold in stores , restaurants  ,  and vending machines in every country except Cuba and North  कोरियाई  .
it  is produced by The Coca-Cola  कम्पनी  of  अटलांटा   ,  Georgia , and  is  often referred to simply as Coke ( a  पंजीकृत   ट्रेडमार्क   of   the   coca-cola   कम्पनी  in the United  राज्य  since  कूच  27 , 1944  )  .
Originally intended  as  a  पेटेंट  medicine when it was  invented  in  the  late 19th century by  जॉन  Pemberton , Coca-Cola was  खरीदा  out by businessman  asa  Griggs Candler ,  जिनकी  marketing tactics  led  Coke  to  its dominance  of  the  संसार   soft-drink  market  throughout  the 20th  सदी   .
the  company  produces  concentrate ,  जिससे   is   तब  sold to  licensed  Coca-Cola bottlers throughout  the   संसार  .
The bottlers , who hold territorially exclusive contracts with the company  ,  produce finished  उत्पाद  in cans and bottles from the concentrate in  संयोजन  with filtered water and  sweeteners   .
The bottlers then sell , distribute and merchandise Coca-Cola to retail stores and vending  मशीने  .
Such bottlers include Coca-Cola Enterprises , which is the largest  सिंगल  Coca-Cola bottler in North  अमेरिका   और   पश्चिमी  Europe  .
the  Coca-Cola  कम्पनी  also sells  concentrate  for soda  स्रोतों  to  प्रमुख  restaurants and food service distributors .
the   coca-cola  Company has , on  अवसर   ,  introduced other cola  पेय  under the Coke brand name  .
The most  आम   of   ये  is  आहार  Coke  ,  with  अन्य  including Caffeine-Free Coca-Cola  ,  Diet Coke Caffeine-Free  ,  Coca-Cola  चेरी  ,  coca-cola  Zero ,  coca-cola  Vanilla , and  खास  versions  साथ   नीबू  , lime or coffee  .
Based  on  Interbrand  's  best  वैश्विक  brand 2011 , Coca-Cola was the world  's  most valuable  ब्रांड  .
Types  of  bar-lines
In  musical  notation  ,  a bar ( or measure )  is  a segment  of   समय  defined  by  a given number  of   बीट्स   ,   प्रत्येक   of  which  हैं  assigned  a   particular   नोट  value .
dividing  music into  बार  provides regular  सन्दर्भ   अंक  to pin point locations within a  टुकड़ा   of   म्यूज़िक  .
It also makes  लिखा   म्यूज़िक  easier  to  follow  ,  since each  बार  of  स्टाफ  symbols can  be   पढ़ा  and played  as  a batch .
typically  ,  a   टुकड़ा  consists of  अनेक  bars of the same length , and in modern  musical  notation  the  number of  बीट्स  in  प्रत्येक  bar is specified at the beginning of the score by the top number of a time signature ( such as 3/4 )  ,   जबकि   the  bottom  क्रमांक   indicates   the  note  मान  of the beat  (  the beat has a  क्वार्टर  note  मान  in the 3/4  उदाहरण  )  .
The  शब्द   बार   is  more common in British English , and the  शब्द  measure is  अधिक  common in American English ,  हालांकि  musicians  generally  understand both  usages  .
In American English , although  the  words bar and  माप  are  प्रायः   प्रयुक्त  interchangeably  the  correct use  of  the  शब्द  'bar ' refers only to  the  vertical line itself  ,  while the word 'measure '  refers  to the beats contained between bars .
in   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  usage , it  is  equally correct  to  speak of  बार   संख्याएँ  and measure numbers , e.g .  ‘bars  9–16’ or ‘mm .  9–16’  .
साथ   the  same lines ,  it  is  हिकमत  to reserve the abbreviated form  ‘bb  .
3–4’ etc . for  बीट्स  only  ;  bars should be referred to  by  name  in  full .
the  first metrically complete  माप  within a piece of music  is  called ‘bar 1’ or ‘m  .  1’ .
When  the   टुकड़ा   begins   साथ  an anacrusis ( an incomplete  माप  at the head of  a  piece of  म्यूज़िक  )  ,  ‘bar  1’  or  ‘m  . 1’  is  the following measure .
The 19.9  mw  Gemasolar  सौर  plant in Spain features  15   घंटों  of storage and  can  supply power 24 hours a day  .
सौर  energy ,  रौशन  light and heat from the sun , has been  harnessed  by humans since  प्राचीन  times  using  a range of  ever-evolving  technologies .
Solar  उर्जा   technologies  include solar heating  ,  solar  photovoltaics  ,  सौर  thermal electricity ,  सौर   वास्तुकला  and artificial photosynthesis , which can make  considerable  contributions  to  solving some of the  सबसे   तात्कालिक   उर्जा  problems  the   संसार   अभी  faces .
सौर  technologies are  broadly  characterized  as  either  passive  solar  or  active solar depending on the  रास्ता  they capture , convert  और  distribute  सौर  energy .
Active solar  तकनीकों  include the use of photovoltaic  panels   और   सौर  thermal  collectors   to  harness the  उर्जा   .
Passive solar techniques include orienting  a  building to the Sun  ,   selecting  materials with favorable  थर्मल  mass or light dispersing properties ,  और   डिजाइनिंग   स्पेसेस  that  naturally   circulate  air .
In  2011   ,   the  International Energy Agency said  कि  ``  the   विकास   of   सस्ती  , inexhaustible  और  clean solar energy  technologies  will have huge longer-term benefits .
It will increase  countries’  energy security  through  reliance on an  स्वदेशी  ,  inexhaustible  and  ज़्यादातर  import-independent resource , enhance  स्थिरता  , reduce pollution , lower the  लागत  of mitigating climate change , and  रखना   चट्टान  fuel prices lower than otherwise .
These advantages are  वैश्विक  .
hence  the additional  लागत   of  the incentives for early deployment  चाहिए  be considered learning investments  ;  they must be wisely spent and  need  to  be   widely   साझा   ''  .
Primary  परवाह  may  be  provided in  जातियाँ  health centres .
प्राथमिक  care  is  the health  परवाह   दिए  by a health care provider  .
Typically  इस  provider  अधिनियमों  as  the   प्रिंसिपल   पाइंट  of consultation  लिये   मरीजों  within a  स्वास्थ्य  care system  और   निर्देशांक  other  specialists  that the  रोगी  may need .
Such  a  professional can be  a  primary  परवाह   चिकित्सक  ,  ऐसे  as a general  practitioner   or  family  चिकित्सक  ,  or  depending  on  the  मोहल्ले   ,  health  प्रणाली  organization ,  और  patient 's discretion ,  वे  may see a pharmacist , a  चिकित्सक   सहायक  , a  नर्स  practitioner , a  नर्स  ( such as in  the  United Kingdom  )  ,  a  clinical  अधिकारी   (  such as in parts of Africa  )  ,  or   an  Ayurvedic or other traditional medicine professional ( such as  in  parts of Asia  )   .
Depending on the  प्रकृति  of the health condition  ,  patients may then be referred for  द्वितीयक  or tertiary care  .
`` Ocean Avenue  ''  is a song recorded by  अमरीकी  pop punk group  yellowcard  .
It  थी  released in February  2004   as  the second single from Ocean  एवेन्यू  and  the  third track  .
it  is known for bringing them  into  the  मुख्यधारा   ,   as  it received  numerous  spins  on  MTV and increasing radio airplay .
Ocean  एवेन्यू   is  a street in Jacksonville  ,  Florida , the band 's  stomping   grounds  near their  ऊँची  school , Douglas Anderson  स्कूल  of the  कला  , and  another  street mentioned  in  the song ,  चेरी  Street .
the   नाम   of  Ocean  एवेन्यू   in  Jacksonville is actually  बीच  Boulevard .
वे   बाएँ  their  असली  base behind  जब  they  स्थानांतरित  to Los  एंजिल्स  .
The song was featured on the  much   म्यूज़िक  compilation album Big Shiny  धुनें   9   .
A  मनोचिकित्सक  is a physician who  specializes   in   psychiatry   .
A psychiatrist specializes  in   the   उपचार  of mental disorders .
Psychiatrists are  प्राधिकृत   to   prescribe  medicine , conduct  शारीरिक  examinations , order  और  interpret  प्रयोगशाला  tests , use psychotherapy  और  may order brain  इमेजिंग  studies such as computed  टोमोग्राफी  (  ct/cat  Scan )  ,   चुम्बकीय  resonance imaging ( MRI ) , and positron emission tomography ( PET )  स्कैनिंग  .
Within the framework of the  संसार  Health  संगठन  's ( WHO )  परिभाषा   of  health as a state  of  complete  शारीरिक  , mental and social well-being , and not merely the absence of disease or infirmity , reproductive health , or  यौन  health/hygiene  ,  addresses  the  reproductive processes , functions and system at all  चरण  of life .
Reproductive health , therefore , implies that  लोगों  are able  to   have  a  जिम्मेदार  ,  संतोषजनक  and  safer  sex  जीवन   और   कि  they have  the  capability to reproduce and the freedom to  decide  if , when and how often to do so .
One interpretation  of  this implies that men and women ought  to   be  informed of and to have  अभिगम   to   सुरक्षित  , effective , affordable and acceptable  विधि  of birth  कंट्रोल  ; also access  to  appropriate health  परवाह  services of sexual , reproductive medicine and implementation of health  शिक्षा  programs to  तनाव   the  importance of  महिलाओं   to  go safely through  गर्भावस्था  and childbirth could provide couples with the best chance of  having  a healthy infant  .
On  the  other hand individuals do face inequalities in reproductive  स्वास्थ्य  services  .
Inequalities  vary   आधारित  on socioeconomic status , education level  ,  age , ethnicity  ,  religion ,  और  resources  उपलब्धियाँ  in  उनके  environment .
It  is  possible for example , that  कम  income individuals lack  the  resources for appropriate health  सेवाएं  and  the  knowledge  to  know what is  उचित   लिये   maintaining  reproductive health  .
According  to   the   जो  , ``  reproductive  and sexual  ill-health  accounts for 20 %  of  the  वैश्विक  burden of ill-health for women  ,  and  14  % for men . ''
Reproductive  स्वास्थ्य  is  a  part of Sexual and reproductive health and  अधिकारों  .
This is a  सूची  of episodes for  the  Disney  चैनल  original series The Suite Life on  डेक  , which  aired  for three seasons on  डिज़्नी  Channel  इससे  September  26  , 2008  to  May  6  ,  2011   .
कोर   2   is   a  brand  encompassing  a  दायरा  of  इंटेल  's  उपभोक्ता   64-bit  x86-64 single-  ,  dual- ,  और  quad-core microprocessors  आधारित  on the Core  microarchitecture  .
the  single- and  dual-core   मॉडल  are single-  die   ,  whereas the quad-core  मॉडल  comprise  दो  dies ,  प्रत्येक   containing   दो  cores  ,   packaged  in  a  multi-chip module  .
The  परिचय  of Core  2  relegated the Pentium brand  to  the mid-range market  ,  and  reunified  laptop and desktop  cpu   लाइनों   ,  which previously had been divided into the Pentium  4   ,   pentium   d  , and  pentium  M brands .
The  कोर  2 brand  थी  introduced on 27  जुलाई  2006 , comprising the Solo ( single-core ) , Duo (  dual-core  ) ,  क्वाड  ( quad-core )  ,   और  in  2007  , the Extreme ( dual- or  quad-core  CPUs  लिये  enthusiasts ) subbrands .
इंटेल  Core 2 processors  साथ   vpro   प्रौद्योगिकी  ( designed for businesses )  शामिल  the  dual-core  and quad-core branches .
The  सुपर  Bowl is  the  annual championship game  of  the National  फ़ुटबॉल  League  (  NFL ) , the  उच्चतम  level of  पेशेवर  American football in the  संयुक्त   राज्य  ,  culminating   a  season  कि   begins  in the late summer of  the   पिछला  calendar year .
the  Super Bowl  उपयोग  Roman numerals  to   पहचानो  each game ,  बल्कि  than the  साल  in  जिससे   it   is   आयोजित  .
For example , Super Bowl  i  was played on  जनवरी  15 , 1967 , following  the   1966   नियमित  season ,  जबकि  Super  कटोरी   xlvii  was played on February 3 , 2013  ,  following the 2012 season .
The game was created  as  part of  a  merger agreement  between  the  एनएफएल  and its  then-rival  league  ,  the American Football League ( AFL ) .
It was agreed that the  दो   लीग  ' champion teams would play  in  an  afl–nfl  World Championship Game until the merger was  to  officially begin  in  1970  .
After  the  merger , each league was redesignated as  a  `` conference ``  ,  and  the   खेल  was  तब   निभाई  between the conference  champions  .
Currently , the National Football  सम्मेलन  ( NFC ) leads  the  series with 25  विन्स  to  22  wins  लिये   the   अमरीकी  Football Conference  (   afc   )  .
The  दिन  on which the Super Bowl is played , now  माना  by some a de facto American national holiday , is  पुकारा  `` Super  कटोरी  Sunday `` .
It is the  second-largest   दिन  for U.S.  खाना  consumption  ,   बाद  Thanksgiving Day  .
in  addition , the  सुपर   कटोरी  has frequently  महरूम  the most watched American television  ब्रॉडकास्ट   of  the  साल   .
Super Bowl XLV , played in  2011   ,  became  the  most-watched American television program in history  ,   आरेखण  an average audience  of  111  लाख  viewers  और   लेने  over the spot held by the previous  साल  's Super Bowl ,  जिससे  itself had taken over  the  # 1  स्पॉट  held for twenty-eight years by the final episode of  m*a*s*h  .
the  Super Bowl is also among the most watched sporting events in the world ,  लगभग   सब   होने  North  अमरीकी  audiences , and is second to association football ’s  यूईएफए  Champions League  फाइनल  as  the  most watched  सालाना   sporting  event worldwide  .
Because  of   इसके   ऊँची  viewership , commercial  airtime   दौरान  the Super  कटोरी   ब्रॉडकास्ट  is the most expensive of the year  .
Due  to  the high cost  of   निवेश   in  advertising  on   the  Super Bowl  ,  companies regularly develop their most expensive advertisements for this  ब्रॉडकास्ट  .
as   a  result , watching and discussing the broadcast 's commercials has become  a   significant   पहलू   of   the  event .
In  जोड  , many  लोकप्रिय  singers and  संगीतकारों  have  performed   दौरान   the  event 's pre-game and halftime ceremonies because of the exposure .
Fiona  is  a feminine given name .
the   नाम   फिओना  was invented  ,  and first  प्रयुक्त  , by  the   स्कॉटिश  poet  जेम्स   macpherson  ( 1736–96  )  , author of the Ossian  कविताएं   ,   जिससे  he  claimed   यहूद   अनुवाद  from ancient Gaelic sources ( sources , when challenged ,  he  never produced ) .
The  नाम   थी   subsequently  used as a pseudonym by William  शार्प  ( 1855–1905 ) ,  जो  authored several romantic works under the name `` Fiona Macleod  ''   .
The  नाम  has since  become  popular in England , Scotland  और  Ireland .
The name is considered to be a  latinised  form of the Gaelic  शब्द  fionn ,  अर्थ  ``  श्वेत  ''  ,   ``  fair  ''  .
The  नाम  Fiona  is   भी  sometimes used  as  an Anglicisation of  the   irish-language  name  fíona  , although  ये  names are  वरना  unrelated ( as Fíona is derived from  an   तत्व  meaning ``  बेल  '' ) .
वहीँ  is also a modern  tendency  to equate the  प्रामाणिक  Scottish  गैलिक  feminine  नाम  Fionnghal with  फिओना  .
The name Fiona is  उठती  in popularity  विशेषकर   in   जर्मनी  -speaking countries .
फिओना  was the 49th most  लोकप्रिय  name for baby girls born in 2008  in  Germany .
Fiona  थी  tied for third place in the ranking of most popular names for baby girls born in the tiny principality  of  Liechtenstein  in  2008 .
the  name was the  347th  most  लोकप्रिय   नाम   लिये  girls born  in  the United States in 2008  ,  where  it   रै   क्रमित  among  the  top  1,000  most popular  names  for girls since  1990  and among the top  500  since 1999 .
the   नाम  Fiona  रै   महरूम  particularly popular  लिये  girls of Asian or Pacific  islander  descent in New York City , where Fiona ranked as  the  ninth most popular name for girls  इससे  those groups in  2007  .
Many languages are used , or historically have been used  in   the  United States .
The most commonly used language is English .
There are also many languages  स्वदेशी   to  North America or to U.S. states or  holdings  in the  प्रशांत  region .
भाषाएं  brought to the  देश   by  colonists  or  immigrants  इससे  Europe ,  एशिया  ,  or  other  भाग  of  the  world  मेक   up  a large portion of  the  languages currently used ; several  भाषाएं  , including creoles and sign languages , have  भी  developed in the United States .
लगभग  337 languages  हैं  spoken or signed by  the   जनसांख्यिकी   ,  of which 176  हैं   स्वदेशी  to the  क्षेत्रफल  .
Fifty-two  भाषाएं   formerly   बोला   in  the  देश  's territory  हैं   अभी  extinct .
The variety of  अंग्रेज़ी  spoken in the United States  is  known as American English .
English is  the  de facto national language of the United States , with 80  %  of the population claiming  it   as   a   माँ  tongue , and some 95 % claiming to  बोलो  it `` well '' or ``  बहुत  well '' .
However ,  no  official  भाषा   exists  at  the   संघीय   स्तर   .
There  have  been several proposals to make English  the  national language in  amendments  to  आव्रजन   सुधार  bills ,  लकिन  none of  ये  bills  रै   become  law with  the  amendment intact .
The situation is quite varied at the state and territorial  स्तर  , with some states  mirroring  the  संघीय  policy of adopting  no  official language in a de  jure   क्षमता   ,  others adopting English  अलोन   ,  others  officially  adopting English as  खूब   as   लोकल  languages  ,  and still others adopting a  नीति   of  de facto bilingualism .
Spanish is the  दूसरी   सबसे  common language  in  the  देश   ,  and  is   बोला  by over 12 % of the  जनसांख्यिकी  .
The United  राज्य  holds the  संसार  's fifth largest  spanish-speaking   जनसांख्यिकी   ,   outnumbered  only  by  Mexico ,  स्पेन  , Colombia ,  और   अर्जेंटीना  .
throughout   the  Southwestern United States  ,   long-established  Spanish-speaking communities coexist with  विशाल  numbers of  अधिक   हाल  Hispanophone  आप्रवासियों  .
Although many new Latin American  आप्रवासियों  are less than fluent in English , nearly  सब   second-generation  Hispanic Americans speak English fluently , while  तभी   परिचय   हाफ   स्टिल  speak Spanish .
According to  the   2000  US census  ,  people  of  German ancestry make up  the   largest  single  जातीय  group in the United States , and the German language  बाँधने  fifth .
इतालवी  , Polish  ,  and French are still widely spoken among  populations  descending from immigrants from those countries  in  the  जल्दी  20th century  ,  but the use of  ये   भाषाएं  is dwindling as the  पुरानी  generations die .
Russian is also spoken by immigrant  populations   .
Tagalog  और   वियतनामी   have   over   एक  million speakers  प्रत्येक  in the United States  ,  almost entirely within recent immigrant populations  .
Both languages ,  साथ   साथ   the   किस्में  of  the  Chinese language , Japanese , and Korean , are now used in elections in  अलास्का  ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  ,  हवाई  , Illinois  ,  New York , Texas  ,  and Washington  .
देशी   अमरीकी  languages are spoken in smaller  pockets  of  the  country , but these populations are decreasing  ,  and the languages are  लगभग  never widely used outside of reservations  .
हवाई   ,  although  having   few  native speakers , is an official language  साथ  with  अंग्रेज़ी   at   the  state level  in  Hawaii .
The  राज्य  government  of  Louisiana offers  सेवाएं  and documents  in  French  ,  as does New Mexico in Spanish .
Besides  अंग्रेज़ी   ,   स्पेनी  ,  फ्रेंच  , German  ,   navajo  and  अन्य   देशी  American languages ,  सब   अन्य  languages are usually  सीखे  from immigrant ancestors that  आए  after  the   समय   of  independence or learned  through   कुछ   रूप  of education .
1990  's Pontiac  ग्रैंड  Am Sedan fender  और   क्वार्टर  panel
On an  ऑटोमोबाइल   ,  a quarter  फलक  ( or  पश्च  wing as it is known in British English  )  is  प्रायः  considered  the  body panel which goes  between  the rear  द्वार  and  the  trunk and  typically  wraps around the wheel  खूब  ;  however   ,   the  similar front section Fender (  गाडी  )  ,  between  the  door  और  the  हुड  ,  is  sometimes incorrectly referred to as a quarter panel  .
The  क्वार्टर  panel is typically made of Sheet metal , but is  sometimes  made  of   fiberglass  or  fiber-reinforced   प्लास्टिक  ; although , this varies with  अलग  makes and models  .
A quarter  फलक   is  typically  a  welded on  घटक   of  the uni-body structure or Monocoque .
Replacement  of  a sheet metal  क्वार्टर   फलक  typically  requires   it  to be cut  बंद  the vehicle  और  a replacement part  to  be welded ( or  sometimes  bonded  )  to the  गाडी  .
due  to this  ऊँची  amount of specialized labor  ,  a quarter panel may often be repaired rather than replaced by hammering out the damage , and a body filler sometimes referred to as bondo  to  be applied to finalize  the  original surface .
Shropshire ( or ; alternatively Salop ; abbreviated ,  in  print only , Shrops ) is  a  county in  the  West  मिडलैंड्स  region of England  .
It borders Wales to  the  west , Cheshire  to   the  north , Staffordshire to the east , Worcestershire  to   the  south-east and Herefordshire to the south .
A unitary  प्राधिकार  (  shropshire  Council ) was created  on   1  April 2009 , taking over  इससे   the  previous  काउंटी   परिषद   और   5  district councils , and covers most of  the   काउंटी   .
the  borough of Telford and Wrekin has been a separate unitary authority  चूंकि   1998  but continues to be  शामिल  in the ceremonial county .
the  county 's population and economy is centred on five  कस्बों  :  the  county town of Shrewsbury ,  जिससे   is  culturally  और   historically   महत्वपूर्ण  and is  स्तिथ  in the  केन्द्र  of the  काउंटी  ;  telford   ,   a   नई  town  in  the east which was constructed around  a  number  of   पुरानी  towns  ,  most notably  वेलिंगटन  , Dawley  और   madeley  ,  जिससे   is   आज  the most  populous  ;  और  Oswestry in the north-west , Bridgnorth just to the south of  telford   ,   और  Ludlow in the  दक्षिण  .
the   काउंटी  has many further  मार्केट  towns , including Whitchurch in the north , Newport just to the north-east of Telford  ,   और  Market  drayton  in the north-east of the  काउंटी  .
The Ironbridge Gorge area is a  युनेस्को  World  विरासत   साईट  , covering Ironbridge , Coalbrookdale and a part of  madeley  .
There  हैं  ,  additionally  ,  अन्य   notable  historic  औद्योगिक   साइट   स्तिथ   around  the county , such as at Shrewsbury , Broseley , Snailbeach  और  Highley as  खूब  as the Shropshire  संघ  Canal  .
The Shropshire Hills Area  of   बकाया  Natural  सौंदर्य   कवर   परिचय  a  क्वार्टर  of the county  ,  mainly  in  the  दक्षिण  .
shropshire  is one of  इंग्लैण्ड  's most rural  और  sparsely  आबादी  counties , with the population density  of  the  shropshire  Council area  होने   बस  91/km2 ( 337/sq mi  )   .
the  Wrekin  is  one of the most  प्रसिद्ध  natural landmarks in the  काउंटी  , though  the  highest  पहाड़ियाँ  are  the  Clee Hills  ,  Stiperstones and the  long   mynd  .
wenlock  Edge  is   another  significant geographical  और   geological  landmark .
In the  low-lying  northwest  of   the  county ( and  अतिव्यापी   the   किनारा  with  वेल्स  ) is  the  Fenn 's  ,   whixall   और   bettisfield  Mosses National Nature  आरक्षित   ,  one  of  the most important and best preserved bogs in  ब्रिटेन  .
the  River  severn   ,  Great  ब्रिटेन  's longest river , runs through the county ,  exiting  into Worcestershire via  the  Severn  घाटी   .
Shropshire is  landlocked   ,  and with an  क्षेत्रफल  of , is England 's largest inland  काउंटी   .
the  county flower is the round-leaved sundew .
For Eurostat purposes , the county ( less the unitary district of  telford  and  wrekin  ) is a NUTS  3  region ( code UKG22 ) .
the  two  shropshire  unitary  क्षेत्रों  ( covering all  of  the  ceremonial  county  )  ,  साथ   साथ  the authorities covering the  ceremonial   काउंटी   of  Staffordshire , comprise the `` Shropshire and Staffordshire  ''  NUTS  2  region .
The Big Bang  सिद्धान्त  cast at Comic  कॉन  2009 , from  बाएँ  : Kunal  नय्यर  , Simon  helberg  , Kaley  cuoco  ,  जिम  Parsons  ,   और  Johnny Galecki
the  American  sitcom  The  बिग  Bang  सिद्धान्त   ,  created and executive produced by Chuck Lorre and  विधेयक  Prady  ,  premiered  on   सीबीएस  on September 24  ,  2007  .
the  show centers  on   पाँच  characters : roommates  शेल्डन  Cooper and Leonard Hofstadter  ,  two Caltech physicists  ;  Penny , a waitress and aspiring actress who lives across  the   हॉल  ;  और  Leonard and Sheldon 's friends  और  co-workers  aerospace  engineer  हावर्ड  Wolowitz ,  और   astrophysicist  Rajesh  koothrappali  .
Over  समय  , several  supporting  characters have  महरूम  promoted to  अभिनीत  roles  :  Leslie Winkle ( season 1 recurring  ;   ऋतु  2  नियमित  ; season 3 guest  )  , a physicist colleague , and , at different times  ,   a  lover  of  both Leonard  और  Howard ;  bernadette  Rostenkowski-Wolowitz ( season  3  recurring ; season 4-present  नियमित   )  , a microbiologist  ,  Howard 's fiancée and  subsequent   बीवी  , and  पूर्व  part-time waitress  alongside  Penny  ;  neuroscientist  एमी  Farrah Fowler (  ऋतु  3 guest ; season 4 recurring ; season  4-present   नियमित  ) ,  जो  joins  the   समूह   बाद  being matched  to   शेल्डन  on a  डेटिंग  website ; and  कॉमिक  book store-owner , Stuart Bloom (  सीज़न   2–5  recurring ;  ऋतु  6-present  नियमित  ) , who replaces  हावर्ड  as Raj 's  बेहतरीन   dost  when Howard is in  स्पेस   .
the  show  भी  features numerous supporting characters ,  प्रत्येक  of whom plays a prominent  भूमिका  in a small group of  एपीसोड   .
The  a-team  is an American action-adventure television series , running from 1983  to   1987  , about a fictional  समूह  of ex– United  राज्य  Army Special Forces personnel who  कार्य  as soldiers of  सौभाग्य   ,  while  on  the run from  the  Army  बाद  being  ब्रांडेड  as war criminals for a `` crime they  किया  n't  कमिट  `` .
A feature film based on the series was  released  by 20th Century Fox on  जून   11  , 2010 .
a  comic  किताब  series , A-Team : Shotgun  विवाह  , began March  9  , 2010 .
डायना  Prince is a fictional  अक्षर   appearing  regularly in stories published by  dc  Comics  .
She  debuted   in   सनसनी  Comics  #   1   (   जनवरी  1942  )   और  serves as  the  civilian and secret identity of the  सुपरहीरो  Wonder Woman .
The character was created by Charles  moulton   और  Harry G. Peter .
Wat Phra Kaew  ,   बैंकॉक   ,  Thailand
There is no official state religion in the  थाई  constitution , which guarantees religious freedom  लिये  all  थाई   नागरिकों   ,  though  the  king  is  required by law to be Buddhist  .
According to the last census ( 2000 )  94.6   %  of Thais are  बौद्धों  of  the   थेरवाद  tradition .
Muslims are the second largest  धार्मिक  group in Thailand at 4.6 % .
Thailand  's  southernmost provinces - Pattani ,  yala   ,  Narathiwat  और  part of Songkhla Chumphon have  प्रबल  Muslim  populations  , consisting  of   दोनो  ethnic  थाई  and Malay .
The southern tip of Thailand  is  mostly ethnic Malays .
ईसाइयों  , mainly Catholics , represent 0.7 % of the population  .
A small but influential  जातियाँ   of   सिखों  in  थाईलैंड  and  कुछ  Hindus also live in the  देश   's  cities ,  और  are heavily engaged  in  retail commerce  .
There is also a  छोटी  Jewish community in Thailand  ,  dating back to  the  17th century .
Since 2001  ,   मुस्लिम  activists , generally described by the Thai government  as  terrorists or separatists , have rallied against  the  central government because of alleged corruption  और   जातीय  bias  on  the part of  officials  .
Thailand 's Department  of  Religion  ,   फिलहाल   अंतर्गत   the  Ministry  of  Culture , is formally responsible for  the  registration of religious groups  in  Thailand URL_http which hold properties through legally  स्थापित  foundations .
It has oversight  ,  along with  the  Immigration Police  ,  over the work permits of missionaries who  हैं  ``  प्रवासी  religious workers  ''  of  सब   धर्मों  .
A value  added   कर  ( VAT  )  is  a  form of consumption  कर  .
इससे  the  परिप्रेक्ष्य  of the buyer ,  it  is a tax  on  the purchase price  .
इससे  that  of   the  seller ,  it  is a  कर  only  on  the value  added  to a  उत्पाद   ,  material , or  सेवा  ,  इससे   an  accounting point of  दृश्य  ,  by  this stage  of  its  manufacture  or distribution  .
The  निर्माता  remits to  the  government the difference  between  these  दो  amounts ,  और   retains  the rest for  themselves  to  ऑफसेट  the taxes  वे  had previously  सशुल्क  on the inputs .
the  value  added  to  a  product by  or  with  a  business is the  बिक्री  price charged to its customer  ,   ऋण  the cost of materials and other taxable inputs  .
A VAT is  जैसे  a  बिक्री  tax in that ultimately only  the  end consumer  is  taxed .
it  differs from the sales tax  in  that , with the latter ,  the  tax  is   एकत्रित   और  remitted to the government only once  ,   at  the point  of   खरीदें   by  the end  उपभोक्ता   .
With the VAT , collections , remittances  to  the  सरकारी  , and credits  लिये  taxes already paid occur  प्रत्येक  time a business in the  सप्लाई   कड़ी  purchases products .
a   रेफरी  calling  a   high-sticking  penaltyHigh
-sticking  is  the name  of   दो   infractions   in  the sport of ice hockey that may occur when  a  player intentionally  or  inadvertently plays with his or her stick  ऊपर  the  ऊँचाई  of  the   कन्धों  or above the cross bar of a hockey goal .
This can result  in   a  stoppage of  खेल  or in  a   दंड  .
In the rules of  the  National Hockey  लीग   ,  high-sticking is defined  as   a   दंड  in Rule 60 and  as  a non-penalty  बेईमानी  in  नियम  80 .
A stoppage in play  परिणाम   if  a high stick comes in contact with  the   पक  and the team who touched it regains  कंट्रोल   of  the  पक  .
However , play usually continues  if   a  player touches the puck with  a  high stick  और   the   opposing  team gains control of the  पक   .
If the puck  goes   into   the  opposing  जाल  after coming into contact with a high stick , the goal is  प्रतिबंधित   .
The level  at  which a stick is considered  too   ऊँची  for a goal is the  crossbar   of  the  जाल   .
however   ,  if a player knocks the  पक   into  his own net with a high stick ,  the  goal is  अनुमत  .
a  penalty  is  assessed if  a  player strikes another  खिलाड़ी  with  a  high stick  .
The player is given a minor penalty unless  उसके  high  स्टिक  caused  an   चोट   ,  in which case  the   रेफरी  has the option to  assess  a  double-minor   ,   प्रमुख  or  मैच  penalty  .
it   is  the referee 's discretion which penalty to  assess  : the  नियम  calls for a double minor for  an  accidental injury , or a match penalty for a  deliberate  attempt to injure  (   whether  the  विपक्ष  player was actually  घायल  )  .
Injury is usually  decided  by the high stick causing  bleeding   ,   लकिन   the   उपस्थिति   of  blood does not automatically mean an extra penalty  is   awarded  .
कुछ  referees have been known to  पुरस्कार  an  अतिरिक्त   दंड  without the  उपस्थिति   of  blood if the referee determines that the injury sustained  थी   sufficient   to   वारंट  a double-minor  दंड   .
ठेठ  modern memory card reader , compatible with many  आम   स्वरुप
A  मेमोरी  card reader is a device ,  typically  having  a  USB interface , for  accessing  the  आंकड़ा  on  a  memory card such  as   a  CompactFlash (  cf  )  ,  Secure  डिजिटल   (  SD ) or  multimediacard  ( MMC ) .
Most card  पाठक  also offer  लिखें   काबिलियत  , and together  साथ  the card , this  can  function  as  a  कलम  drive .
Some printers and personal computers have  a  built-in card reader  .
a  multi card reader is used  लिये  communication with  अधिक   than  one type of flash memory  कार्ड  .
Multi card readers do not have  built-in   मेमोरी   क्षमता  , but are able to accept multiple types  और  styles  of  memory  ताश   .
the  number of compatible  मेमोरी  cards  varies  from  रीडर  to  रीडर  and can include more  than  20 different types .
The number of  अलग   मेमोरी  cards that a  मल्टी  card reader can accept is  expressed  as  x-in-1  , with x being a figure of  मेरिट   indicating  the  क्रमांक   of   मेमोरी  cards  स्वीकृत   ,  such  as  35-in-1  .
There are three categories  of  card  पाठक  sorted  by  the type and  मात्रा   of  the  कार्ड   स्लॉट  : single card reader (  e.g  . 1x SD-only  )  , multi card reader (  e.g  .  9-in-1  )  और  series  कार्ड  reader ( e.g .  4x  SD  तभी   )  .
Some kinds  of  memory cards with their own USB  कृत्यों  do not need the card reader , such as the Intelligent Stick memory card , which can plug directly  into  a USB slot .
The USB  यंत्र  class used is 0x08 .
Bullying is detrimental to students ' well-being  और   विकास  .
Bullying  is  the use of  फ़ोर्स  or coercion to abuse or  intimidate  others .
The behavior  can  be habitual and involve an  असंतुलन   of  social or physical power  .
It can include verbal harassment or threat , physical  उत्पीड़न  or coercion and  may   be  directed repeatedly towards  particular  victims , perhaps on  grounds  of race  ,  religion  ,  gender ,  कामुकता  , or  क्षमता   .
If bullying is  किया  by  a  group  ,  it is called  mobbing  .
The  शिकार  of bullying  is  sometimes  referred  to as a  ``  target '' .
Bullying can  be   पारिभाषित   in   अनेक   अलग   तरीके  .
the   uk  currently has no  विधिक  definition  of  bullying  ,   जबकि  some  u.S.   राज्य  have laws against it  .
Bullying consists of three basic types of abuse – emotional  ,   मौखिक   ,   और   शारीरिक  .
It typically involves  हल्का  methods  of  coercion such as  intimidation  .
Bullying ranges from  सरल   one-on-one  bullying to more complex bullying in which  the   बुली  may have one  or   अधिक   ``  lieutenants '' who may  seem   to  be willing  to  assist  the  primary bully  in  his  or   उसके  bullying  क्रियाएँ   .
Bullying  in  school and the  कार्यस्थल  is also referred  to   as  peer abuse  .
रॉबर्ट  W.  फुलर  has  analyzed   धमकाना  in the  कॉन्टेक्स्ट  of  rankism  .
A bullying  संस्कृति   can  develop in any  कॉन्टेक्स्ट  in which  इंसान  beings interact  साथ   प्रत्येक  other  .
This  शामिल  school  ,  church  ,   परिवार  ,  the  workplace  ,  home , and neighborhoods .
Happy slapping  in   the  Instituto  क्षेत्रीय   federico  Errázuriz  ,  Santa  क्रूज़  , Chile
लौरा  Bush and  rae   leigh  Bradbury ( formerly missing ) on  अप्रैल  4  ,  2007 , in  ऑस्टिन  , Texas  ,  after  the   8-year-old   introduced   mrs.  Bush during announcement of  the  future  खोलने   of   the  Texas  क्षेत्रीय  Office  of  the National  बीच   लिये  Missing and  शोषित  Children .
Rae  leigh  was the first  चाइल्ड  in  the  U.S. to be  बरामद  as a  परिणाम  of an AMBER  चेतावनी  when she  थी  8  सप्ताह   बूढ़ा   in  November  1998  .
An  एम्बर  Alert or a  चाइल्ड  Abduction  आपात  ( SAME code : CAE ) is a child abduction  चेतावनी   प्रणाली  originating in 1996 ,  अभी  employed in 9 countries .
AMBER is officially  a   backronym  for America 's  लापता   :   प्रसारण   आपात  Response , named  लिये   एम्बर   hagerman   ,  a 9-year-old abducted and murdered in Arlington , Texas  in  1996 .
Alternate regional  चेतावनी  names were once used ; in  जॉर्जिया  ,  ``  Levi 's  कॉल  '' ( named after Levi Frady  )  ; in Hawaii , `` Maile  एम्बर  Alert  ''  ( after Maile Gilbert ) ;  और  Arkansas , `` Morgan Nick Amber Alert ''  (  in  मेमोरी  of Morgan Chauntel Nick ) .
AMBER Alerts  हैं  distributed via  वाणिज्यिक  radio stations  ,   अंतरजाल   रेडियो   ,   उपग्रह   रेडियो   ,  television stations , and  केबल  TV  by  the Emergency Alert System and NOAA Weather  रेडियो  ( where they are termed  ``  Child Abduction Emergency '' or `` Amber Alerts ''  )   .
The alerts are also issued  via  e-mail ,  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  traffic-condition signs  ,   the  LED billboards which are located outside of newer Walgreens locations , along with the LED/LCD signs of billboard companies  ऐसे  as Clear Channel Outdoor  ,   सीबीएस   बाहरी  and Lamar , or through wireless device SMS text messages  .
एम्बर  Alert  रै  also teamed up  साथ  Google  और  Facebook to relay information regarding an AMBER  चेतावनी  to an ever  growing  demographic .
Those interested in  subscribing   to   प्राप्त   एम्बर  Alerts in their area  via  SMS  संदेश   can   विज़िट  Wireless Amber Alerts , which  हैं   offered   by  law as  फ़्री  messages .
In some states  ,   the  display  scrollboards  in  सामने  of  लॉटरी  terminals are  भी  used .
The  निर्णय  to declare an AMBER Alert is  बना  by  प्रत्येक   पुलिस  organization ( in many  मामले  , the state  पुलिस  or  राजमार्ग  patrol ) which  investigates   प्रत्येक  of  the  abductions .
Public information  in  an AMBER Alert  प्रायः  consists of  the   नाम   और  description  of  the abductee , a description of the suspected abductor , and a  वर्णन  and  अनुज्ञा  plate number of the abductor 's vehicle , if available .
मोनिका  Samille  lewinsky  ( born July 23  ,  1973 ) is  an  American woman  साथ  whom United States President Bill Clinton admitted to having  था  an ``  improper   संबंध   ''  while she worked  at   the  White House in 1995 and 1996  .
the  affair and its repercussions ( which included Clinton 's  महाभियोग  ) became known  as   the  Lewinsky scandal .
हाउस  of Night is  a  series of vampire -themed  काल्पनिक  novels by American  लेखक   P.   C.  Cast  और  her  बेटी  Kristin  डाल  .
It follows the  adventures  of  zoey  Redbird , a sixteen-year-old girl who has just become  a   ``  fledgling  vampyre  ''  और  is required to attend  the   हाउस  of  रात्रि  boarding school in Tulsa ,  ओक्लाहोमा  .
The series has  महरूम   on  the New  यॉर्क   टाइम्स   बेहतरीन  Seller list for 63  सप्ताह  and  वहीँ  are over  सात  million copies  in  print in North  अमेरिका   अलोन  .
the  sixth novel , Tempted  ,  which  गई  on sale on October 27 , 2009 with a first printing of a  लाख  copies , entered the  यूएसए   आज   बेस्टसेलर  list  कि  week  at  #  1  .
in   जनवरी  , 2010 ,  gezeichnet  ,  a  German translation  of   चिह्नित  , reached the # 1 spot on  the   der  Spiegel bestseller list .
The series has so  दूर  sold more  than  ten  लाख  books  in  39 countries .
Burned was released on April  27  , 2010 ,  और  like Tempted  ,  it entered the USA  आज  bestseller  सूची   कि  week at #  1  .
awakened  , released in January , 2011 , also  डाला  the  सूची  at # 1  .
the  series , which is published by St  मार्टिन  's  दबायें  is planned to include  बारह  books  .
