The  दसवाँ  book in the series ,  छुपा  , was released on October  16  , 2012  .
The  दूसरी  book  in  the  novellas  (  जिससे   दे   पृष्ठभूमि  on supporting characters ) ,  lenobia  's Vow , was released January 31 , 2012 .
Book eleven is currently  पुकारा  Revealed ,  और  the Casts  have  announced that two more  novellas  , Neferet’s Curse , planned to be released  फ़रवरी  19  ,  2013 , and  a   प्रीक्वेल  novel about Kalona , are to be released to coincide with the eleventh and  बारहवीं   किताबे   .
In Greek mythology , the Trojan War was waged against  the  city of Troy by the Achaeans ( Greeks ) after Paris of Troy took Helen from her husband Menelaus king of Sparta .
The war is one of  the  most important events  in  Greek mythology  और  has  महरूम  narrated through  अनेक   works   of   यूनानी  literature ,  सबसे   notably  through Homer  's  Iliad and  the  Odyssey .
The Iliad relates a part of  the  last year  of  the  घेरा  of  ट्रॉय  ; the Odyssey describes Odysseus 's  यात्रा  home  .
Other parts of the  युद्ध   हैं  contained  in   a  cycle of epic poems ,  जिससे  have survived through  fragments   .
Episodes  इससे  the  युद्ध  provided  सामग्री   लिये   यूनानी  tragedy and other  works   of   यूनानी   साहित्य  , and for Roman poets including  वर्जिल  and Ovid .
The war originated from a quarrel between the goddesses Athena ,  hera  , and Aphrodite , after Eris ,  the  goddess  of   संघर्ष  and  अनबन  ,  दिया  them a golden  ठहराना   ,  sometimes  ज्ञात   as  the  ठहराना   of  Discord  ,  marked `` for the fairest  ''   .
Zeus sent the goddesses  to  Paris , who judged  कि  Aphrodite , as the `` fairest  ''  , should  प्राप्त  the apple .
In exchange ,  aphrodite  made  हेलेन  ,  the   सबसे  beautiful  of   सब  women  और  wife  of  Menelaus , fall  in  love with Paris , who took her to Troy  .
Agamemnon  ,  king of Mycenae and the brother of Helen 's  husband   menelaus   ,   led   an  expedition  of  Achaean troops to  ट्रॉय  and besieged the city for  टेन   सालो  because of Paris ' insult .
After the  मौतों  of  अनेक  heroes , including the Achaeans Achilles and Ajax  ,  and the  ट्रोजन्स   हेक्टर   और  Paris , the city fell to the  ruse  of the Trojan Horse  .
The Achaeans slaughtered  the  Trojans ( except  लिये  some of the women  और  children whom they  रखा   or   बेची  as slaves ) and desecrated the temples , thus earning the gods ' wrath .
Few of  the  Achaeans  लौटे  safely  to   उनके  homes  और   अनेक   संस्थापित  colonies in distant  shores  .
The Romans later traced their origin  to  Aeneas , one  of  the Trojans , who was said to  have   led   the   surviving  Trojans to modern-day Italy .
the   प्राचीन   यूनानियों  thought  कि   the  Trojan War  थी   a  historical event that  था  taken place in  the  13th or 12th  सदी  BC  ,  and believed that Troy was  स्तिथ  in  modern-day  Turkey  निकट  the Dardanelles .
By modern times , both the war and the  नगर  were widely believed  to  be  non-historical  .
in  1868  ,  however , the German  पुरातत्ववेत्ताओं  Heinrich Schliemann met  फ़्रैंक   calvert  , who  कायल   schliemann   कि   ट्रॉय  was at  hissarlik  and Schliemann took over  calvert   's  excavations  on  property  belonging  to Calvert ;  इस  claim is now  स्वीकृत   by  most  विद्वानों   .
Whether there is any historical reality behind the Trojan War is an open question .
Many scholars believe that there is a historical core to the  टेल  , though this may simply  औसत  that the Homeric  कहानियां  are a  संलयन  of various tales of sieges  और  expeditions by Mycenaean Greeks during the  कांस्य  Age .
Those  जो  believe that the  कहानियां  of  the   trojan  War  हैं  derived  इससे  a specific historical conflict usually  तिथि  it to  the  12th or 11th centuries  bc   ,  often preferring  the   तिथियाँ  given by  इरैटोस्थनिज़  ,  1194–1184   bc   ,   जिससे   roughly  corresponds with archaeological  प्रमाण   of  a catastrophic burning of Troy  viia   .
anarchists  have employed certain symbols for  उनके  cause , including most prominently the circle-A and the black  ध्वज  , although  anarchists  have historically largely denied the importance  of  symbols to political movement  .
चूंकि  the  पुनरुद्धार  of anarchism around the start of  the  21st-century  संयुक्त  with  the  rise of the  anti-globalization   गति  ,  अराजकतावादी  cultural symbols  हैं  widely present  .
the  greater  palatine   कनाल  ( or pterygopalatine canal ) is a passage in the  कपाल  that transmits the greater palatine artery  ,   रग  , and  तंत्रिका  between the pterygopalatine fossa and the oral cavity  .
Surface temperature of  अंटार्कटिक   in  winter and summer  इससे  the  यूरोपीय   केन्द्र   लिये  Medium-Range Weather Forecasts
the  climate  of   अंटार्कटिक   is  the coldest  on  the  पूरे  of  धरती  .
Antarctica has the lowest naturally occurring temperature  कभी  recorded on the ground on Earth :  −89.2   °c   (   −128.6  °F ) at  वोस्तोक  Station .
it   is   भी   अत्यधिक   शुष्क   (   technically  a  मरुस्थल  ) ,  averaging  166  mm   (   6.5  in  )  of precipitation per year  .
भी  so , on most parts of the continent the snow rarely melts  और  is  आखिरकार   संपीडित  to  become  the glacial  बर्फ  that makes up  the  ice sheet .
मौसम  fronts rarely penetrate far  into  the  महाद्वीप  .
Most of Antarctica has an ice cap  जलवायु  ( Köppen  ef  ) with  बहुत  cold  ,  generally extremely dry weather  throughout  the  साल  and  no   माह  averaging  ऊपर  0 °C (  32  °F ) .
कुछ   फ्रिंज  coastal areas have  a   टुण्ड्रा   जलवायु  ( Köppen ET )  साथ   a  short  गर्मियाँ  averaging above freezing , and  much   उच्चतर  precipitation .
Current  सिर  coach Mike Tomlin , during the 2007 season
the  Pittsburgh Steelers  मताधिकार  has had 16  सिर  coaches throughout its history .
संस्थापित   as   the  Pittsburgh Pirates in , the name  थी  changed  to  the Steelers prior to  the  season  to  celebrate the city  's  heritage of  producing   स्टील  .
जो   बच   परोसा  two separate terms as  सिर  coach and Walt Kiesling served three separate terms .
दौरान   the  and seasons , due to the  राशि   of  players who fought  in  World War II  ,  the Steelers combined their team  साथ   फिलाडेल्फिया  and Chicago  ,  respectively  .
दौरान   ये   सीज़न  , Steelers ' coach  वॉल्ट   kiesling  shared coaching duties with Greasy Neale and Phil Handler  ,   जो  have not been included  भीतर  this list .
Struggling for  much   of  the franchise 's early years , the team  's  first season with more wins than losses was coached by Jock  sutherland  in  .
In ,  अंतर्गत   sutherland  ,  the  Steelers played their first playoff game against the  फिलाडेल्फिया  Eagles  .
टेन   of   the   16   सिर   कोच   खर्च  their entire professional  कोचिंग   करियर   साथ   the  franchise  ,  including John McNally ,  वॉल्ट  Kiesling and Chuck Noll , who have also been voted  into  the Pro Football Hall of Fame  .
One of  तभी  four  मेन  to coach  the  same team for 23 years ,  चक  Noll  रिटायर्ड  in  .
Noll is  भी  the  तभी  coach in National Football League history to win four Super Bowls .
Bill  cowher  , Noll 's replacement  ,  coached  the  Steelers  to  their  पांचवां  Super Bowl victory  ,   in  2005  .
The Steelers  छठे  Super Bowl win came in  सुपर   कटोरी  XLIII  ,  while  सिर   coached  by Mike  tomlin   ,   the   टोली  's current  सिर  coach .
In criminal  विधि   ,  fraud is intentional  deception  made for personal gain or  to   क्षति  another individual ;  the  related adjective is  बेईमान  ,  और  verb is defraud .
धोखाधड़ी  is a  अपराधों  and  a   सिविल  law  उल्लंघन  ,  हालांकि   the  specific  दण्ड  law  परिभाषा   varies  by  विधिक  jurisdiction .
Defrauding people or  entities  of money or valuables  is  a common purpose of fraud  .
A hoax also involves  deception  , but without  the  intention  of  gain or of  damaging  or  depriving  the  शिकार   .
धोखाधड़ी  is  a   रक्षा  in  a   सिविल  action for  उल्लंघन  of contract or  विशिष्ट  performance of a contract .
धोखाधड़ी  is a basis  लिये  equitable jurisdiction .
Passover , or Pesach ( from : in Hebrew  ,  Yiddish ) , Tiberian : ,  आधुनिक  Hebrew : /ˈpesaχ/ Pesah  ,   pesakh   ,   यहूदी  : Peysekh , Paysakh , Paysokh ) is an important Biblically  -derived  Jewish festival .
Historically , together  साथ  Shavuot (  ``   पेंटेकोस्ट  '' ) and Sukkot  (   ``  Tabernacles '' )  ,  Passover  is  one of  the  three  यात्राएं   त्यौहार  ( Shalosh Regalim  )  during which the  संपूर्ण  population of the  किंगडम  of Judah made a  यात्राएं  to the Temple in Jerusalem  .
samaritans  still  मेक   इस  pilgrimage to Mount Gerizim ,  लकिन  only men participate in  पब्लिक  worship  .
passover   commences   on   the   15th   of  the Hebrew  माह  of Nisan and lasts for  either  seven days  (   in  Israel ) or eight days  (  in the diaspora ) .
In Judaism  ,   a   दिन  commences at dusk and  lasts  until the  following  dusk  ,  thus the first day of  passover  only begins  बाद  dusk  of  the 14th of Nisan  और  ends at  संध्या   of   the  15th  दिन  of the month of Nisan  .
the  rituals unique to the Passover celebrations commence with the  passover   seder  when the  15th  of  nisan  has  begun   .
In  the  Northern Hemisphere Passover  takes   प्लेस  in spring  as  the Torah prescribes it : `` in the  माह  of [  the  ] spring '' (  בחדש  האביב  )   .
It is one  of  the  सबसे  widely observed Jewish  छुट्टियाँ  .
The Jewish  लोगों   celebrate  Passover as a  commemoration  of their liberation  over   3,300  years ago by God from slavery in ancient Egypt  कि  was ruled by  the  Pharaohs  ,  and  उनके  birth  as   a  nation under the  नेतृत्व  of  मूसा  .
It commemorates the story of the Exodus as  वर्णित  in the  यहूदी  Bible especially in  the  Book of  exodus   ,  in  जिससे  the Israelites were  freed   इससे  slavery in Egypt .
In the narrative of the Exodus  ,   the   बाइबल  tells that God helped the  children  of Israel escape from  उनके   गुलामी   in  Egypt  by   inflicting   टेन  plagues upon the ancient Egyptians before the Pharaoh would release his  israelite   स्लेव  ; the tenth and worst  of   the  plagues was the death of the  मिश्र  first-born  .
The Israelites  यहूद  instructed to mark  the  doorposts of their  घरों  with the blood of  a   slaughtered  spring  मेमने  and ,  upon   देखकर  this  ,  the spirit  of   the   रब  knew to pass over the first-born  in   ये  homes , hence  the  name  of  the  अवकाश  .
There is some debate  over  where  the  term is actually  निकला   इससे  .
When the Pharaoh freed the Israelites  ,  it is  कहा   कि  they  बाएँ   in  such  a   hurry  that  वे   could  not wait for bread  आटा  to rise ( leaven )  .
In commemoration  ,  for  the  duration of Passover no  leavened  bread is eaten , for which reason  it   is  called `` The Festival of  the  Unleavened Bread '' .
Thus Matzo (  चपटा  unleavened  ब्रैड   )  is eaten during Passover and it is  a   प्रतीक   of  the  अवकाश  .
हैली   's  Comet or  धूमकेतु  Halley (  or  ) ,  officially  designated 1P/Halley , is the best-known  of  the short-period comets  और   is   दृश्य  from Earth every 75–76 years .
Halley is the only  short-period  comet  कि  is  clearly  visible  to   the  naked eye from  धरती  , and thus the only naked-eye comet that  might  appear  twice  in  a   इंसान  lifetime .
Other naked-eye comets may  be  brighter and more spectacular ,  लकिन   होगा  appear only once in thousands of years  .
Halley  's  returns to the inner Solar System have been observed  और   अंकित   by   खगोलशास्त्रियों  since at least 240 BCE .
Clear  रिकॉर्ड  of  the  comet 's  दिखावे   यहूद   बना   by  Chinese , Babylonian , and medieval  यूरोपीय  chroniclers ,  लकिन   यहूद  not recognized as reappearances of the same object at  the  time .
The comet 's periodicity was first  संकल्पित  in 1705  by  English  astronomer  Edmond Halley , after whom it  is  now named .
हैली   's   धूमकेतु  last appeared in the inner Solar  प्रणाली  in 1986 and will next appear in  mid-2061  .
During  इसके  1986  apparition  , Halley became  the  first  धूमकेतु  to be  observed  in detail by spacecraft ,  providing  the first  observational   आंकड़ा  on the  ढांचा   of  a  धूमकेतु  nucleus and  the   यांत्रिकी   of   कोमा  and tail formation .
ये  observations supported a number  of  longstanding hypotheses about comet construction , particularly Fred  whipple  's `` dirty snowball  ''  model , which correctly predicted that Halley would be composed  of  a mixture of volatile ices – such as water ,  कार्बन   डाइऑक्साइड   और  ammonia –  और   धूल  .
the  missions also provided data  जिससे  substantially reformed and  reconfigured  these ideas ; for instance it is now understood that Halley 's surface is largely composed of dusty , non-volatile materials , and that  तभी   a  small portion of it  is  icy .
anti-communism  is opposition to  साम्यवादी   .
व्यवस्थित   anti-communism  developed in  प्रतिक्रिया  to the  वृद्धि   of  communism , especially  बाद   the  1917 October  क्रान्ति  in Russia and reaching  वैश्विक   आयाम  during the Cold War .
Most anti-communists reject  the  concept  of  historical materialism ,  जिससे   is   a  central idea in Marxism  .
anti-communists   अस्वीकृत  the  मार्क्सवादी   विश्वास  that capitalism will be followed  by  socialism  और  communism  ,   बस  as  सामंतवाद  was followed by capitalism .
Anti-communists question  the   वैध   of   the   मार्क्सवादी   अर्जी   कि  the  समाजवादी  state will ``  wither   दूर   ''  when it becomes unnecessary in a  सच्चा   कम्युनिस्ट   समाज   .
Anti-communists  argue   कि   the  repression in  the   जल्दी   सालो  of  bolshevik   नियम  , while not  as  extreme as  कि   दौरान   जोसेफ   स्टालिन  's  नियम  ,  थी   स्टिल   कठोर  by reasonable standards , citing examples such as Felix Dzerzhinsky 's secret  पुलिस  ,  जिससे   eliminated  numerous  राजनैतिक   प्रतिद्वंद्वियों  by extrajudicial  executions  , and the brutal crushing  of  the Kronstadt rebellion and Tambov rebellion .
Some  anti-communists  refer to both Communism and  फासीवाद   as  totalitarianism , seeing  समानता  between the actions of  कम्युनिस्ट   और  fascist governments  .
Historian  रॉबर्ट  Conquest  रै  argued that Communism  थी   जिम्मेदार  for tens of millions  of  deaths during the 20th century .
Opponents argue that Communist parties that have come to power have  tended  to  be  rigidly intolerant of  राजनैतिक  opposition .
These opponents claim that most  कम्युनिस्ट   देशों  have shown no  लक्षण   of  advancing from Marx 's socialist  स्टेज   of  economy  to   an   आदर्श   कम्युनिस्ट  stage .
बल्कि   ,  Communist governments have been accused of creating a new ruling class (  a  Nomenklatura  )   ,  with  शक्तियां  and  privileges   वृहद  than those previously enjoyed  by  the upper classes  in  the  non-  communist regimes  .
Gil Heron ( 9  अप्रैल   1922  –  27   नवम्बर  2008 )  थी  a Jamaican professional  footballer  .
He was the first black  खिलाड़ी  to play  लिये  Scottish club Celtic , and was the father of poet  और   संगीतकार   gil  Scott-Heron .
He  died  in Detroit of a heart  आक्रमण  on 27  नवम्बर   2008  .
the  soybean ( US ) or soya  सेम   (  UK ) ( Glycine  अधिकतम   )  is a species of legume native to East Asia , widely grown  लिये  its edible bean which has numerous uses .
The plant is classed  as  an oilseed  बल्कि   than  a pulse by  the  UN Food and Agricultural  संगठन   (  FAO  )  .
Fat-free ( defatted )  सोयाबीन  meal is a significant and cheap source  of  protein for  एनिमल   फ़ीड्स  and many prepackaged meals ; soy vegetable  आयल   is  another  उत्पाद  of processing the soybean  क्रॉप  .
For example  ,  soybean products  ऐसे  as textured  सब्ज़ी   प्रोटीन  ( TVP ) are ingredients in many meat  और  dairy analogues  .
soybeans  produce significantly more  प्रोटीन   प्रति  acre than most other uses of  जमीन   .
Traditional nonfermented food uses of soybeans include soy  मिल्क  , and from the latter  टोफू  and  टोफू  skin .
fermented   भोजन  include soy sauce  ,   fermented  bean paste  ,   natto  , and tempeh ,  among   अन्य   .
The oil  is  used in many industrial applications .
The main producers of  सोया   हैं  the United States  (  35  %  ) ,  ब्राज़ील  (  27  % ) ,  अर्जेंटीना  (  19  % ) , China  (  6 % ) and India ( 4  %   )  .
The beans contain significant amounts  of  phytic acid , alpha-linolenic acid  ,  and isoflavones .
हैरिसन  Ford ( born  जुलाई  13 , 1942 ) is an American  फिल्मी  actor and  निर्माता  .
He is  प्रसिद्ध  for  उसके   प्रदर्शन  as Han Solo in  the  original Star Wars trilogy and the title  अक्षर   of  the Indiana  जोन्स  film series .
घाट  is also known for  उसके  roles as  रिक  Deckard in Blade Runner , John Book in Witness and  जोकर  Ryan  in  Patriot Games and  साफ  and Present  खतरे   .
उसके   करियर  has spanned six  दशकों  and includes  भूमिकाएँ   in  several Hollywood blockbusters  ,  including Presumed Innocent , The Fugitive  ,  Air  फ़ोर्स  One , and  कया  Lies  beneath   .
at  one  पाइंट   ,  four of the top six box-office hits of all time included  एक  of his roles  .
Five  of  his  films  have been  inducted  into the  नेशनल  Film Registry  .
In 1997  ,   घाट  was ranked No . 1  in  Empire `` The  शीर्ष   100  Movie  सितारों  of All Time  ''   सूची  .
, the United States  घरेलू   बक्सा  office  grosses   of  Ford 's films total over  us  $ 3.5  अरब  ,  साथ  worldwide grosses surpassing $ 6 billion  ,  making Ford the third highest grossing U.S. domestic  box-office   स्टार   .
Ford is the husband of  अभिनेत्री  Calista Flockhart .
A tube of  chapstick
chapstick  is  a  brand name for lip  बाम  manufactured by Pfizer  उपभोक्ता   healthcare  and used  in   अनेक   देशों  worldwide .
It is  intended  to  सहायता   दावत  and  prevent  chapped lips ;  hence  the name  .
Many varieties also include sunscreen in order to prevent sunburn .
Due  to  its popularity , the  पद  has become  a  genericized trademark .
It  popularly   refers   to   कोई   लिप  balm contained in a lipstick-style tube and applied in  the  same manner  as  lipstick  .
However  ,   the   पद  is  स्टिल  a registered trademark , with rights exclusively  स्वामित्व  by Pfizer  .
In Sweden and  in  the United Kingdom , the product  's   प्रमुख  competitor is Lypsyl ,  बना   by   novartis  Consumer  स्वास्थ्य   ,   जिससे   is  distributed in  समान   पैकेजिंग  to  chapstick  .
George Berkeley ( ;  12  March 168514 January 1753  )  , also known  as  Bishop Berkeley  (  Bishop of Cloyne ) , was an Anglo-Irish philosopher whose primary  उपलब्धि   थी   the  advancement of a theory he  पुकारा  `` immaterialism ''  (  later  referred   to   as  `` subjective idealism `` by others ) .
इस  theory denies the existence  of  material  पदार्थ  and  बजाय   contends   कि   परिचित  objects  जैसे   टेबल  and chairs  हैं   तभी   विचार  in the  minds   of  perceivers  ,  and  as  a result can not exist  बगैर  being perceived .
Thus , as Berkeley famously put it , for physical objects  ``  esse est percipi '' (  ``  to be is to  be   आभास  `` ) .
Berkeley is also known  लिये  his  critique   of  abstraction  ,  an important  आधार   in  his  तर्क  for immaterialism  .
In 1709 , Berkeley published his first  प्रमुख  work , , in which he discussed the limitations  of  human vision  और  advanced the  सिद्धान्त  that  the  proper  वस्तुएँ  of sight are  नहीं   सामग्री   वस्तुएँ  , but light and  रंग  .
This  foreshadowed   उसके   मुख्य   philosophical   कार्य  A Treatise Concerning  the   सिद्धान्त  of  इंसान  Knowledge in 1710 which , after its poor reception ,  he  rewrote in  संवाद  form and published under  the   शीर्षक  Three Dialogues between  hylas   और   philonous  in 1713  .
in   इस   किताब   ,  Berkeley 's views were represented  by  Philonous ( Greek : 'lover  of  mind  '   )  ,  जबकि   hylas  (  यूनानी   :  'matter ' ) embodies the Irish thinker’s opponents  ,  in  particular   जॉन  Locke .
Berkeley  argued   विरूद्ध   सर  Isaac Newton 's  doctrine  of  निरपेक्ष  space , time and motion  in  De  मोटू  ( on  गति  ) , published 1721 .
उसके  arguments were a precursor to  the  views of  mach  and Einstein .
In  1732  , he published Alciphron , a Christian apologetic against the free-thinkers  ,  and  in  1734 ,  he   प्रकाशित  The Analyst ,  an   empiricist  critique of  the   मूलाधार   of   infinitesimal   कलन   ,   जिससे  was influential in the development of mathematics .
His last major philosophical work  ,  Siris ( 1744 ) , begins  by   वकालत  the medicinal use  of   तारकोल  water  ,   और  then continues to discuss a wide range  of   विषय  including science  ,   दर्शनशास्त्र   ,  and theology .
Interest in Berkeley  's   कार्य   increased  after World  युद्ध   ii  ,  क्युकी  he  tackled  many of the issues  of  paramount interest to philosophy in the 20th century  ऐसे  as the problems of perception , the difference  between   प्राथमिक  and  द्वितीयक  qualities , and the importance of language .
Qingdao ( )  ,  historically known as  tsingtao  ,  is  a major city  in  eastern Shandong  प्रांत  , Eastern China  ,  with a population  of   over   8.715   लाख   (  2010 census ) .
इसके   निर्मित  up area  ,  made of 6 urban districts  और   4  county-level  शहरों  ,  is  home  to   परिचय  4,896,000 inhabitants  in  2010 .
it   सीमायें   yantai  to  the  northeast ,  weifang   to   the   वेस्ट   और  Rizhao to  the   दक्षिणपश्चिम   .
Qīng ( ) in Chinese  अर्थात्  `` green  ''  or  ``  lush ''  ,  while dǎo ( ) means ``  द्वीप  '' .
Qingdao is administered at the sub-provincial  स्तर  .
Lying  आरपार  the Shandong  प्रायद्वीप  while looking  आउट  to the Yellow  समुद्र  , Qingdao  is   a  major seaport  ,  naval base  ,   और  industrial centre .
it  is also the site of the Tsingtao Brewery .
The world  's   longest   समुद्र  bridge , the Qingdao Haiwan Bridge  ,  links the  प्रमुख  urban area of  चिंगदाओ  with  huangdao  district , straddling the Jiaozhou Bay sea areas .
Qingdao is named China 's most livable city .
Mimivirus is a viral  genus  containing a single  पहचाना   प्रजाति   नामित  Acanthamoeba polyphaga mimivirus ( APMV ) ,  or  is a group of phylogenetically related  विशाल  viruses ( designated  प्रायः  MimiN ) .
In colloquial  वाक  ,  apmv  is  अधिक   commonly   referred  to  as   बस   ``   mimivirus  '' .
Until  अक्तूबर  2011 , when  a  larger virus Megavirus  chilensis  was  वर्णित   ,  it had the largest capsid diameter of all known viruses  .
Mimivirus has a  विशाल  and complex genome compared with most other viruses  .
Mimivirus  ,  short for `` mimicking microbe '' , is so called to reflect  इसके  large  आकार  and apparent Gram-staining properties .
the   मैक्सिकन  War of Independence  (   1810–1821  ) was an  हथियारबंद  conflict between the people  of   मैक्सिको   और  the Spanish colonial authorities which started on September 16  ,  1810 .
the  movement , which  became   ज्ञात  as the Mexican  युद्ध  of Independence ,  थी   led  by  mexican-born  Spaniards , Mestizos  और   amerindians   जो  sought independence from Spain  .
It  प्रारंभ   as   an  idealistic  peasants  ' rebellion  विरूद्ध  their colonial masters , but ended  as   an  unlikely alliance between Mexican ex-royalists and  मैक्सिकन  guerrilla  insurgents   .
Crohn 's disease , also known  as  Crohn syndrome and regional enteritis ,  is   a  type of inflammatory bowel disease  कि  may  affect  any  भाग  of the gastrointestinal  ट्रैक्ट   इससे  mouth to anus  ,  causing a wide  किस्में   of  symptoms .
It primarily causes abdominal  पीड़ा  , diarrhea ( which may be  खूनी  if inflammation  is  at its worst  )  , vomiting ( can be continuous  )  , or  वज़न  loss ,  लकिन  may  भी  cause complications  बाहर  the gastrointestinal tract such as  स्किन  rashes  ,   गठिया  , inflammation of the eye , tiredness , and  कमी  of concentration .
crohn  's disease is caused  by  interactions between  पर्यावरणीय  , immunological and bacterial  कारकों  in genetically susceptible  individuals  .
इस   परिणाम   in   a   दीर्घकालिक  inflammatory disorder , in which  the  body 's immune system  हमले  the  जठरांत्र   ट्रैक्ट  possibly  निर्देशित  at microbial  antigens  .
Crohn  's   बीमारी  has wrongly  महरूम  described as an autoimmune disease in the  पास्ट  ; recent  जांचकर्ताओं   have  described  it  as  an  immune deficiency state  .
वहीँ  is  a   जेनेटिक  association  साथ  Crohn  's  disease ,  primarily  with variations of the NOD2 gene and its protein ,  जिससे   होश   बैक्टीरियल  cell  दीवारें  .
सहोदर  of affected  individuals  are at  उच्चतर   रिस्क  .
Males and females  हैं  equally affected .
Smokers are  दो  times more likely to  develop   crohn   's  disease than nonsmokers .
Crohn 's disease affects  between  400,000 and 600,000 people in  उत्तर  America  .
Prevalence  estimates   लिये  Northern Europe have ranged from 27–48  प्रति  100,000 .
crohn  's disease tends to present  initially  in the teens and  twenties  ,  साथ  another  शिखर  incidence  in  the  fifties  to  seventies  , although the  बीमारी  can  occur  at any  आयु  .
वहीँ   is  no known  फार्मास्युटिकल  or  सर्जिकल  cure for Crohn 's  बीमारी   .
उपचार  options  हैं  restricted to  controlling  symptoms ,  maintaining  remission  ,  and  preventing  relapse .
The disease was  नामित  after gastroenterologist Burrill Bernard Crohn , who , in  1932   ,   साथ  with two  अन्य  colleagues at  माउंट   sinai   हॉस्पिटल   in  New  यॉर्क  ,  वर्णित  a  श्रेणी  of patients with inflammation of the terminal  ileum  , the area  सबसे   commonly  affected by the illness .
इस   is  an incomplete list of the tallest buildings  और  structures  by  country .
The  सूची  directly includes the  tallest  buildings and structures for  प्रत्येक   देश  , and where appropriate ,  it   भी  points to more detailed country-specific  सूचियाँ   .
Rough and Ready  is  a census-designated  प्लेस  in Nevada  काउंटी   ,  California  ,  United States .
It is located west of Grass Valley ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , approximately 62 miles (  100  km ) from Sacramento .
the  population was 963 at the 2010 census .
YouTube  is   a  video-sharing website ,  निर्मित   by  three former  paypal  employees  in  February 2005 , on which users can upload , view and share videos .
The company  is  based in San Bruno ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , and uses  adobe  Flash Video and HTML5 technology  to   प्रदर्शक   a  wide variety of  user-generated  video content , including movie clips ,  tv  clips , and music  वीडियो  ,  as   खूब  as  amateur  content such as video blogging ,  छोटी   असली  videos , and educational  वीडियो   .
Most  of  the  सामग्री  on  youtube  has  महरूम  uploaded  by  individuals ,  हालांकि  media corporations including  सीबीएस   ,  the BBC  ,  Vevo , Hulu  ,  and other organizations offer some of their  सामग्री  via  the  site , as  भाग  of the YouTube partnership program .
Unregistered users can watch videos  ,  while registered users can upload  an   असीमित   क्रमांक  of  वीडियो  .
Videos considered  to   contain   potentially   अप्रिय  content  हैं  available only to  पंजीकृत  users at  तनिक  18  सालो  old  .
In November 2006  ,   youtube  ,  llc   थी   खरीदा  by Google for US $ 1.65 billion , and operates as a  subsidiary   of   google   .
सिस्टर  Act is a musical written by Cheri Steinkellner and Bill Steinkellner with additional book  सामग्री  by Douglas Carter Beane  ,  with lyrics  by   ग्लेन   स्लेटर   और  music  by  Alan Menken .
it   is  based on the hit 1992 film comedy of the same name .
The  2009  West End production  थी  produced by Stage  entertainment   ,  Whoopi Goldberg , and Michael Reno  लिये   सिस  Acts LLC .
Goldberg  is  also a producer of the 2011  ब्रॉडवे   अनुकूलन   .
Microsoft DirectX is a collection of application programming interfaces  (   api   )   लिये  handling tasks related to multimedia ,  विशेषकर  game programming and video , on  microsoft  platforms .
Originally ,  the   names  of  ये  APIs all  began  with Direct  ,  such  as  Direct3D  ,  DirectDraw , DirectMusic , DirectPlay , DirectSound  ,  and  so  forth .
The  नाम  DirectX  थी   coined  as shorthand  पद   लिये   सब  of these  api   (  the X  खड़ा  in for  the  particular API  names  ) and  जल्द  became the  नाम  of the collection .
When Microsoft  बाद  set  आउट  to develop a gaming  कंसोल  , the  x  was used as  the  basis of the  नाम  Xbox  to  indicate that the console  थी  based  on  DirectX  प्रौद्योगिकी  .
The  x   आरंभिक  has been carried forward in  the  naming of APIs  designed   लिये   the  Xbox  ऐसे  as XInput and the  cross-platform  Audio Creation Tool  (  XACT ) , while the DirectX pattern has been  जारी  for Windows APIs  ऐसे   as   direct2d  and DirectWrite .
Direct3D  (   the  3D graphics API within DirectX ) is widely used in the development of video games for Microsoft  खिड़कियाँ   ,  Microsoft Xbox  ,  Microsoft Xbox 360  और  some  sega   dreamcast  games .
Direct3D is also used by other software applications  लिये  visualization and graphics  कार्य   ऐसे   as  CAD/CAM  अभियान्त्रिकी  .
as   direct3d   is  the most widely  publicized   घटक   of  DirectX , it is  आम  to see the  names  `` DirectX '' and ``  direct3d  '' used interchangeably .
The DirectX software  विकास   kit  (  sdk  )  consists  of  runtime  libraries  in   redistributable   शब्दकोष  form  ,   साथ  with  accompanying  documentation and headers  लिये   उपयोग  in coding  .
Originally , the runtimes were  तभी  installed by games or explicitly  by   the  user .
Windows 95  किया  not launch with DirectX ,  लकिन   डाइरेक्टएक्स   थी  included  साथ  Windows 95 OEM  सेवा  Release 2 .
Windows 98 and  खिड़कियाँ  NT 4.0  दोनो  shipped with DirectX , as has every version of Windows released since .
The SDK is  उपलब्धियाँ  as  a  free download  .
जबकि  the runtimes are proprietary  ,  closed-source software , source  कोड  is provided for  सबसे  of the SDK samples .
starting  with the release  of  Windows  8  Developer  पूर्वावलोकन  ,  डाइरेक्टएक्स  SDK has  महरूम  integrated into Windows  sdk   .
Direct3D 9Ex  ,  Direct3D  10  ,  और  Direct3D 11 are only available  लिये  Windows Vista  और   नए  because  प्रत्येक   of  these new versions was built to  निर्भर  upon  the  new Windows  प्रदर्शक   ड्राइवर   मॉडल  that was introduced  लिये  Windows Vista  .
The new  vista/wddm  graphics  वास्तुकला  includes a  नई  video memory manager  supporting   आभासीकरण  of graphics  हार्डवेयर   लिये  various  अनुप्रयोग  and  सेवाएं  like the Desktop Window  मैनेजर   .
quetzaltenango   ,  also commonly  ज्ञात   by   इसके  indigenous name , Xelajú , or more  commonly   ,  Xela ,  is  the second largest  नगर  of  ग्वाटेमाला  .
it  is both the capital  of   quetzaltenango  Department and the municipal seat of  quetzaltenango   नगरपालिका   .
It  रै  an estimated  जनसांख्यिकी  of 224,703  .
the  population  is  about  61   %  indigenous or Amerindian ,  34  % Mestizo or ladino and  5  % European  .
Quetzaltenango is located in a mountain valley  at  an elevation of 2,330 meters (  7,655   ft  ) above  समुद्र  level  at  its  न्यूनतम  part .
It may  पहुँचें  above 2,400 meters  भीतर   the  city  .
the   नगरपालिका  of Quetzaltenango consists of  an  area of .
Municipalities abutting the  नगरपालिका  of Quetzaltenango  शामिल  : Salcajá  ,  Cantel , Almolonga ,  zunil  ,  el  Palmar  ,  Concepción Chiquirichapa  ,  San Mateo  ,   la  Esperanza  ,   olintepeque  , and San  आन्द्रेस  Xecul .
सब  these municipalities  हैं  part of the Department of  quetzaltenango   ,  except San Andrés  xecul  which is  a  part of  the  Department  of  Totonicapán .
The Epic of  gilgamesh  , an epic  कविता  from Mesopotamia  ,   is   amongst  the earliest surviving works of literature  .
The  साहित्यिक   इतिहास   of  Gilgamesh begins  साथ   पाँच   स्वतंत्र  Sumerian poems  परिचय   'bilgamesh  '  (  Sumerian for Gilgamesh  )   ,  king of Uruk  .
Four of these were used  as   सोर्स  material for a combined  एपिक   in   अक्कादी  .
This first combined epic , known as the ``  बूढ़ा  Babylonian '' version  ,  dates to the 18th century BC and is titled after its  incipit  , Shūtur  एली  sharrī (  ``   surpassing  All Other Kings '' )  .
Only a few fragments of it  have  survived .
The later `` Standard  babylonian   ''   संस्करण   तिथियाँ  from  the  13th  to  the 10th centuries  bc  and bears the incipit  शा   naqba   īmuru  ( `` He who Saw  the   गहन   ''   )  .
Fragments of approximately  दो  thirds of  इस  longer , twelve-tablet version  have   महरूम  recovered .
Some  of   the   बेहतरीन   नक़ल  were  खोजा   in   the   पुस्तकालयों   तबाह  of  the  7th-century BC  assyrian  king Ashurbanipal .
the  story  centers  on  a  friendship between Gilgamesh and  enkidu   .
enkidu  is  a  wild man created  by  the gods as  gilgamesh  's equal to  distract   उसे  from oppressing the people of Uruk .
Together ,  वे   यात्रा   to   the  Cedar Mountain to  शिकस्त   humbaba   ,  its monstrous  संरक्षक  .
बाद  they kill the  सांड  of Heaven ,  जिससे  the  देवी  Ishtar  भेजना  to punish  gilgamesh   लिये  spurning  उसके  advances .
as  a punishment for  ये  actions , the gods  वाक्य  Enkidu  to  death  .
the  second half of the epic  focuses   on  Gilgamesh 's  तकलीफ   at   enkidu  's death , and  उसके  quest for immortality .
In  अनुक्रम  to learn the secret of eternal life , Gilgamesh undertakes  a  long and  perilous   यात्रा  .
he  learns that ``  the  life  कि  you are seeking you will never find  .
जब   the  gods created  man  they allotted  to   उसे   मौत   ,  but life they retained in their own keeping . ''
This quote was originally attributed to  siduri  in  the  Old  babylonian   संस्करण  of the epic , and then attributed to the immortal flood  नायिका   utnapishtim   in  the  अक्कादी   संस्करण   of  the epic  .
Nevertheless  ,   gilgamesh   's   कीर्ति  lived on after his  मौत  , because of his great  भवन  projects , and his account of what Utnapishtim told  उसे  happened during the  बाढ़   .
the   स्टोरी  has been translated  into  many  अलग  languages  ,   और   gilgamesh  has since  become   adapted   in  works  of  popular  fiction  .
There are numerous debates over  जो  created  the  first video game ,  साथ  the answer depending  largely  on how video  खेल  are  पारिभाषित   .
The  एवोल्यूशन  of  वीडियो  games  represents  a tangled web of  अनेक  different industries ,  सहित  scientific ,  कंप्यूटर  , arcade , and consumer electronics  .
The `` video  ''  in  ``   वीडियो  game `` traditionally refers to a  रास्टर  display  यंत्र  .
With the popular catch phrase use of the term `` video game ''  ,  the term now  implies  all display  प्रकार  ,  स्वरुप  , and platforms  .
इतिहासकारों  have also sought to  बायपास   the  issue  by  instead using the more specific `` digital games '' descriptive .
This term leaves out the earlier analog-based computer  खेल  .
This  is   a  list of best-selling video  खेल  franchises that  have  sold  or   shipped  at least 5  लाख  copies .
Unless  वरना  stated  ,  numbers  indicate  worldwide units  बेची   ,  ordered alphabetically whenever two or more list the  वही  amount .
The exception are the  ones  specifying shipments , which have lower  पूर्वता   than  others listing  बिक्री  .
Franchise sales  शामिल  expansion packs  भी  though they  हैं  not considered full video games .
For best-selling individual video  खेल   ,  see List of best-selling video games  .
the  sales figures given  नीचे  do  नहीं   शामिल   आर्केड   खेल  sales  ,  which  can  be  मिला  at List  of  highest-grossing arcade video games  .

This  करता  not necessarily apply for  श्रेणी  that are not video game-based .
Dorothy Ann Willis Richards (  सितंबर   1  , 1933  –  September  13  , 2006 ) was  an   अमरीकी  politician and the 45th  राज्यपाल  of Texas .
वो  first came to national attention as the state  कोषाध्यक्ष   of   टेक्सास   ,  when she delivered  the  keynote  पता   at  the 1988 Democratic National Convention .
Richards served as the  45th  Governor of  टेक्सास  from 1991  to   1995  and was defeated for  re-election  in  1994   by   जार्ज   W.  Bush  .
ऐन  Richards was the second female governor  of  Texas  .
आंकड़ा  Execution Prevention ( DEP ) is a  सुरक्षा  feature included in modern operating  प्रणालियों   .
It  is  known to be available in  लिनक्स  , Mac  os  X  ,  iOS  ,  Microsoft Windows and  एंड्रॉइड  operating systems and is intended to prevent an application  or  service from executing  कोड  from a non-executable memory region  .
This  helps  prevent certain exploits that  स्टोर  code via  a  buffer overflow  ,   लिये  example .
DEP  रनों   in  two modes : hardware-enforced DEP for CPUs  कि   can  mark  मेमोरी  pages as nonexecutable  ,  and software-enforced  dep   साथ   सीमित  protection for CPUs  कि  do not have hardware support .
Software-enforced DEP does not  protect   विरूद्ध  execution  of  code  in  data pages , but instead  counters   seh   मिटाकर   ,  another type of  आक्रमण  .
dep  was introduced on  लिनक्स  in 2004 (  कर्नेल   2.6.8  ) , on  खिड़कियाँ  in  2004  with Windows  xp   सेवा   पैक  2 ,  जबकि  Apple  introduced  DEP when they  स्थानांतरित   to  x86 in 2006 .
उदाहरण  illustration of  दो  common futanari  विसंगतियाँ
, is the Japanese word  लिये  hermaphroditism , which is  भी  used in a broader sense  लिये  androgyny .
परे  Japan the term is used  to  describe  a  commonly pornographic genre of computer games , comics  और  animations , which includes characters that show both primary sexual characteristics .
But  in  today  's  language  it   refers  almost exclusively for characters who  have  an overall feminine appearance  .
In  कि  case the term is also often  abbreviated  as futa ( s  )   ,  which  is   occasionally  also used as term  लिये  the  works  itself .
जल्दी  CAPTCHAs such as these , generated by the EZ-Gimpy program , were used  on   याहू  !
A  आधुनिक   captcha  , rather  than  attempting to create a  distorted   पृष्ठभूमि  and  ऊँची   स्तर   of  warping on the text  ,  might  फ़ोकस  on making segmentation  मुश्किल  by adding an angled line .
Another way  to  make segmentation difficult is  to   भीड  symbols together , as in Yahoo  !   's  current CAPTCHA format .
Some CAPTCHAs try to utilize the ability of people  to  see three-dimensional  वस्तुएँ  .
on   इस  image  ,  symbols are drawn with lines of different  मोटाई  to make  an   प्रभाव  of  extrusion  .
a  CAPTCHA ( ) is a  प्रकार  of  challenge-response  test used in computing as an attempt to ensure that the response  is  generated by a human being .
The  प्रक्रम  usually involves  a  computer  पूछे  a  उपयोक्ता  to complete a simple  परीक्षण  which the computer  is  able to grade .
ये  tests are  designed   to  be easy for a computer  to   generate  but difficult for a  कंप्यूटर  to solve , but again easy for  a   इंसान   .
If a  सही  solution is received , it can be  presumed  to have  महरूम  entered by a  इंसान  .
A  आम  type of CAPTCHA requires  the  user to  प्रकार  letters  and/or  digits from a distorted image that appears on the screen .
Such tests are commonly used  to  prevent unwanted internet bots  इससे  accessing websites  ,  since a  सामान्य  human can easily read a CAPTCHA , while the  bot   can  not process the  चित्र  letters  और   इसलिए   ,   can  not  जवाब  properly ,  or  at  सब  .
हालांकि  most CAPTCHAs are letter pictures randomly generated  ,   अनेक  of them have  become  difficult even for a human to read  ,   so  picture CAPTCHAs were  निर्मित  in which  a   इंसान  is shown a simple  परीक्षण   to  show a picture of a certain animal ( given few  एनिमल  pictures )  ,  which is simple for a human being  to  process ,  और   इसलिए  easy  to   चुनें   ,   जबकि   a  bot can not process and  solve  the  सवाल   क्युकी  although it  can  analyze  the   चित्र   ,  it  can  not  easily   अंदाज़ा  the  एनिमल   .
The term ``  captcha  '' was coined in 2000 by Luis von Ahn , Manuel Blum , Nicholas  J.   हॉपर  , and John Langford  (   सब  of Carnegie Mellon University  )   .
It is  an   एक्रोनिम  based on the word `` capture '' and standing for  ``  Completely  स्वचालित  Public Turing test to tell Computers and Humans  अलावा   ''   .
कार्नेगी   mellon   विश्वविद्यालयों  attempted  to  trademark  the   पद   on  15 October 2004 , but the  ट्रेडमार्क  application  थी  abandoned on 21 April  2008  .
a  CAPTCHA is sometimes described as  a   रिवर्स   turing  test  ,  because it is  administered  by  a  machine and targeted at a human ,  in  contrast  to   the  standard  turing   परीक्षण   कि  is typically administered by a human and targeted at a machine .
Jacques-Yves  cousteau  ( ; commonly  ज्ञात   in  English as  ज़ाक   cousteau  ;  11  June  1910   –  25  जून  1997 ) was a French  नवल  officer , explorer , conservationist  ,  filmmaker  ,  innovator ,  वैज्ञानिक  , photographer , author and researcher who  पढ़ाई   the  sea  और   सब  forms  of  life  in  water .
he   co-developed  the Aqua-Lung  ,  pioneered marine  संरक्षण   और   थी  a member of the  académie  française  .
केएफसी  ( Kentucky Fried Chicken  )  is a fast food restaurant chain headquartered in Louisville , Kentucky  ,  United States  ,  which  specializes  in fried chicken .
An `` American  प्रतीक  '' , it is the  संसार   's   दूसरी  largest restaurant chain  overall  ( as measured by  बिक्री  ) after McDonald  's  , with  over  18,000  आउटलेट  in 120 countries  और  territories .
The company is a subsidiary of Yum !
Brands ,  a  restaurant  कम्पनी   जिससे  also owns Pizza Hut and  टैको  Bell .
केएफसी  was  संस्थापित  by Harland Sanders ,  जो   began   selling  fried chicken from his roadside restaurant in Corbin , Kentucky during the Great Depression .
Sanders was one of  the  first  लोगों  to see  the  potential  of   the  restaurant franchising concept ,  साथ  the first ``  केंटकी  Fried Chicken  ''   मताधिकार  opening in Utah  in  1952  .
The franchise popularized chicken in the  तेज़  food industry  ,  thereby  diversifying  the  मार्केट   और  challenging the dominance of  the  hamburger .
विपणन   खुद  as ``  कर्नल  Sanders  ''   ,  he became  a  legendary  फिगर   of  American  सांस्कृतिक   इतिहास  ,  और   उसके  image is still prominently used in  केएफसी  branding .
The company 's  रैपिड  expansion saw it grow too large for Sanders to manage , and in 1964  he  sold the  कम्पनी  to  a   समूह  of investors led by John Y  .  Brown ,  jr.  and Jack Massey .
केएफसी  was one of the first fast food chains  to   विस्तार  internationally , opening outlets  in  England  ,   मैक्सिको  and Puerto  रीको   by  the mid-1960s .
Throughout  the  1970s and 1980s , KFC experienced mixed  सौभाग्य  domestically ,  as  it went through  a  series of corporate owners  जो   था   छोटी  or  no   अनुभव  in the restaurant business .
In  the  early 1970s ,  केएफसी  was sold to the spirits firm  heublein   ,  who  यहूद  taken over by the  r.J.   रेनॉल्ड्स  food and tobacco conglomerate , who sold the chain to PepsiCo  .
The chain continued  to  expand overseas however , and  in  1987 KFC  became   the  first Western  रेस्तरां   कड़ी  to open in  चीन   .
The chain has  चूंकि  expanded rapidly  in  China , and the country  is  now the company 's most profitable  मार्केट   .
PepsiCo spun off  इसके   रेस्तरां  division as Tricon Global  रेस्तरां  ,  जिससे  later changed its  नाम   to   यम  !
Brands  .
KFC primarily sells fried chicken pieces and variations  ऐसे  as chicken sandwiches and wraps ,  सलाद  and side dishes  ऐसे  as French fries  और  coleslaw , desserts and soft  पेय  ,  प्रायः  supplied by PepsiCo  .
Its most famous product is pressure  fried  chicken pieces  ,  seasoned  साथ  Sanders '  ``  Original  रेसिपी   ''  of  11  herbs and spices  .
the  exact nature of these ingredients is  अनजान  , and represents a notable  व्यापार   रहस्य  .
larger  portions of  fried  chicken  हैं  served in a  distinctive   गत्ता  `` bucket '' ,  जिससे  has become  a   हस्ताक्षर   of  the  कड़ी  since being introduced by franchisee Pete Harman .
केएफसी  is famous for the slogan `` finger lickin  '  good  ''  , which  रै  since  महरूम  replaced  by  ``  nobody  does chicken like KFC '' and `` So good '' .
निडारिया  (  साथ  a  मूक  c ) or Coelenterata is a phylum containing  over  10,000  प्रजाति   of  animals found exclusively in  जलीय   और   ज़्यादातर  marine  environments   .
Their distinguishing  विशेषता  is cnidocytes  ,  specialized cells that they use mainly for capturing prey .
Their bodies consist of mesoglea , a non-living jelly-like substance  ,  sandwiched between two layers  of   epithelium  that are mostly one  कोशिका   मोटा   .
They have two basic body forms : swimming medusae  और  sessile polyps , both of which  हैं  radially symmetrical  साथ   mouths   घिरी  by tentacles that  भालू  cnidocytes .
Both forms have  a  single orifice and body  गुहा   कि   हैं  used for digestion and  श्वसन  .
अनेक  cnidarian  प्रजाति  produce colonies that  हैं  single organisms  रचित  of medusa-like or polyp-like zooids , or both .
Cnidarians '  क्रियाएँ  are coordinated by a decentralized nerve  जाल  and simple  receptors   .
Several free-swimming Cubozoa and  scyphozoa  possess balance-sensing  statocysts  ,  और  some  have  simple  आँखें  .
नहीं  all  cnidarians  reproduce  sexually  .
अनेक  have  जटिल  lifecycles  साथ  asexual  polyp   चरण  and  यौन   medusae   ,   लकिन   कुछ   omit  either  the  polyp  or  the  medusa   स्टेज  .
cnidarians  were for a long time  grouped  with  ctenophores  in the phylum Coelenterata , but  increasing   जागरूकता   of  their differences caused them to be placed  in  separate  phyla  .
Cnidarians  हैं  classified  into   चार  main groups : the almost wholly sessile Anthozoa ( sea  anemones  ,  corals  , sea pens )  ;   तैराकी  Scyphozoa ( jellyfish )  ;  Cubozoa ( box jellies  )  ;  और  Hydrozoa ,  a  diverse group that includes all the  freshwater  cnidarians as well as many marine forms , and  रै   दोनो  sessile members  ऐसे  as Hydra and colonial  swimmers   ऐसे  as  the  Portuguese Man o  '  War .
Staurozoa have  recently  been  recognised  as  a  class  in   उनके  own right rather than  a  sub-group of Scyphozoa  ,  and there is debate about whether Myxozoa and  polypodiozoa   हैं   cnidarians  or closer  to  bilaterians (  अधिक  complex animals  )  .
Most cnidarians prey on organisms ranging in size from  प्लवक   to  animals several times  larger  than themselves , but  अनेक   obtain   much   of  their nutrition  इससे  endosymbiotic  शैवाल   ,  and a few are parasites .
Many are preyed upon by other animals  सहित  starfish ,  समुद्र  slugs ,  मछली  and turtles  .
मूँगा  reefs  ,  whose  polyps  are  समृद्ध  in  endosymbiotic  algae ,  support   कुछ  of the world 's most productive ecosystems , and protect  वनस्पति  in tidal  zones   और   on  shorelines  इससे  strong  currents  and  tides   .
While corals  हैं  almost entirely  प्रतिबंधित  to warm , shallow marine waters ,  अन्य  cnidarians  सजीव  in the depths  ,  in polar seas  और  in freshwater .
Fossil cnidarians have  महरूम  found in rocks formed about , and other  जीवाश्मों   दिखाएँ  that  corals   may   have  been  उपस्थित  shortly before and diversified  a  few million years  बाद  .
Fossils of cnidarians  कि   do   नहीं   निर्माण  mineralized structures are very rare .
Scientists  फिलहाल  think that cnidarians , ctenophores  और  bilaterians are more closely  सम्बन्धित   to   calcareous   sponges  than these are to  अन्य  sponges , and  कि  anthozoans are  the  evolutionary `` aunts ''  or  ``  बहनों  '' of other cnidarians , and the most  closely  related to bilaterians .
Recent analyses  have  concluded  कि  cnidarians  ,   हालांकि   माना  more  ``  primitive ''  than  bilaterians , have a wider range  of  genes .

एज़टेक  cosmogram in the pre-Hispanic Codex Fejérváry-Mayer - the fire  परमेश्वर  Xiuhtecuhtli is  in   the  center  .
the  Aztec people were certain ethnic  समूह  of central  मैक्सिको  , particularly those groups who  spoke   the  Nahuatl language and who dominated large parts of Mesoamerica  इससे   the   14th  to  16th  centuries .
The Nahuatl words  aztecatl   (  singular ) and aztecah  (  plural  )   औसत   ``   लोगों   इससे  Aztlan  ``   ,  a mythological place for the  nahuatl-speaking   संस्कृति  of  the  time  ,   और  later  अपनाया  as the  शब्द  to define the Mexica people .
Often the term `` Aztec ''  refers  exclusively  to   the  Mexica  लोगों  of Tenochtitlan ( now the  स्थान  of Mexico  नगर  ) , situated on an  द्वीप  in Lake Texcoco  ,   जो  referred to themselves  as   mexica  Tenochca or Cōlhuah Mexica .
Sometimes the term  भी  includes the inhabitants  of  Tenochtitlan 's  दो  principal  अलाइड  city-states  ,  the Acolhuas of  texcoco   और  the Tepanecs of  tlacopan  , who  साथ   साथ  the Mexica formed the Aztec Triple  गठबंधन  which  नियंत्रित  what is often  ज्ञात  as  ``  the Aztec Empire ''  .
in  other contexts , Aztec  may   refer   to  all the various city  राज्य  and their peoples , who shared  विशाल  parts of their  जातीय   इतिहास   और  cultural traits with  the  Mexica  ,  Acolhua and Tepanecs , and who often also  प्रयुक्त  the  नावातल  language as a lingua franca  .
In  इस  meaning it is  संभावित   to  talk about  an  Aztec civilization including all the  particular  cultural patterns common  लिये  most of the peoples  inhabiting   सेंट्रल  Mexico in the  लेट   postclassic   काल  .
इससे  the 13th century , the Valley  of  Mexico  थी   the   दिल  of  एज़टेक  civilization :  यहाँ  the capital  of  the  एज़टेक  Triple Alliance ,  the  city of Tenochtitlan , was built upon raised islets in Lake Texcoco .
The  ट्रिपल  Alliance formed a tributary  साम्राज्य  expanding its political  आधिपत्य   दूर  beyond the  घाटी   of   मैक्सिको   ,  conquering other city  राज्य   throughout  Mesoamerica .
At  इसके  pinnacle  ,   एज़टेक   संस्कृति  had  समृद्ध  and complex mythological and religious traditions , as well as  reaching  remarkable architectural and artistic accomplishments .
In  1521  Hernán Cortés ,  साथ   साथ  a  विशाल  number of Nahuatl  बोलना   स्वदेशी   allies   ,  conquered Tenochtitlan and defeated  the  Aztec  ट्रिपल  Alliance under the leadership of Hueyi Tlatoani Moctezuma  ii  .
Subsequently the  स्पेनी   संस्थापित  the new settlement  of   मैक्सिको  City on  the   साईट  of the ruined Aztec capital , from where  वे   proceeded  with the  प्रक्रम   of  colonizing Central America  .
एज़टेक  culture and history is primarily  ज्ञात  through  पुरातत्व   प्रमाण   मिला   in  excavations such as that of  the  renowned  templo  Mayor in  मैक्सिको  City ; from  स्वदेशी  bark paper codices ; from eyewitness accounts by Spanish conquistadors such as Hernán Cortés  और   बर्नल  Díaz del Castillo ; and especially  इससे  16th  और  17th century descriptions  of  Aztec culture and history written by  स्पेनी   clergymen  and  साक्षर   aztecs  in  the   स्पेनी  or Nahuatl language ,  ऐसे   as  the famous Florentine  codex  compiled by the  franciscan  monk Bernardino de Sahagún with  the  help  of  indigenous  एज़टेक   informants   .
Anderson Hays  कूपर   (   born  June 3 , 1967  )   is  an American  पत्रकार   ,  author , and television personality  .
he   is  the  प्राथमिक  anchor of the CNN news  दिखाएँ  Anderson Cooper 360° .
The  कार्यक्रम  is normally broadcast  सजीव   इससे  a  नई  York City studio ; however ,  कूपर  often  प्रसारण  live on  स्थान   लिये   तोड़कर  news stories  .
As of September  2011   ,   he  also  serves  as host  of  his own eponymous  syndicated  daytime talk show , Anderson  सजीव  , which will be cancelled at the end of the second season  .
A plot of a  सामान्य   वितरण  ( or bell-shaped curve ) where each band has  a  width of 1 standard deviation – See also : 68-95-99.7  नियम
Cumulative probability of a  सामान्य   वितरण   साथ  expected  मान  0  और  standard deviation 1 .
In statistics and probability theory , standard deviation (  represented  by the symbol sigma  ,  σ ) shows  कैसा   much   विभिन्नता  or dispersion exists from  the  average ( mean ) , or  अपेक्षित   मान  .
a   कम  standard  विचलन   indicates   कि  the data  अंक  tend  to   be  very  बंद  to  the   औसत  ; high standard  विचलन   indicates  that the data points are spread  आउट   over  a  विशाल  range of values .
The standard deviation  of  a random variable  ,  statistical population , data set , or probability distribution is the square root of  इसके  variance .
It is  algebraically  simpler  हालांकि  practically less  मजबूत   than  the average absolute deviation  .
a  useful property of standard  विचलन  is  कि  , unlike  variance  , it is expressed in the same units as  the  data .
Note  ,   however   ,  that for  माप  with percentage as unit , the standard deviation will have percentage points  as   ईकाई   .
In addition  to  expressing the variability of a population  ,   मानक   विचलन  is commonly  प्रयुक्त  to measure confidence in statistical conclusions  .
For example , the margin  of   गलती  in polling  आंकड़ा   is  determined  by  calculating the  अपेक्षित  standard  विचलन   in  the results if the same  पोल  were to be conducted multiple times  .
the  reported margin of error is  typically   परिचय  twice  the  standard deviation  ­–  the radius  of  a  95  percent  विश्वास  interval .
in  science , researchers  commonly  report the  मानक  deviation  of  experimental data ,  और   तभी  effects that fall far outside the  दायरा  of standard  विचलन  are considered statistically significant – normal random  गलती  or variation in the measurements  is  in this way distinguished from  causal   विभिन्नता  .
Standard deviation is  भी   महत्वपूर्ण  in finance , where the standard  विचलन   on  the  रेट  of  वापसी  on  an  investment is a measure of the volatility of  the  investment .
जब  only  a   नमूना  of data  इससे  a population is available , the standard deviation  of   the  population can be estimated  by  a modified quantity called the ``  नमूना  standard  विचलन  '' .
When the sample is the entire population  ,  its  unmodified  standard deviation  is  called the `` population  मानक   विचलन  '' .
Ulluco  (   u   :   ju  : kɔ  :  ) ( Ullucus  tuberosus  ) is a plant grown primarily as a root  सब्ज़ी  ,  secondarily  as a leaf vegetable  .
the   ulluco   is  one  of  the  सबसे  widely  grown  and economically important root crops  in  the Andean region of South America ,  दूसरी  only  to  the potato .
It is  ज्ञात  there  साथ  the common name  of   पापा  lisa , but also  by  the  क्षेत्रीय   names  melloco  (  Ecuador ) , olluco ( Peru ) , chugua  (  Colombia ) or  ruba   (  Venezuela ) ,  among  others .
the  leaf and  the  tuber are  खाद्य   ,  similar to spinach  और  the potato ,  क्रमशः  .
They are known to  contain  high levels of protein ,  कैल्सियम  , and carotene .
Papalisa were used by the Incas prior  to   आगमन   of  Europeans in  दक्षिण  America .
Ulluco  tubers   हैं  marketed as `` Earth Gems ''  in  New Zealand ,  by   halfords   exotic   उपज   .

an  April  24  , 1851  पोस्टर   चेतावनी   the  ``  रंगीन  people of  बोस्टन   ''  about policemen acting  as  slave  catchers  .
The  भगोड़े  Slave Law or Fugitive Slave  अधिनियम  was  passed   by  the United States Congress  on  September  18  , 1850 , as  भाग  of  the   सुलह  of  1850   between  Southern slave-holding  रूचि  and  उत्तरी  Free-Soilers .
इस  was one  of  the most controversial acts of the 1850 compromise and  heightened  Northern fears of a ``  स्लेव  power conspiracy ''  .
It declared  कि  all runaway slaves were ,  upon  capture , to  be  returned to their masters .
abolitionists  nicknamed it the `` Bloodhound Law '' for the dogs that were used  to  track down  runaway   स्लेव  .
Frank Joseph  pallone  , Jr.  (   born   अक्तूबर  30  ,   1951  ) is the U.S.  प्रतिनिधि  for , serving  चूंकि  1993  .
He is  a  member of the Democratic Party .
he   previously  represented the 3rd  ज़िला  from 1988 to 1993 .
Trin-i-tee 5:7  is  a gospel duo from New Orleans  ,  Louisiana in the United States  .
The group was  marketed  as a  इन्जील   वैकल्पिक   to   r  &  b  girl groups such as  नियति   's  Child and TLC .
trin-i-tee  5:7 has sold over  2.5  million  एल्बम   .
In  1998  , the group released their  पहला  album entitled Trin-i-tee 5:7 which debut  at   #  1 on the Top Gospel charts .
The album featured the songs ``  परमेश्वर  's Grace '' and  the  cover  सोंग  `` Oh !
Mary Do n't  तुम   रोते  '' .
The album  बाद  became certified gold .
In 1999 ,  terri   भूरा  left the group and was later replaced by singer Adrian Anderson  .
During  कि  year , the group recorded and  released   उनके  second album  ,  Spiritual Love .
the  album became  the   समूह  's second # 1  एल्बम  on  the  Top  इन्जील  charts  .
the  album  contained  the singles `` Put Your Hands '' and `` My Body  ''  .
In 2002  ,  the  समूह  released their  तीसरा  album The Kiss which  debuted  at  #  2 on the Top  इन्जील  charts .
In 2007  ,  the group left GospoCentric  रिकॉर्ड  and signed  a   रिकार्ड  deal with  स्पिरिट   उठती  Music .
In late 2007 , Trin-i-tee 5:7  released  their fifth  एल्बम  T57 , which featured the top  टेन  gospel single `` Listen ''  .
T57  charted   #  2  on  the  शीर्ष   इन्जील   एल्बम  , # 5 on the Top  ईसाई  charts , and # 12 on the  शीर्ष   r  & B  चार्ट  .
the   संयुक्त  States federal  अर्जित  income tax credit  or  earned income credit  (  EITC or  eic  ) is  a  refundable tax  क्रेडिट  for low-  और   medium-income  individuals  और  couples , primarily  लिये   those   जो  have qualifying  children  .
When the  क्रेडिट  exceeds the amount of  कर  owed , it  परिणाम  in a  कर   refund  to those who claim the  क्रेडिट  .
This credit  is  provided to  ऑफसेट  the burden of social security taxes and  भी  to  प्रचार   an   प्रोत्साहन   to   कार्य  .
In order for a  व्यक्ति  or couple to claim one or more  व्यक्तियों  as  उनके  qualifying child ( ren ) ,  the  age , relationship , and shared  रेसिडेंसी  requirements must be met  ,   as  well as some  अन्य   आवश्यकताएँ   .
u.S.  tax  फ़ॉर्म  1040EZ  ,  1040A ,  or  1040  can  be  प्रयुक्त  to  अर्जी  EIC  बगैर   qualifying  children .
To claim the credit with qualifying  children  ,  1040a  or  1040  must be  प्रयुक्त  ,  as   खूब  as attaching Schedule  eic  .
EIC phases in  धीरे  ,  रै  a  medium-length  plateau , and then  phases   आउट   अधिक   धीरे  than it  phased  in .
Since  the  credit  phases   आउट  at 21 % (  लिये   दो  children and for three or more qualilfying  children  ) or 16 % (  लिये  one qualifying  चाइल्ड   )   ,  it is  सदा  preferable to  have  one more dollar of actual  सैलरी   or  wages (  हालांकि  technically  ,  since  the   eic   तालिका  moves by fifty  डालर   increments  ,  it   's  always preferable  to   have  an extra fifty-dollar  वृद्धि  of salary or wages  )   .
For tax year  2011   ,  the  अधिकतम  EIC for a single  व्यक्ति  or  युगल  filing  बगैर  qualifying children  थी  $  464  .
the  maximum  eic  with  एक  qualifying  चाइल्ड  was $ 3,094 , with two children  थी  $ 5,112 , and  साथ  three or  अधिक   qualifying  children was  $  5,751 .
These  amounts  are  indexed  annually for inflation .
The earned income tax  क्रेडिट  has  महरूम  part of political  debates  in the  संयुक्त  States regarding whether raising the minimum wage or increasing EIC will better address a seeming shortage  of  good-paying jobs .
the  following is a list  of   मध्यांतर  shows held at the National Football League 's championship game , the Super Bowl .
While halftime  shows   हैं   a  tradition during football games at all  स्तर   of   प्रतियोगिता  , the Super  कटोरी  halftime show represents a fundamental link to pop culture ,  जिससे  helps broaden  the   टेलीविज़न   दर्शक  and  देशभर  interest .
In most  सालो  since the mid-1980s ,  the  halftime show of the Super Bowl  रै   प्रदर्शित  popular recording artists and other well-known celebrities .
It has  measurably   increased  television viewers  दौरान  and after  the  halftime show .
the  performance is regarded one of  the  most-watched events in American  टेलीविज़न   annually   साथ  over 100 million viewers  in  the  संयुक्त  States alone .
musical  genres over  the   सालो  have represented a  व्यापक  range  of  music types  ,   सहित  pop , rock  ,   क्लासिक  rock ,  देश   ,  hip hop , rap , blues ,  और  soul .
In  कुछ  years  ,   छोटी  skits  or   नाटक  scenes are  acted  out on a stage .
The performance group  up   साथ  People has performed at  the  most Super Bowl  मध्यांतर  shows ,  अभिनीत  in four  दौरान   the  1970s and 1980s .
According  to  Nielsen  दरजा   ,  Super Bowl XLVI halftime  दिखाएँ  headlined by Madonna  in  2012 remains  the  most-watched  मध्यांतर  show  in  history , with 114 million  दर्शक   or   परिचय  3 million more  than  the  वास्तविक   खेल  .
Beyonce 's 2013  मध्यांतर   दिखाएँ  performance  थी  the  दूसरी   सबसे  viewed show  in   इतिहास  .
It is  सूचीबद्ध  on the Guinness World Records  as   the  largest TV audience for a  सुपर  Bowl half-time performance .
International Men 's Day ( IMD ) is an annual international event  मनाये  on  19th  November .
Inaugurated in 1999 in  त्रिनिदाद  and Tobago , the day and  इसके   कार्यक्रम  find  support  from a  किस्में  of  individuals  and  समूह  in Australia  ,   the   caribbean  , North America , Asia  ,   यूरोपीय  and  अफ़्रीकी  .
Speaking on behalf of UNESCO , Director of Women and Culture of Peace Ingeborg Breines said  of  IMD  ,   ``   इस  is  an   बेहतरीन  idea  और  would give some  लिंग  balance  .  ''
She  added  that UNESCO was looking forward  to  cooperating with  the  organizers .
the  objectives of  celebrating  an International  मेन  's  दिन  include focusing on  मेन  's and boys ' health , improving gender  संबंध  , promoting gender equality  ,  and highlighting  धनात्मक   पुरूष  role models .
It  is  an  अवसर  to  हाइलाइट  discrimination against  मेन  and boys and  to  celebrate  उनके  achievements and contributions , in particular  लिये  their  योगदान  to community ,  परिवार   ,  marriage  ,   और   चाइल्ड  care .
The  broader  and  परम  aim  of  the event  is  to promote basic humanitarian values .
International Men 's  दिन  is  मनाये  in  over  60 countries ,  सहित   त्रिनिदाद  and  टोबैगो  , Jamaica , Australia , India ,  चीन  ,  संयुक्त  States  ,  Romania  ,  Singapore , Malta  ,   संयुक्त  Kingdom  ,   दक्षिण   अफ़्रीकी  ,  तंजानिया  ,  ज़िम्बाब्वे  , Botswana  ,  Seychelles , Burundi  ,  Hungary , Ireland ,  आइल  of  man  , Ghana , Canada , Denmark , Norway , Austria , Bosnia and Herzegovina , Ukraine  ,  France , Italy  ,  Pakistan , Cuba , Antigua  और   बारबूडा   ,   st.  Kitts and  नेविस  , St. Lucia  ,  Grenada and Cayman  आइलैंड्स   ,   on   19   नवम्बर   ,  and global support for the  जश्न  is broad .

गाँव  is a district in the San Fernando  घाटी  region  of  Los  एंजिल्स   ,   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
the   मध्य  age  of  its population , at 36 , is `` old for the  नगर  of Los Angeles . '' and its average household size  of  two  लोगों   is   कम  , compared to other parts of the city  .
Developmental  मनोविज्ञान   is   the  scientific  पढ़ाई  of changes that occur in human beings  over  the course of their life span .
Originally  चिंतित   साथ   infants  and  children  , the field has expanded to include adolescence ,  वयस्क   विकास   ,  aging ,  और  the  संपूर्ण  life  स्पैन  .
इस  field examines  बदलें   आरपार  a broad range  of   विषय   सहित  motor skills and  अन्य  psycho-physiological processes ;  संज्ञानात्मक  development involving  क्षेत्रों  such as problem solving , moral understanding ,  और   conceptual  understanding ;  भाषा  acquisition ;  सोशल  ,  व्यक्तित्व   ,   और   emotional  development ;  और  self-concept and identity formation .
Developmental  मनोविज्ञान  includes issues such as  the  extent to which  विकास  occurs through  the  gradual  accumulation  of knowledge  बनाम   stage-like  development  ,  or the extent to which  children  are born with  स्वाभाविक   दिमागी  structures versus  सीखना  through experience .
Many researchers  हैं  interested in the  बातचीत   between  personal characteristics , the individual  's  behavior  ,   और  environmental factors  सहित  social context , and their impact on development  ;   अन्य  take  a  more narrowly-focused approach .
Developmental  मनोविज्ञान  informs several applied fields ,  सहित  : educational psychology , child  psychopathology  , and forensic developmental psychology  .
developmental  psychology complements several other basic research  फ़ील्ड  in psychology including social psychology , cognitive  मनोविज्ञान  , ecological  मनोविज्ञान  ,  और  comparative  मनोविज्ञान  .
Joseph Michael `` Joey '' Stivic is a fictional  अक्षर   जो  first  appeared  on  the  1970s American  sitcom  All in the  परिवार   .
Joey Stivic was the  बेटे  and  तभी  child  of  Mike  stivic  ( played  by  Rob  reiner   )   और  Gloria Stivic (  निभाई  by Sally Struthers ) , and the grandson of Archie Bunker  (  Carroll O'Connor ) and  एडिथ   बंकर   (  Jean Stapleton ) .
the  character  पहला   appeared  as a newborn baby in a two-part episode  of  All in the Family which aired in December 1975 .
After many  दिखावे  on All  in  the Family until Reiner  और  Struthers left the series  in  1978 ( by that time  ,  Joey had been played most often by alternating twins  जेसन   और   जस्टिन  Draeger  )  , the  जॉय  Stivic character next  appeared  on  the  All  in  the Family spin-off  श्रेणी   (   कुछ  call it  a  continuation  of   the  original  )  Archie  बंकर  's  प्लेस  in  a  guest appearance in the November 1979 episode ``  थैंक्सगिविंग  Reunion . ''
In this instance ,  the  character was  निभाई  by  चाइल्ड   कर्ता  Dick Billingsley  और  was appropriately pre-school age  .
With Gloria now separated  इससे  Mike  ,  she returned to Archie Bunker  's   प्लेस  with  जॉय  in the February 1982  एपीसोड  ``  ग्लोरिया   आता  Home . ''
in  this episode , Joey was played by  क्रिस्टोफर   johnston   .
Joey  stivic  was a regular character on the  सब  in the  परिवार  spin-off series  ग्लोरिया   in  1982 and 1983 .
On  इस  series , in which  the  now-divorced  ग्लोरिया  Bunker character  था  moved to Upstate  नई  York in  अनुक्रम  to work as an  सहायक  veterinarian ,  the  part of  जॉय  Stivic was  निभाई  by  ten-year-old  actor Christian  jacobs   .
After Gloria was canceled in 1983 , Joey Stivic disappeared  इससे  prime time  टेलीविज़न  for  11  years , until the  अक्षर  made one last  रूप  on 704 Hauser ,  a  short-lived 1994 series  परिचय  a  ब्लैक  family  जो  had  स्थानांतरित  into the old  बंकर  home  ,   सालो  after  बंकर  had sold it .
in  this  रूप  , the Joey Stivic character was played  by   केसी   siemaszko  , an actor born in  1961  (  14  years before Joey  stivic  's  fictional  birth  )  .
In 1976 the Ideal Toy  कम्पनी  released  a  14-inch  ``   जॉय   stivic  doll '' ( called `` Archie Bunker 's  पोता  ''  )  which  थी  billed as  the  `` first anatomically  सही  male doll .  ''
The doll inspired  mild  controversy at  the   समय  , and is a collectors ' item today .
The 2011  रोज़  Bowl was the 97th  संस्करण  of the annual  कटोरी  game played on January  1  ,  2011   ,   as  part of the 2010 college football  ऋतु   .
निभाई  in Pasadena , California , the TCU Horned Frogs of the Mountain  वेस्ट   सम्मेलन  defeated  the  Wisconsin Badgers of  the  Big Ten Conference  by   a  score of  21   –  19 .
The Pasadena  टूर्नामेंट  of Roses Association  थी  the organizer of the game  .
Vizio Inc. was the corporate sponsor and  the  game was  officially  named `` The Rose Bowl Game presented by Vizio ''  .
This game marked  the   पहला   समय  a  टोली  from a non-Automatic Qualifying Conference played in ,  और  won  ,   the   रोज़  Bowl  in   इसके  97  सालो  .
The contest was  ब्रॉडकास्ट   on   केबल  television station ESPN with a radio broadcast on ESPN Radio  और  XM Satellite Radio and ESPN3 streaming video over  the   अंतरजाल  .
Coverage began at 1:30 PM ( PST )  साथ  kickoff at 2:10 PM  (  PST  )   .
This  चिह्नित   the  first time that  the   खेल  was not broadcast nationally  ``   over-the-air  ''  (  terrestrial television ) since  the  games  prior  to the 1952 Rose Bowl  ,   जिससे  was the  पहला  nationally televised college football game .
the  Rose Bowl  खेल   ,   प्रसंग  Building Dreams  ,  Friendships ,  &  Memories ,  थी  a  contractual  sell-out , with 64,500 tickets  आबंटित   to  the participating  टीमों  and  सम्मेलनों   .
Ticket prices for all seats  in  the  रोज़  Bowl are listed at  $  145 .
The remaining tickets went to the  टूर्नामेंट  of Roses members  ,  sponsors ,  नगर   of  Pasadena residents  ,   और  the  सामान्य  public  .
the   रोज़  Bowl  स्टेडियम  capacity is  सूचीबद्ध   at  approximately 91,000  .
The Declaration of Independence is a statement adopted by the  महाद्वीपीय  Congress  on   जुलाई  4 , 1776  ,  which announced  कि  the thirteen  अमरीकी   colonies   ,  then at war  साथ  Great Britain , regarded  themselves  as independent states  ,   और  no  longer  a part of the British Empire .
Instead they now formed  a  new nation—the United States  of   अमेरिका   .
John  एडम्स  was a leader in  pushing  for independence  ,  which was unanimously approved on July  2  .
A committee  था   already  drafted the  औपचारिक  declaration , to  be   तैयार  when congress voted  on   स्वतंत्रता  .
एडम्स  persuaded the committee to select Thomas Jefferson  to  compose the original draft  of  the document ,  जिससे  congress would  संपादन  to produce  the  final  संस्करण  .
The  घोषणा  was ultimately a formal explanation of why  कॉंग्रेस  had voted on July 2  to   घोषित  independence from Great Britain ,  अधिक  than a year  बाद   the  outbreak of  the   अमरीकी   क्रांतिकारी   युद्ध   .
The national  जन्मदिवस   ,  the Independence Day is  मनाये  on July  4   ,  although Adams  चाही  July 2 .
After ratifying the text on July 4 , Congress  जारी  the  घोषणा  of Independence in several forms  .
It was initially published  as   the  printed Dunlap broadside  कि  was widely distributed  और   पढ़ा   to  the public .
The most  प्रसिद्ध   संस्करण  of the Declaration  ,  a  हस्ताक्षरित   नक़ल   कि  is popularly  regarded  as the Declaration of Independence , is displayed at the National Archives  in   वॉशिंगटन  , D.C .
Although the wording  of  the  घोषणा  was approved on July  4  , the  तिथि  of its  हस्ताक्षर  was August 2 .
The original July 4  संयुक्त  States Declaration of Independence manuscript was lost while  सब  other  नक़ल   have  been derived  इससे   इस   असली  document .
The sources and interpretation of the  घोषणा  have  महरूम   the  subject  of  much scholarly inquiry .
the  Declaration  जायज   the  independence  of  the United  राज्य  by listing colonial grievances against King George  iii   ,   और  by asserting  निश्चित  natural and  विधिक  rights , including a right of revolution .
Having served  इसके  original purpose in announcing independence ,  the  text of the  घोषणा  was  initially  ignored after the American Revolution  .
Since  तब  ,  it  has  आइये  to be considered a major statement on human  अधिकारों  , particularly  इसके   दूसरी  sentence:
We  थाम  these truths  to  be self-evident ,  कि  all  मेन   हैं  created  बराबर  , that they are endowed by  उनके  Creator with certain unalienable Rights ,  कि  among these are  जीवन  ,  स्वतंत्रता  and  the  pursuit of Happiness .
इस   रै  been called `` one  of  the best-known sentences in the English language '' , containing ``  the  most potent and consequential  शब्द  in American history . ''
The passage  आए   to  represent a moral standard to  जिससे  the United States should  नीयत  .
This  दृश्य  was notably promoted by Abraham Lincoln , who considered  the  Declaration to be the  न्यास  of  उसके   राजनैतिक   दर्शनशास्त्र   ,   और   argued  that the  घोषणा  is a statement of principles through which the  संयुक्त  States Constitution should be  interpreted  .
It  रै   प्रेरित  work for the rights  of  marginalized people throughout the world .
Chitty Chitty Bang Bang is a 1968 British musical  फिल्मी  loosely based  on   इयान   फ्लेमिंग  's novel  .
the   फिल्मी   's  script is by  roald  Dahl and Ken Hughes  और  its  गीतों   by  the Sherman Brothers  .
it  stars  लंड  Van Dyke  as   caractacus  Potts and Sally  ऐन  Howes as Truly  scrumptious  .
the  film was  निर्देशित   by  Ken Hughes  और  produced by  अल्बर्ट  R.  ब्रोकोली   (   co-producer  of  the  James Bond series of films , also based on Fleming  's  novels ) .
John Stears supervised  the   खास  effects .
Irwin Kostal supervised and conducted the  म्यूज़िक   ,  while the musical numbers were  मंचन   by   मार्क  Breaux and Dee  dee  Wood  .
a   प्रदेश   is  arid  जब   it   is   characterized  by a severe  कमी   of  available water ,  to  the extent  of  hindering or preventing  the  growth and development of plant  और  animal  जीवन   .
environments  subject  to  arid climates tend  to  lack vegetation  और   हैं  called xeric  or  desertic .
Most  ``  arid ''  climates   घेर  the  equator  ; these  स्थान  include most of Africa and  भाग  of South America  और  Central America .
Cancer (  ♋  ) is an  astrological  sign ,  जिससे  is associated  साथ  the  नक्षत्र   कर्कट   .
It  spans   the  90-120th degree of the zodiac ,  between  90  और  125.25  उपाधि   of   celestial   देशांतर   ,  which  the   सूर्य   transits  this area  on  average between  जून  22 to July 22  प्रत्येक  year .
And under the sidereal zodiac ,  it   is  currently from July 21 to August 9  .
the   संयुक्त   राज्य  presidential  चुनाव  of  1960   थी   the   44th  quadrennial presidential  चुनाव   ,   आयोजित  on  मंगलवार  ,  नवम्बर  8 , 1960 .
the  Republican  पार्टी   मनोनीत  incumbent  vice-president  Richard Nixon , while the  लोकतांत्रिक  Party nominated  जॉन  F. Kennedy , Senator from Massachusetts .
The  लाज़िम  President  ,  Republican Dwight D.  आइज़नहावर   ,  was  नहीं  eligible  लिये   re-election  after serving  the   अधिकतम  two terms allowed  by   the  Twenty-second  amendment  .
Kennedy was elected  साथ  a lead  of  112,827  मत  ,  or  0.17 % of the popular vote , giving him  a  victory of 303 to  219  in  the   चुनावी  College ,  the  closest since 1916 .
This was the  पहला   चुनाव   in   जिससे  all fifty  of   the  current United States participated  .
a   क्रमांक   of  factors  बताइये  why the election was so close .
Kennedy  gained   चूंकि  there was an  आर्थिक  recession  जिससे  hurt  the   लाज़िम  Republican , and he had the  लाभ   of  17  लाख  more registered Democrats  than  Republicans .
Furthermore , the new votes  कि   कैनेडी  gained among  catholics  almost neutralized the new votes Nixon gained  among  Protestants  .
कैनेडी   's   campaigning  skills decisively  outmatched  Nixon 's .
In the end  ,  Nixon 's emphasis on his  अनुभव  carried little  वज़न  , and he  wasted  energy by  campaigning  in all  50  states instead  of  concentrating on the  झूले  states .
कैनेडी  used his  विशाल  , well-funded campaign organization to  जीत  the nomination , secure endorsements  ,   और  , with the aid of  the   पिछला  of  the   big-city  bosses , to  मिलेंगी   आउट  the vote  in  the big  शहरों  .
He relied  on  running mate Lyndon B. Johnson  to  hold  the  South and used television effectively .
This  चुनाव  is notable  as   होने   the  first time  in  U.S. history that two  बैठे   u.s  .  सीनेटरों  ( Kennedy  और  Johnson ) were  निर्वाचित  as  अध्यक्ष   और  vice-president , a phenomenon  कि  has been repeated  एकबार  ,  by   बराक   ओबामा  and  जो  Biden  in  2008  (  in both cases , the  अध्यक्ष  was the  younger  ,  अधिक  junior  सीनेटर   )  .
शेरवुड  is a city in Washington County  ,  Oregon  ,  United  राज्य   .
Located  in   the   southeast   कोने   of  the county , it is a residential community in  the   tualatin  Valley southwest of Portland .
The population was 11,791 at the 2000 census .
according   to  the 2010 census , the population  थी  18,205  निवासियों  .
Indirectly  नामित   लिये  the Sherwood  वन   in   इंग्लैण्ड  , it was first  incorporated   in  1893 as a town  .
The USA PATRIOT Act  of  2001 is  an  Act  of  the  u.S.   कॉंग्रेस  that was signed into law  by   अध्यक्ष  George W.  बुश  on October 26 , 2001 .
The title of  the  act is  a  ten letter  एक्रोनिम   (  USA PATRIOT  )  that stands for Uniting ( and ) Strengthening America  (  by ) Providing Appropriate Tools Required ( to )  इंटरफेस   (   और  )  obstruct  Terrorism  अधिनियम   of  2001 .
The  अधिनियम  , as a response  to   the   आतंकवादी  attacks of  सितंबर  11th , significantly  घटाया  restrictions in  विधि  enforcement agencies  '  gathering of intelligence within the United States ; expanded the Secretary  of   the  Treasury’s authority to regulate financial transactions ,  विशेषकर   those  involving foreign individuals and entities ; and  broadened  the discretion of law enforcement  और  immigration  अधिकारियों  in  निमाड़   और  deporting immigrants suspected of  terrorism-related   अधिनियमों  .
The act also expanded  the   परिभाषा   of  terrorism to include domestic terrorism , thus enlarging the number of activities to which  the  USA  patriot  Act’s  विस्तारित  law enforcement powers  can   be   लागू   .
On May 26 , 2011  ,   अध्यक्ष  Barack Obama used  an  Autopen to  चिह्न  the PATRIOT Sunsets Extension Act of  2011   ,  a four-year  एक्सटेंशन  of three  कुंजी  provisions in the USA PATRIOT Act while he was in  फ़्रांस  : roving wiretaps , searches of  कारोबार  records  (   the  `` library  रिकॉर्ड  provision `` ) ,  और   conducting  surveillance of ``  लोन  wolves  ''  —  individuals  suspected of terrorist-related  क्रियाएँ  not linked to terrorist groups  .
Republican leaders questioned if the  उपयोग  of  the  Autopen met the constitutional  आवश्यकताएँ  for signing  a   विधेयक  into law .
