Snohomish  is   a   नगर  in Snohomish County  ,  Washington , United States  .
the  population was  9,098  at the 2010 census .
The mayor of Snohomish is Karen  guzak  , and the City Manager is  लैरी  Bauman .
Snohomish prides  itself  for  इसके  historical downtown ,  और  was once known  लिये  its many antique shops  जब  it  थी  known as the `` Antique Capital  of  the Northwest . ''
The historic business  और  residential center  of  the  कस्बा   constitutes  the Snohomish Historic  ज़िला  , which is listed on the National Register of Historic  स्थान  .
Many  घरों  bear plaques with the year  the  house was built  और  the  नाम  of the family or individual who originally occupied it .
Once every year  ,   the  city gives tours of the historic  घरों   ;   एक  of  उन्हें  , the Blackman  हाउस  , is a year-round museum .
a  general aviation airfield , Harvey Airfield  ,   is  less than one mile southwest of  शहर  Snohomish  .
डेव  Matthews  बैंड  (  dmb  ) is  an   अमरीकी  rock band that  थी  formed in Charlottesville ,  वर्जिनिया  ,  संयुक्त   राज्य  , in  1991   .
the   founding   सदस्यों  were singer-songwriter  और  guitarist  डेव  Matthews , bassist  stefan   lessard   ,  drummer /backing vocalist  कार्टर  Beauford and  saxophonist  LeRoi  मूर  .
Boyd  tinsley  was added to the band  as  a  violinist  soon after the band  थी  formed .
मूर   died  suddenly  in  August 2008 due to  जटिलताओं   इससे  injuries sustained  in  an ATV accident  .
GRAMMY Award -winner Jeff Coffin of Béla  fleck  and the  flecktones  has  चूंकि   भर  Moore  's  spot as  the  band 's saxophonist  .
Rashawn Ross and Tim Reynolds  have  also become  full-time  touring members  of  the band .
The band 's  2009   एल्बम  Big Whiskey  और  the GrooGrux King ( the first album  चूंकि  Moore 's death  )   debuted  at  क्रमांक  one on  the   बिलबोर्ड  200 , earning the band their fifth  लगातार  number-one  debut—  making them the second  बैंड  behind Metallica to do so  .
Their  सबसे  recent  एल्बम  ,  दूर  from  the  World , was released  in   2012  ,  और   भी  debuted at  क्रमांक  one  on  the  बिलबोर्ड  chart .
As of 2010  ,  the Dave Matthews Band has sold  over   30  million records worldwide .
the  band is known  लिये   उनके   सालाना   summer-long  tours of the United States  और  Europe  ,   featuring   lengthy   improvisational  renditions  of  their songs , accompanied by an elaborate video  और   lighting  show .
इस   portion  of  the  tour  रै  become a  स्टैम्प   of  DMB and  रै  grown with  the  band since Fenton Williams began working  साथ  them  in  the early  1990s  .
After  बीस   लगातार  years of  touring  the band  घोषित   कि  it would take  the   गर्मियाँ  of 2011 off  .
Dave Matthews Band  रै  won one  ग्रैमी  Award , and was awarded the  naacp  Chairman 's  पुरस्कार  .
According to Julian Bond ,  ``  they sell  आउट  the largest  arenas  on Earth  ,  but frequently give their music away .  ''
Transcendental Wild Oats :  a   अध्याय  from  an  Unwritten Romance is a  गद्य   व्यंग्य   लिखा   by  Louisa May  alcott   ,   परिचय  her  परिवार  's involvement  साथ   the   transcendentalist  community  fruitlands  in the  जल्दी  1840s .
the  work was first published in  a   नई  York newspaper in 1873 ,  और  reprinted in 1874 , 1876 , and 1915 and  बाद   .
In  उसके  account  ,  Alcott  provides   the   रियल  people involved with  पतला  pseudonymous disguises .
उसके  father Amos Bronson  alcott  is  ``  Abel Lamb , '' while his partner and  जातियाँ  co-founder  चार्ल्स  Lane is `` Timon Lion ;  ''   अबीगैल  May Alcott ,  louisa  's mother and Bronson 's wife  ,   is  `` Sister  आशा  .  ''
Alcott depicts  उसके  father as dominated by  उसके   अधिक   forceful   संगी  , and both men as  लापरवाह  and impractical dreamers .
The men  of  the community spend  उनके  time in pointless debates while Sister Hope  works  from dawn to dusk to  maintain   उनके  existence  .
A crisis arises at  कटाई  time ,  जब  the grain crop  is  threatened by  an   approaching   तूफ़ान  .
In  alcott  's words  ,  `` About  the  time the grain  थी  ready to  हाउस  , some call of  the   oversoul  wafted  सब  the men away . ''
Sister  आशा   organizes  the only available help , three  छोटी  girls and a  लड़के  , and manages  to  save  the  crop  .
The little  जातियाँ  collapses as  जल्द  as the weather turns cold , when  it  becomes clear that  उनके  provisions are too  meager  to last the  coming   शीत  .
timon   शेर  and  उसके  son  abscond   to  join the Shakers — though  timon  is  अप्रसन्न   to  learn that  जीवन  among them is ``  सब  work and no  खेल  .  ''
Abel is crushed  by  the failure  of  the enterprise ; after days of despair  he   begins  to eat again only when he realizes that his family needs him .
Sister Hope  पाता   a  way for  उन्हें  to subsist and persevere .
Alcott 's view  of  male arrogance and female exploitation in this piece  is  paralleled  in   उसके   अनोखा  ,  प्रकाशित  in the same year as `` Transcendental Wild Oats . ''
`` Transcendental Wild Oats  ''  has been reprinted in several  आधुनिक  editions .
माउंट   of  the Holy Cross is  the  northernmost 14,000-foot mountain in the  sawatch  Range , part of the Rocky Mountains in  कोलोराडो   .
It is located in  the  Holy Cross  wilderness  near the ghost town of Holy  क्रॉस  City  और   in  Eagle County  .
it  was named for the distinctive cross-shaped snowfield on the northeast face .
Under USDA  वन  Service administration , the mountain was  proclaimed   ``   पावन  Cross  नेशनल  Monument  ''   by   हर्बर्ट  Hoover  on  May 11 , 1929 .
The monument was transferred to the National  पार्क   सेवा  in  1933  .
In  1950  , it was  लौटे  to  the   वन  Service  और   खोया  its  नेशनल   स्मारक  status—the number of  विज़िटर  to  the  mountain and the nearby  ``  Pilgrim 's  हट  '' had  waned  , and the expense of full-time staff  could  not be  जायज   .
This mountain  रै   महरूम  the subject of painters , photographers and even a  कविता  by  हेनरी  Wadsworth Longfellow  ,   (   the  Cross  of  Snow  )  .
The first publicly  उपलब्धियाँ  photograph was published in National  भौगोलिक  magazine .
Thomas  मोरान   चित्रित  the mountain in  an  oil painting ,  जिससे  now  is   भाग  of the  संग्रहण   of  the Museum  of   the  American  वेस्ट   ,  part of the  autry   नेशनल   बीच  in Los Angeles ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया   .
It is still much photographed but it is not as well known  आज   as  it was in  the  past .
आसपास   सुविधाएँ   शामिल  Bowl  of  Tears Lake , directly  अंतर्गत  the east face  of  the  शिखर  ,  tuhare  Lakes , in a  cirque  that lies  दक्षिण   of  a significant subpeak , and several other  झीलों  .
Notable locations  भीतर  include the Dotsero volcano ( near Interstate  70   )  ,  vail  and  aspen   .
US 24  रनों  near the peak  through   gilman   .
Photochrom print of Mount  of   the   पावन  Cross c. 1900  .
इस  image  is   a  reversed view  of  the mountain  compared  to how it  दरअसल  appears .
The first recorded  ascent  of Holy Cross was  in   1873  , by F.  V.   hayden  and photographer W. H.  जैक्सन  during one  of  Hayden 's geographical surveys .
However , the peak may  खूब  have  महरूम   ascended  previously by  खनिक  or  अमरीकी  Indians  .
The first winter  ascent   of  the peak was made  in   1943   by  Russel  keene  and Howard  freedman  of the 10th Mountain Division ,  तब  stationed  at   शिविर  Hale .
Holy Cross can  be  climbed by  at  least four  अलग   रूट  ,  साथ   the  easiest and most  आम  route being the North  लकीरें  ,  जिससे   involves  of vertical gain  over   और  is  रेटेड  YDS Class 2 for moderate scrambling .
the  Cross Couloir route forms the  लंबवत  portion of the famous  क्रॉस  feature  ,   और   provides  an advanced snow climb or  चरम  ski  descent   .
Mount of the Holy Cross has  a   इतिहास  of  endangering  the  जीवनदान  of many hikers .
Primarily , the hikers who require rescue are unfamiliar with the risks  of  entering  wilderness   क्षेत्रों  and do not bring adequate equipment  और  supplies to  respond   to  emergency  शर्तें  .
Although  the  summit on Mount of the  पावन  Cross  is   अक्सर  reached on a  long  day hike , unprepared hikers  हैं  frequently stranded  or  lost  due  to  बदलना   पर्यावरणीय  conditions and  भ्रम  regarding the surrounding landscape , especially on  the  descent of  उत्तर  Ridge .
Thorough research  और  reasonable  नियोजन  should  prevent  most tragedies  .
Mount  of  the  पावन  cross is accessible from Tigiwon Road  ,  south  of   minturn   ,  Colorado .
the   हाफ  Moon  pass  Trail  is   the  standard route to the summit of Mount  of  the Holy Cross via the  उत्तर  Ridge .
Following the  पतन  Creek  ट्रेल  to an  ascent  of Notch Mountain Trail  provides   the  best  दृश्य  of the Holy Cross snow feature from  पायदान  Mountain  लकीरें  .
The GSM logo is  प्रयुक्त  to identify compatible  handsets   और  equipment
GSM ( Global System for  मोबाईल  Communications  ,  originally ' ) ,  is  a standard set developed by the  यूरोपीय  Telecommunications Standards Institute ( ETSI )  to   describe   प्रोटोकॉल  for  दूसरी  generation ( 2G ) digital  सेल्यूलर  networks used by mobile phones .
It became  the  de  facto   वैश्विक  standard for mobile  संचार  with over 80  %  market  share  .
The  जीएसएम  standard was  विकसित  as  a   बदलना  for  पहला  generation ( 1G  )  analog  सेल्यूलर  networks , and  originally  described a digital ,  सर्किट   switched  network  अनुकूलित  for full duplex voice telephony .
This  थी   विस्तारित   over  time to include data communications , first by circuit switched transport , then  पैकेट   आंकड़ा  transport  via   gprs  (  सामान्य  Packet Radio Services )  और   किनारे  (  उन्नत  Data rates for GSM  एवोल्यूशन  or  egprs   )   .
Further improvements were made when the 3GPP developed third generation  (  3G )  umts  standards  followed   by   चौथी  generation (  4g  ) LTE Advanced standards .
``  GSM ''  is  a trademark owned by the GSM Association .
अध्यक्ष  Franklin  D.  Roosevelt  लक्षण  the  lend-lease  bill to give  सहायता  to  ब्रिटेन  and China  (  1941  )
The  lend  Lease act  थी  an  अधिनियम   जहाँ  the United States  था  supported its allies .
lend-lease  ( ) was the law  कि   प्रारंभ  a program under which the United  राज्य   of  America  supplied   the  United  किंगडम   ,   the  USSR , Republic of China , Free France , and other  अलाइड   राष्ट्र  with  materiel  between  1941  and  1945  .
It was signed  into  law  on  March 11  ,   1941   ,  a  साल  and a half after the  outbreak  of World War  ii   in  Europe in September 1939 .
इस  was nine months before the U.S. entered  the  war in December  1941  .
Formally  titled  An Act to Further Promote  the   रक्षा   of  the  संयुक्त  States , the Act effectively  ended  the United States ' pretense of neutrality .
A total  of  $ 50  .1  billion (  समतुल्य  to  $  today ) worth of supplies were shipped : $ 31.4 billion  to  Britain , $ 11.3 billion to the Soviet Union , $  3.2  billion  to   फ़्रांस  ,  $  1.6 billion to China , and  छोटी   रकम  to other Allies  .
रिवर्स   lend-lease   comprised  services such as rent on air  bases  that went to the  u.S.  , and totaled  $  7.8 billion ;  of  this ,  $  6.8  अरब  came from the British and  the  Commonwealth .
The  शर्तें   of  the agreement  provided   कि  the  materiel   थी   to  be used until time for their return  or   विनाश  .
आपूर्तियाँ   बाद  the termination date were sold  to  Britain  at  a large discount for £1 .075 billion using long-term loans from  the  United States .
Canada operated a  समान   कार्यक्रम  that  भेजा  $ 4.7 billion  in  supplies to the  संयुक्त  Kingdom  और  the Soviet Union .
the   संयुक्त   राज्य  did not charge for  सहायता  supplied under this legislation .
इस  program was  a  decisive  कदम  away from non-interventionist policy  ,  which had dominated  संयुक्त  States foreign relations since the end of  संसार  War I , towards international  भागीदारी  .
The Jerusalem artichoke ( Helianthus tuberosus ) , also called sunroot  ,   sunchoke  , earth apple or topinambour , is  a  species  of  sunflower  देशी  to  पूर्वी  North  अमेरिका   ,  and found from eastern Canada and Maine  वेस्ट  to  उत्तर  Dakota ,  और  south to northern Florida and Texas  .
it   is  also cultivated widely  आरपार  the temperate  मण्डल  for its tuber ,  जिससे   is   प्रयुक्त  as a root  सब्ज़ी  .
कैस्टिलो   सैन  Felipe del Morro  भी  known as Fort San Felipe  डेल   morro   or  Morro Castle , is a 16th-century citadel located in  सैन   जुआन   ,  Puerto  रीको   .
Stonehenge is a prehistoric monument in  विल्टशायर  , England , about west of Amesbury  और  north of  salisbury  .
One of the most famous sites in the  संसार  , Stonehenge is the remains of a ring of  खड़ा   पत्थरों   नियत   भीतर   earthworks  .
It is  in  the middle of  the   सबसे   घना   जटिल   of  Neolithic and  कांस्य  Age  स्मारक  in England , including several hundred burial mounds .
archaeologists   मानना  it  थी   निर्मित  anywhere from 3000 BC to  2000  BC  .
radiocarbon   डेटिंग  in 2008 suggested that the  पहला  stones were  उठाया   between   2400   और  2200  bc  , whilst  another  theory  suggests  that bluestones may have  महरूम   उठाया  at the site  as  early as  3000   bc  .
The  surrounding  circular  धरती  bank and  खाई  , which constitute  the   earliest   phase   of  the monument  ,   have  been  दिनाँक   to  about 3100  bc  .
The site and its  परिवेश  were  added   to  the UNESCO 's list  of  World Heritage  साइट  in  1986   in  a  co-listing   साथ  Avebury Henge .
It is a national legally protected Scheduled  प्राचीन  Monument .
Stonehenge is owned  by  the Crown and  प्रबंधित  by English  विरासत   ,  while the surrounding land  is  owned  by  the National Trust .
Archaeological  प्रमाण  found by the Stonehenge Riverside  प्रोजेक्ट  in 2008 indicates that Stonehenge  could   have  been  a  burial  मैदान   इससे   इसके  earliest beginnings  .
The  डेटिंग  of cremated remains found on  the   साईट  indicate that  जमा  contain human bone  इससे   as   जल्दी  as 3000 BC ,  जब  the ditch and bank were first dug .
Such deposits  जारी   at   stonehenge  for at least another 500  सालो   .
the  site  is  a place of  धार्मिक   significance  and  यात्राएं  in  neo-druidry  .
The NCAA Women  's  Division I Championship is an  सालाना   कॉलेज  basketball  टूर्नामेंट  for women .
आयोजित   प्रत्येक  April , the Women 's  चैंपियनशिप  was inaugurated  in  the 1981–82 season .
The NCAA tournament was  preceded  by the  aiaw  Women  's   बास्केट  Tournament , which  थी   आयोजित   annually  from  1972  to 1982 .
Basketball  थी   एक  of  बारह  women 's sports  added   to   the   ncaa  championship  कार्यक्रम  for the  1981-82   स्कूल   साल  , as the NCAA engaged in battle with  the   संघ   लिये  Intercollegiate Athletics for  महिलाओं  for  एकमात्र  governance of women 's collegiate sports .
The AIAW continued to conduct  इसके  established championship  कार्यक्रम  in  the   वही  twelve ( and  अन्य   )   खेल  ; however , after a year  of  dual women 's  championships  ,  the   ncaa  prevailed , while the AIAW disbanded .
Attendance and interest in the Women  's   प्रभाग  I Championship  have  grown over the years ,  विशेषकर   चूंकि   2003   ,   जब  the  फाइनल   चैंपियनशिप  game was moved to  the   मंगलवार   following  the Monday  मेन   's  championship game .
The women 's championship  खेल  is  अभी  the final  overall  game of the college basketball season .
पहले  that , the Women 's Final Four  थी  usually played on the  शुक्रवार  before the Men 's  फाइनल   चार  or  the  hours before  the  men played on the final Saturday of the tournament  .
The final was usually played  the   संडे  afternoon  following  the Men  's   फाइनल  Four .
the  tournament bracket is  बना  up  of  champions from  प्रत्येक  Division  i  conference  ,  which receive automatic bids .
The remaining  स्लॉट   हैं  at-large bids  ,  with teams  चुनी  by an NCAA selection committee .
the  selection process and  टूर्नामेंट  seedings  हैं  based on  अनेक   कारकों  , including team rankings , win-loss records and Ratings  प्रतिशत   अनुक्रमणिका  ( RPI ) data .
Unlike the men 's tournament  ,  there are only 32 at-large bids  (  as of the next tournament  in  2014  )  , and no  play-in   खेल   .
The women 's tournament , like the men  's  ,  is   मंचन   in  a single elimination  स्वरूप  ,  और   is  part  of  the  मीडिया   और   पब्लिक  frenzy known colloquially as March Madness or  the  Big Dance  .
सब  63  खेल  have been broadcast on television since 2003 on  ईएसपीएन  and ESPN2 .
Similar to  the  pre-2011  मेन  's tournament coverage on CBS , local  टीमों   हैं  shown on each  चैनल   जब   उपलब्धियाँ  , with  ``  whip-around  ''  coverage designed  to  showcase  the  most competitive contests in the  बाकी  of  the  country .
The Rosetta Stone in the British Museum
The Rosetta Stone is  an  ancient  मिश्र  granodiorite stele inscribed with a  डिक्री   जारी  at Memphis in  196  BC on behalf  of  King Ptolemy  v  .
The decree appears in three  स्क्रिप्ट  :  the  upper text is Ancient Egyptian  चित्रलिपि   ,  the middle portion Demotic script ,  और   the  lowest Ancient Greek  .
Because it presents essentially the same  टेक्स्ट   in  all three scripts  (   साथ  some  नाबालिग  differences between  उन्हें  )  ,  it provided the key to  the  modern understanding  of   मिश्र  hieroglyphs .
Originally  प्रदर्शित  within a temple , the  स्टोन  was probably  स्थानांतरित  during the early  ईसाई  or  मध्यकालीन  period  और  eventually used as  भवन   सामग्री   in   the  construction of  फोर्ट   जुलिएन  near  the   कस्बा   of  Rashid ( Rosetta  )  in the Nile  डेल्टा  .
it  was rediscovered there  in   1799  by a soldier , Pierre-François Bouchard ,  of   the  French expedition  to  Egypt  .
As the first  प्राचीन  Egyptian bilingual text recovered in modern times , the Rosetta Stone aroused widespread public interest  साथ   इसके  potential to  decipher   इस  hitherto  untranslated  ancient language .
Lithographic  नक़ल  and plaster casts began circulating  among  European museums and scholars .
Meanwhile  ,  British troops  पराजित   the  French  in  Egypt  in  1801 , and the original  स्टोन  came  into  British possession under the Capitulation of  एलेक्जेंड्रिया   .
Transported to London , it  रै  been on public display at the British Museum  चूंकि  1802 .
It  is   the  most-visited object in the British Museum .
Ever since its  rediscovery   ,  the stone has been the focus of nationalist rivalries , including its  ट्रांसफ़र  from French  to   अंग्रेजों  possession  दौरान   the  Napoleonic  युद्धों   ,  a long-running dispute over the relative  मान  of Young 's  और  Champollion  's   योगदान  to  the  decipherment  ,  and since  2003  ,  मांगे   लिये  the stone 's return to Egypt  .
Study of the decree  थी   already   अंतर्गत  way as  the  first full translation of  the  Greek  टेक्स्ट  appeared in  1803  .
It was  20   सालो  ,  however  , before the transliteration of the Egyptian  स्क्रिप्ट  was announced  by   jean-françois  Champollion  in  Paris  in   1822  ; it  took  longer still before scholars were  समर्थ  to  पढ़ा  Ancient Egyptian inscriptions and  साहित्य  confidently .
Major  अग्रिम   in   the   डिकोडिंग  were : recognition  कि  the stone offered three versions  of  the  वही   टेक्स्ट  ( 1799 ) ; that  the  demotic  टेक्स्ट  used  ध्वन्यात्मक  characters to spell foreign  names  (  1802   )  ; that the  hieroglyphic  text did  so  as  खूब   ,  and  था  pervasive similarities to the demotic (  थामस   यंग  , 1814  )  ; and that , in  जोड  to being used for  विदेशी  names , phonetic characters were also used  to   वर्तनी  native Egyptian words (  champollion  , 1822–1824  )   .
दो  other fragmentary copies  of  the same decree were discovered  बाद  , and several similar  मिश्र  bilingual or trilingual inscriptions  हैं  now known  ,   सहित   दो   थोड़ा   पहले   ptolemaic   डिक्री  (  the  Decree of  canopus  in  238  BC  ,  and  the  Memphis decree  of  Ptolemy  iv  ,  ca  . 218  bc   )  .
The Rosetta Stone is therefore no longer unique , but it  थी   the   अनिवार्य  key to modern  समझना   of  Ancient Egyptian literature and  सभ्यता  .
The term Rosetta Stone  is  now used in other contexts  as  the name  लिये  the essential clue to  a   नई  field of knowledge .
Poison  डार्ट   मेंढक   (   भी  dart-poison  मेंढक  , poison frog or formerly poison arrow  मेंढक  )  is   the  common name  of  a  समूह  of  मेंढक   in  the family  dendrobatidae   जिससे   हैं  native to Central  और  South  अमेरिका  .
These species are  diurnal  and often  have   brightly   रंगीन  bodies  .
Although all wild dendrobatids are at least  somewhat  toxic  ,  levels of  toxicity  vary considerably from  एक  species to  the  next and  इससे  one population to another  .
अनेक  species are threatened .
These  amphibians  are often  पुकारा  `` dart frogs ''  due  to the Amerindians ' indigenous use of  उनके   to  poison  the  tips of blowdarts .
However , of  over  175  प्रजाति  , only four have been documented  as  being  प्रयुक्त   लिये  this  purpose   (   curare  plants are  अधिक  commonly used  )   ,   सब  of  जिससे  come from  the   phyllobates  genus  ,   जिससे  is characterized by  the   अपेक्षाकृत  large size  और  high levels of toxicity of its members .
Cajeta is a Mexican confection  of  thickened  सिरप   प्रायः  made of sweetened  caramelised  milk  .
according  to  शेफ़  Rick Bayless ,  the   नाम   लिये   cajeta   आए  from  the   स्पेनी  phrase  al  punto de cajeta , which means ``  a  liquid thickened  to  the point at  जिससे  a  चमचा  drawn through the  द्रव  reveals the bottom  of  the  घट  in  जिससे   it  is being cooked  ''  .
another  hypothesis is that  it  takes its name from the  छोटी  wooden  बाक्स  in  जिससे  it was traditionally packed .
Mexican cajeta  is  considered a specialty of the city of Celaya in the state of  guanajuato  , although it is also produced  साथ  the traditional method in several towns of  the   राज्य  of  jalisco  , such  as  Mazamitla ,  sayula   ,   और   atotonilco   el  Alto .
Cajeta is made by  simmering  goat 's  मिल्क  , or occasionally  a  sweetened liquid  ,  stirring frequently , until it becomes very  viscous  due to evaporation of  जल  , and caramelized .
While goat milk is the most usual  आधार  ,  अन्य   liquids  or juices may be used .
In Celaya , and eventually the  बाकी  of Mexico  ,  the confection of half  बकरी  's milk and half  गाय   's  milk became known  by  the name cajeta , but  elsewhere   ,  the  मिल्क  candy became known as leche quemada ,  जलेबी   de   leche  , etc .
It has cousins in the  अनेक  Indian  milk-based   मिठाई  like pera and the  मिल्क   फ़ज  burfi , and in  the  opera fudge of  the  U.S. Cajeta is eaten on  इसके  own as a  मीठी  , as  a   स्प्रेड   or  filling for breads and pastries ,  ऐसे  as churros , and  as  a topping for ice cream .
निश्चित  liquors are added to  खास  recipes called cajeta  envinada  .
in   जोड   ,   cajeta  envinada  especial  is enriched  साथ   किशमिश  , almonds ,  pecans   or   nuts   .
Often it is  प्रयुक्त  as a topping for crêpes , as  a  sweet sauce boiled and  softened  down with milk to  soak  the crepes  ,  resulting  in  a  स्वादिष्ट  dessert .
in  Mexico many brands make  cajeta  but the most common  ब्रांड  is  coronado  .
it   is  also  बहुत  common to place cajeta  between   obleas  to make  a  traditional  मैक्सिकन  dessert .
प्रिंस  William , Duke of  कैम्ब्रिज  ( William  आर्थर   फिलिप   लुई  ; born 21 June 1982 ) , is  the  elder  बेटे  of Charles ,  प्रिंस   of  Wales , and  डायना  , Princess of Wales  ,  and third-eldest grandchild of Queen Elizabeth II  और   प्रिंस   फिलिप   ,  Duke of  एडिनबर्ग  .
He is second in  the  line  of  succession ,  पीछे  his father  ,   to   the  thrones  of  sixteen independent sovereign states known as the Commonwealth  realms   :  the United Kingdom , Canada , Australia  ,  New Zealand , Jamaica  ,  Barbados  ,   the  Bahamas ,  हरा  ,  पापुआ  New Guinea ,  the   सुलेमान   आइलैंड्स   ,  Tuvalu , Saint Lucia  ,   संत  Vincent and the Grenadines , Belize  ,  Antigua  और   बारबूडा  , and  संत  Kitts and  नेविस   .
Prince William was educated at  चार   स्कूलों  in the United  किंगडम  and obtained  a   उपाधि  from  the  University  of  St Andrews .
He spent parts of a gap year in  चिली  , Belize  ,  Tanzania  ,  and Kenya where he has lived and  holidayed   अनेक   टाइम्स  .
Prince  विलियम  has also taken Kiswahili  अध्ययन  at universities in Kenya and  तंजानिया  .
He was commissioned as a Lieutenant  in   the  Blues  और   रॉयल्स  Regiment of the  household  Cavalry —serving  साथ   उसके   bhai  Prince Harry —and  ,  two  सालो   बाद   ,  earned his wings by completing pilot training at  royal   एयर   फ़ोर्स  College Cranwell  .
In 2009 , he  transferred  to the Royal  एयर   फ़ोर्स   ,  was promoted to Flight Lieutenant and  underwent   हेलीकाप्टर  flying  प्रशिक्षण   in   अनुक्रम  to  become  a  full-time  pilot with  the  Search  और  Rescue  फ़ोर्स  .
In 2010 , he completed  उसके   सामान्य  and special-to-type helicopter training and  गई  on to  raf   घाटी   on   no  . 22 Squadron  performing   co-pilot  duties on  फलक  a Sea King search and rescue helicopter  .
Prince William married  उसके   longtime  girlfriend  ,  Catherine  मिडलटन  , on 29 April 2011 at Westminster Abbey .
घंटों   prior  to his wedding  ,  Prince William  थी   निर्मित   ड्यूक   of  Cambridge , Earl of Strathearn  ,   और  Baron Carrickfergus .
Mali is  a  multilingual  देश  .
The languages  बोला   वहीँ  reflect ancient settlement patterns  ,  migrations , and  इसके  long history .
Ethnologue counts  50   भाषाएं   .
Of  ये  , French  is  the official language  और  Bambara  is  the most widely spoken  .
Altogether 13  of   the  indigenous  भाषाएं  of  माली  have  the   विधिक   औकात  of  नेशनल  language  .
Sign in French , at  a  monument in Bamako  .

9  – 12 February ( Vietnam  )
Rogers Building , the headquarters of  रोजर्स   संचार
Rogers Communications Inc. is a diversified public Canadian communications and  मीडिया  company  .
It is  विशेषकर  in  the  field  of  wireless  संचार  , cable  टेलीविज़न  , telephone , and Internet connectivity  साथ   significant  additional  दूरसंचार   और   द्रव्यमान   मीडिया   एसेट   .
The company is headquartered in the Rogers Building in  टोरंटो  ,  ओंटारियो  .
the   कम्पनी  claims the heritage of the Rogers  वैक्यूम   ट्यूब   कम्पनी  , founded in  1925   by  Edward  रोजर्स   ,  which started the  cfrb  radio station  in  Toronto ,  जिससे  was later acquired by outside interests .
The present enterprise dates to  1960  , when  रोजर्स  ' son , Ted  रोजर्स   ,  founded  रोजर्स  Radio Broadcasting Ltd  .
That company  acquired  CHFI  कि  year ,  as  well as  aldred-rogers   प्रसारण  , a  साझेदारी  with Joel Aldred  जिससे   helped  launch CFTO in  1961  .
Rogers later  खरीदा   आउट  Aldred and  प्रारंभ  the  वर्तमान  cable and wireless operations , known  as  Rogers Cablesystems Ltd .
The chief competitor  to   the   कम्पनी   is   घंटी  Canada ,  जिससे  has a  similarly   extensive  portfolio of  रेडियो  and television media  एसेट  , as well as  बेतार  ,  टेलीविज़न   वितरण  , and telephone  सेवाएं  , particularly in Eastern and  सेंट्रल  Canada  ;   the  two companies  हैं  often  देखी  as  having   a  duopoly on communications services in their  regions  .
However  ,  the  कम्पनी  also competes nationally with Telus for wireless services , and primarily  indirectly  with  शॉ  Communications for  टेलीविज़न  service .
The  कम्पनी  also  competes  with a number  of   अन्य   मीडिया  companies in the  प्रसारण   उद्योग  .
The Internet  is   a   वैश्विक   प्रणाली  of interconnected  कंप्यूटर   संजाल  that use the  मानक  Internet protocol suite  (  TCP/IP ) to serve billions of users worldwide .
It is a  संजाल   of  networks that consists  of   लाखो   of   निजी  ,  पब्लिक  , academic , business , and government networks , of  लोकल  to global scope  ,  that  हैं   linked  by  a  broad array  of   इलेक्ट्रॉनिक   ,  wireless and optical networking  technologies  .
The Internet carries an extensive range  of   सूचना   संसाधन  and  सेवाएं   ,  such  as  the  inter-linked  hypertext documents of the  संसार  Wide Web ( WWW ) and the infrastructure to support email .
Most traditional communications  मीडिया  including  टेलीफोन  , music  ,  film  ,   और  television  हैं  being  reshaped  or redefined by the Internet  ,  giving birth  to  new services such as voice  over  Internet Protocol  (  VoIP )  और  Internet Protocol television  (   iptv   )   .
समाचारपत्र  , book and other print publishing are adapting to Web site  प्रौद्योगिकी  ,  or   हैं   reshaped  into blogging and web feeds .
the   अंतरजाल  has enabled and accelerated  नई  forms  of  human interactions through instant messaging , Internet forums ,  और   सोशल  networking .
Online  खरीदारी  has boomed both for major  खुदरा  outlets and small artisans and traders  .
business-to-business  and  वित्तीय  services on the Internet affect supply chains  आरपार  entire industries  .
the   origins   of   the  Internet  पहुँचें  back to  शोध  commissioned by  the  United  राज्य  government  in  the  1960s  to  निर्माण  robust ,  fault-tolerant   संचार  via  कंप्यूटर   संजाल  .
The funding of a new U.S.  रीढ़  by the National  विज्ञान  Foundation in the 1980s ,  as   खूब   as  private  funding  for  अन्य  commercial backbones , led to  विश्वव्यापी   भागीदारी  in the development of  नई   नेटवर्किंग   technologies  , and  the  merger of many networks .
the  commercialization  of   कया  was by  the  1990s an international  संजाल  resulted in its popularization  और   incorporation  into virtually every  पहलू  of modern human  जीवन  .
,  अधिक   than  2.4 billion  people—over   a  third  of  the world 's  इंसान   जनसांख्यिकी  —have used the  सेवाएं  of  the  Internet  ;  approximately  100  times more  लोगों  than were  using   it   in  1995  ,  when it was mostly used  by  tech-savvy middle  और  upper class people in the United  राज्य  and several other countries  .
The  अंतरजाल  has no centralized governance in either technological implementation  or   नीतियों  for access  और  usage ; each constituent  संजाल  sets its  अपना  policies .
Only the overreaching  परिभाषाएं  of  the  two principal  नाम  spaces  in   the   अंतरजाल  , the Internet Protocol address space and  the   डोमेन  Name  प्रणाली   ,  are directed by  a  maintainer organization , the Internet  निगम   लिये  Assigned  names  and Numbers  (   icann   )  .
The technical underpinning  और   मानकीकरण  of the core  प्रोटोकॉल  ( IPv4 and IPv6 ) is  an   कार्यकलाप  of  the  Internet  अभियान्त्रिकी  Task  फ़ोर्स  ( IETF ) , a  non-profit  organization  of  loosely  संबद्ध   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  participants that  anyone   may  associate  साथ  by contributing technical expertise  .
The 2006  शीत  Olympics , officially known  as  the XX Olympic Winter Games , was a winter multi-sport event which was  मनाये  in Turin ,  इटली  from February 10 , 2006  ,   through  February 26 , 2006 .
This marked the  दूसरी  time  इटली  hosted the Olympic Winter Games , the first  होने  the  सात  Olympic  शीत  Games  in   cortina  d'Ampezzo  in   1956  .
Italy also hosted  the  Games of the  xvii  Olympiad  in  Rome in 1960 .
Turin  थी  selected as the host city  लिये   the  2006  खेल  in 1999 .
The  आधिकारिक  logo displayed  the  name `` Torino  ''  , the Italian  नाम   of  the  नगर  ; the city is known  as  ``  टोरीनो  ''  in  both English and  the  local traditional language , Piedmontese .
The Olympic  mascots  of  टोरिनो   2006   यहूद  Neve ( `` snow '' in Italian  )  , a female  स्नोबॉल  , and  gliz   ,   a  male ice cube  .
the   आधिकारिक  motto of  the  XX Olympic Winter Games was `` Passion  जीवनदान  here  ''  .
``   सहायता  ! '' is  a  song by the Beatles that served as the title song for both the  1965   फिल्मी   और  its  साउंडट्रैक  album .
It  थी  also released as a single , and was  क्रमांक  one  लिये   तीन  weeks in both  the   संयुक्त  States and the United Kingdom .
`` Help ! ''  थी  written  primarily  by  जॉन  Lennon , but credited to  lennon–mccartney  .
दौरान   an  interview with Playboy in  1984  ,  पॉल  McCartney stated that the title  थी  `` out of desperation '' .
पोस्टर  for  the  2005  प्रदर्शनी
Siegfried Bing  (  26  फ़रवरी  1838  –   6  September  1905   )   ,   जो   प्रायः   दिया  his name as S. Bing , and was thus  प्रायः   संदर्भित   erroneously  as ``  सैमुएल   bing  ''  (  Samuel  ओटो   bing  , 1850–1905  ,  was  उसके   bhai  ) was a German art dealer  जो   जिया  in Paris  as  an  वयस्क  ,  और   जो   helped   introduce   जापानी   आर्ट  and artworks to the  वेस्ट  and  थी   a   फ़ैक्टर  in the development  of  the Art  देवानंद   स्टाइल  during the  लेट  nineteenth century .
तुलना  of male and female life expectancy at birth for countries  और  territories  as  defined in  the  2011 CIA  factbook   ,  with  चयनित  bubbles labelled .
The dotted line  corresponds  to equal female and male life  प्रत्याशा  .
The apparent 3D volumes  of  the bubbles are  linearly  proportional  to  their population .
