Kennewick is a city in Benton County  in  the southeastern part of  the  U.S. state of Washington  ,  near  the  Hanford  नाभिकीय   साईट   .
It  is  the most  populous   of  the three  शहरों  collectively referred to as the Tri-Cities (  the  others being  pasco   और  Richland  )  .
Kennewick is located along the  दक्षिणपश्चिम  bank  of  the Columbia River ,  विपरीत   pasco  and  बस  south of the confluence  of  the Columbia and Yakima  नदियाँ  .
The population was 73,917 at the 2010 census .
April  1  , 2012 estimates from  the  Washington  राज्य   दफ्तर  of Financial Management  put  the city  's  population at 75,160  .
the   निकटतम  commercial  विमानक्षेत्र   is  the Tri-Cities  विमानक्षेत्र   in  Pasco ,  a  regional  वाणिज्यिक  and private airport .
Forbes magazine named  kennewick  the #  2   क्षेत्रफल   in  the  संयुक्त  States  लिये  job growth , while nearby Yakima was named # 1 .
The article cites the number of  वैज्ञानिकों  employed  by  the  प्रशांत   उत्तरपश्चिम  National Laboratory and  क्षेत्रफल  farmland  लिये   इस  outlook .
The prothrombin time ( PT ) and its derived measures  of  prothrombin  अनुपात   (  PR )  और  international  सामान्यीकृत  ratio ( INR ) are measures of the  extrinsic  pathway  of  coagulation .
This  परीक्षण  is  भी  called `` ProTime INR '' and `` PT/INR '' .
They are  प्रयुक्त   to   determine   the   clotting   tendency  of blood ,  in   the  measure of warfarin dosage ,  जिगर  damage ,  और   विटामिन  K status .
PT  उपायों  factors I  (  fibrinogen ) , II (  prothrombin   )  ,  v  , VII , and X .
It is  प्रयुक्त  in conjunction with  the  activated  आंशिक   thromboplastin   समय  (  aptt  ) which  उपायों   the  intrinsic  pathway  .
`` I 'm in the Mood for Love '' is  a  popular song .
The music was written by Jimmy McHugh ,  the  lyrics  by  Dorothy  फ़ील्ड  .
The song  थी  published  in   1935   .
It  थी  introduced by  frances  Langford  in  the  फिल्म   प्रत्येक  Night at  आठ  released that  साल   .
The  सोंग  was featured  in   the  1936  हमारी  Gang (  छोटी  Rascals )  छोटी  ,  the   पिंच  Singer ,  सुंग  by  कार्ल  `` Alfalfa '' Switzer , and in the 1936 film Palm Springs  .
it  is  प्रायः  known to  be   switzer  's signature  सोंग   .
James  मूडी  's saxophone solo on a  1952  recording of this song inspired  the  song `` Moody 's  मनोदशा   लिये  Love `` .
Hip hop artist Prince Paul sampled the song as the basis for the track `` Mood for Love  ''   on  his album A  प्रिंस  Among Thieves  (  1999 ) , with  डॉन  Newkirk singing its original lyrics .
the   सोंग  's title  प्रेरित  the English title of  वोंग  Kar  wai  's movie In the  मनोदशा  for Love .
Cross-cultural psychology is the scientific study of human behavior and mental  प्रक्रियाओं  , including both their variability and invariance  ,   अंतर्गत  diverse cultural  शर्तें  .
Through  expanding  research  methodologies  to recognize cultural  variance  in  बर्ताव  , language  ,  and meaning  it  seeks to extend  और   develop  psychology .
Since psychology as an academic discipline  थी  developed largely  in   उत्तर  America , some psychologists  became  concerned that constructs accepted as universal were not as invariant as previously assumed ,  विशेषकर  since many attempts to replicate notable experiments in other  संस्कृतियों  had varying  कामयाबी  .
Since  वहीँ  are  सवाल  as to whether theories dealing with central themes ,  ऐसे  as affect , cognition  ,  conceptions  of  the self , and issues  ऐसे   as   psychopathology  ,  चिंता  , and depression , may lack external validity when `` exported '' to  अन्य  cultural  contexts  , cross-cultural  मनोविज्ञान   re-examines  them using  methodologies  designed to  फ़ैक्टर  in cultural  मतभेद   so  as to account for  सांस्कृतिक  variance .
Although some critics  have  pointed to methodological flaws in cross-cultural psychological research and claim that  गंभीर  shortcomings in the theoretical  और  methodological bases used impede rather than help the  वैज्ञानिक  search  लिये   सार्वभौमिक   सिद्धान्त  in psychology ,  cross-cultural  psychologists  हैं  turning  अधिक  to the study  of  how differences ( variance ) occur ,  बल्कि   than  searching for universals in the style of physics  or  chemistry .
In 1972 the International Association of Cross-Cultural Psychology (  iaccp  )  थी   स्थापित   .
This  शाखा  of  मनोविज्ञान  has  जारी  to expand as there  रै  been an  increasing  popularity of incorporating culture  और   विविधता  into studies  .
Cross-cultural psychology  is  differentiated from Cultural psychology  .
The  latter  is the branch  of  psychology that holds that human behavior is  significantly  influenced  by  cultural differences , meaning that psychological phenomena can only  be  compared with  प्रत्येक  other across  संस्कृतियों   to   a  very  सीमित  extent  .
in  contrast , cross-cultural psychology includes a search  लिये  possible  universals  in behavior  और   दिमागी   प्रक्रियाओं  .
Walter  J.  Lonner ,  लिखने  for  नजर   on  Psi Chi , has stated  कि  `` cross-cultural psychology can  be  thought  of  as a  प्रकार  research methodology , rather  than  an entirely separate field within psychology ( 2000 )  .  ''
`` Judas  ''  is  a   सोंग   by  American recording artist Lady Gaga , from her second studio album  born   इस   रास्ता   (  2011 )  .
It was released  by  Interscope Records on April 15 , 2011 , four days ahead  of  its scheduled release .
लिखा  and produced by  महिला  Gaga  और  RedOne ,  ``  Judas '' is  a  dance and electro  हाउस  song  परिचय  a  स्त्री   in  love with  a   man  who  गद्दारी  her  .
It  embodies  the incidents that have haunted Gaga  in   the  past  ,   और   इसके  core  अर्थ   refers  to the negative parts of her life that she ca n't escape  .
गागा  has further  समझाया  that  the  song was  भी  about  honoring  one 's  भीतरी  darkness in order to bring oneself  into   the  light .
The  कलाकृति   लिये   the  single  थी  designed by Gaga in Microsoft  शब्द  .
In spite of a  polarizing  impact on  अनेक  religious groups ,  the  song was  generally  well  प्राप्त  by  आलोचकों   ,  who  likened  the song to `` Bad Romance ``  साथ  some noting it should have been the album  's  lead single  .
The song has a similar  ध्वनि   to  Gaga 's previous RedOne-produced tracks , including  ``  Poker Face `` , `` LoveGame `` ,  ``  Bad  रोमांस  '' ,  और  `` Alejandro  ``  .
It contains three distinct hooks and a  हाउस  -influenced  ब्रेक   bas  .
Gaga explained that the lines spoken  दौरान  the breakdown  बात  about her as  परे  redemption  ,   regarding   the   परंपरागत  views  of  what a woman should be  .
`` Judas ''  initially   था   a   दमदार  sales opening , but was less successful commercially in  तुलना  to Gaga 's previous  singles  .
The song  पहुँचे   the  top  टेन  of the  चार्ट  in most  प्रमुख  music  बाज़ार  , and also reached the top of the charts  in  South Korea .
a  music video for the song was  फिल्माया   in  April  2011  ,  co-directed  by  गागा  and Laurieann Gibson  और   co-starring  Norman Reedus  .
it  has a Biblical storyline  जहाँ  Reedus played Judas  इस्कैरियट  and Gaga played Mary Magdalene .
The  वीडियो  portrays them as modern day missionaries going to Jerusalem  .
it   शामिल  the Biblical story of  यहूदा   betraying  Jesus , and ended  साथ   गागा   as   magdalene  getting  stoned  to death .
Before  इसके   रिलीज  ,  the  Catholic League  condemned  Gaga for the alleged  उपयोग   of  religious  imagery   और  her role in the video .
however  , critics generally praised the video  ,   नहीं  finding any  अप्रिय   सामग्री  .
The video was nominated for two awards at the 2011 MTV Video  म्यूज़िक  Awards .
गागा  has performed  ``  Judas  ''  on a number of television shows ,  सहित  The Graham Norton Show  ,   शनिवार   रात्रि  Live , Good  morning  Americas ``  गर्मियाँ   कॉन्सर्ट  Series  ''  , the French X Factor  as  well as on The Ellen DeGeneres  दिखाएँ   .
h.264/mpeg-4  Part  10   or  AVC  (  Advanced  वीडियो   कोडिंग  ) is a standard  लिये  video compression , and is currently one  of  the most commonly used  स्वरुप   लिये  the  रिकॉर्डिंग  , compression , and  वितरण  of high definition video  .
The final drafting work on the  पहला  version  of  the standard was  समाप्त  in May  2003  .
h.264/mpeg-4  AVC is  a  block-oriented motion-compensation -based codec standard developed  by  the ITU-T Video  कोडिंग  Experts  समूह  ( VCEG )  साथ  with the ISO/IEC JTC1 Moving  चित्र  Experts  समूह  (  एमपीईजी  )  .
The  प्रोजेक्ट  partnership  प्रयत्न  is known  as   the   संयुक्त  Video  टोली  (  jvt   )  .
the  ITU-T  h.264   मानक  and  the  ISO/IEC  mpeg-4  AVC standard  (   formally  , ISO/IEC 14496-10 – MPEG-4 Part  10  ,  उन्नत  Video Coding  )   हैं  jointly  कायम   so  that they have identical technical  सामग्री  .
h.264  is perhaps best known as  होने  one  of  the codec  मानकों  for Blu-ray Discs ; all Blu-ray  डिस्क  players must be able to  डिकोड  H.264  .
it  is also widely used by streaming internet sources , such as videos from  vimeo  , YouTube  ,  and  the   itunes  Store  ,  web software such as  the   adobe  Flash Player and  microsoft  Silverlight  ,   और  also various  hdtv  broadcasts over  स्थलीय  ( ATSC , ISDB-T ,  dvb-t   or  DVB-T2  )   ,  cable  (  DVB-C )  और  satellite (  dvb-s  and DVB-S2 ) .
non-binding  arbitration is  a   प्रकार  of arbitration in which the arbitrator  makes  a determination  of   the  rights of  the  parties  to  the dispute  ,   लकिन   इस   determination   is  not binding upon them , and  no  enforceable  मध्यस्थता  award is issued  .
The  ``   पुरस्कार  '' is in  प्रभाव   an   सलाहकार  opinion  of  the  arbitrator   's   दृश्य  of the respective merits of the parties  मामले   .
non-binding   मध्यस्थता  is  प्रयुक्त  in  कनेक्शन  with attempts to reach  a  negotiated settlement .
the  role of an  arbitrator  in non-binding arbitration is  ,  on  the  surface , similar to that of  a   मध्यस्थ   in   a  mediation .
However , the  प्रिंसिपल  distinction  is  that whereas  a  mediator will try to  सहायता   the  parties find a  मध्य  ground  to  compromise  at  , the arbitrator remains  totally  removed from the  उपनिवेश  process  और  will only  दे  a determination of liability  और  , if appropriate , an indication of  the  quantum  of  damages payable .
Subsequent to  a  non-binding  मध्यस्थता  ,  the   पार्टियों   remain  free to pursue their claims either through the courts  ,   or   by  way of a binding arbitration ,  हालांकि   in  practice a settlement  is  the most common  निष्कर्ष  .
The  पुरस्कार  and reasoning  in  a non-binding  मध्यस्थता  is  लगभग   invariably   inadmissible   in  any  subsequent  action in the courts  or  in another arbitration tribunal .
Non-binding  मध्यस्थता  is utilised mostly  in  the United States and Canada  .
It is largely unknown in  यूरोपीय   ,  although in the United  किंगडम   वहीँ   is  a practice of parties  जो  are seeking a  उपनिवेश  to jointly instruct  a  Queen 's Counsel for an opinion on  the   merits  and likely quantum  of  a claim  ,  and then  to  negotiate on the basis of the views  expressed   in  that  राय   .
Augustine  ज्वालामुखी  is a  लावा   गुम्बद  Complex on  अगस्टाइन  Island in  southwestern  Cook Inlet in the Kenai Peninsula  बरो  of southcentral coastal Alaska ,  दक्षिणपश्चिम  of  anchorage  .
the  Alaska Volcano Observatory currently rates Mount  अगस्टाइन   as  Level of Concern  रंग  Code Green for aviation and the  ज्वालामुखी  Alert Level is  at   सामान्य   .
अगस्टाइन   द्वीप  has  a  land area of , while West  द्वीप   ,  just off Augustine 's western shores , has .
The  द्वीप  is made  up  mainly of past eruption deposits .
Scientists have  महरूम  able to  discern  that past dome collapse  रै  resulted  in   विशाल  avalanches  .
A map  of  Belize .
The country of Belize  रै  roughly 386  km  of coastline , and  रै   अनेक   मूँगा  reefs  ,  cays ,  और  islands  in  the  caribbean  Sea  .
Most  of   ये   रूप   the  Belize Barrier  रीफ  ,  the   longest   in  the western  गोलार्ध  stemming approximately .
The reef and its islands have  महरूम  a  युनेस्को  World  विरासत  Site since  1996  .
The following  is   a   सूची   of   oceanic  islands  of  Belize , arranged according  to  region  लकिन  all of which are in  the  Caribbean  समुद्र  .
Most of the islands  variate  in  स्पेलिंग  between `` cay '' and  ``   caye   ''  , and  भी  use the  स्पेनी  `` cayo '' .
River islands  have  not been listed .
ड्राइव   अक्षर  Access ( DLA  )  is a discontinued commercial  पैकेट  writing  अनुप्रयोग  for the Microsoft  खिड़कियाँ   ऑपरेटिंग   प्रणाली  that allows optical  डिस्क  data storage devices to  be   प्रयुक्त  in a manner  समान  to floppy disks  .
DLA  is   a  packet  लिखने   प्रौद्योगिकी  for CD  और  DVD media that uses  the  UDF  संचिका  system .
dla  is not compatible  साथ   खिड़कियाँ   विस्टा  and newer , although  a  patch  exists  to  फिक्स  this issue  अंतर्गत  Windows Vista .
Roxio  बर्न   थी  introduced on  अप्रैल   30  , 2009  .
As a replacement for DLA ,  it  remedies compatibility  मुद्दे  Internet Explorer  8   .
अल्फा   रेक्स  Emmanuel Humbard ( August  13  , 1919  –  September 21 , 2007 )  थी  a  well-known   अमरीकी   टेलीविज़न  evangelist whose Cathedral of Tomorrow show was shown on over 600  स्टेशन  at the peak of its popularity .
Limitless is a 2011 American  थ्रिलर  film directed by Neil Burger  और  starring Bradley  कूपर   ,   abbie  Cornish  ,  and  रॉबर्ट  De Niro .
It is  आधारित  on the 2001  अनोखा  The  अंधेरा  Fields by  एलन  Glynn  साथ  the  पटकथा  by  लेस्ली  Dixon .
अलास्का   (   )  is a  राज्य  in  the  United States , situated  in   the  northwest extremity  of  the  उत्तर   अमरीकी   महाद्वीप  , with  the   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  boundary  साथ  Canada to  the  east  ,  the  आर्कटिक  Ocean  to   the  north , and the Pacific  समंदर  to  the  west and  दक्षिण  ,  साथ  Russia  further   वेस्ट  across  the  Bering Strait  .
अलास्का  is the largest state in the United  राज्य   by   क्षेत्रफल  , the 4th least  populous   और   the  least densely populated of the 50 United States .
Approximately half of Alaska 's 731,449  निवासियों  live within the  anchorage  metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल   .
अलास्का  's economy is dominated by the oil  ,  natural gas , and fishing industries ;  it  has these resources  in  abundance .
Alaska was purchased from Russia  on   कूच   30   ,  1867 , for $ 7.2  लाख   (  $ adjusted  लिये  inflation  )  at  लगभग   दो   सेंट  per acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ) .
The  जमीन   गई  through several administrative changes before becoming an  व्यवस्थित  ( or incorporated  )  territory on  may  11 , 1912  ,  and the 49th state of  the  U.S.  on   जनवरी  3 , 1959 .
the   नाम  `` Alaska  ''  ( Аляска  )   थी  already introduced in the Russian colonial period  ,  when it was used only for  the  peninsula  और   is  derived from the  aleut  alaxsxaq ,  अर्थ  ``  the  mainland ''  or  ,  अधिक  literally  ,   ``  the object towards  जिससे  the action of  the   समुद्र  is  निर्देशित  ''  .
It  is  also known  as  Alyeska  ,  the  ``  great land '' ,  an   aleut  word derived  इससे   the  same  रूट   .
Nelson  मंडेला  Metropolitan University ( NMMU  )   is   a  South  अफ़्रीकी  tertiary  शिक्षा   संस्था   साथ   इसके  main administration in the coastal city of  बंदरगाहों  Elizabeth  .
A  विलय   of  three institutions  संस्थापित  NMMU in January 2005 but  इसके  history  तिथियाँ  back to 1882  साथ  the foundation of  बंदरगाहों  Elizabeth  आर्ट  School .
the   विश्वविद्यालयों  draws international  विद्यार्थी   इससे  all over  the  world .
There are over 3000 international students and include  विद्यार्थी  from  the  United States  ,   फ़्रांस  , China , Germany ,  बेल्जियम  , Denmark , Finland , Netherlands , Norway ,  स्वीडन  , United  किंगडम   और  many  अन्य  countries .
NMMU is a comprehensive university offering professional and vocational training  .
The University has six campuses -  पाँच  in Port  एलिज़ाबेथ  and one in  जार्ज   .
the  main campus is the  दक्षिण  Campus .
Students at NMMU  can  study  towards   diplomas  and degrees up  to  and including doctoral  स्तर  qualifications  .
A number of courses include workplace experience as part  of  the curriculum .
covergirl  is an American  कॉस्मेटिक्स  brand founded  in  Maryland , by the  noxzema  Chemical Company ( later called Noxell  )  and  acquired   by   procter  & Gamble in 1989 .
The Noxell Company advertised this cosmetics line by allowing ``  कवर  girls  ''  , fashion  मॉडल  who appear on the  सामने  cover of  महिलाओं  's magazines  ,  to wear its products .
CoverGirl makes up for  कमी  of direct individual customer  सेवा  by providing a wide variety  of  cosmetics available at reasonable prices .
on  the Origin  of  Species , published  on   24   नवम्बर  1859 , is a work of  वैज्ञानिक  literature  by  Charles  डार्विन  which is considered  to  be the  न्यास  of evolutionary biology .
इसके  full title was On  the  Origin of Species by Means  of  Natural Selection , or  the  Preservation of  favoured  Races  in  the Struggle for  जीवन  .
For the sixth edition  of  1872  ,  the  छोटी  title was changed to  the   उत्पत्ति  of  प्रजाति  .
Darwin 's  किताब   introduced   the  scientific theory  कि  populations evolve  over  the  कोर्स  of generations  through   a   प्रक्रम   of   प्राकृतिक  selection .
It presented a  देह  of  प्रमाण  that the diversity  of  life arose by common descent through a branching pattern  of   एवोल्यूशन  .
Darwin  शामिल  evidence that he had gathered on the Beagle  expedition   in  the  1830s  and his subsequent findings  इससे  research , correspondence  ,  and experimentation .
विभिन्न  evolutionary ideas had already  महरूम   प्रस्तावित  to explain  नई  findings in biology .
वहीँ  was growing support for such ideas among dissident  anatomists  and the general  पब्लिक   ,  but during the  पहला  half of the 19th century  the   अंग्रेज़ी  scientific establishment  थी   closely  tied  to  the Church  of   इंग्लैण्ड  , while science  थी   भाग   of  natural theology .
विचार  about the transmutation of species were  विवादास्पद  as they conflicted  साथ  the  मान्यताओं   कि   प्रजाति  were  अपरिवर्तनशील  parts of  a   designed  hierarchy  और  that humans were unique , unrelated to other animals .
The  राजनैतिक  and  theological  implications were  पडती  debated ,  लकिन  transmutation was not accepted  by  the scientific mainstream .
The book was written for non-specialist  पाठक   और  attracted  फैली  interest upon its  प्रकाशन   .
As Darwin  थी  an  प्रतिष्ठित   वैज्ञानिक  , his findings were taken seriously  और  the  प्रमाण   he   प्रस्तुत   उत्पन्न  scientific , philosophical ,  और  religious discussion .
the  debate  over  the book contributed to the campaign  by  T.H .  हक्स्ले  and his fellow members of the  x  Club  to  secularise  विज्ञान  by promoting scientific naturalism .
Within  दो  decades there was  फैली   वैज्ञानिक  agreement  कि  evolution ,  साथ  a  branching   पैटर्न  of  आम  descent ,  था  occurred , but scientists were slow to give natural selection the significance  कि  Darwin  विचार  appropriate .
दौरान   the  `` eclipse of Darwinism `` from the  1880s  to the 1930s  ,  various other mechanisms  of   एवोल्यूशन   यहूद  given  अधिक  credit .
With the development  of  the modern  विकासवादी  synthesis in  the   1930s   और   1940s  , Darwin  's   अवधारणा   of   विकासवादी   अनुकूलन  through natural  चयन  became  सेंट्रल  to modern  विकासवादी   सिद्धान्त  , now the unifying concept of  the  life sciences .
चार्ल्स  Dillon `` Casey  ''  Stengel  (  ; July  30   ,  1890  –  September 29 , 1975 )  ,  nicknamed  ``  The Old  perfessor   ''  ,  थी   an  American  प्रमुख  League Baseball  outfielder  and manager .
He  थी   निर्वाचित  to  the   बेसबॉल  Hall  of   कीर्ति   in  .
Stengel was born in Kansas City  ,  Missouri  ,  and originally nicknamed `` Dutch '' ,  a  common nickname  at  that time for Americans  of  German  ancestry  .
बाद   उसके   प्रमुख   लीग  career began ,  he   acquired  the nickname `` Casey  ''  , which originally came from the  आद्याक्षर  of his hometown ( `` K. C.  ''   )  , which evolved into `` Casey '' ,  बहकावे   by  the wide popularity of the poem Casey  at  the Bat .
In the 1950s  ,  sportswriters dubbed him with yet another nickname , ``  the   बूढ़ा  Professor  ''  (  or   ``   perfessor   ''   )  , for his sharp  wit   और  his  क्षमता  to talk at length on  anything  baseball -related  .
हालांकि  his baseball career spanned  a  number of teams  और  cities , he is  primarily  associated with  क्लब  in New York City .
Between  playing  and managing , he is the  तभी  man to have worn  चार  of New  यॉर्क  's major  लीग  clubs  '  uniforms .
he   थी  the first of four men ( through the  ऋतु   )  to manage  दोनो   the  New York Yankees and New  यॉर्क  Mets ;  योगी  Berra , Dallas  ग्रीन  ,  और  Joe  टोरेस  are the others .
जैसे  Torre , he  भी  managed the Braves and  the  Dodgers .
He ended his baseball career  as  the beloved manager  लिये  the then expansion New York Mets , which won over the hearts of New York partly  due  to the unique character of their veteran leader  .
June (  )  is  the  sixth month of  the   साल   in  the Julian and  gregorian   पंचांग  and one of the four months with a  लंबाई  of 30 days .
ओविड   provides  two  etymologies  for June 's  नाम  in his  कविता  concerning the months entitled the Fasti .
The  पहला  is  कि   the  month is named after the  रोमन   देवी  Juno ,  बीवी  of Jupiter and  समतुल्य  to  the  Greek goddess Hera  ;   the  second is that  the  name  आता  from the Latin word  iuniores   ,  meaning ``  younger   ones  , '' as  opposed  to maiores (  ``  elders '' ) for which the  preceding   माह  May may be named  (  Fasti VI.1–88  )   .
देखिए   :  Months in various calendars also  पुकारा  the season  of   the   जून  is the month with the longest daylight hours of  the  year in the Northern  गोलार्ध   और  the shortest daylight hours  of  the year in  the  Southern Hemisphere  .
June in the  उत्तरी   गोलार्ध   is  the  मौसमी  equivalent to December  in  the  दक्षिणी  Hemisphere and  वाइस  versa .
In  the  Northern hemisphere , the  शुरूआत  of the meteorological summer is 1 June .
In  the  Southern  गोलार्ध  , the beginning  of  the meteorological  शीत  is 1 June .
At the  प्रारंभ  of  जून  ,  the   सूर्य  rises  in  the constellation  of  Taurus  ;   at   the   समाप्त  of  जून  , the  सूर्य  rises  in  the  नक्षत्र  of Gemini  .
However , due  to  the precession  of  the equinoxes , June  begins   साथ  the sun in  the  astrological sign of Gemini , and  ends   साथ  the sun in the astrological sign of Cancer  .
जून   is  known  लिये  the large number  of   विवाह  that occur  over  the course of the  माह  .
According to  एक  etymology  ,  June is named  बाद  Juno ( Hera ) .
Juno was the  देवी  of marriage  और   a   शादीशुदा  couple 's household  ,  so some consider it good luck to be married in  इस   माह  .
According to another etymology provided  by   the  Roman  कवि   ओविड  ,  जून  is named for  the   iuniores  , latin for `` young  लोगों   ''  ( Fasti VI.88 ) and that the  माह  of May  is  named for the maiores , Latin  लिये   ``   बड़ो  '' .
In  आइसलैंड  ,  लोकगीत   says  that if you bathe  नग्न  in the morning dew on the  morning   of  June 24  ,  you  हैं  supposed to  रखना  aging at bay for longer  .
A constitution is  a   नियत  of  आधारभूत  principles or established precedents according  to  which a state or other  संगठन   is   governed  .
These rules together make up ,  i.e   .   constitute   ,  what the  एंटिटी  is  .
When these principles are written down  into  a single document or set of legal documents  ,  those documents  may   be  said to  embody  a written constitution ;  if  they are written  bas  in a single  व्यापक   दस्तावेज़   ,  it  is  said to embody a  संहिताबद्ध  constitution .
Constitutions concern different levels of organizations  ,   इससे  sovereign  राज्य  to companies  और  unincorporated associations  .
A  सन्धि  which establishes an international organization is also its constitution , in that it would define  कैसा  that organization  is  constituted .
Within states , whether  sovereign  or federated ,  a  constitution defines  the  principles  upon  which the  राज्य  is based , the procedure  in  which laws  हैं  made and  by   जिसको   .
Some  constitutions   ,   विशेषकर  codified constitutions ,  भी   अधिनियम   as  limiters of state power  ,  by establishing lines which a state  's  rulers can not cross  ,   ऐसे   as  fundamental rights .
George Washington at Constitutional  सम्मेलन  of 1787 , signing of  u.S.  Constitution .
The Constitution of India is the longest  लिखा  constitution of any  sovereign  country in the  संसार  ,  containing   448  articles  ,  12 schedules and 100  amendments   ,   साथ  117,369 words in its  अंग्रेज़ी  language  संस्करण  ,  जबकि  the United States Constitution  is   the  shortest written constitution , at 7  आलेख  and 27 amendments .
Ron Diftler ( left ) , NASA Robonaut  मैनेजर  assisting in a  robonaut  familiarization training session in the Space Environment Simulation Laboratory  at  NASA 's Johnson Space Center .
अभियान्त्रिकी   प्रबन्धन  is a  specialized   रूप  of  प्रबन्धन  that is concerned with the application  of   अभियान्त्रिकी   सिद्धान्त  to business practice  .
Engineering management is  a  career that brings  साथ   the  technological problem-solving  savvy   of   अभियान्त्रिकी   और  the organizational  ,   प्रशासनिक  , and planning abilities  of   प्रबन्धन   in   अनुक्रम   to  oversee complex enterprises  इससे   धारणा  to  पूर्णता  .
Example areas  of  engineering  हैं   उत्पाद  development , manufacturing ,  निर्माण  ,  डिज़ाइन   अभियान्त्रिकी   ,  industrial  अभियान्त्रिकी   ,  technology  ,  production  ,  or  कोई   अन्य  field  कि  employs personnel who  perform  an engineering function .
Successful engineering  प्रबंधक  typically require training and experience  in  business and  अभियान्त्रिकी  .
technically  inept managers tend to  be  deprived of  support   by  their  तकनीकी  team , and non-commercial managers tend  to  lack  वाणिज्यिक  acumen to deliver  in  a  मार्केट  economy  .
Largely  ,  engineering managers manage engineers who are driven by  non-entrepreneurial  thinking , thus  आवश्यकता   the   जरुरी  people skills  to  coach , mentor and motivate technical professionals .
Engineering  पेशेवर  joining  निर्माण   कंपनियाँ   sometimes  become engineering  प्रबंधक   by  default after  a  period of time .
They are required to  सीख  how to manage  एकबार   वे   हैं   on  the job , though this  is   प्रायः  an ineffective way to develop  managerial   abilities   .
In an insurance policy  ,  the deductible is  the  amount  of  expenses that  जरूर  be paid  आउट  of pocket  पहले  an insurer will pay any expenses  .
in  general usage ,  the  term deductible may  be   प्रयुक्त  to describe one of several types of clauses  (   देखिए   नीचे   )  that are used  by  insurance  कंपनियाँ  as a  दहलीज  for policy payments  .
Deductibles  हैं  typically used to deter the  विशाल  number of trivial claims that  a   उपभोक्ता   can   be   reasonably  expected  to  bear  the  cost of .
By  restricting  its coverage to events that are  significant  enough  to  incur  विशाल  costs ,  the  insurance firm expects to pay out  थोड़ा  smaller amounts  much  less frequently  ,  incurring much higher  बचत  .
as   a   परिणाम  ,  बीमे  premiums  हैं  typically cheaper when they involve higher deductibles .
Deductibles  हैं  normally provided as clauses in an insurance policy that  dictate   कैसा  much of an insurance-covered expense  is  borne by  the   policyholder  .
वे  are  सामान्यतः  quoted as a  फिक्स्ड  quantity and  is  a part  of  most  नीतियों   covering  losses to the  नीति  holder .
The insurer then becomes liable for claimable expenses that exceed this amount  (  subject  to  the maximum sum claimable indicated  in   the  contract )  .
Depending  on  the policy , the deductible may apply  प्रति   covered  incident , or per year  .
लिये  policies where  incidences  are not easy  to   delimit  (  लिये  example health insurance )  ,  the deductible is typically applied per year .
अनेक   deductibles   can  be set  by  the insurer based on the cause of  the   अर्जी  .
For example , a  सिंगल   आवास   बीमे   नीति  may contain  अनेक  deductible amounts  लिये  loss  or  damage  arising  from  चोरी  ,  आग  , natural calamities , evacuation etc .
There are also deductible reimbursement programs  कि  reimburse a deductible  in   the  event  of  an  स्वचालित   ,  home , boat/yacht or  स्वास्थ्य  insurance  अर्जी  .
An  चालान  or bill is a commercial  दस्तावेज़  issued by a seller to a buyer , indicating  the  products  ,   quantities  ,  और   सहमत  prices  लिये  products or services the  विक्रेता  has provided the  खरीदार  .
An  चालान  indicates the  बिक्री   लेनदेन  only .
Payment terms are  स्वतंत्र  of the invoice and are negotiated  by  the buyer and  the   विक्रेता  .
Payment  शर्तें  are usually included on  the  invoice .
The  खरीदार   could   have  already paid for the products or services  सूचीबद्ध  on  the  invoice .
खरीदार  can also have  a  maximum number of days in  जिससे   to   अदा  for  ये   goods  and is  sometimes  offered a discount if paid  पहले   the   due  date  .
In  the  rental industry , an invoice  जरूर   शामिल   a  specific reference to  the  duration of the time being billed  ,  so in addition to quantity  ,  price and discount the  invoicing  amount is  भी   आधारित  on  अवधि  .
Generally each  लकीर  of  a  rental invoice will refer to the actual hours , days , weeks ,  महीने   ,  etc. , being billed .
इससे  the point of view of a seller ,  an   चालान  is  a  sales invoice .
From  the  point of  दृश्य   of  a  खरीदार  , an invoice is  a  purchase invoice .
The  दस्तावेज़  indicates the buyer  और  seller  ,   लकिन  the term  चालान  indicates money  is  owed  or   owing  .
in  English , the context of  the  term invoice is  प्रायः  used to clarify its meaning , such as  ``  We sent them an invoice '' (  वे   owe  us money  )  or `` We received an invoice from them '' (  we  owe  उन्हें   धन   )  .
The right main bronchus ( or right  प्राथमिक   bronchus  , or right  प्रिंसिपल  bronchus ) is a  bronchus   of   the  respiratory  प्रणाली  .
It  is  wider  ,  shorter ,  और  more  लंबवत   in  direction  than   the   बाएँ   .
it  is  परिचय  2.5  cm  long  ,  and enters  the  right  फेफड़ों   nearly   विपरीत  the fifth thoracic vertebra  .
The azygos vein  arches  over it from  पीछे   ;  and the right pulmonary artery lies  at   पहला   नीचे   और  then in front of  it  .
About 2 cm from its commencement it gives off a branch to  the  upper  पालि  of  the  right lung .
This  is  termed  the  eparterial branch  of  the bronchus , because it arises  ऊपर  the right pulmonary artery .
the  bronchus now passes below the artery  ,  and  is  known as  the  hyparterial branch ; it divides  into  two branches for the middle  और   निम्नतर  lobes .
if  a foreign body  in  the airway passes  through   the  trachea  ,   it  will most likely enter the right main  bronchus  instead of the  बाएँ  , due  to  the straighter alignment of the  सही   bronchus  to  the   श्वासनली  .
Squash is a  racquet  sport played by two  (   singles   )  or  चार  players  (  doubles  )   in  a four-walled court  साथ   a  small , hollow  रबर  ball .
The players must alternate in striking the  बॉल   साथ  their  racquet  and hit  the   बॉल  onto the playable surfaces  of   the  four walls of the court .
The game was formerly called squash racquets ,  a   सन्दर्भ   to   the  `` squashable '' soft ball used in  the   खेल   (   compared  with the fatter ball  प्रयुक्त   in  its parent game racquets  or  rackets ) .
स्क्वैश   is  recognized by the IOC and  समर्थक  are lobbying for its  incorporation  in a future  ओलम्पिक  program .
In  2003  ,  फोर्ब्स  rated  स्क्वैश  as  the   क्रमांक  one healthiest sport to  खेल   .
Residual oil is  आयल   मिला  in  कम   एकाग्रता   naturally   or  in  बेहाल  oil fields .
Often mixed with water , it can not be  बरामद  by conventional techniques .
However , it can be recovered using carbon  dioxide-enhanced  oil recovery ( CO2 EOR  )  which  involves  injecting  कार्बन  dioxide  into  the well reducing viscosity and enhancing  प्रवाह  of the oil .
The technique is  नहीं   नई  but has not been used  extensively   on   अवशेष  oil zones  ,  low-grade deposits of petroleum  ऐसे  as the 38 square  मील   in  the Permian Basin of Texas leased  by  Elliott Roosevelt Jr  .
The technique  is  limited  by  availability of carbon  डाइऑक्साइड   .
It does not result in sequestration of the  कार्बन   डाइऑक्साइड   लकिन  the gas is  recycled   as  much as possible .
United  राज्य   reserves  of  अवशेष   आयल  are  अनुमानित  to be 100 billion barrels  .
Artist 's rendering of  the  fire  ,  by  जॉन  R. Chapin , originally  मुद्रित  in Harper  's  Weekly ; the view  चेहरों  northeast across the Randolph  गली  Bridge .
The Great Chicago Fire  थी  a conflagration that  burned   इससे  Sunday , October 8 , to  जल्दी   मंगलवार   ,  October  10  , 1871 , killing hundreds and  destroying  about  in   शिकागो  ,  इलिनोइस   .
Though the  आग  was one of  the   largest  U.S.  आपदाओं  of  the  19th  सदी   ,  the  पुनर्निर्माण  that began helped develop  शिकागो  as one of the  सबसे  populous and economically important  अमरीकी  cities .
Henry VIII  (  28 June 1491  –  28 January 1547 ) was  किंग  of England from 21 April 1509  जबतक   उसके   मौत   .
he  was  रब  , and  बाद   किंग  ,  of  Ireland ,  as  well  as  continuing the  नाममात्र  claim by the English  monarchs  to  the  Kingdom of  फ़्रांस  .
Henry  थी  the  दूसरी  monarch of the Tudor  राजवंश   ,   succeeding  his father  ,  Henry VII .
besides   उसके  six marriages  ,  Henry  viii  is  ज्ञात  for  उसके  role in the  विरह  of the Church  of  England  इससे  the Roman Catholic Church  .
हेनरी  's struggles with Rome  led   to  the separation  of   the  Church  of  England from papal  प्राधिकार   ,  the Dissolution  of  the  monasteries   ,   और   उसके  own establishment as the Supreme Head  of  the  गिरिजाघर  of England  .
Yet he remained  a  believer in core Catholic theological  शिक्षाओं  ,  भी  after his excommunication from the Roman  कैथोलिक  Church .
Henry oversaw  the  legal  संघ  of England and  वेल्स  with the  कानून   in  Wales Acts 1535 and 1542  .
in  1513 , the  नई  king  अलाइड  with the Holy  रोमन  Emperor  ,  Maximillian I  ,  and invaded France in  1513  with  a  large ,  well-equipped  army , but achieved little at a considerable financial cost .
maximillian  , for  उसके  part , used the  अंग्रेज़ी  invasion  to   उसके   अपना  ends , and this prejudiced  इंग्लैण्ड  's  क्षमता  to defeat the  फ्रेंच   .
इस  foray  होता  prove the start of an  obsession  for Henry , who invaded again  in  1544  .
इस  time , Henry 's forces captured  the   महत्वपूर्ण  city of Boulogne ,  लकिन  again  the  Holy Roman Emperor  ,  Charles V  ,   समर्थित  Henry only as long  as  he needed to and England , strained  by  the  विशाल  cost  of  the war  ,   ransomed   the   नगर  back for  सलाम  .
His  contemporaries  considered  हेनरी  in his  प्रधान  to  be  an attractive , educated and accomplished king , and he has been described  as  `` one of  the  most  charismatic   शासकों   to  sit on the English throne ''  .
Besides  सत्ताधारी  with absolute power  ,   he   भी  engaged  खुद   as  an author  और  composer  .
His  ख्वाहिश  to provide England with  a  male heir – which  stemmed  partly  इससे   निजी   वैनिटी  and  partly   क्युकी  he believed a daughter would be unable to consolidate the Tudor  राजवंश  and the fragile peace that existed following the Wars  of  the Roses  –  led to the two  बाते   लिये   जिससे  Henry is  सबसे  remembered :  उसके  six marriages and the  अंग्रेज़ी  Reformation .
Henry became morbidly  मोटे  and  उसके  health suffered , contributing  to  his death in 1547 .
He is  अक्सर  characterised in his later life as a  lustful  ,  egotistical   ,  harsh  ,  and  असुरक्षित  king .
La Reina del  सूर   (  The Queen  of   the   दक्षिण   )  is  a  Spanish-language telenovela produced by the United States  टेलीविज़न  network Telemundo , in  संयोजन   साथ  the Antena 3 network and  rti   producciones   .
आधारित   on   a   अनोखा   of  the same name  by   स्पेनी  author Arturo  pérez-reverte  , the drama depicts  the   वृद्धि  of Teresa Mendoza ( Kate del Castillo )  ,  a young  स्त्री  from  मैक्सिको   जो  becomes the most powerful drug  trafficker  in  दक्षिणी   स्पेन   .
Patricio Wills  ,  the  अध्यक्ष  of  telemundo  Television Studios , was the executive producer .
Though La Reina del Sur was nominated for Novela of  the  Year ,  पसंदीदा  Lead Actress  ,  and Best Bad Luck Video , it  जीती  no awards  .
With a $ 10 million budget ,  la   reina  del  सूर  was  the  most expensive  telenovela  ever  उत्पादित   by  Telemundo  .
the  program 's premiere on February  28  , 2011  ,  was the network  's   उच्चतम  rated premiere for a telenovela  to  date .
the  program frequently dominated its time slot , even over English language programming on other  प्रमुख   u.S.  networks .
la  Reina del Sur completed  इसके  63  एपीसोड   चलाएं   on  Telemundo  और  its 13 episode run  on  Antena 3  simultaneously   on  May  30   ,  2011  .
the  final  एपीसोड  was the highest rated  ब्रॉडकास्ट   in  Telemundo 's 19-year history  (  4.2  लाख  viewers )  ,  and  ताल  all of the English language U.S. television networks to earn  the   क्रमांक  one  स्लॉट  in  the   18-49  adult demographic .
The  कार्यक्रम  's success spurred Telemundo to launch its first campaign to gain  the  series  an   एमी  Award nomination  .
A  one-night  special featuring several cast members aired on  may  31  ,   2011  , and marked  the  Telemundo debut of noted  latina   टेलीविज़न   व्यक्तित्व  Cristina  saralegui   .
La Reina  डेल  Sur  is  broadcast in several other markets , including  सर्बिया   ,  Colombia , Chile  ,   साइप्रस  , Nicaragua  ,   कोस्टा  Rica , Mexico  ,  Albania , Hungary , Slovenia ,  क्रोएशिया  , Romania , ( among others ) .
An example  of  rack  आरोहित  servers
A web  होस्टिंग  service  is  a  प्रकार  of  अंतरजाल  hosting  सेवा  that  allows  individuals and organizations to  मेक  their website  accessible  via the World Wide Web .
Web hosts are companies  कि  provide space on a  सर्वर  owned or leased for use by clients  ,  as well as  providing   अंतरजाल  connectivity  ,  typically in a  आंकड़ा  center .
Web hosts can also provide data  बीच   स्पेस   और  connectivity to the  अंतरजाल  for other servers located  in   उनके  data center , called colocation ,  भी  known  as  Housing  in  Latin America or France  .
The scope of  वेब  hosting  सेवाएं   varies   greatly  .
The most  मौलिक  is web page and  small-scale   संचिका  hosting , where files  can  be uploaded via File Transfer  प्रोटोकॉल  ( FTP ) or a Web interface .
The files  हैं  usually delivered to the Web `` as  is  '' or with minimal processing .
अनेक  Internet  सेवा  providers  (   isps  ) offer  इस  service free to subscribers  .
Individuals  और  organizations may  भी  obtain Web  पेज  hosting from alternative  सेवा  providers .
Personal web  साईट  hosting is  typically  free , advertisement-sponsored  ,  or inexpensive .
Business  वेब  site  होस्टिंग   प्रायः  has  a  higher expense depending  upon  the size and type of the  जालस्थल  .
Single page hosting is generally sufficient for personal web pages  .
a   जटिल   साईट  calls  लिये  a more comprehensive package  कि   provides   डेटाबेस  support and application development platforms ( e.g  .   पीएचपी  , Java  ,   माणिक्य   on  Rails  ,  ColdFusion  ,  or ASP.NET ) .
These facilities allow customers to write or install scripts for applications like  forums  and content  प्रबन्धन  .
Also  ,  Secure Sockets Layer ( SSL ) is  typically  used for e-commerce .
The host may also  provide  an interface  or   कंट्रोल  panel for managing the Web server and installing scripts , as well  as   अन्य   मौड्यूल  and service  अनुप्रयोग  like e-mail .
कुछ  hosts specialize  in   निश्चित  software or  सेवाएं  ( e.g  .  e-commerce  )  ,  जिससे  are commonly  प्रयुक्त  by  larger   कंपनियाँ   कि  outsource network infrastructure .
मैडेन   एनएफएल  (  ज्ञात   as   जॉन  Madden Football before 1993  )  is an American football video  खेल   श्रेणी  developed  by  Electronic Arts Tiburon for EA Sports .
the   खेल  series is named after Pro Football Hall  of   famer   जॉन  Madden , a well-known  पूर्व  Super  कटोरी  –winning  कोच  of the Oakland Raiders  और  color commentator .
The series is  the  best selling EA Sports series  .
the  games have  consistently   महरूम  a  बेहतरीन  seller ,  और  has even spawned TV  shows  where  खिलाड़ी  compete .
among  the game 's realistic features include  sophisticated  playbooks and player statistics , and voice commentary that allows players  to   सुन  the game as if it were a  रियल  TV broadcast  .
the  Madden NFL series has been  nicknamed   the  NFL 's  33rd  Franchise .
The series  थी  originally conceived by Electronic Arts  संस्थापक   ट्रिप  Hawkins , who  तब  approached  मैडेन  in 1984 for his endorsement and expertise .
due  to Madden  's  insistence that  the  game be  as  realistic  as   संभावित   ,  the first version of John Madden Football  थी  not  released   जबतक  1988 .
The second version  of   the  game was  released  in 1990 ,  साथ  annual  संस्करण  since then .
The  श्रेणी  ' name was changed  to  Madden NFL in 1993 after EA  acquired   the  rights to use NFL teams and players .
despite  Madden  's   रिटायरमेंट   as   a  broadcaster in 2009  ,  he continues to lend  उसके  name and  provide   विशेषज्ञता  for  the  game .
Cindy Lee Miller Sheehan ( born  जुलाई  10 ,  1957  )  is   an  American antiwar activist whose son  ,  U.S. Army Specialist Casey  sheehan  , was killed  by  enemy action during the Iraq War .
वो  attracted national  और  international media attention in August 2005 for her extended antiwar protest at a makeshift  शिविर  outside President  जार्ज  W. Bush 's Texas ranch —a stand  कि  drew both passionate support and angry criticism  .
sheehan  ran unsuccessfully for Congress in  2008  .
She is a vocal critic of  अध्यक्ष  Barack Obama 's foreign policy .
Her memoir , Peace  माँ  :  a  Mother 's Journey  through  Heartache  to   सक्रियता  , was published  in  2006 .
Sheehan  थी  the 2012  vice-presidential  nominee of the  सलाम  and  स्वतंत्रता  Party .
wyclef  Jeanelle Jean ( ;  ;   born  October 17  ,  1969 ) Wyclef  dumped  From Haiti  's   अध्यक्षीय  Ballot  –  TIME ,  अगस्त   21   ,  2010 .
`` Before he announced  on  August 5 that he was running  लिये   अध्यक्ष  of Haiti , Wyclef Jean was still listing  उसके  age as only 37  सालो  old  .
But after declaring himself a presidential  प्रत्याशी  , the Haitian-American-Irish hip-hop star also decided to come  साफ  and confirm that he  थी  really 40 . '' is a three-time  ग्रैमी  Award -winning Haitian-American rapper  ,   singer-songwriter   ,  musician , record producer ,  और  politician .
At  आयु  nine , Jean moved to the United States with his family and has spent much of his life in the country .
He  पहला  received fame as a  सदस्य   of   the  acclaimed New  जर्सी  hip hop group the Fugees .
on  August 5 ,  2010  , Jean filed for candidacy  in   the   2010  Haitian presidential  चुनाव   ,  although  the  Electoral Commission  subsequently  ruled  उसे  ineligible  to  stand  as   he   था  not  मिले  the requirement  to  have  महरूम  resident in  हैती  for five years .
wyclef  Jean to appeal against  हैती   चुनाव  ruling – BBC News  ,  Aug 22 , 2010 .
Haiti 's electoral commission  कहा  that Mr Jean was  अयोग्य   to   स्टैंड  as the Haitian constitution requires  उम्मीदवार  to have lived in  the  country for five years prior to an election .
The  40-year-old  singer lives in the US .
Jean 's  प्रयत्न  at earthquake  राहत   ,   अत्यधिक  publicized in 2010  throughout  Haiti and the United  राज्य  ,  यहूद  channeled through his charitable  संगठन  ,  yéle  Haiti .
The charity , which performed a variety of charitable works in  हैती  between 2005  और   2010   ,  effectively closed in 2012  .
In  विधि   ,   a   set-off  is a statutory defense to  the  whole or to a  portion   of  a plaintiff 's claim  .
it  had no existence under the English  आम  law , being created by 2 Geo . II  c.   22  for the  राहत  of  insolvent  debtors , although  set-off  was  पहचाना   in  equity .
ऐसे  a defense could be pleaded  तभी  in respect  of  mutual debts of  a  definite character , and  किया  not apply  to  cases in which  क्षतिपूर्ति  were claimed  ,  nor to equitable  दावा  or demands .
by  the rules of the Supreme Court  (  O.  xix  . r.  3  ) a  प्रतिवादी   in  an action  may  set off  or   नियत   up  any  सही  or claim  by   रास्ता   of  counterclaim against  the  claims of a plaintiff , and such  set-off  or  counterclaim  has the same effect as  a  statement of claim  in  a  cross-action   .
The legal defense of set-off  (  above  )  was originally introduced to prevent the unfair  हालात  whereby  a   व्यक्ति   (  `` Party A '' ) who owed  धन  to another  (  `` Party  b   ''   )  could be sent to debtors prison , despite the fact that Party B  भी  owed money to Party A .
the  law thus allows both parties to defer payment  जबतक   उनके  respective claims have  महरूम  heard  in   अदालत  .
upon  judgment , both claims are extinguished  और  replaced  by  a  सिंगल  net  योग  owing ( e.g  .   if  Party  a  owes  पार्टी   b   100  and Party B owes Party A 105  ,  the  दो   रकम   हैं  set off  और  replaced  साथ  a single  दायित्व  of 5  इससे   पार्टी   b  to  पार्टी  A ) .
set-off   can  also be incorporated by contractual agreement so that  ,  where  a   पार्टी  defaults , the mutual  amounts  owing are automatically  नियत  off and  बुझे  .
In certain jurisdictions ( including the UK  )   ,   set-off  takes  प्लेस  automatically upon the insolvency of a company  .
This means that  ,  for  प्रत्येक  party which is  दोनो  a  creditor  and  debtor   of   the  insolvent  कम्पनी   ,   परस्पर  debts  हैं   set-off  against each other , and then either the bankrupt 's creditor can claim the balance in the bankruptcy  or   the  trustee in bankruptcy can ask for the balance remaining to be paid , depending on which side owed  the  most .
This  रै  been  criticized  as an  undeclared   सुरक्षा  interest  कि  violates  the  principle  of  pari passu .
the  alternative , where a creditor  रै  to  अदा  all its  debts  , but receive  तभी  a limited portion  of  the leftover moneys that other unsecured creditors get ,  मुद्राएँ   the   खतरे  of  'knock-on   '  insolvencies .
The right to set off is particularly important when reporting a bank 's exposures to  नियामक  authorities .
The situation where a bank has to report that it has lent a  विशाल  sum to a borrower ( and is therefore  उजागर   ,  because there is a risk that the borrower  might  default  thereby  leading to the  घाटा   of  the  बैंको  's or  इसके  depositors ' money )  is   यूँ  replaced ( where the bank has  लिया  security over  साझा   or  securities of the  borrower  ) with an exposure of the money  lent  minus  the  value of  the  security  लिया  .
Jennifer Joanna Aniston ( born February 11 , 1969 )  is  an American actress , film director ,  और  producer .
एनिस्टन  gained  विश्वव्यापी  recognition in the 1990s for portraying Rachel  ग्रीन   on  the television  sitcom   मित्रों  , a role  जिससे  earned  उसके   an  Emmy Award  ,  a Golden  ग्लोब  Award  ,  and a Screen Actors Guild  पुरस्कार  .
Aniston has also enjoyed a  कामयाब   हॉलीवुड   फिल्मी  career  .
She gained critical  acclaim  for her performances in the independent films She  's  the One (  1996  ) , Office  स्पेस   (  1999 )  ,  The Good Girl  (  2002  )  and  मित्रों  with Money ( 2006 )  .
She has had  उसके  greatest commercial  सफलताओं   साथ  the films Bruce Almighty ( 2003 ) , The Break-Up (  2006   )   ,  Marley  &   me  (  2008  ) ,  बस   go   साथ  It  (  2011 ) and Horrible Bosses ( 2011 ) .
Aniston  प्राप्त  a  स्टार   on  the  हॉलीवुड  Walk of Fame on  फ़रवरी  22 , 2012 .
a  white  बंगाल  tiger at the Houston Aquarium
( video  )
A White tiger  at   tobu  Zoo ,  in  Saitama , Japan  .
the  white tiger  is  a  recessive  mutant  of  the Bengal tiger , which was reported in the  जंगली  from time to time in Assam ,  बंगाल   ,   बिहार  and especially from  the  former State  of   रीवा  .
conventional  PCI (  पीसीआई   is  an  initialism   formed  from Peripheral Component  इंटरकनेक्ट  , part of the  पीसीआई  Local Bus standard and  प्रायः  shortened to  बस  PCI  )  is a local computer bus  लिये  attaching hardware  डिवाइस   in   a  computer .
The PCI bus supports the  कृत्यों  found  on  a  प्रोसेसर   बस  , but in a standardized format that  is   स्वतंत्र  of any particular processor .
Devices connected to the bus appear to the processor to be  कनेक्ट  directly  to  the processor bus  ,   और   हैं  assigned addresses  in   the   प्रोसेसर  's  पता   स्पेस   .
Attached  डिवाइस   can   लो  either  the   रूप   of  an  एकीकृत  circuit fitted  onto  the motherboard  itself  ,  पुकारा  a planar  यंत्र  in the  पीसीआई  specification  ,   or  an expansion card  कि  fits into a slot .
The PCI Local  बस  was first implemented in IBM  pc  compatibles  ,  where it  विस्थापित   the  combination of ISA  प्लस  one VESA Local  बस  as the bus configuration .
It  रै   subsequently  been adopted for other computer types .
पीसीआई  and PCI-X are  होने  replaced by  पीसीआई   एक्स्प्रेस  ,  लकिन   ,  most motherboards  हैं   स्टिल  made with one or more PCI slots  ,  which are  sufficient  for many uses .
The  पीसीआई  specification  कवर  the physical size of  the  bus  (  including  the  size and  अंतरण   of   the   सर्किट  board edge electrical  सम्पर्क  ) , electrical  विशेषताएँ  , bus timing , and protocols .
the  specification can be  खरीदा  from the PCI Special Interest Group (  pci-sig   )  .
Typical PCI  ताश  used in PCs  शामिल  : network cards  ,  sound cards  ,  modems ,  अतिरिक्त  ports  ऐसे  as USB  or   सीरियल   ,  TV tuner cards  और   डिस्क  controllers .
PCI video cards replaced ISA and VESA cards , until  growing   बैंडविड्थ  requirements outgrew the capabilities of  पीसीआई  ; the preferred interface for video  ताश  became AGP  ,   और  then PCI Express .
PCI video cards remain available for use  साथ  old  pcs  without AGP or PCI Express slots  .
अनेक   डिवाइस   previously  provided on PCI  विस्तार   ताश  are now commonly  एकीकृत  onto motherboards or  उपलब्धियाँ   in   सार्वभौमिक  serial bus  और   पीसीआई  Express versions .
Caffeine is a bitter , white crystalline xanthine alkaloid that  अधिनियमों   as  a stimulant drug  .
Caffeine is found in varying quantities in the seeds , leaves  ,  and fruit  of  some plants , where  it  acts  as   a  natural pesticide  कि  paralyzes  और  kills certain insects feeding on  the  plants  ,  as well as  बढ़ाना  the reward memory of pollinators .
It is  सबसे  commonly consumed  by   इंसानो  in infusions extracted  इससे   the  seed  of  the coffee  संयंत्र  and the leaves  of  the tea  बुश   ,   as   खूब  as from  विभिन्न  foods and drinks containing products derived  इससे  the  कोला   नट   .
Other sources  शामिल  yerba maté , guarana berries  ,   guayusa  ,  और  the yaupon holly  .
In  इंसानो  , caffeine acts as  a  central nervous  प्रणाली  stimulant ,  temporarily  warding off drowsiness  और   restoring  alertness  .
It is  the   संसार   's  most widely consumed psychoactive drug , but unlike many other psychoactive substances  ,  it is legal and unregulated in nearly all parts of the  संसार  .
Beverages containing caffeine  ,  such as  कॉफी   ,   चाय  , soft drinks  ,   और   उर्जा   पेय  , enjoy great popularity .
in  North  अमेरिका  , 90 %  of   वयस्कों   consume  caffeine  रोज़  .
भाग  of  the  reason caffeine is classified by  the   खाना  and  ड्रग  Administration as  ग्रा  ( generally recognized as safe ) is  कि  toxic  doses  ( over 10 grams ) are much higher than typically  प्रयुक्त  doses ( less than  500  milligrams  )  .
Ordinary  खपत  can have  कम   स्वास्थ्य  risks ,  भी   जब   carried   on   लिये  years  –  there may be a modest protective effect against some diseases  ,  including Parkinsons  बीमारी  ,  और  certain types of cancer .
Caffeine can  have  both  धनात्मक   और  negative  प्रभाव  on  चिंता   विकार  .
Some people experience sleep  disruption  if they consume caffeine , especially during the evening  घंटों  , but others show little disturbance  और  the effect of caffeine on  नींद  is highly  परिवर्तनीय  .
Evidence  of  a  रिस्क  to  गर्भावस्था  is equivocal , but  कुछ  authorities have  concluded  that  दूरदर्शी   सलाह  is for  गर्भवती  women to limit consumption to the  समतुल्य  of two cups of  कॉफी  per day or  कम   .
The  अमरीकी  Congress of  obstetricians  and Gynecologists ( ACOG ) concluded in  2010  that caffeine consumption is safe  up  to 200 mg per  दिन  in  गर्भवती   महिलाओं   .
Caffeine has pressor and mild  diuretic  effects  जब  administered to people  जो  are  नहीं  used  to  it  ,  but  नियमित  users develop  a  tolerance to  इस  effect  ,  and  अध्ययन  have generally failed  to   support  the  आम  notion  कि  ordinary consumption  contributes  significantly  to  dehydration .
With heavy use  ,   सहिष्णुता   develops  rapidly to autonomic  प्रभाव   ऐसे   as  elevated heart  रेट  and muscle  twitching   ,   लकिन  not  to  the cognitive  or  arousal effects of caffeine  .
the   उपाधि  to which  कैफीन   can  produce clinically  significant  physical and mental dependence remains  a  subject  of   विवाद  in the medical  साहित्य   .
a  kicktail  क्रूजर
a  longboard is a longer variant of a skateboard .
it  is commonly used for  cruising  , downhill racing  ,  slalom  रेसिंग  , sliding ,  and/or  transport .

The  सीआईए   's   संसार  Factbook gives the world population as 7,021,836,029 ( July  2012  est . ) and the distribution of religions as  ईसाई  100 % ( of which Roman Catholic 18.85 % , Protestant 8.15 % , Orthodox 4.96  %  , Anglican 1.26 % )  ,   मुस्लिम   22.74   %  , Hindu  13.8   %  , Buddhist  6.77  %  ,   सिखों  0.35 % , Jewish 0.22  %  , Baha'i 0.11 %  ,   अन्य   धर्मों  10.95 % , non-religious 9.66 % , atheists 2.01  %  .
(  2010 est . ) .
The  coast  Ranges of California span from Humboldt County , California south to Santa Barbara County .
The other three coastal California mountain ranges  हैं   the  Transverse  सीमाएँ  , Peninsular Ranges  और  the Klamath Mountains .
Physiographically , they are  a  section of the larger Pacific Border province  ,  which  in   फेरे  are part  of  the larger Pacific Mountain System  physiographic   प्रभाग  .
UNESCO has  शामिल  the  ``  California Coast  सीमाएँ  Biosphere Reserve  ``  in its Man and the Biosphere Programme  of  World Network of Biosphere Reserves since 1983  .

an  automobile  ,  autocar , motor car or car is  a   wheeled   मोटर  vehicle used for transporting passengers , which also carries its own engine  or   मोटर  .
सबसे  definitions of  the  term  बताएँ   कि  automobiles are  designed   to  run primarily on roads , to have seating  लिये  one to eight people , to  typically  have four wheels ,  और  to be constructed principally for  the  transport of  लोगों  rather  than  goods .
The term motorcar  रै   भी  been  प्रयुक्त  in the context of electrified  रेल  systems to denote a  car   जिससे  functions as a small locomotive  लकिन  also  provides   स्पेस  for  यात्री  and baggage .
These locomotive cars were often used on suburban routes by both interurban and  intercity  railroad systems  .
It  थी  estimated in 2010 that  the   क्रमांक  of  ऑटोमोबाइल  had risen  to  over 1 billion  वाहनों  , up from the 500 million  of  1986 .
the   संख्याएँ  are increasing rapidly , especially in  चीन  and  इण्डिया  .
जॉन  Fitzgerald ``  जोकर  ''  कैनेडी   (  May  29   ,  1917 – November  22   ,  1963  )  ,  प्रायः   referred   to  by his initials JFK  ,   थी  the 35th President  of  the United States , serving from  1961   जबतक  his death in  1963  .
After  सैन्य  service  as  commander of the Motor Torpedo  नौकाएँ  PT-109 and PT-59  दौरान  World War II in the South  प्रशांत  , Kennedy represented Massachusetts  '  11th  congressional  district in  the  U.S. House of Representatives from 1947  to  1953 as  a  Democrat .
Thereafter  ,  he  परोसा  in the U.S. Senate  इससे   1953  until 1960 .
Kennedy defeated Vice President and Republican candidate Richard Nixon  in  the 1960 U.S.  अध्यक्षीय  election .
at  43 years of age , he is the youngest to have been elected  to  the office , the  second-youngest   अध्यक्ष  ( after Theodore Roosevelt ) ,  और  the  पहला  person born  in   the  20th century to serve as president .
A Catholic  ,  Kennedy is  the  only  non-  Protestant president , and is  the   तभी   अध्यक्ष  to  have  won a Pulitzer Prize .
कार्यक्रम  during  उसके  presidency  शामिल  the Bay of  सूअर  Invasion ,  the   क्यूबन  Missile  संकट  , the building of the Berlin  वॉल  , the Space Race , the  african-american   सिविल   अधिकारों  Movement  ,  and  जल्दी  stages of  the  Vietnam War .
Therein  ,  Kennedy  increased  the number of military  advisers   ,   खास  operation forces , and helicopters  in   an  effort to curb the spread of  साम्यवादी   in   दक्षिण  East Asia .
The Kennedy  प्रशासन  adopted the policy of  the  Strategic Hamlet  कार्यक्रम  which was  implemented  by the South Vietnamese government .
It involved certain forced relocation , village internment , and segregation  of  rural South  वियतनामी  from the  उत्तरी   और  southern  कम्युनिस्ट  insurgents .
Kennedy was assassinated on  नवम्बर  22 , 1963  in  Dallas  ,  Texas .
Lee  घनघोर  Oswald was charged with  the  crime , but  he  was  शॉट   और   मारे  by Jack Ruby two  दिनों  later , before a trial  could  take place .
The FBI and the Warren Commission officially  concluded  that Oswald was the lone assassin .
however  , the United States House Select Committee  on  Assassinations ( HSCA  )  concluded that those investigations were flawed and that  कैनेडी   थी  probably assassinated  as  the result of a conspiracy .
However  ,  ABC  न्यूज  in their investigation , The  कैनेडी  Assassination :  परे  Conspiracy , confirmed the findings of the Warren Commission ; having  concluded   ओसवाल्ड   acted   अलोन  .
Kennedy 's  विवादास्पद  Department  of  Defense  tfx   सेनानी   bomber  program led  to  a Congressional investigation that lasted  इससे  1963  to  1970 .
Since the 1960s information  concerning   कैनेडी  's private  जीवन  has come  to  light .
विवरण  of Kennedy 's health problems in which he  struggled  have become better  ज्ञात   ,   विशेषकर   चूंकि  the  1990s  .
Although initially  रखा  secret  इससे  the general  पब्लिक  , reports of  कैनेडी  's  philandering   have  garnered much press .
Kennedy ranks  अत्यधिक  in public opinion ratings of U.S.  राष्ट्रपतियों  .
A Siemens MXL  आग  alarm  कंट्रोल  panel ( top  )  and graphic annunciator ( bottom ) for Potomac Hall , at James Madison  विश्वविद्यालयों  .

Manufactured by  एडवर्ड्स   ,  A UTC  f  & S Company
A  आग  Alarm  कंट्रोल  Panel (  facp  ) , or Fire Alarm Control Unit (  facu  ) , is the controlling component of  a   आग  Alarm System .
The panel  receives   सूचना   इससे  environmental  सेंसर  designed  to  detect  परिवर्तन  associated with  आग  ,  मॉनीटर  their operational  अखंडता   और  provides for  स्वचालित  control  of   उपकरण   ,   और   हस्तांतरण   of  information  जरुरी  to  तैयारी   the   सुविधा  for fire based on a predetermined sequence  .
The  फलक   may  also supply electrical energy  to  operate any  संबद्ध  sensor ,  कंट्रोल  , transmitter , or relay .
There are four  मौलिक  types of  panels  :  coded  panels  ,  conventional panels  ,  addressable panels , and multiplex systems  .

MTV 's first  दिन  on the  एयर  was  rebroadcast   on  VH1 Classic  in  2006 and  अपलोड  onto YouTube  in  2010  (  although  तभी  the first four hours were authentic ;  the  rest  यहूद  edited VH1 rebroadcasts  )  .
Bandaranaike International Airport ( BIA  )  ( also known as Katunayake International  विमानक्षेत्र  and  कोलोन   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Airport  )   is   एक  of the two international  एयरपोर्ट   सेवारत   the   नगर  of Colombo , the other is Ratmalana International Airport  .
Mattala Rajapaksa International Airport located in  दक्षिणी  city  of  Hambantota is the other international airport in Sri  लंका   .
भण्डारनायके  International  विमानक्षेत्र   is  located in Katunayake ,  22  miles ( 35 km  )  north of Colombo .
It is administered by Airport  और  Aviation Services  (   श्री  Lanka  )  Ltd .
it   is  the hub  of  SriLankan Airlines , the national carrier of Sri Lanka  ,  and  mihin  Lanka ,  the   बजट  airline  of  Sri  लंका   .
Black Swan is a 2010 American  मनोवैज्ञानिक  thriller and  हॉरर  film directed  by   डैरेन  Aronofsky and starring  नताली  Portman , Vincent Cassel  ,  and  mila   kunis   .
The plot revolves around  a  production of Tchaikovsky  's  Swan  झील   बैले  by a prestigious New York City company .
The production requires a ballerina  to  play  the  innocent and  नाजुक   श्वेत  Swan , for which  the  committed dancer Nina ( Portman ) is a perfect fit  ,  as  खूब   as  the  अंधेरा  and sensual  ब्लैक  Swan  ,  which are qualities embodied  by  the  नई   आगमन   लिली   (  Kunis ) .
नीना  is overwhelmed by  a  feeling  of  immense  दबाव  when  वो   पाता  herself  स्पर्धा   लिये   the  part , causing  उसके  to lose her tenuous  पकड़  on reality  और   descend  into a living  दुःस्वप्न   .
aronofsky  conceived the  आधार  by connecting his viewings  of  a production of  swan  Lake with  an  unrealized screenplay  परिचय   understudies  and the notion of  होने  haunted  by  a  दोगुना  , similar to the folklore surrounding doppelgängers .
aronofsky   cites   fyodor  Dostoyevsky  's  ``  the  Double  ``  as another inspiration for  the  film .
The  निदेशक  also  माना  Black Swan a companion piece to his  2008  film  the  Wrestler ,  साथ   दोनो  films involving demanding performances  लिये  different  kinds   of   आर्ट  .
he  and Portman  पहला   discussed   the  project  in  2000  ,  and after a brief  अनुलग्नक  to Universal Studios , Black  swan  was produced in New  यॉर्क  City in 2009 by  फॉक्स   searchlight  Pictures  .
Portman and Kunis trained in  बैले  for several months prior to filming ,  और  notable figures  इससे  the ballet world helped with film  उत्पादन  to shape the  बैले  presentation .
The  फिल्मी   premiered   as  the  खोलने  film for the 67th  वेनिस  International Film Festival on  सितंबर  1  ,  2010 .
It had  a  limited  रिलीज   in  the  संयुक्त  States starting December  3  , 2010 and  खोली  nationwide on December 17 .
ब्लैक   swan  received critical  तारीफ़  upon its release ,  विशेषकर  for Portman  's  performance  और   aronofsky  's direction ,  और  was a significant box  दफ्तर  success ,  grossing  $ 329 million worldwide  .
The film received five Academy Award nominations and Portman won the Best Actress award for the film ,  as  well  as  many other Best  अभिनेत्री   पुरस्कार   in  several  guilds   और   त्यौहार  , while Aronofsky was nominated for Best Director .
In addition , the  फिल्मी  itself received a nomination for  बेहतरीन   चित्र  .
The world’s  पहला  ice-calorimeter , used  in  the winter of 1782-83 , by Antoine  लाव्वाज़्ये  and Pierre-Simon Laplace , to determine the heat involved  in  various chemical  परिवर्तन  ; calculations  जिससे   यहूद   आधारित   on  Joseph Black  ’s  prior discovery of latent heat .
These experiments mark the  न्यास  of thermochemistry .
A calorimeter (  इससे  Latin calor  ,   अर्थ   ऊष्मा  )  is  an object used for  कैलोरीमिति   ,   or   the  process of  measuring  the heat  of  chemical reactions or physical changes as well as heat capacity .
Differential  स्कैनिंग  calorimeters  ,   समतापी  microcalorimeters ,  titration  calorimeters  और  accelerated rate calorimeters  हैं   among  the most common types  .
A simple calorimeter  बस  consists of a thermometer attached to  a   मेटल  container full  of  water  निलंबित  above a  दहन  chamber  .
To  ढूँढें  the  enthalpy   बदलें   प्रति  mole  of  a substance  a  in a  प्रतिक्रिया  between two substances A  और  B ,  the  substances are added to  a   ऊष्मामापी  and the initial and final temperatures ( before the reaction started and after  it  has  समाप्त  )  हैं  noted .
Multiplying  the  temperature change by the  द्रव्यमान  and  विशिष्ट  heat capacities of the substances gives  a   मान  for the  उर्जा   दिए  off or absorbed  दौरान  the reaction .
dividing   the  energy change  by  how many moles of A were present  देता  its enthalpy change of reaction  .
This method is used primarily  in  academic  शिक्षण   as  it  describes  the  सिद्धान्त  of calorimetry  .
It  करता   नहीं  account for the  ऊष्मा  loss  through  the container or  the  heat capacity of the thermometer and  संग्राहक  itself  .
In addition , the object placed inside  the  calorimeter shows that the objects transferred their  ऊष्मा  to  the   ऊष्मामापी  and into  the  liquid , and the heat absorbed by  the  calorimeter and the  द्रव   is  equal to the  ऊष्मा  given off by the metals .
A pair of green flip-flops
flip-flops  (  भी  called zōri , thongs , jandals ,  or  a  किस्में  of other names throughout the world ) are  a   प्रकार  of open-toed sandal  typically   worn   in  casual  परिस्थितियों  ,  ऐसे  as outside  or  at the  बीच  .
They consist of  a   चपटा  sole held loosely on the foot by a Y-shaped  डोरी   कि   गुजरता  between  the  first  और  second toes  और  around either side  of  the  पैर  .
They  may  also be held to  the  foot with a single strap over the front  of  the foot rather  than  a thong  .
the   नाम   ``   flip-flop  ''  originated   क्युकी   of   the  sound that is made by  slapping   between  the  एकमात्र   of  the foot and the floor  जब   चलना  .
This  स्टाइल   of  footwear has  महरूम  worn by the people  of   अनेक   संस्कृतियों  throughout the world  ,   originating  as  जल्दी  as the ancient Egyptians in  4,000  B.C  .
The modern flip-flop descends from the  जापानी   zōri  , which became popular  बाद  World War II  जब   सैनिको  returning  to  the United States brought them  वापस  .
वे  became popular in casual settings during the  1960s  , 1990s ,  और  2000s  ,   और  some varieties have even  मिला  their way into more  औपचारिक  attire , despite criticism  .
The  उपयोग  of flip-flops can  परिणाम  in many pains and  चोटों  , including ankle sprains and broken bones  .
Some individuals  जो  walk for long periods  रपट  pain in the feet , ankles  ,   और  lower legs .
The lack of  support  provided by flip-flops often results in over-pronation  चोटों  ,  caused   by  the foot  घुसते   inwards   further  than normal .
This can lead  to   चपटा  feet and  tendonitis  .
Other injuries  कि  may result are due to  the   जूते   's  open-toed nature , such  as   stubbed  toes , cuts  ,  and bruises  .
डॉक्टर  recommend purchasing pricier sandals with thick-cushioned  सोल्स  , as well as  those  that have a  डोरी   कि  is  नहीं   कैनवास   और   कि  comes back almost to the  टखने  .
The owners of Hanjin Osaka , seen  यहाँ   transiting   the  Panama  कनाल  in 2008  ,  declared  सामान्य  average following an  विस्फोट  in the  जलयान  's engine room  on  .
The  विधि  of general average  is  a legal principle of maritime  विधि  according to which all parties in a sea  venture   proportionally  share any losses resulting  इससे   a   voluntary   बलिदान  of part of  the  ship or cargo to save the whole in an emergency  .
in  the exigencies  of  hazards faced  at  sea  ,  crew  सदस्यों   प्रायः  have  अनमोल  little time  in  which to determine  precisely  whose  कार्गो  they are jettisoning  .
Thus , to avoid  quarrelling   कि  could  बर्बाद  valuable time , there arose the  निष्पक्ष  practice whereby all the  व्यापारियों  whose cargo landed safely would be  पुकारा   on   to  contribute  a   portion  ,  आधारित  upon a  share  or  प्रतिशत   ,  to the merchant or merchants  जिनकी  goods had been tossed  overboard   to  avert imminent  peril   .
While general average  traces  its origins  in  ancient  मेरीटाइम  law  ,  still it  remains  part  of   the   admiralty  law of most countries .
The first codification  of  general average  थी  the York  antwerp   नियम  of  1890  .
American companies accepted it in 1949 .
General average  requires  three  तत्व   जिससे  are clearly stated by Mr. Justice Grier in Barnard v. Adams:
``  1st .
A common danger  :  a danger  in  which vessel  ,  cargo and crew all participate ;  a  danger imminent and apparently 'inevitable ,  '  except by voluntarily incurring the loss of a portion  of  the whole to  सहेजें  the  शेष   .  ''
`` 2nd  .  There must  be  a voluntary jettison  ,  jactus  ,  or  ढलाई  away  ,   of  some  portion   of  the joint  चिंता  for the purpose of  बचने   इस  imminent peril , periculi  imminentis  evitandi  causa  ,  or   ,  in other words , a transfer of the  peril  from  the   पूरे  to a particular portion  of  the  पूरे  . ''
``  3rd  .
This attempt  to  avoid the imminent  आम  peril  जरूर  be successful  ''   .
Example  पॉलिश   कॉल   लिये  vaccination against  डिप्थीरिया   और  Tetanus .
A vaccination schedule is a series of  vaccinations   ,  including  the  timing  of  all doses , which may  be   either  recommended  or  compulsory ,  depending  on the country  of  residence  .
A  टीका  is an  antigenic  preparation used to  उपज   क्रियाशील  immunity to a  बीमारी  , in order to prevent or reduce the effects of  संक्रमण  by any  प्राकृतिक  or  ``  wild '' pathogen .
Many vaccines require multiple doses for maximum  प्रभावकारिता  , either to  उपज   sufficient  initial immune response or to boost  जवाब  that  fades   over  time  .
लिये   उदाहरण  , tetanus  टीका  boosters  हैं  often recommended every 10 years .
Vaccine  schedules   हैं  developed by governmental agencies or  physicians  groups to achieve maximum  प्रभावकारिता   using   जरूरी   और  recommended vaccines for a  मोहल्ले   जबकि  minimizing the number of health care system  interactions  .
over  the  पास्ट  two  दशकों  , the recommended vaccination  अनुसूची  has grown rapidly and become  अधिक   जटिल  as many new  टीके   have   महरूम   विकसित  .
कुछ  vaccines are  अनुशंसित   तभी  in certain areas ( countries , subnational  क्षेत्रों  ,  or  at-risk populations  )   जहाँ  a disease is common .
For instance ,  पीला  fever vaccination  is  on the routine vaccine  अनुसूची  of  फ्रेंच  Guiana ,  is  recommended in  निश्चित  regions  of  Brazil but in  the  United States is only given to  travelers  heading to  देशों   साथ   a   इतिहास  of the disease .
In developing countries , vaccine  सुझाव   भी  take into account the level of health care access  ,  the cost of  टीके  and issues with vaccine availability and  भंडार  .
Sample  vaccinations  schedules discussed by the World Health  संगठन   दिखाएँ  a developed  देश  using a  अनुसूची  which  extends  over the first five years of  a  child 's  जीवन   और   उपयोग  vaccines which cost over  $   700  including administration costs while  a   विकासशील  country uses a schedule providing vaccines in  the  first 9 months of life and costing only $ 25 .
This difference  is   due   to  the lower cost of  स्वास्थ्य  care , the lower  लागत   of  many vaccines provided  to   विकासशील  nations , and that  अधिक  expensive vaccines  ,  often for less common diseases , are not utilized .
In  1900  ,  the   smallpox  vaccine was the only one  administered  to  children  .
By the early 1950s ,  children   routinely  received  चार  vaccines , for protection against ( diphtheria , pertussis , tetanus ,  पोलियो  , and smallpox ) , and as many as five  गोलियाँ   by  two  सालो  of age .
Since the mid-1980s , many  टीके  have been added to the schedule .
, the US Centers for Disease  कंट्रोल  and  रोकथाम  (  सीडीसी   )   अभी  recommends vaccination against at least fourteen diseases .
By two years of  आयु   ,  U.S. children receive as many as  24  vaccine  injections   ,   और  might receive up to  पाँच  shots  दौरान  one visit to the doctor .
The use of combination vaccine products means  कि   ,   ,  the United Kingdom 's  immunization  program  consists  of 10 injections  by   the  age  of  two  ,  rather than 25 if vaccination for each  बीमारी  was given  as  a separate injection .
दो  revellers dance in the  गलियों  .
the  form of dancing  is  called `` wining '' ( winding )  सुनाया  wine-ing
a  Music Truck entertains the crowd on the streets .
Trucks  हैं  an  अभिन्न  part of the street  परेड  ,  featuring   सजीव  performances  or   deejays
the   त्रिनिदाद   और   टोबैगो  Carnival  is  an  सालाना   इवेंट  held  on   the   सोमवार  and Tuesday before Ash  बुधवार   ,  and  is   खूब  known for participant 's colorful costumes and  समृद्ध   जश्न  .
Carnival in Trinidad and Tobago  is   the   सबसे  significant event on the  आइलैंड्स  ' cultural and  पर्यटन  calendar  ,  with numerous cultural  कार्यक्रम  running in the lead up  to  the street  परेड  on Carnival  सोमवार  and Tuesday  .
it  is said that if the islanders  हैं  not celebrating  it  , then they are  तैयारी  for it ,  जबकि   reminiscing   परिचय  the past year  's  festival .
The  दिल  of the musical celebration  रै  been calypso ; recently soca has  replaced  calypso as  the   सबसे  celebrated  प्रकार  of music  .
Costumes  ,   stickfighting  and limbo  प्रतियोगिताओं  are also important components of the  पर्व  .
Carnival  as  it is  मनाये   in  Trinidad and Tobago is also celebrated  in  cities  विश्वव्यापी  .
These  सहित  Toronto 's  caribana   ,  Miami  's  Miami Carnival  ,  Houston Carifest ,  लंदन  's Notting Hill Carnival as well as New York City  's  Labor Day  कार्निवल  to name  a  few .
Carnival was created when West African slaves mimicked  उनके   फ्रेंच  owners  जो  where  ज्ञात  for their lavish costumes balls .
हराम   to  partake in  ये  festivities and confined to  उनके  quarters ,  स्लेव  combined elements from their  अपना  cultures  to  their master 's  fete  .
Hence the  सृष्टि   of  characters such as Jab Jab or Jab Molassie  (  Devils ) , Midnight Robbers  ,  Imps ,  lagahroo   ,  Soucouyant , La Diablesse and Demons  .
साथ   the   abolition  of slavery  in   1838  ,  freed  Africans took their  संस्करण  of Carnival to the streets through  अभिव्यक्ति  of drums  ,  riddim sections  जैसे  tamboo  बाँसुरी   और   as  each  नई  immigrant population entered Trinidad , Carnival  विकसित  into  कया  we know today .
The  नगर   of   शिकागो  ,  इलिनोइस  held a nonpartisan mayoral election  on  Tuesday , February 22 ,  2011  .
Incumbent  महापौर  Richard  M.  Daley ,  a  member of the  लोकतांत्रिक  Party who had been  in   दफ्तर  since 1989  ,  did not seek a seventh term  as  mayor .
Candidates  needed  to collect  12,500  petition signatures by November  22  , 2010 to  qualify  for a place on the  बैलट  .
April 5 , 2011 was scheduled  to  be a runoff election date if no candidate  प्राप्त   an  absolute  बहुमत  .
rahm   emanuel  won the race for  महापौर  with more than  55  % of  the  vote  .
He  थी  inaugurated on May  16  , 2011 .
`` Pumped Up  kicks   ''  is a  सोंग  by American indie  पॉप  band  फोस्टर   the  People .
It was  released   as  the group  's   डेब्यू  single in  सितंबर   2010  ,  और  the following  साल  was included on their  ep  Foster  the  People and  उनके   डेब्यू  album Torches .
``  Pumped Up Kicks '' became the group 's  भेदन  hit and was one of the  सबसे  popular songs  of  2011 .
the  song was written and recorded by frontman  चिह्नित  Foster while he  थी   working  as  a  commercial  झंकार  writer .
Contrasting  साथ  the upbeat  musical  composition , the lyrics describe the homicidal thoughts  of  a troubled youth .
The track received  considerable  attention after  it  was posted  ऑनलाइन   in  2010 as a free download  ,   और  it helped the  समूह  garner a multi-album  रिकार्ड  deal  साथ  Columbia Records imprint Startime International  .
``  उत्तेजित  Up Kicks '' proved to be  a  sleeper hit ; in 2011  ,  after  receiving  significant airplay on modern rock stations  ,  the song  crossed-over   onto   समकालीन  hit  रेडियो  stations .
The song spent  आठ  consecutive weeks at number three on the Billboard  hot   100  chart  in  the  संयुक्त  States  ,  making it the first  बिलबोर्ड  Alternative Songs number-one single to  क्रैक  the  u.S.  top  5   चूंकि  Kings  of   लिओन  's ``  उपयोग  Somebody  ``   in  2009 .
The  सोंग  was widely praised  by   आलोचकों  , and it has been  licensed   लिये  use in a wide range of popular media since its release .
``  उत्तेजित   up   kicks  '' received a  ग्रैमी  Award nomination for Best  पॉप  Duo/Group Performance .
the  State Fair of West  वर्जिनिया  is an annual state fair for West  वर्जिनिया   .
It is held annually in mid-August  on  the State  fairgrounds  in Fairlea , near Lewisburg , West Virginia in the southeastern part of  the  state .
The  राज्य  Fairgrounds consists  of  a large  खोलें  field  लिये  carnivals  और  exhibitions  ,  a horse track , grandstands  ,  and  अनेक   प्रदर्शनी  buildings .
Free parking  is   provided   सटा   to   the  fairgrounds and  ,  until 2006 , free camping  थी   भी  available in  a  large field  साथ  running-water  toilets   और   बौछार  , but  no  hookups .
Campers are  अभी  charged a small fee .
