Under the United States Constitution  ,  the  अध्यक्ष  of the  संयुक्त  States is the  सिर  of  राज्य  and head of government of the United States  .
As  मुख्य  of  the  executive branch and  सिर  of the  संघीय   सरकारी  as  a  whole  ,  the  प्रेसिडेंसी   is  the  उच्चतम  political  दफ्तर  in the United States by influence  और  recognition .
the   अध्यक्ष  is also the commander-in-chief of  the  United States  हथियारबंद  Forces  .
the   अध्यक्ष   is   indirectly  elected  to  a four-year  पद   by  an Electoral College ( or by  the  House of Representatives  चाहिए  the  चुनावी   कॉलेज  fail to award an  निरपेक्ष  majority  of   मत   to  any person ) .
Since  the   अनुसमर्थन   of  the Twenty-second  amendment  to  the   संयुक्त  States Constitution in 1951 , no person  may   be   निर्वाचित  President more  than  twice  ,  and  no   एक   जो   रै   परोसा   अधिक  than two  सालो   of   a  term to which someone  else   थी   निर्वाचित  may be  निर्वाचित  more  than  once .
Upon the death , resignation ,  or  removal from office  of   an  incumbent President , the Vice President assumes the office  .
The President  जरूर  be  at  least 35  सालो  of age and  a  `` natural born  ''   नागरिक  of  the  United States .
इस  list includes  तभी  those persons  जो  were sworn into  दफ्तर  as  अध्यक्ष   following   the  ratification of the  संयुक्त  States Constitution ,  जिससे   took  effect on  कूच  4  ,  1789 .
For American leaders  पहले  this  अनुसमर्थन  , see President of the  महाद्वीपीय  Congress .
The list  करता   नहीं  include  कोई  Acting Presidents under the Twenty-fifth Amendment  to  the  संयुक्त  States Constitution .
There  have  been 43 people  sworn   into  office , and  44  presidencies , as Grover Cleveland served  दो   non-consecutive  terms and  is   गिने  chronologically as  दोनो  the 22nd and  24th   अध्यक्ष  .
Of the individuals elected as  अध्यक्ष  , four died in office of  प्राकृतिक   कल्याणकारी  ( William Henry Harrison , Zachary Taylor , Warren G. Harding , and Franklin D.  रूज़वेल्ट  ) , four were  assassinated   (  Abraham  lincoln   ,  James A. Garfield  ,  William  mckinley   ,  and John F. Kennedy ) and one resigned (  रिचर्ड  Nixon ) .
George Washington , the first president , was inaugurated in 1789 after a unanimous vote  of  the Electoral College  .
William Henry Harrison spent the shortest time in office with 32  दिनों  in 1841 , and Franklin D. Roosevelt  खर्च  the longest with  over   बारह   सालो  , but  died   shortly  into his  चौथी  term in  1945  .
He  is   the  only president to serve  अधिक  than two  शर्तें  ,  और  a constitutional amendment  ,   affecting  presidents after  हैरी  Truman ,  थी  passed to limit the number  of  times  an   व्यक्तिगत  can be  निर्वाचित   अध्यक्ष  .
Andrew Jackson  ,  the seventh president , was the first to be elected  by  men of all classes in 1828 after most laws barring non-land-owners  इससे  voting  यहूद  repealed .
Warren Harding was the first  निर्वाचित  after women gained  मतदान  rights in 1920 .
History records four presidents – John Q Adams  ,  Rutherford B. Hayes , Benjamin Harrison and George W. Bush  –   जो  lost the popular vote  लकिन   assumed  office .
John F.  कैनेडी   रै   महरूम   the  only president  of  Roman Catholic faith ,  और  the current  अध्यक्ष  , Barack Obama  ,  is  the  first  अध्यक्ष  of African  descent  .
`` Lombardi Trophy  ''  redirects  यहाँ  .
लिये  the award  awarded  annually to the best college football lineman or linebacker  ,   देखिए   लोम्बार्डी  Award  .
The Vince Lombardi Trophy  is   the  trophy awarded each  साल   to  the winning team of the National Football League 's championship game , the Super Bowl  .
The  ट्रॉफी  is  नामित  in  सम्मान   of  legendary NFL coach Vince  लोम्बार्डी  .
This is  a   सूची  of tables of the verified  oldest  people in the world  in  ordinal rank  ,  such as  oldest  person or oldest man .
In these tables  ,  a supercentenarian is considered 'verified ' if his  or   उसके  claim  रै   महरूम   validated   by   an  international body that  specifically  deals in longevity research ,  ऐसे  as the  जराविद्या  Research Group (  grg  ) or Guinness World  रिकॉर्ड  .
the   longest   unambiguously  documented human  जीवनकाल   is  that  of  Jeanne Calment of  फ़्रांस   (   1875–1997   )  , who  died  at age  122  years  ,   164  days .
She  मिले  Vincent van Gogh when she was 12 or  13  .
This  led   to  news  मीडिया   ध्यान  in  1985  , after Calment turned  110   .
Subsequent  छानबीन   मिला  documentation for Calment  's  age , beyond any  उचित   सवाल   ,   in   the   रिकॉर्ड  of her native  नगर  ,  arles   ,   फ़्रांस  .
अधिक  evidence  of  Calment 's lifespan has  महरूम  produced than  लिये  any  अन्य  supercentenarian ; her  मामला  serves as an archetype in the methodology for verifying  the  ages  of  the world  's  oldest  लोगों  .
The longest undisputed lifespan for  पुरूष  supercentenarians is that of Jiroemon Kimura  ,  who  फिलहाल  lives  in  Japan and is  आयु   as  of  .
Since  the   मौत  of 115-year old Dina Manfredini of the United  राज्य  ,  on   17  December 2012 ,  किमुरा  ,  born   19   अप्रैल  1897 ,  is  the oldest  जीना  person  in  the  संसार   जिनकी  age  can   be  documented .
He  रै   भी   महरूम   the  oldest living man since  the  death of  114-year   बूढ़ा   वाल्टर  Breuning on 14  अप्रैल   2011  .
Since the death  of  115-year old Koto Okubo of Japan on 12  जनवरी  2013 , the  oldest  living woman has been -year-old  misao  Okawa  ,   भी  from Japan  ,  born  on   5  March 1898 .
the  People 's Court  is  an American arbitration-based reality court  दिखाएँ  ,  फिलहाल  presided over  by  retired Florida State  सर्किट   अदालत  Judge Marilyn Milian , in  जिससे   छोटी   दावा  disputes are handled .
The People 's  अदालत  is the first court show to use binding arbitration ,  introducing  the  स्वरूप  into the  विधा  in 1981 .
The system  रै  been duplicated  by   सबसे  of  the  show 's  successors  in the judicial  विधा  .
Moreover , The  लोगों  's  अदालत  is the first popular , long-running  वास्तविकता   in  the judicial genre .
It was preceded only by  a  few short-lived  हकीकत  in  the  genre  ;  these  short-lived  predecessors  यहूद  only  loosely  related to judicial  कार्यवाही  , except for  एक  : Parole  (  1959 ) took footage from real-life courtrooms holding legal  कार्यवाही  .
prior  to  the   लोगों   's   अदालत  , the vast  बहुमत  of TV  courtroom  shows  प्रयुक्त  actors ,  और  recreated or fictional cases (  as   किया  radio before  कि  )  .
among   उदाहरण  of these  प्रकार  of court shows  शामिल  Famous Jury  ट्रायल  and  अपना   गवाह  .
the  People 's Court has  था  two contrasting  जीवनदान  .
The show 's first life was  presided  over  solely   by  former Los Angeles County  श्रेष्ठ  Court Judge Joseph Wapner .
उसके   कार्यकाल  lasted from the show  's  debut on September 14 , 1981 , until May  21  , 1993  ,  when the show was  रद्द   due  to  कम   दरजा  .
This left  the   दिखाएँ   साथ   a   कुल  of 2,484 1⁄2-hour episodes  और   12  seasons  .
the  show  थी  taped in Los  एंजिल्स  during its first  जीवन  .
After  होने   रद्द   ,  reruns aired  जबतक  September  9  , 1994 .
On September 8 , 1997  ,  after being out  of  production  लिये  four  सालो  ,  the  People 's  अदालत   थी  revived for a  दूसरी   जीवन  in first-run syndication as a 60-minute program  .
Former lawyer and  महापौर  of New York  ed  Koch was chosen as arbiter  ,  which he maintained for 2 seasons from the 1997–98 season  through  the 1998–99 season  (   the  present life  's  2nd  ऋतु   और  overall show 's 14th ) .
by   the   1999–00   ऋतु  , husband of Judith Sheindlin ( who presides  over  Judge  जुडी  ) and  पूर्व   नई   यॉर्क   राज्य  Supreme  अदालत   न्यायधीश  Jerry  sheindlin  succeeded Koch .
Sheindlin lasted one and  a   हाफ  seasons  as   he  was replaced towards the  समाप्त  of the 2000–01 season (  उपस्थित  life 's 4th season and overall show 's  17th  )  .
Beginning in spring  2001   ,  Florida judge  मर्लिन  Milian took over  the   लोगों  's Court and  रै  presided over the  दिखाएँ  ever  चूंकि  .
एकबार  Milian completes the 2012–13  ऋतु  ,  वो   होगा  have served as  longest   arbiter   over   the  series with 12 and  a   हाफ   सीज़न  .
As of  the  present , however , her years  on  the program tie  wapner  at 12  सीज़न   .
In the  2009-10   टेलीविज़न  season  ,  The  लोगों   's  Courts 2nd/present life  outlasted  its  पहला   जब   it   पहुँचे  13 seasons .
While  the  show  taped  in New  यॉर्क  City for the  पहला  15 seasons of its second life , it  अभी  tapes  in  Stamford  ,  Connecticut as of the 2012-13 season  .
On September 3 ,  2012  ,  the  People  's   अदालत  's  2nd/present  life entered its 16th season  (  28th overall season ) .
With 28 total seasons ,  the  People 's  अदालत  ranks as the  2nd  longest-running courtroom  कार्यक्रम  behind the ongoing Divorce Court at 33  सीज़न  ( from its 3 combined lives ) .
Utah  (   or  )  (  Arapaho  :  Wo'tééneihí ' ) is a state in the  पश्चिमी  United States .
it   became  the 45th  राज्य  admitted to  the   संघ   on   जनवरी   4   ,   1896  .
Utah is  the  13th-largest  ,   the  34th-most  populous   ,   और  the  10th-least-densely   आबादी  of the 50 United States .
Approximately  80  % of Utah 's 2,817,222 people live along the Wasatch  सामने  , centering  on  Salt Lake City , leaving vast expanses  of  the state nearly uninhabited and  बनाना  the  जनसांख्यिकी  the sixth most urbanized in the U.S. Utah is bordered  by  Colorado on the east  ,  Wyoming  on  the  पूर्वोत्तर  ,  idaho   on  the north , Arizona on  the  south , and Nevada on  the   वेस्ट  .
It also  छू  a corner of New Mexico on  the  southeast .
Utah is the most religiously homogeneous  राज्य  in the Union .
लगभग  63 % of Utahns are reported to be members  of  The Church  of  Jesus Christ of Latter-day  संतो  or LDS  (  Mormons ) ,  जिससे  greatly  प्रभाव   यूटा  culture and daily life  .
the  world headquarters of The Church of  यीशु  Christ of Latter-day Saints ( LDS Church ) is located in  यूटा   's  state capital  .
the   राज्य  is a center of transportation ,  शिक्षा   ,   सूचना  technology  और   शोध  , government  सेवाएं  , mining ,  और  a  प्रमुख  tourist destination  लिये   बाहरी   मनोरंजन  .
According to  the   u.S.   जनसांख्यिकी   ब्यूरो   's   जनसांख्यिकी  estimates , Utah is the  पांचवां  fastest-growing state  in   the  United States as of 2012 .
St. George ,  थी   the   fastest–growing  metropolitan  क्षेत्रफल  in  the  United States from 2000  to  2005  .
A 2012  gallup   नेशनल  survey found Utah  overall   to   be  the ``  बेहतरीन  state to  सजीव  in ''  आधारित  on 13 forward-looking measurements including various  आर्थिक  , lifestyle  ,  and health-related outlook  मेट्रिक्स  .
coldwater  is a small  कस्बा  in  टेट  County  ,  Mississippi .
it   is   in   the   मेम्फिस  Metropolitan Area  .
The population  थी   1,674  at the 2000 census .
the  hard palate is a thin  आड़ा   बोनी   थाली  of  the   कपाल  , located  in  the roof of  the  mouth  .
It spans the arch  formed  by  the  upper  दांत  .
It is  formed  by the palatine  प्रक्रम  of  the  maxilla and horizontal plate of palatine  अस्थि   .
It forms  a   विभाजन  between the  nasal  passages  और   the   मुँह  .
भी   on   the  anterior portion of the roof  of  the  मुश्किल   तालु   is  the  rugae  which  हैं  the irregular ridges in  the  mucous  झिल्ली  that help facilitate the movement of  खाना   पीछे  towards the  pharynx  .
This partition is  जारी   deeper   into   the  mouth  by  a fleshy extension called the  नरम  palate  .
Complete set of  scrolls   ,  constituting  the  entire Tanakh  .
The Tanakh (  ,   or  ;  भी  Tenakh  ,   tenak   ,   tanach  ) is a name used in Judaism for  the   canon  of  the  Hebrew Bible .
The Tanakh is  भी  known as the  masoretic  Text or the Miqra .
The name is  an  acronym formed from the  आरंभिक  Hebrew letters  of  the Masoretic  टेक्स्ट  's three traditional subdivisions :  the   तोरा   (  ``  शिक्षण   ''  , also known  as  the Five Books of  मूसा  ) , Nevi'im ( `` Prophets ''  )  and Ketuvim ( `` Writings '' )  —hence  TaNaKh .
the  name `` Miqra  ''   (   מקרא  )  ,  meaning `` that which is read  ''  ,  is  an alternative Hebrew  पद  for the Tanakh .
The  किताबे  of the  tanakh  were relayed with an accompanying oral tradition passed on  by  each generation , called the Oral Torah  .
Sobriety checkpoint  in   जर्मनी
Driving  अंतर्गत   the  influence  (  DUI  )   ,  driving  जबकि  intoxicated ( DWI ) , drunken driving , drunk  ड्राइविंग  , drink driving ,  ऑपरेटिंग  under the influence ,  पीने  and driving , or impaired  ड्राइविंग  is the  अपराधों   of  driving a motor vehicle with blood levels  of  alcohol in excess  of  a legal limit  (   ``  Blood Alcohol Content ''  ,  or  ``  BAC  ''   )   .
Similar  regulations  cover driving or operating certain types of machinery while affected  by  drinking alcohol or taking  अन्य  drugs  ,   सहित  , but not limited to  नुस्खा  drugs .
इस   is  a criminal offense in most nations .
Convictions  do  not  necessarily  involve actual driving  of   the  vehicle  .
In  सबसे  jurisdictions  a  measurement  ऐसे   as  a  रक्त  alcohol  सामग्री   (  BAC ) in excess of  a   विशिष्ट  threshold  स्तर   ,  such as 0.05 % or  0.08  % defines the offense  ,  with  no  need to prove impairment or being  अंतर्गत  the influence of  दारू   .
In  कुछ  jurisdictions , there is an aggravated category  of  the offense at a  उच्चतर   स्तर  e.g . 0.12 % .
In most countries , anyone who  is  convicted  of   injuring   or  killing someone while  अंतर्गत  the influence of alcohol  or  drugs  can   be   heavily  fined , as in France  ,  in addition to being given a  lengthy  prison sentence .
Some jobs have their  अपना  rules and BAC  हद   ,  for  उदाहरण  commercial  पायलट  , and  the  Federal  रेलरोड  Administration in  the   संयुक्त   राज्य   रै  a 0.04 % limit  लिये   ट्रैन  crew .
Some jurisdictions have multiple levels  of  BAC  ;   लिये   उदाहरण   ,  the state of California has a 0.08  %  BAC limit , which is lowered  to   0.04  % if the operator holds a  वाणिज्यिक  driver 's license  .
the   कैलिफ़ोर्निया  BAC  सीमा  is 0.01 %  लिये   those   younger  than  21  years  of  age and  those   on  probation  लिये  a  पिछला   dui  conviction  .
कुछ   विशाल  corporations have  उनके   अपना   नियम  ; Union  प्रशांत   रेलरोड   रै  their own BAC  सीमा  of 0.02 % that , if violated during a random test or a for-cause  परीक्षण  — for example , after a traffic accident — can  परिणाम   in   termination  of employment with no chance  of   भविष्य  re-hire .
अनेक  states in  the  U.S. and  प्रांतों  in Canada  have  adopted  सच्चाई  in sentencing laws that enforce strict guidelines  on  sentencing ,  differing  from  पिछला  practice where prison  समय  was reduced or suspended after  sentencing   था  been issued  .
Some jurisdictions have judicial guidelines requiring  a  mandatory  न्यूनतम  sentence  .
दंड   लिये  DUI charges range from expensive fees  to   forfetiruree   of  your license plates  और  in some serious  हालातों   ,  your vehicle .
a   नशे  driving  सिम्युलेटर  in Montréal , Canada
the  specific criminal offense may  be  called , depending  on   the  jurisdiction , driving under the influence  [  of alcohol or  अन्य  drugs ] (  dui  ) ,  ड्राइविंग  under intense  influence  ( DUII ) , driving  जबकि   intoxicated  ( DWI ) ,  ऑपरेटिंग  under the influence ( OUI ) operating  जबकि  intoxicated ( OWI ) , operating  a  motor vehicle while  intoxicated   (   omvi   )   ,   ड्राइविंग  under the combined influence  of   दारू   and/or  other  दवाएँ  , driving  अंतर्गत   the  influence per  se  or drunk  in  charge [ of a vehicle ] .
Many  ऐसे   कानून   लागू   भी   to   motorcycling   ,  boating , piloting aircraft , use of  motile  farm equipment such  as   tractors   और  combines , riding  घोड़े  or driving  a  horse-drawn vehicle  ,  or  bicycling  ,  संभवतः  with different  bac  level than  ड्राइविंग  .
in  some jurisdictions there  हैं  separate charges depending on  the  vehicle used  ,  such  as  BWI ( bicycling while intoxicated ) , which  may  carry  a  lighter sentence .
In the United States , local  विधि   प्रवर्तन  agencies made 1,467,300 arrests nationwide for  ड्राइविंग   अंतर्गत  the influence of  दारू  in 1996 ,  compared   to  1.9 million such  रखवाले   दौरान  the peak year  in  1983 .
in  1997 an estimated 513,200  dwi  offenders were  in  prison or jail , down from 593,000 in 1990 and  up  from 270,100 in 1986 .
अधिकारियों  from  us  Customs and Border Protection  बोर्डिंग  a  जलयान
Law  प्रवर्तन   in  the  संयुक्त  States is one  of  three  प्रमुख   components   of  the  दण्ड   इंसाफ  system  of   the  United  राज्य  , along with  न्यायालयों  and corrections  .
Although  वहीँ  exists  an  inherent  interrelatedness  between  the   अलग  groups  कि  make up the  दण्ड   इंसाफ   प्रणाली   आधारित   on   उनके  crime  deterrence  purpose , each component operates independently from one another .
However  ,   the   न्यायपालिका   is  vested with  the  power  to  make legal determinations regarding the  conduct  of the other two components .
अलावा  from maintaining order  और  service functions , the purpose of policing is  the  investigation of suspected criminal  कार्यकलाप   और   the  referral  of  the results of  investigations  and of suspected criminals to the  न्यायालयों  .
Law enforcement , to varying degrees at  अलग   स्तर  of government  और  in  अलग   एजेंसियों  , is also  commonly  charged with the  जिम्मेदारियों  of deterring criminal activity  और  of  preventing  the successful commission  of  crimes in progress ;  the  service  और  enforcement  of   वारंट  ,  writs  and  अन्य  orders of  the   न्यायालयों  .
Law enforcement agencies are also involved in  providing  first response  to  emergencies  और  other threats to public safety ; the protection of certain public  सुविधाएं   और  infrastructure ; the  मेंटेनेंस  of  पब्लिक  order ; the  सुरक्षा  of public officials ; and the operation of some  correctional   सुविधाएं  (  प्रायः  at the  लोकल  level  )  .
Elmer Figueroa Arce  (  born June 28 ,  1968   )  , best known under  the  stage name Chayanne , is a  प्यूर्टो   rican  Latin pop singer and actor .
as   a  solo artist , Chayanne has released  21   सोलो   एल्बम  and sold  over   15  million albums worldwide  .
``  World War  हल्क  '' is a comic  किताब  crossover  कथानक  that ran  through   a   स्वः   titled  limited  श्रेणी  and various other titles published by  आश्चर्य  Comics  in  2007  ,  featuring  the  Hulk  .
The series consists  of  five main issues titled World War  हल्क  , with Greg Pak as writer and John Romita  ,   jr.  as penciller , and three other limited series : World War Hulk : Front  लकीर  , World  युद्ध  Hulk  :  Gamma  corps   ,   और  World War Hulk  :  X-Men  .
it  also ran through  अनेक  other Marvel  कॉमिक्स  series .
The  प्लाट  is the culmination of a series  of   कार्यक्रम  that began with the Hulk  होने  tricked into space by  the  Illuminati and  a  life model decoy of Nick  फ़्यूरी   ,   the   हल्क  's subsequent  निर्वासन  seen in Planet Hulk and  उसके  imminent return  to  Earth to seek revenge on the Illuminati .
Marion  मिशेल  Morrison  (  born  marion   रॉबर्ट   मॉरिसन  ; May  26  , 1907  –  June 11  ,  1979  )  , better known by  उसके   स्टेज   नाम   जॉन  Wayne ,  थी   an  American film  कर्ता  , director and  निर्माता  .
an  Academy  पुरस्कार  -winner , Wayne  थी  among the top box  दफ्तर  draws for three decades ,  और  was named  the  all-time  शीर्ष  money-making star  .
an  enduring American icon , he epitomized  खुरदरा  masculinity and is  प्रसिद्ध  for his demeanor , including  उसके  distinctive calm  आवाज़  ,  चलना  , and  ऊँचाई   .
Wayne was  born  in  winterset  ,  आयोवा  but his family relocated to the greater Los Angeles area when he  थी  four  सालो   बूढ़ा  .
He found work  at  local film studios when he  खोया   उसके   फ़ुटबॉल   स्कॉलरशिप  to USC as  a  result of  a   bodysurfing   दुर्घटना  .
initially  working  लिये   the  Fox  फिल्मी  Corporation ,  he  mostly appeared  in  small  बिट   भाग  .
His first  अग्रणी  role  आए   in  the widescreen  एपिक  The Big Trail ( 1930  )  ,  जिससे  led  to  leading  भूमिकाएँ   in   numerous  films throughout the  1930s  , many of them  in  the western genre .
His  करियर  rose  to  further heights in 1939 , with  जॉन  Ford  's   stagecoach   बनाना  him an instant  superstar  .
वेन  would go on  to  star in 142  तस्वीरें  ,  primarily  typecast in Western  films  .
Among his best known later films are  the  Quiet  man  ( 1952 ) ,  जिससे   फ़ॉलो   उसे  as an Irish-American  boxer  and his  प्रेम  affair with a  fiery  spinster  निभाई  by Maureen O'Hara ; The Searchers ( 1956 ) , in which he plays a Civil  युद्ध  veteran who  seeks  out his abducted  भांजी  ; Rio  ब्रावो  (  1959  ) ,  playing  a Sheriff  साथ   डीन   मार्टिन   ;   सच्चा  Grit (  1969  ) ,  playing  a humorous U.S  .   मार्शल  who sets  आउट  to  avenge  a man  's  death in  the  role that won Wayne an Academy  पुरस्कार   ;  and The Shootist ( 1976 ) , his final screen performance in which he plays an aging  gunslinger  battling cancer .
वेन   स्थानांतरित  to Orange County , California in the  1960s   ,   और   थी  a prominent Republican in Hollywood , supporting anti-communist positions  .
he   died  of stomach  कर्कट   in  1979 .
in  June 1999 , the American  फिल्मी  Institute named Wayne 13th  among  the Greatest  पुरूष  Screen Legends of All  समय   .
Galileo  गैलिली   (   ;  15 February 1564  –   8   जनवरी  1642 ) ,  थी  an Italian physicist  ,  mathematician ,  astronomer  , and philosopher who played  a   प्रमुख  role  in   the  Scientific  क्रान्ति   .
His achievements include improvements  to  the  दूरदर्शी  and consequent astronomical observations and support  लिये  Copernicanism .
गैलीलियो  has been called the ``  पिता  of modern observational astronomy  ``  , the `` father  of  modern  भौतिकी  ``  ,  the  ``   पिता  of science ''  ,   और   ``   the   पिता  of  आधुनिक   विज्ञान   ''   .
His  योगदान  to observational astronomy include  the   telescopic  confirmation of the phases  of  Venus  ,  the discovery of the four largest  satellites  of Jupiter ( named the Galilean moons in his honour  )  , and the observation and analysis of sunspots .
गैलीलियो  also  worked  in  लागू   विज्ञान  and  प्रौद्योगिकी  , inventing  an  improved military compass and other  यंत्र   .
गैलीलियो   's   championing  of heliocentrism  थी   विवादास्पद  within his lifetime , when most subscribed  to   either   geocentrism  or the Tychonic  प्रणाली  .
he  met with opposition from  खगोलशास्त्रियों  , who doubted  heliocentrism  due to the absence  of  an observed stellar parallax .
The matter was investigated by the Roman Inquisition in  1615  ,  और  they concluded  कि  it  could  be supported as  तभी  a possibility , not an established fact .
Galileo later  defended   उसके  views in Dialogue  concerning   the   दो  Chief World Systems  ,  which  appeared  to attack  पोप  Urban  viii  and thus alienated him and the Jesuits ,  जो  had both supported Galileo up until  इस  point .
He was tried by the  inquisition  , found  ``  vehemently suspect of heresy '' , forced  to  recant , and spent the rest of his life under  हाउस   गिरफ़्तार  .
It  थी  while Galileo was under house  गिरफ़्तार  that he wrote one of  उसके  finest works , Two New Sciences ,  in  which he summarised the work he had  किया  some  चालीस  years earlier ,  on  the two sciences now called  kinematics  and strength of materials .

प्रोटोटाइप   oled  lighting  फलक  developed  by  Lumiotec
demonstration  of a flexible OLED device
An OLED  (  organic light-emitting diode  )   is  a light-emitting  डायोड  (  led   )  in which  the  emissive electroluminescent layer is a film  of   सशुल्क  compound which emits light in  जवाब   to  an electric current .
This layer  of  organic  सेमीकंडक्टर  is situated between two  electrodes  .
Generally , at least  एक  of these electrodes is transparent .
OLEDs are used  to  create  डिजिटल  displays in devices such  as   टेलीविज़न  screens , computer  मॉनीटर  , portable  प्रणालियों   ऐसे  as mobile phones  ,  handheld games  consoles   और   गुस्से  .
A major  क्षेत्रफल  of research is  the  development of white OLED  डिवाइस   लिये   उपयोग  in solid-state lighting applications  .
वहीँ   हैं  two main families of OLEDs : those based  on  small  अणुओं  and  those  employing polymers  .
Adding mobile ions to an  oled   creates  a light-emitting electrochemical  कोशिका   or  LEC , which has a slightly different  विधि  of operation .
OLED  प्रदर्शक  can use either  passive-matrix  ( PMOLED ) or active-matrix addressing schemes .
Active-matrix OLEDs (  amoled   )   आवश्यकता   a   thin-film   ट्रांजिस्टर  backplane to switch each individual  पिक्सेल  on or off  ,  but allow for higher resolution  और  larger  प्रदर्शक  sizes  .
An  oled   प्रदर्शक  works without a backlight  .
Thus , it  can  display  गहन  black levels and  can  be thinner and lighter than a liquid  क्रिस्टल  display ( LCD ) .
In low ambient light conditions such as a dark room  an  OLED  स्क्रीन  can achieve a  उच्चतर  contrast  अनुपात   than  an LCD ,  whether  the LCD uses  ठंडा   कैथोड  fluorescent lamps  or   led  backlight .
a  carton and a  कांच  of eggnog from  मॉन्ट्रियल  , Canada , showing its French  मुखाग्र   (  English reverse ) and the  फ्रेंच  term lait de  poule   (  literally , `` hen 's  मिल्क  ''  )
Eggnog  ,   or  egg  nog   ,  is a sweetened dairy  -आधारd  beverage traditionally made  साथ  milk and/or cream ,  शुगर  , and  whipped   अंडे  ( which gives it  a   frothy  texture  )  .
Brandy  ,   rum   ,  whisky ,  bourbon   ,  vodka  ,  or a combination of  liquors  are  प्रायः  added  .
The finished serving is often garnished with  a  sprinkling of  मैदान  cinnamon  or  nutmeg  .
It was  भी   ज्ञात   as  the  अंडा  milk  पंच  .
Eggnog is a popular drink  throughout   the  United States and Canada , and is usually  संबद्ध  with Christmas .
Eggnog may be added as a flavoring  to   खाना  or drinks such  as  coffee and tea .
Eggnog as a custard can  भी  be used as an ice cream base .
A pasty (  ,  ) ,  (  sometimes known  in  Britain as  a  Cornish  pasty  , and  in   the  United States as  a   pastie   or  British pasty )  is  a baked pastry , a traditional variety of which  is   विशेषकर  associated with Cornwall , the westernmost county in England  .
It  is   बना   by   रखकर   uncooked  filling typically of meat and vegetables , without meat in vegetarian  संस्करण   ,  on a flat pastry  वृत्त   और  folding it to wrap the  भरना  , crimping the  किनारे   to   रूप  a seal  .
After baking  ,  the result is  a   उठाया   semicircular  comestible  .
The traditional Cornish  pasty   ,  which has Protected Geographical Indication ( PGI  )   औकात   in  Europe  ,  is  भर  with beef  ,   sliced  or diced potato , swede ( also  ज्ञात  as  a   पीला   शलजम  or rutabaga –  referred   to   in  Cornwall  as  turnip )  और   प्याज  , seasoned with  नमक  and pepper ,  और  is baked .
आज  , the  pasty  is the food  सबसे  associated  साथ   कॉर्नवॉल  , it is  regarded  as the  नेशनल   डिश  ,  और  it accounts  लिये  6 % of the Cornish food  अर्थव्यवस्था  .
pasties  with many different fillings are made ; some shops specialise in selling all  sorts   of  pasties  .
The  origins  of  the  pasty  हैं   unclear   ,   हालांकि  there  हैं   अनेक  references to  उन्हें  throughout  ऐतिहासिक  documents  और  fiction .
the  pasty is now popular  world-wide   due   to  the spread  of   cornish   खनिक   ,   और  variations can be found in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  , the United States , Mexico and elsewhere  .
the   (  ortho- ) sympathetic  बेचैन   प्रणाली  (  sns  )  is  one of three major parts  of  the autonomic  बेचैन  system : the others being the  enteric  and parasympathetic  प्रणालियों   .
इसके   सामान्य  action is to mobilize  the   देह  's nervous  प्रणाली  fight-or-flight response .
it   is   ,  however , constantly  क्रियाशील   at  a basic  स्तर  to maintain homeostasis .
Secure Digital or ( SD  )   is  a non-volatile  मेमोरी   कार्ड   स्वरूप  for  उपयोग  in portable devices ,  ऐसे  as mobile  फोन  , digital cameras , GPS  नेविगेशन  devices  ,   और   टैब्लेट  computers  .
the  Secure Digital standard is maintained by  the  SD Card Association  (  SDA ) .
SD  technologies  have  महरूम   implemented   in  more than  400  brands across dozens  of  product categories  और  more than 8,000  मॉडल   .
The Secure  डिजिटल  format includes  चार   कार्ड   परिवारों  available in three different  रूप  factors  .
the  four families  हैं  the original Standard-Capacity  (  SDSC  )   ,   the   high-capacity   (  SDHC )  ,  the eXtended-Capacity ( SDXC )  ,   और   the  SDIO ,  जिससे  combines  input/output  functions with data storage .
The three form  कारकों  are  the  original size ,  the   ``  mini  ''  size , and the ``  सूक्ष्म  '' size ( see illustration ) .
There are  अनेक  combinations of form factors and device families .
electrically  passive adapters allow the use of a smaller card in a host device built to hold  a  larger  कार्ड  .
Host  डिवाइस   कि  comply with  नए  versions of the specification  provide  backward compatibility and accept older SD cards  ,  but this  आलेख  explains  अनेक  factors that can prevent the use of  a  newer  sd  card:
A  नए  card  may   प्रस्ताव  greater capacity than the host device can handle .
A  नए  card may use a file system the host device can  नहीं  navigate .
उपयोग  of  an  SDIO  कार्ड  requires the  मेजबान  device be designed for the  input/output  functions the card provides  .
the  organization of the card was  बदला  starting with  the   sdhc  family .
Some  विक्रेता  produced  sdsc  cards above 1 GB  पहले   the  SDA had standardized  a   विधि  of doing  so   .
The  sda  uses several trademarked  लोगो  to  enforce   अनुपालन  with its specifications  और   assure  users  of  compatibility .

डेनियल  Lawrence  व्हिटनी  ( born February 17 ,  1963  ) best  ज्ञात  by his stage  नाम  and character Larry  the  Cable  guy  , is an American stand-up comedian , actor , country music  कलाकार  , voice actor , and former radio personality .
He was one of the members  of  the Blue Collar Comedy Tour , a  कॉमेडी  troupe which included Bill Engvall  ,  Ron White ,  और  Jeff Foxworthy ( with whom he  रै  starred on  ब्लू   कॉलर  TV )  .
Whitney has  released  seven  कॉमेडी   एल्बम  , of  जिससे   तीन   have  been certified gold by the RIAA for shipments  of  500,000 copies .
In  जोड  , he has  स्ट्रक्चर  in three Blue Collar  कॉमेडी   tour-related  movies , as well as in the films  लैरी  the Cable  guy  :  स्वास्थ्य   इंस्पेक्टर  , Delta Farce , and Witless Protection , as  खूब  as voicing Mater  in  the Cars franchise .
Whitney 's catchphrase : `` Git-R-Done !  ''  is  भी  the title  of  his book .
On January  26  ,  2010  ,  the  TV channel History announced that  it  was  ordering   a  series starring Whitney called Only in America with Larry the  केबल  Guy , in which he  होता  explore the country  और   immerse   खुद  in  अलग   lifestyles   ,  jobs , and  शौक   .
the  first episode of the series  aired   on  February 8 , 2011  .
Vitamin D is a  समूह  of  fat-soluble   secosteroids  responsible for  intestinal   अवशोषण  of  कैल्सियम  and phosphate .
In humans , the  सबसे  important related compounds  of  vitamin D are vitamin D2 and vitamin D3 .
Cholecalciferol ( vitamin D3  )  and ergocalciferol ( vitamin  d2  ) are unique as they constitute what  we  know as vitamin D  और  can be  ingested  from  the  diet and/or supplements .
The body  can   भी  synthesize vitamin D ( from cholesterol  )  when sun exposure is adequate  (  hence its  उपनाम  , the  ``  sunshine  विटामिन  '' ) .
हालांकि  vitamin  d  is commonly  पुकारा  a vitamin , it is not actually an  अनिवार्य   dietary   विटामिन   in  the strict sense , as it  can   be  synthesized in adequate amounts by most mammals  उजागर  to  धूप   .
(  बिल्लियों  and dogs can not synthesize vitamin D  efficiently  and must  प्राप्त  it  in  their diet .  )
An organic chemical compound ( or related  नियत  of compounds ) is  तभी  scientifically called  a   विटामिन   जब  it can not be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an organism , and must be obtained from their  आहार  .
However  ,  as with  अन्य  compounds  commonly  called vitamins ,  विटामिन  D  थी   खोजा   in  an effort to find  the  dietary substance  कि   थी   lacking  in a disease  ,   namely  , rickets , the  बाल्यकाल   रूप  of osteomalacia .
Additionally , like other compounds called  विटामिन  , in  the   विकसित  world  विटामिन   d  is added to staple foods , such  as   मिल्क   ,  to  avoid  disease due to deficiency .
Measures of serum levels reflect endogenous  संश्लेषण   इससे  exposure  to  sunlight  as   खूब  as intake  इससे  the diet , and it is  believed  that synthesis may  योगदान   generally  to the maintenance of adequate serum concentrations .
The evidence indicates that  the   संश्लेषण  of vitamin  d  from sun exposure  works  in  a   प्रतिक्रिया  loop  कि  prevents toxicity  लकिन   ,  because  of   अनिश्चितता  about the cancer  रिस्क   इससे   धूप   ,   no  recommendations are  जारी  by the Institute of Medicine , USA , for the  राशि   of   सूर्य   एक्सपोज़र  required  to  meet  विटामिन   d  requirements  .
Accordingly , the Dietary Reference  intakes  for vitamin D assume  कि  no synthesis occurs and that  सब  of a person 's vitamin D  is   इससे  their diet  ,  although  कि  will rarely occur in practice .
in  the liver vitamin D is  परिवर्तित  to calcidiol ,  जिससे  is also known as  calcifediol   (  INN ) , 25-hydroxycholecalciferol  ,   or   25-hydroxyvitamin   d—abbreviated  25  (   oh   )  D ; and which  is   the   विशिष्ट  vitamin  d  metabolite  कि  is measured in  सीरम  to  determine   a   व्यक्ति   's  vitamin D status .
Part of the calcidiol  is  converted by the kidneys to calcitriol ,  the  biologically  क्रियाशील  form  of  vitamin  D.   calcitriol  circulates  as  a  हार्मोन  in the blood , regulating  the  concentration  of  calcium and  फास्फेट  in  the  bloodstream and promoting the healthy growth and remodeling of bone  .
calcidiol   is   भी  converted to calcitriol outside  of  the kidneys for other purposes ,  ऐसे   as   the  proliferation , differentiation and apoptosis of  कोशिकाएं  ; calcitriol  भी   affects   neuromuscular  function  और  inflammation .
परे  its use to prevent osteomalacia or rickets ,  the   प्रमाण  for  अन्य   स्वास्थ्य  effects of vitamin D supplementation in the general  जनसांख्यिकी  is inconsistent .
The  बेहतरीन   प्रमाण  of benefit  is  for  अस्थि  health  और  a  घटी   in   मृत्यु  in elderly women  .
मानक  form of the periodic table .
the   रंगों  represent different categories  of   तत्व  explained below .
The periodic table is a tabular display of the chemical elements , organized  on  the basis of their  परमाणु   संख्याएँ  , electron configurations , and recurring chemical properties .
Elements are  प्रस्तुत  in order of  increasing  atomic number ( number of protons  )  .
The standard  रूप  of table comprises an  18   ×   7  grid or  प्रमुख  body of  तत्व   ,   positioned  above a smaller double  पंक्ति   of   तत्व   .
The table can also be deconstructed into four rectangular blocks : the s-block  to  the  बाएँ  , the p-block to  the  right  ,  the d-block  in  the middle  ,  and  the   f-block  below that  .
The  पंक्ति  of  the   तालिका   हैं  called periods  ;   the   कालम  of the s- , d- , and  p-blocks   हैं  called groups ,  साथ  some of  ये  having  names  such as the halogens  or  the noble gases  .
चूंकि  , by definition , a periodic table incorporates recurring trends ,  कोई   ऐसे  table can be used  to  derive relationships between the  गुण   of  the elements  और   भविष्यवाणी  the properties of  नई  , yet to be discovered  or  synthesized , elements .
as  a result , a  आवधिक  table—whether  in  the  मानक  form or  कुछ  other  variant—provides  a useful  फ्रेमवर्क  for analyzing chemical behavior , and such tables  हैं   widely  used  in  chemistry  और   अन्य  sciences .
Although precursors exist ,  dmitri  Mendeleev  is  generally  credited   साथ   the  publication  ,   in   1869  ,  of  the first widely recognized periodic table .
he  developed his table to illustrate periodic trends in the properties of the then-known elements .
Mendeleev also  पूर्वानुमानित  some properties of then-unknown elements  कि  would be expected to fill gaps in this  तालिका  .
Most of his predictions were proved correct when the elements in question were subsequently discovered  .
Mendeleev 's periodic table  रै   चूंकि  been expanded and  परिष्कृत  with the discovery  or  synthesis of further  नई  elements  और  the development  of  new theoretical models to explain  रासायनिक  behavior .
All elements from atomic  संख्याएँ  1 ( hydrogen )  to  118 (  ununoctium  ) have  महरूम  discovered  or   synthesized   .
The elements from  1   to  98  (  californium  )  have  महरूम   मिला  to exist naturally ,  हालांकि   कुछ  are  मिला   तभी  in trace  amounts   और  were  initially  discovered  by  synthesis in laboratories  .
The elements  बाद   98  have only been synthesized in  laboratories   .
Production of elements  परे   ununoctium  is being pursued , with the question  of  how the periodic table  may  need  to   be   परिवर्धित   to   accommodate  any such additions being a  पदार्थ   of  ongoing debate .
Numerous synthetic radionuclides of naturally occurring  तत्व  have also been produced in  laboratories  .
Minimum wage by  u.S.  state  और  U.S. territory ( American Samoa ,  गुआम  , Puerto  रीको  ,  वर्जिन   आइलैंड्स  ) ,  as   of   jan.  1  ,   2013  .
In the United  राज्य   ,   मजदूर   हैं  generally entitled to be paid no less  than  the statutory minimum wage .
The federal government mandates  a  nationwide minimum wage level of  $  7.25 per hour , while some states and  municipalities  have set minimum  मजदूरी  levels higher  than  the federal level ,  साथ  the  उच्चतम  state minimum  मजदूरी  being $ 9.19 per  घंटा  in  वॉशिंगटन   as  of  2013  .
Among  those   सशुल्क  by  the   घंटा  in 2012 ,  1.6   लाख  were reported as earning exactly  the  prevailing  संघीय  minimum wage .
परिचय  2.0  लाख   यहूद  reported as earning wages  नीचे   the  minimum  .
Together , these 3.6 million  मजदूर  with  मजदूरी  at  or  below  the   न्यूनतम  made up  4.7   प्रतिशत  of all hourly-paid workers .

Evan Williams bourbon whiskey
Bourbon whiskey is a type of American whiskey – a  barrel-aged  distilled spirit  बना  primarily from corn .
The name of the spirit  गर्भाशयी  from  इसके  historical association  साथ  an area  ज्ञात   as  Old  bourbon   ,   around  what is now Bourbon  काउंटी   ,  Kentucky ( which ,  in  turn  ,  was named after the  फ्रेंच  House of Bourbon royal family  )  .
it  has been produced since the  18th  century .
While  it  may  be  made anywhere  in  the United  राज्य  ,  it  is strongly associated with the American South  in   सामान्य  , and Kentucky in particular .
The Mona Lisa  (   la   gioconda  or La Joconde  )  is a half-length portrait of  a  woman by  the  Italian artist  लियोनार्डो  da Vinci  ,  which has been  acclaimed  as  ``  the  बेहतरीन  known , the most visited , the most written  परिचय   ,  the  सबसे  sung  परिचय  , the most parodied work of  आर्ट   in   the  world . ''
the  painting ,  विचार   to  be a portrait of Lisa Gherardini ,  the  wife  of  Francesco del Giocondo , is in  आयल   on   a   poplar   फलक  , and is believed  to   have  been  चित्रित  between 1503  और   1506  .
It was acquired  by  King  फ्रांसिस  I of France  और  is now the property of the  फ्रेंच   गणतंत्र  , on permanent display  at  the Musée du Louvre in Paris since 1797  .
The ambiguity  of   the  subject  's  expression , which  is  frequently described  as  enigmatic ,  the   monumentality  of  the   संयोजन  , the  हल्का  modeling  of  forms and  the  atmospheric illusionism  यहूद  novel qualities that  have  contributed to the continuing  fascination  and study of  the   कार्य  .
Robert  एलन   पामर  ( 19 January  1949   –   26  September  2003   )   ,  was an English  singer-songwriter  and musician  .
he  was  ज्ञात   लिये   उसके  distinctive voice and the  eclectic  mix of  musical  styles on his albums  ,  combining soul , jazz  ,  rock , pop  ,  reggae  और  blues  .
he   मिला  success both in  उसके  solo career and in the  musical  act The Power  स्टेशन  , and had Top 10 songs in both the UK and the US  .
His iconic  म्यूज़िक  videos by Terence Donovan  लिये  the hits ``  आदी   to   प्रेम  `` and  ``  Simply  irresistible  `` featured identically dressed dancing women with pale  चेहरों   ,  dark eye makeup and bright red lipstick  ,   जिससे  resembled  the   महिलाओं  in the  आर्ट  of Patrick Nagel , an artist popular  in   the  1980s  .
Sharp-suited , his involvement in the  म्यूज़िक  industry commenced in the 1960s , covered  पाँच   दशकों   और  included a spell  साथ  Vinegar Joe .
Palmer received  a   क्रमांक  of awards  throughout  his career , including  दो  Grammy Awards  लिये   बेहतरीन  Male Rock Vocal Performance ,  an  MTV  वीडियो   म्यूज़िक  Award , and was  twice  nominated for  the  Brit Award for Best  अंग्रेजों  Male .
computed  tomography  एंजियोग्राफी  (  cta   )   is  a computed tomography  तकनीक   प्रयुक्त  to visualize  arterial  and venous vessels throughout the body  .
इस  ranges from arteries serving the brain  to  those bringing blood to the lungs , kidneys , arms  और   टाँगे   .

prise  de la Bastille by Jean-Pierre-Louis-Laurent Houel
bastille  Day  is  the  नाम  given in English-speaking countries  to  the French National Day  ,  which is celebrated on  the  14th  of  July each  साल  .
In  फ़्रांस   ,  it is formally  पुकारा  La Fête Nationale ( ; The National  जश्न  ) and  commonly  Le quatorze juillet (  ;   the  fourteenth  of   जुलाई  ) .
It commemorates the 1790  fête  de la  fédération  , held on  the  first anniversary of the storming of the Bastille on 14  जुलाई   1789   ;  the anniversary of the  storming   of  the Bastille fortress-prison  थी  seen as a symbol of the uprising of the  आधुनिक   स्वदेश   ,  and of the  reconciliation   of   सब  the French  अंदर   the   संवैधानिक  monarchy  जिससे  preceded the First Republic ,  दौरान   the  French Revolution .
festivities  and official  ceremonies  are  आयोजित  all over  फ़्रांस   .
The  oldest  and largest regular military parade  in  Europe is held on  the   morning   of   14   जुलाई  ,  on  the  champs-élysées   एवेन्यू   in  Paris in front  of   the  President of the  गणतंत्र  ,  फ्रेंच  officials and foreign guests  .
the  United States of America ( USA or  u.s.A.  ) , commonly called the United States  (   us  or  u.S.  )  or  America  ,  is a federal republic  consisting   of  fifty states and a  संघीय   ज़िला   .
The lower  forty-eight  contiguous states  और   the  federal  ज़िला  of Washington ,  d.C.   हैं  in central North  अमेरिका   between   कनाडा  and  मैक्सिको   .
the  state of  अलास्का  is west of Canada  और  east of Russia across  the   बेरिंग   जलसन्धि  , and the  राज्य  of  हवाई  is  in   the   mid-north  Pacific .
the  country  भी   रै  five  आबादी   और   नौ  unpopulated  territories   in  the  प्रशांत   और  the Caribbean .
At  3.79   लाख   वर्गाकार   मील  ( 9.83 million km2  )  and with around 315 million people , the United States is  the   third-  or fourth-largest  देश  by  कुल   क्षेत्रफल  and the third-largest by  दोनो   जमीन  area and population .
It is  एक   of   the  world 's most ethnically  विविध  and  multicultural  nations  ,  the product  of  large-scale immigration from many countries .
The geography  और  climate of  the   u.S.  is also extremely diverse , with  रेगिस्तान  ,  मैदान  , forests  ,  and mountains that are home to a  चौड़ी  variety  of  species  .
Paleoindians  migrated   इससे  Asia  to  what  is  now the United  राज्य   मेनलैंड  around 15,000 years  पहले  .
After 1500  ,   बूढ़ा  World  रोगों  introduced  by  Europeans greatly  घटाया  their populations .
European colonization began around 1600 and  आए  mostly from England .
The United States  उभरा   इससे  thirteen  अंग्रेजों   colonies  located along the  अटलांटिक  seaboard  .
विवादों  between  ग्रेट  Britain  और  the American colonies  led   to  the American Revolution .
On July 4  ,   1776  , delegates  इससे  the 13 colonies unanimously  जारी  the  घोषणा  of Independence , which established the United States of  अमेरिका   .
The American  क्रांतिकारी  War , which ended with the recognition of independence of the United States from the Kingdom of Great Britain  ,  was the first successful war  of   स्वतंत्रता   विरूद्ध  a European colonial empire .
The current  संविधान   थी  adopted on September 17 ,  1787  ; twenty-seven Amendments have since been  added  to the  संविधान   .
The  पहला  ten  amendments  ,  collectively   नामित  the Bill of Rights , were ratified  in  1791 and guarantee  अनेक  fundamental  सिविल   अधिकारों   और  freedoms  .
Driven  by  the doctrine of  manifest   नियति  ,  the  United  राज्य  embarked on a vigorous expansion across North America throughout the 19th  सदी  .
This  शामिल   displacing  native  जनजातियों   ,   acquiring  new territories ,  और  gradually admitting new  राज्य  .
The American  सिविल  War  ended   legalized   गुलामी   in   the  United States  .
By the end of the nineteenth century  ,  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  extended into the Pacific Ocean ,  और  its economy was the world  's  largest  .
The Spanish–American War and  पुष्टि   the  country  's   औकात  as  a   वैश्विक  military power  .
The  संयुक्त  States emerged  इससे  as a  वैश्विक  superpower  ,  the  पहला  country with nuclear weapons , and  a  permanent member of  the  United  राष्ट्र   सुरक्षा  Council .
the   समाप्त   of  the Cold War and the dissolution  of  the  सोवियत   संघ  left the United States as the  एकमात्र  superpower .
The United States  is  a developed country and has the world 's largest national economy ,  साथ  an estimated  2012   जीडीपी   of  $  15.6   खरब   19   %  of global GDP at purchasing-power parity , as of 2011  .
The per capita  जीडीपी  of  the  U.S.  थी  the world 's  sixth-highest   as  of 2010 ,  हालांकि  America 's wealth inequality was  भी   क्रमित   उच्चतम  among  oecd  countries by the World  बैंको  .
The economy is  fueled  by  an   प्रचुरता  of natural resources  ,  a well-developed infrastructure , and  ऊँची   उत्पादकता  ; and while its economy  is  considered  post-industrial  it continues  to  be one of  the  world 's largest manufacturers .
the  country accounts  लिये   39   %   of  global  सैन्य  spending ,  और  is a leading economic , political  ,  and  सांस्कृतिक  force in  the   संसार  , as well  as   a  leader  in  scientific research  और  technological innovation  .
The NCAA Men 's Division  i  Basketball  चैंपियनशिप  is a  single-elimination  tournament  निभाई  each spring  in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  ,  फिलहाल  featuring 68  कॉलेज  basketball teams  ,  to determine the national championship  of  the major  कॉलेज  basketball teams .
the  tournament ,  व्यवस्थित  by the  नेशनल  Collegiate Athletic Association (  ncaa  ) , was created  दौरान  1939 by the National Association of Basketball Coaches , and  थी  the idea  of  Ohio  राज्य   विश्वविद्यालयों  coach Harold  olsen  .
Played mostly during March  ,  it  is   ज्ञात   informally  as March Madness or the Big Dance , and has become one of the  सबसे  famous annual  sporting  events  in  the United States .
the  NCAA has credited Bob Walsh  of  the  सिएटल   आयोजन  Committee for starting  the  March Madness celebration during  1984  .
The tournament teams include champions from  31  Division  i  conferences ( which  प्राप्त   स्वचालित   बोलियों   )   ,  and 37 teams which are awarded at-large  berths   .
These  ``  at-large '' teams  हैं  chosen by an  ncaa  selection  कमेटी  ,  as  detailed below .
The 64 teams are divided into four regions and  व्यवस्थित  into  a  single elimination `` bracket  ''   ,   जिससे   predetermines   ,   जब  a team  विन्स  a game , which team it will  फेस  next .
प्रत्येक   टोली   is  ``  seeded  '' ,  or  ranked ,  भीतर  its region .
After  an  initial four  खेल  between eight  lower-ranked  teams  ,  the  टूर्नामेंट   occurs   दौरान   the  course of  तीन   सप्ताहांत  , at  pre-selected   न्यूट्रल  sites around the United  राज्य  .
Lower-ranked  टीमों   हैं  placed  in  the  कोष्ठक  against higher ranked teams .
Each weekend eliminates three-fourths of  the   टीमों  , from a round of  64   ,   to  a  ``  Sweet  सोलह  '' ,  और  for the last weekend  of  the  टूर्नामेंट  a Final  चार  ; the  फाइनल  Four is  प्रायः  played during the first weekend of  अप्रैल   .
These  चार   टीमों  , one  इससे  each  प्रदेश  , then compete in one  स्थान  for the national  चैंपियनशिप  .
the  tournament  रै   महरूम  at  तनिक  partially  televised   चूंकि   1969  .
presently  , the games  हैं  reported  by  CBS , TBS , TNT , and  trutv  by the  trade-name  NCAA  कूच  Madness  .
Since 2011 , all games are  उपलब्धियाँ   लिये  viewing  देशभर  .
As television coverage  रै  grown , so too has the tournament 's  लोकप्रियता   .
Presently , millions of Americans `` fill out a bracket ''  ,  predicting  विजेता  of all 67 games .
साथ   11  national titles  ,  UCLA has  the   रिकार्ड  for the most NCAA  मेन  's Division I Basketball  championships   ;  John Wooden coached  ucla  to 10 of its  11  titles .
the  University of Kentucky is second  ,   साथ  8  नेशनल  titles , while Indiana  विश्वविद्यालयों  and the University  of   उत्तर  Carolina are tied for  तीसरा   साथ   5  national titles  .
Duke University  बाँधने   पांचवां   साथ  4 national titles .
a  sample  of  synthetic  मोटर   आयल
सिंथेटिक   आयल  is a  स्नेहक  consisting  of   रासायनिक  compounds  कि   हैं  artificially made  (  synthesized ) .
Synthetic lubricants  can   be  manufactured  using   chemically  modified  पेट्रोलियम   components  rather  than  whole crude oil , but  can   भी  be synthesized from other raw materials .
सिंथेटिक  oil is used as  a  substitute for lubricant refined from petroleum when operating  in  extremes of temperature  ,  because  ,  in general  ,  it provides superior  mechanical  and chemical properties than  those  found in traditional  खनिज  oils .
वायुयान  jet engines , for example , require  the  use  of  synthetic  oils  , whereas aircraft piston  इंजन  do not .
Jackass is  an  American reality series  ,  originally shown on MTV  इससे  2000 to  2002  , featuring people performing various dangerous , crude  self-injuring  stunts and pranks  .
the  show served  as  a launchpad for the television and acting  करियर  of Bam Margera  ,  Steve-O , and  भी   जॉनी  Knoxville ,  जो  previously had  तभी  a few  नाबालिग  acting roles .
Since  2002  , three  बेवकूफ़  films  have   महरूम   उत्पादित   और  released by  एमटीवी  corporate sibling  सर्वोपरि  Pictures , continuing the franchise after its  चलाएं  on television .
The show sparked several spin-offs  सहित  Viva  la  Bam ,  wildboyz  , Homewrecker , Dr. Steve-O and  blastazoid  .
the  show  लगाई  # 68  on  Entertainment Weekly  ``   नई  TV Classics '' list .
roseanne  Cherrie Barr  (  born November 3  ,   1952   )  is  an   अमरीकी   अभिनेत्री  , comedienne ,  लेखक  ,  टेलीविज़न  producer , director  ,  and 2012  अध्यक्षीय   nominee  of the  कैलिफ़ोर्निया  -based  सलाम  and Freedom Party .
Barr began her career in stand-up  कॉमेडी  at clubs before gaining fame for  उसके  role in the sitcom Roseanne .
The  दिखाएँ  was  a  hit and lasted  नौ  seasons ,  इससे  1988 to  1997  .
She won both an  एमी  and a Golden Globe Award for Best Actress for her work on the show .
Barr had crafted a  ``  fierce  working-class  domestic goddess  ''  persona in the eight years preceding her sitcom  और  wanted to do a  यथार्थवादी  show about a strong mother who was not a victim of patriarchal consumerism  .
The  पोती  of immigrants  इससे   यूरोपीय  and Russia , Barr was the oldest  of  four  children  in a  working-class  Jewish  नमक   झील  City family  ;  she was also active  in  the  lds  Church .
In 1974  ,  she married Bill Pentland , with whom  वो  had three children , before divorcing  in  1990 and marrying comedian Tom Arnold for four  सालो  .
Controversy arose when  वो   संग  ``  the  Star-Spangled Banner  ``  off-key at a 1990 nationally aired baseball game  ,  followed  by  grabbing her  crotch   और  spitting .
बाद  her  sitcom  ended  ,  she launched her own talk show ,  the   roseanne   दिखाएँ  , which aired from  1998  to 2000 .
In 2005 ,  वो  returned to stand-up comedy with a world  दौरे  .
In  2011   ,  she starred in an  unscripted  TV show ,  roseanne  's  nuts  , that lasted  इससे  July to September of that year  ,  about  उसके  life on a Hawaiian farm  .
in  early  2012  ,  barr  announced her candidacy for the Presidential nomination of the  ग्रीन  Party  .
barr  lost the  नामांकन  to Jill  स्टीन   .
She then sought  the  presidential  नामांकन   of  the  सलाम  and Freedom Party ,  जिससे  she  जीती   on  August 4 ,  2012  .
Barr received 61,971  मत  in  the   सामान्य  election  ,   रखकर  sixth overall .
francesco  Albani  's  17th century Baptism of Christ  is  a typical depiction with the sky opening and the Holy Spirit descending  as  a dove .
the  baptism of Jesus  marks   the  beginning  of  his  पब्लिक  ministry .
This event is recorded in  the   canonical  gospels of Matthew  ,   चिह्नित   और  Luke .
John  's  gospel does not  describe  Jesus  '   बपतिस्मा  , but John  the  Baptist  करता   गवाही  of the  अन्य   बाते  in .
In the New Testament  ,   जॉन   the  Baptist  preached  the baptism  of  repentance  लिये  the remission of sins ( ) , and  घोषित  himself a  forerunner  of he that would  baptize  `` with the Holy Ghost and with  आग   ''  ( ) .
in  so doing he was preparing the way for Jesus .
Jesus came  to  the Jordan River where he was baptized  by  John .
The baptismal scene includes the heavens opening , a dove-like descent  of  the Holy  स्पिरिट  ,  और   a   आवाज़  from heaven saying  ,   ``  This  is  my  beloved   बेटे  , in whom I am well  प्रसन्न  . ''
Most modern scholars view the  फैक्ट  that Jesus  थी  baptized by John as an historical  इवेंट   to  which a high  उपाधि  of  certainty  can  be   आबंटित  .
साथ  with the crucifixion  of  Jesus most scholars  दृश्य   it   as  one of the two historically certain facts about him  ,  and often  उपयोग   it  as the starting  अंक   लिये  the study  of   the  historical Jesus  .
The baptism  is  one of the five major milestones  in  the gospel narrative  of  the life of Jesus , the  अन्य   होने   the  Transfiguration ,  crucifixion  ,  क़यामत  , and  आरोहण  .
सबसे  Christian denominations view  the  baptism  of  Jesus as  an  important event  और  a basis  लिये  the  ईसाई   रीति  of  बपतिस्मा  (  देखिए  also ) .
In Eastern Christianity ,  यीशु  ' baptism is commemorated on 6 January , the  feast  of Epiphany  .
In the Roman Catholic Church ,  the  Anglican  नियाज़   ,  the Lutheran Churches and some other  पश्चिमी   denominations   ,   it   is  recalled on a day within the following week , the feast of the  बपतिस्मा  of the Lord .
in  Roman Catholicism , the  बपतिस्मा   of  Jesus is  एक   of  the Luminous  रहस्यों  sometimes added to the  rosary  .
It  is  a  trinitarian  feast  in  the Eastern  परंपरागत  Churches .
Methylcobalamin (  दिखाया  ) is a form of vitamin B12 .
physically   it  resembles the other forms  of  vitamin B12  ,  occurring as dark red crystals that freely form cherry-colored transparent solutions  in  water .
Vitamin B12 , vitamin  b12   or  vitamin  b-12  , also called cobalamin , is a water-soluble vitamin  साथ  a key  भूमिका  in the normal functioning of the  दिमाग  and nervous system  ,  and for  the   गठन  of blood .
It is  एक  of the eight  b  vitamins .
It  is  normally involved in the metabolism of every  कोशिका   of   the  human body  ,  especially affecting DNA synthesis and  विनियमन   ,   लकिन   भी  fatty acid  संश्लेषण  and energy production .
neither  fungi  ,  plants , nor animals are  सक्षम   of   producing  vitamin B12 .
तभी  bacteria and archaea have the enzymes required for its  संश्लेषण   ,  although many  भोजन  are  a  natural source  of  B12  क्युकी  of bacterial  symbiosis  .
The  विटामिन  is the largest and  सबसे   structurally  complicated  विटामिन  and  can   be  produced industrially only through bacterial fermentation-synthesis  .
विटामिन  B12 consists of a class of chemically related compounds ( vitamers ) ,  सब  of which have vitamin activity  .
It contains the biochemically rare  तत्व  cobalt .
जैवसंश्लेषण  of  the  basic structure of the vitamin is  संपन्नता  only by  जीवाणु   (  which  प्रायः   उपज   hydroxocobalamin  ) , but conversion  between  different forms of the  विटामिन  can be  संपन्नता  in the human body .
A common  semi-synthetic  form  of   the  vitamin  ,  cyanocobalamin ,  करता  not occur  in  nature ,  लकिन  is produced from  बैक्टीरियल   hydroxocobalamin   और  then used in  अनेक  pharmaceuticals and supplements , and as a  खाना   योगात्मक  , because of  इसके   स्थिरता   और  lower production  लागत  .
In  the  body  it   is   परिवर्तित   to  the human physiological  फ़ॉर्म   methylcobalamin  and  adenosylcobalamin  , leaving behind the  साइनाइड  , albeit in minimal concentration .
More  recently  , hydroxocobalamin ,  methylcobalamin  , and adenosylcobalamin can be found in more expensive pharmacological  उत्पाद  and food supplements .
The extra utility  of  these is currently debated  .
Vitamin B12 was discovered from its relationship  to   the  disease pernicious anemia , which is an autoimmune  बीमारी  in which parietal cells  of  the  पेट  responsible for  secreting  intrinsic factor are destroyed  .
मूलभूत  factor is crucial for  the  normal absorption of  b12  , so a lack of  मूलभूत  factor  ,  as seen in pernicious anemia , causes a vitamin B12 deficiency  .
Many other subtler kinds  of   विटामिन   b12   कमियां   और  their biochemical effects have  चूंकि  been elucidated .
Full Metal  जैकेट  is a 1987 war film  उत्पादित   ,   निर्देशित   और   co-written  by Stanley Kubrick .
It is an adaptation  of  Gustav  hasford   's   1979  novel The Short-Timers and  सितारों  Matthew Modine , Vincent  d'onofrio  ,  R.  Lee Ermey  ,   arliss  Howard , and Adam  baldwin  .
The  फिल्मी  follows a platoon of U.S. Marines through their training and the experiences of  दो   of  the platoon 's Marines  in   the  Tet Offensive  दौरान  the  वियतनाम  War .
The film 's title refers to the  पूरा  metal  जैकेट   गोली   प्रयुक्त   by  infantry riflemen .
The film received  नाजुक   acclaim  .
It received  an   अकादमी  Award  नामांकन  for Best Adapted  पटकथा  for Kubrick  ,  Michael Herr and Gustav  hasford  .
in  2001  ,  the American  फिल्मी  Institute placed Full  मेटल   जैकेट  at # 95  in  their ``  एएफआई  's 100 Years ... 100  thrills  ``  पोल   .
TMZ is a  हस्ती  news website that debuted on November  8  , 2005 .
It was a collaboration between AOL and  telepictures  Productions  ,   a   प्रभाग  of  warner   भाईs.  ,  जबतक  Time Warner divested AOL in 2009 .
However , it remained affiliated with AOL News and  रै  the  एओएल  News logo affixed in  the   अपर   सही  corner .
the  name TMZ  स्टैंड  for the  ऐतिहासिक  ``  स्टुडियो   मण्डल   ``  or 30-mile zone radius from the intersection  of   वेस्ट  Beverly Boulevard and North La Cienega Boulevard  in  Los Angeles  .
TMZ 's  मैनेजिंग   एडिटर   is  Harvey Levin , a lawyer-turned-journalist  जो  was previously a legal expert for the Los  एंजिल्स   टेलीविज़न   स्टेशन   kcbs-tv  .
the  site claims  कि  it  करता  not pay for stories or interviews ; however  ,  Levin  रै  admitted  कि  TMZ does `` sometimes pay  स्त्रोत   लिये  leads on  कहानियां  '' .
levin   रै  stated that `` everything is  शोधकार्य  and  vetted   लिये   सटीकता  . ''
A companion TV series  ,  TMZ  on  TV , debuted on September 10 , 2007 .
Scream 3  is  a 2000 American  slasher  film created  by   केविन   विलियमसन  ,  निर्देशित  by Wes Craven and written by Ehren Kruger  ,  starring  neve  Campbell  ,   courteney  Cox  arquette  and David  arquette   .
It was released  on  February 4 , 2000 as the third installment in  the   चीख  film series .
the  events of the story are  नियत  three years after those of Scream 2  और  follows Sidney Prescott ( Campbell )  जो   रै  gone  into  self-imposed isolation following  the   कार्यक्रम  of the previous  दो   films   लकिन  is  drawn  to  हॉलीवुड   बाद  a new  ghostface   begins   हत्या  the  डाल  of the film  भीतर  a film `` Stab 3 ''  .
चीख  3 combines  the   हिंसा  of the  slasher  genre with  कॉमेडी  and `` whodunit ``  रहस्य  while satirizing  the  cliché  of  film trilogies  .
नापसंद   the  previous Scream films ,  वहीँ   थी  an increased emphasis on comedic elements and the violence  और   हॉरर   थी  reduced in  जवाब  to  increased  public scrutiny about violence in media following  the  Columbine High School massacre .
the  film  थी  the  concluding  chapter of  the   चीख   श्रेणी  until it was revived with a  sequel   ,  Scream 4 ,  in  2011 .
Williamson provided  a  five-page  रूपरेखा   लिये   दो  sequels to  चीख  when  auctioning  his  असली  script  ,  hoping to entice bidders with the potential  of  buying a  मताधिकार   .
Williamson 's commitments to other projects meant  he  was unable to  develop  a complete  स्क्रिप्ट   लिये  Scream 3  और  writing duties were undertaken  by   ehren  Kruger who  discarded   much   of  Williamson 's  टीप  .
Craven and Marco Beltrami returned to  सीधा   और  score the film respectively  as  they had  साथ  the  पिछला  two series entries  .
उत्पादन  was troubled with script rewrites , with pages sometimes only ready  on  the day  of   फिल्मांकन  ,  और  scheduling  कठिनाइयों  with the main  डाल  .
Scream 3 performed  दोनो  financially and critically worse than its preceding  films  ,  कमाई  over  $   161   लाख  and with many  आलोचकों   claiming  that  the  film had become what  चीख   originally  ``  spoofed  `` .
despite  negative  आलोचना  the film did  प्राप्त   तारीफ़   साथ  reviewers  कॉलिंग  it the  पूर्ण  end  to  the  चीख  trilogy .
as  of  2012   ,  the film is currently the  क्रमांक  3 highest-grossing  slasher-film  in North America ,  following  Scream  at  number  1   और  Scream 2 at number  2  .
the   फिल्मी  's soundtrack was  well-received   ,  spending fourteen  सप्ताह  on the Billboard 200  और   reaching  a high of # 32 .
Shoulder  impingement   सिंड्रोम  , also  पुकारा  painful arc syndrome ,  supraspinatus   सिंड्रोम  , swimmer 's  कंधे   ,  and  thrower  's shoulder , is a clinical syndrome which  occurs  when the tendons  of  the rotator cuff muscles become  irritated   और  inflamed as they  pass  through the subacromial space ,  the  passage beneath the  acromion  .
इस   can  result in  पीड़ा   ,  weakness  और  loss  of  movement at the shoulder .
JLA  थी  a monthly comic book  प्रकाशित  by  dc  Comics  इससे  January  1997   to  April 2006 featuring the  इंसाफ   लीग   .
the  colonial history  of  the  संयुक्त  States covers the history  of  European settlements from  the   प्रारंभ   of  colonization of America until their incorporation into the  संयुक्त   राज्य   .
in   the  late  16th   सदी   ,  England , France , Spain and the Netherlands launched  प्रमुख  colonization  कार्यक्रम  in eastern North America .
Small  जल्दी  attempts—such as  the   अंग्रेज़ी   खोया   उपनिवेश   of   roanoke  —often disappeared ; everywhere the death rate of  the  first arrivals was  बहुत  high .
Nevertheless successful colonies were  स्थापित  .
European settlers came  इससे  a variety of  सोशल  and religious groups .
No  aristocrats  settled permanently  ,   लकिन  a number  of  adventurers  ,  soldiers , farmers  ,   और  tradesmen  arrived  .
Diversity was an  अमरीकी  characteristic  as  the Dutch of New Netherland ,  the  Swedes and  finns  of New Sweden ,  the  English  quakers   of   पेन्सिलवेनिया  , the English Puritans of New England , the English settlers of Jamestown , and the `` worthy poor '' of  जॉर्जिया   ,  came to  the  new continent  और  built colonies with distinctive social  ,   धार्मिक  ,  राजनैतिक   और  economic styles .
Occasionally  एक  colony took  कंट्रोल   of  another (  दौरान  wars  between  their European parents ) .
Only in  नोवा  Scotia ( now part of  कनाडा  ) did the conquerors expel the previous  colonists  .
Instead they  सब   जिया   पक्ष  by side in peace .
There were no major civil wars among the 13  colonies  , and  the  two chief armed rebellions ( in Virginia in 1676 and  in  New York  in  1689–91 )  यहूद  short-lived failures .
Wars  between  the French and  the   british—the  French and Indian  युद्धों  and Father  rale  's War —were recurrent ,  और  involved  french-support   लिये  Wabanaki  confederacy   हमले  on the frontiers .
By 1760 France was  पराजित  and the British seized its colonies .
The four distinct  regions  were : New  इंग्लैण्ड  , the  मध्य  Colonies , the Chesapeake Bay Colonies  (   अपर   दक्षिण   )   और  the Lower South  .
Some historians  add  a fifth  प्रदेश  ,  the  Frontier , which was never  separately  organized  .
by   the   समय  European settlers arrived around 1600–1650  ,  the majority of  the  Native Americans living in  the  eastern United States  था  been decimated  by  new diseases  ,   introduced  to them decades  पहले  by explorers  और   sailors  .
See  समयरेखा  of  औपनिवेशिक  America for list of  ऐतिहासिक  events .
ग्लोरिया  Laura Vanderbilt  (  born February 20 , 1924  )   is  an American  कलाकार   ,  author , actress , heiress , and  socialite  most noted as an early  डेवलपर   of   पंक्तियां  blue jeans  .
She  is   a  member of the prominent Vanderbilt family of New  यॉर्क  and the mother  of  CNN 's  एंडरसन   कूपर  .
Greece (  रोमनाइजेशन  of Greek|  )  ,  officially   the   हैलेनिक  Republic  (   '   )  , is a country in Southeast  यूरोपीय  .
According  to  the  2011  census , Greece 's population  is  around 11  लाख  .
Athens  is   the  nation 's capital and largest  नगर  , its urban area  भी   सहित  Piraeus .
Greece is strategically located  at   the  crossroads  of  Europe , Asia ,  the  Middle  ईस्ट  , and Africa ,  और  has land borders with Albania , the  गणतंत्र  of  मकदूनिया   और  Bulgaria to the north , and Turkey to the northeast .
the   ईजियन  Sea lies  to  the east  of   मेनलैंड   यूनानियों  , the  आयोनियन  Sea to the  वेस्ट  , and the Mediterranean Sea to the south  .
Greece has the 11th  longest   तटरेखा   in  the world at in length ,  featuring  a  विशाल   क्रमांक  of islands ( approximately  1,400   ,  of which  227  are inhabited  )  ,  सहित   क्रेट   ,  the Dodecanese , the Cyclades , and the Ionian Islands among  अन्य  .
Eighty percent  of  Greece consists of mountains , of  जिससे  Mount Olympus is the highest  at  .
Modern Greece traces  इसके  roots  to  the civilization of Ancient Greece  ,   generally  considered the cradle of Western civilization .
As such  ,   it  is  the  birthplace of democracy , Western philosophy , the Olympic  खेल  , Western literature and historiography  ,  political science , major scientific and mathematical principles , and  पश्चिमी   नाटक   ,  including  दोनो   त्रासदी   और  comedy .
This legacy is partly  reflected  in  the  seventeen  युनेस्को  World Heritage Sites located  in   यूनानियों  ,  रैंकिंग  it 7th in  यूरोपीय   और  13th  in   the  world  .
The modern Greek state was established in 1830 , following  the  Greek War of Independence  .
Greece  is  a  founding  member  of  the  संयुक्त  Nations , has been  a   सदस्य  of  कया  is  अभी  the European  संघ  since  1981   (  and the eurozone since 2001 ) , and has  महरूम  a  सदस्य  of  नाटो   चूंकि  1952  .
Greece is  a  developed country with an  उन्नत  ,  high-income  economy  और  very high  मानकों   of  living  ,   सहित  the world 's  21st  highest quality of life as of 2010 .
यूनानियों  's economy is  भी  the  largest  in the Balkans , where Greece  is  an important regional  निवेशकों  .
A prime meridian is a meridian , i.e  .  a  लकीर  of longitude , at  जिससे  longitude is defined to be  0°   .
A  प्रधान  meridian and its  विपरीत  in a 360°-system ,  the  180th  मध्याह्न  ( at  180°  longitude ) ,  रूप  a great circle .
This great  वृत्त  divides the  गोला   ,  e.g  .  the  धरती   ,  into two hemispheres  .
If one uses  दिशानिर्देश  of East and West  इससे  a defined prime  मध्याह्न  , then  वे   can  be called  पूर्वी  Hemisphere and Western Hemisphere .
Gerardus Mercator in  उसके  Atlas  cosmographicae   (   1595   )  uses a prime  मध्याह्न  somewhere  बंद  to  25°w  ,  गुजर   बस  to the west  of   सांता   मरिया   द्वीप  in  the  Atlantic .
उसके  180th meridian  रनों   साथ  the Strait of Anián ( Bering Strait  )
A prime meridian is ultimately arbitrary  ,  unlike an equator , which is determined  by  the axis  of  rotation—and various conventions  have  been used or advocated  in  different regions  और  throughout history .
Minka Dumont Kelly ( born  minka  Dumont Dufay ;  जून  24  ,  1980  )  is  an   अमरीकी  actress  .
She  is  perhaps  बेहतरीन  known for her roles  in  Charlie 's Angels  ,  Friday Night  लाइट्स  , and The Roommate .
R.O.B . ( Robotic  ऑपरेटिंग  Buddy  )  ,  released  in Japan as the , is an accessory for the Nintendo Entertainment  प्रणाली  ( NES ) .
It was released  in   जुलाई   1985  in Japan and  बाद   कि   साल  in North America .
it   था  a short  उत्पाद  lifespan , with support for  तभी  two games which comprised  the   ``  Robot Series  ''  ; Gyromite and Stack-Up .
r.o.b  . was released with the intention  of  portraying the Nintendo Entertainment  प्रणाली   as  something  अनोखा  in  अनुक्रम  to  alleviate  retail  fears   following  the video game crash of 1983 .
R.O.B  .  was  उपलब्धियाँ  in the Deluxe Set , a  विन्यास  for the console that included , among other things ,  r.o.b  .  और  Gyromite .
Stack-Up  थी  purchased  separately  and  शामिल   इसके  own physical game pieces .
The Walking  स्वतंत्रता  half dollar was  a   चांदी  50-cent piece or  हाफ   डालर  coin issued by  the  United  राज्य  Mint from 1916  to  1947  ;   it  was designed by  एडाल्फ  A. Weinman .
In 1915 , the  नई  Mint  निदेशक  , Robert  W.  Woolley ,  आए  to believe that he was not only allowed but required  by   विधि  to replace  सिक्का   डिजाइन  that  था  been  in  use  लिये  25  सालो  .
He therefore began  the  process of replacing the  नाई  coinage : dimes , quarters and half dollars , all  bearing  similar designs by long-time Mint Engraver Charles  E.   नाई  , and  पहला  struck in  1892   .
Woolley had the Commission of Fine  कला  conduct a competition ,  as  a result  of  which Weinman  थी   चयनित   to  design  the  dime and half  डालर  .
Weinman 's  डिज़ाइन   of   स्वतंत्रता  striding towards the Sun  लिये  the half  डालर   proved   मुश्किल   to  perfect , and Treasury Secretary William  G.  McAdoo ,  जिनकी  department included the Mint , considered having Barber  बनाएँ  his  अपना   डिज़ाइन  .
मिंट  officials  यहूद  successful in  getting   weinman  's  डिज़ाइन   into  production , although it never struck very well  ,  which  may  have been a  फ़ैक्टर  in  इसके  replacement by the  फ्रैंकलिन  half  डालर  beginning in 1948 .
nevertheless  , art historian Cornelius Vermeule considered the  टुकड़ा  to be among the  सबसे   खूबसूरत  US coins  .
Since 1986  ,  a modification of Weinman 's obverse  डिज़ाइन  has been used for the American Silver Eagle .
The Toyota  4runner  is a mid-size sport utility vehicle (  एसयूवी  ) produced by  the  Japanese manufacturer  टोयोटा  and  बेची  throughout  the  world from 1984 to present  .
In  जापानी  it was known  as   the  Toyota Hilux Surf  .
The original  4runner  was a compact SUV and little more than  a   टोयोटा  pickup truck  साथ  a fiberglass shell  over  the bed  ,   लकिन  the  मॉडल  has  चूंकि  undergone significant independent  विकास  into a cross between a compact  और  a  mid-size  SUV .
सब  4Runners have been built  at  Toyota  's  Tahara plant in Tahara ,  aichi  , Japan  ,  or at Hino Motors ' Hamura ,  जापानी  plant  ,  and  in  Brazil .
Its mid-size crossover  एसयूवी  counterpart is  the  Toyota Highlander .
इस   आलेख  deals with  आयुर्विज्ञान  as practiced by trained  पेशेवर  from ancient times to  the  present  .
The ancient  उन्होंने  had  a  system  of  medicine that  थी   बहुत  advanced  लिये  its time and influenced later  चिकित्सा  traditions .
the   उन्होंने  and Babylonians both introduced  the  concepts  of  diagnosis , prognosis  ,   और  medical examination .
the  Greeks went even further , and  उन्नत  as well  चिकित्सा  ethics .
The Hippocratic Oath , still taken  by  doctors today ,  थी  written in Greece  in   the   5th  century BCE .
in  the medieval era ,  सर्जिकल  practices inherited  इससे  the ancient masters were improved and then  systematized  in Rogerius 's  the  Practice of Surgery  .
Universities  began  systematic  प्रशिक्षण  of  physicians  around the years 1220 in Italy .
During the  पुनर्जागरण   ,  understanding of anatomy improved , and the microscope was invented  .
The  रोगाणु  theory of disease in the  19th  century  led  to  cures  for many  संक्रामक   रोगों   .
Military doctors  उन्नत  the methods of trauma  उपचार  and surgery .
Public  स्वास्थ्य   उपायों  were developed especially in  the  19th century  as  the  रैपिड  growth of cities required  व्यवस्थित  sanitary  उपायों  .
Advanced research  centers  opened in the  जल्दी  20th century , often connected with  प्रमुख   अस्पताल  .
The mid-20th century was characterized by  नई   biological  treatments ,  ऐसे  as antibiotics .
These advancements  ,  along with developments in chemistry  ,   आनुवंशिकी  ,  और   lab  technology (  ऐसे  as the  x-ray  ) led to modern medicine  .
आयुर्विज्ञान  was heavily professionalized in the 20th  सदी  , and new careers opened to women as nurses ( from the 1870s ) and as physicians ( especially after 1970 ) .
the  21st century is characterized by  बहुत  advanced research involving  numerous  fields of science .
The Hippocratic Corpus  ,  is a collection of early medical  works   इससे  ancient Greece  strongly  associated  साथ   the   प्राचीन   यूनानी   चिकित्सक  Hippocrates and  उसके  teachings  .
Potassium is  a   रासायनिक   तत्व  with  प्रतीक  K ( from  neo-latin  kalium ) and atomic number 19 .
Elemental potassium  is  a soft silvery-white  क्षारीय   मेटल   कि  oxidizes  rapidly  in  एयर   और  is very  प्रतिक्रिया  with water ,  generating  sufficient heat to ignite the hydrogen emitted in the reaction and  burning   साथ   a  lilac flame .
क्युकी  potassium and sodium  हैं  chemically very similar , their salts  यहूद   नहीं  at first  differentiated  .
the   अस्तित्व   of  multiple elements  in  their salts  थी   suspected   इससे   1702  , and this was proven in 1807 when potassium  और  sodium were  individually  isolated from different salts by electrolysis .
Potassium in nature  occurs  only in ionic  लवण   .
As such  ,   it   is   मिला  dissolved in seawater  (  which is 0.04 % potassium by  वज़न   )  , and is part of many minerals .
Most  औद्योगिक  chemical applications of  पोटैशियम  employ  the  relatively high solubility in water  of   पोटैशियम  compounds  ,   ऐसे  as potassium soaps  .
Potassium metal has only  a   few   खास  applications , being  replaced  in most  रासायनिक   प्रतिक्रियाएँ   साथ  sodium  मेटल   .
Potassium ions are necessary for the function of all living cells  .
पोटैशियम   आयन  diffusion is  a  key mechanism in nerve transmission  ,  and potassium depletion  in   पशु   ,  including  इंसानो  , results in  विभिन्न   हृदय   डिस्फंक्शन   .
पोटैशियम   accumulates  in  संयंत्र   कोशिकाएं   ,   और  thus fresh fruits  और  vegetables are a good dietary source  of  it .
Conversely  ,   सबसे  plants  मगर  specialist halophytes  हैं   असहिष्णु  of  नमक  , and sodium is present in them only  in  low  विशेषज्ञता  .
This resulted in potassium  पहला   होने   पृथक  from potash , the ashes of plants , giving the element  इसके   नाम  .
For the same  कारण  ,  भारी  crop production rapidly depletes soils of potassium ,  और  agricultural  fertilizers  consume 95 %  of  global potassium  रासायनिक  production  .
The  सिंगापुर  dollar or dollar (  चिह्न  :  $  ; code : SGD )  is  the  आधिकारिक   करेंसी  of Singapore  .
it  is  सामान्यतः   abbreviated  with  the  dollar sign  $  , or  alternatively  S $ to  फर्क   it  from  अन्य   डालर   -denominated  currencies  .
it   is   विभाजित  into  100  cents .
The  मौद्रिक  Authority of Singapore and the  ब्रुनेई   करेंसी   और  Monetary Board still  maintain  the historic exchangeability of their two currencies , the  singaporean  dollar  और  the  ब्रुनेई  dollar  ,  respectively .
the  dollar is accepted  as   ``  customary  टेंडर  ''  in  Brunei according to the Currency Interchangeability Agreement .
likewise  , the Brunei dollar is customarily accepted in  सिंगापुर
James  सैमुएल  Coleman ( May  12   ,   1926   –   कूच  25 , 1995 )  थी  an  अमरीकी  sociologist  ,  theorist  और  empirical researcher , based chiefly at the University  of  Chicago .
He was elected president of  the   अमरीकी  Sociological Association .
कोलमैन   पढ़ाई  the sociology of education , public policy , and was  एक  of the  earliest  users of the term `` social  पूंजी  `` .
His Foundations of Social  सिद्धान्त  influenced  समाजशास्त्रीय  theory .
His The Adolescent Society ( 1961  )  and `` Coleman  रपट  '' ( Equality of Educational Opportunity , 1966 )  यहूद   दो   of   the  most  heavily  cited books  in   शैक्षणिक   समाजशास्त्र  .
The landmark Coleman Report  helped  transform educational theory ,  reshape   नेशनल  education policies  ,   और   बहकावे  public and  scholarly  opinion  regarding   the  role of schooling in determining equality and productivity in  the  United  राज्य   .
सुपरमैन  ( from DC comics  )  was the  पहला  superhero created , art by  जिम  Lee .
a  superhero (  sometimes  rendered super-hero  or   सुपर   नायिका  )  is   a   प्रकार  of stock  अक्षर  possessing `` extraordinary or superhuman  शक्तियां  '' and dedicated  to   protecting  the public .
Since  the  debut of  the   prototypical  superhero Superman in 1938 , stories of superheroes—ranging from  ब्रैड  episodic adventures to continuing  years-long  sagas—have  वर्चस्व   अमरीकी   कॉमिक   किताबे  and crossed over into  अन्य   मीडिया  .
The word itself dates to at  तनिक   1917   .
A female  सुपरहीरो  is  sometimes  called a superheroine ( also rendered  super-heroine  or super heroine ) .
``   सुपर  HEROES  ''  is  a  trademark co-owned by DC Comics  और  Marvel Comics .
By  सबसे  definitions ,  वर्ण   do  not strictly require actual superhuman  शक्तियां   to  be deemed superheroes , although  शर्तें  such as costumed crime fighters  or  masked vigilantes are  sometimes   प्रयुक्त  to refer to  those   ऐसे  as Batman and Green  तीर  without such powers who  share  other common superhero  traits   .
Such characters were  generally  referred to  as   ``  mystery men '' in the so-called  सुनहरी   आयु   of  Comic Books  to  distinguish them from  वर्ण   साथ  super-powers  .
Normally ,  superheroes  use their powers to counter day-to-day  अपराधों  while also  combating   खतरे  against humanity by supervillains ,  उनके   दण्ड  counterparts  .
प्रायः  ,  एक  of these supervillains  होगा  be the superhero  's   archenemy  .
As  खूब   ,  some longrunning superheroes  ,   ऐसे   as   सुपरमैन  , Batman , Spider-Man and Iron  man  each has a  rogues  gallery  of  enemies  .
As  खूब  , superheroes sometimes  होगा  combat such irregular  खतरे  as aliens , magical/ fantasy entities ,  अमरीकी  war enemies such as nazism or communism , and godlike  or   demonic  creatures .
