the  Shawshank Redemption  is  a  1994  American drama film written and  निर्देशित  by Frank  darabont   और  starring Tim Robbins and Morgan Freeman .
adapted  from the  स्टीफन  King novella  रीता   hayworth  and Shawshank  मोचन   ,  the film  tells   the  story  of  Andy Dufresne ,  a  banker who spends nearly  दो  decades in Shawshank State Prison for the murder of his  बीवी   और  her lover  despite   उसके  claims of innocence .
During his time at  the   थाना  ,  he   befriends  a fellow  inmate  , Ellis  boyd  `` Red  ''  Redding , and finds himself protected by the  गार्ड  after the warden begins using him in  उसके  money  laundering   आपरेशन   .
despite  a  गुनगुने   बक्सा  office reception  कि   मुश्किल   recouped  its budget , the  फिल्मी  received favorable reviews  इससे  critics , multiple  पुरस्कार   nominations   ,   और  has  चूंकि  enjoyed a  उल्लेखनीय   जीवन  on  केबल  television  ,   vhs  , DVD  ,  and Blu-ray  .
it  was included in the  अमरीकी  Film Institute 's 100  सालो  ...  100  Movies 10th Anniversary Edition .
IT management is  the  discipline  whereby  all of the  प्रौद्योगिकी   संसाधन  of  a  firm are managed in accordance with  इसके  needs  और  priorities  .
ये  resources  may   शामिल  tangible investments like  कंप्यूटर  hardware ,  तन्त्र  ,  आंकड़ा  , networks  और  data centre facilities  ,  as well as  the   staffs   जो  are hired to maintain them .
Managing  इस  responsibility within a company entails  अनेक  of the basic  प्रबन्धन   कृत्यों  , like budgeting , staffing , and organizing and  controlling   ,  along with other  पहलुओं   कि  are  अद्वितीय  to technology , like change management , software design  ,  network planning  ,   तकनीक  support etc .
The Penitentiary  of  New Mexico Prison Riot , which took  प्लेस   on  February 2 and 3 , 1980  ,  in  the  state  's   अधिकतम  security  थाना   दक्षिण  of Santa  fe  , was one of the most violent prison riots in the history of  the   अमरीकी  correctional  प्रणाली  : 33  inmates  died  और  more than  200   inmates  were treated for injuries .
None  of  the 12 officers taken hostage  यहूद  killed , but seven were  treated  for  चोटों   caused  by beatings  और  rapes .
This was the third major  riot   at  the  nm  State Penitentiary  ,  the  पहला  occurring on 19 July 1922 and the second  on   15  June 1953 .
Author  रोजर  Morris suggests the death toll  may  have been  उच्चतर  , as  a  number  of  bodies  यहूद  incinerated or dismembered during  the  course of the  mayhem  .
`` Red  कार्डिनल   ''  redirects here  .
For the  संयंत्र  Erythrina herbacea , see Coral Bean  .
The Northern Cardinal  (  Cardinalis cardinalis  )  is  a   उत्तर  American bird in the genus Cardinalis ; it  is   भी  known  colloquially  as the  redbird   or   आम  cardinal .
it  can be found  in   दक्षिणी  Canada , through the eastern United States  इससे  Maine to Texas and south through Mexico .
It  is  found  in  woodlands , gardens , shrublands  ,   और   swamps  .
The  उत्तरी  Cardinal is a mid-sized songbird with  a  body length  of  21  सेंटीमीटर  ( 8.3  इंच  ) .
It has  a  distinctive crest on the head  और   a  mask on the face which is  ब्लैक  in the  पुरूष   और  gray in the  मादा  .
The male is  a   हर्षोल्लास   रेड   ,  while the female is a dull red-brown shade  .
The  उत्तरी   कार्डिनल  is  मुख्यतः   granivorous   ,  but also feeds on  कीट  and fruit .
The  पुरूष   behaves   territorially  , marking out his  territory   साथ   सोंग   .
दौरान  courtship , the  पुरूष  feeds  बीज   to  the female beak-to-beak .
A clutch  of   तीन  to four eggs is laid , and  दो  to  चार   चंगुल   हैं  produced each year .
It was  एकबार  prized as a pet ,  लकिन   इसके  sale  as  cage birds  is   अभी   बैन  in  the  United  राज्य  by the  migratory  Bird Treaty Act of  1918   .
Surface runoff , also called  nonpoint  source  प्रदूषण   ,   इससे  a  फार्म  field in  आयोवा  during a  बरसात  storm  .
Topsoil  as  well  as  farm fertilizers and other potential pollutants run off  unprotected  farm fields  जब  heavy rains occur .
Topsoil  is  the  अपर  , outermost layer of soil , usually the top to .
It has the highest concentration  of  organic matter and microorganisms and  is   जहाँ  most of the Earth  's  biological soil activity  occurs  .
Musical  cryptogram   :  `` Aschbeg  ''  set  in   schoenberg  's Sechs kleine Klavierstücke , Op  .   19  , no . 1 , m.  5  .
Note that the notes do  नहीं  come  in  spelling order  लकिन   हैं  all  सटा  ( not separated  by  other notes  )  .
sechs   kleine   klavierstücke  , Op  .  19 (  or  Six  छोटी  Piano Pieces ) is a set of pieces for  सोलो  piano written  by  the  आस्ट्रिया   composer  Arnold  schoenberg  ,  प्रकाशित  in 1913 .
McAfee  ,  Inc. (  )   is   an  American global  कंप्यूटर  security software company headquartered in Santa Clara  ,  California  ,  and  the  world 's largest dedicated security technology  कम्पनी  .
as  of February  28  , 2011 , McAfee is a  wholly   स्वामित्व  subsidiary of Intel .
McAfee 's competitors in the  एंटीवायरस  industry  हैं  Avira , BitDefender  ,   bullguard   ,   f-secure  , Frisk , Kaspersky ,  symantec  , and  ट्रेंड  Micro to  नाम  a few .
Saint Rita of Cascia  (  Born  margherita  Lotti 1381 -  may  22  ,  1457 ) was an  इतालवी  Augustinian nun , widow  और  saint venerated in the Roman Catholic Church .
Rita was  शादीशुदा  at an  जल्दी  age  .
The marriage lasted for 18 years , during  जिससे  she is remembered  लिये   उसके   ईसाई  values  as  a model  बीवी  and mother who made efforts to convert her husband from his abusive behavior  .
Upon the murder of  उसके   husband  by another feuding family  ,  she sought  to   dissuade  her sons from  बदला   .
She subsequently joined an  augustinian  community  of  religious sisters , where she  थी  known for  practicing   mortification   of  the  flesh   ,  along with the apparent efficacy of her  प्रार्थनाएं   .
St.  रीता  is venerated due to various  चमत्कार   attributed  to  उसके  intercession  ,  and is often  portrayed  with a  bleeding  wound on her forehead , which the Roman  कैथोलिक  Church claims  to   have   महरूम  a  आंशिक  stigmata .
The Roman  कैथोलिक  Church , under  the  pontificate  of  Pope  leo  XIII  officially  canonized  रीता  on  may   24   ,  1900 , while her feast day is celebrated every May  22  .
In many  परहेज़गारों  Catholic countries , Rita is known to be  a   patroness   लिये  abused wives and  शोक   महिलाओं  .
उत्तर   अमेरिका  is a continent wholly within  the  Northern Hemisphere and  लगभग  wholly within  the  Western  गोलार्ध  .
It is  भी  considered a  उत्तरी  subcontinent of the  americas   .
It  is   bordered  to the north  by  the Arctic  समंदर  ,  to  the  ईस्ट  by the Atlantic Ocean  ,  to the west and south by  the  Pacific Ocean  ,  and  to  the southeast by South America and  the   caribbean  Sea .
North America covers an  क्षेत्रफल  of about  24,709,000  square kilometers ( 9,540,000 square miles ) , about 4.8  %   of   the  planet 's surface  or  about 16.5 %  of  its land area  .
As  of  July 2008 ,  इसके  population  थी  estimated at  nearly   529   लाख  people across  23  independent states  ,  representing about 7.5 %  of  the  इंसान  population .
North America is the  third-largest  continent  in  area , following  एशिया  and Africa  ,   और  the fourth in population after  एशिया   ,  Africa , and Europe .
the   पहला  people  to  live in North America were Paleoindians who  began   to  arrive  दौरान  the last  glacial  period by crossing the Bering land  सेतु  .
They differentiated into a number  of   विविध   संस्कृतियों   और  communities across the continent  .
the  largest and  सबसे  advanced Pre-Columbian  सभ्यताओं   in  North  अमेरिका  were the Aztecs in what is now Mexico and the Mayans in Central  अमेरिका  .
European colonists began to arrive  starting   in  the 16th  और  17th centuries , wiping out large numbers of  the   देशी   populations  and beginning  an   era   of  European dominance .
Jermaine Lamarr Cole ( born January 28 , 1985 ) , better known  by  his stage name J. Cole  ,  is an  अमरीकी  hip-hop  रिकॉर्डिंग  artist  और  record producer from  fayetteville  , North Carolina .
In 2009  ,  he became the first artist to  चिह्न  to Jay-Z 's Roc Nation  लेबल  .
उसके  long-awaited  डेब्यू  album , entitled Cole World : The Sideline Story  ,  was released on September  27  , 2011  .
The album  debuted   at   क्रमांक   एक  on the US Billboard  200  , Top R & B  एल्बम  and  शीर्ष  Rap Albums chart , selling  अधिक  than 218,000  in   इसके   पहला  week .
he  received  a  nomination for Best  नई   कलाकार  at the  54th  Grammy  पुरस्कार  .
the  two main characters  of  the  श्रेणी   ,  Ratchet  (   सही  ) and Clank ( left )  .
Ratchet & Clank is  a  series of platform  वीडियो  games .
the  franchise was created and  विकसित  by  insomniac  Games and  प्रकाशित  by Sony  कंप्यूटर  Entertainment for many different PlayStation consoles , such  as  PlayStation  2  and PlayStation 3  साथ  the exclusion of  आकार  Matters and  रहस्य  Agent Clank , which were developed  by  High Impact  खेल  for the PlayStation Portable  .
प्रत्येक  game in  the  series has been released for every console  ,  as the  ip   is  owned  by  Sony  कंप्यूटर  Entertainment .
an  animated feature film  अनुकूलन  produced by  rainmaker  Entertainment and Blockade Entertainment  is  scheduled for  a  theatrical release sometime in 2015 .
The games  लो  place in a  विज्ञान  fiction setting  और   follow  the  adventures  of  ratchet  ( an animalistic human-like  अक्षर   ज्ञात   as  a Lombax  ,  who is a mechanic  )  and Clank ( a diminutive  ,  sentient robot ) as  वे  travel through  the   ब्रह्मांड   ,  saving  it  from evil forces on  a   नियमित  basis  .
the  series  is  noted for the  समावेश  of many exotic  और  unique , over the  शीर्ष   हथियार   और  devices  ,  a  अवधारणा  that Insomniac  खेल  also expanded into their other  खेल   .
A will  or  testament  is  a legal  घोषणा   by  which a  व्यक्ति   ,  the testator  ,  names  एक  or more persons to  मैनेज   his/her  estate  और  provides for the  ट्रांसफ़र  of  उसके  property at death  .
For the devolution of  प्रॉपर्टी  not disposed of by will  ,   देखिए  inheritance and intestacy .
in  the  strictest   भाव  , a  ``  will  ''  has historically been limited  to  real property  जबकि  `` testament '' applies only to dispositions of personal property  (  thus giving  वृद्धि  to  the  popular title  of   the   दस्तावेज़  as  ``  Last Will  और   वसीयत  '' )  ,   हालांकि  this distinction  is   seldom   observed  today .
a  will may also create a  testamentary  trust that  is   प्रभावी  only after the death of the testator .
The 19.9 MW Gemasolar  सौर  plant in  स्पेन   सुविधाएँ   15  hours  of  storage  और  can supply power 24 hours a day .
Solar energy ,  रौशन   लाइट  and heat  इससे  the sun , has been harnessed by  इंसानो  since ancient times  using   a   दायरा  of ever-evolving technologies .
Solar energy technologies include solar heating , solar  photovoltaics  ,  सौर  thermal electricity ,  सौर  architecture and artificial photosynthesis ,  जिससे  can  मेक  considerable  योगदान  to  solving   कुछ  of  the  most urgent energy problems  the  world now  चेहरों  .
Solar technologies are broadly  characterized  as either  passive   सौर   or  active solar depending on the way they capture  ,  convert  और  distribute  सौर  energy .
Active  सौर  techniques include the use of  photovoltaic  panels and solar thermal collectors  to  harness the  उर्जा  .
Passive solar  तकनीकों  include  orienting  a building to the Sun , selecting  सामग्री  with favorable thermal mass or  लाइट  dispersing properties ,  और  designing spaces  कि  naturally  circulate  air .
In 2011 , the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Energy Agency said that  ``   the  development of affordable , inexhaustible and clean solar  उर्जा   technologies  will have huge  longer-term  benefits .
It will  बढ़ाएँ  countries’ energy security through reliance on an indigenous , inexhaustible and mostly import-independent resource  ,  enhance sustainability  ,  reduce  प्रदूषण  , lower  the  costs of  mitigating  climate change , and keep fossil fuel prices lower  than   वरना  .
ये  advantages are global .
hence   the   अतिरिक्त  costs of the incentives  लिये  early deployment  चाहिए   be  considered  सीखना   निवेश   ;  they must be wisely  खर्च   और  need to be widely shared '' .
Sir  थामस  More ( ;  7  February 14786  जुलाई  1535  )  , known to  रोमन  Catholics  as  Saint Thomas  अधिक   चूंकि  1935  ,  was  an   अंग्रेज़ी  lawyer , social philosopher  ,  author ,  statesman  ,  और  noted Renaissance  humanist   .
he  was  an  important  पार्षद   to  Henry VIII of  इंग्लैण्ड  and  थी  Lord  चांसलर  from October 1529  to  16 May 1532 .
He was  canonized  by Pope Pius  xi  in  1935  as one of  the  early  शहीदो  of the schism that separated the Church  of  England from Rome  in  the 16th  सदी   .
In  2000  ,  पोप  John Paul II  घोषित   उसे  patron of  कैथोलिक  statesmen and  राजनेता  .
More was  an  opponent of  the   प्रोटोस्टेंट  Reformation , in particular of Martin  लूथर  and  विलियम  Tyndale .
However  ,  since 1980 , he is also commemorated by the Church of England  as  a reformation martyr .
अधिक  coined  the  word  ``   यूटोपिया  `` –  a  name he  दिया  to  the  ideal and  काल्पनिक  island nation , the political system  of  which he described in  यूटोपिया  ,  प्रकाशित  in  1516  .
He opposed the  किंग  's separation  इससे  the Roman Catholic Church  और  refused to accept him as  परम्  Head of the Church of England , a  शीर्षक  which had  महरूम  given by parliament  through   the  Act  of   सर्वोच्चता  of 1534 .
he  was  imprisoned  in 1534 for  उसके  refusal  to  take  the  oath  जरूरी   by  the First Succession  अधिनियम  ,  क्युकी  the  अधिनियम  disparaged  papal   प्राधिकार  and Henry’s  विवाह  to  कैथरीन   of   aragon   .
In 1535 , he  थी   आजमाया  for  देशद्रोह  , convicted on  perjured  testimony  ,  and beheaded  .
More also helped  to  originate the  phrase  `` grasp at straws '' to mean `` desperately trying  भी  useless things  ''  , in  उसके  Dialogue of Comfort Against Tribulation  .
Intellectuals  और   कूटनीतिज्ञों  across Europe  यहूद  stunned  by   अधिक   's  execution .
Erasmus saluted him as one `` whose  आत्मा   थी   अधिक  pure than  कोई  snow ,  जिनकी  genius was such  कि   इंग्लैण्ड  never had  और  never  again  will have  इसके  like '' .
There  थी   a   अधिक  controversial side  to  More  's  life ,  क्युकी  he advocated  the  persecution  और  execution of Protestants  जो  refused  to  recant their  आस्था  .
However , the judgement  of  history has  महरूम   largely   willing   to  forgive this in  लाइट  of the times he lived in  और  his martyrdom in the Roman Catholic cause .
Two  सदियां  later Jonathan Swift said More was ``  the  person of the  महानतम  virtue this kingdom ever produced '' ,  a  sentiment with which Samuel Johnson  सहमत   .
Historian Hugh  trevor-roper  said  in  1977 that More  थी  `` the first great Englishman whom we feel that  we  know ,  the   सबसे  saintly of  humanists  , the most human of saints , the universal  man  of our cool northern renaissance .  ''
कप्तान  Nemo ,  भी  known  as   प्रिंस  Dakkar ,  is  a fictional character invented by the French science fiction author  जूल्स  Verne .
Nemo  appears  in two of Verne 's  novels  , Twenty Thousand Leagues  अंतर्गत  the Sea  (   1870  ) and  the   रहस्यमय  Island  (   1874   )   ,  and makes a cameo appearance  in  Verne  's  play  यात्रा   through   the  Impossible  (  1882 ) .
Nemo  ,   एक  of  the  most famous antiheroes in  fiction  , is  a   रहस्यमय  figure .
The son  of   an  Indian  राजा   ,  he is  a   वैज्ञानिक  genius who roams  the   गहराइयों  of the sea in his submarine  ,  the Nautilus ,  जिससे  was built on  a   उजाड़  island  .
Nemo tries to project a  stern  ,  नियंत्रित  confidence  ,  but he is driven by  a  thirst  लिये   प्रतिशोध  and  a   द्वेष  of imperialism  (   विशेषकर  the British  साम्राज्य  ) .
he   is  also wracked by remorse  over  the deaths of his crew members and  भी  by  the   मौतों   of  enemy sailors .
Nemo has appeared in  विभिन्न   adaptations  of Verne 's novels , including  films  ,  जहाँ  he  रै  been portrayed by a  क्रमांक  of  अलग   अभिनेताओं  .
He  रै  furthermore been  अपनाया   by  other  लेखक  for  समावेश  in their novels ,  सबसे  notably in Alan Moore  's  The League  of   असाधारण  Gentlemen and Philip  जोस  Farmer 's The  अन्य   log  of Phileas Fogg .

Acoustic  coupler   मॉडेम
a  modem  (   modulator-demodulator  ) is a device that modulates  an  analog  वाहक   सिग्नल   to  encode digital information , and  भी  demodulates such a carrier signal  to  decode the transmitted information .
The goal is to  उपज  a signal that can be  transmitted  easily and decoded to reproduce the original digital data .
Modems can be used over any means of transmitting analog signals  ,   इससे   लाइट  emitting  diodes  to  रेडियो  .
The most familiar example  is  a voice band  मॉडेम   कि  turns the  डिजिटल  data  of  a personal computer into  modulated  electrical  सिग्नल  in the voice  आवृत्ति  range of  a   टेलीफोन  channel .
These signals can  be  transmitted over telephone  लाइनों  and demodulated by  another  modem  at  the receiver  पक्ष   to  recover the  डिजिटल  data .
Modems are generally classified by the amount of data  वे  can send  in   a  given  ईकाई   of  time , usually expressed  in  bits per second  (   bit/s  ,  or  bps ) ,  or  bytes per second ( B/s  )   .
Modems can  alternatively  be classified by their symbol  रेट  ,  measured   in   baud  .
The baud  ईकाई   denotes  symbols per  दूसरी  , or the number of times per  दूसरी  the modem  भेजना   a  new signal .
लिये  example ,  the  ITU V.21 standard  प्रयुक्त  audio frequency shift keying  साथ  two possible frequencies corresponding to two distinct  प्रतीकों   (  or one bit per symbol ) , to  carry   300   बिट्स  per second using  300   baud  .
by  contrast ,  the   असली  ITU V.22 standard , which was able to transmit  और  receive four distinct symbols ( two bits per  प्रतीक  ) , handled 1,200  bit/s  by sending 600 symbols per  दूसरी  ( 600 baud ) using phase shift keying  .
The Declaration of Independence is a statement adopted by  the   महाद्वीपीय  Congress  on   जुलाई   4  ,  1776   ,  which announced that the  तेरह  American colonies ,  तब   at  war with Great Britain , regarded  themselves   as  independent states  ,   और  no longer a part of the British Empire .
बजाय  they now formed a new nation—the United  राज्य  of America  .
John Adams was  a  leader in pushing for independence  ,  which was  unanimously   स्वीकृत  on July  2   .
A committee had already drafted the formal declaration  ,   to  be ready  जब  congress voted on independence .
एडम्स  persuaded the  कमेटी  to select Thomas Jefferson to compose the  असली   ड्राफ्ट  of the document  ,  which congress  होता  edit  to   उपज   the  final version .
The Declaration was  ultimately  a  औपचारिक   स्पष्टीकरण  of why Congress had voted on July 2  to  declare independence  इससे  Great Britain , more  than   a  year after the outbreak of the American Revolutionary War .
The national  जन्मदिवस   ,   the   स्वतंत्रता  Day  is  celebrated on July 4 ,  हालांकि  Adams wanted July 2 .
After  ratifying  the text  on   जुलाई  4 , Congress issued  the   घोषणा   of  Independence in several forms .
it  was initially published  as  the  मुद्रित   डनलप  broadside  कि  was  widely  distributed and read to  the  public .
The most famous version of  the   घोषणा   ,  a signed  नक़ल  that is popularly regarded as the  घोषणा  of  स्वतंत्रता  , is  प्रदर्शित   at  the National Archives in  वॉशिंगटन   ,  D.C  .
Although the wording  of  the Declaration was approved on  जुलाई   4   ,  the date  of   इसके  signing was August 2 .
The  असली  July  4  United States Declaration  of  Independence  पाण्डुलिपि  was lost while all other copies  have  been derived from this original  दस्तावेज़  .
The sources and  निर्वचन  of the Declaration have  महरूम  the subject of much scholarly  पूछताछ  .
The Declaration  जायज  the  स्वतंत्रता  of  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  by listing colonial grievances  विरूद्ध  King George  iii  , and by asserting certain  प्राकृतिक   और  legal rights ,  सहित  a right  of  revolution .
Having served  इसके  original  purpose  in announcing independence , the text of  the  Declaration  थी  initially ignored  बाद   the  American Revolution .
Since then , it has come to be considered a major statement on  इंसान   अधिकारों  , particularly its second sentence:
We hold these truths  to  be self-evident ,  कि   सब  men are created equal , that they are endowed by  उनके  Creator with certain  unalienable  Rights , that among these are Life , Liberty and the pursuit of Happiness  .
This has been called `` one of the  best-known   वाक्य  in the English  भाषा  '' , containing `` the most potent and consequential words in American history  .  ''
The passage came to represent  a  moral standard  to   जिससे   the  United  राज्य  should  नीयत  .
This view was  notably   प्रचारित   by  Abraham Lincoln ,  जो   माना  the Declaration to be the foundation  of   उसके  political philosophy  ,  and  argued   कि   the   घोषणा  is  a  statement  of   सिद्धान्त   through   जिससे  the United States Constitution  चाहिए   be  interpreted .
It has  प्रेरित  work for  the  rights of marginalized people throughout  the  world  .
The Economy of Greenland can be characterized  as  small  ,  mixed and vulnerable .
the  present economy consists of a  बिग  public sector  और  comprehensive foreign trade ,  जिससे  has  resulted  in an economy with periods of strong growth  ,  considerable inflation  ,   बेरोजगारी  problems and  चरम  dependence  on   पूंजी   inflow   इससे   डेनमार्क  and use of outside , mainly Danish ,  skilled  labor .
GDP per capita is similar to the average European economies but  the  economy is critically dependent upon substantial support from the  डैनिश   सरकारी   ,  which supplies about half the revenues  of  the home rule  सरकारी  who in turn  employ   परिचय   8,000  Greenlanders out of  a   मजदूर  force  of  40,156 ( Jan. 2012 ) .
बेरोजगारी  nonetheless remains high  ,  with the rest  of  the economy dependent upon demand for exports of shrimp and fish  .
Hydrogen is  a  chemical element with  प्रतीक  H and atomic number 1 .
साथ  an  परमाणु   वज़न  of  (   लिये  hydrogen-1 ) ,  हाइड्रोजन  is the lightest  तत्व   और  its monatomic form  (  H1 )  is   the  most  abundant  chemical substance , constituting roughly 75  %   of  the Universe 's baryonic  द्रव्यमान  .
Non- remnant  सितारों  are  मुख्यतः  composed of hydrogen  in   इसके   प्लाज्मा   राज्य  .
at   मानक  temperature and pressure , hydrogen is  a  colorless  ,  odorless ,  tasteless   ,  non-toxic ,  nonmetallic  , highly combustible diatomic gas with the molecular formula H2 .
सबसे   of  the hydrogen on  धरती   is  in  अणुओं   ऐसे  as water and organic  यौगिकों  because hydrogen readily  फ़ॉर्म   covalent  compounds with most non-metallic elements .
Hydrogen plays  a   विशेषकर  important role  in   acid-base  chemistry with  अनेक  reactions exchanging  protons  between soluble  अणुओं  .
in  ionic compounds  ,  it  can  take  a  negative charge ( an anion known as a hydride  और  written as H− ) , or  as   a  positively charged species  H+  .
the  latter cation  is  written as though  रचित  of a  bare  proton , but  in  reality , hydrogen cations  in  ionic  यौगिकों  always occur as more complex species .
The most common  समस्थानिक   of   हाइड्रोजन  is protium ( name rarely  प्रयुक्त   ,  symbol  1h  ) with a single proton and no neutrons .
As  the   सरलतम   अणु   ज्ञात  ,  the  hydrogen atom has been of theoretical use .
For example , as the  तभी   न्यूट्रल   अणु  with an analytic  समाधान  to  the  Schrödinger equation  ,  the study of  the   energetics  and bonding of the  हाइड्रोजन  atom  निभाई  a key role in the  विकास   of  quantum mechanics .
Hydrogen  गैस  was  पहला   artificially  produced in the early  16th   सदी   ,   via  the mixing  of  metals with acids .
In 1766–81 ,  हेनरी   कैवेंडिश   थी   the  first  to   recognize  that hydrogen  गैस   थी  a discrete substance ,  और   कि  it produces water when burned , a property which  बाद   दिया  it its name  :  in Greek ,  हाइड्रोजन  means  ``  water-former '' .
Industrial production is mainly from the steam reforming of natural gas , and  कम  often from more energy-intensive hydrogen production  विधि  like the electrolysis  of  water  .
Most hydrogen is  employed   निकट  its  उत्पादन  site ,  साथ  the two largest uses being fossil fuel processing  (  e.g. , hydrocracking  )  and ammonia  उत्पादन   ,   ज़्यादातर  for  the  fertilizer  मार्केट  .
हाइड्रोजन   is  a concern in metallurgy  as  it can embrittle many  धातुओं  , complicating the design of  pipelines  and storage tanks .
Unstoppable is a 2010 American action thriller  फिल्मी  directed  by  Tony Scott ,  लिखा   by   चिह्नित   bomback  , and  अभिनीत  Denzel Washington  और  Chris Pine  .
The film , loosely based on  the  real-life CSX  8888  incident , tells  the   स्टोरी  of a runaway freight train  ,  and  the   दो  men ( Washington and  पाइन   )   जो  manage  to   रोकें   it  .
it  was  स्कॉट   's   फाइनल   विशेषता   फिल्मी  before  उसके  death in 2012 .
The film was released in the United States and Canada on November  12  , 2010  ,   और   in  the United Kingdom on November  24   ,   2010  .
It received mostly favorable  समीक्षाएँ   इससे  film critics ; it garnered a `` Certified Fresh ''  दरजा   on  Rotten Tomatoes based  upon   समग्र  reviews  और   a  rating of ``  generally  favorable reviews ''  at  Metacritic  .
The film  थी  nominated for  an  Academy Award for Best Sound Editing at the 83rd Academy Awards , but lost to Inception  .
in   छायाचित्र   ,  bracketing is the general technique of taking several  गोलियाँ  of the  वही  subject using different camera settings .
Bracketing  is   उपयोगी  and often recommended in situations that  मेक  it difficult  to  obtain a satisfactory image  साथ  a single  शॉट  ,  विशेषकर   जब   a  small variation  in  exposure parameters  रै  a comparatively large  प्रभाव   on   the   resulting  image  .
Autobracketing is automatic bracketing  by  using a  सेटिंग  on  the   कैमरा  to take several bracketed shots ( in contrast to the photographer altering  the  settings by  हाथ  between each  शॉट  ) .
Given the time it takes to accomplish multiple  गोलियाँ  ,  it  is typically ,  लकिन   नहीं  always ,  प्रयुक्त   लिये   स्थिर   विषय  .
Insulated glazing  (  IG  )  ,  अधिक  commonly known  as  double glazing ( or  double-pane  , and  increasingly  triple glazing/pane )  हैं  double or  ट्रिपल   कांच  window panes separated  by  an  एयर  or other gas filled space to  reduce   ऊष्मा  transfer across  a  part of  the   भवन  envelope  .
Insulated Glass Units are manufactured  साथ  glass in range  of  thickness from 3 mm to  10  mm or more in special  अनुप्रयोग  .
Laminated or tempered glass  may   भी  be used as part of  the  construction .
Most units are manufactured with the  वही   मोटाई  of glass used  on  both panes but special applications such  as  acoustic attenuation or security may require wide  सीमाएँ   of  thicknesses to be incorporated in the same  ईकाई  .
A sectioned diagram of a fixed Insulated Glazed Unit ( IGU ) ,  indicating   the  numbering convention  प्रयुक्त   in  this article  .
Surface # 1 is  facing   बाहर   ,  Surface # 2  is  the  अंदर  surface  of  the  exterior  pane , Surface # 3 is the outside surface of  the   आंतरिक  pane  ,  and  सतह   #   4  is the  अंदर  surface  of  interior  फलक   .
The window frame  is  labelled # 5  ,  a  spacer  is  indicated  as # 6 ,  seals   हैं  shown  in  red ( #  7  )  ,   the  internal reveal is on the  सही  hand  पक्ष   (  # 8  )   और  the exterior windowsill on the left (  #  9 )
to   reduce   shear  effects on the sealed unit ( a  प्रमुख  cause of premature failure )  ,  manufacturers use a rule of  अंगूठा  that permits a difference of 1  mm   between  the thickness of the panes of glass used  in   the  unit  और  still maintain the warranty for the unit  .
लिये  example , a unit may be ordered with a 4 mm pane on the exterior and  a  3 mm  फलक   on  the interior .
These variations  हैं  allowed for architectural  और  cost  कारण   .
Other combinations can be specified and produced but  the  manufacturer may  आरक्षित  the right to limit the term of  the  warranty  or  refuse to warranty the  ईकाई  altogether .
For  आसानी  of  वर्णन  the surfaces of a double paned unit  हैं   नामित  according to the following convention  :  Surface # 1 ( facing outside )  ,   सतह  # 2  (   अंदर   of  outside  फलक  )  ,  Surface  #  3  (  outside  of  inside pane ) and  सतह  # 4 ( inside surface  of   अंदर  pane )  .
Applying the corresponding nomenclature  लिये  triple  paned   इकाई  results  in   सतहों   #   1  through  #   6   .
The performance of  insulating   glazing   can  be modified through the use of the following:
a   ठेठ  installation of insulated  glazing  windows  साथ  uPVC window  फ्रेम्स  .
सेलेनियम  is a  रासायनिक  element  साथ  symbol  se  and  परमाणु   क्रमांक  34 .
it  is a nonmetal with properties  कि  are intermediate  between  those of  इसके  periodic  तालिका  column-adjacent  chalcogen   तत्व  sulfur and tellurium .
It  rarely  occurs in its elemental state in nature , or as pure ore compounds .
Selenium  (  Greek σελήνη selene  अर्थ  `` Moon ''  )   थी   खोजा  in  1817   by  Jöns Jacob Berzelius  ,  who  विख्यात   the   समानता  of  the  new element  to   the  previously-known tellurium ( named  लिये  the Earth ) .
सेलेनियम  is found  impurely  in  मेटल  sulfide ores , where it  partially  replaces the sulfur .
Commercially , selenium is produced  as  a  byproduct  in the refining  of  these ores , most  प्रायः   दौरान  copper production .
Minerals that  हैं  pure  selenide  or selenate  यौगिकों   हैं  known ,  लकिन   हैं  rare .
The  मुख्य   वाणिज्यिक  uses for selenium  आज  are  in   glassmaking  and in pigments .
Selenium  is  a  सेमीकंडक्टर  and is  प्रयुक्त   in  photocells  .
Uses in electronics , once important , have been mostly supplanted  by  silicon  सेमीकंडक्टर  devices  .
Selenium  continues  to be used in a few types of DC  शक्ति  surge protectors  और   एक  type of fluorescent  क्वांटम  dot .
Selenium  लवण  are  विषाक्त   in  large  amounts   ,  but trace amounts  हैं   जरुरी  for cellular function  in  many organisms  ,  including all animals  .
Selenium is a component of  the  antioxidant  एंजाइमों  glutathione peroxidase and  thioredoxin   reductase  ( which  indirectly  reduce certain oxidized molecules in animals  और  some plants ) .
It is also found in  तीन   deiodinase   एंजाइमों  ,  जिससे  convert  एक  thyroid hormone to another  .
Selenium requirements  in   पौधे  differ by species , with some plants requiring relatively large amounts  ,  and others apparently requiring  none  .
The United  राज्य   अध्यक्षीय   चुनाव   of   2008   थी  the 56th  quadrennial  presidential election  .
it  was  आयोजित  on Tuesday , November 4 , 2008 .
डेमोक्रेट  Barack  ओबामा   ,  then  the   जूनियर   सीनेटर  from  इलिनोइस   ,  defeated Republican  जॉन  McCain ,  the  senior Senator from Arizona  .
as  the campaign progressed ,  the   युद्ध  in Iraq  और   outgoing   रिपब्लिकन  President George W. Bush had become increasingly unpopular ,  और  the major-party candidates ran on a platform of  बदलें  and reform .
Domestic policy and  the  economy  आखिरकार  emerged as the main  विषयवस्तु  in the last few months  of  the election campaign after the onset of the worst recession since the  1930s  .
Obama would go on to win a decisive  विजय   over   मैक्केन  in both the  चुनावी  and  लोकप्रिय  vote .
Obama received the most  मत  for a  अध्यक्षीय  candidate  in  American history ,  और  won  the   लोकप्रिय   और  electoral vote by the  largest   हाशिया  in  12  years  ,  as  खूब  as  the  largest percentage of  the  popular vote for a Democrat in nearly  a  half-century .
This  थी  the  पहला  U.S. presidential election in which an African American was elected  ,  having  भी  been the first in which an  अफ़्रीकी  American won  the  nomination of either  प्रमुख  party  .
This  चुनाव  was also notable  लिये  being  the  first time in U.S. history that both major party  उम्मीदवार   यहूद  sitting U.S . Senators , only  the  third time (  बाद   1920  and  1960  )  कि  any sitting U.S  .   सीनेटर   थी  elected  अध्यक्ष  ,  और   तभी  the second time  कि   the   जीतना  President and  वाइस  President ( Obama and  बिडेन  )  यहूद  both sitting U.S . Senators .
This was also  the   पहला  election since  1952  in which neither  of  the major  पार्टियों  '  नामांकित  was the incumbent President  or   वाइस   अध्यक्ष   .
The Sovereign  प्रिंस  or Princess  of  Monaco  is  the reigning  monarch  and  सिर   of  state  of   the  Principality  of  Monaco  .
All princes or  राजकुमारियों   have   officially  taken the name of  the  House of Grimaldi ,  लकिन  have belonged to various other houses (  goyon  de  matignon   ,  Polignac )  in   पुरूष   लकीर   .
The reigning  प्रिंस   is  Albert  ii  .
कल्पना  of  fragmentation   और   तब   of  defragmentation
In  the  maintenance of file systems , defragmentation is a  प्रक्रम  that  reduces  the amount  of  fragmentation .
It does this by  physically   आयोजन  the  सामग्री  of  the  mass  भंडार  device used to store  फाइलें  into the smallest  क्रमांक  of contiguous regions ( fragments ) .
It also  कोशिशें  to create  larger  regions of free space using compaction to  impede  the return of  fragmentation  .
Some defragmentation utilities try to keep  छोटी  files within a  सिंगल   निर्देशिका  together , as they are often accessed in  अनुक्रम   .
Defragmentation is advantageous and  प्रासंगिक   to  file  प्रणालियों  on  electromechanical   डिस्क  drives .
The movement  of   the  hard drive 's read/write heads over  अलग   क्षेत्रों   of  the  डिस्क  when accessing fragmented files  is  slower , compared to accessing the  संपूर्ण   सामग्री  of  a  non-fragmented  संचिका  sequentially without  चलती  the  read/write  heads to seek other fragments .
a  service-level agreement ( SLA  )  is a  भाग   of   a   सेवा   अनुबंध  where  a  service is formally defined .
In  अभ्यास  , the term SLA is sometimes  प्रयुक्त   to   refer  to the contracted delivery time ( of  the   सेवा   or  performance )  .
As an  उदाहरण  , internet  सेवा  providers will commonly include  सेवा   स्तर   समझौतों  within the terms of  उनके  contracts with customers to define  the   स्तर  ( s )  of  service being sold in  मैदान  language terms .
In  इस  case the  sla  will  typically  have a technical  परिभाषा   in   शर्तें  of mean time  between   असफलताओं  (  mtbf  ) , mean time to repair or  औसत   समय  to recovery ( MTTR )  ;  various data rates  ;  throughput ;  जिटर  ; or similar  measurable  details .
Union Station is a  पूर्व   खरीदारी  mall  in  Union City , Georgia  ,  in  दक्षिणपश्चिम  metro Atlanta  सटा  to Interstate  85  .
After new  स्वामित्व  and  renovations   in  2006  ,  the  नाम  was changed  इससे  Shannon Southpark Mall in 2007  to  Union Station Mall  .
A previous renovation was done  in   the  late 1990s .
The mall  रै  been closed since November 2010 .
This  मैप  shows the  संलग्न   संयुक्त   राज्य   और  , in insets  at   the  lower left ,  the  two  राज्य  that are not  संलग्न  .
the   संलग्न  United States are the 48 adjoining U.S. states on the  महाद्वीप   of  North America that are south of Canada and north of  मैक्सिको  , plus  the   ज़िला   of   कोलंबिया  .
The term excludes the  राज्य   of  Alaska and Hawaii , and all off-shore U.S. territories  और  possessions , such as  प्यूर्टो   रीको  .
साथ  ,  the   48  contiguous states and  d.C.  occupy a  संयुक्त   क्षेत्रफल  of , which is 1.58  %   of  the total surface area of the Earth  .
Of this ,  is  land , composing 83.65 %  of   u.S.   जमीन  area .
Officially , is water area , composing  62.66  %  of   the  nation 's water area  .
The 2010  जनसांख्यिकी  population was 306,675,006 ,  composing  99.33  %  of the  स्वदेश   's  population ,  और  a density  of   103.639  inhabitants/sq mi (  40.015/km2  ) , compared to 87.264/sq  mi  ( 33.692/km2 ) for the nation as a  पूरे   .
``  Why ''  is   the  title of a song recorded  by  American country  बैंड  Rascal  flatts   .
it   is  the third  सिंगल   इससे   उनके  sixth studio  एल्बम   ,  Unstoppable .
It was released to  रेडियो   स्टेशन   on  September  29  ,  2009  and  debuted  at  #  44 on the U.S . Billboard US Billboard Hot  देश   गीतों  chart for  the   सप्ताह  of October 10 ,  2009  .
it  was  लिखा   by  Rob Mathes and Allen Shamblin .
Utilization management is  the   मूल्यांकन   of   the   appropriateness  , medical  need  and efficiency  of  health  परवाह  services procedures and facilities according to established  मापदण्ड  or guidelines and  अंतर्गत  the  प्रावधानों  of an applicable health benefits  योजना  .
typically  it includes new activities  or  decisions based upon the analysis of a case .
Utilization management describes proactive  प्रक्रियाओं   ,   सहित  discharge planning , concurrent planning , pre-certification  और   नैदानिक   मामला   appeals   .
it  also covers  proactive  processes , such as concurrent clinical reviews and peer reviews , as well as  appeals  introduced by the provider , payer or patient .
As  pre-certification  and  संयुक्त   पुनर्विलोकन   of  cases grew ,  utilization  management spun  आउट   of   utilization  review .
जबकि   नहीं  synonymous , health  परवाह   पेशेवर   tend  to use the terms  as  interchangeable  .
the  difference is  utilization  management  is  and  intends   to  manage health  परवाह   मामले  efficiently and cost  effectively  before  और  during  स्वास्थ्य   परवाह  administration .
utilization  review is  अधिक  considering whether health care was appropriately  लागू  after  it  was administered  .
There are four basic  तकनीकों  in utilization  management:
Demand Management
Utilization Review
Case Management
Disease Management
The Outsiders  is   a  coming-of-age novel by S. E. Hinton ,  पहला  published in  1967  by Viking  दबायें  .
Hinton was 15 when she started writing the novel , but did  सबसे  of the work when she was sixteen and a junior in high school .
hinton  was 18  जब   the   किताब  was published .
The book follows  दो  rival groups , the Greasers  और  the Socs ( pronounced by the author as , short  लिये  Socials  )  , who are divided by their  socioeconomic   औकात   .
The  किताब  takes  प्लेस  in Tulsa  ,   ओक्लाहोमा  , in  1965   ,  but  it  is never stated  in  the  किताब   .
a  film adaptation was produced in 1983 ,  और  a little-known  short-lived  television series appeared in  1990  , picking up  जहाँ  the  फिल्म   बाएँ  off .
The  संयुक्त   राज्य  House  of  Representatives is one  of   the  two  घरों  of the United  राज्य  Congress  (  a bicameral legislature )  .
It is frequently referred to as the House .
The other house is the  सीनेट  .
The composition  और   शक्तियां  of  the  House are established in  आलेख  One of the United States Constitution  .
The major power of  the  House  is  to pass  संघीय  legislation  कि  affects the entire country  हालांकि  its  बिल्स   जरूर  also  be  passed by the Senate and further agreed to by the U.S.  अध्यक्ष  before becoming  विधि  ( unless  दोनो  the  हाउस  and Senate re-pass the legislation with a  two-thirds  majority in  प्रत्येक  chamber ) .
The  हाउस  has  अनेक  exclusive powers : the power to  initiate  revenue bills ,  to  impeach officials , and  to  elect  the   u.S.   अध्यक्ष  in case there  is  no majority in  the  Electoral College .
Each U.S.  राज्य  is represented in the  हाउस  in proportion to its  जनसांख्यिकी  but is entitled  to  at least one representative  .
The most populous state , California , currently has  53  representatives .
the  total  क्रमांक  of voting  प्रतिनिधि  is  फिक्स्ड   by  law  at   435  .
Each representative serves for  a  two-year  पद   .
The Speaker of the United States House of  प्रतिनिधि   ,  who  presides   over  the chamber  ,  is elected by the members of the House , and is therefore traditionally the leader  of  the House  लोकतांत्रिक   caucus   or   the   हाउस  Republican Conference ,  whichever  party  रै  more voting  सदस्यों   .
The House meets in  the   दक्षिण  wing of the United States Capitol .
A supply chain is actually a  जटिल  and  डायनेमिक   सप्लाई  and demand network .
(  cf  .  Wieland/Wallenburg  ,  2011  )
A  सप्लाई  chain is  a   प्रणाली  of organizations , people , activities  ,   सूचना  , and  संसाधन  involved in  चलती   a  product or service from supplier  to  customer  .
Supply  कड़ी  activities  रूपांतरण   प्राकृतिक  resources , raw materials  ,  and components into a finished product  कि   is   वितरित  to the  समाप्त  customer .
In sophisticated supply chain systems , used products may re-enter the  सप्लाई  chain at any point where residual  मान  is  recyclable  .
Supply chains  कड़ी  value chains .
``  जामुनी   haze  ''  is  a song written and recorded  by  Jimi Hendrix in 1967 , released as the second single  by  The  जिमि  Hendrix  अनुभव  in  दोनो  the  संयुक्त   किंगडम   और   the  United States .
It later  appeared  on the American version of  the  band 's  1967   एल्बम  Are You Experienced .
``  जामुनी   haze   ''   रै  become one of  the  `` archetypical psychedelic drug songs of the sixties ''  .
`` Purple Haze 's  ''  guitar  virtuosic  techniques would  be  emulated by many metal guitarists .
a  close up picture of a rhinoceros skin .
स्किन  is  the  soft  बाहरी   covering   of  vertebrates .
Other animal coverings such as the arthropod exoskeleton have different developmental origin , structure and chemical composition .
The adjective cutaneous  अर्थात्  `` of the  स्किन  '' (  इससे   लैटिन  cutis ,  स्किन   )  .
In mammals  ,   the  skin is the largest organ of the integumentary  प्रणाली  made  up   of  multiple layers of ectodermal  ऊतक  , and guards  the  underlying muscles , bones , ligaments  और   आतंरिक   अंगों  .
Skin of a different nature  exists  in amphibians ,  सरीसृपों   ,  and  पक्षियों   .
All  स्तनधारियों  have some hair on their skin  ,   भी   समुद्री   स्तनधारियों  which  appear  to  be  hairless  .
the  skin interfaces with  the  environment and  is  the first line of  रक्षा  from  बाह्य   कारकों   .
For example , the skin  plays  a key role in  protecting   the  body against pathogens and excessive  जल  loss .
Its  अन्य  functions  हैं  insulation ,  तापमान  regulation , sensation  ,  and the production  of  vitamin D  folates   .
severely  damaged  स्किन   may  heal by  forming  scar  ऊतक  .
इस  is  sometimes  discoloured and depigmented  .
the  thickness of skin  भी  varies from  स्थान  to location on  an   सजीव   .
In humans  लिये  example , the skin  स्तिथ  under the  आँखें  and  around   the   eyelids  is the thinnest skin in  the   देह   at  0.5 mm  मोटा  , and is  एक   of   the  first areas to  दिखाएँ   लक्षण   of   वृद्धावस्था  such  as  ``  crows  feet '' and  झुर्रियां  .
The skin on the  हथेलियां  and the soles of the feet is  4  mm  मोटा  and the thickest skin in the body .
फर   is  dense  बाल   .
Primarily ,  फर   augments   the   इन्सुलेशन   the  skin provides  लकिन  can  भी   serve   as   a  secondary sexual characteristic  or  as camouflage .
On some animals , the  स्किन  is  बहुत   मुश्किल  and  मोटा  , and  can  be processed  to  create leather  .
Reptiles and fish  have   मुश्किल  protective scales on  उनके  skin for protection , and birds  have  hard feathers  ,  all made of tough β- keratins .
Amphibian skin is not a  दमदार  barrier  to  passage of chemicals and is often subject to  परासरण  and  diffusive   शक्तियां   .
लिये  example , a  मेंढक  sitting  in  an anesthetic  समाधान   होता   be  sedated  जल्दी  ,  as  the chemical diffuses through its skin .
थामस  Scott
the   रेव  . Thomas  स्कॉट  ( 1747-1821  )   थी   an  influential preacher  और  author who is principally known for  उसके  best-selling work A Commentary On The Whole  बाइबल  and  the  Force  of  Truth , and as  एक   of  the  संस्थापकों  of the Church Missionary Society  .
Daniel Radcliffe ,  जो  portrays  हैरी  Potter , has been the  प्रतीक  of the  फिल्मी  series  चूंकि  the release of the  पहला  film in  2001  .
Some of the most  प्रसिद्ध   अभिनेताओं   of   the   संयुक्त  Kingdom and  आयरलैंड  have voiced or  portrayed  characters appearing  in  the Harry  कुम्हार  film series based on the  किताब  series  by  J. K. Rowling .
Daniel Radcliffe ,  रुपर्ट   grint  and Emma Watson have played Harry Potter  ,  Ron Weasley and  हर्माइनी  Granger  in  all the films .
When  वे  were cast only  radcliffe  had previously acted in a film  .
Complementing them  on  screen  हैं  such actors  as  Helena Bonham Carter , Jim Broadbent  ,  John Cleese ,  रोबी  Coltrane , Warwick Davis , Ralph Fiennes , Michael Gambon  ,  Brendan Gleeson , Richard  ग्रीफिथ  , Richard Harris , John Hurt ,  जेसन  Isaacs ,  miriam  Margolyes , Helen  mccrory   ,  Gary Oldman , Alan Rickman  ,  Fiona Shaw , Maggie Smith  ,  Timothy Spall ,  imelda  Staunton ,  दाउद  Thewlis , Emma Thompson , and Julie  walters  ,  among   अन्य  .
तेरह   अभिनेताओं  have  appeared  as  the  same character in all  आठ  films of the franchise .
कुछ  well-known  अंग्रेजों  actors who have not appeared in the series , are asked in jest why  वे  have  नहीं  been cast .
When  दाउद  Yates  थी  directing  the   पांचवां  film  ,  Bill Nighy , who had previously  collaborated   साथ  Yates on three of  उसके  television projects , said that  he  joked with  येट्स  that maybe now he would n't be  the   तभी  actor  in  England who had n't been  in   हैरी   कुम्हार  .
`` But nobody called  ''  ,  nighy  added .
But in 2009 ,  येट्स  cast  nighy  as Minister of Magic Rufus Scrimgeour  in  Deathly  hallows  .
Nighy said , ``  i  am no longer the  तभी  English actor not  to   be  in Harry Potter  और  I am very pleased . ''
Jude  विधि  has quipped , `` Nobody  's  asked me .
I was a bit  too   बूढ़ा  for Harry '' .
When  a  reporter compared potions  प्राध्यापक  Horace Slughorn 's obsession with famous names  to  the series ' connection to `` every notable British actor , '' Jim Broadbent ,  जो  plays Slughorn said  ,  ``  खूब  , not  प्रत्येक   कर्ता  gets invited  .
I know  कुछ  who  हैं   स्टिल  waiting  .  ''
With the  एक्सेप्शन  of Chris Columbus , each director has had  a  cameo appearance in his respective film  :  Alfonso Cuarón appears as a  जादूगर  holding a candle during  a  scene at The Three Broomsticks in Prisoner of Azkaban ; Mike Newell is heard briefly  as  the  रेडियो  presenter in Frank Bryce  's   हाउस  in Goblet of Fire ;  और   दाउद  Yates features as a wizard within a  जादुई  moving portrait in  अनुक्रम   of  the  फीनिक्स  .
Producer  दाउद  Heyman  भी  makes a cameo appearance  as  a wizard featured within a magical  चलती   पोर्ट्रेट  in  the  third film  ,  Prisoner  of  Azkaban .
J. K.  रोलिंग   दिया  a speech  दौरान  the world premiere of the  फाइनल   फिल्मी   in   the   series—  Harry  कुम्हार   और  the  deathly  Hallows Part 2 —on 7 July 2011 in  लंदन  ,  इंग्लैण्ड   .
She  घोषित  that she could never have dreamt of the  प्रतिभाशाली  actors and actresses who have appeared in all the Harry Potter movies .
Rowling also announced  कि  there are  सात  Harry Potter film series  डाल   सदस्यों  , who she refers to as  ``  The Big  सात  '' ,  वे   हैं  Daniel  radcliffe  ,  रुपर्ट  Grint , Emma Watson  ,  Tom Felton , Matthew  लुईस  , Evanna  लिंच   और   bonnie  Wright .
The list below is  sorted  by  फिल्मी   और  character  ,  as some characters have been  portrayed   by   अनेक  actors .
कुंजी
(  v ) indicates the actor or  अभिनेत्री  lent only his or her voice for  उसके   or  her  फिल्मी  character
(  y   )   indicates   the  actor  or  actress portrayed the role in a flashback scene or when  the  character  थी  young .
(  f ) indicates the actor or actress  किया  not appear  in  any new footage for the film  ;   फुटेज   इससे   an  earlier film or films  थी  used .
A light grey cell (  ऐसे  as the one in the `` Charity Burbage  ''  row  in  the `` Philosopher 's Stone ''  कालम  )  indicates  the character was not  in  the  फिल्मी   अनुकूलन   .
a   twelve-step  program is a set of  guiding   सिद्धान्त  ( accepted by  सदस्यों   as  'spiritual principles , ' based on  the   स्वीकृत  literature ) outlining a  कोर्स   of   कार्रवाई  for recovery from , compulsion  ,   or  other behavioral problems .
Originally proposed by Alcoholics Anonymous ( AA ) as a method of recovery from  alcoholism  ,  the  Twelve  कदम  were first published in  the  book  alcoholics  Anonymous : The Story of How  अधिक  Than One Hundred Men  have  Recovered from  alcoholism   in  1939 .
the  method was then adapted  और  became the foundation  of   अन्य  twelve-step programs .
As summarized  by   the   अमरीकी   मनोवैज्ञानिक  Association , the  प्रक्रम  involves the following:
admitting   कि  one can not control  एक  's addiction or compulsion ;
recognizing a higher power that can  दे  strength ;
examining past errors  साथ  the  सहायता   of  a sponsor ( experienced  सदस्य  )  ;
बनाना  amends for these errors ;
learning to  सजीव  a new  जीवन   साथ  a new  कोड   of   बर्ताव  ;
helping others  जो  suffer from  the  same addictions or compulsions .
Witness  महाभियोग  , in the law  of  evidence of the United States  ,  is the process  of  calling  into  question  the  credibility of an  व्यक्तिगत  who is testifying in  a  trial  .
The  संघीय  Rules of  प्रमाण   contain  the rules  शासी  impeachment in federal  न्यायालयों  .
पार्टी  leaders and  whips  of the United States House  of  Representatives are elected by  उनके   संबंधित   पार्टियों  in a closed-door caucus by secret  बैलट  and are also  ज्ञात  as floor  नेताओ  .
the  U.S. House of Representatives does  नहीं  officially use the  पद  `` Minority Leader  ''  although the  मीडिया   अक्सर  do  .
The House instead  उपयोग  the terms `` Republican Leader '' or  ``   लोकतांत्रिक  Leader  ''  depending on which  पार्टी  holds a  अल्पसंख्यक  of seats .
The current  हाउस  Majority Leader is  रिपब्लिकन  Eric Cantor , while  the   वर्तमान  House Minority Leader is Democrat Nancy  pelosi   .
The current House Majority Whip is  रिपब्लिकन   केविन  McCarthy , while the current  हाउस  Minority Whip is Democrat Steny Hoyer .
Following  the   outbreak   of  World War I in 1914  ,   the   जर्मनी   फौज  opened  the  Western Front by first invading Luxembourg and Belgium , then gaining military control of important  औद्योगिक  regions in France  .
the  tide of the advance was  dramatically  turned with the  बैटल  of the Marne .
Following the race  to  the  समुद्र  , both sides dug in along a meandering line  of   fortified   trenches   ,  stretching  इससे  the  उत्तर   समुद्र  to the Swiss frontier  साथ   फ़्रांस  .
इस   लकीर  remained essentially unchanged for most of the war .
Between  1915  and  1917  there  यहूद  several major offensives  साथ   इस  front  .
The  हमले   employed  massive  तोपखाने  bombardments  और  massed  infantry  advances .
However , a combination of entrenchments , machine  गन   nests  ,  कंटीले  wire , and artillery repeatedly  inflicted   कठोर  casualties  on  the  हमलावर  and counterattacking  defenders  .
As a result ,  no  significant advances were  बना  .
among  the most costly of these offensives were the Battle of Verdun with  a  combined [ estimated ] 700,000 dead , the  बैटल  of  the   somme  with more than [ an estimated ] million  हताहत  ,  और   the  Battle of Passchendaele with roughly [ an  अनुमानित  ] 600,000 casualties  .
In  an   प्रयत्न  to break  the  deadlock ,  इस  front saw the introduction  of   नई  military technology ,  सहित  poison gas  ,  aircraft and tanks .
But it  थी  only after the adoption of improved tactics  कि  some degree of mobility  थी   लौटी  .
the  German Spring Offensive of 1918  थी   बना  possible by the Treaty of Brest-Litovsk that marked the end of the  विरोध  on the Eastern  सामने   .
Using the  recently-introduced  infiltration tactics  ,   the   जर्मनी   सेना   उन्नत   nearly  to  the  west , which marked the deepest  अग्रिम  by either side since 1914 and very nearly succeeded  in   forcing  a breakthrough .
In  spite  of  the   generally  stagnant nature of this  सामने  , this  थिएटर  would prove decisive  .
The inexorable advance of  the  Allied  सेना   दौरान   the  second half of 1918 persuaded the German  कमांडरों  that defeat was  अपरिहार्य   ,   और   the  government  थी   मजबूर  to  मुकदमा  for  शर्तें  of an armistice .
The terms of peace were agreed upon with the  हस्ताक्षर  of  the  Treaty of Versailles in 1919  .
The following  is  a  सूची   of   पुनरावर्ती  and  नाबालिग  characters  in  the  डिज़्नी  Channel Original Series The Suite  जीवन  of Zack  &  Cody .

The following list  of  characters  रै  been sorted alphabetically  ,   by  first  नाम  .
Some of the characters  था  no  पिछला  name and most  यहूद  commonly referred to by  उनके   पहला  name so this appeared to be the most logical method  .

the   पहला   महिला  of  the   संयुक्त   राज्य  ( FLOTUS )  is  the  होस्टेस  of  the  White  हाउस  .
Because this position  is  traditionally  भर   by  the wife of the President of  the  United  राज्य   ,  the title is most  प्रायः  applied to the  बीवी  of a sitting  अध्यक्ष   .
The current First Lady is  मिशेल  Obama .
After her  husband  Barack Obama was re-elected  on  November 6  ,   2012  , she  is  scheduled to  serve  until January  20  , 2017 .
Septic shock is a  चिकित्सा  condition as a result  of   कठोर  infection and sepsis , though  the  microbe may  be   प्रणालीगत  or localized to a particular site .
It can cause multiple organ dysfunction syndrome ( formerly known as multiple organ failure ) and death .
Its most  आम  victims are children ,  immunocompromised  individuals  ,  and  the   बुजुर्ग  , as their immune systems can not deal  साथ   the  infection  as  effectively as  those  of healthy  वयस्कों  .
Frequently  ,  patients suffering from septic  शॉक  are cared for in intensive  परवाह   इकाई  .
The mortality rate from septic shock  is  approximately 25–50 % .
Kevin Brereton ( born February 20 , 1972 ) ,  बेहतर  known  by  his stage  नाम  k-os ( ;  ``  chaos  ''   )   ,  is a Canadian rapper ,  सिंगर  , songwriter and record  निर्माता  .
उसके   दिए  name may also  be   cited   as  Kheaven  ,   a  spelling he later  अपनाया  .
the  alias `` k-os '' , spelled  साथ   a   निम्नतर   मामला   ``   k  ''  ,  was  intended  to be less aggressive than the pseudonyms  of  other rappers whose  names  were all upper  मामला   ,  such  as  KRS-One  .
it  is  an   एक्रोनिम  for  ``  Knowledge of Self  ,   ''  although in a later interview  he  said that  it  originally  stood  for `` Kevin 's  असली  Sound . '' k-os ' music incorporates  a  wide variety of music genres  ,  including rap  ,   दुर्गंध   ,  rock , and reggae .
The lyrics frequently focus on  promoting  a ``  धनात्मक  message  ''  while  at  times expressing  आलोचना  of  मुख्यधारा  hip  हॉप  culture  's   obsession  with money , fame and glorification  of  violence .
A  संगीतकार  as well as  a  producer , k-os has  लिखा  and produced  nearly   प्रत्येक   भाग   of  all  चार  of  उसके  albums .
k-os usually performs  साथ  a  सजीव   बैंड   ,   कुछ   कि  is uncommon in  the  hip hop  विधा  .
He sometimes  plays  guitar and keyboard  दोनो  during  सजीव  performances  और  in  the  studio .
k-os  received his  पहला  musical exposure with  the  single ``  musical  Essence '' , released  in   1993  .
After the release  of   उसके  second single  ``   वृद्धि  Like the Sun '' in  1996  , he  withdrew   इससे  the  उद्योग  because he was dissatisfied with  उसके  musical  स्टाइल   .
he  reappeared briefly in 1999  और   released   उसके  debut album Exit  in   2002  .
the  album received positive reviews but  बेची  relatively  few  copies .
he   released  his  दूसरी  album Joyful Rebellion  in  2004  ,  which received platinum status  in  Canada .
a  third  एल्बम  , , was released in  2006   और  also went platinum .
His fourth album , Yes  !
, was released in 2009 .
उसके   पांचवां  album  ब्लैक  on BLonde was released in  2013  .
The  आधिकारिक  2007 edition of the UCC  .
Even the confidential rough drafts of the UCC were saved  और   प्रकाशित  as a  10-volume  set .
the  Uniform Commercial  कोड   (  UCC or the Code ) , first  प्रकाशित  in 1952 , is one of a  क्रमांक  of uniform acts that have  महरूम  promulgated in conjunction  साथ   प्रयत्न   to  harmonize the law  of   बिक्री  and other  वाणिज्यिक  transactions in all 50 states within  the  United States  of  America  .
Multi-pitch climbing is the ascent  of  climbing routes with one or more stops  at  a belay station  .
Each  खण्ड  of actual climbing between stops at the belay stations is called  a   पिच  .
The leader  ascends  the  पिच   ,   रखकर   गियर   और  stopping to anchor themselves  to  the  belay  station .
The reason for the  stops  can be determined  by  choice  ,  convention or necessity  .
लिये   example:
The rope  is  too short to do the entire route  in  one  पिच   (  necessity ) .
The leader has run  आउट   of   सुरक्षात्मक  gear  (   necessity  )  .
There is a  सुविधाजनक  protectable ledge ,  or   फिक्स्ड   bolts   लगाई   by   पिछला  climbers , at the location for  a  belay station  (  convention ) .
The leader chooses  to  rest  or   एक्सचेंज  leads  पहले  the next section  of   the  climb ( choice ) .
The  सामान्य   purpose  of these stops is to allow the  दूसरी   to  ascend to the  पाइंट  of the lead climber while collecting  the  protective gear from  the  route in  the  course of the lead  climber  's  ascent  .
at   the  belay  स्टेशन   ,   the  protective  गियर  is collected , possibly exchanged to a new leader  ,  and the leader of  the   अगला   पिच  ascends the route  .
A  आरेख   प्रर्दशित  an  i  Formation on offense and a 4-3  गठन  on defense
in  American football , each team has eleven players  on   the   फ़ील्ड   at  one time .
The  विशिष्ट   भूमिका  that a player takes on  the  field is called their  स्थिति  .
अंतर्गत  the modern rules of American football , teams are  अनुमत  unlimited  subsititutions  , that is  टीमों  may change any number of players after any play .
This has resulted in the  विकास   of  three `` platoons '' of  खिलाड़ी  , the  ठोकर  ( the  टोली  with the ball , who is  trying  to  स्कोर  )  ,  the  रक्षा  ( the team trying to prevent the other team from scoring , and  to  take the ball from  उन्हें  ) ,  और  the special  टीमों  (  जो  play in kicking situations ) .
Within those platoons , various specific positions exist  depending  on what the player 's  प्रमुख  job is .
the   नियंत्रित  Substances Act ( CSA  )  was  enacted  into law  by  the  कॉंग्रेस   of  the  संयुक्त  States as Title  ii  of  the   व्यापक  Drug Abuse Prevention and  कंट्रोल   अधिनियम  of 1970 .
The  सीएसए  is the federal  u.S.   ड्रग   नीति  under which  the  manufacture , importation , possession , use and distribution  of   निश्चित  substances is regulated .
The Act  भी  served as the national implementing  विधान   लिये  the Single Convention on  narcotic  Drugs .
the   विधान   निर्मित  five Schedules ( classifications ) , with varying  योग्यता   लिये  a substance to  be  included in each .
Two federal agencies , the  ड्रग  Enforcement  प्रशासन  and  the  Food and Drug  प्रशासन  , determine  जिससे  substances are added to or removed  इससे  the various schedules , though the statute passed  by   कॉंग्रेस  created the initial listing  ,   और  Congress  रै   sometimes   अनुसूचित   अन्य   substances   through  legislation  ऐसे  as the Hillory  J.   farias  and Samantha Reid  date-rape  Prevention Act of  2000  ,  जिससे  placed  गामा  hydroxybutyrate in Schedule  i   .   वर्गीकरण   निर्णय  are  जरूरी   to   be  made on criteria including potential  लिये   गाली  (  an  undefined  पद  ) , currently accepted medical  उपयोग  in  उपचार  in the  संयुक्त  States  ,   और   अंतरराष्ट्रीय  treaties  .
The  वेन  Route 23 Transit  बीच  is  a   नई   जर्सी   पारगमन   park-and-ride  station in Wayne ,  नई  Jersey along the  montclair-boonton  Line  कि  provides bus service to  नई   यॉर्क  City and various other points  in  the area as well as  montclair-boonton  Line train  सेवा   to  New York , Hoboken ,  और   इंटरमीडिएट  points along  the  line between Hackettstown and Montclair  राज्य   विश्वविद्यालयों  .
It  is  located off  of  the southbound lanes of New  जर्सी  Route 23 on West Belt  सड़क  , near the interchange where Route 23 , Interstate  80  , and U.S.  रूट  46 meet , across from  the   willowbrook   मॉल   .
the   स्टेशन  opened in  जनवरी  2008 and  रै  1,000 parking spaces .
New Jersey Transit  intends  for this combined  रेल   और  bus station to become an `` interceptor station , '' that  होगा  help relieve the habitual  जमघट  at the West Belt  सड़क  Interchange , where the three  प्रमुख  highways  मिलें  .
in   जोड  , the  निर्माण  of the station was meant  to   भी   आसानी   the  congestion at  कया   थी  then  रूट  23 Park  &   सवारी   ,  a bus depot on  रूट  23 North that has  चूंकि  been renamed Mother  's  Park & Ride , and the  willowbrook  Mall  पार्क  &  सवारी  ; the now-Mother 's site  था   सीमित  parking while NJT was having trouble with overfull parking areas  at   willowbrook  .
The Wayne Township bus  गैरेज  is located on the opposite  पक्ष  of  रूट  23  .
There  रै  been a proposal to  निर्माण   a  parking deck with  another  thousand  धब्बे  and develop the  जमीन  at  the   स्टेशन   .
in  addition to Montclair-Boonton trains  ,   the  Transit Center is served  by  the following  नई  Jersey  पारगमन  bus lines:
75  to Newark Penn Station and Butler
194  to  Port Authority Bus  टर्मिनल  and Butler/Newfoundland
198 to  बंदरगाहों   प्राधिकार  Bus  टर्मिनल  and William Paterson University
324  to Port Authority  और  Wayne Route  23
748  to Willowbrook Mall and Paterson
The  at  sign @  is   भी   commonly  called  the   at  symbol  ,  ampersat  ,   apetail  or commercial at in  english—and   कम  commonly  a  wide range of other  शर्तें   .
The fact  कि  there is no  सिंगल  word  in   अंग्रेज़ी  for  the  symbol has prompted some writers to use the French  arobase  or Spanish and Portuguese arroba—or to coin  नई  words  ऐसे  as asperand , ampersat—but none of  ये  has  हासिल  wide currency .
Originally  an   हिसाब  and commercial invoice abbreviation meaning  ``  at the rate of '' ( e.g . 7 widgets @ $ 2 = $ 14 ) ,  it   थी   नहीं  included on  the  keyboard of the earliest commercially successful typewriters , but was on  at  least one 1889  मॉडल  and the very successful Underwood  मॉडल  from  the  `` Underwood No  .  5 '' in  1900  onward .
It  is   अभी  universally  शामिल   on  computer keyboards  .
In recent years  ,  its  अर्थ  has grown to include the sense of being `` located at , '' `` and , '' or `` directed  at  '' , especially in email addresses  और  social media , particularly Twitter .
the   चिह्नित  is  एनकोडेड  at .
The Catcher in  the  Rye  is  a 1951 novel by J. D.  salinger   .
originally   प्रकाशित  for adults , it has since become popular with adolescent readers for  इसके  themes of teenage angst  और  alienation  .
It  रै  been translated into  लगभग  all of  the  world 's major languages .
around  250,000 copies are sold each  साल   साथ  total sales of more  than  65 million books  .
the  novel 's protagonist  और   antihero  , Holden Caulfield ,  रै   become  an icon for teenage  विद्रोह  .
The novel was  शामिल   on   टाइम्स   2005  list of the  100   बेहतरीन  English-language novels  लिखा  since 1923  ,  and it was named by Modern Library  और  its readers as  एक  of the  100  best English-language  novels   of  the  20th  century  .
It has been  अक्सर   challenged  in the United  राज्य  and  अन्य   देशों   लिये  its  उदार  use  of   profanity   और  portrayal  of  sexuality .
It  भी  deals  साथ  complex issues  of   पहचान  , belonging , connection , and alienation .
Skeletal  मांसपेशियां   होमो  sapiens
This is  a   तालिका   of   मांसपेशियां   of  the human anatomy .
There are  लगभग  642 skeletal  मांसपेशियां  within the typical  इंसान  , and almost  प्रत्येक  muscle constitutes one part of a  जोड़ी  of identical bilateral muscles ,  मिला   on   दोनो   पहलू   ,   resulting   in  approximately 320 pairs of muscles ,  as  presented in this  आलेख   .
nevertheless   ,  the exact  क्रमांक   is  difficult to  define  because different sources group muscles  differently  ,  e.g  . regarding  कया   is  defined  as  different  भाग   of  a single  मांसपेशी  or  as  several  मांसपेशियां  .
Examples range  इससे  640  to   850  .
The muscles of  the  human body  can  be  categorized   into  a number of groups which include  मांसपेशियां   relating  to the  सिर  and neck , muscles of the torso or trunk  ,   मांसपेशियां  of the upper  limbs   ,  and muscles of the lower  limbs  .
the  action  refers   to   the  action  of   प्रत्येक  muscle from the  मानक   anatomical  position .
In other positions , other  क्रियाएँ  may be  performed  .
Bad Girls Club (  bgc  ) is  an   अमरीकी  reality television  श्रेणी   निर्मित  by  जोनाथन  Murray for the Oxygen  टेलीविज़न  station  .
the  show centers on seven feisty and mischievous  महिलाओं  with different backgrounds and personalities , who have a  क्रमांक  of psychological  और  behavioral problems .
They are introduced  to   the  show off their pernicious behavior and accomplish specific goals  .
The  डाल  , deemed `` bad girls '' , enjoy a luxurious lifestyle  in   a   ठीक  mansion  लिये  three  महीने  , during which they must obey specified rules .
Their lives inside –  और  outside – of  the  house are chronicled and  अंकित  by the production team  .
the  Bad  लड़कियों  Club  is  broadcast  in  five countries ( United States , Netherlands , Australia ,  हंगेरियाई  ,  और   स्वीडन   )   .
it  has received negative reviews from  आलोचकों   ,  who believe the show  promotes  violence  by  adolescent viewers .
Furthermore ,  अनेक  cast members made controversial  remarks  which outraged many viewers .
The format of the show has  बदला   इससे  early seasons .
If a `` bad  लड़की  '' breaks a  नियम  , she is  evicted  from  the  show and  ,  if it is  जल्दी   in  the season ,  replaced  by a new `` bad  लड़की  ''  .
There have been nine  पूरा  seasons of The Bad Girls Club ,  साथ  the tenth season currently airing .
The fourth season had the  उच्चतम   दरजा  in the  दिखाएँ  's history , becoming its  ``  breakthrough  ऋतु  '' .
There  have  been  तीन  spin-offs of The Bad  लड़कियों  Club .
One of them ,  प्रेम  Games  :   ख़राब  Girls Need Love Too  ,  where past cast  सदस्यों  seek true love  ,   रै  gained high  दरजा  .
Oxygen  रै  also released a mobile game , comic  स्ट्रिप   और  merchandise to promote the show .
of  the  92  contestants , Kerry Harvick ( of  ऋतु   एक  ) was a successful country singer before the show  .
Tanisha Thomas ( of  ऋतु  two )  बाद  hosted Oxygen 's  oxygenlive  !
और   the   subsequent  seasons of Love Games :  ख़राब  Girls Need  प्रेम   too   .
Thomas , who has been  उतावले  the `` godmother '' to all contestants , has  उसके   अपना  television  वृत्तचित्र  entitled Tanisha Gets Married  .
As of Season  8  she 's  महरूम   the  host of the reunion specials .
The Iowa  सीनेट  is the upper  हाउस  of the Iowa  सामान्य  Assembly  .
वहीँ  are 50 seats in  the   आयोवा   सीनेट   ,  representing 50  single-member  districts across the state  साथ   populations  of  लगभग  60,927 per constituency ,  .
प्रत्येक  Senate  ज़िला  is  रचित  of  दो  House districts .
the  Senate meets  at  the Iowa  राज्य  Capitol in Des Moines .
Unlike the lower house , the Iowa House  of  Representatives ,  सीनेटरों  serve four-year terms , with  हाफ  of the  सीनेट  staggered for re-election  प्रत्येक  two years .
There are no term limits for the  सीनेट   .
Mechanical repair
Maintenance , repair ,  और  operations (  mro  )  or  maintenance  ,  repair  ,   और   overhaul  involves  फिक्सिंग  any sort  of  mechanical  ,  plumbing or electrical  यंत्र   चाहिए   it   become  out  of  order  or  broken ( known as  मरम्मत  , unscheduled  or  casualty  मेंटेनेंस   )   .
it  also  शामिल   performing  routine actions which  रखना  the device  in   working  order  (  known  as  scheduled  मेंटेनेंस   )   or   prevent  trouble from  arising   (   निवारक  maintenance  )  .
mro  may  be  defined  as  , `` All actions which have the  उद्देश्य  of  retaining   or  restoring  an  item in  or   to  a  राज्य  in which it can perform  इसके  required function  .
The actions include the  संयोजन   of  all  तकनीकी  and corresponding administrative  ,  managerial , and supervision actions . ''
MRO  परिचालन   can  be  categorised  by  whether   the  product  remains  the  प्रॉपर्टी  of  the  customer  ,  i.e . a service  is  being offered ,  or   whether  the  उत्पाद  is bought by the reprocessing  संगठन  and  बेची   to  any  ग्राहक   wishing  to make the  खरीदें  (  guadette   ,  2002  )  .
In  the   पूर्व  case it may  be  a  backshop  operation within a larger  संगठन   or  smaller  आपरेशन  .
The former  of  these  represents  a closed loop supply chain and  प्रायः  has the scope of maintenance , repair  or  of  the  product .
the  latter of  the  categorisations is an open loop supply chain and  is  typified by refurbishment  और  remanufacture  .
the  main characteristic of  the  closed loop system is that the  माँग  for a  उत्पाद  is matched  साथ  the supply  of  a used product .
Neglecting asset write-offs and exceptional activities  the  total population of the  उत्पाद  between the  ग्राहक  and the service provider remains constant  .
Prince William , Duke  of   कैम्ब्रिज  ( William Arthur Philip Louis ; born 21  जून   1982  )  ,  is the elder son of Charles ,  प्रिंस  of  वेल्स  , and Diana , Princess of  वेल्स  , and third-eldest grandchild of Queen  एलिज़ाबेथ  II and Prince  फिलिप  , Duke  of  Edinburgh  .
He is  दूसरी  in  the  line of  उत्तराधिकार   ,   पीछे  his father ,  to  the thrones  of  sixteen independent sovereign states known  as   the  Commonwealth realms  :  the  संयुक्त  Kingdom  ,  Canada ,  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  , New  जीलैंड   ,  Jamaica  ,  Barbados , The Bahamas ,  हरा   ,   पापुआ   नई  Guinea  ,   the  Solomon  आइलैंड्स   ,  Tuvalu , Saint Lucia  ,  Saint  विंसेंट  and the Grenadines ,  बेलीज़   ,   अण्टीगुआ   और  Barbuda , and  संत   किट्स  and Nevis  .
Prince  विलियम  was educated at four  स्कूलों  in the  संयुक्त  Kingdom  और  obtained a degree from  the  University of  st   एंड्रयूज  .
He spent  भाग  of a  गैप  year  in  Chile  ,  Belize , Tanzania , and Kenya where  he  has  जिया  and holidayed several times .
Prince William has  भी  taken Kiswahili studies at universities in Kenya and  तंजानिया  .
He was commissioned as a Lieutenant in  the   ब्लूज़   और   रॉयल्स  Regiment  of  the  household  Cavalry  —serving  with  उसके   bhai   प्रिंस  Harry  —and   ,  two years later ,  अर्जित  his wings  by   completing   पायलट   प्रशिक्षण  at Royal Air Force  कॉलेज  Cranwell .
In 2009 , he  transferred   to  the Royal Air Force , was promoted to  उड़ान   लेफ्टिनेंट   और  underwent helicopter flying  प्रशिक्षण   in   अनुक्रम  to become  a  full-time  पायलट  with the  ढूंढें  and  बचाव   फ़ोर्स  .
in  2010 , he completed his  सामान्य  and special-to-type  हेलीकाप्टर   प्रशिक्षण  and went on to  raf  Valley on No .  22  Squadron performing  co-pilot  duties  on   फलक   a  Sea King search  और  rescue  हेलीकाप्टर  .
Prince  विलियम   शादीशुदा  his longtime girlfriend , Catherine Middleton , on 29 April  2011  at Westminster Abbey .
घंटों   prior  to his  विवाह  , Prince  विलियम   थी   निर्मित   ड्यूक   of  Cambridge , Earl of Strathearn  ,   और  Baron Carrickfergus .
deandre  Cortez  रास्ता   (  born July 28 , 1990 ) ,  बेहतर   ज्ञात  by  उसके  stage name Soulja Boy Tell 'Em ,  or  simply Soulja  लड़के  ,  is  an  अमरीकी  rapper , record producer  ,  actor , and  उद्योगों  .
in  September 2007 , his single ``  crank  That  (  Soulja  लड़के  ) `` reached number one on the Billboard Hot  100  .
The single was initially self-published  on   the   अंतरजाल  , and  it  later  became   a  number-one  hit   in  the United  राज्य  for seven non-consecutive weeks  starting  in  सितंबर  2007 .
On  अगस्त  17 Way  थी  listed at # 18  on  the Forbes list of Hip-Hop Cash Kings  of  2010 earning $ 7  लाख  for  कि  year .
Way has currently released three studio  एल्बम  and  एक   स्वतंत्र  album :  उसके   डेब्यू  studio  एल्बम  Souljaboytellem.com (  2007  ) was  certified  platinum by  the   riaa   .
However , his next  दो  albums  ,  iSouljaBoyTellem ( 2008  )  and  the  DeAndre  रास्ता  ( 2010 ) did  नहीं  match  the   वाणिज्यिक  success of his  डेब्यू  ,  the  latter only selling  100,000  copies , despite  the  success of  अनेक  singles across  दोनो  albums , such as  ``  Kiss Me Thru  the  Phone  ``  and `` Turn  my  Swag On  ``  (  isouljaboytellem  )  और   ``  Pretty  लड़के  Swag `` (  the  DeAndre Way ) .
