As of 2011 , Way has confirmed he is working  on  his fourth studio  एल्बम  , entitled USA DRE , which will  be  released in 2013 .
The electron transport  कड़ी   in   the   सूत्रकणिका   is   the  site of  oxidative  phosphorylation  in  eukaryotes  .
The NADH and succinate generated  in   the   साइट्रिक  acid cycle  हैं  oxidized , providing  उर्जा  to power ATP synthase  .
photosynthetic  electron  हस्तांतरण  chain  of  the thylakoid  झिल्ली  .
An electron  हस्तांतरण   कड़ी   (  ETC  )  couples  इलेक्ट्रॉन  transfer  between  an  इलेक्ट्रॉन   दाता  ( such as  nadh  ) and an  इलेक्ट्रॉन   acceptor  (  ऐसे  as  o2  ) with the  ट्रांसफ़र   of  H+ ions ( protons  )  across a membrane .
The  resulting  electrochemical  प्रोटॉन  gradient  is  used to generate chemical energy in the form of  एडीनोसिन  triphosphate ( ATP  )  .
इलेक्ट्रॉन  transport  जंजीरों  are the  सेल्यूलर  mechanisms used for  extracting  energy  इससे  sunlight  in   photosynthesis  and also from  रेडॉक्स   प्रतिक्रियाएँ  , such as the  ऑक्सीकरण  of sugars (  श्वसन   )  .
In chloroplasts  ,  light  ड्राइव   the   परिवर्तन  of water to oxygen and NADP+ to NADPH with transfer of H+  ions  across chloroplast  झिल्लियों   .
in   mitochondria  , it  is  the conversion  of  oxygen  to  water  ,   nadh   to   naD+   और   succinate   to  fumarate that are required to generate the  प्रोटॉन   अनुपात  .
Electron transport chains are  प्रमुख   साइट  of premature electron  leakage   to  oxygen ,  generating  superoxide and potentially resulting in increased oxidative stress  .
Tramadol hydrochloride ( trademarked as  conzip  , Ryzolt ,  ultracet  , Ultram in  the  USA  ,  Ralivia , Zytram XL  durella  { CR-100/200 mg }  in  Canada or Adolonta in Spain ) is a centrally  एक्टिंग   सिंथेटिक  analgesic used  to  treat moderate  to  moderately severe pain  .
The  ड्रग  has  a   चौड़ी  range of  अनुप्रयोग   ,  including treatment  of  rheumatoid  गठिया  , restless legs  सिंड्रोम  ,  मोटर  neurone  बीमारी  and fibromyalgia .
It  थी   शुभारम्भ   और  marketed as  tramal  by  the  German pharmaceutical company  grünenthal  GmbH  in  1977 .
tramadol   is  a  कमजोर  μ-opioid receptor  agonist  that  भी   induces   serotonin  release and inhibits the reuptake of norepinephrine .
tramadol   is  metabolized to O-desmethyltramadol ,  a  significantly more potent μ-opioid agonist .
tramadol  and its major metabolite ( s ) are  विशिष्ट  from  अन्य   अधिक   potent   opioid  agonists  by  relative  selectivity  for μ-opioid receptors  .
Bernard Lawrence ``  बर्नी   ''  Madoff ( ; born April 29 ,  1938  ) is an American former  stockbroker  , investment advisor , financier , and white collar  दण्ड  .
He is the former non-executive Chairman of the NASDAQ stock market , and the admitted  ऑपरेटर  of a  पेन्शन  scheme  कि   is   माना  to be the  largest  financial fraud in U.S.  इतिहास   .
Madoff founded  the   वॉल  Street  कड़  Bernard L.  madoff   निवेश  Securities  llc  in 1960  ,   और  was its chairman  जबतक   उसके  arrest on December  11  ,  2008  .
the   कड़  was  एक  of the top market  मेकर  businesses on Wall Street , which bypassed `` specialist  ''  firms by  सीधे  executing orders over the counter from retail brokers .
He employed  at  the  कड़  his brother Peter as Senior Managing Director and Chief Compliance Officer ; Peter  रै  since been sentenced to 10 years in  थाना  .
Peter 's daughter Shana Madoff as the firm 's rules  और  compliance  अधिकारी  and attorney , and  उसके  sons Andrew and Mark ( Mark committed suicide by  फांसी  exactly two  सालो  after  उसके   पिता   's  arrest )  .
On  दिसम्बर  10 ,  2008  , Madoff 's sons told authorities that  उनके  father had confessed  to  them that  the   एसेट   प्रबन्धन  unit of  उसके   कड़   थी  a massive Ponzi  योजना  ,  और   कोटेड  him  as   describing  it  as  `` one  बिग   झूठ  .  ''
The following day  ,   एफबीआई  agents arrested Madoff  और  charged him with  एक  count of  प्रतिभूति   धोखाधड़ी  .
The  u.S.  Securities  और  Exchange Commission ( SEC ) had previously conducted  investigations   into  Madoff 's business  practices   ,   लकिन   किया  not uncover the  विशाल   धोखाधड़ी  .
In  कूच   2009   ,  Madoff  pleaded  guilty  to  11 federal felonies  और  admitted to turning his wealth management  कारोबार  into a  विशाल  Ponzi  योजना  that defrauded thousands of  निवेशकों   of   अरबों  of dollars .
madoff   कहा  he began the Ponzi  योजना  in the early 1990s  .
however  , federal  जांचकर्ताओं  believe  the  fraud  began  as  जल्दी  as  the  1970s , and those charged  साथ  recovering the missing money  मानना  the investment operation  may   never  have  महरूम  legitimate .
The amount  लापता  from  क्लाएंट   खाते  ,  सहित  fabricated gains  ,  was almost  $  65 billion  .
The  court-appointed  trustee estimated  वास्तविक  losses to investors of $ 18 billion .
On June 29 , 2009 , he was sentenced to  150  years in prison ,  the  maximum allowed .
Administrative Professionals Day  (   भी  known as  secretaries   दिन  or Admin  दिन  ) is an unofficial  धर्मनिरपेक्ष   अवकाश  observed  in   अनेक  countries to recognize the work of  secretaries  , administrative  assistants   ,  receptionists  ,  and  अन्य  administrative support professionals .
In North  अमेरिका  , it is celebrated on the  बुधवार   of  the  पिछला  full week of April  (  April 24 in 2013 )  .
In France  it  is  मनाये   on   the  third  गुरुवार  in  अप्रैल  ( April 18 in 2013 ) .
In  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  it is celebrated  on   the  first Friday in May
A quasi-judicial body is an entity such as an arbitrator  or  tribunal board  ,   generally   of  a public administrative agency  ,  which  रै  powers and procedures resembling  those  of a court of law or  न्यायधीश   ,   और  which is obligated to objectively  determine  facts  और  draw  conclusions   इससे  them so as  to  provide  the  basis of an  आधिकारिक   कार्रवाई  .
Such  क्रियाएँ  are able to remedy a situation  or  impose legal  दंड  ,  और  may affect the  विधिक  rights ,  कर्तव्य  or privileges of specific parties .
स्मारक  of  tycho   ब्राहे  and Johannes Kepler in Prague
Tycho  ब्राहे   (   14  December 154624 October 1601 ) , born Tyge Ottesen Brahe , was a  डैनिश  nobleman  ज्ञात  for his accurate and  व्यापक  astronomical  और   ग्रहीय   observations  .
He was born in  स्कैनिया  ,  तब  part of  डेनमार्क  ,  अभी  part of modern-day  स्वीडन  .
tycho  was  खूब  known in his lifetime as an astronomer  और  alchemist .
In his De nova  स्टेला   (  On the new star ) of 1573  ,  he  refuted  the Aristotelian  विश्वास  in an unchanging celestial realm .
His  precise  measurements indicated  कि  ``  नई  stars  ,   ''   (  stellae novae ,  अभी  known as  supernovae  ) in particular  कि   of  1572 , lacked the parallax expected in  sub-lunar  phenomena  ,  and were therefore not ``  वायुमंडलीय  '' tailless comets  as  previously believed ,  लकिन   यहूद  above  the  atmosphere  और   चंद्रमा  .
Using similar measurements  he  showed that comets were  भी   नहीं   वायुमंडलीय  phenomena ,  as  previously thought , and must  pass  through  the   माना  `` immutable '' celestial  spheres  .
As an  astronomer  , Tycho worked  to  combine what he  देखी   as  the geometrical benefits of the Copernican system with the philosophical benefits of the Ptolemaic system into  उसके  own model of  the  universe , the Tychonic system .
Furthermore , he was the last of the major naked eye astronomers  ,  working without telescopes for his  observations  .
Tycho Brahe was granted an estate  on   the  island of Hven and the  funding  to  निर्माण  the Uraniborg  ,  an early  शोध   संस्थान  ,  जहाँ  he built large astronomical  यंत्र  and took many careful measurements , and later Stjerneborg , underground ,  जब  he discovered that his  यंत्र   in   the   पूर्व   यहूद   नहीं  sufficiently steady .
On the island ( on  जिससे  he demonstrated autocratic  अक्षर  and behavior toward  the   निवासियों  )  he  founded manufactories such as  paper-making  to  provide   सामग्री  for printing his results .
After  मतभिन्नता   साथ  the new Danish king Christian IV in 1597 , he was  आमंत्रित  by the Bohemian king  और   पावन  Roman emperor Rudolph II  to  Prague ,  जहाँ  he became  the  official imperial astronomer .
He built the new  वेधशाला  at Benátky nad Jizerou .
यहाँ  ,  इससे  1600 until his death  in  1601 ,  he  was assisted by Johannes Kepler who  बाद  used  tycho  's  खगोलीय  data  to   develop  Kepler 's laws of planetary motion .
Guro  ज़िला   (  Guro-gu  )   is   a   ज़िला   of  Seoul  ,  South  कोरियाई  , which was separated from Yeongdeungpo  ज़िला  on April 1  ,  1980  .
स्तिथ  in  the   southwestern   भाग  of the city , where besides Yangcheon  ज़िला   और   geumcheon   ज़िला  Guro District has  an   महत्वपूर्ण  position  as  a transport link which  contains   railroads  , land  रूट  from the rest  of  Seoul to the south of the  देश  .
The  gyeongbu   और   gyeongin  railway lines connect  सियोल  to Busan  और  Incheon .
In  जोड  ,  सियोल  Metropolitan Subway lines  1  ,  2   ,  and  7   ,   और  major highways intersect in Guro  ज़िला  .
the  name  guro  originates from the legend that nine (  )   बूढ़ा  men (  कोरियाई  : ro )  enjoyed  longevity in the district .
a  digital industrial complex  is   स्तिथ  in Guro District .
The Guro Digital Industrial  जटिल  , which  निभाई   a  leading industrial role mainly with  वस्त्र   निर्माण   ,  dressmaking  और   अन्य   labour-intensive  industries  in  1967 , has been rapidly changed  into  an IT industrial complex .
This  जटिल  played a pivotal role in the  आर्थिक   विकास  of the  दक्षिण  Korea 's  विकास  era , referred to as  the   ``  Miracle on the Han River `` ,  और  also contributed 10 percent of  नेशनल   निर्यात  in the 1970s  .
twenty-one  percent of the total  क्षेत्रफल  of  guro   ज़िला  is a restricted zone to  be  used  as  a  greenbelt  with the only arboretum  in   सियोल   .
The zone is changing into a lively district as large labour-intensive factories are moving  इससे  the area and the council is developing  कया   it  terms its  चार   zones  .
An ``  e-government  `` system based on this hosted the international  e-participation  forum on February 7–9 , 2007 , with the  भागीदारी  of more than  thirty-seven   देशों  .
The forum  थी  launched with  the  theme `` Promoting  लोकतंत्र  and Regional  विकास   ''   और   twenty-five  mayors  सहित  André Santini (  issy-les-moulineaux  , France ) , Kevin Foy  (  Chapel Hill , US ) , Apirak  kosayothin   (  Bangkok ,  थाईलैंड   )  , Uvais  मोहम्मद   emthiyas  ( Colombo ,  श्री  Lanka ) , and world experts  ऐसे   as   dr   विलियम  H. Dutton  (  Director of Oxford Internet  संस्थान  at the University of  ऑक्सफोर्ड  ,  uk  )  और  Dr Ari-Veiko Anttiroiko ( professor at the  विश्वविद्यालयों  of  tampere  , Finland ) participated  in  the forum .
The Guro Declaration , adopted during the  फ़ोरम  ,  aims   to  set up a portal site for e-government development  और   to  establish a concrete project in  अनुक्रम  to bridge the digital divide among the  संसार  's  शहरों   .
This practice has been recognised for providing  a   नई  important step  in   the  development of  e-democracy  .
The e-participation  फ़ोरम  was a key factor for Guro  to  play the leading  भूमिका  in bridging the  डिजिटल  divide  among  cities , to provide  i.t  . enterprises  स्तिथ  in Guro  डिजिटल  Industrial Complex  the  opportunity  to  launch into the international market ,  to   improve  its  चित्र  and become a global leader  to  concrete e-democracy  .
The international  e-participation  forum on February 7–9 , 2007
a   wonton  ( also  spelled   wantan  , wanton , or wuntun in transcription  इससे  Cantonese ; Mandarin :  húndùn  ) is a  प्रकार  of dumpling  commonly  found in  a  number of Chinese cuisines .
Many people  यहूद  involved in the  आविष्कार  of  रेडियो  as  we  now know  it  .
Several  संभावित  methods of  बेतार  communication were considered ,  सहित  inductive and  capacitive   प्रेरण  and transmission through the ground , however the method used for radio today exclusively involves the transmission  और  reception of  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  waves .
बाद   जल्दी   अटकलें   on   the   विषय  , experimental work on the  कनेक्शन  between  विद्युत  and magnetism began  around  1820 with  the  work of Hans  ईसाई  Ørsted and continued  साथ  the work  of  André-Marie  एम्पीयर  , Joseph Henry ,  और  Michael Faraday .
These investigations  culminated   in  the  पूरा  theory of electromagnetism  विकसित   by  James  क्लर्क   मैक्सवेल  .
This  सिद्धान्त  described the  सैद्धांतिक  basis  of   the   propagation   of   इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक   लहरें  .
After  मैक्सवेल   's   सिद्धान्त  was published  अनेक  people experimented with wireless communication  ,  some  intentionally  using Maxwell 's theory some not  .
It is considered likely that the first intentional  हस्तांतरण  of  a  signal  by  means  of  electromagnetic waves was performed  by  David Edward Hughes around 1880 ,  हालांकि  this was considered  to   be  induction at  the  time .
The first systematic  और   unequivocal  transmission  of  EM  लहरें   थी   performed  by Heinrich  रुडॉल्फ   हर्ट्ज़   और  described in papers published in  1887  and 1890 .
Hertz famously considered  ये   परिणाम   as  being of little practical value .
After Hertz 's work many people were involved  in   the  development of components and theory  शामिल  with  the  transmission and reception of electromagnetic  लहरें   .
Others ,  notably  Guglielmo Marconi , were  चिंतित  with practical improvements and the commercial application  of  radio  to   बेतार   telegraphy   .
बाद   on  Reginald  A.   fessenden   became  the first to send an audio signal by means  of  electromagnetic waves .
Scurvy  is  a disease resulting from  a  deficiency  of  vitamin  c  , which is  जरूरी  for the synthesis of collagen in humans .
The chemical name for vitamin C  ,  ascorbic acid  ,   is   निकला  from the Latin name of scurvy , scorbutus , which  भी   provides  the  क्रियाशील  scorbutic ( ``  of  , characterized  by  or having to do with scurvy ''  )   .
Scurvy often  presents  itself initially  as  symptoms of malaise  और  lethargy  ,  followed by  गठन   of  spots on  the  skin , spongy  मसूड़ों  ,  और  bleeding from  the  mucous membranes .
Spots are  सबसे  abundant  on   the  thighs and legs , and a person with the ailment looks pale , feels depressed  ,  and  is  partially  immobilized  .
as  scurvy  अग्रिम  ,  वहीँ  can be open  ,  suppurating  wounds   ,  loss of  दांत  , jaundice  ,   ज्वर  , neuropathy and death .
Scurvy was at one time common among  sailors  ,  pirates  and others aboard  जहाजों  at  समुद्र  longer  than   perishable  fruits  और   सब्जियां  could be stored (  subsisting  instead only on cured  और  salted  meats  and  सूखी  grains ) and  by   सैनिको  similarly  वंचित  of  ये  foods for extended periods  .
it  was described by  हिपोक्रेटिस  ( c.  460   bc–c  . 380 BC )  ,  and  हर्बल  cures for scurvy have been known in many  देशी  cultures since prehistory .
स्कर्वी   थी  one  of   the  limiting factors  of  marine travel , often killing large numbers of the passengers  और   क्रू   on  long-distance voyages .
This became a  significant  issue in Europe  इससे  the  शुरूआत  of the modern era in the Age  of  Discovery in  the  15th century , continuing  to  play a  significant  role through World  युद्ध  I in the 20th  सदी  .
While today  स्कर्वी  is known  to  be  caused  by  a   nutritional  deficiency ,  जबतक   the  isolation  of  vitamin C  और  direct evidence  of  its link to scurvy in 1932 , numerous theories  और  treatments  यहूद  proposed  ,  often on little  or   no  experimental  आंकड़ा  .
This inconsistency is attributed to  the  lack of  विटामिन  C as a distinct  अवधारणा  , an inability to  reliably  link different foods  (   notably  present in  भैस  citrus , watercress  ,   और   अंग  meat ) to scurvy .
An  अतिरिक्त  concept  जरूरी   to  understand scurvy was the degradation of vitamin C  by  exposure  to  air and copper and  अन्य   परिवर्तन  metal  लवण   ऐसे  as  those  of iron ,  यूँ  changing the links of  भोजन  to scurvy over time  .
Treatment by fresh food , particularly citrus fruit  ,   थी  periodically implemented  ,  as  it  had been since antiquity .
However until  the  1930s ,  उपचार   थी   असंगत   ,   साथ  many  अप्रभावी  treatments used into  the  20th century .
It was a  स्कॉटिश  surgeon  in  the Royal Navy , James Lind  जो   पहला  proved it could be  treated  with citrus fruit in  प्रयोग  he  वर्णित  in  उसके  1753  किताब   ,   a  Treatise of the Scurvy  ,  though his advice was not  implemented  by  the  Royal  नेवी  for several  दशकों   .
in   infants  ,  स्कर्वी   is  sometimes referred to as Barlow 's disease ,  नामित  after  सर  Thomas Barlow  ,  a British physician who  वर्णित   it   .
However  ,  Barlow 's disease may also refer to mitral valve prolapse  .
Other eponyms for scurvy  शामिल   moeller   's  disease  और  Cheadle 's  बीमारी   .
Scurvy does  नहीं  occur in  सबसे  animals  क्युकी  they can synthesize their own vitamin  c  .
however  ,  इंसानो  and other  उच्चतर  primates ( the  simians  -  बंदरों   और   apes  - and tarsiers ) ,  गिनी  pigs , most or  सब  bats , and some species of  पक्षियों  and fish lack an enzyme (  l-gulonolactone   oxidase  ) necessary for such synthesis  और   जरूर   obtain  vitamin C through their  आहार   .
Vitamin C is  फैली  in  संयंत्र  tissues  ,  with particularly high concentrations occurring  in   citrus  fruits (  संतरे  , lemons , limes  ,   grapefruits   )  , tomatoes , potatoes , cabbages  ,  and  ग्रीन  peppers  .
आयरन   is  a  रासायनिक   तत्व  with the symbol Fe ( from ) and atomic number 26  .
It is a  मेटल  in the  पहला   परिवर्तन   श्रेणी  .
It is the most  आम  element  (  by  द्रव्यमान  )  forming  the  ग्रह  Earth as a  पूरे  ,  forming  much of Earth 's  बाहरी   और  inner core  .
It is the  चौथी  most  आम   तत्व  in the Earth  's   क्रस्ट  .
Iron  's   बहुत   आम  presence in  रॉकी   ग्रह   जैसे   धरती  is due to its  abundant  production as  a   परिणाम  of fusion in high-mass  सितारों   ,  where  the   उत्पादन  of  nickel-56  ( which decays to  the  most common  समस्थानिक   of  iron )  is  the  पिछला  nuclear fusion reaction that is exothermic  .
This causes radioactive nickel  to  become  the   पिछला   तत्व   to   be  produced before collapse  of   a   सुपरनोवा  leads to  the  explosive events that  scatter   इस  precursor radionuclide  of  iron abundantly into space .
Like  अन्य  group 8  तत्व  , iron exists in  a  wide range of oxidation  राज्य  , −2  to  +6 ,  हालांकि  +2 and +3  हैं   the   सबसे   आम   .
Elemental  आयरन  occurs  in  meteoroids  और  other low oxygen environments ,  लकिन  is reactive to  ऑक्सीजन  and water .
भैस  iron surfaces appear lustrous  silvery-gray  , but  oxidize  in normal  एयर  to  दे   hydrated  iron oxides , commonly  ज्ञात  as rust  .
Unlike many other metals which form passivating oxide layers , iron oxides  occupy  more volume than  आयरन  metal , and thus iron oxides flake off  और  expose fresh surfaces for corrosion .
आयरन  metal has been used  चूंकि   प्राचीन  times , though copper alloys ,  जिससे  have  निम्नतर  melting temperatures , were used  पहला  in history  .
pure   आयरन  is  नरम  ( softer  than  aluminium  )  , but is  unobtainable   by   smelting   .
The material is significantly hardened  और  strengthened by impurities from the smelting  प्रक्रम  , such as carbon .
A certain  proportion  of carbon  (  between 0.002  %   और  2.1 % ) produces steel , which may be  up   to  1000 times harder than pure iron .
Crude iron metal is produced in blast furnaces ,  जहाँ  ore  is  reduced by coke to pig iron ,  जिससे  has a  ऊँची  carbon content  .
Further  refinement  with  ऑक्सीजन  reduces  the   कार्बन  content  to   the  correct proportion  to  make steel  .
steels   और  low carbon  आयरन   alloys  with other metals (  मिश्रधातु  steels  )   हैं  by far the most common metals in industrial use , due to  उनके  great range of desirable  गुण  and  the   प्रचुरता  of iron .
Iron  रासायनिक  compounds  ,  which include ferrous  और   ferric  compounds , have  अनेक  uses .
Iron oxide mixed with aluminium powder can be  ignited  to create  a  thermite reaction ,  प्रयुक्त   in   वेल्डिंग  and  सुथरा  ores .
It forms  शब्दकोष  compounds with the  हैलोजन्स   और  the chalcogens  .
Among its organometallic compounds is ferrocene  ,  the first sandwich compound discovered .
आयरन  plays an important  भूमिका  in biology  ,  forming complexes with  आणविक  oxygen in  हीमोग्लोबिन  and myoglobin ;  ये  two compounds are common oxygen transport proteins in  vertebrates   .
Iron is also the metal  प्रयुक्त  at the active site  of  many important  रेडॉक्स  enzymes  dealing  with cellular  श्वसन  and  ऑक्सीकरण   और  reduction in plants  और  animals  .
the  Blue Cross  ब्लू  Shield Association (  bcbsa  ) is a federation  of  38 separate health insurance  संगठन  and  कंपनियाँ  in the United  राज्य   .
Combined  ,  they directly or  indirectly  provide health insurance to over 99 million  अमेरिकी  .
The  इतिहास  of  ब्लू   क्रॉस  dates  वापस  to  1929  , while the history  of  Blue  शील्ड  dates to 1939 .
The Blue Cross Association dates back  to  1960 , while its Blue  शील्ड  counterpart  थी  created in  1948  .
The two organizations  मिलाया  in 1982  ,   forming  the current  संघ   .
A potato chip  (  known as  a  chip  in  American ,  ऑस्ट्रेलियाई  ,  नई  Zealand  ,   कनाडाई  , Singaporean , Hong Kong , South African and  jamaican  English  ;   as  a crisp  in   अंग्रेजों  English and Hiberno-English , and as either a  चिप  or wafer in Indian English  )  is  a  thin slice  of   आलू  that is deep fried or baked until  crunchy  .
Potato chips are  commonly   परोसा  as an  क्षुधावर्धक   ,  side dish , or snack .
the   मौलिक  chips are cooked  और  salted ;  अतिरिक्त   किस्में   हैं  manufactured using various flavorings and ingredients including seasonings ,  herbs  , spices  ,   cheeses  ,  और   कृत्रिम   एडिटिव  .
``  crisps  '' ,  however   ,   may  also  refer  to many different types of  savory  snack products sold  in  the United  किंगडम   और  Ireland , some  बना  from potato , but  may  also  be  made  इससे  maize  ,  tapioca or other cereals .
an  example of these kinds  of  savory  स्नैक्स   is   दानव  Munch .
Potato  चिप्स  are a  predominant  part of the snack  खाना  market  in  English-speaking countries and  numerous  other Western  राष्ट्र   .
The global  आलू  chip market generated total revenues of US $  16.4   अरब  in  2005   .
This accounted  लिये  35.5 %  of  the total savory  स्नैक्स  market  in  that year ( US $ 46.1 billion ) .
Henry Clay , Sr.  (  April  12  , 1777 –  जून  29  ,  1852  )  was  a  lawyer , politician  और  skilled  orator  who represented Kentucky  in  both the Senate and in  the  House of Representatives .
He  परोसा  three different terms  as   स्पीकर   of  the United States House of Representatives and was also  सचिव   of  State  इससे  1825  to  1829 .
he  lost  उसके  campaigns for president in 1824 , 1832 and  1844  .
Clay  थी   a  dominant figure  in  both the First and Second Party systems .
As a leading war  हॉक  in 1812 , he favored war with Britain  और  played a significant role  in  leading  the  nation to war in the War of 1812 .
In 1824  he   भागा  for president and lost , but threw  उसके  electoral votes to John Quincy  एडम्स  ,  जो   बना  him secretary  of   राज्य  as the  jacksonians  denounced what  वे  considered a `` corrupt bargain . ''
He ran and lost  again  in 1832 and 1844 as  the  candidate of the Whig Party , which  he  founded and usually  वर्चस्व   .
Clay was  the  foremost  proponent  of  the  American System , fighting  लिये  an  बढ़ाएँ  in tariffs  to   फोस्टर   उद्योग  in the United States , the use of federal  funding   to  build and maintain infrastructure , and a strong national bank .
He opposed the  annexation   of  Texas ,  fearing  it would  इंजेक्ट  the slavery  समस्या   into   राजनीती   .
मिट्टी  also opposed the Mexican-American  युद्ध  and  the   ``  Manifest Destiny `` policy of  डेमोक्रेट  ,  जिससे   लागत  him  मत  in the close 1844 election .
Dubbed the  ``  Great Pacificator , ''  मिट्टी   brokered  important  compromises   दौरान   the   nullification   संकट  and  on  the slavery issue .
as  part of  the   ``  Great Triumvirate `` or `` Immortal  तिकड़ी   ,  '' along with  उसके  colleagues Daniel Webster  और  John C. Calhoun , he  थी  instrumental in  formulating  the Missouri Compromise of 1820 and  the  Compromise  of  1850 .
He  थी  viewed  as  the primary representative of Western interests  in  this group  ,  and was  दिए   the  names  ``   हेनरी  of  the  West  ''   और  `` The  पश्चिमी  Star  .   ''
a  plantation owner  ,  Clay held slaves during his lifetime but  freed  them  in   उसके  Will .
अब्राहम  Lincoln , the  whig  leader in Illinois  ,   थी  a great admirer of Clay , saying he was  ``   my  ideal  of  a great  man   .   ''
Lincoln wholeheartedly supported Clay 's economic programs .
In  1957  ,  a  Senate Committee selected Clay  as   एक  of  the   पाँच  greatest U.S .  सीनेटरों  , along with Daniel Webster , John  C.  Calhoun ,  रॉबर्ट  La Follette , and  रॉबर्ट  Taft .
bj  's Wholesale  क्लबों  , Inc. ,  commonly   referred  to simply as BJ 's ,  is  a membership-only warehouse club  कड़ी   ऑपरेटिंग   on   the   संयुक्त  States  ईस्ट  Coast , as well  as  in the state of Ohio .
The company is ranked #  232   on  Fortune magazine 's  2010   लिस्टिंग  of America 's  500  largest  पब्लिक   corporations  .
The Wizard of Oz , known during his reign  as  The Great and Powerful Oz , is the epithet of Oscar Zoroaster Phadrig Isaac Norman Henkel Emmannuel  ambroise  Diggs , a  fictional   अक्षर  in  the  Land  of   oz  , created by American  लेखक  L.  फ़्रैंक  Baum  .
The character was further popularized by the classic  1939  movie , wherein  उसके  full  नाम   is  not mentioned  .
kristinia  Jamie  debarge  (  ;  born March  8  ,  1990  ) is  an  American singer  ,  songwriter , dancer and actress  .
She  पहला  appeared on  नेशनल   टेलीविज़न   in  2003  as   a  contestant on the American Idol spin-off , American  juniors  .
In  2009  , DeBarge  हस्ताक्षरित  a contract with  the  Island Records department  sodapop   ,   releasing  her debut album Exposed in  जुलाई  of the same  साल  .
The  पहला  single , `` Goodbye ``  ,  reached the top 20 in the  us   और  Canada  .
The lead  सिंगल   (  `` Cry  भेड़िया  '' ) from her untitled  sophomore  album was released on  सितंबर   27   ,   2012  .
the  Hawaii Warriors football  टोली  represents the  विश्वविद्यालयों  of Hawaiʻi  at  Mānoa  in  NCAA Division I FBS college football .
The team  is  coached by Norm  चाउ  .
It was part of the Western Athletic Conference until July 2012 , when  the  team joined  the  Mountain West Conference  .
The  हवाई  Warriors were the third non-AQ team to play  in  a  bcs  bowl game ; losing to Georgia 41–10 in  the  Sugar Bowl on  जनवरी   1   ,  2008 in  नई  Orleans , Louisiana .
Marvin  gaye  (  अप्रैल   2  , 1939April  1  , 1984 )  ,  born  मारविन  Pentz Gay , Jr. , was  an   अमरीकी  singer-songwriter and musician  .
Gaye helped to shape the sound of Motown Records in the  1960s   साथ  a string of hits including `` How Sweet It  is  (  to   be  Loved By  तुम   )   ``   और  `` I Heard It  through  the Grapevine  ``   और   duet  recordings  साथ  Mary Wells and  tammi  Terrell  ,   बाद  earning  the   शीर्षक  ``  प्रिंस   of   motown  '' and `` Prince of Soul ''  .
During  the  1970s  ,  Gaye  अंकित   the  concept albums What 's Going On and Let 's Get It On and  became  among the first artists in  motown  to break away from the reins of its production  कम्पनी  .
gaye   's  later recordings influenced several  r  & B  subgenres  such as quiet storm and neo-soul .
Following a period  in   यूरोपीय  under a tax  निर्वासन   in   the  early 1980s , Gaye released  the  1982 Grammy  award-winning  hit `` Sexual Healing  ``  and  the  Midnight Love album .
Since his death  in  1984 , Gaye has been posthumously  सम्मानित  by  अनेक  institutions  ,  including the Grammy Lifetime  उपलब्धि  Award  और  the  चट्टान  and Roll  हॉल  of Fame .

the   chernobyl  disaster (  ,  Chornobylska Katastrofa – Chornobyl  प्रलय   )  was  a   अनर्थकारी  nuclear accident that occurred on 26 April 1986 at the  chernobyl  Nuclear Power Plant  in  Ukraine ( then  officially  the Ukrainian SSR ) , which was  अंतर्गत   the  direct jurisdiction of  the  central  अधिकारियों  of the Soviet Union .
an  explosion and fire  released  large quantities of radioactive particles into the  माहौल  ,  जिससे  spread over  much   of   the  western USSR and Europe .
The Chernobyl disaster is widely considered to have been the  worst   नाभिकीय   शक्ति   संयंत्र  accident  in  history  ,  and is  एक  of only two classified as  a  level  7  event on the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Nuclear  इवेंट  Scale ( the other being the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster in 2011 ) .
The battle to  contain  the contamination and avert a greater catastrophe ultimately involved over 500,000 workers and cost an  अनुमानित  18 billion rubles .
the  official Soviet  casualty  count of 31 deaths  रै   महरूम   विवादित   ,  and long-term  प्रभाव  such as cancers and  deformities  are still being accounted for  .

Mrs. Claus  is  the wife of Santa  क्लॉस  , the Christmas gift-bringer  in  North American and European Christmas  परंपरा  .
She is known  लिये  making  कुकीज़  with  the  elves and  तैयारी   खिलौने   साथ  her husband Santa Claus .
उसके  first name  is  a mystery , though she has been referred to  as  Mary  ,  Jessica ,  layla  , Annette  ,   हीदी   ,  or Martha .
HijackThis ( also HiJackThis or HJT ) is  an  open  सोर्स   enumerating   औजार  for Microsoft Windows  originally  created  by  Merijn Bellekom , and later  बेची   to  Trend Micro .
The program is notable for targeting browser-hijacking methods  ,  rather  than   relying   on  a database of  ज्ञात   स्पाइवेयर  .
It scans  a  user 's computer  जल्दी  , and displays  ब्राउजर  hijacking  स्थितियाँ  , showing what entries are there .
HijackThis is used primarily for diagnosis of  ब्राउजर   hijacking  ,  as   uninformed   उपयोग   of   इसके   हटाना   सुविधाएं  can cause significant  तन्त्र  damage to a  कंप्यूटर  .
hijackthis   करता  not  हटाएँ  or detect spyware ;  it  lists most common locations  जहाँ  browser hijacking activity can occur  .
Browser hijacking can cause malware to be installed on a computer  .
On February 16 ,  2012   ,  Trend Micro  released   the  HijackThis source code  as  open  सोर्स  and it  is   अभी  available on the SourceForge site  .
Saddle  क्रीक   रिकॉर्ड   is  an American  रिकार्ड   लेबल   आधारित  in  ओमाहा   ,  Nebraska .
Started  as  a college class  प्रोजेक्ट   on   उद्यमिता  , the label was founded by Mike  mogis  and Justin  oberst   in   1993   (  as Lumberjack Records  )  .
mogis  soon  turned  over  उसके   भूमिका  in the  कम्पनी  to Robb Nansel  .
The label  is  named after Saddle Creek Road ,  a  street that cuts through the east  पक्ष   of  midtown Omaha , and the beginnings of a scene  जिनकी  members  शामिल  Conor Oberst (  तब  a  सोलो  artist , currently of  उज्जवल   आँखें  ,  conor  Oberst and the Mystic Valley Band , Desaparecidos  और  Monsters  of  Folk  )   ,   टिम  Kasher ( then of Slowdown Virginia ,  फिलहाल   of   कर्सिव  and The Good Life ) , and others .
Collectively , they were known  unofficially   as  the `` Creekers ''  .
काठी  Creek first appeared in print on  a   दिखाएँ   flyer  , offering to `` Spend  an   संध्या  with Saddle  क्रीक  '' (  बाद  to be the title of the  लेबल   's  DVD . )
काठी   क्रीक   became  an incorporated entity as  a   परिणाम  of a  क्लास  project on entrepreneurship .
वितरण  is handled by the Alternative Distribution Alliance  ,  which is  अंतर्गत   the  Warner Music Group  छतरियाँ   .
Saddle Creek Records continues to be the flagship label of  a  style of  म्यूज़िक   पुकारा  `` The Omaha Sound `` , characterized  by  a slight country twang .
This is increasingly inaccurate , though  ,   साथ   the  rise of more  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  sounds  ऐसे  as those favored by The Faint and Broken  spindles  .
the  eclectic sounds of  काठी   क्रीक  's  disparate  member bands is somewhat explained  by  their history  ;  a  क्रमांक  of the  असली  members of  the  label attended grade school together .
a  ``  सिस्टर  label  ''  ,  of   sorts   ,   to  Saddle  क्रीक   is  Team Love  ,  started  by  Conor  oberst   in   2004  .
the  label opened arms  to  their first bands not  आधारित   in   ओमाहा  in  2001   साथ  releases by  अभी  It 's Overhead and Sorry About  ड्रेसडेन  .
अन्य  non-Nebraskan  कलाकारों  followed ,  सहित   लॉस   एंजिल्स  's  rilo  Kiley , Eric Bachmann ( formerly  नेता  of Archers of Loaf  और  Crooked Fingers from North  कैरोलिना  ) , Georgie James ( Washington D.C.  )  , Two Gallants  (  San Francisco )  ,   और  most  recently  Tokyo Police  क्लबों  (  टोरंटो   )   .
In 2005 , Spend an Evening with Saddle Creek ,  a   वृत्तचित्र  detailing the first ten  सालो  of the  रिकार्ड  label  's  history , was released  .
The  dvd   सुविधाएँ   extensive  interviews with  the  Saddle  क्रीक  bands ,  archival  footage , and rare live performances  .
on  June  8   ,   2007  , the  लेबल   खोली  their  अपना  music  स्थान   नामित   slowdown   (  after the  समूह  Slowdown  वर्जिनिया   )  , located in downtown Omaha , Nebraska .
The following is a list of episodes  लिये  the television  दिखाएँ  Full  हाउस   .
In  कुल   ,  there were  192  episodes  फिल्माया  for  the  show  over   the  course of its eight seasons , from 1987 to 1995  .
Full House is a situation comedy  जिससे  chronicles a  विधवा   पिता  's struggles  of  raising  उसके  three young  बेटियां  and the  जीवनदान  that  वे   have  touched .
The patriarch of the  परिवार  , Danny  (  Bob Saget  )   ,  invites  उसके  brother-in-law  जेसी   (  John  stamos  ) and his  बेहतरीन  friend Joey  (   डेव  Coulier ) , to help raise his  children  ( Candace Cameron  ,  Jodie Sweetin , and  मरियम  Kate/Ashley Olsen ) ,  बाद  his  बीवी  was killed  दौरान  an automobile  दुर्घटना  involving a drunk driver .
After episodes 88 and  89  , Jesse  marries  Becky ( Lori Loughlin ) ,  और  they move into the  अटारी  .
Then , after episodes 104 and 105  ,   बेकी  and  जेसी  have twin boys  नामित  Nicky and Alex  (   डेनियल   और   केविन  Renteria/Blake and Dylan  tuomy-wilhoit  )  .
The series ends with  एपीसोड  192 ,  ``  Michelle Rides Again  भाग  2  ''  , when Michelle loses  उसके  memory and  the   परिवार  tries to restore it .
Notice of  स्टैम्प   अधिनियम  of 1765 in  समाचारपत्र
American newspapers reacted  to  the Stamp  अधिनियम  with anger  और  predictions of the demise of  पत्रकारिता  .
The Stamp Act 1765 ( short title Duties  in   अमरीकी  Colonies Act  1765   ;  5 George III , c. 12  )   imposed   a   सीधा  tax by the British  पार्लियामेंट   specifically  on the  colonies   of  British America ,  और  it required that many printed  सामग्री  in  the  colonies  be   उत्पादित   on  stamped paper produced in  लंदन  , carrying an  embossed  revenue  स्टैम्प  .
These printed materials were  विधिक  documents  ,   मैगज़ीन   ,  newspapers and many other  प्रकार   of   पेपर   प्रयुक्त  throughout the colonies .
जैसे  previous taxes  ,   the  stamp  कर  had to be paid in  मान्य   अंग्रेजों   करेंसी   ,   नहीं  in colonial  पेपर  money .
the  purpose of  the  tax was to  सहायता   अदा  for  सैनिकों   stationed  in  उत्तर   अमेरिका  after  the  British victory in the Seven  सालो  ' War .
the  British government  लगा  that  the  colonies were the primary  beneficiaries   of   इस  military presence  ,   और   चाहिए   अदा   at  least a  portion  of the  व्यय  .
The Stamp Act  मिले  great resistance in the  colonies  .
the  colonies  भेजा  no  प्रतिनिधि  to Parliament  ,  and therefore had  no  influence over what  कर  were raised , how they  यहूद   levied  ,  or  how  वे   होता  be spent .
Many colonists considered it a  उल्लंघन  of their  अधिकारों   as  Englishmen to  be  taxed without their  सहमति   —consent   कि  only the colonial legislatures  could  grant .
Colonial assemblies sent petitions  और   विरोध   .
The Stamp  अधिनियम  Congress held in New  यॉर्क   नगर  , reflecting the first significant joint  औपनिवेशिक   जवाब  to  कोई  British measure  ,  also  petitioned   पार्लियामेंट   और  the  किंग  .
Local protest groups , led by colonial merchants and landowners , established  कनेक्शन्स  through  पत्राचार  that created  a   ढीला  coalition  कि   विस्तारित  from  नई  England  to   जॉर्जिया  .
Protests  और  demonstrations initiated  by  the  बेटे  of Liberty  प्रायः  turned violent  और  destructive as  the   masses  became  शामिल  .
Very soon all stamp tax  वितरकों  were intimidated  into  resigning their  आयोग  , and  the  tax was never  effectively  collected .
Opposition  to  the Stamp  अधिनियम  was not limited to  the  colonies .
British merchants and manufacturers , whose exports to the colonies were threatened by colonial  आर्थिक   समस्याएं  exacerbated by the tax ,  भी  pressured  पार्लियामेंट  .
The Act  थी   repealed  on  कूच  18 , 1766 as a matter of  expedience   ,  but Parliament affirmed  इसके  power  to   legislate  for the  colonies  “in all cases whatsoever”  by  also passing the Declaratory Act  .
There followed  a  series of  नई  taxes and  regulations  , likewise  opposed  by the colonists  .
the  episode played a major role  in  defining the  grievances  and enabling the organized colonial resistance that led  to  the American  क्रान्ति  in 1775 .
PT-105  underway   .
pt  boats were a variety of torpedo-armed fast attack craft used  by   the  United States  नेवी   in  World War  ii  to  आक्रमण   larger   सतह  ships .
``  pt  '' is the US hull  वर्गीकरण  symbol for  ``  Patrol  torpedo   ''  .
The PT boat squadrons were nicknamed ``  the  mosquito fleet ''  .
The Japanese  पुकारा   उन्हें  ``  शैतान   नौकाएँ  '' .
The original pre– World War I torpedo  नौकाएँ  were designed with `` displacement '' hulls .
They  विस्थापित  up to  300   टन  and  the  top  गति  was  .
the   pt  boats used  in  World War II were built  using  the  planing   -type  hull form developed for racing boats  .
वे  were much smaller (  30–75   टन  ) and  तेज़   (  35–40  knots  ) .
दोनो  types were designed  to  strike at larger warships with torpedoes  ,   using   अपेक्षाकृत  high speed to  मिलेंगी  close , and  छोटी  size  to  avoid  होने   spotted  and hit by gunfire .
They were  much   कम  expensive than  विशाल   warships  .
PT boats  यहूद  much faster ,  छोटी   ,   और  cheaper than  conventional  ( displacement  हल  ) vessels .
During World War  ii   ,  American PT boats engaged  दुश्मन  destroyers  और  numerous  अन्य  surface craft , ranging from small boats to large supply ships .
PT  नौकाएँ  also  संचालित  as gunboats  विरूद्ध  enemy  छोटी   शिल्प  , such as armored  barges   प्रयुक्त  by  the  Japanese forces for inter-island  हस्तांतरण   .
Good Friday is  a  religious holiday  observed  primarily by Christians commemorating  the  crucifixion  of  Jesus  मसीह  and his  मौत  at  कलवारी  .
The holiday is observed  दौरान  Holy Week as part of  the  Paschal Triduum on  the  Friday preceding Easter  संडे  , and  may  coincide with the Jewish observance of Passover .
It is  भी   ज्ञात   as  Holy Friday  ,  Great Friday ,  ब्लैक  Friday  ,  or Easter Friday , though the  latter  properly refers to the  शुक्रवार   in  Easter week .
आधारित   on  the details  of  the Canonical gospels , the  crucifixion  of Jesus  थी   सबसे   संभावित  to  have  been on a  शुक्रवार   (  the  दिन   पहले  the  sabbath  )  (  )  .
The  अनुमानित  year of  the  Crucifixion is AD 33  ,  by two different  समूह  , and originally as  ad  34 by Isaac  न्यूटन   via  the differences  between  the  biblical  and  जूलियन  calendars and the crescent  of  the moon  .
A third method , using  a  completely  अलग  astronomical approach based on a  चंद्र   crucifixion  darkness and eclipse model  (   सतत  with Apostle Peter  's  reference to a `` moon  of  blood '' in Acts 2:20 ) , points to  शुक्रवार  ,  3  April AD  33  .
The  ग्रेट  Basin  is  the largest  क्षेत्रफल  of  endorheic  watersheds in  उत्तर  America .
It is noted for  दोनो   इसके  arid conditions  और  its Basin and range  स्थलाकृति   कि  varies from the  उत्तर  American  कम   पाइंट  at  badwater  Basin to the highest point  of   the  contiguous United States , less than away at the  समिट  of  माउंट  Whitney .
the   प्रदेश  spans several  physiographic  divisions ,  biomes  / ecoregions , and deserts .
रास्टर  may refer  to:
Raster graphics  ,  graphical techniques  using  arrays of  पिक्सेल  values
Raster graphics editor , a  कंप्यूटर  program
रास्टर  scan  ,  the pattern of image  readout   ,  transmission , storage ,  और   पुनर्निर्माण   in  television and  कंप्यूटर  images
rasterisation   ,  or rasterization , conversion  of  a  वेक्टर  image to a raster image
रास्टर  image  प्रोसेसर   ,  or  rip  , a component of a printing  प्रणाली  that performs rasterisation
Raster interrupt , a computer interrupt  सिग्नल
रास्टर  to vector , an image conversion process
Raster bar , an effect used in computer  demos
Raster-Noton  ,  a record label

Beowulf ( ; Old English : ) is a  legendary  Geatish hero  और  later turned  किंग  in the  एपिक  poem named  बाद  him , one of the oldest surviving pieces  of   साहित्य   in  the English language .
the  attack on  पर्ल  Harbor ( called  हवाई  Operation  or  Operation  ai  by the Japanese Imperial General Headquarters ( Operation  z  in  नियोजन  ) and the  बैटल   of   पर्ल  Harbor  )   थी  a  आश्चर्य   सैन्य  strike conducted  by  the Imperial  जापानी   नेवी   विरूद्ध  the United  राज्य   नवल   आधार  at  पर्ल  Harbor , Hawaii , on  the   morning  of December 7  ,  1941  (   दिसम्बर  8 in Japan  )  .
इससे  the standpoint of  the  defenders  ,  the attack commenced at 7:48 a.m.  हवाई  Time .
The  आक्रमण  was intended as  a  preventive action in order to  रखना  the U.S. Pacific  बेड़े  from  दखल  with  सैन्य  actions the Empire of  जापानी  was planning  in  Southeast  एशिया  against  विदेशी  territories of  the   संयुक्त  Kingdom , the  नीदरलैंड्स  , and the United  राज्य  .
The base was attacked by 353 Japanese fighters , bombers  और  torpedo planes in two waves  ,  launched  इससे  six aircraft carriers .
All eight U.S. Navy  battleships  were  क्षतिग्रस्त  , with four  होने  sunk .
Two of  ये  were later raised , and  साथ   the  remaining  चार   repaired  ,  छह  battleships  लौटे   to   सेवा   बाद   in   the  war .
The  जापानी  also sank or  क्षतिग्रस्त  three cruisers , three  destroyers  , an anti-aircraft training ship , and one minelayer .
188  U.S. aircraft were destroyed ; 2,402 Americans were killed and  1,282   wounded  .
महत्वपूर्ण  base installations  ऐसे   as   the  power station , shipyard , maintenance , and fuel and torpedo storage facilities  ,  as  खूब  as the submarine  पियर  and headquarters  भवन  ( also home of the intelligence  खण्ड  )  यहूद  not attacked .
Japanese losses  यहूद  light : 29  वायुयान  and  पाँच  midget submarines  खोया  ,  और  65 servicemen killed  or  wounded .
One Japanese sailor was captured  .
The attack came as a profound  शॉक  to  the   अमरीकी  people and led directly to  the  American entry into World War II  in   दोनो   the  Pacific and  यूरोपीय  theaters .
The following day  (  December  8   )   ,  the United States declared war on Japan .
Domestic  support  for  non-interventionism  , which had  महरूम   दमदार  ,  disappeared   .
clandestine   support  of Britain  (   लिये  example  the  Neutrality  पैट्रोल  ) was replaced by active alliance .
Subsequent operations by the  u.S.   prompted  Germany  और  Italy to  घोषित  war on  the   u.S.  on December 11 , which was reciprocated  by  the  u.S.  the same day .
There were numerous historical precedents  लिये  unannounced military  कार्रवाई  by Japan .
However , the  कमी  of any formal warning , particularly while negotiations  यहूद  still  जाहिर  ongoing , led  अध्यक्ष   फ्रैंकलिन  D. Roosevelt to  proclaim   दिसम्बर  7 , 1941 ,  ``   a  date which  होगा   सजीव   in   infamy   ``  .
U.S. Route 85 ( US 85  )   is   a  north–south United States highway that runs for  in  the Mountain -  उत्तरी   मैदान   राज्य  of the United States .
The  दक्षिणी  terminus  of  the route  is   at  the  संयुक्त  States-Mexico border in El  पासो  , Texas , connecting  साथ   मैक्सिकन  Federal Highway 45 .
the  northern terminus is at the  संयुक्त   states-canada  border  in   fortuna   ,  North Dakota , where  the  route  continues  north  as  Saskatchewan Highway 35 .
In  दोनो  the United States and Saskatchewan  ,  Canada the route is  ज्ञात  as the CanAm  राजमार्ग  .
Sections of US 85 are considered  भाग  of the Theodore  रूज़वेल्ट   एक्सप्रेसवे  .
the  United States presidential  चुनाव  of 1968  थी  the  46th  quadrennial presidential  चुनाव   ,  held on Tuesday  ,   नवम्बर  5  ,  1968 .
The Republican  nominee   ,  former  vice-president  Richard  निक्सन  , won the  चुनाव   over  the Democratic nominee , incumbent Vice-President  ह्यूबर्ट  Humphrey .
Nixon  भागा  on a  अभियान  that promised  to   restore   विधि   और   अनुक्रम  to the nation 's cities ,  फटा  by riots and  अपराधों  .
Analysts have argued the election  of  1968 is  a  realigning election  as  it permanently disrupted the  नई  Deal Coalition that had dominated presidential politics for  36  years .
coming   चार  years after Democrat  lyndon  B. Johnson won  in   a  historic  भूस्खलन  , the election saw the incumbent president forced out  of   the  race and  a  Republican elected for the first time  in  twelve years .
It was a  विदारक  national experience  ,  conducted  दौरान  a  साल   of  violence that included  the  assassination of civil  अधिकारों   नेता  Martin Luther  किंग   ,  Jr. , and subsequent race riots across the  स्वदेश  , the  assasination   of   लोकतांत्रिक  presidential candidate  रॉबर्ट   F.  Kennedy  ,  widespread opposition to the Vietnam War across university  campuses   ,  and violent  confrontations  between police and anti-war  प्रदर्शनकारियों  at the  1968   लोकतांत्रिक   नेशनल   सम्मेलन  as  the  Democratic party split again and again .
The election  प्रदर्शित  the strongest third party effort since 1912  by  former Alabama Governor George Wallace , a Democrat .
Because Wallace 's campaign opposed federal  हस्तक्षेप   in  the  दक्षिण  to end school segregation , he carried the Deep  दक्षिण  and ran well in  जातीय   औद्योगिक  districts  in  the North .
This was the last election in which  नई  York had the  सबसे  votes  in  the electoral college  (   43   मत  ) .
After the 1970 census , California gained the  सबसे  electoral votes  और  has  remained  the most populous  राज्य   चूंकि  then .
This is the latest  चुनाव   जहाँ   a  presidential ticket  जीती  without carrying the  वाइस   अध्यक्षीय  candidate 's home state .
Windows Task Manager is a task manager or System  मॉनिटर  application included  साथ  the  microsoft   खिड़कियाँ  NT family  of  operating systems  कि   provides  limited information about computer performance and running  अनुप्रयोग  , processes and CPU usage , commit  चार्ज  and memory  सूचना   ,  network  कार्यकलाप  and  आंकडे  , logged-in users , and system services  (  and as often is  the  case with software tools provided by Microsoft for  खिड़कियाँ   ,  3rd party software  is  available which fills  the  requirements  अधिक  thoroughly  ,  e.g ,  ``  Process Explorer  ''  , ``  विस्तारित  Task  मैनेजर  '' , ``  anvir  Task Manager  ''   ,   ``  Process  हैकर  '' , and `` System Explorer '' ) .
the  Task Manager  can  also be used to set process priorities  ,  processor affinity , forcibly terminate processes  ,  and shut down ,  restart  ,  hibernate  or log off  इससे  Windows .
Windows  कार्य  Manager  थी  introduced with Windows NT  4.0   .
Previous versions of Windows NT included the Task  सूची  application  ,   जिससे   था  far fewer features .
The  कार्य   सूची  was  सक्षम   of  listing  फिलहाल  running processes and killing them  ,  or creating a  नई   प्रक्रम  .
In  खिड़कियाँ  XP only , a Shutdown menu  is  also present that allows access to Standby , Hibernate ,  फेरे   बंद   ,  Restart , Log Off and Switch User .
Earlier versions  of  Microsoft  खिड़कियाँ  ( Microsoft  खिड़कियाँ  3.x , Windows 95 , Windows 98 )  था  a  कार्यक्रम   ज्ञात  as tasks to  प्रदर्शक   the   कार्यक्रम  currently  कार्यशील   .
This file  थी   चलाया   by  running the  taskman.exe   संचिका  from the C :  \खिड़कीs   निर्देशिका  .
Kanji ( ; ) are the  अपनाया   logographic  Chinese characters  (  hanzi ) that are used  in   the  modern Japanese writing system along with hiragana  (  ひらがな , ) , katakana ( カタカナ  ,   )  , Hindu-Arabic numerals , and  the  occasional use of the Latin  वर्णमाला  .
the   जापानी  term kanji ( )  लिये   the  Chinese  वर्ण  literally means ``  हान  characters '' and is written using the  वही   वर्ण  as  the  Chinese  hanzi  ( ) .
John R Williams  (  May 4  ,  1782 – October  20  , 1854 ) was an American soldier , merchant , and politician who  is  most well known for  सेवारत   as  the first mayor of Detroit , Michigan .
In  कुल  , he  परोसा  as Detroit  's   महापौर   लिये  five  अन्य  terms .
he  also  थी   a   ब्रिगेडियर   सामान्य   in  the  संयुक्त  States Army during the  ब्लैक  Hawk War  .
A  सरल   शुष्क  magnetic  पोर्टेबल  compass  .
A smartphone that can be used as  a   कम्पास  because of the  magnetometer   अंदर  .
an  iPhone that can be used as  a  geological compass because of the  3-axis   teslameter  and  3-axis   accelerometer   अंदर  it
A  सैन्य   कम्पास  that  थी  used during World War I  .
a  compass  is  a navigational  यंत्र  that shows  दिशानिर्देश   in  a  फ़्रेम  of reference that is stationary  सापेक्ष  to the  सतह  of the earth  .
the  frame  of  reference  defines  the  चार  cardinal directions ( or points ) –  उत्तर  , south , east , and west .
इंटरमीडिएट  directions are also defined .
Usually ,  a  diagram called a  कम्पास   रोज़  , which  shows   the  directions (  साथ   उनके  names usually  abbreviated  to initials ) , is marked  on  the compass  .
When the compass is in  उपयोग  , the  रोज़   is  aligned with the real directions  in  the frame  of  reference  ,  so , for example , the `` N '' mark on the rose  वाकई  points  to  the north .
Frequently , in  जोड  to  the  rose or sometimes instead of it , angle  markings   in   डिग्री  are shown on the compass .
उत्तर  corresponds to zero degrees ,  और   the  angles increase clockwise , so  ईस्ट  is  90  degrees ,  दक्षिण  is 180 ,  और  west  is  270  .
ये  numbers allow the compass  to  show azimuths or bearings , which are commonly stated  in   इस  notation .
The magnetic compass was first invented  as   a  device for divination as early as the Chinese  हान  Dynasty  (  Since  परिचय  206 BC ) .
the  compass was used in Song Dynasty  चीन  by  the  military  लिये  navigational  orienteering  by  1040-1044  ,  और   थी  used  लिये  maritime navigation by 1111 to 1117 .
The  उपयोग   of  a compass is recorded in Western  यूरोपीय  between 1187 and 1202 ,  और  in  फारस  in 1232  .
The dry compass  थी  invented in Europe  around  1300 .
इस  was  supplanted  in the  जल्दी  20th century by the liquid-filled magnetic  कम्पास   .
The Inca Empire  or   inka  Empire  (  Quechua : Tawantinsuyu )  थी   the  largest  साम्राज्य   in   pre-columbian   अमेरिका   .
the  administrative , political and military center  of  the  साम्राज्य  was located in Cusco  in   modern-day  Peru .
The Inca  सभ्यता   arose   इससे   the  highlands  of  Peru sometime in the early 13th century .
इससे  1438 to 1533 , the Incas used a variety of methods  ,  from  conquest  to peaceful  सम्मिलन  , to  चरितार्थ  a large portion  of  western South America  ,  centered on the  andean   पहाड़   सीमाएँ  ,  सहित   ,  besides  पेरू  , large parts of modern Ecuador ,  पश्चिमी  and south central Bolivia ,  उत्तरपश्चिम  Argentina  ,   उत्तर  and  सेंट्रल   चिली  , and  दक्षिणी   कोलंबिया  into a state  comparable  to the historical empires  of   यूरेशिया  .
The official  भाषा  of the empire was Quechua , although hundreds of  लोकल   भाषाएं  and dialects of  quechua   यहूद  spoken .
The  इन्का  referred to their empire as Tawantinsuyu which can be translated as The Four Regions  or  The  चार   संयुक्त   प्रांतों  .
वहीँ   यहूद  many local forms of worship , most  of  them  concerning  local sacred  ``   huacas  `` , but the  इन्का  leadership encouraged  the   इबादत  of Inti —the sun god—and imposed its  प्रभुता   ऊपर   अन्य  cults such as that of Pachamama .
The Incas considered  उनके   किंग  , the Sapa  इन्का  , to be the  ``   चाइल्ड   of   the  sun . ''
The kidneys  हैं  organs that  serve  several essential regulatory roles in  सबसे  animals  ,   सहित  vertebrates and  कुछ  invertebrates .
वे  are essential in the urinary system and  भी  serve homeostatic functions such as  the  regulation of electrolytes ,  मेंटेनेंस  of acid–base balance ,  और   विनियमन   of  blood pressure (  via   maintaining  salt and water balance ) .
They  serve  the body as  a  natural  फिल्टर  of the blood , and remove wastes  जिससे   हैं  diverted to the urinary bladder .
In  producing   मूत्र   ,  the kidneys excrete  wastes  such  as  urea and ammonium ,  और  they are also responsible  लिये  the  reabsorption  of water ,  ग्लूकोज  , and  अमीनो   acids  .
the   गुर्दे   भी   उपज  hormones including  calcitriol  , erythropoietin , and the enzyme renin .
Located  at   the  rear of the abdominal cavity in the retroperitoneum  ,  the kidneys receive blood  इससे  the paired renal  धमनियों  ,  और   नाली   into   the   युग्म  renal  रगों   .
Each kidney excretes  मूत्र  into a  ureter  , itself a paired structure that  empties   into  the urinary bladder .
Renal physiology is  the  study of kidney function , while nephrology  is  the  चिकित्सा  specialty concerned  साथ  kidney diseases .
Diseases  of   the  kidney are diverse , but individuals with kidney  बीमारी  frequently  प्रदर्शक  characteristic clinical  सुविधाएँ  .
Common clinical  शर्तें  involving  the  kidney  शामिल   the  nephritic and nephrotic  syndromes  ,  renal   cysts  , acute kidney injury , chronic  गुर्दा  disease ,  urinary  tract infection , nephrolithiasis , and urinary  ट्रैक्ट  obstruction .
Various  cancers  of  the  kidney  मौजूद  ; the most common adult renal cancer is renal  कोशिका  carcinoma  .
Cancers  ,  cysts  ,  and some other renal conditions can  be  managed with removal of the  गुर्दा  , or nephrectomy .
जब  renal  फलन   ,   measured   by  glomerular filtration rate  ,  is  persistently  poor  ,   डायलिसिस   और  kidney  प्रत्यारोपण  may be treatment options .
हालांकि   वे  are not  severely  harmful , kidney stones  can  be painful and a nuisance .
The removal  of  kidney  पत्थरों   involves  ultrasound treatment to  ब्रेक   up  the stones  into   छोटी  pieces ,  जिससे  are then  passed  through the  urinary  tract .
One  आम  symptom  of  kidney stones is a  शार्प  pain in the medial/lateral segments  of   the  lower  वापस  .
lockton  Companies  inc.  is the world 's  largest   privately  held insurance  brokerage  firm  ,  providing  बीमे   ,  risk  प्रबन्धन  and  कर्मचारी   लाभ  solutions  .
in  addition  to  its Kansas  नगर  ,  मिसौरी   मुख्यालय   ,   lockton  operates 60  स्थितियाँ   in  17 countries .
lockton  is currently home to more than 4,450 Associates worldwide .
The company was  संस्थापित  by Jack Lockton  in  1966  और   रै  since become the world’s 9th largest insurance brokerage firm .
lockton   serves  a  चौड़ी  array of industries with services that include risk  प्रबन्धन   ,  casualty  ,  surety , professional indemnity and  अधिक   .
For  46  years ,  lockton  posted extraordinary organic  विकास  ,  साथ   वैश्विक  revenues reaching $ 915 million in fiscal  2012   .
Lockton  लाभ  Group  :  Lockton’s Employee Benefit’s  टोली   works   closely  with insurance  वाहक  and administrators to create comprehensive and integrated benefits strategies for  क्लाइंट  .
The Lockton  लाभ  Group  provides  services  सहित   अनुपालन  ,  कार्यपालिका   लाभ  ,  स्वास्थ्य  and  welfare   ,  health  रिस्क  solutions ,  रिटायरमेंट  and  अधिक   .
Lockton Affinity : Lockton Affinity  ,  an  संबद्ध   of   lockton   कंपनियाँ   ,  meets the insurance  needs   of  affinity groups , franchises , professional organizations  ,  and associations of all  आकार  .
Lockton  अपनापन  offers  a  variety  of  insurance  उत्पाद  options  और  programs .
उत्पाद  include :  सामान्य  Liability , Professional Liability ,  प्रॉपर्टी   ,  Workers  मुआवजे  ,  निर्देशकों  & Officers  देयता  , Commercial Auto , Specialty Coverage , Excess , Health Plans and  अधिक  .
Lockton International : Lockton  अंतरराष्ट्रीय   operates  offices  in  the UK  और   आयरलैंड   ,  as well as offices throughout  एशिया  and Latin  अमेरिका  .
In Europe ,  lockton   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   is  a partner  in  EOS  risq   ,  Europe’s leading  बीमे  broking and risk management consultancy .
EOS  risq  is  an  equity-based  यूरोपीय  partnership of major independent insurance  brokers   साथ  over 3,500 employees based in more than 30  देशों   in  Europe .
lockton   अंतरराष्ट्रीय   provides  specialized  समाधान   लिये  personal lines  ,  SME’s and  प्रमुख   multi-national  clients .
श्वेत  chocolate is  a  chocolate  डेरिवेटिव   .
It  commonly  consists  of  cocoa  मक्खन   ,  sugar , milk solids  और  salt ,  और  is characterized by a pale yellow  or   आइवरी   रूप   .
The melting point  of  cocoa butter  ,  its primary cocoa  सेम   घटक   ,  is high enough to keep white chocolate solid at room  तापमान  .
Donald Leon `` Don '' Blankenship (  born  March 14 , 1950  )  was Chairman and CEO of Massey Energy  co.   ,  the sixth largest coal company  (  by 2008 production ) in the United  राज्य  .
he   परोसा   in  those  भूमिकाएँ  from November 30 ,  2000  , until December  31  ,  2010   .
Blankenship is an  क्रियाशील  financial backer of the Republican  पार्टी   और   भागीदार   in  local and state  राजनीती  ,  विशेषकर  in his home  राज्य   of   वेस्ट  Virginia  .
he   रै  frequently  बोला  out  सरेआम  about politics  ,  the environment , unions , and  कोयले   उत्पादन   .
u.S.   प्रतिभूति   और  Exchange Commission  filings  show  blankenship  was  सशुल्क  $ 17.8  लाख   in  2009 , the highest  in  the coal  उद्योग  .
उसके  2009  अदा  represents a $ 6.8  लाख  raise over 2008  और   लगभग  double his  मुआवजे  package in 2007 .
blankenship  also received a deferred compensation package  valued  at $ 27.2  लाख  in 2009 .
On December 3 ,  2010  , Blankenship announced that he  थी  retiring as CEO at  the  end of  the  year , and would be succeeded by Massey President Baxter F. Phillips  jr   .
Bow Wow is one of  the   transcriptions  used in English  to  describe  a   श्वान   's  bark .
Bow  wow   may  also  refer  to:
धनुष   wow   (   बैंड  )  ,  a  जापानी  hard rock/heavy metal band
