`` Bow Wow  ब्लूज़  ( My  मामा  Treat Me like a Dog ) ''  ,  a song composed  in  the 1920s by Cliff  dost   &  Nat Osborne
Negligence ( Lat . negligentia , from neglegere  ,  to  उपेक्षा  , literally  ``  not to pick up  कुछ   ''   )   is  a failure  to  exercise the care  कि  a reasonably prudent person would exercise  in  like circumstances  .
The area  of  tort law  ज्ञात  as negligence involves harm caused by carelessness , not intentional harm  .
According to Jay  M.  Feinman of the  rutgers  University  स्कूल  of Law ;
`` The core idea  of  negligence is that people  चाहिए  exercise reasonable care when they  अधिनियम   by  taking account of the potential harm that  वे  might  foreseeably  cause harm  to  other people . ''
`` those who go  personally   or  bring property where they know that they or  it  may come into  टक्कर  with the  व्यक्तियों  or property  of  others  have  by law  a   ड्यूटी   डाल  upon  उन्हें  to use reasonable  परवाह   और  skill to  avoid   ऐसे   a   टक्कर  . ''
फ्लेचर   v  Rylands ( [  1866  ]  lr  1 Ex 265 )
Through civil  वाद   ,  if an  घायल   व्यक्ति  proves that  another  person acted negligently to cause their  चोट  , they can  रिकवर  damages  to  compensate for their harm .
Proving a case for  लापरवाही  can potentially entitle  the   घायल   अभियोक्ता   to   मुआवजे   लिये  harm to their body , property  ,  mental well-being , financial status  ,  or  अंतरंग   संबंध  .
However , because  लापरवाही  cases  हैं  very  fact-specific  ,  इस   सामान्य  definition does not fully explain the  अवधारणा  of  जब  the  विधि   होगा  require  एक  person to compensate another for losses  caused  by accidental injury  .
Further  ,  the law of negligence at  आम   विधि   is  only  एक  aspect  of  the  विधि   of  liability  .
हालांकि   resulting  damages must be proven  in  order to recover  मुआवजे  in a negligence action ,  the  nature and extent of those  क्षतिपूर्ति  are  नहीं  the primary focus  of  negligence  मामले  .
A melanocytic nevus ( also  ज्ञात  as `` Nevocytic  nevus   ''   )  is a type  of  lesion that contains nevus cells (  a   प्रकार  of melanocyte  )  .
Some sources  equate  the term mole with `` melanocytic nevus '' .
अन्य   स्त्रोत   आरक्षित   the  term `` mole  ''   लिये   अन्य  purposes .
The  बहुमत  of  औज़ार  appear during  the  first two  दशकों  of a person’s life  ,  while  परिचय  one in every 100  शिशु   is  born with moles .
acquired   औज़ार  are a  रूप   of  benign neoplasm , while congenital moles ,  or  congenital  nevi   ,  are considered a  नाबालिग  malformation or hamartoma and may  be  at  a   उच्चतर  risk for  melanoma   .
a  mole can be either subdermal ( under  the   स्किन  )  or   a   pigmented  growth on the  स्किन  , formed  ज़्यादातर  of a  प्रकार   of  cell known  as  a  melanocyte  .
The high  विशेषज्ञता   of  the body’s pigmenting agent ,  मेलेनिन   ,  is responsible for their dark  रंग   .
औज़ार  are a member of the  परिवार   of   स्किन  lesions known as nevi .
The comprehensive metabolic panel , or chemical screen  ,  ( CMP ; CPT  कोड   80053  ) is  a   फलक  of 14 blood tests which  serves  as an initial broad  चिकित्सा  screening tool .
The CMP provides a  अशिष्ट   जाँच  of kidney function  ,  liver function  ,   और  electrolyte and fluid balance , but  it  is  दूर  from perfect .
असामान्य  values  इससे  a CBC may be  a  result  of   गलत  positives and  यूँ  the CBC may need  to  be repeated for  a   रोगी  (  or   replaced  with a more  विशिष्ट  test )  .
The CMP  is  an expanded version of the basic metabolic  फलक  ( BMP  )  , which does  नहीं  include liver tests  .
A CMP (  or  BMP  )  can  be   ordered   as  part of  a  routine  शारीरिक   परिक्षा  ,  or  may  be  used to monitor  a   रोगी  with a chronic  बीमारी  , such as diabetes mellitus or hypertension .
पिछला  names  लिये  the panel of tests  have   महरूम  Chem 12 ,  रसायन   फलक  , Chemistry screen , SMA 12  ,  SMA 20 and SMAC ( Sequential Multiple Analysis - Computer ) .
The tests are performed  on  machines based on  the   autoanalyzer  invented in  1957  .
प्राकृतिक   गैस  extraction by countries  in   घन  meters per year .
Natural gas is  a   naturally   occurring  hydrocarbon  गैस   मिश्रण   consisting  primarily of methane , but commonly  सहित  varying amounts  of  other hydrocarbons , carbon dioxide ,  नाइट्रोजन  , and hydrogen sulfide .
Natural gas is an energy source often  प्रयुक्त  for heating , cooking , and electricity  पीढी  .
it  is  भी  used as fuel for vehicles  और   as  a  रासायनिक  feedstock  in   the  manufacture of plastics  और   अन्य  commercially important  सशुल्क  chemicals .
Natural  गैस  is found in deep  भूमिगत  natural  चट्टान  formations  or  associated with  अन्य   हाइड्रोकार्बन   टंकी   in  coal beds and  as   मिथेन  clathrates .
Petroleum  is  also another resource  मिला   in  proximity to and  साथ  natural  गैस   .
Most natural gas was created over time by two mechanisms :  biogenic   और  thermogenic  .
biogenic  gas is created  by   methanogenic  organisms in  marshes  , bogs  ,  landfills , and  उथले   sediments   .
deeper  in the earth ,  at  greater temperature and  दबाव  , thermogenic  गैस  is created from buried  सशुल्क   सामग्री  .
Before natural gas can be used as  a  fuel ,  it   जरूर  undergo processing  to  remove  impurities   ,   सहित  water , to  मिलें  the  विशेषताएँ   of  marketable  प्राकृतिक  gas .
The by-products of  प्रसंस्करण   शामिल  ethane , propane  ,  butanes ,  pentanes  , and  उच्चतर  molecular weight  hydrocarbons  , hydrogen sulfide ( which  may   be  converted into  pure  sulfur )  ,  carbon dioxide , water vapor ,  और  sometimes helium  और  nitrogen  .
प्राकृतिक   गैस   is   प्रायः  informally referred to simply  as  gas , especially when compared to other energy  स्त्रोत   ऐसे  as  आयल  or coal  .
इस  page is about the  कल्पना  Movers band .
For  सूचना   परिचय  the  tv  show starring  the   बैंड  , see  कल्पना   मूवर्स  ( TV series  )  .
कल्पना  Movers is a  बैंड  formed  in   नई  Orleans ,  louisiana   ,  in  2003   .
the  lineup includes Rich Collins  ,  Scott Durbin , Dave Poche , and Scott  ``   smitty   ''  Smith .
Members of the group were  longtime  friends and neighbors .
the  group started  as  a television/music  अवधारणा  which was  pitched   to  local PBS  affiliates  in New Orleans .
WLAE-TV was the  पहला  to take  an  interest in  the  group and later introduced them to Beth Courtney  ,  the President  &  Chief Executive  अधिकारी  at  louisiana  Public Broadcasting .
Soon after , LPB began airing one-minute  वीडियो  produced by the  कल्पना  Movers themselves .
the   मूवर्स   निर्मित  a sizable  क्षेत्रीय  following by  सेटिंग  educational  गीतों  for kids to melodies and  लय  that adults appreciate as well .
They sold more than 100,000 copies of their self-produced  cds   और   dvds  .
Their three  इंडी  CDs :  ``  Good Ideas , '' `` Calling All  मूवर्स   ,  '' and `` Eight Feet ''  साथ  with their  ग्रास  roots DVD ``  हलचल  It Up '' have , combined , won fourteen national awards ,  इससे  such  समूह  as  the   नेशनल  Association of Parenting  publications   (  NAPPA ) and Parents '  चुनाव  .
in  early 2005  ,  Disney took notice , and initiated negotiations to  add  the Movers  to   the  company 's roster .
These were interrupted in  अगस्त   जब  the  बाढ़   सुरक्षा  designed and built by  the   फौज  Corps of Engineers to  protect  New Orleans  विफल   .
The resulting floodwater claimed the band 's  दफ्तर  ,  as   खूब  as the homes of  कॉलिन्स  , Durbin and Poche –  लकिन   the   सौदे  was  हस्ताक्षरित  in the spring of  2006   .
In 2008 , Walt Disney Records introduced  the  Imagination Movers ' music to the nation with the release  of  the Movers ' first nationally-released CD , `` Juice  बक्सा  Heroes .  ''
In  सितंबर   2008   ,  a 30-minute  दिखाएँ  featuring the  समूह  began airing  on   the  Disney Channel  's   प्रीस्कूल  programming  ब्लाक  known as  playhouse  Disney , and currently  airs   on   playhouse  Disney 's  बदलना  , Disney Junior .
The  मूवर्स  write  और   perform   सब   the  songs on their show  .
Moreover  ,   the   कल्पना  Movers have received critical  kudos  for their live  कॉन्सर्ट  performances .
In October  2009   ,  the Imagination  मूवर्स   प्रारंभ  the ``  सजीव  from  the   विचार  Warehouse Concert Tour  2009  '' .
Traveling from  mid-october  to mid-December 2009 their live performances include lots of  उनके   पसंदीदा   गीतों  and dancing  ,   as   खूब   as  video  दिखावे  of Warehouse Mouse .
शुरूआत  in early-February  2011  and wrapping up in  लेट  May 2011 ,  the   कल्पना  Movers presented their `` In a Big Warehouse Concert Tour ,  ''  playing more than  100   shows  in 50+  शहरों   आरपार  North  अमेरिका   .
From March  to  October  2012  ,  the  Imagination Movers toured North America on their  post-disney  `` Rock-O-Matic '' tour .
The show maintained  अनेक   तत्व  of the original  tv   अवधारणा  ,  ऐसे  as an on-stage `` idea  आपात  '' and several sets  इससे   उनके  older catalogue ; however , with the departure of Wendy Calio back to her  देशी  Hawaii , the  अक्षर   ``  Nina '' , along with her musical numbers ,  is  not present  .
the   दौरे   promotes   the   कल्पना  Movers ' new  album/dvd  release  ,  `` Rock-O-Matic ''  ,  which features all new  म्यूज़िक  from the  बैंड   .
the  album itself is produced independently  of  Disney and has a  notably  more mature  ,  contemporary  rock-and-roll   ध्वनि  , though  स्टिल   बहुत  appropriate  लिये  children .
Several performance dates were moved to  बाद  in 2012 to  लाभ  from the increased  एक्सपोज़र   of  the Imagination Movers TV show now  playing  daily  on  Disney Junior .
The platypus  (  Ornithorhynchus anatinus ) is  a  semiaquatic mammal  endemic  to eastern Australia  ,  including Tasmania .
Together  साथ  the  चार  species  of  echidna ,  it  is one of the five  extant   प्रजाति   of   monotremes  , the only  स्तनधारियों   कि   lay   अंडे  instead of giving birth .
it   is   the  sole living representative of its  परिवार  ( Ornithorhynchidae ) and genus (  ornithorhynchus   )   ,   हालांकि  a  क्रमांक  of related species  have  been found in the fossil record .
The unusual appearance  of   इस   egg-laying  , duck  -billed   ,  beaver -tailed , otter -footed mammal  मनोरथ  European naturalists when they first encountered it  ,   साथ   कुछ  considering it an elaborate fraud .
It is one of the few  विषैला   स्तनधारियों   ,  the male  platypus  having a spur on the  हिन्द   पैर  that delivers a venom capable of causing  कठोर  pain  to  humans .
the  unique features of the platypus make  it  an important subject  in   the   पढ़ाई  of  विकासवादी  biology and  a  recognisable and  iconic  symbol of Australia ; it has appeared as a  शुभंकर  at national events and is  प्रदर्शित  on  the   रिवर्स  of its 20-cent  सिक्का  .
The  platypus  is the animal emblem of the  राज्य  of  नई  South Wales  .
Until the early 20th  सदी  , it was hunted  लिये  its fur , but  it  is  अभी   सुरक्षित  throughout its  दायरा  .
Although captive breeding programmes have had only limited success and the  platypus  is vulnerable to  the  effects  of  pollution ,  it  is not under  कोई  immediate threat  .
the   chupacabra   or  Chupacabras ( ,  इससे  chupar `` to suck '' and cabra ``  बकरी  ''  ,  literally ``  बकरी  sucker  ''  ) is a legendary  cryptid   rumored  to  inhabit  parts of the Americas .
it  is  संबद्ध  more recently with sightings of  an   allegedly   अनजान  animal in Puerto Rico  (  where these sightings  यहूद  first  reported  )  ,  Mexico ,  और  the United States  ,   विशेषकर  in the  latter   's  Latin American communities .
The  नाम  comes  इससे  the animal 's  reported  habit of  attacking   और  drinking the blood of livestock , especially  बकरियों  .
शारीरिक   descriptions  of  the  creature vary  .
Eyewitness  sightings  have  महरूम  claimed as early as 1995 in Puerto Rico , and  have  since been reported as far north as  maine   ,  and as far south as  चिली  , and even being spotted outside the Americas in countries like Russia and The Philippines  .
It  is  supposedly a heavy  प्राणी  , the size  of  a small bear , with a  पंक्ति  of spines reaching  इससे  the neck  to  the base of  the  tail .
sighting  reports of the  chupacabra  have  महरूम  disregarded as uncorroborated  or  lacking evidence  ,   जबकि  most reports in  उत्तरी  Mexico  और  the  दक्षिणी  United  राज्य   have   महरूम  verified  as   canids   afflicted  by mange .
biologists  and wildlife management officials view the  chupacabra   as  a contemporary legend  .
The North American Free  व्यापार  Agreement ( NAFTA  )  is an  अनुबंध  signed  by  Canada , Mexico ,  और  the  संयुक्त  States , creating a trilateral trade  bloc  in North America .
the  agreement came into force on  जनवरी  1 , 1994 .
It superseded  the  Canada–United States  फ़्री   व्यापार  Agreement between the U.S.  ,  Canada , and Mexico
NAFTA has two supplements : the North  अमरीकी  Agreement on Environmental Cooperation (  naaec  ) and the North American  अनुबंध  on Labor Cooperation  (   naalc   )  .
Thermal  सुकून  is  the   कंडीशन  of mind that  expresses  satisfaction with the  थर्मल  environment and is assessed by subjective evaluation ( ANSI / ASHRAE  मानक  55 ) .
Maintaining  इस   मानक   of  thermal comfort  लिये   occupants  of  इमारतें   or  other  enclosures  is one of the  महत्वपूर्ण  goals of HVAC (  हीटिंग   ,  ventilation , and air  कंडीशनिंग  )  डिज़ाइन  engineers .
The Predicted Mean Vote (  pmv  ) model stands among the most  पहचाना  thermal comfort models  .
It  थी  developed using  सिद्धान्त   of  heat balance and experimental  आंकड़ा  collected in  a  controlled  जलवायु   कक्ष  under  स्थिर  state conditions  .
क्युकी   the  PMV  मॉडल   थी  derived from  आंकड़ा  collected in a controlled climate , it  is   नहीं  suitable for  अनुप्रयोग  in naturally ventilated  स्पेसेस  which often have  ऊँची  levels of air movement .
This shortcoming motivated the  विकास  of a  परिवार  of empirical  सांख्यिकीय   मॉडल  of  थर्मल  comfort  in   naturally  ventilated  स्पेसेस  known as adaptive  मॉडल  .
Adaptive  मॉडल  of thermal comfort consider occupants as  dynamically   interacting   साथ  their  पर्यावरण  , and  controlling  their thermal comfort by  अर्थात्  of clothing or window-opening and  closing  .
This is in  कंट्रास्ट  to thermal comfort in sealed buildings , in which  occupants   अनुभव   the  environment  passively  .
Thermal comfort is affected by heat conduction , convection , radiation  ,  and  evaporative  heat  घाटा  .
Thermal comfort  is  maintained when  the  heat generated by human  चयापचय   is  allowed to  dissipate  ,  यूँ  maintaining thermal equilibrium with the surroundings .
It has been long recognized  कि  the  सनसनी  of feeling hot  or   ठंडा   is  not  बस  dependent on  एयर  temperature  अलोन  .
Thermal comfort calculations according to ANSI/ASHRAE Standard 55 can be freely performed with the  cbe  Thermal Comfort  औजार  for ASHRAE-55  .
durante  degli Alighieri , simply referred  to   as  Dante ( , ; ; c. 1265–1321 ) ,  थी  a major Italian poet of the Middle  आयु  .
His Divine Comedy , originally called ' and later called  '   by   boccaccio  , is  widely  considered the  महानतम   साहित्यिक  work composed in the Italian  भाषा  and  a  masterpiece of  संसार  literature .
In  इटली   he  is known as ' ( `` the  परम्   कवि  '' )  or  just  '   .
He  ,  Petrarch and Boccaccio are also  ज्ञात   as  `` the  तीन  fountains  ''   or   ``  the three crowns ''  .
Dante  is   भी  called the ``  पिता  of the  इतालवी  language ''  .
मुख्यालय  ( Kobe , Japan )
( ) is a tire and rubber company  आधारित  in Japan .
It is part of the Sumitomo Group .
The  कम्पनी   traces   इसके  origins to  1909  , when the Sumitomo Group made an investment in Dunlop Japan , the  newly  formed  जापानी  subsidiary of the British  कम्पनी  Dunlop Rubber .
Over the years  sumitomo   और  Dunlop  विकसित  a close  कारोबार   संबंध  ,  और  in 1963 the  sumitomo  Group acquired control  of   dunlop   जापानी  and  renamed  it Sumitomo Rubber  उद्योग   ltd  .
In 1985 , when Dunlop Rubber  थी  taken over by BTR plc  ,   the   कम्पनी  acquired the  ऑटोमोबाइल   टायर  assets of Dunlop ,  सहित   the  right to  उपयोग  the Dunlop brand on automobile  टायर   .
The acquisition  किया  not include  the  US and Australian businesses , which  यहूद  separately owned  ,  but  in  1986  sumitomo  also  acquired  the Dunlop  टायर   निगम  of the US  इससे  its management .
In  1997   ,  Sumitomo formed a  संयुक्त  venture  साथ  Goodyear Tire and Rubber Company  ,  by which Goodyear and Sumitomo agreed to manufacture tires for each other  's  markets  ,  including Dunlop branded  टायर   .
As  भाग  of the agreement  ,   goodyear  acquired 75 %  रूचि  in Dunlop Tyres , the  uk  company which  sumitomo  had formed  ,   और   in  Dunlop Tire Corporation .
Goodyear and Sumitomo also made  निवेश  in  प्रत्येक  other .
Today  ,  the company makes a wide range  of   रबर  based products , including automobile tires ,  गोल्फ़  balls and tennis balls  .
Microsoft Visual Studio Express is a set  of  freeware integrated development  environments  ( IDE  )  developed  by  Microsoft  कि  are lightweight versions of the Microsoft  विज़ुअल   स्टुडियो  product line  .
Express Editions were conceived beginning with  विज़ुअल  Studio 2005  .
The idea of Express editions is to provide  streamlined  ,  easy-to-use  and easy-to-learn IDEs  लिये   उपयोक्ता   अन्य   than  professional software developers , such  as   hobbyists   और   विद्यार्थी  .
The Alps  हैं   एक  of the  ग्रेट   पहाड़   दायरा  systems of Europe  stretching  approximately across eight Alpine countries from Austria and Slovenia in  the  east  ,   स्विट्ज़रलैंड   ,  Liechtenstein  ,  Germany  ,   फ़्रांस   to  the west and Italy and Monaco  to   the  south  .
The mountains were formed over hundreds of millions of years as the African and Eurasian tectonic plates  collided  .
Extreme shortening caused by the event  resulted  in  समुद्री   sedimentary   रॉक्स   उठती  by  thrusting  and folding  into  high mountain peaks  ऐसे   as  Mont Blanc and the Matterhorn .
Mont Blanc spans the French–Italian  किनारा  ,  और  at  is   the   उच्चतम  mountain in  the  Alps  .
The Alpine region area contains many peaks higher than , known  as  the `` four-thousanders `` .
the   ऊँचाई  and  आकार   of  the  दायरा  affects the climate  in  Europe  ;  in  the  mountains  वर्षण  levels vary  greatly  and  climatic  conditions consist  of  distinct zones  .
Wildlife such  as   ibex   सजीव  in the higher peaks to elevations of , and  पौधे  such  as  Edelweiss  grow  in rocky areas in lower elevations  as  well  as   in  higher  elevations  .
Evidence of human habitation in  the  Alps goes back to the Paleolithic era .
a  mummified man , determined  to   be  5,000 years old ,  थी  discovered  on  a  हिमानी  at the  austrian–italian  border in  1991   .
By the  6th  century BC , the Celtic La  tène   संस्कृति  was well established .
hannibal  may have crossed the Alps with  a  herd of  हाथियों  , and  the  Romans had settlements in  the   प्रदेश   .
In 1800 Napoleon crossed one of  the  mountain passes  साथ   an  army of  40,000  .
The  18th  and  19th  centuries saw an  influx  of naturalists  ,   लेखक   ,  and artists ,  in  particular  the  Romantics  ,  followed by  the  golden age of alpinism  as  mountaineers  began  to ascend the peaks .
In World War II the  तीसरा   reich  invaded  the  Alpine countries ,  साथ   the   एक्सेप्शन  of Switzerland and Liechtenstein ; Adolf  हिटलर  kept a base of  आपरेशन   in   the  Bavarian Alps  throughout  the war .
The Alpine region has a strong cultural identity .
The traditional culture of farming , cheesemaking ,  और  woodworking  स्टिल  exists  in  Alpine  गांवों  ,  हालांकि  the tourist industry began to  grow   जल्दी  in the  20th   सदी   और   विस्तारित   greatly  after World War II to become the dominant  उद्योग  by the end of the century  .
The Winter Olympic Games have  महरूम  hosted  in  the Swiss ,  फ्रेंच   ,  Italian  ,  Austrian and German Alps .
At  उपस्थित  the region is home to 14 million  लोगों   और  has 120 million annual visitors .
लोइस  Patrice  griffin  ( née Pewterschmidt )  is  a character from the animated  टेलीविज़न  series Family Guy  .
She is voiced  by   लेखक  Alex Borstein and first  appeared   on  television ,  साथ   साथ  the  बाकी  of  the  family in the 15-minute short on December 20 , 1998  .
लोइस  was created  और  designed by series creator  सेठ   macfarlane   .
macfarlane  was asked to  पिच   a  pilot  to  the  फॉक्स   प्रसारण  Company based on Larry and  स्टीव  , a short made  by  MacFarlane  जिससे   प्रदर्शित   a   middle-aged  character named Larry and an intellectual  श्वान  , Steve .
बाद  the  पायलट  was  दिए  the green light , the  griffin  family appeared on the episode  ``  Death  रै   a   छाया   ``   .
Lois is  the   माँ  of the Griffin family .
With her husband Peter , she has had  तीन   children  :  मेग  , Chris  ,   और  Stewie .
Lois is  प्रायः  portrayed as  a  stereotypical  टेलीविज़न  mother  ,  despite her admitting to  होने  a drug  उपयोक्ता  , a  recovering   मेथ  addict  kleptomaniac  .
Lois has also  था  several affairs , one of which allegedly  resulted  in the conception of Meg .
वो  has  appeared  in other media  relating  to  परिवार  Guy—including  a  video game , commercials and  books—and  inspired an entire  लकीर  of  merchandise  .
Lois 's distinctive  नई  York accent originated from  a  character  in   a  stage show that Alex Borstein had performed  in   ,  which was largely  प्रेरित  by a relative who grew up  on  Long Island  ,  New  यॉर्क  .
Family  हस्तांतरण  of  बास्क   भाषा  ( Basque  as  initial  भाषा   )
Percentage of  विद्यार्थी   पंजीकृत  in Basque  भाषा  schools ( 2000–2005 )  .
स्थान  of the  basque-language   प्रांतों  within Spain  और   फ़्रांस
बास्क  ( endonym :  ,  )  is   the   ancestral  language  of  the Basque people  ,  who inhabit  the  Basque Country ,  a  region spanning an area in northeastern  स्पेन  and  southwestern  France .
It is spoken  by  27  %  of Basques  in  all  territories  ( 714,136 out of 2,648,998 ) .
Of these , 663,035 live in  the  Spanish part of the  बास्क  country and the remaining 51,100  सजीव  in the  फ्रेंच  part .
In academic discussions of  the   वितरण  of Basque in Spain and  फ़्रांस  , it is customary to refer to three ancient  प्रांतों  in France and four  स्पेनी  provinces  .
देशी   अध्यक्षों  are concentrated in a contiguous area including parts  of   the  Spanish autonomous communities  of  the Basque Country  और  Navarre and in the  पश्चिमी   हाफ   of  the French département of Pyrénées-Atlantiques .
the  Basque  autonomous  Community is an administrative  एंटिटी   भीतर  the binational  ethnographic   बास्क  Country incorporating the  परंपरागत  Spanish  प्रांतों   of   biscay  , Gipuzkoa  ,   और  Álava ,  जिससे  retain their  अस्तित्व   as   politico-administrative   विभाजन  .
ये  provinces  और  many areas of Navarre are heavily populated  by  ethnic  basques   ,  but Basque was  ,  at least until the 1990s ,  नहीं   बोला  as  a  native language in most of Álava , western  भाग  of Biscay  और  central  और  southern  क्षेत्रों  of Navarre  ,  either  क्युकी  it had been replaced by  स्पेनी  along  the   सदियां  , in some areas  ,  or because  it  had never been  बोला   वहीँ  , in other  क्षेत्रों  .
in  southwestern  फ़्रांस  , the ancient Basque-populated  प्रांतों  were Labourd , Lower  नावारा  , and Soule .
They  और   अन्य  regions were consolidated into a single département in 1790 under  the   नाम  Basses-Pyrénées , a name which persisted until  1970  .
a  standardized form  of  the  बास्क  language , called Euskara  batua  ,  थी   विकसित  by  the  Basque  भाषा  Academy in  the  late 1960s .
Euskara Batua  थी   निर्मित  so  कि  Basque language could be used—and easily understood by all Basque speakers—in formal  परिस्थितियों   (  education ,  द्रव्यमान  media , literature ) , and this is its  प्रमुख  use today .
the   भूमिका  of this  मानक   बास्क  language  depends  on the linguistic educational  मॉडल  of  प्रत्येक  region  और   प्रत्येक   स्कूल  .
In  सबसे  areas of the  स्पेनी  Basque Country , the educational Model  d  , where all subjects are taught  in   बास्क  , except  ``  Spanish  भाषा  and  साहित्य   ''  ( which  is  taught  in   स्पेनी  )  is  now the  predominant  model .
In France  ,  the Basque  भाषा  school  seaska   और  the association  लिये  a  दुभाषिया   (  Basque and  फ्रेंच   )  schooling Ikasbi  मिलें   a  wide range of Basque language educational needs up to the  छठे  Form , while often struggling to surmount  वित्तीय  and  प्रशासनिक  constraints .
Apart from this  मानकीकृत   संस्करण  , there are five main Basque dialects :  bizkaian  ,  gipuzkoan   ,  and Upper Navarrese in Spain , and Navarrese–Lapurdian and Zuberoan  (  in France ) .
Although they take their names from the mentioned historic provinces , the  dialect   सीमाएँ   हैं   नहीं  congruent with province boundaries .
the   अध्यक्ष  , Directors and  कम्पनी   ,  of the  बैंको  of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  ,  commonly   ज्ञात   as  the First  बैंको  of the  संयुक्त   राज्य  , was a central bank  ,  chartered for  a  term of  बीस  years  ,  by the United States Congress on February 25 ,  1791  .
Establishment of the  बैंको  was included in a three-part  विस्तार   of  federal fiscal  और  monetary power  (  along  साथ  a  संघीय   मिंट  and excise taxes ) championed by Alexander  हैमिल्टन  , first Secretary of  the   राजकोष   .
Hamilton believed a central bank was necessary to stabilize and  improve  the  स्वदेश  's credit , and to  improve  handling  of  the financial business  of  the United  राज्य  government  अंतर्गत   the  newly enacted Constitution  .
Officially proposed  to   the  first session  of   the   पहला  Congress in 1790 , Hamilton 's Bank  faced  widespread resistance  इससे  opponents  of  increased federal power .
Secretary of State Thomas Jefferson and  जेम्स   मैडिसन  led the  विपक्ष  , which  claimed   कि   the  bank was unconstitutional , and that it  benefited  merchants and  निवेशकों   at  the expense  of  the majority  of  the population .
the   पहला  Bank  भवन  is now  a  National Historic Landmark located in Philadelphia ,  पेन्सिलवेनिया  within Independence National Historical Park .
James Wesley Marsters ( born August 20 , 1962 ) is  an   अमरीकी  actor and musician .
marsters   पहला  came to the  ध्यान  of the general public playing  the  popular  अक्षर  Spike ,  a  platinum-blond yobbish English  पिशाच  in the television  श्रेणी  Buffy the Vampire Slayer  और  its spin-off series ,  देवदूत  , from 1997  to  2004 .
Since then  ,  he  रै  gone on  to   खेल  other science fiction roles , such as the  एलियन  supervillain Brainiac on the Superman -inspired series  smallville  , the omnisexual  समय  traveller Captain  जॉन  Hart in British  science-fiction  show Torchwood  और   आतंकवादी  Barnabas Greeley in  sci  fi 's  caprica   .
Marsters appeared in a  supporting   भूमिका   in  the 2007 movie P.S .
I Love You and as the main  विपक्षी  , Piccolo ,  in   the  2009 fantasy adventure film Dragonball  एवोल्यूशन  .
He appeared as a recurring character in the first season  of   the  revival of  हवाई  5-0 .
In molecular biology  ,  human  chorionic  gonadotropin  (   hcg  ) is  a  hormone produced by the fertilized  अंडा  after  धारणा  .
Later  दौरान   गर्भावस्था  it  is   बना  by the developing placenta  ,  and  बाद  by the  placental  component syncytiotrophoblast  .
Some cancerous tumors produce  इस   हार्मोन   ;  therefore , elevated  स्तर  measured when the patient  is   नहीं  pregnant can lead to a cancer  निदान  .
however  ,  it   is   नहीं  known whether this  उत्पादन  is  a  contributing cause  or  an effect of tumorigenesis .
the  pituitary  एनॉलॉग  of  hcg  , known as  luteinizing  hormone ( LH )  ,   is   उत्पादित  in the pituitary  ग्रंथि   of  males  और   महिलाओं   of  all ages  .
, the FDA has prohibited  the  sale of `` homeopathic '' and over the  काउंटर   hcg   आहार   उत्पाद  and declared  उन्हें  fraudulent  और  illegal  .
बेयोंस  Giselle Knowles-Carter  ,  known by  उसके   स्टेज  name Beyoncé (  ;   born  September  4   ,   1981  )  ,  is  an   अमरीकी   सिंगर  ,  songwriter  , dancer  ,  and actress .
Born and  उठाया   in   ह्यूस्टन   ,   टेक्सास  , she performed  in  singing and  नाचना  competitions as  a   चाइल्ड  before  forming   in   1990  a  समूह  with Kelly Rowland  और   latavia  Roberson that was eventually named Destiny  's  Child .
एकबार  signed to Columbia Records , the girls subsequently became one of the  संसार  's  best-selling  girl groups of  सब  time .
the  group was plagued by internal conflict and legal turmoil and Knowles  suffered  from depression that lasted for a number of years .
During the group  's  hiatus , Knowles released her debut solo  एल्बम  Dangerously in Love (  2003  ) , which  अर्जित  her  पाँच  Grammy Awards  और  has sold a  कुल  of 4.9  लाख  copies in the US alone .
it  spawned Billboard number one singles `` Crazy in Love  ,  '' considered by  vh1  to be the ``  महानतम   सोंग  Of the  00  's , ''  और  ``  baby  Boy . ''
following  the disbandment  of  Destiny 's Child in 2005 , Knowles 's second  सोलो  album B'Day ( 2006 ) contained the top five singles `` Déjà Vu `` , `` Irreplaceable `` , and ``  खूबसूरत  Liar `` .
Her  प्रदर्शन   in  Dreamgirls (  2006  ) earned  उसके   दो  Golden  ग्लोब   nominations  .
Knowles  '   कार्य  playing  etta  James in  कि   फिल्मी  inspired her subsequent  एल्बम  I Am  ...
Sasha  fierce  ( 2008 ) which  शाखित   हिट्स  `` If  i   यहूद  a Boy  ``   ,  `` Single Ladies ( Put a Ring  on   it  ) `` ,  ``  Halo `` , and  ``  Sweet  सपनो   ``  .
The  एल्बम  also helped Knowles earn six  grammys  in  2010  ,  तोड़कर   the  record  लिये  most  ग्रैमी   पुरस्कार  won  by  a female  कलाकार  in one  रात्रि  .
Her fourth album  4  ( 2011 ) deviated towards  परंपरागत   r  & B and became  उसके   चौथी  consecutive  क्रमांक  one album on the  बिलबोर्ड  200 .
in  January 2012  ,  Knowles gave birth  to  daughter  ब्लू  Ivy Carter  ,  her  पहला   चाइल्ड  with husband  jay-z  .
नॉलेस   रै  sold over 13  लाख  albums in the US and 118 million  रिकॉर्ड   विश्वव्यापी   (  as well as  a  further 50 million  रिकॉर्ड  with Destiny 's Child ) , and is one of the best-selling music artists of  सब  time  .
The  रिकॉर्डिंग  Industry  संघ  of America (  riaa  )  पहचाना  Knowles as  the   शीर्ष  Certified Artist of the 2000s  .
In 2009 , Billboard  नामित  her the Top Radio Songs  कलाकार  of the decade and  क्रमित   उसके   the  Top  मादा  Artist  और  the fourth Artist of the Decade .
बेयोंस   नॉलेस   is   the  most nominated woman in Grammy Award history , receiving 17 awards  ;  other accolades include 12  एमटीवी  Video  म्यूज़िक  Awards  ,  7 Billboard Awards including  a  Millennium  पुरस्कार  , and a star on the Hollywood Walk  of  Fame as part of  नियति   's   चाइल्ड  .
``   एंग्री  All  the   समय   ''  is  the   शीर्षक  of  a   सोंग  written by Bruce  robison  and first  अंकित  on his 1998 album Wrapped .
It was  बाद  covered by  टिम   mcgraw  with  अतिथि  vocalist Faith  हिल   .
released  in July  2001  ,  mcgraw  's version was the second single from  mcgraw   's   नियत  This  सर्कस  Down  एल्बम  .
The song reached  क्रमांक  One  on  the Billboard Hot Country  singles  & Tracks (  अभी   hot  Country Songs  )  charts .
Dear John is a 2010 American romantic drama  -   युद्ध  film starring Amanda Seyfried and Channing Tatum .
it  was released theatrically in  उत्तर  America  on   फ़रवरी   5  , 2010 .
the  film was directed by Lasse  hallström  , and it is an adaptation of Nicholas Sparks  's  novel of the same  नाम  .
It  फ़ॉलो   the  life  of  a  सिपाही   (   चेनिंग  Tatum )  बाद   he  falls in love  साथ  a  यंग  woman ( Amanda Seyfried ) .
They  decide   to  exchange  अक्षर   to  each other  बाद   he   is  deployed to the war  .
the   फिल्म   थी  filmed in 2009  in  Charleston ,  दक्षिण   कैरोलिना   .
Despite receiving negative reviews  ,  the film  बना  a strong  बक्सा  office performance  ,   knocking   बंद  Avatar after  सात  weekends in first place and grossing a total of  $   114,977,104   विश्वव्यापी  .
The film  थी  released  on  May 25 , 2010  on  DVD and Blu-ray  .

Hartsfield–Jackson  अटलांटा  International Airport is the busiest single  विमानक्षेत्र  in the United  राज्य  .

Santa Fe ( ; ( Tewa : Ogha Po'oge , ) )  is   the   पूंजी  of the U.S. state  of   नई   मैक्सिको   .
It is the fourth-largest  नगर  in the state  और   is  the seat of .
Santa  fe  (  अर्थ   “holy   faith”   in  Spanish ) had a population of 67,947  in  the 2010  जनसांख्यिकी  .
It is  the   प्रिंसिपल  city of a  महानगर  Statistical Area which encompasses all  of  Santa  fe   काउंटी  and  is  part of the larger Albuquerque-Santa Fe-Las Vegas Combined  सांख्यिकीय  Area  .
The city’s full  नाम   जब   संस्थापित   थी  La Villa  रियल   de  la Santa  fé  de San Francisco de Asís  (  “The Royal  कस्बा   of  the  पावन  Faith  of  St. Francis of Assisi”  )  .
Pepsi ( stylized in  लोअरकेस  as pepsi  ,  formerly  stylized   in  uppercase as PEPSI ) is  a   कार्बोनेटेड  soft drink that is produced and manufactured by PepsiCo .
निर्मित  and developed in  1893  and introduced as Brad 's  पेय  , it was renamed as  pepsi-cola  on August 28  ,  1898 ,  तब  to  पेप्सी  in 1961 .
1765 Broadside
the  Sons of  स्वतंत्रता  was a  समूह  consisting of  अमरीकी   देशप्रेमी  that originated  in  the pre-independence North American British colonies .
The group was formed to  protect  the rights  of  the colonists and  to  take to the streets against the taxes by  the   अंग्रेजों  government  .
They  हैं   बेहतरीन   ज्ञात   लिये  undertaking  the   बोस्टन  Tea  पार्टी  in 1773  ,  which led  to   the  Intolerable Acts  (   an   तीव्र  crackdown by the British  सरकारी  )  ,   और  a counter-mobilization  by  the Patriots .
Osaka  किला
is a city in the Kansai  प्रदेश   of   जापानी   's  main island of  होन्शू  ,  a  designated city under the Local  स्वायत्तता  Law , the capital city  of  Osaka  प्रीफ़ेक्चर   और  also the largest part of the Keihanshin metropolis , which comprises three major cities of Japan , Kyoto  ,  Osaka and  कोबे  .
स्तिथ   at  the mouth of the Yodo River on Osaka  खाड़ी  , Osaka is Japan 's third  largest  city  by  population after Tokyo ( special  wards   )   और   yokohama  .
Keihanshin is  the   दूसरी  largest metropolitan area  in  Japan  by  population and one of the largest  महानगर  areas highly  क्रमित  in  the  world ,  साथ  nearly 19 million people , and by  जीडीपी  the  दूसरी   largest  area in Japan and the seventh  largest   क्षेत्रफल   in  the world .
Historically the commercial  बीच  of  जापानी  , Osaka  कृत्यों  as one of  the  command  centers   लिये  the  जापानी  economy .
the  ratio between  दिन   और  night time  जनसांख्यिकी  is  141  % ,  the  highest in Japan ,  highlighting  its status as an  आर्थिक  center .
Its nighttime  जनसांख्यिकी  is 2.6 million ,  the  third  in  the country , but in  दिन   the  population surges to  3.7  million , second only after  टोकियो   (  combining the special wards of Tokyo , which is not a  सिंगल  incorporated  नगर  , for statistical purposes ; see  the   टोकियो   आलेख  for more  सूचना  on  the   परिभाषा   और  makeup  of  Tokyo ) .
Osaka  प्रयुक्त  to be  referred  to  as   the  in  सामंती  Edo period  क्युकी  it  थी   the  centre  of  trading for rice  ,  creating the  पहला  modern futures  एक्सचेंज   मार्केट  in  the   संसार  .
The Little Mermaid is a 1989 American animated musical fantasy film produced by  वॉल्ट  Disney  विशेषता   एनिमेशन  and  वितरित  by  वॉल्ट  Disney Pictures .
आधारित  on the Danish fairy tale by Hans Christian  andersen  ,  the  Little Mermaid  tells  the  स्टोरी  of a beautiful mermaid  जो  dreams of becoming human .
Written , directed , and produced  by  Ron Clements and John  musker  , with music by Alan Menken and  हावर्ड   ashman  ,  the  film features the voices Jodi Benson , Christopher Daniel  barnes   ,  Pat Carroll ,  सैमुएल   E.  Wright , Jason Marin ,  केनेथ  Mars  ,  Buddy  hacket   ,  and  रेने  Auberjonois .
The 28th  फिल्मी  in the  वॉल्ट  Disney Animated  क्लासिक  series ,  the  Little Mermaid  थी  released to  थिएटर  on  नवम्बर   14   ,  1989 to  largely  positive reviews ,  garnering   $   84  million at  the  box office during  इसके  initial  रिलीज  , and $  211  million in total lifetime  सकल  .
बाद  the  कामयाबी  of the 1988 Disney / Amblin  फिल्मी   जो  Framed Roger Rabbit , The  छोटी  Mermaid is given credit for breathing  जीवन  back  into   the  art  of   डिज़्नी  animated feature films after a string of  नाजुक  or commercial  असफलताओं  produced by Disney that dated back to the early  1970s  .
It also marked the start of  the  era known as the Disney  पुनर्जागरण   .
A  स्टेज  adaptation  of   the  film with  a  book  by   डग  Wright and additional songs by  एलन  Menken  और   नई   गीतों  Glenn Slater opened in Denver  in   जुलाई  2007 and began performances on Broadway  जनवरी  10 , 2008 .
alt=Close-up photo  of   a   मेटल  spoon filled with  a  viscous , clear purple fluid
Purple  पिया  is  a  slang term  लिये  a recreational  ड्रग  popular  in   the  hip hop community in  the   दक्षिणी  United States  ,   originating  in  ह्यूस्टन   ,  Texas  .
Its  प्रमुख  ingredient is prescription -strength cough syrup containing  codeine  and  promethazine   .
Cough syrup is  typically  mixed with  संघटक  such  as   sprite  soft drink or Mountain Dew and pieces of  प्रसन्न  Rancher candy .
the   purplish  hue  of   जामुनी  drank  आता  from dyes in  the  cough  सिरप  .
There are  numerous  slang terms for  जामुनी  drank ,  सहित  sizzurp , lean , syrup  ,   पिया  , barre  ,   जामुनी  jelly , Texas  चाय   ,  and Tsikuni  .
first/given   ,  middle  ,  and last/family/surname  आरेख  with J.  S.   बच  as  उदाहरण  .
J.  S.  बच  shared his given name  साथ  six immediate  परिवार   सदस्यों  and many extended family members .
he  shared his family name with most family members  .
A given name ,  in  Western contexts often  referred   to  as a first name ,  is   a  personal  नाम   कि   specifies   और   differentiates   between  members  of   a   समूह  of individuals , especially in a  परिवार  ,  सब  of  जिनकी  members  प्रायः  share the  वही   परिवार  name ( surname  )  .
A given name is  purposefully  given , usually by a  चाइल्ड  's parents at or  निकट   जनम   ,  in contrast to an  inherited  one such as a family name  .
A given  नाम   is  sometimes  legally  changed through  a  name change  .
दिए  names  हैं   प्रायः  used in a  परिचित  and friendly manner in informal situations  .
In more formal situations the surname  is  used instead , unless it is necessary  to   फर्क  between people  साथ  the same surname  .
the  idiom `` on a first-name basis  ''  (  or  `` on  first-name   शर्तें  ''  )  alludes to the  अपनेपन  of  संबोधित  another  by   a   दिए  name  .
The western style of having  दोनो  a family name ( surname  )   और  a given name  is   दूर   इससे  universal .
In  अनेक   देशों   it  is common  लिये  ordinary  लोगों  to have only one name ( a mononym ) .
Hydrochloric  एसिड   is  a clear , colourless solution of hydrogen chloride ( H Cl ) in water .
it   is   a  highly corrosive , strong  खनिज  acid with many industrial uses .
Hydrochloric acid is found  naturally   in  gastric acid .
Historically  पुकारा  muriatic acid , and spirits of salt  ,   हाइड्रोक्लोरिक  acid was produced  इससे  vitriol  (   sulfuric  acid )  और  common salt  .
It first appeared  दौरान   the  Renaissance , and then it was  प्रयुक्त  by chemists such as Glauber , Priestley and  डेवी  in their scientific  शोध   .
With major production  starting   in  the Industrial Revolution  ,  hydrochloric acid  is  used in the chemical industry as  a   रासायनिक   अभिकर्मक   in  the large-scale production of  विनाइल  chloride for PVC plastic , and  mdi   /  TDI  लिये  polyurethane .
It has numerous smaller-scale  अनुप्रयोग  ,  सहित  household cleaning , production  of  gelatin  और  other  खाना  additives ,  descaling  , and leather processing  .
About  20  million tonnes of  हाइड्रोक्लोरिक  acid are produced  annually   .
Wheat ( Triticum spp  .  ) is a cereal grain  ,  originally from the  levant  region  of  the Near East and Ethiopian  हाइलैंड्स   ,   लकिन  now  cultivated  worldwide  .
In  2010   ,   संसार   उत्पादन   of   गेहूं   थी  651 million tons  ,  making  it  the third  most-produced  cereal after maize ( 844  लाख  tons )  और  rice ( 672 million  टन  ) .
गेहूं  was the second most-produced cereal  in  2009 ; world production in  कि  year was 682 million tons , after  मक्का  ( 817 million  टन  ) ,  और  with  राइस   as  a  बंद   तीसरा   (  679 million  टन   )  .
This grain  is  grown on more  जमीन   क्षेत्रफल  than any  अन्य  commercial food .
संसार  trade in wheat  is  greater  than  for  सब  other crops combined .
Globally , wheat  is  the  अग्रणी  source  of  vegetable protein in human food  ,   having   a  higher protein content than soybeans or  the  other major cereals , maize (  मकई  )  or  rice .
in   शर्तें  of  कुल  production  tonnages  used for  खाना   ,  it is currently  दूसरी   to  rice  as   the   प्रमुख  human food  क्रॉप  and ahead  of   मक्का  ,  बाद  allowing for maize 's more extensive use  in  animal  फ़ीड्स  .
Wheat  थी  a key  फ़ैक्टर   enabling  the emergence of city-based  समाजों  at the  प्रारंभ  of  सभ्यता  because it was one of the first crops  कि  could be easily cultivated on a  विशाल  scale ,  और   था  the additional advantage of yielding a  कटाई  that provides long-term storage  of   खाना  .
गेहूं   contributed  to the emergence of  city-states   in   the  Fertile Crescent , including  the  Babylonian  और  Assyrian empires .
Wheat grain is a staple food used to  मेक  flour  लिये  leavened  ,  flat  और   steamed   breads  , biscuits , cookies ,  cakes   ,  breakfast cereal , pasta ,  नूडल्स   ,  couscous  और  for fermentation  to   मेक   बियर  , other  alcoholic  beverages , or  biofuel  .
Wheat  is  planted  to  a  सीमित  extent as  a  forage  क्रॉप   लिये   पशुधन  , and  इसके  straw can  be   प्रयुक्त  as  a   निर्माण  material  लिये  roofing thatch  .
The whole grain  can  be  milled  to leave just  the  endosperm for  श्वेत  flour .
the  by-products of  इस  are bran and germ .
The whole grain is a concentrated source  of  vitamins ,  खनिज   ,  and protein  ,  while the refined grain is  ज़्यादातर  starch .
Printing
To publish  is  to make content available to the general  पब्लिक  .
While specific use of  the   पद  may vary  among  countries ,  it   is  usually applied to  टेक्स्ट   ,  images , or other  audio-visual  content on any  परंपरागत  medium , including  पेपर  ( newspapers , magazines ,  कैटलॉग  , etc  .   )  .
the   शब्द  publication means  the   अधिनियम   of   प्रकाशन  , and  भी  refers to  कोई  printed copies .
मेलिसा   &   जॉय  is an  एबीसी  Family original television  श्रेणी  starring Melissa  जोन  Hart  और   जॉय   लॉरेंस  .
it  first aired on ABC  परिवार   on   अगस्त   17  , 2010 .
the  series  फ़ॉलो   लोकल   राजनेता  Mel Burke ( Melissa Joan Hart ) and Joe Longo (  जॉय  Lawrence ) , whom Mel hires to look after  उसके  niece and nephew after a Ponzi  योजना  leaves him  broke   .
the  series was renewed by ABC Family for  a  second season  of   पंद्रह  episodes  ,  which began airing on  may  30 , 2012 and  ended   on  August  29  ,  2012  .
मेलिसा  &  जॉय  ranks  as  cable TV 's #  1  telecast at 8  o'clock  across target audiences 18–34 , 18–49 and 12–34 demographics  .
On  अगस्त   17  , 2012  ,   एबीसी  Family  नवीनीकृत   मेलिसा  & Joey for a  तीसरा   ऋतु  , set to  प्रीमियर  in  वसन्त   2013   .
The  धर्मं  wheel  ,  often  प्रयुक्त   to  represent  the  Noble Eightfold Path
The Noble Eightfold  पाथ  ( , ) is  एक  of  the   प्रिंसिपल   शिक्षाओं   of   the  Buddha , who  वर्णित   it  as the  रास्ता   अग्रणी   to   the  cessation  of  suffering (  dukkha   )  and  the   उपलब्धि  of  self-awakening  .
it  is used to develop  इनसाइट   into  the true nature of phenomena ( or  वास्तविकता   )  and  to   eradicate   लोभ   ,  hatred  ,   और   भ्रांति  .
The Noble Eightfold Path is the fourth of the Buddha 's  चार  Noble  सच्चाई  ; the first  तत्व   of  the Noble  eightfold  Path  is  , in turn , an understanding of the Four Noble  सच्चाई  .
It is also known as the  मध्य  Path  or  Middle Way .
सब  eight  तत्व  of the  पाथ  begin  साथ   the  word  ``  right  ''  ,  जिससे  translates the word samyañc (  in   संस्कृत  )  or  sammā  (  in Pāli ) .
These  denote   पूर्णता  , togetherness , and coherence , and can also suggest the senses of  ``  perfect  ''   or  `` ideal  ''  .
'Samma ' is also translated  as  ``  wholesome  ''  ,  `` wise  ''   और  `` skillful '' .
In  बौद्ध   प्रतीकवाद  , the  प्रतिष्ठित  Eightfold Path is often represented by  अर्थात्  of  the   धर्मं  wheel  (  dharmachakra )  ,  whose eight  तीलियां  represent the eight  तत्व  of the path .
The  ग्रैमी  Award  लिये  Song of the  साल  is  an  honor presented  at  the Grammy  पुरस्कार  , a ceremony  कि   थी   स्थापित  in 1958 and  originally  called the  gramophone   पुरस्कार  .
पुरस्कार  in several categories are distributed annually  by  the National Academy  of  Recording Arts and Sciences of  the  United  राज्य  to `` honor  कलाकारी  achievement ,  तकनीकी   proficiency   और  overall excellence in the recording industry , without regard  to  album sales or  चार्ट   स्थिति  .  ''
Economics  is  the social science that  analyzes  the production , distribution , and consumption of goods  और   सेवाएं   .
The  पद  economics comes from the Ancient Greek ( '  ,   ``  management  of   a  household , administration '' ) from  (  ' , ``  हाउस  '' ) + ( '  ,   ``  custom '' or ``  विधि  '' ) , hence  ``   नियम  of  the  house ( hold  )  ''  .
राजनैतिक  economy  थी  the earlier name  लिये   the  subject , but economists in the late 19th century suggested `` economics ''  as  a shorter term for `` economic science ''  कि  also  avoided   a  narrow political-interest  connotation  and as similar  in   रूप  to  ``  mathematics `` , ``  आचार   ''  , and so forth  .
A focus of  the  subject  is  how economic agents behave or  interact  and how economies work .
Consistent with this , a  प्राथमिक  textbook distinction is between microeconomics and macroeconomics .
Microeconomics examines  the   बर्ताव  of basic elements  in  the economy , including individual  एजेंटों  ( such as households and firms or as buyers  और  sellers ) and  बाज़ार  ,  और  their interactions  .
macroeconomics  analyzes  the   संपूर्ण   अर्थव्यवस्था  and  मुद्दे   affecting  it , including unemployment , inflation , economic  विकास  ,  और   मौद्रिक  and fiscal policy  .
Other broad distinctions include those between positive economics ( describing ``  कया  is '' ) and  normative  economics ( advocating  ``   कया  ought  to  be '' )  ;  between economic theory and applied economics ; between rational and behavioral economics ;  और   between   मुख्यधारा   अर्थशास्त्र  ( more `` orthodox ''  और   dealing  with  the  `` rationality-individualism-equilibrium nexus  ''  )  और   शास्त  economics ( more `` radical  ''  and dealing with the  ``   institutions-history-social  structure  नेक्सस   ''   )  .
Economic analysis  may  be  लागू   throughout  society ,  as   in  business  ,  finance , health care , and  सरकारी  , but also to such  विविध  subjects as crime , education , the  परिवार   ,  law , politics ,  धर्म   ,  social  संस्थानों  ,  युद्ध  , and  विज्ञान  .
At the turn  of  the 21st century , the  expanding  domain of economics in  the  social  sciences   रै  been described  as   आर्थिक  imperialism  .
An increasing  क्रमांक  of economists have called for  increased  emphasis on environmental sustainability ;  इस  area  of  research  is  known as  ecological  economics .
This is a list  of   अनुसूची  IV drugs under the  नियंत्रित  Substances Act  लिये  the  संयुक्त  States .
जरूरी   निष्कर्षों  for drugs to be  लगाई   in   इस  schedule:
The drug or other  पदार्थ  has a low  संभावित   लिये   गाली  relative to  the  drugs  or  other substances in  अनुसूची   iii   .
the  drug or other substance  रै  a  फिलहाल  accepted medical use in  उपचार  in the United  राज्य   .
गाली  of the drug or other substance  may  lead to  सीमित  physical dependence  or  psychological dependence relative to  the  drugs or other substances in schedule  iii  .
The complete list  of   अनुसूची  IV drugs are as follows .
the   प्रशासनिक  Controlled  substances   कोड  Number for each  ड्रग  is  शामिल  .
US  काउंटी  household  मध्य   आय  2009  .
Median US  household  income ,  2001-2011
household  income  is  a measure commonly  प्रयुक्त   by   the   संयुक्त  States government and private institutions  .
प्रत्येक  household  is   measured  by  the  income of every resident over  the  age  of   15  .
Income includes wages and salaries , unemployment  बीमे  ,  विकलांगता  payments , child support  भुगतान  received  ,   नियमित   rental  receipts , as  खूब  as any  निजी   कारोबार  ,  निवेश  , or other  kinds  of income  प्राप्त   routinely  .
While inflation-adjusted (  ``   रियल   ''  ) household income had been increasing  लगभग  every year from 1945 to 1999 , it has since been flat and even decreased recently  .
U.S. median  household  income fell from $ 51,144 in  2010  to  $  50,502 in 2011 .
चरम  poverty in the United States , meaning households  जीना  on  कम  than $ 2  प्रति  day before government benefits , doubled  इससे  1996 to 1.5 million households in 2011  ,  including 2.8  लाख  children .
the   निवासियों  of the household  do  not have to be related to the  सिर  of the household for their earnings to be  माना  part  of  the  household  's income .
as  households  tend   to  share  a  similar economic context , the  उपयोग  of household  आय   remains  among the most widely  स्वीकृत   उपायों   of  income  .
That  the  size  of  a household  is  not commonly taken into  खाता   in  such measures  may   विकृत   कोई   विश्लेषण   of  fluctuations  भीतर   or  among the household  आय  categories  ,  and may render direct comparisons  between   quintiles  difficult  or  even impossible .
The lapse  रेट  is defined as  the   रेट  of  घटी  with  ऊँचाई   लिये   an   वायुमंडलीय  variable .
The variable involved  is  temperature  जबतक  specified otherwise  .
The  शब्दावली  arises from  the  word lapse in  the  sense  of  a decrease or  मनाही   .
While most often applied to Earth 's atmosphere  the  concept can  be   विस्तारित  to any gravitationally  समर्थित  ball of  गैस  .
Blue Mountain State is  an   अमरीकी  comedy series that  premiered  on Spike on January 11 ,  2010   .
The series producers  शामिल   क्रिस   romano   और   eric  Falconer ,  और   it   is   उत्पादित  by  lionsgate   टेलीविज़न   .
the  series  is  about a fictional  विश्वविद्यालयों   ,  Blue  पहाड़  State ,  और   इसके   फ़ुटबॉल  team  ,  ``  the  Mountain Goats  .  ''
It portrays  निश्चित   पहलुओं  of American  विश्वविद्यालयों  life ,  सहित  football , sex ,  binge   पीने   ,  drugs  ,  wild partying , and hazing  .
In February 2012 ,  it  was  reported  that Blue Mountain State would  नहीं   be  renewed for a fourth season .
In March  2013  , Ed  marinaro   stated  that  he  is working on a  ब्लू  Mountain  राज्य  film  .
Apple Inc.  ,  formerly Apple Computer , Inc. , is  an  American  बहुराष्ट्रीय  corporation headquartered in  cupertino  , California  कि  designs , develops , and sells consumer electronics , computer  तन्त्र  and personal  कंप्यूटर  .
इसके   best-known   हार्डवेयर   उत्पाद  are the Mac line  of  computers , the  ipod  music  खिलाड़ी  , the  iphone   स्मार्टफोन  ,  और   the  iPad tablet computer .
इसके   तन्त्र  includes the OS X and iOS operating systems , the iTunes media  ब्राउजर  , the Safari web browser ,  और  the iLife  और  iWork creativity and production  suites   .
The company was founded on April 1  ,  1976  ,  and incorporated  as   ठहराना   कंप्यूटर   ,  Inc. on January 3 , 1977  .
the  word ``  कंप्यूटर   ''   थी  removed from  इसके  name on January 9 , 2007 , reflecting its shifted  फ़ोकस  towards consumer  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स  after  the   परिचय  of the iPhone  .
Apple is  the  world 's  second-largest  information technology company  by  revenue after Samsung  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स  , and  the   संसार   's  third-largest mobile phone maker after Samsung and  नोकिया  .
Fortune magazine named  ठहराना  the most admired  कम्पनी   in  the  संयुक्त   राज्य  in 2008  ,  and  in   the  world  इससे  2008 to  2012  .
However  ,  the company has  प्राप्त  criticism for its contractors '  मजदूर  practices , and for Apple 's own environmental and business practices  .
, Apple maintains  394  retail  स्टोर्स  in fourteen countries as well as the  ऑनलाइन  Apple Store  और   itunes  Store .
It is the second-largest publicly  traded   निगम  in the  संसार  by market  capitalization  ,  साथ  an estimated value of US $  414   अरब  as of  जनवरी  2013 .
,  the   कम्पनी  had 72,800  स्थाई  full-time  कर्मचारी  and 3,300 temporary  full-time   कर्मचारी  worldwide  .
Its worldwide annual revenue  in   2012  totalled  $  156 billion  .
Section 8 housing in the South Bronx
खण्ड  8 of the Housing Act  of  1937  (   )  ,  प्रायः  simply known  as  Section  8   ,  as  repeatedly  amended , authorizes the payment of rental housing  सहायता   to  private landlords on  निमित्त  of approximately 3.1 million low-income households .
It operates through  अनेक  programs , the largest of which , the Housing Choice Voucher program  ,  pays a  विशाल  portion  of  the rents  और   उपयोगिताएँ  of  परिचय  2.1  लाख  households .
The  us  Department of Housing  और  Urban  विकास   manages  the Section 8 programs .
The  आवास  Choice Voucher Program  provides  ``  tenant-based  '' rental assistance , so  a  tenant can move  इससे   एक  unit of  at  least  न्यूनतम   आवास   विशेषता   to  another  .
It  भी   allows  individuals to apply their monthly  वाउचर   towards  the purchase  of  a home , with over $ 17  अरब  going towards such purchases each  साल   (  from ncsha.org  विश्लेषण  )  .
the  maximum  अनुमत  voucher is $ 2200  a  month .
Section 8 also authorizes a variety  of  ``  project-based  '' rental assistance  कार्यक्रम   ,  under which the owner reserves some  or   सब  of  the  units  in  a building for low-income  किरायेदारों  , in return for  a  Federal  सरकारी  guarantee to  मेक  up  the   अंतर  between  the  tenant  's   योगदान  and the rent for 1 cent in the owner 's contract with the government .
a  tenant who leaves a  subsidized  project  होगा  lose access to the project-based subsidy  .
The  संयुक्त  States Department of  आवास  and Urban Development and  संयुक्त   राज्य  Department  of  Veterans  अफेयर्स  have  a   खास  Section 8  कार्यक्रम   पुकारा  VASH ( Veterans Affairs Supportive Housing ) , or  hud-vash   ,  which gives out a certain  क्रमांक  of Section 8 vouchers to eligible homeless  और  otherwise  vulnerable  US armed  शक्तियां   दिग्गजों  .
Restaurants  categorized   by  type and information about  ये  different  प्रकार  .
U.S. Federal Reserve  टीप  in the mid-1990s
